steps: Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve.
ingredients: cabbage, russet potatoes, cooked ham, chicken broth, half-and-half
name: potato cabbage soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Prepare the caramel apple bake according to package directions. Pour batter into a greased 9x13 pan. Melt butter in a small saucepan, add sugar and pecans then cook over medium heat, stirring frequently until all the sugar dissolves. Drizzle the caramel mixture over brownie batter and bake until a toothpick can be inserted and withdrawn cleanly, about 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: apples, baking mix, cinnamon, caramels, nuts, brown sugar, margarine
name: caramel apple bake

steps: Combine all the ingredients except the lobster tails and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the lobster tails and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered
ingredients: lemon juice, olive oil, salt, paprika, black pepper, garlic powder, rock lobster tail
name: grilled rock lobster tails

steps: Combine sugar and water and bring to the boil. Simmer 5 minutes to make a syrup. Allow to cool. Combine berry puree with lemon juice and syrup. Place in a metal bowl or tray. Freeze till set.
ingredients: water, sugar, frozen raspberries, mango, fresh raspberry
name: valentine granita

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl mix sugar, water, orange juice concentrate, pecan halves, orange zest. Add 1 cup of oatmeal to each of 6 bowls. Sprinkle evenly with pecans and the remaining orange zest. Serve immediately.
ingredients: sugar, water, orange juice concentrate, pecan halves, orange zest
name: orange sugared pecans

steps: Heat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, apple, onion, oats, mustard, rosemary, poultry seasoning and salt in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce.
ingredients: red onion, nonfat sour cream, dijon mustard, fresh thyme, butter, sourdough bread, fat-free honey roasted turkey breast, tomatoes, muenster cheese
name: grilled tomato smoked turkey and muenster sandwich

steps: In a stock pot, place chicken parts, onion, carrot, celery ribs, garlic cloves, parsley, whole cloves, dried thyme, salt and pepper, long grain white rice. Cover with water. Boil for thirty to forty minutes, remove chicken from pot. Allow chicken to cool remove skin and bones, then chop chicken into bite-size pieces. Add chicken back to soup, add parsley, pasta, salt and pepper. Allow to simmer until noodles are cooked. You may need to add water to keep soup soupy after pasta has cooked. Use your own judgment.
ingredients: chicken parts, onion, carrot, celery ribs, garlic cloves, parsley, whole cloves, dried thyme, salt and pepper, long grain white rice
name: chicken soup with rice

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add corn, egg yolks, flour, sugar, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Beat egg whites with an electric mixer set at high speed until stiff peaks form, about 2 minutes. Stir egg whites into corn mixture. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of corn batter into skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook until nuggets are browned, about 3 minutes per side.
ingredients: corn kernels, self-raising flour, eggs, spring onions, potato, chili, coriander, milk, vegetable oil, salt
name: chilli corn tamale cakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: burritos, mild enchilada sauce, green onion, black olives, cheddar cheese
name: easy wet burrito

steps: Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture evenly between the three pie crusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze for at least 2 hours. May top with additional cool whip and chocolate shavings or chopped peanuts.
ingredients: creamy peanut butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, cream cheese, whipped topping, ice cream topping, oreo cookie pie crusts
name: peanut butter pie semi homemaker recipe sandra lee

steps: Combine tart cherry pulp, sugar, butter, almond extract, brandy, and lemon juice in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until the pulp and sugar dissolves. Remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Skim off any foam. Ladle into hot jars. Clean the rims, seal, and process in hot water bath for 10 minutes.
ingredients: cherry pulp, sugar, sure-jell, butter, almond extract
name: tart cherry jam cooked

steps: Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: chickpeas, onion, carrots, broccoli, chives, breadcrumbs, olive oil, vegetable broth, salt
name: chickpea broccoli casserole

steps: Melt butter in a saucepan. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add lemon mixture to mushrooms, stirring until sauce is absorbed.
ingredients: olive oil, unsalted butter, mixed herbs, thyme, garlic cloves, dried onion flakes, wine, sliced mushrooms, worcestershire sauce
name: sauteed steak house style mushrooms

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup cream and coffee. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. In a medium bowl, combine chocolates. Through a fine-mesh strainer, strain cream mixture over chocolates. Stir until chocolates are melted. In a medium bowl, beat remaining 2 cups cream and vanilla at high speed with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. Fold whipped cream mixture into chocolate mixture. Cover and chill. Chilling can take up to 4 hours.
ingredients: milk, instant coffee granules, vanilla instant pudding mix, frozen whipped topping, frozen pound cake, semisweet chocolate, ground cinnamon
name: cappuccino mousse trifle

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pound chicken breasts between sheets of waxed paper. Mix gruyere cheese, pesto, pine nuts, and green onions in a small bowl. Spread 2 tablespoons of the cheese mixture on top of each chicken breast and roll tightly. Dredge chicken breasts in flour. Saute chicken breasts in heated oil at medium-high heat until golden brown, turning occasionally, for approximately 6 minutes. Place chicken in pan and bake until chicken is tender and cooked through, about 20 minutes. Place chicken in pan and bake until chicken is tender and cooked through, about
ingredients: french rolls, basil pesto, grilled chicken, gruyere cheese, arugula leaf
name: pesto chicken and arugula panini

steps: In a large pot of boiling salted water, heat the cream in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer covered for 15 minutes. Stir in cooked sausage, kale or spinach simmer for about 5 minutes more or until kale is tender. Season to taste with pepper.
ingredients: rigatoni pasta, onion, smoked sausage, cannellini beans, sun-dried tomato, chicken broth, fresh rosemary leaves, parmesan cheese
name: tuscan rigatoni white beans

steps: Preheat broiler. Combine all ingredients, except butter and flour. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Blend melted butter with the flour to make a roux. Add roux to the corn and mix well. Remove from heat. Pour into a casserole dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Broil until cheese is nicely browned.
ingredients: kernel corn, whipping cream, butter, flour, salt, sugar, white pepper, parmesan cheese
name: summit house classic creamed corn au gratin

steps: Put in food proscessor. Mix togethar, so meat is mixed well with venison. Make into burgers. And fry on grill or frying pan. Salt and pepper.
ingredients: venison, mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, sliced mushrooms, butter, salt, pepper
name: venison or beef country style stew

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes.
ingredients: ground chuck, soft breadcrumbs, milk, vegetable oil, worcestershire sauce, vinegar, sugar, ketchup, onion, salt and pepper
name: best hamburgers in bbq sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast half, margarine, onions, celery, chicken bouillon cube, water, pepperidge farm stuffing, salt and pepper
name: boneless chicken breast

steps: To a blender, add ice and all ingredients except lime. Blend until ice is fully crushed and liquid is frothy. To a blender, add ice and all ingredients except lime. Pour into the glass. Add in the sprite to the glass. Shake vigorously for 5-10 seconds. Add in the
ingredients: tequila, vodka, rum, triple sec, sour mix, cola
name: texas tea

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour and baking soda in a bowl. Beat butter, peanut butter, sugars, and vanilla in a large mixing bowl until creamy. Beat in eggs. Beat in flour mixture. Stir in oats and chocolate chips. Drop by mounded tablespoons onto a ungreased cookie sheet about 3 inches apart then bake for 10 to 15 mins. Or until they are light brown. Let stand on cookie sheets 3 minutes then remove to wire racks to cool.
ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, white sugar, vanilla, flour, water, baking soda, oats, chocolate chips
name: easy chocolate chip oatmeal cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Preheat oven to 350f. Preheat
ingredients: potatoes, beetroots, sweet potato, olive oil, thyme leaves, salt and pepper, fresh cream, parmesan cheese, gruyere cheese
name: potato beetroot and sweet potato gratin

steps: In a small saucepan, combine the brown sugar, butter, cream and maple syrup. Cook and stir over medium heat for 4-5 minutes or until sauce is smooth. Stir in bananas. Heat through. Remove from the heat. Stir in extract. Serve over ice cream.
ingredients: bananas, brown sugar, lemon, juice of, butter, rum, vanilla ice cream
name: rummy baked bananas

steps: Put jello in a pyrex. Pour boiling water over and stir until completely dissolved. Fold in all fruit and 1 cup nuts. Put in fridge to congeal. When jello is totally set, spread sour cream over top. Sprinkle with rest of pecans. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Prep time doe not include refrigerator time.
ingredients: fresh strawberries, bananas, sugar, water, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cornstarch
name: strawberries and bananas

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan, add onion and saute until soft. Remove seeds and rib of pepper, chop, add to saucepan and cook for 5 minutes. Add beef cubes and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add stock and thyme. Season with salt and simmer for about half an hour. Serve with cooked rice.
ingredients: oleo, ground beef, onion, noodles, corn, ripe olives, canned tomatoes, cheese
name: beef corn noodle casserole

steps: Mash the banana in a medium bowl. Add the egg, vanilla, yogurt, and water. Whisk until a bit frothy and smooth. In a smaller bowl mix the flour, baking soda, baking powder and cocoa powder. Sift it into the banana mixture. Mix until just blended. It will be thick. Use a ladle to drop some batter on a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Cook about 1-2 minutes per side. When bubbles form on one side, its time to flip them over.
ingredients: banana, eggs, vanilla extract, walnuts, cooking spray, almond butter
name: flourless banana bread pancakes

steps: Spread the egg mixture evenly over the buttered side of the bread. Arrange the cheese on four slices, and top with the salami and remaining bread. Press firmly together. Beat the eggs and olive oil together, adding salt and pepper to taste. Heat the cooking oil in a frying pan. Dip each sandwich into the egg mixture, fry 2 sandwiches at a time until golden brown, turning with a spatula to crisp both sides. Drain on absorbent kitchen paper and serve.
ingredients: egg, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese, hamburger bun, prepared mustard
name: simple fried egg sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella string cheese, mozzarella cheese. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: manicotti, ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella string cheese, mozzarella cheese
name: easy to stuff manicotti

steps: Mix all ingredients on medium speed for 2 minutes. Pour into greased and floured bundt or tube pan. Bake at 350 degrees for about 55 minutes, or until inserted toothpick comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes, then turn out of pan. Cool. Dust with powdered sugar if desired.
ingredients: corn muffin mix, water, egg, black beans, cooked chicken, salsa, ground cumin, fresh cilantro, cheddar cheese, light sour cream
name: mexican corn cakes

steps: Heat oil in a skillet. Add lavash bread, carrot, lebanese cucumber, garlic clove, mint, parsley, fresh ground black pepper, celery rib, snow peas. Stir well. Garnish with remaining green onions. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour to blend flavours.
ingredients: yoghurt, lavash bread, carrot, lebanese cucumber, garlic clove, mint, parsley, fresh ground black pepper, celery rib, snow peas
name: herb and vegie yoghurt dip

steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add the onion, mushrooms, carrot, and thyme, and saute until the onion is just translucent, about 4-5 minutes. Add the broth and mashed potatoes. Stir until potatoes are mostly dissolved and broth is smooth. Add the turkey and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through, about 10 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: canola oil, onions, celery, carrots, canadian bacon, chicken broth, turkey, potatoes, fresh sage, black pepper
name: turkey and potato soup with canadian bacon cooking light

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, celery, green pepper, garlic clove, stewed tomatoes, sugar, water, hot sauce. Bring to a boil, stirring well. Cover and simmer until liquid is absorbed, and rice is tneder, about 10-12 minutes. Remove from heat, and let rest 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: beef liver, celery, onion, green pepper, garlic clove, stewed tomatoes, sugar, water, hot sauce
name: beef liver creole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f place the pork char shu chinese side by side, fat side up in a large heavy roasting pan. Insert an ovenproof meat thermometer in the center of one of the roast. Roast the pork for 30 minutes. Meanwhile in a bowl, crush the rosemary with the olive oil, pepper, vinegar and salt. Spoon the seasoning over the pork. Return the meat to the oven and roast for 30 minutes longer, until the internal temperature is 160 to 165. Remove from the oven, cover loosely with foil and let rest for at least 10 minutes. Thinly slice the meat and arrange on platters. Pour any juices over the meat. Garnish with rosemary springs. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: water, sugar, salt, dark soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic, ground ginger, pork roast
name: roast pork char shu chinese

steps: Place the rice into a pan with the milk and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes. Strain through a cheesecloth or fine mesh sieve. Stir in the sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and peel. Chill in the refrigerator and serve.
ingredients: coconut milk, water, rice, salt
name: rice cooked in coconut wali wa nazi

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Grease or spray a large cookie sheet. Stir together dry ingredients including the sugar. Cut butter into flour mixture. Add raisins, stir to mix well. Beat egg in measuring cup. Add milk to make 1 cup. Stir into flour. Drop roughly tablespoon size scoops on cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: plain flour, baking powder, salt, butter, milk
name: edmonds scones

steps: Place celery, water, and bouillon in med saucepan. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover and cook approx 15 minutes or until celery is crisp-tender. Drain, add butter, cover and let stand until butter melts. Sprinkle with cheese and parsley.
ingredients: butter, onion, garlic clove, celery ribs, apple, chicken broth, salt, ground black pepper, ground sage, dried thyme
name: braised celery with apple

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Butter two baking sheets, or place silicon baking sheets on them. In a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. With an electric mixer on low speed, add the butter until blended. Whisk together the eggs, zest and vanilla, and add this to the flour mixture, and continue beating on low until you have a smooth dough. Pinch off a small piece of dough about the size of a small golf ball and roll it into a log about 2 inches long. Roll the log into the sesame seeds, pressing them so seeds stay on. Place the cookie on the prepared baking sheets keeping the cookies two inches apart. Bake for 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool, and store in airtight containers.
ingredients: sesame seeds, light brown sugar, granulated sugar, butter, chunky peanut butter, egg, flour, salt, baking soda, nutmeg
name: golden sesame cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, brown sugar, eggs, maraschino cherry juice, flour, baking powder, maraschino cherries, pecans, powdered sugar. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely.
ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, maraschino cherry juice, flour, baking powder, maraschino cherries, pecans, powdered sugar
name: mini holiday muffins

steps: In 4-quart saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook onion and garlic in butter 2 to 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until tender. Stir in flour, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, 1 minute. Stir in broth, broccoli and corn. Heat to boiling over high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer 5 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender. Stir in half-and-half. Cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until hot.
ingredients: coconut fat, olive oil, leeks, ground habanero chile pepper, corn, vegetable broth, salt
name: spicy vegan corn chowder

steps: Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh green beans, onion, garlic, pecans, olive oil
name: roasted green beans with garlic onions and pecans

steps: Mix the salt and chile powder on a small plate. Rub the rims of 4 martini glasses with the lime wedge, then dip the rims in the salt mixture to coat. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, and add all of the remaining ingredients. Shake vigorously, then strain into glasses. Serve immediately.
ingredients: frozen limeade concentrate, gold tequila, triple sec, fresh mango, mango nectar, grand marnier, ice, salt
name: mango margaritas

steps: Place chicken breasts in a lightly greased shallow baking dish. Season with the taco seasoning mix. Pour the salsa over the chicken. Bake at 350 for 35 to 45 minutes, or until chicken is tender. When ready to serve, remove the chicken from the pan, stir sour cream into salsa, then return chicken. Serve salsa sour cream chicken with a big tossed salad and spanish rice. This chicken breast recipe serves 4.
ingredients: oil, skinless chicken breast halves, salsa, water, frozen corn, ricotta cheese, minute rice, cheddar cheese
name: salsa chicken skillet

steps: Preheat a grill for high heat. When the grill is hot, lightly oil the grate. In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, worcestershire sauce, hickory seasoning, salt and pepper until well blended. Make 8 or 10 balls, and flatten into patties. On one half of the patties, distribute the onions, mushrooms, ham and cheese. Carefully cover the piles with the remaining patties, making sure to seal all of the edges of the patties together tightly and enclose the filling. Grill the patties for 8 to 10 minutes per side, or until meat is well done, and cheese in the center is melted.
ingredients: lean ground beef, garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, salt, pepper, barbecue sauce, kaiser rolls
name: cowboy hamburgers

steps: Preheat oven to 190c grease a patty tin or use paper cups. Sift flour and baking powder. Cream fat and sugar until mixture is light and creamy. Add in vanilla essence. Beat egg and add it gradually to the mixture, beating well after each addition. Fold in the sifted flour with a metal spoon. Add a little milk if necessary to give it a soft dropping consistency. Mix in the raisins. Fill greased patty tin or paper cups half full with the mixture. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: butter, self raising flour, golden caster sugar, currants, egg, sunflower oil
name: welsh cakes

steps: Combine the mustard, honey, sugar and vinegar in a saucepan and whisk to mix. Bring to a simmer over low heat and cook gently, uncovered, until richly flaovred, about 5 minutes, whisking from time to time. Remove from heat and season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve warm or at room temperature. The glaze will keep, tightly covered in the refrigerator, for several weeks.
ingredients: small pretzels, prepared mustard, honey, cider vinegar, dry mustard
name: mustard pretzels

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter, brown sugar, spiced rum, nutmeg. Heat about 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in carrots and cook until coated with sauce and just heated through. Serve hot.
ingredients: carrots, coconut, sugar, ghee
name: carrot coconut barfi

steps: In a large bowl or cork, toss the zucchini with the salt. Cover and let stand in a cool place for 8-12 hours. In a non-reactive saucepan, combine the sugar and vinegar. Bring to a boil, then let it cool. Rinse the zucchini, and drain it well. Pack the vegetable mixture firmly into pint mason jars. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables. Close the jars with hot two-piece caps. Process the jars for 20 minutes in a boiling water bath. Store the cooled jars in a cool, dry, dark place for at least 3 weeks before eating the zucchini.
ingredients: zucchini, salt, rice vinegar, granulated sugar, sesame oil, garlic cloves, hot pepper flakes
name: quick zucchini pickles

steps: Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add bay leaf, soy sauce and garlic powder. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve.
ingredients: boneless chuck roast, prepared horseradish, carrots, potatoes, onions, salt, black pepper, apple juice, sour cream
name: savory crock pot pot roast

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chocolate chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, unsalted butter, sugar, vanilla, salt, eggs, all-purpose flour, walnuts
name: classic unsweetened chocolate brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a small sauce pan, heat the sesame oil, almonds and sesame seeds on medium high. Toast the almonds and seeds stirring constantly until the sesame seeds start turning golden brown. Immediately pour the nuts and seeds into the soy sauce mix and stir. Add in the scallions, and then pour the dressing over the salad. Toss the salad until the dressing is completely incorporated. Allow the salad to sit at room temperature for at least 30 minutes before serving up to 4 hours.
ingredients: almond meal, sesame seeds, parmesan cheese, egg white, prepared mustard, garlic powder, salt
name: low carb sesame crackers

steps: Combine egg yolks and sugar in a medium-sized bowl and beat well. In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites to stiff peaks. In a third, larger bowl, combine the egg yolk mixture with the mascarpone, then fold in the egg whites to produce a creamy mixture. Arrange a tight layer of ladyfingers in a 9-by-12-inch serving dish. Using a spoon, drizzle about half the liqueur and half the espresso over the ladyfingers. Cover the ladyfingers with the mascarpone mixture and the grated chocolate, and dust it with a little more than half the cocoa. Cover the filling with a second layer of ladyfingers and drizzle with the remaining liqueur and espresso. Place the dish in the refrigerator for at least 12 hours. Top with the remaining cocoa before serving.
ingredients: eggs, granulated sugar, mascarpone cheese, brewed coffee, coffee-flavored liqueur, ladyfingers, unsweetened cocoa powder
name: president s choice tiramisu

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, cooking spray
name: lemon grilled chicken breasts

steps: In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs.
ingredients: cantaloupe, sugar, fresh lemon juice, mint leaf, basil leaves, light rum, ice
name: cantaloupe daiquiris

steps: Put the dressing in a small mixing bowl and put it on to boil. Put the sultanas into a small bowl, then cover them with boiling water and set them aside. To make the citrus dressing, peel and finely grate the ginger into a small mixing bowl. Finely grate half the rind from the lemon and then from the orange into the bowl. Squeese the juice from half of the lemon and then from half of the orange and add it to the ginger in the mixing bowl. Stir in the sour cream or yogurt and set the dressing aside. Peel the carrots and grate them into a serving bowl, then drain the sultanas and add them. Stir the dressing into the carrots and sultana mixture, then season with salt and add honey or sugar to taste. Finally, stir in the chopped nuts and serve.
ingredients: carrot, pickled ginger, orange juice, salt, pepper
name: carrot orange ginger dressing

steps: In a wide shallow dish, whisk the egg, yogurt and salt. Brush one side of bread slices with melted butter. Layer the ham, swiss and cheddar on the buttered side of 2 slices of the bread. Top with remaining bread, buttered side inward. Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a cast iron skillet over medium-low heat. Carefully dip both sides of the sandwich into the egg mixture, holding sides of sandwich together. Cover and cook in skillet until golden, then turn and cook other side until cheese is melted. Add additional butter to skillet as needed. Dust with powdered sugar and serve immediately.
ingredients: bread, ham, gruyere cheese, eggs, milk, cinnamon sugar, vanilla, powdered sugar, raspberry jam
name: simply baked monte cristos

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray 13x9 pan with cooking spray. Drain butter beans and pour into pan. Add all other ingredients and mix well. Bake for 1 hour or until brown and bubbling.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, baked beans, refrigerated biscuit, cheddar cheese
name: beef and bean round up

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Saut salmon and chive in butter until tender. Add salt to taste. Beat eggs and milk together in small bowl. Sprinkle parmesan in bottom of well greased muffin trays or pie dish. Layer salmon and chive in bottom of well greased muffin trays or pie dish. Layer salmon and chive in bottom of well greased muffin tr
ingredients: butter, breadcrumbs, light sour cream, eggs, red salmon, fresh chives, tasty cheese, plain flour, parsley
name: salmon and chive crustless quiche

steps: Heat oven to 425. Cut the bottoms off the brussels sprouts and trim any damaged leaves. Cut in half. Add the rest of the ingredients into a bowl. Mix to combine. Add broccoli, then pine nuts and wine. Add lemon juice a bit at a time. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and simmer until liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: unsalted butter, yellow onions, chicken stock, kosher salt, ground black pepper, couscous, pine nuts, fresh parsley
name: couscous with toasted pine nuts

steps: Put your brats in a large pot and dump in the 2 beers, onion, season all and garlic powder. Add water until the brats are fully covered. Cook 20 minutes on medium heat, meanwhile, heat up your grill. Transfer your brats to the grill and cook 4-5 minutes on each side. Be careful not to pierce the brats with a fork or anything because this will let the good tasting juices out. Discard the beer & onion mixture. Place a slice of cheese in each hot dog bun and add your brats on top. Add desired condiments.
ingredients: bratwursts, beer, onion, hot pepper, olive oil, hot dog bun, mustard
name: beer brats with onions and peppers

steps: Heat oil in a wok. Add cabbage, garlic, black bean sauce, stir fry for 1 minute. Stir in the spinach, chili sauce, and lemon juice, and mix well. Keep stirring for about 3 minutes, until cabbage is soft, about 20-30 minutes. Add cabbage to the skillet and saut for 1 minute or until aromatic. Add garlic to the skillet and stir to coat in bacon drippings and garlic. Add rotel, reserved crumbled bacon, salt and pepper and stir to combine. Simmer over low to med heat until cabbage is soft, about 20-30 minutes. Add garlic to the skillet
ingredients: bacon, cabbage, garlic powder, salt, ground mustard
name: bacon cabbage stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 16 muffin cups. Cut each carrot in half crosswise to create 2 short round rolls. Press each half roll into one muffin cup, forming it into a cup shape. Mix together ther blueberries, preserves and lemon peel, and spoon some of the mixture into each muffin cup. Sprinkle each cup with pecans. Bake 12 minutes at 375 degrees until golden brown. Cool for 10 minutes in the muffin tin, then remove and place on wire rack. Drizzle icing over rolls.
ingredients: carrot, zucchini, red capsicum, red onion, creamed corn, barbecue sauce, seasoned stuffing mix, white bread, egg, butter
name: vegetable rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey and curry powder. Spread over chicken pieces. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. Baste while baking and be careful that sauce does not burn.
ingredients: honey, margarine, curry powder, dry mustard, potatoes, chicken
name: honey glazed chicken and potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chocolate chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: brownie mix, kahlua, chocolate pudding mix, cool whip, candy bars
name: brownie trifle

steps: Place 1 cup beef stock and 1 cup water in sauce pan. Add diced tomato and bring to a boil. Cook until tomatoes are easily pierced with a fork, about 10 minutes. While the potatoes are boiling, cook the frozen vegetables, according to the package, in the microwave. When the potatoes are tender, reduce heat to medium and add the remaining ingredients except water. Use an additional cup of stock if you desire a stronger flavored broth. Add enough water to cover the meat and veggies with broth. Stir to combine. Allow to simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until heated thoroughly.
ingredients: lean ground beef, ranch-style pinto beans, tomatoes and green chilies, minestrone soup
name: super easy spicy beef minestrone soup

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place cubed chicken in a ungreased rectangular baking dish, 13 x 9 x 2 inches. Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes, cook thoroughly. Meanwhile, start cooking your rice according to your package directions. Then in a large bowl, add the remaining ingredients and still well. When the chicken is done remove it from oven. Spoon in the ingredients from the bowl. Cover and cook for 30 minutes. Serve hot over rice and be sure to get lots of the juice.
ingredients: whole chicken, lemon juice, onion, carrots, bay leaf, rosemary, salt and pepper, white wine, apple, sugar
name: pollo rio negro marinated chicken

steps: Heat oil in skillet, add onion, pepper, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic and tomato paste. Cook for 10 minutes. Bring sauce to a boil, then add shrimp and lemon juice. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 2 minutes. Add coconut milk and stir-fry 3-4 minutes until shrimp are pink and opaque. Add cilantro. Toss well and transfer to serving plates. Top each serving with 1 tablespoon toasted coconut and 1 tablespoon chopped peanuts. Garnish with lime wedges.
ingredients: basmati rice, unsalted butter, garlic clove, crushed red pepper flakes, medium shrimp, low sodium chicken broth, coconut milk, fresh lime juice, salt, fresh cilantro
name: coconut shrimp and rice

steps: In bowl, mix milk, sugar and lemon juice. Stir well. Chill until ready to use. Place melon in lg bowl. Add coconut milk mixture and toss to coat.
ingredients: powdered milk, ricotta cheese, sugar, butter, cardamom powder, cashew nuts, almonds, saffron
name: kalakand

steps: In small bowl, mix together heavy cream, milk, vanilla extract, limoncello, eggs, granulated sugar, stale bread. Stir well and leave to sit for 1 hour. Lightly beat heavy cream, milk, vanilla extract, limoncello, eggs, granulated sugar, stale bread. Spoon into four glasses or serving dishes, drizzle over the remaining coffee and sprinkle with remaining chocolate. Chill at least one hour and up to 4 hours. Dust lightly with icing sugar before serving.
ingredients: heavy cream, milk, vanilla extract, limoncello, eggs, granulated sugar, stale bread
name: carraba s limoncello bread pudding

steps: Mix all ingredients and bring to soft ball stage, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir until mixture thickens, becomes creamy and cloudy, and pecans stay suspended in mixture. Spoon out on aluminum foil or parchment paper. Makes approximately fifteen to twenty pralines, depending on size.
ingredients: pecans, sugar, milk, light corn syrup, butter, vanilla
name: creole pralines

steps: In a saucepan, combine milk, whipping cream, cornstarch, white chocolate, rose essence, salt. Gradually whisk in milk until smooth. Cook, whisking constantly, over medium-high heat for about 5 minutes or until boiling and thickened. Remove from heat. Whisk in vanilla. Divide among custard cups or dessert dishes. Let cool to lukewarm or serve chilled.
ingredients: milk, whipping cream, cornstarch, white chocolate, rose essence, salt
name: white chocolate rose pudding

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan
ingredients: water, carrots, zucchini, yellow squash, butter, fresh dill weed, onion powder, garlic powder, salt
name: steamin vegetable medley

steps: Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Add pasta. Cook 8 minutes. Add shrimp to pot. Cook 3 minutes or until shrimp are done and pasta is al dente. Drain. Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Stir in basil and next 4 ingredients. Place spinach on plates. Top with pasta mixture.
ingredients: tap water, rotini pasta, cucumber, mayonnaise, lemon juice, dried dill, garlic, imitation crabmeat, fresh snow peas
name: seafood and pasta salad

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: carrots, bacon, onion, brown sugar, pepper
name: bacon n onion carrots for two

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and two sugars until well combined. Beat in vanilla pudding mix. Add eggs, one at a time, until well incorporated. Mix in vanilla extract. In another small bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, and salt. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just incorporated. Fold in m&ms and white chocolate chips. Drop tablespoon size cookie dough onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes, or until just turning golden brown. Cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes before removing to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, nuts, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, cool whip, heath candy bars
name: white cream bars

steps: In a large saucepan, saute the pinto beans in oil until tender. Stir in the garlic, cumin, salt and cayenne. Cook and stir until heated through and water is absorbed. It only takes a few minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in lime juice.
ingredients: dried pinto beans, smoked turkey drumstick, water, kosher salt, black pepper, cayenne
name: big crock pot full of pinto beans

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place sliced apples in 9 inch pie plate and sprinkle with orange juice and amaretto. Combine sugar, flour, and spices in a medium mixing bowl. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Sprinkle mixture over apples evenly. Bake at 375 degrees f for 45 minutes until apples are tender and topping is crisp. May serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: granny smith apple, cinnamon, peanut butter, graham cracker
name: peanutty apple s more

steps: In a blender, combine orange juice, lemon juice, splenda sugar substitute, fresh thyme. Pour through a strainer into ice-filled glasses. You should end up with about 1 cup of liquid. Stir in lime juice and agave. Garnish with lime and mint, and serve.
ingredients: orange juice, lemon juice, splenda sugar substitute, fresh thyme
name: orange thyme granita

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter and saute garlic until it is browned slightly. Cook spaghetti according to the package directions, and drain. Add spaghetti, parmesan cheese, cream, parsley flakes, salt, and pepper, and mix well. Pour into a buttered 2 quart baking dish. Cover and bake at 325 degrees until it is warm, about 15 minutes. Uncover and sprinklethe bacon over casserole.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onions, garlic, tomato paste, tomatoes, dried oregano, dried basil, dried thyme, fresh ground pepper
name: all purpose quick spaghetti sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease cookie sheet. Beat sugar and shortening until creamy. Beat in egg, milk and orange extract. Stir in flour and baking powder. Add cereal and nuts. Mix well. Drop by tablespoon onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. Let stand 1 minute before removing to racks to cool.
ingredients: quick-cooking oats, all-purpose flour, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, cherry pie filling, almond extract, vanilla ice cream
name: cherry crunch

steps: In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together. Fold until all is blended. Keep refrigerated in mason jars with lids, or in containers with tightly fitting lids. To make garlic bread, slice french bread and place on cookie sheet. Spoon spread onto bread. Toast, bake, or broil until cheese is bubbly and nicely browned.
ingredients: bread, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, manchego cheese, tomatoes, balsamic vinegar, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil
name: garlic bread with ripe tomatoes and manchego cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot.
ingredients: buttermilk, lemon, juice and zest of, sugar, gelatin, cold water, boiling water
name: buttermilk pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately.
ingredients: butter, vanilla essence, sugar, egg, self-raising flour, cocoa, unsalted dry roasted peanuts
name: chocolate peanutties

steps: Place the coleslaw mix and onion in a large bowl and set aside. In a small sauce pan, heat the sugar, vinegar, and seeds on medium high heat just until the mixture comes to a light boil. Whisk in the splenda and set aside. In a small saute pan, heat the sesame oil, almonds and sesame seeds on medium high. Toast the almonds and seeds stirring constantly until the sesame seeds start turning golden brown. Immediately pour the nuts and seeds into the soy sauce mix and stir. Add in the scallions, and then pour the dressing over the salad. Toss the salad until the dressing is completely incorporated. Allow the salad to sit at room temperature for at least 30 minutes before serving up to 4 hours.
ingredients: coleslaw mix, onion, splenda sugar substitute, salt, fresh ground black pepper, celery seed, mayonnaise, heavy cream, white vinegar, lemon juice
name: best low carb coleslaw

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Mix ground beef, stuffing mix, water, and the powder ingredient from the variation you chose. Press into 12 muffin cups sprayed with cooking spray. Make an indentation in center of each meatloaf. With spoon fill indentation with sauce. Bake 30 min or until cooked through. Top with cheese, continue baking 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, stove top stuffing mix, water, italian seasoning, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: marvelous mini meatloaves italian style

steps: In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, and vanilla. Lightly swirl pie filling into cream cheese mixture. Spoon into serving dishes. Cover and chill. Garnish with almonds. Prep time includes refrigeration time.
ingredients: goat cheese, ricotta cheese, walnuts, honey
name: catalan cheese walnut and honey dessert

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges.
ingredients: oil, zucchini, onion, diced tomatoes, basil, cheese
name: zucchini scramble

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: butter, fresh mushrooms, flour, salt, pepper, ground nutmeg, whole boneless skinless chicken breasts, heavy cream, white port
name: chicken oporto

steps: For pork, combine all but the salt in a large plastic zipper bag. Marinate in refrigerator, turning the bag occasionally, for 2 hours. Remove pork and discard marinade. Sprinkle pork evenly with salt. Grill pork over indirect heat for about 20 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 155. Let stand 10 minutes. Slice crosswise. For salsa, combine all ingredients in a large plastic zipper bag
ingredients: pork chops, chipotle chile in adobo, oregano, garlic cloves, olive oil, lime juice, fresh cilantro, salt
name: chipotle lime marinated grilled pork chops or tenderloin

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: crescent rolls, brown and serve sausages, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, green peppers, salt, pepper, oregano
name: crescent roll breakfast casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender.
ingredients: butter, onion, mushrooms, garlic, garlic powder, salt, worcestershire sauce
name: mushroom steak topper

steps: Melt butter in medium saucepan over medium high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add scallions and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Reduced heat to low. Cover and cook for 17-20 minutes. I finished by adding a little extra butter and salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, long grain white rice, chicken broth, frozen peas, sharp white cheddar cheese
name: rachael ray s rice pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: baking potatoes, sour cream, velveeta cheese, chicken bouillon cubes, cheddar cheese, bacon, water, salt & pepper
name: baked potato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, green pepper, garlic cloves, water, tomato paste, dried basil, dried oregano, dried parsley, salt and black pepper
name: garlic pizza sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: flour, natural bran, baking powder, salt, ground nutmeg, bananas, eggs, brown sugar, vegetable oil, vanilla extract
name: spiced banana muffins

steps: Place peppers in a single layer on a foil-lined jelly roll pan, and broil peppers for 4 minutes on each side or until blackened and tender. Cool, combine peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon rind, red pepper, salt, and mozzarella balls, and toss. Cover, and refrigerate overnight, tossing after 6 hours. Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes. Stir in basil leaves, and lemon juice before serving. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: sweet bell peppers, garlic cloves, olive oil, basil pesto, salt & freshly ground black pepper, mozzarella cheese
name: grilled bell peppers stuffed with basil pesto boccocini cheese

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Add chicken and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 6 to 10 minutes. Drain excess liquid before adding sauce ingredients. Mix remaining ingredients and add to skillet, stirring to coat chicken well. Cook on medium heat until chicken is well coated and sauce thickens, about 8 to 10 minutes. You can also cook them in a crock pot, on low setting. The meat just falls off the bone.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt & freshly ground black pepper, poultry seasoning, fresh rosemary, orange marmalade, balsamic vinegar, chicken stock, scallions, baby arugula
name: orange balsamic glazed chicken

steps: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add flour, salt, pepper, matzo meal, eggs and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add flour mixture to pan and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add flour mixture to pan and cook until golden
ingredients: boiling water, oil, salt, pepper, matzo meal, eggs
name: the best pesach rolls

steps: In a pitcher, blend water and sugar until the sugar dissolves. Add orange blossom water, blood orange juice and lemon juice. Stir. Add what remains of one lemon and one blood orange. Let chill for 30 minutes. Serve over ice.
ingredients: lemons, limes, oranges, water, sugar
name: citrusade citrus ade

steps: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook orzo 5 minutes. Add sugar snap peas and squash. Cook until orzo is al dente and vegetables are crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Drain well. Return to pot. Add lemon juice, olive oil, and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine and serve.
ingredients: orzo pasta, sun-dried tomato, kalamata olive, bell pepper, red onion, feta cheese, olive oil, rice wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt and pepper
name: greek orzo pasta salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease an 8x8-inch baking dish. In a large mixing bowl, beat together milk, butter and egg substitute. Add the sugar, then gradually beat in the flour. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Cut into 16 square servings.
ingredients: rice, flour, caster sugar, butter, baking powder, egg, milk, salt
name: rice griddle cakes

steps: Place chicken pieces in crockpot. Sprinkle the garlic salt and onion soup mix over the chicken. Pour salad dressing and water over the chicken. Cover and cook for 7-8 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Shred chicken from the bones, and return to crock pot. Serve on hamburger buns.
ingredients: chicken thighs, brown sugar, dry mustard, garlic powder, salt & pepper, soy sauce, corn syrup
name: slow cooker black chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add butter and sugar. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes at 170 degrees celsius.
ingredients: flour, eggs, baking powder, salt, sugar, cold water
name: breakfast scones

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, cut sausage into bite-size pieces. In a large skillet cook sausage and peppers over med-high heat until sausage is brown. Drain off fat. Add broth & pepper to skillet. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Drain pasta and toss with sausage mixture.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, hot italian sausage link, sweet red peppers, vegetable broth, ground pepper, parsley
name: pasta with sausage and sweet peppers

steps: Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat. Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Stir in tomatoes and salt. Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: diced tomatoes, garlic cloves, onion, salami, dried basil, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese
name: baked pasta sauce

steps: Place the pita sandwiches on a baking sheet. Sprinkle with cheese and italian seasoning. Bake at 350 for 10-12 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, japanese eggplant, onions, garbanzo beans, ground cumin, fresh lemon juice, of fresh mint, feta cheese, pita bread rounds
name: feta garbanzo bean and eggplant pita sandwich

steps: Mix together 3 tbsp. Parmesan cheese with 1 cup bread crumbs. In bowl, beat 2 eggs, salt and pepper to taste. Dip venison in eggs, then bread crumbs. Heat 6 tbsp. Olive oil in skillet till hot. Fry venison 5 mins. Each side till brown. Then place venison on a cookie sheet, spoon spaghetti sauce over venison and bake till cheese melts.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, italian bread, kosher salt, parmesan cheese
name: forevermama s best croutons ever

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Place fennel, onion and garlic into an oiled baking dish using the 2 tablespoons oil. Combine saffron, chicken broth and white wine and pour over fennel season with salt and pepper. Dot with butter. Cover and bake for 25 - 30 minutes. If desired, uncover the baking dish toward the end of the cooking time, to allow any excess liquid to evaporate. Garnish with the fennel fronds.
ingredients: fennel, chicken stock, sugar, mint sauce, oil
name: minted fennel

steps: Boil potatoes for 10-12 minutes or until fork-tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Mash potatoes, adding cream cheese until it is blended. Stir in milk, chives, and seasonings. Heat on medium heat until just warmed through, then serve at once.
ingredients: mashed potatoes, ham, swiss cheese, mayonnaise, onion, egg, mustard, salt, pepper, corn flakes
name: potato hors d oeuvres baked not fried

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine all ingredients except for dough in a medium sized bowl. Divide crescent roll dough into 24 rounds. Press into miniature muffin cups. Spoon 1 tbl. Of cream cheese mixture into cups. Bake at 350 f. For 13-15 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: cream cheese, monterey jack cheese, dijon mustard, granny smith apple, chives, pecans
name: apple jack spread

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix all the dry ingredients in a medium sized plastic bag or in a bowl. Pat dry the tofu on paper towel. Place the slices or cubes inside a plastic bag and gently shake to coat tofu with the dry mixture. Place on a greased baking sheet. Lightly spray tofu with cooking oil spray. Place in oven and bake for approximately 25-30 minutes until golden brown. Serve with your favorite dip.
ingredients: firm tofu, egg, chili sauce, panko breadcrumbs, oil
name: panko tofu

steps: Cook broccoli until tender in the amount of water called for on the package, drain. Mix together soup mix, cream cheese, sour cream and water chestnuts. Add drained broccoli and stir well. Place in lightly buttered casserole dish and top with grated cheese and cracker crums. Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes or until hot throughout and bubbly.
ingredients: frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, butter, salt, pepper, onion, sour cream, cheddar cheese, cream of celery soup, ritz crackers
name: jason s veggie medley

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute walnuts in olive oil. Add broccoli florets and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add broccoli florets and sa
ingredients: penne pasta, broccoli florets, olive oil, walnuts, blue cheese, lemon juice
name: broccoli walnut blue cheese pasta

steps: Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all.
ingredients: small red potatoes, rotel tomatoes & chilies, mayonnaise, spicy brown mustard, celery, corn niblets, scallions, bacon, salt and pepper
name: durango potato salad

steps: In a large nonmetal dish or resealable food storage plastic bag, combine all ingredients except steak. Mix well. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover dish or seal bag. Refrigerate atleast 4 hours or overnight to marinate. Heat grill. When ready to grill, remove steak from marinade. Discard marinade. Place steak on gas grill over medium heat. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until desired doneness, turning once or twice. To serve, cut steak across grain into slices. Place on serving platter.
ingredients: rib eye steaks, dried oregano, basil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, feta cheese, fresh lemon juice, kalamata olive
name: mediterranean steaks

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: sourdough bread, sharp cheddar cheese, canned tomatoes, tart apple, vegetable oil
name: grilled cheese tomato panini with crispy apples

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender and flavors blended.
ingredients: ground pork, onion, salt, ground black pepper, garlic clove, mustard seeds, water, casings
name: fresh homemade kielbasa

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add shallots to the skillet drippings. Cook over medium-high heat until golden brown, about 6 minutes. Add balsamic vinegar and cook for 1 minute. Remove from heat. Place green beans in large pot of lightly salted, boiling water. Cook until just crisp-tender, 5-6 minutes. Drain immediately and add green beans to shallot mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Toss until coated, place in dish, sprinkle pancetta over top, and serve.
ingredients: green onion, butter, green beans, raspberry vinegar, salt, pepper
name: tangy green beans

steps: Combine marinade ingredients in shallow dish or self-closing plastic bag. Add tuna steaks. Turn to coat. Refrigerate 20 minutes. Turn occasionally. Grill or broil 8 to 10 minutes per inch of thickness. Discard leftover marinade.
ingredients: tuna steaks, dry white wine, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, fresh rosemary, fresh oregano, salt
name: grilled marinated tuna steaks

steps: In a medium saucepan combine squash, onions, carrots, broth, and salt. Simmer, uncovered, until squash is very tender, about 40 minutes. Puree soup in a blender or food processor with the butter. Whisk cream into soup. Serve in wide, shallow bowls with a dollop of sour cream if desired.
ingredients: butternut squash, onions, chicken broth, curry powder, salt, pepper, sour cream, scallion
name: ww curried butternut squash soup

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
ingredients: chili powder, dried oregano, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, juice of, salt, pepper, roasting chickens, kosher salt
name: zesty roasted chicken

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook potatoes in oil for 15 minutes, turning occasionally. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Stir in green pepper and onion. Cook 5 minutes longer, stirring occasionally. In a small bowl, combine the beer, broth and brown sugar. Stir into vegetables. Bring to boil. Reduce heat. Cook 2 minutes longer, stirring occasionally
ingredients: vegetable oil, onions, garlic cloves, light brown sugar, plain flour, brown ale, vegetable stock, marmite
name: beer gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place 1 layer of fish in a shallow pan. Cover with green pepper and onion, then sprinkle with curry powder. Drizzle with coconut oil or melted butter. Dri
ingredients: fish, walnuts, onions, butter, sour cherries, sultana raisins, salt
name: kutum lavagny stuffed fish

steps: Preheat oven to 375f heat the vegetable oil in a small ovenproof frying pan. Fry the chicken wings for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden. Remove the pan from the heat and add the soy sauce, water and honey. Transfer to the oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, turning the chicken wings once. Arrange the chicken wings on a warmed platter, scatter over the sesame seeds and serve.
ingredients: lime juice, soy sauce, ginger, fresh cilantro, hot pepper sauce, chicken wings, honey, tomato sauce, fresh scallions
name: honeyed chicken wings

steps: Cut bacon strips in half widthwise. In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until cooked but not crisp. Remove to paper towels to drain. Keep warm. Drain drippings from skillet. Cook chicken in butter over medium heat for 5-6 minutes on each side or until chicken juices run clear. Top each chicken breast with barbecue sauce, green onions, tomato and two reserved bacon pieces. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and cook for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: bacon, chicken breast halves, butter, barbecue sauce, green onions, tomatoes, shredded cheddar cheese
name: monterey barbecued skillet chicken

steps: In small bowl, mix brown sugar and pumpkin pie spice. Set aside. In small microwave-safe dish, microwave butter on high about 30 seconds or until melted. Stir in vanilla. In large microwavable bowl, mix all cereals and pecans. Pour butter mixture over cereal mixture, stirring until evenly distributed. Add sugar and spice mixture and stir until coated. Microwave uncovered on high 5 minutes or until mixture begins to brown, stirring every minute. Spread on wax paper or a cookie sheet to cool. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: chex cereal, vanilla baking chips, butter, lemon peel, fresh lemon juice, powdered sugar
name: chex lemon buddies

steps: Heat the grill to medium hot. In a medium mixing bowl, combine the preserves, garlic, olive oil, soy sauce, dry mustard, cayenne pepper, salt and black pepper, and mix well to combine. Sprinkle the tenderloins with additional salt and pepper and place on the grill. Cook about 10 minutes on each side before brushing the upturned side with the glaze. Continue cooking for another 10 to 12 minutes, turning every 3 to 5 minutes and brushing each upturned side with glaze every time, until the meat is cooked through. Move the pork to a cooler part of the grill if it starts to get too dark before it is cooked through. Place the peach halves on the grill, cut-side down, and grill 2 minutes. Turn, and brush the tops with the glaze. Grill 3 ro 5 minutes more, until the peaches are soft and the cavities fill with juices. Transfer the cooked pork and peaches to a serving plate & serve immediately.
ingredients: pork chops, ginger, paprika, garlic powder, cumin, salt, pepper, peach jam, peach
name: grilled spice rubbed pork chops with peach glaze

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Arrange flaked cheese pie evenly in a 9 inch pie pan that has been sprayed with a nonstick cooking spray. In a blender, combine half of the parmesan with remaining ingredients. Blend until smooth. Pour mixture over tuna. Top with remaining parmesan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes, until set and lightly browned. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: butter, flour, milk, salt, nutmeg, feta cheese, kefalotiri, eggs, parsley, phyllo dough
name: tiropita greek cheese pie

steps: Heat the oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Halve the pineapple slices, add to the pan with the juice, tomatoes and kidney beans. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, fresh ground pepper, vegetable oil, seedless raspberry preserves, chili sauce, pineapple chunks
name: raspberry pineapple chicken nibbles

steps: In a large shallow bowl mix bread crumbs, cheese, ground chilies, and salt. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Dip in beaten egg and roll in crumb mixture to coat. Place on a foil-lined 12-by 15-inch baking sheet. Bake in a 375 degree oven or 350 degree convection oven until crumbs are browned and chicken is no longer pink at the bone, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
ingredients: sun-dried tomato, corn flakes, flour, dried rosemary, salt, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, egg
name: crispy sun dried tomato crusted chicken

steps: Heat a large saucepan over a low heat and add the butter. When the butter has melted, add the onion and cook until soft and translucent. Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper to taste, then increase the heat and stir. When the moisture from the mushrooms has been released, allow it to evaporate, concentrating the flavour. This might happen quickly or slowly, depending entirely on the type of mushrooms used. Add teh paprika and cayenne and fry for a few moments longer, until the paprika turns a shade darker. Finally, add teh sour cream or creme fraiche and dill, and allow it to bubbvle gently for a further 5 minutes or so.
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, vegetable oil, minced garlic cloves, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, black pepper, onion powder, ground cayenne pepper
name: spicy stuffed mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In medium bowl, combine eggs, butter or margarine, flour, garlic salt, parsley flakes, onion salt, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, french-fried onionspreparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In medium bowl, combine eggs, butter or margarine, flour, garlic salt, parsley flakes and onion salt. Separate crescent dough into 4 rectangles. Firmly press perforations to seal. Cut each rectangle crosswise into 8 strips. Dip each strip in egg mixture. Coat with crushed onions. Place on ungreased cookie sheets. Bake in for 8 to 12 minutes until golden brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheets.
ingredients: butter, onion, bacon, fresh parsley, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls
name: bacon onion appetizers

steps: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray then heat until hot. Add the tofu, soy sauce, & pepper to the vegetables, stir. Continue to cook another 3-4 minutes or until the tofu is heated through. Remove from the heat & cool slightly. Mix the tomatoes & spinach in with the tofu & vegetables then stuff each pita half with the mixture. Serve immediately.
ingredients: tomatoes, tofu, vegetable oil, garlic, scallion, salt, sugar, soy sauce, ground coriander, black pepper
name: tofu with tomatoes and coriander

steps: Preheat oven to 400degf. Combine olive oil, spanish onions, salt and black pepper, garlic cloves, sweet paprika, bay leaves, fresh rosemary, potatoes, saffron strands, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sprigs, fresh rosemary sp
ingredients: olive oil, spanish onions, salt and black pepper, garlic cloves, sweet paprika, bay leaves, fresh rosemary, potatoes, saffron strands
name: saffron potatoes

steps: In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons butter over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms and saut until tender, about 5 minutes. Add leek, shiitake mushrooms, frozen peas and carrots, leaf thyme, salt and pepper. Pour over mushrooms and saut until tender, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: vegetable broth, farfel, leek, shiitake mushrooms, frozen peas and carrots, leaf thyme
name: mushroom farfel

steps: In a large shallow baking pan, toast hazelnuts in 325 oven, 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, beat egg whites until foamy. Gradually add sugar and salt, beating until stiff. Fold in toasted hazelnuts. Melt butter in same pan. Spread nut mixture on top. Bake 30 to 40 minutes at 325 or until nut are browned and butter is absorbed. Stir nuts thoroughly every 10 minutes during baking.
ingredients: heavy cream, skim milk, sugar, hazelnut-flavored liqueur, hazelnuts
name: no egg hazelnut ice cream

steps: Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, cornstarch, sea salt, black peppercorns, cayenne pepper, chinese five spice powder, seltzer water, oil, shrimp
name: salt and pepper shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In medium mixing bowl, break beef into small chunks. Add egg, oatmeal, onion, spices, and ketchup. Mix until well blended. Smooth mixture into regular sized bread pan. If you like having a sauce on top, smooth some extra ketchup over the top of the uncooked meatloaf. Place in oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat is cooked all the way through. Let sit for 5-10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, salt, pepper, dried basil, parmesan cheese, onion, eggs, hard-boiled eggs
name: low carb roman meatloaf

steps: Put the eggs in a large bowl and mix well. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 30 minutes. Stir dough down. Fill greased muffin cups half full. Cover and let rise
ingredients: eggs, salt, sugar, vegetable oil, milk, yeast, water, flour
name: yeast waffles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook chicken according to directions, arrange in greased 9 x 11 pan. Cut up cooked chicken into slices, arrange in pan. Mix soup, mayonnaise, curry, and lemon juice and pour over chicken. Sprinkle cheddar cheese over top. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minute may make ahead and refrigerate, extend bake time to 50-55 minute. Starting with raw chicken will extend the cooking time by 30-40 min, or the time it takes to cook the chicken.
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, chicken broth, worcestershire sauce, cheddar cheese, sour cream, broccoli, chicken, crepes
name: chicken divan crepes

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, chorizo sausage, garlic clove, basmati rice, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, black beans, fresh corn kernels, green onionpreparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, chorizo sausage, garlic clove, basmati rice, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, black beans, fresh corn kernels, green onionpreparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, chorizo sausage, garlic clove, basmati rice, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, black beans, fresh corn kernels, green onionpreparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, chorizo sausage, garlic clove, basmati rice, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, black beans, fresh corn kernels, green onionpreparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, chorizo sausage, garlic clove, basmati rice, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, black beans, fresh corn kernels, green onionpreparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, chorizo sausage, garlic clove, basmati rice, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, black beans, fresh corn kernels, green onionpreparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, chorizo sausage, garlic clove, basmati rice, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, black beans, fresh corn kernels, green onionpreparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, chorizo sausage, garlic clove, basmati rice, diced tomatoes, chicken
ingredients: pure olive oil, onion, chorizo sausage, garlic clove, basmati rice, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, black beans, fresh corn kernels, green onion
name: picante black beans and rice

steps: Melt chocolate chips in the microwave for a minute, stir, then cook for another minute and stir. Cube cream cheese and add to the white chocolate. Mix with beaters until smooth. Fold in whip cream until completely incorporated. Pour into graham cracker crust. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm.
ingredients: white chocolate chips, cream cheese, cool whip, graham cracker crust
name: cheesecake no bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Remove seeds from chilies. Slice open the chilies and line a 9x13 casserole with half of them. Cover chilies with half of the cheddar and half of the jack cheese. Use the rest of the chilies on top of the cheeses. Beat the egg whites till stiff peak. Beat the yolks and add flour, milk, salt and. Pepper. Fold in whites and pour over top of chilies and cheese. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Top with the remaining cheeses. Top with salsa, if desired.
ingredients: monterey jack cheese, shredded cheddar cheese, green chilies, eggs, milk, all-purpose flour
name: bite sized chile relleno squares

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, chunky peanut butter, cheerios toasted oat cereal, rice krispies
name: plantation bars

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: frozen hash browns, butter, eggs, half-and-half, cooked ham, green onion, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper
name: hash brown quiche

steps: Heat olive oil in large skillet. Add onions and saute until just a little soft. Add zucchini, tomatoes, and yellow squash and cook, stirring occasionally, until the squash is soft and the tomatoes liquefying. Top with parmesan cheese and allow to melt. Serve, perhaps with brown rice or as a side dish.
ingredients: broccoli floret, cauliflower floret, mushroom, onion, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, ranch dressing, whole wheat pita bread, cheese
name: summer time veggie pita melt

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Place squash, seeds still in, cut side up on a cookie sheet and bake for 45 minutes or until soft. Remove from oven and scoop out the seeds and fibers. Mix remaining ingredients and distribute evenly into the cavity of each squash. Return to oven for apprx 10 minutes.
ingredients: acorn squash, ground pork, apple, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, salt, butter
name: deluxe acorn squash

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In large skillet, brown beef and onion then drain. Return meat to pan. Add spaghetti sauce. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl combine mozzarella cheese and sour cream. Pour hot meat into an ungreased 12 x 8 inch dish. Spoon cheese mixture over meat. Unroll crescent roll dough over the top of the mixture. Mix parmesan cheese and butter together, then spread over the top of the dough. Bake 18-25 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: ziti pasta, red pasta sauce, meatballs, italian-style tomato sauce, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese
name: cheesy italian meatball casserole

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine milk, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, unsalted butter. Add butter and whisk until smooth. Add eggs and whisk until smooth. Add vanilla and whisk until smooth. Add cinnamon and whisk until smooth. Add
ingredients: milk, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, unsalted butter
name: cinnamon toast toddy

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10
ingredients: oil, onion, green pepper, garlic cloves, curry powder, chicken breasts, potatoes, coconut milk, salt, chicken stock
name: coconut curry chicken with potatoes
