steps: Mix together all ingredients in a small bowl. Add pumpkin puree, paprika, garlic cloves, ground cinnamon, lemon juice, salt, vegetable oil and mix well. Bake at 450 for 35 minutes or until tender. Whisk together all ingredients in a small bowl. Whisk together all
ingredients: pumpkin puree, paprika, garlic cloves, ground cinnamon, lemon juice, salt, vegetable oil
name: pumpkin salad tirshi

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. In a small mixing bowl, beat the eggs with a splash of water. On a plate combine breadcrumbs and thyme. Then on another plate combine flour with a pinch of salt and pepper. Lay ham strips on work surface, top each slice with cheese then place chicken chink toward the end of the strip. Rollup lightly, and coat with flour, eggs and breadcrumbs. Cook for 20 mins or until done.
ingredients: breadcrumbs, salt, black pepper, butter, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, deli ham, swiss cheese
name: inside out chicken cordon blue

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Melt butter on a low flame in a small sauce pan. Add garlic and saute on low for about 1 minute. Add the lemon juice and shut off flame. Spray the bottom of a baking dish lightly with cooking spray. Place the fish on top and season with salt and pepper. Pour the lemon butter mixture on the fish and top with fresh parsley. Bake at 400 until cooked, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, salt and pepper, light mayonnaise, parsley, fresh dill, lemon wedge
name: baked tilapia with fresh herbs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour a bundt pan. I use bakers joy spray. Beat cake mix, water, oil, eggs and pineapple on low speed 3 minutes. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 50-55 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Cool in pan 15 minutes. Remove from pan and cool on wire rack. Cool at least 1 hour before frosting.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, carrots, crushed pineapple in juice, sweetened coconut, flour, baking soda, salt
name: phenomenal carrot cake

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onions and cook for 5 minutes. Add the curry powder, salt and pepper and cook for 5 minutes. Add the spinach and cook for 5 minutes. Add the curry powder
ingredients: onion, tomatoes, oil, curry powder, unsalted peanuts, water, frozen spinach, salt
name: groundnut sauce

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or wok over low heat. Add the garlic, pine nuts and soaked raisins and cook till the nuts and the garlic are light golden, 3-5 minutes. Increase the heat to medium add the chopped spinach and cook for about 1 minute, stirring to combine evenly. Season with salt and pepper to taste, transfer to serving bowl.
ingredients: fresh spinach, sweet onion, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, nutmeg, lemon, juice and zest of, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, pine nuts
name: braised spinach with garlic onion and pine nuts

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomatoes, hot red pepper flakes, zucchini, vegetable broth, lemon juice, sugar, salt and pepper
name: hot and sour zucchini soup maradj kar a hamiz

steps: In a large saucepan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add ketchup, chickpeas, green peas, honey, vinaigrette dressing, cinnamon, peanut butter, raisins, whole grain bread. Reduce heat and simmer until the ketchup is tender, about 5 minutes. Remove the ketchup from the heat and let stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. Stir in the ketchup and season with salt and pepper. Discard the ketchup from the heat and let stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Remove the ketchup from
ingredients: ketchup, chickpeas, green peas, honey, vinaigrette dressing, cinnamon, peanut butter, raisins, whole grain bread
name: pea nut raisin sandwich

steps: In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 tablespoon whipped topping and 2 tablespoons wafer crumbs. Fold remaining whipped topping into pudding. In a 2 quart serving bowl, layer a third of the strawberries, wafer crumbs and pudding mixture. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with reserved wafer crumbs. Top with reserved whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: instant chocolate pudding mix, milk, vodka, baileys irish cream, cool whip
name: chocolate pudding shooters

steps: Mix first 4 ingredients and pour into a greased 9x13 baking pan. Prepare cake mix as directed on the package and spoon batter over marshmallow mixture in the pan. Top with nuts, if desired. Bake at 350 for 45-50 minutes until toothpick inserted into center comes out clean. Serve warm or cool and garnish with whip topping or vanilla ice cream, if desired.
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, eggs, flour, bicarbonate of soda, cocoa powder, blanched almond, dark chocolate chips
name: fudgy chocolate biscotti

steps: Mix together the ground beef, rice, eggs, salt, pepper, oregano, garlic, salt and pepper. Shape into 6 large balls. Set aside. Combine tomatoes, beer and chili powder in a large, heavy, deep skillet. Heat to boiling over medium heat. Carefully drop meatballs into hot tomato mixture. Cover and simmer for 45 to 55 minutes. Lift out meatballs and thicken sauce with 3 tbsp flour mixed with cold water, if desired. Serve meatballs with sauce in deep bowls with cornbread or crusty bread.
ingredients: ground beef, instant rice, onion, salt, pepper, ground sage, vegetable oil, water, tomato sauce
name: porcupine balls meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. On a baking sheet with sides, toss sweet potatoes and apples with oil, salt and pepper. Spread out into single layer. Roast 30 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, stir together butter, brown sugar and pumpkin pie spices. Spoon over potato mixture and toss to coat. Continue baking for 10 minutes or until sugar has melted.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, butter, salt
name: roasted sweet potato fries or rounds

steps: In a small, heavy saucepan, stir together the condensed milk, vanilla extract, whipped cream, unsweetened cocoa powder, ice cubes, honey. Heat over medium heat, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom of the pan, just until bubbles appear at the sides. Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla or liqueur. Top with ground nutmeg or cinnamon, whipped cream or marshmallows.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, milk, vanilla extract, whipped cream, unsweetened cocoa powder
name: chocolate swizzle nog

steps: Mix all ingredients together in blender. Pour into 6- 3oz molds or paper cups. Freeze for one hour, place sticks in the middle. Freeze for another 3 hours, until solid. To release pops, dip molds into hot water until pops loosen and slide out. If using paper cups, peel away paper.
ingredients: orange juice, fresh strawberries, plain yogurt, ice cubes, whipped cream
name: berry pink smoothie

steps: Heat ghee with cinnamon. Add coconut milk and stir well. Simmer on medium heat for 10 minutes. Reduce heat and simmer on low until slightly moist.
ingredients: curry paste, sweet potatoes, coconut milk, water, pineapple, coriander
name: sweet potato and pineapple korma

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Stir together salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin and cinnamon. Coat the pork with the lime beer marinade. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a 12 inch skillet, over relatively high heat, and brown pork, turning every 30 seconds for 4 minutes. Stir together brown sugar, garlic, and tabasco and pat onto top of the tenderloin. Place pork in roasting pan and cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: beer, lime juice, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, chili powder, ground cumin, ground coriander, salt, black pepper, pork tenderloin
name: pork tenderloin with lime beer marinade

steps: In a larger bowl, blend together flour, cheese, sugar, both powders, and italian seasoning. In a medium bowl, add milk, oil, and egg, mixing well. Stir into wet bowl into dry bowl, until moistened. Pour into a greased 9x5-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 f for 50 to 55 minutes or until toothpick inserted near centre comes out clean. When you remove from oven, spread margarine over top with paper towel. Cool for 10 minutes in pan. Remove to wire rack and cool for 10 more minutes, then enjoy.
ingredients: italian seasoning, sugar, garlic powder, onion powder, milk, canola oil, egg, self-rising flour, cheddar cheese, margarine
name: quicky garlic cheese and herb bread

steps: Bring 3 quarts water to a boil in a pot. Add pasta. Cook 8 minutes. Cook 3 minutes or until pasta is al dente. Drain. Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Stir in basil and next 4 ingredients. Place spinach on plates. Top with pasta mixture.
ingredients: pasta, red pepper sauce, plain yogurt, canned tuna, red pepper, green pepper, red onion, black pepper, olive oil
name: delicious pasta bake

steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet on medium heat. Add garlic, rosemary, and beef. Brown beef on all sides, then add shallot, red wine vinegar, and balsamic vinegar. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove beef with tongs and place in a bowl quickly saut arugula in remaining juices for approximately 5 seconds. Plate arugula and top with beef and liquid.
ingredients: grape tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, kosher salt, arugula, fresh ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar
name: sauteed baby tomatoes with arugula

steps: In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through.
ingredients: chicken breasts, olive oil, garlic, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf, butter, fresh rosemary, parmesan cheese
name: low carb savory italian grilled chicken

steps: Prepare cake according to package directions, adding poppy seeds and coconut extract if desired to batter. Pour into a greased 9x13 inch baking pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool completely. In a mixing bowl, beat milk and pudding mix on low speed for 2 minutes. Spread over the cake. Spread with coolwhip. Sprinkle with coconut if desired.
ingredients: white cake mix, eggs, oil, water, poppy seed, coconut extract, milk, instant coconut cream pudding mix, frozen whipped topping, flaked coconut
name: easy coconut cream cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl mix together the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt, and set aside. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk together all of the wet ingredients, except the cider vinegar. Add the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, and whisk well to combine. Drizzle the cider vinegar over the top of the batter and whisk quickly to incorporate. Pour batter into greased 9inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking soda, cocoa, salt, eggs, wesson oil, buttermilk, vanilla, water
name: wesson oil chocolate cake

steps: Preheat oven to 300f. Coat an 8-inch square pan using nonstick cooking spray. Combine oats, flour, wheat germ, and cinnamon. Stir until well mixed. Fold in raisins. Press mixture into pan and bake for 18 to 20 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool to room temperature, cut into 12 bars and serve.
ingredients: oats, applesauce, brown sugar, honey, cinnamon, vanilla, flax seed meal, cashew pieces, raisins
name: yummy healthy granola

steps: Heat butter in 12in skillet. Add onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add scallops. Stir and saute 4-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Add parsley, red pepper flakes, and lemon, heat through.
ingredients: fresh scallops, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, white pepper, paprika
name: charbecued scallops

steps: In large pot, combine all remaining ingrediants. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 15-18 minutes until noodles are done. Add cheese chunks and cook, stirring with a whisk, until the cheese melts. Add milk, corn, and hot sauce, stirring until soup is hot. Garnish with parsley.
ingredients: wild mushrooms, onions, butter, lemon, juice of, water, beef broth, sour cream, flour, salt and pepper, fresh dill
name: zupa ze swiezych grzybow polish mushroom soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: butternut squash, apples, fresh cranberries, brown sugar, unsalted butter, flour, salt, ground nutmeg
name: butternut squash apple cranberry bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large skillet over medium heat, add all ingredients and mix until well combined. Pour into a 13x9 casserole dish. Bake for 1 hour or until top is slightly golden. Sprinkle top with french fried onions and bake an additional 10 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: ham steaks, butter, onions, flour, water, brown sugar, whiskey, salt and pepper
name: easter ham steaks with whiskey sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In a large bowl, whip butter, sugar, cornstarch, salt, butter, icing sugar, heavy cream, vanilla. Add cornstarch and cornstarch a bit at a time to incorporate. Form into two thick ropes, rolling on wax paper. Refrigerate 30 minutes. They will be firm and easy to slice into coins. Bake slices until they just begin to turn golden on the bottom. I added chocolate chips to half, and they were nice too.
ingredients: flour, cornstarch, salt, butter, icing sugar, heavy cream, vanilla
name: whipped buttery cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: potatoes, london broil beef, garlic powder, ground black pepper, olive oil, green bell pepper
name: one pan potatoes and pepper steak

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cut jalapenos in half lengthwise and scrape out seeds. In a bowl, combine cheeses and onion and mix well. Wrap bacon slices around each half, cover as much of the surface as possible. Brush bacon surface with bbq sauce. Secure with toothpicks and pop into oven for 1 hr.
ingredients: jalapeno peppers, neufchatel cheese, fresh cilantro, honey mustard, corn flakes cereal
name: oven fried jalapeo poppers

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine ingredients. Pour into pie crust. Bake 15 minute at 425. Reduce heat to 350 degrees and bake 45 minutes longer or until the filling is set.
ingredients: carrots, sweet potatoes, stevia, water, avocados
name: pumpkin pie in a bowl

steps: Boil bacon, onions, cauliflower, chicken broth, condensed cream of celery soup, brie cheese, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red pepper, parsley, red
ingredients: bacon, onions, cauliflower, chicken broth, condensed cream of celery soup, brie cheese, parsley, red pepper
name: cauliflower brie and bacon soup

steps: Place broccoli florets, bacon, dried cranberries, sunflower seeds, mayonnaise, sugar, white wine vinegar, shredded cheddar cheese in a large mixing bowl. Pour dressing over salad mixture, stirring well. Cover and refrigerate 8 hours or overnight.
ingredients: broccoli florets, bacon, dried cranberries, sunflower seeds, mayonnaise, sugar, white vinegar, shredded cheddar cheese
name: broccoli salad small batch

steps: Boil squash in small amount of water,. Season to taste, with salt and pepper. Add butter and all the other ingredients. Do not dilute the soup. Pour into a greased casserole dish and bake about 30 minutes at 350.
ingredients: squash, bacon, onion, breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, paprika, salt and pepper
name: cheesy stuffed summer squash

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. We have also toasted the muffins and cooked these in the microwave.
ingredients: english muffins, tomato sauce, italian seasoning, mozzarella cheese, bacon
name: english muffin pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl mix sugar, cinnamon, paprika, cayenne pepper, egg whites, pecan halves. Add pecans and toss well. Drizzle honey and oil over spiced nuts and mix well so they are evenly coated. Spread on greased baking sheet and bake 7 - 10 minutes until sugar is caramelized. Let it cool for 5 minutes and take it of the sheet otherwise they might stick to the bottom. If that happens put it back in oven to melt the sticky sugar.
ingredients: egg white, water, pecans, salt, cinnamon, sugar
name: frosted pecans

steps: Add ravioli to a pot of boiling water. Cook 3-5 minutes or until ravioli floats to the surface. Remove from heat, drain and set aside. Heat oil in a oversized skillet on medium heat, add spinach, tomatoes, onion powder, salt and pepper, and saute for about 7 minutes or until spinach and tomatoes wilt. Add ravioli to skillet and cook for 3 more minutes. Serve hot and sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: cheese ravioli, olive oil, roma tomato, marinated artichoke hearts, scallion, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: cheese ravioli with fresh tomato and artichoke sauce

steps: Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender. Drain potatoes and cut cup but not too small. Cook, peel and cut up hard boiled eggs. Chop green onions, shred carrot, and finely chop celery and radishes. Add to potatoes and eggs. Add enough miracle whip to moisten. Add horseradish and pepper. Lastly, add still frozen green peas just 5 to 10 minutes prior to serving.
ingredients: new potatoes, eggs, radish, mayonnaise, yoghurt, lettuce, fresh parsley, black pepper
name: simple potato egg salad

steps: In a medium skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, jelly, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the horseradish mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving.
ingredients: carrots, onions, horseradish, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, water, breadcrumbs, butter
name: sister mary s zesty carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Arrange coal s firecracker pizza slices in single layer on greased baking tray. Sprinkle pizza dough with salt, bake until soft and golden. Turn heat up to 515 and place pizza stone in oven. Roll out pizza dough on cornmeal coated paddle, lightly coat with oil. Sprinkle pizza dough with mozzarella and arrange eggplant in a spoke pattern. Sprinkle with tomatoes and dot with pesto. Bake 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: pizza dough, bel paese cheese, tomato sauce, pecorino romano cheese, corn kernel, olive oil, parsley
name: coal s firecracker pizza

steps: Heat a large non stick skillet or the grill to medium heat. Butter each slice of bread on one side, turn 4 slices butter facing down. Put 1 slice of cheese each on 4 slices of bread. Spread 1-2 tbsp marinara sauce over the cheese. Sprinkle evenly with parmesan. Layer each with even amounts of turkey. Top each with another slice of cheese. Top with remaining bread, butter side facing up. Grill sandwiches until bread is golden brown, about 3 minutes per side. Slice diagonally and serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, flour, eggs, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, chunky marinara sauce, provolone cheese, oil, kaiser rolls
name: chicken parmigiana sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: shallots, green beans, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, ground black pepper, fresh parsley, pine nuts, lemon zest
name: green beans roasted with garlic shallots and pine or hazelnuts

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Place chicken in a casserole dish. Mix soup mix, tomatoes, tomato puree, basil, chilli, wine vinegar and crumbled stock cube together. Pour over chicken. Cover and cook for 50 to 55 minutes, or until chicken is cooked.
ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, chicken quarters, bacon, potatoes, onions, salt and pepper, fresh thyme, chicken stock, fresh chives
name: stoved chicken chicken casserole with potatoes bacon and onion

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f or grill to medium-high. Sprinkle both sides of steak with garlic powder and pepper. Cut in thin strips. Combine steak strips and pepper strips with teriyaki sauce. Center one-fourth of the steak mixture on each sheet of foil. Bring up foil sides. Double fold top and ends to seal packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Repeat to make four packets. Bake 12 to 15 minutes on a cookie sheet in oven or grill 7 to 9 minutes in covered grill. Serve immediately over rice. Makes 4 servings.
ingredients: red potatoes, boneless beef top sirloin steak, garlic clove, olive oil, green pepper, onion, pepper, cornstarch, beef broth
name: pepper steak with potatoes

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the water and milk. When bubbles just begin to break the surface, slowly add the grits, whisking constantly. Cook, stirring frequently and scraping the bottom of the pan, until thickened and cooked, about 7 minutes. Add the cheese and butter and stir just until melted. Remove from the heat. Add salt to taste and hot pepper sauce, if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: water, grits, instant chicken bouillon, garlic, onion, butter, black pepper, half-and-half, cheese, cooking spray
name: easy cheese grits

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook corn flake crumbs, butter, pork sausage, cooked rice, milk, cream of mushroom soup, eggs, cheddar cheese. Cover and bake 1 hour. For the topping combine corn flake crumbs, butter, pork sausage, cooked rice, milk, cream of mushroom soup, eggs, cheddar cheese. For
ingredients: corn flake crumbs, butter, pork sausage, cooked rice, milk, cream of mushroom soup, eggs, cheddar cheese
name: sausage supper dish

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat. Add coconut oil and sauté tilapia fillets on both sides of each fillet. Cook until just opaque in the center, gently turning halfway though.
ingredients: tilapia fillet, milk, shredded coconut, spices, limes, coconut oil
name: coconut crusted tilapia

steps: Cook linguini as directed on box. While noodles cook heat butter and garlic in small saucepan over medium heat until butter is melted and garlic is browned. Add cream and heat until bubbling. Add cheese, parsley, basil, salt and pepper. Return drained noodles to kettle. Pour sauce over noodles, stirring gently until all are well coated.
ingredients: linguine, butter, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, baby shrimp, salt and pepper, heavy cream, parmesan cheese
name: authentic shrimp alfredo

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake at 350 for an hour.
ingredients: bananas, butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, baking soda, salt, flour
name: no nut banana bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes.
ingredients: light brown sugar, butter, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, bananas, pecans, coconut, vanilla ice cream
name: brown sugar banana sauce for ice cream

steps: Combine apple cider vinegar, barbecue sauce, soy sauce, honey, steak sauce, garlic, cayenne, tandoori paste, and sugar and puree. In a gallon size zip top bag, put pieces of selected meat and pour in marinade. Seal bag, removing as much air as possible. Allow steak to marinate for at least 1 hour in refrigerator. Then grill or broil selected meat to doneness.
ingredients: apple cider vinegar, barbecue sauce, soy sauce, honey, steak sauce, garlic, cayenne
name: easy bbq chicken marinade

steps: Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes.
ingredients: free-range chicken, lemon, garlic cloves, sea salt, cracked black pepper, canola oil, yellow onion
name: basic roasted chicken

steps: Mix all ingredients together, except for 2 handfuls of cheese. Pour into a greased casserole dish. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Bake at 350 for 40 minutes or so. Recipe can easily be doubled, tripled, etc., but, if using a deep dish, allow extra baking time.
ingredients: cornmeal, milk, baking soda, salt, jalapeno peppers, creamed corn, eggs, green onion, cheddar cheese, olive oil
name: hot mexican cornbread

steps: Cook and drain spaghetti as directed on package. While spaghetti is cooking, cook bacon in a a skillet, stirring frequently, until crisp. Remove bacon from pan with slotted spoon and drain. Drain fat from skillet, reserving 1 tablespoon in the pan. Cook onion and garlic in bacon fat over medium heat about 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until onion is tender. Stir in spaghetti, chicken, cheese and whipping cream. Cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through. Toss with bacon.
ingredients: whole wheat spaghetti, soymilk, eggs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, black pepper, butter, turkey bacon, red pepper flakes
name: skinnygirl lower fat pasta carbonara

steps: Scrub beets but do not peel. Place beets in a large saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 40 minutes, or until just tender. Drain. When cool enough to handle, peel beets, cut into quarters and place them in a oven-proof casserole dish, with a lid. Pre-heat oven to 350f. In small saucepan, melt butter and mix in honey and ginger. Season with salt and pepper and pour over beets. Cover with lid and bake 45-60 minutes, stirring occasionally, until beets are well glazed.
ingredients: beets, butter, onion, honey, lemon juice, nutmeg, salt and pepper
name: honey lemon beets

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Coat a 10- by 15-inch rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place the chicken breasts on the baking sheet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Spread the mixture evenly over the chicken breasts. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until the topping is golden and no pink remains in the chicken.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, spicy brown mustard, honey, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, butter, lemon juice, water, paprika
name: spicy brown mustard chicken

steps: In a small saucepan, heat oil and fry ginger and onion until translucent. Add the vegetable broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 15 minutes stirring occasionally. Puree soup in a blender or food processor. Return to the boil then turn off. Add salt to taste.
ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, onion, carrots, vegetable stock, garlic, fresh ginger, fresh lemon juice, lemons, rind of, pickled ginger
name: gingery carrot soup

steps: Mix seasonings in small bowl. Coat all sides of roast well and rub inches. Allow to macerate for an hour or so. Roast meat as you normally would. Be prepared to fill the house with an aroma thick and delicious enough to eat.
ingredients: fresh gingerroot, garlic, brown sugar, lemongrass, coriander seed, clove, ground cinnamon, black peppercorns, red chile, salt
name: favourite meat rub

steps: Preheat oven to 400f and lightly grease baking sheet. Unfold puff pastry on lightly floured surface, roll out into 12-inch square. Crimp edges. Spread pesto evenly over top, sprinkle with cheese. Top with thin tomato slices, top with rest of cheese. Bake 17 to 20 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: pan juices, plain flour, dry white wine, chicken stock, sun-dried tomato pesto, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: tomato pesto gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle crumbs onto an ungreased baking sheet and set aside. Bake for 5-7 minutes or until lightly browned. Combine bread crumbs, black pepper and parsley in a shallow pan and set aside. Raise oven temperature to 400f. Combine mayonnaise, water and hot pepper sauce in shallow bowl, mixing well. Dip fish in mayonnaise mixture and then dredge in bread crumbs. Place fish on greased baking sheet and bake in oven 17-18 or until fish flakes easily. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: white fish fillet, whole milk, butter, paprika, dry breadcrumbs, garlic, parsley
name: garlicky baked fish

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Dip chicken in milk, then roll in seasoned flour. Melt butter in 9 x 13 baking dish. Place chicken, skin side down, in butter. Cook 30 minutes. Mix water, remaining milk and soup together. Turn chicken and pour soup mixture over it. Bake 30 minutes more. Remove chicken and stir gravy.
ingredients: chicken parts, buttermilk, instant chicken bouillon, oregano, flour, paprika, butter
name: versatile chicken

steps: Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes.
ingredients: new potatoes, olive oil, water, paprika, garlic powder, black pepper, cayenne pepper, salt, parmesan cheese
name: home style potatoes

steps: Combine first 4 ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well. Combine sugar and remaining ingredients in a small bowl, stirring with a whisk. Pour vinegar mixture over cabbage mixture, tossing gently to combine. Cover. Chill 1 hour.
ingredients: fresh lemon juice, chili, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, napa cabbage, green onions, fresh cilantro
name: spicy cabbage salad

steps: In a small bowl, beat the honey, vinegar, eggs, ground mustard, salt, pretzels until smooth. Gradually beat in honey, vinegar, eggs, ground mustard, salt, pretzels. Add eggs and mix well. Add remaining ingredients. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until thick. Serve hot over sweet n hot mustard dip. Refrigerate leftover sauce to use for sandwiches.
ingredients: honey, vinegar, eggs, ground mustard, salt, pretzels
name: sweet n hot mustard dip

steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a big skillet. When hot, put in the vegetable pancake. When vegetables start to pop, put in the vegetables. Stir once. Add seasonings. Stir and fry for a minute. Add 3 tablespoons of water, lower heat, cover, and simmer 10-15 minutes. Stir every now and then. If vegetables stick, add a little water. Dish is done when the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: semolina flour, water, flour, carrot, cabbage, onion, coriander, salt, black pepper, oil
name: vegetable puda indian vegetable pancake

steps: In a medium saucepan, mix all ingredients except the vanilla. Cook until mixture reaches 270 degrees, or brittle ball. Take off heat and stir in vanilla. Pour over the popcorn, and stir lightly and quickly to coat. Shape quickly with butter coated hands.
ingredients: sugar, light corn syrup, butter, cocoa powder, salt, popped corn
name: chocolate popcorn balls

steps: Boil the potatoes whole for about 20-30 minutes or until easily pierced with a fork. Drain and cool completely. Large dice the potatoes. Add more mayonnaise, if necessary.
ingredients: potato, vienna sausages, onion, celery rib, eggs, frozen peas and carrot, mayonnaise, sour cream, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, green onion
name: colombian potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f spread phoron bengali on baking sheet, and toast 5-7 minutes, or until light brown and fragrant. Transfer to bowl. Meanwhile, toast phoron bengali, fenugreek seeds, nigella seeds, fennel seed, cumin, mustard seeds, and salt in skillet over medium-low heat 3 minutes, or until phoron bengali is light brown and mixture is fragrant, swirling pan constantly. Place in bowl with phoron bengali. Cool completely. Coarsely grind phoron bengali and sumac in food processor, or grind with mortar and pestle. Transfer to bowl, and stir in sesame seeds. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: fenugreek seeds, nigella seeds, fennel seed, cumin, mustard seeds
name: panch phoron bengali five spice

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Line a large baking tray with baking parchment. Place bread in a blender or food processor and blend to make fine breadcrumbs. Mix the breadcrumbs with the grated cheese and. Place the egg white and flour in 2 separate shallow bowls. Dip the chicken pieces in the flour first to lightly dust then dip into the egg whites and finally into the cheesy breadcrumbs, turning to evenly coat. Place on prepared baking tray. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the chicken is thoroughly cooked, there is no pink meat and the juices run clear when pierced with a sharp knife. Serve the chicken dippers with tomato sauce or mayonnaise.
ingredients: white bread, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, garlic powder, onion powder, butter
name: cheesy oven sandwiches

steps: Cover and cook potatoes in boiling salted water for 15 to 20 minutes, until potatoes are fork tender. Drain potatoes. Mash potatoes in a large mixing bowl until no lumps remain. Add butter and milk, salt, and pepper mashing in to blend together. Fold in pesto very lightly just to streak the potatoes. Garnish with pine nut and basil.
ingredients: small red potatoes, coarse salt, stock, pesto sauce
name: pesto smashed potatoes

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: egg, low-fat milk, self rising flour, vanilla essence
name: world s easiest pancakes

steps: Place beef in slowcooker. Add sliced onions. Mix together the vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic, pepper and thyme. Pour liquid mix over beef in slowcooker. Cover with the lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness.
ingredients: beef roast, onion soup mix, cream of mushroom soup, water
name: super easy slow cooker roast

steps: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set.
ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, hot water, vanilla ice cream, crushed pineapple, pecan nuts, banana
name: raspberry jello ice cream salad

steps: In a small bowl, add the bourbon to the cornstarch and stir until the cornstarch has dissolved. Add the rest of the ingredients except the chicken and oil, and stir again until the sugar has dissolved. Then set the sauce aside. Coat both sides of the golden corral copycat with the olive oil and fry for 4 minutes on each side, or until the internal temperature reaches 165f remove the chicken and cut into bite size pieces. Put the chicken back into the pan, along with the sauce and simmer over low heat until the sauce starts to bubble. Serve with rice or noodles.
ingredients: dark chicken meat, soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic powder, powdered ginger, dried onion flakes, jim beam bourbon whiskey, white wine
name: bourbon street chicken golden corral copycat

steps: In a large saucepan, saute the corn in butter until smooth. Add in the flour. Stir until smooth. Cook for 1 minute stirring constantly. Gradually add in the milk. Cook and stir constantly over medium heat until mixture is thickened and bubbly. Stir in hot sauce, salt and pepper to taste. Add in crabmeat and shrimp. Cook and stir over low heat until shrimp turn pink. Add in parsley and stir to combine. Serve.
ingredients: onion, butter, flour, curry powder, frozen corn, milk, heavy whipping cream, salt, pepper, crabmeat
name: crab and corn bisque

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve with sauce. Serve over hot white rice, if desired.
ingredients: aluminum foil, salmon fillets, asparagus, lemon, fresh ground black pepper, seasoning salt, lemon wedge
name: salmon and asparagus in foil

steps: Place the tomatillos in a blender or food processor. Blend either coarse or smooth, depending on your preference. Transfer tomatillo salsa to covered container and refrigerate at least 3 hours. Good with tortilla chips, enchiladas, tacos, etc. I always triple the recipe and freeze in 8 ounce containers.
ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, white onion, serrano chili peppers, tomatillo, cilantro, avocado
name: salsa de tomatillo con aguacate

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chopped strawberries in a 13 x 9 cake pan and sprinkle with gelatin. Bake for 20 minutes. While apples are baking, mix the rest of the ingredients. Crumble mixture on top of cooked rhubarb and bake 40 minutes longer.
ingredients: fresh strawberries, cold water, sugar, potato starch, cranberries, rhubarb
name: kisel s pureed fruit dessert

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine pasta with peppers, carrots and parsley. Add tri-color spiral pasta, red onion, shredded cheddar cheese, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar, head broccoli, mayonna
ingredients: tri-color spiral pasta, red onion, shredded cheddar cheese, head broccoli, mayonnaise, splenda granular, apple cider vinegar
name: broccoli pasta cheddar salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine spinach, cheeses, and seasonings. Lift up skin of each chicken breast and divide mixture evenly among them. Be careful not to tear skins. Smooth skin over stuffing. Tuck skin edges underneath to form a neat package. Brush chicken with melted margarine. Place in 2-quart baking dish. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes. Remove skin before serving.
ingredients: chicken breasts, fresh spinach, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, salt, ground black pepper, garlic powder, dried thyme leaves, dried tarragon, butter
name: stuffed chicken breasts o brien

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Dice the two casseroles into approximately one inch cubes. Toss the casserole cubes with 2-4 tbsp of olive oil. Add salt and pepper to taste. Spread into a single layer on a baking sheet and pop into preheated oven. Roast until eggplant is tender and beginning to brown, 15-20 minutes. When eggplant is done roasting, pull out of the oven and top with crushed red pepper, tomato sauce, parmesan, and mozzarella cheese. Place back in oven for approximately 10-15 minutes or until cheese is bubbling and starting to brown slightly. Serve with salad.
ingredients: heavy cream, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, worcestershire sauce, parmesan cheese, nutmeg, paprika, fish, shrimp
name: creamy seafood casserole low carb

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Add water in a steamer to a boil, lower heat to a simmer. Layer ingredients in the steamer. Cabbage, break the slice up a little, the slice of onion, broken into rings. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon cheese over evenly, add the slice of tomato. Season the fish with salt and pepper and place the fish fillets evenly over the tomato and top with the other tablespoon of cheese. Steam for approximately 10 minutes or until the cabbage is tender crisp and the fish is flaky. Try to retain the layers to remove to plate.
ingredients: sour cream, parmesan cheese, garlic, bacon, haddock fillets
name: dads super secret baked haddock

steps: Preheat oven to 180c or 350f. Melt the butter in a large pan. Then add sugars and cook, stirring, until combined. Remove from heat. Add all of the remaining ingredients and stir gently until combined. Place level tablespoons pf mixture, about 3cm apart, on lightly greased oven trays. Bake in a moderate oven about 15 minutes or until golden brown. Stand for 5 minutes before removing from trays to cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, eggs, salt, baking soda, flour, corn flakes, walnuts, vanilla
name: grandma s corn flake cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all ingredients, except pecans and pie crust, together. Pour into pie shell. Bake until done.
ingredients: butter, sugar, karo syrup, eggs, pecans, whole pecans, vanilla extract, unbaked pie shells
name: old fashion pecan pie

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook and drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt and pepper. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, frozen chopped broccoli, fresh mushrooms, fat-free cream of mushroom soup, low-fat mayonnaise, egg whites, salt and pepper
name: low fat spinach broccoli casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Combine the biscuit mix, margarine, onion, dill weed, sesame seeds, half and half in a bowl and mix well. Shape into balls and place on a greased baking sheet, flaten slightly with palm of hand. Brush with the melted butter. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: margarine, onion, dill weed, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits
name: quick easy dill biscuits

steps: Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Add layer of american cheese, ham, two slices of tomato, two leaves of lettuce, and two pieces of bacon. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on the stack mayo side down. Slice the sandwich in quarters diagonally. Skewers or long toothpicks may be used to hold all the layers together.
ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, american cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, crisp bacon
name: blt club sandwich

steps: Place jamaica agua fresca in blender and blend until smooth. Pour into ice cube trays. Set trays on a cookie sheet and set in freezer. Freeze solid. When ready to serve, put jamaica agua fresca in fancy dessert glasses. Let set a few minutes to thaw slightly.
ingredients: dried hibiscus flowers, water, strawberries, sugar
name: strawberry jamaica agua fresca

steps: In a large bowl, combine the warm milk, yeast, sugar, eggs and oil. Cover and process on low speed for 30 seconds or until blended. In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Add the yeast mixture and stir with a spoon until combined. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 30 minutes. Stir dough down. Fill greased muffin cups half full. Fill greased muff
ingredients: hot water, sugar, shortening, active dry yeast, salt, egg, all-purpose flour
name: hot rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Spray a small baking dish with non-stick spray. Take the stems out of the mushrooms by twisting them until they come loose. Mince the stems and place them in a small dish. Add the cheese, parsley, oil and cayenne pepper to the dish and mix well. Place the caps in the dish stem side up. Spoon the mixture into the caps. Bake 12-15 minutes or until tender. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: button mushrooms, extra virgin olive oil, cider vinegar, bay leaf, peppercorns, fresh parsley
name: soused mushrooms

steps: Boil spaghetti until al dente. Prepare a large non-stick skillet on med-high heat with olive oil. Chop onion into large chunks and cook until browned in the skillet. Add garlic, salt, and red pepper flakes. Add tomatoes and spinach. Mix well until heated through. Serve over spaghetti or mix it all up.
ingredients: spaghetti, frozen peas, olive oil, onions, minced garlic clove, cooked bacon, cream cheese, milk, red pepper flakes
name: creamy spaghetti with peas and bacon

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Place the black olives in a large bowl and bake until just crisp, about 10 minutes. Let cool. Pour the olive oil in a steady stream until combined. Transfer to a container and store in the refrigerator. To serve, put the black olives in a large bowl. Toss with enough of the vinaigrette to coat the spinach. Sprinkle with the crisp prosciutto crumbles, toss again, and serve.
ingredients: oranges, red onions, olive, white wine vinegar, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper, parsley, pine nuts
name: orange black olive salad

steps: Melt butter in a large skillet or saute pan over medium heat. Saute mushrooms, spinach, basil, salt, pepper and garlic until mushrooms are tender and spinach is heated through. Pour in wine and reduce heat to low. Simmer 1 minute. Stir in parmesan cheese and serve.
ingredients: vegetable stock, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves, fresh thyme leave, salt, portabella mushrooms
name: grilled portabella with thyme garlic

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Place fennel, onion and garlic into an oiled baking dish using the 2 tablespoons oil. Combine saffron, chicken broth and white wine and pour over fennel season with salt and pepper. Dot with butter. Cover and bake for 25 - 30 minutes. If desired, uncover the baking dish toward the end of the cooking time, to allow any excess liquid to evaporate. Garnish with the fennel fronds.
ingredients: fennel, orange, orange zest, onion, bay leaf, salt & pepper
name: fennel with orangeslices

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer until sugar dissolves. Reduce heat to medium and simmer until peels lose their bright color. Remove apple peels with tongs or a slotted spoon. Continue simmering until mixture has reduced by half. Test consistency by dipping a spoon into the mixture and then rubbing your finger across it. You will be able to tell when it has thickened. Cooking time will vary. You may this in sterile jars or let it cool and keep in the refrigerator.
ingredients: apple juice, dried apple, butter, ground cinnamon
name: space needle apple cinnamon caramel sauce

steps: Butterfly shrimp and place on non-stick baking pan or line pan with aluminum foil for easier cleanup. Brush shrimp with melted butter. Sprinkle lightly with garlic salt. Mix together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, par
ingredients: linguine, butter, heavy cream, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, pesto sauce, large shrimp
name: creamy pesto shrimp or chicken

steps: To serve, add dressing and toss lightly to combine. Dressing can be made several days in advance and refrigerated, shake well before using. Combine remaining ingredients in a large salad bowl. Chill until serving time. To serve, add dressing and toss lightly to combine. Combine remaining ingredients in
ingredients: herring in wine sauce, bermuda onion, granny smith apple, dill pickle, sour cream, sugar, distilled white vinegar, fresh dill
name: oma trudy s herring salad

steps: Heat the oil in a deep skillet or wok. Saute the onion and celery 5 minutes. Mix in the pork, soy sauce and sprouts. Cook 2 minutes. Mix the cornstarch with the broth. Add to the skillet, stirring steadily to the boiling point. Cook 3 minutes more. Serve with rice or chow mein noodles.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, green pepper, mushroom pieces, cabbage, carrot, onion soup mix, water, cornstarch, soy sauce
name: mock chow mein

steps: Heat oil in large non-stick skillet. Add corn tortilla, roast pork, cheese, green chilies, onion, lemon pepper, garlic clove, salt and pepper. Cook on high for 3-4 hours.
ingredients: corn tortilla, roast pork, cheese, green chilies, onion, lemon pepper, garlic clove
name: shredded pork taquitos

steps: Put the pineapple juice, crystallized ginger, club soda, ice cubes in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add sugar, pineapple juice and the ginger. Bring mixture to a light boil and stir until sugar has melted and incorporated into all the other ingredients. Pour mixture over the pineapple and toss gently.
ingredients: pineapple juice, crystallized ginger, club soda, ice cubes
name: ginger pineapple spritzer

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Place salmon into a glass baking dish. Pour coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot, coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt
ingredients: light coconut milk, scallions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper, salmon fillets, asparagus, carrot
name: salmon and asparagus with coconut sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add vinegar to skillet. Add garlic to skillet. Add basil to skillet. Add tomato sauce to skillet. Cook,
ingredients: vinegar, salt, pepper, round steak, flour, oil, tomatoes, green chili, garlic, basil
name: spicy tomato steak

steps: Combine all ingredients in a crock pot. Stir in coconut milk, flour, curry, garlic, salt, chicken breasts, onion, carrots, bell pepper. Add second can of coconut milk, flour, curry, garlic, salt, chicken breasts, onion, carrots, bell pepper. Add second can of coconut milk, flour, curry, garlic, salt, chicken breasts
ingredients: coconut milk, flour, curry, garlic, salt, chicken breasts, onion, carrots, bell pepper
name: crock pot thai chicken with vegetables

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease cupcake, 9 x 13, or 2 layer pans. Dump all ingredients into large bowl. Mix by hand using a wire whisk or wooden spoon just until the dry ingredients are combined. Do not overmix. If using walnuts, mix with a teaspoon of flour and then fold into batter. Bake 350 degrees about 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool on wire rack and frost with favorite frosting, if desired.
ingredients: mashed banana, maple syrup, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, salt, cinnamon, sugar
name: banana mug cake

steps: Heat oil in a skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until browned stirring often. When done cut into strips. Place back into skillet and add soup, water, corn& tortillas. Bring to a boil. Cover, cook over low heat for 5 minutes or until hot. Top with cheese and serve.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast half, chili powder, tomatoes, butter, eggs, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: tortilla a la mexicana

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
ingredients: chicken broth, tomato paste, ground black pepper, dried oregano, salt, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breasts, dry breadcrumbs, olive oil, fresh mushrooms
name: chicken in a pot

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm. Pour juices from baking dish into a small saucepan and whisk together with cream over low heat until thickened. Pour sauce over chicken and serve warm.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, seasoning salt, butter, bacon, onion, fresh mushrooms, monterey jack pepper cheese, parmesan cheese
name: bacon jack chicken

steps: Mix first layer and press into 9 x 13 pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Combine ingredients for second layer and spread on first layer. Mix pudding and milk. Spread over second layer. Spread remaining cool whip over third layer. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Place in refrigerator until ready to serve.
ingredients: peach nectar, dried apricot, butter, pistachios, salt, white pepper
name: space needle apricot and pistachio butter

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first seven ingredients. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Drain and discard marinade. On each of 12 metal or soaked wooden appetizer skewers, thread two shrimp and any veggies you want to add. Grill kabobs, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 5-8 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, turning once.
ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, garlic cloves, dried thyme, salt, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast, sweet green peppers
name: lemon chicken kabobs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Coat a 2-quart baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients except the bacon and mix well. Pour into the baking dish and lay the raw strips of bacon on top. Cover and bake for approximately 45 minutes, or until thick and bubbly. Uncover and bake for 5 more minute.
ingredients: butternut squash, apples, lemon juice, ground cinnamon, brown sugar, apple juice
name: butternut apple casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly coat 12 well muffin pan with nonstick cooking spray. In bowl, combine muffin mix, buttermilk, egg and 2 tbsp butter until blended. Gently fold in the blueberries and pecans. Spoon batter into prepared pan. Brush tops with 1 tbsp butter. Bake 12 minutes or till golden brown. Let cool 5 minutes, remove from pan.
ingredients: unsalted butter, sugar, salt, honey, eggs, whole wheat flour, whole grain cornmeal, baking powder, milk, blueberries
name: blueberry whole grain corn muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat cake mix with eggs, oil and milk in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Pour evenly into 2 greased round cake pans. Mix first 5 dry ingredients together. Beat egg, add milk, sour cream, melted butter and vanilla. Combine with dry ingredients only until blended. Pour into a greased, floured 8 or 9 inch round or square pan. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 25 minutes.
ingredients: bisquick baking mix, milk, sugar, oil, egg, bisquick, butter, cinnamon
name: old bisquick streusel coffee cake recipe

steps: Mix together flour, salt, onion powder, pepper, margarine, cream of potato soup, onion powder, salt and pepper. Serve with mashed potatoes or rice. Tastes even better when served the next day.
ingredients: pork chops, flour, garlic salt, onion powder, pepper, margarine, cream of potato soup
name: pork chops with potato gravy

steps: To make the crust, mix the flour, sugar, and salt in a medium bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Stirring with a fork, add just enough of the egg yolk mixture to moisten the dough so it holds together when pinched between the thumb and forefinger. Gather up into a thick disk and wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight.
ingredients: flour, shortening, salt, egg, ice water, vinegar
name: sure thing pie crust

steps: Cook sausage, ground beef and onion in large pan until brown, adding worcestershire, oregano, garlic powder, miniature party rye rounds. Reduce heat and blend in cheese. Mix thoroughly. Spread on slices of rye bread. Place on a baking sheet with wax paper between layers and freeze. When frozen, put in a ziploc bag and store in freezer until ready to use. Bake at 325 for 15 - 20 minutes.
ingredients: breakfast sausage, onion, green pepper, velveeta cheese, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, miniature party rye rounds
name: sausage appetizers oamc

steps: Heat olive oil in frying pan, cook sausages for 8-10 minutes or until cooked through. Remove from pan and chop roughly, cover to keep warm. Return pan to medium heat and add garlic, crushed and sundried tomatoes, white wine and cream and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered for 10 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly. Meanwhile, cook pasta according to package directions, drain. Stir cooked sausage, spring onions and sage through sauce, season to taste. Divide pasta among serving bowls and spoon over sauce.
ingredients: fettuccine pasta, sausages, olive oil, button mushrooms, garlic cloves, green olives, lemon rind, lemon juice, parsley, cream
name: fettuccine with italian sausage and olives

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine pasta with peppers, carrots and parsley. Add vinaigrette and mix well. Add feta cheese, mix lightly, lifting the pasta and cheese mixture until the cheese is distributed throughout. Chill for an hour before serving.
ingredients: farfalle pasta, roasted red peppers, onion, fresh parsley, red wine vinegar, garlic cloves, olive oil, cannellini beans, red kidney beans, salt and pepper
name: mediterranean farfalle bow tie pasta salad

steps: Preheat oven according to instructions on cake mix. Melt the butter over medium high heat in the iron skillet. Remove from the heat and sprinkle the brown sugar evenly to cover the butter. Next, arrange pineapple rings around the bottom of the pan, one layer deep. Place a maraschino cherry into the center of each pineapple ring. Prepare the cake mix by mixing the mix, water, oil and eggs together, substitute some of the pineapple juice for some of the liquid in the directions. Pour the batter over the pineapple layer in dutch oven. Bake as directed by the cake mix directions. Cool for 10 minutes, then carefully turn out onto a plate.
ingredients: pineapple juice, vanilla vodka, grenadine, maraschino cherries, ice
name: pineapple upside down cake martini

steps: In a small, heavy saucepan, stir together the apple juice, cinnamon syrup, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon
ingredients: apple juice, cinnamon syrup, whipped cream, caramel syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon
name: hot caramel apple cafe hot drink

steps: Mix together lamb mince, shallot, parsley, pine nuts, sweet paprika, cumin, salt and pepper and brush over both sides of the lamb. Leave to marinate for at least 4 hours or overnight. Preheat oven to 325 f. Drain the lamb, reserving marinade, and dry lamb with paper towel. Heat olive oil in frying pan and cook lamb over high heat just until browned on both sides. Transfer the lamb to a shallow pie dish. Scatter the sliced onions and bay leaves around the lamb, then pour the white wine and the reserved marinade on top. Mix the flour with sufficient water to make a firm dough. Moisten the rim of the pie dish. Roll out the dough on a floured surface and use to cover the dish so that it is tightly sealed. Bake for 2 hours, then break away the crust and serve the lamb hot. Potatoes make a great accompaniment.
ingredients: lamb mince, shallot, parsley, pine nuts, sweet paprika, cumin, salt and pepper, olive oil
name: koftas

steps: In a large saucepan, heat oil. Add sausage and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add shallots and garlic. Cook one minute. Add tomatoes, herbs and sugar. Bring to a fast boil, then simmer uncovered for 40 minutes. Stir frequently and skim off fat. Add salt and pepper. Serve over pasta.
ingredients: italian sausage, italian stewed tomatoes, tomato sauce, beef broth, mushroom, green bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, cheese tortellini, dill pickle
name: italian soup with dill

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix first 4 ingredients. Pour into pie plate or similar small baking dish. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle the bacon on top. Bake for additional 5 minutes. Serve with crackers or crusty bread.
ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, all purpose greek seasoning, french bread, feta cheese, sliced ripe olives, pepperoncini pepper
name: greek appetizer bread

steps: Heat a large saucepan over a low heat and add the butter. When the butter has melted, add the onion and cook until soft and translucent. Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper to taste, then increase the heat and stir. When the moisture from the mushrooms has been released, allow it to evaporate, concentrating the flavour. This might happen quickly or slowly, depending entirely on the type of mushrooms used. Add teh paprika and cayenne and fry for a few moments longer, until the paprika turns a shade darker. Finally, add teh sour cream or creme fraiche and dill, and allow it to bubbvle gently for a further 5 minutes or so. Serve immediately with rice, pasta or spatzle.
ingredients: sugar, water, paprika, salt, thyme, tarragon, oregano, lemon, zest of
name: smoked paprika syrup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter 9 inch fluted or plain tube pan. In large bowl of electric mixer, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs, eggnog, and vanilla. Stir together flour, bakng powder, and salt. Gradually beat into butter mixture. Prepare topping by combining nuts, sugar and cinnamon. Scatter half the topping evenly over bottom of pan. Spoon in half batter. Add remaining topping and spoon on remaining batter. Bake 50 to 60 minute, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: brown sugar, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, unsalted butter, milk, egg, ground nutmeg, walnuts
name: nutmeg coffee cake

steps: Place the cucumber in a sieve and sprinkle with salt. Put the yogurt and mint in a bowl. Mix well. Add the garlic, lemon juice, olive oil and drained cucumber, and season well with black pepper. Mix well and taste for salt before serving.
ingredients: plain yogurt, cucumbers, salt, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, fresh ground pepper, mint leaf
name: tzatziki cucumber dipping sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spread almonds onto a baking sheet in a single layer. Roast about 10 to 15 minutes, until slightly browned, tossing a couple of times for even browning. Let cool to touch. In a blender, mix or pulse the almonds with the walnut oil and salt. This can take about 10 minutes or so. Once smooth, spoon in honey and blend for 30 seconds to mix thoroughly. Spread on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 30 minutes, until slightly browned, tossing a couple of times for even browning. Spread on an un
ingredients: liquid honey, ground cinnamon, almonds, salt
name: cinnamon and honey almonds

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled.
ingredients: garlic bread, cream cheese with tomato and basil, ground beef, cheese, italian stewed tomatoes, butter, salt, pepper
name: garlic bread pie

steps: Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes.
ingredients: butter, flour, milk, new potatoes, peas, salt, pepper
name: easy new peas and potatoes

steps: Whisk together milk, water, cinnamon, orange, zest of, mexican chocolate, semisweet chocolate, tangerine liqueur in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the milk, water, cinnamon, orange, zest of, mexican chocolate, semisweet chocolate, tangerine liqueur in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the milk, water, cinnamon
ingredients: milk, star anise, cinnamon, orange, allspice berries, brown sugar, semisweet chocolate, dark rum
name: venezuelan spiced hot chocolate

steps: Whisk together garlic, vinegar, water, olive oil, salt, white pepper, basil, oregano, sugar. Whisk together garlic, garlic clove, balsamic vinegar, salt, white pepper, basil, oregano, sugar. Pour vinaigrette over broccoli. Serve immediately.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, balsamic vinegar, salt, white pepper, basil, oregano, sugar
name: sweet tangy balsamic vinaigrette

steps: Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Mix in pineapple and oranges. Chill.
ingredients: tapioca pudding, instant vanilla pudding, orange jell-o, water, cool whip, mandarin oranges
name: orange creamsicle salad

steps: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan. Cook over medium heat for 30 minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally. Cool. Store in the refrigerator. Makes a nice condiment for poultry, pork or beef.
ingredients: apricots, raw sugar, red onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, lime juice, red capsicum, salt, pepper
name: apricot and lime chutney relish

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the stock, with the dill added, to a boil. Add rice. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for about 15 to 20 minutes-- just until the rice is tender but still firm. In the bowl with the beaten eggs, slowly stir about 2 cups of the soup in, beating constantly. Once combined, slowly pour this mixture back into the soup-pot. Increase the heat to medium and cook, stirring constantly, for about 5 minutes or until the soup has slightly thickened. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice. Taste and add salt and pepper. Serve immediately.
ingredients: de-fatted chicken broth, long-grain rice, egg yolks, lemon, juice of, salt & freshly ground black pepper, of fresh mint, lemon slice
name: greek egg lemon soup for the microwave

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over
ingredients: salt, tomatoes, oil, fresh ginger, fresh garlic, green chilies, fennel seeds, bay leaves, hard-boiled eggs, fresh coriander leaves
name: subru uncle s indian egg curry my picky eater bro manav loves

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: linguine, garlic cloves, olive oil, salmon, chicken broth, fresh parsley, salt, cayenne pepper
name: garlic salmon linguine

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add peanut butter and vanilla and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately.
ingredients: peanut butter, butter, powdered sugar, brown sugar, pretzels, milk chocolate
name: chocolate peanut butter pretzel bites

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil to medium-high heat. Add chicken and brown. Put chicken in crockpot. Add frozen vegetables and tapioca. Mix well. In a small bowl, mix all remaining ingredients. Pour on the chicken. Cover and bake at low heat for 4 hours.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, teriyaki sauce, ranch dressing, cracker crumb
name: teriyaki ranch chicken

steps: Spray a slow cooker container with butter-flavored cooking spray. Combine apples and raisins in crock. Add splenda, apple pie spice, and apple juice. Mix well to combine. Dot top with margarine. Cover and cook on low for 4-6 hours.
ingredients: pork loin chops, chicken broth, apple pie filling, lemon juice, chicken bouillon granule, cinnamon, pecans
name: crock pot pork loin chops with apples

steps: In a large roasting pan toss parsnips, potato, rutabaga, carrots and onion with oil. Sprinkle with salt. Roast for 15 - 20 minutes, in a 450 degree f oven. In a large saucepan bring broth and beans to a boil and add roasted vegetable. Reduced heat. Simmer, covered, 5 minutes. Stir in thyme. For a thicker soup, mash vegetables and beans slightly.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, curry powder, carrots, parsnip, vegetable broth, salt, ground black pepper, yogurt, parsley
name: carrot parsnip soup

steps: In a large bowl, combine whole milk ricotta cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, orange rind, mini chocolate chip, sugar ice cream cones, candy sprinkles. Cover and blend or process till smooth. Stir into the yogurt. If desired, cover and chill up to 24 hours. Serve with assorted fruit. Prep time includes refrigeration time.
ingredients: whole milk ricotta cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, orange rind, mini chocolate chip, sugar ice cream cones, candy sprinkles
name: ice cream cone cannoli

steps: Heat skillet over medium high heat. Add wine and lemon juice and simmer for about 45 or 50 minutes, or until tender. Remove to warm serving platter. Make mustard sauce. Stir flour into drippings in skillet until smooth. Stir in cream, mustard and cayenne. Boil, stirring 1 minute. Serve chops with sauce.
ingredients: butter, shallots, cornstarch, dry red wine, beef broth, dijon mustard, fresh chives, pepper
name: wine shallot sauce dijon

steps: In a dutch oven, bring 4 cups water to a boil. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Remove from the heat. Add water and pineapple juice. Put in the fridge for about an hour, until completely set but not set yet. Add the fruit, evenly scattered through the pineapple. Put back in the fridge until completely set.
ingredients: pineapple, watermelon, coconut, sugar, water
name: otai

steps: In lg. Bowl, stir together all ingredients except for half of the cheese and the fish sticks. Spread into 13x9 baking dish. Top with frozen fish sticks in 3 rows of 6 longways. Sprinkle evenly with the rest of the cheese, spreading, making sure some of it gets down in between and around fish sticks. Bake at 350, uncovered, for about 35-40 minutes. Serve with coleslaw and garlic bread.
ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, eggs, skim milk, onion flakes, fresh dill, seasoning salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, frozen fish sticks
name: kid s fish stick casserole

steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. Prepare the breasts by cutting a slit or flap in the largest part of the breast. Mix all filling ingredients and spoon into breasts. Place stuffed breasts into a glass 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle with bread crumb mixture and parmesan cheese. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, asparagus spears, red pepper, mushrooms, grape tomatoes, olive oil, sea salt, pepper, garlic powder, part-skim mozzarella cheese
name: veggie blend stuffed breasts
