steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cut jalapenos in half lengthwise and scrape out seeds. In a bowl, combine cheeses and onion and mix well. Wrap bacon slices around each half, cover as much of the surface as possible. Brush bacon surface with bbq sauce. Secure with toothpicks and pop into oven for 1 hr.
ingredients: sausage meat, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, jalapeno peppers, garlic
name: yuma jack s jalapeno poppers

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: sausage, onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, fresh mushrooms, egg noodles, pasta sauce
name: for sausage onion pepper mushroom lovers only

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter the sides and bottom of a 10-inch springform pan and set aside. In the top of a double boiler, combine the butter, chocolate and coffee and melt slowly, stirring occasionally, until smooth. Remove from the heat and let cool for 5 minutes. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar and vanilla until frothy. Whisk the eggs into the melted chocolate until combined. Pour the mixture into the prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour and cool on a wire rack until it reaches room temperature. Remove the sides of the pan, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight, before serving.
ingredients: unsalted butter, bittersweet chocolate, brewed coffee, extra large eggs, sugar, vanilla extract
name: dense bittersweet chocolate cake

steps: Place steaks in a large resealable plastic bag and add marinade. Turn to coat. Refrigerate 45 minutes to an hour, turning occasionally. Heat grill to medium-high heat. Remove steaks from marinade and grill, turning once, about 3 minutes per side or until preferred doneness. Let steaks rest 5 minuts before serving.
ingredients: beef t-bone steaks, salt, chili powder, brown sugar, ground cumin, garlic, cider vinegar, worcestershire sauce, ground red pepper
name: grilled t bone steaks with bbq rub

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Spread into a 9x9 baking dish. Top with reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Bake until bubbly and lightly browned on top approximately 30 minutes.
ingredients: artichokes, rotel tomatoes & chilies, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, garlic powder
name: sassy baked artichoke dip

steps: In a large saucepan, bring sugar and corn syrup to boil. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter and vanilla. Mix in cereal. Drop by large spoonful onto wax paper. Let cool. They seem to harden better, plus they taste good that way.
ingredients: corn flakes, crunchy peanut butter, sugar, white corn syrup, chocolate chips
name: no bake chocolate peanut butter corn flake bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. Should be 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: reduced-fat cream cheese, biscuit mix, nonfat milk, green onions, egg substitute, vegetable oil, sugar, vegetable oil cooking spray
name: green onion and cream cheese muffins

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth. Chill at least a few hours before tasting. Can serve with chips, crackers, or as a veggie dip. Keeps well in fridge. Cooking time listed is for chilling time.
ingredients: cauliflower florets, broccoli florets, oyster sauce, water, chili paste, olive oil, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, carrot, green onion
name: szechuan broccoli and cauliflower

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve.
ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, cayenne pepper, olive oil, orange juice, raisins, red wine vinegar, couscous
name: north african style chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place foil on a cookie sheet. Place fish on the foil and season to taste with salt and pepper. Top with pesto, tomatoes and then cheese. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until fish flakes with fork. To prevent wasting the rest of the pesto in the jar, i make one recipe for dinner and freeze the ingredients to have another day. Just place each of the ingredients in its own quart-size freezer bag, then place all in a gallon-size freezer bag along with directions and freeze. When ready to make, just thaw completely and follow the above directions to prepare.
ingredients: frozen cheese tortellini, zucchini, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, fat-free half-and-half, pesto sauce, ham
name: creamy pesto tortellini

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Cut pork ribs into sections of 3 or 4 bones. Mix remaining ingredients well, sprinkle on both sides of ribs and rub into the meat. Seal rib sections in foil with a tablespoon of water in each package, and bake for 2 hours on a cookie sheet in the center of the oven. Open foil carefully as steam escapes. Can be crisped on a hot bbq if desired but will be great just the way it is.
ingredients: rack of ribs, light brown sugar, paprika, salt, fresh ground black pepper, thyme, oregano, onion powder, garlic salt
name: pork ribs perfection

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine eggs, scallion, parsley, basil leaves, cream cheese, salt, cream cheese, salt, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese
ingredients: scallion, fresh parsley leaves, fresh basil, eggs, heavy cream, cream cheese, salt, fresh ground pepper, butter
name: luxury splendid eggs

steps: In a large skillet, saute onions and celery in 3 tablespoons butter until tender. Drain and set aside. In a saucepan, melt the remaining butter, stir in flour, salt and pepper until smooth. Gradually stir in milk. Bring to a boil, cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Pour over vegetables. Toss to coat. Pour into an ungreased 2 quart baking dish sprinkle with cheese and pecans. Bake, uncovered at 350f for 20-25 minutes, or until heated through.
ingredients: onions, sugar, salt, ground black pepper, butter, dry sherry, parmesan cheese
name: gourmet onions

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: carrots, slivered almonds, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt & fresh ground pepper, honey, cider vinegar, dried cranberries, danish blue cheese, arugula
name: roasted carrot salad

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: low-fat buttermilk, salt-free cajun seasoning, salt, panko breadcrumbs, chicken breast halves, skinless chicken thighs, cooking spray
name: cajun oven fried chicken

steps: In a skillet saute onion and ground beef until meat is no longer pink. Stir in tomato sauce, macaroni and spices. Cover. Simmer on low heat for 15 minutes. Remove cover. If sauce is too thick add water. Serve topped with grated parmesan cheese and a side salad if desired.
ingredients: ground beef, kraft macaroni and cheese, water, barbecue sauce, tomato sauce, lettuce, tomatoes, white onion
name: beeferoni mac

steps: Rinse flank steak and pat dry. In a 1-gallon zip lock bag or large bowl, mix the soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, green onions, sesame seeds, garlic, pepper, and ginger. Add the steak, seal bag or cover bowl tightly, and chill, turning occasionally, at least 4 hours or up to 2 days. Lift steak from the bag and let drain briefly. Place meat on a grill over a solid bed of medium-hot coals or medium-high heat on gas grill. Close lid on gas grill. Cook steak, turning occasionally to brown evenly, for medium-rare, 9 to 12 minutes,, transfer steak to a platter and let stand 10 minutes, cut meat across grain into thin slanting slices,.
ingredients: beef flank steak, barbecue sauce, soy sauce, green onion, sesame seeds, garlic clove, ground ginger
name: asian grilled flank steak

steps: Spray one side of each sheet of foil. Lay four pieces of chicken on four sheets. Top with corn and green peppers and bbq sauce. Take other sheets of foil to enclose each to be a packet. Grill until done. Open and eat.
ingredients: aluminum foil, chicken breast halves, barbecue sauce, frozen whole kernel corn, green bell pepper
name: barbecue chicken packets

steps: Heat oil in fry pan over medium high heat until a popcorn kernal pops. Add half of shrimp to oil, cook to golden brown both sides. Remove and add second half of shrimp and repeat.
ingredients: jumbo shrimp, sage leaf, pancetta, olive oil
name: sage and pancetta shrimp

steps: In a large sauce pan. Add the salt, cayenne pepper, raw shrimp, canola oil, garlic, green onion, snow peas, vegetables, chicken broth, lemon, zest of. Bring to a slight boil. Add shrimp and fresh or frozen but thawed broccoli florets. Take some of the excess sauce and pour into a bowl. Whisk and return to pan. Bring to full boil and stir constantly. As soon as thickening begins, remove from heat and serve over white rice. You may also use one of them premade asian vegetable medleys in this recipe and pour sauce over it. Can be used for beef, chicken or pork as well.
ingredients: salt, cayenne pepper, raw shrimp, canola oil, garlic, green onion, snow peas, vegetables, chicken broth, lemon, zest of
name: cayenne shrimp stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: baking potato, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese, fresh flat-leaf parsley, garlic powder, crushed red pepper flakes, salt
name: italian seasoned fries low fat

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place swiss cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: swiss cheese, flour, buttermilk, apple cider, caraway seed
name: warm and creamy swiss cheese dip with caraway

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the butter, cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the butter mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately.
ingredients: blue cheese, unsalted butter, fresh black pepper, french baguettes, celery top
name: buttery blue cheese bread

steps: To a pitcher add orange juice, gin, vodka and cava or champagne. Add sugar, a pinch at a time. Stir and taste until desired sweetness is acheived. Refrigerate until chilled. Fill a glass with 2 or 3 ice cubes and fill. Garnish with lemon or lime wedges.
ingredients: oranges, vodka, water, sugar
name: orangecello

steps: In a large bowl combine flour and salt. Make a well. Mix together the wet ingredients and pour into well. Mix well. Turn out onto a floured board and knead until firm, shiny and elastic. At this point cover and chill for 1 hour, up to 24 hours. When ready to use follow instructions for manual pasta machine or cut into manageable pieces and roll out to desired thickness, cut into desired shape.
ingredients: flour, milk, eggs, butter, salt
name: croatian flour noodles

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Bake romaine lettuce for 30 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly. Remove from oven and allow
ingredients: head romaine lettuce, bacon, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, olive oil, egg, red wine vinegar, onions
name: commander salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl, beat the margarine, white and brown sugars together until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla, beat well. In another bowl, sift flour, baking powder, and salt. Add to the creamed mixture, stirring well. Fold in butter brickle bits, and chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting.
ingredients: margarine, molasses, sugar, eggs, vanilla, skim milk powder, baking powder, salt, wheat germ, walnuts
name: healthy flourless butterscotch brownies

steps: Combine asparagus, cooked shrimp, lemon, green onion, parsley, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf, vina
ingredients: asparagus, cooked shrimp, lemon, green onion, parsley, vinaigrette dressing, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, lettuce leaf
name: asparagus and shrimp salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: sugar, butter, egg yolk, almond extract, all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, chocolate chips
name: easy chocolate buttery cookies

steps: Saute the cranberries, discarding any bruised or decayed fruit, then rinse. In a 4-quart saucepan, over medium-high heat, bring the water, cranberries, sugar, apricots, currants, raisins & vinegar to a boil, stirring often. Reduce heat & simmer, stirring occasionally, until cranberries begin to pop, 5-8 minutes. Meanwhile, peel the tangerines, removing & discarding the peel & white fibers. Discard the seeds, then separate the segments & coarsely chop them. Add the chopped tangerines & the juice to the pan, & simmer to blend flavors, 2-3 minutes. Stir in pecans, then cool to room temperature & serve. Or chill & serve. Can be kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator up to 3 days, or frozen for up to 1 month.
ingredients: red onion, garlic cloves, dry red wine, pears, cranberries, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice
name: pear cranberry chutney

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Beat an egg in a mixing bowl. Add in ground beef, bread crumbs, garlic powder and onion powder and mix together. Add in almost all of the cup of catalina until the ground beef rolls into a ball. Place meat mixture into a greased bread pan and then add the remaining catalina dressing on top of meat mixture. Bake for an hour and a half.
ingredients: ground beef, minced garlic cloves, tomato paste, purple onion, eggs, seasoned bread crumbs, lipton onion soup mix, ketchup
name: melinda s tasty meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix butter, cinnamon, milk, bananas, mango chutney, crouton, rum. In a small bowl, mix butter, cinnamon, milk, bananas, mango chutney, crouton, rum. In a small bowl
ingredients: butter, cinnamon, milk, bananas, mango chutney, crouton, rum
name: banana bisque with cinnamon croutons

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Empty peaches into the bottom of a 13 x 9- inch pan. Cover with the dry cake mix and press down firmly. Cut butter or margarine into small pieces and place on top of cake mix. Sprinkle top with cinnamon. Bake for 45 minutes.
ingredients: white cake mix, peaches in heavy syrup, sprite, butter
name: bob s peach cobbler

steps: Dissolve honey in water. Add yeast mixture and oil. Knead until texture has developed. This takes about 4 - 5 minutes in the kenwood mixer, but would take longer if doing it by hand. Grease and flour a bread tin. Place dough into tin and leave to rise. Bake at 190 degrees c for about 30 - 32 minutes.
ingredients: warm water, olive oil, honey, unbleached flour, oats, sea salt, yeast, vital wheat gluten, flax seeds
name: gregs bread great for bread machine

steps: Toast bread in toaster to desired level. Put butter on one slice and mayo on the other. Put cheese in between slices of bread. Wrap a moist papertowel around sandwich and put in microwave for 20 sec. Enjoy.
ingredients: sourdough bread, olive oil, fresh basil leaves, tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, salt and pepper
name: toasted caprese sandwich

steps: In a large bowl, combine the soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar, black pepper, garlic, green onions and sesame seeds. Slice beef thinly into x 2 inch pieces. Add meat to soy sauce mixture and mix well. Cover and refrigerate 1-2 hours. Preheat oven to broil. Broil on broiler rack or grill meat for 2-3 minutes per side or until brown. Serve with vegetable side dishes and rice.
ingredients: beef, teriyaki sauce, light soy sauce, garlic cloves, scallions, brown sugar, granulated sugar, sesame oil, black pepper
name: spicy bulgogi

steps: Boil syrup and sugar together for about 2 minutes. Pour over eggs gradually, stirring well. Add butter, vanilla and pecans. Pour into pie shell. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for about 50 to 60 minutes. As it bakes, the bottom layer will rise to the top.
ingredients: butter, sugar, light corn syrup, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, pecans, unbaked 9-inch pie shell
name: texas pecan pie

steps: In a small saucepan, mix butter and sugar until smooth. Place over low heat and cook, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat and cool. Cream butter and sugar until very light and fluffy, about 5 minutes. Gradually beat in cooled flour mixture until smooth. Beat in vanilla. Frosts one cake.
ingredients: sifted flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, sugar, anise extract
name: self frosting anise cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving.
ingredients: ground turkey, onion, chili powder, salsa, corn, red pepper, tortilla, cheese, ripe olives, sour cream
name: soft turkey tacos

steps: Sprinkle chicken breasts evenly with salt and pepper and place in a lightly greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Combine cheese and next 3 ingredients, and pour over chicken. Sprinkle with chilies. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve over rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, condensed cream of chicken soup, green giant sliced mushrooms, water, frozen sweet peas, instant rice
name: easy chicken and rice casserole

steps: Heat the chicken broth in a large saucepan over med-low heat. When broth is hot, add the cole-slaw mix, the green onions, and the salt & pepper. Cover and cook over med-low heat, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Mix together the melted butter and the dijon mustard, and stir in the chopped pecans. Pour the mustard-pecan butter over the cabbage, and toss well to coat. Bake at 450f for 10 minutes or until fish flakes easily.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, butter, pecans
name: pecan crusted dijon tilapia

steps: In a 3-quart saucepan, heat theolive oil oover medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until soft and light golden brown, about 8-10 minutes. Add the thyme and the carrot and cook 5 minutes more, until the carrot is quite soft. Add the tomatoes and juice and bring to a boil, stirring often. Lower the heat and simmer for 30 minutes, until as thick as hot cereal. Season with salt and serve. This sauce holds one week in the refrigerator or up to 6 months in the freezer.
ingredients: canned plum tomatoes, unsalted butter, yellow onion, salt
name: the simplest tomato sauce ever marcella hazan

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place 2 tablespoons butter in each of two 9-inch pie plates. Heat in oven until melted. Stir together bisquick, milk and eggs. Arrange half of the peach slices in each pie plate. Divide batter evenly between pie plates. Stir together sugar and cinnamon. Sprinkle over batter. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until puffed and golden brown. High altitude no changes.
ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, baking soda, salt, milk, fresh peaches
name: peach bake

steps: Place one pizza base on a pizza or oven tray. Spread with meat sauce to within 1. 25cm of edge, top with capsicum, mushrooms & half the cheese. Place second pizza base on top pressing down slightly, sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake in a hot oven for 20-30 mins or until cheese is golden and base of pizza is cooked through. Serve with a crisp tossed salad.
ingredients: italian sausage, lean ground beef, italian-style tomato sauce, olive oil, prepared pizza crust, ricotta cheese, egg, italian cheese blend
name: bolognese style pan pizza

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, lemon zest, mustard, salt and pepper. Slowly whisk in the flavored oil until the dessing is creamy and blended. Roll the remaining basil leaves into a tight roll and slice across to make thin shreds. Stir into dressing. Whisk together vinegar, lemon zest, mustard, salt and pepper. Roll the remaining basil leaves into a tight roll and slice across to
ingredients: canola oil, olive oil, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, salt and pepper, garlic clove, dried herbs
name: choose your own flavor herb vinaigrette

steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Cut 4 pieces of aluminum foil twice the size of each fillet. Place each fillet on a piece of foil. Sprinkle fish evenly with salt and pepper. Top each with 1 tablespoon wine, 1 tablespoon butter, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon capers, and 1 teaspoon parsley. Wrap fish in foil grill for 6 to minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
ingredients: flounder fillets, mayonnaise, thyme, onion powder, marjoram, tarragon, rosemary, pimentos, dry vermouth, salt and pepper
name: baked flounder with herbed mayo and vermouth

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Line pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pastry shell and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning.
ingredients: zucchini, onion, garlic, olive oil, salt, unbaked 10-inch pie shell, eggs, milk, heavy cream, mozzarella cheese
name: zucchini quiche

steps: Heat oven to 400. Parboil beans for 5 minutes. Saut onions and green peppers in skillet until heated thoroughly. Add cooked rice, drained black beans, and tomato sauce and cook for an additional 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in cup of cheese. Spoon mixture into pepper halves and then place in 9 x 13 glass baking dish. Pour hot water in the bottom of the dish and cover with aluminum foil. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake uncovered for an additional 10 minutes.
ingredients: green peppers, onion, baked beans, garlic clove, butter, ground beef, barbecue sauce, celery, gruyere cheese
name: beef baked beans stuffed bell peppers

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Tear 2 pita breads into chip-size pieces and brush with oil. Sprinkle with lime zest and chilli flakes. Bake for 10 mins until crisp. Sprinkle with salt if you like.
ingredients: garlic granules, onion powder, oregano, paprika, fresh ground pepper, salt, olive oil, pita breads
name: savory pita chips

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat butter and brown sugar until well combined. Add eggs, one at a time, and vanilla. In another bowl, with a whisk, mix flour, salt, and chocolate bars. Add dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix together. Spread the mixture in an 8-inch square buttered pan. Bake for about 45 minutes. Put the pan on a wire rack and spread the caramel sauce on the cake while it is still hot. Let the cake cool in the pan.
ingredients: gingernut biscuits, scotch finger biscuits, butter, sweetened condensed milk, milk chocolate
name: quick caramel slice

steps: Beat all but the bread in a large bowl. Dip each slice of bread in mixture so it absorbs as much as possible. Cool. Place slice in toaster until hot.
ingredients: eggs, salt, pepper, milk, butter, toast, ketchup, cheese
name: egg and cheese toast

steps: Heat the oil in a fry-pan & pour in the egg mixture. Cook for 3 mins or until golden & almost set. Flip the frittata & scatter with parmesan, cook until the underside is golden and the cheese has melted.
ingredients: broccoli florets, garlic cloves, olive oil, butter, rosemary, salt, parmesan cheese
name: best garlic broccoli

steps: Mix together eggs, sugar, oil, apple juice, flour, vanilla extract, almond extract, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder,
ingredients: eggs, sugar, oil, apple juice, flour, vanilla extract, almond extract, baking powder
name: hamantaschen dough aka hamantashen oznei haman

steps: Put the horseradish mixture in a small saucepan of cold water and bring to the boil. Simmer for three minutes, drain, and dry the horseradish mixture on paper. Remove to a casserole, add the chicken pieces to the pan, adding more oil if necessary. Saute the chicken until golden, and remove from the casserole. Saute the carrots, onions and garlic for a minute or so, in the same oil. Return the bacon and chicken to the pan and pour in the stock, adding a sprig of thyme. Simmer in a preheated oven at 160c for about 45 minutes, or until the chicken is tender. Skim any fat from the top of the casserole and sprinkle with chopped parsley to finish. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: young fresh baby carrots, mayonnaise, diced onion, prepared horseradish, fresh ground black pepper, ritz cracker crumbs, butter
name: carrot horseradish casserole

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired.
ingredients: oil, onion, garlic, small white beans, chicken broth, tomatoes, cooked ham, dried thyme, salt and pepper
name: white bean and ham soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Coat a medium size baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. In a shallow bowl, mix bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, romano cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Brush both sides of the fillets with butter, and dredge in the bread crumb mixture. Arrange fillets in a single layer in the prepared baking dish, and sprinkle with parsley. Bake in pre-heated oven 10-15 minutes, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Bake in pre-heated oven 10-15 minutes, or until the
ingredients: fine dry breadcrumbs, instant minced onion, parsley flakes, seasoning salt, salt, pepper, italian seasoning
name: seasoned breadcrumb mix

steps: Saut onion, broccoli, tofu and bell pepper in oil. In a bowl, combine the sauce ingredients. Add to the veggies. Cook until thickened and bubbly. Serve with rice.
ingredients: garlic cloves, vegetable oil, vegetable broth, soy sauce, firm tofu, vegetables, fresh cilantro, fresh cracked pepper, hot sauce
name: thai vegetable tofu soup

steps: Cook tuna in water with a dash of salt. Combine all other ingredients in a large bowl with a lid. When pasta is cooked through, drain and rinse in cold water. Add tuna to other ingredients & mix thoroughly. Let sit in fridge for several hours before serving. May be served over a garden salad, baked potato, with crackers. This recipe is versatile & can be tweaked to your taste. Could be made gluten free if use gluten free pasta.
ingredients: macaroni, mayonnaise, sour cream, celery seed, onion salt, tuna in water, baby peas, cheese whiz, green bell peppers, pimiento
name: sea island tuna salad

steps: Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy creampreparation:Melt rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy cream
ingredients: rice cakes, oyster crackers, pretzel stick, butter, curry powder
name: curried party snack mix

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can put this
ingredients: zucchini, boiling water, butter, salt and pepper, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese
name: zucchini with sour cream topping

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Place tart apples in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the tart apples. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, butter, whipped cream. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired.
ingredients: tart apples, light brown sugar, flour, rolled oats, cinnamon, allspice, butter, vanilla ice cream
name: old fashioned apple crisp

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Prick eggplant once with a knife. Place on a baking sheet and roast until the skin is wrinkled and eggplant has collapsed, about one hour. Remove and set aside until cool enough to handle. Slit eggplant open length wise and scrape pulp out and finely chop. Place into a large bowl and add the rest of the ingredients. Cover and chill for several hours. Serve with pita toasts.
ingredients: eggplants, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, roasted red pepper, small caper, fresh ground pepper
name: roasted eggplant aubergine spread

steps: Place chicken in colander in sink. Boil about 2 quarts water, pour half over chicken, drain well, pour rest over and drain completely. In large skillet, melt butter. Add chicken, onions and apples. Stir in grape jelly and salt. Cover and simmer to desired tenderness. I only cook mine for 10 minutes. I like this as is, but you can sweeten this further with a little sugar to taste if desired.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, margarine, apple jelly, apple juice, cinnamon, salt and pepper
name: apple jelly chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a dutch oven, brown hamburger meat. Drain off fat. In the dutch oven, top meat with all of the sliced onions, then the potatoes. Salt the potatoes. Top with shredded cheese. Combine soup and soup can of water in a bowl and blend with spoon until smooth. Bake covered at 350 for about an hour.
ingredients: pork chops, fat-free cream of mushroom soup, water, carrot, celery, sage, salt and pepper
name: grandma knorberg s pork chops casserole

steps: Place all other ingredients in food blender to create a paste. Spread half of mixture over lamb, alow to stand for 2 hours. Place in foil tray and cover with rest of mixture. Cover tray with foil. Cook for 1 hour in covered bbq. Remove foil and cook a further 30 minutes, or until done to your taste. Mint leaves to be loose packed.
ingredients: ground coffee, unsweetened cocoa powder, cinnamon, olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: coffee and cocoa steak rub

steps: Heat oil in frying pan over med high heat. Add chicken, onion, and peppers, cook and stir until chicken is browned. Add water, tomatoes, and tomato sauce and bring to a boil. Add tortellini, making sure that tomato mixture covers it completely. Cook 15 to 20 minutes until sauce is thickened and chicken is cooked through. Stir frequently during cooking.
ingredients: olive oil, marinara sauce, mascarpone cheese, fresh thyme, fresh parsley, tortellini, italian cheese
name: cheesy baked tortellini

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place pineapple slices, soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic powder, pork loin chops, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, paprika in a small bowl. Pour over chops, cover & bake 1 hour or until tender. Turn once during baking to give both sides added browning. Place pineapple slices, soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic powder, pork loin chops, italian seasoned bread
ingredients: pineapple slices, soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic powder, pork loin chops, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, paprika
name: oven baked pineapple pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, and salt until light and fluffy. In another bowl combine flour and finely ground walnuts. Little by little add flour mixture to butter mixture. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover your dough and refrigerate it for at least 1 hour. Take a quarter of your dough at a time out of your refrigerator, and roll it out to a quarter inch thickness. With a lightly floured glass rim, or any other desired shape you wish to use, and cut your cookies out and place on an parchment lined cookie sheet and bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until they are just lightly browned. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, vanilla, all-purpose flour, walnuts
name: koala cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cook asparagus in boiling, salted water for 5 to 7 minutes, or until al dente. Drain. Melt butter in ovenproof skillet. Add asparagus and saute for 5 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese, add salt and pepper, and bake for 2 minutes. Transfer to broiler and gratinee for 2 minutes, or until golden brown. Sprinkle with lemon juice and serve.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, chopped tomatoes, thyme, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: asparagus parmigiano

steps: Heat 2 t olive oil in a skillet that you can eventually place under the broiler. Add onion to skillet and cook until soft, about 4 minutes. Add 1 t olive oil and heat. Add eggs seasoned with salt, pepper, parsley and cheese. Cook until bottom of frittata begins to solidify. Gently place the rounds of tomato on the egg mixture. Cover and cook over low heat until top of frittata firms, about 5 minutes. Finish by placing under preheated broiler for a minute or two until lightly browned. Cut into triangles.
ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, basmati rice, vegetable stock, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, peas
name: onion parmesan pilaf

steps: Drain spinach well, pressing between paper towels. Combine parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and 2 tablespoons breadcrumbs in a small bowl. Cook onion in remaining 1 tablespoon hot oil in a medium skillet over medium heat 5 minutes or until tender. Add garlic, and cook 1 more minute. Stir in spinach, and cook 2 minutes or until thoroughly heated. Remove from heat, and stir in salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Place tomatoes in a 9-inch square baking dish. Spoon spinach mixture evenly over tomatoes. Sprinkle with breadcrumb mixture. Bake at 400 for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: spinach, cottage cheese, light sour cream, eggs, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground pepper, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese
name: baked eggs florentine

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease cookie sheet. Beat sugar and shortening until creamy. Beat in egg, milk and orange extract. Stir in flour and baking powder. Add cereal and nuts. Mix well. Drop by tablespoon onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. Let stand 1 minute before removing to racks to cool.
ingredients: oil, potatoes, italian herb seasoning, egg yolk, all-purpose flour, egg white, dry breadcrumbs
name: crunchy potato logs

steps: Put the chicken on top of low calorie lemon chicken. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until juices run clear. Stir in the chicken. Cover and cook on high for 20-30 minutes or until juices run clear. Stir
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon-pepper seasoning, assorted fresh vegetable, cream of chicken soup, dried rosemary, mixed italian herbs
name: crock pot low calorie lemon chicken

steps: Combine all ingredients except sugar in a blender or food processor. Puree until smooth. With machine running, add sugar in a. Thin stream. Process until well blended. Transfer to a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate for up to 2 days. Chill before serving. Serve on leaf lettuce or mixed baby greens. Does not include chilling time.
ingredients: strawberries, sugar, cantaloupe, plum wine
name: strawberries and melon in plum wine

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Stir together flour tortillas, cream cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green chilies, c
ingredients: flour tortillas, cream cheese, green chili, green onion
name: gringos

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni pastitsio as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni pastitsio. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through.
ingredients: macaroni, butter, eggs, evaporated milk, feta cheese
name: macaroni pastitsio with feta cheese

steps: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Beat with electric mixer until light and very fluffy. Turn into 1 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees f. In the oven for 20 minutes or until puffed and lightly browned.
ingredients: simply potatoes traditional mashed potatoes, curry powder, eggs, baby shrimp, mango chutney
name: curried shrimp potato puffs 5fix

steps: Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add bell pepper, onion and garlic, and saute for 2-3 minutes, or until vegetables are tender. Add chicken broth, tomatoes, oregano, basil and black pepper. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low. Place catfish fillets in the sauce, cover, and simmer for 7-9 minutes, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Individual fillets with sauce may be served over a bed of cooked rice.
ingredients: tilapia fillet, lemon, worcestershire sauce, orange juice, onion, olive oil, stewed tomatoes, salt-free tomato sauce, yellow pepper, old bay seasoning
name: bill s world famous fish stew

steps: Melt butter in a large saucepan. Stir in flour and seasonings till smooth and bubbling. Stir in milk stirring constantly, till thick and bubbly. Stir in ham and eggs. Heat until hot. Serve on toast.
ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, ham, brie cheese, avocado, salt, black pepper, butter
name: ham and brie french toast

steps: Place potatoes under broiler for a few minutes, until cheese is hot and begins to brown. Place potatoes under broiler for a few minutes, until cheese is hot and begins to brown
ingredients: small potatoes, of fresh mint, feta cheese, black olives, olive oil
name: potatoes with olive mint and feta

steps: Place carrots in a medium saucepan. Add water to cover by one inch. Bring to a boil. Partially cover and boil until tender crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Drain. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium low heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic and saute, stirring occasionally, until mushroom liquid evaporates, about 6 minutes. Add carrots, sugar, thyme, salt and pepper, cover and cook over low heat 15 minutes. Uncover, remove garlic. Discard. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring often, until carrots and mushrooms are very lightly browned, 2-5 minutes.
ingredients: zucchini, carrots, onion, olive oil, salt, pepper
name: zucchini carrot saute

steps: Mix gelatin, sugar and salt thoroughly in a small saucepan. Add water. Place over low heat, stirring constantly until gelatin is dissolved. Remove from heat and stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice and lemon rind. Blend with a rotary beater. Pour into a refrigerator tray. Quick chill in freezing unit 10-15 minutes, or until firm, about 1 inch from edge but soft in center. Beat until fluffy. Fold in remaining ingredients. Turn into 4 cup mold or individual molds and chill until firm. Unmold on serving plate.
ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, gelatin powder, water, salt, lemon yogurt, apples, pecans
name: cranberry apple gelatin mold

steps: Wash and peel cucumbers. Slice or cut in rounds as thin as possible cukes & onions. Place in bowl and cover with vinegar. Add 3-5 heaping tablespoons of sugar, mix well. Chill and serve. This is better if you let it sit in the fridge covered overnight. Actually. If allowed to mellow for 2 or 3 days -- in a tightly sealed jar in the refrigerator -- jar turned upside down 1 day & turned right side up the next.
ingredients: cucumbers, kosher salt, low-fat sour cream, white vinegar, white sugar, onions
name: cucumber and onion in sour cream

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix the first 4 ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Add the vanilla and oil until all dry ingredients are moistened. Add the water and mix well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out of the center clean.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, lemon extract, cake flour, salt, cream of tartar
name: basic sponge cake

steps: Preheat oven to 375f mix cream cheese and 2 tablespoons of the chocolate. Stir in almonds. Unroll crescent roll dough. Separate into 8 triangles. Spread 1 rounded tablespoons cream cheese mixture onto each triangle. Roll up each loosely, starting at shortest side of triangle, rolling to opposite point. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet. Curve each into crescent shape. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bale 12 to 14 minute or until golden brown. Serve rolls warm, drizzled with remaining honey.
ingredients: crescent roll dough, cream cheese, ground cinnamon, semisweet mini chocolate chips, powdered sugar
name: chocolate chip cinnamon crescents

steps: In a mixing bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs.
ingredients: honeydew melon, cantaloupe, watermelon, seedless cucumber, fresh lime juice, cayenne pepper, salt
name: mexican style fruit salad

steps: Cook ground beef in a large dutch oven until the meat is browned, stirring to crumble the meat. Drain well. Add the tomatoes and the next 6 ingredients. Stir well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer, uncovered, 3 hours or until thickened. Serve over rice, if desired.
ingredients: onion, lean ground beef, salt, pepper, chili powder, worcestershire sauce, baked beans, tomato sauce, tomato paste
name: teen s favorite goulash

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a pan large enough to hold the chops in a single layer with non-stick spray. Season the pork chops with salt& pepper. Arrange them in single layer in the prepared pan. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the chops from the pan and pour off the fat. Place the apples in the pan and top with the baked chops. Combine the water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce and lemon juice, and pour over the pork and apples. Bake uncovered, basting occasionally, for 45 minutes or until pork is tender.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, salt and pepper, peaches, shallot, whiskey, reduced fat margarine, lemon juice, brown sugar substitute, dried thyme
name: healthy baked pork chops with drunk peaches

steps: Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: spaghetti, breadcrumbs, italian parsley, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, dried chilies, salt
name: spaghetti aglio olio spaghetti with garlic and oil

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add carrots, celery and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until vegetables begin to soften. Add tomatoes, zucchini and stock to pan. Cover and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add leeks and squeeze lemon juice. Season with freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: leeks, onion, olive oil, chopped tomatoes, carrots, potatoes, celery, parsley, salt and pepper, lemon juice
name: stewed leeks with tomatoes

steps: In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: shell noodles, butter, condensed cheddar cheese soup, evaporated milk, chicken bouillon cube, season-all salt, onion powder, black pepper, dry mustard, sharp cheddar cheese
name: baked macaroni cheese with pizzazz

steps: Preheat oven to 475 degrees f. Toss sugar snap peas, turnips, vegetable oil, shallot, garlic clove, sugar, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Transfer to a baking sheet and spread in a single layer. Roast in the oven, stirring once halfway through, until the peas are tender and beginning to brown slightly, 12 to 14 minutes. Serve warm, sprinkled with bacon if desired.
ingredients: sugar snap pea, turnips, vegetable oil, shallot, garlic clove, sugar, salt and pepper, parsley
name: glazed sugar snap peas with turnips

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: pizza dough, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, egg
name: pepperoni stromboli pepperoni bread

steps: Put the dumplings in a large saucepan and cover tightly. Cook for 10 minutes.
ingredients: tart red cherries, water, sugar, cinnamon, almond oil, bisquick baking mix, milk
name: cherry dumplings

steps: Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, and salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Arrange salmon fillets on foil-lined baking sheet. Brush fillets with balsamic glaze, and sprinkle with oregano. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil. Bake in preheated
ingredients: butter, salmon fillets, salt, white wine, dried tarragon, dijon mustard
name: salmon with tarragon sauce

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce.
ingredients: lean ground turkey, frozen spinach, sun-dried tomato, provolone cheese, granulated garlic, italian seasoned breadcrumbs
name: turkey burgers with spinach and sun dried tomato

steps: Mix oil, vinegar, garlic, rosemary, salt, & pepper, and brush on chops. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or as long as overnight. Preheat grill. Grill 5-8 minutes on each side, depending on thickness. Let rest 1-2 minutes before serving.
ingredients: olive oil, red wine, fresh lemon juice, dried mint, dried oregano, garlic cloves, bay leaf, pork shoulder, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon
name: grilled pork souvlaki

steps: In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add curry, cumin and cayenne, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot.
ingredients: olive oil, asafoetida powder, cumin seed, brown mustard seeds, courgettes, green pepper, natural yoghurt, ground coriander, salt, chat masala
name: courgette and green pepper sabzi tori aur hari mirch ki sabzi

steps: Heat the oven to 425 degrees f. Heat a heavy-based oven roasting pan on top of the stove and toss the vegetables and garlic. Sprinkle with the oil. Stir until they start to brown. Add the herbs, sprinkle over the vinegar and season well. Put the pan in the oven and roast for about 15 minutes, then reduce the heat to 375 degrees f and continue cooking for another 30 minutes or so, stirring 2 or 3 times until the beets are tender. If the vegetables start to burn, add a little more oil and vinegar to the pan.
ingredients: beets, onion, butter, all-purpose flour, cider vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper
name: dutch beets

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Place bbq chicken legs in a greased 9x13-inch baking dish. Arrange chicken in a single layer over onions. Sprinkle with salt. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over all, completely covering chicken. Bake uncovered for 1 hour or until juices run clear, basting several times.
ingredients: ketchup, hoisin sauce, chicken legs, salt, black pepper, bacon, carrots, sugar snap peas, asparagus, mint leaf
name: bbq chicken legs with sauteed veggies

steps: In a small bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth. Gradually beat in milk and mayonnaise until blended. Add the mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper. Stir in eggs and chives. Mix well. Serve with peppers or crackers. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: egg, milk, dried chili, garlic salt, black pepper, mayonnaise, bread, fresh chives
name: the best easiest egg and chive sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Put cream cheese out to soften. Scrub potatoes. Dry them off and grease them with butter and salt the skins. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. Remove from oven and cool to handle. Cut potatoes in half, lengthwise, remove cooked potato and put in large bowl. Be carefully to leave the skin intact. Mash with cream cheese, hot milk, onion salt, butter, and pepper. Pile mixture back into skins. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley and bake 20 more minutes.
ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, white pepper, onion, egg, gruyere cheese, milk, whipping cream, butter
name: swedish potatoes

steps: In a large non-stick skillet over medium heat, melt butter and olive oil together. Add the remaining ingredients to the skillet. Stir until potatoes are evenly coated with spice mixture and onion slices are evenly distributed. Cook covered on medium heat for 15 minutes, tossing and turning the potatoes every few minutes. Potatoes will be done when slightly browned and fork-tender.
ingredients: new potatoes, olive oil, red onion, red pepper, zucchini, fresh rosemary leaves, lemon juice, garlic cloves, fresh basil leaves
name: saut potatoes provencale

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease a 9-10 inch pie plate. Sprinkle mushrooms, cheese, and onion evenly over bottom of pie plate. Place remaining ingredients in blender, cover, and blend on high for 1 minute. Pour into pie plate. Bake until golden brown and knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let stand 5 minues before cutting. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: milk, bisquick, margarine, eggs, bacon, green onions, canned mushrooms, cheese
name: all in one quiche

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add lemon zest, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
ingredients: graham cracker crust, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice
name: world s richest and most delicious cheesecake

steps: Spray a 13x9 inch baking pan with cooking spray. Put turkey drumsticks in the baking dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes. In a bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients. Take turkey drumsticks out of the oven and pour sauce mixture over them
ingredients: enchilada sauce, green chilies, dried oregano, garlic salt, ground cumin, turkey drumsticks, cornstarch, cold water
name: crock pot turkey drumsticks

steps: Beat candy coating in a large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until creamy. Gradually add sugar, beating until well blended after each addition. Add white chocolate, vanilla, pecans, and food coloring. Mix well. Spread in a foil-lined 8 inch square pan. Refrigerate 1 hour or until firm. Cut into squares.
ingredients: white candy coating, green food coloring paste, nutter butter sandwich cookies, candies
name: gruesome monster toes

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions, or until al dente. Drain, then rinse under cold water until cool. Transfer pasta to a large bowl and add feta cheese, penne pasta, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves, mint leaf, salt, white pepper, feta cheese, unsalted dry-roasted cashews. Toss to combine. In a separate, nonreactive bowl, combine vinegar, salt, and pepper. While whisking constantly, slowly add oil by pouring in a thin stream down the side of the bowl. Whisk until completely incorporated. Pour vinaigrette over salad and toss until pasta is coated. Taste, adjust seasoning as desired, and serve.
ingredients: eggplants, penne pasta, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves, mint leaf, salt, white pepper, feta cheese, unsalted dry-roasted cashews
name: pasta salad with feta cheese eggplant and cashew nuts

steps: Place sweet potatoes in bottom of slow cooker. Mix spices and orange juice together. Stir into sweet potatoes. Cook on high for 2 hours or on low for 4 hours. Check for doneness because each crock pot cooks at a different heat setting. Before serving, stir in toasted pecans.
ingredients: beer, cornmeal, cumin, cinnamon, salt, chipotle pepper, garlic cloves, dried ancho chile powder, beef brisket, sweet potatoes
name: brisket wiith sweet potatoes crock pot

steps: In a small saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until transparent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended.
ingredients: butter, sliced mushrooms, cream cheese, cooked rice, fresh spinach, parmesan cheese, walnuts, salt, ground black pepper
name: walnut rice with cream cheese mushrooms spinach

steps: Place duck breasts in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, cook 1 minute. Place duck breasts in a small saucepan. Bring to a
ingredients: duck breasts, dried apricots, shallots, honey, dark soy sauce, sesame oil, chinese five spice powder, scallions
name: chinese apricot duck on the grill bbq

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a cookie sheet with no stick cooking spray. Dip chicken in butter, coat with combined remaining ingredients. Place on cookie sheet. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or till tender.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, parmesan cheese, saltine crackers, garlic cloves, parsley
name: garlic parmesan chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add peanuts and stir to combine. Transfer peanuts to baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with chili powder and toss. Cool and then transfer to airtight containers. Store at least 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: peanuts, maple syrup, dried chipotle powder, ground habanero chile pepper, cumin, salt
name: nuclear nuts

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown.
ingredients: olive oil, potatoes, chicken bouillon, lemon juice, lemon peel, dill, garlic, pepper
name: lemon potatoes

steps: Heat oven to 400f degrees. Line baking sheet with aluminum foil. Arrange potatoes in a single layer on prepared baking sheet. Bake 18-20 minutes. While fries are baking, microwave refried beans for 3-4 minutes until hot. Cool beans about 5 minutes. To assemble potatoes, evenly space potatoes on a microwave safe plate and top each with 1 tablespoon beans, and a sprinkle of cheese. Microwave, uncovered 1 minute until cheese is melted. Then top each stack with 1 teaspoon salsa, 1 teaspoon sour cream and an olive slice. Microwave, uncovered 1 minute
ingredients: potato chips, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, scallions, black olives, cooked bacon, ketchup, sour cream
name: potachos

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place the butter, salt and water in a pan. Bring to a boil. Sift the flour onto a sheet of waxed paper, then, off the heat, add it all to the butter and water mixture and stir it in very quickly to form a thick paste that leaves the sides of the pan clean. Return the pan to the heat and beat the mixture with a wooden spoon for 1 minute to dry it. Remove the pan from heat and cool for 5 minutes. Beat in the eggs and yolk, one at a time, then add the mustard, cayenne pepper and grated cheese. Place teaspoonfuls of the mixture onto a nonstick baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes. Lower the oven temperature to 350 degrees and cook for 15 minutes, until golden brown. Cool on a wire rack and serve cold.
ingredients: monterey jack cheese, eggs, chives, white pepper, phyllo dough, butter
name: phyllo cheese puffs

steps: This step will take approximately 20 minutes, so preheat oven to 350 while working on this step. Put macaroni to boil. In a medium pot heat butter and saut onions. Add milk, flour, salt and pepper. Bring to a rolling boil. Slowly add cheddar cheese, stirring while adding. After cheddar has dissolved, add the mozzarella, stirring while adding. Drain macaroni. Add macaroni directly to the cheese mixture in the pot. Pour mac and cheese mixture into large lasagna pan. Put in oven and bake for 30 minutes or until top is bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: milk, flour, black pepper, cheddar cheese, american cheese, cooked macaroni
name: mac n cheese

steps: Combine tomatoes, onion, bell peppers, white vinegar, canning salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar, cumin, salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar,
ingredients: tomatoes, onion, bell peppers, white vinegar, canning salt, jalapeno peppers, sugar
name: home canned rotel substitute copycat clone homemade

steps: In a large bowl, dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Stir in ice cream and apple juice until blended. Chill until partially set. Fold in apples. Pour into two 6 cup ring molds coated with cooking spray. Refrigerate overnight or until firm. Just before serving, unmold.
ingredients: gelatin, boiling water, apple juice, fresh fruit
name: fruit gel for babies

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Cook and drain pasta. Cook and crumble bacon. Cook and drain chicken. In a bowl combine soup, sour cream, spinach and garlic powder. Add pasta, bacon, chicken, 1 c fried onions and 1 c cheese. Spread into a baking dish. Bake at 375 for 30 minutes or until heated through. Top with extra onions and cheese. Bake another 3-5 minutes.
ingredients: onion, butter, chicken breasts, milk, chicken broth, macaroni, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese
name: chicken macaroni casserole

steps: Muddle mint leaves, 1 lime wedge and simple syrup. Add ice, rum and vanilla extract. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds or until ice crystals form. With a cocktail strainer, pour into a tall ice-filled glass. Top off with club soda. Garnish edge of glass with a slice of lime.
ingredients: white rum, lime juice, passion fruit juice, mint sprigs, vanilla extract, sugar
name: vanilla passion fruit mojito

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Bake loaves for 30 minutes or until sounds hollow when tapped on bottom. Bake loaves for
ingredients: water, millet, butter, salt
name: basic millet

steps: In a high-sided nonstick pot or wok, combine the cooked rice, cooked shrimp, green onions, chili peppers and water. Cook over high heat, stirring often to mix well and prevent sticking, until all ingredients are thoroughly heated and most of the water is gone, about 8 minutes. Turn the heat to high and stir for 1 more minute as the pot gets hotter. Add the nuoc cham and stir rapidly to mix thoroughly. Continue to cook over high heat, stirring constantly, until most of the liquid has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and serve.
ingredients: butter, onion, uncooked rice, red pepper, chili powder, origanum, tomato juice, tomato puree, water, salt
name: red hot rice

steps: Place tofu on a cooling rack with a baking pan underneath to catch excess liquid. Bake for 10 minutes, turn tofu and bake for another 15 minutes, or until the edges start to brown.
ingredients: soy dairy firm tofu, vegan mayonnaise, prepared yellow mustard, salt, turmeric, garlic powder, onion powder, fresh scallions, carrot
name: tofu

steps: Trim and snap green beans into thirds. Mince the onion. Put water on to boil to steam beans. As soon as water boils, steam beans for 12 to 17 minutes or until tender. Melt margarine for beans and saut onions until tender. Add steamed beans, basil, garlic powder and pepper. Toss beans with oil, salt, and pepper to taste, then toss with lemon juice and half of zest. Serve beans sprinkled with remaining zest.
ingredients: green beans, yellow wax bean, light soy sauce, pickled ginger, sesame seeds
name: asian glazed green wax beans

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, salt, sugar, butter, buttermilk, egg, oil, milk
name: buttermilk rusks

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Peel the potatoes if the skin is too tough, otherwise just scrub and rinse them. Cut the potatoes into thin slices. Put the potatoes in a baking dish. Slightly fan out the slices. Bake the potatoes for about 50 minutes. Remove the potatoes from the oven, sprinkle with parmesan and cheddar cheese. Bake the potatoes for another 10-15 minutes. Remove the potatoes
ingredients: potatoes, frankfurters, onion, butter, flour, salt, milk, cheddar cheese, parsley, prepared mustard
name: frank and potato bake

steps: Bring a pot of water to a boil and immerse the poached pears for a minute or two, until the skins come off easily. Remove them with a slotted spoon and place them in a bowl of cold water to stop the cooking. Peel the poached pears, then slice into wedges off the pit and into a bowl. Stir in the sugar, sauternes, and orange liqueur. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or overnight. Serve cool, but not cold.
ingredients: pears, orange, juice and zest of, sauternes wine, water, honey, sugar, lemons, juice of, vanilla pod, cinnamon stick, cloves
name: poached pears in sauternes

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Put the milk, the cornstarch, and the 2 kinds of pepper in a pan. Cook over medium heat until it starts to thicken and bubble. Add the chopped onion and set it aside. While the milk mixture is cooking, peel and slice the potatoes very thinly. Spray an 8x8 pan with cooking spray. Start layering the potatoes in the pan. When you are halfway done with the potatoes, add half the cheese. Then finish with the rest of the potatoes. Pour the onion sauce over the potatoes and sprinkle the rest of the cheese on top. Cover and bake for 40 minutes. Then uncover and cook for 10 minutes more or until the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: diced tomatoes, red potatoes, onion, whipping cream, swiss cheese, parmesan cheese
name: tomato scalloped potatoes

steps: In a large bowl, beat eggs with an electric mixer until light colored. Add butter and cheese and mix on low. Add muffin mix, broccoli and scallions and mix at low speed for another minute. Coat a 12 cup muffin pan with cooking spray. Divide batter among muffin cups. Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes until light golden brown. Cool on a rack before turning muffins out of pan.
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, paprika, eggs, milk, dried thyme, sharp cheddar cheese
name: cheesy muffins

steps: Add potatoes and garlic to a pot and cover with water. Add salt and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until fork tender. Drain and add back to the pot. Mash with the remaining ingredients. Add the buttermilk gradually in case you need less.
ingredients: idaho potatoes, evaporated milk, butter, sour cream, salt
name: mama s best mashed potatoes

steps: Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the chicken until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the chicken onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using.
ingredients: chicken breasts, black beans, frozen corn, salsa, taco shells, sour cream, cheddar cheese, lettuce, olive, tomatoes
name: black bean and chicken tacos

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut the stem end from turnips. Rub each with olive oil and wrap tightly in aluminum foil. Bake for approximately 90 minutes or until insides are soft enough to scoop out. Scoop out insides of each turnip, leaving the shell intact. Mash & whip the insides with the sour cream, spices and seasonings. When the insides are a creamy consistency, carefully spoon them back into shells. Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees and bake the stuffed turnips for 20-30 minutes until heated thru.
ingredients: turnips, butter, eggs, flour, brown sugar, baking powder, salt and pepper, nutmeg, fine breadcrumbs
name: turnip puff

steps: Combine blueberries, strawberries, and orange juice in container of blender or food processor, process until smooth. Add frozen yogurt, and process until blended. Serve immediately.
ingredients: blueberries, strawberry, oranges, seedless grapes, strawberry yogurt, cool whip
name: fruit parfait

steps: Mix all the ingredients above in a bowl. Add your desired cut of lamb. Cover in the fridge for at least 24 hours. Cook your lamb in your preferred way. Enjoy a nice new taste to your meat.
ingredients: garlic clove, olive oil, white wine, rosemary, shoulder lamb chops, salt and pepper
name: marinade for lamb shoulder chops

steps: Melt butter in a heavy 3-liter saucepan on low heat. Add the sugar, corn syrup, water, vanilla extract, toasted almonds, semi-sweet chocolate chips. Cook over medium heat. Stir constantly until it reaches hard crack stage, 300 on candy thermometer. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract and the almonds. Spread into a buttered 13 x 9-inch pan. Let stand 5 minutes. Sprinkle with chocolate chips. When chocolate is melted, spread evenly over candy. Let cool completely, and when chocolate is set, break into pieces.
ingredients: milk chocolate chips, unsalted butter, cocoa krispies cereal, dried cherries
name: milk chocolate and cherry crunch

steps: Mix all together well. Bake for 20-25 minutes at 350 degrees. Allow to cool before cutting into bars. Will keep for weeks stored in airtight container in fridge. Also freezes well.
ingredients: old fashioned oats, shredded coconut, raisins, walnuts, bananas, unsweetened applesauce, date sugar
name: yummy banana oat bars

steps: Place greens in a bowl. Add red onions, balsamic vinegar, vegetable oil, sugar, fresh ground pepper, salt & pepper. Toss thoroughly. Taste, and add more oil if desired. Scatter olives & feta cheese over the top and serve.
ingredients: lettuce, red onion, feta cheese, balsamic vinegar, vegetable oil, sugar, fresh ground pepper, salt
name: greens with feta and red onions

steps: In a small saucepan, melt butter and chocolate over low heat, stirring constantly until melted. Stir in sugar, vanilla, salt, and milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Cook 7 minutes, stirring constantly. Serve warm over ice cream or pound cake. The amount of time will vary with the amount of sauce being reheated.
ingredients: heavy cream, whole milk, water, unsweetened cocoa powder, corn syrup, kosher salt, bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, vanilla extract
name: bittersweet chocolate sauce

steps: In the 3 cups of water, simmer the meat for 30 minutes. Crumble the meat up as you add it to the water. There should not be any large pieces. After 30 minutes add the remaining ingredients. Simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Serve this up with some cheese and extra onions if you want.
ingredients: peanut oil, onion, garlic cloves, bacon drippings, chili powder, ground cumin, dried oregano, beef stock, masa harina, salt
name: gebhardt s chili gravy

steps: In a large bowl beat the eggs, milk, and salt. Dip bread in batter. Fry in a frying pan with butter. Add powdered sugar on top. Add the juice of an orange on top.
ingredients: butter, honey, ground cinnamon, eggs, orange juice, salt, bread
name: orange cinnamon french toast
