steps: Fry the onion and mushrooms in the oil a couple of minutes. Add curry powder and fry gently until softened. Add potato flour, stir. Add water, cream and sweet chili sauce. Stir and cook 5-7 minutes on low heat.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, red onion, bourbon, ancho chilies, chicken stock, apple juice concentrate, whole black peppercorns, light brown sugar
name: ancho chile and bourbon sauce

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic-flavored olive oil, soy sauce, sesame oil, chili oil, brown sugar, toasted sesame seeds. Cook, stirring, until just tender, about 3-5 minutes. Add onion, garlic-flavored olive oil, soy sauce, sesame oil, chili oil, brown sugar, to
ingredients: sugar snap pea, garlic-flavored olive oil, soy sauce, sesame oil, chili oil, brown sugar, toasted sesame seeds
name: asian sugar snap peas

steps: Place beans in a slow cooker and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: dried pinto beans, onion, garlic cloves, beer, roma tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, sugar, salt, fresh ground pepper, cilantro leaf
name: beans and beer

steps: Place pork chops on top of pork chops. Cook for 4 hours on high. Serve with a green vegtable.
ingredients: pork chops, apples, butter, nutmeg, salt and pepper
name: pork chops and apple slices crock pot

steps: Place the devil s dew in a small saucepan and cook over medium heat until the devil s dew is cooked through, about 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature
ingredients: sweet wine, water, maple syrup, butter, cinnamon stick
name: devil s dew

steps: In a medium saucepan combine squash, onions, garlic cloves, chicken stock, lemon juice, water, green chilies, butter, cream, sour cream. Simmer, uncovered, until squash is very tender, about 40 minutes. Puree soup in a blender or food processor with the butter. Whisk cream into soup. Serve in wide, shallow bowls with a dollop of sour cream if desired.
ingredients: butternut squash, brown onions, garlic cloves, chicken stock, lemon juice, water, green chilies, butter, cream
name: south african butternut soup

steps: Heat the oil in a small vessel. When it is hot add the yogurt, butter, curry powder, cumin, salt, ground cardamom, ground cayenne pepper, sugar, nuts, coarse salt. Serve garnished with coriander and mint.
ingredients: low-fat plain yogurt, butter, curry powder, cumin, salt, ground cardamom, ground cayenne pepper, sugar, nuts, coarse salt
name: you must be tandoori nuts

steps: Boil the potatoes just until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain, peel and dice. Toss with the lemon juice, oil and salt and pepper to taste. Let cool. Add the celery, eggs, chopped red onion, and parsley toss gently. Combine 1 cup mayonnaise with vinegar, blend well then toss over the potato salad, gently folding until completely coated. Add more mayonnaise, if necessary.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, cider vinegar, sweet pickle relish, dijon mustard, salt, black pepper, vegetable oil, green onions, red bell pepper
name: yam sweet potato salad

steps: Mix first 3 ingredients in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil stirring entire time. Boil until candy thermometer hits 234 degrees, stirring entire time. Remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir until chocolate and marshmallows are dissolved. Pour in buttered 8x8 pan. Chill 30 minutes, cut with buttered knife. Chill again until set.
ingredients: evaporated milk, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, miniature marshmallows, vanilla, walnuts
name: sheila s can t fail fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In a medium bowl mix the flour, baking soda, and salt together. In a large bowl cream the butter and sugar together with a mixer set at medium speed. Beat in the eggs and vanilla until just mixed together. Add the flour mixture, chocolate chips, and pecans. Mix in at low speed until just mixed together. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoons 2 inch apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes depending on your oven. Bake until the cookie is golden. Wait 1 minute and transfer the cookies to a wire rack to cool. Wait 1 minute and transfer the
ingredients: chocolate chips, butter, egg, colored miniature marshmallows, pecans
name: christmas marshmallow log

steps: In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in berries. Cook until the berries have mostly broken down, approximately 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and lemon juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: frozen raspberries, granulated sugar, water, coffee, half-and-half, cream, mint sprigs, raspberries
name: iced jazzberry java

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. On a cutting board, with a fork, mass the salmon into a paste with the salt and pepper. Add the butter and mash into garlic paste. Arrange the salmon in a single layer in a baking dish. Top it with the garlic butter and drizzle with lemon wedges. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until salmon is just cooked through. Sprinkle with the parsley and serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: salmon, olive oil, coarse sea salt, fresh ground pepper
name: easy roast salmon

steps: Mix all ingredients except the sugar and cornstarch in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat to a simmer and stir in the vanilla. Cook until just about all of the milk is absorbed, stirring occasionally. Stir in cinnamon and nutmeg. Serve warm or chilled.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, milk, eggs, cooked rice, butter, vanilla, raisins, nutmeg
name: new england creamy rice pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple cider, fresh ginger, butter
name: sweet potatoes with ginger and apple cider

steps: Roughly mash the strawberries, leaving some chunks. Stir in sugar or splenda. Mash bananas and add to strawberries. Mix well. Pour mixture evenly into 4 ice cube trays. Set trays on a cookie sheet and set in freezer. Freeze solid. When ready to serve, put sherbet cubes in fancy dessert glasses. Let set a few minutes to thaw slightly.
ingredients: strawberry, mashed bananas, water, lemon juice
name: strawberry banana sorbet

steps: Dissolve jello gelatin in boiling water. Add marshmallows, milk, lime gelatin, cream cheese, crushed pineapple, whipped cream, mayonnaise. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan. Chill for 4 hours or until firm. Cut into squares. Garnish with remaining cool whip.
ingredients: marshmallows, milk, lime gelatin, cream cheese, crushed pineapple, whipping cream, mayonnaise
name: lime party salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Stir ingredients in medium mixing bowl until blended. Spoon onto 2 un-greased cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the pan, or wait 1-2 minutes before moving to cooling racks. Cookies should be soft & chewy.
ingredients: white cake mix, butter, crunchy peanut butter, eggs, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: cake mix peanut butter chocolate chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 425f place a 10-inch cast iron skillet into the oven. In a bowl, combine the cornmeal, salt, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda. Whisk together to combine well. In a large bowl, combine the buttermilk, eggs, and creamed corn, whisking together to combine thoroughly. Add the dry ingredients to the buttermilk mixture and stir to combine. If the batter will not pour, add more buttermilk to the batter. Add 2 tablespoons canola oil to the cast iron skillet. Pour the batter into the skillet. Bake until the cornbread is golden brown and springs back upon the touch, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: jiffy cornbread mix, cream cheese, eggs, onion, butter
name: finger lickin cornbread

steps: Bake potatoes at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hour until soft. Slice potatoes in half lengthwise. Scoop out insides, leaving a firm shell. Place potato pulp, cheddar cheese, milk, ham, sour cream, onion salt, pepper, butter, paprika or parsley in a mixing bowl. Beat at high speed until smooth. Fill potato shells with mixture. Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 20 to 30 minutes. Garnish with paprika or parsley.
ingredients: ham, potatoes, onion, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese, cream of celery soup, paprika
name: crock pot ham and potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet try to flatten rolls so they resemble flat circles. Take a spoonful of sauce and spread ontop of each rolls. Then cut up cheese into small bits and garnish. Add meat ontop of cheese and then place remaining cheese ontop of meat. Cook for about 15 min of until rolls are golden.
ingredients: pillsbury refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, pepperoni slices, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: pizza in a crescent

steps: In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 cup of cookie crumbs. Mix together remaining crumbs with melted butter. Press mixture into the bottom of a large pan. Spread vanilla ice cream evenly on top of crumb mixture. Freeze pan for 30 minutes. Spread warmed hot fudge evenly on top of vanilla ice cream. Freeze for 30 minutes more. Cover top of torte with whipped topping and sprinkle with reserved crumbs, and place strawberries on top. Freeze for 30 minutes more before serving.
ingredients: milk, whipping cream, sugar, almond extract, instant vanilla pudding, vanilla wafer crumbs
name: biscuit tortoni

steps: Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, black olives, black beans, it
ingredients: carrot sticks, onion, pasta sauce, garlic, fresh parsley
name: italian carrot and onion salad

steps: In a large saucepan over low heat, bring the rhubarb, sugar, and 2 cups of water to a boil. Simmer until rhubarb is soft. Add the rest of the water. Bring to a boil again and remove from heat. Mix the cornstarch and a bit of water separately. Add to the saucepan and let simmer for a few minutes. Remove from heat and let cool. Serve with a bit of granulated sugar sprinkled on top.
ingredients: rhubarb, strawberry gelatin, milk, vanilla instant pudding mix, graham cracker crust
name: rhubarb rumble

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 9x12 casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Prepare stuffing as directed. Let sit. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Combine soup, veggies and chicken into 9x13 casserole dish. Stir until everything is mixed thoroughly. Add stuffing on top of casserole. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: condensed cream of chicken soup, seasoned stuffing mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter
name: stuffing coated baked chicken

steps: In medium non-stick skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add zucchini and saute 2 minutes. Add zucchini and salt and pepper, to taste. Continue to saute for another 4 to 5 minutes or until zucchini is just tender. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.
ingredients: zucchini, unsalted butter, arugula, garlic clove, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: sauteed zucchini and arugula

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Pour sauce into 13 by 9 inch baking dish. Stir in 4 tbsp of parmesan cheese. Place the chicken breasts in the sauce, turning to coat them well. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and uncover. Sprinkle remaining parmesan cheese, and the mozzarella over the chicken breasts, and and continue baking for 5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, low-fat italian salad dressing, breadcrumbs, italian seasoning mix, spaghetti sauce, parmesan cheese, low fat mozzarella
name: chicken parmesan low fat

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add beef stew meat, cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup, french onion soup, fresh mushrooms, onion, egg noodles, sour creampreparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add beef stew meat, cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup, french onion soup, fresh mushrooms, onion, egg noodles, sour creampreparation:In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored
ingredients: beef stew meat, cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup, french onion soup, fresh mushrooms, onion, egg noodles, sour cream
name: easy crock pot beef stroganoff

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeno peppers and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving.
ingredients: red onion, garlic clove, salt, bacon grease, rotel diced tomatoes, chicken broth, chili powder, cumin, instant rice
name: spicy mexican rice

steps: Cook salmon fillets according to the packet instructions. Meanwhile, heat a medium frying pan. Add curry paste and cook, stirring, for a few seconds. Gradually stir in a coconut cream and bring to a simmer. Add salmon fillets, cover and simmer for 7-8 minutes, turning the fish over halfway. Meanwhile, blanch green beans in a pan of simmering water until just tender. Drain and divide between 2 hot serving plates. Stir some fresh cilantro leaves into the sauce. Top the beans with the salmon, spooning over the sauce. Garnish with cilantro and serve with the cooked rice.
ingredients: salmon fillets, water, lemon juice, black pepper, kosher salt, dried dill
name: poached salmon

steps: Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Cover and cook on low setting for 8-10 hours or on high for 5 hours --. Serve on hot buttered pasta of choice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, onion soup mix, milk, mushroom, raw carrot, potatoes
name: easy yummy slow cooker chicken

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add bacon, horseradish, and bacon bits. Cook over medium high heat until crispy. Drain well on paper towels. In a medium bowl, combine mayonnaise and sour cream. Mix-in tomatoes just before serving. Serve with toasted bagel rounds or pita triangles.
ingredients: bacon, fat free cream cheese, prepared horseradish, pumpernickel bread, tomatoes
name: bacon horseradish and tomato sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine potatoes and oil in a large bowl or plastic bag, tossing well to coat. Combine salt, garlic powder, and red pepper in a small bowl. Sprinkle salt mixture over potatoes, tossing well to coat. Arrange potatoes in a single layer on 2 baking sheets coated with cooking spray. Bake at 425 degrees for 25 minutes. Turn potato wedges over, and rotate pans. Bake at 400 degrees for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: potatoes, cayenne pepper, cumin, oregano, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper
name: spicy roast potatoes

steps: In a serving bowl, layer half of the tomatoes, all of the tomatoes, then remaining tomatoes. Sprinkle with onion. Combine remaining ingredients in a jar with a tight fitting lid and shake well. Pour over salad. Cover and chill for 25 to 30 minutes or until ready to serve.
ingredients: tomato soup, salad oil, vinegar, sugar, worcestershire sauce, onion, paprika, prepared mustard, salt, pepper
name: tomato soup salad dressing

steps: Place pork chops in greased slow cooker. Top with onions and mushrooms. Combine soup mix, water, and mushroom soup. Pour over mushrooms and onions. Cover. Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 4-5. Serve over rice or cooked noodles.
ingredients: center-cut pork chops, dry onion soup mix, spaghetti sauce, onion, green pepper slices, mushroom
name: nana debs pork chops

steps: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. To a cocktail shaker, add the vodka, rum, gin, tequila, blue curacao, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shake vigorously for 5-10 seconds. Pour into the glass. Add in the sprite to the glass. Stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.
ingredients: light rum, vodka, gin, fresh lemon juice, simple syrup, mint, lemon
name: southern iced tea cocktail

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put apples in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: flour, bread dough, tart apples, brown sugar, white sugar, apple pie spice, nutmeg, butter, cheddar cheese
name: apple cheddar brunch pizza

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and salt, blending well. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press tomatoes through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly. In a soup
ingredients: tomatoes, butter, onions, soymilk, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: creamy fresh tomato summer soup

steps: Place egg quarters and sieved yolks in a large bowl, cover with a lid, and set aside.
ingredients: eggs, mustard, mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar
name: double eggs

steps: Place all ingredients in the slow cooker and set on low. Cook for approximately 4 to 6 hours or until apples are tender. The time will vary depending on the type of apples used. Remove bourbon flamed apples. Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: tart apples, fresh lemon juice, unsalted butter, brown sugar, bourbon, creme fraiche
name: bourbon flamed apples

steps: In a large mixing bowl place jello and pour boiling water over. Stir till dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, stirring with a fork if necessary to break up. Stir till combined. Add in celery, apples and nuts. Stir to mix in fairly evenly. Pour into a 6-cup mold or 8-inch square pan. Chill till set, 2-3 hours.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, miniature marshmallows, apples, green seedless grape, pecans, pineapple tidbits, whipping cream, shredded coconut
name: ambrosia waldorf salad

steps: Place fish fillets in bottom of greased baking dish in one layer. Mix soup with sherry, salt, pepper, and basil. Spread this over fish. Sprinkle parmesan cheese over top. Bake at 350 f for 20-30 minutes until fish flakes. Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley.
ingredients: red snapper fillets, fresh parsley, plum tomatoes, onion, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oil, canola oil
name: perch or snapper fillet with tomatoes and onion

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the sugar, water, lemon juice, lemon zest. Stir to combine. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the figs and cook for about 2 minutes or until soft, turn once. Add in the figs
ingredients: figs, fresh lemon juice, lemons, zest of, water, sure-jell, sugar
name: fig jam 2

steps: In a medium bowl, combine all dry ingredients. In a separate bowl beat egg. Using one hand for the wet and the other for the dry, dredge the turkey in the egg followed by the flour mixture. Repeat until all strips are coated. Drizzle about a tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Place turkey strips in skillet, cook for 3-4 minutes. Flip strips, cook an additional 3-4 minutes until cooked through, taking care to not overcook or the turkey will become incredibly dry.
ingredients: turkey breast, dark brown sugar, ketchup, water, oil, balsamic vinegar, soy sauce, onion
name: turkey roast

steps: Line 8 x 4 inch loaf pan with foil. Mash 2 cups of strawberries in large bowl. Stir in condensed milk, juice and 2 cups of the whipped topping. Pour into pan. Top with combined chopped cookies and butter. Press into mixture. Cover. Freeze at least 6 hours. To serve, invert onto plate. Remove foil. Frost with remaining whipped topping. Top with remaining strawberries, sliced.
ingredients: evaporated skim milk, unflavored gelatin, water, sugar, vanilla extract, lemon juice
name: topping low fat whipped

steps: Place chicken tenderloins in a large skillet over high heat until skillet is hot. Add oil to skillet, then add chicken and onion and cook, stirring often, until chicken is browned. 5 minutes. Add the broth and stir, scraping up the brown bits clinging to pan. Add oil to skillet, then add chicken and onion and cook, stirring often, until sauce is slightly thickened, about 10 minutes. Stir in lemon juice and chives.
ingredients: chicken tenderloins, margarine, rice-a-roni, water, cayenne pepper, red sweet bell pepper, frozen broccoli spears, frozen corn
name: chicken tenderloins and veggies

steps: Combine garlic and sage in a large bowl. Add lamb, and coat with herbs. Grind pepper and salt over all. Wrap well and marinate in the fridge 4 hours or overnight. Remove from marinade, scraping off as much herbs as possible. Preheat oven to 400f. Heat large saut pan high, add 2 tbsp oil. Sear both sides of meat. Transfer to large baking dish in oven. Bake 10 minutes for medium rare. Cover with foil and let rest for 10 minutes before slicing. Garnish with sprigs of rosemary.
ingredients: red onions, extra virgin olive oil, fresh sage, garlic, racks of lamb
name: garlic and sage lamb racks with roasted red onion

steps: Pack 6-7 quart jars with apple, tightly. Mix the first 5 ingredients. Add water and lemon juice. Cook until it thickens and clears. Pour over apples, leaving an inch of head space. Process in water bath canner for 35 minutes.
ingredients: white sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, water, lemon juice, apples
name: apple pie filling in a jar

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop onions and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes.
ingredients: butter, onion, sliced mushrooms, cooked bacon, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, ground nutmeg
name: onion bacon mushroom quiche

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over a low heat and add the butter. When the butter has melted, add the onion and cook until soft and translucent. Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper to taste, then increase the heat and stir. When the moisture from the mushrooms has been released, allow it to evaporate, concentrating the flavour. This might happen quickly or slowly, depending entirely on the type of mushrooms used. Add teh paprika and cayenne and fry for a few moments longer, until the paprika turns a shade darker. Finally, add teh sour cream or creme fraiche and dill, and allow it to bubbvle gently for a further 5 minutes or so. Serve immediately with rice, pasta or spatzle.
ingredients: cooking oil, yellow onions, garlic, fresh ginger, serrano peppers, snow peas, red bell pepper, mushroom, oyster sauce, rice wine
name: chinese mushroomherd s side dish

steps: Add water to a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Stir in the oats, raisins, apricots, figs, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, cardamom, salt. Lower heat to med-low. Simmer, uncovered, for about 5-10 minutes or until the liquid is absorbed and the fruit softened.
ingredients: quick-cooking rolled oats, nonfat milk, nutmeg, oat bran, dried apricots, brown sugar
name: creamy apricot oatmeal volumetrics

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium high heat. Saute fish for 3 minutes and then flip fish and saute for 5 minutes of other side or until fish is done.
ingredients: ground cumin, onions, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, fish, lemon wedge
name: grilled fish with cumin lemon rub

steps: Heat 2 quarts of soy sauce in a large saut pan, add the onions and garlic, and saut until opaque. Add beef and saut, turning often with tongs, for 7 to 10 minutes. Stir together the oil, vinegar, and ginger and add to the saut mixture. Blanch broccoli in the boiling water. Add to the meat mixture and keep warm. Prepare soba noodles according to package directions. Drain, toss with the beef and broccoli, and serve.
ingredients: sirloin steak, garlic cloves, soy sauce, fresh gingerroot, peanut oil, green onions, yellow onion, chives
name: beef with four onions

steps: Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately.
ingredients: butter, boneless pork roast, dry rub seasonings, onion, garlic cloves, water, liquid smoke flavoring
name: pulled pork bbq sandwiches

steps: Place breakfast sausage in crockpot. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours or high for 3-4 hours. Remove sausage from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way.
ingredients: butter, breakfast sausage, onion, green bell pepper, green chilies, monterey jack cheese, eggs, sour cream, salsa
name: southwest crock pot breakfast

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Spread the pepperoni between two paper towels and blot to remove the excess grease. Brush the olive oil over the pizza crusts and cover with the pizza sauce. Next add the cheese, pepperoni, and tomatoes in that order. Finally topped with the chopped vegetables. Place pizzas on pizza stones or pizza pans. These really work better than cookie sheets. Change the oven temperature to 425 before putting the pizzas in the oven. Bake until the crust is a golden brown. About 15 minutes.
ingredients: red bell peppers, tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt and pepper
name: mozzarella topped peppers with tomatoes and garlic

steps: Mix together vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, chicken pieces, garlic, fresh ginger, scallions in a small bowl. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Simmer uncovered until the sauce thickens, 8 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, chicken pieces, garlic, fresh ginger
name: sticky chicken ii

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine butter, lemon rind, lemon juice, lemon zest, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel
ingredients: butter, lemon rind, lemon juice, salt, sugar, egg
name: lemon hard sauce

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add butter, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press corn through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly
ingredients: sweet corn, butter, tomatoes, jalapeno, onion, garlic clove, milk, cheddar cheese
name: spicy cream of sweet corn soup

steps: In a large skillet, cook onion in hot, melted butter over med heat until tender. Add in mushrooms and garlic. Cook about 5 minutes or until onions are tender, stirring occasionally. Transfer mixture to a greased 3-quart baking dish. Stir in the water, barley, dry soup mix, thyme, and salt. Bake, covered, at 350 for about 1 hour and 15 minutes or until onion is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed, stirring once or twice. Let stand, covered, for 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: celery, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, mushroom soup, ham, water, minute rice
name: budget casserole

steps: Bring to a boil in a large saucepan the potatoes and enough salted cold water to cover. Reduce the heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, approx 10 minutes. Drain well. Combine buttermilk, chipotle, salt & pepper in a 1 cup glass measure stirring until blended. Set aside. Return the potatoes to the saucepan and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until all the liquid has evaporated. Remove from heat and mash. Add buttermilk, chipotle, salt & pepper in a 1 cup glass measure stirring until blended. Return the potatoes to the saucepan and cook
ingredients: red potatoes, garlic, salt, butter, dried chipotle chile, fresh chives, chevre cheese, milk, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: chipotle chevre mashed potatoes

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees. Mix the ranch dressing and salsa in a small bowl, cover and refrigerate. Spray a cookie sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place tostada shells on sprayed cookie sheet and bake for 5 to 6 minutes turning once, or until hot and crisp. Meanwhile, heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. When oil is hot, saute the steak strips until they are well browned. Add bell pepper strips and saute over medium-high heat until peppers are soft and meat starts to char. Divide lettuce evenly among prepared tostada shells, and top each with the meat-pepper mixture. Drizzle the chilled dressing over tostadas, sprinkle with cheese and serve.
ingredients: boneless sirloin steak, seasoning salt, garlic pepper seasoning, chili powder, dried oregano leaves, hoagie rolls, salsa, avocado, colby-monterey jack cheese
name: southwest steak and salsa sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine muffin mix, ham and cheese in medium bowl. Combine milk, egg and mustard in one cup glass measure. Stir milk mixture into dry ingredients. Mix just until moistened. Fill 9 paper cup-lined muffin cups two-thirds full with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes. Remove muffin pan to rack, cool 5 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, ham, tasty cheese, pineapple chunk
name: ham cheese and pineapple muffins

steps: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain, crumble and set aside. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook peggy s delicious broccoli salad in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain, and rinse under cold water. In a small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar to make the dressing. In a large bowl, combine broccoli, green grape, green onion, slivered almonds, golden raisin, bacon, mayonnaise, sugar, apple cider vinegar to make the dressing. In a large bowl, combine broccoli, green grape, green onion, slivered almonds, golden raisin, bacon, mayonnaise, sugar, apple cider vinegar
ingredients: broccoli, green grape, green onion, slivered almonds, golden raisin, bacon, mayonnaise, sugar, apple cider vinegar
name: peggy s delicious broccoli salad

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: hazelnuts, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, salt, olive oil, parmesan cheese
name: hazelnut cilantro pasta sauce

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine the vanilla bean, dry white wine, sugar, honeydew melon, fresh blueberries. Pour into 9x13 inch glass dish and chill until set. Stir together cream cheese and sour cream. Add sugar and vanilla. Blend well. Spread cream cheese mixture over chilled jell-o. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Chill.
ingredients: vanilla bean, dry white wine, sugar, honeydew melon, fresh blueberries
name: vanilla scented honeydew blueberry salad

steps: Drain spinach well, pressing between layers of paper towels and set aside. Cut 2-3 cheese slices into small triangles, and reserve for garnish. Cover bottom and sides of a lightly greased 9 or10-inch pieplate with remaining muenster slices, overlapping cheese as needed. Combine spinach, onion and next 5 ingredients. Spoon into cheese-lined pieplate. Bake 350 for 45 minutes or until set. Cool 10 minutes before serving. Garnish with reserved cheese triangles and pimiento strips, if desired.
ingredients: sweet onions, ground beef, salt, pepper, cheese, milk, bisquick, eggs
name: vidalia cheeseburger pie

steps: Put all ingredients in a stand mixer with a wire whip attachment and whip until butter is lighter in color and the volume has increased. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator. Or, dish it out on parchment paper and roll into a log. Wrap in plastic wrap and foil and it can be frozen for months. Best part is you can just unwrap and slice off what you need and rewrap it and stick it back in the freezer.
ingredients: butter, fresh sage, cracked pepper, balsamic vinegar
name: herb butter for steak chicken chops or veggies

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and saut for about 3 minutes, until transparent. Add the garlic and saut one minute longer. Add the carrots, broth and salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered for about 20 minutes, or until carrots are tender. Stir in the chiles, lime juice and rice. Cool and pure the soup with a food processor, blender or immersion blender. The easiest way to puree is to add the solid ingredients to your food processor with just enough liquid to puree and then mix this thick pureed mixture back into the broth. Reheat, if necessary and serve warm.
ingredients: cooking oil, leek, garlic clove, carrots, potato, chicken broth, salt, pepper, crouton
name: pureed carrot soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
ingredients: flour, salt, corn, beer, water, egg
name: beer batter

steps: Saut onions in the butter in a large soup pot. Add milk, butter and egg yolk. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes. Discard the egg yolk. Puree soup in a blender in small batches or with a stick blender. Return to the pot. Stir in milk. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: onions, milk, butter, salt, egg yolk
name: king s soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. In a small mixing bowl, beat the eggs with a splash of water. On a plate combine breadcrumbs and thyme. Then on another plate combine flour with a pinch of salt and pepper. Lay ham strips on work surface, top each slice with cheese then place chicken chink toward the end of the strip. Rollup lightly, and coat with flour, eggs and breadcrumbs. Cook for 20 mins or until done.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, swiss cheese, ham, panko breadcrumbs, milk
name: easy chicken cordon blue

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium casserole dish mix together green beans, milk, cream of chicken soup, frozen corn, water chestnuts, onion, sour cream, velveeta cheese, butter, butter flavored cracker. Bake in a 325-degree fahrenheit oven until brown. Drain grease from meatballs. Combine meatballs and green beans in casserole dish and pour soup on top. Return to oven and bake at 300 degrees for 1 to 1 hours.
ingredients: french style green beans, cream of chicken soup, frozen corn, water chestnuts, onion, sour cream, velveeta cheese, butter, butter flavored cracker
name: makeover fancy bean casserole

steps: In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions.
ingredients: spinach fettuccine, white pearl onions, butter, olive oil, lemon peel, thyme, vegetable stock
name: spinach fettuccini with pearl onions

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, quinoa, vegetable stock, soy sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, parsley
name: quinoa with garlic and soy sauce

steps: Place beef on top of vegetables. Mix horseradish, salt, pepper and 1 cup water. Pour over top of beef. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until beef and vegetables are tender. Remove 2 cups of juices from crock pot and put into small sauce pan. Mix corn starch with 2 t cold water and then add to juices. Bring to a boil while stirring constantly until thickened. Serve gravy over meat and vegetables.
ingredients: top round roast, tomato sauce, white wine, prepared horseradish, sugar, pepper, parsley, oregano, fresh thyme leave, bay leaves
name: crock pot beef roast

steps: In a non-stick skillet, cook chicken for 4-5 minutes on each side or until juices run clear. On roll, layer the bacon, chicken and cheese. Broil 4-6 inches from the heat for 1-2 minutes or until cheese is melted. Top with romaine and mayo. Add additional topping to your liking.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, seasoned bread crumbs, mixed italian herbs, provolone cheese, butter
name: provolone chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix flour, sugar, agave nectar, grapeseed oil, banana, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, white vinegar, vegetable oil, cold waterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix flour, sugar, agave nectar, grapeseed oil, banana, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vanilla
ingredients: eggs, sea salt, agave nectar, grapeseed oil, banana, cocoa powder
name: flourless chocolate banana cake

steps: Heat oven to 350. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl on until well blended. Beat in eggs, vanilla, and applesauce. Combine flour, baking soda and salt and add to butter mixture, beating until well blended stir in mints candies. Pour into two loaf pans. Bake for 60 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean cool completely in pan. Drizzle with glaze or wait until the cake is sliced and then drizzle with glaze to maximize the glazed area.
ingredients: butter, oreo cookies, mint chocolate chip ice cream, andes mints candies, chocolate syrup
name: mint ice cream cake

steps: Heat oven to 180 degrees celsius in a small saucepan, add pears, sugar, and 4 tbsp water. Cook gently over low heat about 5 minutes until pears are just tender. Remove from heat and stir in the mangoes and stem ginger. Spoon mixture into a 1. 75 litre baking dish and leave to cool. For the crumble mixture, rub butter into the flower until crumbly. Stir in sugar and pecans, then sprinkle mixture over the fruit mixture. Bake at 180 degrees c for 30 minutes until lightly browned on top. If freezing, prepare to end of step 2. Wrap whole dish in large freezer bag, seal, and freeze up to 1 month. Can be baked from frozen in a 160 degree c oven for 50 minutes. Serve with cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: textured vegetable protein, wheat germ, curry powder, cayenne pepper, sea salt, braggs liquid aminos, boiling water, whole wheat flour, olive oil, garlic
name: homemade tvp crumbles

steps: In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions.
ingredients: pizza dough, pesto sauce, spinach leaves, mozzarella cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, frozen artichoke hearts, roma tomatoes, feta cheese, black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: pesto sun dried tomato artichoke spinach feta pizza

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add lamb chops and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add lamb chops and sauté
ingredients: garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, olive oil, fresh ground pepper, lamb rib chops, salt, lemon slice
name: grilled lamb ribs agnello a scottadito

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the squash cut side up in a baking dish with inch of water in the bottom of the pan. Cover the dish and bake for 45 minutes. Meanwhile, combine the cinnamon, pineapple, nutmeg, allspice, and ginger. When squash has been cooked, remove from oven. Let cool down for 10 minutes. Carefully scoop out the pulp from the halves and combine with the pineapple and cinnamon mixture. Replace the squash into the shells and return to the oven and bake for 7 minutes more until pineapple is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: acorn squash, eggs, turkey, butter, garlic cloves, onion, fresh sage, salt and pepper
name: brunch style stuffed acorn squash paleo

steps: Combine all of the ingredients, except the pineapple, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes, or until knife comes out clean.
ingredients: crushed pineapple in syrup, instant vanilla flavor pudding and pie filling, shortbread pie crusts, pineapple, maraschino cherries, sweetened flaked coconut
name: two minute hawaiian pie

steps: Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add leeks, onions and potatoes and stir. Cover saucepan and sweat veg for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Add cream to taste.
ingredients: butter, leeks, potatoes, celery seed, parsley, salt and pepper
name: sauteed potatoes and leeks

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Melt butter on a low flame in a small sauce pan. Add garlic and saute on low for about 1 minute. Add the lemon juice and shut off flame. Spray the bottom of a baking dish lightly with cooking spray. Place the fish on top and season with salt and pepper. Pour the lemon butter mixture on the fish and top with fresh parsley. Bake at 400 until cooked, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley, butter, olive oil, flour
name: lemon butter tilapia

steps: Place fillets in a greased baking dish. Combine rosemary, wine, lemon juice and pour over the fish. Top with scallions and mushrooms. Cover with aluminum foil. Bake in preheated 350-degree oven for about 15 minutes or until flaky. Sprinkle with parsley and season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: haddock fillets, salt, pepper, all-purpose flour, butter, fresh parsley, green onions, dry white wine
name: haddock fillets in white wine

steps: Cook potatoes in their jackets, until done. Cool slightly and peel. Cut into thin slices while still warm. In a non-stick skillet, add a mixture of canola oil and olive oil- just enough to coat the bottom of pan. Heat oil and add potato slices, garlic, and onion. Season with salt and pepper. Saute until golden brown. Sprinkle liberally with chopped chives or parsley.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, vegetable oil, salt and black pepper
name: kentucky fried potatoes

steps: In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in candied violets. Cook until the candied violets have completely dissolved. Remove from heat. Stir in almond extract and vanilla. Serve.
ingredients: water, sugar, almond extract, violets
name: candied violets

steps: Saute chicken and rice stuffed bell peppers in butter in saucepan over medium heat until tender. Add flour, and salt and pepper, cooking and stirring until mixture is smooth and bubbly. Add broth and milk, stirring constantly until mixture comes to a boil and begins to thicken. Add broth and milk, stirring constantly until mixture comes to a boil and begins to
ingredients: condensed cream of celery soup, water, onion soup mix, cooked chicken, cooked rice, green peppers, lemon-pepper seasoning, cheddar cheese
name: chicken and rice stuffed bell peppers

steps: Mix pudding and pineapple in bowl. Gently stir in whipped topping. Cut cake horizontally into thirds. Spread one-third pudding mixture over bottom layer of cake. Top with second layer. Repeat layering, ending with pudding. Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until ready to serve. Garnish with your favorite seasonal berries.
ingredients: angel food cake, vanilla instant pudding mix, crushed pineapple, whipped topping
name: angel food pudding cake angel lush with pineapple

steps: In medium bowl, combine brown sugar, ground cinnamon, red apple, green apple, walnut pieces, light cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, light sour cream, cracker. Beat until well blended. Spread into a ball by rolling it around inside the bowl. Once ball is formed, pour crushed nuts into a second bowl, and roll cheese ball in the crushed nuts until the outside is covered. Presenting the cheese ball on a plate, place cinnamon stick and bay leaf in the top of the ball to make it look like an apple.
ingredients: brown sugar, ground cinnamon, red apple, green apple, walnut pieces, light cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, light sour cream, cracker
name: cheddar apple pie dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, and crushed pineapple. Mix well. Pour mixture into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, shortening, brown sugar, eggs, pineapple, vanilla
name: pineapple drop cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Combine the biscuit mix, cheese, sesame seed and half and half in a bowl and mix well. Shape into balls and place on a greased baking sheet, flaten slightly with palm of hand. Brush with the melted butter. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: self-rising flour, baking powder, sugar, vegetable shortening, cheddar cheese, buttermilk
name: paula deen s cheese biscuits

steps: I use 2 tablespoons of general foods international vanilla caramel latte from the makers of maxwell house instead of folgers caramel groove cafe latte mix, but this site does not recognize it because it is new. Fill your blender almost to the top. Add skim milk to blender. Mix 2 tbsp vanilla caramel latte with your coffee until dissolved than add to blender. Blend on med to high speed. My blender has a frappe speed and that is what i use. Blend until you reach the consistency you prefer. You can always add more milk if this mixture is to thick. If you do not use enough ice, it will be very watery and it will not be anything like mcdonalds frappe. Top with whipped cream and caramel. I also stir in some caramel before adding the whipped cream. But to each his own.
ingredients: extra strong coffee, skim milk, granulated sugar, artificial sweetener, ice, whipped cream
name: frappuccino light just like that star place

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet on medium heat, add spinach, tomatoes, onion powder, salt and pepper, and saute for about 7 minutes or until spinach and tomatoes wilt. Add ravioli to skillet and cook for 3 more minutes. Serve hot and sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: ravioli, walnuts, unsalted butter, olive oil, parmesan cheese, heavy cream
name: easy cream walnut sauce for ravioli

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, chunky salsa, whole kernel corn, miracle whip, chili powder, tortilla chips, cheddar cheese
name: beef nacho casserole

steps: Heat the oil in a wok over a medium heat for 1 minute. Add the chicken and stir-fry for 5 minutes or until golden. Stir in the vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes, or until tender-crisp. Transfer the contents of the wok to a large salad bowl, add the salad greens and mix well. Whisk together the dressing and the soy sauce in a small bowl, drizzle it over the salad-vegetable mixture and toss to combine. Serve with noodles or rice.
ingredients: egg noodles, broccoli coleslaw mix, canola oil, lean chicken, green onions, garlic cloves, low sodium chicken broth, teriyaki sauce, cornstarch, red pepper flakes
name: no yolks chicken skillet

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: english muffins, canned crabmeat, water chestnuts, diced pimento, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, lemon, juice of, creole seasoning, swiss cheese, paprika
name: hot crabmeat sandwiches

steps: Heat oven to 425. Coat a cookie sheet with nonstick spray. Place 4 tortillas on cookie sheet. Sprinkle with half the cheese, then all the corn and bacon. Cover with eggs. Top with scallions, the remaining cheese and tortillas. Lightly coat tortillas with nonstick spray. Bake 6 minutes. Then turn over and bake 6 minutes more until lightly browned and crisp. Cut in wedges. Serve with salsa.
ingredients: cooking spray, corn tortilla, mole, salsa, egg, cheddar cheese
name: egg mole tostada

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs. Then add the creamed corn, and melted butter. Whisk in the sugar until blended. In a small bowl, whisk together the flour, cornmeal and baking powder. Slowly add the flour mixture into the large bowl until combined. Fold in the diced chiles and cheese until combined. Place the mixture into a greased 10-inch round cake pan and smooth the top of the batter. Bake until the top is golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean, about 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool the bread for 15 minutes on a rack. Invert the bread onto a platter and drizzle with honey. Cool completely, then cut and serve.
ingredients: eggs, cream-style corn, sour cream, jalapeno pepper, cheddar cheese, yellow cornmeal, baking soda, salted butter
name: furr s cafeteria mexican corn bread

steps: In a 3 quart saucepan, melt butter and saute onions. Add potatoes, water, and bouillon cubes. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium. Cook just until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place frozen broccoli and cheddar cheese in crock pot on low to start melting and thawing. Once the potatoes are done, using a hand blender, blend contents of saucepan to desired consistency and then pour into the crock pot. Heat on low until warmed.
ingredients: cooked brown rice, frozen broccoli, cream of chicken and mushroom soup, low-fat milk, velveeta mexican cheese, butter, black pepper, paprika
name: rice broccoli soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, salt, bananas, nonfat milk, vinegar
name: fat free chocolate banana muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Prepare muffin tin. Sift flours and spice. Stir in sugar. Make well in centre. Place buttermilk, yoghurt, eggs and oil in large jug. Mix well. Pour into flour mixture, stir with wooden spoon until just combined. Spoon into muffin pan and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: ground flax seeds, vanilla whey protein powder, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, vanilla-flavored soymilk, eggs, vegetable oil, xylitol sweetener, vanilla
name: high fiber high protein flax muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking pan with nonstick spray. In a large bowl, beat eggs slightly with a fork. Add water and oatmeal and let stand until liquid is absorbed stir in remaining ingredients, except meat. Mix well. Add meat, using your hands or a sturdy spoon and mix until well blended. Shape into a loaf in your baking pan. Make an indentation down center of loaf and fill with ketchup. Bake for 1 hour or until loaf is done. Remove from oven and cover with foil--let stand 10 to 15 minutes before serving and it will cut nicely.
ingredients: lean ground beef, tomato juice, oats, egg, onion, salt, pepper, heinz chili sauce
name: quaker oats prizewinning meatloaf

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: cooked brown rice, onion, vegetable oil, parsley, carrot, milk, egg, breadcrumbs
name: carrot cutlets

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a glass baking dish, melt the butter in the oven. Remove the dish from the oven and add the salt, garlic and black pepper. Meanwhile, wash the shrimp, leaving the shells on. Add the shrimp to the butter mixture and stir well to coat. Bake for 15-18 minutes.
ingredients: italian salad dressing, butter, beer, salt, pepper, tabasco sauce, shrimp
name: easy sauteed shrimp

steps: Boil water and sugar until water is dissolved. Simmer for five more minutes without stirring. Pour in a 9 by 9 inch pan. Freeze for two hours. Stir every hour from outside in, until it is slushy. Return to freezer. Process in food processor. Return to pan and freeze for about six hours. Garnish and serve.
ingredients: sugar, water, oranges, zest of, blood orange juice, campari
name: campari blood orange sorbet

steps: Place ham hock in crock pot. Cover with water. Bring to a rapid boil. Turn burner to medium to medium-high and let it come to a medium boil. Add the sliced onion. Let this cook while you wash and snap your beans. Wash beans, cut off ends and break in half. Add beans, salt, sugar, garlic, pepper and parsley to the ham hocks. Let it come to a boil, then turn burner to medium to medium-low. Let it slow boil for about an hour or more or less, depending on how well you like your beans cooked. About 15-20 minutes before done, add your potatoes. Boil until tender.
ingredients: dried great northern beans, garlic cloves, sweet onion, kosher salt, black pepper, parsley, ground cloves, smoked ham, water
name: crock pot ham and beans

steps: Spray a nonstick frypan with veggies cooking spray and heat to medium. Spray veggie cooking spray over both sides of the cod fillets. Sprinkle parsley, italian seasoning, salt and pepper over both sides of the cod fillets. Place cod into medium hot frypan, cook for about 5 minutes, carefully turn and cook a further 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish.
ingredients: cod fish fillets, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, white wine, bay leaves, chopped tomatoes, chickpeas, black olives, water
name: cod chickpea olive stew

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Melt half the butter with the olive oil in a saute pan, and gently fry the onions until soft and lightly golden, about 15 minutes. Spread half the onions in the bottom of a casserole. Lay a layer of sliced potatoes on top, season with salt and pepper, and scatter with thyme leaves. Build another layer of onions, then a final one of potatoes, and finally pour over the stock. Cover the pan with foil, and bake until all the liquid has been absorbed, 2 to 3 hours, removing the foil for the last hour if you like a crisp top. Bake until all the liquid has been absorbed, 2 to 3 hours, removing the foil for the last hour if you like a crisp top. Bake until all the liquid has been absorbed, 2 to 3 hours, removing the foil for the last hour if you like a
ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, ham, beef, flour, beef broth, dry red wine
name: carne a la castellan castilian style sliced beef

steps: Combine the water, cardamom pods, fresh ginger, orange strips, cloves, low-fat milk, tea leaves, dark brown sugar. Let simmer for 10 minutes to infuse flavours. Strain into a heated teapot and serve immediately. Garnish with the orange slices.
ingredients: water, cardamom pods, fresh ginger, orange strips, cloves, low-fat milk, tea leaves, dark brown sugar
name: ginger spiced tea

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl mix together the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt, and set aside. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk together all of the wet ingredients, except the cider vinegar. Add the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, and whisk well to combine. Pour batter into greased 9inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: spelt flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, sea salt, oil, cider vinegar, vanilla extract, water
name: one pan eggless chocolate cake

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Place pieces of butter along the inside edges of dough. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: butter, bread, provolone cheese, pepperoni, pizza sauce
name: pizza grilled cheese

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, saute dilly rice and onion for 6 to 8 minutes or until just tender. Stir in rice and corn. In a small bowl, combine dry milk powder and water. Add milk mixture to the dilly rice mixture. Mix well to combine. Stir cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, parsley flakes and lemon pepper into dilly rice mixture. Lower heat and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: long grain rice, onion powder, dill weed, salt, olive oil, cheese, garlic powder, celery seed, cayenne pepper
name: dilly cheesy rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, add all ingredients and mix until well combined. Pour into a 13x9 casserole dish. Bake for 1 hour or until top is slightly golden. Sprinkle top with french fried onions and bake an additional 10 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: frozen hash browns, butter, eggs, half-and-half, cooked ham, green onion, cheddar cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: hash browns quiche paula deen

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare cake mix according to package directions, using the eggs, water, and oil. Spoon batter into 24 paper-lined muffin pan cups, filling two-thirds full. Remove 24 cherries from cherry pie filling and set aside. Spoon generous teaspoon of remaining cherry filling onto center of each cupcake. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry.
ingredients: cherries, water, sugar, cornstarch
name: cherry pie filling

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Place the onions in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add flour, salt and pepper to skillet. Stir until smooth. Gradually stir in milk until blended. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 min or until thickened. Reduce heat to med. Return onions to the pan. Heat through.
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, dijon mustard, salt, cayenne pepper, milk, baby onions, scallion
name: last minute creamed onions

steps: In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 7 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic
ingredients: broccoli rabe, olive oil, garlic cloves, sea salt, black pepper
name: broccoli rabe with garlic

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the salt, sea salt, fresh rosemary, cooking spray. Add potatoes. Cover and bake at 450 for 20 minutes. Uncover and stir. Bake 15-20 minutes longer or until potatoes are lightly browned and tender. Discard bay leaf.
ingredients: potatoes, sea salt, fresh rosemary, cooking spray
name: crispy baked potato wedges low fat

steps: In a small pot, heat brown sugar, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter,
ingredients: brown sugar, butter, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground cardamom, water, orange brandy, orange slice
name: hot buttered orange brandy

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, bacon, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, vegetable oil, maple syrup
name: maple bacon muffins

steps: Heat olive oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Stir
ingredients: honey, butter, yellow mustard, salt, curry powder, chicken
name: oamc baked curry glazed chicken or pork

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: white flour, wheat flour, almond flour, wheat bran, oat bran, wheat germ
name: terri s healthier bread flour mix

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place hasty cobbler in 9x12 baking dish with the margarine. Place in oven. Meanwhile, in small bowl, mix sugar, flour, milk, baking powder and salt. Pour over melted margarine and hasty cobbler. Do not stir. Place back in 9x12 baking dish with the margarine. Place back in 9
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, salt, fruit
name: hasty cobbler

steps: Cover with foil and cook for 10-15 minutes. Serve with bacon.
ingredients: corn on the cob, butter, salt and pepper, bacon
name: barbecue corn with bacon

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Put oil in 9x13 pan, swirl around. Scrub potatoes. Cut each lengthwise into 8 wedges. Combine flour and seasonings in a bowl or baggie. Add potato wedges and shake or toss to coat. Arrange skin-side-down in oiled pan. Bake 35-40 minutes.
ingredients: baking potatoes, onion, butter, salt and pepper
name: diner style baked potato home fries

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Cook corn, butter, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime, mayonnaise, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime,
ingredients: corn, butter, queso fresco, mayonnaise, red chili powder, salt, key lime
name: trolelotes mexican cooked corn snack

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot.
ingredients: water, bulgar wheat, skim milk, honey, apricot, ground cinnamon, ground cardamom, vanilla extract, almond extract, almonds
name: apricot honey wheat pudding

steps: Heat oven to 350°F. Add onion, butter, bread cubes, brown sugar, tomatoes, salt and pepper. Cook for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: onion, butter, bread cubes, brown sugar, tomatoes, salt, pepper
name: dayton steakhouse style stewed tomatoes

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the butter, shallots, and garlic, and reduce until the butter just covers the shallots. Add the cream or half and half and reduce again until the mixture is thick and syrupy, stirring occasionally. Reduce the temperature to very low and gradually whisk the pieces of butter into the mixture, one cube at a time. Do not allow the sauce to become either too hot or too cold or it will break. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground pepper, stir in the remaining ingredients, and serve immediately. Also, feel free to experiment with other herbs than listed above.
ingredients: shallots, white wine, chicken stock, heavy cream, unsalted butter, white pepper
name: buerre blanc

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Toss corn and oil to coat and spread out on a large baking sheet. Bake, stirring once, until some kernels begin to brown, about 20 minute. Combine basil, shallot, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl. Add the corn. Toss to coat. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: fresh basil, butter, whipped butter, orange rind, fresh corn
name: steamed corn with basil butter

steps: Cook macaroni to package. Drain and rinse with cold water. Set pasta to the side make sure all water is removed. In a big bowl combine mayo, buttermilk, dill, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Stir in pasta, celery, cucumber, scallions and sweet pepper. Cover and chill for 2 - 24hours. If a little dry just before serving add small amount of buttermilk.
ingredients: cooked macaroni, salad dressing, french dressing, thousand island dressing, green onions, radishes, hard-boiled eggs, paprika
name: mum s macaroni salad

steps: In a medium sauce pan heat coconut milk, curry paste, peanut butter, sugar, and fish sauce until they come to a very small boil. Set aside and cool adding cornstarch to thicken. While the sauce is cooling, stir fry 1 chopped onion and 1 t minced garlic. Cut up chicken into small pieces and stir fry with the onion and garlic until chicken is cooked through. Combine the garlic, onion and chicken with the sauce and heat. Spoon the chicken peanut curry over rice and enjoy.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, bell pepper, orange juice, shredded coconut, creamy peanut butter, curry powder, water, cayenne pepper, non-fat cooking spray, brown rice
name: thai peanut curry chicken bake

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix peaches and raspberries, and place in bottom of 3 qt casserole dish. Using fork, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and cinnamon. Stir in eggs using fork. Batter will be quite dry. Pour over top of fruit. Pour melted butter of top. Place in oven and cook for 1 hour.
ingredients: butter, frozen peaches, sugar, cinnamon, self-rising flour, milk
name: beaumont s finest peach cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Butter a shallow gratin or baking dish that is just large enough to hold the asparagus. Place a layer of asparagus in the dish, with the. Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper and some of the cheese keep adding layers until all asparagus and all cheese is used, finishing with the cheese. Dot the top of the dish with the pieces of butter and place the dish on the top rack of the oven. Bake for about 15-20 minutes, or until the asparagus is cooked through and beginning to brown and the cheese is melted. Variations. Instead of the butter use olive oil or half butter and half olive oil. Use half parmesan and half shredded fontina cheese for a creamier gratin. Layer a couple of slices of prosciutto in with the asparagus if you like. Sprinkle with a little lemon zest for added zing.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, prosciutto, butter, parmesan cheese
name: asparagus florentine

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Drop by spoonfuls onto parchment lined or lightly greased baking sheet. Bake for 15-20 minutes until lightly golden.
ingredients: agave nectar, applesauce, vanilla extract, whole wheat flour, baking soda, ground cloves, cinnamon, bananas, rolled oats, dark chocolate chips
name: not so guilty chocolate chip oatmeal banana cookies

steps: Heat the vegetable oil in a large frying pan. Add the chicken breasts and brown on both sides. Add the shallots, chicken stock and vinegar. Cover and simmer on low heat until the chicken is no longer pink inside, about 30 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and keep warm. Blend together the cream and cornstarch. Stir into the cooking liquid in the frying pan. Cook until thickened, stirring the sauce to keep it smooth. Stir in the mustard, tarragon, salt and pepper. Arrange the chicken on a serving platter and pour the sauce over it.
ingredients: chicken breast halves, butter, dijon mustard, white wine, lemon juice, fresh tarragon, salt, pepper
name: baked tarragon chicken breasts

steps: In a small saucepan combine coffee, chocolate pieces, and sugar. Cook and stir over medium heat for 2 to 3 minutes or until chocolate is melted and sugar is dissolved. In another small saucepan heat half-and-half or light cream until steaming, stirring occasionally. Pour coffee mixture into a mug. Add warm half-and-half. If desired, stir in additional sugar to taste. Makes 1 serving.
ingredients: coffee beans, sugar, cocoa, vanilla essence, egg white, boiling water
name: mocha java sorbet

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add beef cubes and saute until browned. Add garlic. Saute until garlic is lightly browned. Add flour and stir until well coated. Transfer meat into the crockpot and add marsala, broth, soup and sliced mushrooms. Mix well. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 5 to 7 hours or until meat is tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve with or over rice, egg noodles or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, fresh ground black pepper, flour, mushrooms, marsala wine, low sodium chicken broth, parsley
name: chicken and mushroom marsala

steps: Combine all the seasonings in a small bowl and rub evenly over roast. Place meat in a 6-quart slow cooker. Add water. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 4-5 hours or until pork is very tender. Remove pork to a large cutting board or platter and let rest for 10-15 minutes. Pull, slice or chop to serve.
ingredients: pork butt, ground pepper, paprika, mustard, garlic salt, cayenne pepper, molasses
name: dale s renown pork butt

steps: Heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium heat. Add peppers and onions and saute for about 2 minutes. Add garlic and saute for another minute. Stir in jalapenos and mushrooms and cover pot, reducing heat to low. Let vegetables sweat for about 10 minutes, or until softened and juices are released from the peppers. Add water or broth, salt and pepper to taste, and cilantro. Bring to a boil, then serve immediately.
ingredients: canola oil, cremini mushroom, yellow onion, garlic, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, cotija cheese
name: hongos con pimientos mushrooms with peppers

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place 1/2 cup of butter in a large mixing bowl and whisk until melted. Set aside.
ingredients: lavash bread, sweet corn relish, low fat cottage cheese, tuna in water, mixed vegetables, snow pea sprouts
name: cottage cheese tuna corn relish wraps aust ww 5pts

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Coat a 10- by 15-inch rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place the chicken pieces, bone side up on unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat, about 20 minutes or until light brown. Meanwhile in a bowl stir together oil, mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, oregano and red pepper. Brush mustard mixture onto chicken. Turn chicken, brush with remaning mixture. Broil for 5-15 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink.
ingredients: chicken, honey, dijon mustard, low sodium soy sauce, ground ginger, shallots, parsley
name: honey dijon mustard chicken fillets

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake at 350 degrees F.
ingredients: sugar, water, whole cloves, whole allspice, cinnamon sticks, fresh cranberries, orange
name: mom s cranberries

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Pat pork medallions dry with paper towels and generously season with salt and pepper. Heat a large ovenproof skillet over medium high heat. Sear pork medallions in 1 tablespoon of oil until well browned, about 3 to 4 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add remaining tablespoon of oil to skillet and cook onion and rosemary, stirring occasionally, until onions begin to caramelize and turn golden, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook another minute. Stir in tomatoes, anchovies, remaining salt and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes break down, about 8 minutes. Return pork medallions to skillet and spoon sauce over chops. Cover skillet and place in preheated oven and cook until internal meat thermometer reads 145 degrees f, about 15 minutes. Serve over polenta, egg noodles, or rice.
ingredients: clarified butter, pork medallions, shallots, mushroom, whipping cream, cognac, horseradish, parsley, salt and pepper
name: pork medallions with chanterelles

steps: Preheat the oven to 425. Using a sharp knife, carefully peel the limes. Be sure to remove all of the bitter white pith. Working over a bowl, cut in between the membranes to release the lime sections into the bowl. Cut each section crosswise into quarters.
