Return the limes to the bowl and stir in the onion, cilantro and jalapeo. Add 1 tablespoon of the oil, the sugar and a pinch of salt and toss well. Heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil in an ovenproof skillet until shimmering. Season the fillets on both sides with salt and pepper and add to the skillet, skinned side up. Cook over moderately high heat until golden brown on the bottom, about 2 minutes. Transfer the skillet to the oven and roast the salmon for 5 minutes, or until just cooked through. Transfer to 4 dinner plates, spoon the salsa on top and serve.
ingredients: trout fillets, salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil, salsa, lemon slice
name: pan seared trout with italian style salsa

steps: Heat a tablespoon each of chicken-flavored ramen noodles, broccoli, bok choy, green onions, sunflower seeds, red wine vinegar, olive oil, white sugar, soy sauce, blanched slivered almond. Pour the dressing over the mixture and mix thoroughly but gently. Allow at least 1 hour of refrigeration before serving.
ingredients: chicken-flavored ramen noodles, broccoli, bok choy, green onions, sunflower seeds, red wine vinegar, olive oil, white sugar, soy sauce, blanched slivered almond
name: baby that s good broccoli bok choy salad

steps: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. While butter is melting, in a small bowl combine sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt. Add sliced potatoes to melted butter and turn to coat. Sprinkle sugar mixture over potatoes, stir to coat. Cover skillet, reduce heat to low. Stirring occasionally, cook for 50-60 minutes, or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: butter, sugar, milk, egg, baking powder, flour, cardamom seeds, salt
name: kavring small sugar rusks

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease baking dish. Cook and stir pumpkin, milk, eggs, sugar, salt and cinnamon. Beat eggs, milk, baking mix, salt and pepper until well blended. Pour into baking dish. Bake 25 minutes longer or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Remove foil. Bake 15 minutes longer or until crust is golden brown and a knife inserted near the center comes out clean
ingredients: canned pumpkin, bisquick baking mix, sugar, evaporated milk, butter, pumpkin pie spice, vanilla, eggs, whipped topping
name: impossibly easy pumpkin pie bisquick too easy

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: butter, shallots, green chili pepper, garlic cloves, carrot, vegetable broth, dark soy sauce, salt
name: indonesian stir fried carrots

steps: Combine granulated sugar, water, ginger and zest in small saucepan over medium heat. Add lemon juice and enough cold water to measure 4 cups total. Fill glasses with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves and fresh lemon slices.
ingredients: granulated sugar, water, ginger, fresh lemon juice, lemon, zest of, grapefruit juice, grapefruit, zest of, cornstarch
name: ginger citrus syrup

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper, noodles, nonfat sour cream, parsley. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and parsley. Serve at once.
ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, sirloin steaks, fresh mushrooms, condensed cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, green onion, dried thyme, dried marjoram, cooked noodles
name: mushroom beef stroganoff

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Peel, core and slice apples. Place in a well greased 8x8-inch baking pan. Mix cake mix, oats, sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Melt butter and pour over the top of the dry cake mixture and mix until crumbly. Sprinkle this over apples. Bake 35-40 minutes until golden.
ingredients: apples, brown sugar, flour, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter
name: 1 2 3 apple crisp

steps: Put all but garnish berries in blender. Mix until smooth. Pour immediately into 4 glasses. Garnish with strawberries. Serve at once.
ingredients: watermelon, sugar, lime juice, light rum, mint leaf
name: frozen watermelon daiquiris

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan forced. Place salmon in a baking dish and pour over stock and season, cover with foil and bake for 10 to 15 minutes o until just cooked through. Remove from oven and cool salmon in stock for 10 minutes. Remove the salmon from the stock. Add sour cream, cucumber, wine and tarragon to stock and whisk to combine, season and transfer to a jug. Meanwhile steam potato over a saucepan of simmering water for 8 to 10 minutes or until tender. Place salmon and potato on plates and top salmon with cucumber sauce and tarragon leaves and drizzle oil over potatoes and season and serve.
ingredients: dry white wine, water, lemon juice, salmon fillet, nonfat yogurt, cucumber, dried dill, salt
name: salmon with cucumber dill sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: fresh brussels sprouts, red seedless grapes, walnuts, olive oil, fresh thyme, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar
name: roasted brussels sprouts with grapes and walnuts

steps: Preheat oven to 200 c and put a baking dish in the oven while you preheat it. Meanwhile, separate the cloves from the garlic head but do not peel them. Smash the cloves with a knife. Heat the oil in a pan and add in the garlic. Fry for a couple minutes and put in the pork chops. Season with salt and pepper. Brown for just 1-2 minutes on each side. Put the chops and garlic in the pan that has been heating in the oven. Meanwhile, put the apple in the pan and fry for a couple minutes. Add the wine and let bubble until reduced by half. Pour over the chops and bake for 12-15 minutes, braising with the juice if you like. Take out and serve immediately with your choice of veggies.
ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless pork chops, apple pie filling with cinnamon, seasoned stuffing mix
name: pork chops with apple and stuffing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, white flour, golden syrup, milk, baking soda, cream of tartar, salt
name: scottish brown bread

steps: Place chicken thighs in slow cooker. Combine stock, peanut butter, soy sauce, cilantro, lime juice, chile pepper and ginger. Mix well and pour sauce over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours, until juices run clear when chicken is pierced with a fork. Serve garnished with chopped peanuts and additional fresh cilantro.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, hot salsa, peanut butter, fresh lime juice, soy sauce, gingerroot, peanuts, fresh cilantro
name: thai chicken crock pot

steps: In a heavy saucepan over low heat, whisk together sweetened condensed milk, sugar and cocoa until smooth. Stir the mixture over medium-low heat until it comes to a simmer, continue stirring for 1 minute. Very gradually, whisk in the low-fat milk, stirring to dissolve all the cocoa-sugar mixture. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Pour into individual frozen-treat molds or small paper cups. Freeze until firm.
ingredients: fat-free sweetened condensed milk, unsweetened chocolate, brummel and brown spread, vanilla extract
name: lower calorie quick hot fudge

steps: In a small saucepan, combine the sugar or splenda and cornstarch. Over medium low heat, stir in milk until smooth. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until thick and bubbly. Remove from heat. Stir in the lemon juice, zest and vanilla. Place the pan in a bowl of ice water and stir for 2 minutes to cool. Fold in whipped topping and food coloring if using. Spoon into dessert dishes, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving. Garnish with additional whipped topping if desired.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, butter, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, heavy cream, of fresh mint
name: lemon mousse

steps: Heat butter on a frying pan and fry shallot and garlic until fragrant. Then bottom part of spring onions and star anise. Continue to fry for about 2 minutes. Add rice and stir to mix. Finally add the upper part of spring onions and some salt to taste. Continue to stir until all ingredients are thoroughly mixed.
ingredients: brown rice, beef consomme, water, onion, butter
name: buttered brown rice

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: ground chuck, onion, green pepper, fresh tomatoes, rotel tomatoes, salt & pepper, corn tortillas, ranch style beans, velveeta cheese, cream of chicken soup
name: mexican meat pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In large bowl, blend egg noodles, frozen green peas, condensed cream of mushroom soup, tuna, onion, processed cheese, ground black pepper. Turn into greased 2-quart baking dish. Bake 30 minutes or until bubbling.
ingredients: egg noodles, frozen green peas, condensed cream of mushroom soup, tuna, onion, processed cheese, ground black pepper
name: quick and easy tuna casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 500. In a bowl mix olive oil, minced garlic, basil and parmesan cheese and set aside. Cover a cookie sheet with tinfoil. Spray covered cookie sheet with non stick stray so fish will not stick. Place trout fillets on covered cookie sheet about 1 inch apart. Spoon mixture you reserved in bowl over fish. About 1 tablespoon full spreading evenly over fish. Place a couple of lemon slice over top of mixture on fish. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes. No need to add salt as parmesan will add salt to recipe. Wonderful served with a side salad or pasta.
ingredients: orecchiette, fennel bulbs, olive oil, capers, lemon, trout fillets, fresh parsley
name: smoked trout lemon fennel pasta

steps: In a dutch oven, bring 4 cups water to a boil. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Remove from the heat. Add tea bags. Steep for 5-8 minutes. Discard tea bags. Stir in juice concentrates and remaining water. Serve over ice.
ingredients: granulated sugar, water, oranges, juice of, lemon, juice of, red cinnamon candies, pineapple juice, cranberry juice
name: christmas tea

steps: In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce and black pepper until well combined. Add in garlic pieces and green onion. Add in the chicken strips and toss with the marinade to combine well. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 8-24 hours. Remove the chicken strips and discard the marinade. Thread chicken on the wooden skewers piercing at least 3 times through the skewers. Grill over medium heat.
ingredients: soy sauce, honey, olive oil, lime, garlic cloves, chili-garlic sauce, red pepper flakes, fresh cilantro, boneless chicken breast, salt
name: honey lime chicken skewers

steps: Boil turkey cutlets, sharp cheddar cheese, white wine, dry vegetable soup mix, garlic powder, pepper, tabasco sauce, half-and-halfbake at 375 for 12-15 minutes or until golden. Let cool slightly. Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve warm.
ingredients: turkey cutlets, sharp cheddar cheese, white wine, dry vegetable soup mix, garlic powder, pepper, tabasco sauce, half-and-half
name: turkey and cheese roll ups with white wine cream sauce

steps: Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine salad dressing mix and water. Pour over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Stir in mushrooms, pour over chicken, and cook 1 hour longer or until chicken juices run clear. Serve over rice or noodles.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, italian salad dressing mix, water, cream cheese, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, cooked pasta, oregano leaves
name: italian cream cheese chicken

steps: In 2-qt saucepan, combine butter, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, white sugar, paprika, salt, cayenne pepper, boneless pork, hamburger buns. Cook over medium heat, stirring often, for about 10 minutes. Add pork and toss gently to distribute. Continue cooking over medium heat for additional 5 minutes. Spoon pork onto buns or rolls and serve.
ingredients: butter, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, white sugar, paprika, salt, cayenne pepper, boneless pork, hamburger buns
name: tangy sliced pork sandwiches

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned.
ingredients: pork sausage, crescent roll dough, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt and pepper
name: sausage brunch casserole

steps: Mix together mayo, sour cream and garlic powder. Mash the eggs with a fork and drain the chicken well. Chop the onion very finely. Mix everything together and layer between the bread slices. Add lettuce, tomato as desired.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, teriyaki sauce, hawaiian sweet bread, pineapple rings, green leaf lettuce, pepper rings
name: grilled hawaiian chicken sandwich

steps: Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking.
ingredients: chicken pieces, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, roasted red pepper, fresh rosemary, chicken broth, cornstarch, fresh basil
name: corsican chicken with sun dried tomatoes

steps: Mix together the feta cheese, lemon juice and zest and pepper in small bowl. Drizzle over vegetables. Top with feta. Serve.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, onion, cucumber, black olives, olive oil, salt and pepper, chili pepper, feta cheese
name: greek inspired salad

steps: In a large nonstick pan cook chicken in hot oil over medium heat for 4 to 5 minutes. Turn chicken and add zucchini. Cook for 4 minutes or until chicken is tender and no longer pink and squash is tender. Spread pesto over chicken and sprinkle with cheese and sun dried tomatoes. Let that just warm and serve onto plates.
ingredients: chicken breasts, basil pesto, olive oil, cheese, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, mixed herbs, lemon
name: chicken breast with pesto and vegetables

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Stir together oil & garlic, then using a pastry brush, brush one side of each bread slice with the oil mixture. Place bread slices on a baking sheet & bake about 10 minutes or until tops of bread slices are golden brown. Meanwhile, in medium bowl, toss together eggs, apple, walnuts & salad dressing. Top each toasted bread slice with some of the peaches, roma tomatoes, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, baguette. Serve immediately.
ingredients: red pepper, peaches, roma tomatoes, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, baguette
name: peach and roasted red pepper bruschetta

steps: Combine all ingredients in a shallow bowl. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes.
ingredients: chicken breasts, fresh white breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, eggs, butter, salt and pepper, mayonnaise, sour cream, garlic clove
name: golden parmesan chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease baking sheet and set aside. Cream with electric mixer sugar and shortening until fluffly. Add in eggs and potatoes and mix well. In separate bowl mix flour, cocoa, cinnamon, baking powder, and nutmeg. Add to creamed mixture in stages so does not fly everywhere when mixer is turned on. Drop by rounded tablespoonful onto greased baking sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: cocoa powder, sugar, cinnamon, ground cloves, salt
name: spiced cocoa

steps: Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: cooking spray, asparagus spears, salt, black pepper, butter, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar
name: roasted asparagus with balsamic vinegar

steps: Mix cream cheese and cheese whiz together and blend well. Then add butter, green olives, green onion, walnuts, and mix well. Then add walnuts and mix well. Serve with crackers.
ingredients: cream cheese, butter, green olives, green onion, walnuts
name: better than sex cheese ball

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired.
ingredients: red potatoes, cornstarch, garlic powder, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, unsalted butter, garlic clove, parsley, lemon zest
name: perfect roasted potatoes with garlic

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the onions in a large baking dish. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green peppers alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: onions, red wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh rosemary, fresh rosemary leaf
name: roasted rosemary onions

steps: In the crock pot, soak the dried fruits and ginger in the beer for 1 to 2 hours. Stir in brown sugar, cinnamon, and honey. Brown meat in oil over medium high heat. Place the meat on top of the fruit in the crock pot. Cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours, or on high for 5 to 6 hours.
ingredients: pot roast, vegetable oil, fresh ground black pepper, soy sauce, water, cabbage, flour
name: asian pot roast

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Remove stem end of tomato and cut tomato into several large chunks, then coarsely chop. Stack salami slices, two at a time and cut into small wedges. Arrange the triangles on a flat baking stone or pizza pan so they do not touch. Sprinkle triangles with equal amounts of tomato, salami, cheese and oregano. Bake 15-18 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
ingredients: scalloped potatoes mix, tomatoes, water, oregano leaves, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese
name: pizza potatoes

steps: In a crockpot place the onions, bell pepper on the bottom. Add the sweet potatoes, peas and canned tomatoes, sprinkle with the thyme and the hot sauce, tuck the bay leaf into the juices. Place the leftover pork roast on top and cover with the leftover gravy. Cook on low for about 6 hours, or on high for 3 hours. Just until the flavors are melded and the onions and bell peppers are cooked. Serve with hot crusty bread and a salad. This can be done on top of the stove or baked as a casserole also.
ingredients: stewed tomatoes, onion, bell pepper, garlic clove, salt pork, flour, olive oil
name: pastor grant s redneck tomato gravy

steps: Place tomatoes in a medium bowl. Set aside. In a small bowl, combine oil and vinegar. Add parsley, basil, oregano, salt and sugar. Mix well. Pour over the tomatoes. Cover and refrigerate for at least 3 hours. Drain. Serve on bed of lettuce if desired.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, sugar, water, fresh gingerroot, lemons, pickling salt
name: sweet pickled cherry tomatoes

steps: Combine cream cheese, celery, cucumber, onion, eggs, mayonnaise, lemon jell-o gelatin, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream
ingredients: cream cheese, celery, cucumber, onion, eggs, mayonnaise, lemon jell-o gelatin
name: amish after easter hard boiled egg veggie cream cheese salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil, butter, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil,
ingredients: scallion, pecans, breadcrumbs, flour, salt, pepper, egg, milk, opakapaka fillets, oil
name: pecan crusted opakapaka

steps: Place chicken in crock pot. Sprinkle each breast with seasoning. Place a slice of cheese on each. Combine soup and sour cream in a saucepan and heat through enough to be well blended. Spoon over chicken. Sprinkle stuffing mix on top. Drizzle melted butter evenly over stuffing. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours.
ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, tomatoes, green onions, celery, zucchini, cream of chicken and mushroom soup, worcestershire sauce, dried parsley
name: springtime chicken supper

steps: Cook beef, onion and pepper in skillet until meat is browned and vegetables are tender. Drain. Stir in tomato sauce, seasoned salt, and pepper. Blend cottage cheese and cream cheese together until fluffy. Spoon noodles into grease 10x6x2 inch baking dish. Spread cheese mixture over noodles. Pour meat sauce on top. Bake uncovered at 350 for 30 to 40 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: ground beef, cream of chicken soup, water, noodles, onion powder, salt, pepper, day-old white bread, butter
name: ground beef noodle cream of chicken soup casserole

steps: Ina bowl, combine allthe ingredients except the butter, mustard, worcestershire sauce, hamburger buns, swiss cheese, garlic salt with parsley. Spread buns with mayonnaise, and topping of your choice. Spread buns with mayonnaise, and topping
ingredients: butter, mustard, worcestershire sauce, hamburger buns, swiss cheese, garlic salt with parsley
name: hamburger bun toasts

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the peppers until soft and golden. Stir in the chilies, sweet potatoes and carrots. Add stock. Cover and bring to a boil. Simmer for 20 minutes or until all vegetables are tender. Puree the soup, in batches if necessary, then return to the pan. Season and if necessary, add a bit of water to adjust the consistency. Serve with crusty bread.
ingredients: red bell peppers, vegetable oil, onions, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, salt, canned tomatoes, reduced-fat coconut milk, water
name: roasted red pepper coconut soup

steps: Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour covered.
ingredients: cornish hen, sage, poultry seasoning, adobo seasoning, dill weed, black pepper, butter
name: herbed cornish hen

steps: Place the cornbread mixture on top of double boiler. Place over hot water and heat the milk until hot. Combine cornbread, salt and cold water and stir until smooth. Add to the hot milk, stirring constantly and cook for 10 minutes or until thickened. Cover and cook for about 30 minutes longer. Divide and put in 2 medium size loaf pans. Slice and fry in hot oil when cooled.
ingredients: cornbread, celery, onions, eggs, chicken broth, salt, pepper, ground sage
name: mom s cornbread dressing

steps: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes. Cool 15 minutes before cutting.
ingredients: serrano peppers, habanero pepper, chorizo sausage, cream cheese, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, pepper bacon
name: atomic buffalo turds

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Slice top off bread, clean out round. Reserve top and cut scooped out bread into cubes. Mix all ingredients and fill bread cavity. Wrap bread in foil and bake for 1 hour. Meanwhile spread cubes on cookie sheet and crisp on lower rack uncovered about 10 minutes. Remove bread from foil, stir carefully. Surround with toasted cubes to dip.
ingredients: french bread, light mayonnaise, bell peppers, green onions, cherry tomatoes, cilantro leaves, fresh cilantro, colby-monterey jack cheese
name: southwest cheese bread

steps: Bring milk and oil to a boil in a small saucepan. Add to the manioc. Mix and allow to cool a little. Incorporate the eggs, one at a time. Add the cheese and blend well. Divide into pieces the size of a walnut or small plum. Place a little oil on the hands and round dough into balls. Arrange on a baking sheet. Bake at 375 degrees farenheit until done, about 10 to 12 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: manioc starch, milk, margarine, salt, parmesan cheese, eggs
name: pao de queijo cheese puffs brazilian

steps: In a heatproof jug, mix the jello powder with the boiling water until dissolved. Add the cold water and pineapple juice. Put in the fridge for about an hour, until starting to set but not set yet. Add the fruit, evenly scattered through the jello. Put back in the fridge until completely set. Add ice cubes. Cover and blend until smooth. Cover and blend until nearly smooth. If desired, garnish each serving with reserved fruit.
ingredients: fresh peaches, crushed pineapple, sugar, orange jell-o
name: peach pineapple orange marmalade

steps: Preheat oven to 475f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until spinach wilts. Toss before serving.
ingredients: chicken legs, yoghurt, red chili powder, salt, ginger-garlic paste, red pepper flakes, tikka powder, olive oil
name: oven roasted chicken tikka

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Beat egg. Add remaining ingredients except granulated sugar and mix well. Press dough into ungreased 13x9x2 inch pan. Sprinkle granulated sugar evenly over bars. Bake 15 to 20 minutes. Cool slightly. Cut into bars. Cool completely. Remove from pan and store in airtight container.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, pecans, egg, butter, lingonberry preserves
name: lingonberry bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper. In a large mixing bowl, combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar. Mix well. Pour dressing over salad mixture, stirring well. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend.
ingredients: broccoli florets, seedless grapes, celery, raisins, unsalted sunflower seed kernels, light mayonnaise, plain fat-free yogurt, sugar, white wine vinegar
name: broccoli salad lite

steps: Cut tuna in 2cm wide x 6 cm long batons. Combine soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic clove, salt and pepper. Brush onto tuna strip. Season with salt and pepper. Lay spring roll wrapper on work bench. Place piece of tuna at one end, roll up and half way fold in sides then roll up completely. Seal ends with water. Repeat. Heat oil in wok and shallow fry a few at a time until golden brown. Drain on paper towel and serve.
ingredients: tuna, rice paper sheets, green leaf lettuce, hoisin sauce, carrots, bean sprouts, fresh coriander, green onion, peanut sauce
name: tuna rolls sandwiches

steps: In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm.
ingredients: butter, sugar, milk, vanilla
name: milk frosting

steps: Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the flour. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in a greased 8x8 baking dish,. Making sure not to lay them flat. They should have the same shape as they were in the package. In a small bowl, mix the honey, soy sauce, garlic and seasonings. Pour evenly over the chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce. Serve.
ingredients: chicken thighs, lemons, butter, honey, fresh rosemary, garlic powder, sea salt, black pepper
name: honey rosemary and lemon baked chicken

steps: In a small saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: coconut water, lime juice, sugar, mango, pineapple rum
name: fruited coconut limeade

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a small bowl combine soy sauce, vinegar, brown sugar, garlic powder and black pepper. Stir or whisk until well blended. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking. Remove chicken and stir gravy.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, flour, salt and pepper, butter, crabmeat, asparagus spears, hollandaise sauce mix
name: chicken oscar

steps: Mix first 3 ingredients in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil stirring entire time. Boil until candy thermometer hits 234 degrees, stirring entire time. Remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir until chocolate and marshmallows are dissolved. Pour in buttered 8x8 pan. Chill 30 minutes, cut with buttered knife. Chill again until set.
ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, mini marshmallows, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla
name: easy no fail chocolate fudge no thermometer

steps: Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
ingredients: egg, onion, ham, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, vegetable oil, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper
name: garbage for breakfast

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. For sauce combine soup, mayo, lemon juice and curry powder in a bowl. In bottom of 13x9x2-inch baking dish layer frozen broccoli, chicken, and sauce. Sprinkle with grated cheese and breadcrumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Can be eaten plain or on top of rice.
ingredients: chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, curry powder, lemon juice, broccoli, cheddar cheese, cooked rice, buttered bread crumb
name: chicken curry casserole

steps: Place cabbage, cored end up, on top rack of grill, close lid and smoke until soft. Wrap cabbage with heavy duty aluminum foil. Place cabbage, cored end up, on top rack of grill, close lid and smoke until soft. Wrap cabbage, cored end up, on top rack of grill, close lid and smoke until soft. Wrap cabbage, cored end up, on top rack
ingredients: cabbage, potatoes, water, bacon drippings, salt, pepper
name: cabbage with potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a large skillet, brown chicken on both sides in butter. Combine the teriyaki sauce, water, marmalade, and garlic in a bowl. Pour over chicken. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the juices run clear on the chicken. I was thinking of trying this with sugar free marmalade for a more diabetic friendly recipe.
ingredients: brown sugar, vinegar, pineapple chunks, onion, boneless chicken breasts, cornstarch, soy sauce, green pepper, oil
name: audrey s oriental chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 160 c. Grease small baking dish with the butter. Cut a cross in the bottom of each peach. Place cross side up in dish. Top each peach with vanilla seeds. Drizzle evenly with honey. Pour wine into dish around peaches. Bake 45 minutes or till tender. Serve with ice cream.
ingredients: fresh peaches, sugar, lemon juice, salt, cool whip
name: creole peach dip

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with tomato in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: fresh rosemary, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper, tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese
name: mozzarella tomato stacks with rosemary

steps: Heat 1 tbs oil in a saucepan and fry peas for approx 2 minutes, making sure not to brown the peas. Add salt and tsp of turmeric. Bring to boil then lower heat and cook for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring once or twice. Heat oil in another saucepan and fry peas for approx 2 minute, making sure not to brown the peas. Add onions and fry till onions start to pop. Add salt and tsp of
ingredients: split peas, water, turmeric powder, garlic cloves, onion, salt, oil, cumin seed, pepper sauce
name: trinidadian dhal

steps: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Add garlic. Saut until pale golden, stirring every 5 minutes, about 15 minutes. Increase heat to medium. Add potatoes. Cook until pale golden, stirring every 5 minutes, about 15 minutes. Stir in bell pepper. Cook until potatoes are tender and golden, stirring every 5 minutes, about 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to bowl.
ingredients: red potatoes, red bell pepper, butter, garlic powder, salt
name: zip and steam red potatoes with butter and garlic

steps: Boil eggs and peel while still warm. Cut eggs lengthwise, remove yolks to a separate bowl. Mash yolks and add miracle whip to your favorite consistency. Add paprika, salt and pepper to taste. Stuff egg whites, and sprinkle more paprika on top. Chill.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, cream cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, paprika, salt, black pepper
name: creamy deviled eggs

steps: Clean and remove stems of ez est stuffed mushrooms my bestest.
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, brown and serve sausages, parmesan cheese, butter
name: ez est stuffed mushrooms my bestest

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine milk chocolate candy bars, chocolate syrup, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, butterm
ingredients: milk chocolate candy bars, chocolate syrup, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, buttermilk
name: milk chocolate bundt cake

steps: Slice the sandwich in half and cook to a crisp. Drain on paper towel, and pour drippings out of pan. Whip egg with water, add salt and pepper and scramble eggs in same pan in which the bacon was cooked. Remove egg to cool. After bread has toasted, spread with mayo and layer on eggs and bacon. Slice and serve with favorite breakfast beverage.
ingredients: bacon, monterey jack cheese, white bread, mayonnaise, tomatoes, butter lettuce, unsalted butter, egg
name: blt fried egg and cheese sandwich

steps: Preheat the oven to 400. Place the cut root vegetables in a single layer on one or two large baking sheets. Stir together the oil, maple syrup and garlic cloves and drizzle over the vegetables. Stir to combine the oil with the veggies and then spread once again in a single layer on the baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for about 1 hour until the vegetables are done and a little caramelized from the syrup. Serve immediately.
ingredients: turnip, parsnips, rutabaga, yukon gold potatoes, chevre cheese, unsalted butter, chives, salt and pepper
name: smashed roots and tubers with chevre

steps: Melt butter in a heavy saucepan over low heat. Add flour, stirring until smooth. Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually add milk. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until mixture is thickened and bubbly. Stir in cheddar cheese, salt, dry mustard, and paprika. Gradually stir approx one-fourth of hot mixture into beaten egg. Add to remaining hot mixture. Cook mixture over low heat 1 minute. Serve over toast points.
ingredients: eggs, beer, butter, sharp cheddar cheese, dry mustard, salt, cayenne, worcestershire sauce, toast
name: cheddar cheese rarebit

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter 9 inch fluted or plain tube pan. In large bowl of electric mixer, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs, eggnog, and vanilla. Stir together flour, bakng powder, and salt. Gradually beat into butter mixture. Prepare topping by combining nuts, sugar and cinnamon. Scatter half the topping evenly over bottom of pan. Spoon in half batter. Add remaining topping and spoon on remaining batter. Bake 50 to 60 minute, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, shortening, egg, milk, vanilla, butter
name: quick coffee cake

steps: Preheat oven to 375f and butter and flour a 9-inch cake pan with high sides, line bottom with parchment paper. Finely grind almonds with 2 tablespoons of sugar in food processor. Mix yolks, 2 tablespoons sugar, lemon zest, cinnamon and a pinch of salt in a bowl until thick and smooth. Add almond mixture, stir. Separately beat egg whites until soft peaks form, then gradually add 4 tablespoons sugar, beating until egg whites are stiff but not dry. Fold half of egg whites gently into almond mixture, then add other half and finish folding in gently. Transfer to prepared pan. Bake until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, about 30-35 minutes. Cool on rack, turn out onto serving platter.
ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, self raising flour, eggs, baking powder, ground ginger, orange zest, lime marmalade, chocolate sprinkles
name: lightly spiced citrus wonder cake

steps: In a large pot filled with boiling water, blanch potatoes for 10 seconds. With a slotted spoon, transfer potatoes to colander to cool. Peel, seed and quarter potatoes. In a medium frying pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden, 4-5 minutes. In a blender or food processor, puree potatoes, onion, pumpkin and broth until smooth. Transfer to a large saucepan. Add sherry, salt, pepper and tarragon. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Add cream and heat through, about 3 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: pumpkin, potato, sweet potato, onions, curry powder, cumin, garlic, chicken stock
name: wendy s pumpkin soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, dried cranberries, pecans, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, milk
name: cranberry pecan muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large baking dish, melt butter in the oven. Remove the dish from the oven and add the salt, garlic and black pepper. Meanwhile, wash the shrimp, leaving the shells on. Add the shrimp to the butter mixture and stir well to coat. Bake for 15-18 minutes.
ingredients: water, scotch bonnet peppers, green onions, fresh thyme sprigs, garlic cloves, salt, bay leaf, whole allspice, large shrimp
name: peel and eat hot pepper shrimp

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine ground beef, bread crumbs, egg, onion, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl, mixing lightly but thoroughly. Shape mixture into 32 1-inch meatballs. Place on rack in broiler pan and bake 18 to 20 minuntes. Do not overbake for they will become dry. Meanwhile, combine hot pepper sauce, butter and honey in a small saucepan. Simmer, low, for about 5 minutes until sauce has thickened and has reduced by about half. Place meatballs into a bowl and pour sauce mixture over, stirring to coat well. Serve meatballs with blue cheese dressing.
ingredients: butter, celery, onion, red pepper, chopped tomatoes, white wine, flour, beef stock cube, salt & pepper, parmesan cheese
name: hot parma dip meatball sauce

steps: Heat oil in 2-quart saucepan. Add onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes, until onion wilts. Stir in cumin and pepper. Continue to cook for 2-3 minutes. Add oregano, potatoes, green chilies and chicken broth. Bring to a boil and simmer slowly for 45 minutes. Serve hot with cheese sprinkled in the middle of bowl.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, olive oil, avocados, low-fat chicken broth, green peppercorns in brine, salt and pepper, cilantro leaf
name: avocado soup with green peppercorns

steps: Mix marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold.
ingredients: chicken wings, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, five-spice powder, vegetable oil, salt, fresh black pepper, garlic cloves, liquid honey
name: five spices chicken wings

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. Bake in preheated oven
ingredients: flour, salt, baking powder, dry milk, warm water, shortening
name: seneca ghost bread

steps: Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions.
ingredients: chicken legs, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, orange juice, navel oranges, fresh ginger, white vinegar, dried basil
name: sauteed orange chicken with ginger

steps: Drain the fruit and serve immediately with a spoonful of mascarpone.
ingredients: fruit, peaches, macaroons, orange juice, lemon, zest of, egg whites, caster sugar, vanilla essence, mint leaf
name: fruit gratin

steps: Pour a measure of whisky into a large glass with a stem. Warm the whisky carefully over a candle or a spirit burner and set it alight. Let it burn for a moment, after which kahlua and hot coffee without sugar should be added. Then carefully pour in a thick layer of gently whipped cream. Finally, add burning grand marnier from a large sauce spoon lifted high above the glass preferably in a dark room so that the blue grand marnier flame is clearly visible.
ingredients: baileys irish cream, irish whiskey, coffee, whipped cream, maraschino cherry
name: irish cream coffee

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, combine tomato, basil, olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper in mixing bowl. Drain pasta and place in large serving bowl. Top with tomato mixture, sprinkle with feta cheese and olives. Serve.
ingredients: tomatoes, fresh basil, olive oil, garlic clove, salt, pepper, linguine, parmesan cheese
name: linguini with fresh tomatoes and basil

steps: Wash gaaaaarlic jelly thoroughly and divide into 2. Take the leaves from one bunch, squeeze out the surplus water and chop finely. Put vinegar and sugar into a saucepan with the second bunch of mint and stir over a low heat until the sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil for 1 minute. Strain syrup through a muslin and return to the saucepan. Stir in the certo, bring to the boil and boil for 2 minutes. Add the chopped mint, garlic and chilli. Allow to cool slightly to prevent the mint from floating. Skim, pot and cover in the usual way.
ingredients: butter, garlic, sugar, apple cider vinegar, liquid pectin
name: gaaaaarlic jelly

steps: Sprinkle meat with salt. Add garlic and oregano to blended chili. Pour over meat and marinate in refrigerator 6-8 hours or overnight.
ingredients: whole green chilies, cream cheese, flank steak, salsa verde
name: carne rellenos

steps: Spread beans on a 10-inch serving platter. Blend sour cream and dressing mix together. Spread over beans. Layer remaining ingredients. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: refried beans, salsa, guacamole, sour cream, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, black olives, green onions, tortilla chips
name: easy light 7 layer dip

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, heat the oil and saute the onion until golden, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic ands rice and stir until coated with oil. Stir in the broth, lemon juice, split peas, cinnamon, cumin, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then turn the heat down to a simmer. Cover and cook 45-50 minutes, or until all the liquid is absorbed and the rice and peas are tender. Let stand, covered 10 minutes, then serve hot.
ingredients: yellow split peas, onion, garlic clove, extra virgin olive oil, fresh oregano, salt & pepper, oregano, biscuit
name: mediterranean split pea dip

steps: In a medium saucepan over high heat, bring the vegetable broth and the water to a boil. Slowly pour the cornmeal into the hot liquid, wisking constantly. Stir in the salt. Lower the heat to cook the mixture at a gentle simmer. Cook, stirring frequently, until the cornmeal is creamy and not grainy, about 30 minutes. Remove the polenta from the heat and stir in scallion. Polenta can be served soft, or poured into a baking pan to cool. Once cooled, polenta can then be cut into solid squares.
ingredients: half-and-half, water, salt, cornmeal, unsalted butter, parmesan cheese, fresh ground black pepper
name: 7 minute rich and creamy polenta

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips.
ingredients: cream cheese, italian seasoning, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce, green peppers, green onions, tortilla chips
name: cheesy hot pizza dip

steps: In large bowl, combine nectarines, orange marmalade, margarine, orange juice, chocolate fudge topping. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. Brush top crust with beaten egg and sprinkle with sugar. Bake 15 minutes longer.
ingredients: nectarines, orange marmalade, margarine, orange juice, chocolate fudge topping
name: glazed nectarines with chocolate sauce

steps: Whisk 2 tablespoons olive oil, pressed garlic cloves and oregano in medium bowl to blend. Season with salt and pepper. Add sea scallops and toss to coat with oil mixture. Prepare barbecue or preheat broiler. Alternate 3 scallops, 3 lemon slices and 2 bay leaves on each skewer. Grill or broil brochettes until scallops are golden brown and just cooked through, about 4 minutes per side. Transfer to plates and serve.
ingredients: sea scallops, lemon juice, fresh parsley, orange rind, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, olive oil
name: citrus scallops

steps: Place the rice in a large bowl and add cold water to cover by 3 inches. Swirl around with your fingers until the water becomes cloudy, then pour through a strainer to drain. Repeat this process until the water remains clear. This will take 4 to 6 rinsings. Place the rice, salt and the 6 cups water in a deep, nonstick saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer the rice gently, uncovered, for about 18 minutes. When the rice has absorbed all the water, reduce the heat to the lowest possible setting and sprinkle the butter pieces over the top. Wrap a clean kitchen towel around the pot lid, piling any excess cloth on top of the lid. Place the cloth-covered lid over the rice and steam for 20 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat and let stand, covered, 5 minutes. Gently fluff the rice with a fork and serve immediately.
ingredients: basmati rice, vermicelli, hot chicken broth, salt, vegetable oil
name: arabic rice

steps: Place tofu on a cooling rack with a baking pan underneath to catch excess liquid. Bake for 10 minutes, turn tofu and bake for another 15 minutes, or until the edges start to brown. Remove tofu from the water and drain the saucepan. Place tofu on a cooling rack with a baking pan underneath to catch excess liquid. Bake for 10 minutes, turn tofu
ingredients: peanut butter, hot water, cider vinegar, low sodium soy sauce, sesame oil, broccoli, garlic cloves, firm tofu
name: tofu and broccoli stir fry

steps: Place the raspberries and tea bags in a large glass bowl. Pour the boiling water over the berries and tea bags. Cover and let stand for 5 minutes. Remove the tea bags. Strain the berries from the mixture, then discard them. Cool for a few hours. If desired, chill the tea. Serve in tall glasses, with ice cubes, a few more berries, and a wedge or slice of orange, lemon, or lime, if desired.
ingredients: boiling water, tea bags, mint leaf, sugar, cranberry-raspberry juice, ice, fresh raspberry, lemon slice
name: raspberry mint tea

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: eggs, water, olive oil, onion, garlic, swiss chard, fresh basil, boneless skinless salmon, parmesan cheese
name: swiss chard and salmon frittata

steps: In a large bowl, combine kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannellini, salt, macaroni, parmesan cheese, cooked macaronipreparation:In a large bowl, combine kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannellini, salt, macaroni, parmesan cheese, cooked macaronipreparation:In a large bowl, combine kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannellini, salt, macaroni, parmesan cheese, cooked macaronipreparation:In a large bowl, combine kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannellini, salt, macaroni, parmesan cheese, cooked macaronipreparation:In a large bowl, combine kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannellini, salt, macaroni, parmesan cheese, cooked macaronipreparation:In a large bowl, combine kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannellini, salt, macaroni, parmesan cheese, cooked macaronipreparation:In a large bowl, combine kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannellini, salt, macaroni, parmesan cheese, cooked macaronipreparation:In a large bowl, combine kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannellini, salt, macaroni, parmesan cheese, cooked macaronipreparation:In a large bowl, combine kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannell
ingredients: kale, vegetable broth, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, cannellini, salt, macaroni, parmesan cheese
name: macaroni with kale and white beans

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Prepare pastry. In a large mixing bowl, add the blackberries and sugar & cinnamon. Toss to coat. Next add the cornstarch & lightly mix. Place filling into pastry lined pie pan. Sprinkle lemon juice over filling & dot with butter. Cover the filling with the top pie crust. Trim the excess crust off around the pie and seal. Cut slits in top of pie crust. Bake 50-60 minutes or until crust is golden brown & juice begins to bubble through the slits in crust. Cool completely before slicing.
ingredients: blackberry, water, salt, sugar
name: stewed blackberries

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Coat 8 muffin cups with pam. Mix sugar and cinnamon in small bowl. Dip each marshmallow in melted margarine and roll in sugar mix. Separate dough into triangles. Wrap one triangle around each marshmallow and pinch dough together. Place each one in a muffin cup. Drizzle extra margarine over rolls. Bake 8-12 minutes.
ingredients: rhodes frozen rolls, butter, parmesan cheese, dried parsley, garlic powder
name: magelby s rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and grease an 88x2 pan or 12 muffin tins. Melt butter in a sauce pan or in a 1 quart container in the microwave. Remove from heat. Add cocoa until blended, then add sugar and mix well. Add eggs, one at a time. Stir in vanilla, flour, salt & xanthan gum do not overmix. Bake 25-30 minutes. Cool and serve.
ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking cocoa, baking powder, salt, vanilla chip, macadamia nuts
name: snow flurry brownies

steps: In a large wok, heat oil with red pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Cover and continue cooking until green beans are tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.
ingredients: hoisin sauce, orange, juice of, light soy sauce, olive oil, green beans, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh chives, sesame seeds
name: hoisin roasted green beans

steps: Cut tuna in 2cm wide x 6 cm long batons. Combine soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic clove, salt and pepper. Brush onto tuna strip. Season with salt and pepper. Lay spring roll wrapper on work bench. Place piece of tuna at one end, roll up and half way fold in sides then roll up completely. Seal ends with water. Repeat. Heat oil in wok and shallow fry a few at a time until golden brown. Drain on paper towel and serve.
ingredients: chunk light tuna, american cheese, coleslaw dressing, salad dressing, onion, salt and pepper
name: tuna surprise rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 200c combine the peach, peach and 2 tablespoons of sugar in a medium bowl. Spray four 185ml capacity ramekins or ovenproof dishes with olive oil spray to lightly grease. Place a pastry disc on top of each ramekin and gently press the edges to seal. Use a 9cm-diameter round pastry cutter to cut 4 discs from the pastry. Use a fork to prick the pastry of each pie. Brush the pies with egg and sprinkle over the remaining sugar. Place the pies on a baking tray and bake in oven for 20-25 minutes or until the pastry is golden brown. Serve the pies immediately with cream.
ingredients: peach gelatin, boiling water, cream cheese, vanilla yogurt, graham cracker pie crust, peaches, peach jam, frozen whipped topping
name: peach yogurt pie

steps: Place cream cheese in a mixing bowl and whip with an electric mixer until fluffy. Add dressing, milk and dill weed. Mix well until well blended. Stir in cucumber and onion. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour to allow flavor to blend.
ingredients: cream cheese, light sour cream, plain yogurt, fresh dill, english cucumber, green onions, pepper, salt
name: creamy cucumber dip

steps: Boil toomato juice if making spicy. You can add the spices in a boil bag or use ground. Add lemon juice and fine zest. Stir in pectin. Bring to a boil. Stir in sugar until dissolve. Bring to a rolling boil. Boil 4 minutes. If making hot jelly add tabasco now. Let stand a minute. Skim. Pour into jars.
ingredients: water, tea bags, juice, sugar, liquid pectin
name: basic tea jelly

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add eggs and sauté for 5 minutes. Add mayonnaise and sauté for another 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper and cook for another 5 minutes. Add more salt and pepper and cook for another 5 minutes. Add more salt and pepper and cook
ingredients: olive oil, onions, eggs, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, oil-cured black olive, salt and pepper
name: caramelized onion and egg salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a small loaf pan with non stick coating. In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg. In another small bowl, combine the liquid egg product, applesauce and zucchini. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and using an electric mixer, mix until well blended. Pour mixture into loaf pan and spread evenly- can sprinkle a little sugar and cinnamon on top if desired. Bake 45-50 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: zucchini, sugar, sugar substitute, vanilla, flour, wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, baking cocoa
name: fat free zucchini brownies

steps: Cook tuna in water, cheese, mushroom, olive, salad dressing until well blended. Refrigerate 3 hours or until chilled.
ingredients: tuna in water, cheese, mushroom, olive, salad dressing
name: revolutionary tuna salad no mayonnaise

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and sprinkle with pepper flakes. Stir fry 3 minutes. Add vegetables and teriyaki sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender and chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: dry sherry, ginger, garlic cloves, dry crushed red pepper, low sodium chicken broth, cornstarch, soy sauce, chili-garlic sauce, sugar
name: szechuan sauce

steps: In a large saucepan over low heat, melt margarine. Add chili powder, garlic salt, and onion powder. Stir to mix well. In a large bowl, pour margarine mixture over popped popcorn. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and toss to coat well. Bake for 30 minutes at 325 degrees. Garnish with cheddar cheese.
ingredients: whole kernel corn, cream cheese, diced green chilies, cheddar cheese, milk, butter
name: hot and spicy corn

steps: Sprinkle salt and pepper over the beet mixture. Add the goat cheese mixture and stir until the mixture is smooth and creamy. Add the basil leaves and stir. Add the
ingredients: beets, water, salt, pepper, olive oil, garlic, baby spinach, balsamic vinegar, goat cheese, basil leaves
name: roasted beet spinach goat cheese mix

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse chicken breasts and pat dry. Place one chicken breast in the middle of each sheet of foil wrap or parchment paper. Spoon one fourth of the salsa, black beans and sweetcorn on each of the four chicken breasts. Seal each pack by bringing up sides and folding the top edge over twice. Seal the edges in the same way, leaving enough room for heat to circulate inside. Place packs on a cookie sheet and cook for 20 minutes. Unseal packs carefully. Remove from oven and let cool on cookie sheet.
ingredients: chicken, hash browns, cheddar cheese, sour cream
name: southwestern chicken and hashbrowns

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine grits, water, salt, velveeta cheese, garlic cheese spread, margarine, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, paprika, parmesan cheese, french breadpreparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine grits, water, salt, velveeta cheese, garlic cheese spread, margarine, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, paprika, parmesan cheese, french breadpreparation:
ingredients: grits, water, salt, velveeta cheese, garlic cheese spread, margarine, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, paprika
name: garlic grits southern style

steps: Mix and set aside the butter and soda. In a large pan, mix and boil the sugar, water, and syrup to hardball stage. Add peanuts and stir constantly until mixture turns yellow about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add butter mixture and vanilla. Pour onto greased cookie sheet. Pat into a thickness you like with the back of a spoon. Cool and break into pieces. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: sugar, white karo, water, peanuts, butter, salt, baking soda
name: mom s peanut brittle

steps: Place the vinegar, sugar, and salt in a medium saucepan and heat, stirring until the sugar has completely dissolved. Boil for around 6-7 minutes or until a thin syrup has formed. Squeeze the grated cucumber to remove most of the liquid. When the syrup has cooled, add the cucumber, red onion, jalepeno, garlic, peanuts and cilantro. Mix together thoroughly. Serve at room temperature with fried or boiled shrimp, coconut shrimp, egg rolls, meat sate etc.
ingredients: rice vinegar, sugar, salt, red chile, seedless cucumber, shallot, cilantro leaves
name: a jaad thai cucumber cool down

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Cover a cookie sheet with tin foil. Lightly spray broccoli and garlic with non-fat cooking spray. Arrange on the cookie sheet in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and oregano. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: frozen broccoli florets, butter, brown sugar, onion, salt, vinegar, dry mustard, bacon
name: mom s sweet and sour broccoli

steps: Cook rice according to package directions. Drain. Slowly melt butter in olive oil. Add garlic and saut until lightly golden. Add chicken broth and bring to boil. Add broccoli, cover, simmer 6 to 8 minutes until broccoli is tender. Place cooked cavatelli in bowl. Add broccoli mixture and toss with parmesan cheese. Serve.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, long grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth, salt, broccoli florets, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, unsalted butter
name: rice with broccoli and parmesan

steps: In a large pot, bring stock to a boil. Add barley and cook on medium heat 40 minutes. Drain and rinse until cool. In a large bowl place all the vegetables, mix in the vinaigrette along with salt and pepper to taste. Combine with the barley. Salad can be prepared up to this point and stored, covered in fridge for 2 days. Sprinkle with toasted nuts just before serving.
ingredients: pearl barley, vegetable broth, garbanzo beans, frozen peas and carrots, cucumbers, green onions, rosemary, italian salad dressing, salt and pepper
name: barley medley salad

steps: Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the pork is nicely browned on both sides. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the marinade cook for an
ingredients: thai rice, ground pork, chili-garlic sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, red chilli padi, chinese bean paste, shallots, water, cornflour
name: spicy minced pork rice porridge

steps: In a nonreactive bowl, combine mustard, garlic, vinegar, salt and pepper with 2 teaspoons water. Slowly whisk in olive oil, forming a creamy marinade. Stir in basil. Add the chops to the marinade and coat evenly. Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour and up to four hours. Remove from refrigerator and let sit until arriving at room temperature. Heat grill to very hot. Remove excess marinade from chops and grill uncovered about 3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warm platter and serve. Preparation time does not include marinade and sitting time.
ingredients: lamb, salt and pepper, egg, dijon mustard, dried breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, butter, vegetable oil
name: sesame lamb chops

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix dry ingredients together. In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, oats, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, baking soda, cinnamon. Add applesauce and mix well. Bake for 10 minutes.
ingredients: soymilk, vanilla extract, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, cinnamon-raisin bread, apple
name: cinnamon raisin bread pudding with apples w vegan options

steps: Place pasta in 2 quarts of salted water and cook until soft, which should take about 10 to 12 minutes. Chop the pepper and onions into half inch pieces and saute in olive oil. After 5 minutes, add the garlic, basil, and the tomato sauce and simmer until it starts to thicken. If the sauce become to thick, add a little of the water from the pasta. Add the precooked sausage to the vegetable and sauce mixture, and stir over low heat while waiting until the pasta is done. Add drained pasta to the pan, stir, check to see if salt is needed, and plate. Serve with grated parmesan cheese.
ingredients: italian sausages, pasta sauce, pasta, water, red pepper, green pepper, onion, parmesan cheese, cheese
name: cheesy sausage casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the imperial chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more parmesan cheese. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: chicken pieces, fresh breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, pepper, butter
name: imperial chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve.
ingredients: salmon fillets, fresh ginger, szechuan peppercorns, cilantro, granulated sugar, black pepper, peanut oil, soy sauce, orange juice
name: caramelized salmon with soy orange glaze

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, dry breadcrumbs, dijon mustard, lemon juice, capers
name: pork chops a la dijon

steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor. Whirl until smooth. Place in jar with tight-fitting lid. Refrigerate for up to two weeks. Shake well before serving.
ingredients: mustard, red wine vinegar, olive oil, tomatoes, scallions, capers, parsley, dill
name: vinegar and oil dressing with tomato

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: pork and beans, red onion, green bell pepper, bacon, yellow mustard, light brown sugar, chili sauce, barbecue sauce, spicy bbq sauce, cajun seasoning
name: aj s best baked beans

steps: Cook pasta according to pkg instructions. Meanwhile, heat oil in lg skillet or dutch oven. Add garlic. Cook and stir 1 minute. Add tomatoes, beans, italian seasoning and sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Add spinach. Cook 3 minutes. Put drained pasta on serving plates. Top with tomato mixture. Sprinkle with feta and olives.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, mixed greens, salt, penne, feta cheese
name: pasta with greens and feta

steps: In a medium-size, heavy-bottom non-aluminum saucepan, combine cranberries, apples, apple juice, sugar, orange peel, cranberries. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered for 4 minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally. Add cranberries, sugar, juice and cinnamon. Increase the heat to medium, bring to a boil again, then reduce the heat to low. Simmer uncovered for 15 minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Transfer to a bowl, cover and chill.
ingredients: cranberries, apples, apple juice, sugar, orange peel
name: cranberry sauce with apples

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the oiled garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, grape tomatoes, salt and pepper, chives, basil leaves
name: heirloom tomato salad with garlic oil

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar until thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean.
ingredients: cornstarch, milk, egg, cream, ground almonds, sugar, vanilla essence
name: almond custard

steps: In a small bowl stir together coconut milk, peanut butter, ginger and pepper. Set aside. In a large skillet cook chicken in hot oil over medium heat for 8-10 minutes or until chicken is tender and no longer pink, turning once halfway through cooking. Remove from skillet. Keep warm. For sauce, add green onion to skillet. Cook and stir about 2 minutes or until tender. Stir in coconut milk mixture. Cook and stir until bubbly. To serve, spoon the sauce over chicken. Sprinkle with peanuts.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, oil, onion, red chilies, fresh basil, fish sauce, cilantro roots, sugar, coconut milk
name: thai chicken with basil and coconut milk

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease 8 or 9 inch pie plate. Mix eggs in large bowl. Add shredded cheeses, folding. Fold in milk. Add salt and pepper to taste and any other spice to taste. Add any meats or veggies at this time, fold gently. Pour into pie plate and spread out. Bake for about 40 minutes.
ingredients: pie shells, eggs, half-and-half, ham, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, black pepper, ground red pepper
name: country ham quiche

steps: In a food processor or blender, combine cranberries, vinegar, onion, honey and mustard. Puree until smooth. Gradually add oil and season to taste with salt and pepper. In a salad bowl, toss together greens, apples and enough dressing to coat. Sprinkle with walnuts.
ingredients: dried cranberries, apple cider vinegar, shallot, canola oil, ice cubes, salt and pepper
name: cranberry or raspberry vinaigrette

steps: In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, 4 cups hot water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 30-40 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until water boils. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until water
ingredients: pheasants, water, salt, celery ribs, onion, carrots, mushroom, low sodium chicken broth, egg noodles
name: pheasant noodle soup

steps: Place potatoes in a pot, with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until easily pierced with a fork. Drain, set aside to cool. Place the bacon in a large deep skillet over medium-high heat. Cook until browned and crisp. Remove and set aside. Add onion to the bacon grease, and cook over medium heat until browned. Add the vinegar, water, sugar, salt and pepper to the pan. Bring to a boil, then add potatoes and parsley. Crumble half the bacon into the mix. Heat through, transfer to a serving dish. Crumble the remaining bacon over the top and serve warm.
ingredients: potatoes, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cider vinegar, red onion, olive oil, dill weed
name: easy yum mrs west s german potato salad

steps: Dissolve yeast in water, in a large bowl. Add half the flour, and the sugar, salt, and shortening. Blend at low speed, then beat 2 minutes at med speed. Mix in remaining flour by hand. Cover and let rise until doubled, about 45 minutes. Stir the batter hard for 30 seconds. Spread into 2 8in greased loaf pans. Let rise until doubled, about 20 minutes. Bake at 325 for about 45 minutes, until golden brown and done.
ingredients: active dry yeast, salt, sugar, vegetable oil, flour, milk
name: basic white bread

steps: In a large saute pan heat oil over medium-high heat. Add lemon slices. Cook 4 minutes, turning once. Remove lemons. Set aside. Add pea pods and leek to skillet. Stir-fry 3 to 4 minutes or until pea pods are crisp tender. Stir in dill and reserved lemon slices. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: sugar snap peas, butter, garlic cloves, lemon juice, lemon zest, salt, pepper
name: lemon scented sugar snap peas

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Sautee chicken in butter, margarine or oil over medium heat, until soft. Place chicken breasts in casserole dish and season with salt, pepper and garlic. Pour mushrooms and sauteed onions over chicken. Cover dish with bbq sauce. Cover dish with lid or aluminum foil. Bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: whole chickens, seasoning salt, garlic powder, ground black pepper, barbecue sauce
name: kittencal s easy oven baked barbecued chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, onion, red wine, beef stock, butter, whole wheat bread, gruyere cheese, salt and pepper
name: basler mehlsuppa

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Grease or line cookie tray. Mix together sugar and butter. Add egg yolk and vanilla, mix well. Stir in flour and choc chips. Place teaspoonfuls onto tray and bake for 12 minutes.
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, sweetened condensed milk, self raising flour, dark chocolate chips
name: cafe choc chip cookies

steps: Tear the lettuce into small bite sized pieces and place in the bottom of 9x12 inch cake pan. Layer the rest of the ingredients in the order given, do not cook peas.
