Add the sugar to the mayonnaise and spread over the top as you would frosting. Top with grated cheese. Cover and refrigerate for 8 to 10 hours. Bacon bits can be used for bacon.
ingredients: iceberg lettuce, celery, green onions, sliced water chestnuts, frozen peas, sugar, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, hard-boiled eggs
name: eloise s make ahead salad

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly season pork chops with salt and pepper, then, two to four at a time, depending on the size of your skillet, brown well on each side, removing to warm oven. Deglaze the skillet with the wine, scraping up brown bits, reduce heat to medium and stir in the mustard, then add the cherries. Season to taste with salt and pepper. When the sauce begins to bubble, add all the pork chops back into the skillet, spooning sauce over them to coat, cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook over medium low about 5 minutes, then rearrange chops so those on the bottom are now on the top, and spoon sauce over. Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes or more, until chops are cooked through, but still very slightly pink inside. Remove chops to serving platter or individual plates. Melt butter into remaining sauce in skillet, heat and spoon over chops.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, butter, flour, chicken broth, fresh ginger, dijon-style mustard, grainy mustard, scallions, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: ginger mustard pork chops

steps: In a large mixing bowl, add the yellow cake mix, quick-cooking oatmeal, sugar, vanilla extract, vegetable oil, eggs, pecans, semisweet chocolate morsels. Beat until fluffy. Add in the yellow cake mix, quick-cooking oatmeal, sugar, vanilla extract, vegetable oil, eggs, pecans, semisweet chocolate morsels.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, quick-cooking oatmeal, sugar, vanilla extract, vegetable oil, eggs, pecans, semisweet chocolate morsels
name: cake mix oatmeal cookies

steps: Mix first 4 ingredients and pour into a greased 9x13 baking pan. Prepare cake mix as directed on the package and spoon batter over marshmallow mixture in the pan. Top with nuts, if desired. Bake at 350 for 45-50 minutes until toothpick inserted into center comes out clean. Serve warm or cool and garnish with whip topping or vanilla ice cream, if desired.
ingredients: chocolate pudding mix, sugar, evaporated milk, butter, pecans
name: pudding fudge

steps: In a large saucepan, cook chickpea, onion, garlic clove, tomato sauce, chicken broth, ditali pasta. Bring to a boil and then simmer for about 20 minutes. Use an immersion blender to puree about half of the soup. Add cooked chickpea, onion, garlic clove, tomato sauce, chicken broth, ditali pasta. Add cooked chickpea,
ingredients: white beans, white onion, garlic clove, extra virgin olive oil, tomato sauce, chicken broth, ditali pasta
name: fagiole pasta not pasta fagiole soup

steps: Heat pan over med-high heat, spray with cooking spray. Add chicken tenders and season with pepper. Cook turning pieces half way through about 7 minutes. Remove and set aside. Reduce the heat to low-med add garlic and saute. Then add vinegar, honey and chicken broth. Simmer scraping the bottom of the pan for 1 minute. Return chicken to pan. Mix all ingredients together and heat through. Garnish and serve.
ingredients: chicken breast tenders, cooking sherry, balsamic dressing, italian parsley, red onion, brown sugar
name: balsamic chicken and onions

steps: In a bowl, combine cream cheese, chicken, bacon, salsa, 8-inch flour tortillas, green bell pepper, sweet onion, boneless skinless chicken breast, barbecue sauce, whole wheat tortillas, cheddar cheesepreparation:Cook and stir vegetables in large nonstick skillet on medium-high heat for 3 minutes. Add chicken, cook and stir 3-4 minutes or until no longer pink. Stir in barbecue sauce. Cook on medium heat 3 minutes or until chicken is done, stirring occasionally. Spoon chicken mixture down centers of tortillas. Top with cheese. Roll up. Cut in half.
ingredients: cream cheese, mild salsa, green onion, garlic clove, flour tortillas
name: tempting tortilla roll ups

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: farfalle pasta, italian sausage, green pepper, yellow pepper, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, garlic cloves, chicken stock cube, fresh herb
name: easy italian sausage and pasta skillet meal

steps: In a large pot filled with boiling water, blanch tomatoes for 10 seconds. With a slotted spoon, transfer tomatoes to colander to cool. Peel, seed and quarter tomatoes. In a medium frying pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden, 4-5 minutes. In a blender or food processor, puree tomatoes, onion, pumpkin and broth until smooth. Transfer to a large saucepan. Add sherry, salt, pepper and tarragon. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Add cream and heat through, about 3 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: baking potato, white onion, milk, cream of potato soup, cream of tomato soup, fresh ground pepper, curry powder, salt
name: rosy potato soup

steps: Line 2 baking sheets with nonstick foil or parchment paper. Mix cereal and trail mix in a b owl. Microwave white chocolate chips and oil in a medium bowl on high, stirring every 20 seconds until chocolate melts and is blended and smooth. Immediately pour over cereal mixture and toss with a rubber spatula until well coated. Drop in small mounds onto the lined baking sheets. Refrigerate 10 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: cheerios toasted oat cereal, corn chex, raisins, butter, light corn syrup, brown sugar, cinnamon, salt
name: chewy cinnamon raisin chex mix

steps: Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: long grain and wild rice blend, green onion, sliced mushrooms, butter, hollandaise sauce mix, water, cooked chicken, frozen broccoli
name: wild rice and chicken casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 450. In foil lined roasting pan, toss carrots with oil and cayenne and season with salt. Arrange in single layer, using two pans if needed. Roast tossing one halfway through for 30-40 minutes, or until tender. In a small bowl, whisk together honey, zest and lemon juice. Season with salt. Drizzled over carrots and toss to coat.
ingredients: mandarin oranges, orange juice, carrot, curry powder, seedless grapes, lemon juice
name: fruity carrots

steps: Place potatoes in medium saucepan. Add water to cover. Bring to boil. Cook 5-6 minutes or until potatoes are just tender. Add green beans. Cook additional 3 minutes. Drain. Mix potatoes, beans and remaining ingredients in large bowl until well blended. Cover. Refrigerate at least 1 hour. Stir before serving.
ingredients: new potatoes, fat free ranch dressing, lime juice, lime zest, jalapeno peppers, jicama, avocados, cherry tomatoes, fresh cilantro, green onions
name: caramba potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the olive oil, onion, green bell peppers, garlic cloves, eggs, parmesan cheese, salt & fresh ground pepper, hoagie rolls, giardiniera. Add parmesan. Mix well. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice. Bake
ingredients: olive oil, onion, green bell peppers, garlic cloves, eggs, parmesan cheese, salt & fresh ground pepper, hoagie rolls, giardiniera
name: italian pepper and egg sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown.
ingredients: margarine, sugar, vanilla, baking powder, salt, flour, liquid
name: any flavour cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake teriyaki steak in oven for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool.
ingredients: butter, bell pepper, fresh mushrooms, boneless strip steaks, garlic salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, teriyaki baste and glaze, water
name: simple teriyaki steak dinner

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: italian sweet sausage, hot italian sausages, bell peppers, onions, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, olive oil
name: sausage and peppers in the oven

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, banana, cinnamon, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, granola cereal
name: crunchy banana cookies

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add garlic and onion and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge.
ingredients: vegetable oil, shallots, garlic, chicken stock, peanuts, soy sauce, dark molasses, lime juice, ginger, hot chili peppers
name: katjang sauce spicy peanut sauce

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Place the weight watchers spinach and fruit salad on a baking sheet and bake until just crisp, about 10 minutes. Let cool. In a blender, combine the spinach, strawberries, granny smith apple, green onions, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, citrus vinaigrette dressing, ascorbic acid. Blend until smooth. With the blender running, add the spinach, strawberries, granny smith apple, green onions, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, citrus vinaigrette dressing, ascorbic acid. To serve, put the weight watchers spinach in a large bowl. Toss with enough of the vinaigrette to coat the spinach. Sprinkle with the crisp prosciutto crumbles, toss again, and serve.
ingredients: baby spinach, strawberries, granny smith apple, green onions, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, citrus vinaigrette dressing, ascorbic acid
name: weight watchers spinach and fruit salad

steps: Mix together all ingredients except steak in a large resealable plastic bag, mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. When ready to grill, remove steak from marinade, reserving the marinade. Grill steak to desired doneness. Meanwhile, in medium saucepan bring reserved marinade to a boil. Reduce heat and cook 5 to 8 minutes or until slightly thickened. Serve grilled steak with hot marinade.
ingredients: oil, sirloin strip steaks, salt and pepper, crushed tomatoes, potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, green pepper, dried basil, dried red pepper flakes
name: steak pizziaola

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and spray an oven safe serving dish with non-stick cooking spray. Using an electric mixer, blend the cream cheese and mayonnaise until smooth. Stir in green chilies, jalapeno peppers, and mexican and mozzarella cheeses. Spoon this mixture into the prepared baking dish. Mix together the panko and parmesan cheese and sprinkle it over the cream cheese mixture. Spray the panko and parmesan with a quick spray of non-stick cooking spray. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the mixture is hot and the topping is lightly browned.
ingredients: fresh jalapeno peppers, cooked chicken, red onions, garlic powder, cherry tomatoes, cream cheese, salt & pepper, pecans, brown sugar
name: jalapeo chicken poppers

steps: In a food processor or blender, blend the cream cheese, feta cheese green onion, pepper and oregano, until smooth, scrape down the sides, add the tablespoon of either yogurt or sour cream. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour. Rinse the cherry tomatoes and remove stems. With a sharp knife, cut a slice fron the non-stem end of each tomato. With a small spoon scoop out as much of the seeds and pulp and you can, arrange the hollow tomatoes on paper towel lines plate to drain. After the cheese mixture has chilled for 1 hour, transfer the it to a small zipper-top plastic bag, squeeze out air. Snip off one corner, squeeze the cheese filling into each tomato, arrange on serving dish and sprinkle with paprika.
ingredients: cream cheese, sun-dried tomato vinaigrette dressing, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, black peppercorns, lemon, rind of
name: flavor infused cream cheese nibbles

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: fat-free mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: tender italian baked chicken

steps: Heat oven to 350f. In a food processor, combine cream cheese, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, bacon, green onion, cracker. Process until it resembles large flake oatmeal or to your liking. Fill the hollowed out bread and replace the round cut out section. Wrap in aluminium foil and bake in the oven for about 40 minutes. I cut up a bagette for dipping and serve them around the hot garlic dip.
ingredients: shallot, garlic clove, cottage cheese, cream cheese, butter, camembert cheese, paprika, seasoning salt, pepper
name: bavarian cheese dip obatzda gluten free

steps: Preheat oven to 400f line your pan with aluminum foil and lightly brush with olive oil, or use a bit of cooking spray. Combine mushrooms, scallions, bay leaf, butter, scallions, mushrooms, beef stock, worcestershire sauce, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, scallions, sc
ingredients: cod fish fillets, bay leaf, butter, scallions, mushrooms, beef stock, worcestershire sauce
name: baked cod with mushrooms and scallions

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Refriger
ingredients: chicken wings, fresh lemon juice, fresh ground black pepper, garlic salt, kosher salt, dried thyme, cayenne pepper, butter
name: oven roasted chicken wings

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Place the asparagus on a nonstick baking sheet. Drizzle with the olive oil and sprinkle with the salt & pepper. Toss to coat. Bake for 6 minutes, stirring once, until golden. Meanwhile, fill a medium saucepan with water and bring to a rapid boil. Add the asparagus and cook until crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Drain the asparagus and refresh under cold running water, then pat dry. In a small saucepan, simmer the heavy cream with the sliced garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Crack 2 eggs into each gratin dish, pour the garlic cream on top and sprinkle all over with the buttered crumbs. Bake the eggs for 15 minutes, or until the whites are firm and the yolks are still runny. Serve at once.
ingredients: asparagus, cheese, scallions, eggs, sour cream, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper
name: scallion asparagus egg bake

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat together the eggs and sugar until very thick. The batter should fall from the beaters in a thick ribbon. Beat in the vanilla. While youre beating the eggs and sugar, heat the hot chocolate and butter in a small saucepan to just simmering. Add the hot chocolate mixture to the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream as you continue beating. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Fold the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until theyre just combined. Pour the batter into a lightly greased 9 inch cake round. Bake for 50 minutes, or until the cake is a deep golden brown and starting to pull away from the sides of the pan. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10-15 minutes. Remove the cake
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, mashed potatoes, vanilla, flour, cocoa, baking soda, milk, nuts
name: idaho potato cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Toast oatmeal in a shallow pan for 10 minutes to brown, watch carefully. Remove from oven and in small mixing bowl combine oatmeal with remaining ingredients. Press into 9-inch pie plate. Fill with desired filling and bake or bake crust empty for later use.
ingredients: flour, brown sugar, butter, tart cherries, sugar, cornstarch, rolled oats
name: cherry crisp pie

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, brussels sprout, lemon pepper, sea salt, lemon zest
name: brussels sprouts with garlic and lemon

steps: Heat olive oil, lemon peel, lemon juice, herbs, and s&p into a large ziplock bag. Add shrimp. Toss gently to coat. Cover, and refrigerate for one hour to marinate. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat. Remove skewers from the water, pat dry, and spray with nonstick cooking spray. Skewer the shrimp. Grill the shrimp on the grill on both sides until pink and opaque, about 5 minutes per side.
ingredients: garlic cloves, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, paprika, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, tabasco sauce, large raw shrimp, lemon wedge
name: spicy grilled shrimp skewers

steps: In a large saucepan combine the bananas, orange, juice of, orange, rind of, ground almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds, blanched almonds,
ingredients: bananas, orange, juice of, orange, rind of, ground almonds, blanched almond, cocoa
name: fruit truffles

steps: Mix marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold.
ingredients: chicken wings, soy sauce, honey, garlic, beef broth
name: aunt jean s chicken wings

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: italian sausage, potatoes, green bell pepper, garlic, onion, crushed tomatoes, dried basil, salt and pepper
name: italian sausage casserole

steps: Add the marshmallow creme to the container of an electric blender. Add in the chocolate syrup and milk. Add the ice on top and crumble the graham crackers over the ice. Cover and blend on high until smooth and all the marshmallow creme has been incorporated. Pour mixture into 2 chilled glasses. Garnish with the mini marshmallows and chocolate chips.
ingredients: chocolate graham crackers, marshmallows, chocolate candy bars, raspberries
name: chocolate raspberry s mores

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Pure chipotles in adobo with garlic and honey in a blender until you have a smooth glaze. Pat pork dry and sprinkle with salt and allspice, rubbing the mixture into the meat. Put pork on a foil-lined baking sheet and spread with the glaze to coat well. Roast the pork in the middle of oven until an instant-read thermometer registers 155f, about 20 minutes. Let pork stand 5 minutes on a cutting board before cutting into thin slices.
ingredients: unsalted butter, garlic cloves, raw shrimp, chipotle chiles in adobo, dry white wine, fresh parsley, lemon wedge
name: chipotle shrimp

steps: Puree all ingredients together in blender. Pour into 6- 3oz molds or paper cups. Freeze for one hour, place sticks in the middle. Freeze for another 3 hours, until solid. To release nectarine, dip molds into hot water until pops loosen and slide out. If using paper cups, peel away paper.
ingredients: banana, unsweetened orange juice, nectarine, milk, ice cubes
name: banana nectarine smoothie

steps: Heat the oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Halve the chicken slices, add to the pan with the juice, tomatoes and kidney beans. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic, dry crushed red pepper, ginger, onions, oil, coconut milk
name: indonesian chilli chicken

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: lean ground beef, ranch style beans, doritos, rotel tomatoes, onion, shredded cheddar cheese, taco seasoning, cream of chicken soup, water
name: mexican dorito casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in small mixer bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack.
ingredients: flour, rolled oats, wheat flour, wheat germ, sugar, salt, baking powder, milk, eggs, pecans
name: oat and pecan waffles

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl stir together the eggs, sugar and vanilla. Mix well. Add butter mixing to incorporate. Sift the ground chocolate with the flour, baking powder and salt. Stir into the egg mixture and add the walnuts. Spread into the prepared baking pan. Bake for 20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: butter, ghirardelli double chocolate brownie mix, shredded coconut, butterscotch chips, ghirardelli semi-sweet chocolate chips, pecans, sweetened condensed milk
name: ghirardelli seven layer brownie bars

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onions and garlic and saute for 5 minutes. Add garlic and saute for 5 minutes. Add aubergines and saute for 5 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, aubergines, garlic clove, tabasco sauce, tomatoes, chilies, cheddar cheese, pita breads
name: aubergine eggplant pitas

steps: Combine daikon radishes, white vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce. Add to cucumber mixture and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate. To serve, place one or two boston lettuce leaves on each plate and divide salad evenly among plates.
ingredients: daikon radishes, carrot, granulated sugar, white vinegar, salt
name: diakon radish carrot salad

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Place on baking tray. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve.
ingredients: water, olive oil, all-purpose flour, salt, active dry yeast, garlic powder, dried dill, cornmeal, milk
name: garlic dill breadsticks bread machine

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter, sugars and eggs until smooth. Combine flour, salt and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, orange zest, orange juice, buttermilk baking mix, walnuts, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: orange chocolate drop cookies

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: cooked shrimp, old bay seasoning, garlic powder, plum tomato, green onions, olive oil, egg white, french baguette, mayonnaise, kosher salt
name: shrimp bruschetta

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine all of the ingredients except for the butter. It is easiest to just mix it up with your hands. Form into two loaves. Spread butter over the top of each loaf, and wrap each in foil sealing the foil tightly without squishing the meatloaf. Bake for 1 hour 45 minutes. Poke holes in the foil that is wrapped around the meatloaf and let any grease drain out into the pan while baking another 15 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, butter, all-purpose flour, beef broth, evaporated milk, salt and pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce
name: usmc sos

steps: Combine all vinaigrette ingredients, whisking together well with a whisk. Set aside.
ingredients: butter, heavy cream, lemon juice, wasabi paste, shallot, tamari
name: wasabi cream sauce

steps: Wash and peel cucumbers. Slice or cut in rounds as thin as possible cukes & onions. Place in bowl and cover with vinegar. Add 3-5 heaping tablespoons of sugar, mix well. Chill and serve. This is better if you let it sit in the fridge covered overnight. Actually. If allowed to mellow for 2 or 3 days -- in a tightly sealed jar in the refrigerator -- jar turned upside down 1 day & turned right side up the next.
ingredients: water, oil, apple cider vinegar, sugar, sour cream, salt and pepper
name: german cucumber dressing

steps: In a large skillet, saute the meat with garlic and ginger root in oil for a couple minutes. Add the curry paste, coconut milk, lime rind and juice. Simmer until meat is desired tenderness, or until tofu is heated through. Stir in the cilantro just before serving. Serve with rice.
ingredients: fresh mussels, fresh lime juice, unsweetened coconut milk, dry white wine, thai red curry paste, garlic, fish sauce, white sugar, fresh cilantro
name: thai steamed mussels

steps: Wash then hull strawberries. Slice in half. Peel banana and slice into thirds. Place in a blender or food processor. Pour in juice and optional ice cubes. Whirl until pured and frothy. Pour into tall glasses and serve.
ingredients: papaya, fresh strawberries, milk, plain yogurt, honey, ice cubes, papayas, of fresh mint
name: strawberry papaya shake

steps: Combine water, sugar, instant espresso powder, cream, milk, rum, vanilla extract, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts, walnuts,
ingredients: water, sugar, instant espresso powder, cream, milk, rum, vanilla extract, walnuts
name: espresso rum and walnut ice cream

steps: Combine sugar and cornstarch in a heavy saucepan. Stir in cream, water and corn syrup. Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more. Remove from heat and stir in butter, vanilla and sour cherry. Let mixture stand at room temperature until cooled. Store in refrigerator for up to 2 months.
ingredients: sour cherry, water, cinnamon stick, cornstarch, sugar, brandy
name: cherry brandy sauce

steps: Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add lemon juice, olive oil, cajun seasoning, thyme, pecans, parmesan cheese, dry breadcrumbs, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, pars
ingredients: catfish fillet, lemon juice, olive oil, cajun seasoning, thyme, pecans, parmesan cheese, dry breadcrumbs, parsley
name: cajun pecan catfish

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Place apples in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, spices and salt. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired.
ingredients: apple, all-purpose flour, brown sugar, oatmeal, cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt, butter
name: apple crisp for 2

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in large frying pan. Cook onions until softened. Add to spaghetti. Simmer on low for 10 minutes. Simmer
ingredients: spaghetti, oil, sesame seeds, soy sauce, green onion
name: asian spaghetti

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or til tender, stirring occasionally. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, and salt. Pour over turkey. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes serve over rice.
ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, water, butter, white bread, deli turkey, turkey gravy
name: hot turkey sandwiches

steps: In small frying pan, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil. Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Combine beef and egg, mixing well. To beef mixture, add cooked onion, parsley, worcestershire and tabasco sauces and mix well. Shape mixture into 4 large patties, scoring each with a knife. Heat remaining tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. When hot, add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes.
ingredients: worcestershire sauce, garlic, diced onion, lean ground beef, gouda cheese, hamburger buns
name: dragon s breath steak burgers

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: cauliflower, garlic clove, extra virgin olive oil, tomatoes, salt
name: cavolfiore stufato italian stewed cauliflower

steps: In a large bowl, mix all brine ingredients thoroughly. In a large, deep pan combine whole salmon fillets with the brine mixture to soak over night, keeping refrigerated. Rinse thoroughly after brining. Pat dry with a paper towel and allow to air dry for at least one hour prior to smoking. Lay salmon fillets on smoker rack skin side down. Cook in smoker at 165f for 3-5 hours. Cooking time will depend on the thickness of your fillets.
ingredients: cream cheese, smoked whitefish, lemon juice, roasted garlic, smoked paprika
name: the bowery s hot smoked whitefish dip

steps: Mix ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, breadcrumbs, italian seasoning, egg, milk, romano cheese, dried basil, dried oregano, cayenne pepperpreparation:Mix spices with breadcrumbs and grated cheese. Thoroughly combine with remaining ingredients, by hand. Shape into balls. Brown in olive oil on all sides, or alternatively, bake in 400 degree oven for approx. 20 to 30 minutes, until browned but not cooked through. The meatballs maintain their shape better using the oven method. Add to spaghetti sauce and simmer for 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: beef broth, orzo pasta, meatballs, plum tomatoes, zucchini, fresh parmesan cheese
name: meatballs with orzo and italian vegetables

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain well. Set aside, and keep warm.
ingredients: lo mein noodles, soy sauce, rice vinegar, honey, sesame oil, cornstarch, scallions, garlic, fresh ginger, bok choy
name: chinese noodles with greens

steps: In a large saucepan or large microwavable bowl, melt butter and marshmallows. Stir until smooth. Remove from heat and stir in the cereal until it is evenly coated. Let the mixture cool for about 15 minutes or so, giving it a stir once in awhile. Butter you hands and then shape the treats into 2 inch balls, pressing gently so they are compact, not loose. Push a stick into each ball and set aside to cool. Melt the chocolate in the microwave or double boiler and stir until smooth. Dip the top of the treat balls into the chocolate and then sprinkle with the candy or sugar sprinkles. Lay on a wax paper lined tray until chocolate is hardened. For bake sales or potlucks, wrap each treat in plastic and tie with curling ribbon.
ingredients: karo syrup, white sugar, peanut butter, rice krispies, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips
name: a twist on rice krispie treats

steps: Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add spinach and mix again. Pour olive oil in a skillet. Fry the patties until golden brown.
ingredients: kiwi fruits, low fat cottage cheese, flour tortillas, reduced-calorie peanut butter
name: kiwi cottage cheese wraps

steps: In a large saucepan, cook chicken and onions until chicken is no longer pink. Add taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, corn, and chiles. Cook over medium heat until chicken is no longer pink. Add taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, corn,
ingredients: grilled chicken breast strips, cajun seasoning, low-fat smoked sausage, fresh mushrooms, onion, green bell pepper, diced tomatoes with jalapenos, fettuccine pasta, fresh ground black pepper
name: cajun chicken sausage pasta

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium low heat. Add scallions and cook 2 minutes. Pour over cauliflower and toss. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: cauliflower, butter, crushed red pepper flakes, monterey jack pepper cheese
name: tex mex cauliflower

steps: Heat oven 200c. Place a baking sheet in to heat. Slice goat cheese into 4 equal pieces, leaving the rind on. Turn the mushrooms cut side up. Sit a piece of cheese in the middle of each mushroom. Top with some thyme leave and season to taste. Cut pastry into 4 strips lengthways. Wrap each mushroom in a strip of pastry so that the ends of the pastry are under the mushroom. Make slashes on top of the pastry with the. Brush exposed sides of mushroom with oil. Place them on hot baking sheet, cook 15 - 20 minutes til pastry is golden and cheese oozing and mushroom is tender.
ingredients: walnuts, honey, cooking spray, balsamic vinegar, orange juice, belgian endive, goat cheese, orange sections, fresh chives, cracked black pepper
name: endive stuffed with goat cheese and walnuts

steps: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. Add minced garlic and lightly saute just until fragrant. Stir in the flour and stir for about one minute. This will be thick. Slowly pour in the milk. Add salt, pepper, oregano and nutmeg. Stir until creamy and thick. Turn off the heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Serve over your choice of pasta.
ingredients: fat-free half-and-half, all-purpose flour, butter, onions, garlic cloves, light sour cream, parmesan cheese, salt, white pepper
name: doesn t taste like it s light alfredo sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Melt butter on a low flame in a small sauce pan. Add garlic and saute on low for about 1 minute. Add the lemon juice and shut off flame. Spray the bottom of a baking dish lightly with cooking spray. Place the fish on top and season with salt and pepper. Pour the lemon butter mixture on the fish and top with fresh parsley. Bake at 400 until cooked, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: lemon, milk, eggs, fresh rosemary, fresh garlic, tilapia fillets, yellow cornmeal, extra virgin olive oil, lemon slice
name: fried lemon rosemary tilapia

steps: Sear steaks in hot oil, until cooked to your preference. Remove steaks, cover and keep warm. In same pan saute onions for 2 minutes, add wine and cook over high heat until reduced by half. Add half and half cream. Boil until reduced by half. Stir in boursin cheese or garlic cream cheese until thick and hot. Pour sauce over hot steaks, garnish with parsley.
ingredients: new york strip steaks, dry red wine, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, bay leaves, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: new york steaks with red wine marinade

steps: Combine the coleslaw mix and onion in a large bowl. Whisk together the mustard, white vinegar, and salt in a medium bowl. Blend thoroughly. Pour dressing mixture over coleslaw mix and toss to coat. Chill at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: coleslaw mix, mayonnaise, red onions, ground mustard, sugar, white vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: sweet and tangy cole slaw

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, with electric mixer at medium speed, beat together butter and shortening until light and fluffy. Add sugar and cream together until very light. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each egg. Gradually fold in flour until a soft, workable dough forms. Shape into balls and place on cookie sheets. Dip the bottom of a flat bottomed glass in sugar and use it to mash down the balls of dough. Bake in preheated oven until done. Immediately remove from pan to cool.
ingredients: margarine, sugar, eggs, baking soda, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt
name: old timey tea cakes

steps: Preheat grill and line the grill pan with foil. Mix the seeds and oil and spread them out in the pan. Grill for 12-15 minutes or until soft and charred. Put the seeds into a large bowl and add the hot seeds with all the reamining ingredients. Leave to marinate for 1 hour, then taste and add salt and pepper, plus a little extra sugar if you like. Goes great with cold meats or stuffed into a pitta bread with a strong cheese.
ingredients: seedless raisin, dates, currants, dried apricots, apples, onions, vinegar, chile, gingerroot, soft brown sugar
name: dried fruit chutney

steps: In a large pot, over medium heat, combine oil, onion, garlic, oregano and cumin. Cook, covered, 5 minutes, until onions are tender. Stir in broth, hominy, chile peppers and olives. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium. Stir chicken into pot. Cover and cook until chicken is no longer pink- 5 to 10 minutes. Can garnish with shredded lettuce, and radish or sour cream and grated sharp cheddar cheese.
ingredients: hominy, dried oregano leaves, salt, garlic powder, chili powder, onion, cooked chicken, cooked pork, cilantro
name: ann s easy posole

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey, butter, dijon mustard, curry powder, red cayenne pepper and cayenne. Mix well to combine. Pour over the chicken pieces in the baking dish. Mix the chicken pieces slightly with your hands to coat. Bake uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven. Turn the chicken pieces over. With a spoon, baste with sauce. Bake for another 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked.
ingredients: condensed cream of chicken soup, coarse grain mustard, honey, cream, oil, chicken breast fillets, chives
name: creamy honey mustard chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8x8 inch baking dish. Place the cranberries and brown sugar in the baking dish. Toss gently to combine. Cover and bake for 1 hour, stirring the mixture after about 30 minutes of baking time. After 1 hour baking remove from oven and stir in lemon juice, marmalade and chopped walunuts. Return to oven and bake uncovered for another 15 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Store any leftover conserve covered in the fridge.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, water, vanilla extract
name: ruby cranberry vanilla sauce

steps: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add to the skillet the cabbage, carrots, onion and brown sugar. Cook, stirring often, for about 10-12 minutes until the veggies are well-browned and softened. Remove from heat and stir in the soy sauce, vinegar and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: cabbage, carrots, butter, leeks, brown sugar, apple cider vinegar, spicy brown mustard, caraway seed, salt, pepper
name: cabbage and carrot medley

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Add shrimp, pineapple chunks, cornstarch, chili sauce, soy sauce, garlic powder, cooking spray, sesame oil, green pepper, onion, shrimp and stir-fry sauce mixture to vegetables in skillet and cook 4 to 5 minutes or just until shrimp turn opaque throughout, stirring occasionally. To serve, spoon rice onto plates and top with shrimp mixture.
ingredients: pineapple chunks, cornstarch, chili sauce, soy sauce, garlic powder, cooking spray, sesame oil, green pepper, onion, shrimp
name: sweet and sour shrimp

steps: In a non-stick skillet, saute the cabbage mix. Allow to cool to room temperature before adding to the batter. Mix flour, dashi, sake, soy sauce, eggs, green onions, ham, oil, mayonnaisepreparation:In a non-stick skillet, saute the cabbage mix. Allow to cool
ingredients: all-purpose flour, cabbage, water, ham, egg, salt and pepper, barbecue sauce, mayonnaise
name: okonomiyaki

steps: Mix the lime juice, lime wedge, lime juice, cilantro, lime juice, jalapeno chile, lime juice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime
ingredients: tequila, sugar, cilantro, lime peel, salt, lime juice, jalapeno chile
name: margarita marinade

steps: Preheat oven to 400f, grease a 15 x 10 inch baking pan. Mix together butter, oats, sugar, corn syrup, vanilla extract, salt, semisweet chocolate, walnutspreparation:Heat butter, sugar and water in a 3 quart sauce-pan to a rolling boil. When mix reaches 305 degrees pour onto a greased large cookie sheet. Sprinkle chocolate chips over the chocolate. As chocolate melts spread with a butter knife. Spread nuts evenly over the pan, shaking lightly until all nuts stick. Cool until hard. Break into pieces. Enjoy.
ingredients: coffee creamer, sugar substitute, cinnamon, cream of tartar
name: snickerdoodle coffee creamer

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken drumsticks, garlic powder, pepper, salt, olive oil, rosemary and parsley. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until chicken is cooked. Remove from heat and set aside.
ingredients: olive oil, chicken drumsticks, salt and black pepper, honey, fish sauce, soy sauce, lemons, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil
name: ramsay s sticky chicken drumsticks

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm.
ingredients: lite olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach, dry basil, salt, pepper
name: herbed spinach

steps: Place artichoke hearts and salt in a saucepan containing about 2 inches of water and bring to a boil. Cook until slightly tender. Pack in pint jars. Place a sliver of lemon and lime in each jar. Combine the oil, juices and garlic in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Pour immediately over the artichoke hearts and seal. Place caps on jars. Process for 20 mins. In a water bath canner.
ingredients: water-packed artichoke hearts, kalamata olive, roasted red pepper, feta cheese, red onions, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic clove, kosher salt, black pepper
name: marinated artichoke salad

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon-pepper seasoning, potatoes, butter, lemon juice, salt
name: reasonable lemon chicken and potatoes

steps: Place ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking.
ingredients: pork baby back ribs, vinaigrette dressing, lemon juice, barbecue sauce
name: bbq caesar pork ribs

steps: Boil steaks in pot until blood no longer visible. Drain. Mix ingredients together and bring to boil. Cover and let simmer over med heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cook until carrots reach desired tenderness. Serve with sticky white rice.
ingredients: flank steaks, soy sauce, rice wine, brown sugar, sesame seeds, green onions, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh ground black pepper
name: bul gal bi korean style bbq

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine gumdrop, red seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar, white vinegar, flourpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine gumdrop, red seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar, white vinegar, flourpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine gumdrop, red seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar, white vinegar, flourpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine gumdrop, red seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar, white vinegar, flourpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine gumdrop, red seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar, white vinegar, flourpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine gumdrop, red seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar, white vinegar, flourpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine gumdrop, red seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar, white vinegar, flourpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine gumdrop, red seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar, white vinegar, flourpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine gumdrop, red seedless grapes, mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar,
ingredients: gumdrop, red seedless grapes, miniature marshmallows, crushed pineapple, nuts, lemon, juice of, pineapple juice, sugar, white vinegar, flour
name: gumdrop salad

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until tender. Drain well. Add chicken broth, russet potatoes, half-and-half cream, sour cream, butter, egg, salt, fresh ground pepper. Mix into potatoes and serve immediately.
ingredients: chicken broth, russet potatoes, half-and-half cream, sour cream, butter, egg, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: kittencal s fluffy mashed potatoes

steps: In a medium sized pan, pour the oil and heat under high heat. After 1 minute, add the onions, garlic, and salt. Fry until onion and garlic are slightly turning gold. Add the chillies and continue frying. Keep stirring the whole time to avoid burning on the bottom of pan. When the onions and garlic look golden, but not browned, add chilli powder, turmeric and tuna. Stir the ingredients well for about 1 minute or so. Lower the heat to the lowest it can go. Now add the cabbage to the rest of the ingredients in the pot and gently stir around until the cabbage is fully coated with the rest of the ingredients. Place a lid on the pot and let it cook for about 30 minutes taste and see if the cabbage is cooked after 30 minutes. If not, leave it for another 5 min or so until you think its cooked. Goes well with rice or naan, or just as a side dish.
ingredients: bread, butter, mayonnaise, curry powder, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, paprika
name: curry and mayonnaise rusks

steps: Preheat oven to 190c grease a patty tin or use paper cups. Sift flour and baking powder. Cream fat and sugar until mixture is light and creamy. Add in vanilla essence. Beat egg and add it gradually to the mixture, beating well after each addition. Fold in the sifted flour with a metal spoon. Add a little milk if necessary to give it a soft dropping consistency. Mix in the raisins. Fill greased patty tin or paper cups half full with the mixture. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, caster sugar, cornflour, baking powder, cream, sugar, icing sugar, passion fruit pulp
name: fluffy sponge cake

steps: Preheat the oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 ovenproof dish. Boil the water and add the vodka, jalapenos, red chilies, green chilies, habaneros, dried chipotle chiles, lime, fresh horseradish, peppercorns and salt. Stir in the vodka, jalapenos, red chilies, green chilies, habaneros, dried chipotle chiles, lime, fresh horseradish, peppercorns and salt. Transfer in the 9x9 dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes.
ingredients: vodka, jalapenos, red chilies, green chilies, habaneros, dried chipotle chiles, lime, fresh horseradish, peppercorns
name: chili infused vodka

steps: In a large bowl, combine condensed milk, egg whites, granulated sugar, peppermint extract, green food coloring, mini chocolate chips. Blend well. Gradually fold in whipped cream. Add chocolate chips and mix well. Pour into a 9x5-inch freezer container. Cover and freeze at least 6 hours.
ingredients: egg whites, granulated sugar, peppermint extract, green food coloring, mini chocolate chips
name: mint julep kisses cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown.
ingredients: potatoes, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, dried oregano leaves, black pepper, garlic powder, water
name: greek roasted potatoes

steps: Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through.
ingredients: pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, canadian bacon, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, bearnaise sauce
name: easy eggs bearnaise

steps: In a small saucepan on medium heat, warm the vinegar and sugar together until the sugar dissolves. Set liquid aside to cool. Chop the dill. Slice the cucumber very thinly and arrange in layers on a shallow, non-reactive platter with sloped edges. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and garnish with the fresh dill. Pour the dressing over the cucumbers. Let marinate at least 1 hour or overnight. Yield is estimated.
ingredients: seedless european cucumber, cider, sugar, salt and pepper, red onion, fresh dill
name: cucumber dill salad

steps: Melt butter in slow cooker over medium heat. Add leeks, onions and potatoes and stir. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Add cream and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: potatoes, all-purpose flour, chicken stock, leeks, dried dill, bacon, half-and-half, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper
name: slow cooker potato leek soup

steps: Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of butter and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend until smooth and stir through cream. Divide into serving bowls and top with crispy bacon to serve.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, whole wheat flour, salt, pepper, milk, eggs
name: potato soup with whole wheat butter dumplings

steps: Place cabbage and onion in a colander. Rinse thoroughly with cold water to crisp. Let drain for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk cilantro, vinegar, oil and salt in a large bowl. Add cabbage and onion. Toss well to coat.
ingredients: cabbage, oil, white vinegar, white sugar, worcestershire sauce, cucumber
name: cole slaw for a crowd mayo free

steps: Preheat oven to 350-f degrees and thoroughly grease the inside of a single loaf pan. Reserve. In a large mixing bowl, sift flour and sugar together. Add grated cheddar cheese and chopped green onions. Thoroughly mix all ingredients together. Add beer and stir until the ingredients are uniformly moistened. Spoon bread dough mixture into a well-greased loaf pan. Bake for approximately 1 hour, or until the bread is golden brown and emits a hollow sound when tapped. Cool on wire rack, and store in an air-tight container. May freeze for up to 90 days. Slice to serve. Simply sift together the ingredients and store at room temperature in an air-tight container.
ingredients: self-rising flour, sugar, beer, cheddar cheese
name: the best easiest bread you ll ever make

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place cubed chicken in a ungreased rectangular baking dish, 13 x 9 x 2 inches. Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes, cook thoroughly. Meanwhile, start cooking your rice according to your package directions. Then in a large bowl, add the remaining ingredients and still well. When the chicken is done remove it from oven. Spoon in the ingredients from the bowl. Cover and cook for 30 minutes. Serve hot over rice and be sure to get lots of the juice.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, fresh mushrooms, boneless skinless chicken, shoestring carrots, quick-cooking long grain and wild rice mix, water, fresh parmesan cheese
name: savory chicken and rice skillet

steps: Combine first 5 ingredients, boil until soft ball stage. Remove from heat, then add butter & brown sugar. Stir around a few times and let cool slightly. Then add vanilla. Beat it and pour out onto buttered dish, or parchment covered dish. Cool, and cut into squares.
ingredients: brown sugar, evaporated milk, butter, vanilla
name: grandma s brown sugar fudge

steps: Peel and cut in bite size pieces all the vegetable. Peel and squash the garlic but do not cut it. Mix the vegetables, garlic and all remaining. Ingredients. Spread on a parchemin lined pan. Broil until nice and golden about half an hour.
ingredients: baby carrots, sweet potatoes, coriander powder, powdered cumin, whole cumin seed, butter, olive oil, clear honey, fresh parsley
name: sweet potatoes and carrots

steps: Combine soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy
ingredients: soy sauce, sugar, five-spice powder, sesame oil, pork belly
name: five spice roast pork belly

steps: In a 2-quart pitcher combine grape juice concentrate, cold water, vodka, lemon juice, sugar, ice cube, grapes, mint leaf. Stir in desired amount of sugar to taste. To serve, pour over ice cubes in glasses. If desired, tie a strip of grapefruit peel and a strip of grapefruit peel into a knot and use as a garnish. Serve at once.
ingredients: frozen grape juice concentrate, cold water, vodka, lemon juice, sugar, ice cube, grapes, mint leaf
name: alcoholic purple passion

steps: Melt together in top of a double boiler the morsels, instant coffee, and water. Cream together butter and sugar. Blend into the butterscotch mixture. Add flour alternately with the buttermilk to the creamed mixture. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Turn into a well-greased and floured bundt pan or a tube pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 55-60 minutes. Cool for 15 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: granulated sugar, butter, evaporated milk, butterscotch chips, rolled oats, flaked coconut
name: butterscotch no bakes

steps: Heat oil in wok 375 degrees. Add 1st 4 ingredients. Cook about one minute. Add remaining ingredients and heat through. Serve.
ingredients: ground round, noodles, water, mushroom gravy, cut green beans, french-fried onions, pepper, salt
name: beefy noodle one pot meal

steps: Place potatoes and water in 2 quart casserole dish, cover, and microwave on high 12-15 minutes, or until tender, stirring halfway through. Drain. Mix remaining ingredients, stir in potatoes gently. Cover, refrigerate 1 hour. Drain, reserving salad dressing mixture. Arrange potatoes on skewers. Place on grill over hot coals. Grill, covered for 4 minutes. Turn skewers, brush with reserved mixture, grill 4 minutes longer uncovered to crisp outside, covered if soft outside is preferred.
ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, ranch dressing mix, ground black pepper, salt
name: grilled ranch potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. Lightly grease a 26 x 16cm baking pan. Line with baking paper. Place apple sauce, fruit, sugar and all seeds in a bowl, mix to combine. Add oats, flour, coconut and eggs. Mix to combine. Place mixture in baking pan, use a flat bladed knife or spatula to spead evenly. Bake for 25 minutes, or until cooked and golden. Turn onto wire rack to cool. Cut into 8 piecec. Wrap in baking paper, then plastic wrap to store.
ingredients: apples, rolled oats, sweetened flaked coconut, sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, puffed rice cereal, dates, sunflower seed butter
name: royal energy bars

steps: In a 4-quart saucepan, over medium-high heat, bring the water, cranberries, sugar, apricots, currants, raisins & vinegar to a boil, stirring often. Reduce heat & simmer, stirring occasionally, until cranberries begin to pop, 5-8 minutes. Meanwhile, peel the tangerines, removing & discarding the peel & white fibers. Discard the seeds, then separate the segments & coarsely chop them. Add the chopped tangerines & the juice to the pan, & simmer to blend flavors, 2-3 minutes. Stir in pecans, then cool to room temperature & serve. Or chill & serve. Can be kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator up to 3 days, or frozen for up to 1 month.
ingredients: tangerines, water, cranberries, tart green apples, sugar, slivered almonds
name: cranberry tangerine sauce with apples almonds

steps: In a large saucepan heat butter and olive oil over medium-low heat. Add onion and cook for three minutes. Add apple and cabbage, and cook for five minutes. Stir in vinegar, salt, pepper, and honey. Cover and cook for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is soft.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic clove, red cabbage, green apples, white wine vinegar, sugar, fresh dill, salt and pepper
name: vegan honey cooked cabbage

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Toss together berries and apples, spread evenly over bottom of 8x8 baking dish. In medium bowl combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and oats. Using pastry cutter work butter into oat mixture until crumbly. Spread over fruit, pressing down lightly. Bake 40-45 minutes or until top is lightly browned. Cool before serving. Top with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: mixed berries, cornstarch, butter, old fashioned oats, brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, water
name: mixed berry crisp

steps: In a large non-stick skillet, cook the ground beef mixture, cheese, and tomatoes until the beef is no longer pink, stir frequently. Drain. In a 4-quart slow cooker, add the ground beef mixture, cheese, and tomatoes. Stir to mix. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or until the cheese is melted and mixture is well heated. Stir after 2 hours. Add in the onions, stir to combine. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic, whole kernel corn, rotel, cream cheese, asadero cheese
name: mexican hash

steps: Sift together the dry ingredients. Beat egg slightly and mix with the water. Add the dry ingredients. Stir only until combined. Mixture will be slightly lumpy. Dip shrimp, chunky-cut chicken and vegetables, etc. Into the batter and deep fry until golden brown. Drain on paper towels.
ingredients: egg, water, baking soda, all-purpose flour
name: japanese very light tempura batter

steps: In a medium size glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, and salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips.
ingredients: fresh cilantro, green onions, red wine vinegar, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, hot pepper sauce, salt, water, french bread
name: bread dippin cilantro salsa

steps: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: eggs, butter, curry powder, mayonnaise, bread, ham
name: egg and ham sandwich england

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add onion and cook on low heat until the onion is translucent. Add garlic and onion mixture and cook until the onion is translucent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge.
ingredients: onion, minced garlic cloves, vegetable oil, carrot, chilies, white vinegar, lime juice, salt
name: slim s hot pepper sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Grease 9x 13 pan. Beat everything together. Pour into pan. Bake 30-35 minutes until center tests clean with knife or toothpick. Remove from oven and let cool completely before cutting into squares. Important to cool completely so it sets up firmly before cutting.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, margarine, dry roasted peanuts, miniature marshmallows, wax paper, candy sprinkles
name: rocky road halloween squares

steps: Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Garnish with salsa, sour cream.
ingredients: hamburger, onion, garlic, tomato sauce, black beans, ground cayenne pepper, chili powder, flour tortillas
name: quick beef and bean burritos

steps: In a large nonstick saut pan over medium heat, combine cooked rice and whole milk. Heat until mixture begins to boil. Decrease heat to low and cook to a simmer, stirring frequently, until mixture just begins to thicken, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to medium, add heavy cream, coconut milk, sugar, and cardamom. Continue to cook until mixture just begins to thicken again, approximately 5-10 minutes. Use a whisk to prevent the cardamom from clumping. Once mixture begins to thicken, remove from heat and stir in raisins and pistachios. Transfer the mixture to individual serving dishes or a glass bowl and place plastic wrap directly on the surface of the pudding. Serve chilled or at room temperature. I like my chocolate chip flirt rice pudding a little sweet, so i also added a little bit more sugar than the 2 oz. Called for in the recipe to suit my personal taste.
ingredients: full-cream milk, cream, orange, zest of, brown sugar, risotto rice, dark chocolate
name: chocolate chip flirt rice pudding from nyc s rice to riches

steps: Heat grill to medium-high heat. Using aluminum foil, create an oblong cooking tray to be placed directly on grill. Place salmon fillet in center of tray. Season first with garlic salt, sprinkle with brown sugar, and then cover with pieces of butter. Top with sliced red onions. Pour beer of choice into tray to just below the highest point of the fillet. Cover tray with aluminum foil to envelope fish completely. Pour
ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, smoked bacon, red onion, button mushrooms, lemon zest, red wine vinegar, rosemary, sugar
name: salmon with bacon and mushrooms

steps: Mix together shortbread cookies, pecan chips, butter, philadelphia cream cheese, cool whip, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk
ingredients: shortbread cookies, pecan chips, butter, philadelphia cream cheese, cool whip, powdered sugar, instant lemon pudding, milk
name: lorna doone lemon dessert

steps: Add water to a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Stir in the oats, raisins, apricots, figs, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, cardamom, and salt. Lower heat to med-low. Simmer, uncovered, for about 5-10 minutes or until the liquid is absorbed and the fruit softened.
ingredients: quick-cooking oats, water, raisins, cardamom
name: oatmeal with cardamom and raisins

steps: Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, butter, sour cream, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, crushed red pepper flakes
name: oven baked asparagus with mustard sauce

steps: In large heavy saucepan, cook bacon until crisp. Add onion and green pepper. Simmer 10 minutes or until smooth. Add the herbs just before spooning into bowls. Simmer
ingredients: bacon, onion, creamed corn, potato, canned tomatoes, salt, sugar, pepper, boiling water, evaporated milk
name: helms bakery corn chowder

steps: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients mixing well. If mixture looks a little too dry, add a little more mayonnaise until. Desired moistness is reached. Now taste to see if seasonings need to be adjusted. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
ingredients: romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, fat-free italian salad dressing, pepper, medium cheddar, ham, reduced-fat smoked turkey breast, egg, egg white
name: nif s light and lean chef s salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a medium bowl, stir together the chicken, pesto, and melted butter until chicken is evenly coated. Place english muffin halves, cut sides up, on a baking sheet. Divide the chicken mixture evenly among the muffin halves. Bake about 10 minutes or until chicken mixture is heated through. Top muffins with the bacon pieces. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake for 2 to 3 minutes more or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: bacon, cooked chicken, english muffins, mild red onions, tomatoes, cheddar cheese
name: chicken muffin sandwiches

steps: In a small bowl combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Stir until blended. In a medium bowl, place the egg yolks, cream, and butter. Whisk until well mixed. Stir the dry ingredients into the cream mixture. Whisk until well mixed and smooth. Heat the waffle iron. Brush lightly with butter if not nonstick. Beat the egg whites until stiff, then fold them gently into the batter. Cook until waffles are golden, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, eggs, butter, milk
name: the best ever waffles

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges.
ingredients: butter, onion, canned tomatoes, cheese, egg yolks, salt, pepper, parsley
name: italian eggs

steps: In a large bowl, mix onion, plain yogurt, garlic, ginger, ground cumin, peppercorn, ground nutmeg, buffalo. Add beef to the marinade and let rest for 10 minutes. On metal skewers or presoaked bamboo skewers, thread beef cubes by alternating with green onion. Set the barbecue to medium high. Brush the beef skewers with the marinade and put on a oiled grill of the barbecue. Close cover and cook about 10 minutes or until beef is grilled but still pink inside.
ingredients: onion, plain yogurt, garlic, ginger, ground cumin, peppercorn, ground nutmeg, buffalo
name: buffalo skewers

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh basil, red pepper flakes, french bread, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: french bread pizza a step up

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, red cabbage, white vinegar, sugar, mustard seeds, salt and pepper
name: sauteed red cabbage

steps: Heat oven to 180deg. Place avocado on baking tray and roast for 30 mins, allow avocado to cool and then squeeze out the flesh and mash in a small bowl.
