Add the olive oil, balsamic vinegar and dijon mustard and whish well together. Season with salt and pepper. Chop bacon into bite sized pieces, then grill or dry fry for 3-5 mins or until crisp. Place salad leaves into bowl and add bacon, onion, tomato and avocado. Toss well. Whisk the dressing ingredients again to ensure they are mixed well and then pour over salad.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, lime, garlic clove, cayenne, coarse salt, avocado, yellow bell pepper, cherry tomatoes, scallion, cilantro
name: avocado with bell pepper and tomatoes

steps: Preheat grill to medium-high. Spread butter on corn. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Top with ice cubes. Center corn inside 1 reynolds hot bag, large size. Double fold ends to form packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Grill 15-20 minutes, covered, turning packet over once halfway through cooking. Cut open top of foil bag, carefully, using a sharp knife. Allow steam to escape, fold back foil.
ingredients: dried ancho chile, warm water, cilantro, garlic, fresh lime juice, sugar, kosher salt, butter, corn on the cob
name: corn on the cob with garlic ancho butter

steps: In a large frypan, heat oil over medium high heat. Add chicken season with pepper. Cook 3 to 4 min on each side. Remove chicken and set aside. Reduce heat to low-medium, add garlic and saute. Then add chicken season with pepper. Then add chicken season
ingredients: whole chickens, butter, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, carrots, sherry wine vinegar, tomatoes, fresh parsley, salt & pepper
name: chicken in sherry vinegar

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium-low heat. Add mustard and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: sourdough bread, mustard, smoked ham, brie cheese, butter
name: grilled ham and brie sandwiches

steps: Heat oven to 350c. Cut two 40cms lengths of foil and layer on top of each other. Top with a piece of baking paper. Place feta in middle of baking paper. Sprinkle with thyme or other herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Drizzle with oil. Fold paper and foil edges and turn upwards to seal and form a parcel. Place parcel on a baking tray. Bake 20 minutes till feta is heated through and slightly soft. Serve warm with crackers and olives.
ingredients: feta cheese, cream cheese, eggs, fresh dill, salt, pepper, phyllo pastry sheets, butter
name: feta squares

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the onion. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, butter, garlic powder, pepper, paprika
name: snowy mashed potatoes

steps: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. Add minced garlic and lightly saute just until fragrant. Stir in the flour and stir for about one minute. This will be thick. Slowly pour in the milk. Add salt, pepper, oregano and nutmeg. Stir until creamy and thick. Turn off the heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Serve over your choice of pasta.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, half-and-half, garlic powder, italian cheese blend, salt and pepper
name: easy homemade alfredo sauce

steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat. Add the goat cheese, and cook for 2 minutes on each side, or until nicely browned. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook for about 8 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: tomatoes, goat cheese, salt and black pepper, olive oil, oregano, chicken breast fillets, bacon
name: bacon wrapped goat cheese chicken breasts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a 9x13 baking sheet with parchment paper. Line a 9x13 baking sheet
ingredients: chocolate wafer pie crust, banana, sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, nonfat milk, mini marshmallows, cool whip lite, raspberries
name: raspberry cream marshmallow puff pie

steps: Mix crushed pineapple, cornstarch and salt in small saucepan. Stir in pineapple, lemon juice and mustard. Cook over medium heat stirring constantly until mixture thickens and boils. Boil and stir for one minute. Remove ham about 20 minutes before done, pour drippings from pan. Cut fat surface of ham in diamond shapes. Pour glaze over or pat on with brush. Bake 20 more minutes at 325.
ingredients: crushed pineapple, brown sugar, cornstarch, salt, lemon juice, dijon mustard
name: simple pineapple sauce for ham

steps: Place potatoes in a large pot and fill with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil and cook until tender, about 8-10 minutes, depending on the size of the potato cubes. Meanwhile, fry bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned and crisp. Remove bacon from the skillet to drain on paper towels. Add the onions to the bacon grease in the skillet and fry until tender, stirring often. Drain excess grease. When the potatoes are done, drain the water out of pot and mash. Mix in the buttermilk until you get your desired consistency. Crumble in the bacon and stir in the onions. You can also stir in between 1-2 tablespoons of the bacon grease if you like. Mix together and serve.
ingredients: bacon, mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, smoked turkey breast, bread
name: bacon and mashed potato sandwich

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies.
ingredients: peanut butter, oatmeal, honey, whey protein
name: no bake easy energy bars

steps: Cook the asparagus in a small amount of water until crisp tender, about 4 minutes. Drain well and place in a large bowl. Combine the remaining ingredients and pour over asparagus. Toss to coat. Cover and chill for 1 hour. Toss gently to mix. Transfer to a platter and sprinkle with thyme and lemon zest, optional.
ingredients: asparagus, olive oil, paprika, ground cumin, garlic granules, mayonnaise, lime, fresh cilantro
name: smoked paprika sauce for asparagus and other veggies

steps: Cook and drain orzo. Saute garlic herb orzo in oil for 10 minutes, until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Add chicken, stir-fry until browned, about 5 minutes. Stir in orzo, garlic and broth. Heat until boiling. Reduce heat, cover and simmer about 8 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer about 8 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Bring
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, orzo pasta, long grain rice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, green onions, fresh basil leaf, fresh italian parsley, salt
name: garlic herb orzo and rice pliaf

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: olive oil, baby carrots, lemon, cumin, cinnamon, kosher salt, red pepper, cilantro
name: moroccan spiced baby carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Continue stuffing breasts until all breasts are used. If you have left over stuffing go back and open breasts and continue stuffing until all stuffing is used. Combine soup and sour cream. Spread over chicken breasts. Cover and bake for 45 minutes to an hour until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: chicken breast halves, mozzarella cheese, water, cream of chicken soup, chicken stuffing mix, margarine
name: baked chicken and dressing

steps: Wash, dry and slice mushrooms. Cook in butter till tender. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly.
ingredients: wild rice mix, butter, herb seasoning mix, water, vegetable oil, button mushrooms, baby portabella mushrooms, shallot, fresh thyme
name: wild rice with mushrooms

steps: Heat oven to 500 degrees. Line shallow roasting pan with foil. Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray. Heat oil in small nonstick skillet over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic. Cook 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic begins to soften. Remove from heat. Stir in brown sugar until well mixed. Place chicken breast halves in sprayed foil-lined pan. Spread garlic mixture evenly over chicken. Bake at 500 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear.
ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, garlic cloves, saffron, cilantro, water, kalamata olives, lemon, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: algerian chicken and olive stew

steps: Dissolve jello gelatin in boiling water. Add pineapple juice and refrigerate 1 hour to cool. Also chill the condensed milk for 1 hour.
ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, boiling water, whipping cream, cream cheese, crushed pineapple, mini marshmallows, nuts
name: grandma lula s lime salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease and flour a 9x13-inch baking dish. Stir together sugar, brown sugar, eggs and oil in a medium bowl until smooth. Stir in flour and vanilla. Add pecans and stir until evenly mixed. Spoon into prepared pan and bake for 30 to 35 minutes. Good served with a dollop of whipped cream, enjoy.
ingredients: butter, light brown sugar, eggs, salt, flour, vanilla extract, pecans
name: old post office charleston chewy cake

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Grease or spray a large cookie sheet. Stir together dry ingredients including the sugar. Cut butter into flour mixture. Add raisins, stir to mix well. Beat egg in measuring cup. Add milk to make 1 cup. Stir into flour. Drop roughly tablespoon size scoops on cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, cake flour, baking powder, table salt, unsalted butter, raisins, whole milk, egg
name: easy buttery drop raisin scones

steps: Preheat oven to 475 degrees f. Toss peas, shallot, oil, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Transfer to a baking sheet and spread in a single layer. Roast in the oven, stirring once halfway through, until the peas are tender and beginning to brown slightly, 12 to 14 minutes. Serve warm, sprinkled with bacon if desired.
ingredients: sugar snap pea, water, garlic, cherry tomatoes, salt and pepper, cooking spray
name: sugar snap peas with tomatoes and garlic

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: baked beans, bacon, onions, green peppers, red peppers, brown sugar, molasses, hot sauce, crushed pineapple
name: bar t 5 baked beans

steps: In a resealable plastic bag, combine chicken and salad dressing. Set aside in refrigerator for 20 minutes. Remove chicken from marinade, reserving marinade. Warm oil in a medium skillet over med-high heat. Add chicken and cook 5 minutes, or until no longer pink, turning occasionally. Stir in reserved marinade and tomatoes with juice. Heat to boiling, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 15 minutes, or until a thermometer in thickest portion registers 160 degrees and juices run clear.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, olive oil, oregano, garlic, pepper, fresh parsley, kalamata olive, capers, diced tomatoes
name: chicken thighs with tomatoes olives and capers

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Combine the biscuit mix, cheese, oregano, brown and serve sausages. Bake at 400 degrees for 12 to 14 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, parmesan cheese, dried oregano, brown and serve sausages
name: sausage biscuit bites

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f, and coat baking sheet with cooking spray. Whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in large bowl. Stir in butter and cheese. Stir in buttermilk, and mix until dough just comes together. Scrape out onto well-floured work surface, and pat dough to -inch thickness. Cut out biscuits with 2 -inch diameter round cutter. Repeat with remaining scraps of dough until you have 8 biscuits, and transfer biscuits to prepared baking sheet. Sprinkle red pepper sauce on tops of biscuits. Bake 12 to 15 minutes, or until puffed and golden. Serve hot.
ingredients: almond meal, baking soda, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, eggs, honey, butter, lemon juice
name: scd gluten free cheddar biscuits

steps: Boil ice in a large saucepan over high heat. When water comes to a rapid boil, turn off heat, put the tea bags into water and cover. After the tea has steeped about 1 hour, pour the sugar into a 2-quart pitcher, then add tea. The tea should still be warm so the sugar will dissolve easily. Add lemon juice. Chill. Makes 2 quarts.
ingredients: ice cubes, kiwi fruits, orange juice, powdered sugar, granulated sugar
name: kiwi slush

steps: Heat oven to 200oc. Make a small cut at the top of each fig and push in a little piece of gorgonzola. Wrap each fig in a slice of prosciutto. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes. The cheese will melt and the prosciutto will be crisp. Serve immediately on rocket leaves dressed in olive oil and salt, and finish with a little finely cracked pepper.
ingredients: honey, water, orange blossom water, fresh figs, yogurt, pistachios
name: grilled fig and orange blossom yogurt sundaes

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Roast 10 minutes, stir, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and roast an additional 10 to 15 minutes until vegetables are slightly charred and tender.
ingredients: asparagus spear, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic paste, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, chives
name: roasted garlic asparagus supreme

steps: Heat butter in saucepan over low heat until melted. Stir in brown sugar and corn syrup. Heat to boiling over medium heat, stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute. Remove from heat. Stir in cereal and peanuts until well coated. Drop mixture by tablespoonfuls onto waxed paper. Cool.
ingredients: cheerios toasted oat cereal, granola cereal, dried cranberries, brown sugar, honey, creamy peanut butter
name: peanut butter energy bites

steps: Boil noodles until just tender-crisp, about 3 minutes. Add noodles and stir until noodles are tender-crisp, about 3 minutes. Add the bbq sauce and peanut butter, stir until sauce is smooth. Toss sauce and vegetables with noodles and garnish with chopped peanuts.
ingredients: spaghetti, fresh snow peas, cooked chicken breasts, red bell pepper, green onion, sesame seeds, teriyaki sauce, dark sesame oil, salt and pepper, chili oil
name: chinese chicken noodle salad

steps: In a large mixing bowl, place a paper bowl in the middle of the bowl. Resting the cob on the bowl in a vertical position remove only the tops of the kernel with a knife, using long smooth downward strokes and rotating the cob as you go. After the cob has been stripped, use the dull backside of your knife to scrape any remaining pulp and milk off the cob. Add the corn and pulp mixture to the saucepan and cook over medium high until the juice from the corn has tightened. Add the rosemary. Sprinkle the corn with the sugar and turmeric. Stir constantly for about 2 minutes. Sprinkle the cornmeal onto the corn, using a whisk to combine well. Add the heavy cream and cook until the corn has softened, about 2 to 3 minutes. Remove the rosemary. Season with freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: bacon fat, fresh corn, salt, fresh ground black pepper, unsalted butter
name: meme s creamed corn from virginia willis

steps: Mix together the first 9 ingredients in a slow cooker. Cover and cook on high for 1 hour. Gently smash the beans along the side of the crockery. Sprinkle with cheese, cover, and cook for 30 more minutes. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: cream cheese, black beans, rotel, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese
name: black bean dip

steps: Boil a large pot of water enough to cover the spaghetti squash. Cut the spaghetti squash into 4 pieces. Season with whatever you want, i used garlic salt and onion powder. Once boiling add the squash, onions, garlic and butter. Cook for 20 min covered. Remove and separate spaghetti from the skin.
ingredients: spaghetti squash, water, butter, salt and pepper
name: buttered spaghetti squash noodles

steps: In a large skillet, heat the oil and garlic over medium heat. Add chicken to the skillet and cook for 7 - 10 minutes. Season with black pepper. Add white wine and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Remove chicken to a platter. Saute tomatoes in the skillet until tender. Place tomatoes over the chicken and cover with pan drippings.
ingredients: chicken, onion, garlic cloves, mushrooms, tomatoes, dry white wine, balsamic vinegar, dried thyme, salt, pepper
name: chicken in wine

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Slice potatoes lengthwise into 3 slices each. Place in a 2-quart greased casserole dish. Saut garlic in olive oil, then add pork chops and brown lightly on both sides. Place thin sliced onions over pork chops. Mix sour cream, dry mustard, salt and ground pepper. Pour mixture over onions. Bake uncovered for 90 minutes, or until pork chops are well done.
ingredients: potatoes, egg, flour, cabbage, margarine, salt, ground pepper
name: mom s haluski

steps: In a 3 quart saucepan, melt butter and saute onions. Add potatoes, water, and bouillon cubes. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium. Cook just until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place frozen broccoli and cheddar cheese in crock pot on low to start melting and thawing. Once the potatoes are done, using a hand blender, blend contents of saucepan to desired consistency and then pour into the crock pot. Heat on low until warmed.
ingredients: broccoli, onion, chicken stock, blue cheese, bay leaf, salt, pepper, lemon juice
name: broccoli and stilton cheese soup

steps: In a saucepan over low heat, bring the rhubarb, sugar, and 2 cups of water to a boil. Simmer until rhubarb is soft. Add the rest of the water. Bring to a boil again and remove from heat. Mix the cornstarch and a bit of water separately. Add to the saucepan and let simmer for a few minutes. Remove from heat and let cool. Serve with a bit of granulated sugar sprinkled on top.
ingredients: rhubarb, sugar, water, club soda
name: rhubarb soda

steps: Put carrots in pan and cover with water. Simmer until tender, about 10 to 15 minutes. Drain. Return carrots to pan and add the lemon and parsley
ingredients: carrots, celery, head of cabbage, lemon
name: memory booster

steps: Heat oven to 190c. Peel, quarter and thinly slice celeriac - can be done with slicing blade of food processor. Toss celeriac with walnut oil, season to taste. Place in a gratin dish, spread out evenly. Pour over stock, bake for 45 minutes. Scatter with walnuts and crumble over blue cheese. Cook another 15 minutes till crisp and golden.
ingredients: celery ribs, blue cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, walnuts
name: stuffed celery sticks

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix butter, sugar, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, egg, salt, walnuts, cinnamon, peaches and bake for 15 minutes.
ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, baking powder, milk, egg, salt, walnuts, cinnamon, peaches
name: fresh peach and nut cake or cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray a 9x9 baking dish with cooking spray. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: bacon, butter, onion, garlic cloves, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, potatoes, gruyere, salt and pepper
name: cheese potatoes poutine precurser

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat butter, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown.
ingredients: unsalted butter, bread flour, kosher salt, baking soda, sugar, brown sugar, egg, egg yolk, milk, vanilla extract
name: chocolate chipless chocolate chip cookies

steps: Mix vinegar, salt, garlic and pepper. Toss to coat. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh spinach, oranges, fresh mushrooms, oil, lemon juice, honey, poppy seed, garlic powder, slivered almonds
name: spinach orange salad

steps: In a large pot with boiling salted water cook pasta until al dente. Drain. In a large saucepan heat the italian dressing and olive oil together over medium heat. Add drained spaghetti. Toss well to coat. Add chopped tomatoes, cooked chicken, and grated parmesan cheese and toss lightly. Serve warm.
ingredients: spaghetti, italian salad dressing, fresh tomatoes, smoked turkey breast, parmesan cheese
name: 15 minute pasta combo

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: cauliflower, egg, mozzarella cheese, oregano, parsley
name: cauliflower pizza crust

steps: Add butter, curry powder, salt, tomatoes, onion, shrimp, lemon juice, sour cream, avocadoserve on a bed of lettuce for salad. Sprinkle a little paprika on top for color.
ingredients: butter, curry powder, salt, tomatoes, onion, shrimp, lemon juice, sour cream, avocado
name: hot shrimp avocado halves

steps: Place the cake mix and pudding mix in a large bowl and stir well. Add the mandarin oranges in their liquid and the egg substitute. Beat for about 2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and the oranges are pureed. Spray a 12-cup bundt pan well and spread batter evenly. Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the top springs back when touched and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Allow cake to cool in the pan for 45 minutes, then invert onto a platter. Sprinkle powdered sugar on top, if desired. Sprinkle powdered sugar
ingredients: lemon supreme cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, vegetable oil, eggs, lemon gelatin, water
name: luscious lemon bundt cake

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, onion, roma tomatoes, black olives, oregano, french style green beans, salt and pepper, feta cheese
name: greek style green beans with tomatoes and feta cheese

steps: In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until richly browned on the bottom, about 8 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 7 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the
ingredients: broccoli, butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, mozzarella cheese
name: broccoli in garlic butter

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: yellow cornmeal, baking mix, baking powder, eggs, honey, milk, butter
name: quick cornbread

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add broccoli, carrots, diced tomato, black olives, black beans, italian sausage, garlic cloves, escarole, chicken broth, cannellini beans, parmesan cheese. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse with cold water. In a large bowl, mix broccoli, carrots, diced tomato, black olives, black beans, italian sausage, garlic cloves, escarole, chicken broth, cannellini beans, parmesan cheese.
ingredients: pasta, olive oil, italian sausage, garlic cloves, escarole, chicken broth, cannellini beans, parmesan cheese
name: greens n beans pasta with italian sausage

steps: Spread cream cheese across the top of the sandwich. Spread cheese on top. Cover and refrigerate. Serve with crackers or cocktail breads. Makes about 2 cups.
ingredients: light cream cheese, garlic cloves, red bell pepper, cucumbers, carrots, green onion, hellmanns mayonnaise, salt
name: veggie cream cheese sandwich spread

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired.
ingredients: apple butter, pumpkin, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground ginger, eggs, evaporated milk, unbaked pie shell
name: apple butter pumpkin pie

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll squares into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: sausage, cheddar cheese, hash brown potatoes, pizza crust, parmesan cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper
name: breakfast sausage pizza

steps: Place cucumbers and onion in a bowl. Combine rest of the ingredients in a measuring cup. Stir well. Pour over cucumbers and onions. Chill for 4 hours.
ingredients: plain yogurt, lemon, juice of, garlic cloves, cucumber, dried dill, salt & pepper
name: cucumber yogurt dip

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring frequently, for about 4 minutes or until onions turn pink and are thoroughly cooked. Add the shrimp, onion and garlic and cook, stirring frequently, for about 4 minutes or until onions turn pink and are thoroughly cooked
ingredients: olive oil, frozen chopped onions, cooked brown rice, unsweetened pineapple chunks, anaheim chili, small shrimp, fresh cilantro
name: ww tv dinner thai shrimp rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Set aside half of the cheese. Mix the remaining cheese with the remaining ingredients. Spread mixture into an 8x8 or 9x9 baking dish. Top with remaining cheese. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: stilton cheese, unsalted butter, dry white wine, green peppercorns, heavy cream, parsley
name: stilton green peppercorn sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, pepper and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve.
ingredients: potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, flat leaf parsley, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, chicken
name: italian oven roasted chicken and potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Skewer 3 whole figs onto each sprig of rosemary. In a small bowl combine maple syrup, vinegar, and mustard. Place skewers into an oiled baking dish and roast for 30 min. Spoon maple syrup mixture over figs and continue roasting for 15 min basting occasionally.
ingredients: figs, sugar, fresh lemon juice, lemons, cinnamon sticks
name: fresh fig preserves

steps: Mix all ingredients together. Let chill for 2-3 hours.
ingredients: pumpkin, sugar-free fat-free butterscotch pudding, water, fat-free whipped topping, vanilla extract, cinnamon, ground nutmeg
name: pumpkin fluff

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Grease 2 baking sheets. Sift together flour, cinnamon, baking soda and nutmeg. Set aside. Beat the butter and brown sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer at high speed until well blended. Beat in the eggs and apple juice. Gradually add the flour to the butter mixture, beating at low speed until well blended. Stir in the apple and pecans. Drop the dough by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, light molasses, egg, flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, ground cloves, nutmeg
name: amish christmas cookies

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: farfalle pasta, extra virgin olive oil, hot italian sausage, garlic, fresh basil, cherry tomatoes, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper
name: farfalle with hot italian sausage tomatoes and basil

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a greased 10 x 15 cookie sheet evenly with graham crackers. Combine brown sugar and butter and bring to a boil in microwave or on stovetop. Pour mixture over crackers and sprinkle with nuts and chips. Bake for 10 minutes. Cool in refrigerator. Cut or separate into bars.
ingredients: whole wheat honey graham crackers, rolled oats, sugar, brown sugar, flour, butter, egg, vanilla, semisweet chocolate pieces, smoked almonds
name: oat n toffee grahams

steps: Melt chocolate in microwave on high for 60 seconds. Stir and continue to cook on high for another 30 seconds or until chocolate is completely melted. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Add powdered sugar and continue beating until well blended. Stir in chocolate, vanilla and extract flavouring. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until firm. Shape into 1 inch balls. Roll into cocoa, powdered sugar, nuts or dip into melted chocolate. Store in refrigerator. Alternative. Use white chocolate in place of semi-sweet chips and follow same directions.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, egg yolk, butter, liqueur, icing sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder
name: chocolate truffles with liqueur

steps: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan, over medium high heat. Add the onion, water, sugar, salt and saffron to the pan and bring to a boil over medium high heat, then reduce heat to medium low, partially cover the pan and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove the pan from heat and let stand 5 minutes without removing lid. Fluff with a fork and stir in the pistachios just before serving.
ingredients: olive oil, basmati rice, onion, water, salt, apricot, currants, sliced almonds, cilantro leaves
name: bollywood basmati

steps: Cook cauliflower in boiling water until tender-crisp. Drain. Put cauliflower in an oven-safe casserole dish. Combine milk, soup, mayonnaise, cheese and curry powder. Pour over cauliflower. Combine butter and cracker crumbs. Sprinkle over cauliflower. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes.
ingredients: cauliflower, bisquick, water, oil, salt
name: deep fried cauliflower

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix first 4 ingredients with hand or stand mixer on medium until softened and well mixed. Add next two ingredients and mix on med-low until just incorporated. Transfer mixture to a small ovenproof dish and sprinkling cayenne on top to taste. Top with cheddar. Bake for 15 - 18 minutes or until bubbling around the edges. Remove from oven and allow to set for 5 - 7 minutes before serving. Serve with fried or baked pita wedges and tortilla chips.
ingredients: cream cheese, parmesan cheese, onions, thyme, frozen chopped spinach, whipping cream, pimientos, worcestershire sauce, garlic salt
name: crock pot creamy spinach dip

steps: Place berries in a large saucepan and add vinegar and spices. Boil for 30 minutes. Add sugar and boil for an additional 30 minutes or until thickened sufficiently. Stir occasionally after adding sugar to prevent scorching. Pour into sterilized jars and seal.
ingredients: fresh blueberries, sugar, orange juice, lemons
name: stewed blueberries

steps: Place the mayonnaise mixture in a large mixing bowl. Add the flour, baking powder, salt, cayenne pepper, vinegar, olive oil, salt, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne
ingredients: egg yolk, dijon mustard, salt, cayenne pepper, vinegar, olive oil
name: handmade basic mayonnaise

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
ingredients: grape tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, fresh basil
name: roasted grape tomatoes

steps: In a resealable bag, combine orange juice, lemon juice, ginger ale, canned pears, seedless grapes, maraschino cherry. In a small bowl, whisk together orange juice, lemon juice, ginger ale, canned pears, seedless grapes, maraschino cherry. In a small bowl, whisk together orange juice, lemon juice, ginger ale
ingredients: orange jell-o, orange juice, lemon juice, ginger ale, canned pears, seedless grapes, maraschino cherry
name: fruit mold

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix peaches and raspberries, and place in bottom of 3 qt casserole dish. Using fork, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and cinnamon. Stir in eggs using fork. Batter will be quite dry. Pour over top of fruit. Pour melted butter of top. Place in oven and cook for 1 hour.
ingredients: peaches, whole wheat flour, brown sugar, cinnamon, margarine
name: peachy cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done.
ingredients: white flour, fine sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, coconut flakes, butter, milk, vanilla, banana
name: toasted coconut and banana drop biscuits

steps: Heat the oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a ovenproof skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon.
ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, sea salt, wasabi powder, sour cream
name: roasted salmon with wasabi cream

steps: In a medium-size bowl, combine 4 t. Of the reserved herring liquid, the sour cream, onion, dill, and pepper. Mix until smooth. Add the herring and toss to coat evenly. Cover and chill for about an hour to blend the flavors.
ingredients: herring fillets, fresh dill, chives, sour cream, lemon, juice of, sugar, mustard, salt, white pepper, jar
name: finnish layered midsummer herring

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally.
ingredients: chicken, potatoes, onion, rosemary sprigs, salt, pepper, olive oil, garlic cloves
name: frango moda do alentejana chicken with potatoes and ga

steps: Sift dry ingrediants in one bowl, and, using a fork, lightly beat the wet ingrediants in a serapate bowl. Add the dry into the wet and add the chocolate chips, mixing until just combined. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my waffle iron. This recipe yeilds 4 square waffles for me. These freeze well.
ingredients: low-fat buttermilk, egg, egg whites, vegetable oil, all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, cornmeal, rolled oats, baking powder, sugar
name: four grain waffles

steps: Heat oil in large frying pan. Saute chicken and onion until chicken is no longer pink & onions are translucent. Add cream, mushrooms, paprika & chicken base. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5-7 minutes or until chicken is tender. Remove from heat and stir in sour cream. Mixture will be somewhat thin, but should be a creamy texture like the consistency of a white sauce. Serve hot with warmed flour tortillas and spanish rice.
ingredients: adobo seasoning, worcestershire sauce, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, unsalted butter, yellow onion, garlic cloves, light beer, sliced mushrooms, cornstarch
name: pollo pendejo foolproof chicken

steps: Combine all ingredients, except rum& flavouring in a heavy pot. Bring to a boil to melt butter& combine well. Remove from heat. Stir in rum& flavouring. Refrigerate in a covered container.
ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, dark rum, heavy cream, salt, dry instant coffee, vanilla extract
name: rum mocha chocolate sauce

steps: Heat oil in a non stick skillet. Add garlic and saute for one minute. Add vidalias shallots and saute for one minute. Add sliced vidalias shallots and saute for one minute.
ingredients: vidalia onions, baby portabella mushrooms, shallots, unsalted butter, carrots, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, balsamic vinegar
name: my best steak side dish with vidalias shallots portabellas

steps: Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoon jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing.
ingredients: pear halves, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, cherries
name: pear or pineapple salad

steps: Scoop egg yolks into bowl. Set aside egg whites. Add mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper to yolks. Mash together with fork until smooth. Spoon mixture into egg white halves. Sprinkle tops with paprika,.
ingredients: egg, mustard, white vinegar, sugar, miracle whip
name: grandma s deviled eggs

steps: Heat the oil in a wok over medium-low heat. Add the bok choy, green onions, mushrooms, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, salt and black pepper. Cook, stirring often, 5 minutes. Stir in the bok choy and coconut milk. Cook, stirring until the leaves are tender and stalks are still crunchy, 3-6 minutes. Cook, stirring until the leaves are tender and stalks are still crunchy, 3-
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, ground ginger, ground black pepper, bok choy, chicken bouillon cube, soy sauce, granulated sugar, cornstarch
name: bok choy stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 12 cup muffin tin with cooking spray. In a large bowl, mix together flour, bran flakes, baking soda, baking powder and salt. In a medium bowl, combine applesauce, banana and shredded apple. Add sugar and egg to wet ingredients. Add wet ingredients to flour mixture, stirring just until combined. Fill muffin tins and bake for about 25 minutes or until tests clean.
ingredients: wheat bran, almond milk, unsweetened applesauce, egg, brown sugar, vanilla extract, whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt
name: healthy bran muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking sheet. Place squash, cut sides down, on the baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes, or until a sharp knife can be inserted with only a little resistance. Set squash aside until cool enough to be easily handled. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm.
ingredients: spaghetti squash, italian sausage, baby spinach, rag pasta sauce, goat cheese, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, butter
name: spaghetti squash boats ragu

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 4 ingredients. In a 2-quart saucepan, heat the honey, oil and vanilla until syrupy. Add to the dry ingredients and mix well. Spread on a jellyroll pan. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes. Store in a covered container.
ingredients: oats, walnuts, coconut, brown sugar, cinnamon, salt, vegetable oil, honey, water, raisins
name: ohh sweet granola

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Layer nachos on ovenproof platter or baking sheet. Spread beans evenly over chips and sprinkle with cheese. Bake until beans are hot and cheese is melted, about 5 minutes. Top with salsa.
ingredients: fat-free refried beans, nonfat sour cream, salsa, fresh lime juice, taco seasoning mix, low-fat cheddar cheese, scallion
name: ww 2 points layered dip for nachos

steps: In a medium size glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, and salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips.
ingredients: tomatoes, onion, green onions, jalapeno chiles, habanero peppers, serrano chilies, fresh cilantro, fresh lime juice, salt
name: chile garden salsa

steps: In a medium bowl, beat together eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon and nutmeg. Dip bread slices into egg mixture, coating both sides. In a skillet or on a griddle, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat. Add half of the bread slices and cook for 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat with remaining butter and bread slices. Serve warm.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, buttermilk, vanilla, eggs, butter
name: cinnamon sugar swirl bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, beat the margarine, white sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, chocolate-covered toffee bits, semi-sweet chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting.
ingredients: butter, semisweet chocolate, splenda granular, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking powder, chocolate chips, dried cherries
name: double chocolate cherry brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally.
ingredients: olive oil, boneless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, sun-dried tomatoes, half-and-half, chicken bouillon cube, rosemary, salt and pepper, fettuccine, parmesan cheese
name: rosemary chicken strips and fettuccine

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: miracle whip, sugar, cocoa, flour, baking soda, hot water, vanilla
name: world war ii cake

steps: In a large saucepan over low heat stir together first three ingredients. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil and boil 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Add cereal, toss and coat with cooked mixture until coated well. Quickly press into pan. Cool, then cut into squares.
ingredients: butter, mini marshmallows, rice krispies, white chocolate, maple syrup
name: white chocolate and maple rice krispie squares

steps: Whip butter with mixer. Continue mixing at low speed and add 1 cup powdered sugar, walnuts, then the flour, a few tablespoons at a time. Add vanilla. Drop cookie batter, by teaspoonfull quantities, on ungreased cookie sheet. The dough is fairly stiff so just roll the batter in little balls and then press down with a glass to shape. Bake 15-20 minutes at 350. Remove from pan. Sprinkle with a little powdered sugar.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, powdered sugar, milk, flaked coconut
name: italian cookies taste of home

steps: Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking.
ingredients: baby back ribs, salt & pepper, garlic powder, barbecue sauce, hickory chips
name: stove top smoker hickory smoked ribs

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat add water. When water reaches boiling point add pasta, and cook until desired doneness is reached. Drain and return to skillet. Add meat, rotel, corn and 1 cup of cheese. Stirring until meat is heated through and cheese is melted. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top and serve.
ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, hot water, lean ground beef, zucchini, stewed tomatoes, ketchup, catalina dressing, chili powder, salt and pepper, garlic
name: sloppy joe skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, of fresh mint, salt, fresh ground black pepper, bread, goat cheese
name: slow baked tomatoes with garlic and mint

steps: Preheat oven to 350, or 325 if you have dark non-stick pan. Prepare pan whichever way. In a bowl, cream together sugar and butter. Add the sifted flour and baking powder. Beat in eggs. Stir in vanilla. Finally, stir in milk until batter is smooth. Bake for about 30-40 minutes, until cake springs back at touch.
ingredients: white cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, strawberry daiquiri mix, cool whip, frozen strawberries
name: strawberry daiquiri cake

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: garlic cloves, vegetable oil, raw shrimp, fresh mushrooms, green onion, chicken broth, cooked rice, lemon slice
name: stir fried shrimp and mushrooms

steps: Place in a large bowl and mix together the rum, papaya, mangoes, red sweet bell pepper, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, orange juice, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of,
ingredients: papaya, mangoes, red sweet bell pepper, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, orange juice, spiced rum, shredded coconut, salt
name: yo ho ho and a bottle of rum caribbean salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: asparagus spear, baby carrots, green beans, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, kosher salt, ground black pepper
name: easy balsamic asaparagus medley

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add the liquids and mix smooth. Place 2 tablespoons of batter in the bottom of each of the greased muffin cups. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style peanut butter. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean.
ingredients: whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, eggs, margarine, sour cream, corn muffin mix, cheddar cheese
name: corn bake

steps: Heat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Prepare tortillas in this order, lay tortillas on flat surface, spread 1 tablespoon of salsa on half of tortilla, place half of meatloaf over salsa, top with half of cheese. Fold other half of tortilla over cheese. Repeat with rest of the ingredients for other tortilla. Place both in skillet and lightly brown on both sides, about 10 minutes total, or until desired brownness is reached. Cut each in half. Eat and enjoy.
ingredients: chorizo sausage, pinto beans, diced green chilies, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, salt, flour tortillas
name: chorizo quesadilla

steps: Melt butter in skillet and brown wingers well. Combine the rest of ingredients in a bowl. Pour over wings. Bake 1 hour at 350 degrees or until tender and sauce is sticky.
ingredients: self raising flour, onion salt, chicken salt, lemon pepper, white pepper, cayenne pepper, black pepper, dried herbs, chicken wings, olive oil flavored cooking spray
name: low fat crispy chicken wings

steps: Beat egg yolks until thick and lemon colored. Add sugar and water. Mix well. Add vanilla and fold in stiffly beaten egg whites. Bake in 2 greased layer cake pans in hot oven 15- 20 minutes. When cool, spread whipped cream, sweetened and flavored, between layers and on top of cake.
ingredients: milk, soft breadcrumbs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, egg, light corn syrup, butter
name: bread crumb pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix flour, brown sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt with fork together. Mix in remaining ingredients except chocolate chips and pour into an ungreased 8x8x2-inch baking pan. Sprinkle chocolate chips over batter. Bake until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean, 35-40 minutes. Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, baking soda, lemon, rind of, vanilla, butter, yogurt, eggs
name: one bowl perfect pound cake

steps: Slice a small section off of one end of each onion, then make a small hole into the center. Fill the center hole with 1 bouillon cube and 2 tablespoons butter. Sprinkle the tops with fresh ground black pepper and a small amount of garlic powder if desired. Replace the tops of the onions. Wrap each onion in heavy foil. Place the onions on a preheated grill over indirect heat. Close the lid. Cook for about 1 hour or until the onions are tender. Remove the tops and cut into small pieces and serve with the juice from the foil.
ingredients: fresh onion, beef bouillon granules, butter, provolone cheese
name: roasted french onion onion

steps: Serve open faced or as a sandwich.
ingredients: cucumber, onions, cream cheese, salt, tabasco sauce, green food coloring, mayonnaise, white bread
name: benedictine sandwiches

steps: Mix together all ingredients. Store in a 1 cup canning jar or other airtight container. When ready to make dressing, combine 1 cup of mayonnaise, 1 cup buttermilk, and 1 tablespoon dry dressing mix. Whisk well. Store in a 1 cup
ingredients: jiffy cornbread mix, dry ranch dressing mix, sour cream, pinto beans, whole corn, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, bell pepper, green onion, bacon
name: hoot s cornbread salad

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Line a 15-inch x 10-inch baking pan with foil. Wrap asparagus spears in bundles of 3 or 4 spears with strips of prosciutto around the middle. Place bundles in a single layer on baking pan tucking under ends of prosciutto. Drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Top with roasted red peppers. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until asparagus is crisp tender. Sprinkle with cheese and continue baking for 5 minutes or until cheese is soft.
ingredients: asparagus, pine nuts, lime juice, lime, zest of, olive oil, honey, kosher salt, goat cheese
name: honey lime asparagus with goat cheese

steps: Wash asparagus and trim away outside of woody stalks. Cut stalks into 1-inch pieces. Melt margarine in a large saucepan over medium heat. Saute asparagus, onion, and potatoes until onion is translucent. Add chicken broth and water, and bring to a boil. Turn down the heat and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes place in blender and blend until vegetables are pureed. Return to saucepan over low heat. Stir in white pepper, nutmeg, cream or half-and-half, and lemon juice. Heat a few minutes longer, but do not allow soup to boil.
ingredients: asparagus, vegetable oil, garlic, onion, leeks, chicken stock, potato, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: asparagus and leek soup

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Combine all the ingredients except the potatoes and cheese over high heat. Mix well. Cook for 5 to 8 minutes, or until heated through, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat and and put into a deep cassarole dish. Dollop with the potatoes. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. Cover with grated cheese last 10 minutes of cooking. Serve immediately.
ingredients: crescent rolls, hamburger, salt and pepper, spaghetti sauce, cheese, whole kernel corn, mashed potatoes, paprika
name: shepherd s hamburger pie

steps: Cook squash and onion in boiling, salted water for 5 minutes. Drain. Combine soup and sour cream. Stir in carrots. Fold in squash and onion. Combine stuffing and butter. Spread half of stuffing in bottom of 9x13-inch pan. Spoon squash mixture on top of stuffing. Sprinkle remaining stuffing over top. Bake at 350 degrees, uncovered, for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: yellow squash, carrots, onion, cornbread stuffing mix, cream of chicken soup, butter, sour cream, black pepper
name: gwen s original squash casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease two 9x5-inch loaf pans. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Beat for an additional 2 minutes. Pour into pans and bake for an hour or till a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
ingredients: vegetable oil, canned pumpkin, eggs, bisquick, sugar, ground cinnamon, raisins
name: bisquick pumpkin bread

steps: Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using baked marinade and pan drippings to top.
ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, mayonnaise, breadcrumbs, oregano, garlic
name: baked breaded pork chops

steps: Place chicken breasts between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic, and salt. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink.
ingredients: apple juice, white wine vinegar, olive oil, fresh rosemary, salt, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, golden delicious apples
name: grilled chicken and apples with rosemary

steps: Mix all ingredients except the rice and lemon juice and cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the rice and lemon juice. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top. Place in a 8 x 10-inch baking dish and bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes, or until it is lightly brown and the custard is set. Test with a table knife. Stick it in the center of the dish, and if it comes out clean the dish is baked. This can be served with maple syrup as was done in earlier times or milk will be enjoyed also.
ingredients: cooked rice, eggs, sugar, salt, milk, raisins, lemon juice, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter
name: scandinavian rice pudding

steps: Cook the pasta and drain. While the pasta is cooking, in a large skillet, saute chicken breasts, marinated artichoke hearts, olive oil, garlic cloves, chicken broth, dry white wine, fresh oregano, kalamata olive, campanelle pasta, feta cheesepreparation:Drain the artichokes reserving the marinade. Cut any large pieces in half and set aside. In a large skillet heat the oil over med-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until no longer pink then add the garlic and cook until the chicken has browned to desired doneness. Add the reserved marinade, broth and wine. And if using the dried oregano. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, covered for 10 minutes. Stir in the artichokes and olives. Simmer for 5 to 10 minutes. Add the hot cooked pasta and simmer for 10 minutes or until sauce is absorbed. Serve with the crumbled feta cheese. Great with a salad.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast, olive oil, cornstarch, reduced-sodium chicken broth, lemon juice, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, angel hair pasta, salt and pepper
name: lemony chicken pasta

steps: In separate microwaveable bowls, microwave to melt the two chocolates as directed on the packages. Mix almonds & dried fruits together, putting half of this mixture into the dark chocolate & half of it into the white chocolate. Stir each until well blended. Drop the chocolate mixtures by spoonfuls onto a wax paper-covered baking sheet, alternating the dark & white. Cut through the chocolate mixtures with a knife several times to give a marble effect. Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until firm. Break into pieces, about 24, & store in a tightly covered container at room temperature.
ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, peppermint extract, white chocolate, candy cane
name: candy cane bark

steps: Heat oil in frying pan, add butter. When oil is hot add prawns sauteeing for two minutes. Remove from heat and drain on paper towel. Discard oil from pan, reheat and slowly add honey, allowing it to colour slightly. Return prawns to pan to coat in the honey. Discard oil from pan, reheat and slowly add honey, allowing it to colour
ingredients: eggs, chives, prawns, oil, salt, pepper
name: prawn and chive omelette

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place green tea sauteed vegetables on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake at 350 degrees F for 10 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool.
ingredients: vegetable oil, red chili peppers, lemon, zest of, green tea, broccoli florets, summer squash, brewed green tea, red bell pepper, salt and pepper
name: green tea sauteed vegetables

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir into the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: butter, honey, eggs, cocoa powder, vanilla, almonds
name: brownies without grains

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh parsley, salt, pepper, cherry tomatoes, fresh lemon rind, sugar, lemon juice
name: cherry tomato and lemon sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400c. Put the chicken pieces into a roasting tin and add garlic cloves, lemon chunks and the thyme. Just roughly pull the leaves off the stalks, leaving some intact for strewing over later. Add the oil and using your hands mix everything together, then spread the mixture out, making sure all the chicken pieces are skin side up. Sprinkle over the white wine and grind on some pepper, then cover tightly with foil and put in the oven to cook, at flavour-intensifying low heat, for 2 hours. Remove the foil from the roasting tin, and turn up the oven to 200c and cook the uncovered chicken for another 30-45 minutes, by which time the skin on the meat will have turned golden brown and the lemons will have begun to scorch and caramelise at the edges. Serve straight from the roasting tin to plate.
ingredients: roasting chickens, garlic powder, onion, sweet wine
name: embarrassingly simple utterly delicious chicken with onions

steps: Rinse collard greens with paper towel. Bake on 350 degrees for 45-60 minutes until brown and crunchy.
ingredients: bacon, onion, minced garlic cloves, white wine, water, soy sauce, salt, tabasco sauce, collard greens
name: cajun collards

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and sauté for 1 minute. Add sausage and sauté for 1 minute. Add onion and sauté for 1 minute. Add tomato sauce and sauté for 1 minute. Add tomato
ingredients: ground beef, hot sausage, onion, velveeta cheese, rotel tomatoes
name: oklahoma dip

steps: Mix and set aside the butter and soda. In a large pan, mix and boil the sugar, water, and syrup to hardball stage. Add peanuts and stir constantly until mixture turns yellow about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add butter mixture and vanilla. Pour onto greased cookie sheet. Pat into a thickness you like with the back of a spoon. Cool and break into pieces. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: sugar, light corn syrup, water, butter, unsalted cashews, baking soda
name: buttery cashew brittle

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, arborio rice, chicken stock, chopped tomatoes, tuna, zucchini, parmesan cheese, fresh basil leaves
name: baked tuna and zucchini risotto

steps: Place the pork in a large pot with water to cover. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain well. Place all the remaining ingredients and the pork ribs in a wok. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 cup liquid. Heat a clean wok and sear the pork until browned. Add the reserved liquid and cook over medium until it glazes. Chop the pork into bite size pieces and serve.
ingredients: hoisin sauce, garlic cloves, soy sauce, chinese wine, honey, chinese five spice powder, pork ribs
name: peking pork spare ribs

steps: Spray the grill with cooking spray and preheat for 5 minutes. Mix the turkey, swiss cheese, egg white, mustard, bread crumbs, pepper and salt together. Shape into 4 patties. Grill the burgers for 7-8 minutes. Serve on a bun with your favorite condiments.
ingredients: sourdough bread, apricot jam, turkey breast, sweet onion, roasted red pepper, swiss cheese, nonstick cooking spray
name: grilled turkey and swiss panini sandwich

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add bacon, red potatoes, onion, green pepper, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese. Cook and stir until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand until cheese has melted.
ingredients: eggs, light cream, salt, pepper, fresh chives, bottled chili sauce, butter
name: easter scrambled eggs 1950

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and salt, blending well. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press tomatoes through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly. Heat thoroughly before serving.
ingredients: chicken broth, tomatoes, sweet onion, celery, sugar, light cream, fresh basil, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: easy farmstand fresh cream of tomato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Peel, core and slice apples. Place in a well greased 8x8-inch baking pan. Mix cake mix, oats, sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Melt butter and pour over the top of the dry cake mixture and mix until crumbly. Sprinkle this over apples. Bake 35-40 minutes until golden.
ingredients: granny smith apples, yellow cake mix, sugar, cinnamon, butter, nuts, vanilla ice cream
name: quick apple crisp

steps: Melt the butter in a heavy pan and fry the meat with the scallops and garlic till the vegetables are slightly softened and the meat lightly browned. Add the scallops and garlic and continue to cook for 1 to 1 hour or until the meat is really tender and ready to fall from the bone. Add the scallops and garlic and continue to cook for several minutes. Adjust the seasoning to taste and serve in bowls- the scallops will serve as a vegetable.
ingredients: veal scallopini, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper, flour, canola oil, butter, lemon, juice of, capers, parsley
name: veal piccata

steps: Heat oil in a heavy skillet over high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown tenderloin on all sides about 10 minutes. Transfer pan to oven and roast until thermometer inserted diagonally 2 inches into center of meat registers 120 degrees, 25-30 minutes. Transfer beef to a cutting board and let stand 15 minutes. Temperature of meat will rise to about 130 degrees. Discard string and rosemary sprigs before slicing.
ingredients: steak fillets, bacon, black pepper, butter, salt
name: filet mignon with bacon and butter

steps: Preheat the oven to 375. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, boneless skinless chicken thighs, garlic, ginger, honey, fish sauce, soy sauce, five-spice powder, fresh cilantro stem
name: honey ginger glazed chicken

steps: Heat grill to high, rub mushrooms with oil. Grill for 3 minutes each side or till cooked but still firm. Mix cheese, garlic, butter, salt and pepper together in a bowl. Spoon mixture into mushrooms. Grill until cheese melts. Place in toasted buns with salad. This could also be done in the oven.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, portabella mushroom caps, french bread, mayonnaise, lettuce leaf, tomatoes
name: grilled mushroom sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In 13x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, egg, mini marshmallows, peanut butter chips, chocolate chips, roasted peanuts
name: four layer marshmallow bars

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add shrimp and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the shrimp is cooked through. Remove from heat and serve.
ingredients: eggs, shrimp, spanish onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper
name: shrimp omelette

steps: Cook fettuccine al dente. In a shallow pan, add cream cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese
ingredients: fettuccine, light cream cheese spread, reduced-fat caesar salad dressing, flour, low-fat milk, smoked ham, parmesan cheese
name: updated fettuccine carbonara

steps: In a large bowl mix the flours, baking soda, salt and raisins. Stir in the buttermilk and molasses until well combined. Pour it into a bread pan sprayed with nonstick spray. Let sit for 1 hour. Preheat the oven to 325. Bake for 1 hour or until a tooth pick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Let it sit in the pan for about 10 minutes and then remove it from the pan to sit on a wire rack until it is cooled.
ingredients: low-fat buttermilk, honey, molasses, baking soda, salt, whole wheat flour, wheat germ, all-purpose flour, raisins, nuts
name: california breakfast bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: shortening, sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, flour, baking soda, salt, butterscotch chips, toffee pieces
name: butterscotch toffee cookies

steps: In a large pot, bring stock to a boil. Add all the vegetables, mix in the vinaigrette along with salt and pepper to taste. Combine with the lettuce leaves, fat-free cottage cheese, spring onions, celery, radish, dried dill, salt & freshly ground black pepper, plum tomato, cucumbers. Combine with the lettuce leaves,
ingredients: lettuce leaves, fat-free cottage cheese, spring onions, celery, radish, dried dill, salt & freshly ground black pepper, plum tomato, cucumbers
name: cottage lunch salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line a pan with foil. Wash and slice potatoes very thin. Mix spices, lemon juice and oil in a separate bowl. Dip each patty into lightly beaten egg then lightly coat with breadcrumbs. Heat vegetable oil and fry over medium heat until lightly browned, turning once.
ingredients: potatoes, green onions, eggs, fresh parsley, garlic, seasoning salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, butter, olive oil
name: jumbo skillet potato pancake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
ingredients: microwave popcorn, bugles original flavor snacks, pretzel twists, roasted pistachios, butter, sugar, candy corn
name: witch s cauldron corn

steps: Heat oil in a saut pan over medium heat, add the garlic and cook until golden. Add the artichokes and saut until the outsides are just browned. Stir through the basil leaves and pine nuts and serve.
ingredients: fennel bulbs, artichoke hearts, tomatoes, brine-cured black olives, anchovy fillet, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, dried oregano, dried thyme, pepper
name: artichoke and fennel salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Carefully pour the chicken broth over all. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving.
ingredients: mixed peppercorns, turkey breast cutlets, olive oil, scallions, fresh ginger, fat free chicken broth, brandy, mango chutney
name: pepper crusted turkey or chicken cutlets with chutney sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease and flour a 9x13 size pan. Place all the ingredients into one large mixing bowl. Mix well. Pour into the prepared pan. Bake for 30 to 40 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: brown sugar, butter, canned pineapple, glace cherries, caster sugar, egg, milk, self-raising flour, cinnamon, ginger
name: microwave pineapple upside down cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Stir together sour cream, condensed soups, and dry onion soup mix in a mixing bowl. Spread the turkey in the bottom of a buttered 9x13-inch casserole dish. Top with green beans and mushrooms. Spread the soup over the meat and vegetable mixture. Crumble the stuffing and spread evenly over the top. Bake at 350f for 25-30 minutes or until heated through and bubbly.
ingredients: spaghetti, turkey meat, condensed cream of mushroom soup, frozen broccoli, sour cream, parmesan cheese
name: turkey parmesan casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: smoked salmon, asparagus spears, camembert cheese, eggs, cream, salt and pepper, baby salad leaves, crusty bread
name: smoked salmon camembert frittata

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, garlic powder, pork and beans, onion, green bell pepper, barbecue sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, cayenne pepper
name: easy oven baked beans and pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a shallow baking pan, arrange the chicken wings so they do not touch each other. Bake for 30 minutes. In small sauce pan combine the tomato sauce, butter, italian style breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese and cook until the sugar has dissolved. After the chicken wings are cooked, thickly spread the sauce over the wings and bake for 30 to 40 minutes or longer or until browned and very tender. Serve warm.
ingredients: chicken wings, butter, italian style breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese
name: cheesy chicken wings

steps: In a small saucepan, combine water and agar-agar flakes and bring to a boil. Gently simmer until agar has dissolved completely, about 5 minutes. Add espresso and stir until dissolved. Cool slightly. In a food processor or blender, blend tofu, maple syrup, cocoa powder, vanilla, salt and cooled espresso mixture until completely smooth. Pour into the prepared pie shell. Refrigerate for several hours or overnight until firm. Serve topped with non-dairy topping.
ingredients: unsweetened cocoa powder, cornstarch, sea salt, soymilk, agave nectar, vanilla extract
name: vegan chocolate pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place a baking sheet in to heat. Slice goat s cheese into 4 equal pieces, leaving the rind on. Turn the mushrooms cut side up. Place a piece of cheese in the middle of each mushroom. Top with some thyme leave and season to taste. Cut pastry into 4 strips lengthways.
