Wrap each mushroom in a strip of pastry so that the ends of the pastry are under the mushroom. Make slashes on top of the pastry with the. Brush exposed sides of mushroom with oil. Place them on hot baking sheet, cook 15 - 20 minutes til pastry is golden and cheese oozing and mushroom is tender.
ingredients: dry white wine, water, salt, butter, polenta, goat cheese, olive oil, mixed mushrooms, baby spinach, vegetarian cheddar cheese
name: goat s cheese polenta with mushrooms

steps: In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the salad greens, mandarin oranges, green grape, onion, sliced almonds, orange juice, vegetable oil, vinegar, celery seeds, mixed salad greens, marinated cucumber salad on salad greens. Add salt to your taste. Add cucumber mix to bowl, tossing to coat. Set aside at room temperature to marinate 30 minutes. Arrange chilled prepared salad mix on plates. Spoon cucumber mixture on top.
ingredients: salad greens, mandarin oranges, green grape, onion, sliced almonds, orange juice, vegetable oil, vinegar, celery seeds
name: fruity green salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius or 375 degrees fahrenheit. Soak the bread in the milk for 1 minute. Squeeze dry. Combine the bread, sausage meat, raw egg, parsley, nutmeg, salt and pepper. Mix well. Lightly oil a 12 cup muffin tray. Line each cup with a slice of bacon. Cover with a layer of sausage mixture. Add a hard boiled egg, pointy end up. Enclose the egg completely with more sausage meat mixture. Bake uncovered for 20 minutes or until cooked through.
ingredients: bulk sausage, dried rosemary, dijon mustard, fresh breadcrumb, eggs, fine dry breadcrumb, sherry wine
name: baked scotch eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: eggs, butter, flour, baking powder, cottage cheese, monterey jack cheese, diced green chilies, tomatoes, sour cream, salsa
name: rosie s eggs mexicana chile casserole

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add patties to pan and fry until brown, turning once. Serve on hamburger buns with lettuce, mayo and tomatoes or as desired.
ingredients: chickpeas, garlic cloves, onion, fresh rosemary leaf, flat leaf parsley, fine breadcrumbs, walnuts, egg, olive oil
name: chickpea walnut burgers

steps: Preheat oven to 275f. Cut jalapenos in half lengthwise and scrape out seeds. In a bowl, combine cheeses and onion and mix well. Stuff each hollowed jalapeno half with cheese mixture. Wrap bacon slices around each half, cover as much of the surface as possible. Brush bacon surface with bbq sauce. Secure with toothpicks and pop into oven for 1 hr.
ingredients: cream cheese, cajun seasoning, garlic powder, jalapeno peppers, bacon, toothpicks
name: bbq stuffed jalapenos

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars.
ingredients: graham cracker, peanut butter, margarine, powdered sugar, milk chocolate chips, eagle brand condensed milk
name: clark bar squares

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and saut, stirring frequently, until softened and translucent, about 3 minutes. Add the ground beef to the skillet, breaking it up well with a spoon, and cook until the meat has lost its raw color, about 10 minutes, stirring frequently to break up any clumps. Pour off and discard any juices and fat that have accumulated in the skillet. Add 2 cups ketchup, the chili powder, garlic powder, pepper flakes, and salt and stir well to mix. Cook, uncovered, until the meat is cooked through and the flavors are blended, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently to break up any clumps. Add 2 cups ketchup, the chili powder, garlic powder, pepper flakes,
ingredients: olive oil, mccormick grill seasoning, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, tomato sauce, onion, minced garlic cloves, ground meat, salt and pepper
name: rachael ray basic sloppy joes

steps: Put all ingredients in crockpot. Turn on low for 7 hours.
ingredients: cooking spray, head of cabbage, onion, kosher salt, black pepper, chicken broth, brown mustard, kielbasa
name: kielbasa cabbage and onions low carb slow cooker crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 525 degrees. Add salt to milk. Cut filets into serving pieces, dip into milk, then in the bread crumbs, cheese and thyme. Arrange fish in well-greased dish and pour butter over evenly. Bake on top rack 12 minutes. Garnish with paprika.
ingredients: haddock fillets, parmesan cheese, milk, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, butter, paprika, lemon wedges
name: oven fried haddock fillets

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread one side of each slice of bread with 1 teaspoon mustard and 1 tablespoon 1000 island. Divide the suarkraut and turkey evenly between 2 of the bread slices. Top each with 1 slice of cheese and remaining slice of bread. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet or toaster oven sheet and bake until cheese melts and sandwiches are hot, about 6 minutes.
ingredients: macaroni shells and cheese, sauerkraut, corned beef, spicy brown mustard, rye crackers, swiss cheese
name: pantry reuben shells and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over medium heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour.
ingredients: chicken liver, flour, pepper, dried parsley, vegetable oil, margarine, onion, white wine
name: fried chicken livers

steps: Cook potatoes until tender. While potatoes are cooking, combine olive oil, rice wine vinegar, wine if using, mustard, salt and pepper in large mixing bowl. Whisk well. When potatoes are tender peel or not. Dice potatoes. Add to dressing. Add the onions, parsley and herbs, and toss all gently to combine. Serve warm. Leftovers can be served cold, or reheated gently in microwave.
ingredients: potatoes, mayonnaise, sour cream, lime peel, lime juice, fresh thyme, salt, black pepper
name: lime and thyme potato salad

steps: Cook sausage in large skillet until tender. Remove with slotted spoon& drain. Saute onion& celery in remaining sausage drippings until tender. Combine sausage, sauteed vegetables, bread cubes, cornbread, sage, marjoram& pepper in a large mixing bowl. Blend well. Moisten with chicken broth. Mixture can be stuffed into turkey, or placed into a greased 13x9 baking dish& dot with butter. Cover& bake 20 minutes at 350f. Uncover& bake 10 minutes more, or until golden brown.
ingredients: sausage, sharp cheddar cheese, ranch dressing, black olives, wonton wrapper
name: sausage stars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a 9 inch square pan with nonstick spray. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk wet ingredients together. Blend well. Add liquids to dry ingredients, whisking until smooth. Bake 35-40 minutes, or until done. Cool completely. Frost, if desired.
ingredients: white chocolate, whole milk, hot coffee, chocolate sprinkles
name: white mochachino

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly grease a 12 cup muffin pan. In a medium saucepan with enough water to cover, boil molletes de calabaza pumpkin muffins 20 minutes, or until tender. Remove from heat, drain, and puree in a food processor. In a large bowl, thoroughly mix together milk, egg, flour, salt, baking powder, ground cloves, raisins, and raisins. Stir in molletes de calabaza pumpkin muffins 20 minutes, or until tender. In a large bowl, thoroughly mix together milk, egg, flour, salt, baking powder, ground cloves
ingredients: canned pumpkin, milk, egg, flour, salt, baking powder, ground cloves, raisins
name: molletes de calabaza pumpkin muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Place frozen peaches and onion slices on a large rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle with ginger, soy sauce, one tablespoon of olive oil, sesame oil, and red pepper flakes, and toss to coat. Rub chicken breasts with remaining teaspoon of olive oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Arrange chicken skin-side up among peaches and onions. Roast until chicken is opaque throughout and registers 160 on a thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the breast, about 25 to 30 minutes. Serve over rice, couscous, or bulgur.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, fresh ginger, boneless skinless chicken breasts, peaches, red pepper
name: nif s chicken and peaches

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. In foil lined roasting pan, toss carrots with oil and cayenne and season with salt. Arrange in single layer, using two pans if needed. Roast tossing one halfway through for 30-40 minutes, or until tender. In a small bowl, whisk together honey, zest and lemon juice. Season with salt. Drizzled over carrots and toss to coat.
ingredients: beets, carrots, olive oil, butter, orange juice, salt and pepper, fresh dill
name: roasted beets and carrots

steps: Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately.
ingredients: pork chops, cider vinegar, ketchup, brown sugar, onion, rosemary, worcestershire sauce, black pepper
name: pol martin barbecued pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Spray a baking dish with pam or other no oil spray. Place the cottage cheese in a strainer and drain for 5 minutes. Pack the spinach on the bottom of the dish. Add the sliced onion. Sprinkle on the adobe spice. Combine the eggs and cottage cheese in a food processor and puree until the mixture is very smooth. Pour over the spinach. Arrange the tomato slices on top. Sprinkle on the grated cheese. Bake in 375 oven until golden and the eggs are cooked apprx 25 minutes.
ingredients: raclette cheese, new potatoes, sausage, fennel bulb, cornichon, french bread
name: mountain raclette

steps: Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the flour. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, brown sugar, salt, milk, raisins, nuts, boiling water, butter, vanilla
name: canadian pudding

steps: Place beef in crock pot, cover and cook on low for 7-8 hours. Remove beef from crock pot, cover and cook on low for 7-8 hours. Remove beef from crock pot, cover and cook on
ingredients: beer, boneless beef chuck roast, plain flour, butter, onions, garlic cloves, tomato paste, cayenne, bay leaves, salt and pepper
name: beer and beef crock pot

steps: Heat oil in a non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Preheat oil in a non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Preheat oil in a non-stick skillet over medium high
ingredients: meatless spaghetti sauce, butter, flour tortillas, mozzarella cheese, hard salami, pepperoni, parmesan cheese, dried oregano
name: pizza quesadillas

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spray a large baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Cut each piece of chicken into 6 strips. Combine bread crumbs, parmesan, oregano, salt and pepper in a shallow bowl. Mix well. Dip each piece of chicken into egg, allowing excess to drip back into bowl. Coat chicken pieces with crumb mixture. Place chicken on prepared baking sheet. Bake chicken, turning halfway through baking, until golden, about 15 minutes. Serve immediately with prepared dressing.
ingredients: self rising flour, salt, fresh ground black pepper, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, egg, buttermilk, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast
name: crispy chicken fingers

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Add wing pieces and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 6 to 10 minutes. Drain excess liquid before adding sauce ingredients. Mix remaining ingredients and add to skillet, stirring to coat chicken well. Cook on medium heat until chicken is well coated and sauce thickens, about 8 to 10 minutes. You can also cook them in a crock pot, on low setting. The meat just falls off the bone.
ingredients: chicken wings, orange juice, soy sauce, dark brown sugar, jellied cranberry sauce, tabasco sauce
name: cranberry orange wings

steps: Place half of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on top of the enchilada sauce and top with the rest of the sauce on
ingredients: butter, flour, broth, water, cumin, garlic, oregano, chipotle chiles, adobo sauce, sour cream
name: chipotle enchilada sauce

steps: Place the stock and ginger in a large saucepan, bring to the boil, lower the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Strain to remove the ginger. Discard. Return stock to the pan, add salmon strips, bok choy and chilli to the stock, simmer gently for 2 minutes. Lastly add soy sauce, and sugar and lime juice to taste and to achieve a balanced hot, sweet, salty, sour flavour. Ladle into serving bowls and garnish with torn coriander leaves.
ingredients: tamarind paste, water, palm sugar, tomatoes, celery rib, fish sauce, cod, bean sprouts, red chile, mint
name: canh chua ca sweet and sour fish soup

steps: Heat oven to 350°F. Place sausage, onion, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green olives, pimento-stuffed green
ingredients: braunschweiger sausage, onion, chili sauce, mayonnaise, cream cheese, pimento-stuffed green olives
name: braunschweiger ball

steps: Mix 3 tablespoons limeade concentrate and cumin in plastic food storage bag. Add chicken, seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator 1-2 hours. Stir together pineapple, bell pepper, cilantro and remaining limeade concentreate in medium bowl. Grill chicken over medium heat until no longer pink in center. Serve with lime black pepper sauce.
ingredients: black peppercorns, light corn syrup, fresh lime juice, dried mint, pineapple, of fresh mint
name: grilled pineapple with sweet lime black pepper sauce

steps: Place fish on a broiler rack that has been coated with a non-stick cooking spray. Brush tops of fish with 3 tablespoons of the butter or margarine. Dust with flour. Sprinkle with paprika. Broil 5-6 inches from the heat for 5 minutes or until fish just begins to brown. Combine lemon juice, parsley, worcestershire sauce and remaining butter. Pour over the fish. Broil 5 minutes longer or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: sole fillets, flour, seasoning salt, black pepper, butter, fresh lemon juice, fresh parsley
name: easy pan fried sole fish with lemon butter sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: crescent roll dough, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, eggs, pepper, salami
name: salami pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a food processor, combine sausage, green onion, garlic, all purpose greek seasoning, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, artichoke hearts, tortilla chips. Process until smooth, 2 to 3 minutes. Transfer to a bowl and stir in green olives. Season with pepper to taste. Chill at least 2 hours. Before serving, stir in the chopped parsley.
ingredients: bulk sausage, green onion, garlic, all purpose greek seasoning, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, artichoke hearts, tortilla chips
name: sausage and artichoke dip

steps: In a large non-stick skillet over medium heat, melt butter and olive oil together. Add the remaining ingredients to the skillet. Stir until potatoes are evenly coated with spice mixture and onion slices are evenly distributed. Cook covered on medium heat for 15 minutes, tossing and turning the potatoes every few minutes. Potatoes will be done when slightly browned and fork-tender.
ingredients: garlic powder, dried basil, dried oregano, salt, pepper, rib eye steaks, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, feta cheese, kalamata olive
name: grecian skillet rib eyes

steps: Preheat oven to 475 degrees f. Toss sugar, salt, pepper and peas in a medium bowl. Transfer to a baking sheet and spread in a single layer. Roast in the oven, stirring once halfway through, until the peas are tender and beginning to brown slightly, 12 to 14 minutes. Serve warm, sprinkled with bacon if desired.
ingredients: sugar snap pea, extra virgin olive oil, coarse salt, fresh chives
name: roasted sugar snap peas

steps: Butter side of heavy 3-quart pan. Combine sugar, milk & butter. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla ice cream, powdered sugar, chocolate chips, evaporated milk, butter, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Butter side of heavy 3-quart pan. Remove from heat & add chocolate,
ingredients: fudge brownie mix, vanilla ice cream, powdered sugar, chocolate chips, evaporated milk, butter, vanilla, walnuts
name: fudge brownie sunday

steps: Cook fettuccine in a large saucepan of boiling water until dente and drain well. Heat a dash of oil in a frying pan and quickly cook the bacon pieces until crisp and golden, set aside. Add the beans and pepper to the pan and cook until tender. Pour in the pasta sauce, add the bacon and cook, stirring until hot. Toss through the well drained fettuccini with basil leaves. Serve with grated parmesan cheese on the side.
ingredients: fettuccine, chicken broth, garlic, carrot, green pepper, broccoli floret, sun-dried tomatoes, fresh basil, canned tomatoes, parmesan cheese
name: fettuccine with sun dried tomato sauce

steps: Drain cherry fluff in cheesecloth lined colander for 2 hours. When drained, combine in a medium bowl with vanilla seeds & sugar. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to blend. Combine fruit in a large bowl. To serve, spoon yogurt over individual servings of fruit & grate chocolate over the top.
ingredients: cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, cherry pie filling, crushed pineapple, mini marshmallows, nuts, cool whip
name: sweet cherry fluff salad

steps: In a wok over medium-low heat, add the beef cook until browned. Drain the juices. Add the green pepper, onion and spices and cook until the veggies are soft. Add the canned tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Mix the rice into the wok and serve.
ingredients: cheese ravioli, water, salt, garden vegetable spaghetti sauce, heavy cream
name: easy skillet ravioli

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over med-high heat 1-2 minutes and add garlic, onion, and mushrooms and saute until tender, add the greens and cook 5-8 minutes, stirring occasionally, until greens are tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cook the pasta. Mix the cooked ingredients together. Top with the sour cream and parmesan mix. Serves 4 people.
ingredients: whole wheat penne, olive oil, shallots, garlic, button mushroom, cremini mushroom, chardonnay wine, chicken stock, parmesan cheese, mascarpone cheese
name: creamy mushroom pasta

steps: In a saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until transparent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended.
ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, reduced-fat cream cheese, butter, onion, garlic cloves, lemon pepper, salt, fresh nutmeg, parmesan cheese
name: creamed spinach or broccoli or chard low carb

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place potato wedges on baking sheet and drizzle olive oil over them, work the potatoes around in the oil until evenly coated. Season with the rosemary, salt, pepper and red pepper. Throw the garlic cloves on the sheet with the potatoes. Roast 25 minutes. Make sure to turn them all once at the halfway point or they will end up sticking to the baking sheet.
ingredients: mayonnaise, garlic clove, paprika, fresh lemon juice, flat leaf parsley, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, vegetable oil, baking potatoes
name: hand cut fries with smoked aioli gluten free

steps: Heat oven to 350. Grease 15x10 inch cookie sheet with edges. In a skillet cook ground beef till pea size and brown and drain. In a large bowl mix remaining ingredients and spread in the prepared pan, including hamburger. Bake 20 minutes to 25 minutes or until golden brown, and toothpick comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes cut into any size square desired and dip into your favorite sauce.
ingredients: frozen hash browns, butter, ground beef, onion, milk, eggs, cornstarch, cheese, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper
name: yummy hamburger quiche

steps: Heat olive oil in skillet over medium high heat. Add onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes more, spooning onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfishcook 5-7 minutes
ingredients: onion, green pepper, celery, olive oil, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, salt, swordfish
name: creole swordfish

steps: Place in food processor bowl and pulse until smooth. Pulse several times or until smooth. Stir in sour cream. Cover and chill until ready to serve.
ingredients: cream cheese, beef bouillon cube, boiling water, garlic powder
name: yummy cream cheese dip

steps: Mix all ingredients in a blender or food processor. Whirl until smooth. Place in jar with tight-fitting lid. Refrigerate for up to two weeks. Shake well before serving.
ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, dried tarragon, salt and pepper, fresh chives, mushroom, watercress
name: mushrooms and watercress in mustard dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. Press a slice of ham into each muffin cup. Evenly distribute spinach between muffin cups. Evenly distribute cheese between muffin cups. Crack 1 egg to each muffin cup.
ingredients: sandwich bread, cooked ham, shredded cheddar cheese, eggs
name: savory egg nests

steps: Combine gin, cherry juice, ice, ginger ale, ice, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino cherry juice, ice, maraschino
ingredients: dry gin, cherry juice, ice, ginger ale
name: bust my cherry spirits

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees and grease a 12 hole donut pan. In a large mixing bowl stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, nutmeg, and salt. Add buttermilk, eggs, and butter, stir until just combined. Divide batter between prepared donut pan. Bake until toothpick comes out clean, 7 to 9 minutes. Let donuts cool in pans for 5 minutes then take them out of pan and let cool on a cooling rack.
ingredients: orange, granulated sugar, ground cinnamon, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, vegetable oil
name: chinese orange donut holes

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Place chopped butter, sugar and vanilla in a bowl and beat until light and creamy. Add egg and beat well. Using a flat knife, mix through flours and coconut until a soft dough forms. Mix chocolate chips into the dough. Using your hands, mould two tablespoons of dough mixture into a flat round. Place rounds on a baking tray that is lined with non stick baking paper. Repeat until all the mixture is used. Bake for 10 minutes or until light golden. Allow to cool on trays.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, sweet butter, dark brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, shredded coconut, white chocolate, macadamia nuts
name: chocolate coconut chunks

steps: In large frying pan heat oil. Slowly add egg roll wrappers fry until crispy set aside on paper towel to drain. Add coleslaw mixture to frying pan then add meat and soy and teriyaki sauce and garlic powder. Stir until warmed through. Place salad into serving bowl topped with crispy egg roll wrappers and chopped green onion. Serve warm with sweet and sour sauce or duck sauce to taste.
ingredients: wrap, coleslaw mix, onion, soy sauce, oil, egg
name: egg rolls cheap easy

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: baked beans, bacon, red bell pepper, yellow onion, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, prepared horseradish, yellow mustard, dry mustard
name: baklava s crock pot baked beans

steps: Combine ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well. Cover. Chill 1 hour.
ingredients: carrot, green pepper, onion, tomato sauce, sugar, vinegar, oil, pepper, salt, dry mustard
name: sweet sour carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Butter and flour a 10-inch tube pan. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Stir in applesauce and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together and then sift over applesauce mixture. Sprinkle with raisins and blend gently. Pour batter into pan and bake approximately 65-75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes up clean. Cool in pan 10 minutes then remove from pan to finish cooling.
ingredients: flour, eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, applesauce, pecans, pumpkin pie spice, baking soda, baking powder, sour cream
name: super applesauce bread

steps: Spray 9 x 13 pan with cooking spray. Line pan with bread quarters. Cut sausage into small pieces as you brown it. Drain off any fat. Combine all ingredients in a casserole dish and bake for 2 hours. I keep it covered during the first hour, then remove the cover and stir, and leave the cover off for the last hour of cooking, although the original recipe did not specify this.
ingredients: margarine, bisquick, milk, sugar, oil, eggs, breakfast sausage
name: hearty brunch breakfast casserole

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a bowl. Spread half of mixture evenly in bottom of pan. Add layer of coconut. Spread 2nd half of mixture over coconut layer. Place in fridge overnight and cut into 8 individual squares.
ingredients: vanilla protein powder, whole oats, honey, ground flax seeds, blueberries, sugar substitute, skim milk, olive oil
name: homemade blueberry protein bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place peas in casserole dish. Cover and bake in pre-heated 350 degree oven for one hour.
ingredients: long-grain rice, water, fresh peas, peanut oil, ground pork, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, rice wine, green onions
name: ground pork peas and rice casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Bake for 30 minutes or until crispy and lightly browned.
ingredients: ground beef, ranch dressing, dry breadcrumbs, onion, salt, black pepper, hamburger buns with sesame seeds, lettuce, tomatoes, red onion
name: ranch burger

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and pine nuts. Mix well. Cook until the pine nuts are brown. Add the parsley. Add the pine nuts
ingredients: garlic cloves, scallions, dijon mustard, fresh dill, apple cider vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, canned artichoke hearts, baby spinach leaves, radicchio
name: elegant spinach salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the butter mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: brown sugar, sugar, shortening, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, mini chocolate chip, english toffee bits
name: butter brickle cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease cookie sheet. Beat sugar and shortening until creamy. Beat in egg, milk and orange extract. Stir in flour and baking powder. Add cereal and nuts. Mix well. Drop by tablespoon onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. Let stand 1 minute before removing to racks to cool.
ingredients: ice cream, corn flakes cereal, white chocolate chips, vegetable shortening, corn syrup
name: white chocolate covered ice cream crunch balls

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In 13x9 pan layer potatoes, ham and onion. In 2 quart saucepan melt butter until sizzling. Stir in flour, mustard and pepper. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until smooth and bubbly. Add milk, continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until sauce is thickened. Pour sauce over potatoes. Sprinkle with chives. Bake for 60 to 75 minutes or until bubbly and potatoes are fork tender.
ingredients: hash browns, ham, cream of onion soup, milk, butter, swiss cheese, sharp cheddar cheese
name: ham potato onion casserole

steps: Pre-heat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add sour cream, lemon juice and lemon peel. Mix well. Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
ingredients: cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, lemonade concentrate, frozen whipped topping, yellow food coloring, graham cracker crust
name: lemonade icebox pie

steps: Heat oil and butter in a non stick frypan, add crushed garlic clove and the chilli bean sauce, while still cool to allow everything to be mixed without cooking. Heat oil and add the prawns. Stir constantly for 3-4 minutes serve with simple salads. This recipe does not work with pre cooked prawns.
ingredients: bacon, prawns, black pepper, olive oil, lemons
name: prawn and bacon brochettes

steps: In large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix into a soft dough. Turn dough out onto a floured surface and knead 20 times. Divide dough into fourths and roll each quarter into a 12 inch long rope. Cut each rope into inch pieces, and set on a floured surface. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Roll each piece of dough across the tines of a fork to get groves on it and drop it into the pot of water. Cook gnocchi until it floats to the top. Drain and serve.
ingredients: potato, all-purpose flour, egg, nutmeg, salt and pepper
name: nanna s gnocchi

steps: In a large bowl, mix the kiwi, peaches, blueberries, lemon, sugar, low-fat plain yogurt, poppy seed, mint sprig. In a small bowl, mix the kiwi, peaches, blueberries, lemon, sugar, low-fat plain yogurt, poppy seed, mint sprig. In a large bowl, mix the kiwi, peaches, blueberries, lemon, sugar, low-fat plain yogurt, poppy seed, mint sprig. In
ingredients: kiwi, peaches, blueberries, lemon, sugar, low-fat plain yogurt, poppy seed, mint sprig
name: fresh fruit parfait with lemon poppy seed yogurt

steps: Combine graham cracker crumbs, butter, cinnamon, and nutmed, and press into 9-inch pie plate. Chill in fridge 2 hours before filling. For filling, using a mixer, blend cup of milk into cream cheese until very smooth and creamy. Gradually add remaining milk until blended. Add pudding mix and blend 1 minute do not overblend. Pour into graham cracker crust. Chill.
ingredients: low-fat graham cracker crust, fat free cream cheese, vanilla, splenda granular, light whipped topping, bananas, milk, instant banana pudding mix
name: creamy banana cheesecake

steps: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. Press fruit mixture through a fine-mesh strainer over a bowl to extract juices. Discard solids and pour mixture into 3-ounce paper or plastic drink cups or pop molds. Cover cups with foil. Cut a slit in the foil and insert wooden sticks. Freeze several hours or overnight until pops are firm. Remove from cups or molds to serve.
ingredients: strawberries, nutrasweet, kiwi fruits, peaches, paper cups, wooden popsicle sticks
name: sugar free berry striped pops

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally.
ingredients: oil, chicken breast, onion, garlic clove, smoked paprika, salt, black pepper, chicken stock, sour cream
name: smoked paprika chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Remove stones and place cut nectarines on the parchment paper in an oven proof dish or pan facing up. Drizzle honey, vanilla and sprinkle brown sugar over the top. Bake for 15 minutess, scoop up the juices from the bottom of the pan and coat nectarines and bake for an additional 15 minutes or until golden and sticky. Serve with yoghurt, drizzled with honey.
ingredients: raisins, mixed nuts, honey, coconut
name: no bake honey snacks

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In large bowl mix teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, minced garlic, sesame seeds, garlic powder, onion powder, red pepper flakes, maple syrup. Place chicken in sauce and toss to coat. Pour chicken and sauce into a large disposable baking pan. Bake for 1 hour, tossing every 20 minutes. The liquid will gradually evaporate the longer you cook it. After 1 hour, increase the oven temperature to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Turn wings to coat evenly and cook for an additional 45 minutes.
ingredients: chicken wings, green onion, rice wine, soy sauce, gingerroot, garlic, rice wine vinegar, sugar, sesame oil, hot chili oil
name: dragon s breath wings

steps: Preheat oven to 180c or 350f. Melt the butter in a large pan. Then add sugars and cook, stirring, until combined. Remove from heat. Add all of the remaining ingredients and stir gently until combined. Place level tablespoons pf mixture, about 3cm apart, on lightly greased oven trays. Bake in a moderate oven about 15 minutes or until golden brown. Stand for 5 minutes before removing from trays to cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, self raising flour, vanilla essence, mixed fruit, corn flakes
name: cornflake goofie cookies

steps: Mix all ingredients, except the oil, in a large bowl and chill for 30 minutes. Divide the mixture evenly into 12 portions and shape each one into a flat round pattie. Heat the oil over moderate heat for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Remove and drain on a paper towel if you wish. Serve hot with dipping sauce or raita.
ingredients: ground pork, eggs, breadcrumbs, onion flakes, parsley, garlic cloves, salt and pepper
name: grammy s polish pork hamburgers

steps: In a r4-quart sucepan, mix water, sugar, cinnamon sticks & cloves. Bring to boil over high heat, then add cucumbers & return to a boil. Reduce heat & cook until cucumbers pop, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat & stir in lemon juice & orange zest. Cool to room temperature, then chill about 4 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, top each bowl of soup with a dollop of sour cream. Refrigerate any leftovers.
ingredients: water, splenda sugar substitute, fresh lime juice, seedless watermelon, cucumbers
name: chilled cucumber watermelon soup

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. In a large pot with plenty of salted water, boil the potatoes until they are tender when a fork is inserted, about 10-12 minutes. Drain and let the potatoes cool until you can handle them. With a melon baller, remove a scoop from each potato. Cut a tiny sliver off the bottom of the potatoes so they will stand after filling. Combine the boursin, butter, and cream. Taste and add salt and pepper as needed. Spoon or pipe the cheese mixture into the potatoes. Garnish with fine sprinkling of parsley. Add a tiny dollop of red caviar. Stand the potatoes on a platter to serve.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, milk, dijon mustard, salt, pepper, broccoli floret, cooked ham, cheddar cheese
name: super stuffed potatoes

steps: Cooks seafood fancies as it is directed on pkg. Rinse and drain well. In a large bowl combine mayonnaise, mustard, lemon juice, dill weed, salt, fresh ground black pepper, albacore tuna in waterpreparation:Cooks seafood fancies as it is directed on pkg. In a large bowl combine mayonnaise, mustard, lemon juice, dill weed, salt, fresh ground black pepper, albacore tuna in waterpreparation:Cooks seafood fancies as it is directed
ingredients: jumbo pasta shells, crabmeat, baby shrimp, swiss cheese, salad dressing, celery, onion, pimiento
name: jumbo shells seafood fancies

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients, except salmon, together. Pour a small amount of the mix into the bottom of a baking pan - just enough to lightly cover the bottom. Add the salmon, and pour the remaining mix over top. Bake for about 20 minutes, or until salmon flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: butter, orange juice, fresh basil, orange rind, garlic pepper seasoning, fresh salmon, sliced almonds
name: salmon fillets with orange basil butter

steps: Place all ingredients in crock pot. Stir to combine. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours low for 6-8 hours. Taste great served on rice or egg noodles.
ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, long grain brown rice, butter, salt, boiling water
name: no fuss brown rice crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle cheese in 9x9 inch square baking dish. Dot with butter. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour half of the mixture over the cheese. Pour eggs on top. Pour remaining cream mixture over the eggs. Bake 25 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: carrots, cooked white rice, onion, cheddar cheese, egg, salt, pepper, butter
name: cheesy carrot and rice casserole

steps: Place the peppers whole into a saucepan. Cover to approximately half way with water. Bring to the boil and cook for 10 minutes. Remove peppers onto a board and cut out the seeds and stem. Place into a blender or food-processor and process for 20 or 30 seconds. Add the olive oil and process for another 30 seconds or until mixture is smooth. Add the vinegar and mix for 3 seconds. Season to taste. Delicious spread on thickly sliced bread or drizzled over salads.
ingredients: sweet red pepper, garlic cloves, balsamic vinegar, pepper, salt, fresh basil, olive oil, water, parmesan cheese
name: low fat roasted red pepper dressing

steps: In a large saucepan over high heat, bring the chicken stock to the boil and gradually add the polenta. Reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring often. When thick remove from the heat and stir in the polenta. Pour the mixture into a lined 19cmx19cm pan and leave to cool to room temperature. Once it is cool place in the fridge overnight. The next day slice the polenta in half horizontally and lay the salami, sun-dried tomatoes and pepper on the bottom half. Replace the top half and bake at 200c for 30 minutes. Remove the polenta from the heat and stir in the herbs and cheese. Replace the top half and bake at 200c for
ingredients: whole milk, chicken broth, kosher salt, polenta, fresh ground black pepper, unsalted butter, sharp white cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, herbs
name: cheesy polenta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cut 2 pieces of parchment paper out for baking sheet if you are making one large crust. For individual pizzas no need for extra parchment- just flip them over with a spatula after 15 minutes of baking. Mix cheese, eggs, flax, coconut flour, baking powder, and baking powder together until a sticky wet dough is formed. Spread with a spatula or with dampened hands to inch thickness on a baking sheet lined with one piece of parchment paper. Bake for 30 minutes in preheated oven. Halfway through the baking process, flip crust over by sliding it off of the baking sheet with the parchment paper, placing the second piece on the sheet, and turning the crust over unto the new sheet and peeling the old paper off. Return to oven until done baking. Remove from oven, slide off of parchment paper, and flip over again for cooling. Once crust is cooled, top with sauce, pre-cooked veggies or meats, and cheese. Set crust with toppings under the broiler on high for a minute or two until cheese is melted and bubbly. Slice and serve.
ingredients: eggs, cream cheese, garlic powder, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, hard cheese, tomato sauce
name: gluten free low carb pizza

steps: Cook spaghetti noodles according to directions. Drain and return to pot. Can use any pasta - does not have to be spaghetti. In a skillet, add olive oil and garlic. Saute garlic over medium heat until it begins to brown, then remove from burner. Pour garlic and olive oil over spaghetti and add parmesean cheese. Salt and pepper to taste. Toss to coat spaghetti and serve. I sprinkle more parmesean cheese on top after serving.
ingredients: spaghetti, unsalted butter, kasseri cheese, romano cheese, fresh parsley
name: spaghetti mizithra greek style spaghetti the spaghetti factory

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the mushrooms and sauté for about 5 minutes. Add the butter and sauté for another 5 minutes. Add the zucchini and cook for another 5 minutes. Add
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, onion, butter, flour, milk, bouillon cubes, salt and pepper
name: mushroom soup

steps: To make the dressing, in a small bowl, combine the manchego cheese, olive oil, coarse sea salt, quince paste, baby arugula, fresh pepper, extra virgin olive oil, green leaf lettuce, arugula leaves, mint leavespreparation:To make the dressing, in a small bowl, combine the manchego cheese, olive oil, coarse sea salt, quince paste, baby arugula, fresh pepper, extra virgin olive oil, green leaf lettuce, arugula leaves, mint leavespreparation:To make the dressing, in a small bowl, combine the manchego cheese, olive oil, coarse sea salt, quince paste, baby arugula, fresh pepper, extra virgin olive oil, green leaf lettuce, arugula leaves, mint leavespreparation:To make the dressing, in a small bowl, combine the manchego cheese, olive oil, coarse sea salt, quince paste, baby arugula, fresh pepper, extra virgin olive oil, green leaf lettuce, arugula leaves, mint leavespreparation:To make the dressing, in a small bowl, combine the manchego cheese, olive oil, coarse sea salt, quince paste, baby arugula, fresh pepper, extra virgin olive oil, green leaf lettuce, arugula leaves, mint leavespreparation:To make the dressing, in a small bowl, combine the manchego cheese, olive oil, coarse sea salt, quince paste, baby arugula, fresh pepper, extra virgin olive oil, green leaf lettuce, arugula leaves, mint leavespreparation:To make the dressing, in a small bowl, combine the manchego cheese, olive oil, coarse sea salt, quince paste, baby arugula, fresh pepper, extra virgin olive oil, green leaf lettuce
ingredients: manchego cheese, olive oil, coarse sea salt, quince paste, baby arugula, fresh pepper
name: quince manchego and arugula salad

steps: Preheat waffle iron to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl, combine green gram, rava, spinach, green chilies, fresh ginger, garlic, baking soda, oil, salt, and pepper. Mix well. Pour batter onto waffle iron and cook until lightly crisp and golden. Serve with hot syrup, fresh berries, whipped cream, or bananas and chocolate chips.
ingredients: green gram, rava, spinach, green chilies, fresh ginger, garlic, baking soda, oil, salt
name: lentil waffles

steps: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the cauliflower and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, 5-8 minutes. Add the cauliflower and cook, stirring occasionally, until light golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add the stock, milk, nutmeg, and pepper and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer until the cauliflower is easily pierced with a fork, about 10 minutes. Remove 1 cup of cauliflower florets and set aside., puree soup in blender or food processor until smooth. Return soup to pot and stir in the cheese and remaining cauliflower florets and adjust seasonings to taste.
ingredients: head cauliflower, celery, carrots, water, margarine, salt, evaporated milk, milk, frozen peas, cheddar cheese
name: 3 c s soup 3 carrot cauliflower celery w cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl cream butter until fluffy. Add sugars and egg, mix well. In another bowl sift dry ingredients, add to wet ingredients. Once the dry and wet ingredients are well mixed add cup of rolled oats and cup of chocolate chips. Spoon a bit of the batter at a time onto a greased pan. Cook from 12 to 15 minute until the cookies are golden and have risen.
ingredients: honey, butter, egg yolk, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, rolled oats, baking soda, salt, pecans, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: honey chocolate chippers

steps: Trim the bottoms off of the brussels sprouts and then cut in half vertically. Fry bacon in a large pan until crispy. Remove from pan and reserve the fat. Add the brussels sprouts to the bacon fat and fry on medium. Do not stir too often as they need to brown. Sprinkle with the salt. Once the brussels sprouts are browned, add the green onion. Crumble the bacon and add to the brussels sprouts. Stir together the juice of the lemon and the sugar. Pour juice over the brussels sprouts and cook until evaporated.
ingredients: brussels sprout, dark beer, salt, butter
name: brussels sprouts in beer belgium

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion. Cover and cook for 3 minutes. Uncover and cook for 11 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently. Place the pizza crust on a baking sheet. Combine the sauce and tomatoes. Spread sauce mixture over pizza crust. Top with onion and cheese. Bake at 450 for 10 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Sprinkle with basil. Cut into 6 wedges.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, mozzarella cheese, olive oil, sweet onion, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, roasted peppers, dried oregano, dried thyme, fresh basil, salt and pepper
name: sweet onion pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, slowly cook and stir the mushrooms, parsley and onion in 2 tablespoons butter until tender. Drain and set aside. Separate the dough into 4 rectangles. Cut rectangles in half, forming 8 squares, and arrange on a large baking sheet. Place 1 tablespoon mushroom mixture on each square. Top each square with 1 teaspoon parmesan cheese. Fold the squares into triangles. In a small saucepan, melt remaining butter. Brush triangles with butter and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake in the preheated oven 10 to 15 minutes, until golden brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: crescent rolls, mushrooms, parmesan cheese, butter, red onion, garlic powder, cracked black pepper, herbes de provence
name: mushroom pizza

steps: Cook fettuccini according to package directions. Add broccoli for last 4 minutes of cooking time. Drain. In skillet over medium heat, heat butter. Add chicken and cook until browned, stirring often. Add soup, milk, cheese, pepper and fettuccine mixture and cook through, stirring often. Serves 4.
ingredients: fettuccine, olive oil, carrots, green onion, garlic clove, fresh spinach, alfredo sauce, parmesan cheese, basil, salt and pepper
name: fettuccine vegetable alfredo

steps: Heat the oil and add the rice wine vinegar, salt, and sugar. Fry until rice is golden brown. Add the rice wine vinegar, salt, and sugar and mix thoroughly. Place the seaweed sheets onto the bamboo sheet and spread a layer of the sushi roll onto the seaweed. Add the cooked rice wine vinegar, salt, and sugar and mix thoroughly. Add the cooked rice
ingredients: hot water, rice wine vinegar, sugar, fish sauce, cayenne pepper, carrot, mint leaf, chili pepper, peanuts
name: spring roll dipping sauce nuoc mam

steps: Heat oil in a large saute or fry pan until very hot. Add vegetables all at once, spreading in an even layer. Do not stir until bottom of layer begins to brown. Flip and stir to get unbrowned pieces to bottom. Let cook until beginning to brown. The trick here is to keep heat high and brown pieces without overcooking or burning them. If pieces are browned, but not soft enough for your taste, turn off heat and cover pan for a few minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, sliced mushrooms, shallot, dry sherry, broccoli florets, salt, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, black pepper
name: sauteed broccoli and mushrooms

steps: Spray interior of slow cooker with non stick cooking spray. Place pie filling in slow cooker. In a mixing bowl, combine dry cake mix, and butter, and spoon over filling. Drop walnuts over top. Cover, and cook on low for 3-5 hours, or until a toothpick inserted into center comes out clean.
ingredients: applesauce, crushed pineapple, butter, yellow cake mix
name: applesauce dump cake

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Spray cookie sheets with nonstick cooking spray. In medium bowl, sift together flour, ginger, baking soda, allspice, and salt. In large bowl, cream together sugar and margarine until well-blended. Mix until well blended. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons 1 inch apart onto prepared cookie sheets. Flatten each slightly with moistened finger. Bake 11-14 minutes, or until firm. Watch carefully at end of baking, to prevent overbrowning.
ingredients: canned pears, all-purpose flour, gingersnaps, walnuts, butter
name: gingersnap pears

steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor. Whirl until smooth. Place in jar with tight-fitting lid. Refrigerate for up to 2 weeks. Shake well before serving.
ingredients: olive oil, honey, white wine vinegar, dijon-style mustard, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper
name: sweet mustard dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking cocoa, baking soda, salt, baking powder, bananas, vegetable oil, egg, miniature semisweet chocolate chips
name: double chocolate banana muffins

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini, summer squash, and zucchini. Cook, stirring constantly, for 3 to 4 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Add italian seasoning and garlic powder. Cook 1 minute more- serve hot.
ingredients: zucchini, summer squash, plum tomatoes, onion, fresh basil, fresh oregano, feta cheese, olive oil, salt, black pepper
name: summer vegetables in parchment paper

steps: Heat oil in a large saut pan over medium-high heat. Add oil, garlic and ginger. Cook until fragrant but not brown, about 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add choy sum leaves and cook until leaves are wilted but stems are still crunchy, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Add sweet chili sauce, stir and let cook for another 2 to 3 minutes, tossing to coat all leaves. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper. Serve immediately and spoon leftover sauce in pan over choy.
ingredients: peanut oil, gingerroot, garlic cloves, choy sum, water chestnut, sugar, soy sauce, chicken broth
name: stir fried choy sum with ginger and garlic

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Coat 12 cup muffin pan with non-stick cooking spray. Mix carrot, egg, cheese, and chives. Add flour and baking powder, stir. Spoon batter equally among muffin cups. Bake 25-30 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, walnuts, butter, egg, milk, carrot
name: carrot and walnut muffins

steps: In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in berries. Cook until the berries have mostly broken down, approximately 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and lemon juice. Enjoy.
ingredients: raspberry puree, sugar, egg whites, lemon juice
name: raspberry souffle

steps: Place onion patties in a deep dish pie pan. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Mix topping ingredients, except the cinnamon and butter, with a fork until blended. Sprinkle topping over onion patties. Bake at 375f degrees for 40 minutes.
ingredients: flour, sugar, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, milk, onions
name: amish onion patties

steps: Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all.
ingredients: potatoes, raw cauliflower, celery, hard-cooked eggs, onion, crisp bacon, mayonnaise, bacon fat, caraway seeds
name: barbara s special potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. Should be 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, cayenne pepper, egg, milk, cheddar cheese
name: basic cheese muffins

steps: Cook pasta in boiling water for 10-12 minutes, till tender. Drain and serve. Over medium heat, melt butter in saute pan, add garlic and remaining seasonings, stir. Add shrimp and scallops, saute just until shrimp are no longer translucent, do not overcook. Serve over spaghetti topped with parmesan cheese and additional butter if desired.
ingredients: spaghetti sauce, light sour cream, penne, salt, fresh ground pepper, parmesan cheese
name: easy pasta

steps: Preheat the oven to 180c. Combine the chopped figs, hazelnuts, orange zest and allspice. Using an apple corer, remove the apple cores. Place the apples in a baking dish and loosely press the fig mixture into the centre of the apples. Combine the sugar, butter and orange juice and drizzle it over the apples. Bake the apples for 25 minutes or until tender, then set aside for 10 minutes for the sauce to thicken slightly. Serve with the sauce spooned over the apples with cream or icecream.
ingredients: apples, dried figs, hazelnuts, lemon, brown sugar, ground cinnamon
name: baked apples stuffed with figs and hazelnuts

steps: Spray a large, flat skillet with cooking spray. Drop one tortilla in and fill with lots of cheese. Sprinkle bacon pieces over cheese. Top with another tortilla. Flip over when bottom tortilla is golden brown. Cook until cheese is melted. Slide onto a plate and cut into wedges with a pizza wheel cutter. Slather each piece with mayonnaise and top with a thick slice of tomato. Sprinkle with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper and serve. Cooking time does not include cooking time for the bacon.
ingredients: bacon, romaine lettuce, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, olive oil, plum tomatoes, ground black pepper, light mayonnaise
name: inside out blt s

steps: Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, buttermilkpreparation:Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, buttermilkpreparation:Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, buttermilkpreparation:Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, buttermilkpreparation:Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, buttermilkpreparation:Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, buttermilkpreparation:Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, buttermilkpreparation:Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, buttermilkpreparation:Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, buttermilkpreparation:Mix together butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs,
ingredients: butter, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: the best parmesan chicken

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain well. Set aside, and keep warm. Combine soy sauce and the next seven ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well with a wire whisk. Pour over the pasta. Toss gently. Add toppings, if desired.
ingredients: broccoli, dry pasta, dark sesame oil, light olive oil, minced garlic cloves, hot pepper flakes, firm tofu, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, turbinado sugar
name: asian noodles and broccoli

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add potatoes and chicken and cook 5 to 6 minutes until potatoes are tender and chicken is golden. Add red onion, celery and chicken. Cook and stir 4 to 6 minutes, until vegetables are tender and chicken is golden. Mix in california ripe olives, chives, dill, salt and pepper and remove from heat. Divide evenly among 4 plates.
ingredients: olive oil, simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion, cooked chicken breasts, poultry seasoning, dried cherries
name: chicken cherries and potato hash 5fix

steps: Spray or grease small baking dish. Line bottom of dish with green chiles and spread evenly. Cover green chiles with shredded cheese and spread evenly. Beat eggs with sour cream, using a fork. Add hot sauce and salt and pepper to taste, and mix well. Pour into baking dish. Sprinkle with bacon bits and additional shredded cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 30 minutes, or until eggs are set.
ingredients: cream, water, parmesan cheese, sea salt, pepper, mustard greens, eggs, butter, olive oil flavored cooking spray
name: green eggs kid friendly high in iron

steps: Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt and salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired.
ingredients: avocados, lemon juice, hot sauce, salt, white onion, tomatoes
name: guacamole dip

steps: Mix the olive oil, capers and rosemary. Put fish in an ovenproof dish. Pour the olive oil mixture over the fish. Thinly slice the lemons and arrange the slices so that they cover the fish completely. Drain the anchovies of oil, slice in half and drape over the lemon slices. Add splash of white wine and salt and pepper to taste. Bake in oven at 200c for 20 minutes, or until fish is cooked. I served this with rice flavoured with lemon juice and black pepper and a side dish of brocolli.
ingredients: whole trout, olive oil, garlic clove, lemon, juice of, capers, salt and pepper
name: trout with caper sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars.
ingredients: peanut butter, butter, powdered sugar, brown sugar, chocolate chips
name: chocolate peanut butter fudgy squares

steps: Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Place a large pan of water on the lower rack of the oven. Arrange the chicken directly on the middle rack over the pan of water. Bake 30 min at 425. Baste chicken every 8 min with the remaining marinade and turn the legs each time. Serve hot.
ingredients: chicken drumstick, olive oil, white wine vinegar, fresh parsley, garlic clove, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh lemon
name: chicken drumstick saut

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In medium bowl, combine vegetables, chicken, soup, and seasoning. Fit one pie crust into 9-inch pie pan. Pour vegetable mixture into pie crust. Top with remaining crust, crimp edges to seal and pick top with fork. Bake at 350f for 60 minutes or until crust is golden brown and filling is hot. Allow pie to cool slightly before cutting into wedges to serve.
ingredients: butter, flour, mustard powder, milk, cheddar cheese, potatoes, broccoli, cauliflower, frozen peas, fresh chives
name: green garden veg pie

steps: In a medium saucepan, boil the water and spices until the liquid has reduced to 2 cups, 10-15 minutes. Remove from the heat, add the tea-and steep for 4 to 5 minutes. Strain the tea and discard the leaves and spices, and return the tea to the saucepan. Add sweetener to taste and serve.
ingredients: water, cardamom pod, fresh ginger, whole cloves, black peppercorns, cinnamon stick, peppermint tea bags, pure maple syrup, soymilk
name: peppermint chai tea

steps: Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the chicken until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the chicken onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, low-fat sour cream, taco sauce, black beans, sharp cheddar cheese, tortillas, cooking spray
name: easy chicken bean tortillas

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In small saucepan, melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares.
ingredients: unbleached flour, oat bran, cocoa powder, sugar, instant nonfat dry milk powder, baking soda, chocolate syrup, egg whites, vanilla extract, walnuts
name: low fat moist and chewy brownies

steps: Beat cream cheese and sugar together until well combined and smooth. Add yogurt, powdered sugar, orange juice concentrate and vanilla. Beat 30 to 60 seconds on low speed until blended and smooth. Gently stir in whipped topping until well blended. Serve immediately or refrigerate up to 24 hours. Serve with fresh fruit.
ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, whipping cream, granulated sugar, lemon, juice and zest of, pineapple juice
name: french cream fruit dip

steps: Place the cornmeal on top of double boiler. Place over hot water and heat the milk until hot. Combine cornmeal, salt and cold water and stir until smooth. Add to the hot milk, stirring constantly and cook for 10 minutes or until thickened. Cover and cook for about 30 minutes longer. Divide and put in 2 medium size loaf pans. Slice and fry in hot oil when cooled.
ingredients: cornmeal, salt, cold water, boiling water
name: cooked cornmeal mush

steps: In a saucepan, combine the heavy cream, milk, white chocolate, and salt. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth. Remove from heat and add in vanilla. Whisk until frothy. Pour into warmed mugs. Garnish with whipped cream.
ingredients: heavy cream, milk, white chocolate chips, pure vanilla extract, pumpkin pie spice, whipped cream
name: pumpkin spiced white hot chocolate

steps: Boil water in a large saucepan over high heat. When water comes to a rapid boil, turn off heat, put the tea bags into water and cover. After the tea has steeped about 1 hour, pour the sugar into a 2-quart pitcher, then add tea. The tea should still be warm so the sugar will dissolve easily. Add lemon juice. Chill. Makes 2 quarts.
ingredients: orange drink mix, sugar, unsweetened instant tea, lemonade mix, cherry drink mix, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: cherry tea

steps: Cook the pasta according to package directions. While the pasta is cooking, in a large skillet, saute cheese, lemons, lemon peel and garlic in oil until garlic is tender. Add the drained pasta to the skillet. Sprinkle with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Top with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: linguine, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, milk, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, lemon juice
name: two cheese linguine

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make royal hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is incorporated and mixture is warmed through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: unsweetened baking chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, boiling water, salt, vanilla extract, whipped cream, ground cinnamon
name: royal hot chocolate

steps: In a large saucepan, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Stir in ketchup, water, worcestershire sauce, chili powder, pepper and cayenne. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes or until mix reaches desired thickness. Place hotdogs in buns and top each with about 2 t. Beef mix.
ingredients: lean ground beef, diced tomatoes, minced garlic clove, mccormick mild chili seasoning, oregano, basil, ground cayenne pepper, sugar
name: dar s hot dog chili sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey and curry powder. Spread over chicken pieces. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. Baste while baking and be careful that sauce does not burn.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, brown mustard, brown sugar, white wine
name: sweet mustard baked chicken

steps: Place cookies on bottom of 9-inch springform pan. Beat cream cheese and sugar in bowl on medium speed until well blended. Gradually add juice, beating well after each addition. Stir in strawberries. Add cool whip. Stir with wire whisk until well blended. Pour over cookies. Freeze several hours to overnight until firm. Let stand in fridge 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: milk, cool whip, instant vanilla pudding, instant coffee
name: coffee freeze

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Make into loaf. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Serve.
ingredients: french bread, cream cheese, mozzarella cheese, green onion, butter, garlic salt
name: stringy cheese loaf

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken strips and brown on both sides, about 1 minute per side. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Simmer uncovered until the sauce thickens, 8 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: fryer chicken, butter, worcestershire sauce, garlic, red currant jelly, dijon mustard, orange juice, powdered ginger, tabasco sauce
name: vincent price s chicken sweet and hot

steps: Preheat oven to 375f season roast with salt and pepper. In a small bowl, combine garlic, mustard, mayonnaise and horseradish. In another small bowl, combine parsley, thyme, dill and 1 tablespoon of mustard mixture. Place the beef, rib-bone down, in a roasting pan. Coat top with remaining mustard mixture and cook meat until an instant-read thermometer inserted in center of roast registers 110f coat roast with remaining mustard mixture and press herb mixture onto mustard with your hands. Continue cooking roast until a thermometer inserted into the center of the beef registers 140f for medium, or longer until desired degree of doneness. Cover loosely with foil, and let the beef stand 20 to 30 minutes before carving into 12 thick slices. Yields 1 slice per serving.
ingredients: beef rib roast, unsalted butter, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh rosemary leaf, fresh thyme leave, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil
name: slow roasted prime rib

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until bubbly around edges.
ingredients: puff pastry, shortcrust pastry, ground beef, ground sausage, potatoes, carrot, frozen mixed vegetables, onion, ground black pepper, milk
name: sara s pasties

steps: Heat oil in 10 inch skillet. Add greens. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally for 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in honey, vinegar, and salt.
ingredients: turnip greens, butter, beef bouillon cube, vinegar, nutmeg, summer savory, pepper, sugar, flour
name: gary s savory turnip greens

steps: Place meat, onions, potatoes, and carrots into a dutch oven, cover with water and boil for twenty minutes or until potatoes are tender. Add canned vegetables. You probably will not need the entire can of tomato juice. Simmer on stove for thirty minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve with hot corn bread.
ingredients: stew beef chunk, flour, cooking oil, dry onion soup mix, vegetable juice, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, carrots, potatoes, salt and pepper
name: family favorite beef stew

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Beat the butter with the sugar in a large bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs, orange juice and vanilla. In another bowl mix the flour, corn meal and baking powder. Add the dry ingredients to the wet and stir just until blended. Fold in corn. Fill greased muffin cups three-fourths full. Bake at 375 for 18-22 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack. Serve warm.
ingredients: flour, self-rising cornmeal, sugar, buttermilk, eggs, salt, sweet corn, butter
name: corn muffins with real corn

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: olive oil, shrimp, garlic, fresh basil, butter, linguine, parmesan cheese
name: easy shrimp linguine with basil garlic butter

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 8x8 inch sqare baking pan. In a large bowl, stir together the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, margarine, sugar, honey, eggs, butter, pork rindspreparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 8x8 inch sqare baking pan and set aside. In another large bowl, beat together the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, margarine, sugar, honey, eggs, butter, pork rindspour into prepared pan and bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in the pan and cut into 9 squares.
ingredients: margarine, unbleached all-purpose flour, yellow cornmeal, brown sugar, baking powder, egg, buttermilk, dried plum
name: skillet cornbread with prunes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Stir together salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin and cinnamon. Coat the pork with the spice rub. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a 12 inch skillet, over relatively high heat, and brown pork, turning every 30 seconds for 4 minutes. Stir together brown sugar, garlic, and tabasco and pat onto top of the tenderloin. Place pork in roasting pan and cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: lemon, olive oil, soy sauce, dried oregano, garlic, pork tenderloin, green peppers, yellow onions
name: souvlaki

steps: Sift dry ingredients. Mix together the dry ingredients. Spread a ladleful or so of batter onto the waffle iron and bake until the waffle is done, usually 3 to 5 minutes, depending on your iron. Serve immediately or keep warm for a few minutes in a low oven.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg yolks, buttermilk, cake flour, salt, baking powder, egg whites
name: jackie s waffles

steps: Cover potatoes with water and cook until tender. Cover and bake at 375 degrees for about 20 minutes.
ingredients: russet potatoes, butter, paprika, salt, garlic powder, pepper
name: medieval times potatoes copycat

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add tomato sauce, onion and worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Prepare potatoes. Place beef mixture into a casserole dish. Layer the beans over the beef and smooth potatoes over the beans. Sprinkle the cheese over the potatoes and bake uncovered at 375f for 30 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: sandwich bread, butter, ground beef, egg, onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, salt and pepper, tabasco sauce, sharp cheddar cheese
name: beef cups

steps: Combine all ingredients, except the celery, in a 32 ounce pitcher. Add ice and mix well. Pour into 6 glasses. Place a celery stalk in each glass. Serve.
ingredients: ice cubes, vodka, pimento-stuffed green olives, jar, celery salt, ground black pepper, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, tomatoes, celery
name: true wisconsin bloody mary

steps: Preheat grill to medium. Trim fat from chops if necessary and season with pepper. In a small bowl, stir together mustard, syrup, onion and orange peel. Set aside. Grill pork at 350 degrees for 20-25 mins per side. Roast or grill pork at 350 degrees for 20-25 mins per side. Roast pork at 350 degrees for 20-25 mins per side. Roast pork
ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, real maple syrup, dijon-style mustard, cider vinegar, soy sauce, salt, ground black pepper
name: roast pork with maple and mustard glaze

steps: To prepare each sandwich, spread 1 teaspoon of the olive oil on one side of each slice of bread. Place 2 slices cheese, three to four spinach leaves and 1 tablespoon cooked bacon between unbuttered sides of two bread slices. Place one sandwich in a large frypan or on a griddle. Cook over medium high heat for 3 to 4 minutes on eaach side or till the cheese is melted and the bread is golden brown. If necessary to prevent overbrowning, reduce to medium or brush on extra margarine, butter or olive oil. Repeat for remaining sandwiches.
ingredients: sandwich bread, meatloaf, mayonnaise, red pepper jelly
name: sandwich of the day by faiza
