steps: Spray a slow cooker container with butter-flavored cooking spray. Pour evaporated milk and water into container. Stir in splenda, brown sugar twin, apple pie spice and maple syrup. Add oats, apples, raisins and walnuts. Mix well. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours. Stir before serving.
ingredients: steel cut oats, water, salt, dried fruit, cinnamon
name: crock pot oatmeal with dried fruit

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired.
ingredients: vanilla wafer crumbs, sugar, cocoa, instant espresso, butter
name: mocha crumb crust for cheesecake

steps: In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot.
ingredients: couscous, chicken stock, olive oil, brown onions, garlic cloves, brown sugar, red wine vinegar, thyme, sultana
name: caramelised onion and couscous seasoning

steps: Cook the macaroni until done as usual. Do not overcook it. Drain macaroni in strainer. Place macaroni, butter, salt, pepper, milk, mozzarella cheese, and 3 cups of cheddar cheese in casserole dish. Mix eggs in a bowl first and then stir into mixture. Cover everything with aluminum foil and cook for 45 minutes at 350 degrees. Uncover and add extra cup of cheddar cheese across the top. Bake uncovered for another 15 minutes.
ingredients: skim milk, egg, sugar, butter, whole wheat elbow macaroni, salt and pepper, reduced-fat cheddar cheese
name: one step baked macaroni and cheese

steps: In a medium saucepan, saute onions in butter until tender. Add beans, mushrooms and lemon pepper. Cover and cook over medium heat for 5 minutes or until onions are tender. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand for 1 minute or until onions are tender. Cover
ingredients: whole kernel corn, green beans, green chilies, laughing cow light swiss cheese, reduced-fat cream cheese
name: cheesy corn and green bean bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place each jalapeo chile on a baking sheet. Lined with alumninum foil. Sprinkle with bacon and cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: jalapenos, cream cheese, jalapeno jelly, shredded cheddar cheese, cumin, bacon
name: sweet stuffed jalapenos

steps: In a large saucepan, stir together the applesauce, apple, dried oranges, vanilla, corn syrup. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add applesauce, apple, dried oranges, vanilla, corn syrup
ingredients: applesauce, apple, dried oranges, vanilla, corn syrup
name: orange julius roll ups

steps: In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the sugar, cornstarch, salt, and milk. Combine well, then cook on high in the microwave for 8 minutes. Remove the bowl from the microwave. Pour a small amount of the mixture into a small bowl. Add the egg yolks to the smaller bowl, mixing until well-combined. Pour into the prepared pie shell and chill for at least 2 hours. Return the bowl back to the microwave and cook on high for and additional 1-2 minutes, until the mixture has thickened. Remove from the microwave and stir in the butter and vanilla. Stir until the butter has melted. Pour
ingredients: gooseberries, orange rind, salt, sugar, minute tapioca, butter, unbaked pie crusts
name: gooseberry pie

steps: Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, chicken broth, plum tomatoes, parmesan cheese, fresh basil
name: tomato and garlic soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400f place the pork loins side by side, fat side up in a large heavy roasting pan. Insert an ovenproof meat thermometer in the center of one of the roast. Roast the pork for 30 minutes. Meanwhile in a bowl, crush the garlic with the olive oil, pepper, vinegar and salt. Spoon the seasoning over the pork. Return the meat to the oven and roast for 30 minutes longer, until the internal temperature is 160 to 165. Remove from the oven, cover loosely with foil and let rest for at least 10 minutes. Thinly slice the meat and arrange on platters. Pour any juices over the meat. Garnish with rosemary springs. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: fennel seed, minced garlic cloves, fresh thyme, vegetable oil, dry mustard, salt and pepper, boneless center cut pork loin roast
name: garlic pork roast with thyme

steps: Mix eggs, milk, flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, egg yolks, egg whites, salt, sugar, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg yolks, egg
ingredients: eggs, milk, flour, salt, sugar
name: uncle don s swedish pancakes

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add parsley and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper and cook until fragrant,
ingredients: nicoise olives, extra virgin olive oil, sea salt, dried oregano, eggplants, fresh parsley, ground black pepper
name: eggplant aubergine mediterranean style

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease bottom only of 13x9x2 pan with shortening. Do not flour. Beat cake mix, sour cream, oil, almond extract and egg whites in large bowl with electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds. Beat on medium speed 2 minutes. Stir in chopped cherries and chocolate chips. Pour into pan. Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until cake springs back when touched lightly in center. Cool completely, about 1 hour. Spread frosting over top of cake. Store loosely covered at room temperature.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, instant vanilla pudding, sour cream, eggs, oil, warm water, mini chocolate chips, mini chocolate chip, butter, light corn syrup
name: chocolate chip bundt cake optional chocolate glaze

steps: Bring sugar and water to a boil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add ginger and reduce heat to simmer. Stir until sugar dissolves and ginger infuses syrup, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat and take out ginger. Cool and pour over chunks of pineapple, sliced kiwi, sliced bananas, or any of your favorite fruit combinations.
ingredients: fresh fruit, dry red wine, sugar, lemon juice, whipped cream
name: fresh fruit macedonia

steps: Place the habanero peppers, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic cloves, black pepper, salt, tomato sauce, dried oregano in a medium bowl. Add the habanero peppers, tomatoes, cilantro, garlic cloves, black pepper, salt, tomato sauce, dried oregano. Add the habanero peppers, tomatoes,
ingredients: habanero peppers, tomatoes, onion, cilantro, garlic cloves, black pepper, salt, tomato sauce, dried oregano
name: habanero salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line an 8 inch square pan with nonstick aluminum foil, letting the ends entend over the pan on 2 sides. In a medium nonstick saucepan, combine the evaporated milk, marshmallow creme, sugar and butter. Bring to a boil over med-high heat, stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Reduce heat to medium and boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and stir in chips until melted. Stir in vanilla and walnuts until blended. Pour mixture into the prepared, foiled pan. Chill about 2 hours or until firm. Lift foil by ends out of the pan and transfer fudge onto a cutting board and cut into squares. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: cashews, dates, water, nutmeg, cinnamon, butterscotch extract, kiwi fruits
name: butterscotch mousse

steps: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine cup water, sugar and lemon zest. Bring to a boil, then decrease heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Set aside to cool. Strain syrup through sieve placed over large measuring cup, discarding solids. Whisk in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Pour into molds and freeze until slushy, then insert sticks and freeze until solid, for at least 4 hours. If you are using an ice pop kit, follow the manufacturers instructions.
ingredients: watermelon, water, honey, fresh lemon juice, sugar, mint leaves
name: watermelon ice cubes

steps: Cover the bottom of a 9-inch square pan with iron kettle. Cover the bottom of a 9-inch square pan with butter. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Skim fat from cooking juices. Remove chicken from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way. I have also used bon
ingredients: butter, ground beef, onion, canned tomatoes, salt, noodles, mild cheese
name: iron kettle lunch

steps: In a large saucepan, combine dates, apple, raisins and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Combine flour, cinnamon and baking soda. Stir into apple mixture and mix well. Combine eggs and sweetener. Add to batter and mix well. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto a nonstick baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes.
ingredients: granulated sugar, sour cream, eggs, vanilla, tart apples, all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder
name: moist apple bread

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot. Add okra, turnip greens, okra, onion, pine nuts, jalapeno peppers, water, salt and cilantro
ingredients: turnip greens, okra, onion, pine nuts, jalapeno peppers, water, salt
name: spicy okra and turnip greens

steps: In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, banana pepper, red bell pepper, cream cheese
name: antijitoes

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Fill greased muffin tins two-thirds full with batter. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: active dry yeast, warm water, white sugar, salt, shortening, all-purpose flour, egg
name: delicious no knead refrigerator rolls

steps: Mix sugar, water and salt in a small saucepan. Heat to boil, then boil gently for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract. Use one shot per can of coke over ice for vanilla coke. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: watermelon, sugar, vanilla extract, salt, club soda
name: watermelon flavored syrup for soft drinks

steps: Heat large non-stick skillet, swirl in oil, then add garlic. Saute 30 seconds. Add beef in two batches, cook til just browned, about 2 minutes. Drain pasta, add to bowl with yogurt dressing. Add steak and tomatoes, toss to coat. Serve immediately.
ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, dry mustard, oregano, fresh ground black pepper, blue cheese, garlic oil, lemon juice, fresh spinach
name: blue cheese salad

steps: In a heavy saucepan, open all cans and mix together. Add onion and white chicken chili mix to taste. Stir well. Simmer for 45 minutes, stirring frequently. Sprinkle cheese on the top when serving.
ingredients: chicken breasts, chili seasoning mix, water, cannellini beans, black beans, mushroom soup, stewed tomatoes, onion, cheddar cheese, sour cream
name: val s white chicken chili

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f for 1 hour and 15 minutes, to 1 hour and 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, parmesan cheese, garlic powder
name: parmesan baked potato halves

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium bowl mix sugar, cinnamon, paprika, cayenne pepper, honey, oil. Add pecans and toss well. Drizzle honey and oil over spiced nuts and mix well so they are evenly coated. Spread on greased baking sheet and bake 7 - 10 minutes until sugar is caramelized. Let it cool for 5 minutes and take it of the sheet otherwise they might stick to the bottom. If that happens put it back in oven to melt the sticky sugar.
ingredients: sugar, salt, cinnamon, egg white, pecan halves, unsalted butter
name: holiday pecans

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter the sides and bottom of a 10-inch springform pan and set aside. In the top of a double boiler, combine the butter, chocolate and coffee and melt slowly, stirring occasionally, until smooth. Remove from the heat and let cool for 5 minutes. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar and vanilla until frothy. Whisk the eggs into the melted chocolate until combined. Pour the mixture into the prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour and cool on a wire rack until it reaches room temperature. Remove the sides of the pan, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight, before serving.
ingredients: frozen dough rolls, brown sugar, butter, vanilla pudding mix, walnuts, cinnamon
name: easy overnight coffee cake

steps: Cook pasta in large pot of boiling, salted water until tender, but firm, 8 to 12 minutes, stirring often. Drain well and rinse with cold water. Shake out excess water and toss pasta with oil. Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic powder, milk, tomatoes, black olives, sharp cheddar cheese, salt and pepper. Place pasta in large pot of boiling, salted water until tender, but firm, 8 to 12 minutes, stirring often. Drain well and rinse with cold
ingredients: rotini pasta, bacon, mayonnaise, dry ranch dressing mix, garlic powder, milk, tomatoes, black olives, sharp cheddar cheese, salt and pepper
name: ranch pasta salad with bacon

steps: In a small saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook, stirring, until translucent and beginning to brown, 6 to 8 minutes. Add the honey, hot pepper sauce and chili powder and simmer for 1 minute. Remove from the heat, stir in the lemon juice and set aside. Preheat a grill or large grill pan to medium-high. Rub the chicken with the remaining 3 tablespoons olive oil and season with salt. Grill until well marked, about 7 minutes. Flip and cook until the bottoms are well marked and the chicken is cooked through, another 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate and brush with the reserved honey glaze. Cover with foil and let rest for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, grill the pineapple until well marked on one side, about 4 minutes, then flip and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve with the chicken.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, frozen orange juice concentrate, soy sauce, honey, lemon pepper, garlic clove, multi-grain rolls, arugula
name: grilled honey garlic chicken sandwiches

steps: Mix all cake ingredients well. Place in sprayed tube pan, i put waxed paper in the bottom before i spray it. Bake at 350 for 60-70 minutes or until pick comes out clean. Cool in pan 10 minutes, turn over onto plate. Cool completely. Mix icing ingredients well and drizzle over cooled cake.
ingredients: eggs, butter, sugar, vanilla, lemon, zest of, lemon, juice of, flour, baking powder, cranberries
name: cranberry lemon cake

steps: Preheat oven to 450. In foil lined roasting pan, toss carrots with oil and cayenne and season with salt. Arrange in single layer, using two pans if needed. Roast tossing one halfway through for 30-40 minutes, or until tender. In a small bowl, whisk together honey, zest and lemon juice. Season with salt. Drizzled over carrots and toss to coat.
ingredients: carrots, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, sweet paprika, orange juice, unsalted butter, lemon juice
name: roasted orange paprika carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist.
ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, white pepper, nutmeg, prosciutto, jarlsberg cheese, butter
name: jarlsberg oven omelet

steps: Sift flour, salt, baking powder, and sugar together. Separate eggs. Mix together the buttermilk, sour cream or yogurt and the egg yolks. Stir in the butter and vanilla. Brush the waffle iron lightly with oil and preheat it. Stir the wet into the dry ingredients. Beat the egg whites with the whisk or electric mixer until they hold soft peaks. Stir them gently into the batter. Spread a ladleful or so of batter onto the waffle iron and bake until the waffle is done, usually 3 to 5 minutes, depending on your iron. Serve immediately or keep warm for a few minutes in a low oven.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, unbleached white flour, salt, baking powder, sugar, milk, eggs, vanilla, butter
name: pancakes waffles

steps: Combine all dry ingredient together. Cut in shortening. Add milk and mix. Drop by spoonfuls into simmering soup or stew. Cook 10 minutes uncovered, and 10 minutes covered. Do not take the lid off until the 10 minutes are up.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, buttermilk, egg, baking soda, baking powder, salt
name: buttermilk dumplings

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more.
ingredients: garnet yam, butter, yellow onion, pecans, maple syrup, cinnamon
name: top secret recipes tony roma s maple sweet potatoes by todd wilb

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large bowl, mix together soup, cheese and sour cream. Fold in simply potatoes shredded hash browns, onion, eggs, ground beef, saltpreparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large bowl, mix together soup,
ingredients: simply potatoes shredded hash browns, onion, eggs, ground beef, salt
name: shami 5fix

steps: Heat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. Add one cracked egg to each tin and whisk the yolk. Add your toppings, saving the cheese for last. Bake 30 minutes or until eggs are completely cooked. Cool and serve.
ingredients: eggs, garlic salt, chicken broth, mozzarella cheese, cooking spray
name: omelet

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. In the microwave or in a pan, melt the butter and dark chocolate together until liquid. Add the biscuit crumbs, mix well to combine and spoon into a 22cm fluted round, loose-bottomed tin. Press up the side to form the lip first, then press into the base, making sure there are no gaps where they join then put into the fridge to chill. Using a fork or a hand whisk, mix together the cream, eggs, orange zest and orange curd and pour into the crust in the tin. Bake in the oven for 30-35 minutes until just set. Leave to cool completely. Remove from the tin and drizzle with the melted chocolate. Chill in the fridge before serving.
ingredients: refrigerated sugar cookie dough, chocolate chips, butter, corn syrup, orange zest
name: orange chocolate cookie bars

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Combine cream cheese, sugar and eggs in a small bowl. Beat until fluffy. Place crust on baking sheet. Pour mixture into crust. Bake 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from oven. Cool. Spread blueberry filling on top. Garnish with whipped topping. Chill 3 hours.
ingredients: graham crackers, sugar, cinnamon, butter, cream cheese, vanilla, eggs, blueberry pie filling
name: blueberry delight

steps: Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of bacon and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend the soup and return to the saucepan. Cover saucepan and sweat veg for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Replace lid and simmer for 20 minutes. Season and add cream to taste.
ingredients: bacon, onion, potatoes, carrot, celery, cream of potato soup, milk, american cheese, cooked wild rice, salt
name: wild rice potato soup

steps: In a large pot of boiling, salted water cook the pasta to al dente and drain. Return to the pot and melt in the butter. Toss to coat. Whisk together the eggs, milk, hot sauce, salt, pepper, and mustard. Stir into the pasta and add the cheese. Over low heat continue to stir for 3 minutes or until creamy.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, chicken broth, heavy cream, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, kosher salt, dry mustard, paprika, pepper
name: rice cooker mac and cheese

steps: Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers.
ingredients: italian rolls, garlic cloves, olive oil, tomatoes, dried oregano, ham, monterey jack cheese
name: bocadillo spanish ham and cheese sandwiches

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the sugar and cornstarch. Stir in orange juice concentrate until smooth. Add strawberries. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in butter, juice, and peel until butter is melted. Serve warm.
ingredients: frozen mixed berries, sugar, water, lemon, zest of, cornstarch, almond extract, brandy
name: mixed berry sauce

steps: Heat a large saucepan over a low heat and add the butter. When the butter has melted, add the onion and cook until soft and translucent. Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper to taste, then increase the heat and stir. When the moisture from the mushrooms has been released, allow it to evaporate, concentrating the flavour. This might happen quickly or slowly, depending entirely on the type of mushrooms used. Add teh paprika and cayenne and fry for a few moments longer, until the paprika turns a shade darker. Finally, add teh sour cream or creme fraiche and dill, and allow it to bubbvle gently for a further 5 minutes or so. Serve immediately with rice, pasta or spatzle.
ingredients: onion, fresh parsley, mushroom, margarine, sole fillets, fresh ground black pepper, dry white wine, skim milk, flour, paprika
name: mushroom baked sole

steps: Combine all ingredients except the meat in a medium bowl. Place the meat in a shallow glass or ceramic dish in one layer. Pour marinade over and turn meat to coat well. Marinate at room temperature for at least 2 hours. Drain meat. Thread on 6 skewers and grill 10 to 12 minutes, turning to cook all sides.
ingredients: lamb fillets, green sweet peppers, cherry tomatoes, onions, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, cumin, turmeric, ground red pepper
name: spicy lamb kebabs

steps: In large serving bowl, place hazelnuts, balsamic vinegar, honey, crystallized ginger, bartlett pears, lemon juice, butter lettuce. Add hazelnuts, balsamic vinegar, honey, crystallized ginger, bartlett pears, lemon juice, butter lettuce. Add hazelnuts, balsamic vinegar, honey, crystallized ginger, bartlett pears,
ingredients: hazelnuts, balsamic vinegar, honey, crystallized ginger, bartlett pears, lemon juice, butter lettuce
name: pear hazelnut salad with crystallized ginger dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel squash and cut into cubes about 1 inch square. Put squash into plastic mixing bowl, add olive oil, lime juice, and minced chile vinaigrette and toss well so squash is all coated with oil. Arrange squash on roasting pan in single layer. Dot with butter. Roast for 40-50 minutes, turning several times, or until squash is quite softened and getting browned on the edges. Season with sea salt and fresh ground black pepper, and serve hot.
ingredients: acorn squash, black pepper, salt, olive oil, garlic clove, lime juice, dried chili pepper flakes, fresh cilantro
name: roasted acorn squash with chile vinaigrette

steps: Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine oats, salt, orange zest, macadamia nuts, butter, pure maple syrup, dried cranberries, dried cherries, dried blueberries, dried cherries, dried blueberries, dried cherries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blueberries, dried blue
ingredients: old fashioned oats, salt, orange zest, macadamia nuts, butter, pure maple syrup
name: macadamia maple granola

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: dried navy beans, onion, brown sugar, maple syrup, salt, water, ketchup, prepared mustard, ham hock
name: slow cooker baked beans

steps: In a medium saucepan combine butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, butter, coconut milk
ingredients: winter squash, butter, coconut milk, brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract
name: winter squash in coconut milk fusion soup

steps: Cream shortening and sugar. Add molasses and egg. Stir in sifted, flour, salt and baking soda. Then cinnamon, cloves, and ginger. Dough will be soft and sticky. Roll, into walnut-sized balls and roll in granulated sugar. Place on greased cookie sheet and bake at 350f for 7 to 8 minutes. Cookie will flatten out while baking.
ingredients: shortening, sugar, molasses, egg, flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, ginger
name: oma s gingersnaps

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, and crushed pineapple. Mix well. Pour mixture into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: cool whip, yellow cake mix, egg, water, crushed pineapple, instant vanilla pudding, milk, pineapple juice, cream cheese
name: pineapple fluff cake

steps: Boil eggplants until soft. Saute onion, chopped shrimp, and celery in butter or oil. Combine with eggplant. Put in baking pan and sprinkle with bread crumbs or cracker crumbs. Bake approximately 30 minutes at 350f.
ingredients: eggplant, green bell pepper, olive oil, sesame seeds, garlic cloves, of fresh mint, salt, pepper, paprika
name: eggplant aubergine salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: virgin olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, minced garlic clove, sliced mushrooms, italian-style diced tomatoes, chili powder, cooked long-grain brown rice
name: matthew s healthy tex mex chicken and rice

steps: Place tequila lime bbq in plastic food storage bag. Add chicken, seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator 1-2 hours. Stir together lime juice, limeade concentrate and cumin in plastic food storage bag. Stir together lime juice, limeade concentrate and cumin in plastic food
ingredients: fresh lime juice, tequila, orange juice, fresh cilantro, jalapeno peppers, chili powder, salt, pepper, boneless chicken breast halves
name: grilled tequila lime chicken

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Place the blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, blood oranges, fenn
ingredients: blood oranges, fennel bulb, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil
name: blood orange and fennel salad

steps: In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares.
ingredients: sugar, white syrup, chunky peanut butter, chocolate chips, rice krispies
name: chocolate crispy bars rice krispies

steps: Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook pasta according to package directions and then drain. Melt butter in large pyrex measuring cup and blend in remaining ingredients except cheese. Place pasta and butter back into saucepan used to cook the pasta in. Cook pasta for two minutes until reheated. Stir constantly. Put cooked pasta into serving bowl topped with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: linguine, olive oil, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaf, sun-dried tomato, brie cheese
name: pasta with brie

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add lemon juice and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add lemon juice and cook for
ingredients: fresh green beans, oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, sweet white onion, stuffed green olive
name: south african green bean salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Mix dry ingredients and yeast. Pour into a greased loaf pan. Pour melted butter over mixture. Bake 1 hour, remove from pan and cool at least 15 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: water, sugar, dry yeast, buttermilk, butter, brown sugar, salt, rye flour, unbleached white flour, caraway seeds
name: light seedless rye bread

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine potatoes and oil in a large bowl or plastic bag, tossing well to coat. Combine salt, garlic powder, and red pepper in a small bowl. Sprinkle salt mixture over potatoes, tossing well to coat. Arrange potatoes in a single layer on 2 baking sheets coated with cooking spray. Bake at 425 degrees for 25 minutes. Turn potato wedges over, and rotate pans. Baking an additional 20 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: potatoes, egg white, sumac, chili powder, cumin, garlic clove, lemon zest, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: sumac spiced potato wedges

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spread crusty garlic spiced prime rib over meat and sauce. Mix honey mustard, ketchup, lemon and herb spice, and dices garlic. Spread mixture over meat. Place cut onion over meat and sauce. Spinkle black pepper over entire dish. Bake for 30-40 minutes, until tender. Serve with your choice of vegetables for a little sweeter sauce add granulated sugar to taste.
ingredients: garlic, ground cumin, paprika, ground coriander, dry mustard, brown sugar, salt, cayenne pepper, prime rib roast
name: crusty garlic spiced prime rib

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a small bowl. Spread mixture on top of muffin. Refrigerate overnight.
ingredients: english muffin, cream cheese, liquid honey, dried fig, sunflower seeds
name: fruit and cheese spread 2007

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Using solid shortening, grease and flour bottom only of 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In large bowl, blend all ingredients at low speed until moistened. Beat 2 minutes at medium speed. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes. Remove from pan. Wrap tightly and store in refrigerator.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, instant lemon pudding, water, eggs, vegetable oil, poppy seeds
name: lemon poppy seed bread oh so easy

steps: Heat the oil in a wok over a medium heat for 1 minute. Add the chicken and stir-fry for 5 minutes or until golden. Stir in the vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes, or until tender-crisp. Transfer the contents of the wok to a large salad bowl, add the salad greens and mix well. Whisk together the dressing and the soy sauce in a small bowl, drizzle it over the salad-vegetable mixture and mix well. Whisk together the dressing and the soy sauce in a small bowl, drizzle it over the salad-vegetable mixture
ingredients: soy sauce, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken, olive oil, onions, frozen broccoli, frozen snow peas, mango, fresh cilantro, scallion
name: spicy chicken and mango stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a large bowl. Add the pumpkin and raisins. Stir until just mixed. Do not overmix. Spoon batter into muffin cups, filling to just below the tops. Bake 25-30 minutes, until tops of muffins spring back when pressed lightly. Remove from oven and let stand for 5 minutes in the pan, and then remove to a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: whole wheat pastry flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, pumpkin, soymilk, raisins
name: pumpkin raisin cookies

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear.
ingredients: chicken breasts, milk, salt, onions, crescent rolls, cream cheese, margarine, pepper, seasoned croutons
name: chicken pillows

steps: In a large pot, combine broth, cauliflower, carrots, onion, nonfat milk, ground nutmeg, fresh ground black pepper, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 7 to 10 minutes, until vegetables are tender. Puree in a blender or food processor. Return to pan. Add milk and heat thoroughly, but do not boil. Stir in nutmeg and pepper.
ingredients: pearl barley, potatoes, fresh spinach, carrot, chicken broth, butter, red pepper flakes, light cream
name: easy winter soup

steps: Preheat grill. Arrange veggies on a piece of aluminum foil large enought to form a packet. Sprinkle pepper, garlic powder, & salt over veggies. Slice butter into desired pieces and place on top of veggies. Drizzle with olive oil. Seal packet leaving enough room for veggies to steam. Place on grill for approximately 20 minutes or until veggies are soft and flip packet as necessary for even cooking.
ingredients: summer squash, butter, onion, salt & pepper
name: bev s sauteed yellow squash

steps: Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:Combine all ingredients, except sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter, peanut butter flavoringpreparation:
ingredients: sugar, dry sherry, reduced sodium soy sauce, water, white wine vinegar, creamy peanut butter
name: simple peanut sauce

steps: In a small saucepan over medium-low heat, saute the garlic until aromatic. Add the tomatoes, and saute for another minute or so, then add the broth. Scramble the egg, parmesean cheese, hot sauce, salt and pepper in a serving bowl. When the broth comes to a boil, add the egg mixture while stirring. Remove from heat, place in a bowl, top with fresh ground pepper, and enjoy.
ingredients: oil, onion, garlic cloves, head broccoli, potato, chicken stock, salt & freshly ground black pepper, bacon
name: easy broccoli soup

steps: Melt corn syrup, dark chocolate, butter, corn flakes, chocolate, cream, miniature chocolate eggs. Bake at 350 degree f. for 20- 30 minutes, until set. Drizzle with 2 tbsp. Liquid orange blossom honey. Serve as a pudding.
ingredients: light corn syrup, dark chocolate, butter, corn flakes, chocolate, cream, miniature chocolate eggs
name: chocolate crunch nests for easter

steps: In a preheated, non-stick pan over medium heat get the olive oil hot. Add the broccoli and carrots - saute for 3 minutes. Add garlic and saute another 2 minutes. Add the water - this steams the broccoli a bit and adds some nice color. After a few more minutes, the broccoli and carrots should still be crisp, but slightly tender. Turn heat off and add the honey - mix well. Serve immediately.
ingredients: carrots, orange juice, honey, shallots, salt and pepper
name: orange honey carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 275f. Cut jalapenos in half lengthwise and scrape out seeds. In a bowl, combine cheeses and onion and mix well. Stuff each hollowed jalapeno half with cheese mixture. Wrap bacon slices around each half, cover as much of the surface as possible. Brush bacon surface with bbq sauce. Secure with toothpicks and pop into oven for 1 hr.
ingredients: cream cheese, monterey jack cheese, jalapeno peppers, garlic, green onions, black pepper, wonton wrappers, vegetable oil
name: jalapeno popper wonton puffs

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the pineapple juice, cider vinegar, brown sugar, raisins, salt, ginger paste, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, ground cloves, ground cinnamon. Bring to a boil and simmer until the pineapple is mushy and transparent. If neccessary, add a little more vinegar. Taste and add sugar and cayenne as desired. Then add the pears and simmer until the pineapple is mushy and transparent. Then add the pineapple juice, cider vinegar, brown sugar, raisins, salt, ginger paste, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, ground cloves, ground cinnamon. Bring to a boil and simmer until
ingredients: crushed pineapple in juice, cider vinegar, brown sugar, raisins, salt, ginger paste, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, ground cloves, ground cinnamon
name: revised betty crocker pineapple chutney

steps: In a large bowl, combine the warm water, buttermilk, vegetable oil, sugar, baking soda, salt. Cover and process on low speed for 30 seconds or until blended. In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Add the yeast mixture and stir with a spoon until combined. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 30 minutes. Stir dough down. Fill greased muffin cups half full. Cover and let rise in a warm place
ingredients: active dry yeast, warm water, buttermilk, vegetable oil, sugar, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt
name: buttermilk pan rolls

steps: Heat butter, sugar and water in a 3 quart sauce-pan to a rolling boil. When mix reaches 305 degrees pour onto a greased large cookie sheet. Sprinkle chocolate chips over the candy. As chocolate melts spread with a butter knife. Spread nuts evenly over the pan, shaking lightly until all nuts stick. Cool until hard. Break into pieces. Enjoy.
ingredients: wooden sticks, dessert apples, water, demerara sugar, butter, vinegar, golden syrup
name: toffee apples

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a shallow ovenproof dish. Trim the leeks, cut a slit from the top to bottom and rinse well under cold water. Place the leeks in a saucepan of water, brind to a boil, and simmer gently for 6-8 minutes, until just tender. Remove and drain well using sloted spoon. Arrange in the prepared dish. Beat the eggs with the goat cheese, yogurt, and half the parmesan cheese. Season well with salt and pepper. Pour the cheese and yogurt mixture over the leeks. Mix the breadcrumbs with the remaining parmesan cheese, and sprinkle over the sauce. Back for 35-40 minutes, until the top is crisp and golden brown.
ingredients: butter, leeks, chicken stock, white wine, cream, streaky bacon, fresh bay leaves, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: leeks baked with cream bacon and bay leaves

steps: Heat a large saut pan over medium-high heat. Add oil, garlic and ginger. Cook until fragrant but not brown, about 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add bok choy leaves and cook until leaves are wilted but stems are still crunchy, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Add sweet chili sauce, stir and let cook for another 2 to 3 minutes, tossing to coat all leaves. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper. Serve immediately and spoon leftover sauce in pan over bok choy.
ingredients: baby bok choy, onion, fresh green beans, salt, pepper, light vegetable oil cooking spray
name: baby bok choy stir fry with beans onions

steps: In a nonmetallic bowl, combine navel oranges, kiwi fruits, banana, red seedless grapes, vanilla yogurt, brown sugar. Add navel oranges, kiwi fruits, banana, red seedless grapes, vanilla yogurt, brown sugar. Add navel oranges, kiwi fruits, banana, red seedless grapes
ingredients: navel oranges, kiwi fruits, banana, red seedless grapes, vanilla yogurt, brown sugar
name: simply fruit

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Mix all ingredients except onions and cheese together. Coat 9x11 casserole with nonstick cooking spray. Place the onions in a single layer in the casserole and pour chicken broth mixture evenly over all the onions. Cover onions and bake for 1 hour. After hour, remove and sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven uncovered and bake 5 more minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: sweet onions, butter, condensed cream of chicken soup, milk, pepper, swiss cheese, french bread
name: golden baked onions

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: egg, lime zest, fresh lime juice, salt, unsalted nuts, sugar, chili powder, ground cumin, cayenne pepper
name: crunchy chili lime spiced nuts

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Place fennel, onion and garlic into an oiled baking dish using the 2 tablespoons oil. Combine saffron, chicken broth and white wine and pour over fennel season with salt and pepper. Dot with butter. Cover and bake for 25 - 30 minutes. If desired, uncover the baking dish toward the end of the cooking time, to allow any excess liquid to evaporate. Garnish with the fennel fronds.
ingredients: fennel bulb, onion, extra virgin olive oil, water, instant dashi stock, ground cayenne pepper, salt, dry white wine, fish fillet
name: fish soup with fennel

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Drizzle garlic with olive oil, then wrap in aluminum foil. Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes, and cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain, cool and chop. Stir in butter, milk, salt and pepper. Remove the garlic from the oven, and cut in half. Squeeze the softened cloves into the potatoes. Blend potatoes with an electric mixer until desired consistency is achieved.
ingredients: russet potatoes, half-and-half, garlic cloves, kosher salt, parmesan cheese
name: john s creamy garlic mashed potatoes

steps: Mix together butter, arborio rice, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, card
ingredients: butter, arborio rice, ground cardamom, ground cinnamon, whole milk, sugar, unsalted shelled pistachio, liquid honey
name: rice pudding with cardamom

steps: Preheat oven to 325 f. Mash the bananas until they are mostly lump-free. With a hand mixer, beat together the banana, applesauce, eggs, vanilla, and water until creamy. In a separate bowl, sift the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and spices. Gradually add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients, beating well. Pour the batter into a gently oiled and floured 95 inches loaf pan and spread evenly. Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick is inserted and comes out clean. Cool completely on wire rack before slicing.
ingredients: plantain, butter, allspice, coconut, cloves, raw sugar
name: cooked plantain bananas

steps: Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: red potatoes, garlic, chicken bouillon cubes, sour cream, cream cheese, butter, salt and pepper
name: crock pot mashed red potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel squash and cut into cubes about 1 inch square. Put squash into plastic mixing bowl, add olive oil, lime juice, and minced chai tea and toss well so squash is all coated with oil. Arrange squash on roasting pan in single layer. Dot with butter. Roast for 40-50 minutes, turning several times, or until squash is quite softened and getting browned on the edges. Season with sea salt and fresh ground black pepper, and serve hot.
ingredients: butternut squash, chai tea, nutmeg, cinnamon
name: masala chai butternut squash

steps: Spray pan with cooking spray and saute onion, bell pepper and sausage. Drain as much grease as possible. Put 1 large diced onion and one diced red bell pepper in pan with sausage and cooked until the tender. Sprinkle with garlic powder. Add can diced tomatoes and tomato sauce. Cook pasta separately and add in at end of cooking time.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, polish kielbasa, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, penne pasta, oregano, parsley, white vinegar
name: tomato kielbasa penne

steps: In a food processor or blender, blend the cream cheese, feta cheese green onion, pepper and oregano, until smooth, scrape down the sides, add the tablespoon of either yogurt or sour cream. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour. Rinse the cherry tomatoes and remove stems. With a sharp knife, cut a slice fron the non-stem end of each tomato. With a small spoon scoop out as much of the seeds and pulp and you can, arrange the hollow tomatoes on paper towel lines plate to drain. After the cheese mixture has chilled for 1 hour, transfer the it to a small zipper-top plastic bag, squeeze out air. Snip off one corner, squeeze the cheese filling into each tomato, arrange on serving dish and sprinkle with paprika.
ingredients: tomatoes, feta cheese, kalamata olive, fresh flat-leaf parsley, fresh basil
name: cheese and olive stuffed tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Stir together dressing, butter, garlic salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add chicken and toss well to coat with mixture. Roll each piece in crushed chips and place on a shallow baking sheet. Sprinkle with any remaining chips. Bake for 30 minutes or until crispy and lightly browned.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, ranch dressing mix, dry breadcrumbs, eggs, salt, pepper, butter, cracker
name: easy ranch chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: eggs, jalapeno peppers, cheddar cheese, butter
name: solo green chili cheese omelette

steps: Heat oil in a non stick skillet. Add onion, sweet red pepper, cooking oil, fresh portabella mushrooms, balsamic vinegar, soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, cooked brown rice, stir fry until onions are translucent. Add garlic and saute until cooked and reduced, about 10 minutes on medium heat. Add optional red wine or cooking wine, mix well until reduced. Set aside once finished. When burgers are almost ready, top with portabello mushroom mixture and a slice of cheese, continue grilling or broiling until cheese is melted.
ingredients: onion, sweet red pepper, cooking oil, fresh portabella mushrooms, balsamic vinegar, soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, cooked brown rice
name: portabella mushroom stir fry

steps: Combine egg noodles, hot water, chicken bouillon cubes, butter, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, cooked chicken, parsley flakes. Cook until thickened and bubbly. Remove from heat. Stir in the sour cream, chicken and mushrooms. Add the cooked noodles. Put in greased casserole dish. Sprinkle with buttered crumbs. Bake at 400 degrees for about 20 minutes or until it bubbles.
ingredients: egg noodles, hot water, chicken bouillon cubes, butter, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, cooked chicken, parsley flakes
name: creamy chicken noodle bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix down with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Pour melted butter over top of dough. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, beer, salt, black pepper, eggs, egg white, garlic powder
name: bacaba black pepper beer bread

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add chicken and chilli mixture and cook on a low slow heat until the chicken is transparent. Add chillies to the chicken mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge.
ingredients: birds eye chiles, shallots, garlic, dried shrimp paste, lime juice, sugar, salt and pepper, soy sauce
name: spicy chilli

steps: In an extra large skillet, place the oil and heat it on medium until it is hot. Add the mushrooms, shallots, garlic and sun-dried tomatoes. Saute the ingredients for 2 to 3 minutes or until the mushrooms are slightly cooked. Add the pasta, salt and pepper. Mix the ingredients together thoroughly so that the pasta is well coated. Add more oil if the pasta seems dry. Place the pasta on a serving plate. Sprinkle the goat cheese on top.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, vidalia onion, garlic cloves, honey, marsala wine, spinach fettuccine, salt and black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: spinach fettuccine with garlic onion sauce

steps: Place the beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Cook for 3-4 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. In a small skillet, saute onion in oil for 3 minutes. Add the beans. Saute for 5 minutes or until tender. Reduce heat. Add the tomato, oregano, salt and pepper. Cook 1 minute longer or until heated through.
ingredients: chicken stock, olive oil, tomatoes, string bean, dried italian herb seasoning, salt, pepper, fresh parsley
name: string green beans italian style

steps: Preheat the oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 ovenproof dish. Boil the water and add the grits. Stir and lower the heat to simmer and simmer 5 minutes. Turn off heat and add the cheese and butter into the grits and stir. Let the cheese and butter melt then stir in the eggs. Stir in the peppers and the salt. Transfer in the the 9x9 dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes.
ingredients: velveeta cheese, cream cheese, pecans, garlic powder, salt, chili powder
name: chili cheese log

steps: Melt butter in a skillet. Add rice and stir, about 2 minutes, making sure grains are nicely coated with butter. Add lemon zest, pepper, and the broth. Simmer uncovered over low heat for about 40 minutes, or until the liquid has absorbed and rice in tender. Remove from heat. Add lemon juice and stir. Let stand 5 minutes. Garnish with lemon slices to serve.
ingredients: long grain white rice, vermicelli, butter, safflower oil, chicken broth, salt
name: armenian pilaf

steps: In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in gin and lemonade. Cook until the sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and let cool completely before using. To store, refrigerate up to 2 months. In a glass, combine lemon juice, gin, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber
ingredients: gin, simple syrup, lemonade, soda water, mint, cucumber
name: southside lemonade

steps: In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips, milk and salt. Cook and stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Stir in pie filling and extracts. Pour into crust. Chill 2-3 hours or until firm. Garnish with cool whip and cherries.
ingredients: chocolate cookie pie crust, semi-sweet chocolate chips, egg yolks, vanilla, heavy cream
name: warp speed pie

steps: Put the beets in a large saucepan. Cover with cold water, bring to the boil. Simmer 40 minutes or till tender, cool in pan. Drain beetroot. Use your hands to rub off skin. Combine beetroot, rocket, onion, cheese and pinenuts in serving bowl. Shake oil, juice and sugar together. Season to taste. Drizzle salad with dressing just before serving.
ingredients: beets, olive oil, lettuce, pineapple, avocado, goat cheese
name: goat cheese salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix butter, shortening, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. In separate bowl mix flour, baking soda, salt, and cream of tartar. Combine with moist ingredients. Shape dough into round balls. Bake 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: vegetable oil, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, cayenne pepper, saltine crackers
name: lone star firesnackers

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, with electric mixer at medium speed, beat together butter and shortening until light and fluffy. Add sugar and cream together until very light. Add vanilla, scraping down sides of bowl as needed. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each egg. Gradually fold in flour until a soft, workable dough forms. Shape into balls and place on cookie sheets. Dip the bottom of a flat bottomed glass in sugar and use it to mash down the balls of dough. Bake in preheated oven until done. Immediately remove from pan to cool.
ingredients: crisco, sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, milk, cinnamon sugar, butter
name: sue s coffee cake

steps: Heat oil in a pan and add zucchini tossing to coat. Add vinegar, mix well cover and cook for five minutes until the courgettes are tender crisp. Remove lid and cook for another 2 - 3 minutes until liquid has evaporated. Remove from heat and capers, parsley and lemon juice. Toss to coat and season if desired, serve warm.
ingredients: onion, sunflower oil, courgettes, eggs, plain flour, of fresh mint, fresh dill, feta cheese, oil
name: claudia roden s courgette fritters

steps: Place pork in crock pot. Add soy sauce and garlic powder. Cook for about 10 to 15 minutes on high. Serve with a green vegtable.
ingredients: lean pork, soy sauce, oil, garlic cloves, brown sugar, roasted cashews
name: crock pot cashew pork

steps: Heat oil in 5 qt dutch over medium-high heat. Add onions and cook for about an hour, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and cook for about an hour, stirring occasionally. Add beef bouillon and cook for about an hour, stirring occasionally
ingredients: chuck roast, oil, water, gingersnaps, red wine vinegar, beef bouillon, red pepper, sweet potatoes, carrots, bay leaf
name: gingersnap pot roast

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs until thick. Add cake mix, pudding, water, oil, and bananas. Beat with electric mixer at medium speed for 10 minutes. Add walnuts, mix to incorporate. Pour into ungreased bundt pan. Bake for 50 minutes. Do not remove from pan until cooled. Sprinkle for powdered sugar for garnish.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, miracle whip, eggs, cold water, cinnamon, carrots, cream cheese, vanilla extract, powdered sugar
name: sam s carrot cake

steps: Heat the oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the eggs, break the yolks with a spatula, and allow the eggs to set. Occasionally lift the edges of the eggs to let the uncooked egg run underneath. This allows more egg to make contact with the pan for faster cooking. When the eggs have cooked, sprinkle with salt and cumin, and serve.
ingredients: eggs, cumin seed, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, fresh chives, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper
name: cumin and chive stuffed eggs

steps: Mix all dry ingredients together in a bowl. In another bowl, mix all wet ingredients. Make a well in the dry ingredients and pour in the wet, and mix together. Preheat waffle iron and coat with cooking spray. Cook waffles in waffle iron.
ingredients: egg whites, nonfat milk, all-purpose flour, butter, salt, apples, apple jelly, water, ground cinnamon
name: apple breakfast popover

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add carrots, celery, onion, vegetable broth, red kidney beans, tomatoes, pearl barley, spinach leaves, ground black pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until rib stickin beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle barley soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, carrots, celery, onion, vegetable broth, red kidney beans, tomatoes, pearl barley, spinach leaves, ground black pepper
name: rib stickin bean barley soup

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Beat egg whites until soft peaks begin to form. Add sugar, salt, and vanilla. Beat until stiff peaks form and turn glossy. Fold in nuts and coat well with the egg white mixture. Melt butter in a 9x13 baking pan by placing pan in the oven. Evenly spread coated nuts over melted butter in pan. Bake for 30 minutes, stirring and turning nuts about every 8 minutes, or until butter no longer remains in pan. Place hot nuts on foil and allow to cool. May be stored in an airtight container for several weeks.
ingredients: mixed dried fruit, water, granulated sugar, ground mace, cornstarch
name: swedish dried fruit cream

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a mixing bowl, cream sugar and shortening together. Add eggs and almond extract and mix well. Combine flour, soda, powder and salt and gradually add to creamed mixture. Stir in coconut and cherries, this will take a bit because the dough is very stiff. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto greased or non stick cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown. Cool on racks.
ingredients: shortening, cream cheese, sugar, egg, almond extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, pecans, maraschino cherry
name: cherry nut nuggets

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned.
ingredients: eggs, cooked lentils, seasoning, cheese
name: excellent easy eggs with lentils and seasoning

steps: Put the indian style carrot salad in a small bowl. Add the salt, mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly, pressing out as much liquid as possible. Mix and eat.
ingredients: carrot, salt, vegetable oil, black mustard seeds, lemon juice, sultanas
name: indian style carrot salad

steps: Combine chicken breast, broccoli, red seedless grapes, granny smith apple, celery, walnuts, poppy seed dressing, creole seasoning. Cover and chill until ready to serve.
ingredients: chicken breast, broccoli, red seedless grapes, granny smith apple, celery, walnuts, poppy seed dressing, creole seasoning
name: everyone s favorite chicken salad

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce.
ingredients: ground turkey, spaghetti sauce, onion, oregano, garlic, basil, sugar, cayenne pepper
name: ground turkey tomato sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Spread into a 9x9 baking dish. Top with reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Bake until bubbly and lightly browned on top approximately 30 minutes.
ingredients: mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, water-packed artichoke hearts, garlic powder, paprika
name: artichoke heart dip

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the sugar, water, orange juice, and orance zest. Stir to combine. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the fruit, evenly scattered through the jello. Put back in the fridge until completely set.
ingredients: sugar, guava jelly, orange, water, rum, fruit, dried shredded coconut
name: tropical fruit compote

steps: Fry the bacon in a large cast-iron skillet until crisp, then drain on paper towels, leaving the fat in the pan. Add the onion and cook until golden and tender, then add the flour and stir, cooking for about 1 minute. Add the sugar, salt, pepper, bean liquid or water, and vinegar, stir, and bring to a rolling boil. Allow to boil for about 3 minutes to thicken the sauce. Add the bacon bits at this time. Add the green beans and cook until heated through, about 7--8 minutes. Transfer the beans and sauce to a serving bowl and top with crumbled bacon.
ingredients: onion, tarragon vinegar, bacon, green beans
name: snappy green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussels sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: fresh brussels sprouts, salt, black pepper, plain yogurt, parmesan and roasted garlic salad dressing, parmesan cheese
name: brussels sprouts with creamy parmesan garlic sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan, saute the lamb till soft. Add soy sauce and soy sauce, mix throughly and marinate for 1 hour or overnight in the refrigate. Heat the oil in a large saucepan, saute the lamb till soft. Add soy sauce and soy sauce, mix throughly and marinate for 1 hour or overnight in
ingredients: leg of lamb, brown sugar, canadian rye whisky, soy sauce
name: bbq lamb with canadian whisky

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet and saut the garlic for 1 minute. Saute the onions for 2 to 3 minutes. Add the kale leaves, stems and shoyu soy sauce. Saut for 2 to 3 minutes, stirring constantly. Sprinkle the lemon juice over and toss to mix. Serve immediately after adding the lemon juice or the leaves may loose their bright green color.
ingredients: kale, olive oil, red onion, garlic cloves, salt & pepper, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, feta cheese
name: feta cheese kale red onions

steps: In large serving bowl, place mangoes. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil on medium-heat 1 minute. Add pears and cook 10 to 15 minutes or until mangoes begin to soften and turn golden. Meanwhile, in cup, stir vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper. Add mangoes mixture to pears in skillet, and cook 1 minute or until liquid begins to thicken. Pour pears and liquid from skillet into bowl with mangoes, toss to coat. Serve immediately.
ingredients: beef sirloin, ground black pepper, mangoes, salad leaves, pears, fat-free caesar salad dressing
name: beef mango pear salad

steps: Heat oven to 350. Spray 13x9 baking pan. Put cake mix in lg bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Add water, vanilla, and egg. Mix well. Stir in coconut. Press dough into pan. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Cool for 15 minutes. Melt chocolate and drizzle over cake. Cool.
ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla wafers, baking powder, eggs, pecans, flaked coconut
name: vanilla wafer coconut cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. In a square 9 inch pan stir together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Add oil, vinegar, water, and vanilla. Mix until combined, making sure there are no clumps of flour mixture. Spread batter evenly in pan. Bake until toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 35 to 40 minutes. Let cake cool completley on a cooling rack.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, oil, orange juice, flour, baking powder, cocoa powder, powdered sugar
name: black white swirl cake

steps: Heat oil in 2-quart saucepan. Add onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes, until onion wilts. Stir in cumin and pepper. Continue to cook for 2-3 minutes. Add oregano, potatoes, green chilies and chicken broth. Bring to a boil and simmer slowly for 45 minutes. Serve hot with cheese sprinkled in the middle of bowl.
ingredients: olive oil, green onions, fresh dill, frozen green peas, chicken stock, potatoes, cream cheese, smoked salmon
name: creamy green pea soup with smoked salmon

steps: In crock-pot combine meat with rest of the ingredients. Cover and cook on high for 2-3 hours. Remove bay leaf.
ingredients: ground beef, garlic, chili powder, ground cumin, tomato sauce, beef broth, masa harina, salt, cayenne pepper, paprika
name: easy chili con carne no beans

steps: Preheat oven to 300f. Place the seeds in a bowl and add the olive oil then the seasonings. Mix well. Spread pumpkin seeds on a single layer on baking sheet. Bake for about 30 minutes depending on your oven. Stir half way through.
ingredients: water, salt, pumpkin seeds, vegetable oil
name: mom s roasted pumpkin seeds

steps: In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions.
ingredients: pizza dough, potatoes, rosemary, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper
name: pizza con le patate potato pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix butter, icing sugar, plain flour, cornflour, egg, sweetened condensed milk, golden syrup with 1 tbls of icing sugar mixture. Bake at 350f and 180c for 15 minutes. Cool on a wire rack and keep in an airtight container once cold.
ingredients: butter, icing sugar, plain flour, cornflour, egg, sweetened condensed milk, golden syrup
name: caramel filled biscuits

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a large baking pan with cooking spray. Rub the fillets on both sides with lemon juice, then salt and pepper them to taste. Place fillets in the baking disk and sprinkle evenly with tarragon. Cover evenly with sour cream. Bake for about 15 minutes until fish is done but not over cooked. Sprinkle with chives and parsley.
ingredients: white fish fillet, butter, ritz cracker, tarragon, chives, salt, pepper, lemon
name: baked fish with tarragon

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease cookie sheet, or spray with cooking spray. Unroll dough, place on cookie sheet. Starting at center, press out dough into 13x9-inch rectangle. Bake 7 minutes. Top with pepperoni and cheese. Bake 8-10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Cool 2 minutes. Cut pizza in half lengthwise, then cut into 16 strips. Serve with pizza sauce for dipping.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, dried oregano, garlic, pizza sauce, pepperoni, green onions, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: baked pepperoni pizza dip

steps: Bring the stock, margarine, rice-a-roni, salsa, chicken, pinto beans, corn, flour tortillas, shredded cheddar cheese in a large saucepan over medium heat to a boil. Stir in the rice, and reduce heat to low. Cover and continue to cook for about 5 minutes. Cover and
ingredients: margarine, rice-a-roni, salsa, chicken, pinto beans, corn, flour tortillas, shredded cheddar cheese
name: chicken and rice wrap using rice a roni

steps: Season fish fillets with salt and pepper. Brush fillets with egg yolk and press nuts into both sides of the fish. Sprinkle with parsley. Saut fish in butter or olive oil for approximately 3 minutes per side. Remove from pan and keep warm. Add clarified butter, sherry and lemon juice to pan drippings. Heat and pour over fish. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh parsley, toasted almond, lemon juice, water, orange zest, garlic, ground cumin, salt, swordfish steaks, lemon
name: swordfish with almond crust

steps: Place mousse in 1 c hot water. Let stand for 5 minutes, then add 1 c cold water. Using mixer add the vanilla pudding, mix on slow speed. Fold in coolwhip, fruit. Chill. You can also use strawberries& strawberry jello.
ingredients: sugar-free orange gelatin, sugar-free instant white chocolate pudding mix, mandarin oranges, fat-free cool whip
name: orange dreamsicle mousse

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: salmon fillet, sweet onion, beefsteak tomato, mozzarella cheese, mayonnaise, lemon zest, lemon juice, capers, ciabatta
name: smoked salmon paninis

steps: In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired.
ingredients: ground turkey, onion, garlic, tomatoes, pinto beans, tomato paste, green chili salsa, chili powder
name: gringo chili

steps: Preheat oven to 375f in a mixing bowl, combine all the dry ingredients. Add the beer all at once, mixing as little as possible. The batter should be lumpy. Pour the batter into a 9-x-5-x-3-inch loaf pan and brush with the melted butter. Bake in the oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until an inserted skewer comes out clean. Turn out onto a rack to cool.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, onions, cabbage, salt, pepper, frozen yeast dinner roll dough
name: beer rocks bierocks
