steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line muffin pan with foil baking cups. Cut almond paste into 16 pieces and pat into a round disc. In mixer cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs then add baking powder, soda and extract. Fold in 1 cup flour, buttermilk then remaining flour until well blended. Spoon about 2 tablespoons batter into each cup and smooth surface. Top with level teaspoonful of preserves, then the piece of almond paste. Top each muffin with another 2 tablespoons of batter. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly brown.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, fat free raspberry yogurt, skim milk, canola oil, raspberries, milk chocolate chips
name: raspberry chocolate muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: milk, vegetable oil, egg, bisquick baking mix, fruit preserves, powdered sugar, water
name: fruit filled muffins

steps: In a large saucepan combine the chocolate, cream, butter and peanut butter and heat over moderate heat, stirring, until chocolate is completely melted. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla and a pinch of salt. Transfer to a bowl and chill for 4 hours, or until firm. Form mixture by heaping teaspoons into balls and roll lightly in peanuts. Chill on a baking sheet lined with wax paper for 1 hour, or until firm. Chill on a
ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, whipping cream, instant coffee granules, hot chocolate powder, amarula cream liqueur, graham crackers
name: unforgettable amarula mocha truffles

steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. While spaghetti cooks, mix sauce and next 4 ingredients in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, simmer 10 minutes. Coat a 13 x 9 baking dish with spray. Add pasta and top with sauce. Bake at 375f for 25 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with cheese. Top with onions if desired.
ingredients: pasta, mascarpone, dijon mustard, cheddar cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, chives, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: super speedy spaghetti bake

steps: In a heavy saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender. Add rice and orzo and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes. Add chicken broth and lemon juice and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed. Fluff sauce over chicken and inside. Add lemon skins to chicken cavity. Cook on high 4-6 hours low 6-8.
ingredients: chicken broth, eggs, lemon juice, salt, pepper
name: greek lemon sauce

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl combine the macaroni, tuna, mayonnaise, onion, carrot, salt & pepper. Add onion pepper, and cheese. Toss with peas, ham and celery. Stir in mayo. Serve on lettuce if you prefer.
ingredients: macaroni, tuna, mayonnaise, onion, carrot, salt & pepper, celery
name: good n easy macaroni salad

steps: Bring water and bouillon to a boil in a large saucepan. Stir in uncooked noodles, then cover and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add vegetables and onion, cover and simmer 5 minutes or until noodles are tender and most liquid is absorbed. Add soup, cheese and milk, mix well. Stir in chicken and pepper, heat through.
ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breast, onion, chicken broth, wide egg noodles, frozen peas and carrots, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, parmesan cheese
name: one pot chicken and vegetables

steps: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix into a soft dough. Turn dough out onto a floured surface and knead 20 times. Divide dough into fourths and roll each quarter into a 12 inch long rope. Cut each rope into inch pieces, and set on a floured surface. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Roll each piece of dough across the tines of a fork to get groves on it and drop it into the pot of water. Cook gnocchi until it floats to the top. Drain and serve.
ingredients: olive oil, shallots, mushrooms, fresh sage, mascarpone, gnocchi, parmesan cheese, fresh ground black pepper
name: gnocchi with sage mushrooms mascarpone

steps: Spray a 13x9 inch baking pan with cooking spray. Put drumsticks in the baking dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes. In a bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients. Take drumsticks out of the oven and pour sauce mixture over them. Bake at 375 f for half an hour. Turn drumsticks over and add more garlic powder, pepper and salt. Top with the parsley. Bake another half an hour, or until cooked until 160f.
ingredients: dry red wine, dark brown sugar, low sodium soy sauce, ginger, garlic clove, chicken drumsticks, coarse salt
name: sweet and sticky grilled drumsticks

steps: In a small mixing bowl, combine sugar and cinnamon. Set aside. Take breadsticks and cut them in half lengthwise. In a small microwave pyrex bowl, melt butter in microwave. Take each halved breadstick and dip into butter then roll in cinnamon mixture. Twist each strip 2 or 3 times and place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 to 18 minutes. Let cool on wire racks. Makes 16 toasted sticks.
ingredients: sugar, ground cinnamon, french bread dough, butter
name: cinnamon bubble ring

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, garlic clove, gruyere cheese, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: potato, heavy cream, milk, garlic clove, gruyere cheese, salt and pepper
name: creamy potato dauphinoise

steps: Preheat broiler. Bring a large pot of water to a boil over high heat for the pasta. Place a medium pot over medium-high heat with 2 turns of the pan of evoo, about 2 tablespoons. Add the meat to the pan and cook until golden brown, 5-6 minutes. Add the onion and chili powder to the pan, season with salt and pepper, and cook until the onion is tender, 4-5 minutes. Add the ketchup, mustard and beef stock to the pot, bring up to a bubble and simmer until slightly thickened, 4-5 minutes. While the chili is working, salt the boiling water and drop the pasta inches cook to al dente according to package directions then drain thoroughly and return it to the pot. Add the chili to the pot with the pasta and give everything a good toss. Return to a casserole dish and top with the shredded cheese. Place the casserole under the broiler to melt and brown the cheese. Serve with a simple salad alongside.
ingredients: macaroni, lean ground beef, olive oil, onion, bell pepper, cheddar cheese soup, shredded cheddar cheese, milk, taco seasoning mix, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: taco cheeseburger macaroni

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini, zucchini, garlic, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: zucchini, olive oil, fresh oregano, parmesan cheese, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: zucchini moons

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Butter a medium baking dish. Add the oats and butter to a heatproof mixing bowl. Pour 1 cup boiling water over them and let stand 5 minutes. Stir in the milk, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. When well mixed, stir in the apples. Spoon mixture into the prepared dish. Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and continue to cook for 5-10 minutes, until thick and bubbly. Spoon into bowls and serve hot with cream drizzled around the cereal and a dusting of cinnamon.
ingredients: light brown sugar, milk, water, steel cut oats, salt, dried apple, dried pear half, maple syrup
name: bruleed irish oatmeal

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet, heat olive oil in a large skillet. Sautee onion and zucchini until translucent& tender. Add tomatoes and simmer, 3-5 minutes. Combine tortellini with vegetables and sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: cheese-filled egg tortellini, frozen broccoli florets, alfredo sauce, solid white tuna, butter, italian style breadcrumbs, garlic
name: quick tuna tortellini gratin

steps: Saute pork chops and water chestnuts in butter for 15 minutes. Add onion soup to mixture and simmer for 2-3 minutes. Fill empty soup can with liquid from pork chops and water chestnuts. Add water to reach top of can. Pour liquid into pot with pork chops and water chestnuts. Pour into 9x9 casserole dish, cover and bake for 1 hour at 300 degrees or until pork chops are tender.
ingredients: rice, beef consomme soup, french onion soup, sliced water chestnuts, butter
name: company s coming rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large skillet, cook and stir bacon and onion until bacon is crisp. Drain off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into ungreased 1-quart casserole dish. Bake uncovered until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes.
ingredients: bacon, pork & beans, onion, mustard, ketchup, salt & pepper
name: annabelle s baked beans

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: shortening, sugar, eggs, chocolate chips, bananas, flour, baking soda, salt
name: banana bread with chocolate chips

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Using scissors, cut the marshmallows in half. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and marshmallows. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely.
ingredients: instant nonfat dry milk powder, cinnamon, sugar, flour, baking soda, eggs, vanilla, canned pumpkin, carrot, raisins
name: weight watcher pumpkin muffins

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork chops and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the flour, worcestershire sauce, salt, and oregano and cook for another 5-10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the pork chops and cook for another 5-10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the flour, worcestershire sauce, salt, and ore
ingredients: maple syrup, brown sugar, dijon mustard, vegetable oil cooking spray, boneless butterfly pork loin chops, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: vermont pork chops for 2

steps: Mix all ingredients except prawns. Pour half of mixture into another bowl to reserve for use as a sauce. Marinate prawns with rest of mixture for at least a few hours or longer. Remove prawns and set aside. Pour the used marinade into a pan and quickly bring to a boil on the stove. Thread the prawns on skewers. Cook over hot grill, turning once and basting with the cooked marinade until pink and done,. Serve immediately with the reserved sauce for dipping.
ingredients: prawns, flour, butter, brandy, amaretto, dry white wine, orange juice, orange zest, whipping cream, parsley
name: prawns amaretto

steps: Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: frozen cubed hash brown potatoes, chicken broth, carrot, onion, cubed ham, water, evaporated milk, garlic sauce, cheddar cheese
name: kickin potato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool.
ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, flour, pecans, hershey chocolate kisses, powdered sugar
name: chocolate kisses cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 4 ingredients. In a 2-quart saucepan, heat the honey, oil and vanilla until syrupy. Add to the dry ingredients and mix well. Spread on a jellyroll pan. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes. Store in an airtight container or plastic bag in the refrigerator. It will keep for several weeks.
ingredients: old fashioned oats, flour, brown sugar, salt, nuts, butter, pure maple syrup, dried cranberries, raisins, dates
name: granola clusters

steps: Combine dressing ingredients and heat until it comes to a boil. Let cool and refrigerate. Melt butter in frying pan. Brown broken noodles, almonds, and sesame seeds in butter. Set aside. Keep dressing, dry mixture, and cabbage seperate. Mix all 3 together 15 minutes before serving. This is best served cold and fresh.
ingredients: white vinegar, sugar, oil, soy sauce, sesame seeds, almonds, ramen noodles, green onions, chinese cabbage
name: trudi s oriental crunchy salad

steps: Melt butter in a saucepan. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until clear and thickened. Stir in wine and cook until hot. Serve over steak, hamburgers or other meat.
ingredients: vegetable oil, mushroom, green onion, flour, vegetable broth, ground nutmeg, pepper, skim milk, dry white wine, salt
name: mushrooms in creamy wine sauce

steps: Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on fourth piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on fifth piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on sixth piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on seventh piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on eighth piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on ninth piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on tenth piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on eleventh piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on twelfth piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on thirteenth piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on thirteenth piece of toast and place on top, mayo side
ingredients: apples, water, lemon juice, fat-free mayonnaise, mustard, low-fat flour tortillas, ham, nonfat cheddar cheese, lettuce
name: apple wrap sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Line a greased 9x9 pan with bread. Combine broccoli with margarine, cheese, salt, tobasco, and onion. Spoon over bread. Beat eggs, add milk powder and water, mix well, pour over broccoli. Bake at for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: broccoli, flour, light margarine, skim milk, cheese
name: broccoli in cheese sauce

steps: In a large salad serving bowl, toss together the nectarines, sugar, ground ginger, lemon juice, fresh raspberries, fresh blueberries, low-fat cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, vanilla, nutspreparation:In a saucepan, over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter, stir in sugar and almonds and cook until golden brown. Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly. Combine nectarines, sugar, ground ginger, lemon juice, fresh raspberries, fresh blueberries, low-fat cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, vanilla, nutspreparation:In a saucepan, over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter, stir in sugar and almonds and cook until golden brown. Remove from heat
ingredients: nectarines, sugar, ground ginger, lemon juice, fresh raspberries, fresh blueberries, low-fat cream cheese
name: berry nectarine salad

steps: Place macadamia nuts, basil, garlic cloves, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, lemon, extra virgin olive oil in a food processor. Pulse for a few seconds. With the machine running, add macadamia nuts, basil, garlic cloves, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, lemon, extra virgin olive oil in a food processor. With the machine running, add macadamia nuts, basil, garlic cloves, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, lemon, extra
ingredients: macadamia nuts, basil, garlic cloves, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, lemon, extra virgin olive oil, sea salt
name: macadamia pesto

steps: In a saucepan, cook the sausage over medium heat until no longer pink. Stir in butter until melted. Sprinkle with flour. Gradually stir in milk, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 3 minutes. Serve over biscuits.
ingredients: ground sausage, skim milk, white flour, garlic salt, fresh ground black pepper, dried sage
name: nana s sausage gravy

steps: Mix all ingredients together except for the pita slices. Spread mixture in a large flat circle on a dinner plate or serving dish. Sprinkle with black pepper and oregano and top with the pita slices. Refrigerate for 30 minutes to allow the flavors to mingle. Serve with plenty of tortilla chips, toasted pita triangles or crackers.
ingredients: oregano, cream cheese, pepperoni slice, green onion, sour cream, pizza sauce, bell pepper, mozzarella cheese, pita chips
name: amy s pizza dip

steps: Mix together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg, buttermilk, egg
ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, egg, buttermilk, vegetable oil
name: awesome buttermilk pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Season chicken with the salt and 1 tablespoon of the omani spice mix. Roast chicken on a rack or in a baking dish for 45 minutes until it is cooked through and the skin has browned. Remove from oven and set aside. In a large saucepan, heat the ghee, then add the onions and cook until golden, about 5 or 6 minutes. Add remaining 2 tablespoons of spice mix and garlic. Add the bouillon and water. Once the mixture boils, stir in the rice. Cover, reduce heat and cook on low for about 25 minutes until rice is tender. Serve rice with chicken on top. Garnish with toasted almonds.
ingredients: ground lamb, eggs, onion, ground cinnamon, garlic, marjoram, salt & pepper
name: iranian chelo kabob

steps: In a large saucepan, add the ground beef, onion, garlic, dried italian herb seasoning, stewed tomatoes, beef broth, frozen mixed vegetables, conchiglie, parsley, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley.
ingredients: v8 vegetable juice, frozen mixed vegetables, ground beef, condensed cream of mushroom soup, instant minced onion, salt, pepper
name: tomato hamburger soup

steps: In a saucepan, saute celery and onion in margarine. Blend in flour. Cook and stir until bubbly. Add salt and milk and cook until thick. Stir in chopped parsley. In a greased casserole, place hard boiled eggs, cut in half and round side up. Pour sauce over eggs. Toss mixture of melted margarine and bread crumbs over top. Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes.
ingredients: milk, egg, cornmeal, flour, baking powder, garlic salt, onion powder
name: long john silvers hush puppies

steps: Cook the orzo until tender but firm. Drain in a colander. Rinse under cold water to cool, and drain well. Mix the orzo, zucchini, parsley, and mint in a large bowl with a large spoon. Whisk the remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over the salad and mix with a large spoon.
ingredients: leeks, lemon juice, parsley, olive oil, orzo pasta, asparagus, parmesan cheese
name: orzo with lemony leek sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray. Slice potatoes into 12 wedges each. Place all the potatoes into a large bowl. Sprinkle salt, pepper, and cumin over potatoes, drizzle oil over seasonings and toss the potatoes until all are coated. Spread potatoes onto baking sheet in a single layer. Bake for 10, remove from oven and turn. Place back into oven and cook for 10 more minutes, then turn again. Return to oven and continue cooking until golden brown -- probably 5 - 10 more minutes. Each serving size is 12 wedges.
ingredients: carrot, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, chili powder, cumin, ginger, salt and pepper
name: spiced carrot fries

steps: Saut the pumpkin in the microwave for 5 minutes. Stir in the broth and pumpkin, heat, stirring occasionally, over low heat for 10-15 minutes. Stir in the cream and heat through. Do not boil. Garnish with chives or parsley and serve.
ingredients: pumpkin, onion, garlic clove, chicken stock, curry powder, evaporated skim milk
name: low fat pumpkin soup in microwave

steps: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook angel hair pasta until it is al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and set aside. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: angel hair pasta, artichoke hearts, olive oil, red pepper, garlic clove, dijon mustard, parmesan cheese
name: angel hair pasta with artichokes and mustard sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. With electric mixer, mix cream cheese, splenda, vanilla extract, egg whites until thoroughly mixed. Add cake flour, salt, and milk. With electric mixer, mix thoroughly. Pour batter into nonstick cake pan or spring form pan and bake for 1 hour at 325 degrees f. Let cool at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Place in refrigerator and chill for at least 2 hours. Place in refrigerator and chill for at least
ingredients: boiling water, gelatin, philadelphia cream cheese, splenda sugar substitute, sour cream, heavy cream
name: no bake lemon cheesecake sugar free

steps: Put the pesto into a bowl and mix in the olive oil, garlic and pine nuts. Slowly add the olive oil in a constant stream while the food processor is on. Stop to scrape down the sides of the food processor with a rubber spatula. Add the grated parmeasn cheese and lemon juice. Pulse again until blended. Add salt and freshly ground black pepper. Store pesto in a jar or airtight container in the refrigerator for about a week, or in the freezer for about six months. Keep it looking fresh and green by covering the top with a thin layer of olive oil or with a sheet of plastic wrap directly on its surface. This will keep it from oxidizing and turning brown. If your pesto darkens in color, it will still taste good. I freeze it by dropping tablespoons of it on a parchment paper, freezing it and storing in a zip lock bag in the freezer.
ingredients: fresh basil leaves, olive oil, pine nuts, fresh garlic cloves, parmesan cheese, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: kittencal s perfect pesto

steps: Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through.
ingredients: potatoes, red chile, lemongrass, coriander leaves, spring onions, eggs, plain flour, oil, sweet chili sauce
name: thai potato cakes

steps: Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool.
ingredients: coconut milk, sugar, quick-cooking tapioca, eggs, sweetened flaked coconut, pure vanilla extract, coconut extract, whipping cream, vanilla cookie pie crusts
name: coconut tapioca pie

steps: In large saucepan, combine all ingredients except garnish. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered 20 minutes to blend flavors. Remove spices. Serve hot with cinnamon sticks and sliced apples if desired.
ingredients: water, lemons, oranges, cinnamon sticks, allspice, apple cider, sugar
name: spiced citrus cider

steps: Place mustard seeds, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, fresh herb, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, mustard
ingredients: white mustard seeds, mustard powder, white wine, champagne vinegar, brown sugar, fresh herb
name: herbed mustard

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 4 ingredients. In a 2-quart saucepan, heat the honey, oil and vanilla until syrupy. Add to the dry ingredients and mix well. Spread on a jelly roll pan coated with cooking spray. Bake for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes. Cool completely.
ingredients: old fashioned oats, walnuts, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, kosher salt, pure maple syrup, vanilla extract, canola oil
name: maple walnut granola

steps: Preheat oven to 220 degree c. Grease and flour a 8cm deep, 19cm square cake tin. Place flour, sugar and salt in a large bowl. Add butter and using finger. Make a well in the centre and add buttermilk and using a flat bladed knife, stir until dough almost comes together. Press out to a 3cm thick round. Dip a 5cm round cutter into flour to prevent dough sticking and cut out scones. Gently press leftover dough pieces together and repeat cutting out more scones - should make a total of 16 scones. Place scones, touching into prepared tin. Bake for 15 to 17 minutes or until light golden and hollow when tapped on top. Serve with jam and cream or honey and cream.
ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, kosher salt, buttermilk
name: butter dip biscuits

steps: Place fish in a shallow baking dish, in a single layer. Sprinkle fish with lemon pepper. Sprinkle fish with almonds and parsley. In a small bowl combine butter, wine and lemon juice. Pour over fish. Cover and bake at 350 for 10minutes. Uncover and bake another 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let set 5 minutes. Before serving.
ingredients: fish, butter, lemon, juice of, flour, salt and pepper, white wine, fresh parsley
name: monkfish with lemon

steps: Combine peach juice, orange juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon
ingredients: peaches, sugar, orange juice, lemon juice, champagne
name: champagne peach punch

steps: In a small bowl, mix dressing and taco mix. On a large serving platter or individual serving pates, layer remaining ingredients except tomatoes. Drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with cherry tomatoes that have been sliced in half. You can also top with olives and add a bit of canned corn if you like. I only use a portion of the can of black beans. Use as much as you like.
ingredients: corn chips, chili, cheddar cheese, sour cream, salsa, iceberg lettuce
name: campfire taco salad

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add butter, onion, and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 3 to 4 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender.
ingredients: vegetable oil, long grain rice, onions, green bell pepper, celery ribs, crushed tomatoes, ground cumin, garlic cloves, salt, reduced-sodium chicken broth
name: new mexico spanish rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, crushed pineapple with juice, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, crushed pineapple with juice, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butterpreparation:Pre
ingredients: flour, cornstarch, lemon juice, crushed pineapple in juice, egg yolks, egg whites, granulated sugar, pineapple slices
name: tart pineapple pudding

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine whole berry cranberry sauce, cream cheese, mayonnaise, sugar, cool whip, nuts. Add enough water to cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Immediately reduce heat, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the sauce has thickened. Taste for sweetness, and adjust with additional sugar if necessary. You can not overcook, so continue cooking until you have a good thick consistency. Let mixture cool, then refrigerate in a covered container.
ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, cream cheese, mayonnaise, sugar, cool whip, nuts
name: cranberry cream cheese dessert

steps: Peel and boil potatoes until soft. Drain potatoes, and mash. Add cream cheese, sour cream, and minced garlic to potatoes and mix until smooth. Grease a 13x9 baking dish and add mashed potatoes. Set the 4 pats of butter in various spots on top of potatoes, sprinkle with paparika. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
ingredients: mashed potatoes, sour cream, milk, garlic powder, french-fried onions, cheddar cheese
name: creamy potato casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender.
ingredients: butternut squash, butter, honey, fresh rosemary
name: baked squash with rosemary and honey

steps: In medium bowl, combine yogurt, walnuts, corn syrup, brown sugar, apples, salt & freshly ground black pepper, honey, balsamic vinegar, mint leaves, wooden skewers. In a small bowl, combine yogurt, walnuts, corn syrup, brown sugar, apples, salt & freshly ground black pepper, honey, balsamic vinegar, mint leaves, wooden skewers. In a small bowl, combine yogurt, walnuts, corn syrup, brown sugar, apples, salt & freshly ground black pepper, honey, balsamic vinegar, mint leaves, wooden
ingredients: yogurt, walnuts, corn syrup, brown sugar, apples, salt & freshly ground black pepper, honey, balsamic vinegar, mint leaves, wooden skewers
name: creamed yogurt with grilled fruit

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together rice, cream of celery soup, butter, frozen green beans, mushrooms, swiss cheese. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: kielbasa, water, converted rice, cream of celery soup, butter, frozen green beans, mushrooms, swiss cheese
name: kielbasa and rice

steps: Combine salad greens, boneless skinless chicken breasts, pears, fresh ground black pepper, bleu cheese salad dressing in a large bowl. Season with black pepper. Toss gently to combine. Whisk oil, juice and salt and pepper together in a small bowl until well combined. Add mayo to chicken. Now add garlic powder to the mix -- the more the better. Do not be afraid that you will overpower the chicken salad as the garlic powder is what makes the dish so addictive. Add
ingredients: mixed salad greens, boneless skinless chicken breasts, pears, fresh ground black pepper, bleu cheese salad dressing
name: chicken pear and blue cheese salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all ingredients, except flour, sugar, butter, salt, eggs, karo light corn syrup, vanilla, pecanspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all ingredients, except flour, sugar, butter, salt, eggs, karo light corn syrup, vanilla, pecanspreparation:
ingredients: unsifted flour, sugar, butter, salt, eggs, karo light corn syrup, vanilla, pecans
name: pecan pie squares

steps: Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture evenly between the three pie crusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze. Leave out or refrigerate to soften a bit before cutting. Store leftover in freezer.
ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, peanut butter, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, fudge sauce, graham cracker pie crust
name: peanut butter pie frozen

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and saut briskly, cooking through, for approximately 4-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. In a bowl, toss lettuce with dressing. To assemble sandwich, place cooked shrimp on one half of toasted bread, then top with dressed lettuce and grated parmesan cheese. Top with other half of bread and slice into 4 to 6 portions.
ingredients: caesar salad dressing, cilantro, sweet chili sauce, lime, romaine lettuce hearts, red onion, frozen sweet corn, black beans, tortilla chips
name: cilantro caesar salad

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat together the eggs and sugar until very thick. The batter should fall from the beaters in a thick ribbon. Beat in the vanilla. While youre beating the eggs and sugar, heat the hot chocolate and butter in a small saucepan to just simmering. Add the hot chocolate mixture to the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream as you continue beating. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Fold the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until theyre just combined. Pour the batter into a lightly greased 9 inch cake round. Bake for 50 minutes, or until the cake is a deep golden brown and starting to pull away from the sides of the pan. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10-15 minutes. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan
ingredients: eggs, white sugar, cake flour, salt, baking powder, cocoa powder, hot water
name: amish texas chocolate roll cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, salt, flour, pecans, vanilla
name: pecan meltaways

steps: Cook pasta in large pot of boiling, salted water until tender, but firm, 8 to 12 minutes, stirring often. Drain well and rinse with cold water. Shake out excess water and toss pasta with oil. Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, parsley and basil. Place pasta in large bowl. Add mayonnaise mixture, chicken, artichokes and tabasco. Toss well. Garnish with almonds. For a decorative presentation, serve in avacado halves, in tomato cups or on lettuce leaves.
ingredients: dry fettuccine, cooked chicken, celery, green onion, fresh cilantro, vinaigrette, sesame seeds
name: chinese style pasta salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Using a baking sheet with a lip, melt butter. Mix seasoning into the butter, and then toss in almonds. Bake in a 350 oven for about 10-12 minutes, stirring once, until nuts are lightly toasted and fragrant. Remove from heat and serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, blanched almonds, fresh thyme leaves, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: fried herbed almonds

steps: Combine ingredients in a large bowl. Toss cabbage, green cabbage, grapes, broccoli, celery, green onion, almonds, sunflower seeds, miracle whip, sugar, white vinegar. Toss dressing with the cabbage, green cabbage, grapes, broccoli, celery, green onion, almonds, sunflower seeds, miracle whip, sugar, white vinegar. Toss dressing with the
ingredients: green cabbage, grapes, broccoli, celery, green onion, almonds, sunflower seeds, miracle whip, sugar, white vinegar
name: cabbage broccoli salad and dressing

steps: Heat oil in cast iron skillet until it reaches 350 or flour bubbles immediately upon being sprinkled in it. Place the soy sauce, vinegar and oil in a screw-top jar and shake until well combined. Place the oysters on a large serving platter. Drizzle over the soy and sesame dressing. Sprinkle with the green shallots. Serve immediately.
ingredients: hot sauce, worcestershire sauce, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, salt, black pepper, garlic cloves, oysters, fresh parsley, lemon wedges
name: grilled barbecued oysters

steps: Mix together the margarine, boneless skinless chicken breasts, black pepper, salt, shallots, marsala wine, low sodium chicken broth, plum tomatoes, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh parsley, fresh
ingredients: margarine, boneless skinless chicken breasts, black pepper, salt, shallots, marsala wine, low sodium chicken broth, plum tomatoes, fresh parsley
name: claude lenfant s chicken marsala

steps: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add tilapia fillets to the pan. Sprinkle the fish with garlic powder. Pour lime juice over fish. Saute the tilapia until the fillets are opaque and easily flake with a fork. Serve while hot. I like to serve this with a side of rice pilaf and california blend veggies.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, unsalted butter, kosher salt, black pepper, lime juice
name: tilapia with a touch of lime

steps: Preheat oven to 180deg. Place corn on baking tray and roast for 30 mins, allow corn to cool and then squeeze out the flesh and mash in a small bowl. Add the olive oil, balsamic vinegar and dijon mustard and whish well together. Season with salt and pepper. Chop corn into bite sized pieces, then grill or dry fry for 3-5 mins or until crisp. Place salad leaves into bowl and add bacon, onion, tomato and avocado. Toss well. Whisk the dressing ingredients again to ensure they are mixed well and then pour over salad.
ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, cilantro, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh corn kernels, avocados, cherry tomatoes, red onion
name: corn tomato and avocado salad

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray the pie plate with cooking spray. Combine flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar in a medium bowl. Add the butter, eggs, and vanilla. Stir well. Stir in the chocolate morsels and nuts. Spoon into a greased 9-inch pieplate. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, raspberry liqueur, vanilla extract, silken tofu, agave nectar, chocolate wafer pie crust
name: alton browns dairy free chocolate pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In medium bowl combine flour, soda and salt. Mix well, set aside. In a large bowl with a mixer blend sugars at medium speed. Add butter and mix to until it forms a grainy paste, scraping down the sides of the bowl. Add eggs and vanilla, and beat at medium speed until fully combined. Do not overmix. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges begin to brown. Move immediately to cooling rack.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, unsalted butter, light karo syrup, baileys irish cream, semi-sweet chocolate chips, macadamia nuts, 9 inch pie shell
name: baileys macadamia nut pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. Press a slice of ham into each muffin cup. Evenly distribute spinach between muffin cups. Evenly distribute cheese between muffin cups. Crack 1 egg to each muffin cup. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25 min or until done.
ingredients: butter, extra-large eggs, all-purpose flour, whole milk, swiss cheese, ham
name: ham and cheese savory dutch baby

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together vinegar and oil. Season with salt and pepper. Add beans, bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and cheese. Toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours, and up to 8 hours. Just before serving, stir in basil.
ingredients: red wine vinegar, olive oil, cannellini beans, country bread, plum tomato, english cucumber, red onion, provolone cheese, fresh basil leaf
name: italian panzanella

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. At the top of the loaf, cut a round section and hollow out the bread,. In a food processor, add the mayo, grated parmesan, drained artichokes and garlic cloves. Process until it resembles large flake oatmeal or to your liking. Fill the hollowed out bread and replace the round cut out section. Wrap in aluminium foil and bake in the oven for about 40 minutes. I cut up a bagette for dipping and serve them around the hot garlic dip.
ingredients: water-packed artichoke hearts, pecans, parmesan cheese, fine dry breadcrumb, dried oregano, dried basil, garlic clove, olive oil, cooking spray
name: baked artichoke side with crumb topping

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Fill greased muffin tins two-thirds full with batter. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: water, powdered milk, shortening, sugar, salt, white flour, yeast, egg
name: bread machine dinner rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Melt butter in a saucepan. Add flour, blending well. Add milk gradually and cook until thickened. Add half of cheese and seasoning. Cook until cheese is melted, stirring constantly. Clean the shrimp and break them in half. Mix with rice and sauce. Place in buttered baking dish, sprinkle with crumbs and cover with remaining cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until crumbs are browned and cheese is melted.
ingredients: spareribs, allspice, salt, eggs, msg, soya sauce, flour, breadcrumbs
name: bon bon spareribs 1

steps: Heat grill. In a small bowl, stir together all glaze ingredients. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Brush chicken generously with glaze. Place chicken on gas grill over medium or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Cover grill. Cook 8-12 minutes or until juices run clear, turning once and brushing occasionally with glaze.
ingredients: maple syrup, tomato paste, red wine vinegar, salt, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, fresh ground pepper
name: maple glazed barbecue chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes.
ingredients: butter, roasting chickens, salt and pepper, onions, garlic clove, paprika, ground red pepper, tomato paste, water, green bell peppers
name: easy paprika chicken

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter. Stir in flour until smooth cook and stir over med heat for 2 minutes. Add carrot, parsnips, butter, onions, garlic cloves, water, salt and pepper, curry powder, heavy cream. Bring to a light boil, and stir 2 minutes. Add cheese, parsley, and pepper. Cook, and stir for 1 min, then gradually add broth.
ingredients: carrots, parsnips, butter, onions, garlic cloves, water, salt and pepper, curry powder, heavy cream
name: crock pot carrot and parsnip soup

steps: Bring 3 cups of the stock to a boil in a 6-8 cup saucepan over med-high heat. Beat the remaining stock with the eggs, cheese, nutmeg, and parsley until well blended. When the stock is boiling, adjust the heat so that it bubbles frequently but not furiously. Add the egg mixture in a steady stream, stirring all the while. Stir occasionally until the eggs gather together in small curds, 2-3 minutes. Taste and add salt and pepper to taste, then serve. Garnish with a little more cheese if you like.
ingredients: chicken stock, eggs, fresh parsley, fresh parmesan cheese
name: stracciatella italian egg broth

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Bake for 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on a rack.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, oats, brown sugar, reduced-calorie stick margarine, vanilla extract, cooking spray, apricot preserves
name: crunchy oat apricot bars

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add vinegar to skillet. Boil until syrupy, scraping to loosen browned bits from skillet. Whisk in mustard and any accumulated juices from steak. Serve steaks with sauce.
ingredients: olive oil, red onion, light brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, steaks
name: delicious steak with onion marinade

steps: In 1 quart saucepan, combine sugar and cornstarch. Gradually stir in water until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring often until boiling. Boil 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in butter, juice, and peel until butter is melted. Serve warm.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, water, butter, lemon peel, lemon juice
name: lemon sauce for crazy gingerbread

steps: In a large skillet, brown chicken on both sides in butter. Combine the teriyaki sauce, water, marmalade, and garlic in a bowl. Pour over chicken. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the juices run clear on the chicken. I was thinking of trying this with sugar free marmalade for a more diabetic friendly recipe.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, onion, garlic, fresh mushrooms, chicken broth, dry white wine, rice
name: my best chicken and rice in wine

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in medium-sized saucepan. Saute onions and garlic until brown. Add soy sauce and stir. Lower heat to medium-low. While stirring, add mirin, soy sauce, olive oil, garlic, dried basil, black pepper, limes, swordfish fillets. Allow sauce to bubble. Sprinkle with sugar and mix again. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Use immediately, or transfer to plastic container for storage.
ingredients: mirin, soy sauce, olive oil, garlic, dried basil, black pepper, limes, swordfish fillets
name: easy swordfish for two

steps: Preheat oven to 190c grease a patty tin or use paper cups. Sift flour and baking powder. Cream fat and sugar until mixture is light and creamy. Add in vanilla essence. Beat egg and add it gradually to the mixture, beating well after each addition. Fold in the sifted flour with a metal spoon. Add a little milk if necessary to give it a soft dropping consistency. Mix in the raisins. Fill greased patty tin or paper cups half full with the mixture. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, cornmeal, plain flour, canola oil, milk, baking powder
name: cornmeal cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f, & lightly coat baking sheet with cooking spray. In large bowl, beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, sunflower oil, milk, flour, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, cherries, ground nuts
name: moist cherrie cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: brussels sprout, butter, green seedless grape, white wine, blanched slivered almonds
name: fancy brussels sprouts

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: pizza dough, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, olive oil, italian seasoning, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce
name: stuffed pizza bites

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f.
ingredients: cornmeal, all-purpose flour, manchego cheese, granulated sugar, baking powder, salt, jalapeno peppers, milk, vegetable oil, eggs
name: manchego jalapeo cornbread

steps: In a medium bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, cider vinegar, honey, vegetable oil, mushrooms, green onions, chicken breast fillets, bacon, pineapple chunks. Add the chicken and toss to coat. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 4 hours. Transfer the marinated chicken to a bowl. Pour the marinade into a small saucepan, boil for 2 minutes, then let cool. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium. Thread the chicken, plums and onion onto 8 skewers. Grill the kebabs, turning occasionally and basting frequently with the marinade during the first 6 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through, 12 to 15 minutes. Meanwhile, in a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups water to a boil. Stir in the olive oil and then the couscous, cover, remove from the heat and let stand for 5 minutes. Fluff the couscous with a fork, add the almonds and toss. Serve the couscous alongside the kebabs.
ingredients: soy sauce, cider vinegar, honey, vegetable oil, mushrooms, green onions, chicken breast fillets, bacon, pineapple chunks
name: chicken bacon shish kebabs

steps: Place bun in saucepan and heat over medium-high heat. Remove bun from heat and place on a wire rack to cool
ingredients: barbecue sauce, grape jelly, meatballs, pineapple chunks, red pepper
name: burger bites

steps: Heat stove to high heat. Add butter, onion, garlic, zucchini, red bell pepper, dried italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Cook 1 minute more- serve hot.
ingredients: potato, vegetable oil, unsalted butter, fresh corn kernels, squash, edamame, red onion, fresh chives
name: summer vegetable succotash

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place olive oil, onion, potato, milk, water, cheddar cheese, parsley, paprika, and salt in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside. When potatoes are tender, remove from oven and set the oven to broil. Place potatoes under the broiler for a few minutes, until cheese is hot and begins to brown.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, potato, milk, water, cheddar cheese
name: potato cheese dinner for babies

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tilapia and cook until the fish is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2 minutes more. Reduce heat to medium, turn the fish over, stir the soy mixture and pour into the pan. Bring the sauce to a boil and cook until the fish is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2 minutes more. Add scallions and remove from the heat. Serve the fish drizzled with the sauce.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, olive oil, orange zest, orange juice, fresh ginger, hot sauce, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: zesty grilled tilapia

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp.
ingredients: cauliflower, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, lavender, black pepper, coarse salt, fresh lemon juice, olive oil
name: roasted cauliflower lavender rosemary and garlic

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the custard cups in a large mixing bowl. Mix the brown sugar, bread, egg, milk, vanilla, and pecans together. Pour over the custard cups. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and set. Dust with icing sugar to serve. Hope it tastes good.
ingredients: brown sugar, bread, egg, milk, vanilla
name: grammies caramel bread pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: eggs, fresh asparagus, onion, green pepper, tomatoes and green chilies, cheddar cheese, olive oil, salsa
name: lucas eggs

steps: Mix all the ingredients above in a bowl. Add your desired cut of lamb. Cover in the fridge for at least 24 hours. Cook your lamb in your preferred way. Enjoy a nice new taste to your meat.
ingredients: lamb chops, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper, basil, thyme, savory, rosemary, tarragon, lavender, fennel
name: lamb chops with herbes de provence

steps: Cook the macaroni until done as usual. Do not overcook it. Drain macaroni in strainer. Place macaroni, butter, salt, pepper, milk, mozzarella cheese, and 3 cups of cheddar cheese in casserole dish. Mix eggs in a bowl first and then stir into mixture. Cover everything with aluminum foil and cook for 45 minutes at 350 degrees. Uncover and add extra cup of cheddar cheese across the top. Bake uncovered for another 15 minutes.
ingredients: macaroni, eggs, heavy cream, milk, salt & pepper, velveeta cheese, sharp cheddar cheese
name: baked mac n cheese

steps: Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool.
ingredients: 8-inch pre-baked crumb crust, vanilla instant pudding mix, sour cream, milk, bananas, heavy cream, sugar, vanilla extract
name: the best banana cream pie

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: lentils, onion, carrots, flour, sea salt, coriander, cumin, cayenne pepper, black pepper, olive oil
name: spiced lentil carrot veggie burgers

steps: Set oven to 350 degrees f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. In a bowl combine flour, sugar, sifted cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. In a small bowl combine soy milk with oil and vanilla. Pour into the flour mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts. Transfer to the prepared baking dish. Bake for about 30-35 minutes or until the top is no longer shiny. Let cool about 20 minutes or more before slicing.
ingredients: natural cane sugar, all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt, unsweetened applesauce, soft tofu, chocolate soymilk, vanilla extract
name: everyday vegan choco brownies

steps: Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more.
ingredients: potatoes, frozen peas, sun-dried tomato, cream cheese, salt and pepper
name: warm cream cheese potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350°F. In a large bowl, combine cream cheese, lite, sour cream, natural-style peanut butter, splenda granular, vanilla, fresh fruit, and salt. Mix until smooth. Bake for 10 to 12 min.
ingredients: neufchatel cheese, cool whip lite, sour cream, natural-style peanut butter, splenda granular, vanilla, fresh fruit
name: creamy peanut butter whip

steps: Heat oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook turkey, onion, chilies and garlic in oil, stirring occasionally, until turkey is no longer pink in center and onion is tender. Stir in remaining ingredients. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast, chicken broth, chili powder, ground cumin, black beans, diced tomatoes, corn
name: chicken black bean chili

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown.
ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, lemon thyme, feta
name: feta roast potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut egg in half lengthwise and scoop out seeds. Place cut-side-down in shallow baking dish. Bake 30 to 40 minutes. Use fork to scrape out seeds. Set aside. In saucepan melt butter over medium heat. Add zucchini and tomatoes. Cook until just soft. Stir in spinach. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with grated parmesan.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, frozen chopped spinach, ground sausage, mushroom, green onion, pimiento, eggs, half-and-half, swiss cheese, paprika
name: confetti egg bake

steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. Prepare the vegetables for stuffing by removing the stalks of 4 of the zucchini lengthwise and scoop out the centers with a spoon. Arrange the prepared vegetables on a greased baking sheet, season lightly with salt and pepper. Mince or grate the remaining 3 mushrooms and the leftover stems. Dice the remaining zucchini. Saute the ground pork with the onions over medium heat and add the minced mushrooms. Then add the diced zucchini plus the remaining centers. Cook until soft, then add the can of tomatoes and continue to cook until very little liquid is left, about 10 minutes. Pile the filling into the prepared vegetables on the baking sheet and sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: zucchini, corn kernel, ricotta cheese, chives, salt and pepper, cayenne pepper, cheddar cheese, fresh cilantro
name: zucchini stuffed with corn and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. In a frypan or saucepan heat oil and add onion, garlic, zucchini and carrot. Cook for 2-3 minutes then add salami. In a large bowl, combine pasta, vegetables, eggs and tomatoes, season well. Spoon into lightly oiled flan dish and bake for 45 mins until set.
ingredients: ziti pasta, feta cheese, eggs, milk, shallot, kefalotiri
name: baked ziti with feta

steps: In a medium mixing bowl, combine sugar, flour and salt. Stir in lemon juice, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into plum sponge pudding. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath.
ingredients: self raising flour, custard powder, caster sugar, butter, milk, eggs, vanilla essence, plums
name: plum sponge pudding

steps: Mix everything except crackers. Spread about one generous tablespoon of mixture onto cracker halves. Broil for about 5 minutes until cheese gets bubbly. Cut each muffin into 4 pieces. Serve warm.
ingredients: cream cheese, onions, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, mayonnaise, garlic salt, black pepper, imitation crabmeat, seafood cocktail sauce
name: crabby cracker spread

steps: Cook cauliflower in a large pot of boiling water 10 minsutes or until tender. Drain and rinse with cold water. In a large mixing bowl, mix mayonnaise, lemon juice, sugar substitute and mustard. Add cauliflower, green onions and pepper. Mix well until vegetables are evenly coated with dressing. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill 30 mins.
ingredients: cauliflower, bacon, onions, butter, salt and pepper
name: low carb hash browns cauliflower

steps: Place fish in a shallow baking pan. Combine french dressing, lemon juice and salt. Pour sauce over fish and let stand 30 minutes, turning once. Remove fish from sauce and place in a well-greased baking dish. Crush onions in plastic bag with a rolling pin. Add cheese to onions and mix thoroughly. Sprinkle onion mixture over fish. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork.
ingredients: dijon mustard, breadcrumbs, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, lemon pepper seasoning, white fish fillets, cooking spray
name: fish fillets with a triple cheese crust

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add potatoes, salt and pepper. Cook, shaking pan back and forth and turning potatoes often with a pancake turner, 12 to 15 minutes until golden brown and crisp. Add the scallions, parsley, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, butter. Shake pan about 1 minute. Add butter and continue shaking pan and turning potatoes until butter melts.
ingredients: butter, potatoes, onions, garlic cloves, vegetable stock, fresh parsley, dried chili, sea salt, fresh ground pepper
name: boulangere potatoes savoury potato and onion bake

steps: Melt butter in a medium-heave skillet over medium heat. Mix in the next six ingredients. Saut for 30 seconds and add shrimp. Saut shrimp until they are opaque in centre, about 3 minutes, turning occasionally. Stir in parsley and serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: medium shrimp, butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, tequila, lime juice, salt, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh cilantro, cooked rice
name: tequila lime prawns

steps: Place foil packets on a baking sheet and bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes, until cheese is melted. Serve warm.
ingredients: scallops, mushrooms, butter, parsley, garlic, lemon pepper seasoning
name: grilled scallops and mushrooms in foil packets

steps: Cook pasta and drain. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Set aside 1 cup of the cheddar for topping. Mix all other ingredients well and put into covered casserole dish. Top with the reserved cheddar prior to baking. Bake for 45 minutes.
ingredients: low-carb penne, cream of mushroom soup, tuna, cheese, low-carb breadcrumbs, butter-flavored cooking spray
name: dad s tuna melt casserole

steps: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour milk and chocolate syrup over the ice. Add cold coffee and stir well until chocolate syrup is dissolved. Can be fancied up with a dollop of whipped cream, a shot of kahlua, and a few curls of shaved chocolate if you like. Diabetics and dieters can substitute sugar-free chocolate syrup.
ingredients: chocolate, sugar, coffee, milk, coke, whipped cream, ice cream
name: brazilian iced chocolate coca cola

steps: Season pineapple with salt, pepper, lime juice, cilantro, lime juice, cilantro, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice,
ingredients: pineapple, red onion, scallions, salt and pepper, lime, cilantro leaf
name: grilled pineapple and onion salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Cover a glass baking dish with aluminum foil and place the chicken breasts on top. Zest all 3 of the lemons into a small bowl, and then add the juice of 2 of the lemons. Add the pepper and all the other ingredients into the bowl. Mix the combine and pour over all the chicken breasts. Bake for 1 hour. Remove from the oven and drizzle with the lemon juice of the last lemon, and a few more grinds from pepper mill
ingredients: lemon, cinnamon, olive oil, shallots, chicken broth, chicken breasts, cornstarch
name: lemon cinnamon chicken

steps: Boil the pasta to taste. Meanwhile, chop the garlic into pieces the size of an electron. Whisk the egg. Drain the pasta. Mix in the garlic, egg, salt, oil and pepper.
ingredients: cheese-filled egg tortellini, prosciutto, onions, heavy cream, frozen peas, parmesan cheese, salt and black pepper, parsley
name: pasta with prosciutto and peas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Preheat oven to 350-degrees. Bake prawns in a 350-degree oven for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let cookies cool on sheets for 5 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, prawns, dark rum, double cream, vanilla pod, coconut milk, salt and pepper
name: tahitian coconut vanilla prawns

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist.
ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, salt, ground pepper, cheese
name: oven baked omelet

steps: In a large skillet combine carrots, water, and 1 tablespoon of the butter. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until carrots are nearly tender. Drain. Return to skillet. In a large skillet combine carrots, water, and 1 tablespoon of the butter. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until carrots
ingredients: baby carrots, butter, water, honey, orange marmalade, salt, ground cloves, fresh cilantro
name: glazed baby carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Pour bread crumbs over bread crumbs to soften. Add remaining ingredients except eggs. Stir in eggs. Pour mixture into a well-greased loaf pan or a 6x8 inch casserole. Set the dish in a container of hot water and bake for about 45 minutes or until an inserted knife come out clean.
ingredients: bread, margarine, green onion, dry white wine, fresh parsley, crabmeat, cornflour, milk, salt and pepper, tasty cheese
name: crab open grilled sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat together butter, cream cheese, walnuts, ripe olives. Beat in sugar and vanilla. Gradually mix in flour. Stir in walnuts. Drop by tablespoonful 2-inches apart on to ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375 f. Bake at
ingredients: cream cheese, blue cheese, walnuts, ripe olives
name: blue cheese log

steps: Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: shrimp, light beer, plain flour, salt, paprika, oil
name: beer batter shrimp

steps: Wet a paper towel and wipe any dirt from the mushrooms. Place the mushrooms in a large stockpot. Add the remaining ingredients to the pot. The liquid will not cover the mushrooms at first. Cook, covered, over very low heat for 4 hours. Stir occasionally so that all of the mushrooms are completely coated with the cooking liquid. Remove the cover and cook for an additional 4 hours. The mushrooms will shrimk by half and become saturated with cooking liquid. Remove with a slotted spoon and serve in a bowl.
ingredients: button mushrooms, anchovy fillets, olive oil, mint sprig, lemon juice, parsley sprigs
name: champignons a la monegasque

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Frost as desired.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, vegetable oil, water, sour cream, vanilla instant pudding mix, food coloring, vanilla
name: rainbow bright cupcakes

steps: Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Mix in pineapple and oranges. Chill.
ingredients: maraschino cherry, mandarin orange, pineapple tidbits, coconut, sour cream, marshmallows, mayonnaise
name: yummy salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease 8 x 8 dish. Peel and cut apples. Place apples in pan. Add cinnamon and water. Separately, mix melted butter, flour and sugars. Spread evenly and firmly on top of apple mixture. Bake 45-50 minutes.
ingredients: rolled oats, milk, apple juice, honey, cinnamon, walnuts, tart green apple, yogurt, fresh raspberry
name: delicious easy overnight no bake oatmeal with fruit

steps: Cook the ground meat until done and drain. Mix the meat with the lime juice, fish sauce, red onions, chili peppers, roasted rice powder and mix well. Serve on bed of lettuce and top with sliced green onions and mint leaves. May add additional red peppers if you desire it hotter. Enjoy.
ingredients: white rice, cooking oil, garlic, ground beef, shallots, scallions, thai fish sauce, lime juice, fresh mint leaves, ground red pepper
name: laab thai ground meat salad

steps: Cover potatoes with water, add salt and cook until tender. Mix soup, milk and onion. Add potatoes and toss to mix well. Pour into greased 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, green onion, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, chicken broth, potatoes, mushroom, vegetables, paprika
name: potato vegetable quilt

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. In a small bowl, combine paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, black pepper and salt. Divide in half. In a medium bowl, combine half of spice mixture, sweet potatoes, olive oil and maple syrup. Toss to coat sweet potatoes thoroughly. Spread sweet potatoes onto foil-lined baking sheet into a single layer, leaving two spaces in the middle for the pork chops. Roast for 35-40 minutes or until pork chops are done.
ingredients: tiny new potatoes, butter, salt and black pepper, white balsamic vinegar, pure maple syrup, garlic cloves, green onion, fresh thyme, lemon peel
name: maple glazed new potatoes

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, melt the butter over medium-high heat. Cook the onion, stirring, about 15 seconds. Add in the beaten eggs, salt and pepper to taste, and cook, stirring, until barely set. Stir in the bacon. Remove the pan from the heat. Put the tortillas on a flat surface and spoon half of the eggs on each tortilla. Top with equally with cheese. Fold tortillas in half. Brush lightly with oil. Wipe out the skillet and heat over medium-high heat. Toast the quesadillas until lightly browned on both sides, about 1 minute per side. Serve hot.
ingredients: flour tortillas, chicken, bacon, ranch dressing, red pepper flakes, monterey jack cheese
name: chicken bacon ranch quesadillas

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: flour tortillas, unsalted butter, black pepper, sesame seeds, poppy seeds, caraway seed, salt, cilantro
name: mixed seed crisp bread

steps: Line 8 x 4 inch loaf pan with foil. Mash 2 cups of strawberries in large bowl. Stir in condensed milk, juice and 2 cups of the whipped topping. Pour into pan. Cover. Freeze at least 6 hours. To serve, invert onto plate. Remove foil. Frost with remaining whipped topping. Top with remaining strawberries, sliced.
ingredients: unflavored gelatin, cold water, heavy whipping cream, icing sugar
name: wilton stabilized whipped cream

steps: Place all ingredients in a large bowl and shake until well mixed. Pour over the potato salad.
ingredients: bacon, apple cider vinegar, tiny new potatoes, celery ribs, scallion top, sour cream, mayonnaise
name: bacon and scallion potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Dip chicken in milk, then roll in seasoned flour. Melt butter in 9 x 13 baking dish. Place chicken, skin side down, in butter. Cook 30 minutes. Mix water, remaining milk and soup together. Turn chicken and pour soup mixture over it. Bake 30 minutes more. Remove chicken and stir gravy.
