ingredients: skinless chicken breasts, low-fat plain yogurt, peanut butter, ground red pepper
name: bachelor s prize chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. In medium bowl combine egg with 1 tbsp water. In pie plate place bread crumbs and cheese. Dip pierogies in egg then breadcrumbs. Arrange on baking sheet. Roast until crisp and golden about 15 minutes.
ingredients: pierogies, oil, onions, sliced mushrooms, tomatoes, parsley, salt, pepper, water
name: quick perogies casserole

steps: Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Pour margarine mixture over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6-7 hours. Once chicken has cooked, uncover, add the butter, and shred chicken with 2 forks until mixed well. Serve on buns.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, margarine, italian salad dressing mix, cream cheese with chives, cooking sherry, cream of mushroom soup, minute rice
name: crock pot chicken in creamy chive sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: oil, onion, garlic cloves, ground beef, breadcrumbs, parsley, paprika, kosher salt, pepper, eggs
name: make ahead meatballs

steps: Place chicken breasts in a large crock pot then sprinkle with salt & pepper. Pour the cream sauce over the chicken then cover & cook on low for 4 hours. Remove the chicken & shred. Whisk in the cheese soup until smooth then add the chicken, beans, & chili powder. Continue to cook for another 2 hours. During the last 30 minutes add the cream cheese, stir to melt. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, corn, black beans, salsa, neufchatel cheese, garlic cloves, cumin, salt and pepper
name: crock pot chicken with black beans in cream sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the flour. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in a greased 8x8 baking dish,. Making sure not to lay them flat. They should have the same shape as they were in the package. In a small bowl, mix the honey, soy sauce, garlic and seasonings. Pour evenly over the chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce. Serve.
ingredients: lemon, chicken stock, honey, soy sauce, oil, chicken thighs, onion, rice, pepper
name: honey lemon chicken thighs

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package. Be sure to just cook to al dente stage. Drain and return to pot. Place pot on burner but turn off burner. Stir in oil. Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well. I have also added broccoli to pasta water while cooking pasta and this is very good too.
ingredients: broccoli florets, bow tie pasta, unsalted butter, olive oil, garlic, lemon, black pepper, lemon juice, pine nuts, parmesan cheese
name: broccoli and bow tie pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, beat eggs slightly with a fork. Add water and oatmeal and let stand until liquid is absorbed stir in remaining ingredients, except meat. Mix well. Add meat, using your hands or a sturdy spoon and mix until well blended. Shape into a loaf in your baking pan. Make an indentation down center of loaf and fill with ketchup. Bake for 1 hour or until loaf is done. Remove from oven and cover with foil--let stand 10 to 15 minutes before serving and it will cut nicely.
ingredients: meatloaf, eggs, potatoes, black pepper, salt, butter, heavy cream
name: leftover meatloaf hash

steps: Spray a nonstick frypan with veggies cooking spray and heat to medium. Spray veggie cooking spray over both sides of the cod fillets. Squeese 2 lemon sections over cod surfaces. Sprinkle parsley, italian seasoning, salt and pepper over both sides of the cod filets. Place cod into medium hot frypan, cook for about 5 minutes, carefully turn and cook a further 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish.
ingredients: cod fish fillets, butter, lemon, juice of, corn flake crumbs, lemon pepper seasoning, salad supreme dry seasoning, water
name: lemon crumb cod fillets

steps: Mix everything together in a slow cooker except chicken. Lay chicken on top and cover. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 3-4 hours. 30 minutes before serving, remove chicken and shred. Return chicken to slow cooker and stir together. Top with cheese, sour cream, or tortilla chips, if desired.
ingredients: onion, carrots, celery ribs, boneless skinless chicken breasts, dried tarragon, dried thyme, salt and black pepper, condensed cream of chicken soup, dry onion soup mix, white wine
name: french country slow cooker chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, egg whites, and vanilla. Mix well. Press onto bottom of 10 inch springform pan. Layer blueberries on base. In large bowl combine flour, yogurt, egg, sugar, vanilla, and lemon rind. Mix until smooth. Pour over blueberries. Bake 60-70 minutes or until cake is firm and golden.
ingredients: fresh blueberries, fresh cranberries, all-purpose flour, butter, sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, baking powder, salt, milk
name: double berry cake

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: cucumbers, white onion, fat free ranch dressing, salt, black pepper
name: healthy exchanges creamy cucumbers

steps: Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of bacon and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend until smooth and stir through cream. Divide into serving bowls and top with crispy bacon to serve.
ingredients: butter, bacon, onion, sweet paprika, potato, chicken stock, cheddar cheese, chives
name: potato cheese and bacon soup

steps: Bring tea bags, boiling water, cranberry juice, apple cider, brown sugar, cinnamon stick, ginger, whole cloves and allspice to boil in a medium saucepan. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Add tea bags, cover and let steep 5 minutes. Strain. Serve hot.
ingredients: tea bags, boiling water, cranberry juice, apple cider, brown sugar, cinnamon stick, ginger, whole cloves
name: hot cranberry tea cider

steps: In 2 large cups or glass mugs, mix the coffee and sugar. In a small saucepan over low heat, warm the cream. Add the cocoa and mix well. Add the cream mixture to the coffee and top with a dollop of whipped cream and the grated chocolate. Serve with a cinnamon stick.
ingredients: hot water, instant coffee granules, coffee liqueur, creme de cacao, sugar, whipped cream, semisweet chocolate
name: hot baja coffee

steps: In a large pot with boiling salted water cook pasta until al dente. Drain. In a large saucepan heat the italian dressing and olive oil together over medium heat. Add drained spaghetti. Toss well to coat. Add chopped tomatoes, cooked chicken, and grated parmesan cheese and toss lightly. Serve warm.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh breadcrumbs, pepper, onion soup mix, water, fine egg noodles, parsley, parmesan cheese
name: pasta di pina

steps: In a small bowl whisk together first five ingredients and set aside. Crush sesame seed with a motar and pestle, then spread evenly in a pie plate. Coat the tuna steaks with the crushed seeds. In a large non stick skillet, heat oil over med high heat, and cook tuna steaks 3-4 minutes per side, until golden and just cooked through. Transfer tuna to serving plates. Add honey glaze to hot skillet and simmer one minute, then pour over tuna. Serve with jasmine rice.
ingredients: soy sauce, mirin, honey, sesame oil, rice wine vinegar, tuna steaks, sesame seeds, wasabi paste, olive oil
name: sesame seared tuna steaks

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Combine oil, onion, carrots, ground turkey, thyme, ground pepper, flour, chicken broth, tomato paste, mashed potatoespreparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Combine oil, onion, carrots, ground turkey, thyme, ground pepper, flour, chicken broth, tomato paste, mashed potatoespreparation
ingredients: ground beef, onion, frozen mixed vegetables, beef gravy, frozen pie crust, mashed potatoes
name: better shepherd s pie

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Tear 2 pita breads into chip-size pieces and brush with oil. Sprinkle with lime zest and chilli flakes. Bake for 10 mins until crisp. Sprinkle with salt if you like.
ingredients: pita bread, olive oil, parmesan cheese, chili powder, seasoning salt, onion powder, garlic powder, cayenne
name: pita scoops

steps: In a large saucepan heat butter and olive oil over medium-low heat. Add onion and cook for about 8-10 minutes, adding the fresh garlic the last few minutes. Add in the red wine vinegar, applesauce, brown sugar and cabbage. Cook for about 7-8 minutes, or until the cabbage starts to wilt, stirring often. Season with salt and pepper, cover and simmer until the cabbage is tender stirring occasionally. Season with more salt and pepper if desired.
ingredients: cabbage, red onion, garlic clove, cream, salt, white pepper, sugar, lemon juice
name: creamed cabbage with red onion

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the cheese mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, unsalted butter, whole milk, cornflour, fresh ground pepper, salt, red onion, bread rounds
name: cheese and onion on toast

steps: Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve.
ingredients: diced onion, vegetable oil, baking potato, celery, garlic, salt, pepper, chicken broth, frozen chopped broccoli, dried basil
name: broccoli soup for dieters

steps: In a small mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in milk, cinnamon and salt. Spread entire top of lightly toasted bread with butter mixture. Place on a cookie sheet and broil briefly until mixture bubbles. Cool slightly on a rack. Cut into triangles, and serve warm for breakfast toast. Cover and refrigerate remaining butter mixture for future use.
ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, refrigerated biscuits, margarine
name: cousin stacey s yummy monkey bread

steps: In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large bowl, combine shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce and cajun seasoning. Toss to coat& set aside. In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large bowl, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large bowl, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large bowl, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large bowl, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large bowl, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large bowl, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup,
ingredients: beer, crab boil, medium raw shrimp, light mayonnaise, ketchup, dill pickles, onions, white horseradish
name: wd shrimp with cheseapeake dipping sauce

steps: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat tortillas and chicken over medium-high heat for 7 minutes. Pour sauce in skillet and stir to blend. Sprinkle with cheese and cover. Heat until cheese is melted and sauce is hot.
ingredients: ground beef, cream of mushroom soup, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, green chilies, corn tortillas
name: mom s enchilada casserole

steps: In a blender, combine watermelon, sugar, fresh lime juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice,
ingredients: watermelon, water, sugar, fresh lime juice
name: watermelon agua fresca

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve.
ingredients: butter, onion, fresh mushrooms, roasting chicken, hot water, salt, pepper, flour, paprika, sour cream
name: polish style royal chicken

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: spinach, low-fat ricotta, black olives, parsley, pepper, sea salt, mountain bread, olive oil flavored cooking spray, sesame seeds
name: spinach olive cheese pastries

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place all other ingredients in a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool.
ingredients: fresh ginger, garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar, dried chili pepper flakes, medium shrimp
name: grilled ginger shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Heat a little oil in frying pan and brown stew meat along with onions and carrots. Remove from pan. Layer sliced potatoes, onion, carrot and meat in a 3 pint casserole, finishing with a layer of potatoes. Pour over the stock. Brush the potatoes with 1 tbsp melted butter. Cover and bake for 1 hour. Remove the hot pot from the oven. Uncover and brush the potatoes again with melted butter or dripping. Return to the oven for a further 30 minutes, uncovered, to brown the potatoes. Serve garnished with parsley.
ingredients: beef, onion, carrots, celery, dried bay leaves, peppercorns, water
name: another homemade beef stock recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 350f, grease and flour an 8-inch square cake pan and set aside. Peel, core and chop the apples. In a bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and syrup. Sift flour, ginger and cinnamon, and fold into creamed mixture with the apples. Put mixture into prepared pan, and bake for 40-45 minutes, or until cooked. May be cut into slices, or left as a cake and decorated with whipped cream and sprinkled with cinnamon.
ingredients: granny smith apples, sultana, sugar, ground cinnamon
name: camping sweet roasted apples

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent. Add garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent. Add tomato and cook, stirring occasionally, until tomato is translucent. Add tomato
ingredients: bacon, catalina dressing, prepared mustard, salt, pepper, spinach, tomatoes, provolone cheese
name: bacon tomato spinach salad

steps: Spray a nonstick skillet with non-fat cooking spray. On medium heat, saute onion and pepper for about 10 minutes. Stir in chopped broccoli. Pour in the lemon juice and wine. Add the tarragon. Cover and cook over low heat for about 15 minutes. Prepare tortellini according to package directions while veggies are cooking. Stir the olive oil and sun-dried tomatoes with the veggie mixture. Serve over prepared tortellini.
ingredients: cheese tortellini, frozen squash, milk, butter, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, salt and pepper
name: cheese tortellini with squash puree

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat the bottom of the two small or one medium baking dish with a thin layer of alfredo sauce. In a medium bowl, mix the pasta, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken, garlic and alfredo sauce until combined. Place mixture into baking dish and top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Cut the butter into small pieces and scatter on top of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: baking potatoes, alfredo sauce, garlic powder, pepper, thyme, egg, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, paprika
name: twice baked alfredo potatoes

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. In a separate bowl combine butter, garlic and pepper. Drain beans. Place in serving bowl. Add butter mixture. Toss to coat evenly. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, butter, yellow onion, oregano, black olives, fresh green beans, chicken broth, salt and pepper
name: fresh garlic green beans with olives

steps: In a blender or food processor, combine the pears and egg white. Cover and process until pureed. Pour into tart pan. Add the remaining ingredients in order suggested by manufacturer. Select basic tart setting. Choose crust color and tart size if available. Bake according to tart setting. Choose tart color and tart size if available.
ingredients: sweet tart crust, egg white, fresh pears, brown sugar, gold medal all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon
name: brown sugar pear tart

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8x8 inch baking dish. Combine the sugar, flour and butter, using a pastry blender. Pour cranberry kissel into prepared dish and cover with the flour mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes. Cut into 9 pieces and serve warm or cold.
ingredients: cranberries, water, sugar, potato flour
name: cranberry kissel

steps: Preheat oven to 400degf. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender. Bake in the preheated oven until potatoes are tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: halibut fillets, fingerling potatoes, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh italian parsley, olive oil, lemon, juice and zest of
name: roast halibut with fingerling potatoes lemon and rosemary

steps: Cook, peel, and cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, mix some mayonnaise and ranch powder. Add potatoes, egg, onion, pickles, and celery seed in bowl. Mix ingredients together. Add salt, pepper, and a little pickle juice. Refrigerate and serve.
ingredients: red potatoes, celery, onion, parsley, salt, black pepper, frozen baby peas, dijon-style mustard, ranch salad dressing, hard-boiled eggs
name: ranch potato salad

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Sear the meat in the oil for 2 minutes. Pour meat into bowl and combine chili powder, cumin and flour. Mix with the meat until evenly coated. Pour in broth. Add the salt and ground black pepper pour into crock pot, add garlic put on high for an hour then reduce to low for six to seven hours stirring occasionally. Add the salt and ground black pepper pour into crock pot, add garlic put on high for an hour then reduce to low for six to 7 hours stirring occasionally. Add the salt and ground black pepper pour into crock pot, add
ingredients: lean ground beef, liquid smoke flavoring, ground black pepper, mustard seeds, fennel seed, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic powder, paprika, sugar, quick curing salt
name: homemade spicy pepperoni

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Sautee onions in butter, margarine or oil over medium heat, until soft. Place chicken breasts in casserole dish and season with salt, pepper and garlic. Pour mushrooms and sauteed onions over chicken. Cover dish with bbq sauce. Cover dish with lid or aluminum foil. Bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: beef roast, cream of chicken soup, barbecue sauce, dry onion soup mix, onion hamburger buns
name: oven barbecue

steps: Melt chocolate in microwave on med. Power. Stir occasionally. Set aside. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually add sugar, beating until well blended. Add melted chocolate and vanilla, mix well. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Roll into 1 inch balls. Roll in nuts or coconut. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, unsalted butter, raspberry jam, raspberry liqueur, unsweetened cocoa powder
name: raspberry truffles

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare stuffing according to package directions, but do not let stand. Spoon stuffing across the center of a 2 quart shallow baking dish. Arrange 3 chicken breast halves on each side of the stuffing, overlapping if necessary. Combine soup, milk and parsley. Pour over chicken. Cover with foil and bake for 15 minutes. Uncover and bake 10 minutes longer or until the chicken is no longer pink. You may need to lift some pieces of chicken so that you can check all of it. Stir sauce before serving.
ingredients: salad dressing, milk, seasoned stuffing mix, broccoli, cheddar cheese
name: vegetable and stuffing bake

steps: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add eggs, water, flour, salt, pepper, cheese, olive oil and cook for about 5 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette onto a plate, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette back into the pan, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5 minutes longer, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette back
ingredients: potatoes, onions, eggs, parsley, salt, pepper
name: potato omelette

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Preheat
ingredients: chicken breasts, cooked rice, velveeta cheese, cream of chicken soup, whipping cream, chicken bouillon cube, pepper, frozen mixed vegetables
name: cheesy chicken rice casserole

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt
ingredients: kosher salt, water, fingerling potatoes, butter, fresh ground black pepper, scallion, parmesan cheese
name: perfect fingerling potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, thyme, garlic, salt, pepper and brown sugar. Cut the tomatoes in half and toss to combine with the olive oil mixture. Spread the tomatoes in a roasting pan and place in the oven. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes or until the tomatoes are shrivelled. Break the ends from the asparagus at their natural breaking point. Add the tender lengths of asparagus to the tomatoes and continue to cook for 25 minutes or until the asparagus is tender.
ingredients: asparagus, balsamic vinegar, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, low sodium soy sauce, black pepper
name: grilled asparagus

steps: Place crab in food processor and process until it is in small pieces. Remove to mixing bowl. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Chill. Serve with crackers.
ingredients: reduced-fat cream cheese, fat-free mayonnaise, imitation crabmeat, celery, green bell pepper, garlic clove, cajun seasoning, crackers
name: new orleans crab spread

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place pie crust in a 9-inch tart pan and leave the sides long and free-form. Combine sugar and corn syrup. Add eggs and beat until smooth. Add pecans and vanilla, and teaspoon of melted butter and mix well. Set aside. Toss apples with lemon juice. Spread apples on bottom of pie crust and pour pecan mixture over apples. Fold edges of pie crust over filling. Bake pie until set, about 45 to 50 minutes.
ingredients: unsalted butter, cinnamon, brown sugar, pecan halves, orange, juice and zest of, apple cider, vanilla extract, baking apples, apples
name: bread pudding with apples pecans and raisins

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: smoked gouda cheese, cream cheese, butter, milk, steak sauce, nuts
name: lil smoky cheese ball

steps: Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired.
ingredients: avocados, roma tomatoes, onion, garlic, kosher salt, lime juice
name: easy guacamole dip

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, margarine, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp.
ingredients: small red potatoes, margarine, garlic, fresh basil leaf
name: basil garlic new potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Flour pie dough and roll out to 12 inches in diameter. Spread pesto on dough with the back of a spoon. Spread ricotta on top of pesto. Lay strips of proscuitto on top of pesto. Cover the proscuitto with mozarella. Add olives and tomatoes in an even layer on pizza. Sprinkle parmesan on top. Bake at 400 for 10-15 minutes or until very golden. Let cool 3-5 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: pie dough, pesto sauce, monterey jack cheese, milk, pine nuts, paprika
name: pillsbury pine nut pesto appetizer

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake the sweet potatoes for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, seasoning salt, rosemary, italian seasoning
name: easy roasted sweet potatoes

steps: Place pork chops in plastic zippered bag with yogurt and cheese. Zip shut and refrigerate 1 hour. Place on barbecue grill and cook for 5 minutes on each side. Top with cheese and close top of grill until cheese melts. Spread bottoms of each pork chop with avocado mixture. Top with lettuce, tomato, chicken breasts and top of buns.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, plain yogurt, tortilla chips, chili powder
name: baked tex mex loin chops

steps: In a large pot, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onions, carrots, celery, salt, and chili paste. Stirring frequently, saute the vegetables over high heat for 5 minutes. Add in the water, cover the pot, and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 25 minutes or until the vegetables are soft. Add in the peanut butter, soy sauce, and lime juice. Stir to combine. Puree the soup in batches using an electric blender. Reheat soup if necessary and serve hot.
ingredients: peanut butter, vegetable stock, milk, nutmeg, curry powder, fresh ground black pepper
name: peanut soup

steps: Place cucumbers and onions in a bowl. Combine rest of the ingredients in a measuring cup. Stir well. Pour over cucumbers and onions. Chill for 4 hours.
ingredients: rice vinegar, sugar, salt, water, onion, carrot, cucumber, chili paste, fresh coriander leaves
name: sweet sour cucumber relish

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Bake for an hour and a half.
ingredients: ground pork, ground turkey, eggs, dried breadcrumbs, fresh mushrooms, garlic, italian seasoning, basil, worcestershire sauce
name: meatloaf on the grill

steps: Combine the marinade ingredients in a large non-reactive bowl or one gallon food storage bag. Add the meat or poultry. Turn to coat all sides. Cover or seal tightly. Marinate for at least 6 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Cooked in preferred method.
ingredients: whiskey, brown sugar, olive oil, garlic powder, soy sauce, salt, pepper
name: whiskey marinade for chicken pork or steak

steps: In a large skillet, brown pork chops in oil. Add to slow cooker. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until meat is tender. Discard bay leaf. Serve chops and sauce over noodles.
ingredients: pork chops, condensed cream of celery soup, condensed cream of mushroom soup, tomato sauce, water, soy sauce, dry onion soup mix, wide egg noodles
name: pork chops and noodles

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Sear the stew meat in the oil for 2 minutes. Pour meat into bowl and combine chili powder, cumin and flour. Mix with the meat until evenly coated. Pour in broth. Add salt and ground black pepper pour into crock pot, add garlic put on high for an hour then reduce to low for six to seven hours stirring occasionally.
ingredients: vegetable oil, beef stew meat, onion, garlic clove, diced tomatoes, pimientos, ground cumin, salt, ground black pepper
name: mexican beef stew

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, cook pork, cornstarch, sugar, white wine, soy sauce, boneless pork loin, canola oil, carrot, garlic cloves, ground ginger, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, bok choy, b
ingredients: cornstarch, sugar, white wine, light soy sauce, boneless pork loin, canola oil, carrot, garlic cloves, ground ginger, bok choy
name: pork and bok choy stir fry

steps: Cook rice according to package directions. Spread on a baking sheet, refrigerate until cool. Place rice in a large bowl, add chicken, yucca root, yam, plantains, green onion, carrots, corn, cilantro, water, salt & pepper. Season with salt and pepper, toss to combine. Serve immediately or refrigerate up to one day.
ingredients: chicken, yucca root, yam, plantains, green onion, carrots, corn, cilantro, water, salt & pepper
name: sancocho

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a shallow dish mix together the cornflake crumbs with parmesan cheese, garlic powder black pepper and dry ranch dressing mix. Place the melted butter in a shallow dish. Coat the chicken breast or strips into the melted butter, then roll into the cornflake mixture. Place in prepared baking dish. Bake uncovered for about 30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: breadcrumbs, boneless skinless chicken breasts, parmesan cheese, ranch dressing mix, nonstick cooking spray
name: breaded ranch chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a small loaf pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, cholesterol-free egg substitute, applesauce, zucchinipreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, cholesterol-free egg substitute
ingredients: unsweetened applesauce, sugar, egg, egg white, zucchini, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, vanilla
name: whole wheat zucchini bread reduced sugar

steps: In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, 4 cups hot water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 30-40 minutes, or until chicken falls easily from the bone, stirring twice during cooking. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until noodles are tender.
ingredients: onion, tomatoes, garlic, noodles, salt and pepper, water
name: onion and tomato noodle soup

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, eggs, lemon, rind of, apples, cake flour, salt, baking powder
name: irish kerry cake zwt3

steps: Saute chicken in oil until well browned on all sides. Add 1 teaspoon of alino--rz does not recognize this spice combination. Add salt and pepper to your taste. Also add the onions, mushrooms and bell pepper, saute 5 minutes. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Add garlic, mustard and sour cream. Heat through but do not boil. Serve over rice or noodles, sprinkled with cheese.
ingredients: chicken quarters, olive oil, dried tarragon, fresh parsley, dijon mustard, red wine vinegar
name: grilled mustard and herb chicken

steps: Mix all burger ingredients together, cuting up large pieces of ham in the chutney. Form into four burgers. Grill, broil or pan fry to medium well. Mix all burger ingredients together, cuting up large pieces of ham in the chutney. Grill, broil or pan fry to medium
ingredients: hamburger buns, turkey spam, sharp cheddar cheese, dill pickle slices, mustard, onions
name: spamwich

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness.
ingredients: cooking oil, chuck roast, water, beef bouillon cubes, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, cornstarch, soy sauce
name: pepper steak

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium-high heat. Cook garlic until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add onion and celery. Cook for 2 minutes more. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Simmer for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in dill. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, celery, garlic cloves, wild rice, vegetable broth, long-grain white rice, fresh parsley
name: white wild rice pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Combine all ingredients and knead ten times. Let stand for ten minutes. Put dough on a cookie sheet and roll or press out. Top with toppings. Bake 20-25 minutes or until edges are golden.
ingredients: warm water, dried yeast, caster sugar, flour, semolina flour, table salt, olive oil
name: our go to pizza dough

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: egg noodles, chicken breast, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushrooms, frozen mixed vegetables
name: chicken pot pie casserole

steps: In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in berries. Cook until the berries have mostly broken down, approximately 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and lemon juice. Enjoy.
ingredients: fresh blackberries, sugar, fresh lemon juice, vanilla ice cream
name: vanilla ice cream swirled with fresh berry puree

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add leek. Saut 3 minutes. Add garlic. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add tomato, salt, and pepper. Add wine and salmon. Sprinkle with dill, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
ingredients: olive oil, leeks, chopped tomatoes, vegetable stock, salt, ground black pepper, sugar, pitted black olives, fresh lemon juice
name: turkish braised leeks with olives

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl cream together the sugar and the butter. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Beat in mashed bananas and vanilla and continue beating until mixture is smooth. In a large measuring cup stir baking soda into the buttermilk and add it to the banana mixture along with the flour and chopped nuts. Stir the batter until it is just combined. Pour batter into a greased and floured 9x5 inch loaf pan and bake for one hour or until tooth pick inserted in the center comes out clean. Transfer the bread to a rack and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Turn it out onto a rack and let it cool completely.
ingredients: bananas, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, margarine, all-purpose flour, wheat flour, baking soda, buttermilk, black walnut
name: black walnut banana muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a large bowl combine cornstarch, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce,
ingredients: firm tofu, cornmeal, cornstarch, poultry seasoning, plain yogurt, pepper
name: baked toficken nuggets vegetarian chicken nuggets

steps: In a high-sided nonstick pot or wok, combine the cooked rice, cooked shrimp, green onions, chili peppers and water. Cook over high heat, stirring often to mix well and prevent sticking, until all ingredients are thoroughly heated and most of the water is gone, about 8 minutes. Turn the heat to high and stir for 1 more minute as the pot gets hotter. Add the nuoc cham and stir rapidly to mix thoroughly. Continue to cook over high heat, stirring constantly, until most of the liquid has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and serve.
ingredients: cooked rice, fresh spinach, frozen peas, green onion, carrot, garlic cloves, soy sauce, sesame oil, salt and pepper
name: greens fried rice

steps: Cook squash and onion in about a tablespoon of butter with seasonings. When done lightly mash mixture. Combine milk and soup mix well and add squash mixture. Put in a baking dish and layer breadcrumbs then cheese. Cook in 350 degree oven for 10-15 minutes.
ingredients: yellow squash, egg, breadcrumbs, onion, butter, sugar, salt & pepper
name: dixie cafe baked squash

steps: Put the raisins in a small bowl and mix together. Pour the dressing mixture over the raisins and mix well. Pour the dressing mixture over the rais
ingredients: jicama, navel oranges, salt, chili powder, unsalted peanuts, dark raisin, red pepper flakes, lettuce
name: jicama orange raisin salad

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain off fat. Add broth & pepper to skillet. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Drain pasta and toss with sausage mixture.
ingredients: olive oil, sweet italian sausage, red pepper flakes, onion, garlic cloves, italian-style tomatoes, heavy cream, salt, bow tie pasta, parsley
name: bow ties with sausage

steps: Cook on low for 4-5 hours or on low for 7-8 hours.
ingredients: oil, white onion, garlic cloves, pork shoulder, whole green chilies, jalapenos, diced tomatoes
name: crock pot chile verde

steps: In a large wok, heat oil with red pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Cover and continue cooking until green beans are tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.
ingredients: shoulder lamb chops, extra virgin olive oil, green beans, tomatoes, onion, garlic, fresh ground black pepper, salt, ground allspice, hot water
name: green beans lebanese

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, bell pepper, celery, paprika, thyme leaves, parsley, salt and pepper, russet potato, chicken broth and cook until onion is translucent, about 5-7 minutes. Add potatoes. Saut over medium heat for about 10 minutes more, until potatoes are golden and heated through.
ingredients: olive oil, red bell pepper, red onion, celery, paprika, thyme leaves, parsley, salt and pepper, russet potato, chicken broth
name: potato hash

steps: In a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter and olive oil together. Add the remaining ingredients to the skillet. Stir until potatoes are evenly coated with spice mixture and onion slices are evenly distributed. Cook covered on medium heat for 15 minutes, tossing and turning the potatoes every few minutes. Potatoes will be done when slightly browned and fork-tender.
ingredients: new potatoes, fresh rosemary leaves, olive oil, dried mustard, black pepper, jarlsberg cheese
name: norse skillet potatoes

steps: Place pork loin roast in crock pot and place in crock pot on low for 5-6 hours. Add paprika, cayenne, garlic powder, oregano, salt, black pepper, potatoes, baby carrots, chicken broth. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours. Remove pork loin roast to a plate and temporarily set aside. In fat in skillet, saute sliced onion and minced garlic, seasoned with the poultry seasoning, just until onion starts to soften. Place in bottom of slow cooker. Turn heat to high and add white wine to skillet. Scrape up all the bits sticking to skillet, then pour this mixture over the onions in the crock pot. Cover onions with cubed raw sweet potato. Place browned pork roast on top of sweet potato cubes, then pour chicken stock over roast. Cover and cook on low power for for 7 to 8 hours, or until sweet potatoes are tender and pork is cooked.
ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, paprika, cayenne, garlic powder, oregano, salt, black pepper, potatoes, baby carrots, chicken broth
name: crock pot pork roast potatoes and carrots

steps: In a large skillet heat the oil over med-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until no longer pink then add the garlic and cook until the chicken has browned to desired doneness. Add the reserved marinade, broth and wine. And if using the dried oregano. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, covered for 10 minutes. Stir in the artichokes and olives. Simmer for 5 to 10 minutes. Add the hot cooked pasta and simmer for 10 minutes or until sauce is absorbed. Serve with the crumbled feta cheese. Great with a salad.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, chicken broth, olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper, dried oregano, romano cheese
name: chicken savoy

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Coat a 9x13 inch baking dish with cooking spray. In a large bowl, whisk together oil, mustard, paprika, thyme, salt and pepper. Add potatoes and stir to coat. Transfer potatoes to prepared baking dish and roast 15 minutes. Stir and roast until tender on inside, about 15-20 minutes more.
ingredients: baby potatoes, salt, butter, cake flour, cold water, evaporated milk, dijon mustard
name: baby potatoes in mustard sauce

steps: In a large skillet brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread.
ingredients: ground beef, beef hot dogs, onion, steak seasoning, chili powder, dark brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, tomato sauce
name: sloppy joes with dogs

steps: In 4-quart saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook onion and garlic in butter 2 to 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until tender. Stir in flour, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, 1 minute. Stir in broth, broccoli and corn. Heat to boiling over high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer 5 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender. Stir in half-and-half. Cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until hot.
ingredients: butter, onion, celery, carrot, flour, creamed corn, whole kernel corn, milk, salt, pepper
name: creamy corn chowder

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a large saucepan over medium high heat, add the shrimp. Add the garlic powder, creole seasoning, and lime zest. Then add shrimp. Cook until pink. Serve immediately with remaining lime halves squeezed over the top.
ingredients: medium shrimp, sugar, kosher salt, chili powder, cumin, ground coriander, oregano, avocado oil, lime wedge
name: spiced shrimp with avocado oil

steps: Run the lime wedge around the rim of 4 glasses to moisten them. Dip the rims into the salt to lightly coat the edges of the glasses. Place the glasses in the freezer to chill. Place the ice, water, limeade, orange juice concentrate and lime juice in the container of a blender. Process until combined and slushy. Pour into the prepared glasses. Garnish each glass with a lime slice, if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: lime wedge, coarse salt, ice cube, tequila, lemonade
name: salty chihuahua

steps: Blend oil, eggs and pumpkin together, then add sugar and beat. Once that is fully mixed, add the remaining ingredients. Pour into a greased and floured jelly roll pan. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes. Frost with cream cheese icing.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, oil, pumpkin, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, baking soda
name: darlene s pumpkin bars

steps: In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add baby carrots, onion, garlic cloves, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, baby spinach leaves. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried it
ingredients: baby carrots, onion, garlic cloves, turkey kielbasa, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, black pepper, great northern beans, baby spinach leaves
name: north woods bean soup

steps: Season pork chops with seasoning salt and pepper, coat completely with flour. Heat oil in heavy skillet. Add pork chops and brown on each side. Remove and set aside. Add sliced onions to the pan drippings and cook for 1 minute. Add remaining flour. Continue to stir until onions and flour begin to brown. Add 2 cups of water and bring to a boil, stir until incorporated and return pork chops to the gravy, cover skillet, reduce heat, and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes until gravy is thick and pork chops are tender.
ingredients: center-cut pork chops, onion, garlic cloves, black pepper, olive oil
name: onion and garlic smothered pork chops

steps: Place potatoes in water and 1 tsp salt and simmer until tender, about 15 to 18 minutes. Drain and run under cold water to cool. Cut into quarters. Meanwhile, cook bacon in skillet untel crisp. Crumble when cooled. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, remaining salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Toss with the potatoes, bacon and parsley.
ingredients: red potatoes, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, red onion, celery, ranch dressing, parsley, salt, black pepper
name: emeril s favorite potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, stir together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and sugar. Add the chocolate chips. If the batter is too dry, add 1tbs of soymilk. Bake tablespoon-sized cookies on a greased cookie sheet for 7-10 minutes. Be sure to place the cookies about 2 apart, because they expand as they bake.
ingredients: flour, sugar, dark cocoa, salt, cinnamon, canola oil, water, vanilla, chocolate chips
name: vegan cake in a mug

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir in vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. Stir in
ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, frozen raspberries in light syrup, orange juice, cornstarch, mini chocolate chip
name: chocolate raspberry triangles

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Prepare cornbread mix according to package. In a medium large skillet over medium high heat, saute onions until translucent. Add beef, and saute until browned. Stir as necessary while it cooks. Pour beef mixture into 9x9 casserole. Pour cornbread mixture over beef. Bake in 350f oven uncovered for 30-35 minutes, or until cornbread is cooked and starting to brown.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, jalapeno pepper, garlic powder, green chilies, enchilada sauce, corn kernels, cornbread, cheese
name: beef tamale bake

steps: Scoop egg yolks into bowl. Set aside egg whites. Add mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper to yolks. Mash together with fork until smooth. Spoon mixture into egg white halves. Sprinkle tops with paprika,.
ingredients: hard-cooked eggs, mayonnaise, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, dill weed, garlic powder, salt, fresh dill sprig
name: oh so savory deviled eggs

steps: 1preheat the oven 325 degrees f. Toast the pomelo cubes for five minutes. Let it cool completely. 2in a salad bowl, combine the baby cucumbers, canned artichokes, cilantro, cherry tomatoes, and cheese and toss. Add the pita cubes, which should not be hot or it will melt some of the cheese and warm the vegetables, which should not happen. 3in a small bowl combine the lemon juice, olive oil, black pepper and chives. Add to the salad and combine well. 4refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: fish sauce, lime juice, palm sugar, pomelo fruit, coconut flakes, dry roasted peanuts, shallots, mint leaf, bird chiles, bibb lettuce
name: pomelo salad

steps: Spray a 13x9x2 inch baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Arrange the chicken in the dish. Brush lightly with the milk. In a small bowl mix onion powder, thyme, garlic salt, white pepper, red pepper, and black pepper. Sprinkle over chicken. Bake at 375 for 45 minutes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic powder, powdered ginger, dried onion flakes, bourbon, white wine
name: cajun bourbon chicken bites

steps: Melt butter in a dutch oven. Remove from heat. Add worcestershire sauce, catsup, and hot sauce, stirring well. Add pecans, stirring to coat. Spread pecans evenly in a 15x10x1 jellyroll pan. Bake at 400 degrees for 13 to 15 minute, stirring every 5 minutes. Place pecans on paper towels. Sprinkle with salt and pepper, cool completely.
ingredients: butter, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, salt, pepper, pecan halves, cashews, whole almonds
name: cpa snack

steps: Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Whisk together the olive oil, onion, garlic, and basil. Pour half of this mixture onto a cookie sheet and spread it around. Place tomatoes cut-side down on cookie sheet on top of the oil blend. Drizzle tomatoes with remaining oil, then sprinkle with the maple sugar and salt. Bake slowly in oven at 300 degrees for 3 hours. Blend or process when done. Serve hot over pasta, rice, or white beans.
ingredients: tomatoes, onions, cloves, allspice berries, paprika, garlic clove, cinnamon stick, salt, malt vinegar, sugar
name: tomato sauce matt preston

steps: In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: onion, butter, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, milk, cooked chicken, cooked macaroni, salt, pepper, ritz cracker crumbs
name: chicken macaroni casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Mix wet ingredients. Combine wet ingredients. Combine. Pour into a 9x9. Bake 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: yellow cornmeal, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, sour cream, non-dairy coffee creamer, eggs, butter
name: cornbread low sodium

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add millet, onion, buttercup squash, carrot, cabbage, water, sea salt, parsley. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: millet, onion, buttercup squash, carrot, cabbage, water, sea salt, parsley
name: millet with sweet vegetables

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Spread bottom crust in a 9 inch pie pan. Spread berry mixture in pie shell. Sprinkle cinnamon on top. Dot butter on top. Put top crust on and seal edges. Poke several vent holes in top crust. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 10 minutes. Turn oven down to 350 degrees fahrenheit, leaving pie in oven, and bake for 30 minutes longer.
ingredients: unbaked pie crusts, white sugar, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, fresh strawberries, butter, sugar
name: old fashioned strawberry pie

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, flour, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmeg, and egg whites. Add butter and beat until smooth. Fold in egg whites. Cook over medium heat for 2 minutes, for medium done eggs. Remove to a plate, and add salt, pepper, and cheese if desired.
ingredients: french bread, cheese, skim milk, eggs, butter, salt, pepper, oregano, sliced mushrooms
name: feather bed eggs

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion and thyme. Saut until the onion is soft, but not brown. Add the tomatoes and stir briefly. Add the flour, and stir for about 3 minutes, or until the flour is fully incorporated into the mixture. Stir in the sugar, chicken stock, and tomato paste. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired.
ingredients: onion, olive oil, carrot, curry powder, chopped tomatoes, chicken broth, fresh basil, salt and pepper
name: tomato carrot soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Arrange graham crackers in ungreased 15x10x1-inch pan. Place butter and sugar in sauce pan. Heat to boiling point. Boil 2 minutes. Stir in pecans and spread evenly over crackers. Bake about 10 minutes. Cut each graham cracker in half while warm.
ingredients: unsalted butter, margarine, sugar, pecans, graham crackers
name: praline graham crackers

steps: Add water, pearl tapioca, cardamom pods, whole cloves, honey, lemon juice, frozen orange juice concentrate, tia maria. Pour into ramekins, dessert bowls, or lidded containers. Cool 20 minutes. Stir tapioca well in each container, then chill. Tapioca will thicken as it cools.
ingredients: water, pearl tapioca, cardamom pods, whole cloves, honey, lemon juice, frozen orange juice concentrate, tia maria
name: citrus spiced tapioca

steps: Put scallions in pan and cover with water. Add the scallions and cook until scallions are translucent. Remove from heat.
ingredients: baby carrots, water, salt, butter, olive oil, scallion, brown sugar twin, orange juice, cracked pepper
name: baby carrots with scallions

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Cut pork ribs into sections of 3 or 4 bones. Mix remaining ingredients well, sprinkle on both sides of ribs and rub into the meat. Seal rib sections in foil with a tablespoon of water in each package, and bake for 2 hours on a cookie sheet in the center of the oven. Open foil carefully as steam escapes. Can be crisped on a hot bbq if desired but will be great just the way it is.
ingredients: brown sugar, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper, chili powder, onion powder, garlic powder, ground cumin, sweet paprika, cayenne pepper
name: essential dry rub for ribs

steps: In a large skillet, brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, sour cream, mustard, ketchup, salt and pepper
name: sour cream burgers similar to sloppy joes

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the shrimp mixture and cook for 5 minutes. Add the
ingredients: chicken breast halves, flour, butter, onion, green pepper, garlic, tomatoes, baby shrimp
name: chicken breasts with shrimp sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place chips on a foil-lined baking sheet. Top with salsa, beans, scallions and cheese. Heat until cheese is melted. Top with guacamole. Enjoy with vegetable sticks dipped in dressing.
ingredients: tortilla chips, mexican blend cheese, canned black beans, canned chicken, salsa, sour cream, guacamole
name: better than a restaurant s nachos

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts, peanut sauce, low sodium soy saucepreparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts, peanut sauce, low sodium soy saucepreparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts, peanut sauce, low sodium soy saucepreparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts, peanut sauce, low sodium soy saucepreparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts, peanut sauce, low sodium soy saucepreparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts, peanut sauce, low sodium soy saucepreparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts, peanut sauce, low sodium soy saucepreparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts, peanut sauce, low sodium soy saucepreparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts, peanut
ingredients: cooked shrimp, tomatoes, carrot, of fresh mint, lemon zest, reduced sodium soy sauce, fat free flour tortillas, peanuts
name: thai style tomato and shrimp wrap ww

steps: Cook squash and onion in boiling, salted water for 5 minutes. Drain. Combine soup and sour cream. Sprinkle remaining stuffing over top. Bake at 350 degrees, uncovered, for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: yellow squash, salt, pepper, butter, sour cream, cream of mushroom soup, onion, herb stuffing mix, carrot, chicken broth
name: granny s squash casserole

steps: In a large bowl, dissolve gelatin and sugar in water. Stir in the apricot nectar, pineapple juice and lemon juice. Freeze in two 2-qt. Freezer containers. Remove from the freezer 2-3 hours before serving. Place contents of one container in a punch bowl. Mash with potato masher. Stir in ginger ale just before serving. Repeat.
ingredients: water, strawberry gelatin, sugar, pineapple juice, orange juice, lemon juice, orange sherbet, ginger ale
name: orange sherbet party punch

steps: In a cocktail shaker, place the twelve mint leaves, 6 pieces of lime and the simple syrup. With a muddler, mash up the lime pieces and mint leaves so that they release their flavors and oils. Taste for sweetness and adjust if necessary. Add the rum and a handful of ice. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds or until ice crystals form. With a cocktail strainer, pour into a tall ice-filled glass. Top off with club soda. Garnish edge of glass with a slice of lime.
ingredients: sugar, water, mint leaves, mint sprigs, limes, light rum, cracked ice, champagne
name: champagne mojitos

steps: Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice, light cream, dijon mustard, cayenne pepperpreparation:Dry chops and cover with the flour, salt, pepper, butter, white wine, lemon juice
ingredients: pork loin chops with bone, fresh coarse ground black pepper, green onion, garlic clove, butter, all-purpose flour, nonfat milk, blue cheese, white wine
name: pork chops with blue cheese sauce

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, add potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, mushrooms, dried dill, dried thyme, nutmeg, salt, pepper, paprika, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, noodles, nonfat sour cream, parsleypreparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, mushrooms, dried dill, dried thyme, nutmeg, salt, pepper, paprika, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, noodles, nonfat sour cream, parsleypreparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, mushrooms, dried dill, dried thyme, nutmeg, salt, pepper, paprika, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, noodles, nonfat sour cream, parsleypreparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, mushrooms, dried dill, dried thyme, nutmeg, salt, pepper, paprika, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, noodles, nonfat sour cream, parsleypreparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, mushrooms, dried dill, dried thyme, nutmeg, salt, pepper, paprika, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, noodles, nonfat sour cream, parsleypreparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, mushrooms, dried dill, dried thyme, nutmeg, salt, pepper, paprika, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, noodles, nonfat sour cream, parsleypreparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, mushrooms, dried dill, dried thyme
ingredients: baking potatoes, nonfat yogurt, dijon mustard, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, mushrooms, dried dill, dried thyme, nutmeg
name: stroganoff stuffed potatoes meatless

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: bacon, onion, tart apples, red cabbage, cider vinegar, brown sugar, ground allspice, salt, black pepper
name: amish sweet and sour red cabbage

steps: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, heat the oil and saute the onion until golden, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic ands rice and stir until coated with oil. Stir in the broth, lemon juice, split peas, cinnamon, cumin, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then turn the heat down to a simmer. Cover and cook 45-50 minutes, or until all the liquid is absorbed and the rice and peas are tender. Let stand, covered 10 minutes, then serve hot.
ingredients: chicken broth, water, dried thyme leaves, bulgar wheat, canola oil, sugar snap pea, red bell pepper, green onion
name: bulgur pilaf with pea pods

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Stir together dressing, butter, garlic salt, pepper, potato chips in a medium bowl. Add chicken and toss well to coat with mixture. Roll each piece in crushed chips and place on a shallow baking sheet. Sprinkle with any remaining chips. Bake for 30 minutes or until crispy and lightly browned.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, teriyaki sauce, ranch dressing, cheddar cheese, green onions, bacon bits
name: teriyaki ranch baked chicken

steps: In blender container, combine condensed milk and vanilla. Blend well. Add coffee and gradually add ice, blending until smooth. Serve immediately. Top with whipped cream, if desired.
ingredients: ice cubes, brewed coffee, hazelnut-flavored liquid coffee creamer, whipped cream
name: hazelnut iced coffee

steps: Put the eggs in a shallow bowl and whisk them until well mixed. Add the milk, sugar and salt. Mix well. Place one slice of bread at a time in the mixture until the egg mixture is absorbed. Transfer bread slices to griddle or skillet, heating slowly until bottom is golden brown. Turn and brown the other side. Serve french toast hot with butter and syrup.
ingredients: milk, eggs, salt, vanilla extract, white bread, white sugar, cinnamon
name: snickerdoodle french toast

steps: In a large no-stick skillet, melt the butter over medium heat and make a roux by adding the wondra flour and whisking constantly. As soon as the roux begins to start turning color, whisk in the chicken broth and then all other ingredients. Bring to a boil until the gravy thickens, then remove from the heat. Add in the cooked sausage and stir. If the gravy is too thin, sprinkle in a little more wondra flour and re-whisk over heat. If it comes out too thick, just add more chicken broth over heat and whisk until desired thickness is achieved.
ingredients: roll of pork sausage, all-purpose flour, milk, salt and black pepper, biscuits
name: bob evans sausage gravy copycat

steps: Melt 1 tbsp butter in a saucepan. Add onion and saut until fully incorporated, add ketchup, stir. Add coconut milk slowly, stirring constantly, use a whisk so there are no lumps. Add wine and curry paste and tomatoes. Stir and simmer 10-15 minutes. While the sauce is simmering melt the second tbsp of butter in a skillet and add prawns, saut until fully incorporated, add ketchup, stir. While the sauce is simmering melt the second tbsp of butter in
ingredients: prawns, sour cream, mayonnaise, dill, chives, lemon juice, black pepper, butter, rye bread, red caviar
name: swedish creamy dill prawn toasts with caviar skagenrora

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together eggs, black lentil paste, cornstarch, salt, cumin powder, green chili, turmeric powder, garam masala, water, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn oil, corn
ingredients: eggs, black lentil paste, cornstarch, salt, cumin powder, green chili, turmeric powder, garam masala, water, corn oil
name: egg bara

steps: Heat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Roast 10 minutes, stir, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and roast an additional 10 to 15 minutes until vegetables are slightly charred and tender.
ingredients: asparagus, fresh mushrooms, havarti cheese, sea salt
name: steamed asparagus and mushrooms with danish havarti cheese

steps: In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled potatoes with water and simmer until tender. Drain water and mix until cooked potatoes are a thick liquid. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with peel, onion, carrots, and celery. Stir and cook until potatoes are soft. Add liquefied potatoes, cooked cream corn, bay leaf, and paprika, stir. Add green onions, stir.
ingredients: potatoes, onions, celery, carrots, beef stock, salt and pepper, ground beef, egg, milk
name: norwegian potato soup

steps: In a small bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Stir until blended. In a medium bowl, place the egg yolks, cream, and butter. Whisk until stiff, then fold them gently into the batter. Cook until waffles are golden, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: flour, eggs, milk, vegetable oil, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, vanilla extract, salt
name: cinna nilla waffles

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Put mashed potatoes in a large bowl. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. Remove from oven and cool to handle. Cut potatoes in half, lengthwise, remove cooked potato and put in large bowl. Be carefully to leave the skin intact. Mash with cream cheese, hot milk, onion salt, butter, and pepper. Pile mixture back into skins. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley and bake 20 more minutes.
ingredients: instant mashed potatoes with four cheeses, butter, milk, biscuits, egg white, unsalted butter
name: potato pagachi

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Allow the chicken to come to room temperature in its marinade. Arrange the chicken pieces in a roasting tin skin side up with the marinade, including all the bits and pieces, and tuck the sausages around them. Sprinkle the fresh sage leaves over the chicken and sausages and then put the tin into the oven to cook for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Turn the sausages over half way through to color them evenly. Arrange the chicken and sausages on a large platter.
ingredients: yellow onion, olive oil, english mustard, dried sage, ground pepper, lemon, worcestershire sauce, chicken, sausages, sage leaves
name: chicken and sausage with sage

steps: Cook squash and onion in about a tablespoon of butter with seasonings. When done lightly mash mixture. Combine milk and soup mix well and add squash mixture. Put in a baking dish and layer breadcrumbs then cheese. Cook in 350 degree oven for 10-15 minutes.
ingredients: yellow squash, raw rice, salt, pepper, garlic powder, sirloin steak, margarine, tomatoes
name: stuffed yellow squash

steps: In a large bowl mix the flours, baking soda, salt and raisins. Stir in the buttermilk and molasses until well combined. Pour it into a bread pan sprayed with nonstick spray. Let sit for 1 hour. Preheat the oven to 325. Bake for 1 hour or until a tooth pick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Let it sit in the pan for about 10 minutes and then remove it from the pan to sit on a wire rack until it is cooled.
ingredients: water, nonfat dry milk powder, honey, butter, salt, bread flour, fast rising yeast, old fashioned oats, raisins
name: oatmeal raisin bread abm

steps: Boil shells in plenty of water until just done. Allow them to cool completely and discard any broken ones. Chop peppers and add to the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the best of the
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, fresh ground pepper, egg, milk, oyster, vegetable oil
