name: best of the bay recipes oyster fritters

steps: In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together. Fold until all is blended. Keep refrigerated in mason jars with lids, or in containers with tightly fitting lids. To make boursin cheese, slice french bread and place on cookie sheet. Spoon spread onto bread. Toast, bake, or broil until cheese is bubbly and nicely browned.
ingredients: sweet butter, cream cheese, garlic cloves, oregano, thyme, marjoram, dill, pepper, basil, salt
name: boursin cheese spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss the nuts with the maple syrup, olive oil, herbs and cayenne. Spread the nuts on a rimmed baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes., stirring occasionally, until browned. Season the nuts with salt and pepper and toss frequently until cooled.
ingredients: pecans, walnuts, whole almond, peanut oil, brown sugar, sea salt, paprika, cayenne, ground ginger, ground cumin
name: nuts to you

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes.
ingredients: bananas, eggs, vegetable oil, white cake mix, instant vanilla pudding, semisweet mini chocolate chips
name: instant banana bread

steps: Drain canned corn. Dice peppers and green onion. Put in a large bowl and add mayonnaise, you could increase this to 1 cup and cheese. Just before serving add the fritos. The recipe calls for chili cheese fritos.
ingredients: fritos corn chips, chili, tomatoes, salad greens, cheese
name: fritos taco salad

steps: Mix all ingredients together, cut up large pieces of pineapple in the bun. Top burgers and enjoy.
ingredients: onion, green pepper, unsweetened pineapple juice, turkey, tomato paste, water, dijon-style mustard, garlic powder, whole grain sandwich rolls
name: barbecued turkey on a bun

steps: In a large bowl, mix the green onion and poppy seed. In a small bowl, mix the green onion and poppy seed. In a small bowl, mix the green onion and
ingredients: wide egg noodles, butter, green onion, poppy seed
name: poppy seed and green onion noodles

steps: Combine all ingredients except flour in a large bowl to coat the liver. Add salt and pepper. Slice liver and dredge in seasoned flour. Place olive oil in a large skillet and brown both sides of the liver over medium high heat. Place sliced onions in the skillet with the liver. Pour beef broth on top of liver and onions. Cover and simmer on low until onions are tender and broth forms a nice gravy.
ingredients: beef liver, flour, bacon, onion, water, thyme leaves, ketchup
name: beef liver with onion gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine flour and sugar in a large bowl or food processor. Add margarine and process, or mix together with your fingers, until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add cold water, one tablespoon at a time, and process, or mix, until a manageable dough forms. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 12-inch circle. Press dough into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie pan or removable-bottom tart pan. Prick the bottom all over with a fork, cover dough with foil and fill with dried beans or rice. Bake 10 minutes. Remove beans and foil and bake until crust is golden brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove from oven and cool completely on a wire rack. Yields 8 slices per crust.
ingredients: flour, sugar, salt, vegetable oil, milk
name: pat in pan pie crust

steps: Combine the capsicum and tomatoes in a large bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Place in a paper or plastic bag for about 10 minutes. Peel and seed, then chop coarsely. Combine the capsicum and tomatoes in a large bowl. Combine the capsicum and tomatoes
ingredients: red capsicum, red onion, field mushrooms, pasta sauce, instant polenta, vegetable stock, milk, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: polenta veggie stack

steps: Slice the avocado in half and scoop out the flesh. In a food processor, combine the avocado, cottage cheese, lime juice, green onions, jalapeno, garlic cloves, salt and pepper. Pure until smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately or chill. Serve with raw veggies or tortilla chips.
ingredients: avocados, lime, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, salt and pepper, cilantro
name: guacamole at the cottage

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place pizza crust on ungreased cookie sheet. Sprinkle with 1 cup of the cheese. Top with chicken and garlic powder. Bake about 15 minute or until hot.
ingredients: thin pizza crust, chicken breast, barbecue sauce, provel cheese
name: bbq style chick pizza pie

steps: In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, sour cream and salt. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 238. Remove from the heat. Stir in peanut butter and vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares. Store in the refrigerator.
ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, creamy peanut butter, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust, syrup
name: no bake creamy peanut butter fudge pie

steps: Preheat oven to 400f line your pan with aluminum foil and lightly brush with olive oil, or use a bit of cooking spray. Combine parsley, garlic, lemon zest, and coarse salt on the cutting board. Finely chop, then combine with the breadcrumbs in a shallow plate. Brush top of each fillet with olive oil. Press fillet into the crumb mixture. Place fillets in baking dish, crust-side up. Bake until firm, about 12-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of the fish. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: low-fat mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, fresh lemon juice, salt, anchovy paste, fresh ground pepper, fresh breadcrumb, fresh parsley, cod fish fillets, lemon wedge
name: cod with caesar crust

steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add the chicken to the mixture. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until juices run clear. Stir in the shrimp. Cover and cook on high for 20-30 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
ingredients: chicken, brown sugar, vinegar, sprite, garlic, soy sauce, pepper
name: crock pot garlic brown sugar chicken

steps: Combine the cabbage, granulated sugar, cider vinegar, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Whisk together the cabbage, granulated sugar, cider vinegar, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Whisk together the cabbage, granulated sugar, cider vinegar, salt
ingredients: cabbage, granulated sugar, cider vinegar, salt, mayonnaise
name: clifton s cafeteria cole slaw

steps: Put the mushrooms, top side up on an oiled grill. Close the cover and cook for about 4 minutes or until cheese has melted and mushrooms are tender.
ingredients: portabella mushrooms, olive oil, onion, sun-dried tomato, spanish olives, frozen chopped spinach, garlic-flavored croutons, plum tomato, feta cheese
name: greek stuffed portabella mushrooms

steps: Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through.
ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic clove, fresh gingerroot, onion, coriander, green chili, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, chili paste
name: thai chicken cakes with sweet chilli sauce

steps: In a 9x13 pan pour crushed tomatoes in bottom spread evenly. Place tilapia fillets on top of tomatoes and sprinkle salt and pepper on them. Crush corn chips until pieces are small and mix with cheese and bread crumbs. Melt butter and mix with the breading mixture. Spoon topping over fish and bake 400 for 20 minutes.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, butter, mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice, dried basil, ground black pepper, onion powder, celery salt, tilapia fillets
name: parmesan coated tilapia

steps: In a cocktail shaker, place the twelve mint leaves, 6 pieces of lime and the simple syrup. With a muddler, mash up the lime pieces and mint leaves so that they release their flavors and oils. Taste for sweetness and adjust if necessary. Add the rum and a handful of ice. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds or until ice crystals form. With a cocktail strainer, pour into a tall ice-filled glass. Top off with club soda. Garnish edge of glass with a slice of lime.
ingredients: prosecco, sparkling water, syrup, mint leaf, limes, lime, ice cube
name: hugo champagne aperitif with elderflower and mint

steps: In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the butter, celery and onion. Saute for about 3 minutes, add the flour and stir well to make a dry roux. Add the reserved clam juice to make a paste, then slowly add enough cold water to reach the desired thickness. Add the potatoes, milk, thyme and salt and pepper. Reduce heat to low and allow soup to simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Add the clams and allow to heat through.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, water, salt, pepper, minced clams, milk, flour, butter
name: yummy boston clam chowder

steps: Preheat oven to 350 deg. In saucepan, combine luby s cafeteria lemon icebox pie with sugar-free vanilla pudding mix and gelatine. Add water and lemon juice. Stir until smooth. Cook and stir 1-2 minutes longer or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Cool clightly. Pour into crust. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Spread with whipped topping.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, extra-large eggs, fresh lemon juice, lemon peel, granulated sugar, graham cracker crust
name: luby s cafeteria lemon icebox pie

steps: Line 12 muffin-tin cups with paper liners. Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl, combine flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. Stir well. In a 1-cup measure, dissolve coffee granules in coffee liqueur and whiskey. Add enough milk to measure 1 cup. Whisk egg in a bowl with coffee-milk mixture. Whisk in melted butter. Gently stir liquid into dry ingredients just until moistened. Spoon into muffin tin. Bake at 375 for 25 minutes, or until the top springs back when gently touched.
ingredients: black coffee, sugar, eggs, plain yogurt, flour, baking powder
name: coffee muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large bundt pan. Combine all of the ingredients for the bites in a saucepan. Combine all of the ingredients for the topping in a saucepan. Boil mixture for about 2 minutes. While still warm, poke holes in the top and sides of the cake with a fork. Pour margarita mixture over cake.
ingredients: boiling water, margarita jell-o gelatin, tequila, lime, juice and zest of, whipped topping
name: layered margarita bites

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Place pieces of string cheese along the inside edges of dough. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, tomato sauce, tomato paste, crushed red pepper flakes, cooked chicken, onion, green pepper, ricotta cheese, colby-monterey jack cheese, parmesan cheese
name: spicy chicken oamc pizza

steps: Spray a 13x9 inch baking pan with cooking spray. Put drumsticks in the baking dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes. In a bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients. Take drumsticks out of the oven and pour sauce mixture over them.
ingredients: chicken drumsticks, soy sauce, chili sauce, garlic cloves, sesame seeds
name: sticky chicken drumsticks

steps: Place all the ingredients in a bowl. Beat until mixed well. Pour into a greased flan dish. Bake for about one hour at 175 degrees celsius. When baked it will surprisingly have a base, a custard centre, and a coconut topping.
ingredients: flour, sugar, unbaked pie shells, butter, vanilla, cold water
name: water pie

steps: Preheat over to 375f. Dredge filets in butter. Dredge filets in bread crumbs. Dredge filets in minced garlic. Sprinkle with seasoning salt. Spay small casserole dish add filets and bake covered with foil for 25 minutes. Uncover and broil for 3 or more minutes, depending on if ya want them crispier. Good served with rice and veggie of your choice.
ingredients: catfish nuggets, egg, buttermilk, cornmeal, salt and pepper, oil
name: southern fried catfish nuggets

steps: Spray an 8x8 pan with cooking spray, then place the sliced apples in the pan. Mix the sugar, 2 teaspoons flour and cinnamon together, sprinkle over apples. Pour the water over the apple mixture. Combine the oats, remaining flour, brown sugar, baking powder and baking soda together. Stir in the melted butter and crumble over the apples. Bake at 350 for 40-45 minute. Serve warm with icecream or caramel sauce.
ingredients: cooking apples, lemon juice, flour, oatmeal, brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, butter
name: a little apple crisp

steps: Place the peppers under a hot broiler, shiny side up, until the skin blisters and turns black. Allow to cool. Tear off the papery skin, and remove and discard the stalk and seeds. Cut the flesh into strips and place the strips in a shallow dish. Sprinkle with vinegar, oil, salt, and black pepper. Tear the basil leaves and scatter them over the top. Mix the ingredients lightly together. Serve at once, or keep in a cool place for later. If served later, mix again, and check the seasoning.
ingredients: red bell peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, halloumi cheese, fresh mint leaves, lemon, juice and zest of, fresh thyme, pine nuts, pepper
name: roasted red peppers with halloumi

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish with nonstick pan coating or grease lightly with solid shortening. Cut baked potatoes into 1 inch cubes. Place half in a prepared baking dish. Sprinkle half of the salt, pepper and bacon. Top with half of the sour cream & cheese. Repeat layers. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with chopped green onions to garnish.
ingredients: baking potatoes, milk, french onion dip, seasoning salt, ground pepper, asiago cheese, cooked bacon
name: loaded potato casserole

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: italian sausage, onion, red bell pepper, eggs, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, bread, salt, pepper
name: individual sausage and egg casseroles

steps: Mix seasonings together in small dish. Trim fat from steak and rub seasoning mixture on both sides. Place steak on rack of broiler pan. Position pan so that steak is about 3 inches from heat. Broil 10-12 minutes for a steak, turning once during cooking or grill as desired. Serve with baked potatoes, sour cream and chives, and steamed broccoli.
ingredients: beef tenderloin steaks, butter, heavy cream, black pepper, brandy, mushrooms, salt
name: lisbon steak recipe

steps: Place chicken strips into a large, resealable plastic bag. In a small bowl, mix the egg, buttermilk and garlic powder. Pour mixture into bag with chicken. Seal and shake to coat. Heat oil in a large, heavy skillet to 375 degrees. Carefully place coated chicken in hot oil. Fry until golden brown and juices run clear. Remove chicken from refrigerator, drain, discarding buttermilk mixture. Place chicken in flour mixture bag. Remove chicken from refrigerator, drain, disc
ingredients: saltine crackers, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, sugar, pepper, vegetable oil, chicken pieces
name: christie s chicken coating

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat the margarine, white and brown sugars together until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla, beat well. In another bowl, sift flour, baking powder, and salt. Add to the creamed mixture, stirring well. Fold in butter brickle bits, and chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting.
ingredients: butter, flour, caramel candies, evaporated milk, german chocolate cake mix, pecans, milk, chocolate chips
name: caramel fudge brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray. Press the meatloaf into the pan. Mix the ketchup, brown sugar and mustard together and spread over the meatloaf. Bake at 400 for about 50 minutes.
ingredients: ground turkey breast, quick-cooking oats, nonfat milk, egg, chili sauce, onion, red pepper, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, ketchup
name: richie s turkey meatloaf

steps: In large skillet, melt butter, stir in flour, cook 1 minute. Slowly stir in milk, cook until bubbly. Add cheese, salt and pepper, mix well. Remove from heat. Put 3 pieces asparagus on each ham slice. Roll up and place in 13x9 baking pan. Cover with the cheese sauce. Sprinkle with crumbs. Bake at 375 for 20 minutes.
ingredients: asparagus, country ham, unsalted butter, unbleached all-purpose flour, whole milk, hard-boiled eggs, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh dill
name: asparagus with country ham and egg gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Cover your pie crust with foil and press into the shell. Hold the foil down with a layer of dried beans. Bake 6 minutes and remove the foil. Put 1 cup of cheese in the partially baked crust. Spread on half the chilis. Repeat with the remaining cheese and chilis. Beat 4 eggs with the cream and hot pepper sauce and nutmeg. Pour over the chilis and cheese and bake in a 375f oven for 30 minutes. Separate 2 eggs and beat the egg whites until they form soft peaks. Lightly beat the egg yolks and fold them gently into the beaten whites. Spread over the hot chilis and cheese and bake for 15 minutes or until puffy and browned.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt, green chilies, monterey jack pepper cheese, all-purpose flour, egg, milk, soft breadcrumbs, vegetable oil
name: chicken rellenos

steps: Preheat oven 200 degrees. Flour and brown steaks in a small amount of oil in skillet. Place steaks in 8x12 casserole. Add mushroom soup, water, and onion to meat drippings in skillet in which meat was browned. Simmer together and add kitchen bouquet, pour over steaks and bake covered for 2 hours.
ingredients: cube steaks, flour, garlic powder, salt, pepper, beef broth, onion, button mushrooms, garlic cloves, butter
name: cube steak with mushroom gravy

steps: In a large saucepan, add pineapple. Add water to cover. Bring to a boil. Cook for 25 minutes or until pineapple is tender. Drain and cool slightly. Process pineapple in a food processor until smooth. Pour pineapple into a mixing bowl. Add in remaining ingredients. Stir to combine. Transfer mixture into a greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 40 minutes.
ingredients: crushed pineapple, butter, carrots, brown sugar
name: carrot pineapple layer casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 large baking sheets with silicone baking sheets or parchment paper. In a food processor, chop the parmesan, gruyere and rosemary together until coarsely chopped. Set the cheese mixture aside. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. Working with dough strip at a time, coat each strip with the olive oil and then the cheese mixture, pressing very gently. Twist each cheese covered dough strip and place onto prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the salt, if you wish. Bake until the breadsticks are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes. Transfer the warm breadsticks to a basket and serve.
ingredients: french bread, butter, mayonnaise, paprika, parmesan cheese, minced garlic cloves, cheese
name: damn good cheese bread

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Add 1/2 cup of milk and 1/2 cup of tomato juice
ingredients: spaghetti, old cheddar cheese, onion, tomato juice, butter, salt and pepper
name: grandmas cheddar cheese spaghetti

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place fish fillets in a greased shallow baking dish. In a small bowl, combine sour cream, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, onion, and salt. Spread over fillets. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake 20-25 minutes or until fillets flake easily with a fork.
ingredients: fish fillets, lemon juice, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, green onions, salt, tabasco sauce
name: parmesan fish fillets

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees. Brown ground beef and onion, drain. Add all remaining ingredients, except the biscuits,. Mix well. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low. Cover and cook 10 to 15 minutes or until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally spoon into an ungreased 8-inch squres or oval baking dish seperate dough into 5 biscuits. Cut each in half. Arrange cut side down around outside edge of hot mixture. Bake at 375 degrees for 20 minutes or until casserole is bubbly and biscuits are deep golden brown.
ingredients: stewing beef, flour, vegetable oil, vegetables, onion soup mix, hot water, ready-to-bake refrigerated buttermilk flaky biscuits
name: hearty oven stew

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. To make dough, blend the cheese with the butter. Stir in the flour, salt, and paprika. Mix well. Wrap 1 teaspoon of dough around each olive overlapping completely. Bake until light brown, 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: extra-sharp cheddar cheese, flour, margarine, cayenne pepper, green olives
name: baked green olives in spicy cheese pastry

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Spray muffin cups with non-stick vegetable spray. Roll out biscuits until each is big enough to fit into muffin tins with enough dough to cover. Mix together catsup and mustard with ground beef. Fill each biscuit cup with meat mixture. Sprinkle cheese over all. Fold dough over top. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: self-rising flour, cheddar cheese, milk, mayonnaise
name: cheddar biscuit cups

steps: Place broccoli florets, cauliflower florets, low-fat mayonnaise, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk, low-fat buttermilk,
ingredients: broccoli florets, cauliflower florets, low-fat mayonnaise, low-fat buttermilk, red onions, blue cheese, salt, pepper, parsley
name: broccoli cauliflower blue cheese salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, slowly cook and stir the mushrooms, parsley and onion in 2 tablespoons butter until tender. Drain and set aside. Separate the dough into 4 rectangles. Cut rectangles in half, forming 8 squares, and arrange on a large baking sheet. Place 1 tablespoon mushroom mixture on each square. Top each square with 1 teaspoon parmesan cheese. Fold the squares into triangles. In a small saucepan, melt remaining butter. Brush triangles with butter and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake in the preheated oven 10 to 15 minutes, until golden brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, cream cheese, mushroom stems and pieces, seasoning salt, egg, poppy seed
name: mushroom logs

steps: In a medium bowl, combine the golden delicious apple, fresh lemon juice, onion, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, olive oil, cooked turkey breast, whole wheat pita bread, plain low-fat yogurt, garlic clove, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat pita bread, whole wheat
ingredients: golden delicious apple, fresh lemon juice, onion, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, olive oil, cooked turkey breast, whole wheat pita bread, plain low-fat yogurt, garlic clove
name: turkey apple gyros

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Cut chicken breasts in half to butterfly them into cutlets. Sprinkle with some salt and pepper melt margarine in skillet and brown chicken in margarine and transfer to a 9x13 pan. Pour soup and sour cream into same skillet and whisk until smooth and warm. Place ham on top of chicken and top with a slice of swiss cheese. Pour soup mixture over top and bake uncovered for 40 minutes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, ham, swiss cheese, white wine, parsley, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs, milk
name: chicken cordon bleu the easy way

steps: In a large sauce pan combine chicken, water, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, dumplings, cream of chicken soup, d
ingredients: whole chicken, bay leaf, water, salt and pepper, dumplings, cream of chicken soup
name: easy chicken n pastry

steps: In a large saucepan, heat oil over medium. Add onion, cinnamon and cumin. Saut until onions are soft. Stir in tomatoes, peas and coconut milk. Reduce heat and simmer until peas are tender. Serve over rice and pass naan bread.
ingredients: dried beans, corn oil, garlic, fresh ginger, cayenne, coconut milk, fresh lime juice
name: black eyed peas with coconut milk

steps: In blender, combine coconut milk, sweetened flaked coconut, eggs, frozen limeade concentrate, sugar, flour, coconut extract, salt, deep dish pie shells. Beat well. Fold in chocolate morsels. Pour into prepared crust. Bake at 350 for 1 hour until just set and lightly browned. Cool completely before serving.
ingredients: coconut milk, sweetened flaked coconut, eggs, frozen limeade concentrate, sugar, flour, coconut extract, salt, deep dish pie shells
name: coconut lime custard pie

steps: In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad.
ingredients: low-fat mayonnaise, water, balsamic vinegar, sun-dried tomato, garlic clove, fresh basil leaf, fresh ground pepper, dried chipotle pepper
name: omg low cal sun dried tomato dressing

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, cream cheese, tomatoes, green bell peppers, pastrami, salami, red onions, provolone cheese
name: italian country sandwich

steps: Heat oil in a large saute or fry pan until very hot. Add vegetables all at once, spreading in an even layer. Do not stir until bottom of layer begins to brown. Flip and stir to get unbrowned pieces to bottom. Let cook until beginning to brown. The trick here is to keep heat high and brown pieces without overcooking or burning them. If pieces are browned, but not soft enough for your taste, turn off heat and cover pan for a few minutes.
ingredients: broccoli, swiss cheese, yellow onion, garlic, italian seasoning, dried cilantro, dry white wine, olive oil, white mushroom
name: sauteed broccoli and onions

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the onion. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: instant mashed potatoes, celery, onions, eggs, toast, butter, salt and pepper
name: dutch mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray the pie plate with cooking spray. Combine flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar in a medium bowl. Add the butter, eggs, and vanilla. Stir well. Stir in the chocolate morsels and nuts. Spoon into a greased 9-inch pie plate. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: eggs, flour, sugar, brown sugar, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, pecans, unbaked 9-inch pie shell
name: chocolate chip cookie pie

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: sausages, olive oil, onions, red peppers, green peppers, garlic cloves, tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt and pepper
name: sausages bell peppers

steps: Mix water, sugar and yeast in a small bowl and set aside. Using steel blade, place flour and salt in bowl of food processor. Pour in yeast mixture through chute. Process till dough forms ball. Break dough apart and reprocess 2 or 3 times. Place dough in buttered bowl. Turn dough in bowl to butter all sides. Cover and let rise about 1 hour, till doubled in size. Punch down, shape into loaf and place in greased loaf pan. Let rise till doubled. Bake in preheated oven 25 to 30 minutes or till golden brown.
ingredients: french bread, warm water, yeast, salt, sugar, shortening, flour
name: french bread

steps: Cook haloumi following packet directions and set aside. Heat a non-stick frying pan. Add haloumi and fry until golden brown. Set aside to cool. In a large bowl combine the remaining ingredients. Add the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: chicken fillets, halloumi cheese, lemon zest, lemon thyme, olive oil, honey
name: chicken with haloumi and honey

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Grease and flour 9x13 pan. Combine dry ingredients in mixing bowl. Beat in shortening. Add milk and vanilla. Beat for 2 minutes. Beat in egg whites, beat until very smooth. Bake for 35 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: flour, sugar, eggs, baking powder, water, butter, salt, vanilla
name: plain cake jamaican style

steps: Combine all ingredients in large bowl, mixing well. Using no-stick cooking spray, lightly grease 13x9 pan and then spread mixture evenly into pan. Using no-stick cooking spray, lightly grease 13x9 pan and then spread
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, butter, flaked coconut, almonds, sweetened condensed milk
name: chewy almond squares

steps: Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, garlic, skim milk, salt, pepper
name: mashed yukon gold potatoes with garlic

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Pour olive oil over bread crumbs to soften. Add remaining ingredients except eggs. Stir in eggs. Pour mixture into a well-greased loaf pan or a 6x8 inch casserole. Set the dish in a container of hot water and bake for about 45 minutes or until an inserted knife come out clean.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, walnuts, flat leaf parsley, pomegranate seeds, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh sardine
name: stuffed baked sardines

steps: Mix the orange juice, soy sauce and garlic together. Add scallops. Toss to coat. Put in the fridge for about 1 hour. Preheat the george foreman grill for 5 minutes. Drain scallops, discarding the marinade. Spray both sides of the grill with non-stick cooking spray. Place scallops and peppers on grill. Grill 3 minutes or until scallops or opaque. Remove scallops and continue grilling peppers about 1 minute longer. Mix the almonds and cooked rice together. Serve the scallops and peppers on rice garnished with orange peel.
ingredients: peanut oil, sea scallops, ground pepper, salt, garlic, orange juice, soy sauce, orange zest
name: seared orange scallops

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with butter and set aside. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda. Add the butter and rub it into the flour with your finger. Add the buttermilk and stir until the dough is slightly firm. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin tin and bake in the center of the oven till brown and crusty, 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: cornmeal, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, baking soda, buttermilk, egg, butter
name: southern cornbread muffins

steps: Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium. Add onion and cook until softened, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes. Whisk eggs and hot sauce in a small bowl. Add to hot skillet and cook until eggs set, about 2 minutes. Top with cheese and cook until melted, about 1 minute. Place egg mixture evenly over 4 bagel halves. Top with remaining bagel halves and serve.
ingredients: egg, cheddar cheese, bacon, onion rings, tomatoes, bread, butter, vegetable oil, salt, white pepper
name: hangover sandwich

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan. Add zucchini, onion, bell pepper and mushrooms. Mix well. Add zucchini,
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, zucchini, water, plain yogurt, fresh mint leaves
name: chilled minted zucchini soup

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add leek. Saut 3 minutes. Add garlic. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add tomato, salt, and pepper. Add wine and salmon. Sprinkle with dill, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
ingredients: leeks, water, olive oil, lemon zest, fresh dill, salmon steaks, ground pepper, lemon juice, lemon wedge
name: roasted salmon with leeks

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto the baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, low-fat buttermilk, skim milk, egg, rhubarb
name: sumner s favorite healthy rhubarb scones

steps: Combine the coleslaw mix and onion in a large bowl. Whisk together the salad dressing, vegetable oil, sugar substitute, vinegar, and salt in a medium bowl. Blend thoroughly. Pour dressing mixture over coleslaw mix and toss to coat. Chill at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: beef-flavor ramen noodles, coleslaw mix, sliced almonds, sunflower seeds, green onion, sugar, vegetable oil, white vinegar
name: asian cole slaw

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, ricotta cheese, part-skim mozzarella cheese, turkey pepperoni, plum tomatoes, yellow pepper, oregano, parsley
name: cheese lovers pizza squares

steps: Heat oil in pan over medium heat. Add beef steak, onions, garlic cloves, tomatoes, parsley, bay leaf, salt and black pepper, coriander, red pepper flakes. Cook on the preheated grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate. Knead together the beef steak, onions, garlic cloves, tomatoes, parsley, bay leaf, salt and black pepper, coriander, red pepper flakes. Add beef steak
ingredients: olive oil, beef steak, onions, garlic cloves, tomatoes, parsley, bay leaf, salt and black pepper, coriander, red pepper flakes
name: portuguese beef and onions bifes de cebolada

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Pound the chicken breasts flat. Lay five asparagus spears across each chicken breast. Roll chicken over the asparagus and insert a tooth pick to secure the edge. Lightly season with salt and pepper. Place in baking dish. Cover with sliced mushrooms and garlic cloves. Bake at 375f for 30 minutes. Let stand for 2-3 minutes before serving. Serve with steamed vegetables or leafy green salad.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, chicken breast fillets, asparagus, cooking spray, butter, lemon juice, garlic clove, capers, oregano, baby spinach leaves
name: chicken with asparagus caper sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine cream cheese and cream, stirring until smooth. Stir in onion, horseradish, cottage cheese, mayonnaise, crabmeat, green onion, horseradish, triscuit crackers. Add crabmeat with liquid and fold in gently. Place in a small baking dish, bake 8-10 minutes or until hot.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, cottage cheese, mayonnaise, crabmeat, green onion, horseradish, triscuit crackers
name: hot crab bites

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter. Add chopped onion and garlic. Saute until onion is soft. Add tomatoes, soda, sugar, salt, basil, and pepper, and heat to boiling. Lower heat to simmer and cook gently for 15-20 minutes.
ingredients: chicken breast, soy sauce, vegetable oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, basil, garlic powder, pepper
name: aunt brendas chicken marinade

steps: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm.
ingredients: spaghetti squash, salted butter, orange juice, apple juice, lemon juice
name: fruity baked spaghetti squash

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line a pan with foil. Wash and slice kale very thin. Mix spices, lemon juice and oil in a separate bowl. Dip in each slice of kale into the kale mixture. Bake for 45 minutes or until soft, with crispy edges.
ingredients: kale, raw cashews, water, fresh lemon juice, nutritional yeast, bulb of garlic, sea salt, agave nectar, granulated garlic
name: raw vegan kale chips

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, soya sauce, lemon juice, garlic, tarragon, basil, chives, sage, black pepper
name: marinated bbq pork tenderloin

steps: Put the dressing in a large mixing bowl and mix well. Add salt and pepper to taste. Mix well and serve.
ingredients: carrots, onion, olive oil, lemon juice, curry powder, allspice, salt, black pepper
name: mother earth moroccan carrot salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroon compote passover as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroon compote passover. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through.
ingredients: mixed dried fruit, orange juice, water, cloves, ground cinnamon, sugar, lemon juice, macaroons
name: macaroon compote passover

steps: Heat oven to 250 f. Combine cereal and pecans in 13x9-inch baking pan. Set aside. In large microwaveable bowl, combine corn syrup, brown sugar and margarine. Microwave at high 1 minute 30 seconds. Stir. Microwave an additional 30 seconds to 1 minute 30 seconds or until boiling. Stir in vanilla and baking soda and pour over cereal mixture. Stir to coat evenly. Bake 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes. Spread on baking sheet to cool. Break into pieces.
ingredients: butter, honey, brown sugar, baking soda, popped popcorn, pecan pieces
name: praline butter pecan crunch popcorn

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine peaches, sugar, lemon juice, cornstarch and butter in a blender until smooth. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately with a spoonful of mascarpone.
ingredients: peaches, sugar, fresh lemon juice, cornstarch, unsalted butter
name: peach plum nectarine or cherry filling

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. In large skillet, cook and stir bacon and onion until bacon is crisp. Drain off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into ungreased 1-quart casserole. Bake uncovered until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes.
ingredients: onion, green pepper, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, honey, garlic powder, bacon, pork and beans
name: skillet baked beans

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Combine cream cheese and cream, stirring until smooth. Stir in onion, horseradish, old bay, cheddar and chives. Add crabmeat with liquid and fold in gently. Place in a small baking dish, bake 8-10 minutes or until hot.
ingredients: wonton skins, cream cheese, crabmeat, breadcrumbs, sesame oil
name: crab puffs

steps: Place steaks in a large shallow dish. Combine garlic and remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well. Pour marinade mixture over tuna steaks. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour, turning once. Remove steaks from the marinade, reserving marinade. Bring marinade to a boil in a small saucepan. Grill tuna steaks, covered, over medium hot coals about 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily. Baste often with marinade.
ingredients: garlic clove, reduced sodium soy sauce, fresh ginger, dark sesame oil, rice vinegar, green onion, tuna steaks
name: ginger marinated tuna steaks

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, flour, egg, salt, vanilla, brown sugar, sugar, pecans
name: pecan treats

steps: In a large, heavy bottomed, skillet place the sugar and water. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add the almonds and cook, stirring constantly, until almost all the water has evaporated. About 5 minutes. Add the cinnamon and salt and cook until the sugar has dried on the almonds. About 2 minutes. Pour onto a large sheet pan and let cool.
ingredients: egg white, cold water, whole almonds, sugar, salt, ground cinnamon
name: cinnamon roasted almonds

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce.
ingredients: ground turkey, breadcrumbs, egg, vegetable dip, hamburger buns, rocket, tomatoes, red onion, mayonnaise
name: tomato basil turkey burgers

steps: In large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, butter, sugar, and vanilla. Beat in melted pumpkin. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Chill until set. At least 4 hours. Garnish with your favorite topping or eat plain.
ingredients: cream cheese, canned pumpkin, sugar, pumpkin pie spice, whipped topping, prepared graham cracker crust
name: 2 step pumpkin cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 9x13 inch pan. Mix together first 4 ingredients in a small bowl. In a large mixing bowl, beat brown sugar and butter till fluffy. Add eggs and beat till well blended then beat in vanilla. Stir in flour mixture till well blended then beat in vanilla.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, egg, miniature marshmallows, white corn syrup, vanilla, butterscotch chips, rice krispies, salted peanuts
name: goober bars

steps: Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Simmer for
ingredients: russet potatoes, garlic, unsalted butter, bacon fat, whipping cream, sharp white cheddar cheese
name: garlic and cheese mashed potatoes

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium-high heat. Add onion, celery, red pepper flakes and garlic. Cook 5 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle flour over mixture. Stirring constantly, cook one minute until well blended. Whisking constantly, add chicken broth, peanut butter and soy sauce. Reduce heat to medium-low. Whisking frequently, simmer about 15 minutes. Garnish with peanuts and serve hot.
ingredients: carrot, crunchy peanut butter, vegetable stock, onion, chili powder, salt and pepper, cumin, coriander, dry-roasted unsalted peanuts, olive oil
name: carrot peanut soup

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium high heat and cook the garlic until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and red pepper flakes and cook about 2 minutes. Season calamari rings with salt and pepper, then add to the skillet. Saute, stirring, until cooked through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Transfer to a colander to drain a bit. Place the lemon juice, olive oil, capers, and lemon zest into a clean glass jar with a lid. Shake to combine, taste, and season with salt and pepper. Garnish with fresh parsley.
ingredients: tomatoes, lemon, lemon pepper, kosher salt, cracked black pepper, capers
name: sliced tomato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 5-by-9-inch loaf pan. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, baking soda, cherries, sugar, sour cream, eggs, unsalted butter. In a medium saucepan, combine the whole cherries and the sugar. Using a potato masher, crush the cherries. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes. Transfer to a large bowl and let cool. Whisk in the sour cream and eggs. Stir in the flour mixture. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan, then bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 55 minutes. Let cool in the pan for 15 minutes, then turn out onto a rack to cool completely.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, baking powder, oleo, sugar, eggs, dates, pecans, maraschino cherry, special k cereal
name: cherry winks

steps: Preheat broiler to high. Arrange the baby peppers in a single layer on a foil-lined jelly roll pan, and broil peppers for 4 minutes on each side or until blackened and tender. Cool, combine peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon rind, red pepper, salt, and mozzarella balls, and toss. Cover, and refrigerate overnight, tossing after 6 hours. Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes. Stir in basil leaves, and lemon juice before serving. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: red peppers, extra virgin olive oil, basil, garlic cloves, feta cheese
name: baked peppers with feta cheese

steps: In a large saucepan brown sausage, drain well and crumble. Set aside. In same pan saute onion and celery in 1 teaspoon oil. Mix in carrots and sausage. Place uncooked rice in bottom of a 9 x 9 or 3 quart baking dish. Place sausage mixture in baking dish on top of uncooked rice. In a medium size bowl mix soup, chicken broth, water, dry ranch mix and salt. Pour over sausage mixture and cover with foil. Bake in a 350 degree oven for approximately 50 minutes.
ingredients: wild rice, sausage links, onion, celery salt, mushrooms, water, cream of mushroom soup, salt and pepper
name: sausage and wild rice casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through.
ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, ground beef, pizza sauce, cheese
name: pronto pasta italiano

steps: Preheat broiler in a large bowl, mix together all ingredients. Mix until well blended. Form into 1 inch meatballs. Place on a large broiling pan about 1 inch apart. Broil about 3 inchs from heat until well browned. Turn over and broil other side until well browned.
ingredients: ground lamb, egg, garlic cloves, sea salt, cracked pepper, olive oil
name: lamb and garlic meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: water, butter, egg, sugar, salt, rolled oats, wheat germ, whole wheat flour, bread flour, yeast
name: whole wheat oatmeal bread bread machine

steps: Mix together flour, turbinado sugar, baking powder, baking soda. In a seperate bowl combine flour, turbinado sugar, baking powder, baking soda. In a separate bowl combine honey and butter then pour into dry ingredients. Mix well then drop onto a greased baking sheet. Press out the mixture to the corners of the baking sheet. Bake at 400 for 10 minutes. Cut them quickly when they come out or use cookie cutter for fun shapes.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, turbinado sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, honey, water, vanilla, butter
name: 100 whole wheat graham crackers or pie crust

steps: Place chicken in crockpot. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours. Remove chicken from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way.
ingredients: chicken breast halves, cream cheese, cream soup, plain croissants, paprika, fresh parsley
name: miriam s easy crock pot chicken

steps: Heat 1 tbs oil in a saucepan and fry onion and garlic for approx 2 minute, making sure not to brown the paste. Add hot water. Wash the lentils and put into the water. Add salt and tsp of turmeric. Bring to boil then lower heat and cook for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring once or twice. Heat oil in another saucepan and fry onion till golden, about 2-3 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and stir. Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to a simmer. Cook uncovered until the lentils are tender, about 45 minutes. Serve warm with italian crusty bread or flatbreads.
ingredients: red lentil, onion, oil, mustard, curry powder, chili powder, salt, milk, water
name: red lentil curry

steps: Combine the beef hot dogs, hot dog buns, green cabbage, carrot, red onion, sun-dried tomato, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, tomato ketchup, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Add cabbage and carrots. Toss well to coat.
ingredients: beef hot dogs, hot dog buns, green cabbage, carrot, red onion, sun-dried tomato, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, tomato ketchup, salt and pepper
name: cole slaw on hot dogs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place pork chops in a baking dish. Put all other ingredients into a blender, cover & process until smooth. Pour over chops, cover & bake 1 hour or until tender. Turn once during baking to give both sides added browning.
ingredients: ginger ale, soy sauce, green pepper, garlic cloves, lemon juice, sugar, pork roast, all-purpose flour, water
name: glen s marinated pork roast

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In large bowl, combine all ingredients except breadcrumbs, butter and french fried onions. Mix well. Spread into ungreased 2-quart casserole dish. Toss bread crumbs with butter. Sprinkle over casserole. Bake at 350f for 30-45 minutes or until bread crumbs are golden and mixture is bubbly. Sprinkle french fried onions over casserole. Bake 5 minutes longer or until onions are golden. Will keep in a warm oven, covered.
ingredients: simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion, pepperoni, bow tie pasta, szechwan chili sauce, butter
name: monica s potatos with pepperoni pasta 5fix

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken on a greased backing sheet and brush on honey mustard. Cook for about 25 minute or unit chicken is done. Add mozzarella and return to oven for about 2 minutes for the cheese to melt. Add mozzarella
ingredients: honey mustard, buttermilk, dried breadcrumbs, boneless skinless chicken breast, barbecue sauce
name: chicken tenders w w 4 pts

steps: Preheat oven 350 f. Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a buttered 9-in. Deep-dish pie or cake pan. Bake at for 50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack until room temperature. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: milk, cinnamon, cornstarch, water, sugar, egg yolks, vanilla extract
name: custard natilla

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a large baking pan with cooking spray. Rub the fillets on both sides with lemon juice, then salt and pepper them to taste. Place the fillets in the baking disk and sprinkle evenly with tarragon. Cover evenly with sour cream. Bake for about 15 minutes until fish is done but not over cooked. Sprinkle with chives and parsley.
ingredients: flounder fillets, butter substitute, lemon juice, tomatoes, basil, garlic powder, capers
name: italian style flounder

steps: In a large saucepan, bring 1 inch of water and the sprouts to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 10 to 12 minutes or until fork tender. In a small microwave safe dish, melt the butter and blend in lemon juice, dill weed and lemon zest. Drain the sprouts, return to pan and dry over heat for 1 to 2 minutes. Pour the butter mixture over, tossing to coat, stir in chopped almonds. Enjoy.
ingredients: walnuts, nonfat plain yogurt, maple syrup, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh lemon juice, apple, brussels sprout, lemon zest
name: brussels sprouts apple salad

steps: Cook macaroni and hot dogs according to package directions. Cook macaroni according to package directions. Cook macaroni and hot dogs according to package directions. Cook macaroni and
ingredients: butter, onion, macaroni, salt, water, hot dog, green pepper, tomatoes, american cheese
name: macaroni and hot dogs

steps: Cook pasta according to instructions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine pasta with peppers, carrots and parsley. Add vinaigrette and mix well. Add feta cheese, mix lightly, lifting the pasta and cheese mixture until the cheese is distributed throughout. Chill for an hour before serving.
ingredients: linguine, yellow bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, fresh parsley, salt, feta cheese, sliced ripe olives
name: bell pepper feta pasta toss

steps: Preheat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: water, oatmeal, apple pie filling, sugar, heavy cream, butter, vanilla ice cream
name: apple pie ala mode oatmeal

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Mix wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix wet and wet ingredients together. Pour into muffin pans and bake for 20- 25 minute until done.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, blood orange juice, egg, vegetable oil, honey
name: blood orange muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat the marshmallows together until fluffy. Add chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, salt, all-purpose flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips, miniature marshmallows
name: double chocolate marshmallow brownies

steps: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or crudits.
ingredients: eggplant, onion, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, salt, black pepper, cilantro
name: roasted eggplant onion and garlic dip or spread

steps: Preheat oven to 375f grease 15x10-inch baking pan. In large bowl, combine cake mix, margarine and eggs. Stir by hand until thoroughly moistened. Stir in candy bits from cake mix. Spread in pan. Bake for 13 to 17 minutes or until light golden brown and toothpick comes out clean. Cool completely. Frost bars and sprinkle with candy bits from frosting. Cut into bars.
ingredients: unsalted butter, sugar, egg, orange, self-rising flour, milk, apricot preserves, chocolate, candy orange slices, candy lemon slices
name: the duke of glasgow cross cakes

steps: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet, add garlic, and cook over medium-low heat until just starting to brown, 2 to 5 minutes. Add olives and thyme. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring often, 3 to 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, cook over medium-low heat until juices thicken a bit and flavors are combined, 5 to 8 minutes. Season to taste with pepper. Serve this colorful an. Just before serving, stir in the parsley.
ingredients: garlic cloves, salt and pepper, hot pepper, fresh parsley, olive oil, tomatoes
name: fried tomatoes with garlic

steps: Boil chicken until tender. Drain a little of the water off. Add noodles and cook til tender. Add can of cream of chicken soup and stir until well blended. Serve.
ingredients: flour, dry mustard, boneless skinless chicken breasts, oil, condensed chicken with rice soup, water
name: chicken for the gods

steps: Heat beans. Toast bread, spread with butter. Arrange on a plate and pour over the hot beans. Top with cheese and place under the grill until cheese is melted. Serve immediately.
ingredients: vegetarian baked beans, bread, butter, cheese
name: cheesy baked bean toastie

steps: Cook the quinoa in the chicken broth as you would prepare rice, mixing in the basil just before serving. Heat oil in a wok and stir fry the chicken till browned, about 5 minutes. Add vegetables. Stir fry 2 minutes. Add garlic, salt, pepper. Continue to stir fry till peppers are slightly limp. Top the quinoa with the stir fry mixture and serve hot.
ingredients: chorizo sausage, green pepper, onion, garlic, thyme, quinoa, chicken broth
name: quinoa with chorizo

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. Beat in the instant pudding mix until blended. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Beat in the flour mixture. Finally, stir in the chocolate chips and nuts. Drop cookies by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Edges should be golden brown.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, instant vanilla pudding, eggs, chocolate chips, nuts
name: always soft chocolate chip cookies

steps: Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture equally between the three pie crusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze. Leave out or refrigerate to soften a bit before cutting. Store leftover in freezer.
ingredients: milk, vanilla pudding mix, peanut butter chips, graham cracker crust, whipped topping, milk chocolate chips, shortening
name: peanut butter pudding pie

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl mix together dry ingredients, first 5 ingredients. In smaller bowl mix together wet ingredients, last 4 ingredients. Add wet ingredients to larger bowl of dry ingredients. Mix well. Grease an 8-9 inch cast iron pan with pam. Pour batter into pan and bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: corn, creamed corn, jiffy cornbread mix, egg, sour cream, cheddar cheese, margarine
name: cindy s cornbread casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large mixing bowl, combine condensed milk, cold water, almond extract, vanilla instant pudding mix, heavy whipping cream, angel food cake, seedless raspberry jam, fresh raspberries, chocolate curls, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint, of fresh mint
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, cold water, almond extract, vanilla instant pudding mix, heavy whipping cream, angel food cake, seedless raspberry jam, fresh raspberries, chocolate curls, of fresh mint
name: raspberry cream trifle

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a 9 inch square pan with nonstick spray. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk wet ingredients together. Blend well. Add liquids to dry ingredients, whisking until smooth. Bake 35-40 minutes, or until done. Cool completely. Frost, if desired.
ingredients: cake crumbs, cocoa powder, desiccated coconut, apricot jam, coffee-flavored liqueur, water, dark chocolate, white chocolate
name: mocha balls

steps: Place the strawberries and semisweet chocolate in a medium bowl and stir until well combined. Cover and place in the fridge for 1-2 hours to macerate. Run a vegetable peeler to peel along the long edge of the block of chocolate to make chocolate curls. Cover and place
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, whipping cream, almond extract, strawberries
name: south beach chocolate dipped strawberries

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, heavy whipping cream, sour cream, green chilies, chicken bouillon granules, cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, pepper
name: versatile chili cheese sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Arange shrimp in a single layer in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Combine lemon juice with butter, garlic, worcestershire sauce, lemon pepper, and red pepper. Pour mixture over shrimp. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 minutes or until shrimp are done. Sprinkle parsley over shrimp. Serve immediately. Serving size is 3 ounces shrimp with 2 tablespoons sauce with 3 points per serving.
ingredients: shrimp, cream cheese, lemon, juice of, green onion, prepared horseradish, melba toast
name: lemon shrimp rounds

steps: Combine red wine, chili oil, worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, orange, juice of, orange rind, duck breasts, olive oil, chives in a small saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat, cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat,
ingredients: red wine, chili oil, worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, orange, juice of, orange rind, duck breasts, olive oil, chives
name: duck in red wine

steps: Place chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes.
ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, rosemary, white wine, skinless chicken thighs
name: easy italian chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large, heavy skillet over medium-high heat, brown ground beef, and drain fat. Mix in dry taco seasoning. Spoon browned meat into a 9x13 inch glass baking dish. Spoon a layer of refried beans over meat, then salsa. Top with shredded cheese. Bake about 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven.
ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, baking mix, refried beans, green chilies, water, salsa, cheddar cheese
name: cheap easy taco bake

steps: Cook rice first, as per directions on the package, usually two parts water, one part rice bring to a boil, reduce heat until water is gone. Preheat oven to 350f. Add butter, sour cream, milk, jack cheese, chilies, and salt to cooked rice. Mix well. Put in a casserole dish, sprinkle top with cheddar cheese, and cook until center is hot.
ingredients: cooked rice, boneless skinless chicken breasts, monterey jack cheese, evaporated milk, red onions, eggs, cilantro, cumin, salt, jalapenos
name: southwest chicken rice casserole

steps: In a small stainless steel saucepan, stir the sugar and water with a wooden spoon. Heat on medium until the sugar has dissolved, then boil the mixture for about 1 minute. Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Chop the chilli very finely, then thoroughly bruise in a small mortar and pestle. Place the mango flesh, sugar mixture and chilli in a blender or food processor until smooth. Blend the mango mixture until smooth. Freeze the sorbet in an icecream maker. Remove from the icecream maker when thick and store in an airtight container in the freezer for up to 3 days. The sorbet may need to stand at room temperature for a few minutes before serving, but this time will be minimised if the sorbet is made less than a day before it will be served.
ingredients: sugar, water, limes, coconut cream, mangoes, lime juice, mixed berry
name: lime mango sherbet topped with fresh berries

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: macaroni, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, black pepper, cracker crumbs, butter
name: macaroni cheese casserole

steps: Mix marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold.
ingredients: chicken wings, salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic powder, no-salt-added ketchup, vinegar, sugar, bottled water
name: another chicken wings recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a medium sized bowl, combine all ingredients mixing well. If mixture looks a little too dry, add a little more mayonnaise until. Desired moistness is reached. Now taste to see if seasonings need to be adjusted. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
ingredients: chicken tenderloins, egg, cornstarch, soy sauce, water, flour, chili powder, pepper, cooking spray
name: accidentally the best baked chicken nuggets ever

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix the melted butter and bread crumbs together and put one third of them in a thin layer in the bottom of a buttered baking dish. Cover with half of the oysters and seasonings. Add some of the cream. Layer half of the scallops next, seasonings, and another third of buttered crumbs. Add the remaining oysters and cream. Top with the final half of scallops and top with remaining buttered crumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: medium grain rice, water, oil, carrot, dried oysters, dried scallops, spring onions
name: dried oyster and scallop congee

steps: Heat oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook broccoli, onion, garlic and carrot in oil about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until broccoli is crisp- tender. Stir in chicken, salt, and tomatoes. Cook about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, just until chicken is hot. Toss with pasta. Sprinkle with cheese and parsley.
ingredients: broccoli, chicken livers, onion, olive oil, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, pasta
name: pasta with chicken livers broccoli

steps: In a double boiler, make cream sauce by melting the butter. Add the flour and stir. Add the cream and stir constantly until sauce is thick. Add salt, pepper and sherry to the double boiler. Take the double boiler off the heat and fold in the crab gently. Pour into buttered 1 quart casserole. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake, uncovered, for about 30 minutes, or until cheese melts, at 400 degrees f.
ingredients: shrimp, crushed tomatoes, onion, green pepper, garlic clove, butter, salt and pepper, cooked white rice, monterey jack cheese
name: cuban shrimp casserole caserola de camarones

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a bowl. Spread half of mixture evenly in bottom of pan. Add layer of coconut. Spread 2nd half of mixture over coconut layer. Place in fridge overnight and cut into 8 individual squares.
ingredients: graham crackers, sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, sugar free instant coconut pudding mix, reduced-calorie whipped topping, evaporated skim milk, almond extract, canned peaches, mandarin orange
name: coconut pudding squares

steps: Melt butter with garlic in small saucepan over medium heat. Pour over fettuccine and toss. Add shrimp, cheeses and parsley. Season with salt and pepper. Toss thoroughly. Serve immediately.
ingredients: butter, shiitake mushrooms, garlic cloves, parsley, fettuccine pasta, lemon juice, scallion, salt and pepper
name: fettuccini with shiitake and garlic butter

steps: Mix all ingredients except tofu in a large shallow dish. Place tofu in a large shallow dish.
ingredients: tofu, non-dairy milk substitute, light oil, maple syrup, vanilla extract, cinnamon, sea salt, grain bread
name: tofu french toast

steps: Dissolve jello in boiling water, then stir in lemonade concentrate until dissolved. Chill until firm. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan. Chill for 4 hours or until firm. Fold in three-fourths of the cool whip
ingredients: crushed pineapple, lemon juice, water, cream cheese, sugar, whipping cream, lime jell-o gelatin
name: g ma s lime jello

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease 13x9 inch pan and lightly flour. Mix eggs, oil, and sugar in large bowl with a fork. Add flavoring. Mix batter with a fork about 2 minutes. Pour batter into the pan. Bake for 30 to 40 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean or cake springs back when lightly touched in the center.
ingredients: graham cracker, french vanilla pudding mix, half-and-half, cool whip, chocolate frosting
name: mom s chocolate eclair cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy, 11-13 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: crisco shortening, butter, crunchy peanut butter, white sugar, light brown sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt
name: awesome peanut butter cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place squash, seeds still in, cut side up on a cookie sheet and bake for 45 minutes or until soft. Remove from oven and scoop out the seeds and fibers. Mix remaining ingredients and distribute evenly into the cavity of each squash. Return to oven for apprx 10 minutes.
ingredients: acorn squash, butter, apples, dried cranberries, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: squash with apples cranberries

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a cookie sheet with no stick cooking spray. Dip chicken in butter, coat with combined remaining ingredients. Place on cookie sheet. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or till tender.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, parmesan cheese, dry breadcrumbs, dried oregano, parsley flakes, paprika, salt, pepper
name: 100 parmesan chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray muffin tin with vegetable oil spray. Mix wheat bran and 1 t soy flour, then coat the muffin tin with the mixture. Mix soy flour, splenda, baking powder, eggs, cream, and banana extract in a large bowl with a wire whisk. Whisk in club soda. Fold in nuts. Fill muffin tins evenly, and bake for 20 to 25 minutes, using the toothpick test for doneness. The tops will be golden brown, but it is a bit hard to tell by color change since soy flour is dark.
ingredients: great northern beans, eggs, splenda granular, olive oil, vanilla extract, banana extract, cinnamon, baking powder, walnuts
name: banana nut muffins sbd phase1

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Butter and flour a 10-inch tube pan. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Stir in applesauce and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together and then sift over applesauce mixture. Sprinkle with raisins and blend gently. Pour batter into pan and bake approximately 65-75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes up clean. Cool in pan 10 minutes then remove from pan to finish cooling.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg yolks, fresh lemon rind, vanilla, egg whites, flour, green seedless grapes
name: grape cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, egg, oil, water, vanilla flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, milk, dark chocolate frosting
name: boston cream cup cakes

steps: In a small mixing bowl, combine powdered sugar and cinnamon. Set aside. Take breadsticks and cut them in half lengthwise. In a small microwave pyrex bowl, melt butter in microwave.
