Take each halved breadstick and dip into butter then roll in cinnamon mixture. Twist each strip 2 or 3 times and place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 to 18 minutes. Let cool on wire racks. Makes 16 toasted sticks.
ingredients: eggs, powdered sugar, milk, maple syrup, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, bread, butter
name: maple spice french toast sticks

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon fillets with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve with sauce. Serve over hot white rice, if desired.
ingredients: salmon, cream cheese, lemon juice, onions, prepared horseradish, salt, liquid smoke, pecans, parsley
name: fantastic salmon loaf salmon party log

steps: Sift flour and sugar into a bowl. Mix the egg yolks, butter and extract in separate bowl. Slowly add flour and sugar a bit a time, mixing the mixture with your finger. Fource dough through a press or roll balls and flatten or make snakes onto grease trays. Bake in a moderate oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Keep in air-tight container.
ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, vanilla ice cream, fruit filling
name: ice cream kolaczki

steps: In the bowl of an electric mixer combine the cream cheese, unsalted butter, vegetable shortening, seedless raspberry preserves, chambord raspberry liquor, powdered sugar, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring, food coloring
ingredients: cream cheese, unsalted butter, vegetable shortening, seedless raspberry preserves, chambord raspberry liquor, powdered sugar, food coloring
name: raspberry cream cheese fluffy frosting

steps: In 2-quart pyrex bowl melt chips on high or till melted. Stir. Add rest of ingredients and mix well. Spray or butter a 9x13 pan and pour fudge into pan. Refrigerate and cut into squares.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, bittersweet chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, pure vanilla extract, pecans
name: classic fudge

steps: Dice cabbage, carrot, red bell peppers, vegetable oil, rice vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, fresh gingerroot, chili oil, peanuts. Place in large bowl. In small bowl mix together salt, sugar, oil, vinegar, and water. Mix well. Pour over cabbage, peppers, and onions and mix thoroughly. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Before serving, mix well.
ingredients: cabbage, carrot, red bell peppers, vegetable oil, rice vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, fresh gingerroot, chili oil, peanuts
name: asian cabbage coleslaw

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter with sugar, brown sugar, eggs and vanilla. Gradually blend dry mixture into wet mixture. Stir in nuts and chocolate chips. Drop tablespoon of dough per cookie onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375 degrees for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: unsifted flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, walnuts, ghirardelli double chocolate chips
name: ghirardelli s ultimate chocolate chip cookies

steps: Place 1 tablespoon honey mustard cracker crumb chicken mixture onto a cracker. Place 1 tablespoon honey mustard cracker crumb chicken mixture onto a cracker.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, milk, mustard, cracker crumbs, honey
name: honey mustard cracker crumb chicken

steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain and allow to cool. Slice cooled potatoes and layer in a large bowl or dish. In a saucepan combine water, vinegar and sugar. Bring to a boil and cook for one minute. Remove from heat and pour over potatoes. Cover and chill for at least 12 hours. Drain excess marinade and add onions, eggs, salt, pepper, celery seed and mayonnaise. Mix well and serve chilled.
ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, lemon juice, mayonnaise, hot water, chives
name: my favorite potato salad

steps: Place all ingredients in a large pan, stir. Turn down heat and simmer uncovered until thickened. This may take up to an hour. Cool slightly, spoon into jars. Close jars, cool completely, then keep refrigerated.
ingredients: mint sprigs, green chilies, green onions, vinegar, sugar, salt
name: another mint chutney

steps: In a 4-cup measuring cup, heat 4 cups water in microwave to boiling. Place tea bags in water and let steep for 5-10 minutes. Pour tea into pitcher and mix thoroughly. Set in refrigerator to chill.
ingredients: sweet tea flavored vodka, lemonade, ice, lemon wedge
name: iced tea cocktail

steps: Place chicken breasts in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until juices run clear. Stir in the shrimp. Cover and cook on high for 20-30 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
ingredients: whole chickens, onions, parsnips, herbes de provence, salt and pepper, chicken broth, olive oil
name: crock pot roasted herbes de provence whole chicken

steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a big skillet. When hot, put in the za atar extended version. When they start to pop, put in the vegetables. Stir once. Add seasonings. Stir and fry for a minute. Add 3 tablespoons of water, lower heat, cover, and simmer 10-15 minutes. Stir every now and then. If vegetables stick, add a little water. Dish is done when the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: thyme, sumac, sea salt, coriander, anise, fennel, almonds, cumin, sesame seeds, sunflower seeds
name: za atar extended version

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 12 muffin cups or use muffin papers. Stir all ingredients except blueberries together in large bowl til moistened. Stir in blueberries. Divide evenly among cups. Bake 13-18 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: flour, sugar, powdered milk, salt, baking powder, shortening
name: the master mix homemade bisquick substitute

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dijon mustard, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, butter, lemon rind, lemon, juice of, salt, black pepper, fettuccine
name: lemon butter chicken

steps: Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: asparagus spears, olive oil, salt, black pepper, unsalted butter, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar
name: roasted asparagus with balsamic brown butter sauce

steps: Place salmon skin side down on grill for 15-20 minutes. You may also broil salmon or chicken for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: salmon fillets, cooking spray, fresh dill, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, lemon wedges
name: baked salmon with dill

steps: Heat all ingredients to boiling in 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Strain cider mixture to remove cloves and cinnamon if desired. Serve hot.
ingredients: sugar, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, ground allspice, ground mace, ground nutmeg, apple cider, hot spiced cider mix, cinnamon stick, orange rind twists
name: spiced apple cider or wine mix

steps: Put the cheez-it crackers on a baking sheet with a rim and drizzle the butter over them. Bake in a 350f degree oven for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: chicken breast tenders, cheez-it crackers, milk, egg, salt, pepper
name: easy cheez it chicken fingers

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease one or two baking sheets. Put butter, sugar and syrup in a pan and heat gently until the butter is melted measure all the other ingredients in a large bowl and add the melted mixture, stir until well blended. Spoon teaspoonfuls on the baking sheet, making sure you give them room to spread bake them for approx 15 minutes. Leave them to cool on the baking sheet for a few moments, lift them of with a metal spatula and let them cool completely on a cake rack.
ingredients: oleo, sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder, anise flavoring
name: italian pizzelle cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: self raising flour, caster sugar, milk, egg, tasty cheese, parmesan cheese
name: cheese hotcakes

steps: Heat olive oil and butter in saucepan until butter melets in a medium saucepan add the onion and garlic and saut for about 5 minutes or until onion is softened. Add the tomatoes, mix well, cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the stock, rice, salt and pepper, mix well and bring to a boil. Cover and simmer very gently for about 20 minutes. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: garlic cloves, tomatoes, rice, oil, water
name: adriana s mexican rice

steps: To make glaze, combine all glaze ingredients in a small bowl and mix well. Set aside. Preheat grill. Grill pork for about 16 minutes, turning occasionally. Pork should be slightly pink in the centre. Do not overcook. Brush pork generously with glaze during last 5 minutes of cooking time. Place pork on a cutting board, cover loosely with foil, and let stand for 5 minutes. Cut into thin slices and serve.
ingredients: orange juice, splenda granular, light soy sauce, hoisin sauce, sesame oil, ginger, pork tenderloin
name: asian barbecued pork tenderloin

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat almonds. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and almonds are toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool.
ingredients: slivered almonds, sugar, water, chocolate
name: purim chocolate covered nuts

steps: Preheat oven to broiler. In a small saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the tomatoes, basil, oregano, onion powder, salt and pepper. Mix well to combine. Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Top each slice of bread with equal amounts of the tomato mixture. Place the slices onto a large baking sheet. Broil for about 2 minutes or until bubbly and lightly browned. Sprinkle lightly with finely shredded mozzarealla cheese if desired.
ingredients: spaghetti, diced tomatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, basil, oregano, onion powder, salt and pepper, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese
name: bruschetta pasta

steps: Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, oil, thyme, pepper, salt, and garlic. Pour over chicken seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator for 30 minutes. Preheat broiler. Drain chicken, reserving marinade. Place chicken on the unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4 to 5 inches from the heat about 6 minutes or until light brown. Turn chicken and brush lightly with reserved marinade. Discard any remaining marinade. Broil for 6 to 8 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. If desired serve with salsa and lime wedges.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, vegetable oil, fresh lime juice, cumin, salt, lime slice, red bell pepper, cilantro
name: lime cumin chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place oil and garlic in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute until garlic is browned. Add onion and zucchini. Toss well with garlic oil, gently stirring. Stir in tomato sauce and seasonings. Turn into a 2-quart baking dish. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle on cheeses. Cover casserole and let sit for 2 minutes or until cheese melts- serve immediately.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, zucchini, monterey jack cheese, sweet onion, balsamic vinaigrette, fresh basil leaves, dijon-style mustard, sugar
name: tomato zucchini and cheese toss

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, bananas, eggs, vanilla extract, milk, oil, cherries. Beat with electric mixer at medium speed for 10 minutes. Add cherries, mix to incorporate. Pour into ungreased bundt pan. Bake for 50 minutes. Do not remove from pan until cooled. Sprinkle for powdered sugar for garnish.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, bananas, eggs, vanilla extract, milk, oil, cherries
name: banana cherry cake

steps: Place all ingredients in a sauce pot. Cook on high heat until mixture starts to boil. Stirring occasionally until cranberries pop. Lower heat to medium and using the back of a large wooden spoon, squeeze the grapes against the side of pot or use a potato masher to pop grapes, leaving some whole. The pectin from the grapes and sugar will thicken the sauce as well as the heat the reducing the mixture.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, port wine, ground cinnamon, crystallized ginger
name: cranberries and port wine condiment

steps: Heat oven to 350f.
ingredients: eggplant, salt water, butter, eggs, black pepper, onion, oregano, cracker crumb, cheddar cheese, tomatoes
name: tomato eggplant aubergine casserole

steps: Steep tea bag, cinnamon and cloves in water to make 1 cup of spiced black tea. In a pitcher, combine sugar and spiced tea. Stir until sugar isdissolved. Stir in orange juice, pineapple juice and lemonade. Chill in refrigerator for 4 hours. To serve, pour chilled mixture into a punch bowl and stir in ginger ale.
ingredients: whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, apple juice, blueberry tea bags, navel orange
name: spiced iced tea punch

steps: In a large serving bowl put the peas, white corn, corn, french style green beans, onion, bell pepper, vinegar, wesson oil, sugar, cumin, salt, lime juice, fresh cilantro. Mix well. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until peas are light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place peas mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice.
ingredients: english peas, white corn, corn, french style green beans, onion, bell pepper, vinegar, wesson oil, sugar
name: grand ole opry salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a greased pie plate, mix chicken, broccoli, 2 cups of cheddar, and onion flakes. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, bisquick, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour egg mixture over chicken mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top and bake a few more minutes until it melts. Let cool slightly before cutting.
ingredients: broccoli, onion, green bell pepper, red pepper, fat-free cheddar cheese, self-rising flour, skim milk, salt, pepper, eggs
name: reduced fat impossibly easy vegetable pie

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop onions and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes.
ingredients: frozen pie crusts, eggs, milk, green chili pepper, onion, tomatoes, curry powder, black pepper, salt
name: curried quiche

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: salmon fillets, vegetable oil, light soy sauce, honey, fresh ginger, green onions, lime, juice and zest of, black pepper, lime wedge
name: oriental style salmon fillets

steps: In a small bowl combine all of the marinade ingredients. Put the steak in a plasic bag. Pour in the marinade. Close the bag and place in a shallow baking pan. Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight. Preheat the broiler. Remove steak from bag and discard marinade. Place on broiling pan. Broil for 5-7 minutes on each side.
ingredients: reduced sodium soy sauce, fresh ginger, brown sugar, sesame oil, cayenne pepper, garlic cloves, boneless beef top sirloin steaks
name: korean sirloin

steps: Mix eggs, chicken broth, sour cream, grey poupon dijon mustard, white bread, cheddar cheese, sliced mushrooms. Mix well. Bake in preheated oven, 375f for 13 to 15 minutes, or until tops are lightly golden. Watch carefully the last few minutes.
ingredients: eggs, chicken broth, sour cream, grey poupon dijon mustard, white bread, cheddar cheese, sliced mushrooms
name: cheese mushroom strata

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: white chicken meat, cream of chicken soup, vegetables, refrigerated pie crusts, dried celery flakes, salt and pepper
name: better than homemade chicken pot pie

steps: In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, parmesan, vinegar, sour cream, parsley, mustard, herbs, and salt and pepper to taste. Whisk well. Slowly add the oil, whisking constantly, until the dressing is emulsified. Cover and chill the dressing until you are ready to use it. Let stand at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving. This dressing will keep for up to 5 days in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, cracked pepper, worcestershire sauce, beef bouillon cube, water, salt, milk
name: peppercorn dressing

steps: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in medium sized stock pot, and saut onion, garlic and celery until tender. Add broccoli and broth. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Pure soup or mash with potato masher. Return to heat. In small saucepan, over medium heat melt 3 tablespoons butter, stir in flour and add milk. Stir until thick and bubbly, add to soup. Add cheese. Stir until melted. Season with pepper and serve.
ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, milk, cream of mushroom soup, butter, salt, pepper, tarragon, all-purpose flour, water
name: broccoli cream soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Sift flour with sugar, soda salt and cinnamon into a large bowl or food processor by pulsing 3-4 times. Mix in shortening and knead thoroughly. Shape into balls using 1 tablespoon of dough. Place on ungreased baking sheets and make a depression in the top with the thumb. Press a blanched whole or sliced almond into the center of each cookie. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes. Makes six dozen.
ingredients: almonds, chickpea flour, brown sugar, egg yolk, butter, cardamom
name: almond chickpea flour cookies

steps: Cook on low for 4-5 hours, until tender. Shred meat with a fork after cooking and retain 1 cup of the juice from cooking. Add rest of the ingredients to shredded meat. Put in a crock pot and cook on low heat 3-4 hours. Serve over dinner rolls.
ingredients: boneless chuck roast, onion, catsup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, red wine vinegar, liquid smoke flavoring, salt, pepper, garlic powder
name: sharon s ono barbecue beef

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Put oil in 9x13 pan, swirl around. Scrub potatoes. Cut each lengthwise into 8 wedges. Combine flour and seasonings in a bowl or baggie. Add potato wedges and shake or toss to coat. Arrange skin-side-down in oiled pan. Bake 35-40 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, salt, pepper, paprika
name: oven fried potatoes

steps: Combine all ingredients except vanilla in a sauce pan. Bring to a boil and boil for only 1 minute. Remove from heat and cool. Add vanilla and beat with fork or beaters until spreading consistency. Cooking time does not include time to cool.
ingredients: sugar, flour, butter, crisco, salt, vanilla, milk
name: excellent frosting

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together butter, milk, salt, and pepper. Beat on medium speed for 1 minute. Beat on low speed for 1 minute. Beat on low
ingredients: potatoes, rock salt, olive oil, bacon, broccoli floret, light sour cream, cheese
name: kids jacket potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into squares.
ingredients: quick-cooking oats, sweetened condensed milk, butter, flaked coconut, sliced almonds, miniature butterscotch chips, butterscotch extract
name: butterscotch almond granola bars

steps: In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the hawaiian rice in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari.
ingredients: ground beef, carrots, celery, yellow onion, water, soy sauce, cooked rice
name: hawaiian fried rice

steps: Mix cake mix with mandarin oranges, eggs and oil. Bake in 13 x 9 inch greased and floured pan at 350 for 30-35 minutes. Let cool mix coolwhip, drained pineapple and instant pudding together. Frost cooled cake. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, eggs, mandarin oranges, cool whip, crushed pineapple, instant vanilla pudding
name: tennessee ernie ford s pea picking cake

steps: Melt butter in a large saucepan, add sugar and stir over low heat until smooth. Add vanilla and stir over low to medium heat. Remove from heat and add banana slices. Spoon into cups. Garnish with graham wafer pieces. Sprinkle with cinnamon.
ingredients: chocolate pudding, milk, strawberry, banana
name: strawberry banana white chocolate pudding

steps: Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian sweet sour dressing.
ingredients: vegetable oil, wine vinegar, ketchup, garlic, honey, coriander, basil, paprika
name: joel s sweet sour dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Place in a large mixing bowl and beat together milk, butter and egg substitute. Add the sugar, then gradually beat in the flour. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Cut into 16 square servings. Bake in preheated oven for 30
ingredients: eggs, butter, water, dry milk, all-purpose flour, maple syrup, salt
name: popover oven pancake

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Place the pizza shell or focaccia onto a pizza pan or cookie sheet. Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle minced garlic over shell to edges. Cover the pie with a layer of all 3 cheeses combined and work all the way to the edge of the shells. Cook 6 to 8 minutes, until cheeses have melted and begin to bubble. Remove from oven and garnish with parsley. Cut pie with pizza wheel or knife into bite-size squares and serve.
ingredients: olive oil, flour tortillas, tomatoes, black pepper, black greek olives, goat cheese, fresh basil
name: quicky mediterranean pizzas

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add water and garlic to a boil. Add green beans, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 10 to 15 minutes or until beans are crisp tender. If any water remains at end of cooking, drain and return beans to pan. Turn up heat to medium add remaining ingredients and heat to boiling, stirring occasionally. Serve immediately.
ingredients: butter, honey, green beans, almonds
name: honey almond green beans

steps: Combine ice-cream, milk and vanilla in a blender. Process until thick and smooth, about 1 minute. Divide fudge syrup among parfait glasses, covering the bottom and drizzling syrup in a spiral pattern around inside of each glass. Pour equal amounts of ice-cream mixture into each glass. Swirl some chocolate fudge syrup over each serving. Place 1 cherry on top of each milkshake.
ingredients: frozen dark sweet cherries, skim milk, vanilla, splenda sugar substitute, sugar-free vanilla ice cream, club soda, sugar-free chocolate syrup, cool whip lite
name: chocolate covered cherry shake sugar free

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cubed chicken in a ungreased rectangular baking dish, 13 x 9 x 2 inches. Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes, cook thoroughly. Meanwhile, start cooking your rice according to your package directions. Then in a large bowl, add the remaining ingredients and still well. When the chicken is done remove it from oven. Spoon in the ingredients from the bowl. Cover and cook for 30 minutes. Serve hot over rice and be sure to get lots of the juice.
ingredients: chicken thighs, soy sauce, honey, garlic cloves, cilantro, fresh ginger, lime, black pepper
name: audry s chicken

steps: Drain spinach well, pressing between layers of paper towels and set aside. Cut 2-3 cheese slices into small triangles, and reserve for garnish. Cover bottom and sides of a lightly greased 9 or10-inch pieplate with remaining muenster slices, overlapping cheese as needed. Combine spinach, onion and next 5 ingredients. Spoon into cheese-lined pieplate. Bake 350 for 45 minutes or until set. Cool 10 minutes before serving. Garnish with reserved cheese triangles and pimiento strips, if desired.
ingredients: muenster cheese, frozen chopped spinach, eggs, parmesan cheese, cream cheese, salt, pepper, garlic powder
name: low carb muenster spinach pie

steps: Place beef in crock pot. Cover with lid and cook for about 10 hours or until meat shreds easily. Remove meat and shred with two forks. Stir the meat with barbecue sauce in a hot skillet on the stove and serve on hamburger buns.
ingredients: dried great northern beans, salt, onion, ground pepper, short rib of beef, water, barbecue sauce
name: crock pot barbecued beef and bean soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a greased pie plate, mix chicken, broccoli, 2 cups of cheddar, and onion flakes. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, bisquick, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour egg mixture over chicken mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top and bake a few more minutes until it melts. Let cool slightly before cutting.
ingredients: peanut oil, boneless chicken breasts, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, peanut sauce, rice vinegar, thin pizza crust, mozzarella cheese
name: super easy thai chicken pizza

steps: Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop by tablespoonsful on ungreased cookies sheets, 2 inches apart, and bake in preheated 375 oven about 12 minutes, til tops are puffed and set. Cool on rack.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, unsweetened instant tea, egg yolk, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, powdered sugar, hot water
name: summertime tea cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Roast 10 minutes, stir, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and roast an additional 10 to 15 minutes until vegetables are slightly charred and tender.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, seasoned bread crumbs, salt and pepper, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, butter
name: baked asparagus

steps: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl. Toss well. Pour vinegar mixture over cabbage mixture, tossing gently to combine. Cover. Chill 1 hour.
ingredients: carrot, vegetable oil, black mustard seeds, dried red chili, salt, sugar, lemon juice, raisins
name: indian style chilled carrot salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except the brown sugar and 4 tbsp cocoa and hot water. Spread into a 9x9 pan or equivalent. Mix brown sugar and cocoa and spread over batter. Carefully pour the hot water over all. Bake at 350f for approximately 40 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, low-fat mayonnaise, vinegar, prune juice, water, vanilla
name: chocolate cake with chocolate sauce

steps: Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more. Make-ahead. Bake in preheated 350f oven 45 minutes or until bubbly.
ingredients: fingerling potatoes, plain low-fat yogurt, whole grain mustard, olive oil, red bell pepper, celery ribs, red onion
name: updated potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, onion, stuffed olives, eggs, light cream, seasoning salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, american cheese, butter
name: macaroni and cheese bundt delight

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: ground beef, brown sugar, low sodium soy sauce, eggs, breadcrumbs, garlic powder, olive oil
name: sweet toddler meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake the sweet potatoes for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, brown sugar, cajun seasoning, salt, cayenne pepper
name: cajun roasted sweet potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: cream cheese, honey, eggs, vanilla
name: honey cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: olive oil, new potatoes, garlic, fresh thyme, fresh rosemary, ground nutmeg, balsamic vinegar, salt, pepper
name: balsamic roasted new potatoes

steps: Place potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 20 minutes or until tender. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Drain potatoes and cut into cubes. Add the mayonnaise mixture and toss gently to coat. Serve immediately.
ingredients: red potatoes, mayonnaise, ranch dressing, dijon mustard, fresh basil, pancetta, cheese, celery, red pepper, salt and pepper
name: creamy dijon potato salad with basil

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Combine russian blintze, egg, butter, milk, sugar, salt, oil, chocolate chips, nuts, sweetened condensed milk. Cover with condensed milk. Bake 30 minute. Cool. Cut into 2 squares. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: eggs, flour, milk, sugar, salt, oil
name: grandma reilkoff s authentic russian blintze

steps: Cook patties with balsamic cream sauce and balsamic cream sauce in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add balsamic cream sauce and balsamic cream sauce mixture to skillet and cook over medium high heat. Add balsamic cream sauce and balsamic cream sauce mixture to skillet and cook over medium high
ingredients: ground round, parmesan cheese, egg yolks, salt & fresh ground pepper, butter, onion, olive oil, heavy cream, balsamic vinegar
name: italian beef patties with balsamic cream sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet. Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil. In a small bowl combine. Onion flakes, oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well. Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes. Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet. Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden. Serve while they ar piping hot.
ingredients: potatoes, salt, vegetable oil, shiitake mushrooms, green onion, gingerroot, white wine, oyster sauce, soy sauce, sugar
name: chinese stir fried potatoes

steps: Slice and dice the avocado, and place in a large bowl. Mix together the cream cheese, avocado, sour cream, lemon juice, coriander, ground cumin, salt and pepper, pumpernickel rounds, smoked salmon, coriander leaves, and salt and pepper in a food processor. Process, scraping down bowl occasionally, until mixture is creamy and smooth. Serve a dollop of sauce next to each round.
ingredients: cream cheese, avocado, sour cream, lemon juice, coriander, ground cumin, salt and pepper, pumpernickel rounds, smoked salmon, coriander leaves
name: avocado rounds

steps: Heat a saucepan over med high heat. Spray with olive oil. Cook rice for 3-4 min each side. Transfer to plate. Add onion to pan. Cook stirring for 5 minute add curry paste and cook stiiring for 1 minute add rice and stir to coat. Add chicken and stock and bring to boil. Reduce heat to low, and cook covered for 12 min or until liq has absorbed. Set aside, covered for 10 minute. Top pilaf with almonds, tomato and coriander. Serve with youghurt.
ingredients: olive oil, cumin seed, cinnamon sticks, cardamom pods, basmati rice, vegetable stock, corn kernel
name: indian corn pilaf

steps: Place first 4 ingredients in the top of a double boiler and stir until melted. Cover and cook 45 minutes. Add cream, stir until blended, about 3 minutes. Sauce will become very smooth. Cook another 10 minutes. Add vanilla, stir. Let cool before refrigeration.
ingredients: mexican chocolate, water, heavy cream, kahlua, vanilla
name: mexican chocolate sauce

steps: Preheat oven 160 degrees c. Grease and line a 20cm x 30cm baking tin. Combine oats, flour, sugar, choc chips and coconut in a large bowl. Melt the butter and golden syrup over medium low heat in a small saucepan. Combine bicarb and hot water and add to golden syrup mix. Pour golden syrup mix into bowl and mix together well, choc chips will probably melt from heat of golden syrup mix. Press into tin and bake 20-30 min or until cooked through, do not overcook or it will be tough instead of chewy. Cool in tin for 10 min the turn onto wire rack to cool before cutting into squares. Can omit the choc chips. Can melt 300g dark chocolate and pour on top of cooled slice.
ingredients: rolled oats, plain flour, caster sugar, shredded coconut, butter, golden syrup, boiling water, bicarbonate of soda, dark cooking chocolate
name: chocolate anzac biscuits

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: baby potatoes, ground cumin, ground paprika, salt, olive oil
name: yummy baked taters or wedges

steps: Combine garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes. Add to the salad and combine well. 5in a small bowl combine the garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes. 6in a small bowl combine the garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes. 7in a small bowl combine the garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes. 8in a small bowl combine the garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes. 9in a small bowl combine the garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes. 10in a small bowl combine the garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes. 11in a small bowl combine the garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes. 12in a small bowl combine the garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes. 13in
ingredients: garlic clove, thai chiles, papayas, fish sauce, shrimp paste, sugar, fresh lime juice, cherry tomatoes
name: lao style papaya salad

steps: In a small bowl, combine wonton skins and pork loin. Add rice wine, cornstarch, egg white, salt, sugar, white pepper, wonton skins. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 1-2 minutes. Serve with rice.
ingredients: bamboo shoot, pork loin, sesame oil, rice wine, cornstarch, egg white, salt, sugar, white pepper, wonton skins
name: steamed pork wontons

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter a casserole dish or baking pan enough to hold the ingredients. Mix all ingredients together adjust salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a buttered casserole dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: onion, butter, colby-monterey jack cheese, salt, pepper, cream of chicken and mushroom soup, garlic powder, sour cream, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes
name: hash browns bake

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Combine soup, sour cream and pepper in large bowl. Blend well. Add potatoes, onions, pimientos, and cheeses. Spoon into casserole dish in even layer and sprinkle with a little bit of parm cheese on top. Bake uncovered for 1 1 hours or until bubbling and golden brown. Serve immediately or cool 15-20 minutes.
ingredients: lime zest, lime juice, minced garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, oil, frozen hash brown potatoes, salt, fresh parsley, seasoned pepper
name: ww chicken pepper steak with hash browns

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Peel beets and slice into very thin slices. Mix the remaining ingredients together in a small bowl. In a large ziploc bag place the beets and contents of bowl. Shake well to make sure beets are completely coated with liquid. Place beets on a baking sheet coated with nonstick cooking spray and bake for 45 minutes to an hour turning beets halfway through. Keep an eye on them to make sure they dont burn.
ingredients: eggs, juice, sugar, white vinegar
name: the mama s pa dutch red beets eggs

steps: Spray pan with cooking spray. Add chopped veggies and cook on medium heat for about 5 minutes, or until tender. Crush beans and mix in egg and bread crumbs. Spoon into 4 equal patties on a cookie sheet coated with non stick spray. Bake at 375 - 400 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Flip burgers and cook for another 10 - 15 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, velveeta cheese, onion, baked beans, salt, hamburger bun
name: beans on a bun

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Empty the canned peaches into a 1 quart baking dish that has been sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix in the cinnamon and brown sugar. Sprinkle with the crumb cake mix and cut butter into 4 equal portions and place on top. Cover and bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes. Remove cover and continue to cook for an additional 10 minutes or until top is brown. Can be served immediately or is also good room temperature.
ingredients: poundcake, canned peaches, whole milk, eggs, white sugar, orange juice, cinnamon
name: peach pudding cake

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions.
ingredients: sesame oil, fresh ginger, chili flakes, soy sauce, honey, dry sherry, boneless pork filets
name: caramelised soy pork tenderloin

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter 9 inch fluted or plain tube pan. In large bowl of electric mixer, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs, eggnog, and vanilla. Stir together flour, bakng powder, and salt. Gradually beat into butter mixture. Prepare topping by combining nuts, sugar and cinnamon. Scatter half the topping evenly over bottom of pan. Spoon in half batter. Add remaining topping and spoon on remaining batter. Bake 50 to 60 minute, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: cream cheese, apricot preserves, poundcake mix, sour cream, half-and-half cream, eggs, almond extract, dried apricot, sliced almonds, vanilla icing
name: apricot almond coffee cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, sugar, salt, and cocoa in a bowl until they are blended well. Cut the shortening into the dry ingredients as you would into a pie crust dough. Add the eggs and vanilla and mix until dough is moist. The batter will be stiff. Pour into a greased pan and bake at 350 until a toothpick comes out clean. I use an 8 x 8 pan because i like thick brownies. I bake them between 25- 30 minutes. A 9 x 13 pan would bake between 20- 25 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, flour, vanilla, cocoa powder, margarine
name: quick and easy brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Meanwhile, combine cornstarch and water in a small bowl. In saucepan, melt chocolate and condensed milk over low heat, stirring occasionally. Add the cornstarch mixture, then the eggs, butter, and salt. Stir until well-combined and smooth. Remove from the heat and add pecans. Mix well and pour into crust. Bake for approximately 30-35 minutes, until a knife inserted into the center of the pie comes out clean. Cool on a rack, then cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 2 hours.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, butter, sugar, eggs, pecans, unbaked pie shells
name: old fashion fudge pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss the nuts with the pecan halves, walnut halves, whole almond, egg white, splenda granular, ground cinnamon. Spread the nuts on a rimmed baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes., stirring occasionally, until browned. Season the nuts with salt and pepper and toss frequently until cooled.
ingredients: pecan halves, walnut halves, whole almond, egg white, splenda granular, ground cinnamon
name: sweet and crunchy nuts splenda

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately.
ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, peanut butter, chocolate chips
name: easy peanut butter easter eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 350f drain broccoli well, do not cook. Combine soup, cheese, eggs, milk, mayonnaise and horseradish. Mix in broccoli. Spoon into a 2-quart well-buttered casserole dish. Combine melted butter and cracker crumbs, sprinkle over casserole. Bake for 45 minutes.
ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, mayonnaise, celery soup, onions, frozen chopped broccoli, ritz cracker, butter
name: first place broccoli casserole with ritz crackers

steps: In a large saucepan, mix the eggs, sugar, and salt, if used. Stir in 2 cups milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and mixture coats a metal spoon. Remove from heat and add 2 cups milk and extract. Chill several hours or overnight. Whirl in blender before serving. Add rum or brandy as desired, top with whipped cream and ground nutmeg.
ingredients: rum, cognac, sweet cream, whole milk, eggs, powdered sugar, nutmeg
name: natural homemade eggnog

steps: In a large serving bowl put the lettuce, fresh carrot, sun-dried tomatoes, walnut halves, mozzarella cheese, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, sesame seeds, salt and pepper. Lightly toss. Right before serving mix together the lettuce, fresh carrot, sun-dried tomatoes, walnut halves, mozzarella cheese, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, sesame seeds, salt and pepper. Add to salad and mix well. Serve at once. You may top the salad with roasted chicken pieces that you have diced, but that is optional.
ingredients: romaine lettuce, fresh carrot, sun-dried tomatoes, walnut halves, mozzarella cheese, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, sesame seeds, salt and pepper
name: argentina special salad

steps: In a small bowl combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days.
ingredients: cooked shrimp, frozen mixed vegetables, sesame ginger salad dressing, soy sauce, quick-cooking long grain and wild rice mix, cilantro
name: asian shrimp bowl with rice

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussels sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: frozen brussels sprouts, butter, cider vinegar, sugar, tarragon, marjoram, ground pepper, fresh mushrooms, chopped pimiento
name: brussels sprouts made

steps: Cream together shortening, brown sugar, and white sugar. Beat in 2 eggs and vanilla. Combine shortening, brown sugar, and white sugar. Combine shortening,
ingredients: peanut butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla, nestle semi-sweet chocolate chips, crisco shortening
name: peanut butter eggs

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together dressing ingredients. Combine salad ingredients in a large bowl. Pour dressing over salad mixture and toss well to coat. Allow salad to chill for at least 20 minutes before serving. Salad may not require all of the dressing.
ingredients: red cabbage, dried cranberries, rice vinegar, sugar, white wine vinegar, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, granny smith apples, pecans
name: red cabbage cranberry and apple slaw

steps: Put 6 cups of water into a large pan. Boil carrots until tender crisp. About 10 minutes. Drain. In a small pan, stir cornstarch into apple juice. Over moderate heat, cook, stirring, until sauce consistency. Stir in mint and cinnamon. Pour sauce over carrots and toss to coat.
ingredients: water, carrots, cinnamon sticks, ground cumin, ground ginger, honey, lemon juice
name: candied carrots

steps: Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool.
ingredients: unbaked pie shell, sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, milk, coconut extract, coconut flakes, cool whip topping
name: sugar free coconut cream pie

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. Place minced chicken, breadcrumbs, green onions, coriander, garlic, ginger and egg in a food processor and pulse to combine. Divide chicken mixture into 12 equal pieces and with wet hands shape into neat ovals. Place bites on a lightly oiled baking sheet and refrigerate for 10 minutes. Bake chicken bites for 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: wild rice, butter, onion, dried cranberries, low sodium chicken broth, salt, fresh parsley, pepper
name: fire ants and fleas

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius lightly grease a round 20cm cake tin. Melt the butter in the microwave or over low heat. Set aside. Sift the cocoa into a large mixing bowl. Add the rest of the ingredients, including the butter. Mix thoroughly. Pour into cake pan. Bake for 50 minute.
ingredients: sugar, eggs, butter, baking soda, sour cream, bananas, all-purpose flour, powdered sugar
name: taqueria victoria s banana cake

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan. Bring to a simmer. Simmer for 20 minutes to allow the spices to permeate the liquid. Ladle into mugs. Leftovers will keep in the refrigerator 2 to 3 days. Rewarm in the microwave.
ingredients: boiling water, tea bags, apple cider, honey, orange slice
name: cider tea

steps: Heat oven to 375f in a bowl, whisk together sugar, milk, eggs, 3 tablespoons butter and cinnamon. Gently toss bread in mixture until coated well. Spread remaining butter on a rimmed nonstick baking sheet. Add bread cubes in a single layer and bake 12 to 15 minutes. Use a spatula to remove baked cubes from pan and serve immediately with syrup, dipping sauce and toppings. To make apricot dipping sauce, combine jam and orange juice and microwave 1 minute. Stir until smooth.
ingredients: cream cheese, strawberry preserves, powdered sugar, eggs, milk, vanilla, egg bread, butter, strawberry
name: charmie s strawberry stuffed french toast

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place salmon on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until salmon is golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: salmon fillets, honey, dijon mustard, lime, zest of, fresh thyme
name: oven roasted salmon with honey mustard sauce

steps: In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium-high heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add couscous, curry powder, cumin, cayenne pepper, couscous, chicken broth, salt, pepper and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot.
ingredients: olive oil, israeli couscous, chicken broth, fresh parsley, tarragon, rosemary, lemon juice, salt, pepper
name: herbed israeli couscous

steps: Wtih processor running, drop garlic through feed tube and mince. Scrape down sides of work bowl. Add chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice. Process until mixture is smooth. Add roasted peppers. Process until peppers are finely chopped. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer hummus to small bowl.
ingredients: chickpeas, tahini, lemons, juice of, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt & fresh ground pepper, ground red chili pepper, parsley
name: hummus bi tahina turkish hummus

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Coat a 10- by 15-inch rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place the chicken breasts on the baking sheet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Spread the mixture evenly over the chicken breasts. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until the topping is golden and no pink remains in the chicken.
ingredients: whole chicken breast, prepared mustard, honey, minced garlic clove, salt and pepper, italian dressing, carrots, brown sugar, salt, pepper
name: honey mustard chicken with glazed baby carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a shallow dish, toss the asparagus, olive oil and salt and pepper together. Lay the asparagus in one level layer. Place in oven and roast, uncovered for approximately 10 minutes, or until the asparagus is just tender. Transfer to a serving plate. Whisk the lemon juice, lemon zest, dill, olive oil and honey together in a small bowl. Top the asparagus with some of the dressing and keep the rest on the side.
ingredients: pork loin, butter, salt and pepper, white asparagus, sugar, onion, pickle, hard-boiled eggs, creme fraiche, chervil
name: pork loin with asparagus schweinelendchen mit spargel

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add egg noodles, ground deer meat, onion powder, pepper, salt, italian style breadcrumbs, egg, sour cream, parsley. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and parsley. Serve at once.
ingredients: egg noodles, ground deer meat, onion powder, pepper, salt, italian style breadcrumbs, egg, sour cream
name: deer stroganoff

steps: In a 3-quart saucepan, combine ground beef, onion, chili powder, garlic, tomato sauce, taco sauce, red kidney beans, shredded cheddar cheese, tortilla chips. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer uncovered, about 20 minutes or until rice is tender, stirring occasionally. Top with cheese, sour cream and cilantro if desired.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, chili powder, garlic, tomato sauce, taco sauce, red kidney beans, shredded cheddar cheese, tortilla chips
name: domestic goddess chili

steps: In large mixing bowl. Combine butter and both sugars and beat until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla, beating until fluffy. Combine flour, salt and soda. Add to creamed mixture and stir until blended. Stir in granola and chocolate chips. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto a non-stick baking sheet. Bake at 350f for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, eggs, milk, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, granola cereal
name: granola breakfast cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Stir together dressing, butter, garlic salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add chicken and toss well to coat with mixture. Roll each piece in crushed chips and place on a shallow baking sheet. Sprinkle with any remaining chips. Bake for 30 minutes or until crispy and lightly browned.
ingredients: cream of chicken soup, milk, ranch dressing mix, boneless skinless chicken breast half, tortilla chips, margarine
name: flash roasted crispy ranch chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375f in a large bowl, gently toss together berries, sugar and flour then transfer to an ungreased baking dish. Set aside. In a medium bowl, toss together berries, sugar and flour then transfer to an ungreased baking dish. In a medium bowl, toss together berries,
ingredients: frozen strawberries, frozen raspberries, frozen blueberries, sugar, all-purpose flour, granola cereal, reduced-fat vanilla yogurt
name: triple berry granola crisp

steps: Preheat the oven at 200c. Sift the flour, baking powder and salt together into a baking bowl. Make a hollow in the dry ingredients. Beat the eggs and milk together and add with melted butter into the middle of the dry ingredients mixing just enough to moisten the mixture. Spoon a largish tablespoon of the mixture into the bottom of the tarts. Bake at 200c for 15 minutes or until cooked. Ease the tarts out of the form while warm and put onto a wire rack to cool. Once cool, dust the tops with powdered sugar.
ingredients: butter, plain flour, caster sugar, cold water, jam
name: jam tarts

steps: In a large skillet, cook the cheese crackers until crisp. Drain on paper towels then crumble. Season the cheese crackers with salt and pepper the, brown in the cheese crackers for about 5 minutes on each side. Place the cheese crackers in a 4-6-quart slow cooker. Sprinkle with mushrooms. In the same skillet heat the soup and parmesan cheese with onions and garlic for 5 minutes until bubbly, then pour over the chicken and mushrooms. Cover and cook on low setting for about 4 hours. After about 4 hours sprinkle with the cheese cubes and bacon. Cover and cook on high for about 20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted.
ingredients: cheese crackers, shredded cheddar cheese, onion, green peppers, chili sauce, milk, eggs, salt, pepper, lean ground beef
name: crock pot cheesy meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven 375f oil a 13x9x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, combine olive oil and garlic. In another bowl, combine crackers and parmesan cheese. Dip oysters into oil mixture then coat with sherry and any remaining cracker mixture. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes to brown.
ingredients: oysters, bacon, salt and pepper, parsley
name: baked oysters and bacon

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Cook crawfish, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with crawfish tail, yellow rice mix, ro-tel tomatoes, condensed golden mushroom soup, mexican blend cheese. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: seasoning, crawfish tail, yellow rice mix, ro-tel tomatoes, condensed golden mushroom soup, mexican blend cheese
name: crawfish casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f in large skillet, brown ground sirloin, breaking apart as you cook. Drain grease. In a large bowl combine all remaining ingredients until well blended. Add sirloin to mixture and crumble bacon in last. Mix lightly. Transfer mixture to 9x13 inch baking dish and bake for 2 hours at 350f.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, baked beans, red kidney beans, sweetcorn, bread, cheese
name: quick beany bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine baguette, olive oil, brie cheese, honey, walnuts. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f for 1 hour and 15 minutes, to 1 hour and 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: baguette, olive oil, brie cheese, honey, walnuts
name: easy tapas

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: rolled oats, flour, cinnamon, light brown sugar, regular margarine, vanilla, sliced apples, lemon juice, ground cloves, brown sugar
name: apple pie with oatmeal cookie crust

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray. Slice potatoes into 12 wedges each. Place all the potatoes into a large bowl. Sprinkle salt, pepper, and cumin over potatoes, drizzle oil over seasonings and toss the potatoes until all are coated. Spread potatoes onto baking sheet in a single layer. Bake for 10, remove from oven and turn. Place back into oven and cook for 10 more minutes, then turn again. Return to oven and continue cooking until golden brown -- probably 5 - 10 more minutes. Each serving size is 12 wedges.
ingredients: olive oil, baby carrots, potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, ground cumin, salt and black pepper
name: creamy vegetable cumin soup

steps: Add ground beef, refried beans and taco seasoning. Mix together and cook on low till beef is cooked throughly heated, about 2 hours. This can be left on warm until serving time.
ingredients: chili powder, cumin, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, lean ground beef, tomato sauce, canned black beans
name: ww chili beef tacos 2 pp value

steps: Heat the oil in a heavy based pan until it reaches smoking point, then put in the chicken and crushed cumin. Keep the heat high and swirl the chicken around, but not too often. This cools the pan down a little and allows moisture from the chicken to escape. Toss for 2-3 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through, then taste and add more salt if necessary. Sprinkle with coriander and serve.
ingredients: onions, tomato paste, stewed tomatoes, garlic cloves, cumin, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, chicken
name: chicken in cumin sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk eggs and milk, and pour over top. Cover dish with foil and freeze. To prepare for serving, thaw dish, and bake uncovered in a preheated 375 oven for 45 minutes.
ingredients: cooking spray, bread, butter, eggs, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, skim milk
name: eggs in bed

steps: Place cucumbers, water, mint sprigs, lemon, ice cube in a large bowl. Add cucumbers, water, mint sprigs, lemon, ice cube and mix well. Pour over cucumbers, water, mint sprigs, lemon, ice cube and mix well. Pour over cuc
ingredients: cucumber, water, mint sprigs, lemon, ice cube
name: cucumber water recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, cinnamon and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and chocolate chips. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely.
ingredients: nut quick bread mix, unsweetened cocoa, instant coffee granules, toffee pieces, semi-sweet chocolate chips, buttermilk, oil, eggs
name: cappuccino crunch muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Place broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, frozen chopped spinach, cheddar cheese, onion, mayonnaise, eggs, butter, ritz cracker
name: lisa s broccoli spinach and cheese casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Place salmon fillet in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a non stick baking dish, dice onion and spread out in bottom of dish. Spray with nonstick cooking oil. Lay fillets on top of onions. In separate sauce pan heat butter, jelly and worchestershire sauce over medium heat until jelly becomes liquid. Spoon over salmon. Bake at 350-degrees f. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. Spray with non
ingredients: salmon fillets, red onion, fresh fettuccine, lemon juice, honey, whole grain mustard, olive oil, fresh chives
name: salmon fettuccine

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. In medium bowl combine egg with 1 tbsp water. In pie plate place bread crumbs and cheese. Dip pierogies in egg then breadcrumbs. Arrange on baking sheet. Roast until crisp and golden about 15 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, sliced mushrooms, onion, salt and pepper, dry sherry, flour, low-fat milk, chicken broth, frozen low-fat potato pierogies, light sour cream
name: pierogies with creamy mushroom and sherry sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style peanut butter. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean.
ingredients: jiffy corn muffin mix, creamed corn, shredded cheddar cheese, eggs, milk
name: the best jiffy cornbread

steps: Preheat oven to 400f melt butter or oil in a 9-inch pie dish in the oven while it preheats. In a medium bowl, mix the dry ingredients. Use 2 of the tiny scoops of kal brand stevia extract powder or another sweetener in the equivalent of 2 teaspoons of sugar. Only use salt if you are using unsalted butter or coconut oil. Salted butter will give enough saltiness, so do not add additional salt. In a small-medium bowl, wisk the eggs and mix in the milk substitute, and other flavorings. Remove the pie plate from the oven and. Quickly pour the liquid into the dry mix and wisk thoroughly but quickly. Immediately pour into the hot greased pie dish and put into the hot oven. Bake about 12 minutes or until set in the middle. You might test with a dry knife similar to checking a pumpkin pie, when the knife removed comes out a little wet but no batter sticking to it.
ingredients: sour cream, heavy cream, eggs, butter, chives, salt and pepper
name: austrian eggs

steps: Melt butter in medium saucepan over med-high heat. Add pine nuts, chicken broth, garlic powder, parsley flakes and pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce to low, cover and simmer 20 minutes or until rice in tender. Stir in parmesan cheese and sliced almonds.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, ground cumin, oregano, long-grain rice, pine nuts, chicken stock
name: pine nut rice pilaf pion rice pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine chicken breasts, feta cheese, frozen spinach, lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper. Brush chicken with melted margarine. Place in 2-quart baking dish. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes. Remove skin before serving.
ingredients: chicken breast halves, feta cheese, frozen spinach, lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper
name: chicken breasts stuffed with feta and spinach

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute until beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: green beans, butter, mustard, salt and pepper
name: mustard green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 180c or 350f. Melt the butter in a large pan. Then add sugars and cook, stirring, until combined. Remove from heat. Add all of the remaining ingredients and stir gently until combined. Place level tablespoons pf mixture, about 3cm apart, on lightly greased oven trays. Bake in a moderate oven about 15 minutes or until golden brown. Stand for 5 minutes before removing from trays to cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, light corn syrup, baking soda, crispix cereal
name: caramel crispix mix

steps: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, crushed pineapple, navel orange, walnuts, cherry gelatin
name: cranberry salad best ever for thanksgiving dinner

steps: Preheat over to 450f. On a rimmed baking sheet, toss pecans and butter with brussels sprouts and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Roast on lower rack until golden brown and tender when pierced with a knife, 20 minutes. Serve hot, drizzled with balsamic vinegar, if desired.
ingredients: pecans, brussels sprouts, butter, olive oil, yellow mustard seeds, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper
name: shredded brussels sprouts pecans salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients, except salmon, together. Pour a small amount of the mix into the bottom of a baking pan - just enough to lightly cover the bottom. Add the salmon, and pour the remaining mix over top. Bake for about 20 minutes, or until salmon flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: unflavored gelatin, smoked salmon, reduced-fat sour cream, fresh lemon juice, coarse salt, fresh dill, crackers
name: super easy salmon mousse martha stewart

steps: Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: butter, sour cream, egg, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, corn muffin mix
name: 3 corn casserole bread

steps: Combine 1 celsius water with the sugar and bitters. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally, until sugar has dissolved. Remove pan from heat. Let cool completely. Pour mixture through a fine sieve into a measuring cup. Discard star anise. Cover syrup with plastic wrap, and chill. In a large pitcher, combine grapefruit juice, campari, and chilled syrup. Divide among eight glasses. Top with sparkling wine or champagne. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 7-up soda, peach, rum, champagne, sangria
name: milestone s bellini

steps: Place bacon strata on a baking sheet and bake at 350 for 1 hour or until center is firm. Bake at 350 for 1 hour and 15 minutes, basting often with sauce.
ingredients: nonfat milk, green onion, egg substitute, dijon mustard, ground red pepper, french bread, ham, cooking spray, gruyere cheese, bacon
name: bacon gruyre and ham strata

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugar. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, creamy peanut butter, water, vanilla extract, salt, cornstarch, vanilla candy coating, peanuts
name: peanut butter blocks

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees celcius. Put the chopped apples into a large bowl and sprinkle with the lemon juice. Combine the nuts, sultanas, sugar, flour, salt and baking powder and mix well. Stir this mixture into the apples. Add in the vanilla essence and mix again. Pour the mixture into a lightly oiled cake tin and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until lightly browned on top. Serve hot or cold. For a moister cake. Add to the ingredients a little fruit juice or water.
ingredients: tart apples, sugar, cinnamon, oil, eggs, flour, salt, baking powder, orange juice, vanilla
name: my mom s other soft apple cake in a tube pan

steps: In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: water, potatoes, vegetable bouillon cube, black pepper, salt, ground cumin, arrowroot, milk, sour cream, chervil
name: sour cream and potato soup

steps: Drain and discard the juice from the pickle jar. Remove the pickles from the jar and cut each one in half lengthwise. Return the pickles to the jar and set aside. In a large measuring cup, combine the sugar, water and kool-aid. Mix until the sugar has completely dissolved. Pour enough of the liquid into the pickle jar to cover the pickles. Discard any excess. Cover the jar and refrigerate at least 24 hours.
ingredients: dill pickles, white sugar, white vinegar, bay leaves, whole cloves, dill seed
name: woolfes candied dills

steps: Combine garlic, butter, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli, mayonnaise, butter,
ingredients: mayonnaise, butter, prepared horseradish, onion, salt, dry mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, broccoli
name: broccoli with horseradish sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Place shrimp on prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: unsalted cashews, brown sugar, sea salt, curry powder, ground cumin, water, butter
name: indian spiced cashews

steps: In a large soup pot, saute the onions in the olive oil over medium-high heat until the onions are soft. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until the spices are fragrant. Add the beans, oregano, and 1 to 2 cups water. Stir in the bouillon. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and allow to simmer, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed to keep the beans from sticking to the bottom of the pan, until the beans are very soft - approximately 1 hour. Using a potato masher, mash the beans until most of them are mashed, and the texture is mostly smooth.
ingredients: dried pinto beans, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt
name: basic refried beans

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic cloves, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp.
ingredients: baking potatoes, olive oil, garlic salt, pepper
name: garlic baked potatoes

steps: Bring 4 quarts of salted water to a boil in a large saucepan. Remove any torn or discolored outer leaves from the spouts and then trim and cut out cores. Add sprouts to the boiling water and blanch for 3-5 minutes. Drain and fince with cold water until cool enough to handle. Separate sprouts into leaves and blot dry with paper towels. In a skilled cook bacon over medium heat for 5-10 minutes or until crisp. Remove and drain on paper towels. Discard all but 1 tablespoon of the bacon drippings. Reduce heat to medium low and add sprout leaves, bacon pieces, thyme, salt and pepper. Saute for 2-5 minutes, tossing gently or until heated through.
ingredients: lean bacon, spanish onion, garlic cloves, brussels sprouts, salt & freshly ground black pepper, sugar
name: emeril s bacon brussels sprouts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter a casserole dish or baking pan enough to hold the ingredients. Mix all ingredients together adjust salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a buttered casserole dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: hash brown potatoes, bacon, milk, onion, salt, pepper, garlic powder, butter, paprika
name: bacon hash browns bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13 x 9-inch. Cream butter with sugar, add in eggs and sour cream. Beat well. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Beat well until combined. Spread more than half of the batter in the prepared baking pan. In another bowl, cream together all filling ingredients, then carefully spread over the cake batter. Spoon the remaining cake batter over the top of the cheese mixture. For the topping mix all ingredients, and sprinkle over cake. Bake for about 50-55 minutes or until middle feels set and not jiggly.
ingredients: oil, buttermilk, egg, vanilla, flour, sugar, baking soda, cocoa, salt, coffee
name: grandma s old fashioned coffee cake

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f or grill to medium-high. Sprinkle both sides of steak with garlic powder and pepper. Cut in thin strips. Combine steak strips and pepper strips with teriyaki sauce. Center one-fourth of the steak mixture on each sheet of foil. Bring up foil sides. Double fold top and ends to seal packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Repeat to make four packets. Bake 12 to 15 minutes on a cookie sheet in oven or grill 7 to 9 minutes in covered grill. Serve immediately over rice. Makes 4 servings.
