ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, cornstarch, beef broth, soy sauce, garlic powder, green pepper strips, cooked rice
name: steakhouse onion beef pepper stir fry

steps: Place the mayonnaise, cornstarch, olive oil, white vinegar, plain low-fat yogurt, yellow mustard, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, horseradish, hors
ingredients: water, cornstarch, olive oil, white vinegar, plain low-fat yogurt, yellow mustard, horseradish
name: low fat mayonnaise

steps: Place meat into a double-boiler and cook for 4 hours. Place meat into blender with butter and blend to a paste. Add other ingredients and blend to mix. Place into sterilized jars. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: beef steak, bacon, butter, worcestershire sauce, mace, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, nutmeg
name: granny wistrand s meat paste

steps: In large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix into a soft dough. Turn dough out onto a floured surface and knead 20 times. Divide dough into fourths and roll each quarter into a 12 inch long rope. Cut each rope into inch pieces, and set on a floured surface. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Roll each piece of dough across the tines of a fork to get groves on it and drop it into the pot of water. Cook gnocchi until it floats to the top. Drain and serve.
ingredients: gnocchi, olive oil, onion, garlic, crushed tomatoes, clams, fresh basil
name: gnocchi with garlicky red clam sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve.
ingredients: roasting chickens, olive oil, ground cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, ground allspice, paprika, salt, ground black pepper, lemon
name: roast chicken with cumin paprika and allspice

steps: Place cabbage, scallions, carrot, rice wine vinegar, salt, chili-garlic sauce in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add in cabbage, scallions, carrot, rice wine vinegar, salt, chili-garlic sauce and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt.
ingredients: cabbage, scallions, carrot, rice wine vinegar, salt, chili-garlic sauce
name: easy kimchee

steps: Cook the macaroni and set aside. In a pot, melt the butter and mix in salt and pepper. Slowly add in the flour, stirring continuously. Gradually add in the milk and stir the mixture until smooth. Add in the cheese on a low heat and melt into the mixture. Once the mixture is at your desired consistency, mix in the drained macaroni.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, skim milk, fat-free cream cheese, part-skim mozzarella cheese, non fat cheese, parmesan cheese, salt & pepper
name: almost non fat mac and cheese

steps: Mix together the shrimp, tomatoes, green onions, ketchup, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing, it
ingredients: shrimp, tomatoes, green onions, ketchup, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, italian salad dressing
name: summer shrimp cocktail

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9x 13 pan. In a mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Add the arrowroot cookies, walnuts, eggs, salt, cocoa, butter, granulated sugar, vanilla, nutmeg, cinnamon, baking soda. Gradually add to the creamed mixture, beating just until combined. Stir in the apple and walnuts. Pour batter into greased baking dish. Bake for 30-35 mins, or until cake test done.
ingredients: arrowroot cookies, walnuts, eggs, salt, cocoa, butter, granulated sugar, vanilla
name: arrowroot squares

steps: Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepperpreparation:Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepperpreparation:Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepperpreparation:Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepperpreparation:Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepperpreparation:Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepperpreparation:Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepperpreparation:Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepperpreparation:Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepperpreparation:Dice the red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic
ingredients: red cabbage, fennel bulb, flat leaf parsley, capers, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepper
name: coleslaw with capers

steps: Place lettuce in a large bowl. Add croutons and mix with dressing until greens are well-coated. Divide the salad among four chilled plates. Slice each steak into six pieces. Place meat on the center of each salad. Garnish with tomato and sprinkle with the cheese.
ingredients: romaine lettuce, garlic, anchovy fillets, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, mayonnaise, blue cheese, olive oil, croutons, parmesan cheese
name: blue cheese caesar salad

steps: In the crock pot, soak the dried fruits and ginger in the beer for 1 to 2 hours. Stir in brown sugar, cinnamon, and honey. Brown meat in oil over medium high heat. Place the meat on top of the fruit in the crock pot. Cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours, or on high for 5 to 6 hours.
ingredients: pot roast, oil, mustard, brown sugar, water, vinegar, onions, salt, flour
name: mom s pot roast

steps: Cook sausage and onion until sausage is browned and onion is tender. Drain. Combine biscuit mix, milk, and 1 egg. Mix well. Spread mixture in a greased 13x9 baking dish. Sprinkle with caraway seeds. Top with sausage mixture. Combine sour cream, salt, and 1 egg. Blend well. Pour over sausage mixture and sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes. Cut into squares.
ingredients: bulk pork sausage, condensed cream of potato soup, eggs, milk, pepper, cheddar cheese
name: sausage egg bake

steps: Mix chicken broth, salsa, flour, onion, garlic clove, whole chickens, sour cream, cheddar cheese, red beans, flour tortillas, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cheddar cheese, sour cream
ingredients: chicken broth, salsa, flour, onion, garlic clove, whole chickens, sour cream, cheddar cheese, red beans, flour tortillas
name: mexican chicken burritos crock pot

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add cream, eggs, maple syrup, brown sugar, vanilla, salt, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar,
ingredients: cream, eggs, maple syrup, brown sugar, vanilla, salt, bread
name: french toast with brown sugar

steps: In a large shallow dish, combine the paprika, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, thyme, salt and lemon zest. Add the catfish fillets and turn to coat both sides, pressing the herb-and-spice rub into the fish. In a large non stick frying pan over medium-high heat, heat the oil. Add the fish and cook for 4 minutes. Pour the lemon juice over the fillets, turn and cook until the fish just separates when pressed with a fork, about 4 minutes. Pour the lemon juice over the fillets, turn and cook
ingredients: paprika, salt, thyme, oregano, garlic powder, ground black pepper, ground red pepper, catfish fillets
name: herbed grilled catfish

steps: Beat on high until creamy. Add agave nectar. Beat on high until creamy. Add sea salt. Beat on high until cream.
ingredients: chocolate chips, grapeseed oil, agave nectar, vanilla extract, sea salt
name: vegan chocolate frosting

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Melt butter in a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish. Combine flour, paprika, salt and pepper in a bag. Shake chicken pieces, one at a time, in bag to coat with flour mixture. Place chicken skin side down in baking pan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes. Turn chicken. Bake 30 minutes longer.
ingredients: broiler-fryer chickens, all-purpose flour, salt, paprika, pepper, butter, shortening
name: easy oven fried chicken

steps: Place chayote in a large pot and cover with salted water, bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 5- to 10 minutes. Drain and cool chayote. Cut chayote off the cobs. Place squash into a skillet and add water. Cook suash over medium heat until tender, 5- to 10 minutes. Drain any excess water fromskillet. Stir corn butter parsley salt and pepper into squash. Cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: water, chayotes, garlic, onion, salt, ground black pepper, italian parsley, olive oil, white vinegar
name: chayote squash salad salada de chuchu

steps: Spread peanut butter evenly onto each slice of bread snd drizzle honey over the peanut butter. Cut each banana in half lengthwise and then cut in half crosswise. Arrange 2 banana pieces on 4 of the prepared bread slices. Top with remaining bread slices, peanut butter-sides down. In a shallow bowl combine eggs, milk, and cinnamon. Carefully dip sandwiches into egg mixture, coating both sides. Melt butter in a large skillet or on a large griddle over medium-low heat. Cook sandwiches in hot butter about 2 minutes on each side or until golden. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan heat fruit preserves over medium-low heat until melted, stirring frequently. To serve, cut warm sandwiches in half crosswise. Drizzle with warm fruit preserves.
ingredients: unsalted butter, white bread, peanut butter, banana, crisp bacon, honey
name: the elvis

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix amaretto and raspberry smoothie with ice. Add the raspberry preserves, vanilla gelato and almond liqueur to the shaker. Shake briskly to mix and chill. Strain into the martini glass. Garnish with the raspberry smoothie.
ingredients: fresh raspberries, vanilla gelato, almond liqueur, orange zest, ice, amaretti cookies
name: amaretto and raspberry smoothie

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Beat the egg whites until stiff. Beat in gradually, the salt& sugar. Slowly, fold in the powdered sugar. Add almond paste, powdered sugar, vanilla, salt, egg whites, sugar. Mix well. Drop mixture from. Bake for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: almond paste, powdered sugar, vanilla, salt, egg whites, sugar
name: swedish almond macaroons

steps: Place chicken pieces in crockpot and cover with remaining chicken pieces. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, chicken thighs, white wine, butter, parsley
name: tasty chicken and herb supper

steps: Place bagels on a baking sheet sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Spread mixture evenly over each split and toasted bagel half. Place bagels on a baking sheet sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Spread mixture evenly over each split and toasted bag
ingredients: whole grain bagels, mild green chilies, fat free cream cheese, pizza sauce, mild salsa, mozzarella cheese
name: southwest pizza bagels

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Frost as desired.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, oil, paper baking cups, vanilla wafers, chocolate eggs, vanilla frosting, food coloring, sugar crystals
name: surprise easter cupcakes

steps: Place chicken bones in medium sized pot and just cover with water. Bring to boil and then simmer over a low-medium hear for one hour. You may need to keep adjusting the temperature from time to time as some liquid evaporates. Skim fat from the top of the broth. Add onion, carrot, garlic, ginger, bay leaf and celery seeds and continue to simmer for 3 hours, stirring once or twice. Allow stock to cool uncovered. Strain into a storage container and either use immediately or freeze for later use.
ingredients: chicken bones, spanish onions, celery, carrots, olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, bay leaves, peppercorn, fresh flat-leaf parsley, fresh thyme
name: rich chicken stock

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir in lemon-lime soda. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in raspberry-lemonade concentrate. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in raspberry-le
ingredients: ginger ale, raspberry sherbet, frozen raspberry-lemonade concentrate, water, frozen raspberries, dry ice
name: perfect purple punch

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: green beans, margarine, lemon juice, coarse grain mustard
name: green beans with lemon mustard sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add the liquids and mix smooth. Place 2 tablespoons of batter in the bottom of each of the greased muffin cups. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style red pepper. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean.
ingredients: red pepper, onion, butter, milk, eggs, yellow cornmeal, unbleached flour, sugar, baking powder, salt
name: onion and red pepper corn muffins

steps: In a large saucepan, heat olive oil and gently cook onion without browning, for 3-4 minutes. Add pumpkin, carrot and rosemary and cook, stirring for 2-3 minutes. Add stock and bay leaves. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 12-15 minutes until vegetables are tender. Remove any rosemary stalks and bay leaves. Place a third of the soup in the blender with a third of the skim milk powder and puree. Pour into a large bowl. Repeat with the remaining soup and milk powder and pour the whole lot back into the saucepan, heat through and serve. For vegetarian use vegetable stock.
ingredients: fresh pumpkin, butter, salt, black pepper, onion, carrot, celery rib, tomatoes, vegetable broth, cooked rice
name: lil pumpkins soup for two

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle crumbs onto an ungreased baking sheet and set aside. Add fish fillet, tomato sauce, breadcrumbs, scallion, fresh basil leaf, tomatoes, fish seasoning, salt & freshly ground black pepper, and toss well. May be served hot.
ingredients: white fish fillet, tomato sauce, breadcrumbs, scallion, fresh basil leaf, tomatoes, fish seasoning, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: fresh tomato basil baked fish

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners. Stir together flour, sugar, baking soda and baking powder. In a separate bowl, combine yogurt, egg, vanilla, oil and fruit. Stir mixtures together just until combined. Batter will be very thick. Scoop into prepared muffin cups and bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes. This helps the leavening process.
ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla essence, eggs, self raising flour, custard powder, greek yogurt
name: custard yoghurt cake

steps: Preheat oven to 200. Place tomatoes and peppers, cut side down on a baking rack set onto a baking sheet. Roast for 20-30 minutes or until skins are easily removed. Spray or brush vegetables with olive oil and continue to roast until tomatoes become a dark red color, about 2 hours. Remove from oven and chop into small pieces. Meanwhile, cook and drain pasta. Place into a mixing bowl. Add the onions, tomatoes and peppers, toss to combine. Mix together the vinegar, mustard, parsley, basil, olive oil, salt and pepper. Beat with a whisk to combine. Pour over the pasta, add the cheese and toss again. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: pearl barley, basil leaves, parmesan cheese, olive oil, garlic cloves, cherry tomatoes, corn kernels, salt and pepper
name: barley salad with tomatoes and corn

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Spray a quiche dish with nonstick cooking spray. Mix mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, garlic cloves, salt and pepper in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to blend. Spread mashed potato mixture evenly into the quiche dish. Arrange the frozen potato wedges in a spoke wheel fashion on top of the mashed potatoes. For curly fries, make a random pattern, breaking in half any large fries. Sprinkle with bacon bits, green onion and parmesan cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve.
ingredients: low-fat cooking spray, garlic cloves, broccoli, low fat cottage cheese, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, baking potatoes
name: ww broccoli and cheddar stuffed potato

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Grease 2 cookie sheets. Sift together flour, cinnamon, baking soda and nutmeg. Set aside. Beat the butter and brown sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer at high speed until well blended. Beat in the eggs and apple juice. Gradually add the flour to the butter mixture, beating at low speed until well blended. Stir in the apple and pecans. Drop the dough by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: egg, honey, flour, salt, brown sugar, ground ginger, baking soda, ground cloves, butter, ground cinnamon
name: honey spice cookies

steps: In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, heavy cream and salt. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 239. Remove from heat. Stir in white chocolate and vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares. Store in the refrigerator.
ingredients: sugar, heavy cream, salt, vanilla
name: white fudge opera fudge

steps: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, brown the ho hos snack cakes. If desired, drain fat. Add onions and mushrooms and cook until tender, set aside in a separate bowl. In a large skillet over medium-high heat, add the oil and hash browns over medium-high heat and cook until golden brown on 1 side. Once golden brown add eggs, add the sausage and mushroom mixture. Scramble together until desired consistency and top with cheese. Cover with a lid until cheese melts and serve.
ingredients: ho hos snack cakes, cream cheese, milk, instant pudding mix, cool whip, berries
name: ho ho or twinkie surprise

steps: In a large saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: canola oil, red onion, garlic clove, chili powder, ground cumin, black beans, water, fresh cilantro, lime juice
name: quick southwestern black beans

steps: In a medium saucepan, cook the cream cheese, orange marmalade, curry powder, salt, white pepper, cooked chicken, green onions, celery, macadamia nuts. Add the remaining ingredients plus the reserved liquid, bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer gently for about 15 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: cream cheese, orange marmalade, curry powder, salt, white pepper, cooked chicken, green onions, celery, macadamia nuts
name: curried chicken balls

steps: Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoon jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing.
ingredients: pears in light syrup, fat free cream cheese, cool whip lite, sugar-free lime jell-o gelatin, nonfat milk, maraschino cherries
name: wood family s seafoam salad aka green stuff

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Add chicken pieces, skin side down. Cook until chicken is cooked through, about 15 minutes. Serve chicken with pan jus, just as it is. Rice would be an excellent side dish.
ingredients: dried thyme leaves, salt, pepper, garlic powder, lemon juice, chicken piece, uncooked rice
name: lemon chicken oamc

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: skinless chicken drumsticks, skinless chicken thighs, coarse salt, ground pepper, egg, corn flakes, olive oil, cayenne pepper
name: cornflake crusted baked chicken

steps: Place chicken in crock pot and cover with lid. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours. Serve gravy over meat and vegetables.
ingredients: chicken, olive oil flavored cooking spray, seasoning salt, onion, garlic, aluminum foil
name: roast crock pot chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a 1. 5 quart baking dish put half of the macaroni in bottom of dish, followed by half the milk and half the butter. Season with salt and pepper. Cover with half the cheese. Repeat above direction for a second layer. Bake uncovered for 30 min or until cheese is thoroughly melted.
ingredients: penne rigate, milk, cheese, cornstarch, ground mustard, ground nutmeg, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper
name: not your mama s mac n cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place salmon skin side up over the seasonings. Cover tightly and bake in a moderate oven, 375 degrees for 1 hour. Chill. Place on a serving platter and remove skin carefully. Garnish with mayonnaise and cucumber slices. Serves 6.
ingredients: pink salmon, milk, oats, egg whites, fresh chives, fresh parsley, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper
name: healthy salmon patties

steps: In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomatoes, tomato sauce, chili powder, salt, kidney beans, spaghetti
name: chiligetti

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine salmon fillets, potatoes, broccolini, butter, lemon rind, chives, salt and pepper. Place in a 9-by-13-inch casserole dish, sprayed with cooking spray. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Remove from oven. Top with salmon. Grind on pepper. Return to oven uncovered and bake 10 to 12 minutes, until fish is done to your liking. Garnish with almonds and parsley.
ingredients: salmon fillets, potatoes, broccolini, butter, lemon rind, chives, salt and pepper
name: salmon potato parcels

steps: Place roast on top of onions and carrots, fat side down. Season all sides of roast liberally with the kosher salt and ground pepper. Place roast on top of onions and carrots, fat side down. Combine mustard, sugar, worcestershire sauce, beef broth and red wine in a separate bowl and pour over roast. Set crock pot to low and cook for 3 hours. After 3 hours, turn the roast onto one side and cook for 20 minutes. After 20 minutes, turn the roast on the next side and cook 20 minutes, repeat until the roast has the fat side on the bottom again. Cook for about 2 more hours usually 6 hours total. The roast is done when it shreds easily with a fork.
ingredients: roast, dry mustard, butter, garlic, onion, white sugar, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, bisto
name: crock pot roast

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and salt, blending well. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press tomatoes through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly. Set aside press tomatoes through
ingredients: celery, green onions, butter, flour, stewed tomatoes, water, dry white wine, chicken bouillon cube, bacon
name: savory tomato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl use your hands to mix together the meat, eggs, onion, saltines, and worcestershire. Mold the mixture into a loaf and place in a pan or on a baking sheet lined with aluminum foil. Mix together the spread in a bowl and smear onto the top of the loaf. Place your loaf in the oven and bake for 45minutes to 1 hour or until the top becomes a burgundy color and fat has gathered on the bottom of the pan. Serve with mashed potates and veggies for a yummy winter meal. Bon apetite.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, worcestershire sauce, ketchup, saltine crackers
name: old time meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, pecans
name: pecan crispies

steps: Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker with the contents of the barbecue sauce packet. Pour water, wine, and soy sauce over the top, turning the pork to coat. Carefully spread garlic over the pork, leaving as much on top of the roast during cooking as possible. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. Serve with cooking liquid on the side as au jus.
ingredients: boneless chuck roast, garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper, barbecue sauce
name: slow cooker barbecue

steps: Heat oil in a medium large soup pot. Add onion and cook over medium-low heat until completely translucent. Add chicken stock. Bring to a simmer and allow to simmer for 15 minutes. Bring
ingredients: oil, onion, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, fresh basil, crushed red pepper flakes, whipping cream
name: roasted garlic tomato soup

steps: Put ice into a cup. Pour pineapple juice into cup with ice. Next, pour pineapple juice into cup, and stir. Then, pour pineapple juice into cup, and stir. Then,
ingredients: banana, lemon juice, mango, pineapple-orange juice, non-fat vanilla yogurt, coconut extract
name: tropical pina colada shake

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, butter, sausage, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, eggs, half-and-half cream, salt, pepper
name: hash brown quiche baskets

steps: Add 1/4 cup of water to a large mixing bowl. Add 1/4 cup of water to a large mixing bowl. Add 1
ingredients: tequila, triple sec, orange juice, grenadine, orange slice, cherries, lime wedge
name: tequila stinger

steps: Cook the beets until tender in boiling salted water, drain, slip the beet skins off with your fingers. Zest and segment the orange, remove the pith and seeds. In a small sauce pan heat the apricot preserves and mix in the orange segments with the liqueur, simmer for a couple of minutes. Place the beets in a serving dish, smother with sauce and garnish with orange zest. This actually is plenty for 2 -- i generally freeze half.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, orange juice, butter, orange zest, beets
name: beets in orange sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Add chorizo and saute for about 2 minutes, just until a little browned. Remove sausage and place on a paper towel. Meanwhile, whisk together eggs, milk and baking powder. When sausage is removed from pan, add egg mixture. Sprinkle with sausage and spinach. Top with grated cheese. Cover pan with lid and turn heat down to medium-low. Check after about 3 minutes and see if omelette has set - the middle should not jiggle. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, frozen broccoli, onion, eggs, salt and pepper
name: flat omelet for a stress free life

steps: In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cornstarch, salt, fish sauce, vegetable oil, green onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, chili powder, sesame oil, peanut oil, bamboo skewerpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, salt and pepper and set aside. Saute shrimp, cornstarch, salt, fish sauce, vegetable oil, green onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, chili powder, sesame oil, peanut oil, bamboo skewerpreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cornstarch, salt, fish sauce, vegetable oil, green onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, chili powder, sesame oil, peanut oil, bamboo skewerpreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cornstarch, salt, fish sauce, vegetable oil, green onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, chili powder, sesame oil, peanut oil, bamboo skewerpreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cornstarch, salt, fish sauce, vegetable oil, green onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, chili powder, sesame oil, peanut oil, bamboo skewerpreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cornstarch, salt, fish sauce, vegetable oil, green onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, chili powder, sesame oil, peanut oil, bamboo skewerpreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cornstarch, salt, fish sauce, vegetable oil, green onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, chili powder, sesame oil, peanut oil, bamboo skewerpreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cornstarch, salt, fish sauce, vegetable oil, green onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, chili powder, sesame oil, peanut oil, bamboo skewerpreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cornstarch, salt,
ingredients: eggs, medium raw shrimp, cornstarch, salt, fish sauce, vegetable oil, green onion
name: cantonese shrimp scramble

steps: Mix together the first 9 ingredients in a slow cooker. Cover and cook on high for 1 hour. Gently smash the beans along the side of the crockery. Sprinkle with cheese, cover, and cook for 30 more minutes. Gently smash
ingredients: chorizo sausages, onion, garlic cloves, poblano chiles, tomato sauce, kidney beans, bananas, tortilla chips
name: bean and banana dip

steps: Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 for 30 to 40 mins or till center is almost set and pie is golden brown.
ingredients: sugar, salt, eggs, butter, flour, milk, coconut, unbaked 9-inch pie crust
name: coconut macaroon pie

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugar. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately.
ingredients: butter, creamy peanut butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, milk chocolate kisses
name: chocolate kiss peanut butter cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey and curry powder. Spread over chicken pieces. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. Baste while baking and be careful that sauce does not burn.
ingredients: potato, chicken, carrots, olive oil, honey, mustard, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper
name: honey mustard roasted chicken

steps: In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the caramel ice cream topping, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, butterscotch puddingpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the caramel ice cream topping, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, butterscotch puddingpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the caramel ice cream topping, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, butterscotch puddingpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the caramel ice cream topping, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, butterscotch puddingpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the caramel ice cream topping, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, butterscotch puddingpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the caramel ice cream topping, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, butterscotch puddingpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the caramel ice cream topping, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, butterscotch puddingpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the caramel ice cream topping, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, butterscotch puddingpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl,
ingredients: caramel ice cream topping, chocolate-covered english toffee bars, graham cracker pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, milk, non-dairy whipped topping, butterscotch pudding
name: caramel drizzled butterscotch toffee crunch pie

steps: Heat the olive oil and garlic in a large skillet over medium heat. When garlic is tender, remove from skillet and set aside. Place the broccoli and carrot in the skillet, and cook 2 minutes, just until hot through. In a pot, bring the vegetable broth to a boil. Stir in the penne pasta and heated crushed garlic clove. Cook for 5 minutes, or until pasta is almost al dente. Remove and discard garlic clove. Transfer the partially cooked pasta and broth to the skillet. Mix in the peas. Cover skillet, and continue cooking 10 minutes over medium heat, or until pasta is almost al dente and vegetables are tender. Toss with the parmesan cheese to serve.
ingredients: fettuccine, cauliflower floret, fresh broccoli florets, carrot, red pepper, summer squash, zucchini, alfredo sauce, dried basil, parmesan cheese
name: garden primavera fettuccine

steps: Cook and mash potatoes, add egg to potatoes while mashing. Set aside. Brown ground beef and onions, drain. Add beans and soup, stir well. Place in a greased casserole dish. Put mashed potatoes on top of meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 350 for 35-40 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, pepper, garlic powder, dry mustard, onion soup mix, water, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, frozen french fries
name: cheeseburger and fries casserole ii

steps: Combine corn flakes, seedless raisin, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt
ingredients: corn flakes, seedless raisin, nutmeats, sugar, butter, vinegar, water, salt
name: raggedy ann brittle

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper and noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Sim
ingredients: onion, sliced mushrooms, butter, beef sirloin, sour cream, sugar, salt, dry mustard, paprika, egg noodles
name: creamy beef stroganoff

steps: Combine fruit in a large pot and fill with enough cider to cover it by a third or more. Add cloves and lemon peel. Simmer until the larger pieces are cooked but not falling apart. Pour off liquid and cook until reduced by a third. To reduced liquid add honey, cinnamon, lemon juice, and fruit. Reheat, stirring. Taste, and add more lemon juice if needed. Serve warm in crystal or clear glass bowls. Keeps in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: dried apricot halves, prune, raisins, water, sugar, cinnamon sticks, lemon juice, orange extract, ground allspice
name: apricot dried fruit compote

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add marinade. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steak, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: oil, soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, pepper, dried parsley flakes, garlic, lemon juice, salt, wine vinegar
name: barb s marinade

steps: Roast cauliflower florets until tender, 3-5 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving dish. In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook cauliflower until tender, 3-5 minutes. Add scallions and cook 2 minutes. Pour over cauliflower and toss. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot or warm with lemon wedges, if desired.
ingredients: cauliflower, olive oil, salt and pepper, butter, garlic cloves, capers, caper juice
name: martha stewart s roasted cauliflower

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Place the spinach in a large bowl. Toss with enough of the vinaigrette to coat the spinach. Sprinkle with the crisp prosciutto crumbles, toss again, and serve.
ingredients: olive oil, baby spinach, cherry tomatoes, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper
name: wilted spinach and cherry tomatoes

steps: Place all ingredients in a roaster. Cover the roaster with plastic wrap and then foil to seal. Bake at 250 for 8 hours. Remove coverings and stir. Remove bone and cartilage as meat will have fallen off. Turn oven up to 350. Continue cooking for 1 hour stirring occasionally as the dish caramelizes. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: sauerkraut, sugar, dark beer, salt, garlic powder, black pepper, paprika, pork roast
name: pork sauerkraut and beer

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet. Add chicken and zucchini. Saute until tender. Stir in chicken and zucchini mixture. Cover and cook 1 minute, sprinkle zucchini mixture with parmesan cheese, serve warm.
ingredients: margarine, brown onion, garlic clove, curry powder, basmati rice, boneless skinless chicken breasts, water, chicken stock, zucchini
name: curried chicken and zucchini soup

steps: In a blender or food processor, combine the pears and extract. Cover and process until pureed. Pour into bread machine pan. Add the remaining ingredients in order suggested by manufacturer. Select basic bread setting. Choose crust color and loaf size if available. Bake according to bread machine directions.
ingredients: foie gras, salt and pepper, pear, butter, brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, cider, fresh rosemary
name: foie gras on a bed of pears

steps: Combine all ingredients in a medium size heavy skillet. Heat over medium-high heat to boiling. Cook, stirring constantly, until all of the liquid is evaporated and nuts are coated and sugary. Transfer to a non-stick baking sheet. Break nuts apart while still warm. Let cool.
ingredients: eggplant, walnut pieces, fresh gingerroot, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, ground allspice, salt, hot pepper sauce
name: eggplant walnut pate by dr andrew weil

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium-high heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place 1 sandwich into skillet. Cook, turning once, until sandwich is golden brown, about 4-5 minutes. Repeat with remaining sandwiches.
ingredients: french bread, virgin olive oil, basil leaves, feta cheese, kalamata olives, salt
name: basil feta olive toast

steps: Place egg yolks and water in the top of a double boiler and beat well with a wire whip or fork. Put all but 2 tbs of the butter in a small saucepan over moderately low heat until just melted. Add 1 tbs of the cold butter to the egg and water mixture and place over hot, not boiling water. Whip constantly until egg yolks thicken slightly. Remove from heat and whip in the second tbs of cold butter. Gradually pour the melted butter into the egg mixture, beating constantly. Place over hot, not boiling, water cook until thickened, whipping constantly. Thickened hollandaise should hold the imprint when a fork or whip is drawn across the surface. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice, salt, cayenne pepper. Sauce may be placed in top of double boiler over hot, not boiling, water, covered, and kept until serving time. Serve with vegetables, baked or broiled fish, and shell-fish.
ingredients: egg yolks, water, butter, salt, lemon juice, fresh chives
name: hollandaise sauce french style

steps: Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: olive oil, pancetta, onion, crushed tomatoes, dried red pepper flakes, spaghetti, salt, parmesan cheese
name: crushed red pepper and pancetta pasta

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and cook over medium-low heat until wilted. Add chicken stock. Bring to a simmer and allow to simmer for 15 minutes. Add parmesan cheese. Blend to desired consistency with hand blender, food processor or blender. Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
ingredients: italian sausage, garlic powder, pepper, chicken broth, frozen chopped spinach, heavy cream, hot sauce, parmesan cheese
name: poppy s favorite toscano soup low carb

steps: Heat broiler to high. Cut the ciabatta into bite-size pieces and spread out in a single layer on a baking sheet. Drizzle over 1 tbsp oil. Broil for 3-4 mins, turning the pieces of bread occasionally, until just golden. Leave to cool. Put the toasted ciabatta in a serving bowl with tomatoes, cucumber, olives and feta. Tear up the basil, then scatter over the salad. Whisk the balsamic and remaining olive oil together and drizzle over, then mix gently to combine.
ingredients: fresh chives, olive oil, white wine vinegar, honey mustard, black pepper, tomatoes, feta cheese, cucumbers
name: tomato feta salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Boil baby artichokes for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. In the meantime, saut onions and garlic in butter until they are soft and translucent. Layer potato slices and onions in a 9 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream over the potatoes. Season to taste and sprinkle gruyere over the whole shebang. Bake 4050 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: baby artichokes, olive oil, dry white wine, garlic, breadcrumbs, lemon, zest of, fresh lemon juice, fresh parsley, oil
name: baby artichoke gratin

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: cream cheese, chunky peanut butter, sugar, sour cream, vanilla extract, graham cracker tart shells, whipped topping, peanuts
name: crunchy peanut butter tarts

steps: In a saucepan combine sugar, cornstarch and cocoa. Slowly add milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat and continue. Stirring until thick. Remove from heat and add margarine and vanilla.
ingredients: sugar, cocoa, cornstarch, salt, milk, butter, vanilla
name: microwave chocolate lovers pudding

steps: Heat oil on medium heat. Add the onion, the garlic and the curry powder. Saute for 2-3 minutes, then add the rest of the ingredients, plus a cup of water. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve over basmati rice with a squirt of lime juice.
ingredients: chicken cutlet, salt, pepper, thyme, olive oil, garlic cloves, balsamic vinegar, sandwich buns, red onion, arugula
name: herbed chicken and arugula rocket panini

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 x3 inch pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: sugar, solid shortening, bananas, eggs, flour, salt, baking soda
name: kanai inn banana bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray an 8-inch square baking pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine oats, peaches and sugar. In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Beat with a fork or wire whisk until blended. Add to oat mixture, mixing well. Place mixture in prepared pan. Bake, uncovered, 50 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: quinoa, milk, honey, cinnamon, pure vanilla extract, peach
name: quick peaches and cream breakfast cereal with quinoa

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, pecans
name: butter pecan cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a mixing bowl, combine ginger, lemon juice, rind and buttermilk. Stir into the dry ingredients, alternatively with melted butter and mango slices. Divide evenly between 12 greased muffin tins, sprinkle with castor sugar. Bake for 15-18 minutes or until well risen and cooked. Leave in the tins for 5 minutes before turning onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: unbleached white flour, salt, baking soda, unsalted butter, sugar, egg, buttermilk, fresh ginger, lemons, zest of
name: ginger lemon muffins

steps: In a small saucepan, combine gelatin, hot water, egg yolks, egg whites, caster sugar, lemons, heavy whipping cream. Cook in the microwave for one minute intervals, stirring after each minute until the mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a metal spoon. It will be quite liquid but will set up somewhat overnight. Remove from the microwave, and pour into sterile jars. Store for up to 3 weeks in the refrigerator.
ingredients: unflavored gelatin, hot water, egg yolks, egg whites, caster sugar, lemons, heavy whipping cream
name: lone s danish lemon dessert

steps: Cover a large baking sheet with wax paper. Place semisweet and white chocolate chips in a medium glass bowl. Microwave at high 45 seconds. Stir, and microwave an additional 45 seconds or until smooth. Add cereal and remaining ingredients. Stir quickly to combine. Drop mixture by tablespoonfuls onto prepared baking sheet. Chill 1 hour or until firm.
ingredients: artificial sweetener, brown rice syrup, smooth cashew butter, hazelnut butter, crispy rice cereal, chocolate chips, pecans
name: pecan chocolate chip rice crispy squares

steps: Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour italian dressing mix with water. Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour over chicken. Cover with lid or foil. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Serve over cooked noodles.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, raw shrimp, button mushroom, sun-dried tomato, salt and pepper, heavy cream, romano cheese, cayenne pepper, dry penne pasta
name: spicy shrimp and chicken pasta like carino s

steps: In a 3-quart saucepan, saute the squash, carrots, celery, onion, and ginger in the olive oil until tender. Add the vegetable broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 40 minute stirring occasionally. Puree soup in a blender or food processor. Reheat on stove if necessary. Add salt to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, onion, fresh sage, salt, ground black pepper, fat-free chicken broth, butternut squash, parmesan cheese
name: quick butternut squash soup

steps: Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium. Add onion and cook until softened, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes. Whisk eggs and hot sauce in a small bowl. Add to hot skillet and cook until eggs set, about 2 minutes. Top with cheese and cook until melted, about 1 minute. Place egg mixture evenly over 4 bagel halves. Top with remaining bagel halves and serve.
ingredients: bagels, cream cheese, lox, eggs, hollandaise sauce, fresh dill
name: lox eggs benedict for manbeasts

steps: Place the mangoes, papayas, coconut, slivered almonds, mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice in a large bowl. Pour dressing on top. Mix well. Serve immediately or let it sit for a bit to let the flavors meld.
ingredients: mangoes, papayas, coconut, slivered almonds, mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice
name: mango papaya salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions. Set aside. Place chicken in a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Combine the soup, sour cream, milk, parmesan cheese, dried basil leaves, carrots, sugar snap peas, fresh asparagus, red pepper, chicken flavor stuffing mix. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until bubbly.
ingredients: cream cheese, milk, parmesan cheese, dried basil leaves, carrots, sugar snap peas, fresh asparagus, red pepper, chicken flavor stuffing mix
name: creamy vegetable bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, applesauce, oil, vanilla extract
name: j s applesauce sugar cookies

steps: In a heavy saucepan, gently saute the butterkase cheese, fontina cheese, all-purpose flour, white wine, dry sherry, shallots, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scall
ingredients: butterkase cheese, fontina cheese, all-purpose flour, white wine, dry sherry, shallots, fresh ground pepper, blue cheese, scallions
name: the melting pot wisconsin trio cheese fondue

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. In a large mixing bowl, mix the tomatoes, cilantro, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, edamame, ed
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, cumin, tomatoes, frozen edamame, salt and pepper, cilantro
name: edamame with tomatoes and cilantro

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all the ingredients except the cheese in a 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and put in the oven until rice is tender. Remove from oven and add cheese to taste, wait about 2 minutes or until cheese has melted - there will be a little liquid left, you can let it sit longer for the rice to absorb it. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, broccoli, uncle bens wild rice, mushroom soup, water
name: wild rice broccoli casserole

steps: Heat oil in frying pan over med high heat. Add chicken, onion, and peppers, cook and stir until chicken is browned. Add water, tomatoes, and tomato sauce and bring to a boil. Add tortellini, making sure that tomato mixture covers it completely. Cook 15 to 20 minutes until sauce is thickened and chicken is cooked through. Stir frequently during cooking.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cheese tortellini, milk, butter, flour, salt, green onions, garlic, swiss cheese, pepper
name: chicken tortellini

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease bottom and side of a 9-inch pie plate. Sprinkle ham, cheese, onions and apple in pie plate. In medium bowl, stir remaining ingredients until blended. Pour over ham mixture. Bake uncovered 35 to 40 minutes in preheated oven or until a knife inserted halfway between center and outside edge comes out clean. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: boneless ham, swiss cheese, green onions, bisquick baking mix, milk, salt, pepper, eggs, tomatoes, green bell pepper
name: impossible ham cheese pie

steps: Mix first seven ingredients in a bowl and spread in a 3 quart casserole. Sprinkle with cheddar, then monterey jack. Top with second amount of chili powder. Can chill ahead of time. Bake, uncovered in a 350 oven for 20 minutes or until hot and cheese is melted.
ingredients: taco seasoning mix, ground beef, refried beans, avocado, cheddar cheese, black olives, chopped tomato, sour cream, salsa, green onion
name: mexican dip

steps: In a large heavy saucepan cook the julienned fennel and the shallots in the butter over moderately low heat, stirring occassionally, for 5 minutes. Add the chicken broth and bring to a boil. Simmer the mixture, covered for 15 minutes or until the fennel is just tender but not soft, and remove the pan from the heat. In a heatproof bowl whisk together the lemon juice and the yolks. Whisk 1 cup of the soup liquid, a little at a time, into the yolk mixture. Add yolk mixture to the soup, whisking. Return soup to the stove and reheat over low heat, stirring constantly. Stir in the minced fennel leaves just prior to serving.
ingredients: fennel bulb, lemon, orange, pine nuts, olive oil, fleur de sel, fresh ground pepper
name: fennel salad with citrus zests and toasted pine nuts

steps: In a large saute pan, heat the oil until hot but not smoking, add the onion, and cook over medium heat for 2 minutes. Add the corn, poblano chiles, red onion, jalapenos, fresh cilantro, lime juice, salt and pepper. Mix well. Add the corn, poblano chiles,
ingredients: sweet corn, poblano chiles, red onion, jalapenos, fresh cilantro, lime juice, salt and pepper
name: chipotle s spicy corn salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 425f degrees. Put the chicken skin-side-up in a small roasting tin. Mix together the garlic, thyme and butter and dot over the chicken. Scatter around the red onions and pancetta and drizzle with oil. Roast for 20 minutes until the chicken has cooked through and the onions are softened. Divide the salad between 4 plates and top with the red onions, pancetta and chicken.
ingredients: parsley, chicken breasts, shallots, fresh thyme, vegetable oil, salt, egg whites, red pepper
name: chicken and thyme terrine

steps: In a 2- or 3-quart saucepan, saute onion and garlic over medium-high heat. Add beans, mashed sweet potatoes, and cumin. Mix well. Warm the tortillas and make burritos with the cheese. Good with salsa and sour cream.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, orange juice, cornstarch, cinnamon, cumin, salt, black beans, cooked white rice
name: sweet potatoes and black beans

steps: Melt 2 oz of butter in a saucepan. Add chopped onion and celery, cook until just translucent. Add rice, cook a few minutes more, stirring to coat the rice with butter. Add wine, 1 cup of boiling water and crumbled stock cubes. Bring to a boil, add peas. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered until the water has evaporated. Add another cup of boiling water, cook until evaporated. Add the final cup of boiling water. Keep cooking until the water is almost absorbed. Overall cooking time is about 20 minutes. Stir in the parmesan cheese and 1 oz butter. Add salt& pepper to taste.
ingredients: eggs, long grain rice, broth, garlic powder, carrots, scallions, frozen peas
name: unfried rice

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with butter and set aside. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda. Add the butter and rub it into the flour with your finger. Add the buttermilk and stir until the dough is slightly firm. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin tin and bake in the center of the oven till brown and crusty, 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, wheat germ, oat bran, nonfat dry milk powder, salt, baking powder, canola oil
name: low fat bisquick substitute

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Spray cookie sheet with nonstick cooking spray or lightly grease. Combine biscuits, butter, italian seasoning, garlic and italian seasoning in medium mixing bowl. Add milk. Stir until soft dough forms. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheet. Bake at 450f for 7 to 9 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: biscuits, butter, italian seasoning, garlic
name: italian garlic biscuits

steps: Heat a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat. Add butter, and cook until melted and foamy. Add garlic, rosemary, and lemon juice and rinds. Stir in worcestershire and hot sauces, and bring to a simmer. Season shrimp with salt and pepper. Add to skillet. Cook until pink and firm to the touch, 3 to 4 minutes. Season with pepper. Serve in a shallow serving bowl with bread.
ingredients: unsalted butter, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, large shrimp, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper, french baguette
name: mr jim s louisiana barbecued shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, sugar, flaked coconut, sweetened condensed milk, pecans, hershey bar, creamy peanut butter
name: chocolate coconut bars

steps: Combine eggs, sugar, oil and pumpkin, mix well. Combine flour, spice, soda, and salt in a bowl. Make a well in the center and pour pumpkin mixture into well. Stir just until dry ingredients are moist. Stir in cranberries. Spoon into greased muffin pans. Bake at 350 degrees for about 30 minutes. I start checking for doneness around 20 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, pumpkin puree, vegetable oil, sugar, flour, pumpkin pie spice, baking soda, salt, fresh cranberries
name: cranberry pumpkin bread

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large bowl, beat sugar, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown.
ingredients: brown sugar, light margarine, egg whites, vanilla extract, chickpeas, chocolate chips, flour, old fashioned oats, baking soda, salt
name: chocolate chip cookies with chickpeas

steps: In a saucepan, bring water to a boil, add peas and. Cook 5 minutes or until peas are tender, drain, reserve the cooking water. Puree the peas in your food processor add 5 tbsp of the reserved water and the butter return to saucepan and stir in the orange peel& rosemary heat through. Meanwhile immerse the peas in boiling water and blanch for apprx 5 minutes or until the peas are tender, drain, reserve the cooking water. Meanwhile immerse the peas in boiling water and bl
ingredients: carrots, fresh peas, butter, flour, salt, pepper, milk, paprika
name: creamed peas and carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a bowl, mix the graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and butter with your hands. Press the mixture firmly into a 9-inch pie pan, and bake until brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool to room temperature before filling. Lower the oven temperature to 325 degrees f. In a separate bowl, combine the condensed milk, lime juice, and eggs. Whisk until well blended and place the filling in the cooled pie shell. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes and allow to chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours. Once chilled, combine the sour cream and powdered sugar and spread over the top of the pie using a spatula. Sprinkle the lime zest as a garnish on top of the sour cream and serve chilled.
ingredients: graham crackers, sugar, butter, egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, key lime juice, powdered sugar, lime rind, whipping cream
name: the best key lime pie

steps: Rinse and drain lentils. Finely chop ginger, onion and garlic clove. Heat oil in a pot and saut chopped ginger, onion and garlic until softened. Add turmeric, hot chicken stock, crushed tomatoes and the lentils. Bring to boil and allow to simmer for 20 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender until smooth and return to the pot. Add coconut milk and heat gently.
ingredients: oil, onion, coriander, cumin, kumara, red lentil, water, chicken stock cubes, soy sauce, yoghurt
name: kumara and red lentil soup

steps: Add water, oil, honey, sugar and salt in container. Bake for basic bread. It is really good and so easy to make. To make it even better, remove from bread machine after the dough cycle. Shape in one large on 2 smaller loaves. Let rise in a warm place for 1 hour. Bake in a 375 preheated oven 30 minutes.
ingredients: water, olive oil, bread flour, whole wheat flour, sugar, salt, sun-dried tomatoes, fresh rosemary, garlic powder, active dry yeast
name: sun dried tomato rosemary bread abm

steps: In a large pot, combine chicken stock, eggs, parmesan cheese, fresh italian parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Stir occasionally over medium heat until chicken is hot, 1 to 2 minutes. Add chicken. Cover and simmer just until chicken is hot, 1 to 2 minutes.
ingredients: chicken stock, eggs, parmesan cheese, fresh italian parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: italian straciatella soup

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Mix pasta and all ingredients in a sprayed casserole dish. Sprinkle paprika on top for color if desired. Bake in 350 degree fahrenheit oven for 30 to 45 minutes until done. Serve hot.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, egg, salt, dry mustard, hot water, sharp cheddar cheese, milk, seasoned croutons
name: beyond macaroni cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled.
ingredients: garlic bread, lump crabmeat, mozzarella cheese, mayonnaise, frozen chopped spinach, scallions, garlic cloves, seafood seasoning, egg, oil
name: garlic bread topped with crab meat and spinach

steps: Melt butter and while hot, stir in marshmallows and honey bunches of oats cereal. Mix well and add to the chocolate in a double boil and heat until melted and combined. Dip into melted chocolate and paraffin or shortening with toothpick. Cool on waxed paper.
ingredients: butter, marshmallows, dipping chocolate, honey bunches of oats cereal
name: chocolate dipped snowballs

steps: Melt butter in a large saucepan. Stir in flour and seasonings till smooth and bubbling. Stir in milk stirring constantly, till thick and bubbly. Stir in ham and eggs. Heat till hot. Serve on toast.
ingredients: monterey jack cheese, cooked ham, butter, flour, baking powder, egg, cottage cheese, salt and pepper, cooked bacon
name: ham and cheese souffle

steps: With mixer on low speed blend, butter, eggs and water. By hand stir in cake mix. Add coconut and nuts. Chill dough for approximately 1 hour before placing on baking sheet. Form into large balls, place on baking sheet and press down with hand. Bake 350 degrees for 12 minutes. Let cool before removing from baking sheet.
ingredients: german chocolate cake mix, eggs, butter, powdered sugar, cream cheese
name: neiman marcus cake chocolate version

steps: Heat a skillet over medium high heat. Add oil and meat to pan and brown meat. Add chicken stock to the meat. Season the meat with paprika, worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper. When the liquid comes to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve on buns and top with chopped onion.
ingredients: lean ground beef, salt, black pepper, beef broth, garlic powder, onion, dill pickle slices, mustard, hamburger buns
name: loose meat sandwiches

steps: Place chicken pieces, bone side up on unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat, about 20 minutes or until light brown. Meanwhile in a bowl stir together oil, mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, oregano and red pepper. Brush mustard mixture onto chicken. Turn chicken, brush with remaning mixture. Broil for 5-15 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, fresh lime juice, fresh cilantro, dijon mustard, olive oil, chili powder, sea salt, pepper
name: mustard lime chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: unsalted butter, honey, scotch whisky, dark brown sugar, sweet potatoes, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, walnuts
name: honey and whisky glazed sweet potatoes

steps: Boil apples in vinegar for 1 hour. Peel skin from the apples. Mix remaining ingredients in a large, nonreactive pot and bring to a boil. Add meat and boil for 10 minutes. Cool and store in refridgerator for one week. Slice apples thinly to serve.
ingredients: apples, vinegar, sugar, mace, whole cloves, whole allspice, mustard seeds, pepper, salt
name: pickled apples

steps: Pit the cherries, and chop them roughly if desired. Wash the cherries and put them in a saucepan with the water. Cover them and bring them to a boil, stirring gently, until the cherries are all popped. Press them through a sieve, and reserve the puree. Discard the skins, stems and seeds. Mix the cherries, cherries and sugar in a large pot. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until the sugar dissolves. Boil hard until the mixture reaches the gell stage, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and skim. Seal in sterilized jars. Process in boiling water for 5 minutes.
ingredients: black cherries, black plums, sugar, rose water, red wine, cardamom, nutmeg, cinnamon, lemon juice, salt
name: lusty cherry plum jam

steps: Saut the peanut butter in the butter in a large saucepan for 5 minutes. Stir in the peanut butter. Stir in chicken stock until smooth. Add margarine and worcestershire sauce if desired. Cook for approximately 20 minutes. Add white wine. Stir in heavy cream in the last 1-2 minutes and cook only until warmed through. Season to taste.
ingredients: pumpkin puree, margarine, onion, chicken broth, creamy peanut butter, low-fat milk, salt and pepper
name: pumpkin peanut butter soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spread butter, feta cheese, french bread, kalamata olives, oregano leaves on top of mediterranean bread crisps. Bake at 350f. Spread butter, feta cheese, french bread, kalamata olives, oregano leaves on top of mediterranean
ingredients: butter, feta cheese, french bread, kalamata olives, oregano leaves
name: grilled mediterranean bread crisps

steps: Prehead oven to 250f. Place entire bag of popcorn twists into a large roaster. In a large saucepan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to foam to cook down slightly. Pour caramel mixture over popcorn twists and stir until mixed. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Allow to cool slightly and break apart.
ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, corn syrup, salt, baking soda, vanilla, popped popcorn
name: baked caramel popcorn

steps: Place the orange peel, water and sugar in a saucepan. Boil for 5 minutes. Remove the peel and let the syrup cool. Mix the orange juice with the coffee and syrup. Add the whipping cream. Pour over crushed ice in tall glasses.
ingredients: ice, sparkling water, orange juice, pineapple juice
name: pineapple orange drink brazilian

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Beat the cream cheese, shredded cheese, and taco seasoning mix until fluffy. Stir in 1 cup of sour cream. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then fold in the chilies and the red pepper. Pour in a greased spring-form pan and bake for 40 to 45 minutes. Cool for 10 minutes on wire rack. Combine the remaining sour cream with the salsa and spread on top. Bake for 5 minutes more. Refrigerate over night. To serve, unmold and spread with the guacamole or avocado dip.
ingredients: green chilies, cayenne pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, jalapenos
name: mexican cheese squares

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place onion pieces, potato chips and cheese in prepared dish, beginning with onions & ending with cheese. Mix soup and milk together. Stir in cayenne pepper. Pour soup mixture over the top of the cheese. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes or until onions are completely tender, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from heat and drain well.
