Layer onion pieces, potato chips and cheese in prepared dish, beginning with onions & ending with cheese
ingredients: onions, butter, rice, swiss cheese, half-and-half cream
name: mona s onion casserole

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add asparagus and cook, stirring, until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir the asparagus. Toss to coat and serve.
ingredients: asparagus, butter, orange, zest of, orange juice, salt and pepper
name: orange asparagus

steps: In a large saucepan, mix all ingredients except the vanilla. Cook until mixture reaches 270 degrees, or brittle ball. Take off heat and stir in vanilla. Pour over the popcorn, and stir lightly and quickly to coat. Shape quickly with butter coated hands.
ingredients: sugar, white karo, hot water, egg whites, peanut butter
name: old fashioned peanut butter roll candy

steps: Combine all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth, 1-2 minutes. Refrigerate. Sauce may become quite thick once refrigerated. Just heat for a few seconds in microwave. Recipe can be doubled or tripled and the level of buckthorn bbq sauce can be adjusted to suit personal preferences.
ingredients: ketchup, apple cider vinegar, molasses, honey, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, hot sauce
name: buckthorn bbq sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, and chile and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent, about 7 minutes. Add rice and stir to coat, add lemon peel, salt, and 3 cups water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until rice is tender, 20-25 minutes. Stir in lemon juice. Cover and let stand off heat for 15 minutes. Fluff with a fork and stir in cashews.
ingredients: butter, onion, minced garlic clove, basmati rice, turmeric, chicken broth, bay leaf, thyme, salt and pepper
name: turmeric rice

steps: In a large bowl whisk egg. Add salsa and seasoning. Mix in cheese, meat and bread crumbs. Shape into 4 patties. Grill over medium heat until done- about 15 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, butter, velveeta cheese, breakfast sausage, fresh cilantro, jalapenos, rotel tomatoes, fritos corn chips
name: tex mex scrambled eggs

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.
ingredients: vegetable oil, frozen shredded hash browns, green pepper, bacon, eggs, milk, sharp cheddar cheese
name: shortcut skillet frittata

steps: Place eggplant slices on a plate and sprinkle with salt then let them sit for 30 minutes to remove bitterness. Rinse off the cubes in a collander then pat them dry with a paper towel. Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Place eggplant slices onto a nonstick baking sheet and drizzle the oil over them. Grind the fresh pepper over the eggplant to give them all a light dusting. Sprinkle the just under 1 tsp salt over the cubes. Sprinkle the garlic powder over the cubes. Bake for 30 minutes, give it a stir midway thru.
ingredients: oil, eggplants, salt, eggs, sugar, flour, powdered sugar
name: fried eggplant with powdered sugar

steps: Heat a wok or large non-stick frying pan until hot. Add the oil, prawns and garlic and fry for 1-2 minutes, until the prawns turn pink. Remove from the pan and set aside. Add the tomatoes and squash down with the back of a spatula to release the juices. Cook for 1-2 minutes then add the wine and bubble for 1 minute. Return the prawn mixture to the pan, season with salt and pepper then toss through the drained noodles and broccoli. Divide among four bowls and serve immediately.
ingredients: prawns, extra virgin olive oil, rice, oil, onions, garlic cloves, tomatoes, salt and pepper, sweet peas
name: prawns peri peri mozambique

steps: In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired.
ingredients: lean ground buffalo, onion, green pepper, low-sodium tomato sauce, low sodium beef broth, low-sodium tomato paste, chili powder, cumin, brown sugar, dark red kidney beans
name: freshour s chili

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to over
ingredients: unsweetened cocoa, sugar, salt, milk, light cream, vanilla, cinnamon, whipped cream, orange zest
name: mrs bush s hot chocolate

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spread brisket on top and cover. Bake at 375 for 45 minutes to 1 hour.
ingredients: beef brisket, ketchup, grape jelly, onion soup mix, pepper
name: sweet and savory brisket

steps: Whisk scallions, soy sauce, gingerroot, sesame oil, cooked white rice in a nonreactive saucepan. Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce the heat to medium and cook for 15 to 20 minutes or until the sauce forms a glaze. Set aside. Preheat the broiler. Place the salmon on a broiler pan and baste with the sauce. Let sit for 15 minutes. Broil them until cooked through, about 8 minutes, basting again with the glaze. Remove the salmon from the heat and baste once more with the glaze before serving.
ingredients: sea bass fillet, scallions, soy sauce, gingerroot, sesame oil, cooked white rice
name: weight watchers asian style sea bass

steps: Place all ingredients except pecans and crackers in mixer bowl. Attach bowl and flat beater to mixer. Turn to speed 4 and beat about 1 minute, or until well blended. On waxed paper, shape mixture into a ball. Roll ball in chopped pecans. Wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate until serving time.
ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, havarti cheese, ground pepper, garlic salt, pecans, cracker
name: tasty cheese ball

steps: Combine garlic, honey, mustard, soy sauce, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a non-reactive bowl. Add chicken toss to coat each piece well. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour or up to one day. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place chicken in a singe layer on a wire rack over an oven tray. Bake 45 minutes until well browned and cooked through.
ingredients: garlic cloves, honey, dijon mustard, light soy sauce, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, chicken drummettes
name: sweet tangy garlic drumettes

steps: Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake another 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: onion, boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt and pepper, hoisin sauce, honey, ground ginger, broccoli coleslaw mix, flour tortilla
name: mu shu chicken wraps

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the first six ingredients for crust. Place half of mix in a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake crust for 10 minutes. Melt caramels and whipping cream. Place chocolate chips over baked crust, drizzel caramel over chips, then place the remaining crust mixture on top of the caramel. Bake another 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees. Cool.
ingredients: heavy cream, white sugar, white karo, butter, vanilla, pecans
name: lovely light caramels

steps: Heat oil in a deep non-stick frying pan and add the onion. Fry for about 3 minutes until tender. Then stir in the curry paste and fry for 1 minute. Add the chicken and tomatoes and a splash of water, cover and cook for 15-20 minutes until cooked through. Stir in spinach until it just wilts. Then stir in the yoghurt and coriander, season. Serve with rice, naan bread or salad.
ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, mild curry paste, dry white wine, light sour cream
name: fuss free biryani chicken

steps: Place the lemon rind, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves
ingredients: black currants, cold water, white sugar, lemons
name: old fashioned black currant lemonade

steps: Preheat the oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a second bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: apples, powdered sugar, all-purpose flour, butter, whipped cream
name: easy apple crumble

steps: In a small mixing bowl, thoroughly whisk together eggs, margarine, salt and pepper. Heat a skillet over low-medium heat. Melt butter. Then add egg mixture. As eggs cook, slowly but constantly move them around skillet. Cook only until eggs are set, yet still soft and moist--avoid overcooking. Transfer scrambled eggs to a plate and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: eggs, tap water, margarine, salt, pepper
name: scrambled eggs hotel style very simple

steps: Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the ginger root, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper, and stir fry for 5 - 10 seconds, or until the ginger root is well browned. Remove the skillet from the heat and let the oil cool to room termperature. Pour the gari over the ginger root, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper, and stir fry for 5 - 10 seconds, or until the ginger root is well browned. Pour the gari over the ginger root
ingredients: gingerroot, rice vinegar, sugar, salt
name: pickled ginger gari

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the onion. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, fresh garlic cloves, light cream, black pepper, chicken broth
name: transylvania mashed potatoes

steps: Add the casserole to a large mixing bowl. Cover and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes or until the casserole is cooked through. Remove from heat, stir in chopped chives and serve.
ingredients: smoked sausage, green beans, onion, mushroom, potato
name: smoked sausage casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place wedges in single layer on baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes. Meanwhile mix mayo, cheese and tuna together. Place wedges in single layer on baking
ingredients: tuna in water, kernel corn, mushroom soup, potato chips
name: mom s potato chip tuna casserole

steps: In a mixing bowl, beat together cheese, sour cream, and onion with electric mixer until fluffy. Stir in blue cheese, walnuts, and bacon. Mix well. Chill up to 24 hours. If dip thickens after chilling, stir in 1 to 2 tablespoons milk. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: sour cream, blue cheese, cream cheese, diced onions, hot sauce, bacon, fresh parsley
name: bacon cheese dip southern living

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Remove stem end of tomato and cut tomato into several large chunks, then coarsely chop. Stack salami slices, two at a time and cut into small wedges. Unroll crescent dough on cutting board and separate into 8 triangles. Arrange the triangles on a flat baking stone or pizza pan so they do not touch. Sprinkle triangles with equal amounts of tomato, salami, cheese and oregano. Bake 15-18 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, olive oil, garlic clove, mozzarella cheese, heirloom tomatoes, basil leaves, balsamic vinegar, sea salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh mozzarella cheese
name: pizza caprese or pizza margherita my way

steps: In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through.
ingredients: italian dressing, extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, cider vinegar, garlic cloves, black peppercorns, chicken
name: kenner patton s my chicken

steps: Cook the beets until tender in boiling salted water, drain, slip the beet skins off with your fingers. Zest and segment the orange, remove the pith and seeds. In a small sauce pan heat the apricot preserves and mix in the orange segments with the liqueur, simmer for a couple of minutes. Place the beets in a serving dish, smother with sauce and garnish with orange zest. This actually is plenty for 2 -- i generally freeze half. This actually is plenty for
ingredients: beets, sugar, ground ginger, lemons, lemon zest, almonds
name: viennese beet preserves

steps: In a heavy-bottomed pot over medium, fry the bacon until crisp. Remove the bacon and drain on paper towels. Saute the onion and garlic in the bacon grease over low heat until soft, about 3 minutes. Add the brussels sprouts and stir them around so that they are coated with the bacon grease. Add the broth and cook, covered, over low heat until the sprouts are easily pierced with a fork, about 12-15 minutes. Stir in the butter just before serving. Garnish each serving with bacon bits.
ingredients: butter, onion, garlic, brussels sprouts, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, sugar, salt, pecans
name: brussels sprouts with pecans

steps: Brown meat and onion together and drain off fat. Add tomato sauce, undrained beans, undrained tomatoes, chili powder and salt and pepper to taste. Simmer for 20 minutes. Serve over hot spaghetti. Sprinkle cheddar cheese and sour cream on top. Enjoy.
ingredients: ground beef, chili seasoning mix, ground cinnamon, tomato sauce, kidney beans, cooked spaghetti, cheddar cheese, onion
name: simple cincinnati chili

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray 13x9 pan with cooking spray. Drain butter beans and pour into pan. Add all other ingredients and mix well. Bake for 1 hour or until brown and bubbling.
ingredients: onions, oil, pork and beans, mustard, catsup, brown sugar, tabasco sauce, barbecue sauce
name: brothers barbecue baked beans recipe

steps: Spray a large nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Cook ham steak in skillet over medium heat for 3 minutes per side, or until golden brown. Remove ham from skillet and keep warm. Squeeze lemon over pan, scraping up brown bits from the bottom of the pan. Add butter to pan. Once butter is melted, add garlic, parsley and tomatoes. Cook over medium heat for approximately 5 minutes, or until tomatoes soften and begin to lose their shape. Spoon sauce over ham steak and serve immediately.
ingredients: ham steak, brown sugar, dry mustard, vinegar
name: broiled ham steak with mustard glaze

steps: Bring 1 cup water to a boil over high heat in 2-quart saucepan. Remove from heat. Add tea bags and brew 15 minutes, dunking tea bags several times. Remove tea bags and squeeze. Stir in sugar and baking soda until completely dissolved. Stir in remaining 12 cups water.
ingredients: tea bags, boiling water, apple juice, cranberry juice, sugar, lemon juice, pumpkin pie spice
name: autumn tea

steps: Preheat broiler to high. Arrange the baby peppers in a single layer on a foil-lined jelly roll pan, and broil peppers for 4 minutes on each side or until blackened and tender. Cool, combine peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon rind, red pepper, salt, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, fresh lemon juice, and toss. Cover, and refrigerate overnight, tossing after 6 hours. Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes. Stir in basil leaves, and lemon juice before serving. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: red pepper, yellow pepper, tomatoes, garlic cloves, fresh thyme leave, anchovies, fresh ground pepper, olive oil flavored cooking spray, soft fresh goat cheese
name: piemontese capsicums

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, eggs, milk, dry mustard, garlic powder, paprika
name: country potato pie

steps: Cook pasta by following the package directions, adding ham and feta during the last 2 minutes of cooking. Drain, then return to pan. In a large skillet, cook pasta by following the package directions, adding ham and feta during the last 2 minutes of cooking. In a large skillet, cook pasta by following the package directions, adding ham and feta during the last
ingredients: rigatoni pasta, cooked ham, plum tomatoes, garlic, feta cheese, mozzarella cheese, dried thyme, half-and-half, parmesan cheese
name: baked rigatoni with ham and feta

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Spread tater tots on bottom. Spread onion mixture over green beans. Spread turkey mixture over green beans. Sprinkle cheese over entire dish. Bake at 350 for 1 hour, or until cheese on top is melted and golden brown.
ingredients: onion, celery, garlic, ground beef, parmesan cheese, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, condensed cream of celery soup, frozen tater tots, cheddar cheese
name: easy tater tots topped casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Place the seeds in a bowl and add the olive oil then the seasonings. Mix well. Spread pumpkin seeds on a single layer on baking sheet. Bake for about 30 minutes depending on your oven. Stir half way through.
ingredients: pumpkin seeds, olive oil, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, seasoning salt, ground cayenne pepper, pumpkin pie spice
name: spicy pumpkin pie seeds

steps: Mix and set aside the jalapeno. In a large pan, mix and boil the sugar, water, and syrup to hardball stage. Add peanuts and stir constantly until mixture turns yellow about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add butter mixture and vanilla. Pour onto greased cookie sheet. Pat into a thickness you like with the back of a spoon. Cool and break into pieces. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: jalapeno, water, sugar, light corn syrup, peanuts, salt, butter, baking soda
name: jalapeno peanut brittle

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Lightly spray a baking dish with pam or other no oil spray. Place the cottage cheese in a strainer and drain for 5 minutes. Pack the spinach on the bottom of the dish. Add the sliced onion. Sprinkle on the adobe spice. Combine the eggs and cottage cheese in a food processor and puree until the mixture is very smooth. Pour over the spinach. Arrange the tomato slices on top. Sprinkle on the grated cheese. Bake in 375 oven until golden and the eggs are cooked apprx 25 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, butter, eggs, salt & pepper, prosciutto, basil, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese
name: basil frittata

steps: In large skillet, heat italian dressing and cook fish over medium heat, turning once, 8 minutes or until fish flakes. Remove to serving platter and keep warm. Into skillet, add wine, then pepper, dill and mustard. Bring to a boil, then simmer, stirring occasionally, 8 minutes. Stir in cream and heat 1 minute or until thickened. Serve over fish. Garnish, if desired, with baby vegetables.
ingredients: swordfish steaks, salt & freshly ground black pepper, dijon mustard, olive oil, lemon, juice of, bay leaf, dill, lemon wedge
name: grilled swordfish steaks

steps: Mix cream cheese, butter and vanilla. Stir in sugars and fold in chips and toffee bits. Refrigerate 2 to 3 hours. Form into a ball and roll in copped pecans. Serve with graham crackers or apple slices.
ingredients: cream cheese, butter, red velvet cake mix, brown sugar, powdered sugar, mini chocolate chip
name: red velvet cheeseball

steps: Heat oil in frying pan until hot. Stir-fry green onions and ginger 1 minute. Add beef. Stir-fry 4 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: apple juice, low sodium soy sauce, ground ginger, cornstarch, cold water, cod
name: apple ginger pan sauce for cod

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pour melted butter into bottom of a 9 x 13 inch pan. Sprinkle graham cracker crumbs and coconut over butter. Layer chocolate chips, butterscotch chips and nuts over crumbs and coconut. Pour condensed milk over all ingredients. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, sweetened coconut, pecans, sweetened condensed milk
name: thingies layered dessert bars

steps: In a serving bowl, layer half of the tomatoes, all of the cucumber, then remaining tomatoes. Sprinkle with onion. Combine remaining ingredients in a jar with a tight fitting lid and shake well. Pour over salad. Cover and chill for 25 to 30 minutes or until ready to serve.
ingredients: tomatoes, olive oil, vinegar, dried oregano, feta cheese, cucumbers, salt & pepper
name: cucumber boats

steps: Place blueberries, lemon juice, water, dry low-sugar pectin, sugar in a large bowl. Add to a large bowl and add cinnamon and pectin. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly for 3-5 minutes. Add sugar and bring to jam stage stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Boil for 3 minutes more. Skim off any foam with a wooden spoon. Jar as usual.
ingredients: blueberries, lemon juice, water, dry low-sugar pectin, sugar
name: blueberry jam half recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except the brown sugar and 4 tbsp cocoa and hot water. Spread into a 9x9 pan or equivalent. Bake at 350f for approximately 40 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, cocoa powder, dark cocoa, salt, water, butter, vanilla
name: dark chocolate sauce

steps: Melt butter in saucepan over medium heat. Add cream cheese, chives, dried basil, garlic clove, caraway seed, dill weed, lemon pepper seasoning, fresh snow peas. Stir in cream cheese, chives, dried basil, garlic clove, caraway seed, dill weed, lemon pepper seasoning, fresh snow peas. Stir
ingredients: cream cheese, chives, dried basil, garlic clove, caraway seed, dill weed, lemon pepper seasoning, fresh snow peas
name: pretty stuffed spring peas

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Drain the berries and reserve the syrup from one can. Stir the syrup in to the combined mixture of the cornstarch and half of the sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat. Gently stir in remaining sugar, blueberries, and lemon juice. Let stand while preparing pastry. Line a 9-inch pie pan with pastry and fill with the filling. Dot with butter or margarine. Adjust top crust on pie, cuttin slits for the steam to escape, and seal. I recommend adding some sugar over the top after sealing. Bake for 30 minutes or until filling is bubbly and crust is brown.
ingredients: blueberries, sugar, lemon juice, cornstarch, water
name: blueberry filling for pies

steps: Boil the udon noodles to taste. Meanwhile, chop the walnuts and pomegranates into pieces the size of an electron. Whisk the egg. Drain the udon noodles and combine with walnuts and pomegranates. Toss lightly. Add the walnuts and pomegranates
ingredients: udon noodles, broccoli, red pepper, walnut oil, tofu, garlic cloves, walnuts, maple syrup, pomegranate seeds, green onions
name: udon noodles with walnuts and pomegranates

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Bake in 350 oven until golden and the eggs are cooked apprx 25 minutes.
ingredients: garlic scape, swiss chard, summer squash, onion, eggs, mozzarella cheese, salt and pepper, cooking spray
name: garlic scape frittata

steps: Combine all the seasonings in a small bowl and rub evenly over roast. Place pork in a 6-quart slow cooker. Add water. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 4-5 hours or until pork is very tender. Remove pork to a large cutting board or platter and let rest for 10-15 minutes. Pull, slice or chop to serve. Serve in buns with barbecue sauce.
ingredients: pork butt, salt, ti leaves, water
name: kalua pua a roast pork

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Mix the cooked pasta, chicken, pesto, and bell peppers in a saucepan. Heat over low heat, stirring frequently, until hot. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Garnish with olives and sprinkle a little parmesan cheese on top.
ingredients: olive oil, chicken breasts, penne, sun-dried tomato, basil pesto, light cream, parmesan cheese
name: chicken pesto and sun dried tomato pasta

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together the egg yolk and sugar. Temper small amounts of the tapioca into the egg mixture until you have added at least 1 cup. Add this back into the remaining tapioca in the slow cooker. Add the lemon zest and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 15 minutes, stirring at least once. Transfer the pudding to a bowl and cover the surface with plastic wrap. Allow to cool at room temperature for 1 hour and then place in the refrigerator until thoroughly chilled.
ingredients: pearl tapioca, milk, eggs, white sugar, salt, vanilla
name: tapioca custard pudding

steps: Place tomato in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and slowly stir in sour cream and cheese. When cheese is melted, stir in tomatoes and onion. Place in a serving dish and garnish with black olive slices, if desired. Serve warm with tortilla chips.
ingredients: red chilies, hot peppers, onions, tomatoes, shrimp paste, salt, sugar, oil
name: tomato chilli dip

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine the onions, red onions, cranberries, sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt. Bring to a boil over high heat, and continue boiling until thickened, about 30-35 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and stir in the caramelized onions. Cool to room temperature. Just before serving, fold in the sour cream and mix well.
ingredients: margarine, red onions, cranberries, light brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt
name: cranberry sauce with caramelized onions

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place the crackers in ziploc bag and crush them. Melt half the butter and mix the crumbs, crab and butter in small bowl. Put stuffing in shallow dish. Cut fish into 4 equal parts and arrange them over the haddock. Dot with remaining butter and season with salt and pepper. Bake 20 minutes, then turn the broiler to hi and broil 2 minutes, until browned.
ingredients: light mayonnaise, prepared horseradish, parmesan cheese, haddock fillet, butter
name: delicious speedy baked haddock

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl, stir together melted butter, ricotta, milk, eggs and vanilla until smooth. Pour into dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Fold in berries. Distribute batter evenly into prepared muffin cups. Bake for 18-22 minutes, until a tester inserted into the cake part comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate in an airtight container. Cakes will stay moist for several days.
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, whole milk ricotta cheese, sour cream, eggs, vanilla, anise, flour
name: nicole s italian ricotta cheesecake

steps: Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips.
ingredients: tuna, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, green onions, dijon mustard, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese, lettuce leaves
name: south beach diet confetti tuna wrap

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease 8 x 8 dish. Peel and cut apples. Place apples in pan. Add cinnamon and water. Separately, mix melted butter, flour and sugars. Spread evenly and firmly on top of apple mixture. Bake 45-50 minutes.
ingredients: apples, golden raisin, ground cinnamon, water, oatmeal
name: baby cinnamon apple oatmeal

steps: In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the butter, celery, onion, all-purpose flour, minced clams, potatoes, evaporated milk, dried thyme, salt and pepper. Add the reserved clam juice to make a paste, then slowly add enough cold water to reach the desired thickness. Add the potatoes, milk, thyme and salt and pepper. Reduce heat to low and allow soup to simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Add the clams and veggies to white sauce.
ingredients: baby clams, potatoes, onion, celery & leaves, sweet green pepper, italian-style stewed tomatoes, spicy vegetable juice, dried thyme, bay leaf, bacon
name: manhattan style crock pot clam chowder

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Lightly grease a 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Melt butter in skillet. Saute celery and onion till tender, about 3 minutes. In large mixing bowl, combine cornbread, bread, celery and onions, sage and black pepper. Stir broth and beaten eggs into cornbread mixture. Blend well. Stir in chopped boiled eggs. Pour into prepared baking dish. Bake 30 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: celery, onion, parsley, black pepper, sage, cornbread, hot chicken broth, salt
name: emaw s cornbread dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: new potatoes, brussels sprouts, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, fresh oregano, salt substitute, black pepper
name: brussels sprouts and potatoes

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine maraschino cherry, pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, fruit cocktail, maraschino cherry, cool whip, italian dressing, italian seasoning, red pepper, cucumber, carrot, cucumber, carrot, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing
ingredients: pasta, sugar, eggs, flour, salt, unsweetened pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, fruit cocktail, maraschino cherry, cool whip
name: rosa marina pasta salad

steps: Mix together the flour, nutmeg, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, maraschino cherry, egg, applesauce, vegetable oil, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, maraschino cherry, egg, marasch
ingredients: flour, nutmeg, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, maraschino cherry, egg, applesauce, vegetable oil
name: applesauce cherry loaf kit hansen s

steps: Combine cranberry sauce, sugar, onion, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese, horseradish, salt, cream cheese,
ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, sugar, onion, horseradish, salt, cream cheese
name: cranberry cheese holiday dip

steps: In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the brown sugar, cornstarch, salt, and milk. Combine well, then cook on high in the microwave for 8 minutes. Remove the bowl from the microwave. Pour a small amount of the mixture into a small bowl. Add the egg yolks to the smaller bowl, mixing until well-combined. Pour the egg mixture back into the large bowl, combining well. Return the bowl back to the microwave and cook on high for and additional 1-2 minutes, until the mixture has thickened. Remove from the microwave and stir in the butter and vanilla. Stir until the butter has melted. Pour into the prepared pie shell and chill for at least 2 hours.
ingredients: real butter, eggs, sugar, flour, salt, vanilla, buttermilk, unbaked pie crusts
name: best buttermilk pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, monterey jack cheese, mild chiles, italian sausage
name: speckled egg bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the first six ingredients for crust. Place half of mix in a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake crust for 10 minutes. Melt caramels and whipping cream. Place chocolate chips over baked crust, drizzel caramel over chips, then place the remaining crust mixture on top of the caramel. Bake another 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees. Cool.
ingredients: pitted dates, water, maple syrup, lemon rind, sugar, butter, all-purpose flour, oats, baking soda, salt
name: maple date bars

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first 7 ingredients. Add the steaks. Seal the bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steaks, uncovered, over medium-hot heat for 8-10 minutes or desired doneness.
ingredients: vegetable oil, shallot, shiitake mushrooms, olive oil, boneless rib-eye steak, low sodium soy sauce
name: seared rib eye steak sauteed shallots shiitake mushrooms

steps: Spray rack of boiler pan with nonstick spray. Preheat the broiler. Whisk together the brown sugar, mustard, and dill in a small bowl. Sprinkle on the broiler rack and spoon the brown sugar glaze on top. Position 7 inches from the heat and broil until lightly browned and just opaque in the center, about 6 minutes.
ingredients: dark brown sugar, dijon mustard, soy sauce, ground ginger, salmon fillets, sesame seeds
name: brown sugar and ginger glazed salmon

steps: In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad.
ingredients: potatoes, french dressing, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, sour cream, prepared mustard, cucumber
name: creamy sour cream potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together cake mix, egg and butter. Spread into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan. In a separate bowl, mix together powedered sugar, beaten eggs, softened cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth. Spread mixture over bottom layer. Bake 30-40 minutes, until top layer turns a light golden brown.
ingredients: lemon cake mix, butter, egg, egg yolks, saltine crackers, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice
name: lemon crumb bars

steps: Put the onions into the saucepan with the little bit of oil and cook over low heat until lightly yellowed do not brown. Add water and potatoes with salt and caraway seed. Let it cook for few minutes then add sauerkraut and polish kielbasa. Let it cook for at least 20 minutes or until potatoes are soft. Then add some sour cream, pepper and vinegar if needed.
ingredients: potatoes, coleslaw mix, onion, caraway seeds, polish sausage, chicken broth
name: polish sausage and cabbage soup

steps: Mix the garlic in a food procesor. Add the egg and process until well mixed. With the motor running, slowly pour in half of the olive oil. Stop the machines and add the lemon juice. Then, with the motor running, slowly pour in the rest of the olive oil and process until the mixture is thickened and the oil is emulsified. Add salt and pepper to taste. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, covered, and up to 12 hours before serving. This will allow the raw garlic flavor to mello.
ingredients: cauliflower, garlic, egg yolks, extra virgin olive oil
name: cauliflower and aioli

steps: Preheat oven to 400 c. Grease small baking dish with the butter. Cut a cross in the bottom of each peach. Place cross side up in dish. Top each peach with vanilla seeds. Drizzle evenly with honey. Pour wine into dish around peaches. Bake 45 minutes or till tender. Serve immediately with a spoonful of mascarpone.
ingredients: sugar, water, almond extract, flour tortillas, mint sprig, brown sugar, butter, peach pie filling, vanilla ice cream
name: peachy enchiladas

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan forced. Place salmon in a baking dish and pour over stock and season, cover with foil and bake for 10 to 15 minutes o until just cooked through. Remove from oven and cool salmon in stock for 10 minutes. Remove the salmon from the stock. Add sour cream, cucumber, wine and tarragon to stock and whisk to combine, season and transfer to a jug. Meanwhile steam potato over a saucepan of simmering water for 8 to 10 minutes or until tender. Place salmon and potato on plates and top salmon with cucumber sauce and tarragon leaves and drizzle oil over potatoes and season and serve.
ingredients: salmon fillet, ground cumin, ground paprika, ground red pepper, yogurt cheese, cucumber, dill, garlic, salt
name: salmon with cucumber sauce

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a glass bowl. Place the lamb in a extra large heavy-duty plastic bag or glass bowl. Pour the marinade over the lamb, and turn to coat well on all sides. Cover tightly with plastic wrap. Place in the fridge for a minimum of 24 hours. When ready to grill, remove from fridge and save marinade for basting if desired. Turn the grill to high heat. Sear both sides for about 5 minutes on each side. Reduce grill temperature to medium heat and finish cooking the lamb. You may baste the lamb with the leftover marinade if desired.
ingredients: butterflied leg of lamb, garlic cloves, chili, curry powder, of fresh mint, parsley, natural yoghurt
name: butterflied leg of lamb masala

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, water, cherry pie filling, cherry gelatin, pepsi, crushed pineapple, pecans, frozen whipped topping, cheddar cheese. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thick. Remove from heat and chill. In a large bowl, combine the sugar, water, cherry pie filling, cherry gelatin, pepsi, crushed pineapple, pecans, frozen whipped topping, cheddar cheese. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, water, cherry pie filling, cherry gelatin, pepsi, crushed pineapple, pecans, frozen whipped topping, cheddar cheese. In a large mixing bowl,
ingredients: sugar, water, cherry pie filling, cherry gelatin, pepsi, crushed pineapple, pecans, frozen whipped topping, cheddar cheese
name: cherry pepsi salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease an 8 x 4 inch loaf pan and dust with powdered sugar, shaking off excess. Whip the cream until stiff. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the cream mixture. Stir to combine. Spoon batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake just begins to pull from the edges of the pan. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out on rack. The cake will keep in the fridge for up to a week wrapped air-tightly in plastic wrap and foil.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, flour, cream of tartar, sweet cream, egg yolks, powdered sugar, cornstarch, milk, almonds
name: 1890 cream cake

steps: In a large pot with boiling salted water cook pasta until al dente. Drain. In a large saucepan heat the italian dressing and olive oil together over medium heat. Add drained spaghetti. Toss well to coat. Add chopped tomatoes, cooked chicken, and grated parmesan cheese and toss lightly. Serve warm.
ingredients: rotini pasta, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, garlic powder, dried basil, dried oregano, sun-dried tomato, parmesan cheese
name: simple pasta toss

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender.
ingredients: onions, sugar, margarine, mashed potatoes, pot roast, frozen green peas, gravy, parmesan cheese, paprika
name: leftover meat potato casserole

steps: Preheat oven broiler. Spray the chicken breasts with olive oil spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Broil the chicken breasts for 7 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Chop chicken breasts and put in refrigerator to cool. While oven is still hot, spread your almond flakes on a cookie sheet and toast on the broiling rack. Please keep an eye on them because they toast quickly, and you dont want burnt almonds. Once the chicken is cooled, mix in the almonds, celery, onion, mustard and mayo. You can either put the salad straight onto your choice of bread and add whatever you like on your sandwiches or can be eaten out of iceburg lettuce leaves for a no carb version.
ingredients: whole chicken breasts, broccoli, dried dill, lemon, juice of, red onion, sour cream, mayonnaise, salt and pepper
name: chicken salad with broccoli

steps: Place cabbage in a medium saucepan. Add water to cover by one inch. Bring to a boil. Partially cover and boil until tender crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Drain. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium low heat. Add garlic and mushrooms and saute, stirring occasionally, until mushroom liquid evaporates, about 6 minutes. Add carrots, sugar, thyme, salt and pepper, cover and cook over low heat 15 minutes. Uncover, remove garlic. Discard. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring often, until carrots and mushrooms are very lightly browned, 2-5 minutes.
ingredients: cabbage, carrot, garlic cloves, onion, fresh ginger, black pepper, salt, white vinegar, canola oil
name: sauteed cabbage and carrots

steps: Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, cooking oil, dried thyme, black pepper, salt, garlic cloves, salsa, lime wedgepreparation:Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, cooking oil,
ingredients: sweet cherries, onion, fresh sage, salt, fresh thyme, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, white wine vinegar, garlic salt, pepper
name: cherry stuffed grilled chicken

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour to form a roux, cooking until bubbly. Whisk in 1 jar of clam juice, until smooth. Pour in half-and-half, and rest of clam juice, stirring constantly. Stir in clams, reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes. Season with pepper and serve.
ingredients: new england clam chowder, cream of potato soup, half-and-half, minced clams, butter, onion
name: easy crock pot clam chowder

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. In a large mixing bowl, mix the eggs, onion, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, ground cumin, ground coriander. Spread this mixture evenly in a baking dish. Pour the crushed tomatoes and any juices over the potatoes. Pour water into the pan. Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes. After this time, reduce oven temperature to 180c, remove foil and bake an additional 30 minutes until the potatoes are tender and the sauce has thickened.
ingredients: eggs, onion, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, ground cumin, ground coriander
name: shikshuka scrambled eggs and tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: ground beef, minute rice, water, onion, salt, celery salt, garlic powder, pepper, tomato sauce, worcestershire sauce
name: aunt becky s porcupine meatballs

steps: In a large nonmetal dish or resealable food storage plastic bag, combine all ingredients except steak. Mix well. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover dish or seal bag. Refrigerate atleast 4 hours or overnight to marinate. Place steak on gas grill over medium heat. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until desired doneness, turning once or twice. To serve, cut steak across grain into slices. Place on serving platter.
ingredients: reduced sodium soy sauce, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, sesame oil, lime juice, sirloin steak
name: ginger sesame marinated steak

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease four 9 x 5-in loaf pans. Cream butter, sugar and eggs. Mix sour cream and soda in a separate bowl. Let stand until foamy. Add vanilla, bananas, salt and flour. Mix well. Place in 4 prepared loaf pans. Bake for 50 minutes or until cake tests done.
ingredients: baking soda, sour cream, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, bananas, salt, flour
name: bestest ever banana bread

steps: Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Pour into pops molds or plastic or paper cups. Freeze about 2 hours or overnight until firm. Insert wooden spoon or stick or plastic spoon into each for handle. Freeze 8 hours or overnight until firm. Freeze 8 hours or overnight until
ingredients: milk, sugar, gelatin powder, cold water, vanilla extract, sour cream
name: white jello

steps: Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to creamed mixture. Add vanilla, soda mixture, oatmeal, and flour. Roll into balls and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes.
ingredients: margarine, milk, granulated sugar, cocoa, peanut butter, vanilla, oatmeal
name: oatmeal drop cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray non-stick spray in cassarole pan. Cook pasta and drain. Add onion & bell pepper. Cook and stir for a few minutes. Add pasta, chicken, tomatoes, olives, italian seasoniong. Mix to blend. Put mozzarella on top. Cook in oven for about 35 minutes.
ingredients: broiler chickens, red potatoes, italian salad dressing, italian seasoning, parmesan cheese
name: chicken potato bake

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic, olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, mayonnaise, prepared horseradish. Add the garlic, olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, may
ingredients: bulb of garlic, olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, mayonnaise, prepared horseradish
name: 2bleu s creamy garlic spread

steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Process till smooth. Heat frypan to moderately high. Grease lightly. Drop dessertspoons of batter into pan. Allow room fror spreading and turning. Cook till bubbles appear on top. Turn and cook other side till golden brown.
ingredients: self raising flour, salt, bicarbonate of soda, sugar, egg, buttermilk, butter
name: moody pikelets

steps: In a food processor, combine the peels of grapefruit and orange with the buttermilk until the mixture is wet, but do not mix too much. Add sugar, salt and butter and beat well. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder and baking soda. Add the mixture of buttermilk and mix until the mixture is wet, but do not mix too much. Spread the mixture in 12 greased muffins tins. Cook in a preheated oven of 375 f 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the muffins comes out clean. Let cool on a rack for about 5 minutes. Remove from the pan and let cool completely.
ingredients: sugar, water, pink grapefruit juice, campari, grapefruit zest
name: grapefruit and campari granita

steps: Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
ingredients: frozen hash browns, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese, lean ham, onion, green pepper, egg substitute
name: breakfast casserole weight watchers

steps: Heat oil in a pot and saute garlic until golden brown. Add onion, potato, rice, broth, parsley, and 2 cups water. Stir, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. Add more water if soup appears too thick. Stir in cheese and serve.
ingredients: rice, onion, drippings, tomatoes, red peppers, salt, parsley, sugar, paprika
name: fijian tomato soup

steps: Place banana halves in small banana split dish or shallow bowl, with cut sides facing inward. Spread peanut butter evenly over open banana. Spoon yogurt in the middle. Top with cereal. Serve immediatley.
ingredients: banana, lemons, salt, pepper
name: banana split

steps: Preheat oven to 200c, lightly grease a 29cm x 21cm rectangular flan pan, and press the pastry firmly into the pan. Trim and discard any excess pastry and chill the pastry-lined pan for 15 minutes. Spread the onions and garlic over the pastry, top with the sliced tomatoes, anchovy fillets and olives, and drizzle with the reserved oil. Bake for 40-45 minutes, until the pastry is crisp and golden. Serve.
ingredients: deep dish pie shell, vidalia onions, olive oil, salt and pepper, four-cheese mexican blend cheese, monterey jack pepper cheese, firm ripe tomatoes, green onion top, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, margarine
name: vidalia onion sweet tart

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and saut for about 3 minutes, until translucent. Add the carrots, broth and salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered for about 20 minutes, or until carrots are tender. Stir in the chiles, leek, water, carrots, canned white beans, pear, fresh rosemary. Cool and pure the soup with a food processor, blender or immersion blender. The easiest way to puree is to add the solid ingredients to your food processor with just enough liquid to puree and then mix this thick pureed mixture back into the broth. Reheat, if necessary and serve warm.
ingredients: butter, leek, water, carrots, canned white beans, pear, fresh rosemary
name: creamy carrot white bean and pear soup

steps: Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: unflavored gelatin, tomato soup, cream cheese, green onion, mayonnaise, shrimp, tortilla chips
name: shrimp mold

steps: In a small saucepan, saute walnuts until tender. Sprinkle with flour. Stir until blended. Gradually add milk. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Add cheese crumbles. Stir. Pour into jar. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour to blend flavors before serving.
ingredients: blue cheese, butter, garlic powder, onion powder
name: blue cheese butter

steps: Mix vinegar, honey, mustard and pepper with wire whisk until well blended. Gradually add oil, honey, mustard and pepper with wire whisk until well blended. Grad
ingredients: fresh spinach, dried craisin, red onion, bacon, honey, lime juice, dijon mustard
name: cranberry spinach salad

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the butter, white wine, lemon juice, garlic, and parsley. When the butter melts completely, remove from heat. Arrange shrimp in a shallow baking dish. Pour the butter mixture over the shrimp. Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes or until the shrimp are pink and opaque, reduce heat. Remove shrimp and set aside. Add garlic and cook 2-3 minutes. Do not allow garlic to brown - it will make it bitter. Add white wine, and lemon juice. Cook until wine is reduced by half. After it is reduced, add italian seasoning. Reduce heat to low, and add butter. If pan is too hot, the butter will separate. Add shrimp back into sauce, add parsley, and season to taste with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese.
ingredients: shrimp, onion, garlic cloves, butter, chicken broth, dry white wine, salt, pepper
name: joe s shrimp scampi

steps: Cook cauliflower but leave a little crunchy. Break up into flowerettes and put in a 8x8 dish. Stir together the mayo and the mustard. Spread on top of cauliflower the grated cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 oven about 5 minutes or til the cheese melts. Very good and very easy to make.
ingredients: cauliflower, cheddar cheese, challah, prepared mustard, mayonnaise, eggs, salt, pepper
name: cauliflower and cheese puff

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, add the beans and saute until tender. Sprinkle on chili powder and cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add beans, salsa, and water and cook about 5 minutes. Serve beans over rice, with sour cream on top.
ingredients: red kidney beans, olive oil, mexican seasoning, nutritional yeast
name: easy roasted red kidney beans with a kick vegan

steps: Place mushrooms, chicken flavor stuffing mix, butter, garlic clove, onions, salt and pepper in a large saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool.
ingredients: mushrooms, chicken flavor stuffing mix, butter, garlic clove, onions, salt and pepper
name: super simple stuffed mushrooms

steps: Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:Combine cranberry-raspberry juice, red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh strawberries, club sodapreparation:
ingredients: red wine, coconut rum, orange, lime, fresh lemon, kiwi, green grape, fresh mango, fresh strawberries
name: cuban sangria

steps: Place popcorn in large bowl. Microwave butter 20 seconds or until melted. Stir in butter. Toss with salt and sugar, if desired, and stir again.
ingredients: popcorn, butter, olive oil, salt
name: ed s homemade microwave buttery popcorn

steps: In a food processor with a metal blade or a blender container, combine the beans, broth, salsa, and cumin. Process 1 minute, or until smooth. Heat bean mixture in a medium saucepan over medium heat, until thoroughly heated. To serve, ladle soup into 2 individual bowls. Spoon 1 tablespoon of sour cream on top of each. Swirl gently. Sprinkle with green onions.
ingredients: smoked sausage, salsa, pinto beans, black beans, white beans, red beans, fresh cilantro, cheddar cheese
name: four bean soup

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the vinegar, cider and brown sugar. Cook over high heat until bubbly, stir the first 30 seconds to dissolve sugar. Turn down heat to medium and continue to cook for 15 minutes more. In a small skillet, cook the diced bacon over medium heat until crisp. Drain bacon. Add bacon, apples and orange juice to the vinegar mixture. Bring back to a boil and cook for 30 minutes more. Add bacon
ingredients: smoked bacon, red onions, apples, garlic, sugar, apple cider vinegar, fresh thyme, kosher salt, black pepper
name: apple bacon relish

steps: Melt butter on medium heat in a 10-inch skillet. Add mushrooms. Cook, covered, stirring occasionally, for 10- 15 minutes or until tender. Stir in half& half and sherry and cook for another 2 minutes. Stir in half& half
ingredients: butter, olive oil, shallot, garlic cloves, mushrooms, sherry wine, salt and pepper, parsley
name: nif s sherry sauteed mushrooms

steps: In a food processor or blender, mix all the herbs, garlic and lemon juice. Slowly add olive oil and blend. Add zest. Pour marinade over olives. They can be served immediately but will improve with a day to marinate.
ingredients: olive oil, tequila, citrus juice, fresh cilantro, jalapeno, orange, zest of, lime, zest of, salt, black pepper
name: tequila citrus marinade

steps: Bring water to a boil in a large skillet over medium-high heat, add onions and saute 8 minutes for until crisp tender. Drain, keep warm. Heat oil in large, non-stick skillet over medium-high heat, add pancetta, shallot, balsamic vinegar, fresh green beans, coarse salt, ground black pepper, salt and ground black pepper. Add balsamic vinegar and cook for 1 minute. Remove from heat. Place green beans in large pot of lightly salted, boiling water. Cook until just crisp-tender, 5-6 minutes. Drain immediately and add green beans to shallot mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Toss until coated, place in dish, sprinkle pancetta over top, and serve.
ingredients: fresh green beans, shallot, dijon mustard, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh dill
name: green beans with balsamic dijon and dill thanksgiving

steps: Combine cream cheese, dill, garlic powder, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, cream cheese, green onions, red bell peppers, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese
ingredients: dill, garlic powder, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, cream cheese, green onions, red bell peppers
name: yummy cream cheese spread

steps: Cook spaghetti as directed on package. Meanwhile, heat dressing and garlic in large nonstick skillet on medium heat. Add chicken and broccoli. Cook and stir 5-7 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Stir in tomatoes and half of the mozzarella cheese. Cook 1-2 minutes or until heated through, stirring occasionally. Drain spaghetti. Place on serving plate. Top with chicken mixture, remaining mozzarella cheese, and the parmesan cheese.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, green onions, fresh mushrooms, grape tomatoes, italian dressing, spaghetti, parmesan cheese
name: chicken spaghetti supreme

steps: Combine lemon juice and sugar. Add 4 teaspoons cherry juice from the jar. Pour one jigger, whiskey to each of two ice filled glasses. Fill both glasses with the sour mixture. Top with cherries.
ingredients: bourbon, lemon, juice of, sugar, egg white, red maraschino cherry, ice
name: whiskey sour

steps: To make the tiramisu, bring the water to a boil in a small saucepan. Add as much sugar as will dissolve into the water, then add the amaretto and lemon juice. Just before it starts to boil, add the cherries, and stir it over a high heat until the liquid takes on the color of the cherries. Reduce the heat, and simmer until most of the liquid has evaporated. Place the mixture in a small bowl, cover tightly, and place in the fridge. To make the coffee cream, simply combine the cheese, kahlua, and coffee in a bowl, and stir until the mixture is uniform in color. Add sugar to taste, if necessary. Once the cherry sauce has cooled, arrange the three components in layers in a martini glass, with the biscuit crumbs on the bottom, cherry sauce in the middle, and coffee cream on top. Refridgerate until the coffee cream is firm. Decorate with powdered sugar, and place a cherry on top.
ingredients: mascarpone cheese, ricotta cheese, granulated sugar, brewed espresso, marsala, cocoa powder, bittersweet chocolate, fresh fruit
name: tiramisu dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, combine flour, baking powder and salt. In a large bowl, beat brown sugar and butter until fluffy. Add egg whites and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture alternating with water. Stir in chips. Spread into a foil-lined 9- x 13-inch baking pan. Bake until golden, about 20 to 25 minutes. Cool on wire rack. Remove foil and cut into 24 two-inch squares.
ingredients: cooking spray, cake mix, canned pineapple, syrup, applesauce
name: weight watcher 3 pt pineapple upside down cupcake

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Place chicken pieces in 13x9-inch baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. Arrange onion slices over top. In small saucepan, combine ketchup, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and liquid smoke. Heat over medium heat 2 to 3 minutes or until sugar dissolves. Pour over chicken. Bake for 30 minutes. In small saucepan combine the tomato sauce, sugar and soy sauce and cook until the sugar has dissolved. After the chicken wings are cooked, thickly spread the sauce over the wings and bake for 30 to 40 minutes or longer or until browned and very tender. Serve warm.
ingredients: brown sugar, barbecue sauce, dried thyme, chili powder, ground red pepper, frozen apple juice concentrate, chicken pieces, salt and pepper
name: sweet barbecue broiled or grilled chicken

steps: Bake at 350 for 1 hour and 15 minutes, basting often with sauce. Bake at 350 for 1 hour and 15 minutes, basting often with sauce. Bake at
ingredients: egg, white breadcrumb, onions, fresh parsley, seasoning salt, prepared mustard, cooked ham, apricot-pineapple preserves
name: bolitas de jamon aruba

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cheddar cheese, plain yogurt, butter, eggs
name: cheese muffins

steps: Heat wok or deep frying pan over high heat. Add oil, onions, ginger and curry and cook 1 minute. Add stock and coconut milk and bring to simmer. Add the pumpkin, cover and cook another 5 minutes until the pumpkin is soft. Stir in basil. Serve with rice.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, fresh ginger, pumpkin, chicken stock, coconut cream, salt and pepper
name: coconut pumpkin and ginger pasta sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Remove seeds from chilies. Slice open the chilies and line a 9x13 casserole with half of them. Cover chilies with half of the cheddar and half of the jack cheese. Use the rest of the chilies on top of the cheeses. Beat the egg whites till stiff peak. Beat the yolks and add flour, milk, salt and. Pepper. Fold in whites and pour over top of chilies and cheese. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Top with the remaining cheeses. Top with salsa, if desired.
ingredients: poblano peppers, cheddar cheese, eggs, whipping cream, onions, salt, garlic, fresh ground pepper
name: chile relleno pie

steps: In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika.
ingredients: cream cheese, milk, garlic salt, pepper, chicken breasts, green onions, wonton wrappers, margarine, paprika
name: chicken wonton stars

steps: Combine all ingredients except mascarpone in a blender or food processor. Puree until smooth. With machine running, add mascarpone in a. Thin stream. Process until well blended. Transfer to a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate for up to 2 days. Chill before serving. Serve on leaf lettuce or mixed baby greens. Does not include chilling time.
ingredients: berries, balsamic vinegar, mascarpone cheese, milk, honey
name: berries vinaigrette with mascarpone

steps: Heat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Prepare tortillas in this order, lay tortillas on flat surface, spread 1 tablespoon of salsa on half of tortilla, place half of meatloaf over salsa, top with half of cheese. Fold other half of tortilla over cheese. Repeat with rest of the ingredients for other tortilla. Place both in skillet and lightly brown on both sides, about 10 minutes total, or until desired brownness is reached. Cut each in half. Eat and enjoy.
ingredients: whole wheat tortillas, cheddar cheese, apples, butter
name: apple cheddar quesadillas

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat. While pasta cooks, melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add flour. Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly with a whisk. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly with a whisk. Increase heat to medium-high. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat. Simmer 3 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly, stirring frequently. Remove from heat, and stir in cheese, salt, and pepper. Combine the sauce, pasta, and spinach, tossing gently to coat.
ingredients: spaghetti, garlic clove, red pepper flakes, extra virgin olive oil, fresh spinach, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, pine nuts, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: linguine with spinach

steps: Place the beef, onions, carrots, garlic, red wine, water, fresh rosemary, bay leaves in a dutch oven, cover with water and boil for twenty minutes or until potatoes are tender. Add canned vegetables. You probably will not need the entire can of tomato juice. Simmer on stove for thirty minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve with hot corn bread.
ingredients: corned beef, onions, carrots, garlic, red wine, water, fresh rosemary, bay leaves
name: new zealand corned beef hot pot

steps: In a large mixing bowl, stir together the pita breads, garlic-infused olive oil, pesto sauce, garlic clove, mozzarella cheese, roma tomatoes, onion, italian seasoning, fresh basilpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together the pita breads, garlic-infused olive oil, pesto sauce, garlic clove, mozzarella cheese, roma tomatoes, onion, italian seasoning, fresh basilpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together the pita breads, garlic-infused olive oil, pesto sauce, garlic clove, mozzarella cheese, roma tomatoes, onion, italian seasoning, fresh basilpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together the pita breads, garlic-infused olive oil, pesto sauce, garlic clove, mozzarella cheese, roma tomatoes, onion, italian seasoning, fresh basilpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together the pita breads, garlic-infused olive oil, pesto sauce, garlic clove, mozzarella cheese, roma tomatoes, onion, italian seasoning, fresh basilpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together the pita breads, garlic-infused olive oil, pesto sauce, garlic clove, mozzarella cheese, roma tomatoes, onion, italian seasoning, fresh basilpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together the pita breads, garlic-infused olive oil, pesto sauce, garlic clove, mozzarella cheese, roma tomatoes, onion, italian seasoning, fresh basilpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together the pita breads, garlic-infused olive oil, pesto sauce, garlic clove, mo
ingredients: pita breads, garlic-infused olive oil, pesto sauce, garlic clove, mozzarella cheese, roma tomatoes, onion, italian seasoning, fresh basil
name: margherita pita pizzas

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a baking sheet with nonstick spray. Slice the onions width wise and then break them apart into rings. Put the flour in 1 bowl, the egg whites into a second, and into the third put the bread crumbs and all the spices. Dip each onion ring into the flour, then the egg whites, and then the bread crumbs. Place them on the baking sheet and then repeat with the next ring. Bake them all for about 20 minutes or until crispy.
ingredients: dry breadcrumbs, seasoning salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, sweet onion, egg white, cooking spray
name: air fried onion rings

steps: Cook pasta to desired doneness. Drain and cover to keep warm. In medium skillet, cook bacon until crisp-tender. Remove and set on paper towels to drain. Reserve 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Chop bacon, fry gently in a frying pan. Add mushrooms. Blend the sun-dried tomatoes and their oil, garlic, and basil in a food processor and blend until the tomatoes are finely chopped. Transfer the tomato mixture to a large bowl. Stir in the parmesan. Add the pasta, mushrooms and bacon to the pesto and toss to coat, adding enough reserved cooking liquid to moisten. Season the pasta, to taste, with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: onion, tomatoes, bacon, black pepper, penne
name: penne with bacon and tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Slice the bread in half lengthwise, then lightly butter the bread and wrap in foil. Bake at 350 degrees f for 15 minutes. Brown the ground beef and drain the excess fat. Add the onion, and cook until the onion is transparent. Remove from the heat and add the sour cream, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper. Remove the bread from the oven and spread the meat mixture on each half. Arrange the chopped tomatoes and chopped bell pepper on top of the meat mixture and top with the grated cheese. Place back in the oven and bake only until the cheese is melted. Serve hot.
ingredients: ground turkey, french onion soup mix, ranch dressing, honey, dijon mustard, black pepper
name: easy turkey stroganoff

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place roast in a large roasting pan. Combine soup mix, broth and beer in a bowl and stir until soup mix is dissolved. Pour over roast and place onions around it. Bake for 2 to 3 hours, basting frequently, or until beef is tender and looks stringy when pulled with a fork. If roast starts getting too crispy, cover pan with foil or lid. Slice meat thinly and serve on rolls. Serve juices in individual cups or bowls to dip sandwiches into.
ingredients: beef broth, dark beer, worcestershire sauce, pastrami, sandwich buns, swiss cheese, mustard
name: beer pastrami sandwich

steps: In a blender, puree raspberries, water and wine. Pour into a large saucepan, add the cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon and cloves. Bring just to the boil over a medium heat. Strain into a large bowl, and let cool. Whisk in the lemon juice and yogurt, then chill several hours before serving.
ingredients: fresh raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurt, sour cream
name: chilled raspberry soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees and spray a 10 x 15 inch pan with cooking spray. Place the cauliflower in a large bowl, drizzle with oil and toss to coat. Spread the cauliflower in prepared pan and sprinkle with any remaining crumbs. Bake 18 to 20 minutes, until lightly browned.
ingredients: olive oil, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic cloves, green chilies, cauliflower, plain breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese
name: cauliflower crunch

steps: Combine soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, garlic and ginger with chicken breasts and allow to marinate. Pour rice and broth into rice cooker. Cover with lid and press brown rice setting. Allow to cook for 1 hour. Place chicken breasts and marinade on foil sprayed with nonstick cooking spray, top with slivered onion and make packet. Place vegetables in seperate foil packet. Carefully open lid of cooker and place steam tray into the rice cooker. Place chicken packet in tray.
