Close the lid and steam for 10 minutes then open lid again and place vegetables in allow to steam till cooker changes to keep warm. Carefully check chicken for doneness and using oven mitts carefully remove steam tray from the rice cooker and serve immediately.
ingredients: chicken breasts, soy sauce, honey, spring onions, garlic, fresh ginger, five-spice powder, vegetable oil, walnut oil, port wine
name: soy sauce and honey marinated chicken

steps: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Saute the chicken in hot oil for 5-8 minutes or until no longer pink, stirring constantly. Add the mushrooms, garlic, ginger, and cayenne pepper. Cook 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Add in the hoisin sauce, soy sauce, and cooked pasta. Toss to coat. Cook a couple of minutes or until pasta is heated through. Add the green onions, stir to mix. Serve immediately.
ingredients: linguica sausage, white onion, lard, salt & pepper
name: pan fried linguica and onions

steps: In a pot, add olive oil and saut garlic and sofrito for a minute. Add salt, pepper, cumin and oregano to sofrito and mix. Add beans and mix well. Add tomato sauce and beer or broth and mix. After 5 minutes, add apple cider vinegar and stir. Add 2-3 cups of already cooked white rice and mix well. Cook until all is absorbed. Let sit for 10-15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: vegetable oil, butter, sofrito sauce, stuffed olives, salt, pigeon peas, long grain rice, water
name: spanish rice and pigeon peas arroz con gandules

steps: Place potatoes in a dutch oven, and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add bacon, cheese, sour cream, chives and stir.
ingredients: bacon, yukon gold potatoes, buttermilk, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh chives, extra-sharp cheddar cheese
name: mashed potato skins

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool in pan and cut into bars.
ingredients: butter, semisweet dark chocolate squares, milk chocolate pieces, raw brown sugar, honey, eggs, plain flour, macadamia nuts
name: chocolate macadamia nut brownies

steps: Roast meat, along with 1 cup water and bouillon cubes until very tender or cook on low in the crock pot 8-10 hours, until tender. Shred meat with a fork after cooking and retain 1 cup of the juice from cooking. Add rest of the ingredients to shredded meat. Put in a crock pot and cook on low heat 3-4 hours. Serve over dinner rolls.
ingredients: corned beef brisket, peppercorn, beer, bay leaves, garlic
name: slow cooked corned beef for sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green peppers alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: fennel bulbs, red potatoes, red bell pepper, red onion, olive oil, kosher salt, pepper
name: roasted potatoes and fennel

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Empty the canned peaches into a 1 quart baking dish that has been sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix in the cinnamon and brown sugar. Sprinkle with the crumb cake mix and cut butter into 4 equal portions and place on top. Cover and bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes. Remove cover and continue to cook for an additional 10 minutes or until top is brown. Can be served immediately or is also good room temperature.
ingredients: white cake mix, flour, baking powder, nuts, peach pie filling, eggs, lemon extract, sugar, butter
name: old fashioned peach cake

steps: To make the dressing, in a small bowl, combine the lemon juice and garlic. Slowly whisk in olive oil until the mixture is creamy. Season with salt and pepper. Place arugula in a serving bowl and add dressing to taste. Mix well. Top with avocado slices, drizzle a bit more dressing over them and season with a pinch of salt. Using a vegetable peeler, shave slivers of parmesan over the top.
ingredients: granny smith apple, pear, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, salt and black pepper, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, mixed greens
name: parmigiano regianno with fruit and aged balsamic

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine thegarlic salt, seasoned salt and paprika. Add potatoes, seal bag and toss to coat. Transfer potatoes to an ungreased microwave-safe dish. Dot with butter. Microwave, uncovered, on hig for 3 minutes. Turn potatoes. Cook 2-3 minutes longer or until tender. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand until cheese is melted. Roast potatoes for 35-40 minutes, spooning the oil over them 2-3 times. Remove from oven and sprinkle with a pinch of salt.
ingredients: baking potatoes, butter, chili seasoning mix, salsa
name: zesty style potato wedges

steps: In large pot, combine potatoes with enough salted water to cover. Bring to boil. Cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash. In a large pot, combine potatoes with enough salted water to cover. In a large pot, combine potatoes with enough salted water to
ingredients: small red potatoes, sour cream, buttermilk ranch salad dressing mix, condensed cream of chicken soup
name: crock pot ranch potatoes

steps: Place all ingredients in the slow cooker and set on low. Cook for approximately 4 to 6 hours or until apples are tender. The time will vary depending on the type of apples used. Remove cinnamon stick. Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: sweet apples, whole cloves, water, sugar, nonfat vanilla yogurt
name: clove spiced apples

steps: Heat oil in small skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook until browned on all sides. Combine remaining ingredients except rice and add to skillet. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 5-10 minutes. If mixture is too thick after simmering, add milk to desired thickness. Serve over warm white rice.
ingredients: chicken breast, olive oil, linguine, pasta sauce, cream cheese
name: quick chicken for four

steps: Place frozen chicken breasts in crock pot. Mix juice, broth, honey, dry mustard, teriyaki sauce, broccoli floret, cauliflower floret, carrotpreparation:Place frozen chicken breasts in crock pot. Mix juice, broth, honey, dry mustard, ter
ingredients: frozen orange juice concentrate, chicken breasts, marjoram, ground nutmeg, garlic powder, water, cornstarch
name: low fat glazed chicken in crock pot

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a glass bowl. Place lamb in a extra large heavy-duty plastic bag or glass bowl. Pour the marinade over the lamb, and turn to coat well on all sides. Cover tightly with plastic wrap. Place in the fridge for a minimum of 24 hours. When ready to grill, remove from fridge and save marinade for basting if desired. Turn the grill to high heat. Sear both sides for about 5 minutes on each side. Reduce grill temperature to medium heat and finish cooking the lamb. You may baste the lamb with the leftover marinade if desired.
ingredients: onion, olive oil, vinegar, black peppercorns, salt, oregano, bay leaf, garlic, leg of lamb
name: marinated boned leg of lamb

steps: Preheat oven to 200oc. Make a small cut at the top of each fig and push in a little piece of gorgonzola. Wrap each fig in a slice of prosciutto. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes. The cheese will melt and the prosciutto will be crisp. Serve immediately on rocket leaves dressed in olive oil and salt, and finish with a little finely cracked pepper.
ingredients: dried black figs, water, black olives, lemon juice, whole grain mustard, garlic clove, capers, fresh rosemary, extra virgin olive oil, salt and black pepper
name: fig and black olive tapnade

steps: Mix together the butter, shortening, sugar, egg, pamelas ultimate baking and pancake mix, cream of tartar, cinnamon. Add the remaining ingredients and blend until smooth. Spoon onto nonstick baking sheet. Bake at 375 degrees f for 10-12 minutes. Cool completely before icing.
ingredients: butter, shortening, sugar, egg, pamelas ultimate baking and pancake mix, cream of tartar, cinnamon
name: gluten free snickerdoodles

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine all ingredeints except lamb, whisking together in a medium-sized bowl until well blended. With a brush, coat leg of lamb evenly with the mixture. Leave at room temperature on lamb for 2 hours. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 minutes. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45
ingredients: lamb chops, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt and black pepper, unsalted butter, dijon mustard
name: lick your chops

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Add broccoli rabe and stir until the leaves start to wilt. Season with salt and pepper. Cover skillet and let cook 3 to 5 minutes, turning occasionally.
ingredients: broccoli rabe, lemon, olive oil, unsalted butter, garlic cloves, green olives, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: broccoli rabe and olives with lemon

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken breasts in a 9x13 casserole dish and spread olives and artichoke hearts all over and around the chicken breasts. Pour the chicken broth over all. Sprinkle with tarragon. Bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken, tomatoes, frozen artichoke hearts, yellow onions, red pepper flakes, capers
name: easy artichoke chicken

steps: Mix all ingredients into a large bowl. Let marinade in the fridge for about one hour. Preheat oven to 350. Place tofu on a cooling rack with a baking pan underneath to catch excess liquid. Bake for 10 minutes, turn tofu and bake for another 15 minutes, or until the edges start to brown.
ingredients: honey, olive oil, ginger, garlic, sesame seeds, firm tofu
name: toddler tofu bites

steps: In a small saucepan, heat the oil on medium-high heat until shimmering. Put the chili powder into the oil, and stir into a smooth paste. Allow the mixture to form bubbles around the edges. Pour in the chili powder, and stir to combine. Add cumin, honey, or lime, if using, and boil, covered, for 5 minutes. Uncover saucepan and boil until the sauce changes from burnt orange, to red-orange, to brick red. The sauce should be reduced by half. This will take 10 minutes or so. Turn heat to low. If using chocolate, stir in while still hot but not bubbling. Serve or refrigerate.
ingredients: hamburger, cumin, water, chili powder, garlic powder, sugar, ketchup, dried onion flakes, salt
name: awesome hot dog chili sauce

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, and garlic. Sweat the onions for about 2 minutes. Add the cumin and beans. Stir and add the red pepper flakes. Simmer for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: black beans, onion, green pepper, garlic cloves, cumin powder, oregano, salt, red wine vinegar
name: frijoles negros cuban black beans

steps: Beat the eggs with a whisk until fluffy. Add the cheese, flour, baking powder and salt, and 1 teaspoon of the sugar, and mix well. Heat a griddle or a nonstick skillet. Add 1 tablespoon each of the butter and the vegetable oil, and heat until the butter is melted. Pour a heaping tablespoon of batter onto the skillet, flattening slightly with the back of the spoon. Cook in batches until golden brown, turn and brown on other side. Repeat with the remaining batter, using the rest of the butter and oil when needed. Drain the pancakes on paper towels. Mix the remaining sugar and the cinnamon in a small bowl. Serve the pancakes sprinkled with the cinnamon and sugar.
ingredients: eggs, all-purpose flour, sugar, butter, cream cheese
name: cream cheese pancakes

steps: Spray a large roasting pan very well with oil and set aside. In a large pan combine butter and karo. Add brown sugar when butter has melted. Stir well and bring to a boil. Once boiling starts set timer to 10 minutes. Pop all 5 bags of popcorn and pour into a very large bowl sprayed with oil. When sugar mixture is ready remove from heat and add vanilla, mix well then add soda and mix well. Pour popcorn into the roasting pan and bake at 250f for one hour. Pour cooked popcorn back into the deep tote and break up carefully with the wooden spoon. Continue to break up with the wooden spoon as the corn cools keep in a large sealed baggie.
ingredients: popped popcorn, salted peanuts, unsalted butter, dark brown sugar, dark corn syrup, pure vanilla extract
name: good eats slacker jacks

steps: In a large wok or nonstick frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and ginger and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add scallops and stir to coat with garlic mixture, then cook 1 minute. Mix in snow peas and cook 1 minute. Stir in broth and soy sauce and cook just until simmering. Sprinkle with green onions and mix with noodles.
ingredients: black-eyed peas, chili peppers, onion, salt, eggs, water, oil
name: koos

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix the potatoes with french onion soup mix, cream, butter, cream of onion soup, milk, salt and pepper. Pour over top. Bake covered at 350 degrees for 1 hour, then uncover and bake until done.
ingredients: potatoes, french onion soup mix, cream, butter
name: scalloped potato with french onion base

steps: Combine all ingredients, except red pepper, cheese and egg substitute in a non-stick skillet which has been sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Lightly brown the squash, peppers, corn, onions, squash and zucchini. In medium bowl, combine the egg substitute, the cheese and red pepper. Fold the browned mixture into the egg mixture. Pour into a lightly greased tart pan and bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes or until lightly brown and set in the middle.
ingredients: butter, zucchini, summer squash, onion, eggs, sour cream, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf, cheese
name: summer squash frittata

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Whisk together lime juice, kool-aid lemon-lime powdered drink mix, whipped topping, and lime juice. Pour into pie shell. Bake until filling is evenly set and shell is light browned, about 15-20 minutes. Cool to room temperature and then refrigerate for 2 hours. Serve with a spoonful of cool whip on top.
ingredients: pretzels, sugar, butter, sweetened condensed milk, lime juice, kool-aid lemon-lime powdered drink mix, whipped topping
name: key lime margarita pie

steps: Place chicken in slow cooker and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook on low about 4 hours or until the chicken is done. Add the spinach and cook just until the spinach starts to wilt.
ingredients: skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, black pepper, onion, heavy cream, romano cheese, butter, broccoli, egg yolks
name: chicken broccoli alfredo low carb

steps: In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, 4 cups hot water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 30-40 minutes, or until chicken falls easily from the bone, stirring twice during cooking. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until noodles are tender.
ingredients: chicken breasts, carrots, yellow onion, celery, chicken broth, seasoning salt, wide egg noodles, tortellini
name: double noodle chicken soup

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: butter pound cake, brandy, sherry wine, blanched almond, custard
name: tipsy cake

steps: Slice beef over rice and serve.
ingredients: stewing beef, water, condensed beef broth, cream of mushroom soup, salt, pepper
name: crock pot beef over rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a standard size bundt pan, 9 x 13-inch baking pan, or two 9-inch cake pans. In a large bowl, mix together the yellow cake mix, sugar, oil, pumpkin, water, cinnamon and eggs. Beat until well blended. Transfer to the baking dish or cake pans. Bake for 45 minutes. For glaze, cook together the butter, whipping cream and brown sugar for 3 minutes, stirring. When slightly cooled, pour over cake.
ingredients: eggs, pumpkin pie filling, condensed milk, cinnamon, nutmeg, yellow cake mix, butter
name: thanksgiving dessert

steps: Place stew meat in crockpot. Add tomatoe juice, vegatables, soup starter, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, hot sauce, parmesan cheese, vegetable beef soup mixpreparation:Place stew meat in crockpot. Add tomat
ingredients: ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, beef broth, water, sugar, salt, pepper, ro-tel tomatoes, frozen mixed vegetables
name: spicy beef and vegetable soup

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: chicken pieces, flour, seasoning salt, garlic powder, paprika, ground red pepper
name: lazy oven fried chicken

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add avocado, garlic, lemon juice, cilantro, tomatoes, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream, parmesan cheese, sour cream,
ingredients: avocado, lemon, garlic cloves, salt, fresh basil, extra virgin olive oil, pasta, fresh ground black pepper
name: creamy avocado pasta

steps: Melt butter in a medium-heave skillet over medium heat. Mix in the next six ingredients. Saut for 30 seconds and add shrimp. Saut shrimp until they are opaque in centre, about 3 minutes, turning occasionally. Stir in parsley and serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: garlic cloves, butter, medium shrimp, white wine, monterey jack cheese, fresh parsley
name: shrimp monterey

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package. Be sure to just cook to al dente stage. Drain and return to pot. Place pot on burner but turn off burner. Stir in oil. Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well. I have also added broccoli to pasta water while cooking pasta and this is very good too.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, onion, tomato sauce, vodka, butter, olive oil, garlic, dried basil
name: bow tie pasta and vodka sauce

steps: In a nonreactive bowl, combine mustard, garlic, vinegar, salt and pepper with 2 teaspoons water. Slowly whisk in olive oil, forming a creamy marinade. Stir in basil. Add the chops to the marinade and coat evenly. Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour and up to four hours. Remove from refrigerator and let sit until arriving at room temperature. Heat grill to very hot. Remove excess marinade from chops and grill uncovered about 3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warm platter and serve. Preparation time does not include marinade and sitting time.
ingredients: of fresh mint, balsamic vinegar, ground cumin, dry mustard, honey, salt, fresh ground black pepper, lamb loin chops
name: cumin honey and mint marinated lamb chops

steps: Cook bacon until crips. Crumble. Measure 3 teaspoons of bacon fat into skillet. Stir in remaining ingredients, leaving out cabbage. Cook mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and clear. Cool to room temperature. Put cabbage into salad bowl. Pour cooled dressing over it. Add crumbled bacon. Chill.
ingredients: bacon, onion, flour, vinegar, water, salt, pepper, brown sugar, red cabbage, caraway seed
name: sweet and sour cabbage

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice.
ingredients: butter, blue cheese, parmesan cheese, chives, garlic powder, french bread
name: blue cheese garlic bread

steps: Cook eggs in boiling water for 20 minutes, cool under running water. Peel and cut eggs in half lenghtwise, remove yolks and set whites aside. Put still warm yolks into a plastic food storage bag with mayonnaise, mustard, pickle juice, worcestershire sauce and seasonings. Squeeze bag to mash yolks and mix ingredients. Refrigerate filling and eggs whites seperately. Fill egg whites just before service.
ingredients: hardboiled egg, picante sauce, mayonnaise, bacon
name: tex mex devils

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray an 8-inch square baking pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine oats, peaches, sugar, egg whites, vanilla extract, almond extract, skim milk. In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Beat with a fork or wire whisk until blended. Add to oat mixture, mixing well. Place mixture in prepared pan. Bake, uncovered, 50 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: black plums, nectarines, brown sugar, flour, margarine, oats, cinnamon
name: peaches and plums

steps: Place each chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic, and salt. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink.
ingredients: mayonnaise, dried rosemary leaves, dried thyme leaves, garlic salt, lemon, juice of, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: quick and low cal grilled bistro chicken

steps: Place chicken pieces in crockpot. Sprinkle the garlic salt and onion soup mix over the chicken. Pour salad dressing and water over the chicken. Cover and cook for 7-8 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Shred chicken from the bones, and return to crock pot. Serve on hamburger buns.
ingredients: chicken, ketchup, water, brown sugar, dry onion soup mix
name: chicken hurry

steps: In small bowl, thoroughly mix sour cream and flour. Heat butter in a small skillet over medium-high heat. As soon as the foam disappears from the melted butter, break eggs one by one into the hot butter. Add salt and pepper to taste. When eggs begin to solidify, gently spoon sour cream over them, cover, and let cook another half minute to a minute, depending on personal preference. With spatula, transfer eggs to a warm serving plate.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, chili powder, turmeric powder, salt, pepper, lemon, juice of
name: fried boiled eggs

steps: Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, lettuce, tomatoes, corn tortilla, avocado, vegetable oil, cheese
name: moms tacos

steps: In a medium saucepan cook the onion and celery in hot margarine or butter until tender. Stir in flour and curry powder. Add the chicken broth and worcestershire sauce. Cook and stir until bubbly. Stir in the cooked chicken and tomato juice. Heat through. Season with salt and pepper if desired. Serve over hot rice.
ingredients: butter, onion, green bell pepper, garlic clove, curry powder, dried thyme, stewed tomatoes, salt, pepper
name: tomato curry sauce

steps: In a medium saucepan combine all the ingredients except for the pure extract, if using. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly for about 5 minutes or until the brown sugar dissolves. Be careful that the sauce does not burn. If necessary, reduce heat to avoid burning. Remove pan from heat, add the optional pure extract if using, and whisk well. Serve warm.
ingredients: butter, whipping cream, brown sugar, vanilla
name: praline sauce

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together butter, sage, garlic, brussels sprout, parsnip, baby carrots, butternut squash in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: butter, dried sage, garlic, brussels sprout, parsnip, baby carrots, butternut squash
name: carrot squash roasted vegetable medley

steps: In a lrg saucepan, combine cranberry juice, brown sugar, cinnamon sticks, cloves, white zinfandel wine. Bring to a boil, reduce heat & simmer uncovered for 5 minute remove spices. Add white zinfandel. Heat till just warm. Ladle into mugs or transfer to a warm, heatproof pitcher & pour into mugs.
ingredients: orange juice, cranberry juice, dry white wine, orange liqueur, sugar, seltzer water, strawberries
name: ww cupid s cocktail 2 pts

steps: Heat oil and saute garlic along with the oregano. Stir in leeks and water mixing well. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally 8 to 10 minutes or until tender. Serve immediately.
ingredients: onion, mushrooms, leeks, dry oregano, salt and pepper, vegetable oil cooking spray
name: sauteed leeks mushrooms onions

steps: Spray a nonstick frypan with veggies cooking spray and heat to medium. Spray veggie cooking spray over both sides of the cod fillets. Sprinkle pine nuts, italian seasoning, salt and pepper over both sides of the cod fillets. Place cod into medium hot frypan, cook for about 5 minutes, carefully turn and cook a further 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish.
ingredients: butter, lemon juice, pine nuts, cod fish fillets, greens, lemon wedge
name: cod fish with pine nut brown butter

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy
ingredients: green beans, olive oil, garlic clove, dried rosemary, salt
name: rosemary and garlic green beans 2 ww points

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Season both sides of chicken with some salt& pepper and some cinnamon to taste. Saute chicken in oil about 5 minutes per side or until cooked through and no longer pink inside- but still moist. Spoon pineapple mixture over each serving and serve immediately. If you prefer, you may instead grill chicken.
ingredients: watermelon, strawberry, red onion, jalapeno peppers, of fresh mint, olive oil, lime juice, sugar, chicken
name: rotisserie chicken with fire ice salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Grease a muffin pan. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, brown sugar, baking powder and soda. In another bowl stir together oats and yogurt, stirring in banana, oil and egg. Stir mixture into flour mixture and stir until moistened. Put in muffin pans and bake for 20-25 minute until done.
ingredients: quick oats, water, coconut extract, banana, unsweetened coconut, walnuts, sugar
name: banana and coconut oatmeal

steps: In a medium pot, cook the salmon over medium heat until the fat renders. Transfer the salmon to a paper towel to drain, reserving 2 tablespoons fat in the pot. Add the potatoes and onion and cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, for 3 minutes. Stir in the creamed corn, milk and 1 cup water and bring to a simmer. Add the salmon, lower the heat and simmer until the potatoes are tender and the salmon is cooked through, about 15 minutes. Using a fork, break up the salmon into small chunks. Stir in the cooked bacon and season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: salmon, onions, celery, shoestring carrots, fat-free chicken broth, fat free cream cheese, brown rice, dill weed, salt, water
name: slow cooker salmon chowder

steps: Preheat over to 375f. Dredge filets in butter. Dredge filets in bread crumbs. Dredge filets in minced garlic. Sprinkle with seasoning salt. Spay small casserole dish add filets and bake covered with foil for 25 minutes. Uncover and broil for 3 or more minutes, depending on if ya want them crispier. Good served with rice and veggie of your choice.
ingredients: trout, bacon, salt, pepper
name: baked trout

steps: Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whippreparation:Blend cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant
ingredients: white cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, instant pistachio pudding mix, whole milk, powdered sugar, cool whip
name: pistachio poke cake st patty s day cake

steps: Preheat oven to 500 deg. Place sliced potato wedges on a cookie sheet. Drizzle with oil to coat and season with herb seasoning. Roast potatoes and turn after after 15-20 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese liberally on potatoes and roast another 10 minutes.
ingredients: frozen french fries, processed cheese, milk, bacon, jalapeno, roma tomatoes, ranch dressing
name: baked cheese fries

steps: In a mixing bowl, beat together cheese, sour cream, and onion with electric mixer until fluffy. Stir in blue cheese, walnuts, and bacon. Mix well. Chill up to 24 hours. If dip thickens after chilling, stir in 1 to 2 tablespoons milk. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: cream cheese, green olives, sharp cheddar cheese, bacon
name: olive and cream cheese dip

steps: Place broccoli in a steamer basket and set in a saucepan over 1 inch of boiling water. Cover and steam just until tender, approx. 5 minutes. To prepare the sauce, combine the orange juice, honey and ginger in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Add the cornstarch mixture and return to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook the sauce until thickened, about 1 minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Stir in the lemon juice and the sesame oil. Arrange the broccoli in a serving bowl. Top with the sauce, sprinkle with sesame seeds.
ingredients: dark sesame oil, vegetable oil, red pepper flakes, garlic, soy sauce, sugar, lemon juice, water, broccoli
name: hot sesame broccoli

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, unsalted butter, eggs, light corn syrup, light brown sugar, vanilla extract, salt, pecan halves, unbaked pie shells
name: ghirardelli chocolate pecan pie

steps: In a pressure cooker at 10 pounds pressure for 30 minutes. After cooker has depressurized, remove jars to a wire rack and attach seal. Process in a pressure cooker at 10 pounds pressure for 30 minutes. After cooker has depressurized, remove jars to a wire rack and attach
ingredients: zucchini, sugar, lemon juice, crushed pineapple, water, apricot jell-o
name: zucchini marmalade

steps: Place pecan halves, plain breadcrumbs, salt, paprika, dried oregano, cayenne pepper, boneless pork chops, flour, buttermilk. Bake 30 minutes at 400 turning over chops half way through. Bake 30 minutes at 400 turning over
ingredients: pecan halves, plain breadcrumbs, salt, paprika, dried oregano, cayenne pepper, boneless pork chops, flour, buttermilk
name: cajun pecan pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat butter and brown sugar until well combined. Add eggs, one at a time, and vanilla. In another bowl, with a whisk, mix flour, salt, and chocolate bars. Add dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix together. Spread the mixture in an 8-inch square buttered pan. Bake for about 45 minutes. Put the pan on a wire rack and spread the caramel sauce on the cake while it is still hot. Let the cake cool in the pan.
ingredients: quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, butter, caramel sauce, white sugar
name: easy peasy caramel granola

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place foil on baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes or until chicken is fully cooked. Carefully cut open the packets.
ingredients: chicken pieces, potato, onion, cream of mushroom soup, cream, flour, salt, pepper
name: chicken in foil

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold.
ingredients: fresh ginger, peanut oil, lemon juice, curry powder, ground cumin, dijon mustard, salt, chicken wings
name: curry marinade chicken wings

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Lightly oil a 12 hole muffin pan. Line moulds with a slice of ham so the ends stick out over the top. Break an egg into each hollow, top with tomato and scatter with chives, parmesan, salt and pepper. Bake for 18 minutes or until egg is set. Remove from oven and leave to cool for 5 minutes. Run a knife around each mould to loosen ham. Cool on rack.
ingredients: puff pastry, ham, tomatoes, chives, spring onion, cream cheese spread, eggs, cream, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: breakfast pies

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except cheese. Bake at 350f for 25 minutes and stir after 12 minutes. Optional take a cup of cheese and mix it in the mixture when you stir after 12 minutes. Place back in oven for 8 minutes. Take remaining cheese and put it on top of the mixture and replace in oven for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted. I usually double this recipe. Take remaining cheese and put it on top of the
ingredients: cream cheese, salsa, taco seasoning, chicken breast, monterey jack cheese, tabasco sauce
name: creamy southwestern chicken dip

steps: Heat the oil in a non-stick saute pan over medium heat. Add the potatoes and cook until golden brown. This is best achieved by allowing the potatoes to sit on the bottom of the pan for a few minutes before stirring to create a browning. Once potatoes are cooked, 5-10 minutes, remove from pan and place on a plate lined with a paper towel to cool. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients except for the additional 2 tablespoons oil. Add the potatoes and stir to combine. Wipe out the pan and heat a the pan over medium heat. Add the fat and allow to coat the entire pan. Add the potato mixture and cook stirring gently until it begins to set. At this point, turn the heat up to medium-high and allow the bottom to brown. Cover with a lid for a few minutes to set the top and remove from heat. Turn out onto a plate and serve with sour cream or thick yogurt and green onions for garnish.
ingredients: masa harina, salt, baking powder, shortening, warm water, muenster cheese
name: pupusas el salvadorean tortilla

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until smooth. Combine flour, salt and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy.
ingredients: chocolate chips, pecans, butter, sugar, salt, vanilla, flour
name: marble cookies

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix margarine, sugar, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine
ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, low-fat milk, brown sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, baking powder, egg, fresh peaches
name: peach cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a greased pie plate, mix chicken, broccoli, 2 cups of cheddar, and onion flakes. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, bisquick, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour egg mixture over chicken mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top and bake a few more minutes until it melts. Let cool slightly before cutting.
ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, cheddar cheese, cooked chicken, onion, bisquick baking mix, milk, salt, pepper, eggs
name: impossibly easy chicken n broccoli pie

steps: Heat oil until you think it is hot enough. You can check with a cube of bread. Drain the cauliflower and let cool. Mix together in a bowl the red cauliflower, onion, lime, cauliflower, chopped tomatoes, bell peppers, caster sugar, feta cheese, salt, flat leaf parsley. Fry until golden brown. As soon as you remove it from the fat, sprinkle it with more cheese.
ingredients: onion, lime, cauliflower, chopped tomatoes, bell peppers, caster sugar, feta cheese, salt, flat leaf parsley
name: red cauliflower

steps: In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, butter, sugar, and vanilla. Beat in melted chocolate. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Cover and chill until serving.
ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, cool whip, creamy peanut butter, vanilla extract, whipped cream, salted peanuts, chocolate sauce
name: peanut butter pie ii

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired.
ingredients: red potatoes, vidalia onion, butter, roasted garlic, fresh parsley, salt and pepper
name: grilled garlic potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 375-400f. Remove fibrous end pieces of asparagus. Lay asparagus across shallow baking dish and add oil, salt, lemon juice, and pepper. Roll and toss to coat well. Arrange the oiled asparagus in the pan so they do not overlap. Bake in oven 20 minutes.
ingredients: almonds, cornstarch, chicken broth, fresh asparagus, lemon peel, pepper
name: asparagus almondine

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: carrot, water, butter, salt, brandy, fresh parsley
name: brandied carrots

steps: Mix all of the ingredients in a small mixing bowl. Place the tuna balls on top of the tuna and corn filling. Bake at 375 degrees for 20 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: solid white tuna packed in water, corn flake crumbs, mayonnaise, egg, green onions, prepared mustard, white sauce mix, milk, frozen peas, dried dill weed
name: tuna balls with cream sauce

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: english muffins, black olives, green onion, sharp cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, salt, curry powder
name: curry pizza appetizers

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray the pie plate with cooking spray. Combine flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar in a medium bowl. Add the butter, eggs, and vanilla. Stir well. Stir in the chocolate morsels and nuts. Spoon into a greased 9-inch pieplate. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack
ingredients: sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, powdered milk, water, mint extract, green food coloring, cool whip free, miniature chocolate chips, chocolate graham wafer pie crust
name: chocolate mint pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: fresh parsley leaves, fresh cilantro leaves, onion, olive oil, garlic cloves, chili powder, dried oregano leaves, salt, salmon fillets
name: fresh herb rubbed salmon fillets

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist.
ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, pepper, frozen hash browns, ham, cheddar cheese
name: oven omelette

steps: Cook noodles in boiling water and salt in dutch oven for 10-12 min, stirring occasionally, until tender but firm. Drain well. Turn into large bowl. Add remaining 6 ingredients. Toss until well coated.
ingredients: butter, soy sauce, fresh parsley, garlic powder, dried thyme, dried rosemary, rubbed sage
name: herb butter for poultry

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: butter, eggs, flour, monterey jack cheese, chilies, small curd cottage cheese, baking powder, salt
name: chili cheese casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a medium non-stick skillet, over medium heat, add the first 4 ingredients and cook until meat is no longer pink and onion is tender. Drain if needed. While meat mixture is browning, boil water. In a large bowl add rest of ingredients except shredded cheese. Mix well. Pour into a greased or sprayed 2-quart baking dish. Cover with lid or foil and bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese and bake until cheese is melted and lightly browned.
ingredients: cooked rice, cheddar cheese, butter, curry powder, bread
name: rice au gratin

steps: In a small bowl whisk together first five ingredients and set aside. Crush lemon pepper with a motar and pestle, then spread evenly in a pie plate. Coat the tuna steaks with the crushed seeds. In a large non stick skillet, heat oil over med high heat, and cook tuna steaks 3-4 minutes per side, until golden and just cooked through. Transfer tuna to serving plates. Add honey glaze to hot skillet and simmer one minute, then pour over tuna. Serve with jasmine rice.
ingredients: tuna steaks, stock, salt, lemon juice, black pepper, dijon mustard, oil, chives
name: lemon pepper tuna

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Spread the flaked almonds over a small plate. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate, and top each with another slice. Dip sandwiches into egg mixture, then press into the almonds, to coat. Heat the remaining butter and oil in a pan. Add almond-coated, chocolate-filled sandwiches and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side or until golden. Cut into quarters and serve immediately.
ingredients: milk, almond extract, vanilla extract, eggs, bread, butter, almonds, brown sugar, cinnamon
name: bear claw french toast

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: apples, brown sugar, sugar, flour, cinnamon, butter, egg
name: simple swedish apple pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: shortening, granulated sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, peanut butter, enriched flour, baking soda, salt
name: peanut butter cookies

steps: Place potatoes into a large pot and fill with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil and cook until tender, about 8-10 minutes, depending on the size of the potatoes cubes. Meanwhile, fry bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned and crisp. Remove bacon from the skillet to drain on paper towels. Add the onions to the bacon grease in the skillet and fry until tender, stirring often. Drain excess grease. When the potatoes are done, drain the water out of pot and mash. Mix together and serve.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, salt, butter, lard, bacon, milk
name: basler rosti with bacon and onion

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool.
ingredients: butter, honey, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips
name: honey chocolate chip cookies

steps: Combine margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine,
ingredients: margarine, mars bars, corn flakes, semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter
name: really easy and good cornflake mars bars squares no bake

steps: In a heavy saucepan, whisk together powdered sugar, cocoa, salt, milk, vanilla, butter, nuts. Beat until smooth. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla & nuts. Pour into pan.
ingredients: powdered sugar, cocoa, salt, milk, vanilla, butter, nuts
name: 2 minute microwave fudge

steps: Preheat the broiler. Brush a baking sheet with oil. Lay the fish on the baking sheet in a single layer. Brush with 1 t of oil and season with salt and pepper. Combine the tomatoes and garlic in a small bowl. Stir in the remaining t oil. Season with salt and pepper. Broil the fish for 4 minutes. Turn over with a spatula, top with the tomato mixture, and continue to broil for another 4 to 5 minutes. Check doneness by inserting a knife between layers of the flesh. The meat should be just translucent. Spoon pan juices back over the fish and serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: cod fish fillets, plum tomatoes, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf
name: roasted fish with tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until just tender. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired.
ingredients: baby potatoes, olive oil, shortcut bacon, garlic clove, olive oil flavored cooking spray, rump steak, light sour cream, coarse grain mustard, chives, lemon juice
name: steak and mustard cream potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, toss the nuts with the maple syrup, olive oil, herbs and cayenne. Spread the nuts on a rimmed baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes., stirring occasionally, until browned. Season the nuts with salt and pepper and toss frequently until cooled.
ingredients: olive oil, green swiss chard, garlic, red wine vinegar, pine nuts, golden raisin
name: swiss chard pine nut and raisin topping

steps: Brown hamburger. Mix hamburger, soup and green beans. Put this mixture in a buttered 9x13-inch cake pan. Layer the tater tots over the top. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes.
ingredients: hamburger, condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed cream of celery soup, shredded cheddar cheese, frozen tater tots
name: becky s tater tot casserole

steps: Wash and pick over the beans, removing loose skins or shriveled beans. Put in a large covered pot and cover with hot water. Soak over night if you want to cut down on cooking time. When beans start to simmer add ham bone, salt pork or bacon. Add more water as needed but only hot or boiling water. Never add cold water the beans will turn dark. If you cook without a lid the beans will also turn a dark color. When the skins are almost as tender as the inside of the beans, they are done. They should not be broken. Add salt and allow to stand before serving.
ingredients: dry pinto beans, water, margarine, salt, pepper
name: my best pinto beans

steps: Spray inside of slow cooker with cooking spray. Combine teriyaki sauce, mustard, honey, black pepper, boneless veal loin, vegetable oil in small bowl and mix well. Place pork chops in cooker. Pour mixture over top. Cover and cook on low heat 7-8 hours.
ingredients: teriyaki sauce, mustard, honey, black pepper, boneless veal loin, vegetable oil
name: veal chops with whole grain mustard and honey

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, with electric mixer at medium speed, beat together butter and shortening until light and fluffy. Add sugar and cream together until very light. Add vanilla, scraping down sides of bowl as needed. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each egg. Gradually fold in flour until a soft, workable dough forms. Shape into balls and place on cookie sheets. Dip the bottom of a flat bottomed glass in sugar and use it to mash down the balls of dough. Bake in preheated oven until done. Immediately remove from pan to cool.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, milk, vanilla extract, eggs, cinnamon, ginger
name: cauldron cakes spice cakes from harry potter

steps: Melt butter. Add butter. Saute until melted. Add cream and bring to a boil. Slowly add parmesan, allowing to melt. Season to taste with white pepper. Toss with pasta and serve with decadent fettucine sauce.
ingredients: butter, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, nutmeg, salt, white pepper
name: decadent fettucine alfredo sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Peel beets and slice into very thin slices. Mix the remaining ingredients together in a small bowl. In a large ziploc bag place the beets and contents of bowl. Shake well to make sure beets are completely coated with liquid. Place beets on a baking sheet coated with nonstick cooking spray and bake for 45 minutes to an hour turning beets halfway through. Keep an eye on them to make sure they dont burn.
ingredients: beet, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, fresh rosemary, water, salt and pepper
name: roasted beets with a rosemary glaze

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the water and milk. When bubbles just begin to break the surface, slowly add the grits, whisking constantly. Cook, stirring frequently and scraping the bottom of the pan, until thickened and cooked, about 7 minutes. Add the cheese and butter and stir just until melted. Remove from the heat. Add salt to taste and hot pepper sauce, if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: water, milk, salt, hominy grits, eggs, sharp cheddar cheese, butter
name: baked hominy grits with cheese

steps: Boil the beets with their skins for about 30 to 40 minutes, let them cool and peel. In a little bowl mix the olive oil, vinegar and garlic. Cut the beets in round slices and place on a plate. Pour the dressing over the beets and sprinkle with the walnuts. You can also cut in cubes and serve in a deeper bowl.
ingredients: beets, onion, apple, dill pickle, salt, lemon juice, sugar
name: warm or cold beet salad

steps: Cook rice according to package directions. Let cool slightly, then add rest of ingredients. Mix throughly and put in a loaf pan, lined with plastic wrap overlapping edges. Refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight. Remove from loaf pan by pulling up on plastic wrap. Invert on plate and remove wrap. Serve cold.
ingredients: rice, eggs, butter, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: lovely leftover rice dish

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. On a cutting board, with a fork, mass the garlic into a paste with the salt and pepper. Add the butter and mash into garlic paste. Arrange the salmon in a single layer in a baking dish. Top it with the garlic butter and drizzle with lemon juice. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until salmon is just cooked through. Sprinkle with the parsley and serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: canned salmon, egg whites, lemon juice, garlic cloves, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, salt and black pepper, extra virgin olive oil
name: garlic salmon burgers

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. At the top of the loaf, cut a round section and hollow out the bread,. In a food processor, add the mayo, grated parmesan cheese, drained artichokes and garlic cloves. Process until it resembles large flake oatmeal or to your liking. Fill the hollowed out bread and replace the round cut out section. Wrap in aluminium foil and bake in the oven for about 40 minutes. I cut up a bagette for dipping and serve them around the hot garlic dip.
ingredients: french bread, butter, sesame seeds, garlic cloves, sour cream, monterey jack cheese, parmesan cheese, parsley flakes, artichoke hearts, cheddar cheese
name: artichoke french bread

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion in butter until tender. Add rice and orzo and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes. Add chicken broth and lemon juice and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed. Fluff penne pasta with fork and stir in chopped parsley.
ingredients: penne pasta, heavy cream, butter, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, lemon zest, black pepper, salt
name: athena s lemon greek penne pasta

steps: Cook pasta in water and broth in a heavy skillet untill just tender. Do not drain add soup, milk and tuna. And mix well. Sprinkle cheese on top. Mix bread crumbs and butter and put on top heat through.
ingredients: condensed chicken broth, water, spiral shaped pasta, cream of mushroom soup, milk, chunky salsa, tuna, cheddar cheese
name: tuna and cheddar skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, instant coffee granules, cocoa powder, water, olive oil, dairy-free margarine, wholemeal self-rising flour, dark chocolate chips, icing sugar
name: chocolate brownie diabetic

steps: In a large bowl, combine brown sugar, butter, eggs and vanilla just until blended. Combine flour, baking powder and salt. Add to brown sugar mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Spread into a a greased 13x9-inch pan. Bake at 350 for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Cut into bars.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, walnuts, white chocolate chips
name: blondies with walnuts

steps: Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, cream of chicken soup, cooked chicken, sour cream, cheddar cheese, ritz crackers, margarine
name: a picky eaters chicken casserole

steps: In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt. Gradually add to the creamed mixture. Stir in the popcorn, chocolate chips and pecans. Drop by tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto greased baking sheets. Bake at 350 for 13-14 minutes or until golden brown. Remove to wire racks to cool.
ingredients: popped popcorn, sugar, butter, light corn syrup, baking soda, vanilla extract
name: vanilla popcorn

steps: In a medium saucepan, bring the sugar, cream, butter and corn syrup to a boil over medium heat stirring constantly. Lower heat and boil gently, stirring often, until sauce thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon. Remove from heat and stir in whiskey and vanilla. Allow to cool slightly before serving. Can be refrigerated up to one week. Warm gently before serving.
ingredients: veal escalopes, butter, lemon, white wine, chicken, cream, egg yolk, ground mace, salt and pepper, seasoned flour
name: scotch collops

steps: Heat butter and oil in a large saucepan. Add onion and cook over low heat until soft. Add garlic and cook for a further 30 seconds. Add curry paste cook for 30 seconds. Add stock. Simmer for 15 minutes. Cool slightly before pureeing. Return to the heat and stir in the yoghurt. Serve drizzled with cream and with pappadums.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, onion, celery, chicken stock, cauliflower florets, butter beans, cream
name: creamy cauliflower and butter bean soup

steps: In a medium mixing bowl, cream margarine, sugar and vanilla essence with electric beater. Add eggs and egg whites, one at a time, continue beating between additions. Blend in yoghurt, polenta, coconut, orange rind and orange juice. Beat well for further 2 minutes. Pour into greased ring pan. Bake in a moderately slow oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until cooked when tested and golden brown.
ingredients: buttermilk, polenta, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, fresh rosemary leaves, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs
name: rosemary polenta pound cake

steps: Melt butter in a large saucepan over high heat. Brown chicken breast quickly, then turn the heat down to medium and cook until juices run free of pink. Turning the chicken often to prevent burning. Mix cornstarch, mustard, orange juice and soy sauce in a small bowl. When chicken is fully cooked, place on a heated platter or in a low oven to keep warm. Discard the oil left in the saucepan. Add the orange mixture to the saucepan and heat to boiling over medium heat, stirring constantly, and boil through until thickened. Pour over chicken breasts.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, dijon mustard, onion, butter, orange juice, brown sugar, garlic powder
name: chicken thighs with orange juice glaze

steps: Combine strawberries, sugar, raspberry jelly, lemon juice, grand marnier, ice cubes, jell-o gelatin dessert, boiling water, frozen strawberries, bananas, crushed pineapple, pecans, sour creampreparation:Put jello in a pyrex. Pour boiling water over and stir until completely dissolved. Fold in all fruit and 1 cup nuts. Put in fridge to congeal. When jello is totally set, spread sour cream over top. Sprinkle with rest of pecans. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Prep time doe not include refrigerator time.
ingredients: strawberries, sugar, raspberry jelly, lemon juice, grand marnier
name: ruby red jellies

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine flour and sugar in a large bowl or food processor. Add margarine and process, or mix together with your fingers, until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add cold water, one tablespoon at a time, and process, or mix, until a manageable dough forms. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 12-inch circle. Press dough into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie pan or removable-bottom tart pan. Prick the bottom all over with a fork, cover dough with foil and fill with dried beans or rice. Bake 10 minutes. Remove beans and foil and bake until crust is golden brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove from oven and cool completely on a wire rack. Yields 8 slices per crust.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, sugar, unsalted butter, cold water
name: martha stewarts foolproof pie crust

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, onion, oregano, dry mustard, sharp cheddar cheese, egg, milk, butter, cream cheese, milk, butter, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, onion salt, oregano, dry mustard, sharp cheddar cheese, egg, milk, butter
name: savory cheddar bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, brown sugar, salt, baking powder, baking soda, eggs, buttermilk, cooking oil
name: injera ethiopian flat bread

steps: Add potatoes to a hot pan and break it up to crumble it as you cook it. When the sausage is no longer pink, add the hash browns, seasonings and onion flakes. Cook the hash browns until they are slightly soft. Wisk some of the chicken broth with the gravy mix in a bowl and slowly add to the pot. Add the remaining chicken broth to the pot. Mix gently and bring to a rolling boil over med-high heat. Lower the heat to simmer and cook for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until hot all the way through.
ingredients: frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, oil, garlic powder, celery salt, salt, dry mustard, white pepper, onion flakes, chicken broth, country gravy mix
name: easy 20 minute potato soup

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add chutney, honey, lime juice, spicy brown mustard, fresh ginger, five-spice powder, boneless skinless chicken thighs, parsley, sesame seeds, orange rind. Add chutney, honey, lime juice, spicy brown mustard, fresh ginger, five
ingredients: chutney, honey, lime juice, spicy brown mustard, fresh ginger, five-spice powder, boneless skinless chicken thighs, parsley, sesame seeds, orange rind
name: turkish chicken thighs 400 winner

steps: Boil eggs and peel while still warm. Cut eggs lengthwise, remove yolks to a separate bowl. Mash yolks and add miracle whip to your favorite consistency. Add paprika, salt and pepper to taste. Stuff egg whites, and sprinkle more paprika on top. Chill.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, onions, miracle whip, prepared mustard, salt and pepper, paprika
name: jude s deviled eggs

steps: Using a food processor, mix together all dry ingredients and pulse 4-5 times to blend. Add remaining ingredients and process until smooth. About 10 seconds. Do not overprocess. Pour onto a hot slightly greased griddle and cook until bubbles appear on the top side. Flip over and brown.
ingredients: flour, salt, baking powder, eggs, milk, shortening
name: flannel cakes best pancakes ever

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-low heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: red cabbage, granny smith apples, onions, garlic, white sugar, vinegar, bacon fat, salt and pepper, boiling water
name: easy red cabbage and apple saut

steps: Place roma tomatoes in a microwaveable dish and microwave for 1 minute or so on high, then remove skins. Add diced tomatoes, lime juice, pepper, salt, and red pepper flakes to food processor, pulse 3 or 4 times until everything looks well mixed. Add onion, roma tomatoes, and cilantro, and pulse just a few times until onion is at desire consistency. Adding onions at the end is very important, otherwise they will become pureed and make a gross texture for the salsa. If you want to remove the remaining metallic taste of the fresh tomato, cook over medium low heat in a non-reactive pot for about 15-20 minutes. For best flavor, refrigerate over night to let flavors mingle.
ingredients: roma tomatoes, bermuda onion, tomatoes, fresh cilantro, jalapeno peppers, lime, seasoning salt, garlic
name: chef jim s salsa fresca

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, garlic salt, onion powder, paprika, cayenne, rosemary, baking potatoes, vegetable oil
name: cheesy seasoned oven fries

steps: Mix the egg whites with the vanilla yogurt, nectarine, sugar substitute, non-fat vanilla yogurt, nectarine, sugar-free maple syrup, cinnamon. Simmer for 15 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in maple flavoring. This may form crystals but can be reheated. Does not need to be refrigerated.
ingredients: egg whites, sugar substitute, non-fat vanilla yogurt, nectarine, sugar-free maple syrup, cinnamon
name: my egg white fruit omelet

steps: Heat a griddle, sandwich maker, or a skillet over medium heat. In small bowl, mix butter and taco seasoning mix. Spread half of mixture on one side of each piece of bread. Put cheese slices onto bread and top with remaining bread slices. Place the sandwiches, buttered sides down, on hot griddle. Spread top sides with remaining butter mixture. Cook until golden brown on both sides and cheese is melted. Serve with salsa as a dip.
ingredients: flour tortillas, american cheese, velveeta cheese, sour cream, fajita seasoning mix
name: mexican grilled cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350-f degrees and thoroughly grease the inside of a single loaf pan. Reserve. In a large mixing bowl, sift flour and sugar together. Add grated cheddar cheese and chopped green onions. Thoroughly mix all ingredients together. Add beer and stir until the ingredients are uniformly moistened. Spoon bread dough mixture into a well-greased loaf pan. Bake for approximately 1 hour, or until the bread is golden brown and emits a hollow sound when tapped. Cool on wire rack, and store in an air-tight container. May freeze for up to 90 days. Slice to serve. Simply sift together the ingredients and store at room temperature in an air-tight container.
ingredients: biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, beer, margarine, sesame seeds
name: beer cheese bites

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugars, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add fruit. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and microwave on high for 10-12 minutes or until tender. Turn squash cut side up. Fill centers with brown sugar, butter and honey. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover and microwave on high for 2-3 minutes or until heathed through.
ingredients: acorn squash, apple, fresh cranberries, orange rind, brown sugar, butter
name: baked cranberry acorn squash

steps: Heat grill to high. Add in mushrooms and cook for another minute. Toast the bread, top with the mushrooms and then the cheese. Grill until cheese is brown and bubbly.
ingredients: mushrooms, butter, onion, garlic cloves, fresh thyme, salt and pepper, whipping cream, eggs, asiago cheese, miniature tart shells
name: mushroom asiago tarts

steps: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high hear. Add oil and saute garlic and chili powder until golden, about 1 minute. Add water and vegetables. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp, about 3 minutes. Add the bbq sauce and peanut butter, stir until sauce is smooth. Toss sauce and vegetables with rice noodles and dressing to salad and toss again. Serve right away or cover and refrigerate to allow the flavors to blend. I also nearly doubled the dressing ingredients.
ingredients: rice noodles, cooked chicken breasts, cucumber, scallions, red chili pepper, soy sauce, lime, sugar, mint
name: minty asian chicken noodle salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Place rolls on baking sheet try to flatten rolls so they resemble flat circles. Take a spoonful of sauce and spread ontop of each rolls. Bake for about 15 min of until rolls are golden.
ingredients: olive salad, rolls, cheese slices, ham slices, genoa salami
name: easy mini muffulettas

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: brown sugar, ground cinnamon, cayenne pepper, egg white, salted cashews, pecan halves, dry roasted peanuts, dried cranberries
name: sugar and spice nuts

steps: In a large soup pot, saute the onions in the olive oil over medium-high heat until the onions are soft. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until the spices are fragrant. Add the beans, oregano, and 1 to 2 cups water. Stir in the bouillon. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and allow to simmer, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed to keep the beans from sticking to the bottom of the pan, until the beans are very soft - approximately 1 hour. Using a potato masher, mash the beans until most of them are mashed, and the texture is mostly smooth.
ingredients: olive oil, white onion, jalapeno, garlic cloves, dried pinto beans, bay leaf, water, cumin, jalapeno sauce, salt
name: no pressure rancho pinto beano

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: chicken thighs, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, dried parsley, onion powder, dry breadcrumbs, butter, cornstarch
name: baked mushroom chicken thighs

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic and sauté over medium-high heat until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add tomato and cook, stirring occasionally, until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add tomato and cook, stirring occasionally,
ingredients: garbanzo beans, garlic clove, lemon juice, light sour cream, olive oil, salt and pepper, cumin, baby carrots, assorted fresh vegetable, pita chips
name: hummus my way

steps: Preheat oven to 350c or 350f. Melt the butter in a large pan. Then add sugars and cook, stirring, until combined. Remove from heat. Add all of the remaining ingredients and stir gently until combined. Place level tablespoons pf mixture, about 3cm apart, on lightly greased oven trays. Bake in a moderate oven about 15 minutes or until golden brown. Stand for 5 minutes before removing from trays to cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: butter, sugar, dates, nuts, rice krispies, vanilla, coconut
name: angel flake cookies

steps: Combine the chicken broth, baby bok choy, green onions, fresh ginger, garlic clove, soy sauce, ramen noodles, ham, hard-boiled eggs, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, sesame oil, s
ingredients: chicken broth, baby bok choy, green onions, fresh ginger, garlic clove, soy sauce, ramen noodles, ham, hard-boiled eggs, sesame oil
name: ramen noodle soup with egg garnish
