steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle cheese in 9x9 inch square baking dish. Dot with butter. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour half of the mixture over the cheese. Pour eggs on top. Pour remaining cream mixture over the eggs. Bake 25 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, tomato soup, sugar, worcestershire sauce, cream cheese, wide egg noodles
name: cream cheese casserole

steps: Add liquid and spices to crockpot. Slice meat into thin strips. Toss meat in crockpot mixture. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. One hour before serving add broccoli. Cover and cook on high for another hour. Serve over rice.
ingredients: boneless beef chuck roast, beef consomme, soy sauce, brown sugar, sesame oil, garlic cloves, cornstarch, fresh broccoli florets
name: crock pot beef and broccoli

steps: Put the rice paper in a large bowl and pour on the melted butter, mixing lightly. Peel and core the apples and slice them thinly. Mix them with the sugar, cinnamon, lemon zest and juice. Butter a 40-ounce pudding basin or casserole dish and put in a thin layer of crumbs, then a layer of apple, then more crumbs, more apples and lastly a layer of crumbs. Cover with a sheet of foil. Bake at 350f for 20 minutes, remove the foil and bake for a further 30 minutes, or until the top has browned nicely and the apples are tender. Serve hot with cream. The apples should have started to caramelize and become transparent and amber-coloured.
ingredients: green apples, fresh lemon juice, brown sugar, walnuts, unsalted butter, caster sugar, rice paper sheets, icing sugar
name: rice paper apple strudels

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk, maple syrup
ingredients: maple syrup, quinoa flour, coconut flour, coconut oil, vanilla extract, sliced almonds, baking soda, baking powder, coconut milk
name: maple nut cookies

steps: Add butter, salt and pepper. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: baking potatoes, garlic powder, onion powder, sea salt, ground black pepper, butter, heavy cream
name: darn good mashed taters

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix flour, cheese, milk and salt together until combined. The mixture is fairly moist and sticky. Put about a rounded tablespoon of mixture onto a greased tray. Bake for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: self raising flour, salt, cream, milk
name: scone recipe c w a

steps: In crock pot, combine beans, ham, carrots, onion and pepper. Stir in undrained tomatoes and broth. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hrs or high for 3-4 hours. Stir in kale or spinach just before serving. Sprinkle each serving with parmesan cheese, if desired.
ingredients: potatoes, cooked ham, water, evaporated milk, whole kernel corn, mushrooms, black pepper, salt, paprika
name: papa s potato ham soup

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook garlic until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and mix well. Pour in stock and bring to a boil. Cover. Reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in dill. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: unsalted butter, onion, garlic cloves, long-grain rice, chicken broth, jalapeno pepper, bay leaf, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: caribbean style rice pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Butter a shallow 8 or 9-inch baking dish. Slice potatoes thinly and boil in salted water for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside. Heat oil and butter in a medium frying pan. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes. Add chicken and fry over a high heat until nicely browned. Lower heat and stir in tarragon and half of the cream and season with salt and pepper. Spread half of the potatoes in the greased baking dish and pour chicken mixture over top. Cover with remaining potatoes. Pour remaining cream over top of potatoes and sprinkle with gruyere. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until top of casserole is golden.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, olive oil, cream, dijon mustard, fresh tarragon, chives, salt, pepper
name: chicken breast with tarragon cream sauce

steps: Cook cauliflower in boiling salted water until tender-crisp. Drain. Put cauliflower in an oven-safe casserole dish. Combine milk, soup, mayonnaise, cheese and curry powder. Pour over cauliflower. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes.
ingredients: head cauliflower, half-and-half cream, butter, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, curry powder, salt and pepper, cracker crumbs
name: curry cauliflower bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: white chocolate baking squares, vanilla wafers, food coloring, semi-sweet chocolate chips, red food coloring paste
name: eyeball cookies halloween

steps: Preheat grill on high heat. Lay out cuban style burgers in a single layer and season well with salt and pepper. Divide cuban style burgers into four portions. Wrap each piece of cuban style burger in a 4-inch square piece of ham. Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add each cuban style burger and fry, turning, until meat is crisp and cheese is beginning to melt. Allow to cool slightly, fold meat around each cuban style burger to form hamburgers about 1 inch thick. Grill burgers for about 4 to 5 minutes a side or until just cooked through.
ingredients: ground chuck, salt & freshly ground black pepper, mayonnaise, roasted garlic cloves, dijon mustard, hamburger buns, smoked ham, swiss cheese, dill pickles
name: pressed cuban style burgers

steps: Place salmon fillets, skin side down, on foil-lined baking sheet. Coat fish with cooking spray and season with salt and pepper. Preheat broiler. Cook salmon 10 to 12 minutes or until fish is opaque. While fish is cooking, combine avocado, sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, hot-pepper sauce, worcestershire sauce, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh cilantro stem. Process, scraping down bowl occasionally, until mixture is creamy and smooth. Serve a dollop of sauce next to each salmon fillet.
ingredients: hass avocado, lime juice, filet mignon steaks, sea salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh cilantro stem
name: filet mignon with avocado and sea salt

steps: Mix together sweet chili sauce, soy sauce, chili-garlic sauce, dark sesame oil, fresh ginger, chicken wings, vegetable oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper. Put chicken pieces of choice in a gallon ziplock bag. Add the sauce mixture. Place in a freezer. To cook the chicken, thaw completely in the refrigerator. Dump into a 9x13 pan. Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit until done, 50 to 60 minutes.
ingredients: sweet chili sauce, soy sauce, chili-garlic sauce, dark sesame oil, fresh ginger, chicken wings, vegetable oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: chicken wings with thai sweet hot chili glaze

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a second bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto the baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, unsalted butter, white chocolate chips, blueberries, buttermilk, powdered sugar
name: white chocolate blueberry scones

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients, except salmon, together. Pour a small amount of the mix into the bottom of a baking pan - just enough to lightly cover the bottom. Add the salmon, and pour the remaining mix over top. Bake for about 20 minutes, or until salmon flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, ground black pepper, butter, fresh parsley
name: salmon with oregano

steps: Combine heavy cream, coconut milk, irish cream, chocolate liqueur, espresso, cocoa powder in an 8 cup measure cup or bowl. Gradually stir in milk. Microwave on high 5 to 6 minutes or until it starts to boil and thicken slightly. Stir in butter and vanilla. Place plastic wrap on surface of pudding. Refrigerate at least 2 hours. Whisk until smooth. Serve in individual bowls or wine glasses.
ingredients: heavy cream, coconut milk, irish cream, chocolate liqueur, espresso, cocoa powder
name: coconut cream mocha espresso

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: cucumbers, garlic, sugar, salt, vinegar, sour cream
name: cucumber salad with sour cream

steps: Bring to boil water and sugar. Remove from heat and add instant. Coffee. Bring to boil again. Remove from heat and add vanilla extract. Cool before adding rum. Put in bottles and cork. Makes about 3 fifths.
ingredients: water, sugar, instant coffee, vodka, vanilla
name: sa kahlua

steps: Beat cream cheese with fork until smooth. Gradually stir in pineapple, 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onion and salt. Chill. Shape into ball. Roll in remaining nuts. Refrigerate until well chilled. Garnish with pineapple slices, cherries and parsley. Makes about 40 appetizer servings. The green pepper gets liquid when you process it in the food processor. I have to blot it with a paper towel. When i made the ball with the low fat cream cheese i either did not drain the green pepper and pineapple well or it was the cream cheese. Ever since i have used full fat cream cheese and have not had a problem.
ingredients: cream cheese, crushed pineapple, pecans, green onions, seasoning salt
name: pineapple cheese logs

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, combine flour, salt and black pepper and set aside. In another bowl combine flour, salt and black pepper and set aside. In another large bowl combine flour, salt and black pepper and set aside. In another large bowl combine flour, salt and black
ingredients: duncan hines chewy fudge brownie mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, peanut butter chips
name: paula deen s peanut butter brownie cupcakes

steps: Spray soup pot with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and onion and saute for 3-5 minutes. Add the potatoes and 3c water. Bring to a boil. Then reduce heat and simmer for for 15 minutes. Stirring occasionally. Add shredded cabbage and cook for 10-15 minutes or until cabbage is tender. Whisk the water, flour and skim milk together and add to to soup. Add cubed cheese and stir until cheese is melted and soup is heated through. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: cabbage, onions, garlic cloves, potatoes, ham, paprika, chicken broth, butter, flour
name: creamy cabbage soup

steps: Preheat oven to 450. In small mixing bowl, combine salmon, eggs, potato, onion, fine breadcrumbs, baking powder, salt, hot sauce, oil, bunspreparation:Preheat oven to 450. In small mixing bowl,
ingredients: salmon, eggs, potato, onion, fine breadcrumbs, baking powder, salt, hot sauce, oil, buns
name: salmon potato patties

steps: Preheat the oven to 400f. In a shallow baking pan, arrange the chicken wings so they do not touch each other. Bake for 30 minutes. In small sauce pan combine the tomato sauce, sugar and soy sauce and cook until the sugar has dissolved. After the chicken wings are cooked, thickly spread the sauce over the wings and bake for 30 to 40 minutes or longer or until browned and very tender. Serve warm.
ingredients: chicken wings, soy sauce, butter, brown sugar, salt, pepper, garlic powder
name: sweet soy wings

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add lemon and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add lemon and sauté until fragrant,
ingredients: cavatappi pasta, coarse salt, pesto sauce, lemon, juice and zest of, flat leaf parsley, grape tomatoes, scallions, ricotta salata, black pepper
name: pasta salad with lemon pesto dressing

steps: Combine maraba tamer dates and water in a bowl, cover, and let stand at least an hour to macerate, tossing once or twice. Cook over low heat until sugar dissolves and mixture darkens and turns clear, 25 to 30 minutes stirring as needed to keep from sticking add raspberries, continue cooking over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick, about 10 minutes. Stir in chambord and remove from heat. Immediately pour into 2 hot sterilized 1 pint canning jars. Once jars are sealed, let them cool completely upside down on top of a clean kitchen towel, and store in the fridge or in the freezer.
ingredients: water, sugar, whole cloves, dates, lemon juice, blanched almond, walnuts
name: maraba tamer date jam

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a shallow dish, toss the asparagus, olive oil and salt and pepper together. Lay the asparagus in one level layer. Place in oven and roast, uncovered for approximately 10 minutes, or until the asparagus is just tender. Transfer to a serving plate. Whisk the lemon juice, lemon zest, dill, olive oil and honey together in a small bowl. Top the asparagus with some of the dressing and keep the rest on the side.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, thyme leaves, dark beer, dijon mustard, garlic clove, honey, pepper, salt
name: asparagus with beer and honey sauce

steps: Place the tea in a bowl and stir in the zest, nutmeg and condensed milk. Pour over the tea and serve.
ingredients: unsweetened instant tea, orange zest, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, ground nutmeg, sweetened condensed milk, water
name: creamy spiced tea

steps: Heat oven to 425. Line baking sheet with foil. Place cashew nuts in pan. In small bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Brush over cashew nuts. Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until cashew nuts are slightly browned. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut cashew nuts into slices.
ingredients: cooking spray, honey, vegetable oil, dry mustard, cashew halves
name: honey mustard cashew nuts

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Coat 8 muffin cups with pam. Mix sugar and cinnamon in small bowl. Dip each marshmallow in melted margarine and roll in sugar mix. Separate dough into triangles. Wrap one triangle around each marshmallow and pinch dough together. Place each one in a muffin cup. Drizzle extra margarine over rolls. Bake 8-12 minutes.
ingredients: pie crust, butter, sugar, cinnamon, cornstarch
name: pie crust cinnamon rolls

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees f. In 4 quart saucepan, heat soup, milk, thyme, pepper, chicken and vegetables to boiling over med-high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil and stir 3-5 minutes. Spread in ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Seperate dough into 8 biscuits. Place evenly over hot chicken mixture. Bake 35-40 minutes or until biscuits are golden brown and no longer doughy on bottom. After 20 minutes, cover with foil if necessary to prevent excessive browning.
ingredients: buttermilk biscuits, fat-free mayonnaise, yellow mustard, ham, low-fat cheddar cheese
name: hot molten blobs

steps: Preheat oven to 190 degrees. Line a 20cm pie dish with baking paper. Place 1 sheet of pastry over the paper. Trim edges. Place bacon, mushrooms, tomato and onion in pastry case. Season with black pepper. Crack eggs over filling. Top pie with remaining sheet of pastry. Trim and crimp edges. Glaze top of pie with milk. Cut a vent in centre of pie. Bake for 25-20 minutes or until pastry is golden brown.
ingredients: corn flake crumbs, bacon, cheddar cheese, fresh chives, eggs, salt and pepper, shortcrust pastry, egg
name: egg and bacon pie

steps: Combine soy sauce, cherry preserves, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion, garlic
ingredients: light soy sauce, cherry preserves, garlic cloves, dijon-style mustard, hot pepper sauce, chicken parts, green onion
name: cherry bomb chicken

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over low heat. Add marshmallows and stir until completely melted. Remove from heat. Stir in pumpkin pie spice. Add crispy rice cereal. Stir until completely coated. Using a buttered spatula or waxed paper, evenly press the rice mixture into a 13- x 9- x 2-inch baking pan coated with cooking spray. Cool. Cut into 2-inch squares.
ingredients: cream-filled chocolate sandwich cookies, rice krispies, butter, marshmallows
name: oreo rice krispie treats

steps: In a large bowl, whisk crouton crumbs with cornstarch. Stir in soy sauce. Add chicken and toss until completely coated. Cover and refrigerate at least 30 minutes. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook, covered for 20 - 25 minutes or until nice and crispy and cooked through. Turn about 4 or 5 times to avoid burning. Drain on paper towels and serve hot with rice or noodles.
ingredients: onion and garlic croutons, cornstarch, light soy sauce, boneless skinless chicken thighs, canola oil
name: chinese sticky chicken

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: french haricots vert, fresh ginger, unsalted butter, lemon, zest of, salt
name: green beans with ginger butter

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease roasting pan or cake pan using nonstick spray. Mix all ingredients together, and toss until all vegetables are coated with olive oil and spices. Spread vegetables into pan. Bake 45 minutes, removing from the oven and stirring twice during cooking. For crisper vegetables, cut cooking time a few minutes shorter. Switch oven setting to broiler. Place pan under the broiler for 7-10 minutes, sliding out and stirring vegetables once or twice.
ingredients: onions, green bell peppers, fresh mushrooms, garlic clove, olive oil, tomatoes, saffron, red snapper fillets, white wine, parsley
name: red snapper louisiana

steps: Cook pineapple, reserving juice from pineapple. In a medium saucepan, combine sugar, can of tomatoes, onion, soy sauce, ginger and pineapple. Simmer for 20 minutes. In a small bowl, combine cornstarch and reserved pineapple juice. Stir till smooth. Add to the cooked pineapple mixture when mixture is done cooking. Bring to a boil and cook for about 2 minutes or till slightly thickened, remove from heat and cool. Refrigerate till cold.
ingredients: crushed pineapple, sugar, white vinegar, soy sauce, cornstarch, water, plum sauce
name: delicious pineapple sweet n sour sauce

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: bulk italian sausage, green bell pepper, sweet onion, garlic, spaghetti sauce, cream cheese, sun-dried tomato, dried italian seasoning, balsamic vinegar, farfalle pasta
name: sausage supper

steps: Heat oven to 425. Cut the bottoms off the brussels sprouts and trim any damaged leaves. Cut in half. Add the rest of the ingredients into a bowl. Mix to combine. Add brussels sprouts and mix until coated. Put in a roasting pan in the oven for 45 minutes, stiring once after about 25 minutes, until brown and caramelized.
ingredients: brussels sprout, carrot, butter, brown sugar, lemon juice, salt, pepper, chives, toasted almond
name: glazed brussels sprouts and carrots with almonds

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: low-fat milk, sugar, vanilla, banana, plain low-fat yogurt, bananas
name: banana mousse

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add eggs, black olives, feta cheese, onions, olive oil, salt and pepper, red peppers, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, until the omelet is set and the bottom is golden brown. Cover and cook for about 5 minutes longer, until the omelet is set and the bottom is golden brown. Cover and cook for about 5 minutes longer, until the omelet is set and the
ingredients: eggs, black olives, feta cheese, onions, olive oil, salt and pepper, red peppers
name: omeleta horiatiki greek omelet

steps: Heat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Preheat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Preheat oil in a medium sized non-
ingredients: ground beef, cumin, salt, pepper, green chilies, flour tortillas, salsa, mexican cheese, lettuce, sour cream
name: quesadilla style burgers

steps: In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the butter, celery and onion. Saute for about 3 minutes, add the flour and stir well to make a dry roux. Add the potatoes, milk, thyme and salt and pepper. Reduce heat to low and allow soup to simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Add the clams and allow to heat through.
ingredients: clams, cream, potato, butter
name: pearson clam chowder

steps: Heat oven to 375. Spray an 11x7 inch baking dish with pam. Salt and pepper the chicken breast halves and place in the dish. In a bowl, combine the artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, garlic salt, crabmeat, chives, french bread. Mix well. Spread artichoke mixture over chicken breasts. Bake, uncovered, 30-35 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
ingredients: english muffins, artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, fresh crabmeat, sharp cheddar cheese
name: crab and artichoke sandwiches

steps: Place steak in crock pot. Cover with beef broth. Cover with gravy mixture. Cook on low for 5 to 6 hours.
ingredients: steak sauce, spicy brown mustard, potatoes, round steaks, beef broth
name: a 1 round steak crock pot

steps: In a saucepan, bring the coconut milk and water to a boil. Remove from heat and whisk in the coconut milk and water to a boil until dissolved. Stir in the ice water. Chill 20 minutes. Beat the mixture 1 minute. Fold in the cake, 4 cups of whipped topping, and the fruit. Spoon into a dish lined with plastic wrap. Cover and chill overnight. Unmold cake onto serving plate and remove plastic. Frost the cake with the remaining whipped topping.
ingredients: angel food cake, sweetened condensed milk, key lime juice, lime zest, frozen whipped topping, flaked coconut, kiwi fruit, strawberry
name: key lime coconut angel cake

steps: In a large bowl, combine the apples, pineapple, celery, and raisins. Stir in the yogurt. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour. Add the sunflower seeds and toss. Serve atop a bed of lettuce, if desired.
ingredients: apples, pineapple tidbits, celery, grapes, carrot, sour cream, sugar, lemon juice
name: summer apple salad

steps: Mix everything except noodles. Spread about one tablespoon of mixture onto noodles. Broil for about 5 minutes until cheese gets bubbly. Cut each noodle into 4 pieces. Serve warm.
ingredients: broad egg noodles, hamburger, onion, brown sugar, tomato soup, cheddar cheese soup, cream of chicken soup, milk, cheese slice
name: amber s favorite amish casserole

steps: Combine eggs, sugar, salad oil, flour, baking powder, raw carrots. Mix well. In a separate bowl, combine and mix dry ingredients. Add to wet mixture, mixing well. Stir in finely crated carrot. Pour batter into 13x9 cake pan that has been sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Bake at 350 degrees for 50-60 minutes. Allow to cool before frosting with your favorite cream cheese frosting.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, salad oil, flour, baking powder, raw carrots
name: rabbit s carrot bread

steps: Preheat an 8-inch pot with a tight fitting cover over moderate heat. Add oil, onion and garlic and saute for 2 or 3 minutes. Add broth to the pan and bring to a boil. Stir in orzo and return to boiling. Cover pot and reduce heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Remove lid and stir in orzo and return to boiling. Remove lid and stir
ingredients: butter, olive oil, onion, basmati rice, orzo pasta, chicken broth, salt and pepper, italian spices, parmesan cheese
name: chia s rice orzo

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees c. Grease and flour a 8cm deep, 19cm square cake tin. Place flour, sugar and salt in a large bowl. Add butter and using finger. Make a well in the centre and add buttermilk and using a flat bladed knife, stir until dough almost comes together. Place on a lightly floured surface and knead gently until dough comes together. Press out to a 3cm thick round. Dip a 5cm round cutter into flour to prevent dough sticking and cut out scones. Gently press leftover dough pieces together and repeat cutting out more scones - should make a total of 16 scones. Place scones, touching into prepared tin. Bake for 15 to 17 minutes or until light golden and hollow when tapped on top. Serve with jam and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, kosher salt, unsalted butter, salami, scallions, heavy cream, butter
name: salami and scallion biscuits

steps: Slice beef in half and place in crock pot. Add onion and remaining ingredients. Cover and cook on low 7 to 9 hours or until beef is tender. Discard pickles. Return meat to sauce and heat through. Using slotted spoon, fill buns with desired amount.
ingredients: boneless sirloin tip roast, brown sugar, italian dressing, italian seasoning, onion, bell pepper, sandwich buns
name: crock pot tangy italian beef sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: carrots, sugar, olive oil, salt, fresh rosemary, pepper
name: oven baked carrot fries

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the olive oiled garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the olive oiled garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, garlic cloves, sea salt, pepper
name: mediterranean dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Spread one side of each slice of bread with 1 teaspoon mustard and 1 tablespoon 1000 island. Divide the suarkraut and turkey evenly between 2 of the bread slices. Top each with 1 slice of cheese and remaining slice of bread. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet or toaster oven sheet and bake until cheese melts and sandwiches are hot, about 6 minutes.
ingredients: rye bread, thousand island dressing, corned beef, sauerkraut, swiss cheese
name: oven baked reubens

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, mix together peaches, marmalade, lemon juice, ginger, mustard, cinnamon and soy sauce. Place pork in medium baking dish. Glaze pork with peach mixture, using it all. Roast in oven for approximately one and a half hours. Serve.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, vegetable oil, lemon juice, sugar, white wine, chicken stock, pears, cornstarch, ground ginger, salt and pepper
name: pork with pear and ginger sauce

steps: Combine all ingredients in a 4-quart or larger crock pot. Cover and cook on low-heat for 8-10 hours. Stir once or twice during cooking. To serve as an entree, spoon over hot cooked white rice or egg noodles. Sauteed sugar snap or snow peas make a good side dish.
ingredients: sweet and sour sauce, light brown sugar, soy sauce, garlic powder, black pepper, frozen meatballs, red bell pepper, pineapple chunks
name: easy crock pot sweet and sour meatballs

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency, drain. Meanwhile, in a large pot combine all remaining ingredients. Stir in the cooked noodles. Bring to a full boil over high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil for about 10 minutes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped green onions if desired.
ingredients: red sweet peppers, spring onions, water chestnuts, salt, bay leaf, dashi, chicken broth, light soy sauce, lemon juice, white pepper
name: japanese red pepper soup

steps: Melt chocolate and set aside. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream until soft peaks form. Fold into chocolate mixture. Spoon into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until serving. Garnish with chocolate curls and strawberries, if desired.
ingredients: chocolate bars, milk, honey, fresh cream
name: the world s easiest chocolate mousse

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Cut chicken breasts in half. Mix water and egg togther in a small bowl. Mix bread crumbs and cheese together in separate bowl. Dip each piece of chicken in egg mixture then in bread mixture. Then set in a greased 9x13 greased pan. Cook for 45 minutes to 1 hour. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: garlic clove, butter, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, garlic powder, italian seasoning, black pepper, chicken meat
name: amanda s parmesan chicken

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Fill greased muffin tins two-thirds full with batter. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: yeast, warm water, sugar, oil, salt, flour
name: 21st street pan bagna rolls

steps: Put butter, sugar, milk, sugar, baking powder, salt, oil, buttermilk, egg wash, egg, waterpreparation:Combine dry ingredients. Measure oil and milk in measuring cup and do not mix. Pour all at once over flour mixture. Just mix in bowl. Does not need to be kneaded or shaped. Just mix until all ingredients are just moistened. Can add a little more flour if it seems too gooey but you basically will take it in your hands to shape and place on pan. Let proof 10 min on lightly greased pan. If you want a more golden look, place egg wash on top before baking. If you want a more dessert type biscuit for strawberry shortcake then dust with sugar and melted butter before baking. 475 degrees 10-12 minutes or until lightly brown.
ingredients: red wine, sugar, oil, baking powder, salt, flour
name: simple wine biscuits

steps: Cook sausage, onion, diced tomatoes, black beans, yellow hominy, condensed tomato soup, water, beef broth, salsa, dried parsley. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: mild italian sausage, onion, diced tomatoes, black beans, yellow hominy, condensed tomato soup, water, beef broth, salsa, dried parsley
name: spicy sausage soup with hominy

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, balsamic vinegar, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: grilled balsamic asparagus

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Grease cookie sheets. Combine brown sugar, shortening, peanut butter, maple syrup, egg yolk, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, baking powder, sugarpreparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine peanut butter, shortening, peanut butter, maple syrup, egg yolk, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, baking powder, sugarpreparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine peanut butter, shortening, peanut butter, maple syrup, egg yolk, all-purpose flour,
ingredients: brown sugar, shortening, peanut butter, maple syrup, egg yolk, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, baking powder, sugar
name: maple peanut yummies

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Salt and pepper the pork chops in a baking pan. Cut onion and bell pepper into pieces. Sprinkle on top and sides of pork chops. Pour wine over pork chops. Pour water in between pork chop pieces. Bake covered for 25 minutes. Flip chops over and bake uncovered for 15 minutes.
ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, green peppers, mushroom, garlic, diced tomato, tomato sauce, white wine, oregano, salt and pepper
name: pork chops with an oregano wine sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. In a medium bowl whisk flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. In another bowl sift dry ingredients, add to wet ingredients. Once the dry and wet ingredients are well mixed add cup of rolled oats and cup of chocolate chips. Spoon a bit of the batter at a time onto a greased pan. Cook from 12 to 15 minute until the cookies are golden and have risen.
ingredients: brown sugar, plain flour, baking powder, salt, toasted sesame seeds, egg, butter, vanilla
name: benne seed wafers

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Mix the pasta, chicken, pesto, and bell peppers in a saucepan. Heat over low heat, stirring frequently, until hot. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Garnish with olives and sprinkle a little parmesan cheese on top.
ingredients: dry pasta, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, tomatoes, dry white wine, pesto sauce, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: pasta with tomato and pesto

steps: Whisk together 1st four vinaigrette ingredients, slowly add oil whisking constantly. Add cilantro. Set dressing aside. Season chops with salt and pepper, brush with oil, grill over med-high heat 5-6 minutes, or until done, turning once. Put chops onto serving platter, pour dressing over chops and serve immediately.
ingredients: extra firm tofu, honey, olive oil, lime juice, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, cumin powder, chili flakes, salt and pepper
name: cilantro lime grilled tofu

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in medium-sized saucepan. Saute onions and garlic until brown. Add tomato sauce and stir. Lower heat to medium-low. While stirring, add rosemary, basil and oregano. Allow sauce to bubble. Sprinkle with sugar and mix again. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Use immediately, or transfer to plastic container for storage.
ingredients: mahi mahi, butter, garlic clove, teriyaki sauce, lemon juice, honey, sesame seeds
name: mahi mahi with teriyaki sauce marinade

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: green lentil, sweet onion, garlic cloves, bay leaf, water, cashews, olive oil, rice wine vinegar, dried tarragon, salt and pepper
name: vegan lentil pate aka faux gras

steps: Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, lemon juice, olive oil, fresh parsley, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, fresh sage, pepper
name: herb marinated pork chops

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat and add the mushrooms and cook for 10 minutes stirring often until the mushrooms are tender and all moisture has evaporated. Remove to a plate lined with paper towel and set aside to cool. Wipe pan clean. Sift flour, baking powder and salt into a bowl. Whisk buttermilk and eggs in a jug with a fork until well combined. Stir in mushrooms and chives. Brush frying pan with a little of the oil and heat over medium heat until hot. Using about 2 tablespoons of the mixture per hotcake, spoon mixture into pan and cook for about 2 minutes, until bubbles appear on the surgace and then turn hotcakes and cook for a further 1 to 2 minutes or until golden. Keep warm while cooking the remaining batter. Serve - suggestions given are reduced fat cream cheese or a dollop of tomato chutney and cottage cheese.
ingredients: vegetable oil, eggs, panko breadcrumbs, white mushrooms, salt
name: panko crusted mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Melt chocolate chips and butter on low heat. Stir then add eagle brand milk,. Flour, nuts and vanilla. Cool. Spoon by teaspoon onto greased pan. Bake at 325f for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, bittersweet chocolate, unsweetened chocolate, walnuts, salted butter, eggs, sugar, rice flour, vanilla, baking powder
name: gluten free chocolate fudge cookies

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: fryer, cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, sherry wine, cheddar cheese
name: company pan chicken

steps: Bake trifle in a 13x9 2 inch pan as directed on the package and allow to cool. Cut the trifle crosswise in half. Freeze half for another time, unless doubling the recipe. Cut the remaining trifle into 8 sections. Split each section horizontally. Arrange half of the trifle crosswise in a 2 quart glass serving bowl. Set aside a few berries for decoration and layer half of the remaining strawberries over the trifle and pour one cup of pudding over the trifle, cover with a cup of cool whip. Repeat this layer of trifle, berries, pudding and cool whip. Finish the top by pouring a ring of pudding around the rim of the bowl. Decorate by alternating apricot or peach halves and whole strawberries. Pour cool whip topping in the centre space and sprinkle slivered almonds. Chill before serving.
ingredients: strawberries, amaretto, sugar, cream cheese, powdered sugar, sour cream, vanilla, angel food cake, whipping cream
name: amaretto strawberry trifle

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place potatoes in a single layer, cut side down. Bake, tossing potatoes once, until beginning to brown, about 20 minute. Meanwhile, rub fillets with remaining tsp oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Remove baking sheet from the oven. Add the tomatoes and olives to the potatoes. Stir to combine. Push the vegetable mixture to one side of the baking sheet and place the fillets flat on the baking sheet next to the vegetables. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast until the fish is cooked through and potatoes are brown and tender, about 15-20 minute. Transfer the fish and vegetables to a serving platter and serve immediately.
ingredients: potatoes, bread dressing, cod fish fillets, onion, butter, salt and pepper
name: cod potato casserole

steps: Heat a large nonstick saut pan over high heat for 2 minutes. Add the chicken, smooth side down. Pan fry for 2-3 minutes, until juices run clear. Turn the chicken over, reduce heat, and cook for 3-6 minutes, until juices run clear. Sprinkle with a little salt and thyme just before serving.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, fresh ginger, olive oil, salt and pepper
name: skillet glazed chicken

steps: Place tomatoes in food processor. Process on high for 1 minute. In dutch oven on medium heat, saut onions in olive oil till soft but not browned. Add tomatoes, tomato pure and all spices. Cook sauce on very low heat for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Add a little water if necessary as sauce cooks.
ingredients: tomatoes, oil, onion, jalapeno pepper, garlic cloves, red wine, dried oregano, dried ancho chile powder, cumin, dried basil
name: mexican tomato sauce

steps: Combine all ingredients except crabmeat, cilantro, white onion, tomatoes, seedless cucumber, limes, serrano peppers, ketchup, clamato juice, salt and pepper in a nonreactive container. Add shrimp, toss, cover and refrigerate 12 hours, tossing periodically to coat shrimp. Meanwhile, cut 1 garlic clove in half and rub the bread slices with the garlic. Place bread on a baking sheet and bake in a 350f oven 15 minutes or until toasted. Serve each shrimp, tail up, on a bread round. Drizzle with olive oil and garnish with a fresh mint leaf.
ingredients: crabmeat, cilantro, white onion, tomatoes, seedless cucumber, limes, serrano peppers, ketchup, clamato juice
name: crab ceviche appetizer

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl toss chicken pieces and can of green chilies. Mix well and add cream cheese. Cook over low heat until cream cheese melts. Put mixture in a 13 x 9 baking pan, top with 1 cup of grated cheese pour the whipping cream over the top and then put the last cup of grated cheese over that. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes or so, checking to make sure the cheese gets bubbly, not burnt.
ingredients: cooked chicken, condensed cream of chicken soup, flour tortillas, stewed tomatoes, mexican blend cheese
name: quick cheesy chicken enchiladas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot heat butter and saut onions. Add milk, flour, salt and pepper. Bring to a rolling boil. Slowly add cheddar cheese, stirring while adding. Drain macaroni. Add macaroni directly to the cheese mixture in the pot. Pour mac and cheese mixture into large lasagna pan. Put in oven and bake for 30 minutes or until top is bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, gold medal all-purpose flour, salt, garlic, milk, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaf
name: mozzarella macaroni and cheese

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: day-old white bread, caster sugar, milk, sweet sherry, white wine, egg yolks, butter, ground cinnamon, strawberry jam
name: english 15th century poor knights of windsor boozy toast

steps: In a large saucepan, heat the oil over medium heat and add chickpeas, water, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chickpeas, dried chili, kale, chorizo sausage. Cook, stirring constantly, until the garlic starts to brown, about 1 minute. Add chickpeas and cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes. Let cool slightly. Transfer soup to a blender. Cover loosely, and puree until just smooth. Return to the saucepan and stir in lemon juice and sea salt to taste. Serve, garnished with a fresh rosemary sprig, or an additional drizzling of olive oil.
ingredients: chickpeas, water, olive oil, fresh cilantro, onions, stewed tomatoes, mixed spice, cayenne, salt
name: chickpea and tomato soup shawrbat an nikhi

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Remove from oven and cool to handle. Cut potatoes in half, lengthwise, remove cooked potato and put in large bowl. Be carefully to leave the skin intact. Mash with cream cheese, hot milk, onion salt, butter, and pepper. Pile mixture back into skins. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley and bake 20 more minutes.
ingredients: russet potatoes, white onion, butter, sour cream, cheese whiz, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese
name: twice baked potato casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 9x12 casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Prepare stuffing as directed. Let sit. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Combine soup, veggies and chicken into 9x13 casserole dish. Stir until everything is mixed thoroughly. Add stuffing on top of casserole. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: ground turkey, seasoned stuffing mix, cranberry sauce, egg, butter
name: great balls of stuffing

steps: Place ground beef in a greased 9x13 baking dish and top with mushrooms. Combine potatoes and contents of sauce mix packets, water, milk, butter, salt, seasoned salt and pepper. Pour over beef and mushrooms. Cover and bake at 400 for 30 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with cheese and bake, uncovered for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, hash browns, mushrooms, condensed cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese
name: cheesy potato skillet stuff

steps: In a blender, puree the honey, nonfat plain yogurt, fresh lime juice, ginger, garlic, mint, salmon steaks, green grapes, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest
ingredients: honey, nonfat plain yogurt, fresh lime juice, ginger, garlic, mint, salmon steaks, green grapes
name: grilled salmon with creamy lime dressing

steps: In a large skillet, whisk together the water, and flour until smooth. Slowly stir in the broth, heating over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Add chicken, salt, and pepper. Cover, and reduce heat to low. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a large skillet, whisk together the water, and flour until smooth. In a
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, butter, milk
name: grandma bouclair s dumplings for stew

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Boil whole potatoes for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. In the meantime, saut onions and garlic in butter until they are soft and translucent. Layer potato slices and onions in a 9 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream over the potatoes. Season to taste and sprinkle gruyere over the whole shebang. Bake 4050 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: unsalted butter, chipotle chiles in adobo, heavy cream, sweet potatoes, salt, fresh ground white pepper
name: gourmet sweet potato gratin with chiles and cream casserole

steps: Heat oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired.
ingredients: navy beans, water, ham bone, parsley, onion, garlic, celery & tops, salt, pepper
name: white bean soup

steps: Place ice, water, limeade, orange juice concentrate, lime juice, lime slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice, orange slice
ingredients: lime juice, water, triple sec, tequila, superfine sugar, strawberry, popsicle molds
name: strawberry margarita ice pops

steps: Place onions in crock, cover with foil, and cook for 5 minutes, or until cheese is melted and soup is bubbly. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: french onion soup, deli roast beef, water, provolone cheese, hoagie rolls
name: quick french dips

steps: Place rice in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add butter and stir well. Cook, covered, at 350 for 30 minutes. Remove lid and continue to cook for another 30 minutes
ingredients: cooked rice, sweet red pepper, green sweet pepper, sweet corn, fresh parsley leaves, onion, butter, salt
name: dominican rainbow rice

steps: In a not too deep bowl, mix flour, cornmeal, cajun seasoning, salt and pepper. In another bowl not too deep, mix mayonnaise, dill and lemon juice. Soak crawfish fillets in the mixture of mayonnaise, then in the mixture of flour flipping them to coat well. Put fish fillets on a greased baking sheet. Cook in a preheated oven of 450 f for about 10 minutes or until croquettes are golden. Keep cooking under the broiler for about 4 minutes or until crispy. Serve with the mixture of mayonnaise that you set aside.
ingredients: butter, green onion, parsley, crawfish tail, andouille sausage, flour, cream, red pepper, fettuccine
name: cajun crawfish and andouille fettuccine

steps: Heat oven to 425. Line baking sheet with foil. Place pork in pan. In small bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Brush over pork tenderloin. Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until pork has slight blush of pink in center and meat thermometer inserted reads 160. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut diagonally into slices.
ingredients: soy sauce, bourbon, brown sugar, pork tenderloin, sour cream, light mayonnaise, dry mustard, green onions
name: pork tenderloin with creamy mustard sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: lean ground beef, ground cloves, salt & pepper, onion, poultry seasoning, flour
name: boulettes

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Grease a muffin pan. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, brown sugar, baking powder and soda. In another bowl stir together oats and yogurt, stirring in banana, oil and egg. Stir mixture into flour mixture and stir until moistened. Put in muffin pans and bake for 20-25 minute until done.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, oats, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, egg, bananas, butter, cranberries
name: cranberry banana oat muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, salt, baking soda, pecans. Mix, do not beat. Stir in pecans. Baked in greased loaf pan in a 350 preheated oven about 1 hour. Best kept a day or two before eating. Freezes well, great thinly sliced with cream cheese.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, egg, avocado, buttermilk, pecans
name: avocado nut bread

steps: In a large bowl, combine pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, apples, pears, red grapes, blueberries, frozen whipped topping, marshmallow cream, sweetened coconut. Pour over fruit and gently toss to coat. Sprinkle with coconut and marshmallows.
ingredients: pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, apples, pears, red grapes, blueberries, frozen whipped topping, marshmallow cream, sweetened coconut
name: easy ambrosia parfait

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Melt chocolate and butter, and let cool slightly. In a bowl, whisk flour, cocoa powder and salt. In large mixer bowl, beat eggs, sugar and vanilla until pale yellow and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes with mixer on medium. Turn mixer to low, beat in cooled chocolate mixture, then flour mixture until blended. Stir in chips. Drop cookies onto nonstick baking sheet, about 2 leveled tablespoons per cookie, about 2-inches apart. Bake 14 minutes or until tops are slightly cracked, centers will still be soft.
ingredients: sugar, vegetable oil, unsweetened chocolate squares, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, powdered sugar
name: chocolate snowflake cookies chocolate crinkles crackles

steps: Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, eggs, butter, milk, raisins, vanilla and raisins. Mix just until all flour is moistened. Roll out dough onto lightly floured surface with rolling pin. Roll out to about 2 inch thickness. Use a round cookie cutter or the top of a glass to cut out buns. Put them into a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place them all together, no need to separate them. Bake at 450f until golden brown about 12-15 minutes.
ingredients: flour, yeast, warm water, cooking oil, salt, sugar, eggs
name: two hour buns

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: cream cheese, salsa, cheddar cheese, black olives
name: cream cheese salsa dip w cheddar olives

steps: Cook turkey in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese.
ingredients: taco shells, ground turkey, onion, tomatoes and green chilies, ground cumin, garlic salt, oregano
name: turkey tacos

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey and curry powder. Spread over chicken pieces. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. Baste while baking and be careful that sauce does not burn.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, honey, prepared mustard, lemon pepper, bacon, mozzarella cheese
name: honey mustard mozzarella chicken

steps: In a small bowl, mix dressing and taco mix. On a large serving platter or individual serving pates, layer remaining ingredients except tomatoes. Drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with cherry tomatoes that have been sliced in half. You can also top with olives and add a bit of canned corn if you like. I only use a portion of the can of black beans. Use as much as you prefer.
ingredients: fat free cream cheese, taco seasoning mix, salsa, canned black beans, lettuce, fat-free cheddar cheese, green onion, pitted ripe olives
name: south beach diet fat free 7 layer mexican dip

steps: Combine the dried apricot and water in a bowl, cover, and let stand overnight, or until soft and well plumped. Combine apricots and water in a bowl, cover, and let stand overnight, or until soft and well plumped. Add the sugar and bring to boil, while stirring. Boil gently, stirring often, until the mixture is thick and shiny and begins to clear the sides of the pan when stirred. Do not allow the mixture to cook down to a puree. It should retain good-sized bits of apricot. Remove the preserve from heat and stir in almond extract and brandy. Ladle into 3 half-pint canning jars, prepared in usual manner and seal with sterilized 2 piece screw-on lids. Cool and let mellow several weeks or more before serving.
ingredients: dried apricot, lemon juice, heavy cream, water
name: mishmishiyah

steps: Combine the flour and a small amount of milk to make a smooth paste. When smooth, add remaining milk and the mustard. Set aside. Melt butter in a large pan on medium heat. Add carrots and garlic and cook until crispy-tender, stirring often. Next take the set-aside milk mixture and stir into carrots. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. When mixture thickens, cook for one minute stirring constantly. Stir in ham, cooked noodles and thawed peas. Heat through till good and hot, stirring constantly, but gently. Serve immediately.
ingredients: frozen puff pastry, dijon mustard, black forest ham, gruyere cheese, egg, water
name: ham and cheese in puff pastry barefoot contessa

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees celsius. Place the puffs on a baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes or until the puffs are set.
ingredients: figs, sugar, brandy, puff pastry, unsalted butter, powdered sugar
name: brandied fig bundles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
ingredients: rye flour, cornmeal, baking soda, salt, dark molasses, milk, egg, raisins
name: boston brown bread new england

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place chicken pieces, condensed cream of chicken soup, condensed cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, half-and-half, parmesan cheese, chives, seasoning salt, pepper, paprikapreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken pieces, condensed cream of chicken soup, condensed cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, half-and
ingredients: chicken pieces, condensed cream of chicken soup, condensed cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, half-and-half, parmesan cheese, chives, seasoning salt, pepper, paprika
name: easy creamy baked chicken breasts

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat almonds. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and almonds are toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool.
ingredients: almonds, sugar, water, cinnamon
name: burnt almonds in the microwave

steps: In a large heavy saucepan, saut the onions and garlic in 3 tablespoons of olive oil for about five minutes. Add the remaining tablespoon of oil and the potatoes and stir fry for another minute. Add the broth, cover and simmer for about 45 minutes or until the potatoes are mushy. Remove from the heat and puree the soup, using an immersion blender. Now stir in salt and pepper and the coriander, cover, and refrigerate for 24 hours. After 24 hours, the soup is ready to be served cold, or, once you have gently heated it over moderate heat, it can be served hot.
ingredients: cooking spray, onion, ground cumin, ground coriander, mild chili powder, cardamom seed, garlic cloves, carrots, salt & freshly ground black pepper, cilantro leaves
name: curried carrot and coriander soup

steps: In a large skillet, cook butter, cream of mushroom soup, french onion soup, instant rice, water, soy sauce, long grain white rice. Add to the beef mixture. Mix well. Stir in the soy sauce and rice. Simmer, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until the rice is tender.
ingredients: butter, cream of mushroom soup, french onion soup, instant rice, water
name: rice on the side casserole

steps: Spray crock pot with cooking spray. Layer ingredients in order as listed, except brown sugar and olive oil. Sprinkle brown sugar over all the vegetables. Drizzle olive oil over all. Cook 6 hours on low.
ingredients: bulgur wheat, brown rice, barley, quinoa, rolled oats, apple, ground cinnamon, water, vanilla extract
name: 6 grain breakfast in the crock pot

steps: Heat oil in deep frypan. Add onion and chorizo, cook about 8 minutes till browned. Add celery, garlic and thyme, cook further 5 minutes. Add lentils, stock, salt and pepper, cook 25 minutes till lentils are tender. Remove from the heat, stir through vinegar.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, sweet italian sausage, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, rosemary, brown lentils, chicken broth, escarole, salt and pepper
name: sausage and lentil stew

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: soft heaven chocolate chip cookies

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: butter, garlic, carrots, salt, lemon pepper, zucchini, crookneck yellow squash, red bell pepper, green onion, fresh basil
name: herbed veggie medley

steps: Heat the butter in a large pan over low heat. Add sliced onions and cook until soft, translucent and lightly browned, stirring often. Add the sugar and continue stirring until the onions are deep brown in colour. This may take around 20 minutes. Add flour and cook for 3 minutes. Add water and bonox and simmer for 30 minutes. Top each slice of the baguette with a tablespoon of parmesan cheese. Toast baguette under a hot grill until golden brown. Serve baguette on top of the soup, and sprinkle with chopped parsley.
ingredients: onions, cooked rice, fresh parsley, sharp cheddar cheese, olive oil, white wine, salt and black pepper
name: stuffed parsleyed onions

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and salt, blending well. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press tomatoes through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly. Heat thoroughly before serving.
ingredients: butter, flour, tomato juice, baking soda, milk, sugar, salt, roquefort cheese
name: easy cream of tomato soup

steps: Cream margarine. Add gradually and beat in brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift and stir in flour, salt, baking soda. Add chocolate chips. Bake 10 minutes at 375.
ingredients: vegan margarine, brown sugar, caster sugar, egg, rice flour, soy flour, dark chocolate
name: gluten free chocolate chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray. Combine flour and baking soda in bowl and set aside. Cream butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Alternately stir in raisins and flour mixture. Fold in remaining ingredients. Spread evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool and then cut into bars.
ingredients: chocolate, unsalted butter, condensed milk, chocolate hazelnut chocolate chip biscuits, mixed dried fruit, nuts
name: chunky chocolate bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a medium baking dish. In a shallow, medium bowl, mix cayenne pepper, lemon pepper, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Brush both sides of catfish fillets with butter. Brush fillets with the cayenne pepper mixture on both sides. Bake 30 to 35 minutes in the preheated oven, until fish is easily flaked with a fork.
ingredients: paprika, salt, lemon pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, dried basil, onion powder, thyme, catfish fillets, unsalted butter
name: blackened catfish

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Pulse olives, vegetables, and oil in a food processor until chopped, add a bit of the stuffed olive brine if salad needs it. Brush cut sides of the focaccia with vinegar and sprinkle with oregano. Layer meats and cheese on the bottom half of the bread. Top with olive salad and the other half of the bread. Wrap in foil and bake until heated through, about 30 minutes. Slice into quarters, then cut each quarter in half diagonally, and serve.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, champagne vinegar, coarse sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, carrot, hardboiled egg, shallot, fresh green beans, gruyere, mesclun
name: salade gruyre de comt pour deux

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: eggs, flour tortillas, vegetable oil, cheddar cheese, avocado, green onions, bacon, salsa
name: bacon avocado burritos

steps: Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: green beans, water, green peppers, green onions, garlic, bacon bits, soy sauce, accent seasoning
name: fancy tasting green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray an 11x7 inch baking dish with pam. Salt and pepper the chicken breast halves and place in the dish. In a bowl, combine the artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breast halves. Mix well. Spread artichoke mixture over chicken breasts. Bake, uncovered, 30-35 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast, sliced mushrooms, garlic, butter, marinated artichoke hearts, flour, chicken broth
name: chicken mushroom and artichoke casserole

steps: Saut onion and celery in butter. Remove from heat. Blend in bisquick and salt. Add chicken broth, dry sherry, egg yolks, heavy cream, shrimp, fresh parsley. Cook and stir until thick. Cook
ingredients: onion, butter, flour, chicken broth, dry sherry, egg yolks, heavy cream, shrimp, fresh parsley
name: chef s choice shellfish bisque

steps: Place the eggs in a large bowl and mix together until well combined. Add the milk and mix until well combined. Add the salsa and mix until well combined. Add the hummus and mix until well combined. Add the avocado and mix until well combined
ingredients: english muffins, eggs, milk, avocado, salsa, monterey jack cheese, dried red chili
name: avocado and scrambled egg open faced sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: red salmon, sugar, coarse salt, white pepper, dill, cognac, dry white wine
name: danish gravlaks lox cured salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a mixing bowl, beat together dried figs, cream cheese, walnuts, kosher salt, green onion tops. Mix and form into ball. Refrigerate overnight. Serve with crackers. Will not form ball, but makes a creamy spread.
ingredients: dried figs, cream cheese, walnuts, kosher salt, green onion tops
name: cream cheese dried fig and walnut spread

steps: Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using cooked marinade and pan drippings to top.
ingredients: pork chops, dry ranch dressing mix, cream of chicken soup, potatoes, real butter, parmesan cheese, roasted garlic, milk, salt, cracked black pepper
name: ranch house crock pot pork chops w parmesan mashed potatoes

steps: In a food processor, combine flax seed oil, canola oil, tahini, water, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup, lemon juice, tamari, red
ingredients: flax seed oil, canola oil, tahini, water, lemon juice, tamari, red onion, garlic clove, maple syrup
name: another tahini salad dressing

steps: Place 1/4 cup of high rollers on top of tortilla. Place 1/4 cup of high rollers on top of tortilla. Place 1/4 cup of high
ingredients: tortillas, cream cheese, garlic powder, roast beef, honey-roasted ham, smoked turkey, colby-monterey jack cheese, lettuce, tomatoes
name: high rollers

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a medium-size gratin dish. Make a layer of one-third of the apple slices in the bottom of the prepared gratin dish. Add a layer of half the onions and then half the carrots. Dot with 2 tablespoons of the butter and season well with salt and pepper. Repeat the layers and finish with the remaining one-third of the apple slices. Dot with the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and season with salt and pepper. Pour in the stock. Cover with aluminum foil and bake until the vegetables are tender, about 45 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with the cheese. Bake 10 minutes longer, until the cheese is golden brown. Serve very hot. Makes 6 to 8 servings.
ingredients: butter, carrots, onion, apples, water, ground nutmeg
name: apple carrot onion side dish

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place sausage, eggs, green onion, butter, tortilla chips, cheddar cheese, salsa on a baking sheet. Bake at 350 for 5-10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly, about1 minute. Top each chip with a dollop of cheese, and lay the chips in a single layer on a baking sheet. Heat under the broiler until the cheese is melted and bubbly, about1 minute. Serve at once.
ingredients: breakfast sausage, eggs, green onion, butter, tortilla chips, cheddar cheese, salsa
name: easy breakfast nacho bake

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: powdered sugar, cocoa powder, marshmallow creme, butter, whole milk, vanilla
name: chocolate marshmallow frosting

steps: Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker with the contents of the soup packet. Pour water, wine, and soy sauce over the top, turning the pork to coat. Carefully spread garlic over the pork, leaving as much on top of the roast during cooking as possible. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. Serve with cooking liquid on the side as au jus.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, dry onion soup mix, water, red wine, garlic, soy sauce, pepper
name: amazing pork tenderloin in the slow cooker

steps: Heat oil in skillet on med, add onions, cook until soft. Add celery, cook until crisp tender. Increase heat to med hi, add peas. Cook until peas are heated through. Stir in celery leaves, salt and pepper.
ingredients: onion, celery, butter, frozen peas, salt, pepper, dried marjoram, water
name: herbed peas

steps: Sift together in large bowl flour, sugar & salt. In another bowl, beat eggs until cream colored. Blend in milk & butter. Pour egg mixture into dry mixture and beat smooth. Heat skillet or griddle. Grease lightly. For each pancake spoon a t of butter on the griddle. Cook each pancake over medium heat until lightly brown on bottom. Loosen edges wtih spatula, turn and lightly brown the other side.
ingredients: sifted flour, granulated sugar, salt, eggs, milk, butter, lingonberry preserves
name: pancakes with lingonberries sweden

steps: In a 3-quart saucepan, saute the squash, carrots, celery, onion, and ginger in the olive oil until tender. Add the vegetable broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 40 minute stirring occasionally. Puree soup in a blender or food processor. Reheat on stove if necessary. Add salt to taste.
ingredients: celery rib, carrot, onion, olive oil, butternut squash, potato, salt, hot water
name: creamy butternut squash soup
