steps: Combine red wine vinegar, sugar, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt,
ingredients: red wine vinegar, sugar, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, cucumbers
name: ww sweet hot marinated cucumbers 0 points

steps: In a medium bowl, beat together eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, ground nutmeg. Dip bread slices into egg mixture, coating both sides. In a skillet or on a griddle, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat. Add half of the bread slices and cook for 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat with remaining butter and bread slices. Serve warm. If desired, serve with maple syrup.
ingredients: white bread, egg, water, caster sugar, butter, ground cinnamon
name: french toast or eggy bread

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat your powdered sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, cinnamon, butter, vanilla, and salt until light and fluffy. In another bowl combine powdered sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, cinnamon, butter, vanilla, and salt. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover your dough and refrigerate it for at least 1 hour. Take a quarter of your dough at a time out of your refrigerator, and roll it out to a quarter inch thickness. With a lightly floured glass rim, or any other desired shape you wish to use, and cut your cookies out and place on an parchment lined cookie sheet and bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until they are just lightly browned. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: powdered sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, cinnamon, butter, vanilla
name: walnut cinnamon balls jar mix

steps: In a microwave-safe 8-in. Square dish, melt butter. Stir in cracker crumbs. Press mixture onto bottom of dish. In a bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Whisk in the ice cream, pour over crust. Cover and freeze for 2 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with crushed candy bars. Return to the freezer until firm, but remove from the freezer approx 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: instant pistachio pudding mix, crushed pineapple in juice, cool whip, mini marshmallows
name: 1980 s pistachio fluff

steps: Mix sugar, cocoa, milk and milk in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil. Add vanilla. Remove from heat and stir in coconut and oats. Drop by spoonfuls onto wax paper. Chill.
ingredients: milk, sugar, butter, cocoa, vanilla, oats
name: david s no bake chocolate oatmeal drops

steps: Wash cucumbers, dry off and remove the ends. Score the skins with the tines if a fork, dragging it the length of the cuke. Repeat all the way around. Slice cucumbers very, very thin. Place in a bowl. Sprinkle with salt and sugar. Add vinegar and press slightly with back of a spoon. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Keeps well in a covered jar. The end result is similar to an uncooked pickle.
ingredients: english cucumber, salt, rice vinegar, sugar
name: japanese pickled cucumber

steps: Heat oven to 180 degrees celsius in a small saucepan, add sugar, and 4 tbsp water. Cook gently over low heat about 5 minutes until croccante italian almond brittle is just tender. Remove from heat and stir in the almonds and stem ginger. Spoon mixture into a 1. 75 litre baking dish and leave to cool. For the crumble mixture, rub butter into the flower until crumbly. Stir in sugar and pecans, then sprinkle mixture over the fruit mixture. Bake at 180 degrees c for 30 minutes until lightly browned on top. If freezing, prepare to end of step 2. Wrap whole dish in large freezer bag, seal, and freeze up to 1 month. Can be baked from frozen in a 160 degree c oven for 50 minutes. Serve with cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: sugar, water, almonds, butter
name: croccante italian almond brittle

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line muffin pan with foil baking cups. Cut almond paste into 16 pieces and pat into a round disc. In mixer cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs then add baking powder, soda and extract. Fold in 1 cup flour, buttermilk then remaining flour until well blended. Spoon about 2 tablespoons batter into each cup and smooth surface. Top with level teaspoonful of preserves, then the piece of almond paste. Top each muffin with another 2 tablespoons of batter. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly brown.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, buttermilk, fresh raspberry
name: raspberry buttermilk muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges.
ingredients: pastry shells, apples, sugar, butter, apricot jam
name: french apple tart

steps: Heat butter in a large saucepan. Stir in flour and seasonings till smooth and bubbling. Stir in ham and eggs. Heat till hot. Serve on toast.
ingredients: eggs, heavy cream, salt, bread, butter, mustard, cheese, cooked ham
name: ham and cheese french toast

steps: Place apples in greased 1 quart baking dish. Combine sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger and apple cider. Pour over apples. Dot with butter. Sprinkle with raisins. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45-60 minutes or until apples are tender.
ingredients: granny smith apples, cardamom seed, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, ground allspice, fresh nutmeg, sugar
name: spiced apple slices apple chips

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Cook pasta 8 minutes, drain. Mix pasta shell ingredients and toss with pasta. In 9-inch pie plate press pasta to form a shell. Cook ground beef for 4-5 min., breaking into crumbles. Add garlic powder, salt and cumin, stir in tomatoes and cook until almost all liquid has evaporated, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and add sour cream. Spoon mixture into pasta shell. Add cheese to top and bake 15 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, enchilada sauce, olive, salt, chili powder, cornbread mix, cheddar cheese
name: siesta fiesta pie

steps: Place ingredients in bread machine pan in recommended order and set on dough cycle. Check consistency of dough and add additional water or flour, if necessary. At end of cycle, remove, shape, and let rise until approximately doubled. Bake in preheated 350 deg. Oven. For app. 30 to 40 minute.
ingredients: cottage cheese, buttermilk, eggs, butter, honey, white sugar, self rising flour, orange flower water, water
name: polish cheese slices

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Pour sauce into 13 by 9 inch baking dish. Stir in 4 tbsp of parmesan cheese. Place the chicken breasts in the sauce, turning to coat them well. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and uncover. Sprinkle remaining parmesan cheese, and the mozzarella over the chicken breasts, and and continue baking for 5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, no-sugar-added spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, italian seasoning
name: low carb chicken parmesan

steps: Heat the oil in a large saut pan over medium heat. Add the onions, raccoon, water, salt, onions, pepper, lard, red pepper flakes and mix well. Season with aditional salt and freshly ground pepper if desired.
ingredients: raccoon, water, salt, onions, pepper, lard, red pepper flakes
name: coon hash

steps: Preheat oven to 400f and spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with cooking spray. Combine all ingredients except sausage in a large zipper type plastic bag, mixing well. Place ingredients from bag into prepared pan, bake uncovered for 30 minutes. Add sausage to vegetables mixing well. Bake for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender and golden browned.
ingredients: sausage, baking potato, onion, butter, fresh parsley
name: pub spuds

steps: In a medium-size pot, bring water to a boil. Stir in the spices, cover, and simmer over low heat for 5 minutes. Stir in the spices, cover, and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and steep for 10 minutes. Add tea leaves and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 5 minutes. Reduce heat,
ingredients: water, cloves, cinnamon stick, cardamom pods, sugar, milk, tea leaves
name: masala chai indian spiced tea

steps: Toast bread in toaster to desired level. Put butter on one slice and mayo on the other. Put cheese in between slices of bread. Wrap a moist papertowel around sandwich and put in microwave for 20 sec. Enjoy.
ingredients: whole wheat bread, cheddar cheese, butter, kosher dill pickle, vidalia onion
name: grilled cheese pickle and vidalia onion sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 375 deg. Place sliced patate e pomodori al on a cookie sheet. Bake at 375 for 1 hour or until cooked through, turning 2 to 3 times while baking. Bake at 375 for 1 hour or until cooked
ingredients: onions, potatoes, tomatoes, olive oil, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, basil leaves, water
name: patate e pomodori al forno

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Roll in 1-inch balls. Place on greased cookie sheet. Press with fork. Bake 10-12 minutes, as long as possible without burning.
ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, flour, sugar, coconut, baking soda, baking powder, vanilla, salt, macadamia nuts
name: jane s coconut sugar cookies

steps: Place grouper fillets in a greased 13-in x 9-in x 2 baking dish. Sprinkle with pepper. Beat egg white with salt if desired until stiff peaks form. Fold in mayonnaise, dill and onion juice, spoon over fish. Bake uncovered at 425 degrees for 15 to 20 minutes or until topping is puffed and golden and fish flakes easily with a fork. Garnish with dill and lemon if desired.
ingredients: grouper fillets, butter, onion, lemon, juice of, spicy brown mustard, salt and pepper
name: golden grouper

steps: Cream together the white cake mix with pudding, powdered sugar, butter, eggs, cream cheese, vanilla, pecans and beat well. Pour mixture into a 9 inch x 13 inch pan and bake for one hour and 15 minutes in a preheated 350 degree f oven. Bake for one hour and 15 minutes in a preheated 350 degree f oven.
ingredients: white cake mix with pudding, powdered sugar, butter, eggs, cream cheese, vanilla, pecans
name: easy crazy cake

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Add 1/2 cup of water to a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature.
ingredients: bacon, cabbage, coleslaw dressing, blue cheese, cherry tomatoes
name: 4th of july cabbage salad

steps: Preheat oven to 325- 350 degrees. Spread stuffed pears in an 8-inch square glass baking dish. Whisk the apple juice and sugar in a small heavy saucepan over medium-high heat until the sugar dissolves. Whisk in the butter. Pour the sauce over the pears. Bake until the pears are crisp-tender and beginning to brown, basting occasionally with the juices, about 35 minutes. Spoon the pears onto plates. Top with ice cream. Drizzle with any juices and serve. The pears can also be served frozen. To do so, cool the pears, then place them in the freezer until frozen solid, about 8 hours.
ingredients: anjou pear, dried cranberries, walnuts, goat cheese, apple cider, maple syrup
name: roasted stuffed pears

steps: Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, onion, red bell peppers, green bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, plum tomatoes, salt, pepper
name: tri color pepper salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, instant pistachio pudding mix, eggs, oil, club soda, butter, milk, vanilla, powdered sugar
name: joans pistachio pudding cake

steps: In a large skillet, brown the salted chicken pieces in oil. Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes or until browned. Crush garlic cloves and scatter over the chicken add the broth. Turn heat to low. Cover and cook for about 15 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove cover, add salt and red pepper flakes. Add water and simmer over low heat until water is cooked off. Remove cover,
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, chicken broth, chicken flavored bullion cube, carrot, celery ribs, onion, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic powder, celery seed, bay leaves
name: simple poached herbed chicken

steps: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix well. Pour dressing mixture over carrot mixture. Toss to coat. Cover and chill 30 minutes, if desired. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: carrot, cucumber, celery, green pepper, onion, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, pepper
name: party vegetable spread

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: plain flour, water, sesame oil, salt
name: chinese pancakes no egg or milk

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add the liquids and mix smooth. Place 2 tablespoons of batter in the bottom of each of the greased muffin cups. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style peanut butter. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean.
ingredients: oil, eggs, buttermilk, salt, sugar, baking soda, cornmeal, flour
name: cornmeal muffins

steps: Place the roast on top of vegetables. Mix horseradish, salt, pepper and 1 cup water. Pour over top of beef. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until beef and vegetables are tender. Remove 2 cups of juices from crock pot and put into small sauce pan. Mix corn starch with 2 t cold water and then add to juices. Bring to a boil while stirring constantly until thickened. Serve gravy over meat and vegetables.
ingredients: red potatoes, carrot, chuck roast, cream of mushroom soup, onion soup mix
name: crock pot pot roast

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Stir together sour cream, condensed soups, and dry onion soup mix in a mixing bowl. Spread the turkey in the bottom of a buttered 9x13-inch casserole dish. Top with green beans and mushrooms. Spread the soup over the meat and vegetable mixture. Crumble the stuffing and spread evenly over the top. Bake at 350f for 25-30 minutes or until heated through and bubbly.
ingredients: button mushrooms, turkey fillets, flour, garlic clove, butter, olive oil, chicken bouillon powder, parsley, salt, warm water
name: turkey fillet in mushroom sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large wok or high-sided skillet over med-high heat. Add fruit, water, cider vinegar, light brown sugar, salt, garlic cloves, dry mustard. Continue to stir-fry until duck is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: mixed fruit, water, cider vinegar, light brown sugar, salt, garlic cloves, dry mustard
name: linda s chinese duck sauce

steps: In a large wok or nonstick frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and ginger and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add scallops and stir to coat with garlic mixture, then cook 1 minute. Mix in snow peas and cook 1 minute. Stir in broth and soy sauce and cook just until simmering. Sprinkle with green onions and mix with noodles.
ingredients: filet of beef, peanut oil, rice wine, soy sauce, cilantro, scallion, ground cumin, dried chili pepper flakes, ground black pepper, sea salt
name: spiced beef stir fry with scallions and cilantro

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan.
ingredients: zucchini, bell peppers, onions, diced tomatoes, smoked kielbasa, vegetable seasoning, tomato paste, salt, pepper, paprika
name: lecho

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: potatoes, salami, tasty cheese, fresh chives, baked beans
name: cheesy baked beans in baked potatoes

steps: Saute onions in butter. Add chicken mixture and top with remaining doritos. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, salt & pepper, enchilada sauce, condensed cheddar cheese soup, light sour cream, taco seasoning, sharp cheddar cheese, doritos
name: dorito beef casserole

steps: Heat oven to 350. In large bowl, beat sugar, butter, egg and vanilla until creamy. Add flour, baking powder and soda. Beat on low until well mixed. Stir in toffee bits with a spoon. Shape into 1-inch balls. Roll in sugar. Put 2-inches apart on ungreased baking sheet. Flatten slightly with bottom af glass. Bake for 9 minutes or until edges are just lightly brown. While warm, sprinkle with more sugar.
ingredients: butter, yellow cake mix with pudding, eggs, water, pecans, almond brickle chips
name: toffee crunch cookies

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add pork chops, onion, garlic, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, flour, water, fresh parsley leaves, and cook until sauce thickens slightly. Add
ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, flour, water, fresh parsley leaves
name: pork chops in simple garlic sauce as i like it

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
ingredients: plum tomatoes, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh herbs, parmesan cheese
name: easy broiled tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Wash gnocchi, leaving skins on, and grate either by hand or in a food processor. Blot zucchini with paper towels to remove as much moisture as possible. Place in an 8 inch square baking dish that has been sprayed with cooking spray. Cut butter into small pieces and place evenly over zucchini. Bake for 15 minutes, uncovered. Remove from oven and pour off any liquid that has accumulated in the bottom of the dish. Stir in sour cream, salt and pepper. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese and bake until zucchini is tender and cheese melts. About 5-10 more minutes.
ingredients: gnocchi, heavy cream, all-purpose flour, salt, black pepper, ground nutmeg, baby spinach, whole milk ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese
name: gnocchi gratin

steps: In a large pot or dutch oven heat oil over medium-high heat. Add couscous, vegetable stock powder, frozen shrimp, frozen peas, garlic, boiling water, fresh ground black pepper. Bring to boil and let simmer until the couscous is tender, 2 to 3 minutes. Add chicken stock and pesto. Bring to
ingredients: couscous, vegetable stock powder, frozen shrimp, frozen peas, garlic, boiling water, fresh ground black pepper
name: feed me now soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: chili, green chilies, taco seasoning, rice, water, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, salsa, sour cream
name: chili cheese burritos

steps: In a saucepan, combine cream and 1 cup sugar. Cook and stir constantly over low heat until candy thermometer reads 160 or steam rises from pan. Stir in gelatin until dissolved. Add extracts. Cool 10 minutes. Whisk in sour cream. Pour into eight dessert glasses or small bowls. Chill at least 1 hour. Before serving, combine raspberries and remaining sugar. Spoon over each serving.
ingredients: cottage cheese, caster sugar, double cream, lemon juice, egg whites, fresh raspberry, fresh strawberries, single cream
name: coeurs a la creme

steps: Place the potatoes in a large skillet over medium heat, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until tender. Drain, and set aside to cool. In a large bowl, mix together the sour cream, mayonnaise, sugar, half of the onions, and half of the cheese. Gently stir in the cooled potatoes. Top with remaining cheese and onions, and sprinkle bacon bits over the top.
ingredients: potatoes, lemon juice, bacon, red pepper, green onions, mayonnaise, sour cream, hot pepper sauce, blue cheese, salt and pepper
name: potato salad with creamy blue cheese dressing

steps: Heat the butter in a large pan over low heat. Add sliced onions and cook until soft, translucent and lightly browned, stirring often. Add the sugar and continue stirring until the onions are deep brown in colour. This may take around 20 minutes. Add flour and cook for 3 minutes. Add water and bonox and simmer for 30 minutes. Top each slice of the baguette with a tablespoon of parmesan cheese. Toast baguette under a hot grill until golden brown. Serve baguette on top of the soup, and sprinkle with chopped parsley.
ingredients: water, vegetable bouillon cubes, creme fraiche, coarse grain mustard, soft cheese, cornstarch, salt and pepper, spring onion
name: dutch mustard soup zaanse mosterdsoep

steps: Cook penne rigate following packed directions until tender. Drain. Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Reduce heat and stir in salt, pepper, cream, pesto, and parmesan cheese. Cook until chicken is no longer pink inside.
ingredients: whole wheat penne rigate, olive oil, yellow pepper, onion, garlic cloves, pasta sauce, chicken breasts, basil
name: penne rigate with chicken

steps: In a large, deep skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until richly browned on the bottom, about 8 minutes. Add the water, cover and cook until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 7 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the garlic is golden brown, about 3 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook
ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, crushed red pepper flakes, frozen chopped broccoli, salt, eggs, black pepper, asiago cheese
name: garlic and broccoli scrambles

steps: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set.
ingredients: sugar, water, fresh cranberries, apple, orange, banana, walnuts
name: luby s style cafeteria cranberry fruit salad

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, and pearl barley and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with maraschino cherries, fresh mint, and lemon slices, if desired.
ingredients: pearl barley, water, lemon, rind of, lemon juice, sugar
name: old fashioned lemon citrus barley water

steps: Chill four martini glasses. Peel, core and slice the pear. Combine the vodka, syrup, liquer, ice and lime juice in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Dip the rims of the chilled glasses in the sugar. Pour the cocktails and garnish the glasses with pear slices.
ingredients: blood orange juice, vodka, cointreau liqueur, fresh lime juice, ice cubes, blood orange
name: blood orange martini

steps: In small bowl, combine all ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Cover and refrigerate for several hours to blend flavors. Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. Serve with dressing.
ingredients: pearl tapioca, water, milk, salt, sugar, fruit cocktail, whipped cream
name: fish eye salad tapioca fruit salad

steps: Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoon jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing.
ingredients: baby spinach, pear, almonds, sugar, water, balsamic vinegar, salt, dijon mustard, olive oil, pepper
name: caramelized pear and toasted almond salad

steps: Beat cream cheese, sugar, lime zest, lime juice, and vanilla with a mixer on medium until well blended. Add eggs. Mix just until blended. Pour into crust. Bake at 350f for 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool. Refrigerate 3 hours or overnight. Garnish with cool whip and lime slices.
ingredients: condensed milk, key lime juice, cream cheese, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust
name: easy key west key lime pie

steps: Dissolve jello in boiling water, then stir in lemonade concentrate until dissolved. Chill until partially set. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into a 13 x 9 glass dish. Chill until firm.
ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, boiling water, mountain dew soda, crushed pineapple, lemon pie filling, miniature marshmallow, cool whip
name: lemon mountain dew salad

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving.
ingredients: coconut rum, lime juice, pineapple juice, grenadine, maraschino cherry, pineapple chunk
name: kathy s summer cooler

steps: Preheat oven to 300f. Place the seeds in a bowl and add the olive oil then the seasonings. Mix well. Spread pumpkin seeds on a single layer on baking sheet. Bake for about 30 minutes depending on your oven. Stir half way through.
ingredients: pumpkin seeds, sugar, sea salt, pumpkin pie spice, butter
name: sugar spice roasted pumpkin seeds

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh thyme, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, apricot jam, balsamic vinegar, chicken broth
name: apricot balsamic skillet chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown.
ingredients: potatoes, reduced-fat feta cheese, spring onions, fresh dill, egg, lemon juice, ground black pepper, flour, olive oil
name: greek potato patties

steps: Place the ritz crackers into a plastic storage bag and break into crumbs with a rolling pin. Pour crumbs into a bowl and add the melted butter. Spread into the bottom of a 13x9 inch pan to make a crust. Bake at 350f for 20 minutes. Cool. Mix pudding with 2 cups of milk using the directions on the side of the package. Add in softened vanilla ice cream. Pour over the cooled cracker crust. Top with cool whip. Use a vegetable peeler to create chocolate curls as garnish across the top. Chill until ready to serve.
ingredients: ritz crackers, butter, instant vanilla pudding, milk, vanilla ice cream
name: yum yum ice cream pudding

steps: In a 3. 5-4 quart slow cooker gradually stir 5 cups water into the soup. Stir or whisk until smooth. Stir in chicken, vegetables, and seasoned pepper. Cover. Cook on low-heat setting for 6-8 hours or high-heat setting for 3-4 hours. If using low-heat setting, turn to high-heat setting. Stir in noodles. Cover and cook for 20 to 30 minutes more or until noodles are just tender.
ingredients: potatoes, cubed ham, fresh broccoli florets, cheddar cheese soup, fiesta nacho cheese soup, chicken broth, milk, paprika
name: slow cooker potato soup with a zip

steps: Mix butter and sugar until smooth and creamy. Beat butter and sugar until smooth and creamy. Add eggs. Stir in vanilla. Blend mixture and stir in the applesauce with raisins. Spread in a prepared 13 by 19-inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. Let cool on rack or serve warm with cream.
ingredients: butter, sugar, applesauce, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon, raisins, flour
name: ez applesauce bars

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add the liquids and mix smooth. Place 2 tablespoons of batter in the bottom of each of the greased muffin cups. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style peanut butter. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean.
ingredients: unsifted all-purpose flour, yellow cornmeal, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, cayenne, butter, sharp cheddar cheese
name: cheddar cornmeal muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little.
ingredients: buttermilk, honey, salt, whole wheat flour, vital wheat gluten, barley flour, almond flour, soy protein, flax seeds, instant yeast
name: low carb buttermilk bread a b m

steps: In a rice pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley.
ingredients: ground beef, oil, rice, diced tomatoes, beef broth, water, frozen mixed vegetables, salt and pepper
name: vegetable beef with rice soup

steps: Mix jello with boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, oranges, pineapple, and pecans. Lightly spray a 4 cup ring mold or pretty glass dish that it will be served. Add salad. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 3 hours or till firm. Serve with dollop of cool whip.
ingredients: cranberry gelatin, whole berry cranberry sauce, salt, cinnamon, mandarin oranges, boiling water
name: cranberry cinnamon salad

steps: Combine sourdough bread, turkey breast, cashews, cream cheese, mayonnaise, dried cranberries, dried sage, lemon juice, salt, cracked black pepper. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours.
ingredients: sourdough bread, turkey breast, cashews, cream cheese, mayonnaise, dried cranberries, dried sage, lemon juice, salt, cracked black pepper
name: turkey sandwiches with dried cranberries and cream cheese

steps: In a double boiler, melt caramels, butter, and milk. Keep water in the bottom of pot to a minimum boil. Dip one marshmallow into melted mix using a fork. Remove, and roll in marshmallows. Place on tray covered with wax paper. Repeat until bag of marshmallows is finished. Freeze marshmallow balls if desired. Enjoy.
ingredients: butter, mini marshmallows, vanilla, peanut butter, rice krispies, frosting
name: peanut butter marshmallow rice krispies squares

steps: Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: large shrimp, all-purpose flour, egg whites, flaked coconut, oil, pineapple preserves, pina colada nonalcoholic drink mix
name: coconut fried shrimp

steps: Mix together edamame, small shrimp, cannellini beans, cherry tomatoes, red onion, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, fresh lime juice, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper. Mix together edamame, small shrimp, cannellini beans, cherry tomatoes, red onion, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, fresh lime juice, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper
ingredients: edamame, small shrimp, cannellini beans, cherry tomatoes, red onion, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, fresh lime juice, extra virgin olive oil, salt
name: edamame and bean salad with shrimp and fresh salsa

steps: Sprinkle the curried lamb shanks with the onion, curry paste, tomatoes, beef stock, coriander leaves, yoghurt. Cover and cook on low heat for 8-9 hours. Add the curried lamb shanks with the onion, curry paste, tomatoes, beef stock, coriander leaves, yoghurt. Add the curried lamb shanks with the onion, curry paste, tomatoes,
ingredients: vegetable oil, lamb shanks, onion, curry paste, tomatoes, beef stock, coriander leaves, yoghurt
name: indian style curried lamb shanks

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: egg whites, sugar, chocolate chips, walnuts
name: nighty night cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: lima beans, black-eyed peas, celery ribs, red bell pepper, cashews, green onions, ketchup, garlic powder, balsamic vinegar, olive oil
name: beans black eyed peas and cashew salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400f, grease a 15 x 10 inch baking pan. Mix together butter, oats, sugar, corn syrup, vanilla and salt. Press into prepared pan and bake 15 to 18 minutes until the mixture is brown and bubbly. Remove from the oven and immediately sprinkle on the chocolate, set aside for 10 minutes, then spread the chocolate over the base. Sprinkle on nuts, cool on a wire rack, then cut into squares.
ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, egg yolk, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, cinnamon, hershey bars, walnuts
name: coffee hour toffee bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray a 6 cup muffin tin. Line the muffin cups with the prosciutto slices, pressing the prosciutto into the bottom and sides of each cup. Crack 1 egg into each cup. Sprinkle the spinach over the eggs, then the cheddar cheese, dividing them evenly. Top each serving with 4 tomato halves and season with salt and pepper. Bake the pies for 18 to 20 minutes, until the egg whites are firm and the yolks are starting to set but are still soft in the center. Timing might vary due to oven differences and preferences. Set them aside to cool for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: tomatoes, basil leaves, extra virgin olive oil, prosciutto, eggs
name: eggs baked in tomatoes with prosciutto basil

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In large bowl, beat flour, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown.
ingredients: flour, butter, milk, vanilla, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, baking powder, salt, miniature semisweet chocolate chips
name: the ultimate chocolate chip cookies soft and chewy

steps: In a medium-size pot, bring water to a boil. Stir in the spices, cover, and simmer over low heat for 5 minutes. Stir in the pre-brewed coffee. Meanwhile, in a saucepan, heat milk until almost boiling. Strain the coffee through a fine mesh strainer covered with cheesecloth into the milk. Add sweetener, stir, and serve in mugs.
ingredients: water, brown sugar, cloves, cinnamon, regular grind coffee
name: tradtional mexican coffee

steps: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, combine everything but the yucca and olive oil. Set aside. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Rub spice mixture onto both sides of each fillet and add to the skillet. Cook until just opaque in the center, gently turning halfway though.
ingredients: yucca root, olive oil, dried cilantro, dried parsley, onion powder, garlic powder, ground cumin, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh lime juice
name: roasted cassava yuca asado

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease tube pan. Mix first four ingredients in bowl. Separate biscuits into 20 pieces, then cut biscuits into 4 pieces. Toss biscuits with bacon and other ingredients. Put all this into tube pan and drizzle with butter. Bake for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, dried parsley, dried dill weed, parmesan cheese, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits
name: herb and cheese biscuit bites

steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. Prepare the vegetables for stuffing by removing the stalks of 4 of the tomatoes. Halve the tomatoes and discard the seeds. Halve 2 of the zucchini lengthwise and scoop out the centers with a spoon. Arrange the prepared vegetables on a greased baking sheet, season lightly with salt and pepper. Mince or grate the remaining 3 mushrooms and the leftover stems. Dice the remaining zucchini. Saute the ground pork with the onions over medium heat and add the minced mushrooms. Cook until soft, then add the can of tomatoes and continue to cook until very little liquid is left, about 10 minutes. Pile the filling into the prepared vegetables on the baking sheet and sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: tomatoes, pork, water chestnuts, shallots, garlic cloves, fish sauce, black pepper, cornstarch, oil
name: thit heo don ca pork stuffed tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine the baking mix, milk and cheddar cheese in a medium bowl. Mix by hand until well combined. Divide the dough into 12 equal portions and spoon onto a lightly greased or nonstick cookie sheet. Flatten each biscuit a bit with your fingers. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes or until the tops of the biscuits begin to brown. In a small bowl, combine the buttery spread with the garlic powder and the parsley flakes. Heat this mixture for 30 seconds in the microwave, then brush a light coating over the top of each biscuit. In a small bowl, combine the buttery spread with the
ingredients: cold water, cheddar cheese, buttermilk biscuit mix, butter, garlic, parsley
name: cheddar bay biscuits red lobster

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x9 inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, bisquick, sweetened condensed milk, egg, vanilla
name: bisquick fudge brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: light cream cheese spread, splenda brown sugar blend, egg whites, ground cinnamon, nonfat milk, whole wheat bread, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares
name: rustic chocolate cinnamon bread pudding low fat low er sugar

steps: In a mixing bowl, add the first 4 ingredients. Toss to combine and let set for 30 minutes. Lay turkey and cheese slices on 6 bread slices. Spoon blackberry mixture over cheese. Sprinkle with minced sage and top with remaining bread slices to make sandwiches.
ingredients: pita pockets, smoked turkey breast, alpine lace reduced-fat swiss cheese, granny smith apple, celery, mayonnaise, alfalfa sprout
name: smoked turkey pockets with apple slaw

steps: Place potatoes in a large baking dish or roasting pan. Combine remaining ingredients. Drizzle over potatoes. Toss to coat. Bake at 425f for 30-40 minutes, stirring often, until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, olive oil, dijon mustard, balsamic vinegar, kosher salt, pepper, sugar
name: roasted dijon potatoes

steps: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add 4 teaspoons of oil to pan and swirl to coat. Place eggs in carefully and cook until the white has become solid, about 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle the eggs with salt, pepper, and about a tablespoon of cheese for each egg. Swirl the remaining olive oil on the top of the cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: garlic cloves, eggs, anchovies packed in oil, capers, olive oil, wine vinegar, salt, pepper, fresh tarragon
name: garlic eggs from the provene

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Bake bread in oven for 3 minutes. Pull out of oven and top with sauce, cheese, pizza toppings and italian seasoning. Bake in oven until heated thoroughly and cheese is melted.
ingredients: french bread, pepperoni, cream cheese, italian seasoning, mozzarella cheese, provolone cheese, marinara sauce
name: quick easy pepperoni loaf

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar, 1 egg and vanilla until smooth. Spread into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. In a small mixing bowl, whisk remaining eggs. Graduall whisk in caramel ice cream topping until blended. Pour over pecans. Bake at 375 for 35-40 min or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for one hour. Refrigerate for 4 hrs or overnight before slicing. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate squares, butter, evaporated milk, sugar, coffee ice cream, chocolate crumb crusts, frozen whipped topping, pecans
name: coffee ice cream pie

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can put this in an omelette and
ingredients: zucchini, olive oil, garlic, italian seasoning, crushed red pepper flakes, salt
name: roasted zucchini

steps: Heat a saute pan on medium high heat. Add in garlic, butter, wine, and half and half. Cook for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Add in the fresh basil and the clams. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Portion a half cup of linguini on each plate, top each plate with equal portions of the clam sauce. Garnish with parmesean cheese and chopped fresh parsley and enjoy.
ingredients: clams, olive oil, margarine, garlic cloves, parsley, clam juice, linguine
name: linguini with clams

steps: In a medium saucepan, cover potatoes with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes or until potatoes are very tender. Drain. Return potatoes to saucepan. Mash. Stir in remaining ingredients.
ingredients: hidden valley ranch dressing mix, mayonnaise, water, small red potatoes, bacon, green onion, celery
name: easy ranch potato salad

steps: Place berries in a large saucepan and add vinegar and spices. Boil for 30 minutes. Add sugar and boil for an additional 30 minutes or until thickened sufficiently. Stir occasionally after adding sugar to prevent scorching. Pour into sterilized jars and seal.
ingredients: fresh strawberries, fresh blueberries, sweet marsala wine, nutmeg, ground cinnamon, powdered sugar, fresh raspberry, fresh blackberries
name: spiked spiced berries

steps: Place the jalapenos in a food processor. Pulse 3-4 times until chopped. Transfer to a bowl. Add in all the remaining ingredients except the salt. Mix well to combine. Season with salt to taste and more sugar if needed. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 3 hours before using.
ingredients: jalapenos, fresh cilantro, garlic cloves, fresh lime juice, water, sesame oil, toasted sesame oil, salt, sesame seeds
name: jalapeno sesame seed salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. In a medium bowl cream butter until fluffy. Add sugars and egg, mix well. In another bowl sift dry ingredients, add to wet ingredients. Once the dry and wet ingredients are well mixed add cup of rolled oats and cup of chocolate chips. Spoon a bit of the batter at a time onto a greased pan. Cook from 12 to 15 minute until the cookies are golden and have risen.
ingredients: chocolate chip cookies, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, flaked coconut, mini marshmallows
name: chips ahoy warm s mores

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter a shallow ovenproof dish. Trim the leeks, cut a slit from the top to bottom and rinse well under cold water. Place the leeks in a saucepan of water, brind to a boil, and simmer gently for 6-8 minutes, until just tender. Remove and drain well using sloted spoon. Arrange in the prepared dish. Beat the eggs with the goat cheese, yogurt, and half the parmesan cheese. Season well with salt and pepper. Pour the cheese and yogurt mixture over the leeks. Mix the breadcrumbs with the remaining parmesan cheese, and sprinkle over the sauce. Back for 35-40 minutes, until the top is crisp and golden brown.
ingredients: leeks, eggs, matzo meal, salt, black pepper, dried thyme, ground cinnamon, canola oil
name: leek fritters

steps: In a large buttered saucepan, combine the sugar, milk, cocoa, and corn syrup. Heat on medium heat until the mixture reaches 240f stirring constantly. Take the mixture off the heat and add butter and vanilla. Let cool to 110f and then stir until mixture loses its gloss. Spoon into a foiled 9x13-inch pan and let harden. Cut into squares.
ingredients: butter, cocoa, sugar, honey, flour, coconut, baking powder, sultana
name: fudge square

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Whisk together the grape tomatoes, artichokes, zucchini, carrot, red onion, olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves. Pour half of this mixture onto a cookie sheet and spread it around. Place tomatoes cut-side down on cookie sheet on top of the oil blend. Drizzle tomatoes with remaining oil, then sprinkle with the maple sugar and salt. Bake slowly in oven at 400 degrees for 3 hours. Blend or process when done. Serve hot over pasta, rice, or white beans.
ingredients: grape tomatoes, artichokes, zucchini, carrot, red onion, olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves
name: hearty roasted vegetable sauce

steps: In a small bowl combine all of the marinade ingredients. Put the steak in a plasic bag. Pour in the marinade. Close the bag and place in a shallow baking pan. Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight. Preheat the broiler. Remove steak from bag and discard marinade. Place on broiling pan. Broil for 5-7 minutes on each side.
ingredients: thickened cream, marsala wine, applesauce, beef stock, kumara, pork sirloin roast
name: grilled pork sirloin with marsala cream sauce and mashed kumara

steps: Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.
ingredients: boneless ham, water, rhubarb, sugar, orange juice, orange rind, dry mustard, cinnamon stick
name: ham with rhubarb sauce

steps: Heat oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees f. Rinse fish, pat dry, and season with salt and pepper. Combine flour, garlic powder, paprika, 2 teaspoons salt, and 2 teaspoons pepper. Stir egg into dry ingredients. Gradually mix in one beer until a thin batter is formed. You should be able to see the fish through the batter after it has been dipped. Dip fish fillets into the batter, then drop one at a time into hot oil. Fry fish, turning once, until both sides are golden brown. Drain on paper towels, and serve warm.
ingredients: fish bones, water, white wine, black peppercorns, onion, fresh ginger, celery, carrot
name: basic fish stock

steps: Cook the pasta according to the directions on the package. Meanwhile, cut the pesto kalamatas and sun dried tomatoes into small cubes and quarter the cherry tomatoes. When the pasta is cooked, drain it and rinse it in cold water until the pasta is cold. Drain it again. Mix the pesto sauce, olive oil and parmesan in with the pasta. In a large serving bowl, mix the pesto kalamatas and sun dried tomatoes with the pasta. Sprinkle the pine nuts over the top and serve.
ingredients: farfalle pasta, kalamata olives, sun-dried tomato, olive oil, pesto sauce, dried chili pepper flakes, parmesan cheese
name: bow ties with pesto kalamatas and sun dried tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, half-and-half, pure vanilla extract, orange zest, butter, kosher salt, white pepper
name: vanilla mashed sweet potatoes

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can add hot sauce or peppers to your liking. This is very versatile.
ingredients: zucchini, red pepper, leek, vegetable oil, egg substitute, dried thyme, black pepper
name: zucchini red pepper leek frittata

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, jelly, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the jelly and orange juice mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving.
ingredients: orange juice, chicken broth, cornstarch, olive oil, carrots, butter, salt
name: orange glazed shredded carrots

steps: Combine sugar and cornstarch in a heavy saucepan. Stir in cream, water and corn syrup. Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more. Remove from heat and stir in butter, vanilla and rum. Let mixture stand at room temperature until cooled. Store in refrigerator for up to 2 months.
ingredients: brown sugar, whipping cream, light corn syrup, butter, amaretto
name: amaretto caramel sauce

steps: Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes.
ingredients: whole chickens, butter, salt, black pepper
name: classic roast chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: butter, white sugar, cocoa, baking soda, salt, vanilla, eggs, flour, nuts, chocolate chips
name: twin chocolate delights

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: sugar, peanut butter, margarine, egg whites, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt
name: peanut butter cookie bites

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Frost as desired.
ingredients: dark raisin, rum, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, half-and-half
name: raisin cupcakes

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, and cook for 2 minutes on each side, or until nicely browned. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook for about 8 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Remove from heat, and toss in the sun-dried tomatoes, mozzarella and parmesan. Set aside. Cut a deep pocket into the thickest side of each piece of chicken, and stuff a quarter of the spinach mixture into each pocket. Close by pressing flesh together and securing with a wooden toothpick, if necessary. Combine the italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper, and sprinkles both sides of the chicken pieces with some of the mixture. Wipe out the skillet, add the olive oil, and preheat over medium-high heat. Wipe out the skillet
ingredients: reduced-fat feta cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic clove, dried basil, fresh ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, extra virgin olive oil
name: sun dried tomato and feta stuffed chicken breasts sbd

steps: Boil turnip pickles for approx. 1-2 hours. Drain and pour cold water over them. Peel skin off and cut roots& tops off. In a sauce pan add remaining ingredients, stir. And add beets, bring to a boil. Simmer for 5 minutes. Chill. Good for 1 month in refridgerator.
ingredients: turnip, beetroot, sugar, coarse salt, water
name: turnip pickles lebanese style

steps: Saute the onion and bacon in a large pot until the onion is softened and the bacon is cooked through. Add the garlic and cook for about another two minutes, stirring frequently. Add the cabbage to the pot. It will take up a lot of room but will wilt down as it cooks. Cook until the cabbage is done, stirring frequently. It will take about ten to twelve minutes. If you want a softer cabbage, cover the pot and let it steam for about an extra five minutes or so. If desired, a little bit of sugar and vinegar can be added near the end of cooking time.
ingredients: bacon, onion, fresh corn, red bell pepper, fresh parsley, milk, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: bacon fried corn

steps: Put the white chocolate chips, half-and-half cream, brewed coffee, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream
ingredients: white chocolate chips, half-and-half cream, brewed coffee, whipped cream
name: white chocolate mocha supreme

steps: Cream together sugar and butter. Beat in the egg and vanilla. If using spices add them at this point, i like a combination of 1 tsp ground ginger, 1 tsp of cinnamon and half a tsp of allspice. But have also made them using a cup of chocolate chips. Add in the flour a cup at a time. Roll out between two sheets of baking paper and place onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 400 for about 6-10 minutes, the time taken depends on the size of cutters you have used. Cool for a minute on the cookie sheet then transfer to a wire rack before decorating.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, shortening, eggs, vanilla extract, ground pecans
name: grandma s christmas sugar cutout cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake for 20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: pie crust, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, strawberry, cornstarch, sugar, water
name: strawberry glazed pie

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving.
ingredients: cooked white rice, cooked wild rice, cooked turkey breast, lowfat mozzarella cheese, fat-free evaporated milk, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, eggs, black pepper, fresh parsley
name: wild rice and turkey casserole

steps: In 13 x 9 inch baking pan, place chicken pieces. Do not overlap. Place onion rings over top. Mix seasonings with cream of chicken soup and milk and spoon over chicken. Bake, uncovered, in 375 degree oven for 40 minutes. Sprinkle chicken with almonds, if desired. Bake 10 minutes more or until chicken is tender.
ingredients: butter, dry mustard, garlic powder, dry breadcrumbs, dried tarragon leaves, salt, pepper, boneless chicken breasts
name: baked tarragon chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, and crushed pineapple. Mix well. Pour mixture into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: mango, crushed pineapple, condensed milk, evaporated milk, cool whip, red food coloring, yellow food coloring, coconut, nuts
name: mango pineapple ice cream no machine needed

steps: In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add couscous, cumin and cayenne, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Adjust heat to medium-high, add couscous, blend well and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot.
ingredients: couscous, chicken stock powder, boiling water, butter, spring onions, corn, parsley
name: corn couscous

steps: Put the quinoa in a small saucepan of cold water and bring to the boil. Simmer for three minutes, drain, and dry the quinoa on kitchen paper. Heat a frying pan with two tablespoons of olive oil and saut the quinoa until golden and crisp. Remove to a casserole, add the chicken pieces to the pan, adding more oil if necessary. Saute the chicken until golden, and remove from the casserole. Saute the carrots, onions and garlic for a minute or so, in the same oil. Return the bacon and chicken to the pan and pour in the stock, adding a sprig of thyme. Simmer in a preheated oven at 160c for about 45 minutes, or until the chicken is tender. Skim any fat from the top of the casserole and sprinkle with chopped parsley to finish. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: onion, olive oil, acorn squash, garlic cloves, soy crumbles, ground sage, salt, ground pepper, stock, quinoa
name: comforting quinoa casserole

steps: In oil in a large pot over medium heat, cook onion and garlic about 10 minutes until lightly browned. Add broth and herbs, bring to boil. Stir in vidalia, reduce heat and simmer 10-15 minutes. Serve with a sprinkling of cheese on top.
ingredients: olive oil, white pearl onion, red onion, vidalia onion, chicken stock, salt, red pepper flakes, angel hair pasta, flat leaf parsley, romano cheese
name: olive garden angel hair and three onion soup

steps: Slice the potatoes as thin as possible and dry with a paper towel. Saut potatoes and onions in olive oil over medium heat, turning frequently, until golden brown. Meanwhile, beat the eggs with salt and pepper until foamy, 1-2 minutes. Pour the eggs over the potatoes, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette onto a plate, cover, lower the heat, and slide the omelette back into the pan, so that the cooked side is on top. Cover and cook for about 5 minutes longer. Cut into wedges and serve.
ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, onion, eggs
name: spanish potato tortilla

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Have ungreased cookie sheets ready. Beat butter, sugar and vanilla together until fluffy. Dissolve coffee in hot water and stir into butter mixture. Sift flour, cocoa and salt into mixture and add nuts. Stir to blend well. Shape into one-inch balls and put on cookie sheets. Bake 15 minutes or until set. Roll in icing sugar while warm. Let cool and roll in icing sugar again before storing in a container with a tight lid.
ingredients: eggnog, instant coffee granules, coffee-flavored liqueur, whipped cream, chocolate sprinkles
name: mocha nog

steps: Place tomato sipper in a slow cooker with the contents of the soup packet. Pour water, wine, and soy sauce over the top, turning the tomato to coat. Carefully spread garlic over the tomato, leaving as much on top of the roast during cooking as possible. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. Serve with cooking liquid on the side as au jus.
ingredients: tomato juice, lemon juice, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared horseradish, hot pepper sauce, celery & leaves, vodka, lemon slices, celery ribs
name: steamy tomato sipper slow cooker

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, milk, eggs
name: muffin tin popovers

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: olive oil, raw shrimp, fresh chili peppers, garlic, coarse salt
name: garlic shrimp with chilies

steps: Cook potatoes until tender. While potatoes are cooking, combine onion, parsley and herbs in large mixing bowl. Whisk well. When potatoes are tender peel or not. Dice potatoes. Add to dressing. Add the onions, parsley and herbs, and toss all gently to combine. Serve warm. Leftovers can be served cold, or reheated gently in microwave.
ingredients: meat, cooked beets, potatoes, tart apple, pickled pearl onions, pickle, pickle juice, mayonnaise, maggi seasoning, salt and pepper
name: huzarensla dutch meat and potato salad

steps: Place all ingredients in a sauce pot. Cook on high heat until mixture starts to boil. Stirring occasionally until cranberries pop. Lower heat to medium and using the back of a large wooden spoon, squeeze the grapes against the side of pot or use a potato masher to pop grapes, leaving some whole. The pectin from the grapes and sugar will thicken the sauce as well as the heat the reducing the mixture.
ingredients: cranberries, sugar, orange marmalade, lemon juice, nuts
name: easy cranberry sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 325c. In small saucepan, melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares.
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, orange zest, red food coloring, yellow food coloring, egg, fudge brownie mix, oil, water, eggs
name: tiger brownies

steps: In a mixing bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs.
ingredients: orange marmalade, mandarin orange segments, almond extract, kiwi fruits, peaches, strawberry, red seedless grapes, cantaloupe, honeydew melon
name: sunny fruit salad

steps: In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through.
ingredients: dried guajillo chilies, onion, garlic cloves, butter, chicken broth, chicken breasts
name: chicken guajillo

steps: Prehat oven to 350. Combine first 6 ingredients in a medium bowl. Stir well. Pour into an 8-inch square baking dish coated with cooking spray. Bake uncovered at 375 degrees for 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as above but cover and cook at high for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as above but cover and cook at high for 15 minutes or
ingredients: corn muffin mix, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, sour cream, butter, egg
name: baked corn casserole

steps: In electric skillet set at 300 degrees, cook butter, sugar, dates and egg until gooey and thickened. About 7-10 min. Add pecans and vanilla. Then add rice krispies. Mix well. Cool until slightly warm. Form into balls & roll in powdered sugar. Makes 50-60 small balls.
ingredients: dates, boiling water, butter, sugar, egg, flour, baking powder, salt, nuts
name: 1947 date nut bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, oil, water, sugar, whipped topping, sour cream, frozen coconut
name: coconut ice box cake

steps: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add 4 teaspoons of oil to pan and swirl to coat. Place eggs in carefully and cook until the white has become solid, about 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle the eggs with salt, pepper, and about a tablespoon of cheese for each egg. Swirl the remaining olive oil on the top of the cheese. Carefully turn eggs and cook until yolk is of desired doneness, about 1 minute. Serve immediately.
ingredients: egg, milk, vanilla, sugar, salt
name: egg cheese

steps: Peel eggplants and slice length-wise to a thickness of 1 cm. Add salt and pepper and fry eggplant on both sides on medium heat until golden. Add half a cup of hot water to tomato paste and mix well. Add salt and pepper and fry eggplant on both sides on medium heat for about 4-5 minutes. Peel onions and slice thinly. Fry in oil until golden. Also fry dried mint in oil for a few minutes. Pour kashk evenly over eggplants, follow with onions and mint. Mash ingredients together with a fork, then serve.
ingredients: eggplants, kashk, tomato paste, onions, dried mint, cooking oil, salt, black pepper
name: kashekeh bademjoon

steps: Heat the oil in a large lidded frying pan and quickly cook the onion, garlic and mushrooms for about 3-4 minutes or until lightly browned, set aside. Add the chicken fillets to the pan and brown quickly over high heat. Add the tomato soup and the thyme. Cover and simmer gently for 30 minutes or until chicken is tender. I serve this with rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, turkey gravy, paprika, salt, soy sauce, rice
name: slow cooker quick chick

steps: Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Tossing occasionally. In a serving bowl, combine vinegar and dijon. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper, and toss.
ingredients: dijon mustard, dill weed, olive oil, orange juice, orange zest, red potatoes, smoked salmon, red onion, capers
name: smoked salmon potato salad

steps: Add ground beef and ketchup. Serve on hamburger bun.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, salt, pepper, water, condensed chicken gumbo soup, ketchup, prepared mustard
name: bar b q burgers

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Add 1/2 cup of water to a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes. Reduce heat
ingredients: ground turkey breast, mushroom stems and pieces, all-purpose flour, ground black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, skim milk, worcestershire sauce
name: sos light ground turkey gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Spread into a 9x9 baking dish. Top with reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Bake until bubbly and lightly browned on top approximately 30 minutes.
ingredients: crescent rolls, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, marinated artichoke hearts, garlic powder, sour cream
name: cheesy artichoke pinwheels

steps: In a mixing bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs.
ingredients: honeydew melon, cantaloupe, strawberries, mandarin oranges, pineapple, bananas, lemonade, orange marmalade, orange liqueur
name: mozart s fruit melody salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease and flour a 9x13 size pan. Put all the ingredients into one large mixing bowl. Mix well. Pour into the prepared pan. Bake for 30 to 40 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: half-and-half, light brown sugar, egg yolks, light rum, pineapple, mint sprig
name: fresh pineapple with rum sauce

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: green cabbage, carrot, apple, celery seed, black pepper, sugar, salt, cider vinegar, vegetable oil
name: weight watchers apple cole slaw 1 point

steps: To make the crust, mix the flour, sugar, and salt in a medium bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Stirring with a fork, add just enough of the egg yolk mixture to moisten the dough so it holds together when pinched between the thumb and forefinger. Gather up into a thick disk and wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, white sugar, shortening, egg, vinegar, cold water
name: perfect never fail pastry crust

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: phyllo pastry, butter, cheesecake, raspberry jam, orange juice
name: phyllo wrapped cheesecakes

steps: Place strawberries in the pie shell. Set aside. Mix jello and pudding with water. Heat to a full boil, then remove from heat. Pour over berries and chill. Top with 1 t. Cool whip, if desired.
ingredients: fresh strawberries, fat-free sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, sugar-free strawberry gelatin, water
name: no crust low calorie strawberry pie

steps: Spray and lightly flour medium baking dish. In bowl, mix brown sugar, peaches and cinnamon. Place in dish. In another bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Sprinkle on top. Bake in 350f oven for 20-25 minutes, till top is golden.
ingredients: peaches, sugar, cinnamon, clove, allspice
name: country style peach butter

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a dutch oven, brown hamburger meat. Drain off fat. In the dutch oven, top meat with all of the sliced onions, then the potatoes. Salt the potatoes. Top with shredded cheese. Combine soup and soup can of water in a bowl and blend with spoon until smooth. Bake covered at 350 for about an hour.
ingredients: hamburger, onion, salt and pepper, green beans, cottage cheese
name: grandma s hamburger casserole
