steps: In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda
ingredients: plums, lemon juice, sugar, cinnamon, butter
name: plum clafoutis without dough

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving.
ingredients: ground chicken, taco sauce, mexican blend cheese, taco shells, lettuce, sour cream, black olives, chopped tomato
name: easy cheesy chicken tacos

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place cabbage and ham in alternate layers in a 2-quart casserole sprayed with cooking spray. Mix together soup and milk. Pour over cabbage and ham. Top with buttered bread crumbs. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, ham, frozen broccoli, frozen cauliflower, cheddar cheese soup, cheddar cheese
name: cheesy ham bake

steps: Place your prepared mango in a serving dish. In a pot add the lime juice, lemongrass and sugar. Heat gently, no boiling until the sugar is completely dissolved. Do not use juice until it is completely cooled. Strain the juice and pour over the mango wedges. Sprinkle with the lime rind, cover, chill for at least 3 hours. Serve in small bowls with a scoop of ice cream or sherbert and garnish with the sprigs of mint.
ingredients: mango, strawberry, spanish onion, sugar, ginger, lime
name: savoury mango strawberry salad australia

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix all ingredients except reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Spread into a 9x9 baking dish. Top with reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Bake until bubbly and lightly browned on top approximately 30 minutes.
ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, garlic, onion powder, frozen spinach, artichoke hearts, chopped tomato
name: tgif s spinach dip

steps: Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a small bowl. Brush over the chicken. Broil the chicken for 10 minutes each side, 2 inches or so from the heat. Brush frequently with the sauce. Serves 1-2 people.
ingredients: basil leaves, kosher salt, lemon zest, fresh ground black pepper, water, chicken breast halves
name: basil lemon brined grilled chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine ingredients. Pour into pie crust. Bake 15 minute at 425. Reduce heat to 350 degrees and bake 45 minutes. Cool and garnish with whipped cream.
ingredients: canned pumpkin, flour, splenda sugar substitute, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, vanilla, egg, skim milk
name: guilt free pumpkin pudding

steps: In a saucepan over med-high heat, bring oatmeal and chicken broth to a boil. Stir in curry powder, salt, and pepper. Pour over oats and mix thoroughly. Bake at 325 for half an hour or until golden brown. Cool. Serve as a cold cereal or cook in microwave or on the stove with 2 parts water or milk to one part toasted oats until thickened.
ingredients: oatmeal, chicken broth, salt, pepper, olive oil, curry powder, parsley
name: oatmeal savory and comforting

steps: Place all ingredients except corn in a food processor. Process in an on-off manner for about 1 minute. Transfer to large bowl & stir in corn manually. Refrigerate overnight to allow flavors to blend. Serve with chips, crackers or toast.
ingredients: black beans, tomato paste, fresh lime juice, sour cream, cheddar cheese, cumin, cayenne pepper, green onions
name: the perfect black bean dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Put the chopped apples into a large bowl and sprinkle with the lemon juice. Combine the nuts, sultanas, sugar, flour, salt and baking powder and mix well. Stir this mixture into the apples. Add in the vanilla essence and mix again. Pour into a lightly oiled cake tin and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until lightly browned on top. Serve hot or cold. For a moister cake. Add to the ingredients a little fruit juice or water.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, milk, apples, sugar, ground cinnamon
name: hollandsche appel koek dutch apple cake

steps: Heat oven to 350f or mark 4. Bake for about 35 minutes until the meringue is firm and brown on top. Remove from the oven and spread the jam on top of the pudding. Reduce the oven to 300f or mark 2. Whisk the egg whites stiffly and fold in the remaining caster sugar. Pour into the pie dish and bake for about 35 minutes until the meringue is firm and brown on top. Pour into the pie dish and bake for about 35 minutes until the meringue is firm
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, sugar, orange juice, marshmallows, whipping cream, frozen raspberries
name: pink lady dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large bowl, mix all of your ingredients until incorporated. Spray a pan with pam and scoop about 1 tbs of the whole wheat flour mixture onto pan. Press cookies flat with a fork. Bake in the oven for 12 minutes or until done.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, almond extract
name: hearty whole wheat biscotti

steps: Preheat oven at 410 degrees f. Line 9x12 inch baking tray with grease-proof paper. Mix together dry ingredients. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs until fluffy, add milk, oil. Add to dry mixture. Cover dish with a layer of batter. Cut the cream cheese in cubes and sprinkle over first layer of batter. Add remaining batter to cover the cream cheese. Place in baking tray. Bake for 20 minutes until slightly golden brown. Cool, cut the cornbread into square pieces, and serve with tea.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, butter, sugar, eggs, cream-style corn, canned crushed pineapple, monterey jack cheese
name: caribbean cornbread

steps: Place chicken pieces in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, oil, thyme, pepper, salt, garlic cloves, salt and garlic. Pour over chicken seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator for 30 minutes. Preheat broiler. Drain chicken, reserving marinade. Place chicken on the unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4 to 5 inches from the heat about 6 minutes or until light brown. Turn chicken and brush lightly with reserved marinade. Discard any remaining marinade. Broil for 6 to 8 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. If desired serve with salsa and lime wedges.
ingredients: chicken, lime, cilantro, kosher salt, fresh black pepper
name: cilantro lime baked chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on wire rack.
ingredients: yogurt, bananas, eggs, milk, honey, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, oats, raisins
name: no sugar low fat fruity oatmeal cookies

steps: Preheat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the pies into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the pies and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: pie crust, sugar, cornstarch, water, jello gelatin, fruit, cool whip
name: fruitful pie

steps: Cook beef in a large skillet until no longer red. Remove from skillet, using a slotted spoon so as to save liquid in the skillet. Cook macaroni, onion and green pepper in drippings until macaroni is yellow. Return meat to skillet along with tomato sauce, water, salt, pepper and worcestershire sauce. Cover and simmer 25 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, vegetable oil, elbow macaroni, green pepper, tomato sauce, water, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce
name: skillet macaroni and ground beef

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Bake for 10 minutes.
ingredients: puff pastry, bacon, onion, pumpkin, smoked cheese, egg, milk, nutmeg
name: smoky cheese and pumpkin mini quiches

steps: Place watermelon slices in heavy duty zip lock bag. Seal and freeze for 2 hours. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge. Place the salt in a saucer and spin the rim of each glass in the salt and set aside. Process the frozen watermelon, tequila, and next 3 ingredients in blender until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides. Add the ice and blend well, pour into glasses and garnish if desired.
ingredients: watermelon, fresh lime juice, sugar, tequila, lime zest, fresh mint leaves, mint sprig
name: watermelon mint margaritas

steps: Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling, salted water according to package directions stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk the olive oil, parmesan cheese and lemon juice in a large bowl. Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Toss the pasta with the lemon sauce, and add the reserved cooking liquid and toss again. Season with the salt & pepper. Garnish with lemon zest and chopped basil.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, anchovy fillets, spaghetti, fresh lemon juice, parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: spaghetti with olive oil garlic and anchovies

steps: In a medium sauce pan, saute the onion and garlic in the oil over medium-high heat, until tender. Stir in the flour, cumin, salt and pepper and cook over medium-high heat, stirring, for 2 minutes. Stir in the chiles and oregano. At this point you may cool, and store in refrigerator, covered, for up to one day. To serve, heat thoroughly.
ingredients: dried new mexico chile, garlic, onion, oregano, salt, water
name: traditional new mexican red chile sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, artichoke hearts, garlic cloves, balsamic vinegar, butter, dried oregano leaves, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast half
name: chicken roasted with artichokes and tomatoes w m

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 12 to 14 minutes. They will not brown much. Cool and frost with your favorite glaze and add sprinkles. For convenience, you can melt store-bought frosting. Bake at 350 degrees for 12 to 14 minutes. Cool and frost with
ingredients: yellow cake mix, lemon gelatin, milk, eggs, canola oil, kumquat puree, glaze, margarine, icing sugar
name: calamondin cake

steps: In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, shallot, dried dill, cider vinegar, white vinegar, sugar, salt, black pepperpreparation:In a small saucepan on medium heat, warm the vinegar and sugar together until the sugar dissolves. Set liquid aside to cool. Chop the dill. Slice the cucumber very thinly and arrange in layers on a shallow, non-reactive platter with sloped edges. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and garnish with the fresh dill. Pour the dressing over the cucumbers. Let marinate at least 1 hour or overnight. Yield is estimated.
ingredients: cucumbers, shallot, dried dill, cider vinegar, white vinegar, sugar, salt
name: the best cucumber salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Mix glaze ingredients together, stirring until dissolved. Marinate fish filets for at least 30 minutes. Arrange salmon, skin-side down, in a baking dish lined with aluminum foil & lightly sprayed with cooking spray. Brush glaze on all sides of fish. Bake approximately 15-20 minutes, basting once with pan sauces. Fish is done when it flakes easily and center is cooked through.
ingredients: honey, low sodium soy sauce, olive oil, black pepper, salmon fillets, cooking spray, kiwi fruit, mango, fresh cilantro, fresh orange juice
name: marinated salmon with kiwi mango relish

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Sift dry ingredients into mixing bowl. Blend in egg, milk, butter, and vanilla. Mix in the grated coconut and the currants or raisins, if used. Turn out onto a floured board and knead slightly. Shape into two loaves and pat into two buttered medium loaf pans. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes, until a toothpick in the centre comes out clean.
ingredients: coconut milk, water, granulated sugar, unsalted butter, cornstarch
name: haupia

steps: Place the roti in a large bowl with the water, wheat flour, gram flour, salt, green chilies, black pepper, mango powder, coriander, onions, ghee and bring to a boil. Remove from the heat and add the tea. Let the tea steep, covered, for 3 minutes. To serve, strain roti into a large bowl with the water, wheat flour, gram flour, salt, green chilies, black pepper, mango powder, coriander, onions, ghee and bring to a boil. To serve, strain roti into a
ingredients: wheat flour, gram flour, salt, green chilies, black pepper, mango powder, coriander, onions, ghee
name: masaledar roti

steps: Mix all of the dry ingredients together in a large bowl and whisk to blend, then set aside. In a small bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. In another bowl, add the egg yolks, vanilla, oil and milk, whisking slightly to combine. Add the egg yolk mixture to the dry ingredients and beat until well mixed. Fold in the egg whites just until combined. Make waffles according to the machine instructions.
ingredients: sourdough starter, warm water, powdered milk, salt, sugar, butter, eggs, flour, vanilla extract
name: sourdough belgian waffles

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Drain the berries and reserve the syrup from one can. Stir the syrup in to the combined mixture of the cornstarch and half of the sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat. Gently stir in remaining sugar, blueberries, and lemon juice. Let stand while preparing pastry. Line a 9-inch pie pan with pastry and fill with the filling. Dot with butter or margarine. Adjust top crust on pie, cuttin slits for the steam to escape, and seal. I recommend adding some sugar over the top after sealing. Bake for 30 minutes or until filling is bubbly and crust is brown.
ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, egg yolk, blueberry pie filling, all-purpose flour, quick-cooking oats, sugar, margarine
name: blueberry crumble pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Butter a medium baking dish. Add the oats and butter to a heatproof mixing bowl. Pour 1 cup boiling water over them and let stand 5 minutes. Stir in the milk, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. When well mixed, stir in the apples. Spoon mixture into the prepared dish. Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and continue to cook for 5-10 minutes, until thick and bubbly. Spoon into bowls and serve hot with cream drizzled around the cereal and a dusting of cinnamon.
ingredients: boiling water, milk, rolled oats, salt, dried fruit, apples, ground cinnamon, brown sugar, heavy cream, butter
name: baked pennsylvania dutch oatmeal

steps: In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in berries. Cook until the berries have mostly broken down, approximately 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and lemon juice. Enjoy.
ingredients: fresh raspberries, unsweetened white grape juice, raspberry sherbet, water, lemon juice, ice cubes, of fresh mint
name: creamy raspberry sipper

steps: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add 4 teaspoons of oil to pan and swirl to coat. Place eggs in carefully and cook until the white has become solid, about 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle the eggs with salt, pepper, and about a tablespoon of cheese for each egg. Swirl the remaining olive oil on the top of the cheese. Carefully turn eggs and cook until yolk is of desired doneness, about 1 minute. Serve immediately.
ingredients: margarine, eggs, pimento stuffed olives, parsley, bread, salt
name: eggs olives

steps: Heat oil in wok or large frying pan. Stir-fry onion until tender. Add steak and stir-fry 3-4 minute. Stir in beans and mushrooms, stir-fry 2 minutes. Add black bean sauce and stock, stirring. When sauce boils add sprouts. Serve immediately with cooked noodles or rice.
ingredients: vegetable oil, kielbasa, cooked rice, red kidney beans, hickory flavored barbecue sauce
name: chuck wagon mix

steps: Put chicken in roaster. Combine ingredients and pour over. Cover with lid. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid
ingredients: chicken parts, sherry wine, coconut milk, garlic cloves, bay leaves, whole black peppercorn, thai chiles
name: can t miss asian inspired chicken adobo

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a second bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and teaspoon of the cinnamon. In a second bowl, mix together the flour, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: butter, day-old white bread, green apples, sugar, cinnamon, raisins, whipped cream
name: swiss apple and bread dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Grease and flour bundt pan. Combine butter and shortening in mixer bowl. Add eggs and blend well. Add other ingredients. Beat on medium speed for 10 minutes. Pour into pan. Bake 70 minutes or until golden brown. Cool in pan 10 minutes.
ingredients: brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, butter, baking powder, salt, sugar, baking soda, eggs, sour cream
name: crunchy breakfast cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare stuffing according to package directions, but do not let stand. Spoon stuffing across the center of a 2 quart shallow baking dish. Arrange 3 chicken breast halves on each side of the stuffing, overlapping if necessary. Combine soup, milk and parsley. Pour over chicken. Cover with foil and bake for 15 minutes. Uncover and bake 10 minutes longer or until the chicken is no longer pink. You may need to lift some pieces of chicken so that you can check all of it. Stir sauce before serving.
ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, pork chops, condensed cream of mushroom soup, onion, dried thyme, mozzarella cheese
name: yummy pork chop stuffing bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Put cream cheese out to soften. Scrub potatoes. Dry them off and grease them with butter and salt the skins. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. Remove from oven and cool to handle. Cut potatoes in half, lengthwise, remove cooked potato and put in large bowl. Be carefully to leave the skin intact. Mash with cream cheese, hot milk, onion salt, butter, and pepper. Pile mixture back into skins. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley and bake 20 more minutes.
ingredients: instant mashed potatoes, whipped cream cheese, egg, parsley, onions, butter, paprika
name: instant potato casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners. Mix in a large bowl, the flax seed and warm water. Let the flax seed set. In a separate bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking soda and baking powder. Return to the bowl with the flaxseed in it. Combine yogurt, vanilla, margarine and blueberries with the flaxseed. Stir the two mixtures together just until combined. Batter will be very thick. Scoop into prepared muffin cups. Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, ground flax seed, sugar, baking powder, canola oil, salt, soymilk, cinnamon, vanilla extract, berries
name: whole wheat vegan pancakes

steps: In a food processor or blender, blend the cream cheese, feta cheese green onion, pepper and oregano, until smooth, scrape down the sides, add the tablespoon of either yogurt or sour cream. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour. Rinse the cherry tomatoes and remove stems. With a sharp knife, cut a slice fron the non-stem end of each tomato. With a small spoon scoop out as much of the seeds and pulp and you can, arrange the hollow tomatoes on paper towel lines plate to drain. After the cheese mixture has chilled for 1 hour, transfer the it to a small zipper-top plastic bag, squeeze out air. Snip off one corner, squeeze the cheese filling into each tomato, arrange on serving dish and sprinkle with paprika.
ingredients: puff pastry, olive oil, cherry tomatoes, sugar, feta cheese, fresh basil leaf, parmesan cheese
name: cherry tomato and feta cheese slice

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl combine tuna, celery, and onion in large bowl. In smaller mixing bowl, combine mayo, parsley, lemon juice, salt, pepper, dry mustard. Add pasta to tuna mixture. Spoon mayo mixture over tuna and stir until well blended. Refrigerate 3 hours or until chilled.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, tuna, celery, miracle whip light, green pepper, green onion, chopped pimiento, salt, black pepper
name: tangy tuna macaroni salad

steps: Place your prepared mango in a serving dish. In a pot add the raspberry juice, lemongrass and sugar. Heat gently, no boiling until the sugar is completely dissolved. Do not use juice until it is completely cooled. Strain the juice and pour over the mango wedges. Sprinkle with the raspberry rind, cover, chill for at least 3 hours. Serve in small bowls with a scoop of ice cream or sherbert and garnish with the sprigs of mint.
ingredients: raspberry-flavored sparkling water, ice, fresh strawberries, mango, lime juice
name: berry mango slush

steps: Place the double onion beef sandwich in a large roasting pan. Combine garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce, fresh coarse ground black pepper, beef brisket, onion, onion soup mix, water, french rolls. Bake for 2 to 3 hours, basting frequently, or until beef is tender and looks stringy when pulled with a fork. If roast starts getting too crispy, cover pan with foil or lid. Slice meat thinly and serve on rolls. Serve juices in individual cups or bowls to dip sandwiches into.
ingredients: garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce, fresh coarse ground black pepper, beef brisket, onion, onion soup mix, water, french rolls
name: double onion beef sandwiches

steps: In a medium saucepan with a lid, heat oil over medium. Add 1 cup water. Bring to a boil. Add pistachios and remaining pistachios. Season with salt and pepper. Fluff with a fork, and serve.
ingredients: pistachios, low sodium chicken broth, salt, couscous, fresh mint leaves, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, ground pepper
name: pistachio couscous

steps: Place the tofu on a plate and pat dry with kitchen paper. Slice into 1cm thick slices. Heat the tofu in a non stick frying pan, once oil is hot add the tofu and cook over a medium heat for 5-8minutes either side or until tofu is golden brown. Place the soy sauce, sesame oil, 5 spice powder and honey in a large bowl. Mix well and toss. In the warm tofu. Sprinkle over the sesame seeds. Serve with steamed tender stem broccoli or stir fried vegetables.
ingredients: eggplant, tofu, black bean sauce, oil, flour
name: chinese eggplant and tofu in black bean sauce

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: large shrimp, olive oil, lemon peel, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, salt and pepper, linguine, leeks, dry white wine, fresh parsley
name: leeky linguine with shrimp

steps: In a large skillet or wok on medium high heat, cook the rice in oil over medium heat, stirring, until golden brown. Add salt, water, bouillon and soy sauce. Cover tightly and simmer 20 minutes longer or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender.
ingredients: carrots, cabbage, oil, beef-flavor ramen noodles, hamburger, salt and pepper, soy sauce
name: easy chinese dish

steps: In a large heavy saucepan combine all the ingredients and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Stir occasionally to prevent sticking. When mixture is simmering, reduce heat to low. Cook mixture until fruit is tender and the relish has thickened, approximately 40-50 minutes, stirring occasionally. Let cool, serve.
ingredients: canola oil, red onion, ginger, garlic, orange juice, brown sugar, cranberries, figs, orange zest
name: cranberry fig relish

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add mandarin orange, red pepper, green onion, deli turkey, spinach leaves and cook until browned. Add mandarin orange, red pepper, green onion, deli turkey, spinach leaves and cook until browned. Add mandarin orange, red pepper, green onion, deli
ingredients: 10-inch flour tortillas, fat free cream cheese, mandarin orange, red pepper, green onion, deli turkey, spinach leaves
name: turkey and mandarin orange rolls

steps: In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar and salt, stirring constantly, bring to a full boil. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat, add in chocolate chips and vanilla, stir hard until blended. Stir in chopped walnuts. Spread mixture in a buttered 8-inch square pan. Chill until firm. Cut in small squares if desired, top each square with a walnut half.
ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, miniature marshmallows, white chocolate chips, walnuts, maple extract, walnut halves
name: maple walnut fudge

steps: In one small bowl, toss chicken strips with pasta sauce and let marinate 10 minute. In another small bowl, combine beans and salsa. Place half of the chicken on half of one tortilla. Spread half the beans and salsa over chicken. Sprinkle with half the cheese. Repeat with second tortilla. Roll tortillas up and place, seam side down, in a baking dish. Bake at 375f 5 minutes. Top with a dollop of sour cream and serve.
ingredients: hormel fully cooked chicken breasts with gravy, salsa, corn, canned black beans, minute rice, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, flour tortillas
name: chicken tortilla casserole

steps: Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat. Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Stir in tomatoes and salt. Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: broccoli, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, pasta
name: spicy broccoli pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brush 2 baking sheets with 1 tsp oil each. Loosely grate potatoes and onion in food processor and place in large mixing bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Add flour and onion and mix well. Mix in eggs and 1 tsp oil. Spoon out the batter onto baking sheets and flattern slightly. With oven racks in lower and middle positions, bake until brown on the bottom. Turn and bake another 5 or until brown. Garnish liberally with chives and serve with sour cream or non-fat yogurt.
ingredients: onion, green bell pepper, pimiento, olive oil, idaho potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: o brien potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the onion, garlic, ketchup and egg in a large bowl. Stir to combine. Add meat and mix until well combined. Add breadcrumbs and cheese and continue mixing until thoroughly incorporated. Transfer meat mixture to a loaf pan. Top with bacon strips, if desired, and cover with aluminum foil. Transfer to oven and bake until meat is no longer pink, about 55 minutes. Uncover, and continue baking an additional 30 minutes. Let meatloaf stand, loosely covered, about 10 minutes, before slicing and serving.
ingredients: ground lean pork, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, seasoning salt, worcestershire sauce, egg, ketchup, fresh breadcrumb
name: betsy s meatloaf

steps: Place in a casserole dish and cook for an additional 5 minutes on medium heat. In a casserole dish, put baked beans and ketchup together and mix well. Add hamburger, hot dogs, onion, and bell pepper and stir until uniformly mixed in the dish. Take the uncooked bacon and lay them over the top of the dish side by side until dish is completely covered. If you cut up block cheese instead, go ahead and cut in thick pieces and add before putting in the oven. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Once preheated, put dish in oven uncovered for 30-40 minutes. The cheese should be slightly brown around the edges and the beans should be boiling slightly when dish is taken out of the oven. Reheats very well after being refrigerated.
ingredients: hamburger buns with sesame seeds, hamburger patties, cheddar cheese, red onion, dill pickle, tomatoes, romaine lettuce, mustard, ketchup
name: krabby patties

steps: In a microwave-safe 8-in. Square dish, melt butter. Stir in cracker crumbs. Press mixture onto bottom of dish. In a bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Whisk in the ice cream, pour over crust. Cover and freeze for 2 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with crushed candy bars. Return to the freezer until firm, but remove from the freezer approx 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: cool whip, graham cracker pie crusts, butterfinger candy bars, vanilla instant pudding mix, milk
name: butterfinger pie

steps: Put strawberries in a blender and blend until the strawberries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Put mixture into 4 individual serving dishes and chill. When ready serve, add whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: strawberry, syrup, milk, sugar, ice cubes
name: strawberry smoothies

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place butter in bottom of 9x13 baking dish and melt in oven, while preheating. Place eggs in blender and beat on high. Add flour, milk and vanilla. Mix together for 30 seconds. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Cut into 16 square servings.
ingredients: eggs, milk, vanilla, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, sugar
name: the simple but perfect pancake

steps: Add 1 tablespoon oil to pan. Add the finely minced garlic and lightly brown. Be very careful not to burn the garlic. Add 3 tablespoons honey. Dissolve 1 tablespoon corn starch in 1 tablespoon water to thicken sauce. Thicken and stir until nice and shiny. I often make ahead, refrigerate and warm in micro wave just before using. Keeps well at least a week.
ingredients: garlic, white bread, extra virgin olive oil, white vinegar, lemon juice, water
name: skorthalia greek garlic sauce

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook potatoes in oil for 15 minutes, turning occasionally. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Stir into vegetables. Bring to boil. Reduce heat. Cook 2 minutes longer, stirring occasionally. In a small bowl, combine the beer, broth and brown sugar. In a large bowl, combine the beer, broth and brown sugar. Cook
ingredients: whole black peppercorn, fresh thyme, bay leaves, garlic cloves, water, kosher salt, brown sugar, lager beer
name: beer brine

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cabbage, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cabbage, zucchini, onion, garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper
name: squashed cabbage

steps: Place the peach whip on a plate and pat dry with kitchen paper. Slice into 1cm thick slices. Heat the peaches in a non stick frying pan, once oil is hot add the peach whip and cook over a medium heat for 5-8minutes either side or until peach is golden brown. Place the soy sauce, sesame oil, 5 spice powder and honey in a large bowl. Mix well and toss. In the warm peach whip. Sprinkle over the sesame seeds. Serve with steamed tender stem broccoli or stir fried vegetables.
ingredients: peaches, tofu, honey, mint sprig
name: tofu peach whip

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except bread and butter. Mix until the cornstach is disolved. Transfer mixture to a shallow bowl or pan. Dip both sides of each bread slice into the mixture. Melt butter on the griddle or skillet. Place bread on heated surface and cook each side to a light golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: whole wheat bread, soy coffee creamer, soymilk, cornstarch, chickpea flour, vegetable oil
name: fronch toast

steps: Place tomatoes in a blender or food processor. Cover and blend on lowest speed 2 seconds to chop tomatoes. Combine tomatoes with onion, cilantro, lemon juice, garlic, hot pepper sauce, fresh jalapeno pepper. Taste and adjust seasonings, if desired. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: tomatoes, white onion, jalapeno peppers, cilantro, salt, lemon juice, garlic salt
name: pico de gallo for a party

steps: Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, honey, paprika, cinnamon, cayenne, salt, pepper, whole chickens, sweet onion
name: paprika roast chicken with sweet onion

steps: In a large saucepan, heat the oil, add the beans and mix with a little water, if needed, to thin the beans. Stir in onions, salt, garlic salt. Add cheese and allow to melt. Sprinkle with chiles. Heat until the beans are slightly thickened. Spoon into a dip bowl and serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: pinto beans, bacon grease, onion, garlic cloves, jalapeno, adobo seasoning, salt, cheese
name: johnny jalapeno s easy refried beans

steps: Place all the berries in a large bowl and sprinkle with the sugar. Stir to combine and leave to macerate for about 30 minutes. Using a mixer, beat the mascarpone, heavy whipping cream, powdered sugar and vanilla extract just until soft peaks form. Take four wine or parfait glasses and layer the berries with the cream. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint and a few fresh berries. The parfait can be made about an hour or two before serving.
ingredients: strawberry, grenadine, black peppercorns, caster sugar, balsamic vinegar, vanilla extract, strawberry liqueur, single cream, mascarpone cheese
name: strawberries with mascarpone and balsamic vinegar

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Coat an 8-inch square pan with nonstick cooking spray. Combine oats, flour, wheat germ, and cinnamon. Stir until well mixed. Fold in raisins. Press mixture into pan and bake for 18 to 20 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool to room temperature, cut into 12 bars and serve.
ingredients: crisp rice cereal, quick-cooking oats, raisins, light brown sugar, light corn syrup, peanut butter, vanilla extract, milk chocolate chips
name: no bake granola bars

steps: Make the pineapple juice by whizzing together the mangoes, crushed pineapple, lime juice, sugar. Press through a sieve into a jug. Add about 100ml water to the sieve and push through the pulp to get as much flavour out of it as possible. Stir in the lime juice and chill until needed. Put a few ice cubes and a slice of lime in each glass. Fill up with the pineapple juice, then top with the raspberry juice.
ingredients: mangoes, crushed pineapple, lime juice, sugar
name: mango and pineapple jam

steps: Preheat oven 350. In a med bowl add cake mix, whipped egg, and cool whip mix together until well blended. Take a tablespoon of batter and roll into a ball in powdered sugar. Place on parchment paper lined cookie sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 min.
ingredients: egg, cool whip, cake mix, powdered sugar
name: cool whip cookies

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired.
ingredients: vegetable oil, green onions, smoked sausage, garlic powder, tomatoes, bell pepper, white kidney beans, black pepper, water, fresh cilantro
name: white kidney bean soup

steps: Place chicken in crockpot. Sprinkle with soup mix and garlic salt. Pour dressing and water over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Skim fat from cooking juices. Remove chicken from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way.
ingredients: chicken breasts, white onion, baby carrots, new potatoes, white wine, chicken broth, salt, paprika, pepper, thyme
name: crockpot chicken and vegetables

steps: Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic clove, gherkin, hard-boiled eggs, greek yogurt, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, curry powder. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more.
ingredients: potatoes, beets, red onion, garlic clove, gherkin, hard-boiled eggs, greek yogurt, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, curry powder
name: bollywood potato salad pink potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussel sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: brussels sprouts, butternut squash, olive oil, maple syrup, garlic cloves
name: roasted brussels sprouts and butternut squash

steps: Place egg yolks and water in a small saucepan over moderately low heat until just melted. Add 1 tbs of the cold butter to the egg and water mixture and place over hot, not boiling water. Whip constantly until egg yolks thicken slightly. Remove from heat and whip in the second tbs of cold butter. Gradually pour the melted butter into the egg mixture, beating constantly. Place over hot, not boiling, water cook until thickened, whipping constantly. Thickened hollandaise should hold the imprint when a fork or whip is drawn across the surface. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice, salt, and cayenne. Sauce may be placed in top of double boiler over hot, not boiling, water, covered, and kept until serving time. Serve with vegetables, baked or broiled fish, and shell-fish.
ingredients: egg yolks, lemon juice, salt, sweet butter
name: quicky hollandaise sauce

steps: Heat oven 180c. Grease and line pan - 20cm x 30 cm. Melt butter, sugar and honey in pot. Stir gently till sugar dissolves. Stir in oats, flour and nuts. Cool mixture. Add choc chips. Press mixture into pan. Bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: mayonnaise, celery, raisins, walnuts, tart apple, deli turkey, sourdough bread, lettuce leaf
name: apple walnut turkey sandwiches

steps: Mix all dry ingredients into a large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients. Mix together. Pour batter into well greased 9 x 5 x3 inch pan. Let stand for 20 minutes before baking. Bake at 350 degrees until it tests done.
ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, banana, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar
name: lynne s banana bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. For the filling, mix the two filling ingredients in a bowl, then press onto bottom of 9 inch springform pan. Chill to set. For the filling, beat cream cheese on medium speed until fluffy. Beat in sugar until blended, then beat in eggs until blended. Stir in white chocolate, cranberries, zest & vanilla. Pour into prepared crust & bake 45-50 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool in pan for 30 minutes, then refrigerate. Run knife around sides of pan to loosen, then chill 4 hours or more. Remove rim & cut into wedges. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: belgian endive, blue cheese, dried cranberries, walnuts, raspberry vinaigrette dressing
name: blue cheese and cranberry endive delights

steps: In a large skilled cook the spinach over medium heat until browned and done. Drain reserving 3 t. Drippings, setting spinach aside. Return drippings to the pan and over medium heat saute the onions and garlic for 4-5 minutes. Add the chiles and stir well. Add the potatoes, reduce heat to medium low and cook for 20 minutes, stirring often. Add the tomatoes to heat through. Spoon onto plates, top with eggs and offer salsa at the table. Garnish with chopped cilantro and cheese if you wish.
ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, tomatoes and green chilies, cream cheese, colby-monterey jack cheese
name: tex mex spinach dip crock pot

steps: With a sharp knife, cut the skin and all the white pith off the oranges. Working over a large bowl to catch the juice, segment the orange slices, cutting on either side of each segment to release it from the membrane. Arrange for great presentation in a salad bowl. Separate the onion slices into rings. Arrange in the bowl with tor orange segments and avocado slices. In a small bowl, whisk together the salt, 1 tablespoon the reserved orange juice, the oil and the bergs,. Immediately pour over the salad and serve at once.
ingredients: avocado, orange, iceberg lettuce, mayonnaise, orange juice
name: tossed avocado orange salad

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Cut bananas crosswise into halves. Cut each half lengthwise into halves and arrange in greased 9-inch pie plate. Dot with margarine or butter and drizzle with orange and lemon juices. Sprinkle with brown sugar and coconut. Bake until coconut is golden, 8 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: bananas, butter, orange juice, lemon juice, brown sugar, shredded coconut
name: african dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: butter, sugar, light corn syrup, cherry gelatin, vegetable oil cooking spray
name: cherry suckers

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. Sprinkle olive oil over the base of the baking dish. Lay cutlets in the dish, rubbing them with the oil. Cover cutlets with crushed garlic, mustard and rosemary, then season with the salt and pepper. Place in the oven and cook for 25-30 minutes, turning once, until the cutlets ar browned and crispy. If desired, serve on a bed of couscous with your favourite steamed vegetables.
ingredients: lamb loin chops, lemon pepper seasoning, oil, garlic, dry white wine, chicken stock, lemon juice, fresh chives, fresh ground pepper
name: lemon pepper lamb cutlets

steps: In bowl, combine onion, salad oil, green chilies, whipping cream, tomato puree, salt, corn tortillas, monterey jack cheese, butter. Bake uncovered at 350 for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: onion, salad oil, green chilies, whipping cream, tomato puree, salt, corn tortillas, monterey jack cheese, butter
name: tortilla dry soup casserole sopa seca de tortilla

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: feta cheese, sour cream, eggs, milk, butter, yellow cornmeal, unbleached all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda
name: feta cheese cornbread

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Coat an 8 x 8-inch pan with oil or nonstick spray. Dice the pacific tuna and put them aside. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the milk, celery soup, eggs, onion powder, salt and pepper until smooth. Stir in the tuna, cheese, and diced potatoes, then pour the mixture into the prepared pan. It should come nearly to the top. Bake for 55 to 60 mniutes, or until a knife inserted into the center comes out clean. The edges should be golden brown.
ingredients: tuna, egg, red onion, dried parsley, garlic salt, lemon pepper, crackers
name: pacific tuna cakes

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares.
ingredients: raisins, dark rum, butter, dark chocolate, sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, baking powder
name: rum and raisin brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: nonstick spray coating, baking potatoes, parmesan cheese, paprika, pepper
name: baked fries

steps: Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the bread and chocolate chips in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the bread. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: sugar, tapioca, salt, milk, egg, unsweetened chocolate squares, instant coffee, vanilla, whipped topping
name: chocolate tapioca pudding

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: dried pinto bean, bacon, garlic, plum tomatoes, onions, green pepper, beer, fresh cilantro, jalapeno peppers, salt and pepper
name: mexican charro beans

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Place apples in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired.
ingredients: apples, butter, cinnamon, maple syrup, nutmeg, rolled oats, salt, raisins, apple juice
name: baked sliced apples

steps: In a large frying pan, fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon and drain. Add cabbage, butter and water to bacon grease and cook until tender. Stop cooking when the cabbage is still a bit crunchy. Add salt and pepper to taste maybe a little more butter, not much. Slice sausage and lay on top of cabbage. Continue to cook a little longer to warm the sausage. Crumble bacon over all. Yummmy -- great with black eyed-peas and cornbread.
ingredients: cabbage, water, chicken stock cube, olive oil, bacon, onion, butter, cracked black pepper, parsley
name: cabbage bacon

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Carefully pour the chicken broth over all. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving.
ingredients: ground turkey, onion, stewed tomatoes, green pepper, long-grain rice, water, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, low-fat cheddar cheese
name: inside out turkey stuffed bell pepper casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut filets into 3 - 4 oz portions. Melt butter. Crush ritz crackers into crumb size pieces. Mix together dry ingredients. Dip halibut into melted butter then into cracker mixture. Place on baking sheet. Pour remaining melted butter over halibut. Bake at 400 degrees for 12 - 15 minutes or until flaky when touched with a fork.
ingredients: halibut fillets, butter, parsley, salt and pepper, olive oil
name: easy halibut fillets with herb butter

steps: Mix shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimppreparation:Mix shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimppreparation:Mix shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimppreparation:Mix shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimppreparation:Mix shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimppreparation:Mix shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimppreparation:Mix shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimppreparation:Mix shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimppreparation:Mix shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimp
ingredients: shrimp, crab boil, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, hard-boiled eggs, tabasco sauce
name: shrimp dip spread

steps: In the bowl of an electric mixer combine the butter, cocoa powder and cream cheese over low speed and mix until thoroughly combined. Increase speed to high and cream ingredients until light and fluffy. Reduce speed to low and slowly add the powdered sugar, buttermilk, and vanilla. Beat until mixture is smooth and thoroughly combined. Frost cake as usual.
ingredients: chocolate milk, coffee, sugar, coffee liqueur, ice cube, orange wedge
name: frosted coffee chocolate punch

steps: In a large skillet, brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread.
ingredients: ground beef, tomato sauce, dried onion flakes, dried oregano, dried basil, hamburger, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: sloppy dogs ground beef sloppy joes with cheese in hot dog bun

steps: Boil eggs and peel while still warm. Cut eggs lengthwise, remove yolks to a separate bowl. Mash yolks and add miracle whip to your favorite consistency. Add paprika, salt and pepper to taste. Stuff egg whites, and sprinkle more paprika on top. Chill in fridge for at least 1-2 hours before serving.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, tartar sauce, prepared mustard, butter, pepper, paprika
name: aunt abbie s deviled eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine oats, wheat flour, egg, applesauce, peanut butter, honey, brown sugar, vegetable oil, sunflower seeds, chocolate chips, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar,
ingredients: quick-cooking rolled oats, wheat flour, egg, applesauce, peanut butter, honey, brown sugar, vegetable oil, sunflower seeds, chocolate chips
name: karen s power bars

steps: Heat the oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a ovenproof skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon.
ingredients: pink salmon, oil, all-purpose flour, milk, salt and pepper
name: salmon gravy

steps: Cook caramelized leeks over noodles according to package directions. Drain and rinse. In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add leeks, olive oil, butter, dark brown sugar, egg noodles, fresh parsley, extra virgin olive oil, salt and black pepper. Stir fry 5 minutes or until leeks are tender. Add leeks, olive
ingredients: leeks, olive oil, butter, dark brown sugar, egg noodles, fresh parsley, extra virgin olive oil, salt and black pepper
name: caramelized leeks over noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Bake for 20 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
ingredients: pie shells, eggs, milk, frozen spinach, gouda cheese, pecans, salt & pepper
name: spinach gouda pecan quiche

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add leek. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add garlic. Add tomato, salt, and pepper. Add wine and salmon. Sprinkle with dill, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
ingredients: mussels, leeks, garlic cloves, liquid garlic, french mustard, white wine, vegetable bouillon granules, cream, parmesan cheese
name: creamy mussel and leek appetiser

steps: In large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic, ginger and red pepper, cook and stir 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium-high. Add rice and soy sauce. Cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add pineapple, tossing to combine. Heat rice through. Sprinkle with green onions before serving.
ingredients: light soy sauce, sugar, cider vinegar, ketchup, ground ginger, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breast, vegetable oil, stir fry vegetables, unsweetened pineapple chunks
name: low fat pineapple chicken stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled.
ingredients: skinless chicken breast half, butter, garlic cloves, green onions, dried basil, pizza dough, roma tomatoes, fresh cilantro, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese
name: delicious chicken garlic pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the tomatoes. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in a greased 8x8 baking dish,. Making sure not to lay them flat. They should have the same shape as they were in the package. In a small bowl, mix the honey, soy sauce, garlic and seasonings. Pour evenly over the chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce. Serve.
ingredients: boneless chicken thighs, garlic powder, salt, pepper, olive oil, cherry tomatoes, balsamic vinegar
name: chicken thighs with tomatoes

steps: Heat oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Add flour, whisking constantly until bubbly, about 1 minute. Slowly whisk in milk until thickened, about 3 minutes. Stir in black pepper, cheese, chipotle peppers, and adobo sauce. Divide steaks and pepper-and-onion mixture among 4 baguette slices. Top with cheese sauce and remaining 4 bread slices.
ingredients: cream cheese, black beans, monterey jack pepper cheese, chipotle salsa, tortilla chips
name: zesty raspberry chipotle black bean dip

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the water, wine and sugar, stirring to dissolve. Add the cranberries, apples and lemon juice. Bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and gently boil, uncovered, stirring occasionally until the cranberries pop and apples softened, approximately 15 minutes. Transfer sauce to a food processor and puree.
ingredients: cranberry juice, water, cloves, cinnamon stick, sugar, frozen lemonade concentrate
name: nancy drew lemonade disguise

steps: Combine all ingredients except chicken wings in a plastic bag. Add wings and shake to coat. Place in single layer on 2 greased 15 x 10 pans. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. Turn and bake 15 minutes more. Recipe can be doubled.
ingredients: chicken wings, taco seasoning mix, cornmeal, parsley flakes
name: taco party wings

steps: Mix seasonings together in small dish. Trim fat from steak and rub seasoning mixture on both sides. Place the steak on rack of broiler pan. Position pan so that steak is about 3 inches from heat. Broil 10-12 minutes for a steak, turning once during cooking or grill as desired. Serve with baked potatoes, sour cream and chives, and steamed broccoli.
ingredients: kosher salt, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, black pepper, sugar, ground celery seed, nutmeg
name: steakhouse rub

steps: Spray a slow cooker container with butter-flavored cooking spray. Combine apples and raisins in crock. Add yams, apple pie filling, golden raisin, unsalted butter, ground cinnamon, pecans, granulated sugar. Mix well to combine. Dot top with margarine. Cover and cook on low for 4-6 hours.
ingredients: yams, apple pie filling, golden raisin, unsalted butter, ground cinnamon, pecans, granulated sugar
name: crock pot apple spiced yams

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is incorporated and mixture is warmed through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh ginger, sugar, water, skim milk, chocolate syrup
name: hot chocolate with ginger

steps: Combine peanut butter, sugar, and egg together until smooth. Drop by spoonfuls onto parchment-lined baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit. Do not brown. Do not over bake.
ingredients: peanut butter, splenda granular, egg, vanilla extract
name: magical peanut butter cookies

steps: Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Mix in pineapple and oranges. Chill until mixture mounds slightly when dropped from a spoon. Fold in three-fourths of the cool whip. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan. Chill for 4 hours or until firm. Cut into squares. Garnish with remaining cool whip.
ingredients: orange gelatin, crushed pineapple, canned mandarin oranges, cool whip, pecans, buttermilk
name: orange buttermilk jello salad

steps: In large bowl, combine first 4 ingredients. Stir until smooth, then mix in the remainder of the ingredients. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of either crumbled potato chips or chow mien noodles. Bake at 350f for 20 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle with lemon juice during last 5 minutes of baking.
ingredients: chicken, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, ritz crackers, butter, celery seed, poultry seasoning
name: creamy chicken casserole

steps: Heat oven to 400. Brown hamburger and onions. Combine softened cream cheese, soup, and milk. Combine browned hamburger and onions to mixture, add ketchup and salt. Mix well together and pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Place biscuits on top and bake until biscuits are done.
ingredients: hamburger meat, onion, macaroni and cheese mix, cream of mushroom soup, garlic powder
name: glunk

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: pork chops, cornbread stuffing mix, hot chicken broth, apple, onion, parsley
name: easy pork chops with apple stuffing bake

steps: Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and return to the pot add in the butter, toss to combine. Meanwhile warm the cream in a small saucepan over low heat. Then add in the garlic, pressing it into the oil occasionally to release its flavor. It should barely color on both sides. Remove the garlic, and add the remaining oil. Fry the eggs gently in the oil, until the whites are just about set and the yolks still quite runny. Remove the pasta, and add the remaining oil. Fry the eggs gently in the oil, until the whites are just about set and the yolks still quite
ingredients: olive oil, spanish onions, tomato puree, chicken stock, rigatoni pasta, butter, parmesan cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: rigatoni con le cipolle pasta with onion

steps: In the bowl of an electric mixer combine the butter, cocoa powder and cream cheese over low speed and mix until thoroughly combined. Increase speed to high and cream ingredients until light and fluffy. Reduce speed to low and slowly add the powdered sugar, buttermilk, and vanilla. Beat until mixture is smooth and thoroughly combined. Frost cake as usual.
ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, butter, egg yolks, sugar, cognac, cream, cocoa powder
name: swiss chocolate squares

steps: Spread guacamole and cream cheese evenly in centers of each tortilla. Top with tomato, carrot, cucumber and sprouts, evenly distributed. Lightly sprinkle with salt and pepper. Place cheese down center of each tortilla. Fold bottoms up and sides in tightly, to form a package with an open top. Spread guacamole and cream cheese evenly in centers of each tortilla. Top
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, canned black beans, chunky salsa, green onions, monterey jack cheese, lettuce, chopped tomato, sour cream, burrito-size flour tortillas
name: santa fe wrap

steps: Mix together all ingredients using hands in a big bowl. To get the right consistency it is important that all ingredients get well mixed and gets softened a bit. I would say that you should knead for around 5 minutes. Form into meatballs according to the size you prefer. In denmark meatballs used for dinner is the size of the palm of your hand, and lunch meat balls are about half of that. Heat a non-stick pan to medium-hot and place the meatballs in the pan. If you feel they stick too much to the pan, you can add a bit of butter to the pan. Turn the meatballs with a fork once they have started to brown. Keep turning them every 4 min or so being careful that they do not brown too much. Cook for approx 15-20 min until cooked through. Serve with a potato salad, mashed potatoes or cooked potatoes with a white milk based gravy.
ingredients: egg, soft breadcrumbs, milk, worcestershire sauce, onion powder, salt, garlic powder, ground beef
name: make ahead freezer meatballs

steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add the onion, mushrooms, carrot, and thyme, and saute until the onion is just translucent, about 4-5 minutes. Add the broth and mashed potatoes. Stir until potatoes are mostly dissolved and broth is smooth. Add the turkey and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through, about 10 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, salt, boiling water, sage sausage, milk, light cream, ground sage, parsley, red bell pepper
name: potato sausage christmas confetti soup

steps: Preheat oven to 180dc. Heat oil in a heavy based pan, add onions, apples and ginger and cook until soft. Add mustard seeds and water and cook for 15 minutes. Remove mixture to warmed ovenproof dish. Deglaze pan with cider and add to onion mixture. Fry sausages in pan until browned. Drain and add to onion mixture. Bake in oven, uncovered for 25-30 mins. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: granny smith apple, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, ground chicken
name: chicken and apple sausage

steps: Wet a paper towel and wipe any dirt from the mushrooms. Place the mushrooms in a large stockpot. Add the remaining ingredients to the pot. The liquid will not cover the mushrooms at first. Cook, covered, over very low heat for 4 hours. Stir occasionally so that all of the mushrooms are completely coated with the cooking liquid. Remove the cover and cook for an additional 4 hours. The mushrooms will shrimk by half and become saturated with cooking liquid. Remove with a slotted spoon and serve in a bowl.
ingredients: olive oil, shallots, gingerroot, fresh mushrooms, soy sauce, fresh chives, milk, cream
name: braised east west mushrooms

steps: Combine first 4 ingredients in a large pitcher, stirring until sugar dissolves. Taste at this point and if you want it a little sweeter, add a little bit more sugar. Add fruit slices and peaches. Cover and chill at least 8 hours. Stir in club soda and ice cubes just before serving.
ingredients: red wine, orange juice concentrate, triple sec, brandy, sugar, lemon juice, lemon zest, peaches
name: sangria peaches

steps: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Beat with electric mixer until light and very fluffy. Turn into 1 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees f. In the oven for 20 minutes or until puffed and lightly browned.
ingredients: russet potatoes, cheddar cheese, half-and-half cream, butter, eggs, salt, onion powder, ground black pepper
name: kittencal s cheesy mashed potato puff bake

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired.
ingredients: russet potatoes, green onions, dried italian herb seasoning, salt and pepper, chicken broth, paprika, fresh parsley
name: oven crisped potatoes

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well.
ingredients: canned tomatoes, tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, garlic clove, fresh rosemary, olive oil, eggs, salt and pepper
name: tomato basil omelet

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease and flour 24 minit muffin pan cups. Combine sugar and cinnamon in small bowl. Mix cake mix, water, oil and eggs according to package directions, stir nutmeg into batter. Fill prepared muffing cups two-thirds full. Bake about 12 minutes or until lightly browned and toothpick inserted into centers come out clean. Remove cupcakes from pans. Roll warm cupcakes in sugar mixture until completely coated. Bake about 12 minutes or until lightly browned
ingredients: yellow cake mix, water, vegetable oil, banana, baking powder, vinegar
name: so easy egg and dairy free cupcakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: salmon fillets, unsalted butter, soy sauce, garlic powder, fresh ginger, sesame oil, limes
name: ginger salmon steaks

steps: Place all the ingredients in a bowl. Beat until combined well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pie pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, old fashioned oats, corn syrup, sweetened flaked coconut, butter, eggs, pie shells
name: oatmeal coconut pie

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Preheat oven to 350. Grease 2 small loaf pans, or 1 large one. Stir sugar, butter, eggs, bananas and buttermilk in large bowl. Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in blueberries, pour into pan. Bake large pan for 75 minutes, smaller pan from 55-60 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes, remove from pan onto wire rack, cool 2 hours before slicing.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, sugar, eggs, orange rind, milk, fresh blueberries, fresh raspberry
name: raspberry blueberry tea bread

steps: Whisk together all ingredients in a food processor until smooth and creamy. Whisk until smooth and creamy. Wh
ingredients: strawberries, frozen orange juice concentrate, sugar, kiwi fruits, orange, bananas, peaches, apples
name: fruit cups with strawberry dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl, combine tuna, celery, onion, cheese, dill relish, celery, onions, mayonnaise, garlic salt, hot dog buns. Spread tuna mixture evenly over bottom halves of rolls and top with remaining roll halves. Wrap each sandwich in foil. Place on a baking sheet into a pre-heated 350 oven for 15-20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Unwrap and serve immediately.
ingredients: tuna, cheddar cheese, dill relish, celery, onions, mayonnaise, garlic salt, hot dog buns
name: tuna buns

steps: Mix first 4 ingredients and pour into a greased 9x13 baking pan. Prepare cake mix as directed on the package and spoon batter over marshmallow mixture in the pan. Top with nuts, if desired. Bake at 350 for 45-50 minutes until toothpick inserted into center comes out clean. Serve warm or cool and garnish with whip topping or vanilla ice cream, if desired.
ingredients: dark chocolate, instant coffee powder, brown sugar, digestive biscuits, almonds, walnuts, raisins
name: no bake chocolate fudge cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle crumbs onto an ungreased baking sheet and set aside. Sprinkle mayonnaise mixture and then dredge in bread crumbs. Place fish on greased baking sheet and bake in oven 17-18 or until fish flakes easily. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: fish fillets, macadamia nut oil, macadamia nuts, fresh oregano, parsley, garlic clove, lemon juice, lemon zest
name: baked herb and macadamia crusted fish

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the onions and saute for 1-2 mins. Add the garlic and saute for 1-2 mins. Add the tomato sauce and saute for 1-2 mins. Add the cayenne pepper and saute for 1-2 mins.
ingredients: oil, onion, tomato sauce, ground cumin, ground coriander, cayenne pepper, salt, fava beans
name: fooll mudammes fava bean egyptian breakfast

steps: In a mixing bowl, using an electric mixer, beat cream cheese and mayonnaise until well blended. Add ketchup, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce and beat again until well incorporated. Add onions and mix well using a fork. Adjust tabasco sauce to taste. Divide mixture equally into 2 serving bowls. Add crab to one bowl and mix well using a fork. Add shrimp to the other bowl and mix well using a fork. Serve with potato chips or vegetable crackers. Refrigerate any unused portions.
ingredients: shrimp, mayonnaise, thai sweet chili sauce, hot chili sauce, cornstarch
name: bang bang shrimp copycat from bonefish grill

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Rinse and pat mushrooms dry. Twist off stems. Unfold puff pastry and cut into 36 squares. Fill each mushroom cap with a spoonful of gorgonzola cheese. Place 1 filled mushroom in the center of 1 puff pastry square. Draw all 4 corners up to form a bundle and pinch center together to form a knob. Repeat to bundle all the mushrooms. Brush each bundle lightly with egg. Bake until golden borwn-approx. 10-20 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, baby portabella mushrooms, fresh breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, hot pepper sauce, gorgonzola
name: grilled gorgonzola stuffed mushrooms

steps: Scoop egg yolks into bowl. Set aside egg whites. Add mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper to yolks. Mash together with fork until smooth. Spoon mixture into egg white halves. Sprinkle tops with paprika,.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, green onion, curry powder
name: deviled eggs with curry

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Combine wet ingredients. Combine dry ingredients. Pour into a 9x9. Bake 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, buttermilk, baking soda, cornmeal, salt
name: arkansas corn bread

steps: Heat oven to 325f and spray a baking sheet with pam cooking spray. Put all the dry ingredients into a ziplock bag and shake to combine. Remove chicken from the ziplock bag and shake off any excess buttermilk and add to the breadcrumb mix, add 3 pieces at a time and shake to coat the chicken. Remove and place on baking sheet. Repeat till all pieces are coated. Spray chicken with pam cooking spray and bake for about 20 minutes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, buttermilk, panko breadcrumbs, coconut, salt, pepper
name: simple baked crispy coconut chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, egg, mini marshmallows, light corn syrup, vanilla extract, peanut butter chips, rice krispies, salted peanuts
name: salted nut bars

steps: Place onion, celery, condensed french onion soup, water, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, hamburger buns on top of burger bun.
ingredients: ground beef, celery, condensed french onion soup, water, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, hamburger buns
name: zesty onion burgers

steps: Put cucumbers in jars and refrigerate at least 24 hours before tasting.
ingredients: water, vinegar, salt, alum, cucumbers, fresh onion, dill weed, garlic
name: refrigerator dill pickles

steps: To make dressing, combine all ingredients in a pan and bring to the boil. Set aside. Preheated oven to 200c. Toss pumpkin lightly in 2 tablespoons of the vegetable oil, place in baking tray and baked in until golden brown, about 45 minutes. Heat remaining oil in wok and stir-fry prawns until just cooked, about 2-3 minutes. Drizzle half the dressing over the prawns and toss to coat. To assemble, combine pumpkin, baby spinach and onion in a bowl. Divide mixture between individual serving plates. Arrange prawns on top of salad and drizzle remaining dressing around the plates.
ingredients: red onions, olive oil, dried mission figs, brown sugar, sherry wine vinegar, baby spinach leaves, feta cheese, hazelnuts, cracked black pepper
name: warm spinach and dried fig salad from sun maid

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add the crayfish and cook until the crayfish is cooked through. Add the crayfish and cook until the
ingredients: eggs, crayfish tail, green onion, sliced mushrooms, velveeta cheese, colby-monterey jack cheese, salt and pepper
name: crawfish omelet

steps: Place 1 tbsp butter into skillet to melt. Add potatoes and pepper. After 5 minutes, add onion. Brown potatoes. Onion should be limp, but not browned. In separate bowl, beat eggs, then add milk, salmon and dill. Add 2 tbsp butter to skillet to melt. Pour in egg mixture over potatoes. Scramble until almost done. Remove from heat. Eggs should still be a little moist. Sprinkle parsley on top as garnish.
ingredients: butter, eggs, milk, white pepper, smoked salmon, green onion, sour cream, fresh coriander
name: scrambled eggs with smoked salmon
