steps: Cook the potatoes. When done cooking, drain the water and mash them in the pot. Transfer them to a mixing bowl. Whip in the eggs, cream or milk, salt to taste, and 4 tablespoon butter. Beat until very fluffy. Turn into a buttered 1-quart casserole and sprinkle with the bread crumbs. Dot with remaining two tablespoons butter. Bake in a moderately hot oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until the top is nicely browned. Serve hot.
ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, butter, green onion, sour cream, fresh parsley, dried marjoram, salt and pepper, fresh breadcrumb
name: make ahead mashed potato casserole

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in medium-sized saucepan. Saute onions and garlic until brown. Add tomato sauce and stir. Lower heat to medium-low. While stirring, add rosemary, basil and oregano. Allow sauce to bubble. Sprinkle with sugar and mix again. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Use immediately, or transfer to plastic container for storage.
ingredients: roma tomatoes, diced onion, garlic cloves, kosher salt, red pepper flakes, olive oil, fresh basil leaf
name: slow cooker marinara with fresh basil

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all of the dry ingredients together. Mix all of the wet ingredients together. Mix everything together. Bake for 10-12 minutes at 350f.
ingredients: chocolate chips, brown sugar, white sugar, banana, vanilla, baking soda, applesauce, olive oil, flour
name: vegan chocolate chip banana cookies

steps: Heat a saute pan on medium high heat. Add in garlic, butter, wine, and half and half. Cook for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Add in the fresh basil and the clams. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Portion a half cup of capellini on each plate, top each plate with equal portions of the clam sauce. Garnish with parmesean cheese and chopped fresh parsley and enjoy.
ingredients: clams, garlic cloves, olive oil, white wine, capellini, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: tuscan style capellini with clams and garlic

steps: In a large skillet combine olive oil and butter over medium heat. Add garlic, pepper and the lemon zest. Salt water when it boils then cook cappellini to al dente, 2 to 3 minutes. Add a ladle of cooking water to lemon pepper butter and stir in the lemon juice. Drain pasta and toss with lemon-pepper butter and salt, to taste. Add the basil to the pasta and serve a small bundle alongside your entree or serve as a delicate first course.
ingredients: sea salt, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese, lemon, zest of
name: lemon and olive oil dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely enjoy.
ingredients: almonds, quinoa, water, raisins, cinnamon, nutmeg, quick-cooking oatmeal, brown sugar, vanilla yogurt
name: raisin spice hot cereal with quinoa

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Toss together apples and apples, spread evenly over bottom of 8x8 baking dish. In medium bowl combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and oats. Using pastry cutter work butter into oat mixture until crumbly. Spread over fruit, pressing down lightly. Bake 40-45 minutes or until top is lightly browned. Cool before serving. Top with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: tart apples, brown sugar, flour, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter
name: heavenly apple crisp

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet. Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil. In a small bowl combine. Onion flakes, oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well. Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes. Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet. Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden. Serve while they ar piping hot.
ingredients: potato, swede, onion, chives, butter
name: the broon s clapshot for burn s night

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl, beat the cream cheese, mayonnaise, dungeness crabmeat, onions, artichoke heart, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley. Add the rest of ingredients. Pour into the casserole dish and bake till browned and bubbly 20-25 minutes. Serve with crackers or party rye.
ingredients: mayonnaise, dungeness crabmeat, onions, artichoke heart, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley
name: hot dungeness crab dip

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place the butter, salt and water in a pan. Bring to a boil. Sift the flour onto a sheet of waxed paper, then, off the heat, add it all to the butter and water mixture and stir it in very quickly to form a thick paste that leaves the sides of the pan clean. Return the pan to the heat and beat the mixture with a wooden spoon for 1 minute to dry it. Remove the pan from heat and cool for 5 minutes. Beat in the eggs and yolk, one at a time, then add the mustard, cayenne pepper and grated cheese. Place teaspoonfuls of the mixture onto a nonstick baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes. Lower the oven temperature to 350 degrees and cook for 15 minutes, until golden brown. Cool on a wire rack and serve cold.
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, green onions, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, monterey jack cheese, small curd cottage cheese
name: cheesy egg puffs

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack.
ingredients: unbleached white flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, egg whites, canola oil, brown sugar, vanilla, bananas
name: brown sugar banana bread

steps: Wash, core and dice celery. Sprinkle lemon juice over them and toss together gently to coat, then sprinkle brown sugar over the celery and toss again. Chill for at least 20 minutes. Add celery and nuts then stir in mayonnaise, adding only enough for desired consistency. Serve on a bed of greens.
ingredients: celery, dried cherries, hazelnuts, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat sour cream, fresh lemon juice, salt, bartlett pears
name: northwest waldorf salad

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Lightly oil a 12 hole muffin pan. Line moulds with a slice of ham so the ends stick out over the top. Break an egg into each hollow, top with tomato and scatter with chives, parmesan, salt and pepper. Bake for 18 minutes or until egg is set. Remove from oven and leave to cool for 5 minutes. Run a knife around each mould to loosen ham. Cool on rack. Bake for 18 minutes or until egg is
ingredients: red potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, onion, cooked ham, heavy cream, eggs, dijon mustard, swiss cheese
name: ham pot pie topped with scalloped potato gratin

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, bananas, instant tang orange drink, sugar, egg, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: tang y banana chocolate chip muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: wild rice, budweiser beer, mushroom, onion, olive oil, black pepper, italian sausage
name: budweiser wild rice and sausage

steps: In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, onion, garlic, lime juice, lemon juice, cayenne, tandoori paste, dark brown sugar and puree. In a gallon size zip top bag, put pieces of selected pork and pour in marinade. Seal bag, removing as much air as possible. Allow steak to marinate for at least 1 hour in refrigerator. Then grill or broil selected pork to doneness.
ingredients: salt, sugar, garlic, scallion, soy sauce, sherry wine, honey
name: soy sherry marinade for barbecued pork

steps: Heat butter in skillet. Add onion and cook until tender. Add soup, milk and tomatoes. Heat to a boil. Add fish and cook over low heat 10 minutes or until fish is done. Serve over linguine.
ingredients: butter, onion, garlic cloves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, diced tomatoes, fish fillet, cooked linguine
name: one pan white fish tomato alfredo

steps: Mix cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, buttermilk, oil, honeypreparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little.
ingredients: cornmeal, all-purpose flour, salt, sugar, baking powder, milk, oil, eggs, butter
name: cast iron skillet baked cornbread

steps: Place the strawberries in a large bowl and mix together until smooth. Add the sugar and mix until smooth. Add the cinnamon and mix until smooth. Add the vanilla and mix until smooth. Add
ingredients: fresh strawberries, calvados, sugar, heavy cream, cinnamon
name: fraises marinees aux calvados strawberries in calvados

steps: Combine octopus, red wine vinegar, garlic cloves, oregano, salt and pepper in small saucepan with tight-fitting lid. Add red pepper flakes if desired. Cook briefly over medium heat, until garlic becomes fragrant. Add couscous to pan. Saute over medium heat until golden brown, approximately 5 minutes. Add capers, red wine, and water. Season with salt and pepper to paste. Bring mixture to a boil. Cover and remove from heat. Let stand 4-5 minutes. Fluff with a fork before serving.
ingredients: octopus, red wine vinegar, oregano, olive oil, garlic clove
name: octopus meze

steps: Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Add pasta. Cook 8 minutes. Add shrimp to pot. Cook 3 minutes or until shrimp are done and pasta is al dente. Drain. Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Stir in basil and next 4 ingredients. Place spinach on plates. Top with pasta mixture.
ingredients: spaghetti noodles, fresh shrimp, goat cheese, lemon, juice of, red onion, italian seasoning, oregano, crushed red pepper flakes, tomatoes, salt and pepper
name: shrimp tomato and goat cheese pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease four 9 x 5-in loaf pans. Cream butter, sugar and eggs. Mix sour cream and soda in a separate bowl. Let stand until foamy. Add vanilla, bananas, salt and flour. Mix well. Place in 4 prepared loaf pans. Bake for 50 minutes or until cake tests done.
ingredients: butter, bananas, bicarbonate of soda, baking powder, sugar, plain flour, egg, milk
name: banana loaf cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour and baking soda in a bowl. Beat butter, peanut butter, sugars, and vanilla in a large mixing bowl until creamy. Beat in eggs. Beat in flour mixture. Stir in oats and chocolate chips. Drop by mounded tablespoons onto a ungreased cookie sheet about 3 inches apart then bake for 10 to 15 mins. Or until they are light brown. Let stand on cookie sheets 3 minutes then remove to wire racks to cool.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, peanut butter and milk chocolate chips, nuts
name: reese s classic peanut butter and milk chocolate chip cookies

steps: Cook beef in a large skillet until no longer red. Remove from skillet, using a slotted spoon so as to save liquid in the skillet. Cook macaroni, onion and green pepper in drippings until macaroni is yellow. Return meat to skillet along with tomato sauce, water, salt, pepper and worcestershire sauce. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until macaroni is tender. Stir in macaroni and cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until macaroni is tender. Return meat to
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, macaroni
name: beeforoni

steps: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add pork, cooking 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Remove pan from heat and let pork stand for 30 seconds. While pork cooks, combine brown sugar, soy sauce, chile paste, hoisin and rice vinegar in a small bowl. Pour sauce over the pork, scraping the pan to loosen the fond. Turn the pork over to coat. Serve garnished with the green onion slices. I had a couple of thick boneless chops sitting around, so i cut them into thin, flat slices and cooked as above. Then doubled the sauce ingredients, tossed it all together and served with saffron rice. A nice variation.
ingredients: thai peppers, garlic, distilled vinegar, seasoned sea salt
name: chili garlic vinegar

steps: In a large bowl, beat eggs with an electric mixer until light colored. Add butter and cheese and mix on low. Add muffin mix, sausage patties, english muffins, cheddar cheese, eggs, margarine, oilpreparation:In a large bowl, beat eggs with an electric mixer until light colored. Add muffin mix,
ingredients: sausage patties, english muffins, cheddar cheese, eggs, margarine, oil
name: sasauge egg mcmuffin copycat mcdonalds recipe

steps: Place cretons in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 4 to 6 hours or until the meat is tender.
ingredients: ground pork, milk, onion, garlic, salt, pepper, clove, allspice, fine dry breadcrumbs
name: cretons

steps: Mix all ingredients except margarine in a small bowl and set aside. Using steel blade, place flour and salt in bowl of food processor. Pour in margarine mixture through chute. Process till dough forms ball. Break dough apart and reprocess 2 or 3 times. Place dough in buttered bowl. Turn dough in bowl to butter all sides. Cover and let rise about 1 hour, till doubled in size. Punch down, shape into loaf and place in greased loaf pan. Let rise till doubled. Bake in preheated oven 25 to 30 minutes or till golden brown.
ingredients: water, milk, dry yeast, margarine, sugar, salt, flour, egg
name: braided sweet bread

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Add peppers and veggies. Cook about 2 minutes. Mix dry jello and cornstarch, in small bowl. Add broth, dressing, and garlic. Stir until jello is dissolved. Add to skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook about 3 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Serve over hot rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, lemons, brown sugar, white wine vinegar, water, dried fig, sea salt, thyme, fresh cilantro
name: egyptian lemon chicken with figs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, crushed pineapple with juice, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla,
ingredients: pineapple, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, vanilla ice cream
name: grilled pineapple delight

steps: With the back of a fork, mash egg yolk with mustard to make a thick paste. Stir in chopped scallions and chopped egg white. Mix in salt and pepper as desired. Divide mixture on top of 2 slices of bread. Top with lettuce leaves, and cover with remaining slices of bread. Makes 2 sandwiches.
ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, sugar, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, pepper, hard-boiled eggs
name: special egg salad

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions and then drain. Melt butter in a large pot. Simmer onion and sage leaves 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper. Toss with noodles. Top with parmesan cheese just before serving.
ingredients: pasta, butter, sage leaves, parmigiano-reggiano cheese
name: butter sage sauce over pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: sugar, shortening, eggs, flour, baking soda, salt, vanilla, sour milk, cinnamon
name: german cinnamon jumbo cookies

steps: Combine cheese, chopped tomato, diced green chilies, black olives, green onion, italian salad dressing, cilantro, tortilla chips. Taste and adjust seasonings, if desired. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: mexican blend cheese, chopped tomato, diced green chilies, black olives, green onion, italian salad dressing, cilantro, tortilla chips
name: tennis team salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: chicken meat, condensed cream of chicken with herbs soup, frozen mixed vegetables, potato, milk, fresh parsley, herbes de provence, salt, fresh ground black pepper, pie crusts
name: valerie s chicken pot pie from woman s day mag

steps: Place chicken in a large, shallow roasting pan with foil, grease well with a thin layer of olive oil. Combine oil and garlic, pour over chicken, tossing to coat. Cover and marinate 8 hours or overnight. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line a large, shallow roasting pan with foil, grease well with a thin layer of olive oil. Combine crumbs, garlic powder, salt, pepper and paprika in a shallow bowl. Dredge chicken in crumb mixture and place in prepared pan. Bake uncovered for 1 hour, or until done.
ingredients: instant potato flakes, parmesan cheese, parsley flakes, garlic salt, frying chicken, margarine
name: crispy herb baked chicken

steps: Preheat oven or toaster oven to 450 degrees. Lay a 12-inch square piece of foil on the counter and put the garlic on it. Sprinkle the thyme and rosemary over the garlic. Pour the oil over the garlic and herbs. Draw up the edges of the foil and make a sealed packet. Bake 20 minutes. While the garlic is baking, cook pasta according to package directions. Two minutes before pasta is done add the zucchini to the cooking pasta, cook 2 minutes. Drain zucchini and pasta. Open the foil and mash the garlic lightly with a spoon. Toss mashed garlic with the pasta and zucchini. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: yellow onions, garlic cloves, butter, veal, sauvignon blanc wine, fresh thyme, fresh italian parsley, juice, cumin, salt & pepper
name: porcini mushroom pasta

steps: Cream butter and sugar. Add sifted dry ingredients. Roll into balls and place on a greased oven tray and flatten. Place a chocolate button in the centre of each biscuit. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes at 175c.
ingredients: thickened cream, powdered sugar icing, vanilla bean paste, coffee liqueur, espresso coffee, ground cinnamon
name: coffee liqueur with vanilla cinnamon cream

steps: Mix the peanut butter and honey together in a medium sized bowl. Microwave for 30 seconds on high until melted. Mix well. Add the cereal and coat well. Pat it into an 8 inch round cake pan or pie pan. Mix the pudding and the skim milk for 2 minutes. Fold in the whipped topping. Put the butterscotch mixture on top of the crust. Freeze. Let it sit out for 10 or so minutes before you cut it. Top with extra whipped topping if desired.
ingredients: peanut butter, honey, toasted rice cereal, milk, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix
name: grab another slice chocolate pie

steps: In a large skillet heat olive oil and then add capers and garlic. Cook stirring fo r1-2 minutes. Add shrimp, tomatoes, oregano and tarragon to skillet and saute for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally or until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese. Toss to combine. Spoon shrimp mixture over the orzo. Toss.
ingredients: soy crumbles, mushroom, onion, fat free vegetable soup, bow tie pasta, spinach, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese
name: ww pasta skillet dinner

steps: In crock pot sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkraut sauerkra
ingredients: kielbasa, onions, potatoes, baby carrots
name: 1 pot 4 item sausage suprise

steps: In a medium sized pot, add water, bouillion cubes, onion powder and turmeric. Bring to a rapid boil. Remove from heat and add rice, stir gently. Cover and return to stove and simmer on low heat till all water is absorbed. Once all water has been absorbed remove pot from stove and let sit covered for 5 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork and add nuts, raisins, candied ginger and chopped chives.
ingredients: olive oil, cashews, onions, curry powder, garlic, ginger, water, firm tofu, red peppers, frozen peas
name: cashew curry

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Bake 20 minutes, stopping at 7 minutes to flatten with fork.
ingredients: sugar, butter, vegetable oil, almond extract, baking soda, salt, flour, almonds, powdered sugar
name: almond tea cookies

steps: Melt butter, add apple and onion, cook until soft. Add cabbage, stir to blend. Add vinegar, sugar, cloves and wine. Cook, covered, until cabbage is tender, about 12 minutes. Thicken the sauce with flour, first adding a little water with the flour. Simmer until sauce is smooth.
ingredients: red cabbage, crisco, vinegar, salt, onion, cloves, sugar, ground cloves, ground allspice, gingersnaps
name: red cabbage german style

steps: Heat oven to 350°F. Place bread slices on top of oven and bake for 20-25 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: italian bread, muenster cheese, swiss cheese, process american cheese, part-skim mozzarella cheese, butter, garlic salt with parsley
name: super grilled cheese sandwiches taste of home

steps: In a small bowl, mash sweet potato and avocado together with a fork, leaving the mixture slightly chunky but thoroughly mixed. Spread sweet potato mixture on one slice of bread, and mayo on the other. Sprinkle basil leaves over the mayo. Add turkey and sprouts. Repeat for the second sandwich. Serve.
ingredients: honey mustard, mayonnaise, poppy seed, whole wheat bread, sweet potato, red onion, avocado, tomatoes, alfalfa sprout
name: sweet potato and avocado sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: cheddar cheese soup, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, hash brown potatoes
name: funeral dinner potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl, mash the bananas, stir in oats, dates, oil and vanilla. Mix well and allow to sit for 15 minutes. Drop by tspfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 15-20 minutes. In combining the ingredients, i personally use my food processor. I just toss everything in and let it mix. In combining the
ingredients: bananas, butter, real maple syrup, lemon juice, flaked coconut, pecans
name: maple baked bananas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve with sauce. Serve over hot white rice, if desired.
ingredients: salmon fillets, shallot, vegetable oil, apple juice concentrate, balsamic vinegar, liquid smoke flavoring, onion powder, cornstarch, water
name: hickory glazed salmon

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, chili powder, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the jelly and orange juice mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving.
ingredients: carrot, butter, brown sugar, hot sauce, fresh lemon juice, orange juice, ground cumin, garlic cloves, chili powder, salt
name: jamaican carrots

steps: Cook mushrooms until tender, about 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve over hot pasta.
ingredients: dry pasta, mushrooms, butter, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, lemon, cream, parmesan cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: pasta with mushrooms

steps: To prepare bbq barbecue chicken sliders, whisk all ingredients together, except cole slaw mix, in a large bowl. Add cole slaw mix and toss to coat. Refrigerate until ready to serve. To prepare chicken, combine barbecue sauce, vinegar and chicken in a bowl. Microwave about 3 minutes or until thoroughly heated. To serve, place chicken on bun bottoms. Spoon slaw on top of chicken. Place remaining bun halves on top.
ingredients: cooked chicken, barbecue sauce, honey, hawaiian rolls, dill pickles
name: bbq barbecue chicken sliders

steps: In a small saucepan, combine water and agar-agar flakes and bring to a boil. Gently simmer until agar has dissolved completely, about 5 minutes. Add espresso and stir until dissolved. Cool slightly. In a food processor or blender, blend tofu, maple syrup, cocoa powder, vanilla, salt and cooled espresso mixture until completely smooth. Pour into the prepared pie shell. Refrigerate for several hours or overnight until firm. Serve topped with non-dairy topping.
ingredients: firm silken tofu, cocoa, agave nectar, vanilla extract, peanut butter, chili pepper flakes
name: vegan chocolate chilli pepper mousse

steps: Heat the dressing in a medium skillet on medium heat. Coat the fish with flour and then add to the pan. Cook 4-5 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Remove from skillet, cover and keep warm. Add broth and lemon juice to the pan. Cook 3 minutes, until it is reduced by half, stirring frequently with a whisk. Add cream cheese and cook until melted, stirring constantly. Pour over fish, sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, dried dill weed, paprika, lemon pepper, lemons, olive oil
name: tilapia with dill and paprika

steps: Mix oil, flour, garlic salt, cayenne, eggs, sweetened flaked coconut, raw shrimp, skewers, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Mix oil, flour, garlic salt, cayenne, eggs, sweetened flaked coconut, raw shrimp, skewers, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Mix oil, flour,
ingredients: oil, flour, garlic salt, cayenne, eggs, sweetened flaked coconut, raw shrimp, skewers, salt and pepper
name: skewered coconut shrimp

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook garlic until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add shallots and parmesan. Cook for 2 minutes more. Add the chicken broth, rice and salt. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 25 minutes or until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed. Remove from heat, and stir in the cashews and parsley.
ingredients: butter, shallots, garlic clove, basmati rice, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, dry white wine, fresh parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, black pepper, sea salt
name: rice pilaf with shallots and parmesan

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onions until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: dried lentils, butter, water, red peppers, onion, garlic, beef bouillon cubes, salt & pepper
name: savory lentils from panama

steps: Place tilapia fillet on top of rice and top each with one slice shrimp. Cover and bake in pre-heated 350 degree oven for one hour. Bake in 350 degree oven for 25 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: tilapia fillet, cream of shrimp soup, ritz crackers, margarine
name: tilapia casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a mixing bowl, combine pumpkin, egg, flour, baking powder, salt, butter, sugar, cinnamon, lemon slice. Combine streusel ingredients. Sprinkle over muffins. Bake at 400f for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: cooked pumpkin, egg, flour, baking powder, salt, butter, sugar, cinnamon, lemon slice
name: pumpkin fritters pampoen koekies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a small bowl, soak the apples in brandy for 5 minutes. Blend flour, brown sugar, salt and butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add oats and almonds and toss. In a 9 inch glass pie dish, toss together apples, apricots and brandy. Sprinkle oat mixture evenly over top and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until apples are tender and topping is browned.
ingredients: apples, butter, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, instant maple and brown sugar oatmeal, salt, walnuts, maple syrup
name: instant oatmeal apple crisp

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the butter and milk. When bubbles just begin to break the surface, slowly add the butter and milk. Cook, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom of the pan, until thickened and cooked, about 7 minutes. Add the cheese and butter and stir just until melted. Remove from the heat. Add salt to taste and hot pepper sauce, if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: bacon, smoked cheddar cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, diced pimentos, sugar, salt, pepper
name: bacon pimento cheese

steps: Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes.
ingredients: warm water, honey, butter, white flour, whole wheat flour, dry milk, salt, yeast, sunflower seeds, raisins
name: honey wheat sunflower and raisin bread bread machine

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: egg, milk, whole wheat flour, baking soda, salt, sweet paprika, sesame seeds, frying chicken, butter
name: sesame baked chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In medium bowl, combine eggs, butter or margarine, flour, garlic salt, parsley flakes and onion salt. Separate crescent dough into 4 rectangles. Firmly press perforations to seal. Cut each rectangle crosswise into 8 strips. Dip each strip in egg mixture. Coat with crushed onions. Place on ungreased cookie sheets. Bake in for 8 to 12 minutes until golden brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheets.
ingredients: hard rolls, milk, canadian bacon, butter, onion, parsley flakes, eggs, salt and pepper
name: bayerische semmelklsse

steps: In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, combine the sugar, salt, butter and milk. Bring to a boil, then boil for 1 full minute. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate milk mix. Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let stand until completely cool.
ingredients: milk, sugar, margarine, peanut butter, unsweetened cocoa powder, quick-cooking oatmeal, nuts, vanilla
name: no bake chocolate oatmeal nut cookies

steps: Place all ingredients in a large crock pot. Stir to mix. Cook on high for 4 to 5 hours or on low for 8 to 10 hours. Remove meat and vegetables and some of the cooking liquid. Slice meat thinly across the grain. Serve with vegetables and some of the liquid.
ingredients: corned beef, cooking onion, bay leaf, whole cloves, black peppercorns, water, yellow mustard, light brown sugar
name: simple corned beef crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Brush a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with olive oil. Layer the sliced potatoes, mushrooms, and onions, in the dish. Sprinkle with the salt and sage leaves. Pour the cream over evenly. Brush the pork chops with olive oil, and rub the breadcrumbs onto both sides of each pork chop. Place pork chops on top of potatoes. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or just until the pork chops are cooked through and the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: pork chops, baking potato, onion, bacon grease, salt, pepper
name: pork chops potatoes and onion casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix peaches and raspberries, and place in bottom of 3 qt casserole dish. Using fork, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and cinnamon. Stir in eggs using fork. Batter will be quite dry. Pour over top of fruit. Pour melted butter of top. Place in oven and cook for 1 hour.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, peaches, water, ground cinnamon, whole wheat pastry flour, baking powder, salt, margarine, soymilk
name: fresh peach cobbler vegan

steps: In blender, combine eggs, milk, coconut, flour, butter, vanilla, salt. Blend 10 seconds. Stir in coconut. Pour into greased pie plate. Bake in 350 oven 40 minutes or until knife comes out clean when inserted in the middle. Serve hot or chilled.
ingredients: eggs, milk, coconut, flour, butter, vanilla, salt, honey
name: honey coconut custard

steps: In a large bowl, combine black eyed peas, diced pimentos, red onion, red wine vinegar, sugar, canola oil, ground red pepper, salt and pepper. Toss thoroughly with a large spoon. Place in refrigerator for several hours. Add black eyed peas, diced pimentos, red onion, red wine vinegar, sugar, canola oil, ground red pepper, salt and pepper. Add
ingredients: black-eyed peas, diced pimentos, red onion, red wine vinegar, sugar, canola oil, ground red pepper, salt
name: nutt house black eyed pea salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake for 15 minutes, uncovered. Remove from oven and pour off any liquid that has accumulated in the bottom of the dish. Stir in sour cream, salt and pepper. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Remove from oven and pour off any liquid
ingredients: zucchini, onion, butter, salt, pepper, bread, egg, cheddar cheese
name: mom s zucchini bake

steps: Place the chicken in a large saucepan over medium heat. Bring the stock, basil, garlic powder, tabasco sauce and tomatoes in a large saucepan over medium heat to a boil. Stir in the rice, and reduce heat to low. Cover and cook for about 20 minutes. Stir in the peas and chicken. Cover and continue to cook for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: soy sauce, butter, curry powder, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, garlic clove, tabasco sauce, broiler chicken, sesame seeds
name: forbidden city chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Lightly grease muffin cups or spray with cooking spray. Place orange pieces in blender and blend until finely chopped. Add margarine, eggs, and milk and blend until well mixed. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda in a large bowl. Make a well in center and add orange mixture, stirring just until moistened. Fold in blueberries. Fill muffin cups and bake for 22-25 minutes or until golden. Cool 10 minutes in pan before removing.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sour cream, half-and-half, orange zest, frozen huckleberries
name: huckleberry orange scone

steps: Heat butter in 12in skillet. Add onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add scallops. Stir and saute 4-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Add parsley, red pepper flakes, and lemon, heat through.
ingredients: scallops, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, salt, ground black pepper, paprika, fresh parsley, fresh lemon juice
name: scallops with lemon butter

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 2-quart casserole dish. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. If desired, roasted garlic may be added to mixture.
ingredients: baking potatoes, olive oil, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, ground turmeric, garlic cloves, spinach, fresh cilantro, salt, plain low-fat yogurt
name: creamy potatoes and spinach

steps: In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, 4 cups hot water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 30-40 minutes, or until chicken falls easily from the bone, stirring twice during cooking. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until noodles are tender.
ingredients: whole chicken, carrots, onion, water, salt, fresh ground pepper, celery, egg noodles
name: real chicken noodle soup

steps: Put the bread cubes in a greased 13x9 inch baking dish. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, ground nutmeg. Pour egg mixture evenly over the bread cubes. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours or overnight. Remove from refrigerator 20 minutes before baking. Preheat oven to 350. Bake, uncovered, for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. Serve with maple syrup, if desired.
ingredients: eggs, half-and-half, sugar, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, cinnamon raisin bread, unsalted butter, maple syrup
name: cinnamon raisin french toast

steps: Heat the oil in a large frying pan with a lid and fry the onion and sausages until starting to brown. Add the potato slices and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden. Season with salt and pepper. Add the mustard, if using, to the stock, then pour into the pan. Cover with a tight-fitting lid and cook for 10 minutes until the potatoes are tender. Preheat the grill to medium. Scatter the cheese over the top of the potatoes and put the pan under the grill for 5 minutes until the cheese is bubbling and golden. Serve with steamed vegetables.
ingredients: potato, garlic sausage, oil, onion, whole grain mustard, eggs, salt and pepper
name: potato and garlic sausage hash

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter and flour a 10-inch tube pan. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Stir in applesauce and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together and then sift over applesauce mixture. Sprinkle with raisins and blend gently. Pour batter into pan and bake approximately 65-75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes up clean. Cool in pan 10 minutes then remove from pan to finish cooling.
ingredients: butter, apples, raisins, orange juice, apricot jam, orange rind, cinnamon, allspice
name: apple raisin saute

steps: Place broccoli in a steamer basket and set in a saucepan over 1 inch of boiling water. Cover and steam just until tender, approx. 5 minutes. To prepare the sauce, combine the orange juice, honey and ginger in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Add the cornstarch mixture and return to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook the sauce until thickened, about 1 minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Stir in the lemon juice and the sesame oil. Arrange the broccoli in a serving bowl. Top with the sauce, sprinkle with sesame seeds.
ingredients: fresh broccoli florets, sugar, olive oil, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sesame seeds
name: sesame soy broccoli

steps: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl and serve.
ingredients: navel oranges, pink grapefruit, fresh orange juice, orange flower water, honey, vanilla bean, cinnamon, mint leaf
name: moroccan citrus fruit salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Grease 9x13 baking dish. Place rhubarb slices in an even layer. Scatter the brown sugar and 2 tablespoons water overtop of rhubarb slices. Mix sugar into flour and baking powder mixture. Add butter and beat for about 3 minutes. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Blend slightly after each addition and pour batter over the rhubarb slices. Smooth over the top. Bake about 40 minutes at 375 until the top is golden brown. Cool 30 minutes and serve with a nice dollop of whipping cream.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, milk, eggs, almond flavoring, rhubarb
name: sue s rhubarb platz

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake for 25-30 minutes or ntil light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on wire rack.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, vanilla, quick-cooking oats, chocolate-covered raisins, peanut butter
name: chocolate raisin oat bars

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, salt, light corn syrup, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla
name: caramel gold

steps: Place cucumber in a mixing bowl and whip with an electric mixer until fluffy. Add dressing, milk and dill weed. Mix well until well blended. Stir in cucumber and onion. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour to allow flavor to blend.
ingredients: cucumber, white pepper, fresh dill, mayonnaise, sour cream
name: cucumber dill dip or salad dressing

steps: In bottom of crockpot, place carrots, potatoes, onions and garlic. Trim fat from brisket and sprinkle with salt, black pepper and thyme. Place brisket on top of vegetables. Add beef broth, cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours. Before serving, remove 1 cup of broth from crockpot and pour into skillet. Add cabbage wedges and simmer until cabbage is tender. Cut meat across the grain and serve with vegetables and broth.
ingredients: corned beef brisket, water, pickling spices, salt, peppercorns, cabbage
name: traditional irish corned beef and cabbage

steps: Cook gnocchi according to package directions, drain. Heat butter in a large non stick skillet over medium heat. Add pine nuts to pan. Cook 3 minutes or until butter and nuts are lightly browned, stirring constantly. Add garlic to pan. Cook 1 minute sor until spinach wilts,. Stirring constantly. Stir in salt and pepper. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: gnocchi, butter, shallots, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, salt, nutmeg, fresh ground pepper, parmesan cheese, fresh basil
name: gnocchi with zucchini ribbons basil brown butter

steps: Roll out dough lengthwise and cut into 9 slices. Place slices in a greased 8-inch baking dish and bake at 375 degrees for 27 minutes. Mix powdered sugar with milk and use as glaze for cinnamon rolls.
ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, pecans, brown sugar, butter, maple syrup
name: easy maple pecan monkey bread

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degree celsius. Lightly grease and line a 20cm cake tin and line with baking paper. In a bowl combine the flour, oats, bicarbonate of soda, allspice, sugar and pecans. Make a well in the centre and then add the oil and egg and then the apples and combine all ingredients well together. Pour mix into the prepared tin and cook for 35 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: betty crocker yellow cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, coconut pecan frosting
name: coconut pecan snack cake

steps: Combine chicken, philadelphia cream cheese, breadcrumbs, carrot, red onion, sweet chili sauce, green curry paste, frozen puff pastry, egg, sesame seeds. Bake at 350f for 35 minutes or until browned. Makes about 20.
ingredients: ground chicken, philadelphia cream cheese, breadcrumbs, carrot, red onion, sweet chili sauce, green curry paste, frozen puff pastry, egg, sesame seeds
name: thai sausage rolls

steps: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Whirl one minute. Scrape down and blend 15 seconds more. Refrigerate at least one hour before making crepes. Heat a lightly greased 6 inch skillet. Remove from heat. Spoon in 2 tbsp batter. Lift and tilt skillet to spread evenly. Return to heat. Brown on one side only. To remove, invert pan over paper toweling. Repeat with remaining batter.
ingredients: skim milk, whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, eggs, honey, vegetable oil, salt, butter
name: honey wheat crepes

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can put this in an omelette and top with
ingredients: zucchini, onion, green pepper, butter, fresh corn, tomatoes, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese
name: garden vegetable combo

steps: Preheat oven at 200c. Sift the flour, baking powder and salt together into a baking bowl. Make a hollow in the dry ingredients. Beat the eggs and milk together and add with melted butter into the middle of the dry ingredients mixing just enough to moisten the mixture. Spoon a largish tablespoon of the mixture into the bottom of the muffin form, making certain that it covers the bottom of the muffin form. Make a small hollow in the middle if the muffin mixture and set a teaspoon of apricot jam into the hollow, try not to let the jam run out to the sides very much. Cover the apricot jam with another spoonful of the muffin mix and run a clean finger around it so that the jam is as enclosed by the muffin mixture as possible. Bake at 200c for 15 minutes or until cooked. Ease the muffins out of the form while warm and put onto a wire rack to cool. Once cool, dust the tops with powdered sugar.
ingredients: sugar, salt, egg, milk, crunchy peanut butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, marshmallow creme, strawberry preserves, salted peanuts
name: peanut butter n jam bread

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Dredge chicken in flour and shake of excess. Dip in egg, allowing excess to drip off. Saut in skillet a few pieces at a time, turn once, browning on both sides. Arrange chicken in a buttered, shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, oregano and cheese. Cover with foil, bake 15 minutes. Remove foil, baking until browned, about 15-20 minutes. Remove foil, baking until browned, about
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dijon mustard, dried breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried oregano, garlic salt, black pepper
name: oregano dijon chicken

steps: In a large saute pan with cover, brown meat in olive oil over med-high heat. Drain any fat or juices that have accumulated in pan. Add onion, bell pepper, mushrooms, and garlic. Saute with meat until onions start to become translucent and veggies are becoming slightly tender. Add whole jar pasta sauce& whole bottle of chili sauce to pan. Stir to combine all ingredients. Bring to low boil, then cover& turn down heat so that sauce is simmering. Simmer for approximately. 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender. If sauce has too much liquid, simply remove cover and simmer until the desired amount of liquid has cooked off. Serve over hot cooked spaghetti with sprinkling of parmesan cheese, garlic bread, and green salad.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, elbow macaroni, spaghetti sauce, spinach, provolone cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: lazy mom s faux lasagna

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving.
ingredients: butter, red bell pepper, onion, curry powder, cooked sweet potato, flour, sour cream, mango chutney, wonton wrappers
name: leftover sweet potato wontons

steps: Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add bay leaf, soy sauce and garlic powder. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve.
ingredients: pork butt, garlic, sour orange juice, oregano, cumin, black pepper, salt, onions
name: pierna asada a la criolla cuban pork roast

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix milk, flour and eggs well. Add the remaining ingredients and pour into 8 x 8 greased baking dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes. Let sit 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: french bread, butter, monterey jack cheese, ham, eggs, milk, white wine, green onions, cream cheese, parmesan cheese
name: easter brunch casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 5x9 loaf pan. Combine oats, flour, salt, sugar, baking powder, water and beer and put into the prepared loaf pan. Bake for 30 minutes. Generously brush top of loaf with melted butter, reserving some for a second brushing. Return to oven and bake for 30-40 minutes more until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Remove from the oven and brush with reserved butter. Remove from bread machine and shape into loaf. Sprinkle with cornmeal. Let rise until double, about 1 hour. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
ingredients: water, buttermilk, oil, honey, old fashioned oats, white flour, wheat flour, salt, baking soda, yeast
name: oatmeal bread bread machine bread maker

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, maple syrup, salt and pepper
name: maple roasted sweet potatoes

steps: Place chicken in ziploc bag and add marinade. Marinate for at least one hour. Thread chicken onto bamboo skewers. Grill over medium to hot coals or fire until juices run clear.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, balsamic vinegar, honey, corn flakes
name: honey balsamic chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Lightly grease 13-by-9-inch baking pan with cooking spray. Unroll pizza dough and press evenly over bottom and about 1 inch up sides of prepared pan. Brush dough lightly with olive oil. Sprinkle with garlic and basil. Cover with drained tomatoes, artichoke hearts, and mushrooms. Sprinkle with feta cheese and sliced bell pepper. Bake pizza for about 20 minutes until crust is golden brown.
ingredients: black olives, marinated artichokes, chestnut mushrooms, mozzarella cheese, tomato sauce, prepared pizza crust
name: artichoke pizza

steps: Combine all ingredients, except red pepper, cheese and egg substitute in a non-stick skillet which has been sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Lightly brown the ham, peppers, corn, onions, squash and zucchini. In medium bowl, combine the egg substitute, the cheese and red pepper. Fold the browned mixture into the egg mixture. Pour into a lightly greased tart pan and bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes or until lightly brown and set in the middle.
ingredients: eggs, red pepper, green pepper, cooked ham, cheddar cheese, salt
name: easy breakfast frittata

steps: Cook pasta until al dente. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink inside. Reduce heat and stir in salt, pepper, cream, pesto, and parmesan cheese. Cook until chicken is no longer pink inside. Cook until chicken is no
ingredients: penne pasta, broccoli, garlic, lemon, chili flakes, pine nuts, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese
name: broccoli pesto pasta

steps: Cook the eggplant in water until al dente. Drain well. Dip into egg, then bread crumbs and fry in hot oil until golden brown. Drain. This can be made ahead of time and kept warm, uncovered, in the oven.
ingredients: eggplants, egg, oil, salt, black pepper, flour, seasoned bread crumbs, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese
name: oven fried eggplant

steps: Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium heat. Add mustard seeds and turmeric and cook, shaking pan, until mustard seeds pop, 1-2 minutes. Add onion, garlic, and chile and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent, about 7 minutes. Add rice and stir to coat, add lemon peel, salt, and 3 cups water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until rice is tender, 20-25 minutes. Stir in lemon juice. Cover and let stand off heat for 15 minutes. Fluff with a fork and stir in cashews.
ingredients: unsalted butter, red onion, garlic clove, ginger, fenugreek seeds, ground cumin, cardamom seed, dried oregano, ground turmeric, basil leaves
name: nit ir qibe spiced butter

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place entire bag of popcorn kernels into a large roaster. In a large saucepan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to foam to cook down slightly. Pour caramel mixture over popcorn kernels and stir until mixed. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Allow to cool slightly and break apart.
ingredients: butter, baking soda, brown sugar, vanilla, corn syrup, popped popcorn, salt
name: baked caramel corn ii

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: italian sausage, onion, green pepper, sweet red pepper, tiny new potatoes, water, pepper
name: sausage pepper and potato skillet

steps: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, saut pork schnitzels, bacon, red pepper, green pepper, wooden skewers. Remove the bacon from the pan, without draining oil. Add the pork strips and brown on all sides. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add garlic about 1 minute before the pork is done. Add the sauerkraut and saute about 10 minutes, until the sauerkraut starts to brown and wilt a bit. Sprinkle the sugar over the sauerkraut and mix in. Mix the paprika into the beer, and add to the pan. Cook until most of the beer has evaporated. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with reserved bacon crumbled on top.
ingredients: pork schnitzels, bacon, red pepper, green pepper, wooden skewers
name: pork and bacon skewers

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Set aside. In a small bowl, combine the butter, bread crumbs, parsley, oregano, garlic, sea scallops, black pepper. Mix well. Pour the scallops evenly over the scallops and broil for 8 to 10 minutes, or until the topping is golden and the scallops are cooked through.
ingredients: sea scallops, all-purpose flour, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, butter, dried thyme, ritz crackers
name: decadent baked scallops

steps: Heat oil in 2-quart saucepan. Add onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes, until onion wilts. Stir in cumin and pepper. Continue to cook for 2-3 minutes. Add oregano, potatoes, green chilies and chicken broth. Bring to a boil and simmer slowly for 45 minutes. Serve hot with cheese sprinkled in the middle of bowl.
ingredients: onion, extra lean ground beef, garlic, paprika, ground cumin, crushed tomatoes, beef stock, red kidney beans, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, fresh parsley leaves
name: chili con carne soup

steps: Mix flour, semolina flour, semolina flour, salt, yeast, honey, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour. Bake for 15 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: bread flour, whole wheat flour, semolina flour, salt, yeast, honey, butter, water
name: mad dogs ultimate whole wheat semolina bread

steps: Mix sugar, cornstarch and salt together in a microwavable bowl and stir in the milk. Microwave for 9 minutes, stopping to stir every 3 minutes. The object is to cook until it achieves a thick, pudding-like consistency, so it may take more or less time dependent upon the individual microwave. This can also be performed in a saucepan on the stovetop. Add the butter and vanilla into the mixture. Pour the thick mixture into the baked 8 inch pie shell and sprinkle the top with cinnamon. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: cocoa, stevia, cornstarch, salt, milk, vanilla, pie shells, whipped cream
name: sugar free chocolate cream pie diabetic

steps: Mix all ingredients in a small bowl. Pour dressing mixture over tomato mixture. Toss. Cover and chill 30 minutes, if desired. Serve on lettuce leaves.
ingredients: green pepper, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, salt & freshly ground black pepper, oil, vinegar, black olives
name: fresh moroccan salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, all-bran cereal, milk, egg, oil, vanilla
name: my best bran muffins

steps: Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg white until blended. Drop by rounded teaspoon onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: oleo, sugar, vinegar, flour, baking soda
name: imperial butter cookies

steps: Place the orange juice, tamari, horseradish mustard, fresh ginger, honey, salmon fillets, cooked rice, lemon slice in a nonreactive saucepan. Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce the heat to medium and cook for 15 to 20 minutes or until the sauce forms a glaze. Set aside. Preheat the broiler. Place the salmon on a broiler pan and baste with the sauce. Let sit for 15 minutes. Broil them until cooked through, about 8 minutes, basting again with the glaze. Remove the salmon from the heat and baste once more with the glaze before serving.
ingredients: orange juice, tamari, horseradish mustard, fresh ginger, honey, salmon fillets, cooked rice, lemon slice
name: grilled salmon with ginger orange glaze

steps: Place ribs on grill grate, skirt side down, cover and slow cook until brown and ribs are done. Turn and cook the second side until brown and ribs are done.
ingredients: garlic salt, onion salt, sugar, paprika, ground annatto seed, fresh coarse ground black pepper, cayenne, ground celery seed, spareribs, apple juice
name: smoked barbecue ribs

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Place radicchio and endive salad on a baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: red wine vinegar, olive oil, honey, coarse salt, fresh ground pepper, radicchio, belgian endive
name: radicchio and endive salad

steps: In large saucepan, combine chocolate chips, butter and corn syrup. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Remove from heat and add vanilla, peanut butter and powdered sugar. Mix well. Stir in cereal and pecans and mix ell. Spread into greased 9x13 pan. Chill until firm.
ingredients: milk chocolate chips, butter, light corn syrup, vanilla, powdered sugar, rice krispies
name: fudge krispies

steps: Carefully insert one popsicle stick into each cut apple. Set aside. In a medium bowl, mix chopped cookies and candy sprinkles. Place bananas on a cookie sheet. Place in freezer until firm. If storing in the freezer for more than 8 hours, place the bananas in a covered container. Remove from freezer 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: wooden popsicle sticks, apples, caramels, water, oreo cookies, white chocolate, vegetable oil
name: oreo caramel dipped apples

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Spread peanut butter mixture evenly over balls. Bake at 350f for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: peanut butter, honey, gluten-free oats, sliced almonds, pumpkin seeds, golden raisin
name: gluten free power balls

steps: Put eggs in a medium-sized pot with enough water to cover the eggs. Bring water to boil, then lower heat to simmer for 3 minutes. Remove eggs from heat and allow them to cool a bit before handling. Take the back of a knife and crack eggs evenly all around. Return eggs to the pot and add the rest of the ingredients. Bring liquid to boil again, then simmer for 1 to 3 hours, longer for a more intense flavor and color, adding water if level gets too low. Remove from heat, and serve as a snack or addition to rice or noodles.
ingredients: eggs, salt, water, soy sauce, black soy sauce, black tea leaves, star anise, cinnamon stick, tangerine zest
name: chinese tea leaf eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: plain flour, ground ginger, baking powder, baking soda, egg, golden syrup, pitted dates, butter, dark brown sugar
name: ginger date muffins

steps: Melt butter in a skillet. Add rice and stir, about 2 minutes, making sure grains are nicely coated with butter. Add lemon zest, pepper, and the broth. Simmer uncovered over low heat for about 40 minutes, or until the liquid has absorbed and rice in tender. Remove from heat. Add lemon juice and stir. Let stand 5 minutes. Garnish with lemon slices to serve.
ingredients: butter, vermicelli, rice, chicken broth
name: armenian rice pilaf

steps: Heat oven to 350f degrees. Grease and flour 9x13 pan. Combine dry ingredients in mixing bowl. Beat in shortening. Add milk and vanilla. Beat for 2 minutes. Beat in egg whites, beat until very smooth. Bake for 35 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: egg whites, vanilla, cream of tartar, salt, brown sugar, cake flour
name: brown sugar angel food cake

steps: Combine all ingredients except flour. Shape into patties and dredge in flour. Brown patties in oil in heated skillet over medium high heat. Remove from skillet. Combine all gravy ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done.
ingredients: ground beef, flour, salt, pepper, canned milk, water, salt and pepper, dried beef
name: moms hamburger gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in the mushrooms and onion, and cook until tender. Sprinkle with the flour. Reduce heat to low, and continue cooking 5 minutes. Mix in sour cream and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper transfer to a small casserole dish, and top with parmesan cheese. Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.
ingredients: white potatoes, onion, fresh mushrooms, butter, sour cream, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: creamy mushroom potato bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease two 9x5-inch loaf pans. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Beat for an additional 2 minutes. Pour into pans and bake for an hour or till a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, sliced almonds, ground nutmeg, rum, eggs, eggnog, margarine
name: holiday rum eggnog bundt cake

steps: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Bake at 350 for 30-40 minute.
ingredients: velveeta cheese, horseradish, mayonnaise, hot sauce
name: bar cheese

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: carrots, olive oil, smoked paprika, kosher salt, brown sugar, dark molasses, ground cumin, sherry wine vinegar, fresh ground black pepper, fresh italian parsley
name: roasted carrots with smoked paprika

steps: Preheat 375 f. Roll store bought or homemade pie crust into a tart shell. Cream the cream cheese with sugar with paddle attachment until fluffy. Add zest. Add eggs one at a time until fully incorporated. Pour into tart shells. Mix cinnamon sugar with apples. Place in a symmetrical pattern on top of filling. Place in oven until golden brown and set.
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, almond extract, heavy whipping cream, fresh strawberries, graham cracker tart shells
name: strawberries n cream tarts

steps: Heat the sesame oil in a heavy-bottomed pot. Brown the ground beef, separating while stir-frying. Add the green onion, garlic, soy sauce, salt and pepper and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add the water, then the spinach. Bring the soup to a boil, then lower the flame. Place a tight-fitting lid on the pot and simmer for 10 minutes.
ingredients: butter, onion, celery, flour, water, potatoes, salt, spinach, cream, swiss cheese
name: potato spinach soup

steps: In a small bowl combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Stir until blended. In a medium bowl, place the egg yolks, cream, and butter. Whisk until stiff, then fold them gently into the batter. Cook until waffles are golden, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, sugar, kosher salt, baking soda, baking powder, eggs, unsalted butter, buttermilk
name: good eats waffles alton brown

steps: Heat oil in wok 375 degrees. Add 1st 4 ingredients. Cook about one minute. Add remaining ingredients and heat through. Serve.
ingredients: oriental-flavor instant ramen noodles, peas and carrots, eggs, olive oil, soy sauce
name: ramen noodle chinese fried rice

steps: In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve.
ingredients: milk, hot water, unsweetened cocoa, instant coffee powder, brown sugar, vanilla essence, fresh cream, cinnamon
name: iced cocoa coffee

steps: Add 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Simmer 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add mustard mixture. Add balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: cold water, cornstarch, balsamic vinegar, salt, sugar, egg, prepared mustard, unsalted butter
name: durkee famous sauce clone

steps: In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve.
ingredients: warm water, cocoa, sugar, milk, chocolate
name: cocoa chocolate shake

steps: Place chicken livers in casserole dish. Pour wine mixture over chicken. Bake 25 minutes at 450f. Turn chicken. Add onion, parsley & butter to wine. Pepper chicken & sprinkle with paprika. Place skin down in casserole dish. Pepper chicken & sprinkle
ingredients: onion, olive oil, sliced mushrooms, flour, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, chicken liver, dry red wine
name: chicken livers in wine

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine all dry ingredients, except chocolate chips, in a large mixing bowl and mix well. In a seperate bowl, slightly beat the eggs with a fork or wire whisk. Add thwe remaining wet ingredients to the eggs and stir well. Fold in chocolate chips. Coat 2 bread pans evenly with cooking spray. Pout half of the mixture into each pan. Bake for 50-60 minutes.
ingredients: poundcake mix, eggnog, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, eggs, vanilla rum extract
name: eggnog sweet bread loaves

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Toss together berries and apples, spread evenly over bottom of 8x8 baking dish. In medium bowl combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and oats. Using pastry cutter work butter into oat mixture until crumbly. Spread over fruit, pressing down lightly. Bake 40-45 minutes or until top is lightly browned. Cool before serving. Top with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: blueberries, sugar, strawberries, old fashioned oats, brown sugar, light butter, light whipped topping
name: red white and blueberry crisp ww 2 points

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil in deep skillet. Add onion & bell pepper. Cook and stir for a few minutes. Add pasta, chicken, tomatoes, olives, italian seasoning. Mix to blend. Put mozzarella on top. Cook in oven for about 35 minutes.
ingredients: pasta, olive oil, stewed tomatoes, water, salt
name: toasted pasta

steps: Combine first 4 ingredients, stirring well with fork or small whisk. Combine olives, pineapple, navel orange, tart apple, raisins, valencia oranges, extra virgin olive oil, dijon mustard, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Toss. Cover and chill 30 minutes, if desired. Serve on lettuce leaves.
ingredients: carrots, fresh pineapple, navel orange, tart apple, raisins, valencia oranges, extra virgin olive oil, dijon mustard, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: fruit carrot salad

steps: For the pimento cheese and bacon sandwiches, add 1/4 cup of pimento cheese and 1/4 cup of bacon. Spread pimento cheese and bacon on top of bacon.
ingredients: mild cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, diced pimento, bacon, white bread, butter
name: grilled pimento cheese and bacon sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done.
ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, bananas, vanilla, yoghurt, flour, baking powder, baking soda, coconut
name: coconut banana bread

steps: In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: water, of fresh mint, family-size tea bags, sugar, fresh lemon juice, ice, mint sprig
name: oak alley s sweet mint iced tea

steps: Place tater tots on top of hamburger and top with tater tots. Bake for about 45 minutes or until tater tots are bubbling and tater tots are all heated through. Remove from oven, top with desired amount of shredded cheddar, and continue to bake until cheese is bubbling and tater tots are all heated through. Remove from oven, top with desired amount of shredded cheddar, and continue to bake until cheese is bubbling and tater to
ingredients: ground turkey, tater tots, cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, cream of chicken soup
name: duggar s tater tot casserole

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the onion. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: potatoes, green onion, spring onion, white vinegar, english mustard, buttermilk, salt
name: monstrous mash

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges.
ingredients: pie crust, apples, dried apple, lemon juice, sugar, white sugar, flour, oatmeal, light margarine
name: spiced sugar apple pie light

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little.
ingredients: soymilk, egg white, honey, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: honey sweet soy nog

steps: Heat the oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Halve the pineapple slices, add to the pan with the juice, tomatoes and kidney beans. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, peanut oil, fresh pineapple chunks, molasses, fresh lime juice, crushed red pepper flakes, green onions, crystallized ginger
name: pineapple ginger chicken stir fry

steps: Pour 2 cups milk into a medium bowl. Add pudding mix. Beat with an electric mixer 1 minute. Spread mixture evenly into crust. Beat cream cheese, sugar and 1 tablespoon milk with an electric mixer until smooth. Fold in whipped topping on low speed. Spread over chocolate mixture. Sprinkle with chocolate, if desired. Cover with dome. Chill at least 3 hours before serving.
ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, instant chocolate pudding mix, dream whip topping mix, milk, cool whip
name: simple chocolate cream pie

steps: Place cabbage, cored end up, on top rack of grill, close lid and smoke until soft. Wrap cabbage with heavy duty aluminum foil. Place cabbage, cored end up, on top rack of grill, close lid and smoke until soft. Wrap cabbage, cored end up, on top rack of grill, close lid and smoke until soft. Wrap cabbage, c
ingredients: savoy cabbage, streaky bacon, garlic clove, fresh ginger, red onion, butter, vegetable oil, chinese five spice powder
name: chinese stir fried cabbage

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add sugar and sauté until sugar dissolves. Add herbsaint and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add whiskey and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add lemon peel and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add whiskey and
ingredients: sugar, bitters, angostura bitters, rye whiskey, herbsaint, lemon peel
name: emeril s sazerac cocktail

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine all ingredients and mix well. Press mixture evenly into a loaf pan. Bake uncovered 1 to 1 hours. Let stand 5 to 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: wild rice, onion, celery, mushrooms, sausage, flour, milk, buttered bread crumb, worcestershire sauce
name: wild rice and sausage

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In large bowl, blend macaroni and cheese mix with cream of mushroom soup and milk. Stir in onion soup mix with cream of mushroom soup and milk. Pour into baking dish. Bake 30 minutes or until bubbling.
ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, milk, onion, green pepper, butter, cream of celery soup, tuna, sliced mushrooms, diced pimentos
name: golden tuna casserole

steps: Heat oil in wok or skillet and quickly saute prawns until they turn pink. Do not overcook. Serve with plain rice.
