ingredients: prawns, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, fresh basil, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, black peppercorns, dried rosemary
name: grilled prawns italiano

steps: Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately.
ingredients: egg noodles, pot cheese, butter, salt
name: noodles and pot cheese

steps: Bring 6 cups water to boil. Add salt and rice. Stir well. Cook until rice is done, 15 minutes. Drain. Add milk. Heat and simmer slowly until rice is done, 15 minutes. Serve in bowls with cinnamon sugar. Add cold milk if desired.
ingredients: milk, water, rice, salt, butter, sugar
name: puerto rican arroz con leche rice with milk

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: bacon, green onion, vinegar, water, sugar, salt, asparagus, tomatoes
name: asparagus and tomato skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter a casserole dish or baking pan enough to hold the ingredients. Mix all ingredients together adjust salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a buttered casserole dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, cheddar cheese, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, butter, ritz crackers
name: quick and easy hash browns casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter, margarine, margarine, yellow cake mix, creamy peanut butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, toffee pieces, baking spraypreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter, margarine, margarine,
ingredients: eggs, water, margarine, yellow cake mix, creamy peanut butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, toffee pieces, cooking spray
name: yellow cake mix cookies

steps: Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onion, the garlic and the curry powder. Saute for 2-3 minutes, then add the rest of the ingredients, plus a cup of water. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve over basmati rice with a squirt of lime juice.
ingredients: dried garbanzo beans, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, rosemary, bay leaf, italian tomatoes, chorizo sausage, spinach
name: chickpea stew with spinach and chorizo

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in a large skillet or heavy saucepan. Add garlic and cook until tender. Add fresh tomatoes and cook until heated through. Stir in basil, crushed red pepper, black pepper and salt. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti or other italian pasta and top with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, zucchini, fresh tomatoes, garlic salt, fresh ground pepper, dried basil, dried oregano, bay leaf, whole wheat spaghetti
name: whole wheat spaghetti with zucchini sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat the bottom of the two small or one medium baking dish with a thin layer of alfredo sauce. In a medium bowl, mix the pasta, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken, garlic and alfredo sauce until combined. Place mixture into baking dish and top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Cut the butter into small pieces and scatter on top of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: linguine, broccoli floret, butter, chicken, cream of mushroom soup, milk, parmesan cheese, pepper
name: cheaters chicken and broccoli alfredo

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Cut chicken breasts in half. Mix water and egg togther in a small bowl. Mix bread crumbs and cheese together in separate bowl. Dip each piece of chicken in egg mixture then in bread mixture. Then set in a greased 9x13 greased pan. Cook for 45 minutes to 1 hour. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, asiago cheese, olive oil, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, dried bay leaves, white onion
name: dustin s chicken spiedini

steps: Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add bay leaf, soy sauce and garlic powder. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve.
ingredients: onion, baking potatoes, pork chops, condensed cream of celery soup, water
name: easy pork chops dinner crock pot

steps: Shuck and silk the corn and cut away any bruised areas. Bring lots of water and the honey to a rolling boil in a large pot. Add the corn and cook for four minutes, after the water comes back to a boil. Stir together the melted butter, salt and white pepper in a baking dish long enough to hold an ear of corn. Drain the corn, roll each ear in the butter mixture and serve immediately.
ingredients: ears of corn, water, milk, sugar, butter, salt
name: cob off the cob

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool completely. Remove from oven and let
ingredients: unsalted butter, onion, garlic, red bell peppers, zucchini, summer squash, lima beans, fresh corn kernels, salt & freshly ground black pepper, sage
name: autumn vegetable succotash

steps: Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: red potatoes, butter, garlic cloves, dried chives, salt, pepper
name: garlic chive red potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Fry red beans until crisp and set aside. Saute onion, celery, and bell pepper in bacon drippings until transparent. Transfer onion mixture to a medium sauce pan and add tomatoes, salt, pepper, and sugar. Cook, covered over low heat for 1 hour. Add cheese to sauce mixture and stir until melted. Place green beans in casserole dish, crumble bacon over beans, and pour sauce over top. Bake, uncovered for 1 hour.
ingredients: andouille sausages, kidney beans, diced tomatoes, green pepper, converted rice, vegetable stock, cajun seasoning, salt and pepper
name: cajun red beans with andouille sausage crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place a skillet over high heat and add oil. Saute onion for 3 to 4 minutes. Add mushrooms and garlic and continue to saute until mushrooms have released their liquid and they are golden. Add chicken stock and bring to boil. Pour mushroom and stock mixture orzo and rosemary into a 8x8 baking dish. Season with salt and pepper and bake 35 minutes until liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, dried marjoram, dried rosemary, turmeric, salt & freshly ground black pepper, orzo pasta, long grain brown rice, water
name: rice pilav with orzo

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken in the bottom of a skillet. Cover and cook chicken until done and no longer pink. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 1 hour, checking after 45 minutes to make sure they do not get over-cooked.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing, mayonnaise, pesto sauce, ciabatta rolls, parmesan cheese, prosciutto, roasted red pepper, spring greens
name: italian festival chicken sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat together the eggs and sugar until very thick. The batter should fall from the beaters in a thick ribbon. Beat in the vanilla. While youre beating the eggs and sugar, heat the hot chocolate and butter in a small saucepan to just simmering. Add the hot chocolate mixture to the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream as you continue beating. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Fold the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until theyre just combined. Pour the batter into a lightly greased 9 inch cake round. Bake for 50 minutes, or until the cake is a deep golden brown and starting to pull away from the sides of the pan. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10-15 minutes. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10
ingredients: sugar, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, egg, milk, vegetable oil
name: chocolate cake in a mug

steps: Cream butter, add sugar, salt, vanilla and flour. Form into small balls and roll in sesame seeds. Make a thumbprint in center of balls. Fill with strawberry preserves. Place on cookie sheets and bake at 400 degrees for 10 minutes. When making cookies, i use parchment paper so i do not have to grease and wash the cookie sheets repeatedly. I do not know how many this makes and will have to guess.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, flour, walnuts, strawberry jam
name: strawberry cookies czechoslovakian

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: solid white tuna, green pepper, onion, cooked rice, diced pimento, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, asparagus spears, mozzarella cheese
name: tuna cheese bake

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix all ingredients except the cheese together in a bowl. Bake for 7-10 min or until meat is done and cheese is melted. Bake
ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, milk, minced garlic cloves, lean ground beef, fresh flat-leaf parsley, parmesan cheese, egg, salt, mozzarella cheese
name: mozzarella stuffed meatballs

steps: Mix all ingredients, except the oil, in a large bowl and chill for 30 minutes. Divide the mixture evenly into 12 portions and shape each one into a flat round pattie. Heat the oil over moderate heat for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Remove and drain on a paper towel if you wish. Serve hot with dipping sauce or raita.
ingredients: ground pork, garlic, ground cumin, ground paprika, onion, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: spicy pork skewers

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat the margarine, white and brown sugar together until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla, beat well. In another bowl, sift flour, baking powder, and salt. Add to the creamed mixture, stirring well. Fold in butter brickle bits, and chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting.
ingredients: margarine, white sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: deep dish chocolate brownies

steps: Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread peaches in a well greased 13x9 baking dish. Blend flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add milk, beating until a batter forms. Pour over peaches. Drizzle margarine over top of mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Let cool and refrigerate about 4 hours prior to serving.
ingredients: peaches, sugar, cinnamon, water, cornstarch
name: hot peach sundaes

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: water, tea bags, apple cider, orange juice, cranberry juice, sugar, orange, cloves, cinnamon sticks, red-hot candies
name: wassail punch non alcoholic

steps: Mix chicken stock and next 5 ingredients in saucepan and bring to a boil. Add rice, return mixture to boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes
ingredients: chicken rice pilaf mix, butter, water, frozen snow peas, sliced water chestnuts, orange marmalade, pepper
name: citrus rice pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Saute zucchini, yellow squash and onion with the butter and garlic. Add oregano and tomato sauce. Simmer for 5 - 7 minutes. Place in a casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: whole wheat rotini, fat-free cottage cheese, italian seasoning, zucchini, diced tomato, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese
name: zucchini rotini

steps: Cover with lid and switch to high. Add prepared potatoes and carrots. Cover and cook for 4 hours. Serve in warmed deep soup plates.
ingredients: potatoes, carrots, frozen peas, onions, celery, garlic salt, salt and pepper, ground beef, tomato soup, water
name: crock pot hamburger casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a ovenproof skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon.
ingredients: lemons, salmon fillets, butter, salt and pepper
name: basic salmon packet baked

steps: In a small bowl, mix dressing and taco mix. On a large serving platter or individual serving pates, layer remaining ingredients except tomatoes. Drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with cherry tomatoes that have been sliced in half. You can also top with olives and add a bit of canned corn if you like. I only use a portion of the can of black beans. Use as much as you like.
ingredients: tater tots, ground beef, taco seasoning, water, cheddar cheese, lettuce, picante sauce, sour cream, tomatoes
name: tater tot taco salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the mushrooms in a 2-quart pie pan. In a medium bowl, combine the beef broth and flour. Microwave at low power until slightly thickened, 2-3 minutes. Stir in the heavy cream and cayenne. Season with salt. Immediately pour the sauce over the mushrooms. In a medium bowl, mix together the breadcrumbs and parmesan. Sprinkle on top of the mushrooms. Top with the butter and bake until browned, about 45 minutes.
ingredients: tri-color spiral pasta, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, egg, milk, onion, green pepper, mushrooms
name: colorful mushroom casserole

steps: Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack. Cool
ingredients: dark chocolate, unsalted butter, golden syrup, puffed rice cereal
name: choc crackles without copha

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool completely. Place onions and eggs in a large jar. Add enough vinegar mixture to completely cover. Cover and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight. Use a clean spoon each time you remove eggs for serving. May be refrigerated for up to 1 week.
ingredients: eggs, red beets, water, cider vinegar, brown sugar, onion
name: pickled red beet eggs

steps: Cook pasta until al dente. Combine avocado, garlic, lemon juice and cilantro in a food processor. Process about 1 minute or until smooth. Stir in chopped tomatoes. Drain pasta and pour pesto over it tossing well. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: pasta, olive oil, garlic, avocados, lemon juice, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, cream
name: pasta with avocado

steps: Cook pasta according to pkg instructions. Meanwhile, heat oil in lg skillet or dutch oven. Add garlic. Cook and stir 1 minute. Add tomatoes, beans, italian seasoning and sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Add spinach. Cook 3 minutes. Put drained pasta on serving plates. Top with tomato mixture. Sprinkle with feta and olives.
ingredients: minced garlic clove, oil, water, crushed tomatoes, chicken bouillon cubes, dried sage, shell pasta, frozen chopped spinach, white kidney beans, parmesan cheese
name: tomato pasta and spinach soup

steps: Place chicken pieces in a shallow baking dish. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking.
ingredients: lemon, dried rosemary, salt and pepper, olive oil, chicken
name: broiled lemon rosemary chicken

steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a big skillet. When hot, put in the tomatoes. When they start to pop, put in the vegetables. Stir once. Add seasonings. Stir and fry for a minute. Add 3 tablespoons of water, lower heat, cover, and simmer 10-15 minutes. Stir every now and then. If vegetables stick, add a little water. Dish is done when the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: eggplant, tomatoes, green bell pepper, olive oil, garlic clove, fresh ground black pepper, onion, salt, herbs, sour cream
name: armenian eggplant aubergine casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 pan. Beat eggs, sugar and oil, together. Add flour, soda and cinnamon. Mix well. Add apples and walnuts, mix together. Pour into prepared pan. Bake 40 to 45 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, orange juice, eggs, oil, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, apples, cinnamon
name: grandma bubbe s apple cake

steps: Combine all ingredients except for brown sugar and beat on medium speed for 30 seconds. Pour batter into greased loaf pan and generously sprinkle top with brown sugar. Bake at 350 f for 55-65 minutes, or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean. Remove from pan and cool completely on wire rack. Slice when cool.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, salt, baking powder, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, bananas, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: mark bittman s banana bread

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Brown beef and onions. Combine softened cream cheese, soup, and milk. Combine browned beef and onions to mixture, add ketchup and salt. Mix well together and pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Place biscuits on top and bake until biscuits are done.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic clove, cream of mushroom soup, cream cheese, milk, ketchup, salt, refrigerated biscuits
name: dressed up ground beef

steps: Beat cream cheese, sour cream, sugar and vanilla until smooth. Add eggs one at a time, beating thoroughly after each addition. Line a 9x13 pan with the crescent rolls. Pinch dough together to seal seams. Pour in filling and sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes.
ingredients: crescent rolls, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, egg yolk
name: danish

steps: In a small bowl, combine water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Place the peaches, lemon juice, sugar, and nutmeg in a blender and process for 1 minute or until blended. Cover and freeze for 3 hours or until almost firm. Transfer to a blender and process again for 30-40 seconds or until slushy. Cover and freeze over night. Remove from freezer just before serving. Using a fork, scrape into 2 dessert dishes.
ingredients: water, sugar, frozen lemonade, frozen peaches, vodka, lime juice, carbonated lemon-lime beverage
name: peachy slurp

steps: Cream butter and sugar, then add egg. In another bowl, combine bananas and milk. Combine flour, baking powder and baking soda and add to creamed mixture alternately with banana mixture. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. Pour into a greased 9 x 5 loaf pan and bake at 350 for 60 to 70 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan to cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, bananas, flour, baking powder, salt, milk chocolate chips
name: banana chip bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease or butter a small, shallow casserole dish. In the prepared dish, combine the cream, corn, and pepper. Cut butter in small pieces and put on top of corn. Put the broken saltine pieces on top of casserole. Bake until slightly brown on top.
ingredients: frozen corn kernels, whipping cream, evaporated milk, salt, sugar, flour, butter, black pepper
name: delicious cream corn

steps: Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions.
ingredients: honey, apple juice, garlic, ground ginger, soy sauce, cider vinegar, vegetable oil
name: bill knapp s honey ginger chicken marinade

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Line pricked pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pastry shell and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning.
ingredients: frozen spinach, ricotta cheese, eggs, tasty cheese, cream cheese spread, onion flakes, vegetable stock powder, nutmeg, butter
name: mini quiche for mini people

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f for 1 hour and 15 minutes, to 1 hour and 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: chicken breasts, italian dressing, potatoes, parmesan cheese
name: parmesan chicken and potatoes

steps: Melt butter in skillet and brown wingers well. Combine the rest of ingredients in a bowl. Pour over wings. Put wings on baking sheet or casserole dish with sides. Bake 1 hour at 350 degrees or until tender and sauce is sticky.
ingredients: soy sauce, brown sugar, vegetable oil, fresh gingerroot, garlic powder, chicken wings
name: sweet and gooey chicken wings

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the feta and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add
ingredients: skinless chicken breast half, tomatoes, feta cheese, kalamata olive, olive oil, naan bread, tzatziki
name: won t you be my gyro chicken panini

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Do not separate the rolls, just slice them all at once with a long serrated knife. Place both packages of bottoms on a sheet pan. Cover the bottoms with the sliced ham and swiss and put the tops back on. Cut around the individual sandwiches. Bake for 15 minutes or until browned.
ingredients: dijon mustard, honey-roasted ham, swiss cheese, egg, dry breadcrumbs, cooking oil
name: awesome appys

steps: Cover grill and grill for 15 to 20 minutes or place on top rack of outdoor grill. Bake in preheated 375 degree fahrenheit oven for 20 minutes or place on top rack of outdoor grill. Bake in preheated 375 degree fahrenheit oven
ingredients: cream cheese, honey, butter, fresh lemon rind
name: cream cheese crosses icing for hot cross buns

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add ginger preserves, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon wedges, lemon
ingredients: jumbo shrimp, ginger preserves, limes, juice of, fresh cilantro, olive oil
name: ginger glazed shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Stir flour, baking soda and salt together. Cut in butter, until mixture resembles crumbs. Pour in sour milk. Knead dough, cut cross at center and bake for 40 minutes.
ingredients: flour, whole wheat flour, light brown sugar, baking powder, kosher salt, baking soda, caraway seeds, unsalted butter, buttermilk
name: whole wheat brown sugar soda bread

steps: In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 tablespoon whipped topping and 2 tablespoons wafer crumbs. Fold remaining whipped topping into pudding. In a 2 quart serving bowl, layer a third of the strawberries, wafer crumbs and pudding mixture. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with reserved wafer crumbs. Top with reserved whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: vanilla instant pudding mix, cold water, sweetened condensed milk, whipped topping, vanilla wafers, firm bananas
name: banana pudding dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Roll out the pizza dough into a 12-inch circle. Roll the edges inward to create a ridge around the pizza. Place the pizza dough on a pizza stone that has been dusted with cornmeal. In a small bowl, stir together the marinara sauce and the sour cream until it is thoroughly combined. Spread the sauce evenly over the crust. Sprinkle the bacon evenly over the sauce. Combine the mozzarella with the parmesan and sprinkle them evenly over the bacon. Top the cheese with the scallops, which should be distributed evenly over the pizza. Bake for 16 to18 minutes until the cheese is bubbly and the scallops are cooked.
ingredients: pizza crust, turkey gravy, mashed potatoes, prepared stuffing, turkey, cranberry sauce, swiss cheese, mozzarella cheese
name: trina s thanksgiving leftover pizza

steps: Place apple, orange and all remaining ingredients into crock pot to full. Add brown sugar. Stick whole cloves into skin of orange and apple wedges. Place apple, orange and all remaining ingredients into cheese cloth, tie with string and drop into crock pot. Bring to a boil, about 2 to 2 hours on high. Once the cider is boiling, reduce setting to low. Keep on low for 2 hours or more before serving. Replenish with additional cider when needed. If cider is cold, return setting to high until heated. Serve or have guests serve themselves from the crock pot. If desired, leave a bottle of spiced rum nearby.
ingredients: apple cider, brown sugar, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves
name: hot perked apple cider

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick spray. Bake in preheated oven until at least 160f inside. We like ours well done. After 80 minutes it was 180f and perfect. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, graham cracker crumbs, milk, ketchup, onion, eggs, salt
name: graham cracker meatloaf oamc

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4.
ingredients: penne, dried basil leaves, hot sausage, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, onion, plum tomatoes, italian-style tomato sauce, asiago cheese
name: penne with italian sausage and peppers

steps: Cook cauliflower in boiling salted water until tender-crisp. Drain. Put cauliflower in an oven-safe casserole dish. Combine milk, soup, mayonnaise, cheese and curry powder. Pour over cauliflower. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes.
ingredients: head cauliflower, vegetable oil, salt, butter, onions, curry powder, water, reduced-sodium chicken broth, fresh parsley
name: curried cauliflower soup

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a non-stick skillet brown meat with salt and pepper. When browned stir in basil, tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, pasta sauce, ricotta and parmesan, and simmer for a couple of minutes. Place 3 lasagna noodles on the bottom of bake dish and top with half the sauce. Add another layer of noodles and then the remaining sauce. Top with mozzarella cheese and cover dish with foil. Bake for 45 minutes, remove from oven and let sit for 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: cooked lasagna noodles, hamburger, spaghetti sauce mix, tomato paste, water, cottage cheese, mozzarella cheese, dried parsley
name: american beauty lasagna

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine whole wheat bread, potatoes, peas, carrot, celery, vegetable oil, beaten egg whites, salt and pepper. Add salt and pepper to taste. Stir well, mashing the bread against the sides of the bowl until the mixture holds together. Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray. With dampened hands, pack a heaping cup of the bread mixture into a ball. Roll the ball in the bread crumbs and place on the baking sheet. Repeat the process until all of the bread mixture is used up. Bake for 20-25 minutes until the balls are heated through and crisp on the outside.
ingredients: whole wheat bread, potatoes, peas, carrot, celery, vegetable oil
name: veggie balls

steps: Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes, or until golden, but not brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the onion and cumin, turmeric and cayenne and cook, stirring for about 5 minutes or until soft. Add the spinach and stir until coated with the oil and spices. Stir in the spinach with just the water clinging to it, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes until wilted. Uncover, stir in the pimientos and continue cooking, stirring gently until the liquid evaporates. Season to taste and serve.
ingredients: olive oil, scallions, sweet peas, dry white wine, spinach, butter, salt and pepper
name: sweet peas and spinach

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the potatoes until soft and golden. Stir in the chilies, sweet potatoes and carrots. Add stock. Cover and bring to a boil. Simmer for 20 minutes or until all vegetables are tender. Puree the soup, in batches if necessary, then return to the pan. Season and if necessary, add a bit of water to adjust the consistency. Serve with crusty bread.
ingredients: potatoes, water, garlic, olive oil, cabbage, salt, black pepper
name: cabbage and potato soup caldo verde

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Punch down dough and kneed in hands and bowl. Keep moving. Sprinkle cornmeal in a thin layer over pizza pan and roll dough out on pan as thick or thin as you like. Add desired sauce, meat, veggies and cheese. Bake in 425 degree oven for 15-20 minutes.
ingredients: warm water, yeast, sugar, oil, salt, flour
name: sunny s pizza dough

steps: In a mixing bowl, add plain yogurt, banana, apple juice, fresh peach, strawberries, ice cube. Stir gently to combine. Spoon mixture into custard cups, ramekins. Or dessert bowls. Refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: plain yogurt, banana, apple juice, fresh peach, strawberries, ice cube
name: the peckham peach palouser

steps: This step will take approximately 20 minutes, so preheat oven to 350 while working on this step. Put macaroni to boil. In a medium pot heat butter and saut onions. Add milk, flour, salt and pepper. Bring to a rolling boil. Slowly add cheddar cheese, stirring while adding. Drain macaroni. Add macaroni directly to the cheese mixture in the pot. Pour mac and cheese mixture into large lasagna pan. Put in oven and bake for 30 minutes or until top is bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: wagon wheel macaroni, butter, flour, paprika, milk, salt, worcestershire sauce, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs
name: cheesy cheese baked macaroni

steps: Heat oil in frying pan, add butter. When oil is hot add prawns sauteeing for two minutes. Remove from heat and drain on paper towel. Discard oil from pan, reheat and slowly add honey, allowing it to colour slightly. Return prawns to pan to coat in the honey. Discard oil from pan, reheat and slowly add honey, allowing it to colour
ingredients: oil, large shelled prawns, garlic, fresh ginger, chili, fresh coriander
name: prawns shrimp on the barbie aussie style

steps: Add water, honey, maple syrup, cinnamon stick, star anise, balsamic vinegar to a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Add water, honey, maple syrup, cinnamon stick, star anise, balsamic vinegar to a saucepan. Add water, honey, maple syrup, cinnamon stick
ingredients: plum, water, honey, maple syrup, cinnamon stick, star anise, balsamic vinegar
name: spiced plums

steps: To make filling, melt butter in a small skillet and cook apple over a low heat for 2-3 minutes or until just heated through. Remove pan from heat. Set aside and keep warm. To make omelet, melt butter in a small skillet. Place eggs, water and black pepper to taste in a small bowl and whisk to combine. Pour egg mixture into pan and cook over medium heat, continually drawing in the edge of the omelet with a fork during cooking, until no liquid remains, and the omelet is lightly set. Top half of the omelet with apple slices, cheese, and chives and fold in half. Slip onto a plate and serve immediately.
ingredients: new potatoes, canola oil, kosher salt, sour cream, blue cheese, fresh chives
name: baby baked potatoes with bleu cheese topping

steps: Preheat oven to 400 f. Whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl. Add the butter and rub it into the flour using your finger. Crumble the tararua needles in your hand and add them to the mixture. Add the cheese and toss to combine. Pour in the buttermilk and fold in gently with a spatula until mixture forms a sticky dough. Bake for about 12 minutes until golden on top or a toothpick comes out clean. Remove from oven and allow to cool on trays.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, condensed milk, soy flour, rolled oats, baking powder, desiccated coconut, sesame seed paste
name: tararua biscuits

steps: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Whirl one minute. Scrape down and blend 15 seconds more. Refrigerate at least one hour before making crepes. Heat a lightly greased 6 inch skillet. Remove from heat. Spoon in 2 tbsp batter. Lift and tilt skillet to spread evenly. Return to heat. Brown on one side only. To remove, invert pan over paper toweling. Repeat with remaining batter.
ingredients: mushrooms, butter, salt, black pepper, nutmeg, flour, milk, gruyere cheese
name: pancakes crepes filled with mushrooms filling only

steps: Place all ingredients in large pitcher with tight-fitting lid. Cover. Shake vigorously 1 minute or until well blended. Pour evenly into 4 glasses. Serve immediately.
ingredients: instant vanilla pudding, milk, pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, whipped topping, pie crust
name: instant pumpkin pie

steps: In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the bacon, onion, veal schnitzels, seasoned flour, oil, apricot nectar, onion soup mix, worcestershire sauce, mushrooms, cooked ricepreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the bacon, onion, veal schnitzels, seasoned flour, oil, apricot nectar, onion soup mix, worcestershire sauce, mushrooms, cooked ricepreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the bacon, onion, veal schnitzels, seasoned flour, oil, apricot nectar, onion soup mix, worcestershire sauce, mushrooms, cooked ricepreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the bacon, onion, veal schnitzels, seasoned flour, oil, apricot nectar, onion soup mix, worcestershire sauce, mushrooms, cooked ricepreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the bacon, onion, veal schnitzels, seasoned flour, oil, apricot nectar, onion soup mix, worcestershire sauce, mushrooms, cooked ricepreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the bacon, onion, veal schnitzels, seasoned flour, oil, apricot nectar, onion soup mix, worcestershire sauce, mushrooms, cooked ricepreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the bacon, onion, veal schnitzels, seasoned flour, oil, apricot nectar, onion soup mix, worcestershire sauce, mushrooms, cooked ricepreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the
ingredients: bacon, onion, veal schnitzels, seasoned flour, oil, apricot nectar, onion soup mix, worcestershire sauce, mushrooms, cooked rice
name: apricot veal rolls on mushroom rice

steps: Heat a medium sized saucepan over medium heat. Add sugar, water, rice vinegar, garlic, salt, crushed red pepper flakes. Stir until it melts. Season, to taste, with salt and pepper.
ingredients: sugar, water, rice vinegar, garlic, salt, crushed red pepper flakes
name: thai crystal sauce nahm jeem gratien

steps: Heat oil and butter in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat. When butter has melted, add half of the asparagus to the skillet with. Using tongs, distribute spears in an even layer. Cover skillet. Cook until asparagus is bright green and still crisp, about 5 minutes. Uncover, increase heat to high and season asparagus with salt and pepper to taste. Cook until spears are tender and well-browned along one side, 5 - 7 minutes, using tongs to occasionally move spears from the center of the pan to the edge of the pan to ensure all are browned. Transfer to serving dish, adjust seasonings as needed and, if desired, squeeze lemon over spears. Serve immediately.
ingredients: leeks, asparagus spears, olive oil, salt, fresh black pepper, balsamic vinegar
name: oven roasted asparagus and leeks

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack.
ingredients: sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, vanilla, flour, unsweetened cocoa, baking soda, bananas, chocolate chips
name: double chocolate banana bread

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. Transfer to a serving bowl. Add the remaining ingredients. Toss to coat.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, mushrooms, zucchini, anchovy, chickpeas, tomatoes, spring onion, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley
name: chickpea and mushroom vegeroni bow ties

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut squash into 1-inch cubes if too large. In a large bowl, toss together squash, bell pepper, olive oil, garlic, parsley, black pepper, and salt to taste. Pour into a 2 quart flat baking dish. Sprinkle parmesan evenly over the top. Bake squash approximately 50 minutes until tender. Can use cooking spray instead of olive oil. Can use 1 green and 1 red pepper if desired.
ingredients: yellow squash, red pepper, eggs, onion, all-purpose flour, mozzarella cheese, white pepper, salt, butter, ritz crackers
name: my squash and pepper casserole

steps: Place chicken in a large pot and just cover with water. Bring to boil and then simmer over a low-medium hear for one hour. You may need to keep adjusting the temperature from time to time as some liquid evaporates. Skim fat from the top of the broth. Add onion, carrot, garlic, ginger, bay leaf and celery seeds and continue to simmer for 3 hours, stirring once or twice. Allow stock to cool uncovered. Strain into a storage container and either use immediately or freeze for later use.
ingredients: chicken, carrots, leeks, cold water, salt, ground pepper
name: stock chicken

steps: Cream butter until light. Gradually add sugars, creaming well until blended. Beat in vanilla and egg. Stir together flour, salt and soda. Add flour mixture to butter mixture, blending well. Stir in chips and crushed candy canes. Drop by level tablespoonfuls, 2 inches apart, onto cookie sheets covered with parchment paper. Bake at 375 degrees for about 12 minutes until golden. Remove to wire racks to cool.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, unsweetened applesauce, peppermint extract, water
name: peppermint cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: whole wheat pastry flour, salt, baking powder, applesauce, bananas, honey, skim milk
name: lullaby muffins

steps: In a food processor puree the quail eggs with the mayonnaise, mayonnaise, fresh dill, salt and pepper. With the motor running add the quail eggs, mayonnaise, fresh dill, salt and pepper. Blend the mixture until it is combined well. Pack the mixture into small ramekins or a crock, and chill it, covered until it is firm, preferrably at least overnight. Garnish the potted kippers with the fresh dill.
ingredients: quail eggs, mayonnaise, fresh dill, salt and pepper
name: nif s dilled quail eggs

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic, vinegar, water, oil, mustard, salt and pepper. Cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the haricots vert and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the shallot vert and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the shallot
ingredients: french haricots vert, olive oil, shallot, red wine vinegar, black pepper, salt
name: haricots verts with warm shallot vinaigrette

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, green onions, milk, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce, paprika
name: creamy baked crab dip

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Cut up sweet potatoes into wedges, rounds or thin strips. In a large bowl add the fries. Coat them with oil. You may substitute just water if desired. Then add the garlic granules, parmesan and sea salt. Spay a cookie sheet with pam or oil and lay fries out on top. Bake for 10 mins then turn them over. Put back in the oven for 10 more minutes. If you have thicker fries you may need an additional 5-10 minutes baking time.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, fresh basil, pine nuts, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese, whole wheat breadcrumbs, olive oil
name: basil butter sweet potato patties

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13x9 pan with pam. Put hash browns in pan and add salt and pepper to taste. Top with grated cheese and pour half and half over top. Drizzle with melted butter. Sprinkle with paprika, if desired. Bake for 1 to 1. 5 hours. I like to cover mine with foil and then uncover the last half an hour.
ingredients: chicken broth, milk, butter, salt, pepper, instant mashed potatoes, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, velveeta cheese, chives
name: three cheese potato bake

steps: Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the rosemary. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake another 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more rosemary. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, celery, mayonnaise, sour cream, fresh rosemary
name: rosemary chicken salad

steps: Combine the cereal and sugar in a large bowl an set aside. Place chocolate chips in a 1-qt microwave-safe dish. Microwave uncovered, on high for about 1 minute. Stir gently until smooth. Stir in vanilla. Pour over cereal mixture and mix well. Spoon into a greased 9x13 baking pan. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, then cut into squares.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, cereal, unsalted peanuts
name: fudge drops

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, vegetable oil, orange juice, dijon mustard, honey, cornstarch
name: dijon orange chops

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Slice each frankfurter diagonally about 5 times at 1 inch intervals, set aside. In a 2 quart saucepan, combine soup and milk, stirring until smooth. Add mustuard and caraway seed. Stir in sauerkraut. Heat thououghly, stirring often until mixture is hot. Spread misture into a greased 10 x 6 x 2 inch baking dish. Arrange frankfurters over top. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes or until mixture is bubbly and franks are slightly browned.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, milk, tomato sauce, frankfurters
name: frankfurter fondue

steps: Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of bacon and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend until smooth and stir through cream. Divide into serving bowls and top with crispy bacon to serve.
ingredients: bacon, onion, red potatoes, half-and-half, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, flour, green onion, salt and pepper
name: loaded potato soup and i do mean loaded

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease cookie sheets. Beat egg whites, coffee, cream of tartar, and salt in medium bowl on low speed until foamy. Beat in sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time on high speed until stiff. Do not underbeat. Stir in cocoa until smooth. Fold in coconut. Drop mixture by rounded teaspoonfuls 1 inch apart on cookie sheet. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until set. Cool 10 minutes, then remove from cookie sheet. Sprinkle with cocoa or drizzle with melted chocolate.
ingredients: cocoa, sugar, salt, water, milk, kahlua, whipped cream
name: mocoa

steps: Preheat oven to 350f place the pork tenderloin side by side, fat side up in a large heavy roasting pan. Insert an ovenproof meat thermometer in the center of one of the roast. Roast the pork for 30 minutes. Meanwhile in a bowl, crush the rosemary with the olive oil, pepper, vinegar and salt. Spoon the seasoning over the pork. Return the meat to the oven and roast for 30 minutes longer, until the internal temperature is 160 to 165. Remove from the oven, cover loosely with foil and let rest for at least 10 minutes. Thinly slice the meat and arrange on platters. Pour any juices over the meat. Garnish with rosemary springs. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: garlic cloves, sea salt, paprika, thyme, oregano, olive oil, pork sirloin roast, french baguettes, salt
name: pata de cerdo canary island style pork roast

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Add hot water to stuffing mix. Stir till blended. Set aside. Saute italian sausage in a large nonstick skillet over med-high heat until nicely browned. Add vegetables to skillet, saute until crisp tender. Drain any oil in skillet. Place sausage mixture into a 13 x 9 pan. Cover with tomato sauce. Cover with prepared stuffing. Bake 25 minutes or until heated throughout.
ingredients: bulk pork sausage, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, milk, biscuit
name: easy sausage gravy

steps: Place cucumber in a mixing bowl and whip with an electric mixer until fluffy. Add dressing, milk and dill weed. Mix well until well blended. Stir in cucumber and onion. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour to allow flavor to blend.
ingredients: cucumbers, cream cheese, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, mayonnaise, sour cream, rye cocktail bread, dill weed
name: cucumber open faced sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease 4 9 x 5-in loaf pans. Cream butter, sugar and eggs. Mix sour cream and soda in a separate bowl. Let stand until foamy. Add vanilla, bananas, salt and flour. Mix well. Place in 4 prepared loaf pans. Bake for 50 minutes or until cake tests done.
ingredients: cream cheese, butter, sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, fruit cocktail, baking powder
name: fruit cocktail bread

steps: Place all ingredients except pecans and crackers in mixer bowl. Attach bowl and flat beater to mixer. Turn to speed 4 and beat about 1 minute, or until well blended. On waxed paper, shape mixture into a ball. Roll ball in chopped pecans. Wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate until serving time.
ingredients: philadelphia cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, pecans, pecan halves, cracker
name: cheddar pecan cheese ball

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, tomato paste, dried basil, salt, fresh ground pepper, pasta, parmesan cheese
name: garlicky pasta sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 with rack placed in the center position. Place asparagus in a brown paper bag large enough to hold the asparagus comfortably. Drizzle with oil to prevent the bag from burning. Place bag on a baking sheet, and drizzle with more olive oil. Bake for 20 minutes. Shake bag a few times before carefully opening. Transfer asparagus to platter. Drizzle with more oil. Serve immediately.
ingredients: white fish fillets, baby asparagus, bacon, gruyere, butter, white wine, lemon juice, asparagus, egg yolks, cayenne
name: stuffed fish rolls with asparagus hollandaise sauce

steps: In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, and vanilla. Lightly swirl pie filling into cream cheese mixture. Spread on top of cake. Top cake with strawberries. Be careful to not put too much of the juice on the cake, or else it will be too moist. Refrigerate for an hour.
ingredients: angel food cake, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla, cherry pie filling, cool whip
name: icebox cherry dessert

steps: Spray rack of boiler pan with nonstick spray. Preheat the broiler. Whisk together the brown sugar, mustard, and dill in a small bowl. Sprinkle on the broiler rack and spoon the brown sugar glaze on top. Position 7 inches from the heat and broil until lightly browned and just opaque in the center, about 6 minutes.
ingredients: brown sugar, dijon mustard, fresh ginger, salmon fillets, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: salmon with ginger glaze

steps: Boil the first five ingredients in a sauce pan. Bring to a boil, remove from heat. Add the rest of the ingredients. Drop from teaspoon onto waxed paper. Let cool and serve.
ingredients: shredded coconut, powdered sugar, eggs, salt
name: coconut haystack cookies

steps: Heat the oil in a non-stick saute pan over medium heat. Add the tomatillos and cook until golden brown. This is best achieved by allowing the tomatillos to sit on the bottom of the pan for a few minutes before stirring to create a browning. Once tomatillos are cooked, 5-10 minutes, remove from pan and place on a plate lined with a paper towel to cool. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients except for the additional 2 tablespoons oil. Add the potatoes and stir to combine. Wipe out the pan and heat a the pan over medium heat. Add the fat and allow to coat the entire pan. Add the potato mixture and cook stirring gently until it begins to set. At this point, turn the heat up to medium-high and allow the bottom to brown. Cover with a lid for a few minutes to set the top and remove from heat. Turn out onto a plate and serve with sour cream or thick yogurt and green onions for garnish.
ingredients: tomatillos, pasilla chiles, garlic clove, white onion, pork chops, vegetable oil, water, potatoes
name: oaxacan costillas de puerco en chile pasilla

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, white sugar, peanut butter, egg, salt, baking soda, sifted flour
name: peanut butter cookies johnny cash s mother s recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 375 dgrees. Lightly beat 1 egg white with 1 tablespoon water. Brush top of loaves with egg wash and then sprinkle with fresh parmesan. Bake a 375 deghrees for 30-45 minutes, depending on the size of the loaves.
ingredients: onion, garlic clove, olive oil, vegetable broth, long grain rice, fresh rosemary, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: rosemary rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, mix together peaches, marmalade, lemon juice, ginger, mustard, cinnamon and soy sauce. Place pork in medium baking dish. Glaze pork with peach mixture, using it all. Roast in oven for approximately one and a half hours. Serve.
ingredients: fresh peaches, candied ginger, plain fat-free yogurt, skim milk, ground nutmeg, cinnamon
name: chilled peachy ginger soup low fat

steps: Dissolve jello in boiling water, then stir in lemonade concentrate until dissolved. Chill until partially set. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into a 13 x 9 glass dish. Chill until firm.
ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, boiling water, mountain dew soda, miniature marshmallow, crushed pineapple, lemon flavor instant pudding and pie filling, cool whip
name: luscious lemon salad

steps: Mix lemon juice and garlic in large bowl. Whisk in oil. Add remaining ingredients. Toss. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: fresh lime juice, green pepper, cucumber, fresh strawberries
name: cucumber strawberry salad

steps: Boil pickle acar nenas in salt water for 3 hours. Peel skin from the tongue. Mix remaining ingredients in a large, nonreactive pot and bring to a boil. Add meat and boil for 10 minutes. Cool and store in refridgerator for one week. Slice pickle acar nenas in salt water for 3 hours. Mix remaining
ingredients: fresh pineapple, oil, fresh ginger, red chili pepper, salt, dark soy sauce, sugar, vinegar
name: spicy pineapple pickle acar nenas

steps: Combine lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, jalapeno chiles, garlic cloves, english cucumbers, red onion, of fresh mint, dry roasted salted peanuts. Cover and refrigerate at least four hours.
ingredients: fresh lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, jalapeno chiles, garlic cloves, english cucumbers, red onion, of fresh mint, dry roasted salted peanuts
name: thai cucumber salad with roasted peanuts

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add pork chops. Brown chops for 2 minutes on each side. Reduce heat to medium-low. Add vinegar mixture to skillet. Cover and simmer chops for 10-15 minutes. Serve with sauce poured over top.
ingredients: center-cut pork chops, chipotle hot sauce, oil, garlic cloves, orange juice, orange marmalade, honey, bourbon
name: orange bourbon glazed pork chops

steps: In a large skillet, brown the salted chicken pieces in oil. Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes or until browned. Crush garlic cloves and scatter over the chicken add the broth. Turn heat to low. Cover and cook for about 15 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove cover, add salt and red pepper flakes. Add water and simmer over low heat until water is cooked off. Add chicken, making sure it is well-coated with the marinade. Marinate chicken, covered in fridge for at least 3 hours and preferably overnight. Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Remove chicken from marinade and discard marinade. Arrange chicken breasts in a shallow baking pan. Season with salt and pepper generously, and add chicken, making sure it is well-coated with the marinade. Season with salt and
ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken breast, andouille sausage, frozen broccoli, stewed tomatoes, water
name: easy chicken gumbo

steps: Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, salt, boston lettuce, baked corn tortilla chipspreparation:Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, salt, boston lettuce,
ingredients: sunflower oil, tuna steaks, cayenne pepper, ground cumin, tortillas, avocado, tomatoes, lime, juice of, fresh cilantro
name: fresh tuna tortillas

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Mix dry ingredients and beer. Pour into a greased loaf pan. Pour melted butter over mixture. Bake 1 hour, remove from pan and cool at least 15 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, egg, beer
name: irish beer bread

steps: Put the vodka, cranberry juice, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with lemon-lime soda. Float a lemon slice on top, and serve.
ingredients: cranberry vodka, cranberry juice, grapefruit juice, lime wedge
name: sea breeze cocktail revolution style

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix first six ingredients and form into meatballs. Place on jelly roll style pan with lip. Bake meatballs in oven for 15-20 minutes until done. Melt butter in saucepan. Add garlic and saut for 1-2 minutes. Stir in flour. Stir in chicken broth and cook until thickened. Combine meatballs and sauce. Keep warm in crockpot if serving for party.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, water, italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, pepper, meatballs, mashed potatoes
name: creamy garlic meatballs

steps: Place sweet potatoes in a 3-qt. Slow cooker coated with cooking. Spray. In a small bowl combine the brown sugar, coconut, pecans,. Vanilla, salt and cinnamon. Sprinkle over sweet potatoes. Drizzle. With butter. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or until potatoes are tender,. Sprinkling with marshmallows during last 5 minutes of cooking time.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, pecans, flaked coconut, sugar, brown sugar, butter, cinnamon, salt, coconut extract, vanilla extract
name: coconut pecan sweet potatoes

steps: Add salt and pepper. Saute for 5 minutes.
ingredients: morel, butter, garlic clove, flour, water, celery salt, salt and pepper
name: morel mushroom sauce

steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl except for pork chops. Stir until well mixed. Place pork chops in bottom of crock pot. Pour liquid mix over pork chops. Cook in crock pot on low for 4-6 hours or until meat is cooked and tender.
ingredients: tri-tip roast, catsup, water, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, yellow mustard, garlic, liquid smoke, apple cider vinegar
name: pulled pork with bbq sauce in the crockpot

steps: Cover and cook on high 1 hour stirring occasionally until cheese if fully melted. Serve warm with chips and sour cream.
ingredients: popcorn, butter, dried chives, lime zest, ground cumin, chili powder, salt, pepper, monterey jack cheese
name: nacho popcorn

steps: In a large, heavy bottomed skillet, place the sugar and water. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add the almonds and cook, stirring constantly, until the sugar has dried on the almonds. About 2 minutes. Pour onto a large sheet pan and let cool.
ingredients: chocolate chips, marshmallows, almonds, vegetable oil
name: rocky road candy with chopped almonds

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Place butter in bottom of 9x13 baking dish and melt in oven, while preheating. Place eggs in blender and beat on high. Add flour, milk and vanilla. Mix together for 30 seconds. Pour mixture into dish with melted butter. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, butter, white sugar, buttermilk, light corn syrup, baking soda, vanilla extract
name: german pancake with buttermilk sauce

steps: Combine all ingredients except biscuits in a bowl and mix well. Spoon mixture evenly into 10 greased cups of a 12 cup muffin pan. Place 1 biscuit in each cup. Bake in pre-heated 425 degree oven for about 10 minutes. Cool 5 minutes. Remove from pan by inverting pan onto a plate. Serve warm.
ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, oil, refrigerated biscuits, butter
name: easy elephant ears

steps: Heat oil in large pan. Cook onion, garlic, rind and mushrooms. Stir until mushrooms are browned lightly. Add rice, stock and wine, bring to boil. Simmer, covered 15 minutes, stirring midway through cooking. Remove from heat. Let stand, covered 10 minutes. Stir in cashew nut and green pepper risotto. Cover for 1 minute and serve.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, green pepper, sweetcorn, brown rice, vegetable stock, soy sauce, cashew nuts
name: cashew nut and green pepper risotto

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Let the artichoke hearts come to room temperature, and mix all of the ingredients together in a medium sized bowl. Spread the mixture into an oven safe serving dish. Sprinkle the parmigiano-reggiano cheese over the top. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until very lightly browned. Serve on crostini or with chips.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, plain low-fat yogurt, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, garlic cloves, fresh basil
name: healthy warm artichoke dip

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain edamame and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over edamame and return to bowl
ingredients: frozen edamame, green onions, nori, rice wine vinegar, olive oil, sea salt, nanami togarashi
name: clean eating edamame salad

steps: In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurtpreparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry
ingredients: fresh raspberries, sugar, dry red wine, sour cream
name: cold raspberry soup

steps: Preheat oven to 375. If fruit is frozen, thaw but do not drain. Place apples in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired.
ingredients: sugar, apples, butter, bread, eggs, condensed milk, milk
name: tarantela try it you will love it

steps: Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan. Add the zucchinis and fry for 5 minutes, stirring every so often until the eggs are done to your liking. Cover the pan with a lid or a sheet of foil, then cook for 2 to 3 minutes until the eggs are done to your liking. Cover the pan with a lid or a sheet of foil, then cook for 2 to 3 minutes until the eggs are done
ingredients: eggs, bread, bacon, garlic clove, onions, shallots, flour, red burgundy wine, salt, pepper
name: eggs in meurette

steps: Preheat oven to 400f and spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with cooking spray. Combine all ingredients except sausage in a large zipper type plastic bag, mixing well. Place ingredients from bag into prepared pan, bake uncovered for 30 minutes. Add sausage to vegetables mixing well. Bake for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender and golden browned.
ingredients: sweet italian sausage, butter, onion, garlic clove, tomatoes, fresh oregano, fresh basil, water
name: hearty tomato and sausage stew

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray a 9x13 inch pan with cooking spray. Quarter biscuits, and place at bottom of pan. Layer with cooked bacon and shredded cheese. In a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs, sour cream, salt, and pepper and pour over cheese and biscuits. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until golden brown. Allow to cool 5-10 minutes before serving. Garnish with onions, if desired.
ingredients: potatoes, bacon, onions, swiss cheese, heavy cream, butter, salt and pepper
name: tartiflette the indulgent version

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: buttermilk, corn muffin mix, seasoned dry bread crumb, fresh cilantro, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, cayenne pepper, chicken parts, cooking spray
name: oven fried corn muffin chicken

steps: Heat the vegetable oil in a large frying pan. Add the chicken breasts and brown on both sides. Add the shallots, chicken stock and vinegar. Cover and simmer on low heat until the chicken is no longer pink inside, about 30 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and keep warm. Blend together the cream and cornstarch. Stir into the cooking liquid in the frying pan. Cook until thickened, stirring the sauce to keep it smooth. Stir in the mustard, tarragon, salt and pepper. Arrange the chicken on a serving platter and pour the sauce over it.
ingredients: sunflower oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, low-fat creme fraiche, dijon mustard, coarse grain mustard, dried tarragon
name: creamy mustard tarragon chicken

steps: Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the milk. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, eggs, self raising flour, milk, lemons, juice and zest of, white chocolate chips, sugar, boiling water
name: lemon chocolate pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: unbleached flour, whole wheat flour, salt, wheat germ, dry yeast, milk
name: bloomer bread

steps: Heat oil in a large saut pan over high heat. Add the onions, bell peppers, and garlic. Saut until they are soft and golden, about 10 minutes. Cover and reduce the heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, until very soft, about 45 minutes. Drain and season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, tempeh, red bell pepper, red onion, garlic cloves, dried thyme, salt, fresh black pepper, swiss chard
name: basic scrambled tempeh

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place skewer 3 whole figs onto each sprig of merlot. In a small bowl combine maple syrup, honey, pure vanilla extract, dried black figs, dried cherries, cinnamon stick, non-fat vanilla frozen yogurt. In a small bowl combine maple
ingredients: merlot, honey, pure vanilla extract, dried black figs, dried cherries, cinnamon stick, non-fat vanilla frozen yogurt
name: merlot poached figs with vanilla frozen yogurt

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook corn according to package directions. Drain water. Then mix in butter, cream cheese, garlic, sugar, salt, and parsley. Spoon into a casserole dish. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes, until lightly browned on top.
ingredients: bacon, corn kernels, onion, red bell pepper, green pepper, half-and-half cream, cream cheese, salt, pepper, sugar
name: confetti corn

steps: Preheat oven to 400f line your pan with aluminum foil and lightly brush with olive oil, or use a bit of cooking spray. Combine pork sausage, smoked ham, boiling water, yellow onions, potatoes, parsley, salt and pepper on the cutting board. Brush top of each patty with olive oil. Bake until firm, about 12-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of the fish. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: pork sausage, smoked ham, boiling water, yellow onions, potatoes, parsley, salt and pepper
name: dublin coddle ii

steps: Preheat grill on high for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ginger, salt and pepper to taste, bring to a boil. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk cornstarch into the water and mix into brown sugar mixture. Cook, stirring constantly until bubbling and thickened. Reduce grill to medium-high heat. Grill chops on oiled grill, brushing often with brown sugar glaze, about 6-8 minutes per side, or until digital thermometer inserted sideways into the center of each chop reads 160f do not over cook.
ingredients: brown sugar, apple juice, vegetable oil, soy sauce, ground ginger, salt and pepper, cornstarch, water, boneless pork chops
name: grilled brown sugar pork chops

steps: In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh corn, edamame, red onion, red bell pepper, fresh cilantro, light mayonnaise, lemon juice, ginger, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: roasted corn and edamame salad

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4.
ingredients: penne pasta, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, canned tomatoes, dried oregano, salt and pepper, mozzarella cheese
name: easy penne pasta bake

steps: In a large pot of boiling, salted water cook the pasta to al dente and drain. Return to the pot and melt in the butter. Toss to coat. Whisk together the eggs, milk, hot sauce, salt, pepper, and mustard. Stir into the pasta and add the cheese. Over low heat continue to stir for 3 minutes or until creamy.
ingredients: cooked elbow macaroni, milk, flour, cheese, bread, butter
name: mac n cheese

steps: Cook cauliflower in boiling salted water until tender-crisp. Drain. Put cauliflower in an oven-safe casserole dish. Combine milk, soup, mayonnaise, cheese and curry powder. Pour over cauliflower. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes.
ingredients: head cauliflower, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, curry powder, dried breadcrumbs, butter
name: curried cauliflower ala marianne

steps: Using a 2 quart casserole dish with lid, put rice, hot water, butter and salt in dish. Stir. Cover, and microwave on high power 5 minutes. Stir with fork. Cover and put back in microwave and cook on medium this time for 15 minutes. Remove lid and fluff with fork. Let stand 2-3 minutes. Serve.
ingredients: long grain rice, water, butter, salt
name: perfect microwave rice

steps: Combine juice and water in a saucepan, and bring to a boil. Add ginger and bring to boil. Add sugar and lemon juice, strain tea. Allow to cool and add ice. Garnish with lemon balm leaves.
ingredients: water, sugar, fresh ginger, lemon peel, green tea bags, lemon slice
name: ginger lemon tea

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly season chicken thighs with salt and pepper, then, two to four at a time, depending on the size of your skillet, brown well on each side, removing to warm oven. Deglaze the skillet with the wine, scraping up brown bits, reduce heat to medium and stir in the mustard, then add the cherries. Season to taste with salt and pepper. When the sauce begins to bubble, add all the chicken thighs back into the skillet, spooning sauce over them to coat, cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook over medium low about 5 minutes, then rearrange thighs so those on the bottom are now on the top, and spoon sauce over. Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes or more, until chops are cooked through, but still very slightly pink inside. Remove chops to serving platter or individual plates. Melt butter into remaining sauce in skillet, heat and spoon over chops.
ingredients: chicken thighs, dijon mustard, french mustard, marjoram, vinegar, garlic clove
name: mustard and mustard chicken thighs

steps: Add flour, lard, red paprika, caraway seeds, salt, pepper, egg white, water, bread. Simmer for 1 minute, stirring occasionally. Add flour, lard, red paprika, caraway seeds, salt, pepper, egg white, water, bread. Add flour, lard, red paprika, caraway seeds, salt, pepper, egg
ingredients: flour, lard, red paprika, caraway seeds, salt, pepper, egg white, water, bread
name: croatian flour soup prezgana juha

steps: Heat the oil in a pan and add the onion and saut until soft and transparent. Dust the liver slices with flour and saut them lightly for 2-3 minutes. Add the rest of the ingredients and simmer for 5 minutes. Adjust amount of sugar and vinegar to suit your taste serves 5. German traditional cooking.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, dried sage, calf liver, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, white wine vinegar, flat leaf parsley
name: venetian calf s liver with onions

steps: Combine pizza dough, medium-sized shrimp, olive oil, feta cheese, rosemary, cornmeal, mozzarella cheese, garlic cloves, green onion, olivesseason with pepper. Toss thoroughly. Serve immediately.
ingredients: pizza dough, medium-sized shrimp, olive oil, feta cheese, rosemary, cornmeal, mozzarella cheese, garlic cloves, green onion, olives
name: shrimp and feta greek style pizza

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and salt, blending well. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press tomatoes through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly. Heat thoroughly before serving.
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, low sodium chicken broth, low-fat milk, salt and pepper
name: condensed cream of soup substitute

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9-inch cake pan with non-stick spray. In a large bowl, cream butter and splenda. Beat in eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt. Add dry ingredients to wet, mix well to combine. Add milk and walnuts, stirring until just combined. Spread half of pie filling over top. Spread remaining batter carefully over apples and arrange remaining apple pie filling over top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: graham crackers, sugar, milk, butter, boysenberries, mini marshmallows, whipped cream, nutmeats, lemon juice, cornstarch
name: boysenberry graham cracker dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the kale and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the kale evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: kale, olive oil, garlic cloves, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, toasted sesame seeds
name: oven roasted kale

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Season chicken breasts with horseradish cream sauce. Wrap each breast in 1 strip of bacon and place in a 9x13x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, mix the sour cream and soup. Spoon mixture over the chicken and bake uncovered for 40 to 50 minutes or until slightly brown on top. Serve with hot cooked rice, if desired.
ingredients: butter, flour, milk, horseradish, sour cream, sugar, dijon mustard, white wine vinegar, salt and pepper, chicken breast halves
