name: baked chicken breasts with horseradish cream sauce

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain well. Turn into large bowl. Add remaining 6 ingredients. Toss until well coated.
ingredients: egg noodles, butter, carrots, fresh parsley, dried rubbed sage, salt, pepper
name: noodles with herbed carrots

steps: Heat all ingredients to boiling in 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Strain cider mixture to remove cloves and cinnamon if desired. Serve hot.
ingredients: apple cider, whole cloves, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, cinnamon sticks, butter, brown sugar, rum
name: buttered rum spiced cider

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together flour, butter, shortening, powdered sugar, sugar, eggs, lemon juice, baking powder, baking soda, salt, clove, cinnamonpreparation:Cream butter & sugar. Mix in egg. Mix in flour, butter, shortening, powdered sugar, sugar, eggs, lemon juice, baking powder, baking soda, salt, clove, cinnamonpreparation:Cream butter & sugar. Mix in flour, butter, shortening, powdered sugar, sugar, eggs, lemon juice, baking powder, baking soda, salt, clove, cinnamon
ingredients: flour, butter, shortening, powdered sugar, sugar, eggs, lemon juice
name: mom s lemon bars

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, place the cut potatoes and pour the olive oil over the top. Sprinkle on the garlic, thyme and seasoned salt. Mix well until the potatoes are evenly coated. Spread the potatoes on a baking sheet in a single layer. Do not throw away the oil that is left in the bowl. Bake 30 minutes, turning the fries over halfway through. After 30 minutes of baking, return the fries to the bowl with excess oil and sprinkle with the parmesan cheese and parsley. Toss to coat and return to baking sheet and bake for another 10 minutes. If desired, sprinkle fries again with a few shakes of parmesan and a few shakes of seasoned salt.
ingredients: baking potatoes, fresh parmesan cheese, all-purpose flour, dried parsley, salt, pepper, butter
name: parmesan parsley potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9x9 baking pan. Peel and thinly slice apples. Arrange in the bottom pan. Melt 3 tbsp butter. In a large bowl, whisk together eggs and yogurt. Whisk in melted butter. Add cereal and brown sugar, and stir to combine. Spread over the apples and sprinkle with cinnamon sugar. Cut remaining 3 tbsp butter into small pieces and sprinkle on top. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until golden and bubbly.
ingredients: apples, applesauce, nonfat milk, flour, sugar, baking powder, vanilla extract, cinnamon, salt
name: ww apple cobbler

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Season both sides of chicken with some salt& pepper and some cinnamon to taste. Saute chicken in oil about 5 minutes per side or until cooked through and no longer pink inside- but still moist. Spoon pineapple mixture over each serving and serve immediately. If you prefer, you may instead grill chicken.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, butter, onion, fresh garlic, fresh cilantro, salsa verde, chicken broth, fresh tomato, green onion
name: cilantro chicken

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet, fry the onion until soft. Add the chicken pieces and saute until the onions are golden and the chicken pieces lightly browned. Add the salt, pepper and a cup of water and cook over a low heat-20 minutes for the quarters, less for breasts. The chicken should be tender and the sauce reduced. Keep turning the chicken pieces, and add a little water if the sauce reduces too much. Remove from the heat, stir in the yoghurt mix, and serve sprinkled with the almonds.
ingredients: chicken breasts, buttermilk, mayonnaise, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, pepper, paprika, parsley
name: the yogurt shoppe cafe ranch chicken

steps: In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, nonfat sour cream, fat-free cream of chicken soup, panko breadcrumbs, margarine, salt and pepper
name: lightened up easy creamy sour cream chicken casserole

steps: In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add curry, cumin and cayenne, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Adjust heat to medium-high, add couscous, blend well and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot.
ingredients: vegetable stock, shallots, carrot, garlic powder, ground cumin, couscous, low-fat margarine
name: lightly spiced vegetable couscous

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool.
ingredients: unsifted flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, ghirardelli semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts
name: ghirardelli chocolate chip cookies

steps: Place salmon in 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over salmon. Turn salmon so that it gets coated with the marinade. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Bake in preheated 425 f oven for 10-12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily and is opaque in centre.
ingredients: orange juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, ground ginger, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, black pepper, salmon steaks
name: orange marinated grilled salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease two 9x5-inch loaf pans. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Beat for an additional 2 minutes. Pour into pans and bake for an hour or till a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
ingredients: pumpkin, eggs, evaporated milk, yellow cake mix, butter, pecans, cool whip
name: pumpkin up side down cake

steps: In a small saucepan over low heat, warm the cream. Add the cocoa and mix well. Add the cream mixture to the coffee and top with a dollop of whipped cream and the grated chocolate. Serve with a dollop of whipped cream and the grated chocolate.
ingredients: raspberry flavored syrup, espresso, milk, godiva dark truffle hot cocoa powder, whipped cream, cocoa
name: godiva chocolate raspberry latte

steps: Place a heavy, deep skillet over medium-high heat. After a few minutes, add the oil. Wait a minute or so and add the green beans. Turn the heat to high and stir-fry for about 5 minutes, or until the beans are well seared. Add the garlic, salt and red pepper, if using. Stir-fry for several more minutes, then remove from heat.
ingredients: eggplant, oil, ground pork, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, fresh ginger, garlic, hot red peppers
name: szechwan eggplant

steps: Place chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes.
ingredients: minced garlic cloves, salt, red potatoes, olive oil, onion, broiler-fryer chickens, tomatoes, fresh basil
name: tomato garlic chicken

steps: Heat oven to 425. Grease 12-inch pizza pan. Sprinkle with cornmeal. Unroll dough and press in pan. In small bowl, combine oil and garlic. Drizzle over dough. In small bowl, combine cheese, oregano and basil. Sprinkle over oil. Bake at 425 for 13 to 16 minutes or until crust is deep golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: mozzarella cheese, roasted red peppers, fresh thyme sprigs, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh rosemary, italian seasoning, crushed red pepper flakes
name: marinated mozzarella cubes

steps: Place the prawns, ginger, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger, chili powder, salt and pepper in a large mixing bowl. Add the prawns, ginger, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger, chili powder, salt and pepper and mix well. Cover the prawns, ginger, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger, chili powder, salt and pepper and mix well. Cover the prawns, ginger, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger
ingredients: prawns, olive oil, lemon juice, onion, garlic, ginger, chili powder, salt and pepper
name: barbecue ginger prawns shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix flour and corn. Then add sugar, milk, salt and butter. Add eggs and mix well. Pour corn mixture into a greased 1 quart casserole dish. Place casserole into a larger pan and fill the larger pan half way up with hot water. Bake for 1 hour in the 325f oven.
ingredients: jiffy corn muffin mix, eggs, corn, creamed corn, sour cream, butter
name: jiffy corn pudding

steps: Place pork in crock pot. Pour can of beef broth over pork. Cook for about 10 hours or until meat shreds easily. Remove pork and shred with two forks. Stir the meat with barbecue sauce in a hot skillet on the stove and serve on hamburger buns.
ingredients: pork roast, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, fresh lemon juice, onion, hamburger buns
name: crock pot bbq pulled pork sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Saute zucchini, yellow squash and onion with the butter and garlic. Add oregano and tomato sauce. Simmer for 5 - 7 minutes. Place in a casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: italian sausage, pepperoni slice, onion, sliced mushrooms, olives, mozzarella cheese, italian-style tomato sauce, refrigerated biscuits
name: upside down pizza casserole

steps: In a large skillet, cook the rice in oil over medium heat, stirring, until golden brown. Add salt, water, bouillon cubes, soy sauce, ground beef, onions, celery ribs, green pepperspreparation:In a large skillet, cook the rice in oil over medium heat, stirring, until golden brown. Add salt, water, bouillon cubes, soy sauce,
ingredients: ground beef, dried mushroom, garlic powder, pepper, frozen carrots, tomato sauce, water, rice
name: poor man s rice beef

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnutspreparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnutspreparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees
ingredients: flour, cinnamon, allspice, baking soda, butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, walnuts, seedless raisins
name: michigan rock cookies

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Place slices of ice cream in a large baking dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: unsalted butter, vanilla ice cream, eggs, cinnamon, challah, maple syrup, vanilla, bananas
name: overnight ice cream french toast with cinnamon banana syrup

steps: Heat skillet over medium high heat. Add chives and cook about 10 seconds. Add cognac and stir. Add parsley, mustard, and worcestershire sauce. Add beef broth and stir. Swirl in 1 tablespoon butter and serve.
ingredients: butter, flour, dijon mustard, milk, salt and pepper, chives
name: mustard and chive sauce

steps: Cook tortellini in a large pot of boiling water according to package directions. Add the shrimp, cherry tomatoes, broccoli floret, red onion, colby-monterey jack cheese, salt and black pepper, italian salad dressing and mix well. Pour dressing over shrimp, cherry tomatoes, broccoli floret, red onion, colby-monterey jack cheese, salt and black pepper, italian salad dressing and mix well
ingredients: cheese tortellini, shrimp, cherry tomatoes, broccoli floret, red onion, colby-monterey jack cheese, salt and black pepper, italian salad dressing
name: tortellini shrimp and cheese salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: chicken breasts, monterey jack cheese, diced green chilis, green onion, bacon, avocado, sour cream
name: chicken breast with chili cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles in accordance with package and drain. In a medium mixing bowl, combine melted soup and milk and stir until well blended. In 13 x 9 baking dish, combine ham, cooked noodles, liquid soup mixture and half of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes. Sprinkle remaining cheese over top of casserole. Dot with butter. Bake for additional 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: noodles, cooked ham, sharp cheddar cheese, green pepper, prepared horseradish, condensed cream of chicken soup, breadcrumbs, butter
name: judy o grady s ham

steps: Line a sieve with cheesecloth or paper towels and suspend it over a bowl. Pour the yogurt into the sieve and allow it to drain, refrigerated, for 3 hours or overnight. Place the thickened yogurt into a medium bowl and stir in the currants or raisins, vanilla, honey, orange, zest of, orange juice, orange juice, orangepreparation:Line a sieve with cheesecloth or paper towels and suspend it over a bowl. Place the thickened yogurt into a medium bowl and stir in the currants or raisins, vanilla, honey, orange, zest of, orange juice, orange juice, orange juicepreparation:Line a sieve with cheesecloth or paper towels and suspend it over a bowl. Place the thickened yogurt into a medium bowl and stir in the currants or raisins, vanilla, honey, orange, zest of, orange juice, orange juice,
ingredients: vanilla yogurt, fresh fruit, granola cereal, mint
name: yogurt fruit and granola parfait

steps: Mix mayonnaise, sugar, and vinegar in a bowl. Set aside. In a large bowl, mix broccoli, spinach, onion, bacon bits, and raisins. Pour the dressing over the mixture and mix thoroughly but gently. Allow at least 1 hour of refrigeration before serving.
ingredients: low-fat mayonnaise, sugar, cider vinegar, broccoli florets, carrot, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, bacon, red onions, water chestnut
name: broccoli brain power salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired.
ingredients: pumpkin, sugar-free vanilla pudding mix, water, pumpkin pie spice, graham cracker crust, egg whites
name: two point pumpkin pie

steps: Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through.
ingredients: chicken thighs, tomatoes, spring onions, ginger, fish sauce, salt, sugar, sesame oil
name: vietnamese steamed chicken with tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Prepare muffin tin. Sift flours and spice. Stir in sugar. Make well in centre. Place buttermilk, yoghurt, eggs and oil in large jug. Mix well. Pour into flour mixture, stir with wooden spoon until just combined. Spoon into muffin pan and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: oats, low-fat sour cream, low-fat berry yogurt, brown sugar, egg, flour, salt, baking soda, baking powder, frozen mixed berries
name: healthy berry muffins

steps: Place greens in a bowl. Add salt & pepper. Toss thoroughly. Taste, and add more oil if desired. Scatter olives & feta cheese over the top and serve.
ingredients: feta cheese, onion, black olives, fresh rosemary, olive oil
name: feta preserve

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil, salt, and pepper. Season with salt and pepper. Add tomatoes, green beans, potatoes, carrots, pickle, peas, tomatoes, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese. Toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours, and up to 8 hours. Just before serving, stir in basil.
ingredients: avocado, buffalo mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, basil leaves, fresh ground black pepper
name: italian tricolore salad

steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add broiler-fryer chickens, vegetable oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, water, garlic, ground ginger, slivered almonds. Mix well and pour sauce over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours, until juices run clear when chicken is pierced with a fork. Serve garnished with chopped peanuts and additional fresh cilantro.
ingredients: broiler-fryer chickens, vegetable oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, water, garlic, ground ginger, slivered almonds
name: crock pot oriental chicken

steps: Put cream cheese, vanilla, and sugar in a large bowl. Mix the ingredients in the bowl. Add eggs one at a time, beating thoroughly after each addition. Line a 9x13 pan with the crescent rolls. Pinch dough together to seal seams. Pour in filling and sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon sugar
name: easy cream cheese danish

steps: Cook carrots in boiling salted water for 2 minutes. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cream the butter with the brown sugar and ginger. Cook over medium heat until mixture melts and begins to bubble slightly. Add drained carrots and stir well. Saute 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add soy sauce and orange juice and cook 1-2 minutes over high heat until liquid is almost completely reduced and carrots are glazed.
ingredients: toasted sesame oil, carrots, light soy sauce, hoisin sauce, orange juice, gingerroot, honey, sesame seeds, pepper, salt
name: asian carrots

steps: Peel and cut in bite size pieces all the vegetable. Peel and squash the garlic but do not cut it. Mix the vegetables, garlic and all remaining. Peel and cut in bite size pieces all the vegetable.
ingredients: water, sea salt, brown rice, sweet potato, onion, flour, olive oil
name: sweet potato patties

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Place pizza crust on baking sheet. Melt butter in 8-inch skillet until sizzling. Add chicken and garlic powder. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until chicken is no longer pink. Stir in salsa. Spread evenly onto crust. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until cheese is lightly browned and bubbly.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, pizza sauce, fat-free cheddar cheese, vegetarian chicken pieces, roma tomato, dried basil, dried oregano, olive oil
name: vegetarian chicken pizza

steps: Place strawberry pink lemonade in a large pitcher, cover and freeze for at least two hours. Slice the 8 limes very thin, reserve a few for glasses and the top of the pitcher. Place this strawberry pink lemonade in a large pitcher, cover and freeze for at least two hours. Slice the 8 limes very
ingredients: powdered drink mix, cold water, frozen strawberries, ice cube
name: strawberry pink lemonade

steps: Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until they look fairly cooked and shiny. Add almonds and saut for a couple more minutes. Finally, add frozen green beans and splash of soy sauce. Stir frequently until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture.
ingredients: green beans, coarse salt, extra virgin olive oil, butter, onion, garlic clove, portabella mushroom caps, fresh ground black pepper, dry sherry, worcestershire sauce
name: sherried green beans with portobello mushrooms

steps: Cook artichokes and olives according to diretions. Combine next 4 ingredients in large serving bowl. Add pasta and toss well. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Toss in parmesan cheese. Add asparagus and shrimp.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic, artichoke hearts, kalamata olive, vegetable broth, plum tomatoes, basil leaves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, linguine, parmigiano-reggiano cheese
name: linguine with artichokes and olives

steps: Heat a large non stick skillet or the grill to medium heat. Butter each slice of bread on one side, turn 4 slices butter facing down. Put 1 slice of cheese each on 4 slices of bread. Spread 1-2 tbsp marinara sauce over the cheese. Sprinkle evenly with parmesan. Layer each with even amounts of turkey. Top each with another slice of cheese. Top with remaining bread, butter side facing up. Grill sandwiches until bread is golden brown, about 3 minutes per side. Slice diagonally and serve.
ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, butter, water, bread, cooked turkey breast, turkey gravy
name: hot roasted turkey mountain hot turkey sandwich

steps: In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups water, butter, salt, and cumin to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in rice, and reduce heat to a simmer. Cook, covered, until liquid is absorbed, about 25 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat. Add lemon juice and cilantro. Fluff with a fork until combined. Serve immediately.
ingredients: unsalted butter, long grain white rice, lemons, zest of, chicken broth, salt, fresh lemon juice, heavy cream, fresh ground pepper
name: creamy lemon rice

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Parboil banana peppers for 5 minutes. Saut onions and green peppers in skillet until heated thoroughly. Add cooked rice, drained black beans, and tomato sauce and cook for an additional 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in cup of cheese. Spoon mixture into pepper halves and then place in 9 x 13 glass baking dish. Pour hot water in the bottom of the dish and cover with aluminum foil. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake uncovered for an additional 10 minutes.
ingredients: banana peppers, soft fresh goat cheese, green onion, black pepper, pork sausage, mozzarella cheese, dried basil leaves
name: stuffed banana peppers

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the herbs alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: dijon mustard, olive oil, rosemary, fresh oregano, parsley, table salt, black pepper, new potatoes
name: roasted potato wedges with herbs

steps: Place the peppers on a baking sheet with the cut side facing down. Place the baking sheet on the top shelf in the oven and broil until the outer layer of the skin has blackened, about 8-14 minutes. Place the peppers in a zip-lock bag or other sealable container, seal and let them cool until you can handle them, about 20 minutes. Remove the skins from the peppers. The skins should easily pinch off. Assemble sandwich by spreading the cream cheese on the inside of one piece of bread. Layer with roasted jalapeno peppers and shredded cheese. Top with the second bread slice and spread with the softened butter the outersides of the bread slices. Sprinkle over both sides with crushed chips. Preheat a skillet and grill until golden brown and the cheese has melted, about 2-3 minutes per side.
ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, green chilies, jalapeno peppers, parmesan cheese
name: jalapeno popper dip

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with cooking spray, brown meat, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, tomato sauce, italian seasoning, splenda sugar substitute, whole wheat noodles, fat-free cheddar cheese, fat free mozzarella cheesepreparation:In a large skillet sprayed with cooking spray, brown meat, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, tomato sauce, italian seasoning, splenda sugar substitute, whole wheat noodles, fat-free cheddar cheese, fat free mozzarella cheesepreparation:In a large skillet sprayed with cooking spray, brown meat, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, tomato sauce, italian seasoning, splenda sugar substitute, whole wheat noodles, fat-free cheddar cheese, fat free mozzarella cheesepreparation:In a large skillet sprayed with cooking spray, brown meat, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, tomato sauce, italian seasoning, splenda sugar substitute, whole wheat noodles, fat-free cheddar cheese, fat free mozzarella cheesepreparation:In a large skillet sprayed with cooking spray, brown meat, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, tomato sauce, italian seasoning, splenda sugar substitute, whole wheat noodles, fat-free cheddar cheese, fat free mozzarella cheesepreparation:In a large skillet sprayed with cooking spray, brown meat, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, tomato sauce, italian seasoning, splenda sugar substitute, whole wheat noodles, fat-free cheddar cheese, fat free mozzarella cheesepreparation:In a large skillet sprayed with cooking spray, brown meat, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, tomato sauce, italian seasoning, splenda sugar substitute, whole wheat noodles,
ingredients: lean ground beef, yellow onion, light brown sugar, pasta sauce with mushrooms, frozen cheese ravioli, mozzarella cheese
name: easy ravioli lasagna crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Sift flour with sugar, soda salt and cinnamon into a large bowl or food processor by pulsing 3-4 times. Mix in shortening and knead thoroughly. Shape into balls using 1 tablespoon of dough. Place on ungreased baking sheets and make a depression in the top with the thumb. Press a blanched whole or sliced almond into the center of each cookie. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes. Makes six dozen.
ingredients: rice flour, ground almonds, sugar, egg white, clear honey, almond extract, blanched almonds
name: almond rice cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Cream sugar and eggs until light in color and add vanilla. Mix soda into sour cream. Mix sour cream into egg mixture. Sift flour and cream of tartar together and fold into wet mixture. Pour into greased loaf pan and bake at 325 for 1 hour.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, crisco cooking oil, sour cream, instant vanilla pudding, eggs, nuts, crushed pineapple, sugar, cinnamon
name: pineapple sour cream cake

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: warm water, sugar, coffee, milk, ice, ice cream, whipped topping, caramel ice cream topping
name: caramel frappe for 2

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, maple syrup, eggs, pure vanilla extract, pecan halves
name: maple pecan squares

steps: Cook fettuccine as directed on package. While fettuccine is cooking, cook pepperoni in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until light brown. Drain and reserve. Melt butter in same saucepan. Cook mushrooms in butter, stirring occasionally, until mushrooms are light brown. Stir in half-and-half and cheese. Heat just until hot. Stir in pepperoni and parsley. Drain fettuccine. Toss with pepperoni mixture.
ingredients: fettuccine pasta, butter, fresh parmesan cheese, pepper
name: parmesan fettuccine

steps: Heat a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Pour in oil and saute onion and garlic until translucent. Mix in cumin seed and saute an additional 2 minutes. Sprinkle in flour and saute 1 minute more. Stir in beets, tomatoes, water, and salt. Reduce heat to low, cover pan with lid, and allow to simmer 30 to 45 minutes, until beets are tender.
ingredients: beetroots, lemon, juice of, ground cumin, salt & freshly ground black pepper, sugar, extra virgin olive oil
name: beetroot and cumin dip

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Place pieces of string cheese along the inside edges of dough. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: eggs, monterey jack pepper cheese, pepperoni, salt, jalapeno, cooking spray, salsa
name: pepper jack pepperoni pizza omelet

steps: In 2-quart pyrex bowl melt chocolate chips on high or till melted. Stir. Add rest of ingredients and mix well. Spray or butter a 9x13 pan and pour fudge into pan. Refrigerate and cut into squares.
ingredients: white chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, key lime juice, lime zest, macadamia nuts
name: easy key lime fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Butter two baking sheets, or place silicon baking sheets on them. In a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. With an electric mixer on low speed, add the butter until blended. Whisk together the eggs, zest and vanilla, and add this to the flour mixture, and continue beating on low until you have a smooth dough. Pinch off a small piece of dough about the size of a small golf ball and roll it into a log about 2 inches long. Roll the log into the sesame seeds, pressing them so seeds stay on. Place the cookie on the prepared baking sheets keeping the cookies two inches apart. Bake for 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool, and store in airtight containers.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, oil, salt, post grape-nuts cereal, flour, baking powder
name: grape nuts biscotti

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender.
ingredients: butternut squash, brown sugar, maple syrup, butter, orange rind, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, pure vanilla extract
name: candied winter squash

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken in large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until spinach wilts. Toss before serving.
ingredients: bacon, chicken breasts, garlic salt, ground pepper, water, fresh green beans, yellow bell pepper, plum tomatoes, balsamic vinaigrette
name: easy chicken and garden veggies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, enchilada sauce, green chili peppers, velveeta cheese, corn tortilla
name: mexican casserole

steps: Place potatoes in saucepan, cover with water and salt to taste. Boil about 20 minutes until done. Drain. In another saucepan, combine peas, butter, onion, shredded lettuce, salt and pepper to taste, and sugar. Cover and simmer 5 to 10 minutes, until peas are tender. Meanwhile, peel and cut potatoes into quarter inch thick slices. Add potatoes to peas. Add the cream and milk, salt and pepper to taste. Cook about 5 minutes and serve.
ingredients: potatoes, frozen peas, onion, milk, heavy cream, salt and pepper, nutmeg, parsley
name: potatoes and peas in cream

steps: Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, onion, chicken stock cubes, hot water, bay leaf, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves, salt and pepper, cream,
ingredients: carrot, butter, onion, chicken stock cubes, hot water, bay leaf, salt and pepper, cream, bay leaves
name: creamy matchstick carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium casserole dish mix together green beans, milk, cream of mushroom soup, and onions. Sprinkle with black pepper and stir. Bake for 25 minutes in the oven until heated through and bubbly. Sprinkle with french fried onions over the tops and return to oven for 5 minutes.
ingredients: butter, flour, salt, sugar, diced onion, sour cream, green beans, fried onions, cheddar cheese
name: best ever green bean casserole no canned soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: weet-bix, flour, coconut, sugar, baking powder, butter, sweetened condensed milk, golden syrup, chocolate icing
name: weet bix de luxe

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions. Set aside. Place chicken in a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Combine the soup, sour cream and dry soup mix. Spread over chicken. Sprinkle with mushrooms and water chestnuts. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until bubbly.
ingredients: herb seasoned stuffing mix, boiling water, butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, paprika, cream of mushroom soup, milk, fresh parsley
name: one dish chicken stuffing bake

steps: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook cauliflower until tender, 3-5 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving dish. In a small skillet, melt butter over medium low heat. Add scallions and cook 2 minutes. Pour over cauliflower and toss. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: cauliflower, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, capers, caper juice, salt and pepper
name: roasted cauliflower with capers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Stir together salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin and cinnamon. Coat pork with the spice rub. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a 12 inch skillet, over relatively high heat, and brown pork, turning every 30 seconds for 4 minutes. Stir together brown sugar, garlic, and tabasco and pat onto top of the tenderloin. Place pork in roasting pan and cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: boneless pork loin, apple juice, cider vinegar, hot pepper sauce, chili powder, oregano, cumin, garlic
name: pork bocaditos

steps: In a small bowl combine tomato and salad dressing, set aside. Trim fat from meat. Rub lemon-pepper seasoning on both sides of chops. For a charcoal grill, grill chops on the rack of an uncovered grill directly over medium coals for 12 to 15 minutes or until juices run clear, turning once halfway through grilling. Transfer chops to serving plates. Top each chop with some feta cheese and some of the tomato mixture. If desired, sprinkle with snipped oregano.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, shake-n-bake for pork, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: italian pork chops mozzarella

steps: Preheat oven 375f oil a 13x9x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, combine olive oil and garlic. In another bowl, combine crackers and parmesan cheese. Dip oysters into oil mixture then coat with sherry and any remaining cracker mixture. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes to brown.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, plain breadcrumbs, egg white, pork tenderloin, olive oil, lemon wedges
name: pork medallions milanese

steps: In a large skillet, saute the meat with garlic and ginger root in oil for a couple minutes. Add the curry paste, coconut milk, lime rind and juice. Simmer until meat is desired tenderness, or until tofu is heated through. Stir in the cilantro just before serving. Serve with rice.
ingredients: coriander, ginger, garlic cloves, spring onions, green chilies, turmeric powder, fish sauce, olive oil
name: thai green paste

steps: Combine and chill first four ingredients. Blend sour cream, ground ginger, salt, and pepper. Add to chicken mixture. Toss lightly. Serve on bed of greens. Sprinkle with toasted almonds.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, baby spinach leaves, daikon radishes, fresh ginger, toasted sesame seeds, olive oil, rice wine vinegar, low sodium soy sauce, sesame oil
name: clean eating sesame spinach salad with chicken

steps: Place beef in slow cooker on low 8-10 hours. Cover with lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness.
ingredients: beef roast, salt and pepper, onion, beef gravy, water, ketchup, dry red wine, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder
name: spicy wine roast for slow cookers

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl, combine tuna, celery, onion, cheese, olives, mayonnaise, pepper, hamburger buns. Wrap sandwiches loosely in aluminum foil. Place tuna mixture evenly among 4 buns. Bake 15-20 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: hoagie rolls, chunk light tuna, hard-boiled eggs, sweet relish, cheddar cheese, miracle whip, butter
name: tuna treasure chests

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss potatoes, garlic, and olive oil together to coat. Place potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Place in 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender, allow to cool for 10 minutes. Combine mayonnaise, creole mustard, lemon juice, parsley, and scallions. Add to potatoes. Add salt or pepper to taste. Serve cold or room temperature.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, italian salad dressing, salt, pepper, mayonnaise, celery, eggs
name: margie s potato salad with italian dressing

steps: In the crock pot, soak the dried okra in the beer for 1 to 2 hours. Stir in brown sugar, cinnamon, and honey. Brown meat in oil over medium high heat. Place the meat on top of the fruit in the crock pot. Cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours, or on high for 5 to 6 hours.
ingredients: okra pods, red bell pepper, ginger, turmeric powder, cumin seed, dried red chili, oil, salt
name: roasted okra

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, sugar, ground thyme, eggs, orange juice, butter
name: orange thyme pancakes

steps: Combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream, orange juice, mandarin orangespreparation:In a large bowl, combine gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie, ice cream,
ingredients: gelatin, water, crema, condensed milk, evaporated milk, fruit cocktail, cookie
name: gelantine a la ponche crema

steps: In a medium saucepan combine butter, sugar, buttermilk, eggs, buttermilk, milk, natural yoghurt, water, buttermilk, eggs, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk,
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, golden syrup, milk, natural yoghurt
name: butterscotch

steps: In a small bowl, mix dressing and taco mix. On a large serving platter or individual serving pates, layer remaining ingredients except tomatoes. Drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with cherry tomatoes that have been sliced in half. You can also top with olives and add a bit of canned corn if you like. I only use a portion of the can of black beans. Use as much as you like.
ingredients: sour cream, lettuce, tomatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, green onion, taco seasoning
name: vegetarian taco salad

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well. Pour vinegar mixture over lettuce leaves, nasturtium petals, extra virgin olive oil, walnut oil, french mustard, white wine vinegar, salt and pepper. Cover. Chill 1 hour.
ingredients: lettuce leaves, nasturtium petals, extra virgin olive oil, walnut oil, french mustard, white wine vinegar, salt and pepper
name: summer flower salad

steps: In a large skillet brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread.
ingredients: vegetable oil, green bell pepper, onion, barbecue sauce, ketchup, mustard, garlic powder, hot dog, hot dog buns
name: sloppy dogs

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Bake cut up sausages for about 20 minute while sausage is cooking put onion and oil in large skillet saute chicken breasts, cajun spices, garlic powder, andouille sausage, red pepper, onion, diced tomatoes, tomato pastepreparation:Preheat oven to 400. Bake cut up sausages for about 20 minute while sausage is cooking put onion and oil in
ingredients: cooking spray, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cajun spices, garlic powder, andouille sausage, red pepper, onion, diced tomatoes, tomato paste
name: chicken and andouille sausage with peppers ww 5 points

steps: Roll the dough out as thin as it will go without it breaking. Put pizza sauce on half of the rolled out dough. Sprinkle cheese on that half only. Put whatever toppings you like on top of that. Fold over the other half of the biscuit. Cook at 375 for about 10-15 minutes.
ingredients: sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits
name: breakfast cups

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a small measuring cup. Place venison steaks in a large zip lock bag. Pour marinade over steaks and seal bag. Place bag in a flat casserole dish so that the steaks are in a single layer. Refrigerate and marinate at least 4 hours, turning every half hour to marinate each side. Drain marinade and grill steaks to desired doneness. I double or triple this recipe for each addition package of steak. Any wild game steak can be used in this recipe.
ingredients: venison steak, dry red wine, cane syrup, fresh ground black pepper, creole seasoning, vegetable oil
name: blackened venison steak with wine and cane syrup sauce

steps: Heat oven to 425. Scrub the potatoes, rinse, and pat dry. Cut each potato length ways into 8 wedges. Put the wedges in a roasting tin, drizzle over the oil and toss well to coat the potatoes. Sprinkle with the paprika and salt. Roast potatoes for 35-40 minutes, spooning the oil over them 2-3 times. Remove from oven and sprinkle with a pinch of salt. Roast potatoes for 35-40 minutes, spooning the oil over them 2
ingredients: baking potatoes, butter, corn flake crumbs, paprika, salt
name: browned paprika potatoes

steps: Heat the oil in a skillet on medium-high heat. Add the hamburger, bean sprouts, head of cabbage, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, soy sauce, lumpia skins. Cook for about 5 minutes or until the hamburger is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2 minutes more. Add the cabbage and cook until the cabbage is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2 minutes more.
ingredients: hamburger, bean sprouts, head of cabbage, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, soy sauce, lumpia skins
name: authentic lumpia

steps: Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisking constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: bacon, mushrooms, whole kernel corn, green bell pepper, pimiento, salt and pepper, eggs, water, butter
name: kentucky scramble

steps: Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers.
ingredients: feta cheese, olive, steak sauce, lemon juice, mayonnaise, hamburger patties, pita bread, tomatoes, lettuce
name: greek style burgers

steps: Completely dissolve gelatin in boiling water by gently stirring for 3-4 minutes. Let cool to room temperature. Stir in raspberry gelatin and crushed pineapple. Pour into a bundt pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Refrigerate for 4 hours or longer to congeal. To loosen ring from mold, place mold in larger bowl of hot water for a few seconds, then remove by placing the serving platter on top, and flip over.
ingredients: raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, frozen sweetened raspberries, crushed pineapple, salt, cream cheese, sour cream
name: raspberry gelatin ring

steps: Boil the pastry dough in a large bowl. Add the flour, sugar, salt, lemons, zest of, unsalted butter, egg, vanilla, salt & pepper.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, lemons, zest of, unsalted butter, egg, vanilla
name: pasta frolla italian sweet pastry dough

steps: Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers.
ingredients: hamburger bun, green pepper, onion, margarine, salt and pepper, bologna, mustard, cheese
name: bologna burger

steps: In a large saucepan bring water to a boil. Add chicken broth and water to a boil. Add onion, carrot and garlic. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered 10 minutes. In a skillet cook and stir chicken in hot oil for 3 minutes or until larger pieces of pasta are tender but slightly firm. Add chicken, pastas, and sage to soup. Simmer, uncovered for 8 to 10 minutes or until larger pieces of pasta are tender but slightly firm. Add chicken
ingredients: water, onion, carrot, cabbage leaves, chicken noodle soup mix, tomatoes, small macaroni noodles
name: quick minestrone soup

steps: In a nonreactive bowl, combine mustard, garlic, vinegar, salt and pepper with 2 teaspoons water. Slowly whisk in olive oil, forming a creamy marinade. Stir in basil. Add the chops to the marinade and coat evenly. Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour and up to four hours. Remove from refrigerator and let sit until arriving at room temperature. Heat grill to very hot. Remove excess marinade from chops and grill uncovered about 3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warm platter and serve. Preparation time does not include marinade and sitting time.
ingredients: racks of lamb, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh rosemary leaf, pomegranate juice, garlic, shallot, virgin olive oil
name: grilled lamb chops in pomegranate marinated

steps: Fill the glasses with sangria, spooning some of the fruit into each glass. Garnish each drink with a slice of lime and a sprig of mint. Garnish each drink with a slice of lime and a sprig
ingredients: oranges, lime, frozen orange juice, berry juice, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, ice
name: pampered chef sangria non alcoholic

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, apple, onion, oats, mustard, rosemary, poultry seasoning and salt in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce.
ingredients: smoked turkey, roll, barbecue sauce, canned jalapeno slices, sweet relish, dijonnaise mustard, tomatoes
name: brown bag ideas paris meets texas

steps: Combine milk, water, artificial sweetener, ground ginger, cocoa, sea salt, pure vanilla extract, candies and mix well. Pour into serving cups and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and nutmeg and serve with a cinnamon stick.
ingredients: milk, water, artificial sweetener, ground ginger, cocoa, sea salt, pure vanilla extract, candies
name: ginger hot chocolate

steps: Stir boiling water into gelatin in large bowl at least 2 minutes, or until completely dissolved. Stir in cold orange juice. Stir in ice cream until nice and smooth. Pour into a 5 cup mold or any glass dish or decorative bowl. Refrigerate 4 hours or until firm. Unmold.
ingredients: orange jell-o, boiling water, creme de cacao, cold water
name: tootsie roll jello shots

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Add 1 tb olive oil in a large bowl. Add lamb. Turn to coat. Let marinate at room temperature at least 30 minutes and up to 1 hour. Preheat oven to 400f. Heat remaining 1 tb olive oil in heavy large ovenproof skillet over high heat. Cook until browned, about 3 minutes per side. Transfer skillet to oven and roast lamb chops to desired doneness, about 10 minutes for medium-rare. Transfer lamb to platter, cover, and let rest 5 minutes.
ingredients: leg of lamb, feta cubes, onions, kefalotiri, carrots, celery & leaves, potatoes, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper
name: lamb baked in packages

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Butter a shallow baking dish and arrange fish pieces in it. Cover fish with onion slices. In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream, wine, flour, lemon juice and the seasonings. Pour over the fish and onions. Bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes or until fish is tender. Do not overcook or fish will dry out.
ingredients: potatoes, cooking oil, onion, ham, eggs, swiss cheese, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce, parsley
name: hoppel poppel

steps: In a small pan, heat milk until simmering. Add oatmeal and wheat germ, stir, then add oatmeal and wheat germ. Simmer for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until milk is absorbed. Let stand 2 minutes. Sweeten with honey.
ingredients: honey, plain soymilk, old-fashioned oatmeal, sesame seeds, nuts, dried figs, coconut flakes
name: energy balls

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 4 ingredients. In a 2-quart saucepan, heat the honey, oil and vanilla until syrupy. Add to the dry ingredients and mix well. Spread on a jellyroll pan. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes. Store in a covered container.
ingredients: rolled oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, salt, slivered almonds, honey, light olive oil, craisins
name: baked honey granola

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake for 15 minutes or until cheese is melted. Remove from oven and allow to cool. Remove
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, chili without beans, corn chips, parmesan cheese
name: chili con crescent snacks

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly.
ingredients: canned diced green chiles, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, evaporated milk, eggs, flour, salt, pepper, tomatoes
name: our family favorite john wayne casserole

steps: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or crudits.
ingredients: butter, onions, red wine vinegar, red wine, sugar, grenadine, salt and pepper
name: le chardonnay s onion marmalade

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Blend together all the ingredients except the chicken. Brush the breasts all over with the marmalade mixture. Place in a baking dish lined with foil. Bake for 20-25 minutes until done, basting every 8 minutes. If there is any sauce left, heat, and serve along side the chicken. Serve.
ingredients: orange juice concentrate, soy sauce, ground ginger, fresh garlic cloves, sesame oil, chili flakes, chicken pieces, sesame seeds, orange zest
name: lori s low calorie orange chicken

steps: Place all ingredients in a bowl. It may be easier to warm the honey, as it is easier to blend with the other ingredients. Make sure the cucumber is drained well, otherwise your raita will be too watery. Mix well, and add to serving bowl. Sprinkle cumin over the top. Serve on top or on the side of your favorite indian dish, or serve as a dipping sauce with naan bread.
ingredients: plain yogurt, cucumber, fresh dill, salt, ground cumin
name: raita yogurt dill sauce

steps: Heat oven to 350. Grease 15x10 inch cookie sheet with edges. In a skillet cook ground beef till pea size and brown and drain. In a large bowl mix remaining ingredients and spread in the prepared pan, including hamburger. Bake 20 minutes to 25 minutes or until golden brown, and toothpick comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes cut into any size square desired and dip into your favorite sauce.
ingredients: eggs, mozzarella cheese, dried parsley, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, black pepper, frozen puff pastry, water, sesame seeds
name: cheese bourekas

steps: Pour siegfried place green beans into small cooking pot. Add water, vinegar, boulion cube and oil. Bring to a boil. Turn down to medium. Simmer for approximatly 45 minutes, or until most all the liquid has evaporated.
ingredients: bacon, white vinegar, water, sugar, onions, flour, green beans
name: siegfried place green beans

steps: Combine the sour cream, mayonnaise and salad dressing and mix well. Squeeze the spinach to remove water. Add to the mixture and mix well. Add optional ingredient. Hollow out the bread and fill with the sour cream mixture. Arrange assorted cut up veggies and bread cubes around loaves.
ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, knorr vegetable soup mix, frozen spinach, water chestnut, sourdough bread rounds, green onion
name: spinach dip supreme

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the cream of cantaloupe, orange juice, lemon juice, cinnamon, heavy cream, honey, lemon yogurt, strawberry, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt, lemon yogurt
ingredients: cantaloupe, orange juice, lemon juice, cinnamon, heavy cream, honey, lemon yogurt, strawberry
name: cream of cantaloupe soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine stuffing, butter, parmesan cheese, parsley, basil and rosemary. Butterfly chicken breasts and lie flat on cutting board. Take slice of ham, spoonful of stuffing mixture and slice of cheese. Wrap breast around and place seam-side down in 9 inch glass baking dish. Repeat with other breast and cover dish with foil to prevent burning. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until chicken is no longer pink. You can make a sauce with this or serve it alone.
ingredients: butter, blue cheese, dried thyme, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lemon juice, paprika, salt and pepper
name: blue cheese stuffed chicken breasts

steps: In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through.
ingredients: milk, butter, pasta roni chicken and brococoli with linguine, water, frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, cooked chicken, dried basil
name: country chicken dinner

steps: In a large saucepan, bring mixture to a boil, then simmer, uncovered, for about 30 to 45 minutes. Stir frequently until the fat renders. Transfer the bacon to a paper towel to drain, reserving 2 tablespoons fat in the pot. Add the potatoes and onion and cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, for 3 minutes. Stir in the creamed corn, milk and 1 cup water and bring to a simmer. Add the salmon, lower the heat and simmer until the potatoes are tender and the salmon is cooked through, about 15 minutes. Using a fork, break up the salmon into small chunks. Stir-fry until the onion becomes translucent. Add the celery, onion, mushrooms and water chestnuts. Add the brown sugar, salt and soy sauce, cook for an additional 10 minutes until ready. Serve with plain white rice.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, condensed tomato soup, cut green beans, potatoes, cheddar cheese
name: sexy chow

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness.
ingredients: flat iron steaks, fresh thyme, sweet paprika, garlic cloves, ground red pepper
name: garlic thyme flat iron steak

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Bake for 30 minutes until golden and set. Dust with icing sugar to serve. Hope it tastes good.
ingredients: eggs, caster sugar, plum pudding, rum, double cream
name: leftover christmas pudding ice cream

steps: In a microwave-safe bowl, combine the popcorn, turkey pepperoni, olive oil flavored cooking spray, nonfat parmesan cheese, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried
ingredients: popped popcorn, turkey pepperoni, olive oil flavored cooking spray, nonfat parmesan cheese, garlic powder, dried oregano, dried marjoram, dried basil leaves, dried sage, black pepper
name: cheesy pepperoni popcorn

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: peaches, cilantro, onion, green pepper, balsamic vinegar
name: peach and cilantro salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, unsweetened cocoa powder, sugar, brown sugar, plain yogurt, vanilla extract, dried tart cherries
name: cocoa fudge cookies

steps: In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions.
ingredients: eggs, cream, parmesan cheese, green onions, sun-dried tomatoes, baby spinach leaves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, feta cheese
name: semi dried tomato and feta frittatas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium casserole dish mix together green beans, milk, cream of mushroom soup, and onions. Sprinkle with black pepper and stir. Bake for 25 minutes in the oven until heated through and bubbly. Sprinkle with french fried onions over the tops and return to oven for 5 minutes.
ingredients: frozen green beans, cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese soup, milk, pepper, french-fried onions
name: better than traditional green bean bake

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Place chicken in a casserole dish. Combine all ingredients and pour over chicken. Bake covered for 2 hours. Stir several times while baking. Add pineapple just before serving. Serve over cooked rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, zucchini, green pepper, onions, fresh mushrooms, garlic, teriyaki marinade, salt and pepper, garlic powder, skewers
name: garlic grilled teriyaki chicken with vegetables

steps: In one bowl, mash the bananas until smooth and add the sugar and vanilla, blending until incorporated. In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients until well blended and add to the bananas. Mix these thoroughly. Pour this into a 9x13 glass baking dish or a regular loaf pan. Bake at 350 for an hour.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, splenda granular, baking powder, baking soda, ground cinnamon, egg whites, banana, applesauce
name: low fat banana bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place eggplant cubes on baking sheet and spray with oil. Bake at 350 for 15 minutes, until golden brown. Turn round once while baking.
ingredients: eggplant, sea salt, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, pine nuts, fresh basil, tomato sauce, eggs, ricotta cheese
name: eggplant aubergine rolatini

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray non-stick spray in cassarole pan. Cook pasta and drain. Add onion & bell pepper. Cook and stir for a few minutes. Add pasta, chicken, tomatoes, olives, italian seasoniong. Mix to blend. Put mozzarella on top. Cook in oven for about 35 minutes.
ingredients: rotini pasta, olive oil, chicken breast, frozen mixed vegetables, light cream cheese, light italian dressing, skim milk, garlic powder
name: chicken and rotini primavera

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: paprika, hot chili powder, fresh lemon juice, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, salt, chicken breast halves
name: peri peri african chicken

steps: Heat water in a large nonstick saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the potato, water, leeks, butter, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, nutmeg, parsley, chives and cook until softened, not browned, about 5 minutes. Add the parmesan and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, not browned, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. In batches or with a blender stick, puree to desired texture. You may want to spoon out and reserve some cauliflower pieces for added texture. Stir in half & half and nutmeg and blend. Top with grated cheddar cheese.
ingredients: cauliflower, potato, water, leeks, butter, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, nutmeg, parsley, chives
name: cauliflower and parmesan soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 20 minutes. Cut into squares.
ingredients: special k cereal, sugar, karo syrup, peanut butter
name: aunt agnes chewies

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick frypan over medium heat until hot. Add sweet potato mixture and water. Cook 13-18 minutes or until sweet potatoes are tender, turning mixture over occasionally. Add seeds or nuts and serve.
ingredients: sweet potato, beet, olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, bacon, onion
name: sweet potato beet hash melissa d arabian

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Add chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock, chicken stock
ingredients: red lentil, chicken stock, garlic cloves, lemon, juice and zest of, cilantro, salt and pepper
name: easy lemon lentil soup

steps: In a double boiler, make cream sauce by melting the butter. Add the flour and stir. Add the cream and stir constantly until sauce is thick. Add salt, pepper and sherry to the double boiler. Take the double boiler off the heat and fold in the crab gently. Pour into buttered 1 quart casserole. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake, uncovered, for about 30 minutes, or until cheese melts, at 400 degrees f.
ingredients: margarine, cheese spread, mayonnaise, garlic powder, seasoning salt, crabmeat, english muffins
name: crabbies

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, hot red pepper flakes, dry white wine, salt, black pepper, unsalted butter, capellini, fresh flat-leaf parsley
name: shrimp scampi pasta

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, and vanilla bean and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with maraschino cherries, fresh mint, and lemon slices, if desired.
ingredients: lemon, lemon drop candies, sugar, vanilla ice cream, lemonade
name: lemon drop shakes

steps: Lay out the flour, beaten egg and panko bread crumbs on three separate plates, or shallow pans. Mix the onion, black pepper and parsley into the panko. Blend well. Dip the seasoned fish in the flour, then egg and then press the fish into the seasoned panko bread crumbs, coating the fish evenly on all sides. Grease or line a baking pan with parchment paper. Place the fish carefully in the baking pan. Spray the top with pam or oil. Bake at 350 for 15 to 20 minutes.
ingredients: salt-free seasoned dried breadcrumbs, butter, lemon, juice of, dried chives, scrod fillets, pam cooking spray
name: alyssa s favorite fish

steps: In a small bowl, combine apples, raisins, celery, cheddar cheese, and nuts. In a large bowl, combine apples, raisins, celery, cheddar cheese, and nuts. In a small bowl, combine apples, raisins, celery, cheddar cheese, and nuts. In a small bowl, combine apples, raisins, celery
ingredients: half-and-half, lemon juice, honey, cinnamon, tart apples
name: scandinavian apple salad

steps: Cover with foil and bake for 10 minutes. Remove foil and bake for 10 minutes. Remove
ingredients: mushrooms, butter, minced clams, green onions, parsley, salt, pepper, garlic clove, mayonnaise, prepared mustard
name: clam stuffed mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees arrange zucchini on nonstick cookie sheet. Spray zucchini with cooking spray. Combine spices and sprinkle over the zucchini fries. Place in very hot oven and cook 15 to 18 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: dried porcini mushrooms, potatoes, olive oil, dried oregano, pepper, salt, garlic
name: italian style oven fries

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place sliced apples in an 8 x 8 inch baking dish. Sprinkle water over apples. Mix rest of ingredients in a bowl until you get a crumble. Spread crumble mixture over apples. Bake uncovered about 40 minutes.
ingredients: frozen apples, apple juice, fat-free caramel topping, lemon juice, unbleached all-purpose flour, margarine, brown sugar substitute, cinnamon, cool whip free
name: low fat sort of low sugar caramel apple crisp

steps: Heat butter or margarine. Saute in at medium heat until browned about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with brown sugar, if desired. Serve immediately as a side dish or dessert.
ingredients: plantains, nutmeg, cinnamon, ground cloves, butter, canola oil
name: sauted plantains with sweet spices

steps: Heat oven to 350f put the beans on a baking tray and drizzle with some of the oil. Season and roast for 20 minutes and then remove. Drain and rinse the beans. Fry the chorizo in a non-stick pan until crisp, then drain on kitchen paper. Wipe the pan clean and add the olive oil, onion and seasoning. Cook for 5 minutes, then add the vinegar and reduce by half. Add the chorizo, tomatoes and salad leaves and mix again. Pour the warm dressing over the beans and mix again. Divide between 2 plates.
ingredients: cannellini beans, grape tomatoes, frozen spinach, olive oil, garlic cloves, yellow onion
name: cannellini bean saut

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla on medium speed until well blended. Add eggs. Mix just until blended and pour into oreo pie crust. Bake for 35-40 minutes until center is about set. Cool for 45-60 minutes. While cooling, microwave caramels and milk for 3 minutes on high or until melted. Pour caramel over cooled cheesecake. Sprinkle chocolate chips and pecans on cake. Refrigerate for at least two hours.
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, eggs, caramels, milk, pecans, graham cracker crust
name: easy caramel pecan cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: broccoli florets, onion, ricotta cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, salt, ground black pepper
name: broccoli cheddar pie

steps: Mix all ingredients in a medium glass bowl. Mix well. Shape like a ball and roll in nuts. Refrigerate overnight for best flavour. Serve with your favourite crackers.
