ingredients: cream cheese, worcestershire sauce, accent seasoning, green onions, buddig beef, walnuts, ritz crackers
name: aunt sue s smoky cream cheese cheese ball

steps: Place tuna steaks in a large bowl, cover with foil-lined baking sheet. Coat fish with cooking spray and season with salt and pepper. Preheat broiler. Cook tuna 10 to 12 minutes or until fish is opaque. While fish is cooking, combine avocado, sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, hot-pepper sauce, worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper in a food processor. Process, scraping down bowl occasionally, until mixture is creamy and smooth. Serve a dollop of sauce next to each tuna steaks.
ingredients: avocados, tuna fish, lemon juice, salt and pepper, mayonnaise
name: tuna stuffed avocado

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add leek. Saut 3 minutes. Add garlic. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add tomato, salt, and pepper. Add wine and salmon. Sprinkle with dill, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
ingredients: salmon fillets, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh dill, salt, ground black pepper, lemon zest, lemon wedge
name: cedar planked salmon with garlic lemon and dill

steps: Put the drained steamed or blanched green beans in a large bowl. In a smaller bowl, add the lemon juice, oil, honey, and mustard. Whisk until smooth. Pour the mixture over the beans and toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot, cold, or at room temperature.
ingredients: dijon mustard, salt, pepper, red wine vinegar, peanut oil, shallot
name: craig claiborne s vinaigrette

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake until toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 35 to 40 minutes. Let cake cool completley on a cooling rack.
ingredients: flour, granulated sugar, baking soda, salt, cocoa powder, oil, water, vanilla extract, vinegar
name: mom s chocolate cupcakes

steps: Heat the butter in a large oven proof lidded casserole dish, add the onions and saut until soft and transparent. Add the sauerkraut, mix well and cook, uncovered, over a low heat for 5 minutes. Add the apples to the sauerkraut mixture together with the wine and enough stock to cover. Mix well then continue to cook over a low heat for 30 minutes. Add the sauerkraut, mix well and cook, uncovered, over a low heat for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 170c, 325f, gas mark 3 during this cooking time. Stir in the sugar and celery seeds then cover and transfer to the oven. Bake for 30 minutes and serve hot.
ingredients: spareribs, sauerkraut, salt and pepper, flour, baking powder, egg, milk
name: baked spareribs and sauerkraut

steps: Place feta cheese in a bowl. In a jar with a tight fitting lid, add all the other ingredients and cap jar. Shake until well blended. Pour over feta and stir gently as not to break up cubes. Divide mixture between 2 half pint jars with lids. Store in the fridge for up to a week. To serve, let cheese come to room temp for about 30 minutes. Serve with assorted crackers, chips or crisp breads. Makes 2 half pint jars. To serve as a spread, mash cheese with some of the marinade to desired thickness.
ingredients: feta cheese, black greek olive, roasted red peppers, olive oil, red onion, garlic, balsamic vinegar, fresh thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon juice
name: marinated feta with greek olives appetizer

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the squash cut side up in a baking dish with inch of water in the bottom of the pan. Cover the dish and bake for 45 minutes. Meanwhile, combine the cinnamon, bourbon, brown sugar, butter, orange juice. When squash has been cooked, remove from oven. Let cool down for 10 minutes. Carefully scoop out the pulp from the halves and combine with the pineapple and cinnamon mixture. Replace the squash into the shells and return to the oven and bake for 7 minutes more until pineapple is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: acorn squash, bourbon, brown sugar, butter, orange juice
name: roasted acorn squash with bourbon

steps: Toast the english muffin. In a microwaveable cup roughly the same diameter of the muffin, add the egg, a tablespoon of water. Beat the egg, add the bacon. Microwave on high for 1 to 2 minutes while muffin is toasting. Assemble the muffin and let stand for a few minutes to melt the cheese.
ingredients: whole wheat english muffin, egg, tomatoes, bacon, cheese
name: quick bacon egg wich

steps: In medium saucepan, cook ground beef over medium-high heat, 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cooked well, drain. Reduce heat to medium. Stir in remaining ingredients, except shredded cheese and tortilla chips. Cook 8-12 minutes or until thoroughly heated, stirring frequently. Top individual servings with shredded cheese and tortilla chips.
ingredients: ground beef, salt and pepper, brown sugar, onion, tomato soup, egg noodles, cream of chicken soup, processed cheese
name: yum a setta

steps: Heat oven to 400f degrees. Place chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes.
ingredients: chicken breasts, italian herb seasoning, garlic powder, kosher salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, bay leaf, butter, onion, baby red potatoes
name: baked italian herb chicken

steps: Heat oven to 450f. Stir baking mix, milk and cheese until soft dough forms. Drop by 9 spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Stir together margarine and garlic salt. Brush over warm biscuits.
ingredients: bisquick baking mix, bulk pork sausage, mild cheddar cheese, milk, dried rosemary leaves, parsley flakes
name: joe s sausage cheese balls

steps: Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Toss occasionally. In a serving bowl, combine vinegar and dijon. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper, and toss.
ingredients: carrot, cider vinegar, salt, coriander seed, vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, cayenne pepper
name: belarussian carrot salad

steps: Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: ground ginger, honey, red wine vinegar, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, vegetable oil, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, mixed greens
name: asian grilled chicken salad

steps: Spray a slow cooker container with butter-flavored cooking spray. Combine apples and raisins in crock. Add splenda, apple pie spice, and apple juice. Mix well to combine. Dot top with margarine. Cover and cook on low for 4-6 hours.
ingredients: golden delicious apples, brown sugar, water, pumpkin pie spice
name: slow cooker spiced applesauce crock pot

steps: Preheat grill to medium-high. Spread butter on corn. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Top with cornstarch. Bake, uncovered for 1 hour at 325. Stir every 15 minutes. Cool and freeze. Can use ziploc bags or freezer containers.
ingredients: frozen corn, salt, butter, sugar, water, cornstarch
name: copycat green giant niblets corn in butter sauce

steps: In a medium sized bowl, lightly beat the eggs. Stir in the ghee and salt. Season with salt and pepper. Heat the oil in a very hot non-stick frying pan. Pour the mixture into the pan, move the pan to distribute evenly and leave for 7 seconds without stirring. Tilt the pan and move the cooked egg to the center with a spatula, allowing the uncooked egg to replace the cooked egg. When there is the hint of uncooked egg left, fold the omelette in half and transfer to a warm platter, sprinkle with paprika and tarragon. Cut into 2 or 3 pieces and serve immediately.
ingredients: potato, ghee, eggs, salt, black pepper, ground cumin, fresh cilantro, onion, red chilies
name: potato and egg pan omelette parsi style

steps: Heat the oil in a small vessel. When it is hot add the prunes, water, lemon rind, lemon juice, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind, lemon rind,
ingredients: prunes, water, lemon rind, lemon juice, brown sugar
name: lekvar prune plum filling or apricot

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover.
ingredients: tomatoes, fresh basil, dried basil, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, sugar, pepper, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: tomato basil salad with balsamic dressing

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan. Cook over medium heat until thoroughly heated. Do not boil. Stir in instant cocoa mix. Combine boiling water and coffee granules, then stir into milk mixture. Pour into mugs. Serve with a dollop of whipped cream and garnish with cinnamon sticks and a small, bright red chili pepper. Makes 3 quarts.
ingredients: non-dairy powdered coffee creamer, hot cocoa mix, instant coffee, ovaltine, sugar, cinnamon, ground nutmeg
name: mocha fireside coffee mix

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, frozen chopped broccoli, flour, breadcrumbs, salt and pepper
name: amy s cheezy broccoli balls

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a large bowl mix all dry ingredients. Add milk and water and add-ins of your choice. Using your fingers knead into an elastic dough. If you need more flour just add it and if you need more liquid add more water or milk. Flatten the dough to desired thickness and cut out scones of desired size. Place scones on a paper-lined baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, rolled oats, sugar, baking powder, salt, frozen blueberries, egg, butter, milk
name: oat blueberry scones

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oatspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oats
ingredients: oatmeal, egg, margarine, water
name: golden oats

steps: Sift together the butter, white chocolate, brown sugar, golden syrup, milk, plain flour, self raising flour, eggs, cream. Beat in vanilla. Add dry ingredients alternately with coffee to creamed mixture, beating well after each addition. Beat egg whites in another bowl until stiff peaks form. Fold egg whites into cake batter. Pour batter into a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven 45 minutes or until cake tests done. Cool in pan on rack.
ingredients: unsalted butter, white chocolate, brown sugar, golden syrup, milk, plain flour, self raising flour, eggs, cream
name: caramel mud cake

steps: Put in a bowl and cover with a lid or buttered greaseproof paper. Place in a hot oven 230-250c approx 20 minutes or until rice is tender. When cooked carefully mix in the remaining butter with a fork. For variations try mixing in some fried mushroom slices and toasted pine nuts and parsley, or to add some grated cheese just before serving.
ingredients: cod, onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, eggs, lemon
name: bacalhau a bras

steps: Heat all ingredients to boiling in 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Strain cider mixture to remove cloves and cinnamon if desired. Serve hot.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, cider, seedless raisin, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves
name: grandma strohecker s cider and raisin sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium casserole dish mix together green beans, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cream of mushroom soup, milk,
ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, milk, soy sauce, pepper, onion powder, frozen cut green beans, fresh mushrooms, dried sweetened cranberries, french-fried onions, almonds
name: christmas green bean casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375f and grease a 12 cup muffin pan. Toss cereal with sugar, flour, baking soda and salt. In a seperate bowl, whisk oil, egg and buttermilk. Add buttermilk mixture to cereal mixture and stir just until blended. Stir in blueberries and spoon into prepared muffin tin. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, until tester inserted in the centre of a muffin comes out clean.
ingredients: oats, blueberries, egg whites, skim milk, low fat cottage cheese, flour, water, salt
name: hearty yet healthy blueberry oatmeal pancake

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lay chips on oven safe platter. You will be layering this so split them. Warm beans and chili on stove or in microwave. Stir beans until smooth. Spread beans over tortillas. Top with onion, cheese, jalepenos, chili and cheddar cheese. Repeat by layering tortilla chips and toppings until gone. Place in oven and bake until cheese is melted. Dollop with sour cream. Add tomatoes and green onions on top.
ingredients: lean ground beef, chili seasoning mix, tomato sauce, black beans, colby-monterey jack cheese, shredded cheddar cheese, tortilla chips
name: chili o nachos

steps: Cream butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes.
ingredients: butter, eggs, sugar, vanilla, flour, cornstarch, baking soda, nuts, chocolate chips
name: chocolate chip biscotti

steps: In a food processor, add cream cheese, lemon juice, dill and capers. Combine for a few minutes. Toast chosen bread. Once the bread has been toasted spread cream cheese mix thickly onto both pieces of bread. Top with the smoked salmon and red onions.
ingredients: smoked salmon, cream cheese, capers, lemon juice, lemon zest, spring onions, parsley, sambal oelek
name: lovely smoked salmon and cream cheese entree

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the rotini noodles and cook for about 5 minutes. Add the celery and cook for another 5 minutes. Add the green onions and cook for another 5 minutes. Add the feta cheese and cook for another 5 minutes. Add the feta
ingredients: rotini noodles, boneless chicken breast, celery, sweet red pepper, black olives, feta cheese, green onions, greek salad dressing
name: pasta salad greek style

steps: Heat grill to medium-high, cook shrimp for 2 to 3 minutes a side, basting with reserved sauce. Cook shrimp until opaque. Be careful not to overcook.
ingredients: oil, ketchup, vinegar, dry mustard, worcestershire sauce, sugar, salt, onion, shrimp, bay leaves
name: linda s marinated shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Arrange flaked tuna evenly in a 9 inch pie pan that has been sprayed with a nonstick cooking spray. In a blender, combine half of the parmesan with remaining ingredients. Blend until smooth. Pour mixture over tuna. Top with remaining parmesan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes, until set and lightly browned. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: tuna, cream cheese, corn kernels, tasty cheese, spring onions, flat leaf parsley, black pepper, puff pastry, milk
name: creamy tuna tart

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. Should be 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: cooked pasta, eggs, cheese, seasoned bread crumbs, italian seasoning, garlic powder, meat
name: leftover or not pasta muffins oamc

steps: In a medium bowl, combine the garlic, fresh coarse ground black pepper, olive oil, water, turkey breast. Slowly whisk in the olive oil to thoroughly combine. Place the turkey cutlets in a shallow dish and pour the liquid over top. Cover and place in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour. Preheat the grill or oven broiler. Place the breasts directly on the grill, or on a roasting rack beneath the broiler. Cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the turkey is fully done. Turn the breasts frequently to prevent burning.
ingredients: garlic, fresh coarse ground black pepper, olive oil, water, turkey breast
name: roasted turkey breast

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine all of the ingredients except for the ketchup. It is easiest to just mix it up with your hands. Form into two loaves. Spread ketchup over the top of each loaf, and wrap each in foil sealing the foil tightly without squishing the meatloaf. Line a baking pan with foil, and place the foil wrapped loaves in it. Bake for 1 hour 45 minutes. Poke holes in the foil that is wrapped around the meatloaf and let any grease drain out into the pan while baking another 15 minutes.
ingredients: onion, butter, ground beef, bread, eggs, worcestershire sauce, mustard, ketchup, season salt, kitchen bouquet
name: mom florence s meatloaf

steps: Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired.
ingredients: avocados, cilantro leaf, white onion, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, salt, lime, garlic cloves
name: basic guacamole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine stuffing, butter, parmesan cheese, parsley, basil and rosemary. Cut ham, spoonful of stuffing mixture and slice of cheese. Wrap breast around and place seam-side down in 9 inch glass baking dish. Repeat with other breast and cover dish with foil to prevent burning. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until chicken is no longer pink. You can make a sauce with this or serve it alone.
ingredients: duck breasts, spinach leaves, olive oil, salt, black pepper, prosciutto, lean ground chicken, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic cloves, fresh tarragon leaves
name: duck breast stuffed with ham and sun dried tomatoes

steps: Place rim of chilled glass into rasperry preserves. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the chocolate liqueur, raspberry preserves and vodka to the shaker. Shake briskly to mix and chill. Strain into the martini glass. Garnish with the chocolate.
ingredients: ice, chocolate-flavored liqueur, vodka, chocolate
name: shaken but not stirred chocolate martini

steps: Fry spinach in medium skillet until crisp. Remove spinach and spinach from skillet. Mix sugar and vinegar. Beat egg then mix with vinegar and sugar. Pour over spinach. Cook 2-5 minute. Salt to taste.
ingredients: spinach, green onion, pepper, bacon, white vinegar, lemon juice, sugar, salt
name: wilted lettuce and spinach

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium high heat. Saute fish for 3 minutes and then flip fish and saute for 5 minutes of other side or until fish is done.
ingredients: yellow cornmeal, flour, chili powder, salt, fish fillet, butter
name: chili spiced coating for fish

steps: Heat oil and saute garlic along with the oregano. Stir in cabbage and water mixing well. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally 8 to 10 minutes or until tender. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cabbage, wheat flour, gingerroot, tomatoes, green chilies, coriander leaves, ghee, oil, salt
name: cabbage paratha

steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. Press fruit mixture through a fine-mesh strainer over a bowl to extract juices. Discard solids and pour mixture into 3-ounce paper or plastic drink cups or pop molds. Cover cups with foil. Cut a slit in the foil and insert wooden sticks. Freeze several hours or overnight until pops are firm. Remove from cups or molds to serve.
ingredients: watermelon, watermelon juice, lemon juice, ginger juice, mint extract, sugar, lemon slice, mint sprig
name: watermelon chiller

steps: In a large pot, bring stock to a boil. Add barley and cook on medium heat 40 minutes. Drain and rinse until cool. In a large bowl place all the vegetables, mix in the vinaigrette along with salt and pepper to taste. Combine with the barley. Salad can be prepared up to this point and stored, covered in fridge for 2 days. Sprinkle with toasted nuts just before serving.
ingredients: pearl barley, chicken broth, red onion, mushroom, carrot, green bell pepper, dried dill weed, salt, pepper, green onion
name: toasted barley with mixed veggies

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Butter a shallow gratin or baking dish that is just large enough to hold the asparagus. Place a layer of asparagus in the dish, with the. Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper and some of the cheese keep adding layers until all asparagus and all cheese is used, finishing with the cheese. Dot the top of the dish with the pieces of butter and place the dish on the top rack of the oven. Bake for about 15-20 minutes, or until the asparagus is cooked through and beginning to brown and the cheese is melted. Variations. Instead of the butter use olive oil or half butter and half olive oil. Use half parmesan and half shredded fontina cheese for a creamier gratin. Layer a couple of slices of prosciutto in with the asparagus if you like. Sprinkle with a little lemon zest for added zing.
ingredients: asparagus, olive oil, milk, parmesan cheese, egg, egg white, salt
name: asparagus gratinata

steps: In a large skillet, brown the salted chicken pieces in oil. Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes or until browned. Crush garlic cloves and scatter over the chicken add the broth. Turn heat to low. Cover and cook for about 15 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove cover, add salt and red pepper flakes. Add water and simmer over low heat until water is cooked off.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, brown sugar, olive oil, spices
name: easy garlic chicken

steps: In a large saucepan, heat oil. Add sausage and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add shallots and garlic. Cook one minute. Add tomatoes, herbs and sugar. Bring to a fast boil, then simmer uncovered for 40 minutes. Stir frequently and skim off fat. Add salt and pepper. Serve over pasta.
ingredients: italian sausage, red bell pepper, red onion, stewed tomatoes, flour, green onions
name: simple italian sausage pasta sauce

steps: Mix all the dry ingredients together. Dip chicken into corn flakes. Place chicken on a baking sheet. Bake at 400f for about 25 minutes or till chicken is no longer pink.
ingredients: flour, salt, pepper, egg whites, milk, corn flakes, low-fat cheddar cheese, boneless chicken breast halves
name: cheesy chicken crunchers

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, lemon juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk, chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic
ingredients: chicken quarters, lemongrass, garlic cloves, red curry paste, olive oil, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, kosher salt, unsweetened coconut milk
name: panang curry barbecue chicken with lemon grass

steps: Put strawberries in a blender and blend until the berries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Put mixture into 4 individual serving dishes and chill. When ready serve, add whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: strawberry, sugar, light cream, club soda, vanilla ice cream
name: strawberry ice cream soda

steps: Preheat oven to 350f, grease and flour an 8-inch square cake pan and set aside. Peel, core and chop the apples. In a bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and syrup. Sift flour, ginger and cinnamon, and fold into creamed mixture with the apples. Put mixture into prepared pan, and bake for 40-45 minutes, or until cooked. May be cut into slices, or left as a cake and decorated with whipped cream and sprinkled with cinnamon.
ingredients: refrigerated pie crusts, granny smith apples, lemon juice, brown sugar, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg
name: southern living granny smith apple pie

steps: In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: tea bags, sugar, boiling water, lemons, lemon, pineapple juice, of fresh mint, pineapple
name: pineapple iced tea

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 f. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and set aside. Lay two spring roll wrappers on a clean work surface. Brush wrappers lightly with melted butter. Slice the bananas in half on the diagonal. Place one banana half in the lower third portion of the wrapper and cover with the chocolate. Sprinkle a little salt over the chocolate and top with the remaining banana half. Roll into a tight package. Continue until all bananas and wrappers are rolled. Place the finished banana rolls on the lined baking tray and brush tops and edges with butter. Bake for 5-7 minutes on the baking tray and serve when golden brown.
ingredients: banana, wonton wrappers, sugar, oil, caramel sauce, chocolate syrup, whipped cream
name: banana caramel chocolate won tons

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a cookie sheet with no stick cooking spray. Dip each chicken cutlet in egg mixture and then coat completely with bread crumb mixture. Heat half inch of oil in a pan over med-high heat. Fry each cutlet and turn over when golden brown. Heat oven to 400 degrees. When cutlets are crispy and golden on both side and juices run clear, place them on a baking sheet. Place a slice of provolone cheese on top of each cutlet and place in the oven. In the meantime, heat sauce in the microwave or on the stove top. When cheese is melted, remove cutlets from oven and spoon some sauce nicely over each one. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. Serve with your favorite pasta and remaining sauce.
ingredients: italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, pine nuts, crushed red pepper flakes, coarse black pepper, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, egg beaters egg substitute, olive oil
name: parmesan and pine nut crusted chicken breasts

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place yams in an ovenproof dish and add margarine. Pour over yams and sweet potatoes. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes until bubbly.
ingredients: yams, margarine, miniature marshmallows, orange juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: seet s yummy candied yams or sweet potatoes

steps: In a cocktail shaker, place the twelve mint leaves, 6 pieces of lime and the simple syrup. With a muddler, mash up the lime pieces and mint leaves so that they release their flavors and oils. Taste for sweetness and adjust if necessary. Add the rum and a handful of ice. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds or until ice crystals form. With a cocktail strainer, pour into a tall ice-filled glass. Top off with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. Top with soda and stir. Serve in a collins glass, garnished with raspberry and mint sprigs.
ingredients: kumquats, sugar, mint leaves, lime, juice of, light rum, ice, club soda, sugar cane
name: kumquat mojito

steps: Add all ingredients to sauce pan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes or until the mixture thickens. Use potato masher and mash after 15 minutes. Refrigerate over night.
ingredients: green chili, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, creamed coconut, coriander, mint, salt, caster sugar, limes
name: green coriander chutney

steps: Mix all the ingredients above in a bowl. Add your desired cut of lamb. Cover in the fridge for at least 24 hours. Cook your lamb in your preferred way. Enjoy a nice new taste to your meat.
ingredients: lea & perrins worcestershire sauce, sherry wine, gingerroot, lamb loin chops, olive oil
name: lea and perrins lamb chops

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Place pasta in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Remove from heat and stir in parsley. Serve over pasta topped with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: yellow onion, garlic, olive oil, fresh mushrooms, tomato sauce, black olives, crushed red pepper flakes, penne pasta, parmesan cheese
name: country pasta

steps: Place chicken in a casserole dish. Combine all ingredients and pour over chicken. Bake covered for 2 hours. Stir several times while baking. Add pineapple just before serving. Serve over cooked rice.
ingredients: soy sauce, sugar, ginger, garlic clove, scallions
name: genuine hawaiian teriyaki sauce

steps: In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the white grapes, fruit cocktail and raisins. Add a dash of salt and roast in 375 degree oven for 30 minutes, till well roasted. Cut tomato tops off and scoop out centers. Stuff tomatoes with roasted raisin stuffing. Bake in 350 degree oven for 15 minutes. Grate ginger over each tomato just before serving.
ingredients: white grapes, fruit cocktail, raisins, fresh water
name: raisin jack usmc style

steps: In a large skillet, heat the oil and garlic over medium heat. Add chicken to the skillet and cook for 7 - 10 minutes. Season with black pepper. Add white wine and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Remove chicken to a platter. Saute tomatoes in the skillet until tender. Place tomatoes over the chicken and cover with pan drippings.
ingredients: chicken breasts, cornflour, oil, sliced mushrooms, white wine, whipping cream, salt and pepper
name: quick and easy chicken in cream sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat fillets evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake at 400 degrees f. until done, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: rainbow trout fillets, parsley, lemon juice, seasoning salt, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, white wine
name: rainbow trout tilapia baked

steps: Heat oil in large skillet. Brown the ground beef. Add the peppers and onions. Drain off any fat. Stir in pasta sauce, 2 tbs. Parmesan, oregano, 1 cup mozzarella, and pasta. Put mixture in a 13x9 baking dish. Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella and parmesan. Bake uncovered 30 minutes until hot and bubbly.
ingredients: mostaccioli pasta, cauliflower, garlic cloves, green onions, butter, vegetable oil, seasoned bread crumbs, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: pasta and cauliflower

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: baking chocolate, butter, flour, caster sugar, eggs, cherries
name: cherry chocolate slice

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin cups or a square pan. Put dry ingredients in one bowl, and mix them. Put oil and milk together, and add to dry. Stir til just moist. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: flour, salt, baking powder, sugar, oil, soymilk, olive oil, herbs, garlic cloves
name: amanda s vegan flat bread

steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Peel and dice the potatoes. I have a vegetable chopper from williams-sonoma and this step only takes 5 minutes. Parboil the potatoes 5 minutes in salty water. Either spray a large baking dish with oil or rub it lightly with butter. Drain and then toss the potatoes in the baking dish with the butter, thyme, nutmeg, more salt and pepper. Mix almost all the cheese throughout the potatoes and pour the half & half evenly over all. Top the dish with the reserved cheese. Bake for one hour or until the cheese is nicely melted, bubbling and turning a caramel color.
ingredients: unsalted butter, flour, milk, kosher salt, cracked pepper
name: cracked pepper gravy

steps: Combine all ingredients, except the chicken, in a skillet. Cook on high for 3-4 minutes on the stove. Add the chicken. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve over rice.
ingredients: honey, rice vinegar, soy sauce, minced garlic cloves, fresh ginger, coarse salt, ground pepper, chicken thighs
name: honey teriyaki chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place italian bread shell on an ungreased baking sheet. Stir together the cream cheese, goat cheese or feta, garlic and black pepper in a small mixing bow. Spread mixture over the bread shell. Place the tomato slices and sweet pepper strips over the cheese mixture. Bake in the preheated oven about 12 minutes or till heated through. Sprinkle with fresh basil.
ingredients: pizza dough, onion, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, mozzarella cheese, goat cheese, roasted red pepper, kalamata olive, oregano, salt
name: mediterranean goat cheese pizza

steps: In medium saucepan, cook ground beef over medium-high heat, 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cooked well, drain. Reduce heat to medium. Stir in remaining ingredients, except shredded cheese and tortilla chips. Cook 8-12 minutes or until thoroughly heated, stirring frequently. Top individual servings with shredded cheese and tortilla chips.
ingredients: ground beef, egg, white onion, cooked long-grain rice, beef gravy, green onion, hot sauce, ketchup
name: hawaiian loco moco hearty breakfast

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: white bread, pizza sauce, pepperoni, oregano, mozzarella cheese, american cheese, butter
name: pepperoni pizza sandwich

steps: Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, lard, sugar, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt,
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, water, butter, onion
name: spaetzels

steps: Preheat oven to 350 farenheit. Butter or grease madeleines tin or mini-muffin pan. Combine eggs and sugar and beat until pale in color. Stir in orange extract and butter. Fold in flour until mixture is smooth and uniform. Fill madeleines tins or mini-muffin pans and bake until tops are golden and edges are crispy. Test doneness with a toothpick, just like baking a cake. Remove from oven when done and sprinkle with powdered sugar to taste.
ingredients: cornstarch, all-purpose flour, white sugar, milk, vegetable oil, eggs, baking powder, kirsch, lemon, zest of
name: spanish magdelenas madeleines

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. After the hour of marinating, turn chicken breasts over and sprinkle evenly with oregano and grated parmesan cheese. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 1 hour, checking after 45 minutes to make sure they do not get over-cooked.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, wish bone italian salad dressing, steak sauce, garlic salt, extra virgin olive oil, lemon pepper, oregano, salt, pepper
name: paul s grilled italian chicken breasts

steps: In a microwave safe bowl, mix white sugar, butter, milk, vanilla, cocoa, oatmeal, shredded coconut. Mix well. Drop spoonfuls onto wax paper-lined cookie sheets. Bake on middle rack of preheated 325 degree oven, 10-12 minutes or until browned around the edges. Remove immediately to wire racks. Cool completely.
ingredients: white sugar, butter, milk, vanilla, cocoa, oatmeal, shredded coconut
name: oh soo easy chocolate macaroons

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Arrange flaked tuna evenly in a 9 inch pie pan that has been sprayed with a nonstick cooking spray. In a blender, combine half of the parmesan with remaining ingredients. Blend until smooth. Pour mixture over tuna. Top with remaining parmesan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes, until set and lightly browned. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: tuna in water, egg, plain breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic clove, olive oil, dried basil, fine sea salt
name: veronica s italian tuna cake burger

steps: Heat oven to 425. Grease 12-inch pizza pan. Sprinkle with cornmeal. Unroll dough and press in pan. In small bowl, combine oil and garlic. Drizzle over dough. In small bowl, combine cheese, oregano and basil. Sprinkle over oil. Bake at 425 for 13 to 16 minutes or until crust is deep golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: pizza dough, ranch dressing, garlic cloves, cayenne pepper, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil
name: creamy garlic cheese pizza with fresh basil

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together pork fillets, oil, shallots, red chile, soy sauce, sherry wine, cornflour, garlic, sugar, cornflour, salt and pepper. Pour over chops. Bake in preheated 350f oven for 1 hour or until done.
ingredients: pork fillets, oil, shallots, red chile, soy sauce, sherry wine, cornflour, garlic, sugar
name: chinese pork with shallots

steps: Heat oil, add garlic and saut until golden brown. Pour into a large bowl. Chop tomatoes and toss with salt. Cut arugula into strips and toss most of it with the tomatoes, saving some to top dish before serving. Mix together with oil, tomatoes, garlic and greens while boiling slated water for pasta. While pasta is cooking, cut mozzarella into small pieces. Mix all ingredients with hot cooked pasta. Sprinkle with remaining arugula and red pepper flakes.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, italian-style stewed tomatoes, crushed red pepper flakes, penne pasta, parmesan cheese
name: arrabiata

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Mix the cheese, eggs and half the wine and spread the mixture over the bread. Melt the butter in a heavy skillet large enough to hold all four slices. Swirl in the remaining wine, then settle the bread into the pan. Add cayenne. Bake until the cheese melts, 12 to 13 minutes.
ingredients: gruyere, swiss cheese, sherry wine, plain yogurt, green onion, garlic cloves, lemon, red onion, parsley
name: cheese delight

steps: Place chicken strips on top along with bell pepper strips and cook over medium coals 10 to 15 minutes, turning frequently, until pepper is tender and chicken is no longer pink in center. Spoon cooked chicken on top of rice and garnish with coconut and raisins. Place chicken strips on top along with bell pepper strips and cook over medium coals 10 to 15 minutes, turning frequently, until pepper is tender and chicken is no longer pink in center. Place chicken strips on top along with bell pepper strips and cook over medium coals 10 to 15 minutes, turning frequently, until pepper is tender and chicken is no longer pink
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, sesame dressing, orange juice, stir fry vegetables, crushed red pepper flakes, cooked rice, peanuts
name: orange chicken and rice bowl

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Grease 9x13 baking dish. Combine rhubarb with sugar and place in greased baking dish. Combine brown sugar, oatmeal, butter, shortening and flour and mix to pebble-like consistency. Mixture will be crumbly. Sprinkle crumbly mixture over rhubarb. Bake uncovered for 40 minutes.
ingredients: rhubarb, flour, sugar, cinnamon, salt, water, margarine, brown sugar, rolled oats
name: crumbly topped rhubarb

steps: Preheat oven to 375f mix cream cheese and 2 tablespoons of the honey. Stir in almonds. Unroll crescent roll dough. Separate into 8 triangles. Spread 1 rounded tablespoons cream cheese mixture onto each triangle. Roll up each loosely, starting at shortest side of triangle, rolling to opposite point. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet. Curve each into crescent shape. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bale 12 to 14 minute or until golden brown. Serve rolls warm, drizzled with remaining honey.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, process american cheese, garlic powder, butter-flavored cooking spray
name: silly simple cheese and garlic filled crescents

steps: Melt butter in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium high heat. Saut onion and garlic about 6 minutes until tender. Add flour and cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Gradually whisk in milk. Increase heat to high and whisk 2-3 minutes, or until mixture boils and begins to thicken. Reduce heat to low and stir in remaining ingredients, except cheese. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve sprinkled with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: bacon, onion, garlic cloves, flour, milk, frozen chopped spinach, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: creamed lemon spinach

steps: Drain pineapple, reserving 1 tablespoon juice. In a large bowl, combine the mandarin orange segments, unsweetened pineapple tidbits, unflavored gelatin, v8 splash berry blend, frozen sliced strawberries in syrup, bananas. Add marshmallows, yogurt and lime zest. Mix gently. Sprinkle nuts over top. Cover. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: mandarin orange segments, unsweetened pineapple tidbits, unflavored gelatin, v8 splash berry blend, frozen sliced strawberries in syrup, bananas
name: jiggly fruit salad

steps: In medium saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Add celery and onion and cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients and whisk together. Bring to boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Transfer to a bowl, cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
ingredients: pumpkin seeds, olive oil, lemon pepper, dry mustard, garlic pepper seasoning, brown sugar, liquid smoke, chili seasoning mix, salt
name: tangy bbq flavored pumpkin seeds

steps: In a small saucepan over low heat, mix the coffee and sugar. In a small saucepan over low heat, mix the coffee and sugar
ingredients: ground coffee, brown sugar, boiling water, whipped cream, cocoa powder
name: sorbetto espresso or italian ice

steps: Melt chocolate chips, stir in german chocolate, marshmallow cream, sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, walnuts. Mix well. Let stand about 30 minutes. Then shape into 1 inch balls and roll in additional ground nuts or coconut. Chill or freeze.
ingredients: chocolate chips, german chocolate, marshmallow cream, sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, walnuts
name: granny sunshine s fudge

steps: Combine all ingredients except tuna, and mix really well. Then add tuna. If the mixture is dry, add some more mayonnaise. This is fine for a sandwich.
ingredients: ramen noodles, tuna, sweet pickle relish, mayonnaise, sriracha sauce
name: steve s tuna boona

steps: In heavy saucepan, combine oats, brown sugar, butter, eggs, buttermilk, flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, and butter. Cook and stir on medium-high heat until melted. Remove from heat. Stir in cheerios, raisins, and coconut. Drop by bite size pieces onto wax paper. Let stand for 10 minutes.
ingredients: oats, brown sugar, butter, eggs, buttermilk, flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, butterscotch chips
name: butterscotch oatmeal bread

steps: Season both sides of the pork chops with the salt and pepper. In a small bowl, whisk together brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ginger, salt and pepper, cornstarch, water, boneless pork loin chopspreparation:Preheat grill on high for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ginger, salt and pepper to taste, bring to a boil. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk cornstarch into the water and mix into brown sugar mixture. Cook, stirring constantly until bubbling and thickened. Reduce grill to medium-high heat. Grill chops on oiled grill, brushing often with brown sugar glaze, about 6-8 minutes per side, or until digital thermometer inserted sideways into the center of each chop reads 160f do not over cook.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, olive oil, onion, pineapple juice, brown sugar, cider vinegar, salt
name: no time to cook pork chops

steps: Add potatoes and garlic to a pot and cover with water. Add salt and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until fork tender. Drain and add back to the pot. Mash with the remaining ingredients. Reduce heat and simmer until fork
ingredients: russet potatoes, fresh chives, butter, buttermilk, salt, pepper
name: buttermilk herbed mashed potatoes

steps: Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips.
ingredients: lettuce leaves, tuna packed in oil, celery rib, green pepper, green onion, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, oregano, olive, tomatoes
name: tuna fish salad on a bed of lettuce

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: shrimp, vegetable oil, sugar, garlic clove, shallot, water, fish sauce, sea salt, cilantro
name: caramelized garlic shrimp tom rim man

steps: In large bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In a small bowl, whisk the egg, buttermilk and oil. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fold in corn. Bake at 400 for 18-22 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack. Serve warm.
ingredients: self-rising yellow cornmeal, self-rising flour, salt, sugar, corn oil, eggs, milk
name: cornbread waffles or pancakes

steps: Heat oven to 300 degrees f. With a mortar and pestle or a spice grinder, coarsely grind the lemon zest, cloves, bay leaf, cinnamon, whole allspice, whole black peppercorn, fresh lemon juice, peanut oilpreparation:Heat oven to 300 degrees f. With a mortar and pestle or a spice grinder, coarsely grind the lemon zest, cloves, bay leaf, cinnamon, whole allspice, whole black peppercorn, fresh lemon juice
ingredients: butter, shallots, leeks, champagne, fresh lemon juice, whipping cream, salt and pepper, fresh dill
name: champagne leek and lemon cream

steps: Put cucumbers in a large stainless steel pot. Pour ingredients over the cucumbers. Bring to a boil. When it starts boiling, pack into jars. Wipe rims, and cap, using sterilized lids and bands. Let set for 6 weeks before eating.
ingredients: cucumbers, water, white vinegar, salt, sugar, garlic cloves, fresh tarragon
name: shep ogden s little pickles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, unbleached all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, bananas, vanilla extract, walnuts
name: wonderful banana muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Grease a baking sheet. Roll out the thawed steak rolls into a rectangle then cover with a clean tea towel and allow to sit for about 15 minutes. Brush the top of the dough with olive oil, then sprinkle with black pepper and italian seasoning, then sprinkle the chopped pepperoni over the top. Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the pepperoni then top with parmesan cheese. Roll up the dough in jelly-roll fashion, then pinch the long seam and the two ends tightly to seal completely. Brush the outside of the dough with olive oil. Place seam-side down onto baking pan then sprinkle a small amount of kosher salt over the top. Bake for about 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: minute steaks, salt and pepper, basil, mozzarella cheese, oil, roasted red peppers packed in oil, olives, balsamic vinegar
name: mozzarella filled steak rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Place the zucchini, low-fat ricotta cheese, mountain bread, ham, fresh basil, zucchini, marinated artichoke hearts, green olives, pepperoni, gouda cheese, flour tortilla. Bake for 1 hour or until golden. Drizzle with white balsamic vinegar and serve with crusty bread and an assortment of crackers.
ingredients: zucchini, low-fat ricotta cheese, mountain bread, ham, fresh basil
name: ricotta basil ham wrap 21 day wonder diet day 5

steps: In a large pot of boiling, salted water cook the pasta to al dente and drain. Return to the pot and melt in the butter. Toss to coat. Whisk together the eggs, milk, hot sauce, salt, pepper, and mustard. Stir into the pasta and add the cheese. Over low heat continue to stir for 3 minutes or until creamy.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, chicken breasts, low-fat milk, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, buffalo wing sauce, onion powder, garlic powder, celery, hot sauce
name: buffalo chicken mac n cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 375c and grease an oven proof dish. Bring the cream to the boil, add the stock cube and stir to dissolve. Add salt, pepper and chives. Blend in half the grated jarlsberg until it melts and the sauce is smooth. Layer all the vegetables in the dish and pour in the sauce. Sprinkle the remaining grated cheese on top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes or until potatoes are soft and top is golden brown.
ingredients: broccoli florets, potatoes, water, ground nutmeg, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper
name: healthy broccoli gratin

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 12 large muffin cups. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt in a large bowl. Combine buttermilk, butter, eggs and vanilla in small bowl until blended. Stir into flour mixture just until moistened. Fold in white chocolate. Spoon into prepeared muffin cups, filling half full. Bake 25-30 minutes or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack for 5 minutes. Remove from pan. Cool on wire rack 10 minutes. Serve warm or completely cool.
ingredients: butter, honey, buttermilk, eggs, whole wheat pastry flour, baking powder, baking soda, shredded coconut
name: coconut muffins

steps: In a large bowl, combine flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, baking soda, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda, baking soda
ingredients: butter, milk, flour, honey, salt, flaked coconut, vanilla, crispy rice cereal
name: honey coconut bites

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic clove, oregano, chili powder, corn chips, cheddar cheese, tomato sauce, kidney beans
name: pedro s casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cut the baguette in half lengthwise, place on a sheet tray and bake in the oven until lightly brown. Rub with the garlic cloves. Drizzle with 2 ounces of the olive oil and sprinkle with the parmigiano-reggiano. Return to oven to melt cheese. In a medium mixing bowl, add the tomatoes, minced garlic, basil, vinegar, remaining olive oil, salt and pepper. Mix thoroughly and let sit for 5 minutes at room temperature. Remove baguette from oven and top with the tomato mixture. Garnish with basil and parmigiano-reggiano.
ingredients: baguette, garlic clove, extra virgin olive oil, cream cheese with herbs, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, salt and pepper
name: can can canaps boursin baguette bruschetta

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender.
ingredients: milk, egg, flour, parmesan cheese, male squash blossoms, canola oil, mint leaves
name: batter fried squash blossoms

steps: Preheat oven to 350f grease a 5-by-9-inch loaf pan. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and baking soda. In a medium saucepan, combine the whole cherries and the sugar. Using a potato masher, crush the cherries. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes. Transfer to a large bowl and let cool. Whisk in the sour cream and eggs. Stir in the flour mixture. Fold the chopped cherries into the batter. Gradually stir in the butter. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan, then bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 55 minutes. Let cool in the pan for 15 minutes, then turn out onto a rack to cool completely.
ingredients: maraschino cherries, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, eggs, walnuts, flaked coconut
name: pink cherry bread

steps: Combine rice, cooked shrimp, pineapple tidbits, green bell pepper, celery, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Whisk together mayonnaise, pineapple tidbits, green bell pepper, celery, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add mayonnaise, pineapple tidbits, green bell pepper, celery, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Add mayonnaise,
ingredients: rice, cooked shrimp, pineapple tidbits, green bell pepper, celery, salt and pepper
name: caribbean shrimp salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions. Set aside. Place chicken in a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Combine the soup, sour cream and dry soup mix. Spread over chicken. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until bubbly.
ingredients: onion, celery, butter, bread cubes, eggs, mashed potatoes, chicken broth, salt and pepper
name: pennsylvania dutch potato stuffing

steps: Combine beans, corn, red onion, rice vinegar, garlic salt, black pepper. Pour dressing over bean mixture. Stir gently to combine. Can be served immediately, or chilled for a few hours before serving.
ingredients: black beans, corn, red onion, avocados, rice vinegar, garlic salt, black pepper
name: black bean corn salad

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard.
ingredients: ground beef, green onion, italian seasoning, sugar, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, tomato sauce, sliced ripe olives, spaghetti
name: quick spaghetti

steps: Add water and taco seasoning mix. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours low for 6-8 hours. Taste great served on rice or egg noodles.
ingredients: round steak, onion, water, taco seasoning mix, salsa, diced green chilies, corn chips, cheddar cheese
name: crock pot texas chili

steps: Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beefpreparation:Mix eggs, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried
ingredients: egg, sour cream, dijon mustard, dry breadcrumbs, dried thyme leaves, allspice, celery salt, cinnamon, green onion, ground beef
name: tourtiere burgers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place trout fillets in a greased shallow baking dish. In a small bowl, combine sour cream, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, onion, salt, paprika. Spread over fillets. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake 20-25 minutes or until fillets flake easily with a fork.
ingredients: trout fillets, white wine, bouillon cube, salt and pepper, butter, heavy cream, shallot, herbs
name: trout filets la zug

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice and cook, stirring constantly. Sprinkle with salt, cumin, and taco seasoning. Cook stirring constantly, until slightly translucent. Stir in onions and cook until tender. Stir in tomato sauce and chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes. Fluff with a fork.
ingredients: parboiled rice, butter, chicken broth, cilantro, pimiento, scallions
name: mexi chicken rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients in a medium saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking, for about 15 mins. Or until the mixture is of desired consistency. Pour into sterilized jars and seal. Store processor marmalade in a cool place.
ingredients: grapefruit, lemon, oranges, water, sugar
name: processor marmalade

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Spray a large, shallow baking pan with no-stick cooking spray. In a large bowl toss together shredded wheat and walnuts. Set aside. In a small bowl toss together butter, brown sugar, oatmeal, crispy rice cereal, mini chocolate chip, skor english toffee bit. Pour over the dry ingredients and toss thoroughly to combine. Spread evenly in the prepared baking pan and bake for 25-30 minutes, stirring two or three times, until the mixture is lightly toasted. If it seems damp, it will crisp as it cools. Cool completely, then add the dried fruit. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: brown sugar, water, vanilla, salt, oats, walnuts
name: low fat granola

steps: In large bowl beat together butter and sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift together flour, soda and salt. Mix into wet ingredients. Stir in crispies, and chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet 1 inch apart. Bake at 350 for 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: honey, peanut butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, salted peanuts, crisp rice cereal
name: chocolate crisps

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, with electric mixer at medium speed, beat together butter and shortening until light and fluffy. Add sugar and cream together until very light. Add vanilla, scraping down sides of bowl as needed. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each egg. Gradually fold in flour until a soft, workable dough forms. Shape into balls and place on cookie sheets. Dip the bottom of a flat bottomed glass in sugar and use it to mash down the balls of dough. Bake in preheated oven until done. Immediately remove from pan to cool.
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, egg, vanilla, self raising flour, milk, cinnamon
name: cinnamon teacake

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Cut a 2-inch pocket in the thickest part of each chicken breast. In a small bowl combine the feta and the chopped olives, then stuff of mixture into each pocket. In a nonstick skillet, heat 2 tbs. Olive oil on medium to high heat. Season the chicken with pepper and add it to the skillet, cooking 2 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer to an oven safe baking dish, drizzled with 1 tbs. Olive oil and add it to the skillet, cooking 2 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, chicken breast fillets, chopped tomatoes, frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, kalamata olives, fresh parsley
name: mediterranean chicken vegetables

steps: Place pork chops in greased slow cooker. Top with onions and mushrooms. Combine soup mix, water, and mushroom soup. Pour over mushrooms and onions. Cover. Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 4-5. Serve over rice or cooked noodles.
ingredients: pork chops, vegetable oil, condensed golden mushroom soup, white wine
name: snob pork chops

steps: Heat in small sauce pan 2 tablespoons butter over medium-high heat. Add 4 tablespoons finely chopped shallots and cook until lightly browned. Add 2 tablespoons worcestershire and heat to bubbling, keeping the sauce hot. Heat 12 in skillet 6 tablespoons butter, when it begins to brown, add pounded steaks and cook for 3 minutes. Turn and cook 2 to 3 more minutes longer, or until done to taste. Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with salt and a generous amount of fresh ground pepper. Spread the gaelic steak over the steaks and sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley.
ingredients: sirloin steaks, butter, oil, irish whiskey, heavy cream, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt
name: pan fried gaelic steak

steps: Bring vinegar, water and spices to a boil. Add garlic and bring back to a boil. Pour into clean, sterilized jars. Seal tight and store in cool place. Keep sealed for 3 weeks before using to get best flavor. Separating garlic into cloves and soaking them for 2 or 3 hours makes the outer skin easier to remove.
ingredients: vinegar, pickling salt, sugar, dry mustard, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, grape leaves, dill
name: summer pickles in a crock

steps: Dissolve jello in boiling water, then stir in lemonade concentrate until dissolved. Chill until fully set. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into a 13 x 9 glass dish. Chill until firm.
ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, orange jell-o, boiling water, frozen orange juice, mandarin oranges, pineapple tidbits
name: muriel s orange jello dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm. Pour juices from baking dish into a small saucepan and whisk together with cream over low heat until thickened. Pour sauce over chicken and serve warm.
ingredients: brussels sprouts, bacon, onion, fresh mushrooms, chicken broth, salt, pepper
name: bacon mushroom brussels sprouts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook and drain egg mixture according to package directions. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until lightly browned. Sprinkle with flour and stir while cooking for 1 more minute. Reduce heat, slowly add the milk and cook for about 5 minutes or until milk is slightly thickened. Remove from heat, add one cup cheese, corn, salsa and green chilies. Add in hot pasta and mix well. Place in lightly greased baking dish. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and bake 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: corn tortillas, eggs, half-and-half, low fat cottage cheese, salt, pepper, mexican blend cheese, green onions, salsa
name: southwestern egg casserole

steps: Cook the macaroni according to package directions, drain. Brown the meat and drain. Stir in spaghetti sauce, macaroni, and salad dressing. Heat through, stirring occasionallly. Sprinkle with shredded cheese.
ingredients: panko breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, butter, spaghetti, green peas, dijon mustard, sharp cheddar cheese, american cheese, prosciutto
name: mac and cheese spaghetti

steps: Combine flour, baking soda and salt in suacepan. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook for 10-15 minutes until mixture turns a light caramel color. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Pour over popcorn, nuts, apricots and raisins. Blend corn syrup, brown sugar, vanilla and salt. Pour over popcorn mixture. Toss until evenly coated. Put on buttered jelly roll pan. Bake at 250 for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: pecan halves, blanched almond, popped popcorn, sugar, butter, corn syrup, cream of tartar, baking soda, rum
name: popcorn snack

steps: Cook pasta according to the package directions, omitting salt and fat. Drain in a colander over a bowl, reserving 3 tablespoons cooking liquid. Heat pan over medium heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add garlic to pan, and saut 1 minute. Remove from heat. Add reserved 3 tablespoons cooking liquid and pasta to pan. Let stand 2 minutes. Stir in parsley, oil, salt, pepper, italian seasoning and prosciutto. Sprinkle with cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: ciabatta, prosciutto, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: giada s crostini alla romana

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Brush flesh side of salmon with dressing. Press into pecans until evenly coated. Place, pecan-sides up, on foil-covered baking sheet. Bake 13 to 15 minute or until salmon flakes easily with fork. Meanwhile, beat cream cheese spread and wine in small saucepan with wire whisk until well blended. Cook on medium-low heat 3 to 5 minute or until salmon flakes easily with fork. Spoon cream cheese sauce evenly onto four serving plates. Top with salmon. Sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients: corn oil, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, paprika, salt, flounder fillets, dry white wine, fresh parsley
name: pescado sudado peruvian steamed fish fillets

steps: Place chicken in slow cooker. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Stir in mushrooms, pour over chicken, and cook 1 hour longer or until chicken juices run clear. Serve over rice or noodles.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, broccoli cheese soup, milk, onion, salt, pepper, dried basil, noodles
name: crock pot broccoli cheese chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Cut a 2-inch pocket in the thickest part of each chicken breast. In a small bowl combine the feta and the chopped olives, then stuff of mixture into each pocket. In a nonstick skillet, heat 2 tbs. Olive oil on medium to high heat. Season the chicken with pepper and add it to the skillet, cooking 2 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer to an oven safe baking dish, drizzled with 1 tbs. Olive oil and bake for 18 minutes. In a bowl mix tomato, kosher salt, onion, garlic, basil and parley. When chicken is 5 minutes from being finished, put the remaining olive oil in the skillet, add tomato mix and heat through. Serve chicken with tomato mix on top.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast half, red onion, zucchini, kraft tuscan house italian dressing and marinade, grape tomatoes, pitted black olives, mozzarella cheese
name: mediterranean mozzarella chicken

steps: In a large mixing bowl, mix mayonnaise, lemon juice, sugar substitute and mustard. Add cauliflower, green onions and pepper. Mix well until vegetables are evenly coated with dressing. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill 30 mins.
ingredients: cauliflower, celery, red onion, mayonnaise, cider vinegar, salt, splenda sugar substitute, black pepper, hard-boiled eggs
name: un potato salad low carb

steps: In 2 large cups or glass mugs, mix the coffee and sugar. In a small saucepan over low heat, warm the cream. Add the cocoa and mix well. Add the cream mixture to the coffee and top with a dollop of whipped cream and the grated chocolate. Serve with a cinnamon stick.
ingredients: black coffee, cinnamon stick, brown sugar, milk, cream, vanilla ice cream, powdered chocolate milk mix
name: deluxe iced coffee

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: lasagna pasta, olive oil, shallot, garlic, spinach, cream, black pepper, pitted black olives, blue cheese
name: spinach and blue cheese pasta

steps: In a large nonstick frying pan, add flour, blackened steak seasoning, cooking oil, baby spinach leaves, carrot, balsamic vinegar, water and cook on each side for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and add to serving dish. Sprinkle with fresh lemon. Place spinach over top and serve.
ingredients: fresh sea scallop, flour, blackened steak seasoning, cooking oil, baby spinach leaves, carrot, balsamic vinegar, water
name: seared scallops and spinach salad

steps: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees. Mix together all ingredients from ground beef through pizza sauce. Separate the halves of the hamburger buns, placing each half face-up on a baking sheet. Spread the meat mixture on each of the hamburger buns. Top each with a slice of mozzarella. Bake for 20 minutes or until the cheese is golden and bubbly.
ingredients: pizza crust, mashed potatoes, onions, cooper sharp cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, sour cream, butter, salt, pepper, paprika
name: pagach quick and easy

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: egg whites, egg, white sugar, vanilla extract, cocoa, baking powder, salt, all-purpose flour, marshmallow cream, walnuts
name: rocky road brownies

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until tomato beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired.
ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, onion, jalapeno, garlic, no-salt-added stewed tomatoes, water, pinto beans, white pepper, fresh parsley
name: easy tomato bean soup
