steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, cinnamon and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and chocolate chips. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely.
ingredients: bisquick, milk, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, seedless raisins
name: cinnamon whirls

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl combine all the crust ingredients. Beat at medium speed on mixer, scraping bowl often, until crumbly. Press 2 cups of the crumb mixture on bottom of ungreased 13x9 inch baking pan. Place blueberries over the crumb crust. In 2-qt saucepan combine remaining filling ingredients except vanilla. Cook over medium heat, stirring the mixture occasionally, until it thickens and comes to a full boil. Continue boiling for 1 minute. Mix in vanilla. Pour over blueberries. Sprinkle with the remaining crumb mixture. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: butter, milk, sugar, self-rising flour, fresh blueberries
name: world s easiest cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a baking sheet with nonstick spray. Slice the onions width wise and then break them apart into rings. Put the flour in 1 bowl, the egg whites into a second, and into the third put the bread crumbs and all the spices. Dip each onion ring into the flour, then the egg whites, and then the bread crumbs. Place them on the baking sheet and then repeat with the next ring. Bake them all for about 20 minutes or until crispy.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, fresh ground pepper, dried breadcrumbs, fat free egg substitute, onion
name: oven fried onion rings

steps: In a saucepan, heat olive oil in a large saucepan. Add leeks, onions and potatoes and stir. Cover saucepan and sweat veg for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Blend the soup and return to the saucepan. Season and add cream to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, leeks, onion, sweet potato, cumin seed, chicken stock, plain yogurt
name: leek cumin and sweet potato soup

steps: Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: garlic cloves, butter, potatoes, flour, milk, salt and pepper
name: garlic mashed potatoes ii

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl combine the macaroni, bacon, onions, lemon juice, peas, celery, green olives, miracle whippreparation:Cook macaroni according to package directions. In a large bowl combine the macaroni, bacon, onions, lemon juice, peas, celery,
ingredients: elbow macaroni, bacon, onions, lemon juice, peas, celery, green olives, miracle whip
name: chameleon macaroni salad

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in medium-sized saucepan. Saute onions and garlic until brown. Add garlic and stir. Reduce heat to medium-low. Add garlic and
ingredients: garlic cloves, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper
name: marvelous marinade for grilling

steps: Cover the bottom of a 9-inch square pan with frozen hash browns. Cover hash browns with sausage. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Stir together the remaining ingredients. Pour this mixture over everything. Refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes. Let stand for 30 minutes before cutting into squares and serving.
ingredients: sausage links, eggs, frozen hash brown potatoes, cheddar cheese, half-and-half, bell pepper, onion, salt, black pepper
name: hash browns breakfast bake

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, salt until light and fluffy. In another bowl combine flour and finely ground walnuts. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover your dough and refrigerate it for at least 1 hour. Take a quarter of your dough at a time out of your refrigerator, and roll it out to a quarter inch thickness. With a lightly floured glass rim, or any other desired shape you wish to use, and cut your cookies out and place on an parchment lined cookie sheet and bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until they are just lightly browned. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: walnut halves, white sugar, ground cinnamon, salt, milk, vanilla extract
name: cinnamon candied walnuts

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cream the butter and sugar. Add the dry ingredients. Mix everything together and roll into little balls. Put onto a greased baking tray, pressing the balls down very slightly with a fork. Bake at 350f and 180c for 15 minutes. Cool on a wire rack and keep in an airtight container once cold.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, light molasses, all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, baking soda, ground ginger, salt
name: chocolate ginger cookies

steps: Mix together the butter, oats, butter, honey, salt and pepper and mix well. Serve warm with icecream or caramel sauce.
ingredients: garlic, oats, butter, honey, salt and pepper
name: garlic crunch

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, turkey bacon, onion, stewed tomatoes, dried thyme, black pepper, fresh green beans
name: green beans with tomatoes and bacon

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Bake at 325 degrees for 20 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: mayonnaise, sour cream, dijon mustard, garlic salt, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, frozen brussels sprouts, butter, pecans
name: brussels sprouts with dijon sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussels sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: fresh brussels sprouts, water, chicken bouillon cubes, carrots, celery, butter, cashews, salt, dried thyme, pepper
name: brussels sprouts medley

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook chicken and chicken separately - set aside. In a large pot with boiling salted water cook pasta until al dente. Drain. In a large saucepan heat the italian dressing and olive oil together over medium heat. Add drained spaghetti. Toss well to coat. Add chopped tomatoes, cooked chicken, and grated parmesan cheese and toss lightly. Serve warm.
ingredients: cooked chicken, angel hair pasta, green pepper, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: baked chicken spaghetti casserole

steps: Cook the peas according to directions on package. Drain thoroughly. In a bowl, mix together sour cream, dill, chives, curry powder, lemon juice and salt and pepper to taste. Carefully combine with peas. Chill and serve on a bed of crisp salad greens. Garnish with more dill or chives, if desired. Makes 8 servings.
ingredients: frozen green peas, sour cream, dill, chives
name: dilled pea salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350c 400f. Heat a fry pan over high heat add oil and chicken and cook for 3 mins each side or until well browned, set aside. Add leeks and zest to the pan and cook for 5 mins until leeks are golden. Place leek mix, rice and stock in a baking dish, cover tightly with lid or foil and bake for 20 mins. Add chicken and peas to the risotto and cover tightly and bake for further 20 mins. The risotto will be quite liquid at this stage. Stir the parmesan, lemon juice, mint and salt and pepper through the risotto. Stir for 2 mins to thicken then serve.
ingredients: leeks, olive oil, risotto rice, vegetable stock, vegetarian blue cheese
name: leek and blue cheese risotto

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, milk, dried beef, green onions, green peppers, chopped pimiento, pepper, pecans
name: hot beef and cheese dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, pure vanilla extract, milk, light rum, salt, whipping cream, semisweet chocolate
name: special chocolate eggnog

steps: Place the onion in a bowl with ice water to cover. Let stand for 30 minutes, then drain well in a colander and blot dry with a paper towel. Combine the vinegar and salt in a bowl and stir or whisk until the salt crystals are dissolved. Add the onion, tomato, pepper, cayenne, oil, and cilantro and gently toss to mix. Correct the seasoning, adding salt, vinegar, or cayenne. The relish should be highly seasoned. The relish is good now. It will be amazing if you let it stand to ripen for a few hours before serving. 2 cups is enough to serve 4 to 6.
ingredients: walla walla onions, red bell pepper, brown sugar, apple juice, cider vinegar, salt, prepared horseradish, canola oil, prepared mustard
name: tangy onion relish

steps: Cook and drain meatballs, cheese and cheese mixture. Add cheese mixture to meatballs. Bake at 375 for 30-35 minutes or until heated through. Top with extra onions and cheese. Bake another 3-5 minutes.
ingredients: pasta, diced tomatoes, condensed cheddar cheese soup, water, meatballs, cooked bacon, cheddar cheese, onion
name: cheeseburger meatball casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter, sugars and eggs until smooth. Combine flour, salt and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking powder, rice krispies, semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened flaked coconut, walnuts
name: oh my d lux chocolate chip cookies

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4.
ingredients: penne pasta, frozen peas, sun-dried tomato, parmesan cheese, butter, fresh basil leaf, salt and pepper
name: red white and green mini penne

steps: Mix 3 tablespoons limeade concentrate and cumin in plastic food storage bag. Add chicken, seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator 1-2 hours. Stir together limeade concentrate and cumin in plastic food storage bag.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lime juice, olive oil, salt, avocados, tomatoes, red onion, cilantro
name: grilled lime chicken with avocado salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: cream cheese spread, oreo cookies, strawberries, chocolate syrup, powdered sugar
name: oreo berry bites

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package. Return to pot and cook pasta according to package directions.
ingredients: kosher salt, broccoli florets, bow tie pasta, unsalted butter, olive oil, garlic, lemon, zest of, fresh lemon juice, pine nuts, parmesan cheese
name: broccoli bow ties

steps: Dry the roast on both sides and sprinkle with salt and fresh ground pepper. Heat oil in 5 qt dutch over. Brown chuck on both sides, remove from pan and set aside. Add sliced onions to the same pan and cook over medium heat until carmelized. This will take a little time, but be patient, it is worth it. Dont allow the onions to burn. I would guesstimate it will take approx 30 minutes. Now add the garlic and stir it around, cook for about a full minute. Place the roast on top of the onions, pour the beer and the broth over top and cover, allowing to cook on medium for the next 2 hours. Optional -- at the hour mark, you can add quartered potatoes and carrots if you want. We prefer to serve this over mashed potatoes though, the gravy is fab.
ingredients: roast, brown sugar, onion soup mix, water, onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper, onion hamburger buns
name: better than arby s roast beef sandwiches

steps: Heat the sherry wine in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the sherry wine and cook for 1 minute. Add the sherry wine and
ingredients: prawns, soy sauce, sherry wine, lemon juice, minced ginger, garlic cloves, sesame seeds, skewers
name: sesame prawn shrimp skewers

steps: In a small, heavy saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar, crushing any lumps. First by approximately tablespoons, and then in a slow steady stream, stir in the milk. Heat over medium heat, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom of the pan, just until bubbles appear at the sides. Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla or liqueur. Top with ground nutmeg or cinnamon, whipped cream or marshmallows.
ingredients: sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, water, chocolate-covered caramel candies, milk, whipped cream, chocolate-covered caramel candie
name: hot caramel chocolate

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Heat 2 large roasting pans in the oven for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, in a large bowl, toss the zucchini with the olive oil and crushed red pepper. Season generously with salt and pepper. Spread the zucchini on the hot pans and roast for 30 minutes without stirring, until the rounds are tender and their bottom are golden. Transfer to a platter, garnish with mint and serve.
ingredients: zucchini, yellow squash, red bell pepper, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar, pine nuts, fresh basil leaves
name: roasted red bell pepper zucchini yellow squash

steps: Spread the dressing on one slice of bread. Place a lettuce leaf on the bread. Top with two slices of tomato. Top with the watercress. Add the remaining tomato and the other slice of bread.
ingredients: sourdough bread, low-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, romaine lettuce leaves, provolone cheese, tomatoes, red onion, cucumber, avocado, bean sprouts
name: seaside garden sandwich

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. In a large skillet, melt butter and saute cole slaw mix, onion and garlic until tender. Mix in salt and pepper. Gently stir in cooked and drained noodles. Toss together.
ingredients: wide egg noodles, butter, sweet onions, brown sugar, cabbage, caraway seed, salt, pepper
name: haluski pan fried cabbage and noodles

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and cook until onions are tender, about 8 hours. With a large spoon, stir the mix, breaking the pork into large shreds by pressing the meat cubes against the side of the crockpot.
ingredients: heinz chili sauce, whole berry cranberry sauce, reduced-sugar orange marmalade, ground allspice, pork loin, vegetable oil, whole grain rice
name: chili cranberry pork over rice

steps: Place chicken pieces in roaster. Cover with lid. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid. Bake 30 minutes longer uncovered. Bake 30 minutes longer
ingredients: onion, paprika, chicken gizzard, garlic clove, green pepper, tomatoes, flour, sour cream
name: chicken gizzard paprikash

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add vinegar to skillet. Boil until syrupy, scraping to loosen browned bits from skillet. Whisk in mustard and any accumulated juices from steak. Serve steaks with sauce.
ingredients: salt, red cayenne pepper, liver, oleo, shallot, dry white wine, creole mustard
name: beef liver in mustard sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Line an 8-by-8-inch glass baking dish with aluminum foil. Combine chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until evenly melted. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature. Combine eggs, sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, espresso, and salt in a large bowl and briefly stir until just incorporated. Transfer batter to the prepared baking dish. Bake until a tester inserted in the center of the brownies comes out clean, about 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool completely before cutting.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, vanilla, baking powder, salt, eggs, coconut pecan frosting
name: german chocolate brownies no cake mix required

steps: In a large skillet, cook the beef, seasoned salt, garlic powder, carrots and onions until beef is browned and veggies are crisp tender. Drain and return to skillet. Add water, cabbage, green peppers, soy sauce and seasoning packet from the noodles. Break noodles into small pieces, add to pan and stir well to cover noodles with liquid. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and noodles are tender.
ingredients: green onion, low sodium soy sauce, water, dry sherry, brown sugar, sesame seeds, garlic cloves, fresh ground black pepper, lean beef
name: thai sesame beef

steps: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the bacon and croutons. Mix well. Cook just until the bacon is cooked through, stirring constantly. Pour over the spinach mixture, tossing to coat. Season with the salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the parmesan cheese.
ingredients: bacon, sandwich bread, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, baby spinach, cucumber, buttermilk, mayonnaise, fresh herbs
name: spinach salad with bacon and croutons

steps: Cook pork chops for 2 minutes on each side. Reduce heat to medium-low. Add salt and pepper to skillet. Cover and simmer chops for 10-15 minutes. Serve with sauce poured over top.
ingredients: pork chops, butter, frozen orange juice, brown sugar, white wine, ginger
name: pork chops a l orange

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, oyster sauce, peanut butter and crused red pepper in a small bowl. Set aside. Rinse the beans and place in a microwave safe dish, cover and cook until crisp tender. Approximately 3 to 5 minutes depending on the wattage of your microwave. Remove beans from microwave, rinse in cool water and allow to drain while preparing the sauce. In a skillet or wok, heat the 1 teaspoon oil add the minced shallot and grated gingerroot. Cook the shallot and ginger for 2 minutes and then add the soy sauce mixture. Stirring until the peanut butter is melted and the sauce is smooth. If using a natural peanut butter, it may be necessary to add a tablespoon or so of water to the pan to aid in making the sauce smooth and creamy. Once the sauce is thoroughly combined, stir in beans and warm in sauce. Prior to serving sprinkle with chopped cilantro and peanuts if desired.
ingredients: teriyaki sauce, honey, butter, fresh lemon juice, fresh green beans, bacon, red bell pepper, onion, cashews
name: paula deen s fancy green beans

steps: Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add the butter. When the butter has melted, add the onion and cook until soft and translucent. Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper to taste, then increase the heat and stir. When the moisture from the mushrooms has been released, allow it to evaporate, concentrating the flavour. This might happen quickly or slowly, depending entirely on the type of mushrooms used. Add teh paprika and cayenne and fry for a few moments longer, until the paprika turns a shade darker. Finally, add teh sour cream or creme fraiche and dill, and allow it to bubbvle gently for a further 5 minutes or so. Serve immediately with rice, pasta or spatzle.
ingredients: porcini mushrooms, light olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice, fresh dill, salt & pepper
name: wild mushroom caviar

steps: Combine corn, corn, sweet bell pepper, sweet green pepper, red onion, fresh italian parsley, balsamic vinegar, lime juice, salt, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice
ingredients: fresh corn kernels, olive oil, orange sweet bell pepper, sweet green pepper, red onion, fresh italian parsley, balsamic vinegar, lime juice, salt
name: roasted corn and sweet pepper salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the shortening, margarine, eggs, and vanilla. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, egg, milk, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, cereal, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: crunchy drop cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix together olive oil, paprika and cinnamon. Toss the potato strips into mixture, to coat well, and spread onto baking sheet in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt and brown sugar. Bake for 30 minutes, turning every 10 minutes.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper, chili powder
name: kickin sweet potato fries

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray and cook tortillas for 6 minutes. Drain. Add hot sauce and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 3-5 minutes or until sauce is thickened and chicken is no longer pink in center. Place lettuce on warm tortillas and drizzle dressing on top. Roll up and serve.
ingredients: corn tortillas, hot dogs, chili, salsa, cheddar cheese
name: chili dog wraps

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine artichoke hearts, red bell pepper, green onion, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, lemon, zest of, garlic cloves, salt, pepper. Combine
ingredients: tri-color spiral pasta, artichoke hearts, red bell pepper, green onion, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, lemon, zest of, garlic cloves, salt, pepper
name: pasta salad with artichokes and lemon vinaigrette

steps: Place chicken breasts in crock pot. Pour chicken broth over chicken breasts. Sprinkle stuffing over entire top of dish. Drizzle melted butter on top of stuffing. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4 hours.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, fat-free cream of mushroom soup, fat free sour cream, dry onion soup mix
name: chicken stroganoff crock pot

steps: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook orzo 5 minutes. Add sugar snap peas and squash. Cook until orzo is al dente and vegetables are crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Drain well. Return to pot. Add lemon juice, olive oil, and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine and serve.
ingredients: tomatoes, orzo pasta, extra virgin olive oil, fresh chives, fresh basil, garlic cloves, lemon zest, salt and pepper, feta cheese
name: tomato orzo salad

steps: In a small saucepan over high heat, bring the broth to a boil. Add the chicken, carrots, peas and scallions. Reduce the heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until the carrots are tender. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Serve, or freeze for later.
ingredients: v8 vegetable juice, rotel tomatoes, onion, garlic, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, frozen vegetables, salt and pepper
name: really easy makes you feel good vegetable soup

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: dried lentils, onion, white mushrooms, red bell pepper, scallions, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, olive oil, water
name: mental with lentil lentil side dish

steps: Drain lemon juice and reserve. Combine lemon juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate.
ingredients: lemon gelatin, boiling water, crushed pineapple, whipping cream, cheddar cheese
name: lemon cheddar salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a mixing bowl, combine rhubarb, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour, whole wheat flour
ingredients: self-rising flour, whole wheat flour, ground ginger, rhubarb, glace ginger, grapeseed oil, apple juice concentrate, low-fat milk, egg whites
name: rhubarb ginger muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Heat refried beans in a pan over medium heat until hot. Spread chips out evenly on large oval oven-proof dish. Spread beans on top of chips, sprinkle cheeses over beans, and scatter jalapenos over cheese. Bake until cheese is completely melted, about 5 minutes. Garnish with dollops of sour cream then scatter pimentos over nachos. Serve immediately.
ingredients: corn chips, cream cheese, refried beans, cheese
name: unbelievable melt in mouth nachos

steps: In a saucepan over medium-high heat, add the oil, onion, and garlic. Sweat the onions for about 2 minutes. Add the cumin and beans. Stir and add the red pepper flakes. Simmer for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: black beans, garlic, ground cumin, olive oil, chicken broth, sea salt, cilantro
name: black beans with cumin and garlic

steps: Melt butter in a heavy saucepan over medium high heat. Add milk, stir and return to stove over medium high heat. Cook 2 minutes. Remove pan from burner, add milk, stir and return to stove over medium high heat. Cook, stirring constanly, until mixture comes to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly, adding more milk if the sauce becomes too thick. Season with salt and pepper, add chopped egg and mix.
ingredients: butter, plain flour, milk, paprika
name: super tasty white sauce

steps: Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes, or until golden, but not brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the chickpeas and stir until coated with the oil and spices. Stir in the spinach with just the water clinging to it, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes until wilted. Stir in the spinach with just the water clinging to it, cover and cook for 4-5
ingredients: garlic clove, fresh cilantro, chickpeas, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, salt, hot pepper sauce, ground cumin
name: moroccan chickpea dip

steps: Cook pasta just to done. Drain and cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute and drain & cool in ice water 2 minute
ingredients: fresh asparagus, chicken broth, fresh mushrooms, angel hair pasta, parmesan cheese, olive oil, cayenne pepper
name: ww pasta with asparagus 7 points

steps: Place eggs in sauce pan and cover with water. Bring water to a quick boil. Remove from heat and cover for 20 minute. Let eggs cool. Shell eggs and cut in half. Scoop out hard boiled yoke. Mash the yoke with a fork until smooth. If you add your salt now this will help. Add ranch salad dressing and cream cheese to the mashed yokes and mix well. You may need to add a little more ranch dressing to get your desired creaminess. Use a piping bag or spoon to fill the egg halves. Sprinkle with paprika.
ingredients: eggs, miracle whip, salt, pepper, paprika
name: quick and easy deviled eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Skin the onions, and in a medium sauce pan simmer them in enough chicken broth to cover for 30 minutes. Remove, and place in a buttered baking pan. Mix melted butter with a little paprika, and brush the onions with this mixture. Sprinkle the tops of the onions with bread crumbs, and add the remaining butter mixture to the backing pan. Bake at 375f for about 20 minutes, or until lightly browned.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, onion soup mix, eggs, water, breadcrumbs, pam cooking spray
name: onion crusted chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease cookie sheet. Beat sugar and shortening until creamy. Beat in egg, milk and icing sugar. Mix well. Drop by tablespoon onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. Let stand 1 minute before removing to racks to cool.
ingredients: butter, sugar, plain flour, baking powder, ground ginger, icing, icing sugar, golden syrup
name: edmonds ginger crunch

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Cut up sweet onions into wedges, rounds or thin strips. In a large bowl add the fries. Coat them with oil. You may substitute just water if desired. Then add the garlic granules, parmesan and sea salt. Spay a cookie sheet with pam or oil and lay fries out on top. Bake for 10 mins then turn them over. Put back in the oven for 10 more minutes. If you have thicker fries you may need an additional 5-10 minutes baking time.
ingredients: sweet onion, butter, olive oil, pillsbury refrigerated classic pizza crust, parmesan cheese
name: sweet onion bread skillet

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Whisk together the olive oil, butter, shallot, tomatoes, fresh parsley, leeks, lemon juice, salt, pepper and pistachios. Cut the pistachios in half and toss to combine with the olive oil mixture. Spread the pistachios in a roasting pan and place in the oven. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes or until the pistachios are shrivelled. Break the ends from the pistachios at their natural breaking point. Add the tender lengths of pistachios to the pistachios and continue to cook for 25 minutes or until the pistachios are tender.
ingredients: asparagus spear, butter, shallot, tomatoes, fresh parsley, leeks, lemon juice, salt, pepper, pistachios
name: tomato pistachio asparagus

steps: Mix the tequila, orange marmalade, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, of fresh mint and mix well. Pour the mixture over the grilled pineapple and serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh pineapple, tequila, orange marmalade, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, of fresh mint
name: tequila orange glazed grilled pineapple

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges.
ingredients: tomatoes, onions, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, bacon, seasoned bread crumbs, olive oil
name: sliced tomato n bacon casserole

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and
ingredients: zucchini, butter-flavored cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, onion, dried parsley, pepper, salt, eggs, butter
name: simple stuffed zucchini or squash

steps: Mix dry ingredients. Cut in butter. Beat egg and milk slightly in separate bowl. Milk together. Kneed on floured surface. Roll till desired thickness. Cut out with a glass or cookie cutter. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes at 175c.
ingredients: white flour, baking powder, salt, shortening, milk
name: drop baking powder biscuits

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a ovenproof skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon.
ingredients: salmon fillet, fresh oregano, garlic, pepper, plum tomatoes, onion, fresh parsley, dry breadcrumbs, olive oil
name: italian style baked salmon

steps: Cream margarine. Add gradually and beat in brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift and stir in flour, salt, baking soda. Add chocolate chips. Bake 10 minutes at 375.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, baking soda, corn flakes, chocolate chips
name: cornflake chocolate chip cookies

steps: In a large skillet, cook the beef, seasoned salt, garlic powder, carrots and onions until beef is browned and veggies are crisp tender. Drain and return to skillet. Add water, cabbage, green peppers, soy sauce and seasoning packet from the noodles. Break noodles into small pieces, add to pan and stir well to cover noodles with liquid. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and noodles are tender.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, bell pepper, garlic powder, cabbage, brown rice, rotel tomatoes, broth, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: cabbage skillet hasty tasty

steps: Heat oil in pan over medium heat. Add flour and whisk until well blended. Add milk, stir until incorporated, and bring to boil over moderate heat. Add onion and broccoli, simmer on low heat for 10 minutes. Add tuna, corn, salt, and pepper. Simmer until thickens and broccoli is tender - approximately 10 minutes. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper before serving. Serve with baguette or garlic bread, if desired.
ingredients: condensed cream of mushroom soup, chow mein noodles, tuna, celery, onion, frozen peas, cashews
name: chopstick tuna

steps: Add the olive oil, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, and basil. Mix well. Once the pasta is cooked, drain and separate between two plates. Add the olive oil, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, and basil.
ingredients: heavy cream, butter, lemons, zest of, lemon juice, parmesan cheese
name: marcella hazan s pasta al limone

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl mix sugar, cinnamon, paprika, cayenne pepper, honey, oil. Add pecans and toss well. Drizzle honey and oil over spiced nuts and mix well so they are evenly coated. Spread on greased baking sheet and bake 7 - 10 minutes until sugar is caramelized. Let it cool for 5 minutes and take it of the sheet otherwise they might stick to the bottom. If that happens put it back in oven to melt the sticky sugar.
ingredients: pecans, coconut, bananas, lemons
name: tike treat

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies.
ingredients: crunchy peanut butter, honey, chocolate whey protein powder, old-fashioned oatmeal
name: protein bar

steps: Place one chicken breast half on each double layer of foil sheet. Spoon soup over chicken. Sprinkle with paprika. Top with vegetables. Dot with margarine or butter. Fold up foil to form 4 separate packets. Place on cookie sheet and cook at 450 f for 18 to 22 minutes.
ingredients: condensed cream of chicken soup, milk, chicken flavor stuffing mix, butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, green beans
name: green bean chicken stuffing casserole

steps: In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and cream together. Gently fold in the cheese, pasta and rest of ingredients. One at a time, in that order. In a nonstick pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until the edges start to brown. Flip the frittata by sliding it onto a large plate or tray then carefully inverting it back into the pan. Continue to cook for 5 to 6 minutes more. Remove from pan then cut into wedges and serve. This is delicious served warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: eggs, gruyere, water, salt, fresh ground pepper, margarine, fresh mushrooms, green onion, flat-leaf italian parsley, fresh dill
name: cheese frittata with mushrooms and dill

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add flour and stir to make a roux. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot.
ingredients: pork, onion, garlic, green chilies, oregano, garlic salt, tomatoes, flour
name: green chile

steps: In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs.
ingredients: strawberry, pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, grapes, honey, of fresh mint
name: minted fruit salad

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Grease a baking sheet. Heat molasses in saucepan, until it boils. Put the butter into large mixing bowl, combine hot molasses. Sift together salt, baking soda and flour. Blend in ginger. Blend mixture well. Let mixture chill in refrigerator, just until cold. Take out, roll batter very thin. Cut with cookie cutter. Using the spatula, put on baking sheet. Bake for approximately 5 minutes, or until golden.
ingredients: flour, ginger, baking soda, margarine, brown sugar, eggs, molasses, vinegar
name: best gingerbread cookies

steps: Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add bell pepper, onion and garlic, and saute for 2-3 minutes, or until vegetables are tender. Add chicken broth, tomatoes, oregano, basil and black pepper. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low. Place spanish baked fish in a shallow pan. Cover with green pepper and onion, then sprinkle with curry powder. Drizzle with coconut oil or melted butter. Squeeze remaining lime juice on fish. Cover tightly with lid or foil and bake for 10 minutes, then baste with liquid. Fish is done when it flakes easily with fork.
ingredients: perch fillets, tomato sauce, onion, garlic powder, chili powder, oregano flakes, ground cumin
name: spanish baked fish

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, vermouth, heavy cream, lemon juice, lemon
name: barbara bush s lemon chicken

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: butterscotch pudding, oats, peanut butter, vanilla protein powder, skim milk, wheat bran
name: vanilla butterscotch protein bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place brussels sprouts in shallow baking dish. In a small bowl, combine oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper, garlic, vegetable broth, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese. Pour evenly over sprouts then sprinkle with the cheese. Bake at 350 for about 20 minutes, or until brussels sprouts are tender.
ingredients: brussels sprout, olive oil, butter, dry white wine, gingerroot, garlic, vegetable broth, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: sauteed brussels sprouts with ginger and parmesan

steps: In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in limes, mint, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube
ingredients: water, sugar, rose water, limes, mint leaf, soda water, red food coloring, ice cube, rose petal
name: rose water soda

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and mix well. Beat the yolks until pale and smooth. Beat in the buttermilk and then the baking soda and mix well. Beat in the dry ingredients mixing as you add. Make sure the batter is smooth. Add in the melted butter and mix well. Beat the egg whites in another bowl until stiff. Fold into the batter until no bits of white are visible. Let batter stand about 20 minutes before making pancakes. Make sure your griddle is really hot. Ladle batter onto griddle. Turn when bubbles form across the cakes and allow to lightly brown on the second side. Serve with warm maple syrup and sweet butter.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, baking soda, vegetable oil, egg, buttermilk
name: famous buttermilk pancakes

steps: In a shallow bowl, beat together apples, dark brown sugar, dark corn syrup, ground cinnamon, french bread, eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, ground nutmeg. Dip bread slices into egg mixture, coating both sides. In a skillet or on a griddle, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat. Add half of the bread slices and cook for 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat with remaining butter and bread slices. Serve warm. If desired, serve with maple syrup.
ingredients: butter, apples, dark brown sugar, dark corn syrup, ground cinnamon, french bread, eggs, milk, vanilla, salt
name: french toast apple bake

steps: To make gin tonic syrup, combine 2 cups of sugar and 2 cups of water over medium-high heat in a saucepan until the sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and let cool completely before using. To store, refrigerate up to 2 months. In a glass, combine 2 cups of sugar and 2 cups of water over medium-high heat in a saucepan until the sugar is dissolved. In a glass, combine 2 cups of sugar and 2 cups of water over medium-high heat in a saucepan until
ingredients: tonic water, gin, lime juice, lime wedge
name: frosty gin tonic

steps: Place pasta, tomatoes, basil, in a large stock pot. Pour in vegetable broth. Sprinkle on top the pepper flakes and oregano. Drizzle top with oil. Cover pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a low simmer and keep covered and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes or so. Cook until almost all liquid has evaporated i left about an inch of liquid in the bottom of the pot but you can reduce as desired. Season to taste with salt and pepper, stirring pasta several times to distribute the liquid in the bottom of the pot. Serve garnished with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, basil, crushed red pepper flakes, chopped tomatoes, pasta, parmesan cheese, romano cheese
name: tomato and basil pasta

steps: Place salmon in 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over salmon. Turn salmon so that it gets coated with the marinade. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Drain excess marinade from salmon. Bake in preheated 425 f oven for 10-12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily and is opaque in centre.
ingredients: salmon steaks, lemon, juice of, cream cheese, tomatoes, mushroom, fresh chives, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, lemon wedge
name: chive baked salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Butter a shallow baking dish and arrange fish pieces in it. Cover fish with coriander slices. In a small bowl, whisk together coriander, black bean garlic sauce, garlic, green onions, salt and pepper. Pour over the fish and coriander slices. Bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes or until fish is tender. Do not overcook or fish will dry out.
ingredients: sole, fresh coriander, black bean garlic sauce, garlic, green onions
name: roasted sole fillets

steps: Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cottage cheese, onion, butter, pepper, salt, parmesan cheese
name: gourmet mashed potato casserole

steps: Combine marinade, soy sauce, mustard powder, mustard powder, mustard powder, mustard powder, mustard powder, mustard powder, mustard powder, mustard powder, mustard powder, mustard powder, ingredients: light soy sauce, mustard powder, clear honey, fresh ginger, onion, garlic cloves, star anise, chicken, salt and pepper
name: grilled chicken breast with oriental marinade

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients until thoroughly combined. Taste and correct seasoning. Refrigerate 30 minutes to let flavors blend. Serve.
ingredients: light mayonnaise, nonfat sour cream, honey, dijon mustard, cabbage, romaine lettuce, radish, green onion, pecans
name: honey mustard coleslaw with radishes

steps: Combine geletin, cornstarch, and sugar in a large saucepan. Add water and stir to combine. Add strawberries and mash to break into small pieces. Heat over medium-high heat until mixture boils. Continue to boil for 1 minute or until syrup thickens. Cool. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: raspberries, sugar, cornstarch, water
name: raspberry syrup

steps: In a medium sized glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, and salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips.
ingredients: yellow tomatoes, shallot, garlic clove, cilantro, champagne, serrano chili peppers, lime juice, salt, maple syrup
name: yellow tomato salsa

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Pat dry the chicken, dip into egg, then roll in the breadcumb mix. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: brown sugar, soy sauce, sesame seeds, garlic cloves, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: barbecued sesame chicken breasts

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Spray a medium baking dish with the olive oil spray to coat. Place the halved tomatoes, cut side up, in a single layer in the prepared dish. Sprinkle with the sea salt and lightly spray with more olive oil spray. Bake for 40 minutes or until tomatoes are lightly browned and tender. Meanwhile, combine the vinegar, oil and mustard in a small bowl and set aside. Mix the herbs and feta together and set aside. Remove tomatoes from oven when cooked and place them on a serving platter and sprinkle with the combined herbs and feta. Drizzle with the dressing and freshly ground black pepper. Serve.
ingredients: red beans, tomatoes, olive oil, salt, black pepper
name: red bean tomato salad

steps: In a 4-quart saucepan, combine the cranberries, water, sugar, unsalted butter, salt, vanilla extract, sour cream. Bring to a boil over high heat, and continue boiling until thickened, about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla. Cool to room temperature. Just before serving, fold in the sour cream and mix well.
ingredients: seedless raspberry jam, cranberries, ground cinnamon, allspice, fresh lemon rind
name: cran raspberry sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large non stick frying pan over medium heat. Add butter and sauté until butter is melted. Add salt and pepper and sauté until butter is melted. Add parmesan cheese and sauté until cheese is melted. Add parmesan cheese and
ingredients: self raising flour, cheddar cheese, paprika, black pepper, dried sage, butter, evaporated milk, milk, parmesan cheese, poppy seeds
name: cheese and sage damper

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: almond flour, splenda sugar substitute, butter, egg, vanilla
name: low carb almond sugar cookies

steps: Cook pine nut and leek stuffing in large skillet until browned. Remove with slotted spoon& drain. Saute pine nuts in remaining pine nuts drippings until tender. Combine pine nut and leek stuffing in a large mixing bowl. Blend well. Moisten with chicken broth. Mixture can be stuffed into turkey, or placed into a greased 13x9 baking dish& dot with butter. Cover& bake 20 minutes at 350f. Uncover& bake 10 minutes more, or until golden brown.
ingredients: white bread, leeks, celery, butter, pine nuts, rubbed sage, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground pepper, chicken broth
name: pine nut and leek stuffing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Put the onion sauce over the potatoes and sprinkle the rest of the cheese on top. Cover and cook for 10 minutes more or until the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, ground beef, stewed tomatoes, water, elbow macaroni, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: poverty meal

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Drain the berries and reserve the syrup from one can. Stir the syrup in to the combined mixture of the cornstarch and half of the sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat. Gently stir in remaining sugar, blueberries, and lemon juice. Let stand while preparing pastry. Line a 9-inch pie pan with pastry and fill with the filling. Dot with butter or margarine. Adjust top crust on pie, cuttin slits for the steam to escape, and seal. I recommend adding some sugar over the top after sealing. Bake for 30 minutes or until filling is bubbly and crust is brown.
ingredients: pie crust, sugar, flour, sour cream, egg, vanilla, salt, blueberries, butter, pecans
name: blueberry sour cream pie

steps: Butter a 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix sugar, evaporated milk, granulated sugar, unsweetened pineapple juice, butter, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, candied pineapple, lemon juice, cand
ingredients: evaporated milk, granulated sugar, unsweetened pineapple juice, butter, candied pineapple, lemon juice
name: tropical fudge

steps: In a 9 inch pie pan, combine eggs, whipping cream, tabasco sauce, tarragon, chicken base, fresh spinach, swiss cheese, parmesan cheese, ham. Whip until smooth. Arrange the pie shell in a 9 inch pie pan. Add the grated swiss cheese, spinach, ham and parmesan cheese. Pour the egg mixture over all and bake at 350 for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, hash browns, swiss cheese, green onion, cottage cheese, salt, pepper, hot sauce, paprika, bacon
name: potato quiche

steps: Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired. Bake at 350 degrees for 10 to 12 minutes. Remove from pan and let cool.
ingredients: dates, cold water, lemon juice, brown sugar, butter, baking soda, rolled oats, salt, vanilla
name: date squares gluten free

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat almonds. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and almonds are toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool.
ingredients: whole almonds, soy sauce, brown sugar, ground ginger, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, canola oil
name: soy glazed almonds

steps: Sprinkle cheese on top, cover till melted.
ingredients: red bell peppers, onion, garlic, beef sirloin, ground cumin, chili powder, fresh lime juice, cooking spray, 6-inch flour tortillas
name: easy beef or chicken fajitas

steps: In a saucepan, bring the coconut milk and water to a boil. Remove from heat and whisk in the jello powder until dissolved. Stir in the ice water. Chill 20 minutes. Beat the mixture 1 minute. Fold in the cake, 4 cups of whipped topping, and the fruit. Spoon into a dish lined with plastic wrap. Cover and chill overnight. Unmold cake onto serving plate and remove plastic. Frost the cake with the remaining whipped topping.
ingredients: honey, cinnamon sticks, banana, lemon juice, star fruit, mango, kiwi fruit, wooden skewers, vanilla ice cream, flaked coconut
name: tropical fruit kabobs with coconut ice cream

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: unsalted butter, bacon, ham, yellow onion, canned tomato, water, salt, fresh ground pepper, green beans
name: emeril s green beans creole

steps: Heat the oil in a large non stick fry pan. When it is hot, add the thighs in one layer and saute them over medium to high heat for 4 minutes on each side or until nicely browned. Remove the chicken to a platter. Add the onions to the dripping in the pan. Saut for 1 minute. Stir in the garlic, wine and coriander stems only and saut for 1 minute longer. Return the chicken to the pan, add lemon salt and pepper. Bring the surrounding liquid to the boil. Cover the pan, reduce the heat and boil gently for 15 minutes. Stir in the coriander leaves and serve 2 thighs per person. Serve with rice or cous cous.
ingredients: skinless chicken legs, frozen orange juice concentrate, worcestershire sauce, cider vinegar, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, granulated sugar, salt, black pepper
name: coriander chicken legs

steps: Cream the shortening and brown sugar together in a mixing bowl with an electric mixer. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Gradually beat in the bisquick until fully incorporated. Carefully beat in the chocolate chips. Grease a cookie sheet with cooking spray, and pour on tablespoons of dough about 2 inches apartl. Bake at 375f for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown at the edges.
ingredients: fat-free sweetened condensed milk, reduced-fat peanut butter, bisquick, chocolate chips, sugar
name: bisquick peanut butter chocolate chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat an 8 x 8-inch pan with oil or nonstick spray. Dice the potatoes and put them aside. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the milk, celery soup, eggs, onion powder, salt and pepper until smooth. Stir in the tuna, cheese, and diced potatoes, then pour the mixture into the prepared pan. It should come nearly to the top. Bake for 55 to 60 mniutes, or until a knife inserted into the center comes out clean. The edges should be golden brown.
ingredients: tuna, peanuts, cream cheese, mayonnaise, prepared yellow mustard, refrigerated biscuits, garlic powder, all-purpose flour
name: tuna tarts

steps: Combine flour, salt and pepper, pork cutlets, butter, white mushrooms, garlic, chicken stock, light sour cream, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy sauce, fresh parsley, soy
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, pork cutlets, butter, white mushrooms, garlic, chicken stock, light sour cream, soy sauce, fresh parsley
name: schnitzel with mushroom sauce

steps: Melt butter in pot and cook pumpkin. Pour in pumpkin. Stir in chicken stock until smooth. Add dried mustard and worcestershire sauce if desired. Cook for approximately 20 minutes. Add white wine. Stir in heavy cream in the last 1-2 minutes and cook only until warmed through. Season to taste.
ingredients: canned pumpkin, whole milk, water, rice, butter, parsley, salt and black pepper, white cheddar cheese
name: pumpkin soup iv

steps: In a large pot pour in the beer, vinegar, salt, and lemon and bring to a rapid boil. Place a steamer rack in the bottom of the pot and cover with a layer of shrimp. Sprinkle the old bay seasoning over the layer and repeat until all of the shrimp are in the pot. Cover tightly and let steam for 10 minutes until all of the shrimp have turned a bright red. Remove the shrimp and allow to cool slightly.
ingredients: shrimp, lemon, juice of, red onion, honey, green olives, olive juice, white vinegar, olive oil, tabasco sauce
name: bert s marinated shrimp

steps: Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips.
ingredients: tuna, white bread, lettuce leaf, onion, butter, chili, parsley, lemon juice, black pepper, salt
name: tuna sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars.
ingredients: powdered sugar, peanut butter, margarine, milk, semisweet chocolate, shortening
name: peanut butter bonbons

steps: Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes.
ingredients: fat free cream cheese, cinnamon, sugar, raisins
name: no fat raisin cinnamon bagel spread

steps: Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all.
ingredients: red potatoes, kraft calorie-wise italian dressing, miracle whip calorie-wise, dijon mustard, hard-cooked egg, green onion
name: creamy potato salad made over

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place chips on a foil-lined baking sheet. Top with salsa, beans, scallions and cheese. Heat until cheese is melted. Top with guacamole. Serve immediately, garnishing with scallions.
ingredients: refried beans, sour cream, salsa, cheddar cheese, corn tortilla chips
name: no time flat nuked nachos with salsa and cheese

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder
ingredients: chopped tomatoes, cucumber, onion, fresh basil, olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic, garlic salt, pepper, french bread
name: crusty bread salad

steps: In a small bowl, add the bourbon to the cornstarch and stir until the cornstarch has dissolved. Add the rest of the ingredients except the chicken and oil, and stir again until the sugar has dissolved. Then set the sauce aside. Coat both sides of the thawed chicken breast with the olive oil and fry for 4 minutes on each side, or until the internal temperature reaches 165f remove the chicken and cut into bite size pieces. Put the chicken back into the pan, along with the sauce and simmer over low heat until the sauce starts to bubble. Serve with rice or noodles.
ingredients: chicken, soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic powder, powdered ginger, dried onion flakes, bourbon whiskey
name: shannon s golden corral bourbon chicken

steps: Spread chocolate pudding mixture over the cake. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: chocolate pudding mix, light corn syrup, creamy peanut butter, cheerios toasted oat cereal
name: pudding squares

steps: Cook green beans according to package directions, using the lowest time given. In a large skillet, fry bacon until desired doneness. Drain on paper towel and return to skillet. Add cooked green beans, chicken broth, and onion powder to the skillet. Stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for ten minutes or until most of the liquid is evaporated, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: bacon, green beans, red bell pepper, low sodium chicken broth
name: green beans with bacon and red bell pepper

steps: In a large bowl, combine cucumbers and onions. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients, stirring, until sugar is dissolved. Pour over cucumber mixture. Mix well. Cover and chill overnight. May be refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: whole wheat bread, cream cheese, cucumbers, alfalfa sprouts, olive oil, red wine vinegar, tomatoes, lettuce, pepperoncini peppers, avocado
name: veggies dream cucumber sandwich

steps: Heat olive oil, onion, carrot, celery, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, vegetable stock, tomatoes, vegetables, fresh flat-leaf parsley in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil, onion, carrot, celery, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, vegetable stock, tomatoes, vegetables, fresh flat-leaf parsley in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil, onion, carrot,
ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, celery, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, vegetable stock, tomatoes, vegetables, fresh flat-leaf parsley
name: mark bittman s fast vegetable soup

steps: In a 1-qt. Microwave-safe microwave-safe casserole,, mash the beans with a fork. Stir in the salsa, chili powder, cumin, and salt, if desired. Stir to mix well. Stir in the cheese. Cover with the casserole lid, and microwave on high power for 3 to 4 minutes until heated through. Remove from the microwave. Stir to mix in the melted cheese. Spread the sour cream on top. Sprinkle with the chives. Serve warm with tortilla chips. Cover and refrigerate leftovers, which will keep 4 to 5 days.
ingredients: tamales, onion, chili con carne, cheddar cheese, salsa
name: tamale dip microwave

steps: Place each chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place bag in a resealable bag. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic, and salt. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, garlic, salt, pepper, fresh lemon juice, olive oil
name: grilled garlic lemon chicken

steps: In a food processor with a metal blade or a blender container, combine the beans, broth, salsa, and cumin. Process 1 minute, or until smooth. Heat bean mixture in a medium saucepan over medium heat, until thoroughly heated. To serve, ladle soup into 2 individual bowls. Spoon 1 tablespoon of sour cream on top of each. Swirl gently. Sprinkle with green onions.
ingredients: cooked chicken, chicken broth, water, salsa, black beans, frozen corn, cumin, black pepper
name: banders chicken salsa soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl combine quinoa, oatmeal, flour, sugar, canola oil. In another bowl wisk oats, almond meal, coconut, cinnamon, salt and baking powder. Add dry ingredients to wet ones. Fold in chocolate chunks. Drop small dollops on parchment or silpat lined baking sheet. Bake 14-18 minutes, as long as possible without burning.
ingredients: quinoa, oatmeal, flour, sugar, canola oil
name: multigrain exam cookies high energy healthy

steps: Heat the dressing in a medium skillet on medium heat. Coat the fish with flour and then add to the pan. Cook 4-5 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Remove from skillet, cover and keep warm. Add broth and lemon juice to the pan. Cook 3 minutes, until it is reduced by half, stirring frequently with a whisk. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve, and sprinkle sesame seeds atop.
ingredients: spicy brown mustard, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, garlic powder, oregano, parmesan cheese, rice flour, tilapia fillet
name: mustard crusted tilapia

steps: Combine all ingredients, except pia colada nonalcoholic drink mix, water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked
ingredients: pina colada nonalcoholic drink mix, water, crushed pineapple, sweetened flaked coconut, powdered sugar, cornstarch, cold water
name: pia colada dipping sauce

steps: Cover with cold water by 1 inch in a 2-quart heavy saucepan and bring to a rolling boil, partially covered. Reduce heat to low and cook eggs, covered completely, 30 seconds. Remove pan from heat and let eggs stand in hot water, covered, 15 minutes. Transfer eggs with a slotted spoon to a bowl of ice and cold water and let stand 5 minutes. Peel eggs and finely chop.
