Stir together eggs and remaining salad ingredients in a bowl with a fork. Spoon egg salad onto bread and spread evenly. Top with favorite garnishes.
ingredients: blue cheese, pear, walnuts, bread, unsalted butter, shallot, salt and pepper, fresh tarragon
name: stilton pear and walnut tea sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Remove the stems from the caps, chop off the ends, and cut into large pieces. Cut the mushrooms into pieces no larger than 2 inches in size. Mix the olive oil with the garlic, herbs and seasonings in an ovenproof casserole dish large enough to fit all of the mushrooms. Add the mushrooms, and mix well, coating the mushrooms with the flavored oil. Bake for about 30 to 40 minutes, or until cooked through. Remove from the heat, and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: trout fillets, seasoned flour, butter, garlic clove, fresh sage, fresh mushrooms, dry white wine, heavy cream, salt and pepper
name: trout with mushroom sauce truites aux champignons

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice.
ingredients: frozen bread dough, butter, egg, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt, parsley
name: garlic bread ring

steps: Heat oil with cornstarch in saucepan over medium heat. Cook for 1 minute. Add in chicken pieces and can of green chilies. Mix well and add cream cheese. Cook over low heat until cream cheese melts. Put mixture in a 13 x 9 baking pan, top with 1 cup of grated cheese pour the whipping cream over the top and then put the last cup of grated cheese over that. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes or so, checking to make sure the cheese gets bubbly, not burnt.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salsa, cheese sauce, sour cream, flour tortillas, cayenne pepper, paprika, adobo seasoning, tomato sauce, shredded cheddar cheese
name: easy spicy chicken enchiladas

steps: In a medium sauce pan combine the powdered sugar, egg yolks, cornstarch, soymilk, vanilla extract, heavy cream, vanilla flavoring, and whisk until smooth. Add powdered sugar and mix well. Pour into ice cream mixer or machine. For best results let ice cream freeze over night.
ingredients: powdered sugar, egg yolks, cornstarch, soymilk, vanilla extract
name: vanilla soy ice cream

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, eggs, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking soda, vanilla extract
name: easiest brownies

steps: Place a heavy, deep skillet over medium-high heat. After a few minutes, add the oil. Wait a minute or so and add the green beans. Turn the heat to high and stir-fry for about 5 minutes, or until the beans are well seared. Add the garlic, salt and red pepper, if using. Stir-fry for several more minutes, then remove from heat.
ingredients: sesame oil, green beans, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, chili-garlic sauce
name: szechuan style green beans

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Beat butter and sugar until smooth and creamy. Add brown sugar and mix well. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. Let cool on rack or serve warm with cream.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, milk, eggs, brown sugar, caramel topping, pecans, ground cinnamon
name: cinnamon bun bars

steps: Mix together all ingredients in a plastic bag and add steak. Refrigerate and marinate for 4 to 8 hours, flipping the steaks occasionally. Remove steaks from refrigerator 30 minutes before grilling. Drain and discard marinade from steaks. Grill over medium heat until steaks reach your desired doneness. Remove from grill and let rest for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, beef cube steaks, salt & fresh ground pepper, pancetta, onion, garlic clove, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, tomato sauce
name: italian bbq cube steak rachel ray

steps: Place broccoli in a steamer basket and set in a saucepan over 1 inch of boiling water. Cover and steam just until tender, approx. 5 minutes. To prepare the sauce, combine the orange juice, honey and ginger in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Add the cornstarch mixture and return to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook the sauce until thickened, about 1 minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Stir in the lemon juice and the sesame oil. Arrange the broccoli in a serving bowl. Top with the sauce, sprinkle with sesame seeds.
ingredients: fresh orange juice, butter, honey, dijon mustard, orange zest, broccoli florets, water, salt, hazelnuts
name: orange and hazelnut broccoli

steps: Place mushrooms, carrots, long grain and wild rice blend, beef sirloin, beef broth in a large dutch oven pot over med-high heat until browned on all sides. Combine stewed mushrooms, carrots, long grain and wild rice blend, beef sirloin, beef broth in a large dutch oven pot over med-high heat until browned on all sides. Combine stewed mushrooms
ingredients: sliced mushrooms, carrots, long grain and wild rice blend, beef sirloin, beef broth
name: montana wild rice beef stew with five ingredients

steps: In a large skillet, brown beef in butter on both sides. Transfer to a 3 quart slow cooker. Top with onion. Combine soup and water, pour over onion. Cover and cook on low 8-9 hours or until meet is tender. Serve with noodles.
ingredients: minute steaks, all-purpose flour, paprika, salt and pepper, eggs, dried breadcrumbs, butter, olive oil, lemon
name: beef schnitzel

steps: Heat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Prepare tortillas in this order, lay tortillas on flat surface, spread 1 tablespoon of salsa on half of tortilla, place half of meatloaf over salsa, top with half of cheese. Fold other half of tortilla over cheese. Repeat with rest of the ingredients for other tortilla. Place both in skillet and lightly brown on both sides, about 10 minutes total, or until desired brownness is reached. Cut each in half. Eat and enjoy.
ingredients: lean hamburger, salsa con queso, salsa, red kidney beans, scallion
name: restarunt style queso

steps: Heat oven to 180c. Spray a medium baking dish with the olive oil spray to coat. Place the halved tomatoes, cut side up, in a single layer in the prepared dish. Sprinkle with the sea salt and lightly spray with more olive oil spray. Bake for 40 minutes or until tomatoes are lightly browned and tender. Meanwhile, combine the vinegar, oil and mustard in a small bowl and set aside. Mix the herbs and feta together and set aside. Mix the herbs and fet
ingredients: tomatoes, feta, oregano, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, black olives
name: turkish tomato and feta salad

steps: Chop the avocados. Chop the tomatoes. Cut jalapeo in half and remove seeds. Add cilantro. Allow to sit in fridge for one hour. Eat same day made.
ingredients: avocados, lemon juice, sea salt, chili powder, cumin
name: easy avocado dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeos and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving.
ingredients: long-grain rice, rotel, vegetable oil, chicken broth, carrot, zucchini, salt
name: easy mexican rice

steps: Heat over low-medium until warmed. Pour over brisket and top with onion & pickle slices. Top with additional barbeque sauce as desired.
ingredients: beef brisket, barbecue sauce, orange juice, onions, oil
name: bar b qued brisket

steps: Place chicken and brown both sides. Add green pepper and onion strips, put a lid and cook until chicken is heated through and the onion and pepper strips become tender. Add the seasoning mixture and cook until chicken is heated through and the onion and pepper strips become tender. Add the seasoning mixture and cook until chicken is cooked through and the onion and pepper strips become tender. Add the seasoning mixture and cook until chicken is cooked
ingredients: all-purpose flour, chicken tenders, olive oil, butter, hoisin sauce, orange juice, red pepper flakes, mandarin oranges, green onion, cashews
name: mandarin orange chicken

steps: Mix first four ingredients and add hot water. Knead well. Let stand 10 minutes. Cut into desired size. Fry in hot grease.
ingredients: dry yeast, warm water, water, sugar, butter, salt, flour
name: quick sunday bread

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Cook patties, in batches, about 6 minutes on each side or until browned and done.
ingredients: ground turkey, warm water, sea salt, nutmeg, allspice, garlic powder, sage, thyme, mustard powder, lemon peel
name: turkey breakfast sausage

steps: In a large bowl, combine the warm milk, yeast, sugar, eggs and oil. Cover and process on low speed for 30 seconds or until blended. In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Add the yeast mixture and stir with a spoon until combined. Cover and let rise ntil doubled, about 30 minutes. Bake at 350 for 18-20 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, bread flour, active dry yeast, honey, salt, water, beer, oil
name: whole wheat beer honey bread machine rolls

steps: Combine honey, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardamom, cardam
ingredients: grapefruits, honey, pure vanilla extract, ground cardamom
name: broiled grapefruit with honey vanilla cardamom

steps: Whisk together whole milk, baking chocolate, sugar and cornstarch in a saucepan over medium heat. Add milk and cook, stirring, until hot. Add vanilla and stir. Pour chocolate into serving cups and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and nutmeg and serve with a cinnamon stick.
ingredients: whole milk, baking chocolate, sugar, cornstarch
name: chocolate caliente spanish hot chocolate too

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the water and milk. When bubbles just begin to break the surface, slowly add the grits, whisking constantly. Cook, stirring frequently and scraping the bottom of the pan, until thickened and scallops are tender. Add salt to taste and hot pepper sauce, if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: water, milk, onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, salt, grits, sharp cheddar cheese, scallions, thyme leaves
name: cheesy grits with scallions

steps: Dissolve jell-o in boiling water. Add pineapple juice and refrigerate 1 hour to cool. Also chill the condensed milk for 1 hour. Beat the condensed milk till thick. Beat jello till light and fluffy, then add pineapple juice and refrigerate 1 hour to cool.
ingredients: orange jell-o, boiling water, cream cheese, whipped topping, crushed pineapple, carrot
name: annie s salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces macaroni shells and cheese into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: macaroni shells and cheese, corn, black beans, olives, tomatoes and green chilies
name: pantry mexican shells and cheese

steps: In a small bowl, dissolve the sugar in the hot water. Press the grated ginger through a fine strainer set over the bowl, releasing the juice. In a cocktail shaker, muddle the diced cucumber with the 2 torn basil leaves. Add the ginger syrup, gin, lime juice and a handful of ice. Shake well, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish the martini with a cucumber slice and the remaining whole basil leaf and serve.
ingredients: water, sugar, lemon, zest of, lemons, juice of, vodka
name: meyer lemon drop martini

steps: In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pocketspreparation:In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pocketspreparation:In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pocketspreparation:In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pocketspreparation:In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pocketspreparation:In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pocketspreparation:In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pocketspreparation:In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pocketspreparation:In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pocketspreparation
ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, basil, oregano, garlic clove, salt and pepper, mini pita pockets
name: pita triangles

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: cauliflower, sour cream, salt and pepper, sharp cheddar cheese
name: e z cheesy cauliflower bake

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
ingredients: tomatoes, water, onion, celery, fresh parsley, bay leaf, salt, paprika, sugar
name: homemade tomato juice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Arrange chops in a shallow 2 quart baking dish. Pour apple juice over chops and sprinkle with raisins and salt. Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. Turn chops. Combine brown sugar, nutmeg and cinnamon and coat apple wedges with this mixture. Cover and bake an additional 15 minutes.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, apples, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, salt, pepper, dry sherry
name: baked pork chops with apple sherry

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: warm water, honey, salt, yeast, olive oil, fresh rosemary, fresh oregano, garlic, whole wheat flour
name: whole wheat herbed garlic bread

steps: Cook pork chops until tender, about 1 hour. Remove from heat and place on a platter in a warm oven. Add butter, brown sugar and cinnamon to pan over medium heat. Stir to blend well and to allow to caramelize slightly. Add apple slices and return to heat until the apples are hot. Pour over the pork chops. Serve with rice or potatoes.
ingredients: oil, cinnamon applesauce, brown sugar, pork chops
name: mom s scrumptious applesauce pork chops

steps: Combine all the ingredients except the kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh rosemary, aluminum foil, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion,
ingredients: kielbasa, red potatoes, yellow onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh rosemary, aluminum foil
name: barbecue grilled kielbasa dinner packets

steps: Combine all ingredients for the creamed butter to a fine, soft, spreadable consistency. With a small knife, make a small cross in the base of each cucumber. Plunge the cucumber into a pan of boiling water and count to 20. Remove them to a bowl of cold water, drain and peel off the skins. Butter 10 slices of bread with the creamed butter. Quarter the tomatoes and remove the seeds, press the petals flat and lay them on the slice of buttered bread. Do not layer the tomatoes, as they will cause the sandwiches to come unstuck. Salt and pepper the tomatoes and then press a second slice of bread firmly on to the top of the sandwich, crust and cut into appropriate shapes.
ingredients: english cucumber, unsalted butter, salt & fresh ground pepper, white bread
name: cucumber and butter tea sandwiches

steps: Put vanilla bean in a small saucepan and heat to medium low, so the garlic is just barely sizzling but not browning. Simmer for 10 minutes and remove from the heat, and add 10 of the vanilla bean leaves. Let sit for approx. 20 minutes and then remove the garlic and basil leaves. In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, lemon zest, mustard, salt and pepper. Slowly whisk in the flavored oil until the dessing is creamy and blended. Roll the remaining vanilla bean leaves into a tight roll and slice across to make thin shreds. Stir into dressing.
ingredients: vanilla bean, olive oil, champagne vinegar, hot water, honey, dried tarragon, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: fresh vanilla bean vinaigrette

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place oil and garlic in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute until garlic is browned. Add onion and zucchini. Toss well with garlic oil, gently stirring. Stir in tomato sauce and seasonings. Turn into a 2-quart baking dish. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle on cheeses. Cover casserole and let sit for 2 minutes or until cheese melts- serve immediately.
ingredients: french bread, garlic, zucchini, ricotta cheese, salt and pepper
name: zucchini crostini

steps: Put apples and cinnamon on top of bread. Top with apples and cinnamon. Top with apples and
ingredients: bread, butter, tart apples, cinnamon, marzipan
name: appelkalle swedish apple sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line cookie sheets with parchment or silpat. Whisk together flour, baking powder, soda, and salt in a medium bowl. Set aside. In a separate large bowl, cream butter and sugar together with an electric mixer until light in color. Beat in egg and orange zest. Add flour mixture a little at a time with mixer on low speed, stirring until just combine. Fold in cranberries and chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake 9-12 minutes in preheated oven or until the edges of the cookies are just slightly golden. Cool for 3-4 minutes in preheated oven or until the edges of the cookies are just slightly golden. Cool for 3-4 minutes on pan, then transfer to a baking rack and cool completely. Adding coconut is an option as is adding nuts.
ingredients: butter flavor crisco, sugar, egg, orange extract, orange zest, all-purpose flour, salt
name: orange crispies

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix together all ingredients except chicken or fish, in a flat dish. Moisten chicken with water. Coat with mixture. Place in a shallow baking dish. Bake 20 minutes or until chicken is baked through. At this time you may put the chicken under the broiler to turn the crust to gold. Watch carefully so the chicken does not burn, while under the broiler. Remove from oven and uncover. Sprinkle remaining parmesan cheese, and the mozzarella over the chicken breasts, and continue baking for 5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, ritz cracker, parmesan cheese
name: easy parmesan chicken

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: sugar, water, pineapple juice, lemons, juice of, bananas, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, frozen raspberries
name: banana crush punch

steps: Combine first 3 ingredients in a blender. Process until smooth. Add ice cream. Pour into glasses. Serve immediately.
ingredients: bananas, blueberries, lime juice, brown sugar, plain fat-free yogurt
name: banana berry frozen yogurt

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahreheit. In a small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and melted butter. Mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly in the bottom of a 13x9 baking pan. Pour sweetened condensed milk evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with semi-sweet chocolate chips, white chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, peanut butter chips, coconut, and nuts. Press down firmly with a fork. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, vanilla chips, dried cranberries, sweetened condensed milk, flaked coconut, pecan halves
name: holiday cranberry magic cookie bars

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Place mushroom caps, gill sides up, on a rimmed baking sheet. Drizzle butter in a large skillet or saute pan over medium heat. Saute mushrooms, spinach, basil, salt, pepper and garlic until mushrooms are tender and spinach is heated through. Pour in wine and reduce heat to low. Simmer 1 minute. Stir in parmesan cheese and serve.
ingredients: portabella mushroom caps, olive oil, pepper, cayenne pepper, frozen creamed spinach, garlic cloves, onions, salt, sharp cheddar cheese
name: mushrooms florentine

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Place fish in baking pan. Mix orange juice and butter. Pour half this mixture over the fish. Sprinkle the rind over. Bake for 10 minutes. Pour remaining orange mixture over. Bake another 10 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients: white fish fillets, orange juice, green onions, teriyaki sauce, fresh ginger, cornflour, water
name: orange teriyaki fish

steps: Mix seasonings together in small dish. Trim fat from steak and rub seasoning mixture on both sides. Place steak on rack of broiler pan. Position pan so that steak is about 3 inches from heat. Broil 10-12 minutes for a steak, turning once during cooking or grill as desired. Serve with baked potatoes, sour cream and chives, and steamed broccoli.
ingredients: balsamic vinegar, olive oil, shallot, fresh rosemary, beef tenderloin steaks
name: grilled beef tenderloin steaks in balsamic marinade

steps: Mix together the first 9 ingredients in a slow cooker. Cover and cook on high for 1 hour. Gently smash the beans along the side of the crockery. Sprinkle with cheese, cover, and cook for 30 more minutes. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, minced garlic cloves, chipotle chiles in adobo, ground cumin, dried oregano, adobo sauce, fat-free refried beans, salsa
name: spicy chipotle bean dip

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts
name: mccormick vanilla rich chocolate chip cookies

steps: Place pork in crock pot. Pour liquid mix over pork chops. Cook in crock pot on low for 4-5 hours low for 6-8 hours. Taste great served on rice or egg noodles.
ingredients: pork loin, beer, italian dressing, barbecue sauce, teriyaki sauce
name: crock pot bbq pork

steps: Scoop egg yolks into bowl. Set aside egg whites. Add mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper to yolks. Mash together with fork until smooth. Spoon mixture into egg white halves. Sprinkle tops with paprika,.
ingredients: egg, mayonnaise, mustard, prepared horseradish, garlic salt, onion powder, ground pepper, ground paprika
name: spicy deviled eggs

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add chicken and cook 3 minutes. Reduce heat and add soy sauce, water, and reserved liquid. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes, or until chicken is falling off the bones.
ingredients: chicken pieces, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, soy sauce, white vinegar, bay leaves, salt and pepper, paprika
name: best chicken adobo

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Grease or spray a large cookie sheet. Stir together dry ingredients including the sugar. Cut butter into flour mixture. Add raisins, stir to mix well. Beat egg in measuring cup. Add milk to make 1 cup. Stir into flour. Drop roughly tablespoon size scoops on cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes at 170 degrees celsius.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, salt, self-raising flour, milk, sultana
name: grandma s best scones

steps: Heat up the bar-b-que grill. Whip the cream until stiff peaks are formed. Fold the amarula liqueur into the mixture. Cover and refrigerate until needed. Over medium coals place the bananas, still in peel, onto the grill. Heat bananas until the peel turns black. Remove the bananas from the grill and split the skin of the banana open. In a saucepan, melt the chocolate over medium heat. Once melted, add the walnuts and honey stirring constantly. Pour chocolate sauce over bananas and top with whipped cream mixture.
ingredients: dark creme de cacao, banana, half-and-half, ice cubes, bittersweet chocolate
name: banana fudgicle

steps: Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a small bowl. Brush over the chicken. Broil the chicken for 10 minutes each side, 2 inches or so from the heat. Brush frequently with the sauce. Serve over rice or noodles, sprinkled with cheese.
ingredients: vegetable oil, dijon mustard, fresh parsley, chicken breast halves, paprika
name: mustard roasted chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 425f grease a 9x9 inche metal baking pan. In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. In medium bowl, whisk buttermilk, oil, and egg until blended. Stir into cornmeal mixture just until moistened. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake 20-25 minutes or until golden and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cut cornbread into 9 squares.
ingredients: cornmeal, whole wheat flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, milk, eggs, vegetable oil
name: whole wheat corn bread

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussels sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: brussels sprouts, water, low sodium soy sauce, fresh ginger, minced garlic cloves, splenda granular, red pepper flakes
name: gingered brussels sprouts

steps: Place the apples in a shallow pan. Add the butter, stir until the apples and syrup have heated through. Add the bourbon, stir until the apples and syrup have heated through. Add the bourbon, stir
ingredients: unsalted butter, granny smith apples, water, dark brown sugar, ground cinnamon, heavy cream, bourbon
name: fried apples with bourbon caramel sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. Add one cracked egg to each tin and whisk the yolk. Add your toppings, saving the cheese for last. Bake 30 minutes or until eggs are completely cooked. Cool and serve.
ingredients: mayonnaise, white bread, roast beef, american cheese, fresh tomatoes, smoked ham, iceberg lettuce, toothpick
name: the hippo

steps: Cook and drain pasta according to package directions, rinse with cold water. In large bowl combine mayonnaise, salt, pepper and garlic. Add pasta, bacon, miracle whip, sugar, garlic salt, pasta, carrots, green pepper, onion, mayonnaise, salsa. Toss with large spoon coat. Cover and chill 1 hour to blend flavors.
ingredients: bacon, miracle whip, sugar, garlic salt, pasta, carrots, green pepper, onion
name: tangy pasta salad

steps: Sift dry ingrediants in one bowl, and, using a fork, lightly beat the wet ingrediants in a serapate bowl. Add the dry into the wet and add the chocolate chips, mixing until just combined. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my waffle iron. This recipe yeilds 4 square waffles for me. These freeze well.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, buttermilk, eggs, oil
name: classic waffles

steps: Cream butter, add sugar, salt, vanilla and flour. Form into small balls and roll in sesame seeds. Make a thumbprint in center of balls. Fill with strawberry preserves. Place on cookie sheets and bake at 400 degrees for 10 minutes. When making cookies, i use parchment paper so i do not have to grease and wash the cookie sheets repeatedly. I do not know how many this makes and will have to guess.
ingredients: margarine, sugar, vanilla, flour, nuts, powdered sugar
name: nut dreams aka wedding cookies

steps: Bring water to a boil, in a small saucepan. Combine sugar and cornstarch. Stir well. Add sugar mixture to boiling water. Reduce heat to medium, stirring constantly, or until mixture thickens. Remove from heat. Add butter, vanilla and salt, stirring until butter melts.
ingredients: watermelon juice, sugar, cornstarch, vanilla extract, pistachios, semisweet chocolate, candied citron peel
name: watermelon pudding or sauce

steps: Heat oil. Add onions& sugar, cover and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 20- 25 minutes or until the onions are slightly coloured. Sprinkle flour over onions& stir in. Slowly add the beer, pour in chicken stock and season to taste. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Place toast slices in ovenproof soup bowls. Pour broth into each bowl, sprinkle with some parsley& top with grated cheese. Place under broiler for a couple of minutes to melt cheese.
ingredients: onions, butter, beef broth, water, worcestershire sauce, french bread, parmesan cheese, swiss cheese
name: fast french onion soup

steps: Heat the oil over med-high flame in a large, heavy-bottomed pot. Add the onion and saute until translucent. Add the tomatoes, water or stock, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer gently until tender, from 20 to 30 minutes or done to your liking. Adjust seasoning and serve with a little bit of the broth. You can add a chopped chili pepper or two with the onions. If you like, add some leftover meat for more flavor.
ingredients: okra, bacon, onion, stewed tomatoes, salt, pepper, cayenne, garlic powder, sugar
name: smothered okra and tomatoes

steps: Sprinkle with a little powdered sugar. Bake at 350 for 15 minutes or until lightly firm. Cookies should still be pale in color.
ingredients: ten-grain pancake mix, sugar, crisp rice cereal, butter, egg, maple extract
name: 10 grain sorta healthy cookies

steps: Mix all ingredients in crockpot. Cover, cook on high for 2 hours. If convenient, stir several times during cooking.
ingredients: extra lean beef, lemon juice, soy sauce, green onion, onion, red pepper flakes, salt
name: beef kelaguen kelaguen ktne

steps: Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until they look fairly cooked and shiny. Add almonds and saut for a couple more minutes. Finally, add frozen green beans and splash of soy sauce. Stir frequently until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture.
ingredients: olive oil, sesame oil, shiitake mushroom, frozen green beans, tamari, toasted almond
name: shiitake french style green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the butter, white wine, lemon juice, garlic, and parsley. When the butter melts completely, remove from heat. Arrange shrimp in a shallow baking dish. Pour the butter mixture over the shrimp. Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes or until the shrimp are pink and opaque. Serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: shrimp, butter, garlic cloves, lemon peel, green onion, lemon juice, salt, dried parsley, tabasco sauce
name: scampi style shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 350, or 325 if you have dark non-stick pan. Prepare pan whichever way. In a bowl, cream together sugar and butter. Add the sifted flour and baking powder. Beat in eggs. Stir in vanilla. Finally, stir in milk until batter is smooth. Bake for about 30-40 minutes, until cake springs back at touch.
ingredients: sugar, butter, egg whites, hot water, vanilla, flour, baking powder, water
name: grandmother higbe s a cake that never fails

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add eggs, and cook until whites are done the way you wish. Add water, and cover with a lid. Do not peak or you will loose your steam. Cook over medium heat for 2 minutes, for medium done eggs. Remove to a plate, and add salt, pepper, and cheese if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, chopped tomatoes, fresh chives, bread, prosciutto, eggs, heavy cream
name: shirred eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cream butter and sugar together till pale and creamy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Stir till well combined. Place heaped tablespoons of mixture on trays. Allow room for spreading. Bake 15 - 17 minutes, then cool for 5 minutes. Transfer to wire rack.
ingredients: granola cereal, brown sugar, cinnamon, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, butter
name: brunch bubble ring

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray bottom of baking dish with cooking spray, sprinkle three cups of the has browns in bottom of dish. Layer with ham cheese, bell peppers and mushrooms. Sprinkle remaining potatoes on top. Beat eggs and milk with wire wisk, add cottage cheese and pepper. Pour over mixture in baking pan. Bake 45 min or until golden brown and set in the center.
ingredients: ham, hash brown potatoes, green bell pepper, dried onion flakes, cheddar cheese, milk, bisquick, salt, eggs
name: do ahead breakfast casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. In medium bowl combine egg with 1 tbsp water. In pie plate place bread crumbs and cheese. Dip pierogies in egg then breadcrumbs. Arrange on baking sheet. Roast until crisp and golden about 15 minutes.
ingredients: jumbo pasta shells, mashed potatoes, dried onion flakes, onion powder, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, green onion
name: pierogi pasta shells

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper and noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and parsley. Serve at once.
ingredients: lean ground beef, flour, salt, black pepper, paprika, onion, butter, cream of chicken soup, sliced mushrooms, sour cream
name: ground beef stroganoff

steps: Sift flour, baking powder and salt. Beat egg until light and fluffy and add to dry ingredients. Stir in milk. Drop by tablespoonfuls on gently boiling vegetable gravy. Cover tightly and cook 15 minutes. Do not peek.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, shortening, milk, light maple syrup
name: dumplings in canadian maple syrup

steps: In a large stock pot, combine apple juice, apple cider, brown sugar, sugar, cinnamon, ground ginger, nutmeg, ground cloves and whisk together, mixing well. Pour in 1 gallon of apple cider. Stir and mix well. Pour in everclear grain alcohol 190 proof. Lastly, add 2 cups of pinnacle whipped cream vodka. Continue to stir and mix well. Using a ladle or measuring cup with spout, pour moonshine mixture into mason jars, seal and refrigerate for 5-6 days. Shake well before drinking. Keep refrigerated and drink responsibly.
ingredients: apple juice, apple cider, brown sugar, sugar, cinnamon sticks, everclear alcohol, vodka
name: apple pie moonshine

steps: Boil kraft one dish italian fish until tender but not brown. Add rice, water, white fish fillet, diced tomatoes, italian dressing, italian cheese blend. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: minute rice, water, white fish fillet, diced tomatoes, italian dressing, italian cheese blend
name: kraft one dish italian fish

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat melt the butter, add old bay, minced onion, lemon juice, and stir thoroughly. Add the flour, stirring constantly, and then gradually add the light cream, continuing to stir. Add the crabmeat and let simmer for about 15 minutes. Do not allow the soup to boil. Serve garnished with a dash of old bay and parsley flakes.
ingredients: backfin crab meat, avocado, tortillas, mayonnaise, salt-free lemon pepper, shallots, celery, red pepper, fresh parsley, cooked bacon
name: mary mex crab wraps

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat almonds. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and almonds are toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool.
ingredients: blanched almond, powdered sugar, unsalted butter, almond extract, egg white
name: danish almond filling

steps: Mix marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold.
ingredients: chicken wings, salt, light soy sauce, cooking sherry, sugar, ground ginger, fresh garlic, white pepper, five-spice powder
name: finger licking good chicken wings

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place italian bread shell on an ungreased baking sheet. Stir together the cream cheese, goat cheese or feta, garlic and black pepper in a small mixing bow. Spread mixture over the bread shell. Place the tomato slices and sweet pepper strips over the cheese mixture. Bake in the preheated oven about 12 minutes or till heated through. Sprinkle with fresh basil.
ingredients: butter, leeks, fresh parsley, tomatoes, montrachet, olive oil
name: leek tomato goat cheese pizza

steps: Mix all the dry ingredients together. Dip chicken strips into egg and then coat with bread crumbs. Melt butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 5-6 minutes or until thoroughly cooked and no longer pink inside. Serve with your choice of sauces.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, mayonnaise, onion dip mix, garlic and herb seasoning, panko breadcrumbs, breadcrumbs
name: easy crunchy creamy chicken

steps: Mix sugar, cream cheese and vanilla with mixer until smooth. Spread into a deep pie dish. Spread caramel topping on top, then sprinkle with toffee bits and nuts. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Just before serving, core and cut apples into wedges and arrange around the edge of the pie dish, alternating red and green slices.
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla extract, mini chocolate chips, toffee pieces, caramel ice cream topping
name: apple crack dip

steps: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Stir in ice cream until melted. Add strawberries and cake broken into small pieces. Chill until set. Slice in squares. Top with whipped cream.
ingredients: sugar-free strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, frozen strawberries, angel food cake, miniature marshmallow, cool whip, fresh strawberries
name: strawberry jell o cake

steps: Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add bay leaf, soy sauce and garlic powder. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve.
ingredients: rump roast, salt and pepper, potatoes, onions, carrots, celery, bay leaf, dried marjoram, apple cider
name: yankee pot roast of beef with vegetables in the crock pot

steps: Bring broth to boil and add rice or orzo. Cook until rice is done. Add egg whites to blender and blend until frothy. While egg whites are blending, slowly add egg yolks. After egg yolks are completely mixed with egg whites, add lemon slowly while mixture is still blending. Slowly add 2 cups of chicken broth to blender. After everything is well mixed, slowly add contents of blender to remaining broth and rice, stirring constantly. Serve hot.
ingredients: chicken broth, long-grain rice, egg yolks, lemon juice, dried oregano, dried parsley, fresh ground pepper, tabasco sauce
name: leah s lemon soup a

steps: Pre heat oven to 160 degrees celsius grease and base line a 20cm round cake tin. To measure the golden syrup easier, measure the sugar first, keep it in the scales and pour the syrup on top to avoid sticking to plate. Put butter, syrup and sugar in a saucepan and heat gently until butter has melted and sugar dissolved. Remove from heat and stir in oats. Pour into lined tin and press down with back of a spoon until is surface is level. Bake in oven about 25-30 minutes until golden brown. Remove from oven and loosen from the sides of the tin with a palette knife and leave to cool for about 10 minutes.
ingredients: butter, maple syrup, light brown sugar, porridge oats
name: maple syrup flapjacks

steps: In a large skillet, combine all the ingredients except the potatoes and cheese over high heat. Mix well. Cook for 5 to 8 minutes, or until heated through, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat and and put into a deep cassarole dish. Dollop with the potatoes. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. Cover with grated cheese last 10 minutes of cooking. Serve immediately.
ingredients: ground beef, hot dogs, baked beans, ketchup, brown sugar, prepared mustard, cheese, pastry shells, american cheese
name: hot dog pie

steps: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan, over medium high heat. Add the bay leaves, green cardamom and cloves. Saute until the spices are aromatic, about 1 minute, then scoop out with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the rice to the pan and cook, stirring until the rice is evenly coated in oil, and beginning to toast, 1 to 2 minutes. Add the water, sugar, salt and saffron to the pan and bring to a boil over medium high heat, then reduce heat to medium low, partially cover the pan and simmer for 10 minutes. Fully cover the pan and simmer for about 10 minutes longer, until water is completely absorbed. Take pan off heat and let stand 5 minutes without removing lid. Fluff with a fork and stir in the pistachios just before serving.
ingredients: basmati rice, cloves, cinnamon stick, bay leaves, green cardamom pods, cumin seeds, vegetable oil, onion, coriander
name: quick and easy basmati rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all ingredients, except pecans and pie crust, together. Pour into unbaked pie crust. Top with pecan halves. Bake until done.
ingredients: chocolate pudding mix, milk, chocolate chips, vanilla extract, butter, pie crust
name: grandma s chocolate pie

steps: Mix sugar, cornmeal, flour, eggs, margarine, vinegar, vanilla, milk. Mix with other ingredients which have been blended together. Pour into pie shell. Bake 1 hour at 350.
ingredients: sugar, cornmeal, flour, eggs, margarine, vinegar, vanilla, milk
name: mama s chess pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour 8x8 baking pan and set aside. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt in mixing bowl and set aside. Place margarine and sugar in large bowl of mixer and cream until smooth. Add honey and eggs and beat to blend, scraping bottom and sides of bowl frequently. Beat in half of the milk. Beat in half of the flour mixture. Repeat with remaining milk and flour mixture. With mixer at lowest speed, continue to mix for 4 minutes. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in oven 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: cornmeal, sugar, salt, boiling water, milk, butter, eggs, baking powder
name: christiana campbell s tavern spoon bread

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp.
ingredients: new potatoes, olive oil, salt, pepper, italian cheese blend, fresh basil, garlic cloves, green onions
name: crispy roasted new potatoes

steps: Heat oil in a skillet. Slice pig stomach horizontally into thirds. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and fry in oil on medium high heat until browned on both sides, 2-3 minutes per side. Remove from pan. Set aside. Add pork to pan. Cook, stirring, 1 minute, or until liquid is slightly thickened. Return pork to pan. Cook, stirring, 1 minute
ingredients: pig stomach, water, salt, ground sausage, raw potatoes, onion, cabbage, pepper
name: roasted pig stomach

steps: Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread peaches in a well greased 13x9 baking dish. Blend flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and 3 tbsp sugar together in a bowl. Cut in margarine with pastry blender until mixture looks like coarse cornmeal. Pat an even layer of mixture on bottom and halfway up sides of 8 inch square baking pan, pressing pastry firmly with your hands until it holds. Arrange peaches over bottom pastry and sprinkle with remaining sugar and cinnamon. Bake for 15 minutes in 400 degree oven. Then pour mixture of beaten eggs and heavy cream over the top. Bake for 30 minutes longer. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: cornstarch, sugar, cinnamon, water, juice, lemon juice, peach slices in heavy syrup, vanilla ice cream
name: peachy dessert sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto greased baking sheets. Bake at 350f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown.
ingredients: brown sugar, butter, egg, all-purpose flour, rolled oats, caramels, half-and-half, cashew pieces, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: chocolate caramel cashew chewies

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through. Add peppers and veggies. Cook about 2 minutes. Mix dry jello and cornstarch, in small bowl. Add broth, dressing, and garlic. Stir until jello is dissolved. Add to skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook about 3 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Serve over hot rice.
ingredients: chicken breasts, flour, salt, pepper, butter, chicken broth, lemon juice
name: lemon chicken over rice

steps: Cook basil linguine just until done. Trim green onions and cut lengthwise into long thin threads, including green tops. While noodles are cooking, heat butter and sesame oil in a large skillet. Stir in green onions. Cook for 1 minute or until onions are wilted. Add soy sauce, ginger and garlic powder. Add drained pasta, toss well and serve.
ingredients: linguine, olive oil, fresh basil, salt and pepper
name: basil linguine

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Stir together brown sugar, cayenne, and black pepper in a small bowl. Arrange bacon slices in l layer on a large broiler pan and bake in middle of oven for 20 minutes. Turn slices over and sprinkle evenly with spiced sugar. Continue baking until bacon is crisp and brown, 15 to 20 minutes more, then transfer to paper towels to drain.
ingredients: cooking spray, smoked link sausage, bacon, brown sugar
name: sugar bacon wrapped smokies

steps: Sprinkle cheese over the top of each sandwich. Bake at 425f for 20-30 minutes. For last 5 minutes, remove foil to allow bread to brown. Place bread in foil boat. Cover loosely with another sheet of foil. For last 5 minutes,
ingredients: french bread, butter, blue cheese dressing, mozzarella cheese, diced tomatoes
name: beach bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: chili sauce, grape jelly, brown sugar, ground beef, egg, dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, italian seasoning mix, garlic powder
name: grape flavored meatballs

steps: In a large serving dish, top with whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping, whipped topping,
ingredients: vanilla wafers, hot water, instant coffee, prepared vanilla pudding, whipped topping, cocoa powder
name: easy tiramisu for two

steps: Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread peach trifle in a well greased 13x9 baking dish. Spread peach trifle in a well greased 13x9 baking
ingredients: low-fat vanilla yogurt, vanilla pudding mix, skim milk, raspberry jam, dry sherry, angel food cake, peaches in juice, mint sprig
name: queen s speech peach trifle

steps: Place the mangoes, chilies, and ginger in a large pan. Add the lemon rind and juice, and stir in the water. Bring to a boil, and boil for 10 minutes or until a thick consistency is reached. Stir in the sultanas and balsamic. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Let cool slightly, and pour into warm sterilized jars. Seal according to manufacturers directions.
ingredients: water, sugar, mango juice, orange juice, pineapple juice, lime juice
name: mango punch

steps: In a large heavy saucepan combine all the ingredients and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Stir often to prevent sticking. When mixture is simmering, reduce heat to low. Cook mixture until fruit is tender and the relish has thickened, approximately 40-50 minutes, stirring occasionally. Let cool, serve.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, water, orange juice, dried cherries, grand marnier, pecans
name: grand marnier cranberry orange relish

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter 9 inch fluted or plain tube pan. In large bowl of electric mixer, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs, eggnog, and vanilla. Stir together flour, bakng powder, and salt. Gradually beat into butter mixture. Prepare topping by combining nuts, sugar and cinnamon. Scatter half the topping evenly over bottom of pan. Spoon in half batter. Add remaining topping and spoon on remaining batter. Bake 50 to 60 minute, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, milk, flour, baking powder, salt
name: qwik coffee cake

steps: Add 1/2 cup of water to a large mixing bowl. Add 1/2 cup of water to a large mixing bowl. Add
ingredients: cooked ham, flour tortilla, butter, egg, cheddar cheese, onion, chili powder
name: mexican snack

steps: In a large saute pan combine the oil, garlic and herbs. Warm over very low heat for about 4 minutes. Add the beans and salt and pepper to taste. Toss gently. Cook over low heat until the beans are warm and have absorbed the flavors of the olive oil, about 5 mins. Remove from the heat, add lemon juice and toss gently. Arrange beans on a platter and surround with olives. Serve immediately. Makes 4 servings.
ingredients: dried cannellini beans, extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chorizo sausage, fresh sage, salt & freshly ground black pepper, pecorino cheese
name: cannellini beans with chorizo garlic and sage

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and spray an oven safe serving dish with non-stick cooking spray. Using an electric mixer, blend the cream cheese and mayonnaise until smooth. Stir in green chilies, jalapeno peppers, and mexican and mozzarella cheeses. Spoon this mixture into the prepared baking dish. Mix together the panko and parmesan cheese and sprinkle it over the cream cheese mixture. Spray the panko and parmesan with a quick spray of non-stick cooking spray. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the mixture is hot and the topping is lightly browned.
ingredients: soft fresh goat cheese, fat free cream cheese, fresh parmesan cheese, tomatoes, green onions, fresh sage, kosher salt, jalapeno peppers, cooking spray, fresh cilantro
name: grilled pepper poppers with goat cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Melt butter on a low flame in a small sauce pan. Add garlic and saute on low for about 1 minute. Add the almonds, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Pour the lemon butter mixture on the fish and top with fresh almonds. Bake at 400 until cooked, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: tilapia fillet, butter, sliced almonds, lemon juice, salt and pepper
name: tilapia with almonds

steps: In a large frying pan, fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon and drain. Add salt and pepper to taste maybe a little more butter, not much. Slice sausage and lay on top of cabbage. Continue to cook a little longer to warm the sausage. Crumble bacon over all. Yummmy -- great with black eyed-peas and cornbread.
ingredients: smoked sausage, potato, corn, cheese, butter, salt and pepper, cajun seasoning, garlic powder
name: smoked sausage dish

steps: Place chops in a shallow dish. Combine remaining ingredients and mix well. Pour marinade over chops. Cover and refrigerate overnight, turning occasionally. Remove chops from marinade. Place on grill, approximately six inches from medium-hot coals. Grill for 10-15 minutes, turning once and basting with remaining marinade. Discard remaining marinade when meat is grilled. Grill for 10-15 minutes, turning once and basting with remaining mar
ingredients: boneless pork chops, gluten-free flour, butter, onion, apple juice
name: autumn apple chops

steps: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring well every 2 minutes until the cream sauce is thick and bubbly. While cooking the cream sauce, stir in the butter, garlic, white wine, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper. Pour over the top and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring well every 2 minutes until the cream sauce is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat, add the chicken and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring well every 2 minutes until the cream sauce is thick and bubbly. Remove from
ingredients: whole boneless chicken breasts, fresh broccoli florets, real butter, garlic, white wine, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: chicken broccoli and ziti

steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Cut 4 pieces of aluminum foil twice the size of each fillet. Place each fillet on a piece of foil. Sprinkle fish evenly with salt and pepper. Top each with 1 tablespoon wine, 1 tablespoon butter, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon capers, and 1 teaspoon parsley. Wrap fish in foil grill for 6 to minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
ingredients: flounder fillets, olive oil, ginger, garlic cloves, fresh cracked pepper, white wine, scallion, sesame seeds, soy sauce, hoisin sauce
name: flounder fillets grilled in foil with an asian touch

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. If frozen, partially thaw fillets and cut into serving size pieces. Place in a greased baking dish. Combine sour cream or yogurt, mustard, onion, dill, and mayonnaise. Season with salt and pepper. Spread mixture over fish. Bake 20 minutes per inch of thickness of fish if frozen or 10-12 minutes if thawed. When just done, sprinkle with the cheeses and a dash of paprika. Broil 1 minute or until the cheese is bubbly and flecked with brown. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: salmon fillet, lemon, fresh dill, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper
name: salmon fillets

steps: Combine frozen peas, mayonnaise, madras curry powder, cayenne pepper, hard-boiled eggs, mustard, celery, green onions, baby shrimp, salt & pepper. Stir into the chicken mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Chill for at least 2-3 hours. Serve topped with grated cheese, or not --.
ingredients: mayonnaise, madras curry powder, cayenne pepper, hard-boiled eggs, mustard, celery, green onions, baby shrimp, salt & pepper
name: not your grandmas egg salad curried egg salad with shrim

steps: In a large non-stick skillet, saute the beef, cucumber, carrot, chinese bellflower, bean sprouts, lettuce, dried mushrooms, egg, jelly, red pepper paste. Transfer to a 13-inch by 9-inch by 2-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Stir in the broth, cucumber, carrot, chinese bellflower, bean sprouts, lettuce, dried mushrooms, egg, jelly, red pepper paste. Cover and bake at 350f for 50 minutes. Uncover and bake for another 5-10 minutes or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: beef, cucumber, carrot, chinese bellflower, bean sprouts, lettuce, dried mushrooms, egg, jelly, red pepper paste
name: mixed rice dish bibim bap

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done.
ingredients: orange juice, balsamic vinegar, broiler-fryer chickens, salt, pepper, orange marmalade, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, dried apricots, brown sugar
name: sun dried tomato and apricot chicken

steps: Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: rice vinegar, sugar, salt, sake, kombu
name: sushizu sushi vinegar

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a standard size bundt pan, 9 x 13-inch baking pan, or two 9-inch cake pans. In a large bowl, mix together the yellow cake mix, sugar, oil, pumpkin, water, cinnamon and eggs. Beat until well blended. Transfer to the baking dish or cake pans. Bake for 45 minutes. For glaze, cook together the butter, whipping cream and brown sugar for 3 minutes, stirring. When slightly cooled, pour over cake.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, pumpkin puree, evaporated milk, yellow cake mix, butter, walnuts
name: aunt jennie s favorite pumpkin cake

steps: In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the butter, garlic, onion, chicken broth, clams, cream of potato soup, pepper, half-and-half, salt and pepper. Saute for about 3 minutes, add the butter, garlic, onion, chicken broth, clams, cream of potato soup, pepper, half-and-half, salt and pepper. Reduce heat to low and allow soup to simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Add the clams and allow to heat through.
ingredients: butter, garlic, onion, chicken broth, clams, cream of potato soup, pepper, half-and-half
name: super simple clam chowder

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan. Add onion and garlic and cook over medium-low heat until onion is tender. Add garlic and cook for about 5 minutes more or until onion is tender. Season to taste with pepper.
ingredients: olive oil, plum tomatoes, white onion, garlic cloves, fresh thyme sprigs, white sugar, basil, vegetable stock, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: gordon ramsays roasted tomato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, buttermilk, cranberries, cornmeal, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, walnuts
name: cranberry cornbread

steps: Place cucumbers, onion, vinegar, sugar, salt, mustard seeds, dry mustard, turmeric, crushed red pepper flakes, celery seed. Heat to boiling over high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil 1 minute, stirring occasionally. Pour cucumber mixture into a large bowl. Cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally. Cover and chill overnight before serving. You can spoon cooled cucumbers and their liquid into jars with tight-fitting lids and refrigerate up to 4 weeks.
ingredients: cucumber, sweet onions, splenda granular, salt, celery seed, mustard seeds, vinegar
name: microwave bread and butter pickles sugar free

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside. In a large salad bowl, toss together the salad pastas and vegetables. Add the dressing and spices and toss everything well. Refrigerate until time to serve. This salad develops more flavor the longer it refrigerates so it can be made the night before if desired. Lightly toss just prior to serving.
ingredients: cheese tortellini, salami, plum tomatoes, green bell pepper, onion, vinaigrette dressing, lettuce leaf
name: pronto salami and pasta salad

steps: Heat oil in wok or large frying pan. Stir-fry onion until tender. Add steak and stir-fry 3-4 minute. Stir in beans and mushrooms, stir-fry 2 minutes. Add black bean sauce and stock, stirring. When sauce boils add sprouts. Serve immediately with cooked noodles or rice.
ingredients: oil, broccoli florets, mushroom, carrot, water, ramen noodles, beef, stir-fry sauce
name: leftover magic beef

steps: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the garlic and saut until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add parmesan and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes
ingredients: garlic clove, hot red pepper flakes, olive oil, broccoflower, water, balsamic vinegar, unsalted butter, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese
name: broccoflower archer

steps: Preheat a grill for high heat. When the grill is hot, lightly oil the grate. In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, worcestershire sauce, hickory seasoning, salt and pepper until well blended. Make 8 or 10 balls, and flatten into patties. On one half of the patties, distribute the onions, mushrooms, ham and cheese. Carefully cover the piles with the remaining patties, making sure to seal all of the edges of the patties together tightly and enclose the filling. Grill the patties for 8 to 10 minutes per side, or until meat is well done, and cheese in the center is melted.
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, green onion, fresh garlic cloves, butter, ground lean pork, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, black pepper, prepared mustard
name: mushroom stuffed grilled pork burgers

steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Cut 4 pieces of aluminum foil twice the size of each fillet. Place each fillet on a piece of foil. Sprinkle fish evenly with salt and pepper. Top each with 1 tablespoon wine, 1 tablespoon butter, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon capers, and 1 teaspoon parsley. Wrap fish in foil grill for 6 to minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
ingredients: fish fillet, salt, pepper, paprika, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley, white wine, margarine
name: fresh fish in white wine

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large microwave-safe bowl, microwave frozen hash browns for 4 minutes on high. Stir sour cream, butter, onion, soup, and cheese into potatoes. Spread mixture evenly into a greased 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle corn flakes over top. Bake, uncovered, for 45-50 minutes or until bubbly around edges.
ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, butter, onion, corn flakes
name: harvest potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix all ingredients, except salmon, together. Pour a small amount of the mix into the bottom of a baking pan - just enough to lightly cover the bottom. Add the salmon, and pour the remaining mix over top. Bake for about 20 minutes, or to your own preference.
ingredients: salmon fillets, salt, pepper, fresh thyme, fresh oregano, fresh tarragon, lemons
name: herb roasted salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 400 and put rice and sausage into casserole dish. On the stove, heat soup, adding the water to it. Bring to a boil. Add peas, stir and bring to boil again. Pour on top of rice. Lay cheese on top. Bake at 400 degrees for 20 minutes.
ingredients: sausage, cooked brown rice, milk, celery, green pepper, cream of mushroom soup, sliced mushrooms, american cheese
name: sausage brown rice casserole

steps: Place the chicken on top of red peppers. Place the chicken on top of red peppers. Add another layer of peppers. Cook low for 6 hours. Your crockpot may vary in the length of time to cook.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, roasted red peppers, dry breadcrumbs, vegetable oil, sour cream, feta cheese
name: roasted red pepper chicken

steps: Heat a large pot of water, throw in the noodles and cook for two minutes or until soft. Drain, rinse and cool. Mix the sesame oil, lime juice and wasabi paste together. Pour this over the noodles and mix in the pickled ginger and garlic chives. Press the tuna into the sesame seeds until the fish is coated on all sides. Heat a non-stick frying pan and cook the tuna for one minute on all sides or until just seared. Transfer to a chopping board, let the tuna rest for a moment and then cut it into thick slices. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi in dipping bowls.
ingredients: medium noodles, butter, half-and-half, parmesan cheese, salmon
name: salmon or tuna noodles for two

steps: Combine milk, ice, honey, pineapple chunk, water. Mix well. Pour in slushie. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.
ingredients: bananas, ice, honey, pineapple chunk, water
name: banana pineapple slushie

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl mix all dry ingredients. Add milk and water and add-ins of your choice. Using your fingers knead into an elastic dough. If you need more flour just add it and if you need more liquid add more water or milk. Flatten the dough to desired thickness and cut out scones of desired size. Place scones on a paper-lined baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, cake flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, eggs, buttermilk, fruit
name: plain tea scones

steps: In a large bowl, combine tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers, red onion, fresh parsley, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper, feta cheese, olive oil. Pour over cucumber mixture. Toss. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers, red onion, fresh parsley, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper, feta cheese, olive oil
name: moldovan tomato cucumber pepper salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugars until smooth. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy.
ingredients: sugar, eggs, shortening, sour milk, baking soda, vanilla, salt, flour, walnuts, semisweet mini chocolate chips
name: white drop cookies sour milk chocolate chip cookies

steps: Melt sugar snap peas and water in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover and cook for 2 minutes. Add sugar snap peas and water. Cover and cook 2 minutes. Stir in tarragon, dijon mustard, cider vinegar, salt. Enjoy.
ingredients: sugar snap pea, onion, water, sugar, cornstarch, pepper, cider vinegar
name: tangy sugar snap peas

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter. Stir in flour until smooth cook and stir over med heat for 2 minutes. Add cream, lemon juice, lemon zest and salt and pepper to taste. Simmer for at least 5 minutes but do not boil. Garnish with chopped parsley and very thin slices of carrot.
ingredients: onion, butter, carrots, potato, fat free chicken broth, ginger powder, evaporated milk, dried rosemary, salt, black pepper
name: cream of carrot soup

steps: Mix all ingredients in a large bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.
ingredients: bulk pork sausage, green pepper, onion, canned tomato, oregano, rosemary, black pepper, garlic clove, black-eyed peas, cheese
name: black eyed pea supper dish

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: fryer, salt and pepper, french onion dip, potato chips
name: chip and dip chicken

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter, stir in flour until blended. Cook 30 seconds. Gradually stir in half and half- cook, stirring, until mixture boils and slightly thickens. Stir in all cheeses, salt and pepper. Boil fettuccine till al dente. Drain and pour into large bowl or round casserole dish. Mix in cheese sauce along with parsley, until al dente. Serve immediately.
ingredients: barilla castellane, olive oil, chorizo sausage, fresh corn kernels, barilla sweet peppers & garlic sauce, cilantro, mexican blend cheese
name: mexican pasta

steps: Place beef, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, onion, garlic, grape jelly, oregano, basil, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black pepper, italian seasoning, black
ingredients: ground beef, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, onion, garlic, grape jelly, oregano, basil, italian seasoning, black pepper
name: my favorite spaghetti sauce

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Place chicken skin side down in baking pan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes. Turn chicken
ingredients: eggs, cracker crumb, garlic salt, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter
name: famous butter chicken

steps: Heat oil in nonstick sauce pan. Add rice and saute until rice kernels are opaque. Add water, grated lemon rind, lemon juice, turmeric and salt. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes. Simmer uncovered over low heat for about 40 minutes, or until the liquid has absorbed and rice in tender. Remove from heat. Add lemon zest, pepper, and the broth. Add chicken broth and lemon juice and stir. Let stand 5 minutes. Garnish with lemon slices to serve.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, long grain white rice, chicken stock, lemon, rind of, lemon juice, flat-leaf italian parsley, fresh ground pepper
name: lemony rice pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine apple-smoked bacon, brown sugar, kosher salt, dried red chilies in a small bowl. Arrange the slices in a casserole or baking dish, and spoon the syrup mixture over the slices. Bake for 30 minutes. Serve hot or at room temperature.
ingredients: apple-smoked bacon, brown sugar, kosher salt, dried red chilies
name: red chile glazed bacon

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place french bread on baking sheet. Bake for 3-4 minutes until crisp. Spread beans evenly over tortillas. Spread taco sauce evenly over beans. Top with any additional ingredients. Cut into wedges and serve.
ingredients: french bread, firm tofu, tomato paste, olive oil, tamari, ground fennel, dried oregano, garlic, cayenne pepper, salt and black pepper
name: french bread pizza vegetarian

steps: Place chicken breast in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours. After 6 hours of cooking, you may need to shred the chicken using 2 forks. Stir and continue cooking. May need to add all or part of the reserved liquid if it looks too dry.
ingredients: onion, potato, boneless skinless chicken breast, salt, reduced-sodium chicken broth, thai red curry paste, curry powder, frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, reduced-fat coconut milk
name: crock pot chicken vindaloo ww 5 pts per serving

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Heat 2 large roasting pans in the oven for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, in a large bowl, toss the zucchini with the olive oil and crushed red pepper. Season generously with salt and pepper. Spread the zucchini on the hot pans and roast for 30 minutes without stirring, until the rounds are tender and their bottom are golden. Transfer to a platter, garnish with mint and serve.
