ingredients: zucchini, coarse salt, ground pepper, egg, scallions, flour, canola oil, sour cream, salt
name: zucchini scallion fritters

steps: In a large bowl, beat the eggs. Stir in the cheese, buttermilk, butter and salt. Add the cooked macaroni and mix well. Pour into a greased 13 inches x 9 inch x 2 inch baking dish. Bake uncovered, at 350 degrees, for 45-50 minutes or until a thermoneter reads 160 degrees.
ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, buttermilk, butter, salt, elbow macaroni
name: buttermilk macaroni and cheese

steps: Place jello in 1 c hot water. Let stand for 5 minutes, then add 1 c cold water. Using mixer add the cherry jell-o, mix on slow speed. Fold in coolwhip, fruit. Chill. You can also use strawberries& strawberry jello.
ingredients: cherry jell-o, boiling water, dream whip, cherry pie filling
name: chris s favorite cherry jello

steps: In a medium saucepan combine squash, onions, carrots, broth, and salt. Simmer, uncovered, until squash is very tender, about 40 minutes. Puree soup in a blender or food processor with the butter. Whisk cream into soup. Serve in wide, shallow bowls with a dollop of sour cream if desired.
ingredients: butternut squash, onion, carrot, butter, granny smith apples, chicken broth, salt, fresh thyme, black pepper
name: apple butternut squash soup

steps: Preheat oven to 375-400f. Remove fibrous end pieces of the asparagus. Lay asparagus across shallow baking dish and add oil, salt, lemon juice, and pepper. Roll and toss to coat well. Arrange the oiled asparagus in the pan so they do not overlap. Bake in oven 20 minutes.
ingredients: sandwich bread, blue cheese, cream cheese, eggs, asparagus spears, unsalted butter
name: hors d asparagus

steps: Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese.
ingredients: ground beef, cooked rice, taco seasoning, cheddar cheese soup, diced tomatoes, kernel corn, tortilla chips, taco-seasoned cheddar cheese
name: ground beef taco casserole

steps: Combine skim milk, splenda granular, cocoa powder, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal, vanilla, reduced-
ingredients: skim milk, splenda granular, cocoa powder, vanilla, reduced-fat peanut butter, quick oatmeal
name: no bake reduced fat cookies

steps: Place eggs in sauce pan and cover with water. Bring water to a quick boil. Remove from heat and cover for 20 minute. Let eggs cool. Shell eggs and cut in half. Scoop out hard boiled yoke. Mash the yoke with a fork until smooth. If you add your salt now this will help. Add ranch salad dressing and cream cheese to the mashed yokes and mix well. You may need to add a little more ranch dressing to get your desired creaminess. Use a piping bag or spoon to fill the egg halves. Sprinkle with paprika.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, cheddar cheese, salad dressing, miracle whip, salsa, sour cream, green onions, garlic powder, salt and pepper, paprika
name: mexi salsa deviled eggs

steps: Mix all ingredients together in large bowl. Refrigerate 20 min or till needed. Preheat oven to 350. Roll chilled mixture into 1 in balls. Put on greased cookie sheet. Bake 15 minutes.
ingredients: stove top stuffing mix monterey style with mushroom and onion, hot water, butter, frozen chopped spinach, parmesan cheese, fresh mushrooms, onion, eggs
name: stove top spinach balls

steps: Preheat oven to 350f, grease cookie sheets. Cream butter with sugar and egg. Stir in everything else. Drop spoonfulls onto the cookie sheets with room for them to expand. Bake 12 min or until light brown.
ingredients: oranges, juice and zest of, lemon, juice and zest of, granny smith apples, sweet red apples, light brown sugar, unsalted butter, ground cinnamon, ground allspice
name: barefoot contessa s oven baked homemade applesauce

steps: Cook pasta as directed on box. While pasta is cooking, in large bowl, stir together seasoning mix, cold water and oil. Add chicken and set aside. Drain pasta. Rinse with cold water. Shake to drain well. Stir drained pasta and remaining ingredients into chicken mixture. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, feta cheese, red onion, kalamata olives
name: simple greek chicken salad

steps: Preheat oven to 250f. In a large bowl combine the cereal, oyster crackers, pretzels, pistachios and cheese. In a small bowl combine the butter, salad dressing mix, and garlic powder. Drizzle over the cereal mix, tossing to lightly coat mixture. Place on a cookie or baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven, stir in dry fruit, and spread mixture on buttered foil to cool. Break into bite size pieces and store in airtight container.
ingredients: rice chex, corn chex, pretzel twists, cheese crackers, honey-roasted peanuts, barbecue sauce, vegetable oil, onion powder, garlic powder
name: barbecue chex mix

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook, stirring, until golden, about 6-7 minutes. Add the tomatoes, sugar, salt, and pepper. Raise heat to medium and cook, gently smashing some of the tomatoes with the back of the spoon, until the sauce is thickened, about 8 minutes. Stir in the basil. Add the pasta, combine well and serve immediately, topped with grated cheese.
ingredients: spaghetti, olive oil, garlic, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, fresh parsley
name: spaghetti with cherry tomatoes for 1

steps: Preheat oven to 210c place the mixed herbs, breadcrumbs, salt and pepper in a large bowl and mix until combined, then set aside. Place the flour in another bowl and the eggs in a third bowl. Toss the chicken pieces into the egg, then the breadcrumbs, pressing to coat well. Once all the chicken is crumbed, heat a little oil in a large non-stick frying pan. Cook the chicken in batches until golden. Remove and transfer to a baking tray lined with baking paper. Place in oven for 4-5 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Serve chicken with lemon wedges and a little whole egg mayonnaise for dipping, if desired.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, pesto sauce, breadcrumbs, olive oil
name: crisp chicken bites

steps: Place daikon radishes in a large bowl. Add the salt, mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly, pressing out as much liquid as possible. Add the sesame oil, vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, cayenne and mix well. Mix and eat.
ingredients: carrots, daikon radishes, cucumber, prepared horseradish, mayonnaise, sour cream, salt
name: daikon carrot salad

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add butter and saute until butter is melted. Add parmesan cheese and saute until cheese is melted, about 2 minutes. Add milk and saute until cheese is melted, about 2 minutes. Add parmesan cheese and saute until cheese is melted, about
ingredients: whole milk, yellow cornmeal, fresh rosemary, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: creamy polenta with parmesan and mozzarella

steps: In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, water, pinto beans, diced tomatoes with green chilies, whole kernel corn, ground mustard, pepper, hamburger helper cheeseburger macaroni, salsa con queso
name: zesty macaroni soup

steps: Melt 2 oz of butter in a saucepan. Add chopped onion and celery, cook until just translucent. Add rice, cook a few minutes more, stirring to coat the rice with butter. Add wine, 1 cup of boiling water and crumbled stock cubes. Bring to a boil, add peas. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered until the water has evaporated. Add another cup of boiling water, cook until evaporated. Add the final cup of boiling water. Keep cooking until the water is almost absorbed. Overall cooking time is about 20 minutes. Stir in the parmesan cheese and 1 oz butter. Add salt& pepper to taste.
ingredients: canola oil, yellow onion, garlic cloves, long grain white rice, boiling water, bay leaf, tomatoes, salt
name: portuguese rice

steps: Mix together oats, pecans, oat bran, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates, pecans, dates,
ingredients: old fashioned oats, pecans, oat bran, light brown sugar, golden raisin, dried fig, dates, salt
name: georgia pecan muesli

steps: Preheat grill on high for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ginger, salt and pepper to taste, bring to a boil. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk cornstarch into the water and mix into brown sugar mixture. Cook, stirring constantly until bubbling and thickened. Reduce grill to medium-high heat. Grill chops on oiled grill, brushing often with brown sugar glaze, about 6-8 minutes per side, or until digital thermometer inserted sideways into the center of each chop reads 160f do not over cook.
ingredients: pork chops, brown sugar, margarine, soy sauce
name: tasty brown sugar pork chops

steps: In a large pot, saute cannellini beans in olive oil over medium-high heat until the beans are soft, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and thyme. Cook until fragrant, 1 minute. Add the drained beans, bay leaves and enough water to cover beans. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags.
ingredients: cannellini beans, garlic cloves, olive oil, thyme, black pepper
name: delicious cannellini beans

steps: Heat oven to 325 degrees. Prepare pastry. In small sauce pan, combine butter, breadcrumbs, basil, garlic cloves, pine nuts, tomatoes, white onions, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Cover with a layer of lemon slices, sprinkle with a layer of sugar. Layer tomatoes, lemon and sugar until pie is full. Bake at 350f until brown and bubbly, about 50 to 60 minutes.
ingredients: butter, breadcrumbs, basil, garlic cloves, pine nuts, tomatoes, white onions, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: tomato crumble pie

steps: Bring tea to a boil in a tea kettle. In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: green tea bag, spearmint, water, sugar, mint sprig
name: moroccan mint tea

steps: Combine cranberry-peach juice, peach, vanilla yogurt, ice and cranberry juice in a blender. Cover and process on high until smooth. Add cranberry-peach juice, vanilla yogurt, ice and cranberry juice. Process until smooth.
ingredients: cranberry-peach juice, peach, vanilla yogurt, ice
name: luscious white cranberry peach smoothie

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add sour cream, lemon juice and lemon peel. Mix well. Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, lemon, juice and zest of, pie crusts
name: fluffy lemon chess pie

steps: Sprinkle with reserved bacon. Serve immediately.
ingredients: lettuce, scallion, eggs, bacon, cider vinegar, sugar, heavy cream, salt, black pepper
name: smokey mountain wilted lettuce

steps: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat tortillas and chicken over medium-high heat for 7 minutes. Pour sauce in skillet and stir to blend. Sprinkle with cheese and cover. Heat until cheese is melted and sauce is hot.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, onion, garlic, oregano, basil, parsley, chili powder, salt and pepper, flour tortillas, mozzarella cheese
name: dan s chicken enchiladas

steps: Preheat oven to 180 c. Grease or line cookie tray. Mix together sugar and butter. Add egg yolk and vanilla, mix well. Stir in flour and choc chips. Place teaspoonfuls onto tray and bake for 12 minutes.
ingredients: macadamia nuts, butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla bean paste, flour, white chocolate
name: white chocolate and macadamia cookies

steps: Heat olive oil in pan. When the oil is hot, add the mushrooms, salt and sharry. Cover, and lower heat. Cook until liquid is released from mushrooms, about 10 minutes. Drain and set aside. Toast bread slightly, just to dry it out a bit. Spread toast with alioli and top with mushrooms. Broil for about 30 seconds or until alioli starts to bubble. Serve warm.
ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, wild mushroom, white wine, parsley, salt, pepper
name: setas wild mushroom and garlic tapas

steps: Slice eggs in half lengthwise. Gently remove yolks to small bowl. Set whites aside. Mash yolks with a fork. In a separate small bowl, whisk mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar, mustard, salt, pepper, paprika until smooth. Mix into mashed yolks and stir to blend well. Stuff or pipe yolk mixture into egg whites halves. Sprinkle with paprika and minced parsley as desired.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, tartar sauce, spicy brown mustard, tabasco sauce, paprika
name: bedeviled eggs

steps: In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together. Fold until all is blended. Keep refrigerated in mason jars with lids, or in containers with tightly fitting lids. To make garlic bread, slice french bread and place on cookie sheet. Spoon spread onto bread. Toast, bake, or broil until cheese is bubbly and nicely browned.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, onion, capsicum, herbs, chili pepper flakes, pepper, bread
name: cheese topping with herbs and spices

steps: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Stir in ice cream until melted. Add strawberries and cake broken into small pieces. Chill until set. Slice in squares. Top with whipped cream.
ingredients: strawberries, sugar, unflavored gelatin, water, boiling water, whipping cream
name: strawberry cream cake filling

steps: Combine all ingredients in a 4-quart crockpot. Cover and cook on lo heat 9-11 hours or until vegetables are tender. Stir in the frozen vegetables which have been thawed. Cover and cook on hi heat 1 hour. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: rock cornish game hen, garlic cloves, yellow onions, water, chicken bouillon cube, parsley, garlic salt, pepper, onion powder
name: crock pot game hen

steps: Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of bacon and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend until smooth and stir through cream. Divide into serving bowls and top with crispy bacon to serve.
ingredients: potatoes, bacon, onion, butter, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper
name: dawn s creamy potato soup

steps: Pour syrup into saucepan. Add syrup mixture and fruits together. Add to cream mixture. Add walnuts and chill.
ingredients: fruit cocktail in heavy syrup, egg, sugar, flour, baking soda, salt, nuts, brown sugar
name: momma s fruit cocktail cake

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: red onion, fresh mushrooms, garlic, oregano, olive oil, tomatoes, red peppers, tortillas, cheddar cheese
name: sweet red pepper mushroom quesadillas

steps: Put dill butter in a saucepan. Add 1 inch of water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain and set aside. In the same pan, combine butter, fresh dill, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper, baby carrotspreparation:Put dill butter in a saucepan. In the same pan, combine butter, fresh dill, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper, baby carrotspreparation:Put dill butter in a
ingredients: butter, fresh dill, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper, baby carrots
name: baby carrots with dill butter

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add the liquids and mix smooth. Place 2 tablespoons of batter in the bottom of each of the greased muffin cups. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style peanut butter. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean.
ingredients: cornmeal, seven-grain cereal, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, egg, milk, oil
name: healthy whole grain muffins

steps: To make the stuffing, melt butter, add onion, saut gently and add all other ingredients except fish. Cut each fillet in half lengthwise. Place stuffing on each fillet, roll up and wrap a thin slice of bacon around each roll. Place in a buttered ovenproof dish, cover and bake in a moderate oven for 15 minutes. Remove cover to brown the dish for last five minutes. Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley.
ingredients: bacon, fennel bulb, onion, salt, pepper, cilantro, trout fillets, lemon wedge
name: trout with fennel

steps: Heat 1 tbs oil in a saucepan and fry ginger and garlic paste for approx 2 minute, making sure not to brown the paste. Add hot water. Wash the lentils and put into the water. Add salt and tsp of turmeric. Bring to boil then lower heat and cook for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring once or twice. Heat oil in another saucepan and fry onion till light brown. Add onions and fried seed mixture to lentils, stir through. Serve with basmati rice.
ingredients: canola oil, onion, ground ginger, ground cumin, dried red lentils, water, salt, cilantro, lemon juice
name: spicy lentils

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Whisk egg white until foamy. Mix in spices. Stir in cheerios or chex. Coat a large cookie sheet with vegetable spray, and spread mixture on it. Spray the cereal with a light coating of more vegetable spray. Place in oven and stir every 5 minutes, for a total of 15-20 minutes. Cool completely enjoy.
ingredients: light corn syrup, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, cheerios toasted oat cereal
name: cheerios treats

steps: Combine all ingredients in a crock pot. Stir to mix well. Cover and cook on low 6-9 hours. Cook rice as directed. Serve chicken a la king over a mound of rice.
ingredients: cornish hens, white onions, new potatoes, spike seasoning
name: simple cornish hen ala crock pot

steps: Place the sauerkraut in a large bowl, cover with a lid, and let sit for 10 minutes. Remove from the lid and let sit for 10 minutes. Remove from the lid and
ingredients: pork, onion, salt and pepper, sauerkraut, flour, baking powder, salt, butter, milk
name: pork and sauerkraut with dumplings

steps: In a small mixing bowl, whisk together the oil, wine, garlic, parsley, oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloin, fresh oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloinpreparation:In a small mixing bowl, whisk together the oil, wine, garlic, parsley, oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloin, fresh oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloinpreparation:In a small mixing bowl, whisk together the oil, wine, garlic, parsley, oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloin, fresh oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloinpreparation:In a small mixing bowl, whisk together the oil, wine, garlic, parsley, oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloin, fresh oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloinpreparation:In a small mixing bowl, whisk together the oil, wine, garlic, parsley, oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloin, fresh oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloinpreparation:In a small mixing bowl, whisk together the oil, wine, garlic, parsley, oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloin, fresh oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloinpreparation:In a small mixing bowl, whisk together the oil, wine, garlic, parsley, oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloin, fresh oregano, bay leaf, black pepper, beef sirloinpreparation:In a
ingredients: mackerel fillet, white wine, salt, fresh ground black pepper, soy sauce, curry powder, breadcrumbs, garlic clove, dried parsley, extra virgin olive oil
name: spicy mackerel broil

steps: Cook the jasmine rice in a small amount of water until crisp tender, about 4 minutes. Drain well and place in a large bowl. Combine the remaining ingredients and pour over asparagus. Toss to coat. Cover and chill for 1 hour. Serve warm.
ingredients: tea bag, jasmine rice, green peas, carrot, vegetable oil, sesame oil, rice vinegar, fresh ginger
name: jasmine rice salad with fresh ginger dressing

steps: Place all ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until reduced to a chunky sauce, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat, cool, and refrigerate until needed. You can also freeze in ice cube trays. Keep frozen cubes in a plastic bag so you can remove one portion at a time.
ingredients: apples, butter, water, fresh lemon juice, sugar, cinnamon
name: chunky french applesauce

steps: Combine all ingredients except parmesan cheese. Mix ingredients lightly till well blended. Press lightly into an 8 by 8 pan. Cover with waxed paper & microwave on high for 12 to 14 minutes, turning dish once. Drain fat, if needed. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese & cook uncovered on high for 1- 2 minutes or till cheese melts. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: flour, ground chuck, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, oregano, tomato sauce, eggs, breadcrumbs, oil
name: parmesan meat patty casserole

steps: Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: green beans, onion, bacon grease, fresh ground black pepper
name: country green beans and onions

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly.
ingredients: olive oil, quinoa, chopped tomatoes, vegetable broth, green onion, fresh basil, fresh cilantro, balsamic vinegar, diced green chilies, monterey jack cheese
name: quinoa and green chile casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square, 3-inch deep baking pan or casserole. Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain off all but 1 tbls of the bacon grease. Add the onion to skillet and fry until tender but not browned, about 3 minutes. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, then add the spinach, flour and milk. Stir until well blended. Add the spinach-onion mixture and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared pan. Cover top with cracker crumbs and dot with butter. Bake until a knife inserted in center comes out clean, about 20 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: onion, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, ground nutmeg, milk, water, process american cheese, frozen chopped spinach, oyster crackers
name: spinach bisque

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: brownie mix, cream cheese, sugar, egg, vanilla
name: cheesecake brownies

steps: Heat a large saute pan over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the chicken and cook about 4 minutes per side, or until cooked through and juices run clear. Remove the chicken and set aside. To the same pan, add the spinach and cook just until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes. Lower the heat to medium and add the balsamic vinegar and chicken broth to the pan and stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to remove any browned bits. Add the tomatoes, bring to a simmer and cook 3 to 5 minutes. Place the couscous in a serving bowl. Top with the spinach, chicken and balsamic-tomato sauce.
ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, bosc pears, chicken broth, balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, sugar, dried cherries
name: balsamic chicken and pears

steps: Place beef in slowcooker. Add sliced onions. Mix together the vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic, pepper and thyme. Pour liquid mix over beef in slowcooker. Cover with the lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness.
ingredients: beef roast, garlic powder, kitchen bouquet, fresh ground pepper
name: turned on roast beef

steps: Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: baby red potatoes, reduced-sodium chicken broth, unsalted butter, salt, black pepper, fresh basil, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice
name: lemon basil mashed potatoes

steps: In a large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Add the onion and ginger and cook over med. Heat, stirring, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring, until coated with the oil. Stir in the kidney beans and scotch bonnet, then stir in the coconut milk and water. Season with salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed, 18 minutes. Remove the rice from the heat and let stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. Stir in the scallions and season with salt and pepper. Discard the scotch bonnet and serve.
ingredients: oil, long beans, soy sauce, hot red chili peppers, ginger, shaoxing wine, sugar, salt
name: szechuan long beans

steps: Preheat oven to 375f and butter and flour a 9-inch cake pan with high sides, line bottom with parchment paper. Finely grind almonds with 2 tablespoons of sugar in food processor. Mix yolks, 2 tablespoons sugar, lemon zest, cinnamon and a pinch of salt in a bowl until thick and smooth. Add almond mixture, stir. Separately beat egg whites until soft peaks form, then gradually add 4 tablespoons sugar, beating until egg whites are stiff but not dry. Fold half of egg whites gently into almond mixture, then add other half and finish folding in gently. Transfer to prepared pan. Bake until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, about 30-35 minutes. Cool on rack, turn out onto serving platter.
ingredients: butter, plain flour, icing sugar, almond extract, sliced almonds, caster sugar, eggs, double cream, lemons, juice of
name: almond lemon tart

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add garlic and onion and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge.
ingredients: jalapeno peppers, crackers, flour, eggs, water, vegetable oil
name: t g i friday s fire bites

steps: Place the pita in a large resealable plastic bag. Add ceaser dressing. Seal bag and turn to coat. In a large nonstick skillet, saute pork in oil for 7-8 minutes or until juices run clear. Fill each pita half with pork, cucumber, and onion. Drizzle with cucumber dressing.
ingredients: olive oil, fresh lemon juice, kalamata olives, dried oregano, romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, feta cheese, pita breads
name: greek salad pita sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. In a small bowl, combine paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, black pepper and salt. Divide in half. In a medium bowl, combine half of spice mixture, sweet potatoes, olive oil and maple syrup. Toss to coat sweet potatoes thoroughly. Spread sweet potatoes onto foil-lined baking sheet into a single layer, leaving two spaces in the middle for the pork chops. Rub remaining half of spice mixture lightly over both sides of pork chops and nestle into spaces made in sweet potatoes. Roast for 35-40 minutes or until pork chops are done.
ingredients: pork chops, granny smith apple, onion, maple syrup, brown mustard, salt, pepper, white wine
name: smoky maple mustard chops

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: chocolate digestive biscuits, butter, cream cheese, quark, dark chocolate, double cream, icing sugar
name: british chocolate cheesecake

steps: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, saut cutlets, being careful not to overcook. And please. Do not poke around on these cutlets with a fork. It will only make the meat tough.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, salt, lemon-pepper seasoning, flour, eggs, dried breadcrumbs, cooking oil, lemon wedge
name: simple wiener schnitzel

steps: In a bowl, combine flour tortillas, cream cheese, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper, lettuce, mozzarella cheese,
ingredients: flour tortillas, cream cheese, lettuce, mozzarella cheese, deli turkey, red bell pepper
name: roll ups

steps: Preheat oven to 375f grease or line a baking sheet. Cut the crusts off of the bread slices, then cut each piece of bread into 3 equal rectangles. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, garlic powder and parsley. Spread a layer of cream cheese mixture on each bread rectangle, and roll up. Wrap a slice of bacon around each of the bread rolls and secure them with toothpicks. Arrange the roll ups on the prepared baking sheet. Bake until the bacon is crisp, approximately 20 minutes.
ingredients: fat free cream cheese, reduced-fat mayonnaise, dried basil, dried oregano, dill weed, garlic powder, flour tortillas, onions, deli turkey, lettuce
name: easy turkey roll ups

steps: Combine eggs, sugar, vanilla, chocolate chips, dark corn syrup, oleo, salt, almonds in a medium mixing bowl. Cut in butter with pastry cutter or fork. Spread the mix into a nine inch pie pan and shape with fingers or bottom of a spoon to cover the bottom and sides. Bake for 15 minutes in oven at 350 degrees. Let cool. Pour in filling or use in place of graham cracker crusts.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla, chocolate chips, dark corn syrup, oleo, salt, almonds
name: chocolate almond pie ii

steps: Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments.
ingredients: hass avocadoes, white onion, plum tomato, serrano chilies, fresh cilantro, fresh lime juice, coarse salt
name: award winning guacamole

steps: Mix strawberries, lemon juice concentrate, sweetened condensed milk, strawberry soda, sugar, ice cube. Pour into a glass.
ingredients: fresh strawberries, lemon juice concentrate, sweetened condensed milk, strawberry soda, sugar, ice cube
name: fresh strawberry smoothie punch

steps: Mix water and dressing. Pour over chicken in the bottom of a skillet. Cover and cook chicken until done and no longer pink. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken in
ingredients: chicken, butter, italian salad dressing mix, cream cheese, cream of chicken soup
name: mrs barber s chicken chicken stroganoff

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with maraschino cherries, fresh mint, and lemon slices, if desired.
ingredients: water, sugar, of fresh mint, fresh lime juice, mint sprigs, lime slices
name: mint limeade

steps: In a hot water bath, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: tea, boiling water, mint, sugar, lemons
name: iced sweet mint tea

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: water, cinnamon sticks, egg yolks, evaporated milk, coconut milk, sweetened condensed milk, rum
name: traditional coquito with eggs cooked

steps: Combine all ingredients except for the baguette slices, until well blended. Spread cheese mixture evenly on one side of each baguette slice. Place slices, cheese side up, on a grill topper. Grill, with lid down, over low heat on barbeque for 3 to 5 minutes, or until bread is is lightly toasted and cheese is melted. These can also be baked in the oven at 350f or broiled, until lightly browned.
ingredients: baguette, garlic cloves, kalamata olive, red pepper, capers, fresh ground pepper, fresh parmesan cheese, plum tomatoes, green onions, extra virgin olive oil
name: kalamata and tomato crostini

steps: Heat oven to 350. Place graham crackers close together on large cookie sheet. Mix butter and brown sugar in a 3 quart sauce-pan to a rolling boil. When mix reaches 305 degrees pour onto a greased large cookie sheet. Sprinkle chocolate chips over the candy. As chocolate melts spread with a butter knife. Spread nuts evenly over the pan, shaking lightly until all nuts stick. Cool until hard. Break into pieces. Enjoy.
ingredients: soda crackers, butter, brown sugar, chocolate chips, nuts
name: soda cracker toffee

steps: Preheat oven to 200. Place tomatoes and peppers, cut side down on a baking rack set onto a baking sheet. Roast for 20-30 minutes or until skins are easily removed. Spray or brush vegetables with olive oil and continue to roast until tomatoes become a dark red color, about 2 hours. Remove from oven and chop into small pieces. Meanwhile, cook and drain pasta. Place into a mixing bowl. Add the onions, tomatoes and peppers, toss to combine. Mix together the vinegar, mustard, parsley, basil, olive oil, salt and pepper. Beat with a whisk to combine. Pour over the pasta, add the cheese and toss again. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: tomatoes, green onions, cilantro, fresh basil, oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic powder, fresh ground black pepper, kosher salt
name: tomato salad served with cottage cheese

steps: In a large saucepan bring the chicken stock to the boil and gradually add the polenta. Reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring often. When thick remove from the heat and stir in the herbs and cheese. Pour the mixture into a lined 19cmx19cm pan and leave to cool to room temperature. Once it is cool place in the fridge overnight. The next day slice the polenta in half horizontally and lay the salami, sun-dried tomatoes and pepper on the bottom half. Replace the top half and bake at 200c for 30 minutes.
ingredients: cornmeal, chicken broth, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, olive oil, pasta sauce
name: flavored polenta

steps: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Divide mixture in half and place each half on a sheet of plastic wrap. Draw up the sides of the plastic wrap tightly around each ball and firmly secure. Refrigerate 6-8 hours or until firm. Remove plastic wrap and roll in nuts before serving.
ingredients: cream cheese, port wine cheese, blue cheese, walnuts, cracker
name: ma s cheese ball

steps: In a mixing bowl, combine the dijon mustard, sour cream, scallions and garlic clove. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate until needed. Using a serrated knife, cut a very thin slice from the stem end of each tomato. Carefully scoop out pulp and seeds with the. Lightly sprinkle the insides of the tomatoes with salt. Invert them on paper towels and let them drain for about 15 minutes. Invert them on paper towels and let
ingredients: tomatoes, salt and pepper, grey poupon dijon mustard, sour cream, scallions, garlic clove
name: dijon baked tomatoes

steps: Put corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white corn syrup, jello gelatin, white
ingredients: white corn syrup, sugar, jello gelatin, popped popcorn
name: mary s jello popcorn balls

steps: In a large frying pan, saute garlic in olive oil. Add the drained tomatoes, and bring to a boil. Add the vodka, and simmer for 5-10 minutes. Add the fish boullion, stir until dissolved. Add the cream and the tarragon. Simmer until thickened. Finish off with butter if desired. Toss with cooked pasta. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese.
ingredients: crushed tomatoes, onion, garlic cloves, fresh basil leaves, half-and-half, parmesan cheese, vodka, butter, salt, pepper
name: vodka basil tomato sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish with nonstick pan coating or grease lightly with solid shortening. Cut baked potatoes into 1 inch cubes. Place half in a prepared baking dish. Sprinkle half of the salt, pepper and bacon. Top with half of the sour cream & cheese. Repeat layers. Bake, uncovered, at 425 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with chopped green onions to garnish.
ingredients: potatoes, salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, bacon, light sour cream, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, green onions
name: light twice baked potato casserole

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large nonstick saute pan over medium-high heat. Put two quesadillas in the pan, pressing down with spatula to close. Cook 2 to 4 minutes on both sides. Repeat with the remaining two quesadillas. Dice avocado, then toss with the lime juice and salt. Serve atop the quesadillas.
ingredients: flour tortillas, cheese, black beans, yellow rice, guacamole, salsa, sour cream, scallion
name: black bean and corn quesadillas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line cookie sheet with parchment paper to keep from sticking. Combine flour, sugar and pepper in a gallon plastic bag. Put one bacon slice at a time in bag and shake to coat well. Place bacon on the cookie sheet so they are not touching each other. Bake for 30-40 minutes at 350 degrees. Drain on paper towels.
ingredients: bacon, whole chestnuts, ketchup, peach baby food, sugar, salt
name: bacon wrapped chestnuts

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow baking pan, toss the walnut rosemary with the olive oil. Spread almonds so that they are in a single layer. In small bowl, combine parmesan cheese with garlic salt and sprinkle over the almonds. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until golden brown. Stir once while baking.
ingredients: sesame oil, onion, quinoa, red bell pepper, water, tamari soy sauce, fresh rosemary, fresh peas, walnuts
name: walnut rosemary quinoa

steps: Place broccoli in a steamer basket and set in a saucepan over 1 inch of boiling water. Cover and steam just until tender, approx. 5 minutes. To prepare the sauce, combine the orange juice, honey and ginger in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Add the cornstarch mixture and return to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook the sauce until thickened, about 1 minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Stir in the lemon juice and the sesame oil. Arrange the broccoli in a serving bowl. Top with the sauce, sprinkle with sesame seeds.
ingredients: broccoli, garlic cloves, scallions, rice vinegar, sesame oil, sesame seeds
name: broccoli with sesame seeds and scallions

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined.
ingredients: milk, rolled oats, eggs, oil, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt
name: family favorite oatmeal pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 deg f. Put the cottage cheese, eggs, sour cream, whey powder, splenda granular, lemon rind an juice, and vanilla extract in a blender, and blend until very smooth. Pour mixed into a sprayed pie pan. Place the cake on the top rack of the oven and place a flat pan of water on the bottom rack. Bake for 30-40 minutes. Cook, then chill well before serving.
ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, plain low-fat yogurt, eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, lemon rind, lemon juice, cooking spray
name: breakfast cheesecake south beach diet phase 1

steps: Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until garlic cloves are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, spanish ham, day-old french bread, sweet paprika, garlic cloves, eggs, water, salt
name: sopa de ajo castilian garlic soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: sweet potato, shortening, salt, butter, honey, cinnamon
name: outback steakhouse sweet potato copycat

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Mix butter, sour cream, eggs, cream-style sweet corn, white shoepeg corn, mexicorn, corn muffin mix. Pour margarine mixture into a greased 1 quart casserole dish. Place casserole into a larger pan and fill the larger pan half way up with hot water. Bake for 1 hour in the 325f oven.
ingredients: butter, sour cream, eggs, cream-style sweet corn, white shoepeg corn, mexicorn, corn muffin mix
name: cornbread pudding

steps: In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water. Add flour and salt and stir to form a soft dough. Turn dough onto a floured surface and knead until smooth, 4 to 5 times. Place in a greased bowl, cover and let rise for 15 minutes. Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Punch down and divide into 20 equal pieces. On a lightly floured surface, roll each piece into a 15 inch rope and twist into a pretzel shape. Combine baking soda and cold water and brush over each pretzel. Sprinkle with coarse salt. Place on non stick baking sheets. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm with assorted mustards.
ingredients: sugar, water, active dry yeast, wheat flour, malt drink powder, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, egg
name: philly style pretzels

steps: Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Add layer of american cheese, ham, two slices of tomato, two leaves of lettuce, and two pieces of bacon. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on the stack mayo side down. Slice the sandwich in quarters diagonally. Skewers or long toothpicks may be used to hold all the layers together.
ingredients: mayonnaise, yoghurt, horseradish, mixed herbs, salt, pepper, rye bread, butter, lettuce leaves, roast beef
name: germany hamburg open sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is flaky. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown.
ingredients: white fish fillet, mayonnaise, dried onion flakes, dry mustard, lemon juice, marjoram, paprika
name: creamy baked whitefish

steps: In heavy saucepan, combine butterscotch chips, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter
ingredients: butterscotch chips, semi-sweet chocolate chips, crunchy peanut butter, pretzel sticks, dry roasted peanuts, raisins
name: aunt pat s chocolate butterscotch candy

steps: In a small saucepan, cover the eggs with cold water and bring to a rolling boil. Cover, remove from the heat and let stand for 8 minutes. Drain the eggs and cool under running water, shaking the pan to crack the shells. Drain again and pat dry, then peel and coarsely chop. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise and horseradish and spread on the bread. Arrange the radishes on 4 of the slices and top with the sprouts, scallions and salmon. Spoon the eggs on top, season with salt and pepper and close the sandwiches. Press gently, cut the sandwiches in half and serve.
ingredients: potato, scallions, self-rising flour, eggs, vegetable oil, salt and pepper, fresh chives, sour cream, smoked salmon
name: salmon pancakes

steps: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook cauliflower until tender, 3-5 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving dish. In a small skillet, melt butter over medium low heat. Add scallions and cook 2 minutes. Pour over cauliflower and toss. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: egg, plain breadcrumbs, cauliflower florets, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, parsley sprig
name: fried cauliflower

steps: In a large non-stick skillet coated with cooking spray, cook beef and peppers over medium heat until meat is no longer pink, drain. Stir in the salsa, corn, and water and bring to a boil. Stir in tortilla strips, reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until meat is no longer pink, drain. Sprinkle with cheese, cover and cook 2-3 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Serve with sour cream.
ingredients: lean ground beef, taco seasoning, kidney beans, salsa, water, flour tortillas, mexican cheese, sour cream, green onion
name: quick fix beef burrito skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place cleaned asparagus spears in pan sprinkle with oil. Randomly place lemon curd on asparagus. Sprinkle garlic and ginger over the spear and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, tossing half way through. Give or take depends on the thickness of the spears. Be sure to serve with all the goodness from the pan.
ingredients: asparagus, egg yolks, fresh lemon juice, water, dijon mustard, parsley, butter, salt, cayenne
name: fresh asparagus with hollandaise

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray non-stick spray in cassarole pan. Cook pasta and drain. Heat oil in deep skillet. Add onion & bell pepper. Cook and stir for a few minutes. Add pasta, chicken, tomatoes, olives, italian seasoniong. Mix to blend. Put mozzarella on top. Cook in oven for about 35 minutes.
ingredients: chicken thighs, tomatoes, tomato sauce, olive oil, chicken bouillon, bell pepper, onion, mozzarella cheese
name: chicken catitori bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients in order directed by your bread machine and process. By hand - combine all and knead until elastic, about 10 minutes. Place in a greased bowl, cover and let rise for an hour. Punch down. Place in a greased loaf pan, cover and let rise another 20 minutes. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
ingredients: buttermilk, margarine, sugar, salt, bread flour, yeast
name: rapid buttermilk white bread bread machine

steps: Heat 1 tbs oil in a saucepan and fry onion and garlic paste for approx 2 minute, making sure not to brown the paste. Add hot water. Wash the lentils and put into the water. Add salt and tsp of turmeric. Bring to boil then lower heat and cook for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring once or twice. Heat oil in another saucepan and fry onion till light brown. Add mustard and cumin seeds and fry till mustard seeds start popping. Add onions and fried seed mixture to lentils, stir through. Serve with basmati rice.
ingredients: red lentils, oil, onion, garlic cloves, garam masala, ground turmeric, ginger powder, fresh parsley, water
name: indian dhal

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add cilantro and cook, stirring occasionally. Add cilantro
ingredients: olive oil, fresh garlic, dried chipotle powder, shrimp, butter, tequila, fresh lime juice, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper
name: easy tequila lime shrimp

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Blend together all the ingredients except the chicken. Brush the breasts all over with the marmalade mixture. Place in a baking dish lined with foil. Bake for 20-25 minutes until done, basting every 8 minutes. If there is any sauce left, heat, and serve along side the chicken.
ingredients: flour, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, vegetable oil, orange marmalade, nutmeg, orange juice
name: orange chicken for two

steps: In a large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. Process until smooth. Spoon pineapple over the bottom of a greased deep-dish 9 inch pie plate. Pour batter over pineapple. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes, or until knife comes out clean.
ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, water, sugar, lemon, juice of, evaporated milk, crushed pineapple, graham cracker pie crust
name: lime pineapple dessert fluffy green stuff

steps: Cover crock pot with aluminum foil, leaving enough to overlap potatoes when finished. Layer half of the potatoes, onions, potatoes and cheese in crock pot. Cover and cook on low setting for 8 to 9 hours.
ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, onion, cheddar cheese, ground black pepper, potatoes
name: cheesy crock pot potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined.
ingredients: egg, milk, butter, vanilla extract, sugar, baking powder, whole wheat pastry flour, salt
name: whole wheat fluffy pancakes

steps: In a large bowl, combine the turkey breast, green bell pepper, scallions, breadcrumbs, egg white, reduced sodium soy sauce, sweet and sour sauce, unsweetened applesauce. Bake for about 20-30 minutes, until golden brown on the outside and cooked through.
ingredients: ground turkey breast, green bell pepper, scallions, breadcrumbs, egg white, reduced sodium soy sauce, sweet and sour sauce, unsweetened applesauce
name: ww asian meatballs

steps: In a large container, combine cucumbers and onions. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients, stirring, until sugar is dissolved. Pour over cucumbers and onions. Stir and push under liquid. Let stand for 24 hours. Put in jars and refrigerate. No need to can, just keep in refrigerator. They will keep indefinetely in refrigerator.
ingredients: cucumbers, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, water, green onions, red chilies
name: pickled cucumber

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, beat sugar, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown.
ingredients: butter, chocolate chips, flour, brown sugar, bicarbonate of soda, salt, sugar, chocolate, blended oatmeal, vanilla extract
name: shhh secret secret cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Beat eggs until frothy. Combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and salt in a small bowl. Add corn syrup, melted butter, and vanilla. Mix oatmeal. Pour into uncooked shell. Bake for 45 minutes.
ingredients: quick-cooking oatmeal, no-sugar-added apple pie filling, skim milk, splenda sugar substitute, cinnamon, nutmeg, ground cloves, allspice, salt
name: microwave apple pie oatmeal

steps: Mix together all ingredients using hands in a big bowl. To get the right consistency it is important that all ingredients get well mixed and gets softened a bit. I would say that you should knead for around 5 minutes. Form into meatballs according to the size you prefer. In denmark meatballs used for dinner is the size of the palm of your hand, and lunch meat balls are about half of that. Heat a non-stick pan to medium-hot and place the meatballs in the pan. If you feel they stick too much to the pan, you can add a bit of butter to the pan. Turn the meatballs with a fork once they have started to brown. Keep turning them every 4 min or so being careful that they do not brown too much. Cook for approx 15-20 min until cooked through. Serve with a potato salad, mashed potatoes or cooked potatoes with a white milk based gravy.
ingredients: pickled beet, apple, red onion, creme fraiche, beet juice, salt and pepper, bread, butter, mixed salad green, meatballs
name: swedish meatball sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl, stir together butter, garlic, cheese and parsley. Remove biscuits from container. On baking pan with sides, make 2 loaves of 5 biscuits each. Set the biscuits on their sides, just touching each other end to end, like they were in the can, only in 2 groups of 5. Split each biscuit in half. Separate biscuits into 20 pieces, then cut biscuits into 4 pieces. Toss biscuits with bacon and other ingredients. Put all this into tube pan and drizzle with butter. Bake for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, margarine, bacon, parmesan cheese, onion, green pepper
name: breakaway vegetable bread

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice and cook, stirring constantly. Sprinkle with salt, cumin, and taco seasoning. Cook stirring constantly, until slightly translucent. Stir in onions and cook until tender. Stir in tomato sauce and chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes. Fluff with a fork.
ingredients: water, long grain rice, pigeon peas, sazon goya, recaito, adobo seasoning, tomato paste, chicken bouillon granule, olive
name: easy rice with pigeon peas arroz con gandules

steps: In a stew or dutch-oven pot, saute meat and chopped onions until brown. Pour off any grease. Add to browned meat& onions all of the remaining ingredients. Stir and bring to boil, then turn down to medium-low or simmer and put lid on pot. Simmer 20 minutes or until noodles are done. Stir occasionally to keep from sticking to bottom of pot. Simmer
ingredients: rotini pasta, lean ground beef, celery, onion, diced tomatoes, condensed tomato soup, dried basil, salt, pepper
name: skillet goulash

steps: Heat a large saucepan over a low heat and add the butter. When the butter has melted, add the onion and cook until soft and translucent. Add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper to taste, then increase the heat and stir. When the moisture from the mushrooms has been released, allow it to evaporate, concentrating the flavour. This might happen quickly or slowly, depending entirely on the type of mushrooms used. Add teh paprika and cayenne and fry for a few moments longer, until the paprika turns a shade darker. Finally, add teh sour cream or creme fraiche and dill, and allow it to bubbvle gently for a further 5 minutes or so. Serve immediately with rice, pasta or spatzle.
ingredients: baking potatoes, carrots, asparagus, mushrooms, onion, garlic cloves, basil, salt, pepper, olive oil
name: vegetable hobo dinners

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and bell pepper. Saut 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in black pepper. Divide onion mixture and turkey evenly among bottom halves of rolls. Top each serving with 1 cheese slice. Cover with top halves of rolls. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet. Bake at 375 for 5 minutes or until cheese melts.
ingredients: french rolls, goat cheese, bing cherries, low-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, fresh basil, deli turkey, baby spinach leaves
name: blushing turkey and cheese sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a medium sized bowl, combine all ingredients mixing well. If mixture looks a little too dry, add a little more mayonnaise until. Desired moistness is reached. Now taste to see if seasonings need to be adjusted. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, wheat germ, salt and pepper, egg
name: germy nuggets

steps: Mix sugar, cornstarch and salt together in a microwaveable bowl and stir in the milk. Microwave for 9 minutes, stopping to stir every 3 minutes. The object is to cook until it achieves a thick, pudding-like consistency, so it may take more or less time dependent upon the individual microwave. This can also be performed in a saucepan on the stovetop. Add the butter and vanilla into the mixture. Pour the thick mixture into the baked 8 inch pie shell and sprinkle the top with cinnamon. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, dark cherries, vanilla, pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie, sliced almonds, cherry pie filling, powdered sugar, milk
name: sweet glazed cherry pie

steps: In a heavy bottomed pan, fry ginger root in butter on low for about 15 mins, stirring frequently. Dont let them brown. Add sugar, stir for about 15 mins, allowing the mixture to brown slightly. Turn off heat, but keep stirring so it doesnt burn. Keep in fridge. Havent worked out the storage time yet.
ingredients: gingerroot, garlic cloves, chipotle chile, sugar, tomatoes, salt, cracked black pepper, water
name: ginger jam

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: brown sugar, butter, milk, powdered sugar, maple flavoring
name: yummy caramel frosting

steps: Heat to medium. Add coconut milk, cayenne pepper, sea salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, c
ingredients: bacon, garlic, red onion, baby spinach, coconut milk, cayenne pepper, sea salt, black pepper
name: coconut spinach

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: beans, eggs, milk, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, onions, cooked rice, canned corn, shredded cheddar cheese
name: bean cheese and rice squares

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix spaghetti sauce, tomatoes and water. Spoon 1 cup onto bottom of 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Layer half the ravioli and 1 cup shredded cheese over sauce mixture. Top with remaining ravioli and sauce mixture. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Cover. Bake 30 minutes. Uncover. Bake 15 minutes or until ravioli is tender and heated through. Let stand 10 minutes.
ingredients: frozen cheese ravioli, italian salad dressing, italian style breadcrumbs, marinara sauce
name: light toasted ravioli fried ravioli

steps: In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops.
ingredients: olive oil, yellow squash, zucchini, onion, pork loin chops, salt, pepper, mushroom, spaghetti sauce, dried oregano
name: country pork chops

steps: Combine all ingredients together just before serving.
ingredients: broccoli slaw mix, ramen noodles, slivered almonds, sunflower seeds, green onion, vegetable oil, cider vinegar, sugar
name: crunchy salad

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees f., cook and drain burgers as directed on package. Meanwhile, in 10-inch skillet, cook beef, onion, garlic powder and salt over medium heat 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until beef is thoroughly cooked. Drain. Stir in tomatoes, tomato sauce, sugar and pasta. Pour into ungreased 8-inch square glass baking dish. Cover dish with foil. Bake 30-40 minutes or until bubbly around edges. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake uncovered 5-10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: lean ground beef, oil, dried italian herb seasoning, tomato paste, pasta sauce, bread, tomatoes, cheddar cheese
name: hamburger baskets

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place sausage crumble on a baking sheet with wax paper between layers and freeze. When frozen, put in a ziploc bag and store in freezer until ready to use. Bake at 325 for 15 - 20 minutes.
ingredients: sausages, beans, tomatoes, breadcrumbs, sunflower seeds, salt and pepper
name: sausage crumble

steps: Heat oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat. Cook potatoes until soft, drain. Add cheese, salt & pepper and mash until smooth. Melt margarine or butter in large skillet. Add onions and cook 10 to 15 minutes until tender but not browned. Spread half the onions over the bottom of a 13x9 baking dish. Stuff each shell with heaping tablespoon of the potato mixture, close edges. Arrange in single layer over onions, spread remaining onions on top. Bake at 350 degrees uncovered 15 to 20 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: jumbo pasta shells, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, fresh parmesan cheese, eggs, fresh parsley, tomato sauce
name: three cheese stuffed shells italiano

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, bell pepper, garlic cloves, ground turkey breast, tomato sauce, worcestershire sauce, tomato paste, salt, pepper, kaiser rolls, fresh rosemary leaf, baguette, sea salt, fresh ground black pepperpreparation:Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, bell pepper, garlic cloves, ground
ingredients: onion, bell pepper, garlic cloves, ground turkey breast, tomato sauce, worcestershire sauce, tomato paste, salt, pepper, kaiser rolls
name: light sloppy joes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large saucepan, melt 2 tablespoons butter. Stir in flour and salt. Add milk and stir until bubbly. Pour half of the mixture into a 10x6 inch baking dish. Cook broccoli according to package instructions, drain well. Layer broccoli over the potatoes in the baking dish. Pour the remaining potato mixture over the broccoli. Sprinkle the bread crumbs and 1 tablespoon melted butter over the top of the casserole. Bake at 350 for 20 to 35 minutes, or until bubbly and browned lightly.
ingredients: onions, oil, bacon, white cabbage, garlic, salt and pepper, eggs, milk, soft breadcrumbs
name: cabbage and bacon bake fouson de chou

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup cream and pumpkin puree. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup cream and pumpkin puree.
ingredients: heavy cream, pumpkin puree, pure vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground cloves, salt, marshmallow cream, gingersnaps, dark rum
name: spiced pumpkin mousse trifle

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package. Be sure to just cook to al dente stage. Drain and return to pot. Place pot on burner but turn off burner. Stir in oil. Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well. I have also added broccoli to pasta water while cooking pasta and this is very good too.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, contadina tomato sauce, italian-style diced tomatoes, sweet peas, whipping cream
name: creamy chicken with bow tie pasta

steps: In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine cereals, pecans and banana chips. In a small microwave-safe bowl, combine the butter, brown sugar and cinnamon. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Stir in extracts. Pour over cereal mixture and toss to coat. Cook, uncovered, on high for 3 minutes, stirring after each minute. Spread onto waxed paper to cool. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: butter, bananas, light brown sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, salt, ice cream
name: easy bananas foster

steps: Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoon jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing.
ingredients: mixed greens, red pears, honey, lemon juice, walnuts
name: pear walnut salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick oil spray. Arrange eggplant rounds on the cookie sheet and sprinkle parmesan over the eggplant. Can peel the eggplant also, if preferred that way. Layer one slice of tomato on top of each eggplant round. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. If using olive oil, brush the eggplant with olive oil then add seasonings, then parmesan and tomato. Can also add slices of onion or fresh mushroom to make this a deluxe meal of yummy veggies. Feel free to add additional variations of cheeses. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: eggplant, oil, tomatoes, hot water
name: fried eggplant stew

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Grease 2 40cm x 30cm baking trays with oil spray. Cream butter until close to white. Add caster and brown sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Gradually add egg and vanilla essence. Beat well. Fold in sifted flour, chocolate chips and salt. Combine. Pinch off tablespoons of mixture and place on greased trays. Bake for 15 minutes or until firm. Cool on wire rack and place in airtight container.
ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, egg, self-rising flour, chocolate chips
name: nicky s choc chip cookies

steps: In a saucepan, combine instant coffee, mini marshmallows, whipping cream, bananas, 9-inch graham cracker crusts. Whip cream cheese until light and fluffy. Gradually beat in milk. Pour over bananas and strawberries. Chill for 2 hours or until firm.
ingredients: instant coffee, miniature marshmallows, whipping cream, bananas, 9-inch graham cracker crusts
name: coffee banana pie

steps: Boil water for the macaroni. Cook the noodles in the water until done, usually 7-9 minutes. While the noodles are cooking cube the cheese. When the noodles are done drain them and then return to the pan. Add the cubed cheese and taco seasoning. Stir well, until the cheese is melted. When melted, add the salsa and serve.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, lean ground beef, tomato soup, cream of mushroom soup, green pepper, chopped pimiento, colby cheese, french-fried onions
name: crunchy cheeseroni

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a small saucepan, cook cream of sorrel soup long enough to separate. Drain. Mix sour cream with onion soup mix. Add to the cream of sorrel soup. Mix well. Put the cream of sorrel soup into a 1-quart casserole dish. Mix stuffing with melted butter. Sprinkle on top of cream of sorrel soup. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, onion, potatoes, sorrel, chicken stock, fresh ground black pepper, salt, whipping cream, hard-boiled eggs
name: chilled cream of sorrel soup

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In 2 pans place tomato halves cut side up. Sprinkle with oil, salt and pepper, onion, garlic, and herbs. Bake tomatoes for 2 hours. Check the tomatoes after 1 hour and turn down the heat if they seem to be cooking too quickly. Then turn the oven to 400 degrees and bake another 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and process tomatoes through a food mill using a medium dye over a small saucepan. Discard skins. Add wine, bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes.
ingredients: almonds, garlic cloves, tomatoes, dried hot red chili pepper, red wine vinegar, salt, olive oil
name: romesco sauce

steps: Combine the elderberry flowers, vodka and sugar in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring to dissolve the sugar. Remove from the heat, cover and let steep for 15 minutes. Transfer the syrup to a 2-quart pitcher. Let cool. Add the elderberry flowers, vodka and sugar in a large saucepan. Remove from the heat, cover
ingredients: elderberry flowers, vodka, sugar, lemon verbena leaves
name: elderflower liqueur

steps: In a small bowl combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Stir until blended. In a medium bowl, place the egg yolks, cream, and butter. Whisk until well mixed. Stir the dry ingredients into the cream mixture. Whisk until well mixed and smooth. Heat the waffle iron. Brush lightly with butter if not nonstick. Beat the egg whites until stiff, then fold them gently into the batter. Bake for 30 minutes to a hour or until the lollipop pieces are molten. Wait until they are cool enough to touch and then remove with spatula.
ingredients: waffle mix, sugar, water, eggs
