name: easy dessert crepes

steps: Combine all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth, 1-2 minutes. Refrigerate. Sauce may become quite thick once refrigerated. Just heat for a few seconds in microwave. Recipe can be doubled or tripled and the level of chipotle pepper can be adjusted to suit personal preferences.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic powder, dried chipotle powder, cumin, red wine, brown sugar, soy sauce, apple cider vinegar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce
name: chipotle barbecue sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease a cookie sheet. In a large mixing bowl, combine marshmallow creme, peanut butter, and milk. Stir until smooth. Add popcorn and peanuts. Coat evenly. Bake 5 to 7 minutes. Cool on cookie sheet at least 20 minutes. For a festive presentation, stack the balls like a christmas tree and drizzle with chocolate.
ingredients: caramel candies, whipping cream, popped popcorn, dry roasted peanuts
name: caramel nut popcorn clusters

steps: Preheat oven or toaster oven to 450 degrees. Lay a 12-inch square piece of foil on the counter and put the garlic on it. Sprinkle the thyme and rosemary over the garlic. Pour the oil over the garlic and herbs. Draw up the edges of the foil and make a sealed packet. Bake 20 minutes. While the garlic is baking, cook pasta according to package directions. Two minutes before pasta is done add the zucchini to the cooking pasta, cook 2 minutes. Drain zucchini and pasta. Open the foil and mash the garlic lightly with a spoon. Toss mashed garlic with the pasta and zucchini. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: acini di pepe pasta, lemon juice, butter, fresh lemon zest, zucchini
name: acini di pepe with lemon butter and zucchini

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Arrange flaked tuna evenly in a 9 inch pie pan that has been sprayed with a nonstick cooking spray. In a blender, combine half of the parmesan with remaining ingredients. Blend until smooth. Pour mixture over tuna. Top with remaining parmesan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes, until set and lightly browned. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: tuna, fettuccine, butter, olive oil, garlic, fresh mushrooms, sour cream, milk, parmesan cheese, parsley
name: creamy tuna fettuccini

steps: Sprinkle honey over chicken and arrange in a 12 by 8 inch baking dish. In a small bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Pour over chicken pieces. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours, turning pieces occasionally. Preheat oven to 350. Bake 50 minutes, basting with pan juices.
ingredients: barbecued chicken, honey, dry white wine, chives, soy sauce, lemon juice, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, cornflour
name: chicken with honey glaze

steps: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine cup water, sugar and lemon zest. Bring to a boil, then decrease heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Set aside to cool. Strain syrup through sieve placed over large measuring cup, discarding solids. Whisk in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Pour into molds and freeze until slushy, then insert sticks and freeze until solid, for at least 4 hours. If you are using an ice pop kit, follow the manufacturers instructions.
ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, lemons, juice and zest of
name: lemon spread honey

steps: Cook, peel, and cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, mix some mayonnaise and ranch powder. Add potatoes, egg, onion, and some finely chopped pickle in bowl. Mix ingredients together. Add salt, pepper, and a little pickle juice. Refrigerate and serve.
ingredients: potato, onion, celery, sweet pickle relish, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, celery seed, salt and pepper, hard-cooked eggs
name: mom pooley s potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown.
ingredients: canned crushed pineapple, sweet potatoes, salt, cream of tartar, brown sugar, boiling water, almonds
name: sweet potato candy dulce de camote

steps: In a large bowl, soak bread in soup for 5 mintes. Stir in the onion, egg, salt and pepper. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into an 8 in x 4 in loaf. Line and 11 in x 7 in x 2 in baking dish with foil and grease the foil. Place meatloaf in pan. Top with tomato sauce. Bake uncovered at 350 for 50-60 minutes or until a meat thermometer reads 160. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: canola oil, onion, pepper, beef broth, diced tomatoes, condensed tomato soup, meatloaf, worcestershire sauce, water, cheddar cheese
name: leftover meatloaf soup

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add olives and cook, stirring occasionally, until mixture is thickened. Add feta and cook, stirring occasionally, until mixture is thickened. Add feta and cook, stirring occasionally, until mixture is thick
ingredients: pimento stuffed olive, pitted black olives, italian salad dressing, fresh coarse ground black pepper, feta cheese, cream cheese, garlic
name: roasted olives in feta cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Spread into a 9x9 baking dish. Top with reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Bake until bubbly and lightly browned on top approximately 30 minutes.
ingredients: wonton wrappers, reduced-fat cream cheese, low-fat cheddar cheese, dijon mustard, cayenne pepper, water-packed artichoke hearts, sweet red pepper
name: cheesy artichoke mini tarts

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: unbleached flour, cajun seasoning, paprika, skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, olive oil, chicken stock, fresh lemon juice, capers, fresh parsley
name: spicy cajun chicken with capers and lemons

steps: Combine first 5 ingredients, boil until soft ball stage. Remove from heat, then add granulated sugar, karo syrup, vinegar, water, salt, egg whites, walnuts, vanilla. Beat it and pour out onto buttered dish, or parchment covered dish. Cool, and cut into squares.
ingredients: granulated sugar, karo syrup, vinegar, water, salt, egg whites, walnuts, vanilla
name: grandma elzey s divinity fudge

steps: In small frying pan, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil. Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Combine beef and egg, mixing well. To beef mixture, add cooked onion, parsley, worcestershire and tabasco sauces and mix well. Shape mixture into 4 large patties, scoring each with a knife. Heat remaining tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. When hot, add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, worcestershire sauce, onion powder, salt & pepper, bacon, sharp cheddar cheese, glazed doughnuts
name: is that a hamburger

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine broccoli, mayonnaise, cheese, soup and eggs. Mix well. Place the mixture in pan. Top with crushed crackers and pour the melted butter evenly over crackers. Bake for 35 minutes or until set and browned.
ingredients: broccoli florets, eggs, cream of chicken soup, sharp cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, ritz crackers, butter
name: judy s broccoli casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet. Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil. In a small bowl combine. Onion flakes, oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well. Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes. Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet. Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden. Serve while they ar piping hot.
ingredients: peanut oil, idaho potatoes, sea salt, fresh flat-leaf parsley
name: matchstick potatoes barefoot contessa ina garten

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease or spray with pam a 9-inch pie plate. Press all the water out of the thawed spinach. Combine cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, spinach, eggs, oil, salt and pepper. Pour half of the mixture into the lightly greased pie plate. Arrange tomato slices over spinach. Cover with the remaining spinach mixture. Bake 40 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean
ingredients: red pepper, broccoli florets, zucchini, american cheese, eggs, oil, salt and pepper
name: crustless vegetable quiche

steps: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. Add minced garlic and lightly saute just until fragrant. Stir in the flour and stir for about one minute. This will be thick. Slowly pour in the milk. Add salt, pepper, oregano and nutmeg. Stir until creamy and thick. Turn off the heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Serve over your choice of pasta.
ingredients: milk, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, romano cheese, egg yolks, salt and black pepper
name: the real olive garden alfredo sauce

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: cracked bulgur wheat, chicken broth, cucumber, tomatoes, carrot, green onions, fresh lime juice, chili powder, garlic powder
name: colorful bulgur salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: hamburger buns, onion, celery ribs, butter, sage, salt and pepper, egg
name: aunt beth s sage dressing balls

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Spread one side of each slice of bread with 1 teaspoon mustard and 1 tablespoon 1000 island. Divide the suarkraut and turkey evenly between 2 of the bread slices. Top each with 1 slice of cheese and remaining slice of bread. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet or toaster oven sheet and bake until cheese melts and sandwiches are hot, about 6 minutes.
ingredients: marbled rye bread, reduced-fat thousand island dressing, swiss cheese, sauerkraut, turkey, butter
name: lightweight turkey reuben

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly.
ingredients: corn chips, onion, cheddar cheese, chili
name: chili pie casserole

steps: Preheat an 8-inch pot with a tight fitting cover over moderate heat. Add oil, onion and garlic and saute for 2 or 3 minutes. Add broth to the pan and bring to a boil. Stir in orzo and return to boiling. Cover pot and reduce heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Remove lid and stir in cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: orzo pasta, extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, cremini mushroom, half-and-half, canned peas, parmesan cheese, salt
name: creamy italian orzo

steps: Mix all dry ingredients together in a bowl. In another bowl, mix all wet ingredients. Bake waffles in waffle iron.
ingredients: apples, cinnamon, sugar, orange juice, orange zest, brandy
name: apple topping for pancakes waffles such

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat and pour over potatoes. Cover and chill for at least 12 hours. Drain excess marinade and add onions, eggs, salt, pepper, celery seed and mayonnaise. Mix well and serve chilled.
ingredients: sugar, canola oil, malt vinegar, water, french-fried potatoes, boneless beef top sirloin steak, lettuce, chopped tomato, red onion, mozzarella cheese
name: steak n fries salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Toss together apples and apples, spread evenly over bottom of 8x8 baking dish. In medium bowl combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and oats. Using pastry cutter work butter into oat mixture until crumbly. Spread over fruit, pressing down lightly. Bake 40-45 minutes or until top is lightly browned. Cool before serving. Top with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: butter, oats, brown sugar, flour, apple
name: rachel s apple crisp

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix all ingredients except reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Spread into a 9x9 baking dish. Top with reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Bake until bubbly and lightly browned on top approximately 30 minutes.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, ranch dressing, parmesan cheese, dried dill, paprika, artichoke hearts, spinach
name: not your typical spinach artichoke dip

steps: Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add spinach and mix again. Pour olive oil in a skillet. I use about 2 t. Get it hot. Fry the patties until golden brown.
ingredients: frozen spinach, cooked white rice, flour, egg whites, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: vegetarian spinach patties

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Cut bananas crosswise into halves. Cut each half lengthwise into halves and arrange in greased 9-inch pie plate. Dot with margarine or butter and drizzle with orange and lemon juices. Sprinkle with brown sugar and coconut. Bake until coconut is golden, 8 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: bananas, lemon, juice of, orange juice, coconut milk, milk, honey, coconut
name: banana coconut fitness booster

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook garlic until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and mix well. Stir in rice. Pour in stock and bring to a boil. Cover. Reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in dill. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: oil, small shrimp, garlic cloves, minute rice, cornstarch, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, pepperoni, frozen green pea, tabasco sauce
name: 10 minute paella

steps: Heat oil in large pot over medium high heat. Add beef and onion. Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes. Add garlic, mushrooms and carrots. Cook another 5 minutes. Add pilaf mix, orange juice and beef broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 20 minutes or until liquid has been absorbed.
ingredients: beef liver, garlic powder, oregano, butter, water, tomato soup
name: beef liver and rice stir fry

steps: In a large nonmetal dish or resealable food storage plastic bag, combine all ingredients except steak. Mix well. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover dish or seal bag. Refrigerate atleast 4 hours or overnight to marinate. Heat grill. When ready to grill, remove steak from marinade. Discard marinade. Place steak on gas grill over medium heat. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until desired doneness, turning once or twice. To serve, cut steak across grain into slices. Place on serving platter.
ingredients: filet of beef, merlot, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, brown sugar, fresh ground black pepper
name: merlot marinated grilled beef

steps: Mix seasonings together in small dish. Trim fat from steak and rub seasoning mixture on both sides. Place the steak on rack of broiler pan. Position pan so that steak is about 3 inches from heat. Broil 10-12 minutes for a steak, turning once during cooking or grill as desired. Serve with baked potatoes, sour cream and chives, and steamed broccoli.
ingredients: beef, salt, chaimen, paprika, red pepper, black pepper, kimion, allspice, garlic cloves, water
name: armenian basterma dried cured beef

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray 13x9 dish with cooking spray. Slice potatoes fairly thin and place in dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Toss to coat. Sprinkle italian seasoning and parmesan cheese on top. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: red potatoes, onion, butter, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper, lemon thyme
name: canadian oven roasted potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Stir ingredients in medium mixing bowl until blended. Spoon onto 2 un-greased cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the pan, or wait 1-2 minutes before moving to cooling racks. Cookies should be soft & chewy.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, brown sugar, oil, water, eggs, vanilla extract, chocolate chips
name: super easy chocolate chip squares

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f. in a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper.
ingredients: mashed potatoes, onions, egg, parmesan cheese, parsley, breadcrumbs, vegetable oil
name: potato croquettes with parmesan

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add carrots, celery and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until vegetables begin to soften. Add tomatoes, zucchini and stock to pan. Cover and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add lentils to soup. Cook for 5 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and squeeze lemon juice. Season with freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: cumin seeds, dried chili pepper flakes, olive oil, carrots, lentils, stock, milk, salt, pepper
name: spiced carrot and lentil soup

steps: In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve.
ingredients: water, sugar, dutch-processed cocoa powder, vanilla extract, kosher salt, light corn syrup
name: cocoa syrup

steps: Place the pasta in a large pot of water and bring to a boil. Add beef stock and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Add parmesan cheese and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Add parmesan cheese and bring to a boil
ingredients: beef stock, pasta, roasted red peppers, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: tiny pasta in broth

steps: In a large measuring cup combine light rum, tequila, grand marnier, grenadine, tea bag, powdered sugar, maraschino cherries, cracked ice. Garnish with the orange slice on the top of the glass. Admire your great work. Drink.
ingredients: light rum, tequila, grand marnier, grenadine, tea bag, powdered sugar, maraschino cherries, cracked ice
name: i am tired of living cocktail

steps: Heat oil in frying pan, add the marinated fish pieces to pan and fry for 4 min in simmer. Fry both side of fishes pieces until golden brown. Serve hot with sprinkled lemon juice and sliced onion.
ingredients: lemon, extra virgin olive oil, fish, salt and pepper
name: simply seared opah

steps: Open cans of tomatoes and pour into large skillet. Cut up whole tomatoes with knife, releasing juices. Sprinkle with garlic salt. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add drained beans. Boil pasta water and add pasta. Cook acording to package directions. Add cheese to sauce & stir, simmer till pasta is done. Drain and add to sauce
ingredients: tomato cream sauce, mushroom, sun-dried tomatoes, grilled chicken breasts, rigatoni pasta, romano cheese, ricotta cheese, green onion
name: rigatoni martino

steps: In a 16-ounce shaker, squeeze juice from the lemon and orange halves. Add sugar. Add enough ice cubes to fill two-thirds full. Add water to cover ice. Cover and shake. Serve in a tall glass.
ingredients: ritz crackers, butter, sugar, cool whip, frozen orange juice, mandarin oranges, sweetened condensed milk
name: mandarin orange surprise

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, salt, and pepper. In a separate bowl, whisk together the cream, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper. In a separate bowl, whisk together the cream, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese
ingredients: new potatoes, scallion, roasted red pepper, sour cream, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper
name: potato cheddar salad

steps: Place all ingredients in a large saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Serve with chips.
ingredients: vegetarian refried beans, fat free sour cream, dry ranch dressing mix, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, sliced ripe olives, tomatoes, green onions
name: super fast low fat layered dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients. Place onions in small bowl and chill until ready to use. Grill salmon over medium coals for 10 minutes, turn and grill the other side for 10 minutes. Brush with ginger sauce throughout grilling. Place salmon on platter and sprinkle with onions.
ingredients: sea bass fillets, sea salt, cayenne pepper, fresh ginger, shiitake mushroom, fresh cilantro, green onions, sesame oil, soy sauce
name: steamed sea bass with ginger and shiitakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400c. Line two baking sheets with baking parchment and set aside. Beat egg whites and salt in small bowl at high electric-mixer speed until frothy. With mixer still at high speed, add sugar gradually and continue beating until meringue peaks stiffly. Beat in vanilla, then by hand fold in lemon zest. Drop meringue from rounded teaspoon onto prepared baking sheets, spacing 2-inches apart. Set in oven, immediately turn oven off, and let cookies remain in the oven for 2 hours peel meringue off parchment and store in airtight container.
ingredients: egg whites, salt, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, lemon juice, semi-sweet chocolate chips, powdered sugar
name: chocolate chip studded mini meringues

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in the mushrooms and onion, and cook until tender. Sprinkle with parmesan and salt and pepper. Reduce heat to low, and continue cooking 5 minutes. Mix in sour cream and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper transfer to a small casserole dish, and top with parmesan cheese. Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.
ingredients: whole mushroom, butter, beef bouillon cubes, hot water, flour, cream, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese
name: mushroom supreme

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Line 9 inch pie pan with pastry. In large bowl combine all filling ingredients except butter and toss lightly. Spoon filling into crust lined pan. Cut 4 slits in top of crust. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after 20 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after 20 minutes
ingredients: blueberries, pie crusts, sugar, all-purpose flour, salt, eggs, sour cream, butter
name: berry cream pie

steps: In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In a 2-quart pitcher combine gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedgepreparation:In
ingredients: gin, light rum, tequila, vodka, coke, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, chambord raspberry liquor, ice, lemon wedge
name: long island raspberry iced tea

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar until thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean.
ingredients: pie crust, eggs, cream, brown sugar, butter, powdered sugar
name: tarte au sucre brun

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: pickling cucumbers, salt, white vinegar, sugar
name: old fashion cucumber salad

steps: Place tomatoes in food processor. Process on high for 1 minute. In dutch oven on medium heat, saut onions in olive oil till soft but not browned. Add tomatoes, tomato pure and all spices. Cook sauce on very low heat for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Add a little water if necessary as sauce cooks.
ingredients: tomato sauce, chile, garlic, olive oil, fresh parsley leaves, salt
name: arrabiata sauce

steps: Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Mix in pineapple, mandarin oranges, pineapple chunks, vanilla instant pudding mix, strawberry, banana, blueberries, grapes, sugarpreparation:Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Mix in pineapple, mandarin oranges, pineapple chunks, vanilla instant pudding mix, strawberry, banana, blueberries, grapes
ingredients: vanilla pudding mix, tapioca pudding, orange jell-o, mandarin oranges, water, whipped topping
name: orange tapioca salad ii

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a large baking pan with cooking spray. Rub the fillets on both sides with lemon juice, then salt and pepper. Place the fillets in the baking disk and sprinkle evenly with tarragon. Cover evenly with sour cream. Bake for about 15 minutes until fish is done but not over cooked. Sprinkle with chives and parsley.
ingredients: flounder fillets, vinegar, salt, butter
name: flounder baked in brown butter

steps: Heat panini press to medium-low heat. Spread cheddar cheese on 4 slices of bread. Top with slices of cheddar, 2 pieces of bacon, apple slices and additional cheddar. Place the remaining bread on top. Place on panini press and cook until cheese is slightly melted and bread is browned and crispy.
ingredients: sweet onion, maple syrup, whole wheat bread, mayonnaise, gala apples, smoked ham, smoked cheddar cheese
name: smoked cheddar ham panini

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix first 4 ingredients with hand or stand mixer on medium until softened and well mixed. Add next two ingredients and mix on low until just incorporated. Transfer mixture to a small ovenproof dish and sprinkling cayenne on top to taste. Top with cheddar. Bake for 15 - 18 minutes or until bubbling around the edges. Remove from oven and allow to set for 5 - 7 minutes before serving. Serve with fried or baked pita wedges and tortilla chips.
ingredients: blue cheese, red onion, olive oil, lemon juice, red wine vinegar, garlic, dry mustard, black pepper, fresh parsley, water crackers
name: blue cheese columbine dip

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4.
ingredients: roma tomatoes, zucchini, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, penne pasta, tomato paste, parmesan cheese, fresh basil
name: oven roasted vegetable penne

steps: Preheat oven to 350f grease 8-inch square baking pan. Combine all ingredients in medium bowl and mix until blended. Spread in prepared pan. Bake until firm to touch and golden brown, about 30 minutes. Cool slightly. Cut into squares and serve hot.
ingredients: jiffy cornbread mix, onion, creamed corn, eggs, oil, jalapeno peppers
name: betty s mexican cornbread

steps: Place a large piece of saran wrap on the counter and sprinkle remaining cheese on it. Place lump of cheese in the center of it and roll to form a ball - you may need a little extra cheese to cover. Wrap the ball in saran wrap and chill for atleast an hour. Place a large piece of saran wrap on the counter and sprinkle remaining cheese on it. Place a large piece of saran wrap on the counter and
ingredients: cream cheese, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, colby, hormel real bacon bits
name: ranch and bacon cheese ball

steps: Dredge lobster in buttered lobster tails. Place in hot oil skin side down. Fry for about 2-4 minutes turn, fry til cooked, 2 to 4 minutes. While lobster is cooking, saute mushrooms, garlic, in butter in separate pan. In bowl, mix sour cream, lemon juice or wine together. To serve place lobster on plate, put on good dollop of sour cream, top with mushrooms and garnish with paprika.
ingredients: frozen lobster tails, butter, lemon juice, orange rind, salt, ground ginger, paprika
name: citrus buttered lobster tails

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, vanilla, baking soda, salt, flour, chocolate chips
name: susan s chocolate chip cookies

steps: In a large wok, heat oil with red pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Cover and continue cooking until green beans are tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.
ingredients: fresh green beans, green onions, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, sesame oil, red sweet bell pepper, oyster sauce, pepper, slivered almonds
name: asian style green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease 8-inch pie pan. Combine sugar and butter and mix well in a large bowl. Add eggs, then flour, cocoa and vanilla, stirring well after each addition. Stir in pecans. Pour mixture into pie pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until set. Cool and garnish with whipped cream and chocolate, if desired.
ingredients: refrigerated pie crust, brown sugar, butter, light corn syrup, vanilla, eggs, cashews
name: company s coming cashew pie

steps: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in saut pan. Saut apple slices until just turning soft. Beat together eggs, cream or milk, and salt & pepper until blended but not frothy. Melt remaining butter in omelet pan over high heat until foam begins to recede but before beginning to color. Pour in egg mixture and prepare omelet, stirring lightly, but allowing it to set on the bottom. Fill with sauted apples and brie. Fold or roll and slide out of pan onto a heated plate.
ingredients: eggs, milk, salt & pepper, butter, sugar, golden delicious apple, amaretto liqueur, cream cheese
name: apple amaretto cream cheese omelet for two

steps: Place potatoes in a 2-quart, lightly greased, baking dish. The recipe states to divide the mixture evenly between 6, 6-oz. Lightly greased ramekins or custard cups- i preferred to make it in one big dish but you all can do as you like. Sprinkle evenly with cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or till thoroughly heated.
ingredients: russet potatoes, unsalted butter, milk, season salt
name: twice baked mashed potatoes

steps: Mix dry ingredients well. Add 3 egg yolks and 1 egg white to dry mixture, reserving the other 2 egg whites for the meringue. Add butter and mix well. Slowly stir in milk and water. Over medium heat, cook this mixture until thickened, stirring constantly. Once mixture has thickened, add vanilla extract and bring to room temperature. Once mixture has cooled, pour into baked pie shell. In a separate bowl, beat the two egg whites until soft peaks form. Slowly add 6-7 tablespoons of sugar and continue beating until meringue is stiff, not dry. Top pie with meringue and baked at 350 degrees for approximately 10 minutes until meringue is lightly browned. Refrigerate before serving and refrigerate any leftovers.
ingredients: butter, semisweet chocolate, sugar, eggs, flour, vanilla extract, salt
name: andrew s chocolate pie

steps: Mix ground chuck, dried breadcrumbs, eggs, whole milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, egg, milk, salt, pepper, roman
ingredients: ground chuck, dried breadcrumbs, eggs, whole milk, salt, pepper, romano cheese, spanish onions, fresh garlic, fresh basil leaves
name: mama maroni s meatballs

steps: In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil in a large saucepan and fry the garlic, onion, celery, chickpeas, mint, vegetable broth, tahini, black pepper. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for at least 30 minutes. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: onion, green pepper, butter, canned pimiento, condensed chicken gumbo soup, water, tomato juice, cooked chicken
name: tomato gumbo

steps: Mix mayonnaise, sugar, and vinegar in a bowl. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, mix broccoli florets, bacon bits, chopped onion and dried cranberries until well-combined. In a separate small bowl, combine mayo, sugar and vinegar, stirring until smooth. Pour dressing over salad mixture, stirring well. Cover and refrigerate 8 hours or overnight.
ingredients: fresh broccoli florets, bacon, cashews, mayonnaise, heavy cream, splenda sugar substitute, raisins, salt and black pepper
name: broccoli salad with cashews low carb

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter 9 inch fluted or plain tube pan. In large bowl of electric mixer, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs, eggnog, and vanilla. Stir together flour, bakng powder, and salt. Gradually beat into butter mixture. Prepare topping by combining nuts, sugar and cinnamon. Scatter half the topping evenly over bottom of pan. Spoon in half batter. Add remaining topping and spoon on remaining batter. Bake 50 to 60 minute, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: crescent rolls, vanilla, sugar, egg yolk, cream cheese, cinnamon, nuts
name: cinnamon cheese coffee cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine all of the ingredients except for the ketchup. It is easiest to just mix it up with your hands. Form into loaf on a cookie sheet. Bake for 1 hour - 1 hour 20 minutes. Let cool for 15 to an hour. You can serve this right away or cut into thick slices and fry on the stove top for an extra crunchy-licious crust.
ingredients: ground beef, sliced mushrooms, onion, breadcrumbs, egg, tomato sauce, garlic powder, catsup
name: mo s meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Spray cookie sheets with nonstick cooking spray. In medium bowl, sift together flour, ginger, baking soda, allspice, and salt. In large bowl, cream together sugar and margarine until well-blended. Stir in applesauce and molasses. Add flour mixture to applesauce mixture. Mix until well blended. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons 1 inch apart onto prepared cookie sheets. Flatten each slightly with moistened finger. Bake 11-14 minutes, or until firm. Watch carefully at end of baking, to prevent overbrowning.
ingredients: shortening, sugar, egg, molasses, all-purpose flour, baking soda, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, salt
name: granny s gingersnaps

steps: Combine asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers, asparagus, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby
ingredients: cooking spray, red onion, asparagus, eggs, egg whites, low fat cottage cheese, baby rocket, lemon juice, capers
name: asparagus frittata with rocket 21 day wonder diet day 6

steps: Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Add the prawns, chilli and garlic and cook, stirring, until the prawns are just cooked through. Remove from the heat and stir in the parsley and lemon rind. Combine the linguine with the prawn mixture and toss gently. This is great served with a simple green salad, if desired. Add the prasa yahnisi with the prawn mixture and toss gently.
ingredients: leeks, olive oil, onions, tomatoes, salt, fresh ground pepper, chicken broth, fresh dill
name: prasa yahnisi

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a non-stick skillet brown beef with salt and pepper. When browned stir in basil, tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, pasta sauce, ricotta and parmesan, and simmer for a couple of minutes. Place 3 lasagna noodles on the bottom of bake dish and top with half the sauce. Add another layer of noodles and then the remaining sauce. Top with mozzarella cheese and cover dish with foil. Bake for 45 minutes, remove from oven and let sit for 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, spaghetti sauce, cottage cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, eggs, salt and pepper, lasagna noodle
name: marie s easy lasagna

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat fillets evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle onion mixture over fish. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork.
ingredients: grouper, cooking spray, fresh lime juice, light mayonnaise, onion powder, black pepper, fresh breadcrumb, butter, fresh parsley
name: cooking light s easy crispy baked fish fillets

steps: Place fillets in a greased baking dish. Bake in preheated 350-degree oven for about 15 minutes or until flaky. Sprinkle with parsley and season with salt and pepper. Cover with aluminum foil. Bake in preheated 350-degree oven for about 15 minutes or until
ingredients: perch fillets, lemon juice, salt and black pepper, heavy cream, white wine, mushroom, parsley
name: alpine perch filets in white wine eglifilets in weisswein

steps: Cook rice according to package directions. Blend in soup and next 6 ingredients. Mix gently. Add broth and mix. Spread in a 9x13x2 inch dish. Sprinkle with topping. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 1 hour.
ingredients: cooked chicken, boiling water, milk, onion, cream of mushroom soup, long grain rice, mushroom
name: wild rice chicken casserole

steps: Mix 1 stick melted butter and 2 cups graham cracker crumbs, and 2 tablespoons sugar. Press into pan and chill 30 minutes. Combine 2 cups powdered sugar, 2 sticks room temp butter, 2 eggs. Beat 15 mins and spread in a layer on crumb shell. Spread over mixture pineapple, sliced bananas. Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with crushed nuts and decorate top with maraschino cherries.
ingredients: mini marshmallows, crushed pineapple, whipped topping, firm bananas, chocolate syrup, cherries
name: similar to a banana split but healthier

steps: In a small saucepan, combine the mustard, mustard, mayonnaise, cream cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard, mustard,
ingredients: dry mustard, tabasco sauce, cream cheese, mayonnaise
name: meyer s fire

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place the brie in a shallow baking dish and cover with half of the fruit mixture. Place second layer of brie on top of fruit and cover with remaining fruit mixture. Place second layer of brie on top of fruit and cover with remaining fruit
ingredients: brown sugar, pecans, brandy, brie cheese, cracker
name: brandy nut brie

steps: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until crispy. Drain well on paper towels. In a medium bowl, combine mayonnaise and sour cream. Mix-in tomatoes just before serving. Serve with toasted bagel rounds or pita triangles.
ingredients: bacon, mayonnaise, sugar, cheddar cheese
name: gigi s bacon dip

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Spray a large baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Cut each piece of chicken into 6 strips. Combine bread crumbs, parmesan, oregano, salt and pepper in a shallow bowl. Mix well. Dip each piece of chicken into egg, allowing excess to drip back into bowl. Coat chicken pieces with crumb mixture. Place chicken on prepared baking sheet. Bake chicken, turning halfway through baking, until golden, about 15 minutes. Serve immediately with prepared dressing.
ingredients: lemon curd, chicken broth, soy sauce, ground ginger, buttermilk, lemon zest, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, boneless skinless chicken breasts, vegetable oil
name: chicken fingers with lemon dip

steps: This step will take approximately 20 minutes, so preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. Return to pot. Add milk, melted butter, pepper, and salt. Stir in cheeses. Transfer to a greased 2-quart casserole. Bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Carefully stir mixture. Sprinkle with crushed crackers. Bake 5 minutes more or until crackers are browned and mixture is just heated through. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: butter, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, american cheese, elbow macaroni, cayenne, salt, whole milk
name: crusty macaroni and cheese

steps: Put noodles in 4 cups of salted boiling water. Cook 1-2 minutes. Stir occasionally. Drain and dry. Heat oil in wok or frypan until smoking hot. Add ginger and onion stir for 30 seconds. Add noodles and fry for 5 minutes over med heat. Add sauce, and stir until coated. Serve hot or cold. Sometimes i add some julienned carrots or broccoli to this.
ingredients: peanut oil, egg, cooked rice, green onions, sesame oil, salt
name: easy chinese egg fried rice

steps: Place potatoes in casserole, cover with plastic wrap and place in a microwave oven for about 8 minutes on high, stirring once or twice while reheating. If potatoes become too dry, stir in a little buttermilk. To keep for up to one day, refrigerate, covered. To serve, place in glass dish, cover with plastic wrap and put in a microwave oven for about 8 minutes on high, stirring once or twice while reheating. To serve, place in glass dish, cover with plastic wrap and put in a microwave
ingredients: tiny new potatoes, cooking oil, molasses, balsamic vinegar, dried thyme, salt, walnuts, fresh chives
name: molasses tossed potatoes

steps: In a large nonstick skillet. Heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and zucchini and cook, tossing and stirring often for 3 minutes. Add mushrooms, sundried-tomatoes, broth and basil, if using. Cook, tossing and stirring constantly, until zucchini are crisp-tender and the mushroom are sofened and have just begun to release their liquid, about 2 minutes. Remove skillet from the heat and season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.
ingredients: zucchini, shallots, fresh parsley, extra virgin olive oil, salt
name: sauteed zucchini

steps: In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated.
ingredients: watermelon, cantaloupe, honeydews, green grape, red grapes, sugar, lemon juice, lime juice, orange juice
name: fancy fruit salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. In a small mixing bowl, beat the eggs with a splash of water. On a plate combine breadcrumbs and thyme. Then on another plate combine flour with a pinch of salt and pepper. Lay ham strips on work surface, top each slice with cheese then place chicken chink toward the end of the strip. Rollup lightly, and coat with flour, eggs and breadcrumbs. Cook for 20 mins or until done.
ingredients: chicken breast halves, deli ham, swiss cheese, flour, butter, chicken bouillon cube, garlic, milk, onion salt, parsley
name: chicken cordon bleu

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Remove seeds from chilies. Slice open the chilies and line a 9x13 casserole with half of them. Cover chilies with half of the cheddar and half of the jack cheese. Use the rest of the chilies on top of the cheeses. Beat the egg whites till stiff peak. Beat the yolks and add flour, milk, salt and. Pepper. Fold in whites and pour over top of chilies and cheese. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Top with the remaining cheeses. Top with salsa, if desired.
ingredients: anaheim chilies, monterey jack pepper cheese, eggs, heavy cream, salt, sharp cheddar cheese
name: low carb chile rellenos flourless

steps: Preheat oven to 180c degrees. Bake for 15-18 minutes or until well risen and cooked. Leave in the tins for 5 minutes before turning onto a wire rack to cool. Leave in
ingredients: strawberries, mangoes, crystallized ginger, coconut, flour, brown sugar, white sugar, rolled oats, fresh lemon juice, butter
name: strawberry mango cobbler

steps: Place halibut steaks, soy sauce, sherry wine, garlic clove, ground ginger, honey in a large saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool completely.
ingredients: halibut steaks, soy sauce, sherry wine, garlic clove, ground ginger, honey
name: broiled halibut

steps: To make the scorpion syrup, bring the sugar and water to a boil cook until completely dissolved, only about 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in the lime zest and mint, and let sit for about 30 minutes. Strain, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Muddle dark rum, white rum, brandy, triple sec, orange juice, lime, juice ofpreparation:To make the scorpion syrup, bring the sugar and water to a boil cook until completely dissolved, only about 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in the lime
ingredients: dark rum, white rum, brandy, triple sec, orange juice, lime, juice of
name: scorpion

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius. Line 18 muffin holes with paper patty pans. Whisk the milk, egg and oil in a jug. Sift the flour into a bowl and add the cheese, basil and mushrooms. Make a well in the centre and gently pour in milk, egg and oil mix and fold gently to combine. Divide the mixture between the 18 paper patty pans and top with slices of the extra mushroom. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until a skew inserted through the centre comes out clean. Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: mushrooms, olive oil, butter, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, italian parsley, oregano, garlic clove
name: parmesan stuffed mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
ingredients: plum tomatoes, sugar, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil
name: tomates sches au four oven dried tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking sheet. Place squash, cut sides down, on the baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes, or until a sharp knife can be inserted with only a little resistance. Set squash aside until cool enough to be easily handled. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm.
ingredients: spaghetti sauce, zucchini, yellow squash, onions, garlic cloves, olive oil, basil, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, whole wheat pasta
name: pasta with summer squash and zucchini

steps: Heat milk in double boiler. Caramelize 1 cup sugar in deep heavy saucepan. Stir in orange juice and hot milk. Stir in remaning sugar and orange rind. Cook, stirring often, to soft ball stage. Remove from heat and add margarine. When cool, beat until creamy and stir in nuts. Pour outon greased platter and cut into squares.
ingredients: evaporated milk, sugar, salt, marshmallows, white chocolate chips, lime rind, key lime juice
name: sherry s key lime fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Stir flour, baking soda and salt together. Cut in butter, until mixture resembles crumbs. Pour in sour milk. Knead dough, cut cross at center and bake for 40 minutes.
ingredients: white flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, sour milk
name: mrs sharp s irish soda bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: baby potatoes, salt, dried basil, mexican chili powder, brown rice flour, olives
name: seasoned baked potato chunks

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini, onion and thyme, and cook, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper and adjust heat so onion and zucchini release their liquid without browning. Cook pasta until it is nearly but not quite tender. Add tomatoes and their liquid to zucchini and raise heat a bit so mixture bubbles. Add a little pasta cooking water. Drain pasta and finish cooking it in sauce. Serve, garnished with parsley or parmesan.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, zucchini, pasta sauce, dried oregano, salt and pepper, white rice
name: zucchini chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375f heat the vegetable oil in a small ovenproof frying pan. Fry the chicken wings for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden. Remove the pan from the heat and add the soy sauce, water and honey. Transfer to the oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, turning the chicken wings once. Arrange the chicken wings on a warmed platter, scatter over the sesame seeds and serve.
ingredients: garlic clove, salt, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, honey, sesame oil, cayenne, chicken wings, sesame seeds, scallion
name: sticky sesame chicken wings

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees and boil water. In a 13x9 casserole dish, combine rice and contents of seasoning packet. Add boiling water to dish and mix well. Add chicken, sprinkle with garlic powder. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Add broccoli and cheese. Cover and continue to bake for another 8-10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink in center.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, uncooked rice, condensed cream of broccoli soup, water, frozen broccoli florets, paprika, pepper, salt, cheese
name: easy cheesy broccoli chicken rice bake

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add olives and thyme. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, 3 to 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, cook over medium-low heat until juices thicken a bit and flavors are combined, 5 to 8 minutes. Season to taste with pepper. Serve this colorful an. Just before serving, stir in the parsley.
ingredients: green olives, black olives, capers, garlic, olive oil
name: olive spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Oil a shallow baking dish. Cook cabbage in olive oil over moderately-low heat, stirring, for 5 minutes, or until it is softened. In a bowl, combine cabbage, carrot, green onion, milk, salt, garlic powder, potatoes, pepper, cheddar cheese, parsley, sunflower seeds. Add cabbage mixture and toss. Spoon into baking dish and bake for 1 hour, or until golden-brown. Sprinkle with parsley and seeds and serve.
ingredients: cabbage, carrot, green onion, milk, egg, parmesan cheese, parsley
name: au gratin cabbage

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness.
ingredients: steaks, lemon juice, soy sauce, water, garlic, ginger, flour, ground black pepper, onion, corn oil
name: beef steak

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: sugar, water, family-size tea bag, lemonade concentrate, orange juice concentrate, bourbon
name: frozen whiskey sour punch

steps: In a large saucepan, bring broth and water to boil. Add orzo. Cook and stir for 5 minutes. Add asparagus. Cook, uncovered, over medium heat 4-6 minutes or until pasta and asparagus are tender, stirring frequently. Drain. Stir in parmesan cheese and caesar dressing.
ingredients: orzo pasta, chicken breast, lemon pepper, olive oil, garlic, red bell pepper, orange bell pepper, asparagus, dried basil
name: orzo with peppers and asparagus

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown.
ingredients: canned whole potatoes, lemon pepper, salt, season salt, oregano, butter
name: arin s potatoes

steps: Mix together the dry ingredients. Set aside for 10 minutes. Mix together the dry ingredients. Lightly beat the cherries, then add it, the yogurt, the milk mixture, and the vanilla to the dry ingredients. Fold in the cherries. Pour batter into greased 9 x 5-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes.
ingredients: dark sweet cherries, sugar, cherry brandy, fresh lemon juice, dry pectin, ground allspice
name: cherry bounce jam bread machine

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Arange shrimp in a single layer in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Combine lemon juice with butter, garlic, worcestershire sauce, lemon pepper, and red pepper. Pour mixture over shrimp. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 minutes or until shrimp are done. Sprinkle parsley over shrimp. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil-flavored vegetable cooking spray, lemon juice, honey, dried parsley flakes, creole seasoning, olive oil, soy sauce, large shrimp
name: ww spicy baked shrimp 3 pts

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: bananas, applesauce, butter, sugar, eggs, flour, baking soda, cinnamon, milk
name: banana applesauce bread

steps: Preheat oven 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 pan. Beat margarine, eggs, sugar, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, margarine, marg
ingredients: margarine, eggs, applesauce, apple juice, flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, raisins, apple
name: sugar free applesauce cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies.
ingredients: no-sugar-added peanut butter, butter, liquid low-calorie sweetener, splenda sugar substitute, vanilla protein powder, vanilla, chocolate-flavored candy coating
name: peanut butter protein bars

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: bell peppers, onions, garlic, salt, fennel seed, olive oil, sausage, focaccia bread
name: sausage bell pepper and onion focaccia sandwiches

steps: Wrap ribs in double thickness of foil and bake for 2 hours at 300 degrees f. Unwrap and drain drippings. Combine all ingredients and pour over ribs. Marinate at room temperature for 1 hour. Bake at 350 degrees 30 minutes, basting with sauce, or grill 30 minutes, 4 inches above coals turning and basting.
ingredients: celery salt, ground black pepper, white pepper, brown sugar, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, dried thyme, dried sage, country-style pork ribs
name: cajun country smoked ribs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Beat in the buttermilk and then the baking soda and mix well. Sift in the dry ingredients mixing as you add. Make sure the batter is smooth. Add in the melted butter and mix well. Beat the egg whites in another bowl until stiff. Fold into the batter until no bits of white are visible. Let batter stand about 20 minutes before making pancakes. Make sure your griddle is really hot. Ladle batter onto griddle. Turn when bubbles form across the cakes and allow to lightly brown on the second side. Serve with warm maple syrup and sweet butter.
ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, buttermilk
name: buttermilk cupcakes

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add the mint sprig and stir in lemon juice. Cover and steep for 6 or 7 minutes. Strain and discard the solids. Meanwhile, heat the remaining water and sugar just until the sugar is dissolved. Mix with the tea brew. Add the juice of the lemons and oranges, and strain. Serve chilled, over ice.
ingredients: orange juice, lemons, juice of, rum, superfine sugar, grenadine, orange slice, maraschino cherry, mint sprig
name: myers s planter s punch

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place penne pasta, alfredo sauce, imitation crabmeat, summer squash, zucchini, dried parsley flakes, crushed red pepper flakes, mozzarella cheese, dry breadcrumbs, butter. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Place penne pasta, alfredo sauce, imitation crabmeat, summer squash, zucchini, dried parsley flakes, crushed red pepper flakes, mo
ingredients: penne pasta, alfredo sauce, imitation crabmeat, summer squash, zucchini, dried parsley flakes, crushed red pepper flakes, mozzarella cheese, dry breadcrumbs, butter
name: crab and penne casserole

steps: Drain pineapple juice and reserve. Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate.
ingredients: pineapple slices in syrup, mild cheddar cheese, mini marshmallows, sugar, flour, eggs
name: pineapple and cheese salad

steps: Add broth, water, soy sauce, sesame oil, vegetable oil, white potatoes, beef broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Add the meat, scallions, soy sauce, sesame oil, vegetable oil, white potatoes, beef broth. Add the meat, scallions, soy sauce, sesame oil, vegetable oil, white potatoes,
ingredients: meat, scallions, soy sauce, sesame oil, vegetable oil, white potatoes, beef broth
name: oriental potato and beef soup

steps: Combine rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice, rice,
ingredients: cooked rice, french dressing, shrimp, celery, cauliflower, onion, green bell pepper, lemon juice, mayonnaise, salt
name: bahamas shrimp salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place evaporated milk, cream cheese, egg, sugar, flour and lemon peel in blender, cover. Blend until smooth, pour into crust. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until center is set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. Arrange strawberries on top of pie. Drizzle with jelly. Refrigerate for 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: flour, almonds, butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, cool whip, strawberries, strawberry glaze
name: strawberry pizza dessert

steps: Heat oven to 350. In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: flour, light brown sugar, butter, egg yolk, vanilla, milk chocolate candy bars, nuts
name: toffee bar cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a medium sized bowl, combine all ingredients mixing well. If mixture looks a little too dry, add a little more mayonnaise until. Desired moistness is reached. Now taste to see if seasonings need to be adjusted. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
ingredients: chicken breast, honey, soy sauce, minced ginger, cornstarch, egg, breadcrumbs, vegetable oil
name: asian style chicken nuggets

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: pork and beans, sweet onion, bacon, hot dogs, ketchup, honey mustard, canola oil, brown sugar
name: skillet beans n weiners

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, olive oil, lemon pepper, salt, dinner rolls, whole grain mustard, mayonnaise
name: peppered pork tenderloin sandwiches

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add garlic and onion and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge.
ingredients: red chilies, chilies, onion, garlic cloves, sunflower oil, sugar, white vinegar, thai fish sauce
name: homemade sweet chilli jam

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Arange shrimp in a single layer in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Combine lemon juice with butter, garlic, worcestershire sauce, lemon pepper, and red pepper. Pour mixture over shrimp. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 minutes or until shrimp are done. Sprinkle parsley over shrimp. Serve immediately.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, ground cumin, paprika, raw shrimp, salt and pepper, parsley
name: shrimp braised in olive oil

steps: Preheat oven to 425 f. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and set aside. Lay two spring roll wrappers on a clean work surface. Brush wrappers lightly with melted butter. Slice the bananas in half on the diagonal. Place one banana half in the lower third portion of the wrapper and cover with the chocolate. Sprinkle a little salt over the chocolate and top with the remaining banana half. Roll into a tight package. Continue until all bananas and wrappers are rolled. Place the finished banana rolls on the lined baking tray and brush tops and edges with butter. Bake for 5-7 minutes on the baking tray and serve when golden brown.
ingredients: reduced-fat cream cheese, splenda granular, bananas, vanilla extract, reduced-fat crescent rolls
name: banana rolls

steps: In small frying pan, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil. Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Combine beef and egg, mixing well. To beef mixture, add cooked onion, parsley, worcestershire and tabasco sauces and mix well. Shape mixture into 4 large patties, scoring each with a knife. Heat remaining tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. When hot, add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, barbecue sauce, barbecue potato chips, onion powder, salt, black pepper, cheese slices
name: barbecue burgers

steps: In a large non-stick skillet, cook the ground beef and garlic until the beef is no longer pink, stir frequently. Drain. In a 4-quart slow cooker, add the ground beef mixture, cheese, and tomatoes. Stir to mix. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or until the cheese is melted and mixture is well heated. Stir after 2 hours. Add in the onions, stir to combine. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, tortilla chips, velveeta cheese, lettuce, chopped tomato, black olives, sour cream
name: velveeta nachos

steps: In a small bowl stir together coconut milk, peanut butter, ginger and pepper. Set aside. In a large skillet cook chicken in hot oil over medium heat for 8-10 minutes or until chicken is tender and no longer pink, turning once halfway through cooking. Remove from skillet. Keep warm. For sauce, add green onion to skillet. Cook and stir about 2 minutes or until tender. Stir in coconut milk mixture. Cook and stir until bubbly. To serve, spoon the sauce over chicken. Sprinkle with peanuts.
ingredients: creamy peanut butter, honey, soy sauce, curry powder, garlic, boneless skinless chicken
name: thai peanut chicken

steps: In a large bowl, combine shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprika, salt, white pepper, parsley sprigpreparation:In a large skillet, saute onion& garlic in vegetable oil until tender. Add shrimp and cook 3-5 minutes, just until done. Drain the shrimp well and rinse under cold water. Chill. Peel and devein the cooked shrimp and coarsely chop. Add remaining ingredients except parsley, mixing well. Garnish the spread with a sprig or two of parsley. Serve with party-size rye or whole wheat bread.
ingredients: mayonnaise, garlic powder, tabasco sauce, paprika, white pepper, water, heinz ketchup, black pepper, sugar, salt
name: my secret shrimp sauce recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. Remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is
ingredients: baking apples, orange juice, flour, white sugar, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, butter, vanilla ice cream
name: apple pie dessert

steps: Put the potatoes in a large bowl. Mix 1 cup mayonnaise with mustard, onion, dill, pickle and eggs add to potatoes stirring in and season with salt and pepper. Adding more mayonnaise to the creaminess you desire. Serve room temperature or chilled.
ingredients: potatoes, eggs, dill pickles, pickle juice, yellow onion, miracle whip, mustard, paprika
name: tammi s potato salad

steps: Place potatoes in water and 1 tsp salt and simmer until tender, about 15 to 18 minutes. Drain and run under cold water to cool. Cut into quarters. Meanwhile, cook bacon in skillet untel crisp. Crumble when cooled. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, remaining salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Toss with the potatoes, bacon and parsley.
ingredients: red potatoes, fresh basil leaf, olive oil, honey, white balsamic vinegar, celery
name: red potato salad with honey basil vinaigrette vegan friendly

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Toss together apples and apples, spread evenly over bottom of 8x8 baking dish. In medium bowl combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and oats. Using pastry cutter work butter into oat mixture until crumbly. Spread over fruit, pressing down lightly. Bake 40-45 minutes or until top is lightly browned. Cool before serving. Top with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, rolled oats, sugar, desiccated coconut, ground cinnamon, butter, apples
name: spicy apple and oat slice

steps: In heavy medium saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch, cocoa and espresso powder, mix well. Gradually add milk, beating with wire whisk until well blended. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly with wire whisk, until mixture comes to a boil. Boil 1 minute, stir constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla. Cool slightly. Pour into 6 individual dessert dishes. Refrigerate until chilled. Just before serving, garnish with sliced almonds, if desired. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: milk, sugar, vanilla beans, butter, arborio rice, bittersweet chocolate, hazelnuts, white chocolate
name: chocolate risotto pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cream together shortening, sugar and eggs. In a microwave safe bowl, melt chocolate. Add to shortening mixture. Stir in corn syrup. Sift in flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon. Shape into balls the size of walnuts. Roll balls in granulated sugar. Place cookies about 2-inches apart on parchment lined baking sheets. Bake for 12 minutes.
ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, molasses, flour, baking soda, clove, cinnamon, ginger, egg
name: molasses crinkles

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.
