In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, mayonnaise, salt, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne pepper, cayenne
ingredients: eggs, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, sweet pickle relish, steak sauce, paprika, dried dill weed, salt & fresh ground pepper, cayenne
name: magical egg salad

steps: In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the red grapes, green grape, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla, pecan pieces. Pour into 9x13 inch glass dish and chill until set. Stir together cream cheese and sour cream. Add sugar and vanilla. Blend well. Spread cream cheese mixture over chilled jell-o. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Chill.
ingredients: red grapes, green grape, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla, pecan pieces
name: best grape salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray a 9x13 inch pan with cooking spray. Quarter biscuits, and place at bottom of pan. Layer with cooked bacon and shredded cheese. In a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs, sour cream, salt, and pepper and pour over cheese and biscuits. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until golden brown. Allow to cool 5-10 minutes before serving. Garnish with onions, if desired.
ingredients: sardines in oil, red onion, red ripe tomatoes, lemon, juice of, cumin seed, parsley, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, feta cheese, french bread
name: portuguese style sardines on toast

steps: Cream butter and sugar to the consistency of mayonnaise, adding sugar gradually. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Add dry ingredients alternately with sour cream. Drop by heaping teaspoons onto a cookie sheet and flatten slightly. Bake at 400 degrees f for about 10 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: tang orange crystals, sugar, butter, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, vanilla baking chips
name: orange creamsicle cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Pour milk over bread crumbs to soften. Add remaining ingredients except eggs. Stir in eggs. Pour mixture into a well-greased loaf pan or a 6x8 inch casserole. Set the dish in a container of hot water and bake for about 45 minutes or until an inserted knife come out clean.
ingredients: crabmeat, margarine, salt and pepper, breadcrumbs, onion, garlic cloves, parsley, worcestershire sauce
name: crab bake

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Mix glaze ingredients together, stirring until dissolved. Marinate fish filets for at least 30 minutes. Arrange salmon, skin-side down, in a baking dish lined with aluminum foil & lightly sprayed with cooking spray. Brush glaze on all sides of fish. Bake approximately 15-20 minutes, basting once with pan sauces. Fish is done when it flakes easily and center is cooked through.
ingredients: dark brown sugar, low sodium soy sauce, chinese hot mustard, rice vinegar, salmon fillets, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: sweet spicy glazed norwegian salmon

steps: Mix everything except lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini, lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape
ingredients: lettuce leaves, colby-monterey jack cheese, deli ham, deli turkey, grape tomatoes, baby carrots, zucchini
name: appetizer or snack party tray

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray baking dish with cooking spray. Season breasts with taco seasoning. Bake breasts uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven, spoon salsa over each piece, taking care not to drench them. Bake uncovered 5 minutes. The ones i used were very thick.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, salt, pepper, flour tortillas, limes, salsa, guacamole, diced tomato, lettuce
name: basic soft chicken tacos

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl combine cereal, wheat flour, and flour. Set aside. In a larger mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: rolled oats, water, banana, peach, raisins, flax seeds, rice milk, cinnamon
name: breakfast oatmeal

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine flour and sugar in a large bowl or food processor. Add margarine and process, or mix together with your fingers, until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add cold water, one tablespoon at a time, and process, or mix, until a manageable dough forms. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 12-inch circle. Press dough into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie pan or removable-bottom tart pan. Prick the bottom all over with a fork, cover dough with foil and fill with dried beans or rice. Bake 10 minutes. Remove beans and foil and bake until crust is golden brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove from oven and cool completely on a wire rack. Yields 8 slices per crust.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, lard, egg, vinegar, cold water
name: tenderflake pie crusts

steps: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain, crumble and set aside. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook tortellini in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain, and rinse under cold water. In a small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar to make the dressing. In a large bowl, combine broccoli, tortellini, bacon, raisins, sunflower seeds and red onion. Pour dressing over salad, and toss.
ingredients: broccoli, red onion, bacon, roasted sunflower seeds, raisins, mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar
name: broccoli bacon salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: brussels sprouts, walnuts, dried cranberries, butter, olive oil, lemon, zest of, salt, ground pepper
name: brussels sprouts leaves w dried cranberries toasted walnuts

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut the stem end from turnips. Rub each with olive oil and wrap tightly in aluminum foil. Bake for approximately 90 minutes or until insides are soft enough to scoop out. Scoop out insides of each turnip, leaving the shell intact. Mash & whip the insides with the sour cream, spices and seasonings. When the insides are a creamy consistency, carefully spoon them back into shells. Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees and bake the stuffed turnips for 20-30 minutes until heated thru.
ingredients: turnips, philadelphia cream cheese, salt, pepper
name: the perfect faux tato turnip

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut potatoes in half lengthwise. Place potato on a square of foil and close tightly. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add butter if using. Place
ingredients: idaho potatoes, fat-free catalina dressing, garlic powder, parsley flakes
name: california baked potatoes

steps: In a 3-4 qt pot, saute the onion and carrot in a little olive oil until the onion is translucent. Add the sausage and brown a bit. Add the rest of the ingredients. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve with crusty bread and a green salad.
ingredients: olive oil, italian sausages, carrot, celery, onion, garlic, chicken broth, chickpeas, spinach, cayenne pepper
name: beans and greens soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance.
ingredients: ground chicken, fresh breadcrumb, scallion, smoked paprika, garlic, salt, hot pepper sauce, blue cheese dressing, dippers
name: buffalo chicken meatballs

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken in the bottom of a skillet. Cover and cook chicken until done and no longer pink. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. In a
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, italian seasoning, garlic salt, black pepper, oil, water, milk, angel hair with parmesan cheese pasta roni, chives
name: bistro herbed chicken

steps: In lg. Skillet, coated with nonstick spray, brown chops on both sides. Cook over medium heat till juices run clear. In a bowl, combine the honey, lemon juice, soy sauce, and garlic. Remove chops and keep warm. Add honey mixture to the skillet. Cook over medium heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour over chops.
ingredients: pork chops, vegetable oil, chili sauce, honey, lemon rind, lemon juice, salt, pepper, sour cream, flour
name: honey lemon boneless pork chops

steps: In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crustpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crustpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crustpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crustpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crustpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crustpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crustpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crustpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crustpreparation:In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin
ingredients: low-fat milk, sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla extract, unflavored gelatin, fat-free whipped topping, reduced fat graham cracker crust
name: no bake chocolate cream pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Add eggs and beat until light. Add rum, sour cream and almond extract. Mix in mashed bananas. Combine flour, baking soda and salt in separate bowl. Pour wet mixture into dry mixture and combine. Bake for 1 hour depending on size of loaf pan.
ingredients: dark rum, brown sugar, lemon, rind of, orange, rind of, cinnamon sticks, cloves, whole nutmeg
name: rum with christmas spices

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the avocado, all of the mushrooms and all of the colby-monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: bacon, fresh mushrooms, butter, flour tortillas, colby-monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, avocado, sour cream, salsa
name: bacon avocado quesadillas

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Cut up sweet potatoes into wedges, rounds or thin strips. In a large bowl add the fries. Coat them with oil. You may substitute just water if desired. Then add the garlic granules, parmesan and sea salt. Spay a cookie sheet with pam or oil and lay fries out on top. Bake for 10 mins then turn them over. Put back in the oven for 10 more minutes. If you have thicker fries you may need an additional 5-10 minutes baking time.
ingredients: sweet potato, olive oil, sea salt, chili, garlic powder
name: baked chipotle sweet potato fries

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add coriander, brown sugar, ground cumin, salt, fresh ground black pepper, egg whites, unsalted dry roasted peanuts, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame seeds, black sesame
ingredients: ground coriander, brown sugar, ground cumin, salt, fresh ground black pepper, ground red pepper, egg whites, unsalted dry roasted peanuts, black sesame seeds
name: spiced peanuts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, chicken, bacon and salsa. Gently stir until well combined. Spread beef mixture on each tortilla. Roll up and wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate until serving time. To serve, cut beef mixture on each tortilla. To
ingredients: pillsbury refrigerated butter flake crescent dinner rolls, ground beef, barbecue sauce, shredded cheddar cheese
name: beef rollup

steps: Cook on low for 8-10 hours or on high for 7-8 hours.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, pinto beans, tomatoes and green chilies, unsweetened cocoa powder, chili powder, cumin, salt and pepper
name: crock pot belly burner chili

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a small bowl combine soy sauce, vinegar, brown sugar, garlic powder, black pepper. Stir or whisk until well blended. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, onion, green bell pepper, rice, water, butter, lemon juice, dried basil
name: solo microwave chicken and rice

steps: Heat oven to 190c. Take each roll and hollow out a space just big enough for the cuban cheese. Brush the insides with the oil and bake for 5 mins until crispy. Spoon the chutney into the rolls and place the cheese on top. Depending on the cheese you use you may have to remove the top and bottom rind. Decorate each roll with a sprig of thyme and cover to roll in foil leaving the cheese exposed. Cook for 15 mins removing the foil for the last 5. Bake for 5 mins removing the foil for the last 5.
ingredients: hoagie rolls, whole grain mustard, ham, roast pork, dill pickle slices, olive oil
name: cuban sandwich with fresh goat cheese

steps: In a large bowl, mix all brine ingredients thoroughly. In a large, deep pan combine whole salmon fillets with the brine mixture to soak over night, keeping refrigerated. Rinse thoroughly after brining. Pat dry with a paper towel and allow to air dry for at least one hour prior to smoking. Lay salmon fillets on smoker rack skin side down. Cook in smoker at 165f for 3-5 hours. Cooking time will depend on the thickness of your fillets.
ingredients: reduced-fat sour cream, dijon mustard, eggs, water, fresh chives, fresh tarragon, butter, smoked salmon
name: smoked salmon omelet with herbs

steps: Combine cucumbers, onion, garlic cloves, white vinegar, sugar, salt, mustard seeds, celery seed, ground turmeric. Heat to boiling over high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil 1 minute, stirring occasionally. Pour cucumber mixture into a large bowl. Cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally. Cover and chill overnight before serving. You can spoon cooled cucumbers and their liquid into jars with tight-fitting lids and refrigerate up to 4 weeks.
ingredients: cucumbers, onion, garlic cloves, white vinegar, sugar, salt, mustard seeds, celery seed, ground turmeric
name: easy refrigerator pickle slices

steps: Cook the wild rice according to package directions. Transfer to a large bowl. Meanwhile, in a pot of boiling, salted water, cook the orzo until al dente. Drain. Add to the wild rice. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium-high heat. Add the mushrooms and cook, stirring frequently, until slightly softened, about 3 minutes. Add the pecans and sage and cook, stirring frequently, until the nuts are toasted and the mushrooms are tender, about 3 minutes. Stir in the peas and chickpeas. Add the vegetable mixture to the orzo mixture. Season with salt.
ingredients: wild rice, salt, water, mushroom, butter, flour, milk, pepper
name: wild rice and mushrooms southern style

steps: Place pork chops in greased slow cooker. Top with onions and mushrooms. Combine soup mix, water, and mushroom soup. Pour over mushrooms and onions. Cover. Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 4-5. Serve over rice or cooked noodles.
ingredients: instant rice, water, frozen vegetables, pork chops, cream of mushroom soup
name: one dish pork chop dish

steps: Cook noodles and place in colander. Pour boiling water over noodles, drain well, and mix with rice vinegar, sugar, olive oil, salt, slivered almonds. Mix 3 ramon seasoning packets with sesame seeds, vinegar, sugar, olive oil, salt, slivered almonds.
ingredients: bean thread noodles, medium shrimp, mango, scallions, fresh basil, serrano peppers, rice vinegar, sugar, salt
name: shrimp and mango salad with glass noodles

steps: Combine the red cabbage, carrot, onion and celery ribs in a large mixing bowl. To prepare the dressing, in a small bowl combine the mayonnaise, lime juice, zest, cumin, chili powder, sugar, salt and pepper. Whisk to combine. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and stir to combine. Cover and allow the slaw to sit for at least 30 minutes, tossing every so often to combine well. Top with raisins before serving.
ingredients: red cabbage, carrot, onion, celery ribs, apple, almonds, light mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, black pepper, salt
name: pa german red cabbage slaw

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, butter, buttermilk. Add the butter and rub it into the flour with your finger. Add the buttermilk and stir till the dough is slightly firm. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin tin and bake in the center of the oven till brown and crusty, 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: refrigerated biscuit, ground beef, ketchup, cider vinegar, chili powder, cheddar cheese
name: farmhouse barbecue muffins

steps: Toast 6 thick slices of cheese in a 300 degree oven until crisp. Blend the cheddar cheese with a couple tablespoons of butter, then spread on the toast. When ready to serve the soup, pop one of these on top of each serving bowl and sprinkle with lots of cheddar cheese. Melt butter in a large saucepan over low heat. Add onions, cover, and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally for about 30 minutes. Add the stock and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer to thicken slightly. Add cream and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer to thicken slightly. Season generously with salt and pepper. Ladle into bowls, top with stilton toast, and run under the broiler until the cheese is melted and brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: onion, cheddar cheese, mustard, milk, plain flour, butter
name: cheese onion soup

steps: In a microwaveable bowl, combine sugar, egg, flour, vinegar, and crushed pineapple. Microwave on high for 3 minutes. Stir. Repeat. Allow to cool. Chop apples bite size. When egg mixture is cool, fold in apples, whipped topping, and peanuts. Enjoy cold.
ingredients: granny smith apples, sticks, caramels, milk, peanuts, snickers candy bars
name: linda s caramel apple delights

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Dip chicken in milk, then roll in seasoned flour. Melt butter in 9 x 13 baking dish. Place chicken, skin side down, in butter. Cook 30 minutes. Mix water, remaining milk and soup together. Turn chicken and pour soup mixture over it. Bake 30 minutes more. Remove chicken and stir gravy.
ingredients: corn flakes, egg, skim milk, flour, salt, pepper, chicken pieces, margarine
name: double coated chicken

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a large wok, heat oil with red pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Cover and continue cooking until green beans are tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.
ingredients: green beans, spicy mustard, honey, vegetable oil, pickled jalapeno pepper, salt and pepper
name: spicy sweet green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f & grease a glass baking dish. Cook flat egg noodles in boiling water for 7 minutes, then drain & spoon noodles into prepared baking dish. Wisk together milk, sugar, cream cheese, eggs, nectar & melted butter, beating for 2 minutes. Stir in quartered apricots, then add mixture to noodles in baking dish. Bake about 60 minutes, until kugel is set & top is golden brown. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: wide egg noodles, eggs, salt, pepper, butter, cinnamon, sugar, sour cream, cottage cheese, cream cheese
name: lokshen kugel

steps: In a large bowl combine cabbage, corned beef, russet potatoes, margarine, salt, pepper, marjoram. Place cabbage wedges and simmer until cabbage is tender. Cut meat across the grain and serve with vegetables and broth.
ingredients: smoked pork, cabbage, onions, potatoes, carrots, beef stock, syrup, salt, pepper, marjoram
name: cabbage stew

steps: Add tea bags to boiling water. Steep for 3 minute remove bags, then immediately add frozen lemonade and stir until completely dissolved. Sweeten with sugar or honey, if needed. Refrigerate at least until cold. Then stir in rum to taste. To serve, place a few ice cubes in a large pitcher. Thinly slice lemon and lime and add. Pour tea mixture overtop.
ingredients: green tea bags, boiling water, sugar, lemon zest, lemon juice
name: green tea granita

steps: Add 2 cups water to boil. Add coconut milk and stir well. Cook until rice is done, 15 minutes. Drain. Add salt and rice. Stir well. Serve in bowls with coconut milk.
ingredients: vegetable oil, long-grain rice, salt, coca-cola, raisins, almonds
name: ingrid hoffman s coca cola rice

steps: Boil toomato juice if making spicy. You can add the spices in a boil bag or use ground. Add lemon juice and fine zest. Stir in pectin. Bring to a boil. Stir in sugar until dissolve. Bring to a rolling boil. Boil 4 minutes. If you want to try to make it sugar free i think it would work, just make sure to get the sugar free pectin otherwise it will not set. If i try it anytime soon, i will post and let you know how it turns out.
ingredients: pomegranate juice, mountain dew soda, lemon juice, sugar, pectin
name: pomegranate mountain dew jelly

steps: In buttered casserole dish, place cleaned and trimmed chicken breasts, and season with salt and pepper, if desired. Pour italian salad dressing over to coat and let marinate in the fridge for 1 hour. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. After the hour of marinating, turn chicken breasts over and sprinkle evenly with oregano and grated parmesan cheese. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 1 hour, checking after 45 minutes to make sure they do not get over-cooked.
ingredients: chicken breasts, prosciutto, fontina cheese, flour, dry white wine, butter, salt and pepper
name: chicken valdostana

steps: In a large saucepan, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and ginger and cook, stirring, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring, until coated with the oil. Stir in the kidney beans and scotch bonnet, then stir in the coconut milk and water. Season with salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed, 18 minutes. Remove the rice from the heat and let stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. Stir in the scallions and season with salt and pepper. Discard the scotch bonnet and serve.
ingredients: kale, olive oil, leek, red pepper flakes, cannellini beans, salt
name: kale and cannellini beans

steps: In a 3-quart saucepan, combine rice mix, special seasonings, water, chicken, beans, tomatoes, green bell pepper, chili powder, ground cumin, pepper, salt, whole tomatoes, tomato juice. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer uncovered, about 20 minutes or until rice is tender, stirring occasionally. Top with cheese, sour cream and cilantro if desired.
ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, instant rice, onion, green bell pepper, chili powder, ground cumin, pepper, salt, whole tomatoes, tomato juice
name: low fat spanish rice

steps: In a small saucepan, over medium heat melt 3 tablespoons butter, stir in flour and add milk. Stir until thick and bubbly, add to soup. Add cheese. Stir until melted. Season with pepper and serve.
ingredients: broccoli, onion, garlic clove, vegetable broth, unbleached all-purpose flour, soymilk, soy sauce, basil, salt and pepper
name: easy vegan cream of broccoli soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance.
ingredients: lean ground beef, green bell pepper, yellow onion, egg, rotel tomatoes, taco seasoning, chili powder, tortilla chips
name: spicy mexican meatloaf

steps: Put the cucumber in a large saucepan on medium heat. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 1 hour or until tender. Remove from heat and let cool. Serve chilled or at room temperature, garnished.
ingredients: new potato, sour cream, cornichons, fresh dill, capers, seedless cucumber
name: dilled potato cucumber salad

steps: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees f. Toast the pita cubes for five minutes. Let it cool completely. 3in a salad bowl, combine the baby cucumbers, canned artichokes, cilantro, cherry tomatoes, and cheese and toss. Add to the salad and combine well. 4preheat the oven 325 degrees f. 3in a salad bowl, combine the lemon juice, olive oil, black pepper and chives. Toast
ingredients: water, bulgur, dried currant, pecans, italian parsley, extra virgin olive oil, orange zest, salt, pepper
name: orange scented cracked wheat salad

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: natural-style peanut butter, soy sauce, white wine vinegar, lemon juice, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, ginger, boneless skinless chicken breasts
name: bbq peanut butter chicken

steps: Heat oven to 180c. Spray a medium baking dish with the olive oil spray to coat. Place the halved tomatoes, cut side up, in a single layer in the prepared dish. Sprinkle with the sea salt and lightly spray with more olive oil spray. Bake for 40 minutes or until tomatoes are lightly browned and tender. Meanwhile, combine the vinegar, oil and mustard in a small bowl and set aside. Mix the herbs and feta together and set aside.
ingredients: feta, oregano, basil, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, egg tomatoes, rocket, kalamata olives
name: roasted tomato herb and feta salad

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Combine cream cheese, sour cream, onion, mayonnaise, bacon, cheddar cheese, cracker. Mix well. Spread about 1 tablespoon cheese mixture on each bread slice. Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet for 7 to 9 minutes or until lightly brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, onion, mayonnaise, bacon, cheddar cheese, cracker
name: baked cheddar bacon spread

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan. Add garlic and breadcrumbs and saute for 1 minute. Add garlic and breadcr
ingredients: escarole, olive oil, vegetable oil, garlic, breadcrumbs, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper
name: escarole with garlic and bread crumbs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f & grease a glass baking dish. Cook flat noodles in boiling water for 7 minutes, then drain & spoon noodles into prepared baking dish. Wisk together milk, sugar, cream cheese, eggs, nectar & melted butter, beating for 2 minutes. Stir in quartered apricots, then add mixture to noodles in baking dish. Bake about 60 minutes, until kugel is set & top is golden brown. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: medium noodles, onion juice, worcestershire sauce, margarine, salt, pepper, swiss cheese, sour cream, breadcrumbs
name: swiss cheese kugel

steps: Season chicken breasts generously with salt and pepper. Place the chicken breasts in the bottom of a slow cooker. Add the garlic and rice. Add the lemon juice to the water and stir. Pour this mixture over the rice and chicken. Stir once to coat. Place the lid on the slow cooker and set on low for 8 hours. To plate, place a serving of the rice on each plate and top with 1 chicken breast. Garnish with fresh parsley sprigs.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic cloves, wild rice, lemon juice, water
name: crock pot lemon garlic chicken with wild rice

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake the sweet potatoes for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, agave nectar, fresh lemon juice, salt
name: agave roasted sweet potatoes vegan

steps: Heat oil in a large wok or high-sided skillet over med-high heat. Add broccoli and stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5
ingredients: broccoli, lemon juice, garlic cloves, basil leaves
name: italian infused broccoli

steps: Put the car kabobs in a large bowl and mix together the lime juice, olive oil, white wine vinegar, garlic cloves, chili powder, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt, pepper, raw shrimp, vegetables, salt,
ingredients: cocktail franks, cherry tomatoes, pimento stuffed olives, yellow bell peppers, butter, wooden skewers
name: car kabobs

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, brown sugar, sugar, butter, vanilla, egg whites, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: chocolate chip cookies from cooking light

steps: Preheat oven to 180 c. Cut two 40cms lengths of foil and layer on top of each other. Top with a piece of baking paper. Place feta in middle of baking paper. Sprinkle with thyme or other herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Drizzle with oil. Fold paper and foil edges and turn upwards to seal and form a parcel. Place parcel on a baking tray. Bake 20 minutes till feta is heated through and slightly soft. Serve warm with crackers and olives.
ingredients: feta, fresh rosemary, fresh oregano, fresh thyme, olive oil, cracked black pepper
name: baked herb feta cheese

steps: Combine rotel tomatoes, black beans, white shoepeg corn, green onion, italian dressing in large bowl. Whisk together oil, vinegar, salt and black pepper. Pour dressing over bean mixture. Stir gently to combine. Can be served immediately, or chilled for a few hours before serving.
ingredients: rotel tomatoes, black beans, white shoepeg corn, green onion, italian dressing
name: redneck caviar party dip salsa

steps: In a wok or skillet, heat oil until hot but not smoking. Add garlic and chilis and fry until garlic is light brown. Add mushrooms and onions and stir quickly. Add cooked rice. Stir thoroughly. Add long beans, peppers, and soy and stir thoroughly. At the very end, stir in basil leaves and immediately turn into a serving bowl.
ingredients: cooked rice, oil, onion, garlic, frozen mixed vegetables, bean sprouts, turmeric, light soy sauce, button mushroom
name: vegan fried rice

steps: Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium-high heat. Add jasmine rice, chicken broth, green onion, red chilies, fresh cilantro, butter, gingerroot, turmeric, lime juice, roasted peanuts. Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium-high heat. Add j
ingredients: jasmine rice, chicken broth, green onion, red chilies, fresh cilantro, butter, gingerroot, turmeric, lime juice, roasted peanuts
name: royal thai rice

steps: In a crockpot, simmer the refried beans, the chopped avocado, and salsa, along with the velvetta cheese. In a skillet, brown the hamburger along with the chopped onions and garlic powder. After the hamburger is browned, add to the crockpot with the other ingredients and allow to cook for about 20 minutes on the high setting. Be sure to stir occasionally to prevent burning or sticking. Serve as a dip with tortilla chips or in mini-taco shells.
ingredients: refried beans, sour cream, guacamole, cheese, olives, tomatoes, tortilla chips
name: easy layer dip

steps: Cook cauliflower until tender and separate and chop into tiny pieces. Add to a large sauce pan, cover with water and salt lightly. Bring to a boil and cook until easily pierced with a skewer, about 20 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving plate. Mix oil, vinegar, salt and pepper, pour over potatoes and cauliflower, breaking them up a bit as you do. Serve immediately.
ingredients: coconut milk, cauliflower floret, vegetable oil, green curry paste, cilantro, chili powder, salt
name: coconut cauliflower

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute chicken and garlic until chicken is no longer pink inside. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4.
ingredients: whole wheat penne, boneless skinless chicken breasts, frozen spinach, garlic cloves, cherry tomatoes, fat free cream cheese, parmesan cheese, chicken broth
name: chicken pasta with cream sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Coat a 9 x 5-inch loaf pan with non-stick cooking spray. In a mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Place batter in prepared pan and bake about 1 hour, or until knife inserted in in bread comes out clean. Cool on wire rack 10 minutes and remove from pan. Cool completely before slicing.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, butter, flour, amaretto, vanilla, almonds
name: amaretto nut bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Slice small slits all over the pork loin. Insert the garlic slivers into the holes. Spread the dijon mustard evenly over the entire loin, using your hands or a spatula. Sprinkle loin with the herbes de provence, the salt and the pepper. Place on a roasting rack set in a roasting pan and bake for about 1 hour, or until meat thermometer reaches 155 degrees. Remove from the oven, and let rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: pork loin chops, cooking oil, dijon-style mustard, low-carb italian salad dressing, black pepper, onion
name: pork chops dijon low carb

steps: Cream butter and sugar. Add almonds and sugar. Combine dry ingredients, add to sugar mixture. Drop onto prepared baking sheet. Bake 350 for 1012 minutes.
ingredients: almonds, butter, sugar, water, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: candy sale almond roca

steps: Heat oil in large skillet and saute pork, ham, cheese, and pickles. Add onion and peppers and cook until softened. Add garlic and cook 1 more minute. Let filling cool, then put a spoonful on the short end of each crescent, then roll to seal. Bake according to roll pkg directions. Melt jam in microwave till spreadable. Brush on rolls during the last 3-4 minutes. Any laftover filling can be used in scambled eggs or tossed into hot pasta.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, ciabatta rolls, yellow mustard, swiss cheese, dill pickles, roast pork, cooked bacon
name: cubanitos

steps: Add frozen black-eyed peas, ham hock, bacon grease, salt, black pepper, hot sauce, to a skillet. Cook and crumble meat over medium heat until beef is browned. Drain well. Add frozen black-eyed peas, ham hock, bacon grease, salt, black pepper, hot sauce, to a skillet. Add frozen black-
ingredients: frozen black-eyed peas, ham hock, bacon grease, salt, black pepper, water
name: black eyed peas like maw maw s

steps: In a large bowl, combine the strawberries, caramel ice cream topping, maple syrup, orange juice, cashew halves. Stir in the yogurt. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour. Add the strawberry yogurt and toss. Serve atop a bed of lettuce, if desired.
ingredients: fresh strawberries, caramel ice cream topping, maple syrup, orange juice, cashew halves
name: swift strawberry salad

steps: Melt butter with 1 tblsps olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add feta, eggs, fresh chives, salt & freshly ground black pepper, butter, feta, parmesan cheese, salad leaves and toss to coat. Add feta. Season with salt and pepper and toss thoroughly. Serve immediately.
ingredients: eggs, fresh chives, salt & freshly ground black pepper, butter, feta, parmesan cheese, salad leaves
name: feta parmesan chive omelette

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden
ingredients: fish fillets, garlic and herb seasoning, cajun seasoning, salt, black pepper, light mayonnaise, white cheese, lemon, tomatoes
name: fish fillet sandwich

steps: Fry bacon until crisp. Drain and crumble. Place lettuce in a large bowl. Top with onion, egg, and crumbled bacon. In a skillet put bacon drippings, vinegar, salt, pepper and sugar. Heat to boiling. Pour over lettuce in bowl and toss. Serve immediately.
ingredients: bacon, dry mustard, salad oil, vinegar, onion salt, spinach
name: wilted spinach salad with bacon

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Bake
ingredients: white wine, chicken broth, butter, baby carrots
name: carrots sauteed in wine

steps: Mix first four ingredients and add hot water. Knead well. Let stand 10 minutes. Cut into desired size. Fry in hot grease.
ingredients: bread flour, water, dry yeast, salt
name: pan de agua

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a large skillet, combine the garlic cloves and the oil. Over a low heat, caramelize the garlic until browned and soft, about 20 minutes. Transfer garlic cloves to a blender or food processor. Add the vinegar and mustard. Blend until smooth. With the motor running, slowly pour in the reserved garlic oil. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Chop the lettuce into bite-sized pieces and put in a large salad bowl. Pour the dressing over the lettuce and toss to coat. Sprinkle some grated cheese on top and serve immediately.
ingredients: garlic, onion, white wine, heavy cream, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: roasted garlic sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 200f. In a large skillet mix together all sauce ingredients. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add pork, 1 tablespoon of shaoxing wine, the soy sauce and ginger juice. Allow it to marinate for 1 hour. When done marinating, add 1 inch oil to a heavy bottomed pot and preheat the oil to 340 degrees f. Prepare a wire rack by lining it with several layers of paper towels. Put the potato starch in a small bowl, and roll each piece of pork in it to give each piece an even coating of starch. Fry the pork in batches until lightly browned and cooked though. Transfer the fried pork to the paper towel lined rack. In a saute pan, add the remaining shaoxing wine along with the black vinegar, rice vinegar, soy sauce and sugar. Turn the burner on to high heat and bring the mixture to a boil. Add the cooked pork to the black vinegar sauce and continue boiling until the sauce is very thick and syrupy and coats each piece of pork, rather than the pan. Serve with steamed rice.
ingredients: honey, raisins, dried figs, sweet red wine, red wine vinegar, white wine vinegar, wood chips
name: honeyed wine vinegar

steps: In a large pot, combine the first nine ingredients. Cover and process until blended. While processing, add oil in a steady stream. Process until thickened. Store in the refrigerator.
ingredients: berbere, cayenne, ground ginger, ground cardamom, salt, fresh lemon juice, dry red wine, water
name: awase ethopian ketchup

steps: In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm.
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon
name: cinnamon buttercream frosting

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, light brown sugar, pecans, butter, cream cheese, granulated sugar, eggs, vanilla, berries, mint leaf
name: savannah cheesecake cookies paula deen

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Place the bread cubes in two greased 6-oz. Custard cups. In a small bowl, whisk the egg and creamer. Pour over the bread. Sprinkle with the caramel pieces, nuts, and cinnamon and dot with butter. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until bubbly and golden brown. Cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: milk, sugar, dried cherries, vanilla bean, couscous, vanilla yogurt, ground cinnamon
name: cherry couscous pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Beat eggs until frothy. Combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and salt in a small bowl. Add eggs. Mix well. Add corn syrup, melted butter, and vanilla. Bake in greased muffin tin 350 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: oatmeal, water, egg, butter, all purpose greek seasoning
name: an oatmeal poached egg

steps: In a large skillet brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Add ground beef, crumbling and breaking it up while cooking it. When meat is brown, remove from heat and drain fat. Place back on stove and add two cans of chicken gumbo soup. Stir together until it begins to bubble. Stir in catsup. Simmer for a few minutes, then remove from heat. Ready to serve on hamburger buns.
ingredients: ground beef, tomato soup, salsa, cheddar cheese, hamburger buns
name: cheesy taco sloppy joes

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: butter, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, fryer chickens
name: baked chicken

steps: Place chicken tenders, cheez-it crackers, cayenne pepper, garlic salt, parmesan cheese, low-fat mayonnaise in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. Remove from heat and allow to cool.
ingredients: chicken tenders, cheez-it crackers, cayenne pepper, garlic salt, parmesan cheese, low-fat mayonnaise
name: cheez it chicken tenders

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, onions, worcestershire sauce, cayenne, diced pimentos
name: whistle stop cafe pimento cheese

steps: Combine ice-cream, milk and vanilla in a blender. Process until thick and smooth, about 1 minute. Divide fudge syrup among parfait glasses, covering the bottom and drizzling syrup in a spiral pattern around inside of each glass. Pour equal amounts of ice-cream mixture into each glass. Swirl some chocolate fudge syrup over each serving. Place 1 cherry on top of each milkshake.
ingredients: whipping cream, milk, cocoa powder, milk chocolate, irish whiskey, cream, chocolate curls
name: irish chocolate velvet

steps: Place almonds on foil-lined baking sheet and broil, turning as needed, until blackened on all sides, remove to brown paper bag. Remove skins once cool enough to handle. To toast almonds, heat skillet over medium heat, add almonds, cook, stirring, until almonds are lightly browned, about 2 minutes, do not overcook.
ingredients: almonds, roasted red peppers packed in oil, garlic cloves, red wine vinegar, black pepper
name: roasted red pepper almond dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together chicken, water, vinegar, soy sauce, onion, hot peppers, black pepper, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder, garlic powder
ingredients: chicken, water, vinegar, soy sauce, onion, hot peppers, black pepper, garlic powder
name: kadon pika

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Grease and flour a tube or bundt pan, then sprinkle walnuts in the bottom. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine cake mix, pudding mix, eggs, oil and water. With mixer at medium speed, beat for 3 minutes or until well blended. Stir in chopped apples, plus raisins if desired. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in preheated oven for 55 to 65 minutes or until a tester inserted in centre comes out clean. Cool in pan for 15 minutes, then turn out onto a rack and cool completely. Dust with icing sugar, if desired.
ingredients: sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder, granny smith apples, unsalted butter, dark brown sugar, cinnamon
name: crispy crusted apple cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine the vermicelli, raisins, almonds, cashews, ghee, cardamom powder, sugar, milk, sunflower seeds. Beat until well blended. Fold in raisins, but do not over mix. Spoon the batter into oiled muffin cups and bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve hot.
ingredients: vermicelli, raisins, almonds, cashews, ghee, cardamom powder, sugar, milk, sunflower seeds
name: muzzafar

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees f. In 4 quart saucepan, heat soup, milk, thyme, pepper, chicken and vegetables to boiling over med-high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil and stir 3-5 minutes. Spread in ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Seperate dough into 8 biscuits. Place evenly over hot chicken mixture. Bake 35-40 minutes or until biscuits are golden brown and no longer doughy on bottom. After 20 minutes, cover with foil if necessary to prevent excessive browning.
ingredients: buttermilk baking mix, dried thyme, coarse black pepper, milk, nonstick cooking spray
name: pepper thyme biscuits

steps: Mix together first 8 ingredients in a bowl. Shape mixture into 4 patties. Grill over medium-high heat for 10-12 minutes or until done, turning once. Just before taking off the grill, place cheese slice on each patty. Serve on buns with lettuce, tomato, etc.
ingredients: ground beef, aluminum foil, carrots, canned sliced potatoes, green bell peppers, dried onion flakes, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper
name: camping burgers in foil

steps: Place shredded pork in crock pot. Cover with lid and cook on low heat 8-10 hours. I like to cook mine a long time so they fall apart in the crock pot. Serve with brown rice and a green veggie.
ingredients: pork butt, water, taco seasoning, barbecue sauce
name: crock pot shredded pork

steps: In a large saucepan combine sugar, corn syrup, water, and salt. Cook to hardball stage,, stirring only until sugar dissolves. Meanwhile, as temperature of syrup reaches 250 degrees, very gradually add the syrup to egg whites, beating at high speed with electric mixer. Add vanilla and beat until candy holds its shape, 4-5 minutes. Stir in the chopped nuts or cherries, if desired. Quickly drop candy from a teaspoon onto waxed paper, swirling the top of each piece. Let cool.
ingredients: granulated sugar, water, marshmallow cream, vanilla extract, pecans
name: marshmallow divinity

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: red lentil, onion, garlic, salt, dill, savory, chili powder, water
name: savory red lentils

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package. Return to pot and cook pasta according to directions on package. Return to pot and cook pasta according to instructions on package. Return
ingredients: bow tie pasta, fat-free evaporated milk, flour, fresh basil, garlic, frozen peas, prosciutto, parmesan cheese
name: bow ties with basil cream sauce peas and prosciutto

steps: Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation:Combine eggs, sugar, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnutspreparation
ingredients: egg white, cream of tartar, sugar, almond extract, walnuts, rolled oats
name: oataroons

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish with nonstick pan coating or grease lightly with solid shortening. Cut baked potatoes into 1 inch cubes. Place half in a prepared baking dish. Sprinkle half of the salt, pepper and bacon. Top with half of the sour cream & cheese. Repeat layers. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with chopped green onions to garnish.
ingredients: hash browns, butter, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, purple onion, cheddar cheese, potato chips
name: best ever potato casserole

steps: Pour dressing into large bowl and add dry ranch dressing mix, stirring well. Add diced cucumbers, sliced tomatoes, olives and basil, cover and marinate a couple of hours. In a large pot, place enough water for pasta and drop crab boil bag into water. When water comes to boil, place pasta into water and cook until almost done, then turn heat off, add the frozen shrimp and let sit in crab boil water until pasta is tender. Drain shrimp and pasta mixture into a large bowl. Pour dressing mixture over pasta and shrimp, mixing well. Cover and let chill before serving--overnight is even better.
ingredients: tri-color spiral pasta, fresh broccoli florets, cucumber, tomatoes, ranch salad dressing, parmesan cheese
name: ranch pasta salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: unsalted butter, extra virgin olive oil, gingerroot, garlic cloves, white flour, nonfat milk, fresh orange juice, orange peel, black pepper
name: ginger and orange sauce for salmon halibut or vegetables v l s

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix butter, milk, water, salt, brown sugar, oatmeal, vanilla, chocolate chips in a large mixing bowl. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy.
ingredients: milk, water, salt, brown sugar, oatmeal, vanilla, chocolate chips
name: chocolate chip cookie oatmeal

steps: Bake at 350 for 55 minutes to an hour. Allow to cool 20 minutes while sauce thickens slightly. Dust with powdered sugar.
ingredients: lemon cake mix, lemon gelatin, water, vegetable oil, eggs, powdered sugar, lemon juice
name: pucker up lemon cake

steps: Combine and chill first four ingredients. Blend sour cream, black olives, marinated artichoke hearts, curry powder, mayonnaise, spring onions, pimento stuffed olive, salt, pepper. Add to chicken mixture. Toss lightly. Serve on bed of greens. Sprinkle with toasted almonds.
ingredients: chicken rice-a-roni, black olives, marinated artichoke hearts, curry powder, mayonnaise, spring onions, pimento stuffed olive, salt, pepper
name: curried rice salad

steps: Place the rice vinegar, water, sugar, salt, cucumber, cayenne pepper in a medium saucepan and heat, stirring until the sugar has completely dissolved. Boil for around 6-7 minutes or until a thin syrup has formed. Squeeze the grated cucumber to remove most of the liquid. When the syrup has cooled, add the rice vinegar, water, sugar, salt, cucumber, cayenne pepper. Mix together thoroughly. Serve at room temperature with fried or boiled shrimp, coconut shrimp, egg rolls, meat sate etc.
ingredients: rice vinegar, water, sugar, salt, cucumber, cayenne pepper
name: thai cucumber sauce nam chim taeng kwa

steps: Place the pork in a large pot with water to cover. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain well. Place all the remaining ingredients and the pork ribs in a wok. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 cup liquid. Heat a clean wok and sear the pork until browned. Add the reserved liquid and cook over medium until it glazes. Chop the pork into bite size pieces and serve.
ingredients: sparerib racks, garlic, catsup, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, dry sherry, fresh ginger, honey
name: chinese ribs

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Place squash, seeds still in, cut side up on a cookie sheet and bake for 45 minutes or until soft. Remove from oven and scoop out the seeds and fibers. Mix remaining ingredients and distribute evenly into the cavity of each squash. Return to oven for apprx 10 minutes.
ingredients: acorn squash, fresh orange juice, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: low calorie baked acorn squash with orange

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Place chicken in a singe layer on a wire rack over an oven tray. Bake 45 minutes until well browned and cooked through.
ingredients: garlic, olive oil, vinegar, honey, whole grain dijon mustard, fresh thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: garlic mustard

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: sugar, pineapple juice, lemon juice, ginger ale
name: sparkling pineapple lemonade

steps: Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread peaches in a well greased 13x9 baking dish. Blend flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add milk, beating until a batter forms. Pour over peaches. Drizzle margarine over top of mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Let cool and refrigerate about 4 hours prior to serving.
ingredients: peaches, pineapple chunks, frozen strawberries, banana, vanilla pudding mix
name: fruit dessert

steps: In heavy saucepan, combine ww 1pt peanut butter boulders, honey, non-fat powdered milk, lemon juice, cheerios toasted oat cereal, dried cranberries, sunflower seeds. Cook and stir on medium-high heat until melted. Remove from heat. Remove
ingredients: reduced-fat peanut butter, honey, non-fat powdered milk, lemon juice, cheerios toasted oat cereal, dried cranberries, sunflower seeds
name: ww 1pt peanut butter boulders

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice and cook, stirring constantly. Sprinkle with salt, cumin, and taco seasoning. Cook stirring constantly, until slightly translucent. Stir in onions and cook until tender. Stir in tomato sauce and chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes. Fluff with a fork.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic, chili powder, ground cumin, short-grain white rice, chicken broth, tomato paste
name: simple mexican rice

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine first 5 ingredients and simmer over medium heat for 10-15 minutes until berries pop, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium low, stir in marmalade and cook for 5 more minutes. Set aside to cool, stirring occasionally. Transfer to glass bowl and refrigerate until chilled. Will keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: water, sugar, light brown sugar, cranberries, pineapple preserves, prepared horseradish, dijon mustard
name: cranberry jezebel sauce

steps: Slice end of fennel and remove shoots from top. If exterior of bulb is discoloured or at all ugly, peel it. Slice fennel and apples thinly into matchstick pieces. Place in a serving bowl. Place all dressing ingredients in a blender or food processor and process until well combined. Pour dressing over fennel and apples and toss. Let stand for 5 minutes, then serve.
ingredients: cider vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper, ground fennel, grainy mustard, olive oil, apples, fennel bulb, fresh thyme, red onion
name: fennel apple slaw

steps: Preheat oven to 475f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place chicken in one layer in casserole dish. Saute onion in drippings for about 5 minutes, then add the soup, paprika, salt, lemon juice, and dill, and mix them together thoroughly. Reduce heat to low, then stir the broth and sour cream into the skillet mixing well. Do not boil, but heat the sauce to about serving temperature. Gently pour the sauce over the chicken, actually spooning is best if you are not too lazy, like i am. Cover and bake until chicken is tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: chicken legs-thighs, olive oil, butter, onion, mushrooms, fresh parsley, lemon juice, southern comfort, salt and black pepper
name: southern comfort chicken

steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, add the oil, onion, garlic, cumin and jalapeno pepper. Stir to combine. Cover and cook, stirring until beans are thickened, about 5 minutes. Add the cumin and beans. Stir and add the red pepper flakes. Simmer for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: onion, garlic, olive oil, jalapeno pepper, fresh cilantro, tomatoes and green chilies, black beans, diced green chilies, oregano, cumin
name: black bean chile

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add japanese eggplants and saute for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and saute for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and saute for 5 minutes
ingredients: japanese eggplants, garlic clove, fresh ginger, soy sauce, mirin
name: japanese eggplant aubergine saute

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: olive oil, smoked kielbasa, potatoes, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, yellow onion, old bay seasoning, seasoning salt
name: kielbasa with potatoes peppers onions

steps: Place rice and milk in top of double boiler. Mix in sugar, cocoa and salt. Cook over boiling water 45 mins, stirring occasionally. It should be creamy. Add vanilla and butter before serving.
ingredients: short-grain rice, half-and-half cream, sugar, butter, salt, pure vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg, raisins
name: sweet creamy baked rice pudding

steps: In a large skillet, brown the salted chicken pieces in oil. Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes or until browned. Crush garlic cloves and scatter over the chicken add the broth. Turn heat to low. Cover and cook for about 15 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove cover, add salt and red pepper flakes. Add water and simmer over low heat until water is cooked off.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cooking onion, green pepper, red pepper, yellow pepper, orange bell pepper, cheddar cheese, seasoning salt
name: simple delicious chicken dinner

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the sea salt. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mix well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: potatoes, sea salt, cracked pepper, butter, milk, sour cream, eggs
name: linda s fluffy mashed potatoes

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Cut chicken breasts in half. Mix water and egg togther in a small bowl. Mix bread crumbs and cheese together in separate bowl. Dip each piece of chicken in egg mixture then in bread mixture. Then set in a greased 9x13 greased pan. Cook for 45 minutes to 1 hour. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: chicken breasts, tomato paste, bread, cheese, ham, butter
name: chicken parmigiana jaffle

steps: Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, butter, onion salt, salt, pepper, paprika
name: potatoes extraodinaire

steps: In dutch oven brown beef strips in hot oil over medium-high heat. Add beef broth and peanut sauce. Bring to boiling. Stir in noodles. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered, 4 minutes, stirring occasionally to separate noodles. Add broccoli. Return to boiling. Simmer uncovered for 3 to 4 minutes more or just until noodles are tender, stirring occasionally. Divide beef and noodle mixture among four bowls. If desired, sprinkle servings with green onions.
ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, stir fry vegetables, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, catalina dressing, light soy sauce, instant brown rice, mandarin orange segments, green onion
name: beef fried rice

steps: Preheat mason jars and snap lids. Combine strawberries and raspberries and fruit pectin in a large deep stainless steel saucepan. Whisk in fruit pectin. If using sweetener, measure splenda or sugar and set aside. Stirring constantly, bring fruit mixture to a boil over high heat. If using, add sweetener or sugar, and return mixture to a boil, stirring frequently. Boil 3 minutes. Remove form heat. Skim foam. Ladle into hot jars.
ingredients: unflavored gelatin, cold water, frozen unsweetened strawberries, artificial sweetener
name: diabetic strawberry jam

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Bake 50 to 60 minutes until the french toast is brown and puffed. Sprinkle with cinnamon and brown sugar.
ingredients: butter, eggs, milk, powdered sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, bread
name: easy oven baked french toast

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter. Mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan. Pour eagle brand evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly with fork. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Chill if desired. Cut into bars or diamonds. Store covered at room temperature.
ingredients: coconut, sweetened condensed milk, oleo, powdered sugar, chocolate chips, paraffin wax
name: coconut peter paul mounds bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt in a bowl and mix well. Make three holes in mixture for next three liquid ingredients. Pour vanilla into 1st hole, vinegar into 2nd and oil into 3rd. Pour cold water over all. Mix with fork or wire wisk just until well blended. Pour into two 9 inch pans coated with cooking spray. Bake for 25 - 30 minutes. Cool completely in pans on a wire rack.
ingredients: cake flour, baking powder, salt, butter, milk, maple syrup, water
name: grandperes

steps: Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker with the contents of the soup packet. Pour water, wine, and soy sauce over the top, turning the pork to coat. Carefully spread garlic over the pork, leaving as much on top of the roast during cooking as possible. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. Serve with cooking liquid on the side as au jus.
ingredients: pork roast, garlic cloves, onion, salt, pepper, liquid smoke, brown sugar, cola, ketchup, worcestershire sauce
name: slow cooker bbqd pork

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and line large cookie sheets with parchment paper. In a large bowl, add the ice cream mixture and mix until smooth. Stir in the raisins and nuts. Drop by teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart on baking sheets and bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until edges are browned. Remove to wire racks to cool.
ingredients: raisins, crystallized ginger, dark rum, brown sugar, cinnamon, cream, milk, vanilla extract
name: spiced rum raisin ice cream

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: pasta, canola oil, smoked sausage, onion, milk, self-rising flour, velveeta cheese, salt, ground black pepper
name: smoked sausage pasta w cheese

steps: In a small saucepan, melt butter and chocolate over low heat, stirring constantly until melted. Stir in sugar, vanilla, salt, and milk. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook 7 minutes, stirring constantly. Serve warm over ice cream or pound cake. The amount of time will vary with the amount of sauce being reheated.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, boiling water, sugar, light corn syrup, vanilla
name: hot chocolate sauce for ice cream

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: butter, plain flour, milk, salt, nutmeg, frozen spinach, cheese, eggs
name: cheese and spinach pie

steps: Mix the mustard seeds and spices in a bowl, pour the vinegar on top and leave to soak overnight. Place the mixture in a mortar and pound to a paste. Gradually work in the lager. The finished mustard should resemble a stiff paste, so add extra vinegar if necessary. Store the mustard in sterilized jars in the fridge. Use within 4 weeks.
ingredients: mustard seeds, lager beer, malt vinegar, ground allspice, fresh ground black pepper, kosher salt, sugar, dry mustard, garlic, horseradish
name: beer mustard

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour 8x8 baking pan and set aside. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt in mixing bowl and set aside. Place margarine and sugar in large bowl of mixer and cream until smooth. Add honey and eggs and beat to blend, scraping bottom and sides of bowl frequently. Beat in half of the milk. Beat in half of the flour mixture. Repeat with remaining milk and flour mixture. With mixer at lowest speed, continue to mix for 4 minutes. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in oven 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: frozen corn, eggs, milk, flour, sugar, salt, pepper, margarine, breadcrumbs
name: amish baked corn

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and whisk together until well blended and smooth. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, cajun seasoning, honey, dijon mustard, vegetable oil
name: cajun chicken cubes with honey mustard dipping sauce

steps: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine cup water, sugar and lemon zest. Bring to a boil, then decrease heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Set aside to cool. Strain syrup through sieve placed over large measuring cup, discarding solids. Whisk in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Pour into molds and freeze until slushy, then insert sticks and freeze until solid, for at least 4 hours. If you are using an ice pop kit, follow the manufacturers instructions.
ingredients: watermelon, frozen lemonade concentrate, mint sprigs, ice, watermelon wedges
name: watermelon lemonade cooler
