steps: Preheat oven to 300f. Combine first 5 ingredients in a bowl. Mix thoroughly and set aside. Heat oil in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges.
ingredients: zucchini, bulk sausage, onion, egg, salt, oregano, garlic salt, pepper, cheddar cheese
name: zucchini casserole cracker crumbs

steps: Combine chicken, mayo, jam, raisins and onion in small bowl. Place 1 scoop chicken mixture in center of 8 slices of bread, spreading slightly. Top with remaining bread slices. Center cut-n-seal over bread. Cut and seal.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, salt & fresh ground pepper, fresh dill, unsalted butter, white bread
name: egg salad tea sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a shallow bowl, blend together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, and pepper. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour.
ingredients: garlic powder, ground black pepper, salt, paprika, seasoned bread crumbs, all-purpose flour, milk, egg, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, oil
name: fried garlic chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, egg, water, vegetable oil, banana, walnuts
name: banana nut muffins

steps: Combine apricots and brandy in a small bowl, stand for 10 minutes. Place cream in a small pan, bring to boil, remove from heat. Add white melts, stir until melted. Add undrained apricots, almonds and biscuit crumbs. Mix well. Refrigerate mixture until firm enough to handle. Roll 2 level teaspoons of mixture into balls, toss in coconut. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: dried apricots, coconut, sweetened condensed milk, apricot brandy, powdered sugar
name: apricot brandy balls

steps: Heat oil in large pot over medium heat until hot. Cook turkey and garlic until tender. Stir in garlic, onion, carrot, garlic, turkey breast, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, par
ingredients: cheese tortellini, olive oil, diced onion, carrot, garlic, turkey breast, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, fresh basil
name: turkey tortellini soup

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, semolina, instant yeast, salt, olive oil, water, dough enhancer
name: slow rise pizza crust king arthur flour co

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease two 12-cup muffin tins. Combine flour, sugar baking powder and salt in large bowl. Whisk oil, milk, eggs and extract in another large bowl until smooth. Add dry ingredients and mix only until evenly moistened. Stir in poppy seeds. Divide batter between prepared tins. Bake until muffins are golden brown, or about 30 minutes.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, poppy seeds, egg, milk, cooking oil, lemon juice
name: lemon poppy seed muffin

steps: Combine fresh strawberries, cool whip lite, honey bunches of oats cereal, pecan halves, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal, honey bunches of oats cereal
ingredients: fresh strawberries, cool whip lite, honey bunches of oats cereal, pecan halves
name: berry crunch parfait

steps: Spray 13 x 9 pan with cooking spray. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut biscuits in half. Place in pan in 1 layer. Pour butter evenly over biscuits. Sprinkle sugars evenly over biscuits and butter. Pour ice cream evenly. Bake for 30 minutes. Cool slightly. Turn pan over onto serving platter.
ingredients: vanilla ice cream, butter, sugar, brown sugar, cinnamon roll dough
name: cinnamon rolls rhodes frozen rolls

steps: Place the asparagus in a large frying pan with about 1 inch of boiling water. Cover with lid and cook for about 6-8 minutes, until the asparagus is tender but still firm. Drain well. Arrange the asparagus spears on a warmed serving dish. Make the tarragon butter by creaming together the remaining ingredients. Heat it gently and pour over asparagus. Serve at once.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, olive oil, lemon zest, fresh tarragon, lemon juice, sugar
name: asparagus with lemon and tarragon

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place lamb on a rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 minutes. Thicken pan juices for sauce, removing fat. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 minutes
ingredients: peppercorns, fresh rosemary leaf, fresh mint leaves, garlic, raspberry vinegar, soy sauce, dry red wine, leg of lamb, dijon-style mustard
name: peppercorn encrusted roast lamb

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow bowl, blend together butter, dijon mustard, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cracker crumb, parmesan cheese, chicken cutlets, fresh parsley. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour.
ingredients: butter, dijon mustard, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cracker crumb, parmesan cheese, chicken cutlets, fresh parsley
name: oven fried chicken breast cutlets

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Peel, core and slice apples. Place in a well greased 8x8-inch baking pan. Mix cake mix, oats, sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Melt butter and pour over the top of the dry cake mixture and mix until crumbly. Sprinkle this over apples. Bake 35-40 minutes until golden.
ingredients: sliced apples, equal sugar substitute, cinnamon, rolled oats, salt, flour, brown sugar, margarine
name: cinnamon apple crisps

steps: Place potatoes in a pot and cover with water. Cover and reduce heat to medium and cook potatoes until tender, 20 to 25 minutes. In small saucepan, heat the rest of the ingredients to boiling and keep warm on low heat to wait for potatoes to cook. Drain potatoes in colander and put into a serving dish. Stir in lemon butter and mix throughly with potatoes.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, lemon juice, chives
name: lemon chive potatoes

steps: In a plastic container with a lid, combine all ingredients. Seal and place in the freezer until frozen solid. Take out of freezer and let thaw. Drink when it has thawed and is slushy. Or put in blender and blend until slushy. Garnish with fresh cranberries, zest of a lime or an orange slice.
ingredients: pineapple juice, cranberry juice cocktail, honey, ground cloves, lime zest
name: hot pineapple cranberry sip

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix butter, margarine, sugar, baking powder, salt, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice
ingredients: unsalted butter, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, fresh peaches, lemon juice, cinnamon
name: the easiest fresh peach cobbler ever

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: cream cheese, egg, milk, vegetable oil, flour, baking powder, salt, black olives
name: olive cream cheese muffins

steps: Heat a saute pan on medium high heat. Add in garlic, butter, wine, and half and half. Cook for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Add in the fresh basil and the clams. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Portion a half cup of linguini on each plate, top each plate with equal portions of the clam sauce. Garnish with parmesean cheese and chopped fresh parsley and enjoy.
ingredients: olive oil, sweet onions, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, garlic cloves, bay leaves, crushed tomatoes in puree, dry white wine, littleneck clams, hot pepper
name: spanish style clams

steps: Preheat oven to 325f butter a 9x13-inch baking pan. Coarsely chop chocolate and place in a large microwave-safe bowl along with butter. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, then stir until chocolate is melted. Let mixture cool to room temperature. Stir in sugar, then eggs and vanilla. Gradually stir in flour, then nuts and chocolate chips, if using. Spread mixture in pan. Bake in center of oven for 30 minutes or until a skewer inserted in center of brownies comes out clean.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate squares, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cookies, nuts
name: cookie stuffed brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees place scrubbed whole spareribs in a baking dish and cook until tender. In a saucepan, heat oil and pepper over medium high heat until browned on all sides. Discard pepper, add garlic and ginger and cook until barely tender. Stir in salt and balsamic vinegar to taste and simmer over low heat until ready to serve. When tender, split each potato, drizzle with ginger sauce and serve hot.
ingredients: vegetable oil, pork spareribs, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, golden brown sugar, rice vinegar, reduced sodium soy sauce, cornstarch, cold water, white rice
name: gingered spareribs with brown sugar and soy

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Place pizza crust on ungreased cookie sheet. Sprinkle with 1 cup of the cheese. Top with beef and onion. Sprinkle with remaining cup of cheese. Bake about 15 minute or until hot.
ingredients: thousand island dressing, prepared pizza crust, lean ground beef, colby-monterey jack cheese, bacon, dill pickle, prepared mustard, lettuce, tomatoes
name: big mac pizza

steps: Put dates in boiling water with baking soda and leave to cool. Cream sugar, butter and vanilla extract. Add egg and dates and mix in well. Add all dry ingredients. Place in prepared baking pan and ake at 180c for 45 minutes. 5 minutes before cake comes out of oven, boil topping ingredients together for 3 minutes. Stab cake with knife and pour topping over as it comes out of the oven. Serve warm or cool.
ingredients: pitted dates, self rising flour, eggs, golden brown sugar, ground cinnamon, baking powder, butter
name: cinnamon date cake

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Combine the potatoes with the shallots in a large bowl. Add all remaining ingredients. Toss to coat evenly. Pour the mixture into a shallow baking dish and roast for about 30 minutes, mixing about halfway through.
ingredients: tiny new potatoes, bacon drippings, salt, pepper, molasses, fresh parsley
name: browned new potatoes

steps: In a large saute pan combine the oil, garlic and herbs. Warm over very low heat for about 4 minutes. Add the beans and salt and pepper to taste. Toss gently. Cook over low heat until the beans are warm and have absorbed the flavors of the olive oil, about 5 mins. Remove from the heat, add lemon juice and toss gently. Arrange beans on a platter and surround with olives. Serve immediately. Makes 4 servings.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary leaves, edamame, cannellini beans, pecorino cheese, flat leaf parsley, salt, ground black pepper
name: pecorino bean salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Brush a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with olive oil. Layer the sliced potatoes, mushrooms, and onions, in the dish. Sprinkle with the salt and sage leaves. Pour the cream over evenly. Brush the pork chops with olive oil, and rub the breadcrumbs onto both sides of each pork chop. Place pork chops on top of potatoes. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or just until the pork chops are cooked through and the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: pork chops, red potatoes, baby carrots, yellow onion, vegetable oil, seasoning, salt, cracked pepper, parsley flakes, dried basil
name: roasted pork veggies for two

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5-in loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: self raising flour, bicarbonate of soda, ground nutmeg, pitted dates, brown sugar, orange juice, egg, butter, mashed banana
name: caramel banana date loaf

steps: Cook beef, bell pepper and onion in a large saucepan over medium heat, crumbling the meat with a wooden spoon, until the meat is browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add garlic, chili powder, cumin and cayenne. Cook until fragrant, about 15 seconds. Stir in salsa and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in beans and cook until heated through, about 1 minute.
ingredients: ground beef, chili beans, black beans, diced green chilies, rotel chili fixins tomatoes, diced tomatoes, onion, salt and pepper
name: bev s chili

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Combine wet ingredients. Combine. Pour into a 9x9. Bake 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: white sugar, salt, butter, vanilla extract, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, cornmeal, milk
name: amusement park cornbread

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: lemon, skinless chicken breasts, flour, salt, paprika, oil, soft brown sugar, chicken stock
name: simple lemon chicken

steps: Heat olive oil in skillet over medium heat. Add kale and saute until kale is translucent, about 5 minutes on medium heat. Add kale and saute for another 5 minutes. Add red pepper, and saute for two more minutes. Put on low and add lemon juice and wine. Add seasonings. It is best served warm.
ingredients: olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, mushrooms, kale, red wine, salt and pepper
name: mushrooms kale with red wine

steps: Mix everything but the coleslaw together. Pay special attention to be sure the wasabi is well blended. A trick i learned that works very well, is to put all the ingredients but the coleslaw mix into a big ziploc bag, then squish, shake, and massage the ingredients into a nice smooth blend. Then add the coleslaw mix and the ingredients together in a large bowl and mix well. Cover and put it in the fridge for a couple hours to overnight to allow all the flavors to blend inches it will be soupy on the bottom, but the salad will be crisp.
ingredients: coleslaw mix, pineapple chunks in juice, granny smith apple, celery, dried cranberries, light mayonnaise, cider vinegar, pineapple juice
name: triple fruit coleslaw

steps: In medium skillet over medium-high heat, heat oil. Add chicken and water and cook 10 minutes or until browned. Add more water if necessary to prevent chicken from getting too dry. Set chicken aside. Pour off fat and water. Add remaining ingredients. Heat to a boil. Return chicken to pan. Reduce heat to low. Cover and cook 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink.
ingredients: chicken breasts, tomatoes, cheese, olive oil, apple cider vinegar, garlic clove, fresh basil, black pepper, salt
name: tomato basil roasted chicken

steps: In a blender, puree the garlic, lime juice, salt and pepper until smooth. Add melted butter and blend another 30 seconds. Season salmon fillets all over with salt and pepper. Grill over medium heat on lightly oiled grill rack 4 to 6 minutes i used the flavorwave oven. Turn fillets over and grill until just cooked through, 4 to 6 minutes more. Sprinkle fillets with lime zest and cilantro and then top with the lime butter sauce.
ingredients: cilantro, garlic clove, lime juice, olive oil, salt, salmon fillet
name: baked salmon with cilantro and lime

steps: Melt butter in a medium-heave skillet over medium heat. Mix in the next six ingredients. Saut for 30 seconds and add shrimp. Saut shrimp until they are opaque in centre, about 3 minutes, turning occasionally. Stir in parsley and serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: large shrimp, orange juice, lime juice, cumin, garlic, jalapenos
name: jalapeno lime shrimp with yellow rice

steps: Preheat oven to 425. In a saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter. Add flour and stir thoroughly. Add salt, pepper and sherry to the double boiler. Bake at 425 8-10 minutes or until the biscuits are done.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, bisquick baking mix, ground beef, salt, long grain rice, water, margarine, soy sauce
name: kitty litter casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done.
ingredients: coconut flour, baking soda, cinnamon, salt, eggs, coconut oil, vanilla, bananas, honey, pecans
name: coconut flour banana bread gaps

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown.
ingredients: potato, sweet potato, fat-free cottage cheese, reduced-fat sour cream, nonfat milk, granulated sugar, salt, garlic powder, green onions, reduced-fat cheddar cheese
name: two potato casserole

steps: In a skillet melt butter. Layer with onions and butter. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over beef mixture. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 50 minutes or until meat is no longer pink and rice is tender.
ingredients: onions, butter, frankfurter, whole tomatoes, potatoes, salt, caraway seed
name: frankfurter skillet dinner

steps: Spread fillet in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake in a 350 oven for about 10 minutes or until nuts are lightly toasted and fragrant. Meanwhile, in a med saucepan melt butter over med heat until sizzling. Remove from heat. Stir in rosemary, sugar, salt and red pepper. Add almonds to butter mixture and toss to coat. Cool slightly before serving. If desired seal cooled nuts in an airtight container and store for up to 1 month in refrigerator or up to 3 months in freezer.
ingredients: fillet of sole, salt, pepper, butter, dry white wine, cream of mushroom soup, slivered almonds, lemon juice
name: fillet almondine

steps: Heat oven to 350f. In large oven proof non-stick skillet sprayed heavily with cooking spray add onion and cook till translucent. In paper bag add flour, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Add meat pieces and shake. Add meat to pan with onions. Brown 3 to 4 mins on each side or till just starting to brown. Add all of the remaining ingredients to pan. Be sure to sprinkle the seasonings evenly over meat and vegetables. Do not stir. Cover and place in oven and cook for 1 hour or till very tender.
ingredients: boneless beef round steak, all-purpose flour, vegetable oil, tomatoes, green pepper, onion, basil, salt, black pepper
name: saucy swiss steak for two

steps: In a small bowl, combine cottage cheese, sour cream, green onion, garlic clove, salt, potatoes, monterey jack cheese. Spread in 1 quart casserole. Add pats of butter on top, evenly distributed. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 45 minutes.
ingredients: cottage cheese, sour cream, green onion, garlic clove, salt, potatoes, monterey jack cheese
name: grandma nancy s cheesy potatoes

steps: Boil chicken fillets, onion, green peppers, cabbage, chicken bouillon, soy sauce, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, fresh chinese noodles. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through.
ingredients: chicken fillets, onion, green peppers, cabbage, chicken bouillon, soy sauce, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, fresh chinese noodles
name: yakisoba amerikajin

steps: Heat oil in large skillet until a piece of asparagus sizzles. Add rump steak, soy sauce, dry sherry, fresh ginger, sesame oil, garlic, red chile, fresh asparagus, peanut oil, cornstarch. Stir-fry over medium-high heat for 2 minutes. Add rump steak, soy sauce, dry sherry, fresh ginger, sesame oil,
ingredients: rump steak, soy sauce, dry sherry, fresh ginger, sesame oil, garlic, red chile, fresh asparagus, peanut oil, cornstarch
name: beef asparagus

steps: Heat olive oil and saute garlic and drained artichoke hearts together. Put mixture in a greased 9 x 13 pan. Mix together mayonnaise, soup, lemon juice, curry powder, soft bread cubes, sharp cheddar cheese, butterpreparation:Heat olive oil and saute garlic and drained artichoke hearts together
ingredients: frying chicken, artichoke hearts, tomato sauce, dry sherry, oregano, fresh basil, garlic powder, salt and pepper
name: wine baked chicken and artichoke hearts

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Cut chicken breasts in half to butterfly them into cutlets. Sprinkle with some salt and pepper melt margarine in skillet and brown chicken in margarine and transfer to a 9x13 pan. Pour soup and sour cream into same skillet and whisk until smooth and warm. Place ham on top of chicken and top with a slice of swiss cheese. Pour soup mixture over top and bake uncovered for 40 minutes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, ham, cream cheese, garlic salt
name: low carb chicken cordon bleu

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a second bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and the cinnamon. In a second bowl, mix together the flour, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: rolled oats, brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, butter, canola oil, cooking apples, lemon juice, lemon rind, blueberries
name: blueberry apple crumble

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and pumpkin pie spice. Set aside. In a large bowl, beat together sugar, oil, eggs, and pumpkin. Stir in flour mixture alternately with water. Divide batter evenly between the prepared pans. Bake in the preheated oven for 60 to 70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. For best flavor, store wrapped in plastic wrap at room temperature for a full day before serving.
ingredients: cooking spray, water, salt, cornmeal, cooked pumpkin, sour cream, fresh coarse ground black pepper, ground nutmeg, gruyere, parmigiano-reggiano cheese
name: easy oven baked pumpkin polenta

steps: In a small bowl combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Return cooking water to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days.
ingredients: jasmine rice, water, light coconut milk, canola oil, medium shrimp, chili sauce, slivered almonds, green onion
name: thai shrimp with coconut almond rice

steps: Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender. Drain potatoes and cut cup but not too small. Cook, peel and cut up hard boiled eggs. Add to potatoes and eggs. Add enough miracle whip to moisten. Add horseradish and pepper. Lastly, add still frozen green peas just 5 to 10 minutes prior to serving.
ingredients: potatoes, cream of celery soup, mayonnaise, white vinegar, black pepper, celery ribs, green pepper, green onions, hardboiled egg
name: crunchy potato salad for a crowd

steps: Preheat oven to 300f degrees. In a large skillet, brown the ground beef and onion. Drain off any fat. Combine all ingredients in a casserole dish and bake for 2 hours. I keep it covered during the first hour, then remove the cover and stir, and leave the cover off for the last hour of cooking, although the original recipe did not specify this.
ingredients: corn muffin mix, ground pork, onion, green bell pepper, condensed tomato soup, garlic powder, raisins
name: south american casserole with a north american twist

steps: Combine the chicken and the soy sauce in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook until chicken is tender and no longer pink, turning once halfway through cooking. Remove from heat. For sauce, add green onion to skillet. Cook and stir about 2 minutes or until tender. Stir in coconut milk mixture. Cook and stir until bubbly. To serve, spoon the sauce over chicken. Sprinkle with peanuts.
ingredients: chicken thighs, low sodium soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, fresh ground pepper
name: kieran s fave chicken

steps: Grill the chicken pieces over med heat for 15 minutes per side. Mix the sauce ingredients in a bowl. Brush over chicken. Grill for 5 minutes. Turn, baste and grill 5 more minutes. Continue grilling and basting until chicken is done.
ingredients: cider vinegar, dark brown sugar, vegetable oil, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, black pepper, chicken
name: lexington style grilled chicken

steps: Heat broth and water to boiling. Add pasta as soon as boiling begins. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in skillet and add chicken breasts, cook until browned. Add can of tomatoes to chicken and simmer for 5 minutes. Lower pasta and broth temp to medium. Add canned ingredients, italian seasoning and chicken to broth. Simmer on medium for about 15-20 minutes or until pasta is the way you like it.
ingredients: light italian dressing, chicken broth, boneless skinless chicken breast, stewed tomatoes, carrots, whole wheat macaroni, italian seasoning, garlic powder, parmesan cheese
name: italian stew for two

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the beef and saut for about 3 minutes, until beef is tender. Add the garlic and saut one minute longer. Add the beef and saut one minute longer. Stir in the chiles, lime juice and rice. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered for about 20 minutes, or until beef is tender. Cool and pure the soup with a food processor, blender or immersion blender. The easiest way to puree is to add the solid ingredients to your food processor with just enough liquid to puree and then mix this thick pureed mixture back into the broth. Reheat, if necessary and serve warm.
ingredients: fresh spinach, steak fillets, shallots, garlic cloves, fish sauce, fresh ground black pepper, chicken broth, lemon juice, sugar, red chili pepper
name: vietnamese beef and spinach soup

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Grease or spray a large cookie sheet. Stir together dry ingredients including the sugar. Cut butter into flour mixture. Add raisins, stir to mix well. Beat egg in measuring cup. Add milk to make 1 cup. Stir into flour. Drop roughly tablespoon size scoops on cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, butter, low-fat sour cream, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, water, egg, cooking spray
name: cheddar scones

steps: Mix all marinade ingredients together in a small measuring cup. Place jeanne s steaks in a large zip lock bag. Pour marinade over steaks and seal bag. Place bag in a flat casserole dish so that the steaks are in a single layer. Refrigerate and marinate at least 4 hours, turning every half hour to marinate each side. Drain marinade and grill steaks to desired doneness. I double or triple this recipe for each addition package of steak. Any wild game steak can be used in this recipe.
ingredients: vegetable oil, soy sauce, green onions, garlic cloves, lime juice, red pepper flakes, cumin, skirt steaks
name: jeanne s steak fajitas with special marinade

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chickpeas and saute for 2-3 mins. Add the parsley and saute for 2 mins. Add the cilantro and saute for 2 mins. Add the cilantro and saute for
ingredients: dried garbanzo beans, salt, cumin seed, ground coriander, cayenne pepper, garlic clove, fresh parsley, lemon, juice of, egg, pita breads
name: falafels

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: soft cream cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh garlic, fresh basil, salt and pepper, french bread, plum tomatoes
name: tomato cheese bread

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium high heat. Add garlic and artichokes and season with salt and pepper. Saute garlic and artichokes 3-5 minutes, add remaining ingredients and lower heat to medium low. Simmer about 10 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: turkey tenderloins, olive oil, marinated artichoke hearts, balsamic vinegar, dried oregano, red pepper flakes, garlic clove, cherry tomatoes
name: turkey artichoke tomato tapas

steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Add greens. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally for 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in honey, vinegar, and salt.
ingredients: greens, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, jalapeno pepper, red pepper flakes, sherry wine vinegar, sea salt
name: sauteed greens with garlic

steps: Preheat your oven to 250. Melt 1 cup of butter over medium heat. Mix in brown sugar, corn syrup and sea salt and then stir until boiling at the edges. Lower the heat slightly and let boil until the caramel is 250. Remove from heat and add the baking soda and bourbon. Once fully incorporated, stir in the bacon. Divide the popcorn into two very lightly greased roasting pans and coat with the caramel. Mix well and then put the popcorn into the preheated oven for about 45 minutes to an hour, mixing every 10-15 minutes so the kernels of popped corn is coated in bourbon bacon coating. Once done, pour onto either parchment paper or wax paper to cool and break into pieces. Refrigerate.
ingredients: popped popcorn, sugar, brown sugar, light corn syrup, water, white vinegar, salt, butter
name: caramel popcorn balls

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Melt butter on a low flame in a small sauce pan. Add garlic and saute on low for about 1 minute. Add the lemon juice and shut off flame. Spray the bottom of a baking dish lightly with cooking spray. Place the fish on top and season with salt and pepper. Pour the lemon butter mixture on the fish and top with fresh parsley. Bake at 400 until cooked, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: butter, garlic, halibut fillets, lemon pepper, salt, lemons
name: lemon garlic alaskan halibut

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance.
ingredients: ground round, milk, fresh white breadcrumbs, flat leaf parsley, onion, egg, chili sauce, prepared horseradish, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: prizewinning meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, oil, water, miniature marshmallows, cherry pie filling
name: cherry marshmallow cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs in a bowl. Combine cheeses, bread crumbs and spices in a separate bowl. Dip chicken pieces in egg, then bread crumb mixture, then egg, then bread crumb mixture again. Place chicken on a cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Serve over pasta with marinara sauce and mozzarella. Or place chicken on a hoagie roll with marinara and mozzarella for a chicken parmesan sub. Also great for dipping with marinara or ranch.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, seasoned dry bread crumb, salt & freshly ground black pepper, butter, cooked ham, mozzarella cheese, crepes, cooked chicken, plum tomatoes, seasoning salt
name: chicken saltimbocca crepes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix first 4 ingredients with hand or stand mixer on medium until softened and well mixed. Add next two ingredients and mix on low until just incorporated. Transfer mixture to a small ovenproof dish and sprinkling cayenne on top to taste. Top with cheddar. Bake for 15 - 18 minutes or until bubbling around the edges. Remove from oven and allow to set for 5 - 7 minutes before serving. Serve with fried or baked pita wedges and tortilla chips.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, oregano, garlic powder, crushed red pepper flakes, pizza sauce, pepperoni, green onion, green pepper, mozzarella cheese
name: three layer pizza dip

steps: In a crock pot add all ingredients except chicken and potatoes. Whisk until smooth. Add chicken. Cook all day on low or cook on high for 4 hrs. Add potatoes and cook for 1 hour. If you cook all day, warm potatoes in a pan before you put them in soup mixture.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, zucchini, onion, water, oil, paprika, salt
name: crock pot chicken paprika low carb

steps: Mix first four ingredients in sauce pan. Boil one minute. Remove from heat. Stir in oats. Add remaining ingredients. Drop onto wax paper and let cool.
ingredients: cocoa powder, granulated sugar, quick oats, butter, vanilla, crunchy peanut butter
name: no bake cookies

steps: Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, bacon bits, sweet onion, dried thyme, vegetable broth, small white beans, coleslaw mix, salt and pepper, italian cheese blend
name: quick cabbage and white bean soup

steps: Drain pineapple juice and reserve. Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate.
ingredients: crushed pineapple, lemon jell-o gelatin, philadelphia cream cheese, whipped cream
name: pineapple yum yum salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: flour, celery seeds, baking powder, cabbage, salt, eggs, sugar, milk, onion flakes, butter
name: cabbage muffins

steps: Tear cake into small pieces and cover bottoms of 5 dessert dishes. Mix pudding according to directions on box. Pour over cake. Spread fresh strawberries over pudding mixture. Top with cool whip. Refrigerate if not served immediately.
ingredients: strawberry cake mix, instant coconut cream pudding mix, vegetable oil, eggs, strawberry gelatin, water
name: strawberry bundt cake

steps: Cook pasta according to package. Drain. While pasta cooks, mix sauce and next 4 ingredients in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, simmer 10 minutes. Coat a 13 x 9 baking dish with spray. Add pasta and top with sauce. Bake at 375f for 25 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with cheese. Top with onions if desired.
ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef, onion, kidney beans, diced tomatoes, mushroom stems and pieces, water, chili seasoning mix, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese
name: chilighetti

steps: Place pork chops in greased slow cooker. Top with onions and mushrooms. Combine soup mix, water, and mushroom soup. Pour over mushrooms and onions. Cover. Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 4-5. Serve over rice or cooked noodles.
ingredients: pork chops, mushroom, cream of mushroom soup, beer, onion soup mix
name: beer pork chops

steps: Heat egg and water to cover in small saucepan to boiling. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 10 minutes. Meanwhile, trim large stems from lettuce. Rinse thoroughly and drain. Run cool water over egg, then peel. Rub salad bowl with garlic. Mash egg in bowl with fork. Add oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Beat with fork to blend. Add spinach to vinaigrette and toss to coat.
ingredients: lettuce, spinach, spring onion, parsley, bacon, hard-boiled egg, minced garlic clove, vinegar, sugar
name: simple wilted salad

steps: Heat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Preheat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Preheat oil in a medium sized non-
ingredients: flour tortillas, mexican blend cheese, chicken, green chilies, butter, salsa
name: chicken chile quesadillas

steps: Place the beef in a crock pot, sprinkle with salt and pepper. Place chopped onions on top. Pour beef broth over beef and onion. Cook on low for 5 to 6 hours. Add soup, mushrooms, and gravy mix. Stir well. Cook on low an additional hour or on high for 30 minutes. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: cremini mushrooms, butter, olive oil, dry red wine, beef broth, flour, cold water, dried parsley flakes, salt and pepper
name: jim s easy mushroom sauce for steak

steps: Combine all ingredients, except cinnamon, in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil to melt butter. Stir in aguardiente. Remove from heat and stir in cinnamon. Let mixture stand at room temperature until cooled. Store in refrigerator for up to 2 months.
ingredients: water, light brown sugar, dark brown sugar, lime, juice of, salt, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, orange juice, aguardiente
name: canelazo spiced cinnamon rum drink

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 9x12 casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Prepare stuffing as directed. Let sit. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Combine soup, veggies and chicken into 9x13 casserole dish. Stir until everything is mixed thoroughly. Add stuffing on top of casserole. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: turkey breast, boiled ham, cheddar cheese, carrots, celery ribs, salsa, ranch dressing, angel food cake, strawberry
name: lunch box fun due

steps: Melt chocolate in microwave on med. Power. Stir occasionally. Set aside.
ingredients: heavy cream, rum extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, white chocolate, walnuts
name: rum walnut truffles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Sprinkle crystal sugar sprinkles on tops of muffins. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: granny smith apple, splenda granular, unsweetened applesauce, egg white, vanilla, wheat flour, cinnamon, baking soda, salt
name: very healthy apple muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Line a greased 9x9 pan with bread. Combine broccoli with margarine, cheese, salt, tobasco, and onion. Spoon over bread. Beat eggs, add milk powder and water, mix well, pour over broccoli. Bake at for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, paprika, dry mustard, eggs, milk, american cheese, oil
name: new england cheese puffs

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, salt, unbleached all-purpose flour, walnutspreparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, salt, unbleached all-purpose flour, walnuts
ingredients: butter, flour, vanilla, walnuts, sugar, salt, powdered sugar
name: butter ball cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix all ingredients except reserved leek, butter, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, heavy whipping cream, artichoke hearts, pimento pepper, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmes
ingredients: leek, butter, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, heavy whipping cream, artichoke hearts, pimento pepper
name: hot leek and artichoke dip

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Carefully pour the chicken broth over all. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving.
ingredients: ground turkey, salt, chicken broth, broccoli floret, carrot, dried onion flakes, dried parsley flakes, light sour cream, reduced-fat cheddar cheese
name: turkey veggie casserole

steps: In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add corn kernels and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add onion, garlic, bell pepper, tomatoes, black pepper, canned black beans, cooking spray. Stir gently to combine. Pour dressing over bean mixture. Can be served immediately, or chilled for a few hours before serving.
ingredients: onion, garlic, bell pepper, tomatoes, black pepper, canned black beans, cooking spray
name: havana beans

steps: In a small bowl, combine tomato ketchup, maple syrup, lime juice, celery seed, ground fenugreek, green pepper, chicken drumsticks, cooked rice. Place drumsticks on non-stick skillet and pour the tomato ketchup mixture on top. Cover with lid and bring to boil. Reduce the heat to low and cook for 15 min until they are cooked through. Remove the cover, turn up the heat to mid-high. The sauce will get thicken and start to caramelize in a few minutes. Continue to cook drumsticks turning them around so the sauce can cover them evenly, about 5 more minutes. When you see the sauce becomes like dark brown glaze and stick on to the meat, it is done. Remove from the heat, sprinkle sesame seeds all over them. Serve with hot rice and my steamed broccoli.
ingredients: tomato ketchup, maple syrup, lime juice, celery seed, ground fenugreek, green pepper, chicken drumsticks, cooked rice
name: tomato maple syrup glazed drumsticks

steps: Butter a 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix sugar, buttermilk, light corn syrup, baking soda, butter, pecans, buttermilk, light corn syrup, baking soda, butter, pecans, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, but
ingredients: sugar, buttermilk, light corn syrup, baking soda, butter, pecans
name: buttermilk fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a medium sized microwave safe bowl, melt butter. Mix in brown sugar. Add oatmeal, salt and baking powder. Press into an 8x8 baking dish. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes. Let cool before cutting into squares.
ingredients: salt, walnut oil, matzo meal, lemon, eggs, apples, sugar, cinnamon
name: passover apple squares

steps: Place the lime in the coconut cocktail and mix well. Pour the lime juice into the coconut cocktail and mix well
ingredients: pineapple-coconut juice, lime juice, vanilla vodka, half-and-half, banana schnapps, ice cube, honey, sweetened flaked coconut
name: put the lime in the coconut cocktail

steps: Combine ingredients, bring to a boil and simmer over low heat for 5 minutes. Use this as a basting sauce for barbecue, or combine with chopped or shredded beef, chicken or pork, and simmer until heated throughout and flavor is well through the meat. If you want to make up a batch of this to keep in the freezer, leave out the water, and it will not freeze solid. You can take out the container and just scoop out however much you need. I sometimes make it up by the gallon just to have it on hand for easy meals.
ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared yellow mustard, red onion, ketchup, vinegar, chili powder, lemon juice
name: grandma kane s bbq sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees celsius in a small saucepan, add filter coffee, dark brown sugar, cinnamon stick, dessert pears, dark rum. Cook gently over low heat about 5 minutes until lightly browned on top. Remove from heat and stir in the coffee. Spoon mixture into a 1. 75 litre baking dish and leave to cool. If freezing, prepare to end of step 2. Wrap whole dish in large freezer bag, seal, and freeze up to 1 month. Can be baked from frozen in a 160 degree c oven for 50 minutes. Bake at 400 degrees celsius in a small saucepan, add filter coffee, dark brown sugar, cinnamon stick, dessert pears, dark rum
ingredients: filter coffee, dark brown sugar, cinnamon stick, dessert pears, dark rum
name: blue mountain coffee rum poached pears

steps: Heat the butter over medium-high heat until butter is melted. Add the mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly.
ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, unsalted butter, onion, salt, parsley, eggs
name: mushroomelettes

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. In a medium bowl cream butter until fluffy. Add sugars and egg, mix well. In another bowl sift dry ingredients, add to wet ingredients. Once the dry and wet ingredients are well mixed add cup of rolled oats and cup of chocolate chips. Spoon a bit of the batter at a time onto a greased pan. Cook from 12 to 15 minute until the cookies are golden and have risen.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, egg yolk, flour, baking powder, salt, lime juice, lime zest, white chocolate chips
name: key lime white chocolate chippers

steps: Preheat oven to 375f grease or line a baking sheet. Cut the crusts off of the bread slices, then cut each piece of bread into 3 equal rectangles. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, garlic powder and parsley. Spread a layer of cream cheese mixture on each bread rectangle, and roll up. Wrap a slice of bacon around each of the bread rolls and secure them with toothpicks. Arrange the roll ups on the prepared baking sheet. Bake until the bacon is crisp, approximately 20 minutes.
ingredients: pillsbury refrigerated breadsticks, cooked bacon, egg, fresh parsley
name: pillsbury bacon breadstick focaccia

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place entire bag of puff corn caramel balls in a large roaster. In a large saucepan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to cool slightly and break apart. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Place in oven for 35-45
ingredients: caramels, butter, vegetable oil, marshmallows, corn puffs
name: puff corn caramel balls

steps: Put 1 cup of water into a large pan. Boil carrots until tender crisp. About 10 minutes. Drain. In a small pan, stir cornstarch into apple juice. Over moderate heat, cook, stirring, until sauce consistency. Stir in mint and cinnamon. Pour sauce over carrots and toss to coat.
ingredients: butter, baby carrots, salt, water, ground cinnamon, brown sugar
name: cinnamon glazed baby carrots

steps: Wash and skin potatoes, chop into large chunks. Boil potatoes until tender and mash. Stir in butter, cinnamon, brown sugar and mini marshmallows to taste. Mix in a separate bowl, flour, sugar, cinnamon, and pecans, drizzle melted butter over mixture and stir to moisten, mixture should resemble chunky crumbs. Pour potatoes mixture into casserole dish and cover with a thin layer of mini-marshmallows. Top with pecan mixture. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes or until brown and bubbly.
ingredients: sugar, white karo, water, pecan halves, margarine, vanilla
name: creamy smooth pecan pralines

steps: In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: water, fresh lemongrass, sugar, fresh ginger, mint sprigs, green tea
name: ginger and lemongrass iced green tea

steps: In a small stainless steel saucepan, stir the sugar and water with a wooden spoon. Heat on medium until the sugar has dissolved, then boil the mixture for about 1 minute. Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Chop the chilli very finely, then thoroughly bruise in a small mortar and pestle. Place the mango flesh, sugar mixture and chilli in a blender. Use the lemon juice to rinse the last little bit of chilli juice from the mortar and pestle and add that to the blender too. Blend the mango mixture into the egg white until smooth. Freeze the sorbet in an ice cream maker. Remove from the ice cream maker when thick and store in an airtight container in the freezer for up to 3 days. The sorbet may need to stand at room temperature for a few minutes before serving, but this time will be minimised if the sorbet is made less than a day before it will be served.
ingredients: strawberries, powdered sugar, dark rum, lime juice, mango sorbet, lime zest
name: mango sorbet with strawberry daiquiri sauce

steps: Mix beef, onion, salt and pepper well. Shape into oval patties. Brown patties, pour off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cove and cook on low for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: ground beef, saltine crackers, onion, egg, brown gravy mix
name: yummy salisbury steak

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Cut the tomatoes into strips. Sprinkle with basil, pepper, and salt. Top with veggies, and pats of butter or margarine. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 40 minutes, or until pork is fully cooked.
ingredients: onion, fresh okra, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, garlic, basil
name: tomokra stewed tomatoes and okra

steps: In a large bowl, dissolve orange juice in boilingn water. Stir in ice cream and orange juice until blended. Chill until partially set. Fold in oranges. Pour into two 6 cup ring molds coated with cooking spray. Refrigerate overnight or until firm. Just before serving, unmold.
ingredients: oranges, apricots in juice, artificial sweetener, gelatin, yogurt, egg whites, orange rind
name: orange and apricot mousse

steps: Combine dressing ingredients and heat until it comes to a boil. Let cool and refrigerate. Melt butter in frying pan. Brown broken noodles, almonds, and sesame seeds in butter. Set aside. Bring to a boil in a pan the vinegar, oil, sugar and soy sauce, just enough to dissolve the sugar. Cool dressing completely. Combine all ingredients and toss just before serving.
ingredients: red miso, sugar, mirin, water, light soy sauce, sesame oil, toasted sesame seeds, head iceberg lettuce, carrot
name: japanese salad dressing ii

steps: In a large saucepan, cook chicken and onions until chicken is no longer pink. Add taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, corn, and chiles. Cook over medium heat until chicken is no longer pink. Cook over medium heat until chicken is no
ingredients: spaghetti, onions, green pepper, butter, chicken, garlic salt, colby, cream of mushroom soup, milk, pepper
name: yummy and comforting chicken tetrazzini

steps: Heat oil with cornstarch in saucepan over medium heat. Cook for 1 minute. Add in chili powder and cook for another minute. Gradually stir in the broth, mixing well with a whisk to make sure you get out the lumps. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Simmer until thickened on low.
ingredients: vegetable oil, flour, chili powder, chicken stock, tomato sauce, dried oregano, ground cumin, salt
name: emeril s easy enchilada sauce

steps: Wrap onion wedges with bacon. Secure with long wooden picks. Place in a large shallow dish. Combine sugar, vinegar, and molasses. Drizzle over onion wedges. Cover and chill 1 hour. Remove onion wedges from marinade, reserving marinade. Grill, covered with grill lid, over medium-high heat 20 minutes or until onion wedges are crisp tender, turning and basting occasionally with reserved marinade.
ingredients: white pearl onions, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, water, sugar, salt
name: balsamic glazed pearl onions

steps: Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments.
ingredients: avocados, red onion, jalapeno pepper, roma tomato, lime, cumin, salt, pepper, garlic powder
name: fresh made guacamole

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan over high heat. When water comes to a rapid boil, turn off heat, put the tea bags into water and cover. After the tea has steeped about 1 hour, pour the sugar into a 2-quart pitcher, then add tea. The tea should still be warm so the sugar will dissolve easily. Add lemon juice. Chill. Makes 2 quarts.
ingredients: water, tea bag, chocolate syrup, splenda sugar substitute, non-dairy coffee creamer, whipped cream, ice
name: chocolate spice tea

steps: Combine milk, sugar, salt, half-and-half, vanilla extract, whipping cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries, blackberry, whipped cream, raspberries,
ingredients: milk, sugar, salt, half-and-half, vanilla extract, whipping cream, raspberries, blackberry
name: berrylicious ice cream

steps: In a 4-cup measuring cup, heat 4 cups water in microwave to boiling. Place tea bags in water and let steep for 5- 10 minutes. Pour sugar into 2 quart pitcher and pour hot tea over it. Squeeze tea bags to get out any remaining tea. Add tea to pitcher and discard bags. Stir well. Chill until very cold and serve over ice with lemon.
ingredients: instant coffee, sugar, water, milk
name: easy iced coffee

steps: Place eggplant slices on a greased or sprayed baking sheet. Brush with olive oil. Bake at 400 f for ten minutes. Whisk remaining ingredients together. Turn eggplant slices over and brush with glaze. Bake for 5 minutes. Bake for 5 minutes more.
ingredients: eggplant, olive oil, low sodium soy sauce, apple cider vinegar, brown sugar, smoked paprika, cumin, kosher salt, cantaloupe, toothpicks
name: smoky eggplant and melon wraps

steps: In a large saucepan, saute the onions and garlic in 3 tablespoons of oil for 5 minutes, until limp, then add the last tablespoon of oil and the potatoes and stir-fry for a minute. Add the stock, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes, until the potatoes are mushy. Remove from heat and puree. Return the soup to the pot, season with salt and cayenne, and stir in the chopped cilantro. You can serve the soup cold--or reheat by slowly bringing it to a simmer. Ladle into soup plates and top with a sprinkling of cilantro or chives.
ingredients: white onion, butter, carrots, potatoes, salt and pepper, vegetable stock, cilantro, red onion, jalapeno pepper, lime, juice of
name: carrot and cilantro soup

steps: Heat oil in saucepan. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until beans are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, escarole, low sodium chicken broth, cannellini beans, italian bread, red pepper flakes, parmesan cheese
name: escarole and bean soup

steps: In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato soup, water, tomato paste, red kidney beans, balsamic vinegar, dry chili pepper, cheddar cheese
name: chunky chili con carne

steps: In medium saucepan, combine chicken, soup, green beans, mushrooms, cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, seasoned croutonspreparation:In medium saucepan, combine chicken, soup, green beans, mushrooms, cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, seasoned croutonspreparation:In medium saucepan, combine chicken, soup, green beans, mushrooms, cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, seasoned croutonspreparation:In medium saucepan, combine chicken, soup, green beans, mushrooms, cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, seasoned croutonspreparation:In medium saucepan, combine chicken, soup, green beans, mushrooms, cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, seasoned croutonspreparation:In medium saucepan, combine chicken, soup, green beans, mushrooms, cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, seasoned croutonspreparation:In medium saucepan, combine chicken, soup, green beans, mushrooms, cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, seasoned croutonspreparation:In medium saucepan, combine chicken, soup, green beans, mushrooms, cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, seasoned cr
ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, cooked ham, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, monterey jack cheese, breadcrumbs
name: chicken cordon bleu over rice

steps: In a saucepan, heat corn syrup and brandy over medium heat. Bring to a boil. Add butter and oats. Lower heat and simmer until oats are tender, about 6 to 10 minutes. Place 2 tablespoons of cream and 1 tablespoon of brown sugar, and 1 tablespoon of drained raisins in 4 bowls. Add steaming cooked oats and top with fresh berries. Each person stirs their bowl to enjoy the hidden surprise waiting underneath.
ingredients: steel cut oats, salt, cinnamon stick, canned pumpkin puree, fresh blueberries
name: cinnamon pumpkin and blueberry oatmeal

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 heavy large baking sheets with silicone baking sheets or parchment paper. In a food processor, chop the parmesan, gruyere and rosemary together until coarsely chopped. Set the cheese mixture aside. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. Working with dough strip at a time, coat each strip with the olive oil and then the cheese mixture, pressing very gently. Twist each cheese covered dough strip and place onto prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the salt, if you wish. Bake until the breadsticks are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes. Transfer the warm breadsticks to a basket and serve.
ingredients: kasseri cheese, flour, olive oil, ouzo, oregano, lemon slice, kalamata olive, chopped tomato, pita bread
name: my saganaki

steps: Heat oil over medium high heat. Add tomatoes, mix well, cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the stock, rice, salt and pepper, mix well and bring to the boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the stock, rice, salt and pepper,
ingredients: tomatoes, cucumber, green onions, dried oregano, olive oil, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper
name: agourontomatosalata

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
ingredients: diced tomatoes, butter, evaporated milk, salt and pepper
name: 5 minute 2 tomato bisque

steps: Cook chops in oil. Add cumin, ground coriander, celery salt, pork chops and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 5 minutes. Add pork, cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in the soup, recover, and simmer for an additional 10-15 minutes. Stir in the soup, recover
ingredients: fennel seed, ground cumin, dried oregano, ground coriander, celery salt, pork chops
name: indian pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Butter six muffin cups. In a small saucepan, melt the butter and add the syrup. Remove the crusts from the bread. Flatten each slice with a rolling pin. Brush both sides of each slice with the syrup mixture. Put one slice into each cup and sprinkle the bacon pieces in the cups. Break an egg into each cup and bake until the eggs are set. Start checking after about 5 minutes. Lift the toast cups from the pan and serve immediately, drizzled with additional syrup, if desired.
ingredients: eggs, sausage meat, egg, fat, seasoned flour, breadcrumbs, salt & pepper
name: scotch eggs

steps: Whisk together bacon, shallots, garlic, brown sugar, orange juice, balsamic vinegar, grainy mustard, olive oil, salt and pepper. Whisk together bacon, shallots, garlic, brown sugar, orange juice, balsamic vinegar, grainy mustard, olive oil, salt and pepper. Whisk together bacon, shall
ingredients: bacon, shallots, garlic, brown sugar, orange juice, balsamic vinegar, grainy mustard, olive oil, salt
name: warm bacon vinaigrette

steps: In a medium saucepan, put apricot preserves, lemon juice, dijon mustard, ginger powder. Cook for 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Simmer the sauce for a few more minutes until the flavours blend. Serve with potatoes. Serves 2.
ingredients: kielbasa, apricot preserves, lemon juice, dijon mustard, ginger powder
name: polish appetizer

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add 1 tablespoon of batter in the bottom of each of the greased muffin cups. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style butter. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, sour cream, butter
name: southern living butter muffins

steps: Mix all ingredients together except for the parmesan cheese. Spread mixture in a shallo, medium-sized, ovenproof dish. Sprinkle the parmesan cheese on top. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees for about 30 minutes. Serve warm with crackers along side.
ingredients: cream cheese, picante sauce, baby shrimp, cracker
name: mamma s shrimp dip

steps: In large pot, bring 4 quarts salted water to a boil. Stir in collard greens. Cook 15 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Meanwhile, in skillet over medium-high heat, cook bacon 7 minutes, or until crisp, turning once. Drain bacon on paper towels. Cool and crumble. In skillet with bacon drippings, k cook garlic, leeks and peppers 2 minutes. Stir in cooked collard greens and cook 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Transfer mixture to serving platter. Top with crumbled bacon.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, jalapeno pepper, tomatoes, collard greens, bay leaves, thyme, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: collard greens with tomatoes and garlic

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic, onion, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, garlic
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, flank steak, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, garlic clove, red wine vinegar, oregano leaves, unsalted butter, mixed salad greens
name: flank steak w red wine vinegar and greens

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Combine the marian s hash browns, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, cheese, onions, margarine, soda crackers, salt, pepper, corn flakespreparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Combine the marian s
ingredients: hash browns, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, cheese, onions, margarine, soda crackers
name: marian s hash browns casserole super easy

steps: Place all ingredients in a roaster. Cover the roaster with plastic wrap and then foil to seal. Bake at 250 for 8 hours. Remove coverings and stir. Remove bone and cartilage as meat will have fallen off. Turn oven up to 350. Continue cooking for 1 hour stirring occasionally as the dish caramelizes. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: pork blade steaks, salt, pepper, onion, sauerkraut, dry white wine, paprika, garlic cloves
name: pork sauerkraut skillet

steps: In a large skillet add the sausage and cook until most of it is brown. Drain and return to pan. Add the grated potatoes, onion, and salt to the skillet. Cook on medium heat until the hashbrowns are golden brown. Push the mixture to one side of the pan and scramble the eggs in the empty space. Once cooked, stir them into the hashbrowns. Add the hot sauce, tomatoes, and cheese. Stir well and serve immediately.
ingredients: potatoes, yellow onion, eggs, salsa, jimmy dean sausage, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: scrumptious skillet breakfast

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: spinach, olive oil, garlic cloves, shallot, tomatoes, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: special spinach

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan, add onion and saute until soft. Remove seeds and rib of pepper, chop, add to saucepan and cook for 5 minutes. Add stock and thyme. Season with salt and simmer for about half an hour. Serve with cooked rice.
ingredients: beef, rump steak, onion, bay leaf, garlic cloves, white wine, salt and pepper, cooking oil, tomato puree, vinegar
name: carne estufada azorean beef casserole

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper and noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Simmer
ingredients: lean ground turkey, salt, black pepper, white onion, garlic powder, white mushrooms, pasta, creamy portabella mushroom soup, tofutti better-than-cream-cheese
name: sommer s stroganoff ibs safe

steps: Put apples and water in saucepan. Cover and bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Stir in sugar, cinnamon and cloves. Cook until all sugar is dissolved. Serve warm or let cool.
ingredients: baking apples, butter, halvah, white wine, cinnamon stick, whipped cream
name: baked apples stuffed with halvah

steps: Heat oil and butter in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat. When butter has melted, add half of the asparagus to the skillet with. Using tongs, distribute spears in an even layer. Cover skillet. Cook until asparagus is bright green and still crisp, about 5 minutes. Uncover, increase heat to high and season asparagus with salt and pepper to taste. Cook until spears are tender and well-browned along one side, 5 - 7 minutes, using tongs to occasionally move spears from the center of the pan to the edge of the pan to ensure all are browned. Transfer to serving dish, adjust seasonings as needed and, if desired, squeeze lemon over spears. Serve immediately.
ingredients: sliced almonds, asparagus spears, broccoli, zucchini, beans, snow peas, olive oil, balsamic vinegar
name: steamed greens with toasted almonds

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Prick the steamed new potatoes brussels sprouts and bake for about 1 hour. Cool on a rack for about 15 min. Meanwhile steam the steamed new potatoes brussels sprouts for 5 minutes. Slice each potato in half and gently scoop out most of the flesh leaving the shells in tact. In a blender or food processor, using the metal blade, combine the potato flesh, sour cream, broccoli, green onion, garlic, salt& pepper. Process until smooth. Spoon the potato mixture into potato shells. Place on a baking sheet. Bake until heated through about l5 to 20 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: new potato, brussels sprout, chicken broth, fresh ground pepper, fresh parsley, fresh chives
name: microwave steamed new potatoes brussels sprouts
