steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
ingredients: chicken breast halves, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, olive oil, dry white wine, salt & pepper
name: herb roasted chicken breasts

steps: Slice the tofu lengthwise into 4 rectangular slabs, than half each piece to get squares. Spread the sesame seeds on a plate. Press all surfaces of each tofu square into the seeds to coat. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet on medium heat. Arrange the tofu in a single layer and cook about 5 minutes carefully turn and cook 5 minutes on other side. Add soy sauce and tabasco, turn the squares over, and cook another minute. Transfer squares to a plate. Add the oil and garlic to the pan and saut for about 30 seconds, stirring constantly. Cook until wilted but still bright green. Season to taste with salt & pepper. Serve the tofu on top of the spinach.
ingredients: firm tofu, peanut sauce, spinach, cucumber
name: pan seared tofu with spicy peanut sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Spray a medium baking dish with the olive oil spray to coat. Place the halved tomatoes, cut side up, in a single layer in the prepared dish. Sprinkle with the sea salt and lightly spray with more olive oil spray. Bake for 40 minutes or until tomatoes are lightly browned and tender. Meanwhile, combine the vinegar, oil and garlic clove in a small bowl and set aside. Mix the herbs and feta together and set aside. Remove tomatoes from oven when cooked and place them on a serving platter and sprinkle with the combined herbs and feta. Drizzle with the dressing and freshly ground black pepper. Serve.
ingredients: tomatoes, olive oil, garlic clove, dried basil, oregano, salt and pepper
name: tomato salad insalata pomodoro

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken and cook, covered for 20 - 25 minutes or until nice and crispy and cooked through. Turn about 4 or 5 times to avoid burning. Drain on paper towels and serve hot with rice or noodles.
ingredients: sugar, soy sauce, white wine, water, garlic, chicken thighs
name: sticky chicken

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Pour 1 cup marinade into a large resealable plastic bag. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 5-7 minutes. Cover and refrigerate remaining marinade. Drain and discard marinade. On six- eight metal or soaked wooden skewers, alternately thread chicken and vegetables. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until chicken juices run clear, basting frequently with reserved marinade.
ingredients: beef, lemon juice, lite olive oil, honey, hot pepper, fresh ginger, soy sauce, allspice, cinnamon, clove
name: bbq caribbean beef kabobs

steps: In a large bowl or cork, toss the cabbage and peppers with the salt. Cover and let stand in a cool place for 8-12 hours. In a non-reactive saucepan, combine the sugar and vinegar. Bring to a boil, then let it cool. Rinse the cabbage, and drain it well. Pack the vegetable mixture firmly into pint mason jars. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables. Close the jars with hot two-piece caps. Process the jars for 20 minutes in a boiling water bath. Store the cooled jars in a cool, dry, dark place for at least 3 weeks before eating the cabbage.
ingredients: cabbage, white onion, carrot, red chilies, oregano, vinegar, boiling water, salt
name: curtido salvadorean pickled coleslaw

steps: Melt butter in soup pot. Saut in butter the leeks and onion until opaque. Add broth and potatoes--bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are cooked, stir to prevent burning. Add hummus, stir. Turn off heat and immediately add white wine, stir. Add pepper to taste and serve.
ingredients: ramps, potatoes, butter, kosher salt, water, milk, bouillon cubes, pepper
name: potato and wild leek soup

steps: Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Add 1 cup of flour or enough to make a thick batter. Beat two minutes with an electric mixer. Beat another 2 minutes. Add more flour to make a soft dough. Knead 8-10 minutes. Form into loaves and place in greased loaf pans. Let rise until doubled. Bake at 400f for 30 minutes.
ingredients: flour, sugar, salt, yeast, whipping cream, water, butter
name: ted s special mini loaves white bread bread machine

steps: Place coconut milk in a 1-quart measure. Add whole milk to make 3 cups. Pour coconut milk into a saucepan and add tapioca, sugar and egg. Stir gently just to combine, then let set 5 minutes. Over medium heat, bring tapioca mixture slowly to a full boil, stirring constantly with a rubber or wooden spatula. At the boil, remove from heat. Fold in fruit of choice. Pour into ramekins, dessert bowls, or lidded containers. Cool 20 minutes. Stir tapioca well in each container, then chill. Tapioca will thicken as it cools.
ingredients: coconut milk, milk, sugar, sweetened flaked coconut, quick-cooking tapioca, egg, vanilla extract, coconut extract
name: coconut tapioca pudding

steps: In a large skillet, saute dilly sole in hot olive oil until softened. Add garlic, cook for 2-3 minutes. Add dilly sole, mix well, let cook another 2-3 minutes. Meanwhile, preheat oven to 375f. Rince dilly sole under cold water, pat dry with a paper towel. Place dilly sole in a deep baking dish. Pour dilly sole over filets. Cook for 15-20 minutes, or until fish flakes easily.
ingredients: sole fillet, mayonnaise, salt, fresh ground black pepper, whole wheat bread, garlic, butter, fresh dill, lemon, zest of
name: dilly sole

steps: Wash the gooseberries and put them in a saucepan with the water. Cover the pot and bring to a boil, stirring gently, until the gooseberries are all popped. Press them through a sieve, and reserve the puree. Discard the skins, stems and seeds. Gently rinse the raspberries and drain them well. Mix the gooseberries and sugar in a large pot. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until the gooseberries are all popped. Press them through a sieve
ingredients: gooseberries, water, sugar, lemon, juice of
name: gooseberry jam

steps: Combine peach and raspberry jam in a large bowl. Stir in sugar and lemon juice. Let stand for 10 minutes. In a small saucepan, bring water and pectin to a boil. Boil for one minute, stirring constantly. Add to fruit mixture. Stir for 3 minutes. Ladle into freezer containers. Cool to room temperature, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: peaches, sugar, liquid fruit pectin, lemon juice
name: peach freezer jam

steps: Place chicken, carrots, celery, yellow onions, parsnip, bouquet garni, salt and pepper in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 5 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Remove from heat and add to pot. Simmer for 5 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Remove from heat and
ingredients: chicken, carrots, celery, yellow onions, parsnip, bouquet garni, salt and pepper
name: bubbe s chicken soup

steps: In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch, vanilla, salt, cinnamonpreparation:In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the vanilla wafer
ingredients: vanilla wafer, butter, marshmallows, milk, frozen raspberries, whipping cream, cornstarch
name: raspberry delight pie

steps: Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: red potatoes, onion powder, salt, prepared horseradish, cream cheese, sour cream
name: red skin mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease 9 x 5 x3 inch loaf pans, or 1 large one. Stir sugar, butter, eggs, bananas and buttermilk in large bowl. Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in blueberries, pour into pan. Bake large pan for 75 minutes, smaller pan from 55-60 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes, remove from pan onto wire rack, cool 2 hours before slicing.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, shortening, sugar, eggs, bananas, fresh raspberries
name: banana raspberry bread

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Add pasta, and cook until pasta is tender, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add salt, pepper, red pepper, and black pepper. Toss gently then sprinkle with cheese.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, spaghetti squash, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: skillet spaghetti squash

steps: Mix all ingredients except the corn syrup. Cook until mixture reaches 270 degrees, or brittle ball. Take off heat and stir in vanilla. Pour over the popcorn, and stir lightly and quickly to coat. Shape into small balls and then wrap in wax paper.
ingredients: granola cereal, sweetened coconut, popcorn, brown sugar, light corn syrup, butter, smooth peanut butter
name: granola coconut popcorn balls

steps: Heat oil in large skillet. Brown the ground beef. Add the peppers and onions. Drain off any fat. Stir in pasta sauce, 2 tbs. Parmesan, oregano, 1 cup mozzarella, and pasta. Put mixture in a 13x9 baking dish. Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella and parmesan. Bake uncovered 30 minutes until hot and bubbly.
ingredients: ground beef, green pepper, onion, garlic clove, garden vegetable spaghetti sauce, salt, pepper, mostaccioli noodles, velveeta reduced fat cheese product, parmesan cheese
name: mostaccioli

steps: Cream butter and sugar. Mix in vanilla, buttermilk, baking soda, vanilla extract, almond extract, vanilla extract, almond extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, vanilla extract, extract, vanilla extract,
ingredients: chocolate cake mix, cheerios toasted oat cereal, miniature marshmallows, semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, sweetened condensed milk
name: mom s cheerios bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease 9 x 13 glass pan. Drain and mix peaches, cinnamon, nutmeg, sugar and 3 tablespoons flour. Add to pan. Mix rest of flour, oats and brown sugar. Sprinkle butter mixture over peaches. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. Best served warm with whipped or ice cream.
ingredients: butter, dark brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, dark rum, peach schnapps, peaches, vanilla ice cream
name: peaches foster

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Pour the melted butter into the bottom of the baking dish, then sprinkle with garlic powder, then parmesan cheese. In a large bowl toss the potato halves in olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Place the potatoes cut-side down over the parmesan cheese in the baking dish. Bake for about 40-45 minutes, or until tender.
ingredients: red potatoes, kosher salt, half-and-half, unsalted butter, sour cream, parmesan cheese, fresh ground black pepper
name: parmesan smashed potatoes

steps: Place cauliflower on a platter, cover with water and salt lightly. Bring to a boil and cook until easily pierced with a skewer, about 20 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving plate. Mix oil, vinegar, salt and pepper, pour over potatoes and cauliflower, breaking them up a bit as you do. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cauliflower, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: simply roasted cauliflower

steps: In a large mixing bowl, stir together all ingredients except buns. Have 12 pieces of aluminum foil ready. Partially hollow out centers of buns. Fill each bun with hot dog mixture. Wrap in aluminium foil, sealing securely. Place on a cookie sheet and bake in a preheated 375 degree fahrenheit oven for 20 minutes or place on top rack of outdoor grill. Cover grill and grill for 15 to 20 minutes.
ingredients: refrigerated cornbread twists dough, hot dogs, butter, parmesan cheese
name: corn dog twists

steps: In a medium saucepan, heat butter over medium-high heat. Add butter and sauté until melted. Add guinness stout and sauté until thickened. Add salt and pepper and cook until thickened. Add
ingredients: carrots, unsalted butter, guinness stout, salt, sugar
name: guinness carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally.
ingredients: chicken, extra virgin olive oil, fresh rosemary, lemon, fresh lemon rind, salt, black pepper
name: roast chicken with rosemary lemon salt

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. Press a slice of ham into each muffin cup. Evenly distribute spinach between muffins cups. Evenly distribute cheese between muffin cups. Crack 1 egg to each muffin cup. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25 min or until done.
ingredients: eggs, cream cheese, deli ham, salsa
name: eggs with cream cheese and ham

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Thaw spinach according to package directions. Drain well. Chop up artichoke hearts. Add all ingredients in a medium sized casserole dish. Bake in middle oven rack for 25 to 30 minutes, or until slightly golden and bubbly. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, spinach, artichoke hearts, mozzarella cheese, nacho chip
name: jamies spinach artichoke dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain cabbage well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix corn flakes, butter, cabbage, onion, salt, pepper, cream of mushroom soup, milk, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of mushroom
ingredients: corn flakes, butter, cabbage, onion, salt, pepper, cream of mushroom soup, milk, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese
name: crusty crunchy cheddar cabbage casserole

steps: Bring 2 cups of water to boil in a large saucepan. Add noodles and vegetables. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium-
ingredients: cooking spray, boneless skinless chicken breast, ground ginger, salt & pepper, water, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, frozen mixed vegetables, stir-fry sauce
name: asian chicken noodles with vegetables

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain, rince, and cover to keep warm if serving warm. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat. Add applebee s three cheese chicken penne
ingredients: chicken breasts, italian dressing, penne pasta, alfredo sauce, cheese, tomatoes, basil, garlic cloves, olive oil
name: applebee s three cheese chicken penne

steps: Melt butter over low heat in large saucepan. Add flour, heat until bubbly. Add milk and light cream. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add cheese, salt and parsley. Toss with pasta and serve with garlic toast.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, garlic salt, milk, mozzarella cheese, ground black pepper
name: easy alfredo sauce

steps: In a saucepan, combine cream and 1 cup sugar. Cook and stir constantly over low heat until candy thermometer reads 160 or steam rises from pan. Stir in gelatin until dissolved. Add extracts. Cool 10 minutes. Whisk in sour cream. Pour into eight dessert glasses or small bowls. Chill at least 1 hour. Before serving, combine raspberries and remaining sugar. Spoon over each serving.
ingredients: fresh mint leaves, vodka, sugar, water
name: creme de menthe dairy free

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Wash, dry potatoes, bake until soft. About 45-60 minutes. Cut a slice from the top of each potato being careful not to break skin. Scoop out insides. Mash well. Beat in sour cream, cheese, salt and pepper. If necessary, add more sour cream to make light and fluffy. Stir in onions. Spoon mixture back into shells. Place potatoes on a baking sheet. Dust tops with paprika and return to oven until lightly browned.
ingredients: potatoes, light sour cream, leek, onion, skim milk, part-skim mozzarella cheese
name: stuffed potato

steps: Preheat oven 350. Line 12 muffin cups with paper liners or spray with pam. Measure yogurt into medium bowl and mix in baking soda, it will foam and it is supposed too. Set aside. In a large bowl beat together sugar, eggs and oil. Add bran and vanilla. In a separate bowl mix together flour and baking powder. Gradually add the flour and yogurt mixtures alternately to the sugar mixture. Fold in blueberries. Bake 20-35 minutes. Makes 12 very large muffins or 18 large muffins.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, orange juice, oil, vanilla, low-fat vanilla yogurt, blueberries
name: blueberry yogurt muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat coca cola rice. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and coca cola rice is toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool.
ingredients: vegetable oil, long-grain white rice, salt, coca-cola, raisins, slivered almonds
name: coca cola rice

steps: Mix all ingredients with a fork. Bake for 10 minutes.
ingredients: yeast, sugar, water, salt, oil, vinegar, flour, wheat germ
name: homemade buns

steps: In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder
ingredients: hamburger, onion, heinz 57 steak sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, rolls
name: aunt mag s spoonburgers

steps: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Divide mixture in half and place each half on a sheet of plastic wrap. Draw up the sides of the plastic wrap tightly around each ball and firmly secure. Refrigerate 6-8 hours or until firm. Remove plastic wrap and roll in nuts before serving.
ingredients: cream cheese, onion, green bell pepper, celery, dill pickle, cherries, lemon pepper, garlic powder, parsley flakes, crushed pineapple
name: cheese ball maximus

steps: In a large skillet melt butter over medium-low heat. Add onion and cook about 15 minutes or until onion gets soft and starts to brown, stirring occasionally. Stir in garlic powder. Remove from skillet. Place a tortilla in the same skillet. Arrange cheese slices across the whole tortilla. On one side of each tortilla, put the roast beef and top the other side with onions. Cook over medium-low heat until lightly browned. Carefully fold tortillas in half, pressing gently. Keep warm in the oven until remaining quesadillas are cooked. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: beef, creole seasoning, onion powder, garlic powder, black pepper, monterey jack pepper cheese, feta cheese, flour tortillas, nonstick cooking spray, sour cream
name: beef pepper jack quesadillas

steps: Place each chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place bag in a resealable bag. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink.
ingredients: coriander seeds, caraway seeds, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic powder, kosher salt, boneless skinless chicken breast
name: easy tunsian grilled chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeos and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving.
ingredients: boil-in-the-bag brown rice, pam cooking spray, onion, green bell pepper, garlic, chili powder, jalapenos, fresh coarse ground black pepper, diced tomatoes
name: sayas easy low fat and calorie spanish rice

steps: Drain and press tofu. Cut tofu lenthwise into two pieces. Coat pan with cooking spray and heat over medium heat. Add tofu to pan and sprinkle liberally with cajun seasoning. Cook until crispy and browned. Serve on toasted bread with mustard, baby spinach leaves and red onion slices.
ingredients: garlic cloves, gingerroot, extra firm tofu, tamari
name: sandwich tofu

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp.
ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, minced garlic clove, dried oregano, dried parsley, salt and pepper, crushed red pepper flakes
name: baked in oven garlic potato wedges

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In 13x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle graham cracker crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars.
ingredients: unsalted butter, graham cracker crumbs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, walnuts, coconut
name: coconut bar cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and cool 15 minutes. Remove from oven and cool 15
ingredients: cookie dough, salted peanuts, miniature marshmallow, semi-sweet chocolate chips, caramel ice cream topping
name: rocky road cookie pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Pat the salmon fillets dry. Brush with melted butter. Combine the seasonings in a small bowl and mix. Sprinkle the seasonings over the salmon and press down gently. On a lightly greased baking sheet, bake for 20-25 minutes. I typically line the baking sheet with foil for easy cleanup.
ingredients: salmon fillets, old bay seasoning, pepper, canola oil, whole grain bread, mayonnaise, bacon, iceberg lettuce leaves, tomatoes
name: double decker salmon club sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender.
ingredients: pumpkin, flour, dried basil, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, garlic clove, olive oil
name: pumpkin or butternut squash tian

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: baby carrots, oil, salt, orange marmalade, fresh ginger, water
name: orange roasted baby carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine flour, sugar, butter, milk, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, evaporated milkpreparation:Beat flour mixture in large bowl, low speed for 30 seconds, scraping sides of bowl, then at high speed for 5 minutes, scrape occasionally. In separate bowl, mix flour, baking powder and salt. Beat flour mixture into sugar mixture alternately with milk on low speed. Spread into pan. Bake in 2 loaf pans for approx 55 minutes at 350 degrees.
ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, milk, eggs, vanilla extract
name: 2 step pound cake for a kitchen aide mixer

steps: Wash cucumbers well, and cook in boiling salted water until tender. Slice cucumbers into julienne strips and set aside. Place all pickling ingredients into a pan and bring to boil when boiling bring back mixture to a simmer for about 5 minutes and then strain mixture. Spoon cucumbers into hot sterilized jars, and top with the vinegar mixture. Seal jars, and store in a cool place.
ingredients: baking soda, water, fresh figs, sugar, vinegar, cinnamon, ground cloves, lemons
name: fig pickles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Make a paste with hoagie rolls, pizza sauce, cooked pork, italian salad dressing, mozzarella cheese, salt and pepper. Place in shallow roasting pan on a rack. Rub seasoned hoagie rolls over the pork. Bake for 45 minute and check temp with meat thermometer. Continue roasting until the internal temp is 155-160 degrees. Remove from oven and allow to rest about 10 min before slicing.
ingredients: hoagie rolls, pizza sauce, cooked pork, italian salad dressing, mozzarella cheese, salt and pepper
name: italian pork hoagies

steps: In a medium skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, jelly, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the maple syrup mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving.
ingredients: carrots, fresh orange juice, orange, rind of, maple syrup, mace, butter
name: maple glazed carrots

steps: In pan, brown chops both sides in oil then transfer to crockpot. Add garlic to drippings in pan, cook and stir about 1 min or until golden brown. Stir in soy sauce, broth, brown sugar, chili pepper flakes and cook and stir until dissolved. Pour over chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Serve over white rice or with a boxed oriental style rice.
ingredients: butter, pork chops, onions, green peppers, hominy, cream of mushroom soup, milk, salt
name: oven pork chops with hominy

steps: Bake pie crust according to directions and let cool. Combine all remaining ingredients in a large pot and heat to a simmer, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove pan from burner and place a piece of plastic wrap directly on top of chocolate filling. Let pan stand until cool. Spoon filling into pie crust. Serve with whipped cream.
ingredients: sugar, half-and-half, instant coffee, semi-sweet chocolate chips, whipping cream, salt, rum, eggs, unbaked pie shell
name: deluxe chocolate pie

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, water, dried oregano, potatoes, baby carrots, chicken breast halves, paprika
name: herb roasted chicken vegetables

steps: Drain pineapple juice and reserve. Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate until fully set, about 1 hour. For topping, in a small mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese, sour cream, sugar and vanilla. Carefully spread over gelatin. Sprinkle with walnuts. Cover and refrigerate until firm.
ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, hot water, crushed pineapple, blueberry pie filling, whipped topping
name: purple lady salad

steps: In a large bowl combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Stir until blended. In a medium bowl, place the egg yolks, cream, and butter. Whisk until stiff, then fold them gently into the batter. Cook until waffles are golden, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: butter, honey mustard, waffles, ham, smoked turkey, swiss cheese, cranberry sauce
name: wafflewiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeos and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving.
ingredients: quick-cooking brown rice, button mushroom, fresh snow pea, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, rice vinegar, low sodium soy sauce, salt and pepper
name: japanese brown rice

steps: Put the bread cubes in a greased 13x9 inch baking dish. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and vanilla. Pour egg mixture evenly over the bread cubes. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours or overnight. Remove from refrigerator 20 minutes before baking. Preheat oven to 350. Bake, uncovered, for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. Serve with maple syrup, if desired.
ingredients: cinnamon-swirl bread, cream cheese, egg, milk, maple syrup, cinnamon
name: cinnamon bread morning casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 baking sheets with parchment. Whisk the sugar, egg whites, semisweet chocolate, vanilla and salt in a large bowl. Toss the coconut with the egg mixture until completely coated. Moisten your finger. Form about 1 heaping tablespoon of the batter into pointed mounds or pyramids on the prepared pans, spacing them about 1-inch apart. Bake until the edges are golden brown and the entire macaroon is nicely toasted and dry, 16 to 20 minutes. Transfer to a rack to cool.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, vanilla extract, sugar, egg whites, coconut
name: my favorite chocolate macaroons

steps: Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a large skillet on medium heat and brown the rice on both sides for about 1 minute per side. Remove the rice to a plate. In the same skillet, heat the other tbsp of oil and add the onions, garlic, and chopped chipotle peppers. Saute the vegetables until the onions are soft, about 2 or 3 minutes. Add the chops back to the skillet and keep the heat on low. Stir in the oregano, cumin, and adobo sauce. Stir all together and heat through, about 2 or 3 more minutes. Stir in
ingredients: chipotle chile in adobo, adobo sauce, chili seasoning mix, sea salt, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, tomato sauce, jasmine rice, water, butter
name: spicy chili chipotle rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Take all ingredients except for salt and paprika and combine in small bowl. Vary amount of chili powder depending on desired level of spice. Take chicken and lightly coat both sides with olive oil. Place chicken in oven-safe dish and rub both sides heavily with ingredients previously mixed. Pour a little bit more olive oil into the bottom of the dish, enough so that it is lightly covered. Cook for roughly 35-45 minutes. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Shred chicken from the bones, and return to crockpot. Serve on hamburger buns.
ingredients: salt, paprika, cayenne pepper, onion powder, dried thyme, white pepper, garlic powder, pepper, chicken, onion
name: slow cooker sticky chicken

steps: Place shrimp in a large bowl and mix with electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Add salt and pepper to taste. Mix well. Serve over ice cubes or crushed ice.
ingredients: shrimp, coconut milk, fresh lime juice, pineapple juice, dark rum, fresh cilantro, garlic clove, salt, black pepper, steamed rice
name: pina colada shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, butter, garlic clove, bread, provolone cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, asiago cheese
name: italian four cheese grilled cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, and crushed pineapple. Mix well. Pour batter into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: fresh pineapple, maple syrup, rum, butter, whipped cream
name: bbq baked pineapple

steps: Preheat oven to 350f and spray a baking sheet with pam cooking spray. Put all the dry ingredients into a ziplock bag and shake to combine. Remove chicken from the ziplock bag and shake off any excess buttermilk and add to the breadcrumb mix, add 3 pieces at a time and shake to coat the chicken. Remove and place on baking sheet. Repeat till all pieces are coated. Spray chicken with pam cooking spray and bake for about 20 minutes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, low-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, plain breadcrumbs, dried rosemary, paprika, garlic powder, salt, pepper
name: crispy oven baked chicken breasts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook spaghetti and chicken separately - set aside. Mix broth, mushroom soup and tomatoes. Grease casserole dish with cooking spray. Layer ingredients - spaghetti, kraft singles, chichen, ricotta, tomatoe mixture. Make two layers. Bake 35 minutes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, water, extra virgin olive oil, spaghetti, onion, sliced mushrooms, frozen broccoli, rotel tomatoes, velveeta cheese
name: easy cheesy chicken spaghetti

steps: Place all ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until reduced to a chunky sauce, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat, cool, and refrigerate until needed. You can also freeze in ice cube trays. Keep frozen cubes in a plastic bag so you can remove one portion at a time.
ingredients: pear, ice, cinnamon, apple juice, milk
name: pear smoothie

steps: Place the tofu in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer 5 minutes. Drain well. Chill uncovered in the refrigerator until cool enough to handle. Crumble tofu into a food processor and add remaining ingredients. Blend until a very thick, smooth paste forms, stopping to scrape down the sides of the work bowl as necessary. Cover and chill several hours or overnight in order to allow the flavors to blend before serving. Keeps 5 to 7 days in the refrigerator.
ingredients: firm tofu, vegan sweet and sour sauce, pineapple juice, pineapple chunk, tamari soy sauce, rice vinegar
name: pineapple tofu

steps: Mix everything together in a slow cooker except chicken. Lay chicken on top and cover. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 3-4 hours. 30 minutes before serving, remove chicken and shred. Return chicken to slow cooker and stir together. Top with cheese, sour cream, or tortilla chips, if desired.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, corn, black beans, diced tomatoes, taco seasoning mix, fat free sour cream
name: southwestern taco chicken 5 ww points

steps: In a saucepan, combine dark chocolate, butter, eggs, egg yolks, caster sugar, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, creme fraiche. Reduce heat to medium low and add dark chocolate. Cook, stirring, another 3 minutes. Remove from heat and cool 5 minutes. Add dark chocolate. Pour into dessert dishes and serve or lay plastic on pudding surface and refrigerate.
ingredients: dark chocolate, butter, eggs, egg yolks, caster sugar, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, creme fraiche
name: soft centred chocolate puddings

steps: In a large bowl, combine yogurt, milk, berry yogurt and ice cubes. Blend on high speed or ice crush setting for 30-60 seconds, or until smooth. Stir in the honey, if desired. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately.
ingredients: nonfat milk, nonfat berry yogurt, vanilla instant breakfast drink mix, ice cube
name: yummy yogurt smoothie

steps: Place the pork in a large pot with water to cover. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain well. Add the reserved liquid and cook over medium until it glazes.
ingredients: country-style pork ribs, chili, roasted garlic cloves, oregano, spicy brown mustard, chili flakes, celery ribs, dry sherry, hot smoked paprika, russet potatoes
name: hotsy totsy country ribs

steps: Rinse lentils and add to the pan with water. Bring to the boil and then reduce to a simmer for 15 minutes. Spoon off any scum or froth from the surface. Add the carrot and ginger and continue to cook for a further 15 minutes. Mix the miso paste in half a cup of water until smooth and pour into the soup. Return to the boil then turn off. Serve immediately.
ingredients: red lentil, water, carrot, frozen orange juice concentrate, wasabi powder, gingerroot, soymilk, salt, rice vinegar
name: orange ginger red lentils

steps: Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla, walnutspreparation:Combine sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butters
ingredients: sugar, butter, evaporated milk, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, almonds, vanilla
name: spiced pumpkin fudge

steps: Boil the beets until tender. When beets are cool enough to handle, peel, dice, and place in a salad bowl. Stir in garlic, cilantro, chives, olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper. Chill for at least 1 hour. Stir, sprinkle with parsley and serve.
ingredients: beets, garlic, olive oil, feta cheese, ripe olives, fresh dill, rice wine vinegar, salt and pepper, tabasco sauce
name: roasted beet salad with olives and feta

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: vegetable shortening, baking powder, cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, milk, egg
name: skillet cornbread ii

steps: In a large container, combine cucumbers and onions. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients, stirring, until sugar is dissolved. Pour over cucumber mixture. Mix well. Cover and chill overnight. May be refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: rye bread, cucumbers, beefsteak tomatoes, red onions, avocado, lemon juice, alfalfa sprout, honey mustard, green leaf lettuce
name: tomato cucumber avocado sandwich

steps: Heat oven to 350. Lay chips on oven safe platter. You will be layering this so split them. Warm beans and chili on stove or in microwave. Stir beans until smooth. Spread beans over tortillas. Top with onion, cheese, jalepenos, chili and cheddar cheese. Repeat by layering tortilla chips and toppings until gone. Place in oven and bake until cheese is melted. Dollop with sour cream. Add to shrimp mixture and toss to coat. Place about a tablespoon of the shrimp mixture into each tortilla scoop and place on baking sheets. Bake at 350 for 5-10 minutes or until cheese is melted. Serve warm.
ingredients: nacho chips, monterey jack cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, black olives, jalapeno pepper, tomatoes, tabasco sauce, salsa
name: extra tasty nacho chips and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees fahrenheit. Drain the berries and reserve the syrup from one can. Stir the syrup in to the combined mixture of the cornstarch and half of the sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat. Gently stir in remaining sugar, blueberries, and lemon juice. Let stand while preparing pastry. Line a 9-inch pie pan with pastry and fill with the filling. Dot with butter or margarine. Adjust top crust on pie, cuttin slits for the steam to escape, and seal. I recommend adding some sugar over the top after sealing. Bake for 30 minutes or until filling is bubbly and crust is brown.
ingredients: blueberries, light brown sugar, lemon, juice of, cinnamon, cornstarch, cold water, pie crust
name: blueberry pie a la dr weil

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll crescent rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked shrimp, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: cream cheese, shrimp, parmesan cheese, milk, crescent rolls, egg, water
name: shrimp crescents

steps: Beat cream cheese, sugar, lime zest, lime juice, and vanilla with a mixer on medium until well blended. Add eggs. Mix just until blended. Pour into crust. Bake at 350f for 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool. Refrigerate 3 hours or overnight. Garnish with cool whip and lime slices.
ingredients: cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, frozen whipped topping, key lime juice, graham cracker pie crust, key lime zest
name: easy creamy key lime pie

steps: Heat olive oil in heavy skillet over medium high heat. Saute shrimp for 2 minutes or just until opaque. Reduce heat and add garlic and salt. Saute for 1 minute until garlic is soft. Remove from heat and toss with orange zest. Serve with crusty bread.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, spanish onion, garlic cloves, hot chili peppers, fennel bulb, tomatoes, dry white wine, water, salt, jumbo shrimp
name: shrimp in crazy water

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken in a large pan lined with foil and sprayed with pam. Sprinkle with lemon, then with granulated beef bouillon, and then the parsley flakes. Top with a generous chunk or chunks of butter. Bake uncovered at 375 degrees for 60-75 minutes or until tender. Check after 60 minutes. Baste occasionally while baking and before serving.
ingredients: water, lemon, sugar, salt, boneless chicken breasts
name: quick easy chicken brine

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, dijon mustard, bourbon, fresh lime juice, salt, ground allspice, ground black pepper, dark brown sugar
name: pork tenderloin piquant

steps: Heat egg and water to cover in small saucepan to boiling. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 10 minutes. Meanwhile, trim large stems from spinach. Rinse thoroughly and drain. Run cool water over egg, then peel. Rub salad bowl with garlic. Mash egg in bowl with fork. Add oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Beat with fork to blend. Add spinach to vinaigrette and toss to coat.
ingredients: dijon mustard, white wine vinegar, honey, olive oil, baby spinach, crouton, hard-boiled egg, bacon, butter, salt and pepper
name: spinach salad with bacon egg and crouton

steps: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add to the skillet the cabbage, carrots, onion and brown sugar. Cook, stirring often, for about 10-12 minutes until the veggies are well-browned and softened. Remove from heat and stir in the soy sauce, vinegar and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: cabbage, lean ground beef, potato, carrot, onion, egg, tomato sauce, lemon juice, brown sugar, water
name: sweet and sour stuffed cabbage

steps: In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad.
ingredients: old fashioned oats, butter, parmesan cheese, wheat germ, dried oregano, dried thyme, seasoning salt
name: salad topping

steps: Melt peanut butter, sugar and honey in a large saucepan. Boil fast for 4 minutes, it will turn a golden colour. Mix in the puffed rice, then press into a 8inch square tin lined with foil. Cut into squares while still warm, then allow to cool. Make your own imaginative additions, like chopped nuts etc. Kids love these for a snack or in their lunchbox.
ingredients: crispy rice cereal, chocolate chips, creamy peanut butter, powdered sugar
name: chocolate peanut butter crunch

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare cake mix according to package directions, using the eggs, water, and oil. Spoon batter into 24 paper-lined muffin pan cups, filling two-thirds full. Remove 24 cherries from cherry pie filling and set aside. Spoon generous teaspoon of remaining cherry filling onto center of each cupcake. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry.
ingredients: cherry chip cake mix, eggs, butter, chocolate chips, cherry pie filling, walnuts, powdered sugar, water
name: double cherry dessert

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Grease bottom only of 13x9x2 pan with shortening. Do not flour. Beat cake mix, sour cream, oil, almond extract and egg whites in large bowl with electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds. Beat on medium speed 2 minutes. Stir in chopped cherries and chocolate chips. Pour into pan. Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until cake springs back when touched lightly in center. Cool completely, about 1 hour. Spread frosting over top of cake. Store loosely covered at room temperature.
ingredients: miniature marshmallows, cherry pie filling, white cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs
name: cherry marshmallow magic cake

steps: With an electric mixer cream the butter & sugar in a large bowl. Add the eggs one at a time until well blended. Add the almond extract. In a separate bowl combine the flour, baking soda, & salt. Gradually beat flour mixture into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir in white chocolate chips & almonds. Drop cookies in heaping tablespoonfuls about 1-inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet & bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes or until cookies are lightly browned. Let cookies cool on cookie sheet for 2 minutes then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely. These cookies freeze well.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, almond extract, flour, baking powder, cream of tartar, salt, powdered sugar, half-and-half
name: pink sweeties pretty pink almond cookies

steps: Combine sugar, cream, baking soda, butter, vanilla, nuts in a large saucepan. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil for 7 minutes or until softball stage. Remove pan from heat and stir in white chocolate until melted. Add marshmallow cream and walnuts. Beat by hand until completely blended. Spread into a greased 9x9 inch baking pan. Cool at room temperature.
ingredients: sugar, cream, baking soda, butter, vanilla, nuts
name: burnt sugar fudge

steps: Spray crock pot with cooking spray. Layer ingredients in order as listed, except pepper rice stuffing. Drizzle olive oil over all the vegetables. Cook 6 hours on low.
ingredients: acorn squash, long grain rice, carrot, green bell pepper, garlic cloves, turmeric, water, vegetable broth, nonfat sour cream, fresh parsley
name: crock pot acorn squash with pepper rice stuffing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a small bowl combine sugar, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, creamy peanut butter, egg, semi-sweet chocolate chips, roasted peanutspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl combine sugar-soda-salt-mix, egg and vanilla until well combined. Fold in chocolate chips and roasted peanuts. With moistened hands, roll dough, about 1 heaping tablespoon at a time, into balls. Place 2 inches apart on two baking sheets. Bake for about 12-14 minutes. Cookies will still be slightly soft, but firm up while cooling. Allow to set on baking sheet for a couple of minutes and then transfer to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: creamy peanut butter, white sugar, egg, baking soda, salt
name: gourmet magazine s easy peanut butter cookies

steps: Brown meat in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Drain fat. Stir in seasoning mix and water. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Spoon into warmed taco shells. Serve with assorted toppings.
ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning mix, corn chips, lettuce, cheddar cheese, salsa, sour cream
name: tacos in a bag

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot.
ingredients: sugar, eggs, apricot jam, cake flour, salt, bicarbonate of soda, vinegar, butter, milk, water
name: easy malva pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour two baking pans and set aside. Mash banana and set aside. Combine cake mix and baking soda in the large bowl of an electric mixer. Add the rest of the ingredients and beat on low speed until combined. Beat at medium speed for 4-5 minutes. Divide batter between the two pans and bake 30-35 minutes or until center of cake springs back with lightly tapped. Allow to cool on a wire rack and frost.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, banana
name: banana bundt cake

steps: Mix the cheese and onions in a bowl. Add mayonnaise to desired creamyness. Add pepper and salt, finely diced spring onion and finely diced onion in quantities that suit you. You may omit the red leicester and mozzarella cheese and use only cheddar or similarly strong cheese. This tastes best if made the day before and not served straight from the fridge. Can be used as filler for sandwiches and baked potato, but is also gorgeous as a dip for vegetable crudities.
ingredients: cheese, sweet white onions, scallions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, bread, bacon, butter
name: british style cheese and onion sandwich for 2

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Stir in garlic, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are tender, about 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in garlic, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until potatoes
ingredients: spam, onion, garlic clove, water, white rice, fresh parsley, bay leaf, pepper, ground red pepper
name: island spam

steps: Combine first 4 ingredients. Pour into 2-9 inch greased and floured layer cake pans. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. Cool. Combine instant pudding and crushed pineapple. Put in refrigerator for an hour. When ready to ice, fold in whipped topping. Frost layers and top and sides of cake.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, water, oil, eggs, vanilla ice cream, bananas, maraschino cherries, pineapple topping, hot fudge topping
name: over the top sundae cake

steps: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add soy sauce, water, sugar, ginger, garlic, mirin, water and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add ginger and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add ginger and sauté until fragrant
ingredients: soy sauce, fresh lemon juice, mirin, water
name: lemon soy dipping sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Spray a quiche dish with nonstick cooking spray. Mix mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, garlic cloves, salt and black pepper in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to blend. Spread mashed potato mixture evenly into the quiche dish. Arrange the frozen potato wedges in a spoke wheel fashion on top of the mashed potatoes. For curly fries, make a random pattern, breaking in half any large fries. Sprinkle with bacon bits, green onion and parmesan cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve.
ingredients: boiling potatoes, butter, onion, sour cream, eggs, cream, salt and pepper, fresh herbs, parmesan cheese
name: potato souffle

steps: Cook cauliflower till tender and separate and chop into tiny pieces. Beat the eggs. Add bisquick, cheese, garlic powder and cauliflower until blended. Heat oil to coat and large frying pan. Drop spoonfuls of cauliflower mixture into the pan allowing room for patties to spread. Serve these as an appetizer or a side dish with zucchini sticks, stuffed mushrooms, etc.
ingredients: cauliflower, broccoli, bacon, olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, parmesan cheese
name: oven roasted cauliflower and broccoli with bacon

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, and lime juice and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lime juice and remaining 2 cups of water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with lime slices, if desired.
ingredients: lime, sprite, sugar, honey, water
name: guatemalan limeade

steps: Put custard in a large bowl. In a large bowl, beat 1 tablespoon of sugar and 1 tablespoon of milk together until smooth. Add 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon stick and 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla. Mix until smooth. Mix until
ingredients: sugar, milk, cinnamon stick, eggs, vanilla
name: caramel custard

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place cleaned asparagus spears in pan sprinkle with oil. Randomly place lemon curd on asparagus. Sprinkle garlic and ginger over the spear and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, tossing half way through. Give or take depends on the thickness of the spears. Be sure to serve with all the goodness from the pan.
ingredients: asparagus spears, vegetable oil, shallot, garlic clove, low sodium chicken broth, lemon, juice of, sugar, pepper
name: asparagus with lemon broth low sodium

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: rotini pasta, butter, flour, shallot, milk, salt, sharp cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, broccoli florets, cauliflower florets
name: broccoli cauliflower mac and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 425f, spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. In a bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add the bananas, eggs, buttermilk and vanilla and mix well. In another bowl, mix the salt, baking powder, cardamom and flour. Add the flour to the banana mixture and mix until just combined. Fill muffin tin and bake for 19 minutes.
ingredients: white flour, sugar, oil, cardamom, pistachios
name: afghani nan khatai cardamom spiced cookies topped with pistacios

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Saute onion and mushroom stems in bacon fat until tender. Drain off excess fat. Mix crumbled bacon, onion and stems with softened cream cheese until the mixture is workable. Stuff each mushroom and bake for 10-15 minutes. Finish under the broiler just until tops are golden.
ingredients: fresh large mushrooms, hot italian sausage, green onion, cream cheese, milk
name: mushrooms stuffed with cream cheese italian sausage and green o

steps: Preheat grill on high for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ginger, salt and pepper to taste, bring to a boil. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk cornstarch into the water and mix into brown sugar mixture. Cook, stirring constantly until bubbling and thickened. Reduce grill to medium-high heat. Grill chops on oiled grill, brushing often with brown sugar glaze, about 6-8 minutes per side, or until digital thermometer inserted sideways into the center of each chop reads 160f do not over cook.
ingredients: pork chops, brown sugar, ground ginger, low sodium soy sauce, ketchup, garlic cloves, salt and pepper
name: pork chops for the slow cooker

steps: In a wok or skillet, heat oon sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add chopped onion, chopped garlic cloves and a peeled and minced ginger. Stir-fry for a minute or so until the onion begins to turn translucent. Add the kangkong, finely chopped bird chili pepper, water and soy sauce. Continue to stir-fry just until the onion begins to turn translucent. Add the kangkong, finely chopped
ingredients: stir-fry beef, peanut oil, hoisin sauce, five-spice powder, honey, soy sauce, garlic cloves, sesame oil, dry sherry, cornflour
name: peking beef

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Grease a baking sheet. Roll out the dough into a rectangle then cover with a clean tea towel and allow to sit for about 15 minutes. Brush the top of the dough with olive oil, then sprinkle with black pepper and italian seasoning, then sprinkle the chopped pepperoni over the top. Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the pepperoni then top with parmesan cheese. Roll up the dough in jelly-roll fashion, then pinch the long seam and the two ends tightly to seal completely. Brush the outside of the dough with olive oil. Place seam-side down onto baking pan then sprinkle a small amount of kosher salt over the top. Bake for about 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: frozen bread dough, egg, parsley, oregano, pepper, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, pizza sauce
name: pepperoni bread stromboli

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and whisk together until well blended and smooth. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking.
ingredients: pears in heavy syrup, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, green onions, molasses, fresh ginger, dijon mustard
name: gingered pear chicken dijon

steps: In a small bowl, combine mushrooms, butter, garlic, monterey jack cheese, dry white wine, soy sauce, fine cracker crumb. Mix well, and fill mushroom caps. Sprinkle with remaining parmesan and drizzle with butter. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes and then broil until bubbly and done.
ingredients: mushrooms, butter, garlic, monterey jack cheese, dry white wine, soy sauce, fine cracker crumb
name: cheesy mushroom appetizers

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet try to flatten rolls so they resemble flat circles. Take a spoonful of sauce and spread ontop of each rolls. Then cut up cheese into small bits and garnish. Add meat ontop of cheese and then place remaining cheese ontop of meat. Cook for about 15 min of until rolls are golden.
ingredients: refrigerated sugar cookie dough, cream cheese, frozen limeade concentrate, powdered sugar, fresh strawberries, kiwi fruit, fresh blueberries, fresh raspberry
name: mini fruit pizzas

steps: Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onionpreparation:Mix cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon,
ingredients: smoked salmon, light cream cheese, light mayonnaise, creamed horseradish, fresh lemon juice, onion flakes, garlic cloves, cayenne pepper
name: larry s salmon cheese ball

steps: Combine ground beef with remaining ingredients. Mix well. Shape into 6 patties or 3 larger steaks. Broil 4 to 5 inches from heat for 10 minutes, turning once. These burgers can also be pan grilled.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic powder, caraway seed, cabbage, velveeta cheese
name: dee s runza filling

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix together crepes, bacon, swiss cheese, flour, salt, eggs, milk, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese
ingredients: crepes, bacon, swiss cheese, flour, salt, eggs, milk
name: quiche lorraine cups

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Transfer to a baking dish. Mix cracker crumbs and parmesan cheese together, then add in the butter and butter. Mix to combine, then sprinkle over top. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: cream-style corn, butter, corn muffin mix, prepared onion dip, eggs, salt, celery salt, ground black pepper
name: cream corn casserole

steps: Preheat your oven to 350°F. In a medium skillet, heat the butter and brown the prawns, be careful, they burn easily so watch them. Remove with a slotted spoon and reserve. Saute the prawns until the prawns are lightly toasted. Remove with a slotted spoon
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, low-fat milk, saffron threads, fresh sage, prawns, snow peas, penne
name: penne with saffron and prawns

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 heavy baking sheets with silicone baking sheets or parchment paper. In a food processor, chop the parmesan, gruyere and rosemary together until coarsely chopped. Set the cheese mixture aside. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. Working with dough strip at a time, coat each strip with the olive oil and then the cheese mixture, pressing very gently. Twist each cheese covered dough strip and place onto prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the salt, if you wish. Bake until the breadsticks are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes. Transfer the warm breadsticks to a basket and serve.
ingredients: refrigerated breadstick dough, butter, parmesan cheese, smoked paprika
name: smoky parmesan breadsticks

steps: Bake pie crust according to directions and let cool. Combine all remaining ingredients in a large pot and heat to a simmer, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove pan from burner and place a piece of plastic wrap directly on top of chocolate filling. Let pan stand until cool. Spoon filling into pie crust. Serve with whipped cream.
ingredients: dark chocolate, milk, cream cheese, sugar, whipped topping, 9 inch pie shell
name: easy creamy no bake chocolate pie

steps: Preheat oven to 450f and place a large, heavy skillet or roasting pan in the oven to heat. Place the potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with cold salted water. Put on high heat to boil. Once boiling, lower heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain the potatoes well, and place on paper towels. Put the flour on a plate. When the potatoes are dry, roll them in the flour to coat. Remove the hot skillet from the oven and add the oil and potatoes. Roast, shaking the pan occasionally until the potatoes are golden brown all over, about 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and add the garlic, sage and butter. Return to the oven for one minute. Season generously with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: leeks, garlic clove, olive oil, beefsteak tomatoes, fresh sage, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: tomatoes and leeks with fresh sage

steps: Put corn, water, salt and sugar in a large pot. Bring to boil then boil 2 minutes. Let cool. Then bag, corn and liquid together. Freeze with bags standing up. About 2 cups of this frozen, will serve 3 people. You can freeze whatever amount you want.
ingredients: corn, sugar, water, salt
name: easy frozen corn

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a mixing bowl, beat together butter, cream cheese and milk. Beat in sugar and vanilla. Gradually mix in flour. Stir in walnuts. Drop by tablespoonful 2-inches apart on to ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 10 minutes or until edges begin to slightly brown.
ingredients: cream cheese, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, salt, jam
name: turnover cookies

steps: Place potatoes on a piece of heavy duty foil coated with nonstick spray. Sprinkle with onion, boullin, seasoned salt and pepper. Drizzle with butter. Fold foil around potatoes and seal tightly. Grill, covered over direct medium heat for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes are tender, turning once.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, flour, egg, olive oil, salt and pepper, parsley
name: homemade hash browns potatoes

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add cauliflower and cook, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower is a deep golden color, about 20 minutes. Add balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper. Cook until most of the moisture evaporates and cauliflower is deep brown, about 5 minutes. Meanwhile, steam or microwave the cauliflower until tender but still firm. Put cauliflower on a platter and top with caramelized onions. Sprinkle with pine nuts.
ingredients: head cauliflower, fresh lime juice, rice vinegar, hot red chili pepper flakes, garlic, ground cumin, salt, fresh cilantro leaves
name: mexican pickled cauliflower salad coliflor encurtido

steps: Combine all ingredients except nuts. Stir in nuts. Allow to stand stand 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Spread nuts in a shallow baking pan. Bake at 3500f for 20-25 minutes or until golden. Cool completely. Store in airtight containers in a cool dark place for up to 3 weeks.
ingredients: peanut oil, honey, cayenne, ground cumin, curry powder, unsalted almonds, unsweetened coconut, coarse sea salt
name: burmese spiced nuts

steps: Put the chamomile in a large bowl with the water and the seeds, and boil for 10 minutes. Remove the chamomile from the water and place it in a large bowl with the water and the seeds, and boil for 10 minutes. Remove the chamomile from the water and place it in a large bowl with the water
ingredients: dried chamomile, boiling water, carrots, oranges, ice cube
name: chamomile carrot orange drink

steps: Whip cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually beat in sweetened condensed milk and blend. Blend in reallemon lemon juice and vanilla extract. Pour into pie crust and chill until firm. Top with chilled chocolate mousse filling and chill for at least 2 hours.
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, baking cocoa, milk, vanilla extract, frozen whipped topping, 9-inch graham cracker crust, whipped topping
name: easy chocolate mousse pie

steps: Cook tofu according to directions. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok on medium high heat. Add tofu. Stir fry 5 minutes or until tofu softens. Add cucumber. Stir fry 3 to 4 minutes.
ingredients: soy sauce, gingerroot, lime, firm tofu, medium egg noodles, sunflower oil, chili, cucumber, peanuts
name: asian style tofu and cucumber noodles

steps: Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through.
ingredients: tomatoes, bacon, plain flour, salt, eggs, milk, parmesan cheese, herbs, cheddar cheese
name: cheese and bacon bake

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Add butter, salt and pepper to a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and simmer
ingredients: butter, fresh broccoli, onion, carrot, salt & freshly ground black pepper, all-purpose flour, low sodium chicken broth, cream
name: broccoli soup down home w the neelys

steps: In a large pot, combine chicken broth, eggs, parmesan cheese, italian parsley, salt and pepper. Cook over medium heat for 1 minute, or until sizzling. Add chicken broth, eggs, parmesan cheese, italian parsley, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer, uncovered for 15 minutes. Add chicken broth,
ingredients: chicken broth, eggs, parmesan cheese, italian parsley, salt and pepper
name: straciatella soup italian egg drop soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f and arrange the rack in the middle. Line an 8-by-8-inch glass baking dish with aluminum foil. Combine chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until evenly melted. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature. Combine eggs, sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, espresso, and salt in a large bowl and briefly stir until just evenly incorporated. Add flour and stir until just incorporated. Transfer batter to the prepared baking dish. Bake until a tester inserted in the center of the brownies comes out clean, about 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool completely before cutting.
ingredients: dutch-processed cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, brewed coffee, light corn syrup, unsweetened applesauce, sugar, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, plain nonfat yogurt
name: old fashioned cocoa brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium glass or plastic bowl, combine chicken breast and buttermilk. Cover and put in refrigerator for 10-15 minutes. Combine corn flakes, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, garlic powder, oregano, black pepper, olive oil, salt and pepper in large ziploc bag. After chicken is chilled, drain off liquid and add to ziploc bag, shaking to coat. Add oil to shallow baking pan. Place chicken in pan. Bake for approximately 4 minutes on each side, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. Serve with honey mustard dip or light ranch dressing.
ingredients: corn flake crumbs, fresh parsley, ranch dressing, water, boneless skinless chicken breast
name: crunchy ranch chicken fingers

steps: Spread butter on one side each of 2 slices of bread. Place 1 piece of american cheese on a non-buttered side of bread. Place tomato slices on top of the cheese. Lay thin slices of dill pickle on top of tomato slices. Put other slice of bread, butter side up, on top. Fry in a pan until both sides are nicely browned.
ingredients: butter, pumpernickel bread, dijon mustard, dill pickles, swiss cheese
name: glorious grill cheese and pickles how good is that longmeadow

steps: Preheat oven to 300f. Place the seeds in a bowl and add the olive oil then the seasonings. Mix well. Spread pumpkin seeds on a single layer on baking sheet. Bake for about 30 minutes depending on your oven. Stir half way through.
ingredients: pumpkin seeds, oil, butter, salt
name: pumpkin seeds the easy way

steps: Heat oil in l skillet over medium high heat until oil is shimmering and then add the orzo. Toast, stirring frequently, until it starts to turn golden brown.
