Stir in broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until orzo is tender and broth is absorbed. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Uncover and stir in butter, salt, peper and parsley.
ingredients: orzo pasta, garlic, butter, parmesan cheese, milk, fresh parsley, salt, pepper
name: garlic parmesan orzo

steps: Preheat the oven to 400f. Set the stew on a foil-lined baking sheet skin side down. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In a small bowl, combine the chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary. Add salt and pepper. Using a small spoon, spread the mustard mixture on the stew. Top with the bread crumb mixture. Roast the stew for 12-14 minutes or until it is almost completely firm to the touch and flakes when poked with a fork. Serve at once.
ingredients: olive oil, spicy sausage, diced tomatoes, dried thyme, hot water, flat-leaf italian parsley, salt and pepper, fresh thyme leave
name: loukaniko stew

steps: Heat oven to 400. Arrange the baby peppers in a single layer on a foil-lined jelly roll pan, and broil peppers for 4 minutes on each side or until blackened and tender. Cool, combine peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon rind, red pepper, salt, and mozzarella balls, and toss. Cover, and refrigerate overnight, tossing after 6 hours. Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes. Stir in basil leaves, and lemon juice before serving. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: red capsicums, olive oil, ricotta cheese, cherry tomatoes, red onion, lemon rind, garlic clove, basil leaves
name: stuffed capsicums or bell peppers

steps: Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add bay leaf, soy sauce and garlic powder. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve.
ingredients: pork butt, seasoning salt, liquid smoke, onion, water, bay leaves, barbecue sauce, salt, black pepper, garlic powder
name: paula s smoked boston butt roast

steps: Heat butter and oil in a 3 quart saucepan. Add onion and saute on low until translucent. Add zucchini and saute another 2 minutes. Add cream if serving it hot. If serving it cold, cool soup to room temperature and whisk in the yogurt. Garnish with remaining oregano.
ingredients: zucchini, potatoes, garlic cloves, onion, olive oil, soft cheese, fresh herb, water
name: zucchini and potato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 200. Place tomatoes and peppers, cut side down on a baking rack set onto a baking sheet. Roast for 20-30 minutes or until skins are easily removed. Spray or brush vegetables with olive oil and continue to roast until tomatoes become a dark red color, about 2 hours. Remove from oven and chop into small pieces. Meanwhile, cook and drain pasta. Place into a mixing bowl. Add the onions, tomatoes and peppers, toss to combine. Mix together the vinegar, mustard, parsley, basil, olive oil, salt and pepper. Beat with a whisk to combine. Pour over the pasta, add the cheese and toss again. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: spiral shaped pasta, red capsicums, yellow peppers, goat cheese, walnuts, fresh basil leaf, red wine vinegar, olive oil, garlic, grainy mustard
name: roasted capsicum goat cheese and walnut salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 15 minutes or until lightly golden brown. Cool on a wire rack and keep in an airtight container once cold.
ingredients: sour cherry, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, butter, demerara sugar, ground ginger, ground cinnamon
name: sour cherry crumble

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Stir together eggs, yogurt, onion and mexican seasoning. Lightly toast english muffins and place on a foil covered baking sheet. Top each muffin with equal amounts of egg mixture, chilies and cheese. Bake for 10 min or until eggs are warmed and cheese is melted.
ingredients: eggs, onions, green peppers, butter, virgin olive oil, cheese, breadcrumbs
name: spanish baked eggs

steps: Rinse and hull strawberries, put in bowl and sprinkle with the 2 t. Sugar, set aside. Squeeze the lemons and limes into large bowl or gallon jar. Add the 2 cups sugar and half the water. Stir until sugar is disolved, add the remaining water. With a potato masher or fork, mash the strawberries, but leave semi chunky. Add to lemonade, stir well.
ingredients: fresh strawberries, sugar, whipped topping, lemon yogurt, lemon peel
name: strawberries with lemon cream

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees f. In 4 quart saucepan, heat soup, milk, thyme, pepper, chicken and vegetables to boiling over med-high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil and stir 3-5 minutes. Spread in ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Seperate dough into 8 biscuits. Place evenly over hot chicken mixture. Bake 35-40 minutes or until biscuits are golden brown and no longer doughy on bottom. After 20 minutes, cover with foil if necessary to prevent excessive browning.
ingredients: bisquick baking mix, italian dressing, breadcrumbs, boneless pork loin chops, vegetable oil
name: bisquick italian pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Line two baking sheets with baking parchment and set aside. Beat egg whites and salt in small bowl at high electric-mixer speed until frothy. With mixer still at high speed, add sugar gradually and continue beating until meringue peaks stiffly. Beat in vanilla, then by hand fold in lemon zest. Drop meringue from rounded teaspoon onto prepared baking sheets, spacing 2-inches apart. Set in oven, immediately turn oven off, and let cookies remain in the oven for 2 hours peel meringue off parchment and store in airtight container.
ingredients: egg whites, sugar, cornstarch, salt, lemon juice, water
name: mile high meringue

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray. Combine flour and baking soda in bowl and set aside. Cream butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Alternately stir in raisins and flour mixture. Fold in remaining ingredients. Spread evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool and then cut into bars.
ingredients: eggs, hot coffee, brown sugar, flour, salt, baking soda, oil, vanilla, chocolate chips, walnuts
name: chris chocolate chip coffee bars

steps: Boil macaroni to al dente. Rinse with cold water and set aside to dry. Combine mayo, marinara, relish, celery, onion and olives. Add macaroni to mixture. Add salt and pepper to taste. Refrigerate 3-4 hours.
ingredients: macaroni, 3 bean mix, celery, hard-boiled eggs, miracle whip, sweet pickle relish, sea salt, black pepper
name: three bean macaroni salad

steps: In a large measuring cup combine ice, vodka, lime juice, cointreau liqueur, cranberry juice, lime zest, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur, cointreau liqueur,
ingredients: ice, vodka, lime juice, cointreau liqueur, cranberry juice, lime zest
name: junior league christmas cosmopolitan

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Toss together all the ingredients except for the turnips and parsnips. Place in a roasting pan and roast 30 minutes, or until the turnips are fork tender. Stir in the herbs and toss. Adjust seasoning if necessary.
ingredients: turnips, parsnips, vegan margarine, soymilk, vegan mayonnaise, salt and pepper
name: creamy mashed turnips and parsnips vegan

steps: Heat oil in a pot and saute garlic until golden brown. Add garlic, leek, potatoes, vegetable broth, tomato paste, cumin, thyme, salt, creme fraiche. Stir, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. Add more water if soup appears too thick. Stir in cheese and serve.
ingredients: garlic, leek, potatoes, vegetable broth, tomato paste, cumin, thyme, salt, creme fraiche
name: 25 clove garlic soup

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: cucumbers, onion, red thai chile, white vinegar, sugar, garlic powder, oil, salt
name: sweet sour cucumber salad

steps: Dissolve yeast in warm water, let stand for 5 minutes. Mix remaining ingredients and beat well with mixer. Oil a large bowl, turn so both sides are oiled, cover with wax paper till doubled in size. Punch down, form into rolls on greased cookie sheet and let rise until double in size. Bake in preheated 400 degree f oven for 15 to 20 minutes. Brush tops with butter or margarine. Prep time is in the rising. If using bread machine follow mfg instructions.
ingredients: water, dry yeast, sugar, vegetable oil, salt, flour
name: grandpa harveys famous hot rolls

steps: In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine white chocolate, pretzel sticks, dried cranberries, slivered almonds. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Stir in extracts. Pour over cereal mixture and toss to coat. Cook, uncovered, on high for 3 minutes, stirring after each minute. Spread onto waxed paper to cool. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: white chocolate, pretzel sticks, dried cranberries, slivered almonds
name: winter crunch bark

steps: Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecanspreparation:Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecanspreparation:Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecanspreparation:Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecanspreparation:Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecanspreparation:Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecanspreparation:Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecanspreparation:Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecanspreparation:Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecanspreparation:Combine granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking
ingredients: granulated sugar, salt, evaporated milk, butter, semisweet chocolate pieces, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, marshmallow creme, vanilla extract, pecans
name: mamie eisenhower s favorite million dollar fudge

steps: Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh green beans, tomatoes, garlic clove, onion, butter, water, salt & pepper, seasoning salt, slivered almonds
name: simple yet elegant fresh green beans

steps: Combine all ingredients for the marinade in a zip-lock bag. Add chicken. Marinade overnight. Pre-heat oven to 400 degrees. Line a medium-sized baking pan with aluminum foil and sprinkle the bottom of the pan with salt. Dump the contents of the bag into the pan. Arrange the drumsticks so that they are not touching each other. Cover pan with aluminum foil and bake for forty-five minutes. Remove the top layer of foil and turn the chicken over. Bake for an additional fifteen to twenty minutes, until the top of the chicken is nicely browned. Remove from oven. I always serve this with white rice, and pour the drippings from the chicken over the rice.
ingredients: oyster sauce, dark soy sauce, sesame oil, cooking sherry, teriyaki sauce, pancake syrup, garlic
name: mouthwatering chinese marinade and stir fry sauce

steps: Place bagels in a 9 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. Top with bagels. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Uncover and sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake 20 - 25 minutes longer or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: bagels, eggs, bacon, sausage links, gravy, hash brown, cheese
name: mack daddy

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine potatoes and oil in a large bowl or plastic bag, tossing well to coat. Combine salt, garlic powder, red pepper in a small bowl. Sprinkle salt mixture over potatoes, tossing well to coat. Arrange potatoes in a single layer on 2 baking sheets coated with cooking spray. Bake at 425 degrees for 25 minutes. Turn potato wedges over, and rotate pans. Baking an additional 20 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: vegetable oil, baking potatoes, all-purpose flour, egg, milk, salt, beer
name: beer battered potato wedges

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Place the kumara in a baking dish and drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Sprinkle on a pinch of salt. Roast for 25 minutes or until soft. Set aside to cool. Divide lettuce, tomato halves and radish slices between two chilled plates. Top each with half of the cooled kumara. Sprinkle on crumbled feta and pine nuts. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: oil, pineapple juice, lemon juice, salt, onion salt, kumara, pineapple chunks, celery, slivered almonds
name: kumara salad sweet potato

steps: Mix peanut butter, butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut
ingredients: bread, butter, peanut butter, jelly
name: fried peanut butter and jelly sandwich

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: baby spinach, mexican blend cheese, tortillas, butter, chili powder, sour cream, salsa
name: simple spinach quesadillas

steps: Preheat oven to 350f, grease and flour an 8-inch square cake pan and set aside. Peel, core and chop the apples. In a bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and syrup. Sift flour, ginger and cinnamon, and fold into creamed mixture with the apples. Put mixture into prepared pan, and bake for 40-45 minutes, or until cooked. May be cut into slices, or left as a cake and decorated with whipped cream and sprinkled with cinnamon.
ingredients: granny smith apples, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, flour, egg, pecans
name: apple surprise

steps: Mix sugar, vinegar, salt, spices, do not heat. Sterilize 3 large jars,. Place one sliced onion in each jar, fill with sliced cucumbers. Pour syrup to top ofjar and put on lids. Place in refrigerator. Ready to eat in 5 days. Keeps 1 year in refrigerator.
ingredients: cucumbers, salt water, sugar, mustard seeds, pepper, onions, vinegar, ginger, celery seed, turmeric
name: aristocrat pickles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Place chopped butter, sugar and vanilla in a bowl and beat until light and creamy. Add egg and beat well. Using a flat knife, mix through flours and coconut until a soft dough forms. Mix chocolate chips into the dough. Using your hands, mould two tablespoons of dough mixture into a flat round. Place rounds on a baking tray that is lined with non stick baking paper. Repeat until all the mixture is used. Bake for 10 minutes or until light golden. Allow to cool on trays.
ingredients: butter, sugar, light brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, flaked coconut, butterscotch chips
name: butterscotch coconut drop cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir into the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: sugar, eggs, cooking oil, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, cocoa
name: wonder brownies

steps: Heat oil in a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari.
ingredients: fresh spinach, chicken stock, low sodium soy sauce, sugar, oranges, toasted sesame seeds
name: oriental orange spinach

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter 9 inch fluted or plain tube pan. In large bowl of electric mixer, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs, eggnog, and vanilla. Stir together flour, bakng powder, and salt. Gradually beat into butter mixture. Prepare topping by combining nuts, sugar and cinnamon. Scatter half the topping evenly over bottom of pan. Spoon in half batter. Add remaining topping and spoon on remaining batter. Bake 50 to 60 minute, or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: eggnog, strong coffee, baileys irish cream, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: eggnog lattes

steps: Drain pineapple juice and reserve. Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add crushed pineapple, cornstarch, butter, sugar, pretzel stick, whipped dessert topping mix, milk, vanilla, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese
ingredients: crushed pineapple, cornstarch, butter, sugar, pretzel stick, whipped dessert topping mix, milk, vanilla, cream cheese
name: pineapple pretzel salad

steps: Pour milk into large bowl. Add dry pudding mixes. Beat with wire whisk until well blended. Gently stir in 1 cup of the whipped topping. Place half of the brownie cubes in 2-quart serving bowl. Top with half of the pudding mixture, half of the raspberries, and half of the remaining whipped topping. Repeat all layers. Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until ready to serve.
ingredients: skim milk, chocolate flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, whipped topping, brownie, raspberries
name: chocolate raspberry trifle

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
ingredients: chicken legs-thighs, dried basil, dried thyme, dried rosemary, olive oil, garlic, salt, black pepper
name: herbed bistro chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Clean mushrooms, remove and disgard stems. Arrange mushrooms gill side up in a shallow baking pan. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Combine crabmeat, peppers, mayonnaise and parsley. Combine breadcrumbs and butter, sprinkle over stuffed mushrooms. Bake 15 minutes or until centers of mushrooms are tender. Serve with lemon wedges, if desired.
ingredients: portabella mushroom, egg, olive oil, rosemary, basil, salt, pepper
name: portobello eggs

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or until tender, stirring occassionally. Add cooked turkey. Blend water, gravy mix, milk, flour, and season-all. Pour over turkey gravy mixture. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Serve over rice.
ingredients: butter, flour, chicken broth, salt and pepper, pan drippings from turkey
name: easy make ahead turkey gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Pre-cook broccoli for 5 minutes in boiling salted water. Drain well. Using electric mixer, cream together egg, cream cheese, and mayonnaise. When creamed together, add cheddar cheese soup and mix well. Place broccoli in casserole dish. Pour cheese mixture over top. Sprinkle crushed cheez-its over the top. Bake for 25 - 30 minutes, until heated through and topping is golden brown.
ingredients: frozen broccoli florets, cream cheese, cheddar cheese, green onions, salt and pepper, bacon
name: cheesy broccoli casserole low carb

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined.
ingredients: butter, heavy cream, splenda granular, salt, eggs, coconut flour, baking powder
name: coconut flour pancakes

steps: In a small bowl, combine water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Place the lemon, lemon juice and sugar mixture into a blender and process for 1 minute or until blended. Cover and freeze for 3 hours or until almost firm. Transfer to a blender and process again for 30-40 seconds or until slushy. Cover and freeze over night. Remove from freezer just before serving. Using a fork, scrape into 2 dessert dishes.
ingredients: water, sugar, fresh lime juice, fresh orange juice, ice
name: citrus coolers

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Lightly oil a 12 hole muffin pan. Line moulds with a slice of ham so the ends stick out over the top. Break an egg into each hollow, top with tomato and scatter with chives, parmesan, salt and pepper. Bake for 18 minutes or until egg is set. Remove from oven and leave to cool for 5 minutes. Run a knife around each mould to loosen ham. Cool on rack.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, ham, white sauce, yellow mustard, pie crust
name: ham and egg pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in med bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack.
ingredients: sugar, pecans, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, baking soda, kosher salt
name: pecan pie brittle

steps: Preheat oven to 350. After browning and crumbling the bacon, place it in the bottom of a 9x13 baking dish. Beat eggs, add cheese and salsa verde. Pour egg mixture over the sausage. Bake for 45 minutes or until eggs are set.
ingredients: bacon, green pepper, onions, potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, salt and pepper
name: arkansas breakfast casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease tube pan. Mix first four ingredients in bowl. Separate biscuits into 20 pieces, then cut biscuits into 4 pieces. Toss biscuits with bacon and other ingredients. Put all this into tube pan and drizzle with butter. Bake for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: bacon, bread, butter, chutney, brie cheese
name: brie and bacon sandwiches

steps: In a food processor, add cream cheese, lemon juice, dill and capers. Combine for a few minutes. Toast chosen bread. Once the bread has been toasted spread cream cheese mix thickly onto both pieces of bread. Top with the smoked salmon and red onions.
ingredients: smoked salmon, cream cheese, fresh lemon juice, capers, red onions, belgian endive
name: endive boats with smoked salmon

steps: Put apples and water in saucepan. Cover and bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Stir in sugar, cinnamon and cloves. Cook until all sugar is dissolved. Serve warm or let cool.
ingredients: apple, water, sugar, cinnamon
name: microwave apples and cinnamon for small children

steps: Boil potatoes for 10-12 minutes or until fork-tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add cream cheese, sour cream, and minced garlic to potatoes and mix until smooth. Grease a 13x9 baking dish and add mashed potatoes. Set the 4 pats of butter in various spots on top of potatoes, sprinkle with paparika. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, fat free cream cheese, reduced-fat sour cream, nonfat milk, salt, garlic powder, pepper, chives, paprika
name: light n creamy mashed potatoes

steps: Boil potatoes until fork tender, about 20 minutes. Drain. Shake pan over low heat to help dry potatoes. Mash potatoes until no lumps remain. Add milk, mashing until smooth. Add butter, salt, pepper and blue cheese. Mash vigorously until potatoes are light and fluffy. If desired, put small pats of butter on top. Bake at 400 for 5 minutes.
ingredients: unsalted butter, blue cheese, fresh parsley, brandy, garlic cloves, onion powder, ground black pepper, hot sauce
name: wicked blue cheese butter

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all of the dry ingredients together. Mix all the wet ingredients together. Mix everything together. Bake for 10-12 minutes at 350f.
ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, margarine, soy yogurt, vanilla, baking soda, salt, lemon zest, flour, poppy seed
name: vegan lemon poppyseed cookies

steps: Heat deep skillet over medium-low to medium heat. Add oil and garlic and crushed red pepper flakes. Let garlic begin to sizzle in oil. Add tomatoes and crushed tomatoes. Stir in herbs and spices and let sauce come to a boil. Reduce heat and let sauce simmer 10 minutes or until ready to serve.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, crushed tomatoes, salt and pepper, dried italian seasoning, italian parsley
name: five minute spicy marinara

steps: In a large skillet, brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, sweet pepper, celery, carrot, canned whole tomatoes, tomato puree, black pepper, salt
name: sloppy joe s on cornbread

steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor. Whirl until smooth. Place in jar with tight-fitting lid. Refrigerate for up to two weeks. Shake well before serving.
ingredients: olive oil, aceto balsamico, dijon mustard, honey, pumpkin seed oil, salt
name: pumpkin seed oil dressing

steps: In a large saucepan, combine chicken broth, chicken stock, ziti pasta, garlic powder, salt and pepper, and saute for 1 minute. Add chicken stock, ziti pasta, garlic powder, salt and pepper, and saute for 1 minute. Add chicken stock,
ingredients: broccoli florets, unsalted butter, chicken tenderloins, minced fresh garlic cloves, chicken stock, ziti pasta
name: capone s chicken broccoli and ziti

steps: Combine all dry ingredients first. Add oil and water, mix well. Use ladle to measure desired mixture into desired non-stick skillet. Cook as desired, flip and cook opposite side. Remove from heat. Use cooking spray to grease skillet with before cooking pancakes, or use 1 teaspoon butter to grease skillet, if desired for added flavor.
ingredients: garbanzo beans, potato starch, cornstarch, xanthan gum, baking powder, dry buttermilk, eggs, salad oil, water
name: gluten free buttermilk drop biscuits

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Drain and cut the artichokes into smaller pieces and place in a medium size bowl. Add the spinach, garlic and shallots. Mix the chicken soup, milk and green chilies together and set aside. Skin the thighs and remove any fat. Place in a 9 inch square baking dish. Spread spinach mixture over the chicken. Pour soup mixture over spinach mixture. Cover with a lid or foil. Put it in the oven and bake for 1 hour or until chicken is done and juices are hot and bubbly.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, egg, unseasoned breadcrumbs, oil, unsalted butter, fresh garlic
name: 1 000 artichoke hearts

steps: In a 3-quart saucepan, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired.
ingredients: ground chuck, onion, garlic cloves, tomato puree, chili powder, salt, ground cumin, kidney beans, water
name: illini union chili

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 9 inch square baking pan. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt. In a large bowl, cream the vegetable shortening and sugar. Beat in the egg, milk, and almond extract. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Fold in the almonds. Spread the mixture evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, until the top is lightly colored. Cool in the pan on a rack before cutting into bars.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, baking powder, flour, blanched almond
name: almond bread mandelbrod

steps: Combine all ingredients except steak in a large resealable plastic bag, mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. When ready to grill, remove steak from marinade, reserving the marinade. Grill steak to desired doneness. Meanwhile, in medium saucepan bring reserved marinade to a boil. Reduce heat and cook 5 to 8 minutes or until slightly thickened. Serve grilled steak with hot marinade.
ingredients: sugar, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, ground black pepper, garlic powder, top sirloin steaks
name: sweet steak

steps: Toast 6 thick slices of french bread in a 300 degree oven until crisp. Blend the stilton with a couple tablespoons of butter, then spread on the toast. When ready to serve the soup, pop one of these on top of each serving bowl and sprinkle with lots of cheddar cheese. Melt butter in a large saucepan over low heat. Add onions, cover, and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally for about 30 minutes. Add cream and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer to thicken slightly. Season generously with salt and pepper. Ladle into bowls, top with stilton toast, and run under the broiler until the cheese is melted and brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: onions, butter, meat stock, water, salt and pepper
name: gigi s soupe a l oignon

steps: Saute doritos, enough to just cover the bottom of a 2 quart casserole dish. Mix all other ingredients, except cheese, and place on top of doritos. Crush another layer of doritos on top. Sprinkle cheese over all. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes.
ingredients: doritos, cooked chicken breast, barbecue sauce, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese
name: barbecue chicken doritos snack

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, melt butter over medium-high heat in heavy large skillet. Add onion and cook, stirring until slightly browned. Carefully add the vodka and flame, shaking the pan until the flames die down. Raise the heat to medium high and add the heavy cream. Cook, stirring until sauce slightly thickens and will coat the back of a spoon. Stir in the tomato paste, a little at a time, just until the sauce turns pink. Add the parmigianno-reggiano and stir. Drain the pasta thoroughly and add to the pan, stirring or tossing to combine. Sprinkle with basil and serve.
ingredients: penne pasta, olive oil, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, chili powder, cream, vodka, romano cheese, cilantro
name: irish vodka pasta

steps: Place meatloaf in pan. Top with tomato sauce. Bake uncovered at 350 for 50-60 minutes or until a meat thermometer reads 160. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. Bake uncovered at 350 for 50-60 minutes or until a meat therm
ingredients: lipton onion soup mix, hamburger, onions, salt, egg, oatmeal, juice
name: sharon s meatloaf

steps: In a large nonstick pan cook chicken in hot oil over medium heat for 4 to 5 minutes. Turn chicken and add zucchini. Cook for 4 minutes or until chicken is tender and no longer pink and squash is tender. Spread pesto over chicken and sprinkle with cheese and sun dried tomatoes. Let that just warm and serve onto plates.
ingredients: chicken thighs, chicken broth, pesto sauce, garlic, salt and pepper
name: slow cooker pesto chicken thighs

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Place pita breads on a baking sheet. Spread pita breads with sauce, leaving a inch border. Sprinkle with 1 cup cheese. Add avocado, hard-boiled egg, mayonnaise, garlic powder, salt and pepper, paprika, fresh parsley, lemon juice. Add to avocado. Add remaining ingredients. Let stand or refrigerate for a little while, but not too long as avocados may turn. Serve on a bed of lettuce for salad. Sprinkle a little paprika on top for color.
ingredients: pita breads, olive oil, avocado, lemon juice, salt, garlic powder, hot pepper sauce, chicken, tomatoes, monterey jack cheese
name: avocado chicken pita

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add onion and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 5
ingredients: chicken wings, vegetable oil, garlic powder, habanero sauce, tabasco sauce, ground red pepper, white vinegar, brown sugar, bleu cheese salad dressing, iceberg lettuce
name: thermonuclear chicken wings

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: ricotta cheese, caster sugar, honey, eggs, ground cinnamon, lemon
name: mini honey cheesecakes

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a glass baking dish, melt the butter in the oven. Remove the dish from the oven and add the salt, garlic and black pepper. Meanwhile, wash the shrimp, leaving the shells on. Add the shrimp to the butter mixture and stir well to coat. Bake for 15-18 minutes.
ingredients: shrimp, garlic cloves, serrano chilies, walnut oil, rice wine, tamari, greens, meyer lemon
name: tasmanian shrimp with red chilies

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place wings in a non-stick oven dish. Pour simmer sauce over chicken, cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours. Bake wings at 190c for 30 minutes.
ingredients: chicken wings, hot sauce, honey, white wine, black pepper, onion powder, garlic paste, seasoning salt
name: baked hot wings

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, buttermilk, oil, honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little.
ingredients: cornmeal, flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, buttermilk, baking soda, eggs, butter
name: corn grits cornbread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir baking mix, milk, and eggs until blended and pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: lean ground beef, taco seasoning, tortilla chips, mexican blend cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, black olives, salsa, sour cream
name: favorite taco casserole

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool completely. Place onions and eggs in a large jar. Add enough vinegar mixture to completely cover. Cover and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight. Use a clean spoon each time you remove eggs for serving. May be refrigerated for up to 1 week.
ingredients: eggs, yellow pepper, red pepper, green pepper, onion, white vinegar, water, sugar, cloves, salt
name: pickled peppered eggs

steps: In a heavy skillet, saute onion and garlic in olive oil until just about ready to carmelize. Remove vegetables from skillet and set aside. Season chops with salt and pepper. Dredge with flour on both sides. Brown chops for about five minutes on each side. After browning both sides, pour apple juice over chops. Let the chops cook in the juice for another five minutes over med-low heat. Do not cover. Remove chops and add onion and garlic back into the pan. Reduce sauce slightly, adding dried cherries in last 2-3 minutes of cooking. To serve, plate chops with wild rice and spoon a bit of the sauce over each chop. Depending on thickness of the chops, you may need to adjust cooking time slightly.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, vegetable oil, pork stuffing mix, apple pie filling
name: pork chops with apples stuffing

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Add popcorn, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, rais
ingredients: popped popcorn, craisins, dried apricot, dark chocolate, white chocolate, nuts
name: trick on a stick

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the onion powder with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the onion powder in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover.
ingredients: salt, garlic clove, dry mustard, ground pepper, white wine vinegar, olive oil, fresh lemon juice
name: green company salad dressing

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Grease 9 x 9-inch square pan. Mix milk, lemon peel and lemon juice until thickened. Reserve. Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly. Press half of the crumbly mixture in pan. Bake about 10 minutes or until edge is golden brown and center is set but soft. Cool completely.
ingredients: water, salt, old fashioned oats, almond extract, light cherry pie filling, powdered sugar
name: cherry oatmeal

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: raisins, oat flour, rolled oats, ground flax seeds, baking powder, ground cinnamon, salt, almond butter, water, maple syrup
name: almond butter raisin cookies vegan gluten free

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: butter, artificial sweetener, brown sugar, peanut butter, egg, all-purpose flour, protein powder, baking soda, baking powder, salt
name: protein peanut butter cookies

steps: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees f. Arrange the sliced caprese salad on a baking sheet. Brush with some of the olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake until the bread is pale golden and crisp, about 5 minutes. Remove from the oven. Top each slice of bread with a slice of tomato and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Return the baking sheet to the oven until the cheese and tomato are warmed, about 5 minutes. Arrange the toasts on a serving platter. Top each toast with a basil leaf. Sprinkle with salt and pepper, and serve.
ingredients: green beans, tomatoes, garlic clove, part-skim mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt
name: caprese salad

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat until onions start to soften and brown, about 5-7 minutes. Add potatoes, onion, garlic, salt and pepper to taste, and any seasonings you are using. Saut over medium heat for about 10 minutes, until onions are golden and heated through. Add potatoes. Saut over medium heat for 10 minutes more, until potatoes are golden and heated through.
ingredients: beef hot dogs, oil, onion, garlic salt, pepper, potatoes, cheddar cheese
name: dogs and taters

steps: Cut jalapeno peppers in half, vertically, leaving stem for presentation. Remove seeds. Drain well on paper towel. In a small bowl combine all remaining ingredients and mix well. Spoon filling into pepper halves.
ingredients: avocado, cream cheese, garlic, yellow onion, bell pepper, jalapeno peppers
name: garlic stuffed jalapenos

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Mix well. Pour dressing over salad mixture, stirring well. Cover and refrigerate 8 hours or overnight.
ingredients: broccoli, bacon, red onion, slivered almonds, sharp cheddar cheese, red wine vinegar, white sugar, buttermilk ranch dressing, mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice
name: broccolicious salad

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, eggs, butter, orange rind, brown sugar, vanilla, marshmallows, corn flake crumbs
name: sweet potato surprise balls oamc

steps: In a large pot of boiling water, cook pasta until tender but firm, drain and return to pot to keep warm. Meanwhile, in a large non-stick skillet, heat oil & chili pepper flakes over medium heat. Stir in garlic. Add tomatoes and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until heated through. Transfer to pot with drained pasta. Add olives, feta cheese and basil. Toss gently to mix. Sprinkle each serving with parmesan.
ingredients: ricotta cheese, lemon, butter, penne, fresh basil leaf, olive oil, salt and pepper
name: penne with lemon ricotta and basil

steps: Boil chorizo pasta until done and drain off the fat. Add tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper, tomato puree, green chili pepper,
ingredients: onion, oil, chorizo sausage, chopped tomatoes, tomato puree, green chili pepper, pasta, cheese
name: chorizo pasta bake

steps: In lg skillet, melt butter and cook scallops for about 7 minutes, until golden brown. Remove and keep warm. In same skillet, add pepper, onion and garlic. Cook 2 minutes. Add wine, stir 1 minute. Add broth, milk, and parsley. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens, 1-2 minutes. Add scallops and heat through.
ingredients: garlic clove, grape tomatoes, fresh herbs, salt and pepper, sea scallops, extra virgin olive oil, butter, lemon wedges
name: scallops with herbed raw tomato sauce

steps: Cook rice according to package directions. To prepare the peppers, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and saute until tender. Sprinkle on chili powder and cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add beans, salsa, and water and cook about 5 minutes.
ingredients: jasmine rice, rotel tomatoes & chilies, red onion, scallions, cumin, garlic, poblano peppers, water, mexican cheese, black beans
name: mexican rice stuffed poblano peppers

steps: Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker with the contents of the soup packet. Pour water, wine, and soy sauce over the top, turning the pork to coat. Carefully spread garlic over the pork, leaving as much on top of the roast during cooking as possible. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. Serve with cooking liquid on the side as au jus.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, red peppers, teriyaki sauce, rice wine vinegar, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, creamy peanut butter, green onion, roasted peanuts, limes
name: slow cooker thai pork with peanut sauce

steps: Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian paprika salad dressing.
ingredients: salad oil, sugar, vinegar, onions, dry mustard, paprika, celery seeds, salt, pepper
name: paprika salad dressing

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium high heat. Add garlic and herb marinated artichokes and season with salt and pepper. Saute garlic and herb marinated artichokes 3-5 minutes, add remaining ingredients and lower heat to medium low. Simmer about 10 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh dill, fresh italian parsley, fresh basil, lemon juice, artichokes, red capsicum
name: garlic and herb marinated artichokes

steps: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees f. A half-hour before cooking, remove filet from refrigerator. Heat a large skillet over high heat. Pat filet dry and season generously with salt and pepper. Add oil to hot skillet and when it begins to smoke add steak. Reduce heat slightly and cook steak until browned, about 4 minutes on each side. Transfer skillet to the oven. Roast until an instant-read thermometer inserted sideways into the steak registers 120 degrees f for medium-rare, about 6 to 8 minutes. Transfer steak to a cutting board and let it rest for 10 minutes. Cut steak from the bone and carve meat across the grain.
ingredients: beef tenderloin, fresh ground black pepper, kosher salt, butter, olive oil
name: pan seared filet mignon

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: butter, unbleached cane sugar, eggs, gluten-free vanilla extract, rice flour, baking powder
name: rice flour cake

steps: Combine hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter, toasted hazelnut butter
ingredients: lamb racks, hazelnuts, butter, hot pepper flakes, dijon mustard, coarse salt
name: rack of lamb with toasted hazelnut butter

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, melt the butter. Add the chopped onion and garlic and saute for about 3 - 4 minutes. To the skillet, add the cooked drained potato and turnip cubes. Add the salt and pepper. Continue to cook and stir until potatoes and turnips are lightly browned, adjusting heat as necessary. When done, sprinkle with the parsley and serve.
ingredients: unsalted butter, olive oil, turnip, chicken broth, long-grain rice, salt and pepper, fresh italian parsley, parmesan cheese
name: italian turnip soup mellowed with rice

steps: Preheat oven at 410 degrees f. Line 9x12 inch baking tray with grease-proof paper. Mix together all dry ingredients. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs until fluffy, add milk, oil. Add to dry mixture. The mixture should be moist and of medium consistency. Cover dish with a layer of batter. Cut the cream cheese in cubes and sprinkle over first layer of batter. Add remaining batter to cover the cream cheese. Place in baking tray. Bake for 20 minutes until slightly golden brown. Cool, cut the cornbread into square pieces, and serve with tea.
ingredients: frozen corn, butter, cream cheese, sugar, breadcrumbs
name: wich s creamed corn casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a small loaf pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg. In another small bowl, combine the liquid egg product, applesauce and zucchini. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and using an electric mixer, mix until well blended. Pour mixture into loaf pan and spread evenly- can sprinkle a little sugar and cinnamon on top if desired. Bake 45-50 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, double-acting baking powder, baking soda, zucchini, egg substitute, vegetable oil, unsweetened applesauce, lemon, rind of
name: zucchini lemon muffins

steps: Cook potatoes in water until tender. Drain. While potatoes are cooking. Melt butter in large skillet. Add chopped onion and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in kale mixture.
ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream cheese, butter, dried onion flakes, salt, paprika
name: a mountain of make ahead mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray 13x9 dish with cooking spray. Slice potatoes fairly thin and place in dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Toss to coat. Sprinkle italian seasoning and parmesan cheese on top. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: small red potatoes, vegetable oil cooking spray, salt, black pepper, italian seasoning, tabasco sauce
name: almost no fat roasted tiny red potatoes

steps: Combine the dressing and jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, jalap
ingredients: jalapeno pepper, cherry tomatoes, red onion, pecans, dijon mustard, lemon, juice of, olive oil
name: tangy summer salad

steps: Mix everything except dungeness crabmeat, shallot, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, mayonnaise, egg, dijon mustard, old bay seasoning, white bread. Spread about 1 tablespoon of mixture onto dungeness crabmeat.
ingredients: dungeness crabmeat, shallot, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, mayonnaise, egg, dijon mustard, old bay seasoning, white bread
name: spicy jalapeno crab cakes

steps: Heat broiler, with rack set 4 inches from heat. Place tomatoes on a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, without turning, until opaque throughout, 7 to 9 minutes. Let cool briefly, then flake. Divide tomatoes among serving plates. Top with tomatoes peppers and rocket, and drizzle with vinaigrette.
ingredients: red peppers, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, goat cheese, pine nuts, rocket, basil
name: goats cheese salad with tomatoes peppers and rocket

steps: In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until chops are tender, turning once during cooking. Remove chops and place on a warm platter. Add lemon juice to pan juices and simmer 1 minute. Pour over chops and enjoy.
ingredients: water, sugar, soy sauce, bay leaf, boneless pork steaks, salt, pepper
name: greg s pork asado

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix together potato wedges with oil, seasoning, and salt. Toss the potato strips into mixture, to coat well, and spread onto baking sheet in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt and brown sugar. Bake for 30 minutes, turning every 10 minutes.
ingredients: potato, oil, salt, malt vinegar
name: new jersey boardwalk fries

steps: Combine halibut fillet, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, yellow onions, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmes
ingredients: halibut fillet, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, yellow onions, parmesan cheese
name: baked halibut with parmesan

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix the first 4 ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Add the vanilla and oil until all dry ingredients are moistened. Add the water and mix well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out of the center clean.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, skim milk, margarine
name: hot milk sponge cake

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat add olive oil and onions. Cook until tender. Stir in garlic and cook stirring until golden. Stir in mussels, wine and broth and let simmer for 2-5 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and anisette and let simmer for 5 minutes or so. Pour into bowls to serve.
ingredients: clam juice, tomatoes, lime juice, hot pepper sauce, tomato paste, mussels, butter, cilantro, green onion
name: mussels steamed in broth

steps: Cook the couscous according to package directions. Meanwhile, put the coriander and lemon zest in a bowl. When the couscous is done, mix it with the coriander and lemon zest. Add the olive oil and nuts and mix again. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately or chill if desired. Squeeze a little lemon juice over the couscous just before serving.
ingredients: couscous, olive oil, garlic, spring onion, coriander, black currants, almonds
name: almond coriander couscous

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine in a large mixing bowl the turkey or beef, the spinach, which has been squeezed to drain, the oats, onion, carrots, egg, milk, herbs, salt and pepper. Use a three-tined kitchen granny fork or wooden mixing fork to blend the meat ingredients. Pat into a 9x5-inch loaf pan that has been sprayed with a no-stick oil product, or shape into a loaf and place in the middle of a 13x9-inch baking pan. Bake 1 hour or until a thermometer registers 170 degrees and the center is no longer pink. If substituting beef for turkey, bake 50 to 55 minutes and thermometer should register 160 degrees internal temperature. Let loaf stand out of the oven for 5 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: egg yolk, extra virgin olive oil, sage, ground paprika, salt, ground black pepper, ground turkey breast
name: low calorie turkey sausage patties

steps: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, mini marshmallows, sugar, crushed pineapple, cool whip
name: frozen cranberry salad

steps: Boil chicken breasts in a pot of water with the chicken broth. When the chicken is done let it cool. Then debone the chicken and remove the skin. Cut chicken meat into bite size pieces. Cook the vegetables and drain liquid. In a large bowl mix chicken meat, vegetables, sour cream, can of soup, and spices. Place chicken mixture in 13x9 casserole dish. In another bowl crush ritz crackers into small pieces and spread over chicken mixture. Place dots of butter all over the crackers. Place in oven preheated at 350 for about 45 minutes or until bubbly in the middle. If crakers start to get too brown before done place a piece of tin foil over the top of chicken.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, ritz crackers, butter, salt and pepper
name: easy creamy sour cream chicken casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and bell pepper. Saut 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in black pepper. Divide onion mixture and turkey evenly among bottom halves of rolls. Top each serving with 1 cheese slice. Cover with top halves of rolls. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet. Bake at 375 for 5 minutes or until cheese melts.
ingredients: chicken breast, green bell pepper, onion, olive oil, mozzarella cheese, hoagie rolls
name: chicken f philly sandwich

steps: In a shallow bowl, beat eggs. In another shallow bowl, combine the following four ingredients. Dip the fish pieces into the crumbs, into the egg, and then into the crumbs again. Pat crumbs into fish fillets. In 12-inch non-stick skillet, heat 1 tablespoon butter and 1 tablespoon oil until butter melts. Add 2 pieces of fish and cook. Only turn fish once while browning both sides, approximately 6 minutes. When fillets are golden brown add remaining butter, oil, and fish. Repeat the steps above to cook fillets.
ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, butter
name: egg fried bread

steps: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Slowly add milk to form a soft dough. Knead on a floured surface 4 times. Roll into 10 inch by 5 inch rectangle. Cut into 12 sticks. Put butter in 13x9 baking dish. Roll breadsticks in butter. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake at 425 for 16 minutes, or until golden.
ingredients: bread flour, flour, baking powder, salt, water, vegetable oil
name: easy and fast bread with baking powder

steps: In a large saucepan, heat oil. Add sausage and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add shallots and garlic. Cook one minute. Add tomatoes, herbs and sugar. Bring to a fast boil, then simmer uncovered for 40 minutes. Stir frequently and skim off fat. Add salt and pepper. Serve over pasta.
ingredients: cannellini beans, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, fresh sage leaf, tomatoes, salt, black pepper, sweet italian sausage link
name: beans and sweet italian sausage

steps: Mix soy sauce, water, sugar, ginger, garlic and oil together in a small bowl. Let stand 10 to 15 minutes for the flavors to mix. Then wisk again. Sprinkle with thinly sliced green onion. Use as a dipping suace for ginger chicken or any asian dish.
ingredients: lean beef, peanut oil, garlic cloves, chilies, green onions, fresh ginger, fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, fresh coriander
name: spicy fried ginger beef

steps: In a large saucepan, saute the scandinavian fruit in 3 tablespoons of oil for 5 minutes, until limp, then add the last tablespoon of oil and the potatoes and stir-fry for a minute. Add the stock, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes, until the scandinavian fruit is mushy. Remove from heat and puree. Return the soup to the pot, season with salt and cayenne, and stir in the chopped scandinavian fruit. You can serve the soup cold--or reheat by slowly bringing it to a simmer. Ladle into soup plates and top with a sprinkling of cilantro or chives.
ingredients: mixed dried fruit, water, fruit syrup, cinnamon stick, salt, lemon slices, dry red wine, quick-cooking tapioca
name: scandinavian fruit soup

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic, dried oregano, salt, pepper, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, mayonnaise, pepper, may
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, butter, garlic powder, mozzarella cheese
name: extra cheesy crescent mozzarella wedges

steps: In a heavy saucepan, heat milk and sugar, over medium to low heat. When hot, stir in eggs and flour. Beat together well and boil until thick. Stir in butter and vanilla after it is cooked. Cool and served chilled. Before serving, whip up heavy cream and fold in to chilled pudding.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, milk, butter, vanilla
name: easy vanilla pudding

steps: Pound chicken breasts slightly to uniform thickness. Preheat non-stick skillet over medium heat for 3 minutes, then melt 4 tablespoons butter. Saut the chicken breasts, 2 at a time in the melted butter until browned on both sides. Place browned chicken in a medium-sized sauce pan. Add remaining two tablespoons of butter to skillet, and then saut the onion until soft and brown, about 4 minutes add onions to chicken in sauce pan. Add 5 tablespoons flour to skillet, and saut about 2 minutes, until slightly browned. Add stock and whisk until smooth. Add salt, pepper and garlic powder, and then pour over chicken in sauce pan. Add ranch dressing and stir. Bring mixture to boil in sauce pan, then cover and simmer over medium low for 30 minutes. I serve with homemade biscuits to mop the gravy, along with mashed potatoes, or wild rice.
ingredients: butter, onion, fresh mushrooms, chicken gravy, chicken, parsley
name: smothered chicken using leftover chicken

steps: Bring water to a boil. Add sugar and tea leaves. Bring to a boil again and reduce heat. Keep simmering for around 2 minutes. Bring to a boil
ingredients: water, green tea, sugar, fresh mint leaves
name: mint tea from morocco

steps: Defrost hashbrowns. Combine next 7 ingredients and mix with hasbrowns. Put all in a 3 qt casserole dish. Saute cornflakes in butter and sprinkle on top. Cover and bake at 350 for about 40 minute.
ingredients: cream of chicken soup, frozen hash brown potatoes, cheddar cheese, butter, sour cream, salt, milk, onion, ritz cracker
name: crispy hash browns

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place lobster in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute lobster in butter until softened. Add lobster, ritz crackers, butter and lemon. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: lobsters, ritz crackers, butter, lemon
name: shirley s lobster pie for one

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Line a round cake pan with waxed paper. In a large bowl, mix all ingredients except the biscuits. Separate the dough into 10 biscuits, and cut each one into quarters. Place biscuit pieces, a few at a time in the sugar mixture and roll to coat. Arrange in a single layer in the lined pan, and sprinkle top with any remaining sugar mixture. Bake 20 to 25 minutes, until golden brown. Carefully turn upside down onto a serving plate, remove waxed paper and cut into wedges or pull apart. Carefully turn upside down onto a serving plate, remove waxed paper and cut into wedges
ingredients: flour, nuts, butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, cool whip, lemons, milk
name: lemon lush

steps: Put corn, water, salt and sugar in a large pot. Bring to boil then boil 2 minutes. Let cool. Then bag, corn and liquid together. Freeze with bags standing up. About 2 cups of this frozen, will serve 3 people. You can freeze whatever amount you want.
ingredients: corn, sugar, water, salt
name: libbie s corn for freezing

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Blend dry ingredients and set aside. Combine flour, baking powder, cinnamon, butter, baking powder, egg, milk, vanilla extract, fresh blueberries. Spoon batter into muffin tins lightly sprayed with vegetable oil. Bake until golden brown and a wooden pick inserted into center of a muffin comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, cinnamon, butter, baking powder, egg, milk, vanilla extract, fresh blueberries
name: grandma s blueberry streusel coffeecake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Rinse and dry fish, then drench with juice of limes. Drain and season with salt and pepper. Place 1 layer of fish in a shallow pan. Cover with green pepper and onion, then sprinkle with curry powder. Drizzle with coconut oil or melted butter. Squeeze remaining lime juice on fish. Cover tightly with lid or foil and bake for 10 minutes, then baste with liquid. Fish is done when it flakes easily with fork.
ingredients: fish fillets, mirin, granulated sugar, salt, sesame oil, green onion, cilantro, lemon
name: basic steamed fish

steps: Mix all ingredients in a large serving bowl. Place the salad in the bottom of 9x12 inch cake pan. Top with grated cheese. Cover and refrigerate for 8 to 10 hours. Bacon bits can be used for bacon.
ingredients: lettuce, sugar, salt and pepper, hard-boiled eggs, frozen green peas, bacon, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, green onion
name: 24 hour green vegetable salad

steps: Put yeast, warm water, flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, sugar, shortening, buttermilk, egg wash, egg, waterpreparation:Combine dry ingredients. Measure oil and milk in measuring cup and do not mix. Pour all at once over flour mixture. Just mix in bowl. Does not need to be kneaded or shaped. Just mix until all ingredients are just moistened. Can add a little more flour if it seems too gooey but you basically will take it in your hands to shape and place on pan. Let proof 10 min on lightly greased pan. If you want a more golden look, place egg wash on top before baking. If you want a more dessert type biscuit for strawberry shortcake then dust with sugar and melted butter before baking. 475 degrees 10-12 minutes or until lightly brown.
ingredients: yeast, warm water, flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, sugar, shortening, buttermilk
name: big angel biscuits

steps: Spray pan with cooking spray and saute sausage. Drain as much grease as possible. Put 1 large diced onion and one diced red bell pepper in pan with sausage and cooked until the tender. Sprinkle with garlic powder. Add can diced tomatoes and tomato sauce. Cook pasta separately and add in at end of cooking time.
ingredients: kielbasa, whiskey, ketchup, brown sugar
name: whiskey kielbasa

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 2 quart baking dish with cooking spray, set aside. In a large bowl mix together broccoli, soup, one cup of cheese, garlic powder, pepper, salt, milk, 1 cup of french onions, and soy sauce. Pour into baking dish, sprinkle remaining cheese over top. Bake for 25 minutes or until cheese is lightly browned. Sprinkle with rest of french fried onions and bake until onions are browned and cheese is bubbly, about 10 more minutes.
ingredients: onion, celery rib, butter, frozen chopped broccoli, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, cooked white rice, tabasco sauce, salt and pepper
name: cheesy broccoli rice casserole

steps: In a 2- or 3-quart saucepan, saute onion and garlic over medium-high heat. Add beans, mashed sweet potatoes, and cumin. Mix well. Warm the tortillas and make burritos with the cheese. Good with salsa and sour cream.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, onion, black beans, ground cumin, ground cinnamon, salt, whole wheat tortillas, soy cheese
name: black bean sweet potato burritos

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Meanwhile, combine cornstarch and water in a small bowl. In saucepan, melt chocolate and condensed milk over low heat, stirring occasionally. Add cornstarch mixture, then the eggs, butter, and salt. Stir until well-combined and smooth. Remove from the heat and add pecans. Mix well and pour into crust. Bake for approximately 30-35 minutes, until a knife inserted into the center of the pie comes out clean. Cool on a rack, then cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 2 hours.
ingredients: pumpkin, evaporated milk, eggs, sugar, pumpkin pie spice, white cake mix, pecans, butter
name: pumpkin pecan crumble pie

steps: Heat butter over medium-high heat until melted. Add mushrooms, sauting 3 minutes. Add 2 cups of half and half, salt, and pepper, stirring for 5 minutes, but do not let it boil. Slowly add parmesan and pesto. Heat through and serve over fettuccine.
ingredients: fresh basil leaves, garlic cloves, pine nuts, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese, pecorino romano cheese, fettuccine
name: fettuccine with pesto sauce

steps: Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Saute onion, cloves, and cinammon until the onion is translucent. Rinse the uncooked rice in a sieve with cold running water. Add rice to pan, sirring to coat. Add raisins, salt, and pepper. Add 2 cups water. Increase the heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and cover. Cook 10-15 minutes until water has been absorbed & rice is cooked. Remove from heat and let stand, covered, for 5 more minutes. Season with additional salt and pepper if desired.
ingredients: long grain rice, bouillon cubes, golden raisin, orange rind, almonds, salt, water, butter
name: orange raisin rice blend

steps: Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes.
ingredients: blue potatoes, butter, dried lavender, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: blue on blue potatoes
