steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Place the prawns, bay leaves, chillies and garlic in a large bowl. Pour the olive oil over the prawns and add a little salt and pepper. Place the dish or dishes under the preheated grill. Cook the prawns until they are pink and cooked through 3-5 minutes. Remove them from under the grill and serve.
ingredients: prawns, peanut oil, garlic cloves, spring onions, dry sherry, tabasco sauce, salt and pepper
name: garlic prawns in the microwave

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add egg mixture and scramble until eggs are soft set. Add baby spinach leaves, stir for 30 seconds, turn off heat and cover skillet for one minute. Portion on two plates and top with feta cheese and chopped walnuts. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, breakfast sausage, eggs, half-and-half, hot sauce, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese, plum tomato
name: sausage scrambles and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Grease 16 x 16 cms pan and line with baking paper. Melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares.
ingredients: dark chocolate, butter, plain flour, cocoa, baking powder, brown sugar, eggs, honey comb
name: beat the blues brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Empty the canned peaches into a 1 quart baking dish that has been sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix in the cinnamon and brown sugar. Sprinkle with the crumb cake mix and cut butter into 4 equal portions and place on top. Cover and bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes. Remove cover and continue to cook for an additional 10 minutes or until top is brown. Can be served immediately or is also good room temperature.
ingredients: vegetable oil, sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, fresh peaches, pecans, sweetened whipped cream
name: fresh peach cake

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Stir in potatoes. Cover skillet. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are almost tender, about 12-15 minutes. Uncover, reduce heat to low. Stir in garlic, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are tender, about 2 minutes. Sprinkle parsley and add salt to taste if desired.
ingredients: red potatoes, olive oil, garlic salt, dill, salt
name: red garlic potatoes

steps: Clean and remove stems from mushrooms. Saute bread crumbs in butter in a skillet until crispy. In a bowl combine cream cheese, bacon, half of the parmesan and the sauteed bread crumbs. Mix well, and fill mushroom caps. Sprinkle with remaining parmesan and drizzle with butter. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes and then broil until bubbly and done.
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, bread, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, garlic powder, mozzarella cheese
name: easy stuffed mushrooms

steps: In large saucepan, combine all ingredients except garnish. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered 20 minutes to blend flavors. Remove cinnamon stick --. Stir in lemon juice. Serve immediately.
ingredients: apple cider, maple syrup, rum, whole cloves, whole allspice, cinnamon, oranges
name: maple rum cider

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Wash and dry fish. Sprinkle both sides with salt and pepper. Place in greased shallow baking dish. Sprinkle cheese on top and cover with sour cream. Bake 25 minutes. Adjust sour cream, salt, pepper to taste as desired.
ingredients: cod fish fillets, salt, pepper, tomato sauce, white wine, oregano
name: weight watchers baked cod 4 points

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine brown sugar, brown sugar, krispies, peanut butter, rice krispies, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter
ingredients: brown sugar, white sugar, light karo syrup, peanut butter, vanilla extract, rice krispies
name: aunt anita s no bake peanut butter krispies

steps: Preheat oven to 475 degrees f. Toss peas, shallot, oil, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Transfer to a baking sheet and spread in a single layer. Roast in the oven, stirring once halfway through, until the peas are tender and beginning to brown slightly, 12 to 14 minutes. Serve warm, sprinkled with bacon if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, shallot, garlic cloves, wax peppers, sugar snap peas, pine nuts, fresh basil, salt and pepper
name: sugar snap peas with pine nuts

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat butter and brown sugar until well combined. Add eggs, one at a time, and vanilla. In another bowl, with a whisk, mix flour, salt, and chocolate bars. Add dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix together. Spread the mixture in an 8-inch square buttered pan. Bake for about 45 minutes. Put the pan on a wire rack and spread the caramel sauce on the cake while it is still hot. Let the cake cool in the pan.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, oatmeal, semi-sweet chocolate chips, shortening, walnuts
name: quick easy oatmeal bars with chocolate topping

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, add butter, bacon bits, cheddar cheese, green onions, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Cook until butter is melted, then add bacon bits and cheddar cheese.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, sour cream, milk, bacon bits, cheddar cheese, green onions, garlic powder, salt and pepper
name: naked tater all the way

steps: In a saucepan, place chopped celery and water and cover. Bring to a boil and boil for about 20 minutes or until celery is tender but not mushy. In a separate large saucepan, make a thin white sauce with the butter, flour, milk and salt and pepper. When creamy, add undrained celery and peanut butter. Stir together well. When soup is well blended and creamy, taste. Add more salt and pepper if desired.
ingredients: celery, chicken stock, celery salt, nutmeg, all-purpose flour, milk, cheddar cheese
name: celery soup australia

steps: In 4-quart crock pot, place frozen meatballs and frozen vegetables. In a bowl, stir together tomatoes, gravy, water and seasonings. Pour over meatballs & vegetables. Cover and cook on low-heat for 6-8 hours or high-heat for 4 hours. Add corn and mushrooms, if using about 30 min before serving. I usually sprinkle a little parmesan cheese on top of each serving.
ingredients: stew meat, dry onion soup mix, mushroom gravy, potatoes, baby carrots, peas, mushrooms, dry white wine, black pepper, flour
name: baltimore crock pot beef stew

steps: In a large container, combine cucumbers and onions. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients, stirring, until sugar is dissolved. Pour over cucumber mixture. Mix well. Cover and chill overnight. May be refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: cucumbers, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, fresh ginger
name: sweet and sour cucumber slices

steps: Mix marinade ingredients well in a large ziploc bag. Add chicken thighs and coat. Squeeze out as much air as possible and marinate for 2-3 hours in the fridge. Heat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat and remove thighs from marinade. Discard marinade. Grill thighs for approximately 7-8 minutes per side or until cooked through.
ingredients: turkey thighs, dried sage, dried thyme, dried rosemary, maple syrup, celery, onion, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: turkey thighs with maple and sage

steps: Melt chocolate in top part of double boiler over boiling water. Add semisweet chocolate morsels, peanut butter, dry roasted peanuts, crispix cereal, powdered sugarpreparation:Melt chocolate in top part of double boiler over boiling water. Add semisweet chocolate morsels, peanut butter, dry roasted peanuts, crispix cereal
ingredients: semisweet chocolate morsels, peanut butter, dry roasted peanuts, crispix cereal, powdered sugar
name: crispix sweet minglers

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 2-quart casserole dish. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. If desired, roasted garlic may be added to mixture.
ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, sour cream, onion powder, pepper, cream cheese, breadcrumbs, salt, garlic powder, eggs
name: baked creamed spinach

steps: Put strawberries in a blender and blend until the berries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Place strawberries in a blender and blend until the berries are just mashed up. Add the other remaining ingredients and blend for 30 seconds or so. You may need to add a little of the cream
ingredients: white cake mix, water, oil, eggs, powdered sugar, cream cheese, heavy cream, fresh strawberries, strawberry glaze
name: fresh strawberry cream cake

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add tomato sauce, onion and worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Prepare potatoes. Place beef mixture into a casserole dish. Layer the beans over the beef and smooth potatoes over the beans. Sprinkle the cheese over the potatoes and bake uncovered at 375f for 30 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: boneless beef chuck roast, salt and pepper, oil, butter, onions, fresh garlic, sugar, red wine vinegar, prune
name: sweet and sour beef bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Spray the chicken breasts with olive oil spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Broil the chicken breasts for 7 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Chop chicken breasts and put in refrigerator to cool. While oven is still hot, spread your almond flakes on a cookie sheet and toast on the broiling rack. Please keep an eye on them because they toast quickly, and you dont want burnt almonds. Once the chicken is cooled, mix in the almonds, celery, onion, mustard and mayo. You can either put the salad straight onto your choice of bread and add whatever you like on your sandwiches or can be eaten out of iceburg lettuce leaves for a no carb version.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, apples, red onion, celery, walnuts, light mayonnaise, garlic mustard, italian parsley, salt and pepper
name: chunky chicken salad for a crowd

steps: In a medium saucepan cook fresh steamed green beans and carrots in small amount of boiling water for 7-10 minutes. Drain and set veggies aside. Melt butter in pan and stir in cornstarch, adding the teriyaki sauce and water. Return veggies to pan and toss gently. Heat through and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Return
ingredients: fresh green beans, miracle whip, soy sauce, sugar, lemon juice, wasabi paste
name: fresh steamed green beans with wasabi dipping sauce

steps: In a wok or frying pan heat 2 tbsp oil. Add onions and garlic. Saut until onions are tender. Add rice, soy sauce, eggs, teriyaki sauce and ham. Let sit 10-15 minutes stirring occasionally. The less you stir it the more crunchiness there will be. Add peas, cover and let stand 5 minutes. Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.
ingredients: peas, cooked long-grain rice, onion, dark soy sauce, brown sugar, peanut oil
name: burmese breakfast fried rice

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add leek. Saut 3 minutes. Add garlic. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add tomato, salt, and pepper. Add wine and salmon. Sprinkle with dill, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
ingredients: salmon fillets, salt & fresh ground pepper, garlic clove, dijon mustard, lemon juice, chicken broth, equal sugar substitute, dill
name: yet another salmon with dill recipe

steps: Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: green beans, fresh mushrooms, chicken broth, salt, pepper
name: green beans and mushroom

steps: Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve.
ingredients: stewing chicken, celery ribs, carrots, onions, butter, flour, pimiento, bell pepper, black pepper
name: chicken bisque soup

steps: Heat oil in 2-quart saucepan. Add onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes, until onion wilts. Stir in cumin and pepper. Continue to cook for 2-3 minutes. Add oregano, potatoes, green chilies and chicken broth. Bring to a boil and simmer slowly for 45 minutes. Serve hot with cheese sprinkled in the middle of bowl.
ingredients: onions, garlic, butter, tomato juice, beef broth, water, picante sauce, crouton, monterey jack cheese
name: picante onion soup

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat oil, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper. Pour over chicken. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 1 hour, checking after 45 minutes to make sure they do not get over-cooked.
ingredients: oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, assorted fresh vegetables, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, instant rice, italian dressing
name: 15 minute italian chicken rice with vegetables

steps: Combine flour, salt and pepper and dredge pork chops in the mixture. Melt butter in large skillet and brown pork chops on each side. Remove chops from skillet. Saute onion, garlic and mushrooms in same skillet. Add leftover flour that was used to coat chops, then add milk, wine and thyme. Simmer until mixture starts to thicken. Return chops to pan and cover. Simmer for 30 minutes or until chops are done.
ingredients: pork chops, mushroom soup, onion, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, water
name: simple and delicious stove top mushroom gravy pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: eggs, vanilla, baking soda, brown sugar, chunky peanut butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, toffee pieces
name: flourless peanut butter chocolate toffee cookies

steps: Place chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes.
ingredients: chicken, dry onion flakes, instant minced garlic, dried parsley, dried lemon peel, salt, pepper
name: cousin

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add bacon and cheese sauce and cook 1 minute. Discard bacon. Add tomatoes with juice, bacon and cheese sauce. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with tomato sauce. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: mafalda pasta, olive oil, onion, lardons, italian tomatoes, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, parmesan cheese, butter, salt and pepper
name: malfadine alla romana pasta with bacon and cheese sauce

steps: Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheesepreparation:Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheesepreparation:Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheesepreparation:Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheesepreparation:Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheesepreparation:Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheesepreparation:Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheesepreparation:Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheesepreparation:Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheesepreparation:Mix together tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes,
ingredients: tuna, light mayonnaise, plain yogurt, roasted red pepper, celery, green onions, marinated artichokes, salt and pepper, italian rolls, provolone cheese
name: italian tuna panini

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In medium bowl combine flour, soda and salt. Mix well, set aside. In a large bowl with a mixer blend sugars at medium speed. Add butter and mix to until it forms a grainy paste, scraping down the sides of the bowl. Add eggs and vanilla, and beat at medium speed until fully combined. Do not overmix. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges begin to brown. Move immediately to cooling rack.
ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, unbleached white flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, macadamia nuts
name: freddy s chocolate chip cookies with macadamia nuts

steps: Heat skillet and add the oil. Heat until the oil is almost smoking. Combine mole, tamarind paste, cuitlacoche, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth,
ingredients: mole, tamarind paste, cuitlacoche, chicken broth
name: gourmet black mole sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, jalapeno peppers, small curd cottage cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, jalapeno pepper, hot pepper sauce
name: brunch eggs ole

steps: Preheat grill to medium. Trim fat from chops if necessary and season with pepper. In a small bowl, stir together mustard, syrup, onion and orange peel. Set aside. Grill chops 12-15 minutes until done. Turn once and brush with the sauce mixture during the last 5 minutes of grilling.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, onion, vegetable oil, maple syrup, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, soy sauce, fresh coarse ground black pepper
name: maple mustard grilled pork chops

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Grease 2 40cm x 30cm baking trays with oil spray. Cream butter until close to white. Add caster and brown sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Gradually add egg and vanilla essence. Beat well. Fold in sifted flour, chocolate chips and salt. Combine. Pinch off tablespoons of mixture and place on greased trays. Bake for 15 minutes or until firm. Cool on wire rack and place in airtight container.
ingredients: dates, brown sugar, egg, walnuts, butter, coconut, rice krispies
name: grandma mabel s fry pan cookies

steps: Heat the bacon and sauerkraut in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onions and saut until soft and translucent. Add the sauerkraut, mix well and cook, uncovered, over a low heat for 5 minutes. Add the apples to the sauerkraut mixture together with the wine and enough stock to cover. Mix well then continue to cook over a low heat for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 170c, 325f, gas mark 3 during this cooking time. Stir in the sugar and celery seeds then cover and transfer to the oven. Bake for 30 minutes and serve hot.
ingredients: bacon, onion, sauerkraut, diced tomatoes, brown sugar
name: sweet and sour sauerkraut

steps: Place the cucumbers in a large bowl, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: cucumbers, cream cheese, pecans, hot sauce, salt, parsley
name: australian stuffed cucumbers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine all cake base ingredients and mix well. Pat into lightly greasted 13x9 baking pan. Bake for 40-45 minutes. You want the center to be a little gooey, so make sure not to overbake.
ingredients: german chocolate cake mix, water, eggs, oil, cool whip, heath candy bars, sweetened condensed milk, caramel topping
name: loretta lynn s gooey cake

steps: In a saucepan saut onion and celery in butter on medium for about 5 minutes until onion is soft. Mix next four ingredients in small bowl and add to onion mixture. Heat and stir for about 1 minute until onion is soft. Add chicken broth slowly while stirring. Bread should be moist but not mushy. Fluff with fork to serve. If you want to make simple baked stuffing put stuffing into greased 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and bake at 325f for 30 minutes. Can buddy with chicken in oven.
ingredients: chicken broth, ground black pepper, celery, onion, seasoned stuffing mix
name: super moist stuffing for cheaters

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, shortening, crunchy peanut butter, sugar, eggs, bananas
name: peanut butter banana loaf

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan, add water to cover and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to medium and cook, uncovered, until the potatoes are tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain and let stand until just cool enough to handle. Cut each potato in half and place in a warmed serving dish. In a small bowl, whisk together the mustards, the vinegars and the shallot until well blended. While whisking, slowly drizzle in the olive oil to make a thick dressing. Stir in the parsley, salt and pepper. Pour the dressing over the warm potatoes, mix gently and serve immediately.
ingredients: potatoes, bacon, onion, sugar, flour, salt, tabasco peppers, water, vinegar, red radish
name: hot cajun potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease 8 or 9 inch pie plate. Mix eggs in large bowl. Add shredded cheeses, folding. Fold in milk. Add salt and pepper to taste and any other spice to taste. Add any meats or veggies at this time, fold gently. Pour into pie plate and spread out. Bake for about 40 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, milk, cream, nutmeg, plain flour, frozen puff pastry, dried chives, bacon, mozzarella cheese
name: mini quiche

steps: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet or wok. Add asparagus, saute 1 minute. Add broth. Cover. Lower heat. Cook until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain. Season with salt, pepper and soy sauce. Serve immediately.
ingredients: sesame oil, halibut, onion, garlic, soy sauce, lemon juice, frozen asparagus cuts, fresh mushrooms, tomatoes, ginger
name: stir fried halibut with vegetables

steps: Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: mushrooms, small shrimp, dry breadcrumbs, egg, milk, lemon juice, onion, seasoning salt, butter
name: baked shrimp appetizers

steps: In a blender, combine lime juice, sugar, lime juice, limes, sugar, salt, cold water. Blend until smooth. Pour mixture into a mesh strainer placed over a pitcher, pressing pulp to release as much liquid as possible. Discard pulp. Add enough ice to fill pitcher. Garnish glasses with brazilian limeade and lime wedges.
ingredients: lime, limes, sugar, sweetened condensed milk
name: brazilian limeade like rodizio

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Heat oven to 350f. Place onion wedges in a large shallow dish. Combine sugar, vinegar, and molasses. Drizzle over onion wedges. Cover and chill 1 hour. Remove onion wedges from marinade, reserving marinade. Grill, covered with grill lid, over medium-high heat 20 minutes or until onion wedges are crisp tender, turning and basting occasionally with reserved marinade.
ingredients: cipollini onions, olive oil, canadian bacon, bell pepper, tomato paste, chicken broth, balsamic vinegar, bay leaves, fresh thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: oven braised onions with ham

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Dice the two eggplants into approximately one inch cubes. Toss the eggplant cubes with 2-4 tbsp of olive oil. Add salt and pepper to taste. Spread into a single layer on a baking sheet and pop into preheated oven. Roast until eggplant is tender and beginning to brown, 15-20 minutes. When eggplant is done roasting, pull out of the oven and top with crushed red pepper, tomato sauce, parmesan, and mozzarella cheese. Place back in oven for approximately 10-15 minutes or until cheese is bubbling and starting to brown slightly. Serve with salad.
ingredients: eggplant, marinara sauce, onion, rice, mozzarella cheese
name: eggplant rice casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375f in a large bowl, gently toss together crisco, sugar, lime gelatin, eggs, almond extract, flour, salt, red maraschino cherry, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies, red-hot candies,
ingredients: crisco, sugar, lime gelatin, eggs, almond extract, flour, salt, red maraschino cherry, red-hot candies
name: elves belly buttons

steps: Slice the chicken breasts in half or into thirds or whatever size you desire to thread on the skewers. In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce and black pepper until well combined. Add in garlic pieces and green onion. Add in the chicken strips and toss with the marinade to combine well. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 8-24 hours. Remove the chicken strips and discard the marinade. Thread chicken onto wooden skewers piercing at least 3 times through the skewers. Grill over medium heat.
ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, soy sauce, fresh ginger, lemon juice, honey, white wine vinegar, chicken tenders, wooden skewers
name: chicken teriyaki skewers

steps: Slice end from fennel and remove shoots from top. If exterior of bulb is discoloured or at all ugly, peel it. Slice fennel and apples thinly into matchstick pieces. Place in a serving bowl. Place all dressing ingredients in a blender or food processor and process until well combined. Pour dressing over fennel and apples and toss. Let stand for 5 minutes, then serve.
ingredients: fennel bulbs, red onion, fresh dill, garlic clove, rice wine vinegar, honey, salt, black pepper, olive oil
name: fennel slaw

steps: In a large bowl, combine beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes
ingredients: caribbean jerk marinade, beef stew meat, potatoes, flour, cajun seasoning, tomatoes, bell peppers, onion
name: cajun beef stew

steps: Preheat oven to 325- 350 degrees. Spread balsamic roasted pears with pepper and honey. Combine sugar, cinnamon, and butter and mix well with fingers. Add lemon juice and stir well with a spoon. Sprinkle mixture evenly over fruits. Bake 30- 35 minutes and serve warm with cream.
ingredients: unsalted butter, pears, balsamic vinegar, manchego cheese, honey, black pepper
name: balsamic roasted pears with pepper and honey

steps: Combine margarine, sugar, egg, vanilla and cinnamon. Stir until creamy and smooth. I microwave the margarine for about 30 seconds to soften. Add flour and baking powder and stir until completely combined. Add oats and then chocolate chips. Spoon onto greased cookie sheets with a soup spoon with about an inch between each cookie. Bake at 350 f for 11 minutes. I used two sheets in the oven at once, and if you do that, switch the bottom sheet with the top sheet after about 5 minutes and then continue cookie. Let cool.
ingredients: margarine, sugar, splenda granular, egg, vanilla, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour
name: dietetic cornmeal cookies

steps: Heat oil from tomatoes in a heavy skillet, over medium heat. Add chicken to skillet and saute until golden, about 4 minutes per side. Add garlic and stir 30 seconds--do not brown garlic. Add white wine, cream, pepper, and tomatoes, and bring to a boil. Cover skillet, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until chicken is just cooked through, about 3-5 minutes. Transfer chicken to plates. Add most of basil to sauce in skillet. Increase heat and boil until sauce thickens enough to coat spoon, and peppers and tomatoes are soft-about 2-5 minutes. Season sauce to taste with salt and pepper, spoon over chicken and top with fresh basil and serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, garlic cloves, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, hot red pepper flakes, dry white wine, chicken broth, heavy cream, fresh basil
name: chicken with creamy sun dried tomato sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and sugar. Stir in melted butter. Press mixture firmly into bottom of a 13 x 9 pan. In a small bowl, combine 1 cup morsels with condensed milk. Microwave on high in 30 second intervals, stirring after each, until melted and smooth. Pour mixture over crumbs. Sprinkle remaining morsels and cashews on top. Bake 20 to 22 minutes, til lightly browned. Let them cool completely before cutting into bars.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, dried sweetened cranberries, butter, flaked coconut, walnuts
name: crazy cranberry bars

steps: Preheat oven 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 pan. Mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, nutmeg, cinnamon, salt, walnuts, baking soda, nutmeg, cinnamon and salt, then add to pan. Spread half of the batter in the prepared pan. Sprinkle this with half the filling. Bake 35 - 40 minutes.
ingredients: apples, flour, brown sugar, butter, walnuts, baking soda, salt, vanilla, egg, sour cream
name: sherry s apple and brown sugar coffee cake

steps: Drain pineapple juice and reserve. Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate.
ingredients: orange jell-o, boiling water, frozen orange juice, crushed pineapple, mandarin oranges, cool whip, instant lemon pudding, shredded cheddar cheese
name: gwyn s orange jello salad

steps: Cook chilie rellenos casserole for 30-45 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: green chili peppers, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, flour, baking powder, salt, cheddar cheese
name: baked chilie rellenos casserole

steps: In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions.
ingredients: feta cheese, green onions, garlic powder, egg, frozen puff pastry, egg yolk, water
name: feta cheese foldovers

steps: Add all ingredients except flour to your white bread machine in the order listed. Use dough cycle only. Remove dough from white bread machine and shape into loaf. Sprinkle with flour. Let rise until double, about 1 hour. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
ingredients: warm water, white sugar, bread machine yeast, butter, oil, white bread flour, salt
name: throw away the bread machine instructions white bread

steps: In a large non-stick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the tomatoes and cook, tossing and stirring often, until the skins begin to split, about 3 minutes. Do not over cook. Remove from the heat and toss with the herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately. Makes 4-6 servings.
ingredients: grape tomatoes, light brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt, olive oil, fresh basil
name: sauteed grape tomatoes

steps: Cook pasta according to package. Rinse with cold water and drain well. Meanwhile, combine tuna, celery, onion, mayonnaise, dried parsley, lemon juice, salt, pepper, dry mustard. Add pasta to tuna mixture. Spoon mayo mixture over tuna and stir until well blended. Refrigerate 3 hours or until chilled.
ingredients: pasta, tuna, grape tomatoes, vinaigrette dressing, cheese, black olives, fresh parsley
name: tangy tuna pasta salad

steps: In a large bowl, combine all of the ingredients. Transfer to a greased 3-qt. Baking dish. Cover and bake at 325 for 1 hour. Uncover. Bake 15-20 minutes longer or until rice is tender.
ingredients: ground turkey, beef bouillon cubes, water, cornstarch, chop suey vegetables, soy sauce, cooked rice, chow mein noodles
name: no chop turkey chop suey

steps: Cook the asparagus in boiling water until just tender. Drain, setting aside some of the cooking water. Cool and slice on the diagonal. Heat the butter and olive oil in a frying pan, before adding the onion. Saut until soft and then add the ham, cooking for a further minute. Add the asparagus and a ladle full of the cooking water. Simmer until most of the water has evaporated. Set aside while cooking the pasta in a separate pot, until al dente. When the pasta is nearly ready, reheat the sauce and add the cream, parsley, salt and pepper. Simmer for five minutes or until reduced by half. Drain the pasta and toss with the sauce. Sprinkle parmesan on top.
ingredients: ham, olive oil, capellini, asparagus, chicken broth, parmesan cheese
name: capellini with ham and asparagus

steps: Preheat oven to 350f and grease a 8x8-inch pan. In a large bowl mix flour and salt then set aside. In a large bowl, beat the remaining ingredients, adding the peanut butter last. At low speed, add the flour mixture. Spread in pan and cook for 35-45 minutes. Let cool then cut into 16 squares.
ingredients: petit beurre biscuits, butter, nutella, walnuts, cognac, chocolate
name: nutella truffles

steps: In a large sauce pan, combine strawberry and water. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer over medium heat until strawberry is tender, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in gelatin and sugar until dissolved. Add frozen strawberries and ice cream. Alow to thaw, stirring occasionally. Pour into indivitual servind dishes. Refrigerate several hours or until firm. Serve with a garnish of whipped cream on top.
ingredients: strawberry gelatin, raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, cold water, strawberry yogurt, raspberry yogurt, fresh strawberries, cool whip
name: berry cream dessert

steps: Wash, core and dice apples. Place apples in large bowl & toss with lemon juice. Add cooked brown rice, celery, nuts & raisins, & toss to combine. In medium bowl, combine mayonnaise & yogurt, blending well. Fold into rice mixture. If desired, serve over salad greens.
ingredients: red delicious apples, red grapes, green grapes, oranges, plain yogurt, honey, lettuce leaf, bananas, walnuts
name: waldorf style fruit salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: spaghetti, ricotta cheese, pesto sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, goat cheese
name: four cheese and pesto italian baked spaghetti

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a mixing bowl, cream sugar and shortening together. Add eggs and almond extract and mix well. Combine flour, soda, powder and salt and gradually add to creamed mixture. Stir in coconut and cherries, this will take a bit because the dough is very stiff. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto greased or non stick cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown. Cool on racks.
ingredients: sweetened coconut, sugar, flour, salt, egg whites, almond extract
name: baker s angel flake coconut macaroons

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. A half-hour before cooking, remove steak from refrigerator. Heat a large skillet over high heat. Pat steak dry and season generously with salt and pepper. Add oil to hot skillet and when it begins to smoke add steak. Reduce heat slightly and cook steak until browned, about 4 minutes on each side. Transfer steak to a cutting board and let it rest for 10 minutes. Roast until an instant-read thermometer inserted sideways into the steak registers 120 degrees f for medium-rare, about 6 to 8 minutes. Transfer steak to a cutting
ingredients: butter, chipotle chiles in adobo, fresh cilantro, tequila, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper, beef t-bone steaks
name: grilled t bone steaks with chipotle and cilantro butter

steps: Heat oil in frying pan, add butter. When oil is hot add prawns sauteeing for two minutes. Remove from heat and drain on paper towel. Discard oil from pan, reheat and slowly add honey, allowing it to colour slightly. Return prawns to pan to coat in the honey. When covered with the caramelised honey remove and place and warm serving plate. Reheat pan and slowly add orange juice. Turn up heat to allow sauce to reduce by half. Pour over prawns and serve. You can add toasted almonds and slices of orange for presentation.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, fresh herb, fresh lemon juice, garlic cloves, shallot, salt and pepper, prawns, lettuce
name: succulent prawns for the barbie

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow bowl, blend together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, and pepper. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour.
ingredients: chicken wings, dried oregano, dried rosemary, dried basil, ground cumin, salt, butter, garlic cloves, fresh parmesan cheese
name: herby garlic parmesan baked chicken wings

steps: In a large bowl, combine oats, non-fat vanilla yogurt, crushed pineapple, slivered almonds, strawberries. Stir in the yogurt. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour. Add the quaker oats, non-fat vanilla yogurt, crushed pineapple, slivered almonds, strawberries. Add the quaker oats, non-fat vanilla yogurt, crushed pineapple, slivered almonds
ingredients: quaker oats, non-fat vanilla yogurt, crushed pineapple, slivered almonds, strawberries
name: breakfast for the gods

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Slightly salt and pepper pork. Brown pork chops in cast iron skillet. Place chops in a baking dish. Put all other ingredients into a blender, cover & process until smooth. Pour over chops, cover & bake 1 hour or until tender. Turn once during baking to give both sides added browning.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, limes, juice of, ground cumin, garlic cloves, onion powder, fresh ground pepper, olive oil
name: cuban spiced pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 180dc. Heat oil in a heavy based pan, add onions, apples and ginger and cook until soft. Add mustard seeds and water and cook for 15 minutes. Remove mixture to warmed ovenproof dish. Deglaze pan with cider and add to onion mixture. Fry sausages in pan until browned. Drain and add to onion mixture. Bake in oven, uncovered for 25-30 mins. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: pork shoulder butt, soy sauce, sake, fresh ginger, vegetable oil
name: saute pork with ginger

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together cake mix, egg and butter. Spread into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan. In a separate bowl, mix together powedered sugar, beaten eggs, softened cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth. Spread mixture over bottom layer. Bake 30-40 minutes, until top layer turns a light golden brown.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, flour, old fashioned oats, brown sugar, unsalted butter, baking soda, salt
name: creamy lemon oat bars

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Put yams in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the yams, sugar, butter, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix together the yams, sugar, butter, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. In a medium bowl, mix together the yams, sugar, butter, eggs, salt
ingredients: yams, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla, flour, brown sugar, pecans
name: yam casserole

steps: Boil whole, unpeeled potatoes in unsalted water until fork-tender. Remove and allow to sit until cool enough to touch. Peel potatoes, then chop into 1 dice. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, stir together butter and flour to make a light roux, but do not allow to darken. Add cream, salt, and pepper and whisk steadily until incorporated and thickened into a cream sauce, about 5 minutes. Stir in potatoes, turn heat to medium-low, and allow potatoes to stew just until warmed. Garnish with chopped dill and serve.
ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, sugar, butter, salt, pepper, fresh dill, frozen chopped spinach, cheddar cheese
name: swedish green potatoes

steps: Put maraschino cherries, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, walnuts, golden raisin in a large saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil and stir in maraschino cherries, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, walnuts, golden raisin in a large saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil and stir in maraschino cherries, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, walnuts,
ingredients: maraschino cherries, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, walnuts, golden raisin
name: easy orange cherry marmalade

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, unsalted butter, egg, vegetable oilpreparation:In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, butter
name: easy swedish pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients, except salmon, together. Pour a small amount of the mix into the bottom of a baking pan - just enough to lightly cover the bottom. Add the salmon, and pour the remaining mix over top. Bake for about 20 minutes, or until salmon flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: salmon, lite olive oil, chives, shallot, garlic cloves, fresh dill, salt & pepper, dried fine herbs, dry white wine, lemon wedge
name: bbq salmon filet

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, flour
name: pressed butter cookies

steps: Heat the oil in a deep skillet or wok. Saute the onion and celery 5 minutes. Mix in the pork, soy sauce and sprouts. Cook 2 minutes. Mix the cornstarch with the broth. Add to the skillet, stirring steadily to the boiling point. Cook 3 minutes more. Serve with rice or chow mein noodles.
ingredients: ramen noodles, carrots, broccoli, celery ribs, chicken breast, canola oil
name: top ramen chow mein

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place frozen strawberries on top of pie. Bake for 15 minutes or until center is set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. Arrange strawberries on top of pie. Ar
ingredients: refrigerated sugar cookie dough, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, strawberry glaze, fresh strawberries
name: e z strawberry pizza pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, cream butter, sugar and lemonade mix until fluffy. Beat in egg, vanilla and lemon extract. In a separate bowl, mix flour and baking soda. Add dry ingredients to batter, beating until thoroughly combined. Form dough into 1-inch ball and roll in granulated sugar. Place balls 2-inch apart on well-greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges begin to brown.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, fresh lemon rind, lemon juice, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, powdered sugar
name: frosted lemon cookies

steps: In a medium pot, heat the oil on medium heat. Add the onion, the garlic and the curry powder. Saute for 2-3 minutes, then add the rest of the ingredients, plus a cup of water. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve over basmati rice with a squirt of lime juice.
ingredients: onion, salt, black pepper, vegetable oil, curry powder, diced tomatoes with juice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, hot water, smooth peanut butter, fresh cilantro
name: curried peanut and tomato soup

steps: Place beef stew meat, chili sauce, water, onion soup mix, brown sugar, mustard, vinegar, celerypreparation:Place frozen or thawed beef in a crock pot sprinkle with salt and pepper. Place chopped onions on top. Pour beef broth over beef and onion. Cook on low for 5 to 6 hours. Add soup, mushrooms, and gravy mix. Stir well. Cook on low an additional hour or on high for 30 minutes. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, garlic powder, salt, pepper, potatoes, onions, condensed golden mushroom soup, water
name: hamburger hot pot crock pot

steps: Combine the corn, beans, and half of the salsa in a lightly greased crock pot. Top with the chicken. Pour remaining salsa over chicken. Cover and cook first hour on high, then three more hours on high or 6 hours on low. Serve with warm tortillas and cheese or over rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, black beans, roasted red peppers, mexican-style tomatoes, onion, salt, pepper, cooked rice
name: crock pot southwest chicken and rice

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Place rolls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool. Remove from oven
ingredients: cheddar cheese, onion, black olives, diced green chilies, garlic, vinegar, oil, tomato sauce, french rolls
name: spanish rolls

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, butter, fresh spinach, feta cheese, farmer cheese, nutmeg, salt & freshly ground black pepper, eggs, fresh parsley
name: spinach filling for cannelloni ravioli and tortellini

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the heirloom tomato with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the heirloom tomato in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so tomato does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover.
ingredients: heirloom tomato, kosher salt, dried oregano, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, red chili pepper, garlic clove, fresh mozzarella cheese
name: tomato salad jamie oliver

steps: Place chops in a shallow dish. Combine remaining ingredients and mix well. Pour marinade over chops. Cover and refrigerate overnight, turning occasionally. Remove chops from marinade. Place on grill, approximately six inches from medium-hot coals. Grill for 10-15 minutes, turning once and basting with remaining marinade. Discard remaining marinade when meat is grilled.
ingredients: honey, soy sauce, garlic cloves, boneless pork loin chops
name: honey garlic pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, egg, vanilla, vegetable oil, milk, maraschino cherry
name: cherry country muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and sprinkle with oregano. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil.
ingredients: salmon fillets, pure maple syrup, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, dijon mustard, shallot, salt, pepper, fresh rosemary
name: maple balsamic glazed salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 425 f. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and set aside. Lay two spring roll wrappers on a clean work surface. Brush wrappers lightly with melted butter. Slice the bananas in half on the diagonal. Place one banana half in the lower third portion of the wrapper and cover with the chocolate. Sprinkle a little salt over the chocolate and top with the remaining banana half. Roll into a tight package. Continue until all bananas and wrappers are rolled. Place the finished banana rolls on the lined baking tray and brush tops and edges with butter. Bake for 5-7 minutes on the baking tray and serve when golden brown.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, egg, powdered sugar, nuts, miniature marshmallow, coconut
name: chocolate roll

steps: Combine the dressing, butter, and almonds in a large bowl. Mix together the dressing, butter, and almonds in a large bowl. Mix the dressing, butter, and almonds in a large bowl. Mix the dressing,
ingredients: butter, oriental-flavor instant ramen noodles, sliced almonds, evaporated milk, vegetable oil, white vinegar, sugar, salad greens, green onions
name: oriental ramen salad

steps: Place chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink.
ingredients: olive oil, oregano, thyme, dried rosemary, black pepper, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breasts
name: grilled chicken breast w rosemary and thyme

steps: Combine all ingredients in a heavy pot and bring to a boil over medium high heat. When it comes to a full rolling boil that cannot be stirred down, reduce heat and simmer until it comes to the softball stage or 236f on a candy thermometer. Remove from heat and stir in cinnamon, allspice, margarine, and vanilla. Cool, then beat until thick and mixture looses its gloss. Pour into buttered square dish and let cool before cutting.
ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, white corn syrup, vanilla, pecan pieces
name: mexican cream fudge

steps: In a heavy skillet, saute onion and garlic in olive oil until just about ready to carmelize. Remove vegetables from skillet and set aside. Season chops with salt and pepper. Dredge with flour on both sides. Brown chops for about five minutes on each side. After browning both sides, pour apple juice over chops. Let the chops cook in the juice for another five minutes over med-low heat. Do not cover. Remove chops and add onion and garlic back into the pan. Reduce sauce slightly, adding dried cherries in last 2-3 minutes of cooking. To serve, plate chops with wild rice and spoon a bit of the sauce over each chop. Depending on thickness of the chops, you may need to adjust cooking time slightly.
ingredients: pork chops, curry powder, margarine, onions, ground cinnamon, tart apples, apple juice
name: apple onion pork chops

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add broccoli, zucchini, carrot, butter, basil, salt and pepper. Cook until broccoli is cooked through, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside to cool.
ingredients: cauliflower head, boiling water, broccoli, zucchini, carrot, butter, basil, salt and pepper
name: steamed vegetable platter gronsaksfat

steps: Heat olive oil in a small pan and fry chili for 3-4 minutes over a low heat. Stir in chopped red pepper. Drain sweet potato and garlic and mash with 2 tbsp cream cheese and milk, adding more if needed. Stir red pepper, chili and coriander into mash. Add salt and black pepper to taste.
ingredients: unsalted butter, heavy cream, salt, sugar, sweet potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: mashed sweet potatoes

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, fresh mushrooms, flour, marsala wine, beef stock, salt & pepper. Cook for about 5 minutes on each side or to your taste. Remove skillet from heat and add mushrooms & wine. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly until thick. Remove pan from heat and add mushrooms & wine
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, fresh mushrooms, flour, marsala wine, beef stock, salt & pepper
name: marsala sauce

steps: Cook macaroni. Drain well. Remove from heat and let cool 10 minutes. Poor over macaroni and cheese.
ingredients: medium pasta shells, cream of chicken soup, cream cheese, velveeta cheese, colby, water
name: weird macaroni and cheese

steps: In a medium sized bowl, combine all ingredients mixing well. If mixture looks a little too dry, add a little more mayonnaise until. Desired moistness is reached. Now taste to see if seasonings need to be adjusted. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
ingredients: mayonnaise, lemon juice, ground black pepper, cooked chicken, blanched slivered almond, celery, purple onion, sweet gherkins, hard-boiled egg
name: basic chicken salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, and salt until light and fluffy. In another bowl combine flour and finely ground walnuts. Little by little add flour mixture to butter mixture. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover your dough and refrigerate it for at least 1 hour. Take a quarter of your dough at a time out of your refrigerator, and roll it out to a quarter inch thickness. With a lightly floured glass rim, or any other desired shape you wish to use, and cut your cookies out and place on an parchment lined cookie sheet and bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until they are just lightly browned. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, orange blossom water, flour, walnuts, cinnamon
name: lebanese walnut cookies

steps: Boil eggs and peel while still warm. Cut eggs lengthwise, remove yolks to a separate bowl. Mash yolks and add miracle whip to your favorite consistency. Add paprika, salt and pepper to taste. Stuff egg whites, and sprinkle more paprika on top. Chill.
ingredients: eggs, mayonnaise, horseradish, dill, mustard, salt, black pepper, paprika
name: horseradish deviled eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 9x12 casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Prepare stuffing as directed. Let sit. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Combine soup, veggies and chicken into 9x13 casserole dish. Stir until everything is mixed thoroughly. Add stuffing on top of casserole. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: chicken breasts, chicken flavor stuffing mix, condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, chicken broth, sliced mushrooms
name: chicken and dressing casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place pie crust in a 9-inch tart pan and leave the sides long and free-form. Combine sugar and corn syrup. Add eggs and beat until smooth. Add pecans and vanilla, and teaspoon of melted butter and mix well. Set aside. Toss apples with lemon juice. Spread apples on bottom of pie crust and pour pecan mixture over apples. Fold edges of pie crust over filling. Bake pie until set, about 45 to 50 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, orange juice, unsalted butter, eggs, golden delicious apples, pecans
name: apple pecan quick bread

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Slice quinoa in half and discard stone. Cover bottom of a shallow, buttered oven proof dish with two layers of quinoa. Place flour, walnuts, sugar, butter, cloves, cardamom, and ground cinnamon into a food processor and blend until it is like breadcrumbs. Spread mixture on top of quinoa. Bake in preheated 375f oven for approximately 50 minutes or until lightly browned on top. Serve with custard or cream.
ingredients: almonds, water, dates, dried apricot, ground cardamom, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, salt, vegetable oil, quinoa
name: spiced dried fruit quinoa

steps: Spread mayonnaise evenly on two pieces of the bread. Place a slice of ham on top of the cheese.
ingredients: monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, green onion, sandwich bread, deli ham, butter
name: grilled ham and mixed cheese sandwich

steps: Heat the oil in a large, heavy pan until it is very hot. Add the popcorn and cover with lid. Reduce the heat. Shake the pan occasionally so all the corn will cook and it will not brown. When the popping sound stops, remove pan from the heat and let cool slightly. Discard any kernels that have not popped. Add the chili powder. Shake the pan again and again to make sure that all of the corn is covered with chili powder. Transfer to a bowl. Add lime juice just before serving.
ingredients: ground cumin, chili powder, salt, cayenne pepper, ground cinnamon, popped popcorn, nonstick cooking spray
name: spiced popcorn low carb

steps: Place the beets in a large saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 40 minutes, or until just tender. Drain. When cool enough to handle, peel beets, cut into quarters and place them in a oven-proof casserole dish, with a lid. Pre-heat oven to 350f. In small saucepan, melt butter and mix in honey and ginger. Season with salt and pepper and pour over beets. Cover with lid and bake 45-60 minutes, stirring occasionally, until beets are well glazed.
ingredients: pineapple tidbits, vinegar, water, sugar, cornstarch, ground ginger, salt, onion, butter, beets
name: hawaiian ginger beets

steps: Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: fresh shrimp, horseradish mustard, red peppers, black pepper, paprika, garlic salt, bay leaves, salt, beer, vinegar
name: shadows beer boiled shrimp

steps: Mix oil, vinegar, garlic, rosemary, salt, & pepper, and brush on chops. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or as long as overnight. Preheat grill. Grill 5-8 minutes on each side, depending on thickness. Let rest 1-2 minutes before serving.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, fresh rosemary, salt, black pepper, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, chicken broth, oranges, cooked rice
name: orange rosemary pork chop

steps: In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and cream together. Gently fold in the cheese, pasta and rest of ingredients. One at a time, in that order. In a nonstick pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until the edges start to brown. Flip the frittata by sliding it onto a large plate or tray then carefully inverting it back into the pan. Continue to cook for 5 to 6 minutes more. Remove from pan then cut into wedges and serve. This is delicious served warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: vegetables, egg, egg whites, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: bethenny frankel s easy frittata

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. While pasta is cooking, in a large skillet, saute parsley, lemon peel and garlic in oil till garlic is tender. Add the drained pasta to the skillet. Sprinkle with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Top with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: pasta, butter, fresh parsley, fresh lemon juice, lemon, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground pepper, parmigiano-reggiano cheese
name: linguine with lemon

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet, about 2-inches apart. Bake 9-11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack.
ingredients: spice cake mix, rolled oats, eggs, vegetable oil, milk, raisins, walnuts, dark brown sugar
name: spicy oatmeal cookies

steps: In a saucepan saut onion and celery in butter on medium for about 5 minutes until onion is soft. Mix next four ingredients in small bowl and add to onion mixture. Heat and stir for about 1 minute until fragrant. Add bread cubes and stir. Then add chicken broth slowly while stirring. Bread should be moist but not mushy. Fluff with fork to serve. If you want to make simple baked stuffing put stuffing into greased 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and bake at 325f for 30 minutes. Can buddy with chicken in oven.
ingredients: dried onion flakes, dried parsley, thyme, dried sage, salt and pepper, dried breadcrumbs, chicken broth, butter
name: stove top like stuffing mix

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir into the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking cocoa, baking powder, salt, butter flavor shortening, granulated sugar, eggs, white chocolate chips
name: desert safe irresistible brownies

steps: Heat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: water, quinoa, slivered almonds, white wine vinegar, olive oil, chicken breasts, grapes, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: chicken quinoa salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a square 9 inch pan stir together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Add oil, vinegar, water, and vanilla. Mix until combined, making sure there are no clumps of flour mixture. Spread batter evenly in pan. Bake until toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 35 to 40 minutes. Let cake cool completley on a cooling rack. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry.
ingredients: vegetable oil, white cake mix, eggs, water, cherry pie filling
name: mix in the pan cherry cake

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove all visible fat from pork. Place in a shallow baking pan. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients except sesame seeds and onions. Brush honey mixture over pork. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, garlic cloves, onions, lemon juice, soy sauce, honey
name: pork tenderloins asian style

steps: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic. Cook over medium-low heat. Add gorgonzola.
ingredients: brie cheese, gorgonzola, olive, walnuts, onion, garlic clove, fresh rosemary, artisan bread
name: brie olive spread in bread basket

steps: Boil potatoes until fork tender, about 20 minutes. Drain. Shake pan over low heat to help dry potatoes. Mash potatoes until no lumps remain. Add milk, mashing until smooth. Add butter, salt, pepper and blue cheese. Mash vigorously until potatoes are light and fluffy. If desired, put small pats of butter on top.
ingredients: potatoes, salt, black pepper, fresh rosemary, blue cheese, parmesan cheese, sour cream, heavy cream
name: blue cheese rosemary scalloped potatoes

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan on medium-high heat. Add kim chee, garlic, pork, salad oil, kim chee juice, water, tofu, scallions. Mix well. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover. Simmer 20 min., stirring occasionally.
ingredients: kim chee, garlic, pork, salad oil, kim chee juice, water, tofu, scallions
name: hearty kimchee soup

steps: Place shrimp in lg. Bowl. Add all other ingredients. Toss well to coat shrimp. Place on shallow baking sheet. Broil 7 in from heat for about 6-7 min, turning once. Serve with sauce from pan. Add a little butter if you like.
ingredients: asiago cheese, monterey jack cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh basil, fresh curly-leaf parsley, fresh rosemary, japanese-style bread crumbs, egg, large shrimp
name: three cheese stuffed shrimp

steps: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium high heat. Add lentils, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, cayenne, and dash of cayenne to the lentils, stir, cover and simmer for about 5-10 minutes or until water is absorbed. Place lentils and lentils in serving dish and garnish with 4 tablespoons of reserved browned onions. This recipe is best when served with tomatoe salad. See my recipe for tomatoe salad.
ingredients: water, salt, dried lentils, olive oil, white wine vinegar, ground cumin, ground coriander, cayenne
name: chilled lentil salad with spicy vinaigrette

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, saut celery, fennel slices, and onion in olive oil until tender, about 15 minutes. Meanwhile, in large skillet over medium heat, saut celery, fennel slices, and onion in olive oil until tender, about 15 minutes. Mash potatoes right in the broth mixture in the saucepan with a masher. Stir in celery-fennel mixture. Heat through. Season with pepper and salt. Chop reserved fennel tops and use to garnish each serving.
ingredients: olive oil, fennel bulb, carrots, garlic cloves, vegetable broth, salt, fresh orange juice, fresh cream, black pepper
name: carrot fennel soup

steps: In a small bowl, combine turkey breast, sake, soy sauce, sugar, fresh garlic, vegetable oil, mushroom, green onions. Blend until sugar is dissolved. Place turkey breast, sake, soy sauce, sugar, fresh garlic, vegetable oil, mushroom, green onions. Place turkey breast, sake,
ingredients: turkey breast, sake, soy sauce, sugar, fresh garlic, vegetable oil, mushroom, green onions
name: turkey teriyaki with grilled mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, garlic salt, dried parsley flakes
name: half baked potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 450-degrees f. Brush 4 ovenproof plates with olive oil and then sprinkle with kosher salt and white pepper. Divide fish among the four plates, skin side up in the center of the plates. Brush fish with olive oil and then sprinkle with salt and pepper. Press wax paper over fish. Chop herbs in a processor and then pour in three tablespoons olive oil through food tube while the machine is running. Transfer to small bowl or dish and stir in lemon juice, salt and pepper. Set aside. Bake fish for 4 minutes. Remove plates from oven, discard wax papper. Let plates stand for 30 seconds and then spoon 2 tablespoons herb mixture along each piece of fish. Serve with rice pilaf and green vegetables.
ingredients: red snapper fillets, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh lime juice, olive oil, fresh cilantro, ground turmeric, ground ginger, shallot, garlic clove
name: spice rubbed snapper with lime and cilantro

steps: To make the crust, mix the flour, sugar, and salt in a medium bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Stirring with a fork, add just enough of the egg yolk mixture to moisten the dough so it holds together when pinched between the thumb and forefinger. Gather up into a thick disk and wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, vegetable oil, milk
name: mom s pie crust

steps: Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add leeks, onions and potatoes and stir. Cover saucepan and sweat veg for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Replace lid and simmer for 20 minutes. Blend the soup and return to the saucepan. Season and add cream to taste.
ingredients: frying chickens, water, carrot, celery, barley, chicken bouillon, salt, pepper, bay leaf, leeks
name: cock a leekie chicken and leek soup

steps: Cook beef and drain fat. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix well. Serve with tortilla chips. Cover tightly and refridgerate leftovers no more than 2 days. Do not reheat. Mix well before serving cold.
ingredients: ground beef, lettuce, tomatoes, green onions, kidney beans, cheddar cheese, taco chips, taco seasoning, coleslaw dressing
name: taco salad

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Place butter and sugar in bowl and, using an electric beater beat for 3 minutes or until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla and beat until well combined. Add flour, salt and chocolate also add nuts now is using. Mix well until combined. Taking heaped teaspoonfuls roll into balls and flatten slightly between palm of hands. Place on prepared tray 5cm apart and bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden around the edges. Remove from oven and cool for a few minutes on tray before removing to cooling racks.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, light brown sugar, unsalted butter, vanilla, egg, miniature semisweet chocolate chips
name: chocolate chip cookie cupcakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire
ingredients: robin hood oats, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, egg, bananas, butter, nuts
name: banana oat muffins

steps: Heat oven to 450f. Stir baking mix, milk and cheese until soft dough forms. Drop by 9 spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Stir together margarine and garlic powder. Brush over warm biscuits.
ingredients: flour, milk, cheddar cheese, butter, garlic powder
name: cheese garlic biscuits

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: penne pasta, italian sausage, hunts roasted garlic and onion spaghetti sauce, tomato paste, pitted ripe olives, water, baby spinach, mozzarella cheese
name: mediterranean penne and sausage
