steps: Melt butter in a saucepan. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until clear and thickened. Stir in wine and cook until hot. Serve over steak, hamburgers or other meat.
ingredients: mushroom, onions, garlic, salt, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, butter, parsley, beef tenderloin
name: steak dianne

steps: In food processor add 1/2 cup of apple juice and 1/2 cup of lemon juice. Bring to a rolling boil that cannot be stirred down. Add the liquid pectin and bring back to a boil again for 1 minute. Ladle the hot berry mixture into jars. Wipe tops and place lids on jars and screw caps into place. Place in water bath canner with 1 inch of water covering jars. Bring to a rolling boil that cannot
ingredients: apples, bananas, lemon, juice of, sugar
name: apple banana jam

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Prepare tuna or salmon melt casserole according to package directions. Mix all other ingredients well and put into covered casserole dish. Top with the reserved cheddar prior to baking. Bake for 45 minutes.
ingredients: oil, albacore tuna, cheddar cheese, process american cheese, eggs, flax seeds, garlic powder, salt
name: tuna or salmon melt casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a 9-inch square baking pan with parchment paper. Bake for 30 minutes until set. Let cool before cutting into pieces.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, sweetened coconut, blanched almond, butter, phyllo pastry, vanilla ice cream
name: chocolate coconut filo triangles with vanilla ice cream

steps: In a small saucepan over low heat, saut the curry powder in olive oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. While the curry powder is cooking, mince the onion and chop the crystallized ginger. In a medium bowl, add the mayonnaise, rice vinegar and dijon mustard. Whisk to blend. Add the cooked curry powder, crystallized ginger, onion, pecans and cayenne pepper. Whisk again to thoroughly blend. Add the tuna and mix with a fork until tuna is well blended and coated with the dressing. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: tuna in water, mayonnaise, curry powder, pepper, green onions, dill pickles, dijon mustard, whole wheat bread, lettuce leaves, tomatoes
name: curry tuna fish sandwiches

steps: Try to get 6 equal-sized medium or large red onions. Peel away the outermost layer of onionskin. Carefully slice off the core end of each onion to create a flat base. Make two cuts at right angles through the top of the onion, cutting only halfway through. Push some chopped fresh thyme and kosher salt down into the cuts, along with a tablespoon of soft butter for each onion. Cook in an earthenware dish, or in a roasting pan on a layer of kosher salt or sea salt. Place in a preheated 400f oven for 30-35 minute. You can also tuck the onions into the roasting pan with your chicken or lamb as it roasts. Place in a roasting pan on a layer of kosher salt or sea salt. Place in a roasting pan on a layer of kosher salt or sea
ingredients: red onion, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, mayonnaise
name: roasted red onion mayo

steps: Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking.
ingredients: soy sauce, marmalade, ketchup, garlic clove, pork ribs
name: slow cooker savory pork ribs

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Grease a 9 x 13 pan. Cream together butter and sugar. Add eggs, sour cream and vanilla. Mix together flour, baking powder and salt. Add to butter mixture. Spread half the batter in the prepared pan. Sprinkle this with half the filling. Add the rest of the batter and sprinkle with the remaining filling. Bake 35 - 40 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, butter, sugar, eggs, sour cream, salt, baking soda, vanilla, fresh lemon rind
name: bigjay s sour cream pound cake

steps: Place beef bouillon, soy sauce, garlic powder, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Add beef bouillon, soy sauce, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Cover and simmer on low until onions are tender and broth forms a nice gravy.
ingredients: water, beef bouillon, soy sauce, garlic powder, salt and pepper
name: simple au jus gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 325 f. Line 9x13 pan with tin foil. Grease the foil, then set pan aside. Mix all ingredients in a large bowl until well combined. Press evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until golden brown across the top of the bars. Immediately remove from pan and invert on to a cooling rack so that the foil can be removed from the bars. Allow to cool, then cut into bars. I wrap them indiviually, so they can be quickly snatched for a snack of breakfast on the run.
ingredients: oatmeal, flour, coconut, sugar, baking soda, salt, applesauce, honey, chocolate chips, craisins
name: granola bar

steps: Preheat oven to 325f and grease a ring mold. In a bowl, combine bacon, water chestnuts, soy sauce, brown sugar, brown onion, finely chopped onion and finely chopped apple. Mix well. Place into a greased ring mold and unmold onto a baking sheet. Bake for 1 hour. Move to a warm serving plate. Scramble remaining 6 eggs in a skillet and spoon into the center of cooked sausage ring. Serve immediately.
ingredients: bacon, water chestnuts, soy sauce, brown sugar
name: christmas or any other time appetizer

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a second bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and teaspoon of the cinnamon. In a second bowl, mix together the flour, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the lemon cake mix and smooth over the surface. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: pear half, maraschino cherries, yellow cling peaches, pineapple chunks, unsalted butter, dark brown sugar, curry powder, sour cream
name: betty crocker 1950s curried fruit bake

steps: Combine all ingredients in a shallow dish. Bake uncovered for about 30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, all-purpose flour, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra large eggs, seasoned bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, unsalted butter, olive oil
name: parmesan chicken strips

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add corn flakes and cook one minute. Add peanuts and stir to combine. Transfer corn flakes to baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with chili powder and toss. Cool and then transfer to airtight containers. Store at least 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: corn flakes, small pretzels, butter, unsalted nuts, chili seasoning mix
name: chili snack

steps: Drain and discard marinade from artichokes. Spread the mixture into an oven safe serving dish. Sprinkle the roma tomatoes over the top. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until very lightly browned. Serve on crostini or with chips.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, fresh parmesan cheese, miracle whip, roma tomatoes, scallions, cooking spray
name: fast hot artichoke dip

steps: Place your prepared mango in a serving dish. In a pot add the lime juice, lemongrass and sugar. Heat gently, no boiling until the sugar is completely dissolved. Do not use juice until it is completely cooled. Strain the juice and pour over the mango wedges. Sprinkle with the lime rind, cover, chill for at least 3 hours. Serve in small bowls with a scoop of ice cream or sherbert and garnish with the sprigs of mint.
ingredients: papaya, mangoes, sugar, fresh lime juice
name: papaya and mango jam

steps: In heavy saucepan, mix sugar, cocoa powder, flour and salt. Gradually whisk in milk until smooth. Cook, whisking constantly, over medium-high heat for about 5 minutes or until boiling and thickened. Remove from heat. Whisk in vanilla. Divide among custard cups or dessert dishes. Let cool to lukewarm or serve chilled.
ingredients: butter, self-rising flour, sugar, cocoa, milk, vanilla essence, brown sugar, boiling water
name: microwave self saucing chocolate pudding

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add corn before oil smokes and saute 2-3 minutes until lightly browned. Place corn in a mixing bowl and set aside. Add peppers and onions to skillet and cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add cumin and cook another 1-2 minutes. Turn heat to low, stir in remaining ingredients. Toss with corn and serve.
ingredients: frozen corn, butter, plum tomato, lime juice, salt, ground cumin, fresh cilantro
name: southwest sauteed corn

steps: Preheat broiler or grill. Combine olive oil, vinegar, basil, bay leaves, garlic and salt in a medium bowl. Stir until well combined. Place tomato halves cut-sides down directly on greased broiler pan or grill rack. Broil until they start to char and blister, about 4 minutes. Using tongs or a spatula and spoon, carefully turn tomatoes over and broil or grill 2 minutes more. Remove cooked tomatoes from heat and place cut-sides up in the dish with oil and vinegar mixture. Spoon some of the mixture over tomatoes. Set aside to marinate at least 1 hour, or cover and refrigerate up to 5 days. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: tomatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper, cilantro, wine
name: portuguese grilled tomato spread

steps: Melt half of the butter in a medium frying pan, cook and turn the scallops for 4 minutes or until the scallops are opaque and still soft and tender. Transfer the scallops to a plate and set aside until the sauce is prepared. In the same frying pan melt the other half of the butter. As the butter melts add the cheese spread and mustard, whisk until smooth for about 2 minutes. Add the whipping cream. Stir and bring to a boil, stir in the wine until combined and smooth, about 2 minutes. Return the cooked scallops to the pan, stir just until the scallops are warmed, about 2 minutes and then immediately remove the pan from the heat. Do not overcook or the scallops will become rubbery. Place the scallops on three scallop shaped dishes or on small plates lined with lettuce. Sprinkle the crumbled blue cheese around the scallops. Pour the cream sauce over the scallops. Slice the strawberries partly through leaving the green top to hold the slices together, garnish with the sliced strawberry.
ingredients: olive oil, sea scallops, pesto sauce, heavy cream
name: scallops with creamy pesto

steps: In a small bowl, mix dressing and taco mix. On a large serving platter or individual serving pates, layer remaining ingredients except tomatoes. Drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with cherry tomatoes that have been sliced in half. You can also top with olives and add a bit of canned corn if you like. I only use a portion of the can of black beans. Use as much as you like.
ingredients: lettuce, kidney beans, cheddar cheese, ground beef, taco seasoning, plain doritos, italian dressing, fresh tomato
name: doritos taco salad

steps: Mix sugar, evaporated milk, margarine, vanilla, coconut, vanilla chips, marshmallow creme in a large buttered saucepan. Cook without stirring until candy temp. Reaches 235 degrees f. Or until a soft ball forms in very cold water. Add butter. Stir just til blended. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Let sit until cool. Add chopped nuts. Beat until creamy, and just until it starts to loose its glossy appearance dulls slightly. Pour into prepared buttered 8 x 8 inch pan. Cut into squares while still soft and warm.
ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, margarine, vanilla, coconut, vanilla chips, marshmallow creme
name: white cocont fudge

steps: In a saucepan saut onion and celery in butter on medium for about 5 minutes until onion is soft. Mix next four ingredients in small bowl and add to onion mixture. Heat and stir for about 1 minute until onion is soft. Add bread cubes and stir. Then add chicken broth slowly while stirring. Bread should be moist but not mushy. Fluff with fork to serve. If you want to make simple baked stuffing put stuffing into greased 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and bake at 325f for 30 minutes. Can buddy with chicken in oven.
ingredients: chicken stove top stuffing mix, butter, celery, onion, mild sausage
name: sausage bread dressing

steps: Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:Mix ground beef, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlotpreparation:
ingredients: ground round, egg, sourdough bread, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, merlot
name: savory salisbury steak recipes your new family favorite

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: applesauce, creamy peanut butter, sugar, eggs, flour, baking soda, salt, cocoa, brown sugar
name: no fat added chocolate peanut butter cookies

steps: In a mixing bowl, using an electric mixer, beat cream cheese and mayonnaise until well blended. Add ketchup, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce and beat again until well incorporated. Add onions and mix well using a fork. Adjust tabasco sauce to taste. Divide mixture equally into 2 serving bowls. Add crab to one bowl and mix well using a fork. Add shrimp to the other bowl and mix well using a fork. Serve with potato chips or vegetable crackers. Refrigerate any unused portions.
ingredients: clams, cream cheese, onions, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, hot sauce, parmesan cheese
name: mmmm good hot clam or crab dip

steps: In a double boiler, melt caramels, butter, and milk. Keep water in the bottom of pot to a minimum boil. Dip one marshmallow into melted mix using a fork. Remove, and roll in milky way balls. Place on tray covered with wax paper. Repeat until bag of milky way balls is finished. Freeze milky way balls if desired. Enjoy.
ingredients: butter, marshmallows, milky way bars, cocoa krispies cereal
name: milky way balls

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: sugar, milk, butter, cocoa, oatmeal, peanut butter
name: camp winema mountain bars

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together butter, flour, chicken noodle soup mix, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-boiled eggs, milk, hard-bo
ingredients: butter, flour, chicken noodle soup mix, milk, hard-boiled eggs
name: eggs a la king

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine pasta with peppers, carrots and parsley. Add vinaigrette and mix well. Add feta cheese, mix lightly, lifting the pasta and cheese mixture until the cheese is distributed throughout. Chill for an hour before serving.
ingredients: bulb of garlic, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, vegetables, pasta
name: thanksgiving for 10 new pasta salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Using a baking sheet with a lip, melt butter. Mix seasoning into the butter, and then toss in almonds. Bake seasoned nuts for about 10-12 minutes, stirring once, until toasted and fragrant. Remove from heat and serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: almonds, thyme, rosemary, oil, honey, chili
name: rosemary thyme and chilli spiced nuts

steps: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add butter, onion, garlic, hot red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. When the liquid comes to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve on buns and top with chopped onion.
ingredients: butter, yellow onion, garlic cloves, hot red pepper flakes, salt and pepper, ground cumin, flour, chicken stock, heavy cream, aged cheddar cheese
name: cream of cheddar soup rachael ray

steps: Put the flowers in the sterilised jars, cover with sterilised jars, and cook for 15 minutes. Remove from heat, and add the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Gently put the flowers in the sterilised jars, cover with sterilised jars, and cook for 15 minutes. Gently put the flowers in the sterilised jars, cover with steril
ingredients: onions, nonstick cooking spray, balsamic vinegar, fresh oregano, brown sugar, salt & pepper
name: grilled onion flowers

steps: Place potatoes on a piece of heavy duty foil coated with nonstick spray. Sprinkle with onion, boullin, seasoned salt and pepper. Drizzle with butter. Fold foil around potatoes and seal tightly. Grill, covered over direct medium heat for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes are tender, turning once.
ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, sea salt, ground black pepper, paprika, garlic clove, white onion, shallot, bacon bits, tallow
name: hash browns like no other

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned.
ingredients: pork sausage, white bread, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, dry mustard, worcestershire sauce
name: breakfast casserole from southern living

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place onion and brie tarts on baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 12-14 minutes, or until onion is golden brown.
ingredients: miniature tart shells, onions, olive oil, brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper, brie cheese
name: caramelized onion and brie tarts

steps: Bring 4 cups water to a boil over high heat in 2-quart saucepan. Remove from heat. Add tea bags and brew 15 minutes, dunking tea bags several times. Remove tea bags and squeeze. Stir in sugar and baking soda until completely dissolved. Stir in remaining 12 cups water.
ingredients: baking soda, boiling water, tea bags, white sugar, water
name: smooth sweet tea

steps: Mix together the butter, onion, water, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, par
ingredients: butter, onion, water, yellow cornmeal, parmesan cheese, salt
name: creamy cheese polenta

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add olive oil and sauté onions until translucent. Add garlic and sauté until fragrant. Add tomato paste and sauté until fragrant. Add tomato paste and sa
ingredients: ripe olives, raw cauliflower, green bell pepper, chopped pimiento, onions, salt, vinaigrette, lettuce leaf
name: spanish style cauliflower salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f place the pork loins side by side, fat side up in a large heavy roasting pan. Insert an ovenproof meat thermometer in the center of one of the roast. Roast the pork for 30 minutes. Meanwhile in a bowl, crush the rosemary with the olive oil, pepper, vinegar and salt. Spoon the seasoning over the pork. Return the meat to the oven and roast for 30 minutes longer, until the internal temperature is 160 to 165. Remove from the oven, cover loosely with foil and let rest for at least 10 minutes. Thinly slice the meat and arrange on platters. Pour any juices over the meat. Garnish with rosemary springs. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: pork roast, garlic, dried rosemary, dried oregano, red wine
name: garlic and red wine cuban roast pork

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place chicken in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: grey poupon honey mustard, lemon juice, ground cumin, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, planters pecans, plain breadcrumbs, butter
name: pecan topped honey chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, whisk the sugar, buttermilk, oil, egg, and vanilla together until smooth. In a medium bowl, sift the flour, cocoa and baking soda together and add to the buttermilk mixture, stir until the ingredients are just combined. Be careful not to overework the batter, if there are lumps, they will disappear during baking baking. The less you work the batter, the more tender the pies will be. Fill 6 nonstick muffin top cups with the batter. Bake for 10 minutes in the center of the oven. To prevent the pies from getting soggy after baking, remove the cooked muffins from their cups and cool them on a rack. Serve warm.
ingredients: oleo, chocolate chips, coconut, nuts, sugar, vanilla, eggs
name: chocolate and coconut pie

steps: Heat oil in a small frying pan and stir fry eggs until just starting to wilt. Cut 4 large squares of kitchen foi. Divide veg between them, and lay 2 pieces of fish on top of each square. In small bowl, mix together fish sauce, lime juice, chilli, soy sauce, sugar, coriander. Pour over fish. Seal foil together and place on baking tray. Place tray in oven and cook 10 minutes. Let packets sit for a couple of minutes before opening to prevent steam burns. Open and scatter fish with coriander. Serve with noodles.
ingredients: eggs, tomatoes, soy sauce, broth, onion, pepper, garlic, fresh coriander leaves
name: thai steamed eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Season chicken breasts with garlic powder, salt and pepper. Wrap each chicken breast in 1 strip of bacon and place in a 9x13x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, mix the sour cream and soup. Spoon mixture over the chicken and bake uncovered for 40 to 50 minutes or until slightly brown on top. Serve with hot cooked rice, if desired.
ingredients: butter, flour, garlic powder, onion powder, dried cilantro, milk, cream cheese, cheese, diced green chilies, chicken breasts
name: spicy cream sauce with seafood poultry

steps: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or vegetable crackers.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, minced clams, dry onion soup mix, worcestershire sauce, pepper
name: clam onion dip

steps: Preheat oven to 400f, grease a 15 x 10 inch baking pan. Mix together butter, oats, sugar, corn syrup, vanilla and salt. Press into prepared pan and bake 15 to 18 minutes until the mixture is brown and bubbly. Remove from the oven and immediately sprinkle on the chocolate, set aside for 10 minutes, then spread the chocolate over the base. Sprinkle on nuts, cool on a wire rack, then cut into squares.
ingredients: caster sugar, water, butter, cream, almonds
name: toffee nuts

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Spread the pepperoni between two paper towels and blot to remove the excess grease. Brush the olive oil over the pizza crusts and cover with the pizza sauce. Next add the cheese, pepperoni, and tomatoes in that order. Finally topped with the chopped vegetables. Place pizzas on pizza stones or pizza pans. These really work better than cookie sheets. Change the oven temperature to 425 before putting the pizzas in the oven. Bake until the crust is a golden brown. About 15 minutes.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, pizza sauce, chunky salsa, jalapeno juice, jalapenos, black olives, onion, mozzarella cheese
name: linda s mexican pizza

steps: Heat the oil in a medium size saucepan over a medium-high heat. Add the rice and fry it in the oil for about 1 minute. Add the water and salt and bring to a boil. Once the water is boiling, reduce the heat to low and cover the saucepan. Cook the rice for approximately 15 minutes. If you feel the rice is getting burnt near the base of the pan as it cooks, one trick is to place the saucepan on another flat pan or griddle which is directly on the flame. Toss with a fork.
ingredients: basmati rice, mung beans, ghee, cumin seed, brown mustard seeds, turmeric, rock salt, water
name: kitchari indian seasoned rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeno peppers and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving.
ingredients: cooked rice, olive oil, butter, onion, minced garlic cloves, tomato sauce, water, coriander, salt and pepper
name: leftover rice made into spanish rice

steps: Heat oil in a large saut pan. Add beef and saut, turning often with tongs, for 7 to 10 minutes. Stir together the oil, vinegar, and ginger and add to the saut mixture. Blanch broccoli in the boiling water. Add to the meat mixture and keep warm. Prepare soba noodles according to package directions. Drain, toss with the beef and broccoli, and serve.
ingredients: sirloin, vegetable oil, rice wine, dark soy sauce, chili sauce, garlic clove, chinese five spice powder, spring onions, red capsicum, chestnut mushrooms
name: sizzling beef stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. On a cutting board, with a fork, mass the garlic into a paste with the salt and pepper. Add the butter and mash into garlic paste. Arrange the mackerel in a single layer in a baking dish. Top it with the garlic butter and drizzle with lemon juice. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until mackerel is just cooked through. Sprinkle with the parsley and serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: mackerel fillets, garlic cloves, lemon, juice of, salt, pepper
name: lemon garlic mackerel

steps: In blender add boiling water, family-size tea bag, fresh pineapple, raspberries, vanilla frozen yogurt, sugar, ice cube. Cover and process on high until smooth. Add boiling water, family-size tea bag, fresh pineapple, raspberries, vanilla frozen yogurt, sugar, ice cube. Add boiling water, family-size tea bag, fresh pineapple, raspberries,
ingredients: boiling water, family-size tea bag, fresh pineapple, raspberries, vanilla frozen yogurt, sugar, ice cube
name: pineapple and raspberry smoothie

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a mixing bowl, combine all dry ingredients, except pumpkin seeds, in a large mixing bowl and mix well. In a seperate bowl, slightly beat the eggs with a fork or wire whisk. Add thwe remaining wet ingredients to the eggs and stir well. Fold in chocolate chips. Coat 2 bread pans evenly with cooking spray. Pout half of the mixture into each pan. Bake for 50-60 minutes.
ingredients: brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, nutmeg, egg white, pumpkin seeds
name: sugar spice pumpkin seeds

steps: To make the tiramisu, bring the water to a boil in a small saucepan. Add as much sugar as will dissolve into the water, then add the amaretto and lemon juice. Just before it starts to boil, add the cherries, and stir it over a high heat until the liquid takes on the color of the cherries. Reduce the heat, and simmer until most of the liquid has evaporated. Place the mixture in a small bowl, cover tightly, and place in the fridge. To make the coffee cream, simply combine the cheese, kahlua, and coffee in a bowl, and stir until the mixture is uniform in color. Add sugar to taste, if necessary. Once the cherry sauce has cooled, arrange the three components in layers in a martini glass, with the biscuit crumbs on the bottom, cherry sauce in the middle, and coffee cream on top. Refridgerate until the coffee cream is firm. Decorate with powdered sugar, and place a cherry on top.
ingredients: egg whites, equal sugar substitute, mascarpone cheese, egg yolks, strong coffee, cognac, ladyfingers, butter
name: tiramisu for atkins dieters

steps: Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve.
ingredients: chicken, chicken bouillon cubes, carrots, spinach, celery, cream of chicken soup, creamed corn, pasta
name: tammy s chicken soup

steps: Combine all ingredients in a medium saucepan and cook over medium heat until mixture starts to boil. Stirring occasionally until mixture starts to boil. Lower heat to medium and using the back of a large wooden spoon, squeeze the grapes against the side of pot or use a potato masher to pop grapes, leaving some whole. The pectin from the grapes and sugar will thicken the sauce as well as the heat the reducing the mixture.
ingredients: fresh orange juice, cranberries, orange zest, fresh ginger, prepared horseradish, honey
name: pungent cranberry orange sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large pot of water, boil noodles until al dente. Drain well. In a medium saucepan, combine flour, butter, and salt. Stir until butter is melted and ingredients are combined evenly. Add cheese to mixture, and whisk until cheese is melted and mixture is well blended. Stir in tuna, peas, broccoli, and noodles. Spread the mixture evenly in prepared dish. Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the top noodles begins to turn golden brown.
ingredients: wide egg noodles, tuna, cream of chicken soup, milk, cheddar cheese, broccoli
name: broccoli tuna noodles

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: granulated sugar, water, pineapple, fresh lime juice
name: pineappleade southeast asia

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add chicken and cook 3 minutes. Reduce heat and add soy sauce, water, and reserved liquid. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes, or until chicken is falling off the bones.
ingredients: canola oil, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken, salt, ground black pepper, red wine, chicken stock, onion, cornstarch, water
name: easy coq au vin

steps: Place skewers on grill pan and cook 3 to 4 minutes on each side for medium-rare. Place skewers on grill pan and cook 3 to 4 minutes on each side for medium-rare. Place skewers on grill pan and cook 3 to 4 minutes
ingredients: meat, beef bouillon cubes, ground black pepper, salt, peanut butter, peanut oil, onion, red wine vinegar
name: west african meat kebabs

steps: Combine the sugar, butter and butter in a saucepan. Bring mixture to a rolling boil stirring constantly. Remove pan from heat and stir in white chocolate chips until completely melted. Add marshmallow creme and walnuts. Beat by hand until completely blended. Spread into a greased 9x9 pan.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, butter, vanilla extract, salt, walnuts, miniature marshmallows
name: chocolate marshmallow swirl fudge

steps: Mix flour, salt and pepper and dredge pork chops in the mixture. Simmer until mixture starts to thicken. Return chops to pan and cover. Simmer for 30 minutes or until chops are done.
ingredients: italian dressing, boneless pork chops, flour, oil, cream of chicken soup, milk
name: boneless pork chops with gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spray a large baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Cut each piece of chicken into 6 strips. Combine bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, dried oregano, salt and pepper in a shallow bowl. Mix well. Dip each piece of chicken into egg, allowing excess to drip back into bowl. Bake chicken, turning halfway through baking, until golden, about 15 minutes. Serve immediately with prepared dressing.
ingredients: butter, potatoes, flour, egg, caraway seed, salt
name: paluszki polish little fingers

steps: Combine the sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add chocolate chips. Remove from heat. Stir until chips dissolve. Add semisweet mini chocolate chips. Pour into 9 x 13 pan. Put in refrigerator to cool. Cut when hard.
ingredients: granulated sugar, brown sugar, fat-free evaporated milk, butter, light corn syrup, salt, natural-style peanut butter, vanilla extract, cooking spray, semisweet mini chocolate chips
name: peanut butter chocolate chip fudge

steps: With the back of a fork, mash egg yolk with mustard to make a thick paste. Stir in chopped scallions and chopped egg white. Mix in salt and pepper as desired. Divide mixture on top of 2 slices of bread. Top with lettuce leaves, and cover with remaining slices of bread. Makes 2 sandwiches.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, cheddar cheese, spam, miracle whip, yellow mustard, onion, salt and pepper
name: spam and egg salad spread

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken stock, onion, lemon juice, curry powder, pepper and cook, stirring, until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add asparagus and cook, stirring, until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir the chicken stock, onion, lemon juice, curry powder, pepper and cook, stirring, until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir the chicken stock, onion, lemon juice, curry powder, pepper and cook, stirring, until just tender, 3 to
ingredients: asparagus spears, chicken stock, onion, lemon juice, curry powder, pepper
name: asparagus bisque

steps: Heat olive oil, lemon peel, lemon juice, herbs, and s&p into a large ziplock bag. Add shrimp. Toss gently to coat. Marinate at least two hours or overnight. Grill for 2 minutes per side.
ingredients: lime zest, cumin, dried oregano, salt, pepper, olive oil, lime juice, garlic, shrimp
name: grilled lime shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Melt chocolate and butter, and let cool slightly. In a bowl, whisk flour, cocoa powder and salt. In large mixer bowl, beat eggs, sugar and vanilla until pale yellow and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes with mixer on medium. Turn mixer to low, beat in cooled chocolate mixture, then flour mixture until blended. Stir in chips. Drop cookies onto nonstick baking sheet, about 2 leveled tablespoons per cookie, about 2-inches apart. Bake 14 minutes or until tops are slightly cracked, centers will still be soft.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, light corn syrup, sugar, instant coffee, hot water, amaretto, almond cookie, walnuts, unsweetened cocoa powder
name: amaretto yum yums

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: apples, butter, sugar, flour, cinnamon, ground nutmeg, unbaked pie shells, brown sugar, pecans
name: the best apple pie

steps: Heat oven 180c. Grease and line pan - 20cm x 30 cm. Melt butter, sugar and honey in pot. Stir gently till sugar dissolves. Stir in oats, flour and nuts. Cool mixture. Add choc chips. Press mixture into pan. Bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: butter, self-raising flour, plain flour, rolled oats, desiccated coconut, brown sugar, sultana, chocolate chips, egg
name: choc chip oat slice

steps: Place chicken thighs in a large crock-pot then sprinkle with salt & pepper. Pour the enchilada sauce over the chicken then cover & cook on low for 4 hours. Remove the chicken & shred. Whisk in the cheese soup until smooth then add the chicken, beans, & chili powder. Continue to cook for another 2 hours. During the last 30 minutes add the cream cheese, stir to melt. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, garlic cloves, salsa, chipotle chile in adobo, chili powder, salt and pepper, taco shells, cheese, sour cream, lettuce
name: crock pot chipotle chicken tacos

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and whisk together until well blended and smooth. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dijon mustard, lemon juice, garlic, black pepper
name: baked dijon chicken

steps: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. Add minced garlic and lightly saute just until fragrant. Stir in the flour and stir for about one minute. This will be thick. Slowly pour in the milk. Add salt, pepper, oregano and nutmeg. Stir until creamy and thick. Turn off the heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Serve over your choice of pasta.
ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, fat-free half-and-half, buttermilk, garlic clove, nutmeg, parmesan cheese, pecorino romano cheese, salt, pepper
name: low fat alfredo sauce

steps: Place cauliflower, broccoli, carrot, green peppers, celery hearts, italian dressing in a saucepan over medium high heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and reduce
ingredients: cauliflower, broccoli, carrot, green peppers, celery hearts, italian dressing
name: crunchy vegetable salad

steps: Put the jelly into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix the rhubarb, sugar, & jello together. Put into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix
ingredients: rhubarb, water, candy orange slices, lemon, juice of
name: grandma s rhubarb jelly

steps: Place the salmon on a broiler pan and baste with the sauce. Let sit for 15 minutes. Broil them until cooked through, about 8 minutes, basting again with the glaze. Remove the salmon from the heat and baste once more with the glaze before serving.
ingredients: maple syrup, water, dried cherries, sugar, soy sauce, lemon juice, shrimp, salmon fillets
name: red lobster maple glazed salmon shrimp by todd wilbur

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a greased 10 x 15 cookie sheet evenly with graham crackers. Combine brown sugar and butter and bring to a boil in microwave or on stovetop. Pour mixture over crackers and sprinkle with nuts and chips. Bake for 10 minutes. Cool in refrigerator. Cut or separate into bars.
ingredients: graham cracker, brown sugar, coconut, milk, butter, graham crackers
name: graham cracker bars

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. In large bowl whisk together corn flake crumbs, parmesan cheese, italian herb seasoning, chili powder, garlic salt, potatoes, egg and spices until frothy. Add potatoes. Toss to coat well. Place on nonstick baking sheet in single layer. Bake until golden brown and crisp. About 20 minutes stirring once during baking.
ingredients: corn flake crumbs, parmesan cheese, italian herb seasoning, chili powder, garlic salt, potatoes, egg
name: crunchy seasoned oven fries

steps: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Brown chicken in butter in pan at medium-high heat. Pour maple syrup and white wine into pan. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove chicken. Boil until mixture is thick. Pour sauce over chicken and sprinkle with fresh chives.
ingredients: butter, whole chicken, russet potatoes, garlic, maple syrup, salt
name: garlic roasted chicken with maple glaze

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Bake for 1 hour or until center tests done. Bake
ingredients: sweet cherries, strawberries, white sugar, lemon juice
name: cherry strawberry preserves for the bread machine abm

steps: Place chicken breasts in a lightly greased shallow baking dish. Season with the taco seasoning mix. Pour the salsa over the chicken. Bake at 350 for 35 to 45 minutes, or until chicken is tender. When ready to serve, remove the chicken from the pan, stir sour cream into salsa, then return chicken. Serve salsa sour cream chicken with a big tossed salad and spanish rice. This chicken breast recipe serves 4.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, zucchini, mushroom, olive oil, mild salsa
name: fast easy chicken in salsa with zucchini

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In 13x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars.
ingredients: oreo cookies, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla extract, nuts
name: double chocolate cookie bars

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Using solid shortening, grease and flour bottom only of 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In large bowl, blend all ingredients at low speed until moistened. Beat 2 minutes at medium speed. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes. Remove from pan. Wrap tightly and store in refrigerator.
ingredients: cantaloupe, strawberries, banana, lemon yogurt, poppy seed, ground mace
name: lemon poppy seed fruit salad diabetic

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the water, wine and sugar, stirring to dissolve. Add the cranberries, apples and lemon juice. Bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and gently boil, uncovered, stirring occasionally until the cranberries pop and apples softened, approximately 15 minutes. Transfer sauce to a food processor and puree. Add cranberries, apples and lemon juice. Reduce heat and gently boil, uncovered, stirring occasionally until
ingredients: water, red cinnamon candies, cranberries, jello gelatin, applesauce
name: red hot cranberry applesauce

steps: Sift flour, cornstarch, baking soda, baking powder, salt, water, fishpreparation:Sift dry ingredients. Add water and mix well. Bake at 350 for 15 to 20 minutes.
ingredients: fish fillets, salt, pepper, egg, water, flour, butter
name: your basic panfried fish

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Brush a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with olive oil. Layer the sliced potatoes, mushrooms, and onions, in the dish. Sprinkle with the salt and sage leaves. Pour the cream over evenly. Brush the pork chops with olive oil, and rub the breadcrumbs onto both sides of each pork chop. Place pork chops on top of the vegetables. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or just until the pork chops are cooked through and the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: pork loin chops, onion, vegetable oil, red potatoes, carrot, sliced mushrooms, low-fat cream of celery soup, water, salt, dried thyme
name: pork chops dinner

steps: In a saucepan with a lid, heat oil over medium. Add 1 cup water. Bring to a boil. Add couscous, remove from heat, cover, and let stand for at least 5 minutes. Add dates, walnuts, couscous, boiling water, butter, olive oil, salt and pepper. Fluff with a fork, and serve.
ingredients: carrots, dates, walnuts, couscous, boiling water, butter, olive oil, salt and pepper
name: carrot date walnut couscous

steps: In 2-quart pyrex bowl melt chips on high or till melted. Stir. Add rest of ingredients and mix well. Spray or butter a 9x13 pan and pour fudge into pan. Refrigerate and cut into squares.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, condensed milk, vanilla extract, walnuts
name: easy peasy fudge

steps: In a wide frying pan over medium-high heat, brown rice lightly in butter or margarine. Add onion, garlic, tomato, and chiles, if used and cook for 2 or 3 minutes. Add 3 cups of the broth. Cover and simmer 25 to 35 minutes or bake, covered, in a 350f oven 50 to 60 minutes. Add more broth, if needed, to cook rice. However, there should be no liquid remaining when rice is tender to bite. Add cilantro, if desired, during last 10 minutes. Garnish rice with olives.
ingredients: pumpkin, green apples, yellow onion, sweet peppers, chicken broth, salt, fresh ground pepper, ground nutmeg, cilantro
name: sopa de calabaza y manzana pumpkin apple soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Stir together dressing, butter, garlic salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add chicken and toss well to coat with mixture. Roll each piece in crushed chips and place on a shallow baking sheet. Sprinkle with any remaining chips. Bake for 30 minutes or until crispy and lightly browned.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, hidden valley ranch dip, extra virgin olive oil, vinegar, bacon, ziploc bag, toothpicks
name: bacon wrapped ranch chicken

steps: In a large saucepan, saute the beans until tender. Stir in the garlic, cumin, salt and cayenne. Cook and stir until heated through and water is absorbed. It only takes a few minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in lime juice.
ingredients: pinto beans, garlic, vegetable broth, black pepper, cumin, chili powder, low-sodium salsa, fresh cilantro
name: veronica s southwestern refried beans

steps: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and almond extract. Combine dry ingredients, add to sugar mixture. Drop onto cookie sheet. Bake 350 for 1012 minutes.
ingredients: butter, icing sugar, flour, white sugar, eggs, almond extract, light corn syrup, almonds
name: almond pie bars

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, brown the ground beef, onion, and the green and red peppers. Drain off liquids. Stir in the garlic powder, mustard, ketchup, and brown sugar. Mix thoroughly. Reduce heat, and simmer for 30 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: ground beef, ketchup, green pepper, cooking onion, worcestershire sauce, yellow mustard, sugar
name: leslie s sloppy joes

steps: Mix all ingredients except the rice and lemon juice and cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the rice and lemon juice. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top. Place in a 8 x 10-inch baking dish and bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes, or until it is lightly brown and the custard is set. Test with a table knife. Stick it in the center of the dish, and if it comes out clean the dish is baked. This can be served with maple syrup as was done in earlier times or milk will be enjoyed also.
ingredients: milk, caster sugar, orange rind, vanilla bean, arborio rice, egg yolks, rhubarb, light cream
name: vanilla rice pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius in a 9 inch springform pan in small bowl, blend butter and sugar, then add vanilla and egg. Beat well add flour, baking powder, and salt to butter mixture. Blend well. Spread dough over bottom and 1 inch up sides of pan. Over dough, arrange 5-6 peach slices in center to create a circular shape place rest of slices around center circle to create the effect of sunrays. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake 35-45 minutes cool 10 minutes then remove the sides of pan.
ingredients: plums, sugar, cinnamon, butter, white sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder, icing sugar
name: plum cake

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: sugar, water, egg whites, marshmallow cream, vanilla
name: marshmallow cream frosting

steps: Heat oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook carrots, onion, garlic and ham in broth about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until carrots are crisp- tender. Stir in chicken, salt, and tomatoes. Cook about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, just until carrots are crisp- tender. Toss with pasta. Sprinkle with cheese and parsley.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, ham, chicken broth, carrot, fresh gingerroot, fresh italian parsley
name: carrots and ham in gingered chicken broth pasta sauce

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, brown the ground beef, onion, catsup, mustard, wine vinegar, salt, worcestershire sauce. Drain beef mixture. Transfer beef mixture to crock pot. In large bowl combine ketchup, water and brown sugar. Pour over beef mixture. Allow to warm in crock pot on lowest setting. Serve on buns.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, catsup, mustard, wine vinegar, salt, worcestershire sauce
name: dana s sloppy joes

steps: Place shrimp in a large broiler safe pan and pre-heat broiler, set aside. In a large saute pan, melt butter and oil until bubbly. Add garlic and saute 1-2 minutes-- be careful not to burn garlic. Add the dijon mustard, chili flakes and salt and stir until well blended. Pour sauce over shrimp and broil for approximately 5 minutes or until shrimp has turned pink. Remove from broiler and place on large platter, sprinkle with lemon juice and fresh parsley. Serve with fresh bread and extra lemon.
ingredients: olive oil, medium shrimp, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, dry white wine, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes with juice, fusilli, fresh parsley
name: shrimp fusilli

steps: Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of bacon and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend until smooth and stir through cream. Divide into serving bowls and top with crispy bacon to serve.
ingredients: bacon, leeks, simply potatoes traditional mashed potatoes, chicken stock, fresh parsley leaves
name: shortcut potato leek soup with bacon 5fix

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: white sugar, shortening, pumpkin puree, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, ground cinnamon, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: egg free pumpkin chocolate chip cookies

steps: Heat the oil in a medium size pan, melt the butter in the oil and then saute onions until transparent. Add garlic and the chicken. Stir until meat turns white. Add carrots, basil, and chicken stock, and simmer for 30 minutes or until the carrots are tender. Add pasta and simmer for an additional 15 minutes. After the soup has been poured into a bowl, add one tablespoon of lemon juice to each serving.
ingredients: chicken thighs, lemongrass, fresh lime leaves, garlic cloves, red chile, gingerroot, lime, juice of, light soy sauce, green onion, fresh coriander leaves
name: shredded chicken and lemon grass soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Boil whole potatoes for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. In the meantime, saut onions and garlic in butter until they are soft and translucent. Layer potato slices and onions in a 9 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream over the potatoes. Season to taste and sprinkle gruyere over the whole shebang. Bake 4050 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: heavy cream, dried chipotle peppers, sweet potatoes, gruyere cheese, nutmeg, salt, black pepper
name: sweet potatoes au gratin with a kick

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: shortbread cookies, ricotta cheese, cream cheese, eggs, sugar, lime juice, passion fruit pulp
name: little passionfruit cheesecakes

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: whole wheat tortilla, garlic, mozzarella cheese, reduced-fat parmesan cheese, pepperoni
name: weight watchers tortilla pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Lightly grease a 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Melt butter in skillet. Saute celery and onion till tender, about 3 minutes. In large mixing bowl, combine cornbread, bread, celery and onions, sage and black pepper. Stir broth and beaten eggs into cornbread mixture. Blend well. Stir in chopped boiled eggs. Pour into prepared baking dish. Bake 30 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: cornbread mix, turkey broth, aluminum foil, sage, garlic salt, poultry seasoning, butter, pepper, eggs
name: anita s cornbread dressing

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: yogurt, cucumber, garlic, dried mint, salt
name: yogurt cucumber salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly.
ingredients: kidney bean, mexican-style tomatoes, vegetarian ground beef, onion, chili powder, cayenne, vegetable oil, cornbread batter
name: chili and cornbread casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly.
ingredients: eggs, milk, bisquick, green chilies, chipotle chile in adobo, adobo sauce, sharp cheddar cheese, monterey jack pepper cheese, salt
name: chili relleno casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes.
ingredients: kosher salt, celery salt, garlic salt, cayenne powder, vegetable oil, pecan halves
name: deviled pecans neiman marcus

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a mixing bowl, combine lemon ginger, lemon juice, rind and buttermilk. Stir into the dry ingredients, alternatively with melted butter and mango slices. Divide evenly between 12 greased muffin tins, sprinkle with castor sugar. Bake for 15-18 minutes or until well risen and cooked. Leave in the tins for 5 minutes before turning onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: sugar, fresh ginger, lemon, zest of, butter, eggs, buttermilk, all-purpose flour, baking soda
name: lemon ginger muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9-inch square deep-dish pie plate with non-stick oil. In a mixing bowl, combine peaches, sugar, lemon juice, and mint. Mix cornstarch and orange juice. Let rest 15 minutes, then mix into peaches. Pour peach mixture into prepared pie plate. Mix flour with brown sugar and cinnamon. Use a pastry cutter to cut margarine into flour until mixture resembles course crumbs. Sprinkle over peaches. Bake 45 minutes.
ingredients: fresh peaches, rolled oats, all-purpose flour, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, butter
name: crock pot peach cobbler

steps: Place apple slices in slow cooker. In medium bowl, combine sugar, flour, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, peanut butter. Mix in butter and peanut butter with pastry blender or fork. Sprinkle over apples. Cover pot and cook on low for 5-6 hours. Serve warm. Plain or with ice cream.
ingredients: cooking apples, water, cloves, self-rising flour, butter, brown sugar, rolled oats
name: e z apple crumble

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and sprinkle with pepper flakes. Stir fry 3 minutes. Add vegetables and teriyaki sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender and chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: mixed vegetables, water, large shrimp, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, shrimp flavor ramen noodle soup
name: szechuan shrimp and noodle soup

steps: In a large sauce pan. Add the vinegar, garlic, red pepper flakes, broth, soy sauce, and ginger. Bring to a slight boil. Add shrimp and fresh or frozen but thawed broccoli florets. Take some of the excess sauce and pour into a bowl. Whisk and return to pan. Bring to full boil and stir constantly. As soon as thickening begins, remove from heat and serve over white rice. You may also use one of them premade asian vegetable medleys in this recipe and pour sauce over it. Can be used for beef, chicken or pork as well.
ingredients: vegetable oil, large shrimp, fresh ginger, garlic, broccolini, water, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, hot red pepper flakes
name: shrimp and broccolini stir fry

steps: Heat butter in a large skillet over low heat. Add onion, rosemary and poultry seasioning and cook until onion is translucent, about 3 minutes. Stir in potatoes, chicken, apples, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring ad scraping up browned bits on botom with spatula until mixture is browned, 15-20 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients: olive oil, butter, potatoes, carrot, salt and pepper, shallot, fresh parsley
name: parsley potato carrot hash

steps: Heat cream cheese mixture in saucepan over low heat, whisking until smooth. In small bowl, soften gelatine in cold water and add to cream cheese mixture. Stir until well blended. In separate bowl, mix together mayonnaise, scallions and celery. Stir into cream cheese mixture until well blended. Gently fold in shrimp until well mixed and turn into a lightly oiled 4 cup mold. Chill several hours or overnight. To unmold, place mold in warm water for a few seconds and invert onto a plate. Place crackers around.
ingredients: cream cheese, cream of celery soup, sweet onion, celery, mayonnaise, unflavored gelatin, imitation crabmeat, salt and pepper, hot sauce
name: crab shrimp mold

steps: Melt butter and chocolate. Mix with other ingredients which have been blended together. Pour into pie shell. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until pie begins to crack on top.
ingredients: sugar, butter, egg yolks, egg white, water, vanilla
name: furrs cafeteria butter chess pie clone

steps: Mix all ingredients together in bowl. Form into 4 patties. Cook in skillet or on grill until cooked through, appox. 6-7 minute per side. Serve on buns with lettuce and tomato.
ingredients: lean ground chicken, ranch dressing mix, fresh breadcrumb, mushroom
name: ground chicken ranch burger

steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add the adobo to the mixture. Cook for 5-6 hours, or until adobo is tender. Serve with rice.
ingredients: pork butt, potatoes, soy sauce, apple cider vinegar, water, bay leaves, peppercorn, onions, garlic cloves, sugar
name: filipino crock pot adobo

steps: In 2-qt saucepan bring water to a full boil. Add carrots, pea pods and honey. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until heated through.
ingredients: carrots, honey, vegetable oil, lemon juice, salt
name: honeyed carrots

steps: In the bowl of an electric mixer combine the butter, cornstarch, powdered sugar, flour, cream cheese, vanilla, red food coloring and beat until smooth. Beat in milk mixture. Beat in vanilla.
ingredients: butter, cornstarch, powdered sugar, flour, cream cheese, vanilla, red food coloring
name: melting moments

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Peel onions and cut in half crosswise. Place onions, cut sides down, in an 8 inch square baking dish, drizzle with water. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Combine honey and remaining ingredients. Turn onions over. Brush half of the honey mixture over the onions. Bake, uncovered, an additional 30 minutes or until tender, basting with remaining honey mixture after 15 minutes.
ingredients: vidalia onions, buttery crackers, roll of pork sausage, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, seasoning salt, cheddar cheese
name: vidalia onion casserole ii

steps: Combine avocados, cream cheese, seasoning salt, sour cream, salsa, cheddar cheese, green onions, black olives in medium bowl. Mix well. Cover. Refrigerate for 2 hours. Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: avocados, cream cheese, seasoning salt, sour cream, salsa, cheddar cheese, green onions, black olives
name: salsa wheel

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Combine all ingredeints except lamb, whisking together in a medium-sized bowl until well blended. With a brush, coat leg of lamb evenly with the mixture. Leave at room temperature on lamb for 2 hours. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 minutes. Thicken pan juices for sauce, removing fat.
ingredients: lamb chops, brown sugar, ground ginger, dried tarragon, ground cinnamon, black pepper, garlic powder, salt
name: grilled lamb with brown sugar glaze

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In 13x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars.
ingredients: sugar, butter, salt, marshmallows, evaporated milk, cherry chips, semi-sweet chocolate chips, creamy peanut butter, peanuts
name: cherry bing bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In medium mixing bowl, combine all ingredients then transfer to bakind dish. Top with desired amount of ketchup. Bake at 350 for 1. 25 hours. Let stand for 3-5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, garlic, garlic powder, onion powder, dried onion flakes, egg, ritz cracker, ketchup
name: garlic meatloaf

steps: In a large saucepan, cook chicken and onions until chicken is no longer pink. Add taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, corn, and chiles. Cook over medium heat until chicken is no longer pink. Remove chicken from pan and dice into bite sized pieces. Return chicken to pan and add macaroni, chicken breast, garlic cloves, salt, black pepper, ground chipotle chile pepper, mexican-style corn, herbes de provence. Add enough liquid to get everything coated with sauce. Serve immediately.
ingredients: macaroni, chicken breast, garlic cloves, salt, black pepper, ground chipotle chile pepper, mexican-style corn, herbes de provence
name: buddha s southwestern chicken pasta

steps: In a large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, water, beef bouillon, crushed tomatoes, orzo pasta, peas corn and carrot mix, salt and pepper. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium-high heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, water, beef bouillon, crushed tomatoes, orzo pasta, peas corn and carrot mix, salt and pepper
name: easy delicious hamburger orzo soup

steps: Preheat oven to 325f butter a 9x13-inch baking pan. Coarsely chop chocolate and place in a large microwave-safe bowl along with butter. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, then stir until chocolate is melted. Let mixture cool to room temperature. Stir in sugar, then eggs and vanilla. Gradually stir in flour, then nuts and chocolate chips, if using. Spread mixture in pan. Bake in center of oven for 30 minutes or until a skewer inserted in center of brownies comes out clean.
ingredients: thin mint cookies, egg whites, salt, sugar, vanilla extract, nuts, whipped cream, unsweetened chocolate
name: minted brownie pie

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: green beans, garlic cloves, onions, olive oil, salt, balsamic vinegar, fresh ground black pepper
name: roasted green beans with garlic and onions

steps: Place chicken in crock pot and cover with lid. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours. Remove chicken and shred with two forks. Return chicken to crock pot, reduce to low, and cook for 1-2 hours. Return chicken to
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, cilantro leaf, green onion, soy sauce, low sodium chicken broth, bulgur
name: ginger chicken with bulgur crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Prepare a 13x9 pan with cooking spray. Set aside. In a mixing bowl, combine cottage cheese, eggs, and parmesan cheese. In another mixing bowl, combine cooked pasta, pasta sauce, and salt. Spoon half of the pasta mixture into prepared pan. Evenly top with cheese mixture, then remaining pasta mixture. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake for 30 miuntes, or until heated through.
ingredients: manicotti, part-skim mozzarella string cheese, reduced-sodium marinara sauce, parmesan cheese
name: v s 3 step manicotti

steps: Cook pasta as directed on package. Meanwhile, heat dressing and garlic in large nonstick skillet on medium heat. Add chicken and broccoli. Cook 1-2 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Stir in tomatoes and half of the mozzarella cheese. Cook 1-2 minutes or until heated through, stirring occasionally. Drain spaghetti. Place on serving plate. Top with chicken mixture, remaining mozzarella cheese, and the parmesan cheese.
ingredients: farfalle pasta, frozen green peas, heavy cream, low sodium chicken broth, parmesan cheese
name: pasta for the kids

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve with sauce. Serve over hot white rice, if desired.
ingredients: mangoes, red onions, of fresh mint, orange juice, harissa, salmon fillets, salt
name: moroccan roasted salmon with mango salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender.
ingredients: water, burgundy wine, condensed golden mushroom soup, boneless beef top sirloin steaks, mushroom, long grain and wild rice blend
name: beef burgundy casserole

steps: Put apples and bread in sandwich. Cover and bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Stir in sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger and apple cider. Pour over apples. Dot with butter. Sprinkle with raisins. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45-60 minutes or until apples are tender. Serve warm over ice cream if desired.
ingredients: applesauce, bread, butter, sugar, ground cinnamon
name: applesauce sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In 4 quart saucepan, heat soup, milk, thyme, pepper, chicken and vegetables to boiling over med-high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil and stir 3-5 minutes. Spread in ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Seperate dough into 8 biscuits. Place evenly over hot chicken mixture. Bake 35-40 minutes or until biscuits are golden brown and no longer doughy on bottom. After 20 minutes, cover with foil if necessary to prevent excessive browning.
ingredients: biscuits, onion, green peppers, celery, butter, cheddar cheese, bacon
name: veggie monkey bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In a large mixing bowl, beat butter and sugar together until creamy. Beat in egg and vanilla. Add flour gradually and beat well. Stir in 1 cup morsels. Press on bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 30-33 minutes or until the top is lightly browned. Immediately sprinkle with the remaining chocolate chips and let sit for 5 minutes or so until the chips become shiny. Then spread evenly over top. Cool completely in the pan and then cut into squares.
ingredients: plain flour, unsalted butter, egg yolk, egg, salt
name: shortbread pastry

steps: Fry bacon, drain and set aside. Saute onion in bacon grease about ten minutes. Add onions and peppers to onion mixture. Toss tomatoes with grits mixture. Crumble bacon over top and serve immediately. Serve hot. Do not add bacon and tomatoes until time to serve the grits.
ingredients: bacon, onions, green pepper, rotel tomatoes, grits
name: cajun grits

steps: Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more.
ingredients: potatoes, eggs, green bell pepper, onion, pimientos, mayonnaise, salt and pepper
name: walter s potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f. in a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Pour butter into an 8x
ingredients: butter, garlic powder, baking potatoes, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, seasoning salt
name: garlic parmesan roasted potatoes

steps: Heat the oil in a large heavy-bottom saucepan, and stir-fry the onions until transparent. Add the cabbage and stir well. Add the remaining ingredients and stir again. Cover and simmer over low heat for 1 hour, or until cabbage is tender. If possible, remove the whole cloves before serving.
ingredients: cabbage, onion, apple, butter, brown sugar, celery seeds, salt, dry white wine
name: cabbage with wine hvidkl i vinsauce

steps: Mix gelatin, sugar and salt thoroughly in a small saucepan. Add water. Place over low heat, stirring constantly until gelatin is dissolved. Remove from heat and stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice and lemon rind. Blend with a rotary beater. Pour into a refrigerator tray. Quick chill in freezing unit 10-15 minutes, or until firm, about 1 inch from edge but soft in center. Beat until fluffy. Fold in remaining ingredients. Turn into 4 cup mold or individual molds and chill until firm. Unmold on serving plate.
ingredients: strawberry gelatin, boiling water, frozen strawberries, pecans, bananas, crushed pineapple, sour cream, strawberry, fresh pineapple
name: strawberry mold

steps: Spray soup pot with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add the potatoes, onion, celery & leaves, vegetable oil, boiling water, bay leaf, salt, butter, milk, parsley. Stir and cook until cheese is melted and soup is heated through. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, celery & leaves, vegetable oil, boiling water, bay leaf, salt, butter, milk, parsley
name: kartoffelsuppe potato soup

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Grease 9 x 9-inch square pan. Mix milk, lemon peel and lemon juice until thickened. Reserve. Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly. Press half of the crumbly mixture in pan. Bake about 10 minutes or until set. Spread milk mixture over baked layer. Sprinkle remaining crumbly mixture on milk mixture. Press gently into milk mixture. Bake about 20 minutes or until edge is golden brown and center is set but soft. Cool completely.
ingredients: quick-cooking oats, nuts, brown sugar, coconut, salt, butter, orange marmalade
name: oatmeal crunch bars

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray and cook turkey for 6 minutes. Drain. Add hot sauce and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 3-5 minutes or until sauce is thickened and turkey is no longer pink in center. Place lettuce on warm tortillas and drizzle dressing on top. Place chicken and sauce over lettuce and top with blue cheese. Roll up and serve.
ingredients: cream cheese, basil pesto, burrito-size flour tortillas, smoked turkey breast, romaine lettuce, chopped tomato, red onions
name: smoked turkey and tomato wraps

steps: In a heavy saucepan, heat milk and sugar, over medium to low heat. When hot, stir in eggs and flour. Beat together well and boil until thick. Stir in butter and vanilla after it is cooked. Cool and served chilled. Before serving, garnish with sliced almonds, if desired. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, vanilla extract, unsalted butter
name: creamy pudding yalanci tavukgogsu

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: shrimp, butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, italian parsley, white wine, salt and pepper, lemon, juice of, lemon
name: california scampi

steps: Heat oil in saucepan. Add onion, garlic, zucchini, carrot, chopped tomato, fresh parsley, salt, basil, black pepper, water. Bring to a boil. Stir in garlic, zucchini, carrot, chopped tomato, fresh parsley, salt, basil, black pepper, water. Bring
ingredients: diced onion, fresh garlic, zucchini, carrot, chopped tomato, fresh parsley, salt, basil, black pepper, water
