name: 1980 s weight watchers veggie soup

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: medium raw shrimp, butter, lite olive oil, garlic, dried arbol chiles, fresh lime juice, salt, green onion tops, bread
name: shrimp in fiery hot garlic butter

steps: Bring tea bags to a boil over high heat in 2-quart saucepan. Remove from heat. Add tea bags to a boil over high heat in 2-quart saucepan. Remove
ingredients: green tea, mint extract, sugar, water, mint sprig
name: gunpowder mint tea

steps: Combine flour, baking powder, nonfat milk, eggs, sugar, smooth peanut butter, salt, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut
ingredients: flour, baking powder, nonfat milk, eggs, sugar, smooth peanut butter, salt
name: peanut butter blender bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, cream butter, sugar and lemonade mix until fluffy. Beat in egg, vanilla and lemon extract. In a separate bowl, mix flour and baking soda. Add dry ingredients to batter, beating until thoroughly combined. Form dough into 1-inch ball and roll in granulated sugar. Place balls 2-inch apart on well-greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges begin to brown.
ingredients: sugar cookie mix, coconut, lime zest, lime juice, butter, egg, powdered sugar
name: caribbean lime coolers cookie mix

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f for 1 hour and 15 minutes, to 1 hour and 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: baking potatoes, dried thyme, black pepper, olive oil, parmesan cheese, salt
name: oven fried parmesan potatoes

steps: Preheat oven 350. Mix half of chopped fresh basil, melted butter and garlic together in baking casserole dish. Place chicken breasts on top of mixture and top with remaining fresh chopped basil. Bake covered for 45 minutes. Bake uncovered for 15 minutes. Prepare spaghetti noodles boil for 7-10 minutes to preferred taste. Over low heat warm alfredo sauce, stir often. Be careful not to scorch. Serve. Pepper to taste.
ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic cloves, spaghetti, chili powder, chicken broth, butter, rotel, onion, velveeta cheese
name: spicy chicken pasta

steps: Heat oil over medium heat. Add milk, flour, egg, salt, butter, chives, nutmeg. Simmer until noodles are tender, about 2 to 3 minutes per side. Drain them on paper towels and fry remaining cutlets in same manner. You can keep them warm in the oven as you cook the rest.
ingredients: milk, flour, egg, salt, butter, chives, nutmeg
name: frittatensuppe beef broth topped with strips of sliced pancake

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees f. Place saffron, onion and garlic into an oiled baking dish using the 2 tablespoons oil. Combine saffron, chicken broth and white wine and pour over fennel season with salt and pepper. Dot with butter. Cover and bake for 25 - 30 minutes. If desired, uncover the baking dish toward the end of the cooking time, to allow any excess liquid to evaporate. Garnish with the fennel fronds.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fennel, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, water
name: sauteed fennel

steps: Mix together the first three ingredients and spread into a 9x13 inch dish. Bake at 400 degrees for 10 minutes and cool. Beat together cream cheese and one cup of sugar. Stir in cool whip and spread on cooled pretzel crust. Dissolve jell-o in boiling water. Stir in strawberries and let set for ten minutes. Pour on top of cheese mixture and chill to the jell-o is set.
ingredients: strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, frozen strawberries, pretzels, butter, sugar, cream cheese, cool whip
name: pretzel jello dessert

steps: Put butter on one side of each piece of bread. Put ham and cheese onto the bread then cook like you would grilled cheese. In a pan with butter, or stick on an electric grill. Cook on each side till brown. Open sandwich on side without cheese and add your condiments.
ingredients: ranch dressing, sourdough bread, smoked turkey, maple ham, swiss cheese, pickles, butter
name: turkey ham swiss grilled cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix the melted butter and bread crumbs together and put one third of them in a thin layer in the bottom of a buttered baking dish. Cover with half of the oysters and seasonings. Add some of the cream. Layer half of the scallops next, seasonings, and another third of buttered crumbs. Add the remaining oysters and cream. Top with the final half of scallops and top with remaining buttered crumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: shrimp, sea scallops, lime, toasted sesame oil, sea salt, black pepper, hot red pepper flakes, smoked bacon, toothpick, scallions
name: big daddys applewood bacon wrapped shrimp scallops

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Remove seeds from chilies. Slice open the chilies and line a 9x13 casserole with half of them. Cover chilies with half of the cheddar and half of the jack cheese. Use the rest of the chilies on top of the cheeses. Beat the egg whites till stiff peak. Beat the yolks and add flour, milk, salt and. Pepper. Fold in whites and pour over top of chilies and cheese. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Top with the remaining cheeses. Top with salsa, if desired.
ingredients: eggs, cottage cheese, monterey jack cheese, flour, baking powder, diced green chilies, butter
name: chile relleno squares breakfast version

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter. Mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan. Pour eagle brand evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly with fork. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Chill if desired. Cut into bars or diamonds. Store covered at room temperature.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, sweetened condensed milk, butter, flaked coconut, semisweet chocolate morsels, walnuts
name: chocolate chip treasure cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm.
ingredients: butter, rich chicken broth, onion, fresh mushrooms, garlic clove, sour cream, heavy cream, salt and pepper
name: mushroom cream sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix all the ingredients except the cheese in a 2-quart casserole dish. Cover and put in the oven until rice is tender. Remove from oven and add cheese to taste, wait about 2 minutes or until cheese has melted - there will be a little liquid left, you can let it sit longer for the rice to absorb it. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: celery, onion, margarine, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, cheese spread, frozen chopped broccoli, rice
name: easy broccoli rice bake

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: red potatoes, onion, red peppers, dried rosemary, olive oil, salt and pepper
name: oven roasted home fries

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse chicken breasts and pat dry. Place one chicken breast in the middle of each sheet of foil wrap or parchment paper. Spoon one fourth of the salsa, black beans and sweetcorn on each of the four chicken breasts. Seal each pack by bringing up sides and folding the top edge over twice. Seal the edges in the same way, leaving enough room for heat to circulate inside. Place packs on a cookie sheet and cook for 20 minutes. Unseal packs carefully.
ingredients: cooked rice, salsa, black beans, mexicorn, deli turkey, jalapeno jack cheese, flour tortillas
name: southwestern wraps

steps: Combine ricotta cheese, portabella mushroom, onion, roasted red peppers, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Place in a greased dish and bake in a moderate oven 180c for 25 - 30 minutes. Can be served either with salads, or new potatoes, fresh vegetables and a sauce of your choice.
ingredients: chicken breasts, ricotta cheese, portabella mushroom, onion, roasted red peppers, garlic powder, salt and pepper
name: ricotta red pepper stuffed chicken breasts

steps: In a small bowl, combine all ingredients mix well. Cover. Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours to blend flavours. Stir in deviled ham, sweet relish, garlic powder, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, chili sauce, prepared horseradishpreparation:In a small bowl, combine all ingredients mix well. Stir in deviled ham, sweet relish, garlic powder, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, chili sauce, prepared horseradishpreparation:In
ingredients: sour cream, deviled ham, sweet relish, garlic powder, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, chili sauce, prepared horseradish
name: devil dip for vegetables

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using cooked marinade and pan drippings to top.
ingredients: pork chops, soy sauce, wasabi powder, water, fresh garlic cloves
name: garlic wasabi pork chops

steps: In a large bowl, combine the beef, margarine, onions, round steaks, flour, salt, pepper, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream, paprika, water, sour cream
ingredients: hamburger, margarine, onion, garlic powder, chili powder, allspice, salt, black pepper, water
name: ny system hot weiner

steps: Mix beef, onion, salt and pepper well. Shape into patties. Brown patties, pour off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cove and cook on low for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: ground beef, salt and pepper, onion, saltine crackers
name: salisbury steak

steps: Preheat oven to 275f. Cut jalapenos in half lengthwise and scrape out seeds. In a bowl, combine cheeses and onion and mix well. Wrap bacon slices around each half, cover as much of the surface as possible. Brush bacon surface with bbq sauce. Secure with toothpicks and pop into oven for 1 hr.
ingredients: jalapeno chiles, milk, cheddar cheese, cream cheese, lump crabmeat, flour, egg, water, oil, seasoned bread crumbs
name: jalapeno poppers stuffed with cheese and crab

steps: Place all ingredients in the slow cooker and set on low. Cook for approximately 4 to 6 hours or until apples are tender. The time will vary depending on the type of apples used. Remove cinnamon stick. Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: sugar, apple jelly, lemon rind, orange rind, light rum, apples, cinnamon, golden raisin
name: apple jelly compote

steps: Mix in a big bowl the cornbread mix, sweet pickle, bacon, tomatoes, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice
ingredients: white cornbread mix, sweet pickle, bacon, tomatoes, mayonnaise, green pepper, pickle juice, onion
name: tennessee cornbread salad

steps: In a large nonstick skillet or saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Add broth to the pan and bring to a boil. Stir in orzo and return to boiling. Cover pot and reduce heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Remove lid and stir in cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: reduced-sodium chicken broth, orzo pasta, butter, garlic, nutmeg, parsley
name: orzo with brown butter and parsley

steps: Preheat oven to 400-425. Spray cooking dish with spray if using fat free dressing. Put all ingredients into large zip bag and toss. Put in dish and bake for 15 minute then toss and bake. 20-25 min cooking time. Keep your eye on them. The thinner the slice the faster it cooks. Check in and toss to keep from over drying and baking. If you use a fattier dressing then it is less checking time.
ingredients: red potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper, parsley
name: low fat roasted poatoes

steps: Season pork ribs with salt and pepper. Cover with lid and cook on low for 8-10 hours. I like to cook mine a long time so they fall apart in the crock pot. Serve with brown rice and a green veggie.
ingredients: country-style pork ribs, onion, white hominy, diced tomatoes, chicken stock, garlic cloves, green chili peppers, salt, thyme, cumin
name: crock pot posole

steps: In a 13 x 9 pan, melt butter. Beat eggs lightly in a large bowl. Add flour and baking powder. Combine cheese mixture to the flour. Blend well. Pour batter into pan and bake at 400f for 14 minutes. Reduce heat to 350f and bake 35-40 minutes longer. Cut into appetizer size squares and serve warm with salsa.
ingredients: eggs, cottage cheese, all-purpose flour, baking powder, butter, green onions, green chilies, monterey jack cheese
name: baja bites

steps: Heat grill. In a small bowl, stir together all glaze ingredients. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Brush chicken generously with glaze. Place chicken on gas grill over medium or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Cover grill. Cook 8-12 minutes or until juices run clear, turning once and brushing occasionally with glaze.
ingredients: chicken drumsticks, flour, oil, maple syrup, cider vinegar, garlic, soy sauce, dry sherry, ginger, pepper
name: gingery maple glazed chicken

steps: Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until beans are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic, refried beans, salsa, chicken broth, lime juice, ground cumin
name: creamy bean soup

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 f or 220 c. If you are using a fan assisted oven, you can cut the heat by about 10 percent. In a large skillet, melt the butter and saut the rice and bacon for two minutes. Add the celery, onion and mushrooms. Cook and stir for a further 2-4 minutes, until the vegetables just start to soften. Pour into a large casserole dish. Stir in the broth and garlic. Add a generous amount of black pepper and a couple pinches of oregano. Mix well. Cover and bake for 30 minutes, or until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is cooked.
ingredients: butter, fresh mushrooms, onion, garlic, cayenne pepper, low sodium chicken broth, converted white rice, fresh ground black pepper, salt
name: kittencal s mushroom rice

steps: In small bowl, combine sugar with spices. In large bowl, whisk egg whites until frothy. Stir in pecans until coated. Sprinkle with sugar mixture, tossing with spoon to coat nuts evenly. Spread on 2 lightly greased baking sheets and bake in a preheated 325f degree oven, rotating sheets half way through, for 30 minutes or until coating is crisp and nuts are fragrant. Let cool.
ingredients: pecan halves, butter, sugar, water, salt, cinnamon, cardamom, nutmeg
name: sugar and spice candied pecans

steps: In a large skillet heat the oil over med-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until no longer pink then add the garlic and cook until the chicken has browned to desired doneness. Add the reserved marinade, broth and wine. And if using the dried oregano. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, covered for 10 minutes. Stir in the artichokes and olives. Simmer for 5 to 10 minutes. Add the hot cooked pasta and simmer for 10 minutes or until sauce is absorbed. Serve with the crumbled feta cheese. Great with a salad.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, broccoli, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, olive oil, garlic cloves, paprika, italian seasoning
name: cheese and broccoli stuffed chicken breast

steps: Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats.
ingredients: green pepper, red pepper, yellow pepper, feta cheese, red wine vinegar, clear honey, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: roasted bell peppers salad

steps: Heat oven to 350. Spray bottom of baking dish with cooking spray, sprinkle three cups of the has browns in bottom of dish. Layer with ham cheese, bell peppers and mushrooms. Sprinkle remaining potatoes on top. Beat eggs and milk with wire wisk, add cottage cheese and pepper. Pour over mixture in baking pan. Bake 45 min or until golden brown and set in the center.
ingredients: deli ham, grape jelly, eggs, cheddar cheese
name: the easiest breakfast ever

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease tube pan. Mix first four ingredients in bowl. Separate biscuits into 20 pieces, then cut biscuits into 4 pieces. Toss biscuits with bacon and other ingredients. Put all this into tube pan and drizzle with butter. Bake for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, parmesan cheese, dried onion flakes, dried parsley flakes, refrigerated biscuits
name: savory biscuit bites

steps: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together flour, eggs, milk, butter, salt and pepper. Add to skillet. Cook and stir until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand until cheese has melted.
ingredients: flour, eggs, salt, milk, butter
name: ruhrei mennonite scrambled eggs

steps: In a saucepan over high heat, bring the broth to a boil. Add the chicken, carrots, peas and scallions. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, or until the carrots are tender. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Serve, or freeze for later.
ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, soy sauce, cooked chicken breast, frozen green pea, green onion, egg
name: egg drop soup with chicken 2 ww pts

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Roll in 1-inch balls. Place on greased cookie sheet. Press with fork. Bake 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: coconut milk, evaporated milk, sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, butter, salt, vanilla
name: thai coconut milk cookies

steps: Heat 3 tablespoons of oil over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook, stirring, until the onions have wilted. Add corn and cook, stirring, until the onions have wilted. Add paprika and cook, stirring, until the onions have wilted. Add paprika and cook, stirring, until the onions have wil
ingredients: olive oil, onion, red bell peppers, tomatoes, black-eyed peas, corn, paprika, salt and pepper
name: nyoyo cooked vegetables

steps: In a large saucepan, combine first 5 ingredients and simmer over medium heat for 10-15 minutes until berries pop, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium low, stir in marmalade and cook for 5 more minutes. Set aside to cool, stirring occasionally. Transfer to glass bowl and refrigerate until chilled. Will keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: sugar, fresh cranberries, water, grand marnier, orange rind, fresh lemon juice
name: cranberries grand marnier

steps: Heat oil in wok or skillet, add crushed garlic clove and the chilli bean sauce, while still cool to allow everything to be mixed without cooking. Heat oil and add the prawns. Stir constantly for 3-4 minutes serve with simple salads. This recipe does not work with pre cooked prawns.
ingredients: prawns, lemons, artichoke hearts, salt, virgin olive oil, butter, shallot, dry white wine, tarragon, salt and pepper
name: prawns with artichokes and shallots

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey, lemon juice, curry powder, prepared mustard, onion, slivered almonds, chicken breasts, hot pepperpreparation:Arrange chicken in a shallow pan. Mix the other ingredients and pour over chicken. Cover pan with foil. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes. Add a little water if needed to bottom of the pan to prevent burning. Uncover and sprinkle almonds over chicken and baste with sauce. Bake uncovered for about 10 more minutes. Careful not to burn.
ingredients: skinless chicken breasts, margarine, prepared mustard, honey, curry powder, cayenne pepper, cumin
name: chicken breasts in curry honey mustard sauce

steps: Boil eggs and peel while still warm. Cut eggs lengthwise, remove yolks to a separate bowl. Mash yolks and add miracle whip to your favorite consistency. Add paprika, salt and pepper to taste. Stuff egg whites, and sprinkle more paprika on top. Chill.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, dijon mustard, vinegar, mayonnaise, bell peppers, paprika
name: deviled egg boats

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray an 8-inch square baking pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine oats, peaches and sugar. In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Beat with a fork or wire whisk until blended. Add to oat mixture, mixing well. Place mixture in prepared pan. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the oats are browned and the peaches bubble up around the edges of the pan. Serve hot or at room temperature.
ingredients: oats, water, crystallized ginger, peaches in juice, sugar, milk
name: ginger peach oatmeal

steps: Add 1/4 cup of water and 1/4 cup of sugar. Stir well. Let stand at room temperature 1 hour. Strain and serve over cracked ice. Serve with half-and-half and sugar.
ingredients: boiling water, cinnamon cappuccino instant coffee mix, caramel liqueur, vanilla rum, cinnamon schnapps, dark rum, non-dairy whipped topping, cinnamon stick, cinnamon sugar
name: cinnamon roll cocktail

steps: Combine butter, onion, chicken broth, salt, pepper, curry powder, lemon, juice of, dried parsley in a medium mixing bowl. Add rice and broth to bowl and mix well. Cook on low 3-4 hours or until chicken is cooked through and all liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: butter, onion, chicken broth, salt, pepper, curry powder, lemon, juice of, dried parsley
name: curried sauce for rice

steps: Cook carrots in boiling salted water for 2 minutes. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cream the butter with the brown sugar and ginger. Cook over medium heat until mixture melts and begins to bubble slightly. Add drained carrots and stir well. Saute 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add soy sauce and orange juice and cook 1-2 minutes over high heat until liquid is almost completely reduced and carrots are glazed.
ingredients: carrots, lemon juice, salt, powdered ginger, pepper, butter
name: ginger baked carrots

steps: Add tea bags to boiling water. Steep for 3 minute remove bags, then immediately add frozen lemonade and stir until completely dissolved. Sweeten with sugar or honey, if needed. Refrigerate at least until cold. Then stir in rum to taste. To serve, place a few ice cubes in a large pitcher. Thinly slice lemon and lime and add. Pour tea mixture overtop.
ingredients: boiling water, orange pekoe tea bags, lime cordial, liquid sweetener
name: iced lime tea

steps: Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian basil salad.
ingredients: lemon juice, fresh basil, dry mustard, garlic clove, olive oil, low-fat greek yogurt, salt
name: creamy basil dressing or dip

steps: Place rice in a colander & wash under cold water until water runs clear. Drain well. Place rice, coconut milk, water, butter & sugar in a 2. 5l deep microwave safe bowl or jug and stir to combine. Microwave uncovered on high for 18 minutes, stirring every 6 minutes. Remove, stir & stand for 5 minutes. Spoon warm rice inbto bowls, drizzle with extra coconut milk and top with banana & coconut.
ingredients: butter, banana, dark brown sugar, ground cinnamon, lemon peel, dark rum, ice cream
name: microwaved bananas foster

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: brownie mix, white chocolate chips, low-fat cream cheese, egg, sugar, lemon juice
name: chocolate cheesecake brownies for dummies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool.
ingredients: brown sugar, white sugar, oil, eggs, vanilla, kosher salt, baking powder, all-purpose flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: different chocolate chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees and spray a 10 x 15 inch pan with cooking spray. Place the cauliflower in a large bowl, drizzle with oil and toss to coat. Spread the cauliflower in prepared pan and sprinkle with any remaining crumbs. Bake 18 to 20 minutes, until lightly browned.
ingredients: cauliflower, butter, breadcrumbs, fresh dill
name: polish cauliflower with breadcrumbs

steps: Melt butter in medium saucepan over medium high heat. Add olive oil, shallots, garlic cloves, green onions, sun-dried tomatoes, salt, basmati rice, chicken stock, unsalted butter. Add rice and chicken stock and stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat 20 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Enjoy.
ingredients: olive oil, shallots, garlic cloves, green onions, sun-dried tomatoes, salt, basmati rice, chicken stock, unsalted butter
name: nif s basmati rice pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a second bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto the baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes.
ingredients: unbleached flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, chocolate chips, whipping cream, unsalted butter
name: easy scones

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: italian sausages, bell peppers, onion, baking potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, tomatoes, pecorino cheese, oregano, crusty italian bread
name: baked pork sausages with potatoes and tomatoes

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion, celery, onion, water, tomatoes, butter, flour, salt, pepper. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired.
ingredients: baked beans, celery, onion, water, tomatoes, butter, flour, salt, pepper
name: baked bean and tomato soup

steps: Place grape jelly in colander in sink. Boil about 2 quarts water, pour half over grape jelly, drain well, pour rest over and drain completely. In large skillet, melt butter. Add cabbage, onions and apples. Stir in grape jelly and salt. Cover and simmer to desired tenderness. I only cook mine for 10 minutes. I like this as is, but you can sweeten this further with a little sugar to taste if desired.
ingredients: concord grapes, tart apples, water, lemon juice, sugar
name: apple grape jelly

steps: Wash the dumpling thoroughly, then trim off the thick stems. Add the green onion, garlic, soy sauce, salt and pepper and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add the water, then the dumpling. Bring the soup to a boil, then lower the flame. Place a tight-fitting lid on the pot and simmer for 10 minutes.
ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, fresh ginger, minced garlic cloves, seasoned rice vinegar, soy sauce, wonton, green onion, sesame oil
name: asian dumpling soup

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl, stir together butter, garlic, cheese and parsley. Remove biscuits from container. On baking pan with sides, make 2 loaves of 5 biscuits each. Set the biscuits on their sides, just touching each other end to end, like they were in the can, only in 2 groups of 5. Split each biscuit in half. Divide the butter evenly between biscuits and spread in between split layers. Reshape the loaves. Bake 11 to 14 minutes or until loaves are deep golden brown and thoroughly baked.
ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, dried parsley, garlic powder, biscuits, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce
name: cheesy garlic pull aparts

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place a skillet over high heat and add oil. Saute onion for 3 to 4 minutes. Add mushrooms and garlic and continue to saute until mushrooms have released their liquid and they are golden. Add chicken stock and bring to boil. Pour mushroom and stock mixture orzo and rosemary into a 8x8 baking dish. Season with salt and pepper and bake 35 minutes until liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: olive oil, butter, orzo pasta, onion, garlic, dry white wine, chicken stock, salt, white pepper, sliced mushrooms
name: orzo and mushroom risotto

steps: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour milk and chocolate syrup over the ice. Add cold coffee and stir well until chocolate syrup is dissolved. Can be fancied up with a dollop of whipped cream, a shot of kahlua, and a few curls of shaved chocolate if you like. Diabetics and dieters can substitute sugar-free chocolate syrup.
ingredients: brewed espresso, nonfat milk, artificial sweetener, baking cocoa, instant malted milk powder, ice cubes
name: iced chocolate malted cappuccino

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Line a 7x11 pan with parchment paper. In a pan, melt all the butter over medium heat, taking care that it doesnt burn. Set aside to cool slightly. In a mixing bowl, stir together the eggs, demerara sugar, and granulated sugar. Stir in the melted butter, salt, vanilla, flour, baking soda, and baking powder. Spoon the batter into the prepared pan in an even layer. Dollop the nutella over the surface of the batter, and swirl the. Bake for 25-30 minutes, checking frequently to make sure the blondies dont overbake. The blondies are done when the batter is puffed and golden, and is still a little moist in the middle. The blondies will collapse slightly once they come out of the oven, and will harden into slice-able pieces in about an hour.
ingredients: toasted hazelnuts, vegetable oil, powdered sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, milk chocolate
name: chocolate hazelnut spread mock nutella from gale gand

steps: In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, white wine, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, olive oil, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: baked garlic chicken cacciatore

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Saute chicken in broth for 2 minutes. Add peppers, onions, garlic, salsa and taco seasoning. Cook until veggies are soft. Place tortillas on a baking sheet and spread refried beans onto half of each trotilla., top with chicken and veggie mixture and shredded cheese. Fold each tortilla over and bake at 350 degrees for 10-15 minutes. Serve with fat free sour cream and salsa.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, ro-tel tomatoes, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese
name: ultimate quesadillas

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: bacon, green beans, carrots, butter, garlic, black pepper
name: garlic buttered green beans n carrots with bacon

steps: Cream together the sugar and the butter. Add the vanilla, coconut, and pecans and beat well. Pour mixture into a 9 inch x 13 inch pan and bake for one hour and 15 minutes in a preheated 350 degree f oven.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, vegetable oil, water, eggs, sour cream, chocolate candy bars, semi-sweet chocolate chips, pecans, coconut
name: golden chocolate cake

steps: Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of bacon and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend until smooth and stir through cream. Divide into serving bowls and top with crispy bacon to serve.
ingredients: pork sausage, frozen hash brown potatoes, onion, chicken broth, water, cream of celery soup, cream of chicken soup, milk, cheddar cheese
name: weeknight sausage potato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine stuffing, butter, parmesan cheese, parsley, basil and rosemary. Butterfly chicken breasts and lie flat on cutting board. Take slice of ham, spoonful of stuffing mixture and slice of cheese. Wrap breast around and place seam-side down in 9 inch glass baking dish. Repeat with other breast and cover dish with foil to prevent burning. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until chicken is no longer pink. You can make a sauce with this or serve it alone.
ingredients: chicken breasts, prawns, sun-dried tomatoes, avocado, parmesan cheese, basil, garlic cloves
name: avocado prawn and sun dried tomato stuffed chicken

steps: Place all ingredients in a bowl. It may be easier to warm the honey, as it is easier to blend with the other ingredients. Make sure the cucumber is drained well, otherwise your raita will be too watery. Mix well, and add to serving bowl. Sprinkle cumin over the top. Serve on top or on the side of your favorite indian dish, or serve as a dipping sauce with naan bread.
ingredients: plain yogurt, cucumber, sweet onion, of fresh mint, sugar, salt and black pepper, boneless beef top sirloin steak, lemon-pepper seasoning, fresh mint leaves
name: beef with cucumber raita

steps: Cook sausage until done. Add apple wedges and sprinkle with raisins and salt. Cover and bake an additional 15 minutes.
ingredients: pork sausage links, granny smith apples, onion, water, brown sugar
name: apples and sausage

steps: In a large bowl, combine mandarin oranges, pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple chunks, pineapple
ingredients: oatmeal, water, banana, pineapple chunks in juice, mandarin oranges in juice, lemon extract, coconut extract, shredded coconut
name: ambrosia oatmeal ww core

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: beans, bacon, water, salt, sugar, pepper
name: southern home cooked pole beans

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add bacon and sauté for a few minutes. Add bacon and sauté for another few minutes
ingredients: french bread, butter, jarlsberg cheese, plum tomatoes, dried basil, cooked bacon
name: grilled bacon tomato and cheese sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Slice top off peppers, clean out round. Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes. Cool 15 minutes before cutting.
ingredients: cherry peppers, provolone cheese, prosciutto ham, olive oil
name: cherry pepper shooters

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle onion, garlic, mustard powder, honey, vegetable oil, salt and pepper. Cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: dry white wine, onion, garlic cloves, mustard powder, honey, vegetable oil, salt
name: delicious homemade dijon mustard

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: pork and beans, beef hot dogs, onion, olive oil, brown sugar twin
name: pork n beans wienies

steps: In 13x9-inch pan, layer the cubes of cake, packing them tightly together. Cream together cream cheese and sugar. Fold in cool whip. Spread over the cake cubes in pan. Spread pie filling over top of cream cheese mixture. Sprinkle with nuts, if desired. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: strawberry cake mix, philadelphia cream cheese, lemonade, yellow food coloring, marshmallow creme, cool whip topping, strawberry
name: strawberry lemonade cake

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: flour, salt, sugar, baking powder, egg, milk, sour cream, butter
name: best ever eat em up pancakes

steps: Heat oil in a heavy skillet. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Add broccoli rabe and stir until the leaves start to wilt. Season with salt and pepper. Cover skillet and let cook 3 to 5 minutes, turning occasionally.
ingredients: halibut, salt and pepper, oil, carrot, green onion, broccoli floret, ground ginger, chicken broth, cornstarch, lemon peel
name: halibut saute

steps: Preheat oven to 190 degrees c. Bring the stock to the boil. Place couscous in a bowl and pour the boiling stock over. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and leave to steam for 10 minutes. Fluff couscous with a fork, and add all ingredients except the tomatoes. Season to taste with the salt and pepper. Slice a top off each tomato, and using a teaspoon, hollow out, remove and discard seeds. Fill each tomato with couscous mix, and replace top as a lid. Place stuffed tomatoes on a baking tray and bake for 15-20 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: chicken broth, water, couscous, sun-dried tomato, dried basil, salt and black pepper, pine nuts
name: couscous with sun dried tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 400f for 10-15 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges.
ingredients: apple, splenda granular, butter, cinnamon, flour, refrigerated pie crusts
name: teet bush s dutch apple pie diabetic

steps: Place bread in a skillet on medium heat. Add butter to pan to prevent sticking. Lightly toast bread on both sides. Place cheese directly in pan to slightly melt. After cheese is slightly melted, place cheese on bread using a spatula. Fold bread over onto instelf. Place bread in a skillet on medium heat. Place
ingredients: whole grain bread, button mushrooms, cheese, deli ham, cooking spray
name: sam s grilled cheese

steps: Place chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes.
ingredients: margarine, worcestershire sauce, ground mustard, french-fried onions, boneless skinless chicken breasts
name: tasty onion chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350, or 325 if you have dark non-stick pan. Prepare pan whichever way. In a bowl, cream together sugar and butter. Add the sifted flour and baking powder. Beat in eggs. Stir in vanilla. Finally, stir in milk until batter is smooth. Bake for about 30-40 minutes, until cake springs back at touch.
ingredients: betty crocker yellow cake mix, eggs, white wine, vegetable oil
name: super easy wine cake

steps: In a large saute pan combine the oil, lemon juice, cilantro, lime juice, olive oil, onion, garlic, salt & fresh ground pepper. Add to bowl. Toss gently. Cook over low heat until the beans are warm and have absorbed the flavors of the olive oil, about 5 mins. Remove from the heat, add lemon juice and toss gently. Arrange beans on a platter and surround with olives. Serve immediately. Makes 4 servings.
ingredients: canned black beans, cooked white rice, fresh cilantro, lime juice, olive oil, onion, garlic, salt & fresh ground pepper
name: moros and christianos salad

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat. Drain pasta in a colander over a bowl, reserving 2 tablespoons cooking liquid. Return pasta to pan. Add reserved 2 tablespoons cooking liquid, onion, and remaining ingredients. Toss well.
ingredients: pasta shells, fresh green beans, tuna in vegetable oil, lemon, zest of, capers, dried chili, olive oil
name: tuna and lemon pasta

steps: Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Pour cranberry sauce and ranch mix over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6-7 hours. Once chicken has cooked, uncover, add the butter, and shred chicken with 2 forks until mixed well. Serve on buns.
ingredients: frozen cranberries, water, unbleached cane sugar, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt, pepper, canola oil, maple syrup
name: chicken with cranberry sauce

steps: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add spinach, soy sauce, vinegar and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes until spinach begins to wilt. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
ingredients: white sesame seeds, spinach, garlic cloves, spring onions, pork loin, oil, sesame oil, japanese soy sauce, sugar
name: pork with spinach stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, and crushed pineapple. Mix well. Pour batter into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: pineapple, bittersweet chocolate, malibu rum, whipping cream, brown sugar, wooden skewers
name: caramelized pineapple with hot chocolate sauce

steps: Preheat the oven to 375. Line two baking sheets with baking parchment. Sift together the flour, baking powder and cinnamon into a large mixing bowl. Add the diced butter and rub in with your fingers until the mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs. Stir in the raw sugar. Add the sour cream, blueberries and cranberries and stir just until combined. Spoon ten mounds of the mixture onto the prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the extra raw sugar and bake for about 20 minutes, or until golden and firm in the center. Serve warm.
ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, whipping cream, lemon juice, blueberries, strawberries, fresh mint leaves
name: 4th of july fruit parfait

steps: Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in
ingredients: soy sauce, pineapple juice, ginger, garlic clove, sherry wine, brown sugar, pork tenderloin, water, cornstarch
name: oriental pork tenderloin

steps: Boil the pasta to taste. Meanwhile, chop the garlic into pieces the size of an electron. Whisk the egg. Drain the pasta. Mix in the garlic, egg, salt, oil and pepper.
ingredients: spiral shaped pasta, green beans, spring onions, garlic clove, safflower oil, cream cheese, low-fat yogurt, cooked chicken, salt, citric acid
name: howard s failsafe chicken pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f, & lightly coat baking sheet with cooking spray. In large bowl, beat flour, baking powder, salt, lemon zest, canola oil, lemon juice, vanilla. Beat into egg mixture until blended. Stir in mincemeat. In medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, lemon zest, canola oil, lemon juice, vanilla. Stir in cherries. Drop by rounded teasoonfuls onto parchment paper lined baking sheets. Bake 12-14 minutes, or until lightly brown & firm. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, lemon zest, canola oil, lemon juice, vanilla
name: vegan lemon cookies

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar in mixing bowl. Mix well. Add pasta, broccoli, onion, raisins, bacon and sunflower seeds. Mix gently. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend.
ingredients: salt, pasta shells, fresh green beans, summer squash, marinated artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, red wine vinegar, fresh oregano, part-skim mozzarella cheese, salt and black pepper
name: sicilian pasta salad

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees f. Arrange asparagus and mushrooms on aluminum foil-lined 15x10x1-inch jelly roll pan. Sprinkle garlic, salt and pepper on top. Drizzle melted butter over vegetables. Bake, stirring occasionally, for 15-20 minutes or until vegetables are tender and lightly browned. Serve immediately.
ingredients: eggs, water, ground black pepper, fresh thyme, asparagus spears, brown button mushroom, unsalted butter, cheddar cheese
name: asparagus mushroom and cheese omelet with herbs

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix together olive oil, paprika and cinnamon. Toss the potato strips into mixture, to coat well, and spread onto baking sheet in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt and brown sugar. Bake for 30 minutes, turning every 10 minutes.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, creme fraiche, sriracha sauce
name: sweet potato fries with sriaracha cream

steps: Mix flour, yeast, sugar and salt in a bowl. In another large bowl mix milk, water and butter, and microwave for 1 minute. Add to dry ingredients, adding more flour as needed to form elastic dough. Knead and roll out onto baking stone or pizza pan. Cover with sauce, or italian salad dressing, and top with favourite toppings. Bake at 450 f until golden brown.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, fast rising yeast, salt, sugar, hot water, olive oil
name: eating well s whole wheat pizza dough

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the mushrooms, onions and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can add hot sauce or peppers to your liking. This is very versatile.
ingredients: zucchini, sliced mushrooms, yellow onion, extra virgin olive oil, salt, dried italian seasoning
name: roasted zucchini mushrooms and onions

steps: Heat 2 tablespoons reserved oil in a large skillet, over medium heat. Saute garlic for 1 to 2 minutes or until golden. Sprinkle both sides of the fish with salt and pepper. Place fish in the skillet. Cover, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Add the spinach and sun-dried tomatoes to the skillet. Cover and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Cover and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with
ingredients: olive oil, lime juice, white wine, dry mustard, chili powder, fresh ground black pepper, fresh cilantro, salt, catfish fillet
name: spicy grilled catfish

steps: Heat oven to 350. Grease 8 x 8 dish. Peel and cut oats. Place apples in pan. Add cinnamon and water. Separately, mix melted butter, flour and sugars. Spread evenly and firmly on top of apple mixture. Bake 45-50 minutes.
ingredients: nonfat milk, water, steel cut oats, brown sugar, kosher salt, ground flax seeds
name: steel cut oats with ground flax seed

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine first 5 ingredients and simmer over medium heat for 10-15 minutes until berries pop, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium low, stir in marmalade and cook for 5 more minutes. Set aside to cool, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: oranges, lemons, grapefruits, water, sugar
name: orange lemon grapefruit marmalade

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Whisk together the olive oil, garlic cloves, shallot, roma tomatoes, asparagus spear, fresh basil leaves, salt and black pepper. Cut the tomatoes in half and toss to combine with the olive oil mixture. Spread the tomatoes in a roasting pan and place in the oven. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes or until the tomatoes are shrivelled. Break the ends from the asparagus at their natural breaking point. Add the tender lengths of asparagus to the tomatoes and continue to cook for 25 minutes or until the asparagus is tender.
ingredients: olive oil, fresh garlic cloves, shallot, roma tomatoes, asparagus spear, fresh basil leaves, salt and black pepper
name: asparagus provencal

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Combine mayonnaise, celery, black olives, dried onion flakes, dried tarragon, dill weed, salt, pepper, mayonnaisepreparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Combine mayonnaise, celery, black olives, dried onion
ingredients: small shell pasta, imitation crabmeat, celery, black olives, dried onion flakes, dried tarragon, dill weed, salt, pepper, mayonnaise
name: crab pasta salad

steps: On six slices of bread, layer sourdough bread and ham. Sprinkle with garlic powder. Top with ham, bacon and remaining bread. Spread butter over the top and bottom of each sandwich. Cook on an indoor grill or panini maker for 3-4 minutes or until bread is toasted and cheese is melted.
ingredients: sourdough bread, cheddar cheese, ham, tomatoes, spinach, balsamic vinaigrette, olive oil
name: unreal ham and cheese on the grillet

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika.
ingredients: pheasants, onion, canola oil, flour, milk, sour cream, paprika, parsley, salt, pepper
name: creamed pheasant or chicken eastern european

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: corn beef hash, eggs, tabasco sauce, colby cheese
name: corned beef hash breakfast bake

steps: Heat oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook broccoli, onion, garlic and carrot in oil about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until broccoli is crisp- tender. Stir in chicken, salt, and tomatoes. Cook about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, just until chicken is hot. Toss with pasta. Sprinkle with cheese and parsley.
ingredients: jumbo pasta shells, skinless chicken breasts, spinach, ricotta cheese, cottage cheese, pasta sauce, vegetable stock, parmesan cheese, basil leaves
name: ricotta spinach chicken stuffed pasta shells

steps: Combine sour cream, french dressing, caraway seeds, salt, head cauliflower, celery leaves, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green onion, green
ingredients: sour cream, french dressing, caraway seeds, salt, head cauliflower, celery leaves, green onion
name: caraway seed cauliflower salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a food processor, add the marinade and pulse until smooth. Add the artichokes mixture and pulse until smooth. Add the spinach mixture and pulse until smooth
ingredients: marinated artichokes, frozen spinach, onion, garlic clove, lemon juice, fresh oregano, eggs, dry breadcrumbs, asiago cheese
name: artichoke asiago squares

steps: Boil the first five ingredients for 5 minutes. Then add the last three ingredients. Stir. Remove from heat. While hot, drop by spoonful onto waxed paper.
ingredients: powdered sugar, light karo syrup, cocoa, vanilla wafers, pecans, bourbon
name: bourbon rum balls no bake cookies

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: linguine, zucchini, of fresh mint, olive oil, garlic cloves
name: minty zucchini linguine

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until golden brown. Allow to cool 5-10 minutes before serving. Garnish with onions, if desired.
ingredients: butter, flour, skim milk, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, caraway seed, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, whole wheat bread, cooked ham
name: hearty cheese n toast

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly season pork chops with salt and pepper, then, two to four at a time, depending on the size of your skillet, brown well on each side, removing to warm oven. Deglaze the skillet with the wine, scraping up brown bits, reduce heat to medium and stir in the mustard, then add the cherries. Season to taste with salt and pepper. When the sauce begins to bubble, add all the pork chops back into the skillet, spooning sauce over them to coat, cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook over medium low about 5 minutes, then rearrange chops so those on the bottom are now on the top, and spoon sauce over. Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes or more, until chops are cooked through, but still very slightly pink inside. Remove chops to serving platter or individual plates. Melt butter into remaining sauce in skillet, heat and spoon over chops.
ingredients: boneless sirloin pork chop, celery ribs, soy sauce, mustard, chili paste with garlic, oyster sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, vegetable stock
name: mustard soy braised pork chops with celery

steps: Place zucchini in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic and tarragon. Saute until onion is just tender, about 2 minutes. Add zucchini and zucchini. Saute until crisp-tender, about 8 minutes or less. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: zucchini, hominy, onion, olive oil, salt, water
name: squash and hominy saute

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: sugar substitute, egg, lemon juice, bananas, white flour, salt, baking soda, milk, walnuts
name: banana nut muffins with splenda

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined.
ingredients: eggs, buttermilk, baking soda, wheat germ, whole wheat pastry flour, canola oil, salt
name: wheat germ buttermilk pancakes

steps: Melt butter in a pot. Take off the heat and add to mixture. Mix evenly. Put sifted dry ingredients. Roll into balls and place on a greased oven tray and flatten. Place a chocolate button in the centre of each biscuit. Bake for 15 - 17 minutes at 175c.
ingredients: salt, flour, baking powder, oil, milk
name: 1 2 3 biscuits

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Take all ingredients except for olive oil and chicken and combine in small bowl. Vary amount of chili powder depending on desired level of spice. Take chicken and lightly coat both sides with olive oil. Place chicken in oven-safe dish and rub both sides heavily with ingredients previously mixed. Pour a little bit more olive oil into the bottom of the dish, enough so that it is lightly covered. Cook for roughly 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, garlic powder, onion powder, dried oregano, salt, black pepper, instant mashed potatoes, chicken breasts
name: oven baked chicken breasts

steps: Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until carrots are tender. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired.
ingredients: navy beans, smoked ham hocks, onion, unsalted butter, salt, pepper
name: the famous senate restaurant bean soup

steps: In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: kielbasa, head of cabbage, boiling potatoes, water, red wine, ketchup, salt, fresh ground black pepper, red pepper sauce
name: cabbage sausage and potato stew

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream butter with sugar. Add flour and pecans, mix well. Roll into balls, about the size of a large gumball, and place on a cookie sheet. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes, or until very lightly browned. While still warm, roll in superfine sugar - this is important because the dough does not have much sugar.
ingredients: pecans, butter, vanilla essence, sugar, flour
name: pecan balls

steps: In a large skillet, heat butter over medium heat. Saute chicken and onion until lightly browned. Slowly add chicken broth to chicken, stirring constantly over medium heat, bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and cook until slightly thickned. Pour chicken mixture over hot cooked noodles and toss, serve.
ingredients: onion, celery, butter, chicken, noodles, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, lemon juice, pepper, mushrooms
name: dutch oven one pan chicken and noodles

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until very tender. Drain well. Add soymilk, vegan margarine, salt and pepper. Mash until light and fluffy. Add more soymilk and vegan margarine, if needed, to get a creamier texture.
ingredients: russet potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, butter, onion powder, salt, fresh ground pepper, shredded cheddar cheese
name: kittencal s make ahead mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 2 loaf pans with non stick coating. In a large bowl, mix flour, splenda, baking powder, and salt. In a separate bowl mix together the eggs and egg whites, canola oil, and the grated zucchini. Stir the liquid mixture into the flour mixture. The dough will be somewhat thick. Stir until the flour mixture is just moistened. Spread evenly into the loaf pans. Bake 50 minutes.
ingredients: plain flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, egg, milk, vegetable oil, creamed corn, zucchini
name: zucchini and corn muffins

steps: In a small saucepan combine butter, sugar, buttermilk, karo syrup, baking soda, vanilla and beat well. In a separate mixing bowl, mix together the butter, sugar, buttermilk, karo syrup, baking soda, vanilla and beat well. In a separate mixing bowl, mix together the butter, sugar, buttermilk, karo syrup,
ingredients: butter, sugar, buttermilk, karo syrup, baking soda, vanilla
name: buttermilk syrup

steps: Heat oven to 400. Parboil halved bell peppers for 5 minutes. Saut onions and green peppers in skillet until heated thoroughly. Add cooked rice, drained black beans, and tomato sauce and cook for an additional 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in cup of cheese. Spoon mixture into pepper halves and then place in 9 x 13 glass baking dish. Pour hot water in the bottom of the dish and cover with aluminum foil. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake uncovered for an additional 10 minutes.
ingredients: cooked basmati rice, minced chicken, fresh tomato, mushrooms, egg, jalapeno peppers, fine breadcrumbs, green bell peppers, tomato sauce
name: chicken stuffed bell peppers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl combine all ingredients and set to the side. Heat the oil in a heavy bottom oven proof skillet until the oil shimmers. Pat the chops dry and add them to the hot pan. Cook for two minutes on the first side, flip the chop and cook for an additional minute. Transfer the chops to a plate. Pour the excess oil out of the pan. Add the sauce mixture, scrape up the browned bits on the bottom of the pan. Simmer the sauce over medium heat, stirring frequently until sauce is thick and glossy, about 4-5 minutes. Take the pan off the heat and add the pork chops to the pan, turning to coat in the sauce. Place the skillet in the oven and cook for 15 minutes. Spoon the sauce on top of the pork chops and serve.
ingredients: lemon jelly, evaporated low-fat milk, crushed pineapple in juice, kiwi fruits, chocolate
name: pineapple bavarian

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve, garnished with a fresh rosemary sprig, or an additional drizzling of olive oil.
ingredients: dried yellow peas, water, salt, pork, ginger
name: rter med flsk pea soup with pork

steps: Spray a nonstick skillet with non-fat cooking spray. On medium heat, saute onion and pepper for about 10 minutes. Stir in chopped broccoli. Pour in the lemon juice and wine. Add the tarragon. Cover and cook over low heat for about 15 minutes. Prepare the tortellini according to the packages directions while veggies are cooking. Stir the olive oil and sun-dried tomatoes with the veggie mixture. Serve over prepared tortellini.
ingredients: shallots, garlic cloves, flour, butter, white wine, cream, parmesan cheese, fresh basil, fresh basil leaves, cheese-filled tortellini
name: cheese tortellini with basil cream sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Add chicken and cook 3 minutes. Reduce heat and add soy sauce, water, and reserved liquid. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes, or until chicken is falling off the bones.
ingredients: chicken, potatoes, carrots, garlic, onion, beans, salt, tomatoes, green peas, tomato ketchup
name: filipino chicken afritada

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: butter, soy flour, milk, monterey jack cheese, poblano chiles, salt & freshly ground black pepper, cilantro leaves
name: queso poblano or jalapeno dipping sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. Should be 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, applesauce, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, dried dill
name: cheddar quick bread

steps: Cover and cook on low 7-8 hrs, medium for 6 hrs or high for 3-4 hours. Cover and cook on low 7-8 hrs, medium for 6 hrs or high for 3-4 hours. Cover and cook on low 7-8 hrs, medium for 6 hrs or high for 3
ingredients: pork loin, granny smith apples, honey, cinnamon
name: crockpot honey apple pork loin

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Cream together sugar and margarine. Add eggs, beat till light and fluffy. Combine dry ingredients in another bowl. Mix together orange juice and milk. Add the orange juice mixture alternately with the dry ingredients to the batter, beating till blended. Fold in orange rind and walnuts. Bake in a loaf pan about for 45 minutes or until the cake is cooked when tested with a skewer.
ingredients: milk, black tea leaves, sugar, fresh ginger
name: ugandan ginger tea recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine pancetta, butter, zucchini, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper in a large skillet over medium heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges.
ingredients: pancetta, butter, zucchini, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: zucchini pancetta saute

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Place the rack in the center of the oven and preheat to 400 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking or cookie sheet. In a bowl, blend together the cheese, the puree and the butter. Blend in the flour, a little at a time, to form a sticky dough. Drop by tablespoons onto the prepared baking sheet, and form into patties. Press the olives into the centers, and pull the dough up to completely cover. Bake for about 15 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove from the oven and serve.
ingredients: cream cheese, french dressing, pimento stuffed olive, seedless raisin, bread
name: cheese olive raisin sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, egg, milk, salt, bananas, peanut oil
name: fried bananas

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 9x13 inch pan. Mix together first 4 ingredients in a small bowl. In a large mixing bowl, beat brown sugar and butter till fluffy. Add eggs and beat till well blended then beat in vanilla. Stir in flour mixture till well blended then beat in vanilla. Spread into a greased 8 in pan. Sprinkle with nutty noel bars. Bake for 20-23 minutes. Do not overcook. The center surface of the bars should stay very slightly depressed when done.
ingredients: brown sugar, butter, vanilla, egg yolk, flour, salt, white chocolate chips, salted mixed nuts
name: nutty noel bars

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onion, and cook for 1 minute, or until the onion is translucent. Add the bacon, and cook for 1 minute, or until the onion is translucent. Add the bacon, and
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, light cream cheese, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, green onion, reduced-sodium bacon
name: stuffed sun dried tomato and onion chicken wrapped in bacon

steps: Mix in a big bowl the green beans, the potatoes, the carrots, the cucumbers and the peas. Mix them well. Add the parmesan cheese. Add the mayo and mix the salad. Put on the top the tomato slices.
ingredients: crusty italian bread, italian salad dressing, onion, zucchini, green sweet pepper, garlic clove, tomatoes, provolone cheese, parmesan cheese
name: italian vegetable melt

steps: Heat the oven to 400f. Put the chicken skin-side-up in a small roasting tin. Mix together the garlic, thyme and butter and dot over the chicken. Scatter around the red onions and pancetta and drizzle with oil. Roast for 20 minutes until the chicken has cooked through and the onions are softened. Divide the salad between 4 plates and top with the red onions, pancetta and chicken.
ingredients: chicken thighs, extra virgin olive oil, fresh thyme, garlic cloves, salt, black pepper, lemon slices
name: roast chicken legs with lemon thyme

steps: Combine balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic
