ingredients: port wine, balsamic vinegar, honey, fresh thyme, shallot, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: balsamic port drizzle

steps: Preheat griddle to medium heat. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except bread and butter. Mix until the cornstach is disolved. Transfer mixture to a shallow bowl or pan. Dip both sides of each bread slice into the mixture. Melt butter on the griddle or skillet. Place bread on heated surface and cook each side to a light golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: eggnog, eggs, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, bread, unsalted butter
name: no fuss overnight french toast

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place sliced apples in buttered 8x8 pan. Add spices, lemon juice and water. In separate bowl, mix butter, sugar and flour until crumbly. Sprinkle on top of apples. Bake for 1 hour or until top is golden brown and apples are tender.
ingredients: green apples, butter, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: butter baked apples

steps: Heat oven to 200 degrees. Combine cornstarch with water in glass and stir. Make toast and butter. Place in oven to keep warm. Drain tuna and place in large skillet, with fork break apart. Pour milk over tuna, and add salt and pepper. Heat on medium high then add cornstarch mixture slowly, stirring constantly until thickened. Serve over toast.
ingredients: butter, tuna, flour, milk, salt, pepper, toast
name: creamed tuna the old fashioned way no peas

steps: In a double-boiler melt chocolate. Remove from heat and add the sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, salt, and nuts. Stir until smooth. Turn into wax paper lined 8 inch square pan and chill in fridge. Store in cool place in an airtight container.
ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, unsalted butter, cinnamon, salt, miniature marshmallow, milk chocolate chips, vanilla
name: mexican fudge

steps: Cook beef, onion and pepper in skillet until meat is browned and vegetables are tender. Drain. Stir in tomato sauce, seasoned salt, and pepper. Blend cottage cheese and cream cheese together until fluffy. Spoon noodles into grease 10x6x2 inch baking dish. Spread cheese mixture over noodles. Pour meat sauce on top. Bake uncovered at 350 for 30 to 40 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: wide egg noodles, lean ground beef, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, cream of mushroom soup, cream cheese, worcestershire sauce, black pepper
name: easy beef noodle skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut zucchini into wedges, like you would steak cut fries. Beat egg with 1 tablespoon water. Mix parmesan cheese with herb seasoning. Dip zucchini into egg, then coat with cheese by pressing slices into mixture. Bake on well greased baking sheet for approximately 15 minutes, or until they reach desired browness. You can also turn them carefully to brown on both sides. I do not turn them when i make them.
ingredients: eggs, plain flour, zucchini, mint leaf, parmesan cheese, garlic powder
name: zucchini mint bake

steps: Preheat oven to 400. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the tenderloin and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the tenderloin well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. Slice and serve immediately.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, seasoned bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, vegetable oil, onion, garlic clove
name: parmesan pork tenderloin

steps: In a saucepot, bring 2 inches of water to a boil. Add broccoli. Cover. Cook for 5 minutes, or until broccoli is tender. Place peppers and tomatoes in colander, pour in cooked broccoli and hot water to drain. In skillet over high heat, cook garlic in olive oil 1 minute. Add vegetables and seasoning blend. Cook 2 minutes. Arrange on serving platter.
ingredients: broccoli, sweet red pepper, yellow sweet pepper, vegetable oil, onion, fresh gingerroot, chicken stock, soy sauce
name: broccoli and sweet peppers

steps: Combine astragalus root, broccoli, tomatoes, shiitake mushrooms, salt, water, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon juice, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel, lemon peel
ingredients: astragalus root, broccoli, tomatoes, shiitake mushrooms, salt, water
name: astragalus vegetable soup detox soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease bottom only of 13x9-inch pan. Make brownie mix as directed on box, using oil, water and 2 eggs. Spread in pan. Make brownie mix as directed on pouch, using butter and 1 egg. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls evenly onto brownie batter. Press down lightly. Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until toothpick inserted 2 inches from side of pan comes out almost clean. Cool completely, about 1 hour then frost. For brownies, cut into 8 rows by 6 rows.
ingredients: brownie mix, eggs, vegetable oil, semisweet chocolate morsels, pecans
name: brownie chip cookies

steps: Place the beans in a large saucepan with cold water and bring to a boil. Once boiling, add a touch of salt and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. Drain the beans and return to saucepan, add 2 tablespoons butter, chicken stock, brown sugar, chipotle pepper and adobo sauce. Mash the beans until combined, i like to leave them slightly lumpy. Season with salt and black pepper and serve.
ingredients: dried pinto bean, chopped tomatoes, onion, garlic, ground cumin, chili powder, chipotle chile in adobo, ham hock
name: chipotle pinto beans

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and saute for 5 minutes. Add bacon and saute for another 5 minutes. Add bacon and sa
ingredients: sweet onions, mayonnaise, onion powder, mozzarella cheese, swiss cheese
name: warm onion spread

steps: Mix all the ingredients above in a bowl. Add your desired cut of lamb. Cover in the fridge for at least 24 hours. Cook your lamb in your preferred way. Enjoy a nice new taste to your meat.
ingredients: vegetable oil, lamb rib chops, salt and pepper, yogurt, fresh rosemary, fresh dill, lemon juice
name: lamb chops with yogurt rosemary and dill sauce

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: sweet bell peppers, hot pepper, onions, sausage links, mixed italian herbs, garlic powder, tomato paste
name: sausage pepper and onions baked

steps: Melt butter in medium saucepan over med-high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add parsley and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to med-low. Cover and simmer 25 minutes, or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in parsley. Reduce
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, long-grain white rice, vermicelli, garlic clove, water, herbs, salt and pepper
name: hippie rice pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a shallow dish, toss the asparagus, olive oil and salt and pepper together. Lay the asparagus in one level layer. Place in oven and roast, uncovered for approximately 10 minutes, or until the asparagus is just tender. Transfer to a serving plate. Whisk the lemon juice, lemon zest, dill, olive oil and honey together in a small bowl. Top the asparagus with some of the dressing and keep the rest on the side.
ingredients: asparagus, lemon juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, dried dill weed, garlic, salt, ground black pepper
name: mustard and dill asparagus

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Grease a baking sheet. Roll out the thawed bread dough into a rectangle then cover with a clean tea towel and allow to sit for about 15 minutes. Brush the top of the dough with olive oil, then sprinkle with black pepper and italian seasoning, then sprinkle the chopped pepperoni over the top. Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese over the pepperoni then top with parmesan cheese. Roll up the dough in jelly-roll fashion, then pinch the long seam and the two ends tightly to seal completely. Brush the outside of the dough with olive oil. Place seam-side down onto baking pan then sprinkle a small amount of kosher salt over the top. Bake for about 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: frozen bread dough, pepperoni, butter, mozzarella cheese
name: pepperoni and mozzarella monkey bread

steps: Spray the bottom of a 10 inch tube pan or bundt pan with a non-stick vegetable spray and dust with flour. Arrange eggnog cubes in the bottom of the pan. Blend together nutmeg, almonds, yellow cake mix, ground nutmeg, eggs, eggnog, rum. Add cake mix and beat at medium speed for 4 minutes. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake at 375f for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean. Cool cake 20 minutes in the pan. Loosen and remove from pan onto serving plate.
ingredients: butter, sliced almonds, yellow cake mix, ground nutmeg, eggs, eggnog, rum
name: eggnog pound cake

steps: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray then heat until hot. Add the onion, peppers, & garlic and cook over medium heat for 2 minutes. Add the tofu, soy sauce, & pepper to the vegetables, stir. Continue to cook another 3-4 minutes or until the tofu is heated through. Remove from the heat & cool slightly. Mix the tomatoes & spinach in with the tofu & vegetables then stuff each pita half with the mixture. Serve immediately.
ingredients: onion, firm tofu, fresh spinach leaves, mushrooms, canola oil, sesame oil, light soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, garlic
name: cai bao filling vegetable tofu bun filling sesame flavored

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken wings, onion powder, garlic cloves, margarine, distilled white vinegar, hot sauce, pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper, white pepper,
ingredients: chicken wings, onion powder, garlic powder, garlic cloves, margarine, distilled white vinegar, hot sauce, pepper
name: no need to go to buffalo wings

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Scrub potato with a brush. Cut potato crosswise into 40 very thin slices using mandoline slicer or very sharp knife. Combine potato slices and hot water in a large bowl. Let stand 10 minutes. Drain. Arrange potato slices on a layer of paper towels. Pat dry. Coat 2 jelly roll pans evenly with oil. Arrange potato slices in a single layer on pans. Coat potato slices with cooking spray, and sprinkle evenly with lemon pepper and salt. Bake at 400 degrees for 18 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: sweet potato, potato, beetroot, oil
name: vegetable chips

steps: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Whirl one minute. Scrape down and blend 15 seconds more. Refrigerate at least one hour before making crepes. Heat a lightly greased 6 inch skillet. Remove from heat. Spoon in 2 tbsp batter. Lift and tilt skillet to spread evenly. Return to heat. Brown on one side only. To remove, invert pan over paper toweling. Repeat with remaining batter.
ingredients: eggs, milk, butter, all-purpose flour, white sugar, salt, vanilla, cinnamon
name: dessert crepes

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown.
ingredients: potatoes, salt, lemon, virgin olive oil
name: granny s greek fried potatoes

steps: Heat oven to 350. Beat cake mix and water in extra-large glass or metal bowl on low speed for 30 seconds. Beat on medium speed for 1 minute. Add lemon pie filling and mix well. Pour into ungreased 15x10 jelly roll pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool and frost.
ingredients: fresh strawberries, angel food cake, lemon pie filling, heavy whipping cream, vanilla extract, powdered sugar, lemon zest, liqueur
name: strawberry lemon angel food trifle

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix flour and corn. Then add sugar, milk, salt and butter. Add eggs and mix well. Pour corn mixture into a greased 1 quart casserole dish. Place casserole into a larger pan and fill the larger pan half way up with hot water. Bake for 1 hour in the 325f oven.
ingredients: creamed corn, sweet corn, eggs, green pepper, onion, cracker crumbs, salt & pepper, milk, butter
name: jewel s corn pudding

steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Bake in medium heat for about 15 minutes until the sesame is slightly toasted.
ingredients: light cream cheese, cracked black pepper, salt-free lemon & herb seasoning, flax seeds
name: cracked pepper flax seed cheese ball

steps: Add all ingredients to the pan according to the order in the manufacturers directions, with the milk, eggs, butter, salt, flour, sugar, cardamom, yeast. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the bottom of bread it sounds hollow. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the
ingredients: milk, eggs, butter, salt, flour, sugar, cardamom, yeast
name: finnish coffee bread breadmaker recipe

steps: Heat oil in a wok. Add peanut oil, dried thai chiles, potatoes, scallion, salt. Cook 1 minute. Add chili powder, coriander powder, turmeric, salt, and fenugreek seeds. Stir well. Reduce heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are crispy and tender. Stir in cilantro.
ingredients: peanut oil, dried thai chiles, potatoes, scallion, salt
name: quick and easy yunnan potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook and drain pasta according to package directions. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until lightly browned. Sprinkle with flour and stir while cooking for 1 more minute. Reduce heat, slowly add the milk and cook for about 5 minutes or until milk is slightly thickened. Remove from heat, add one cup cheese, corn, salsa and green chilies. Add in hot pasta and mix well. Place in lightly greased baking dish. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and bake 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: rotelle pasta, chorizo sausage, green pepper, onion, zucchini, low-sodium stewed tomatoes, no-salt-added corn, mild green chilies, monterey jack cheese
name: southwestern style pasta skillet

steps: Place bacon in shallow dish, cover with paper towel, cook on high in a microwave for 3 minutes or until bacon is crisp. Remove bacon from the dish, then add the butter, onion and garlic to the dish, cook on high for 2 minutes. Stir in the mushrooms, cook on high for another 2 minutes, then sprinkle the mushroom mixture with the flour. Next, top the mushroom mixture and flour with the cream cheese, worcestershire sauce and dry sherry. Cook on high for 5 minutes, stir halfway through this cooking time. Stir in the sour cream and the chopped bacon. Spoon into a serving dish. Serve as a hot dip with raw vegetables such as sliced carrots, capsicum, beans and celery.
ingredients: breakfast sausage, button mushrooms, onion, cream cheese, worcestershire sauce
name: sausage dip

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Line a large 9-inch pie plate with rolled out pastry dough, prick with a fork and bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and reduce heat to 350f. In a small bowl, combine sugar, flour and salt. Mix well and spread evenly over the bottom of the crust. Warm cream in the microwave, and then carefully pour the warmed cream over the sugar mixture, completely covering it. In bits, dab butter over the cream. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes to an hour, or until golden spots form on the top. The filling will seem liquid but will become firmer as it cools.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, worcestershire sauce, beef broth, gluten-free flour, onion salt, pepper, frozen mixed vegetables, mashed potatoes
name: poor man s pie gluten free dairy free

steps: Heat water to boiling. Add tea bags. Reduce heat and simmer for 2 to 4 minutes, depending on how strong you like your tea. Remove tea bags and add spices. Simmer for additional 2 minutes. Add milk and splenda, heat to a near boil stirring constantly. Add milk and splenda, heat to a
ingredients: splenda sugar substitute, cornstarch, cinnamon, water, malibu rum, lemon juice, fresh coffee, syrup, skim milk
name: cinnamon rum latte diabetic

steps: Using a 2 quart casserole dish with lid, put rice, hot water, maple syrup, vanilla extract in dish. Stir. Cover, and microwave on high power 5 minutes. Stir with fork. Cover and put back in microwave and cook on medium this time for 15 minutes. Remove lid and fluff with fork. Let stand 2-3 minutes. Serve.
ingredients: cooked rice, hot water, maple syrup, vanilla extract
name: easy breezy rice milk

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Place bread on pan and put into oven for approximately 6 minutes leave oven on. Remove from oven and let bread cool slightly. Then add to food processor along with spices ground until desired consistantcy. Return crumbs to oven, spreading evenly, for approximately 5-6 minutes. Or until lightly toasted. Remove from oven and let cool. Add parmesan cheese and stir until evenly mixed.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, eggs, nutmeg, lemon, broth
name: passatelli dei nonni bread and parmesan cheese soup

steps: Place chicken pieces, bone side up on unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat, about 20 minutes or until light brown. Meanwhile in a bowl stir together oil, mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, oregano and red pepper. Brush mustard mixture onto chicken. Turn chicken, brush with remaning mixture. Broil for 5-15 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink.
ingredients: green onions, skinless chicken pieces, orange juice, low sodium chicken broth, spicy brown mustard, honey, bottled hot pepper sauce, white rice
name: creole mustard orange chicken

steps: Mix dry ingredients. Cut in shortening and bacon grease. Add butter and mix well. Bake at 375f until golden brown. Can be frozen before baking.
ingredients: flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, cream of tartar, butter, egg, milk
name: sky high biscuits

steps: In a large saucepan, cook garlic until tender. Add tomatoes, salt, basil, and black pepper. Cook three minutes. Add cooked spaghetti. Toss well. Add chicken broth and stir. Toss with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: angel hair pasta, eggplant, italian-style stewed tomatoes, tomato sauce, red wine, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh parsley
name: angel hair with spicy eggplant sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl, stir together melted butter, ricotta, milk, eggs and vanilla until smooth. Pour into dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Fold in berries. Distribute batter evenly into prepared muffin cups. Bake for 18-22 minutes, until a tester inserted into the cake part comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate in an airtight container. Cakes will stay moist for several days.
ingredients: low-fat ricotta cheese, cocoa powder, lemon, zest of, espresso coffee, honey, berries
name: ricotta al caffe

steps: Place sauerkraut in skillet, cover, and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sauerkraut is tender.
ingredients: kielbasa, sauerkraut, red potatoes, rye bread
name: sausage n sauerkraut skillet

steps: Heat the cayenne pepper in a large pan and stir-fry the cayenne pepper over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, and salt. Fry until onion and garlic are slightly turning gold. Add the chillies and continue frying. Keep stirring the whole time to avoid burning on the bottom of pan. When the onions and garlic look golden, but not browned, add chilli powder, turmeric and tuna. Stir the ingredients well for about 1 minute or so. Lower the heat to the lowest it can go. Now add the cabbage to the rest of the ingredients in the pot and gently stir around until the cabbage is fully coated with the rest of the ingredients. Place a lid on the pot and let it cook for about 30 minutes taste and see if the cabbage is cooked after 30 minutes. If not, leave it for another 5 min or so until you think its cooked. Goes well with rice or naan, or just as a side dish.
ingredients: cayenne pepper, allspice, turmeric, gingerroot, salt, cabbage, butter, tomato paste, onion
name: mummy s cabbage curry

steps: Preheat oven to 500 degrees farenheit. Brush seared king fish with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside. In a 9-in metal baking pan, combine the butter, scallions and garlic. Reduce oven heat to 425. Cook the scallion mixture for 5 minutes. Stir in the tomatoes and capers and cook for 3 minutes. Top the mixture with salmon and cook for another 20 minutes. Top with fish.
ingredients: fish steaks, garlic, lemon pepper, lime, chicken stock powder, fresh cream, red onion, whole grain mustard, capers, olive oil
name: seared king fish and mustard cream and caper sauce

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large salad bowl. Cover and shake to combine. Dressing can be made several days in advance and refrigerated, shake well before using. Combine remaining ingredients in a large salad bowl. Chill until serving time. To serve, add dressing and toss lightly to combine. Add additional freshly ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: chicken, red onion, feta cheese, red wine vinegar, grapes, poppy seed, salt and pepper
name: red wine feta chicken salad

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onion, and cook for 5 mins until onion is translucent. Add ground beef and, using a large spoon or fork to break up, cook until the meat is browned. Add next 5 ingredients, rinsing out each can with a few tablespoons of water and adding the water to the pot. Cook for 15-20 minutes to let the flavors blend. Salt to taste. As the chili simmers, bring a large pot of water to boil and salt the water. When the water boils, add the frozen ravioli, and when the water returns to a boil, lower heat to simmer. Cook 4 or 5 mins until ravioli is cooked through. Place in serving bowls with chili over the top, sprinkled with grated cheese.
ingredients: beef ravioli, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh breadcrumb, olive oil
name: baked beef ravioli with cheese

steps: Mix all ingredients together in large bowl. Refrigerate 20 min or till needed. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Roll chilled mixture into 1 in balls. Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake 15 minutes.
ingredients: stove top stuffing mix, hot chicken broth, butter, frozen chopped spinach, parmesan cheese, fresh mushrooms, onion, eggs
name: spinach and mushroom stuffing balls

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: brown sugar, gluten-free soy sauce, minced ginger, oil, garlic clove, whole boneless skinless chicken breasts, toasted sesame seeds, parsley
name: sesame chicken bites

steps: Sprinkle with chopped green onions and serve.
ingredients: spam, pineapple slices, yellow mustard, corn flakes, brown sugar, clove, black pepper
name: dressed up spam

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients except the italian bread crumbs. Vegetable oil. Form into 2 inch meatballs. For more intense italian flavor, roll each meatball in the italian bread crumbs. This is optional. If you are going to put the meatballs in sauce or soup do not roll in the crumbs. Place on a baking pan that is non-stick. Preheat oven 375. Cook on the middle rack for 30 - 35 minutes. Makes 25 to 30 meatballs.
ingredients: ground beef, italian style breadcrumbs, cheese, parsley, eggs, fresh garlic, onion, salt & pepper, milk
name: great italian meat balls

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Spray a quiche dish with nonstick cooking spray. Mix mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, garlic cloves, salt and black pepper in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to blend. Spread mashed potato mixture evenly into the quiche dish. Arrange the frozen potato wedges in a spoke wheel fashion on top of the mashed potatoes. For curly fries, make a random pattern, breaking in half any large fries. Sprinkle with bacon bits, green onion and parmesan cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve.
ingredients: potatoes, milk, onion, green peppers, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper, eggs, butter
name: potato squares

steps: Place all ingredients in a bowl. It may be easier to warm the honey, as it is easier to blend with the other ingredients. Make sure the cucumber is drained well, otherwise your raita will be too watery. Mix well, and add to serving bowl. Sprinkle cumin over the top. Serve on top or on the side of your favorite indian dish, or serve as a dipping sauce with naan bread.
ingredients: cucumbers, salt and black pepper, green onions, plain yogurt, cumin seeds, fresh cilantro
name: cucumber yogurt raita

steps: In a cast iron skillet over medium high heat cook the valle de smragdos salsa until blackened. Remove half of the blackened skin and discard. Chop the chilies. Combine the chopped chilies with the remaining ingredients. Let stand 1 hour. Cover and refrigerate.
ingredients: tomatoes, tomato juice, white onion, salt, fresh cilantro, garlic cloves, apple cider vinegar, lemon juice, ground cumin, hot pepper
name: valle de smragdos salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: steak-style french fries, condensed cheddar cheese soup, milk, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika
name: cheese fries

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: wheat bran, boiling water, brown sugar, butter, white flour, baking soda, salt, eggs, buttermilk
name: hodgson mill s oven ready bran muffins

steps: Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of bacon and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend until smooth and stir through cream. Divide into serving bowls and top with crispy bacon to serve.
ingredients: butter, potatoes, white pepper, chicken broth, cooked bacon, onions, milk, fat-free half-and-half, parsley
name: bacon and potato soup ii

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 400 for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cream cheese, milk, carrot, green onion, vegetable oil, egg
name: garden vegetable muffins

steps: Spray a large nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Cook ham steaks in skillet over medium heat for 3 minutes per side, or until golden brown. Remove ham from skillet and keep warm. Squeeze lemon over pan, scraping up brown bits from the bottom of the pan. Add butter to pan. Once butter is melted, add garlic, parsley and tomatoes. Cook over medium heat for approximately 5 minutes, or until tomatoes soften and begin to lose their shape. Spoon sauce over ham steak and serve immediately.
ingredients: ham steaks, apple jelly, prepared yellow mustard, pepper
name: ruth s simple glazed ham steaks

steps: Melt butter in medium saucepan over medium high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add scallions and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Reduced heat to low. Cover and cook for 17-20 minutes. I finished by adding a little extra butter and salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: green pepper, garlic powder, dried basil leaves, black pepper, long-grain white rice, chicken broth, veg-all
name: vegetable rice pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cut ribs into serving sizes. Place in greased roasting pan. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. In a saucepan combine the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, cook for one minute. Drain grease from ribs. Pour sauce over ribs. Cover and bake 1 hour. Uncover, bake for 30 minutes longer, basting twice.
ingredients: red potatoes, carrots, pork chops, salt, barbecue sauce, worcestershire sauce, cola, pepper, ketchup
name: barbecued pork chops supper

steps: Place orange bocconcini, beetroot, lettuce leaf, bocconcini, salt, pepper, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, b
ingredients: orange, beetroot, lettuce leaf, bocconcini, salt, pepper, balsamic vinegar
name: orange bocconcini and beetroot salad

steps: Boil and drain noodles. In a large bowl, mix all ingredients except the topping. Pour into greased rectangular pan. Bake at 350 for 1 hour.
ingredients: wide egg noodles, dark raisin, eggs, sour cream, butter, sugar, whole milk, corn flakes, brown sugar
name: easy noodle kugel

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add ginger and ginger mixture and cook until the ginger is dissolved. Add ginger and ginger mixture and cook until the ginger
ingredients: green mangoes, sugar, scotch bonnet peppers, sweet red pepper, fresh lime juice
name: bermuda triangle mango chili jam

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the pork loins side by side, fat side up in a large heavy roasting pan. Insert an ovenproof meat thermometer in the center of one of the roast. Roast the pork for 30 minutes. Meanwhile in a bowl, crush the rosemary with the olive oil, pepper, vinegar and salt. Spoon the seasoning over the pork. Return the meat to the oven and roast for 30 minutes longer, until the internal temperature is 160 to 165. Remove from the oven, cover loosely with foil and let rest for at least 10 minutes. Thinly slice the meat and arrange on platters. Pour any juices over the meat. Garnish with rosemary springs. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, cracked black pepper, parmesan cheese, dried basil, dried rosemary, dried thyme, garlic powder, salt
name: pork roast with herbed pepper rub

steps: In a medium saucepan on high heat, bring the water to a boil. Add the ginger and cayenne and reduce heat. Simmer for 20 minutes and strain. Add sweetener to taste. Drink and be healthy.
ingredients: lemon, honey, cayenne, fresh ginger, water
name: lemon ginger cayenne tea

steps: Hard boil eggs. After peeling and cooling, halve eggs lengthwise. In bowl mash yolks with other ingredients and spoon equally into the 24 egg halves. Garnish tops with a bit of paprika or if you dare, a bit of cayenne. Corrected recipe -- reversed quantity of mayo and blue cheese.
ingredients: eggs, mayonnaise, mustard, cayenne pepper, salt and black pepper, carrot, celery, capers
name: bunny deviled eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly coat 12 muffin tin liners with cooking spray and place in muffin tin. In large bowl, mash bananas with fork. Whisk in egg, milk, granulated sugar, and brown sugar. In separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Add flour mixture to banana mixture and combine well. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. Spoon equal amounts of batter into 12 muffin cups. Bake 20 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Allow to cool slightly in pan, then remove to wire rack.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, coconut yogurt, milk, vanilla, self raising flour, baking powder, desiccated coconut, chocolate chips
name: coconut choc chip muffins

steps: Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture equally between the three pie crusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze. Leave out or refrigerate to soften a bit before cutting. Store leftover in freezer.
ingredients: graham cracker crust, peanut butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, cool whip, peanuts
name: mary s creamy peanut butter pie

steps: Mix all the ingredients above in a bowl. Add your desired cut of lamb. Cover in the fridge for at least 24 hours. Cook your lamb in your preferred way. Enjoy a nice new taste to your meat.
ingredients: lamb loin chops, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, butter
name: buttery baked lamb chops

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add eggs, green peas, onion, salt, black pepper, oil. Add the rest of the ingredients. Mix well. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-40 minutes or until firm. Serve with tomato sauce, sweet corn, red sweet peppers.
ingredients: eggs, green peas, onion, salt, black pepper, oil
name: egg and green peas scramble

steps: Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Mix in pineapple and oranges. Chill.
ingredients: fat-free sugar-free instant pistachio pudding mix, crushed pineapple in juice, low-fat vanilla yogurt, cool whip free
name: low fat watergate salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice.
ingredients: french bread, butter, salt, sweet paprika, celery seed, garlic, cayenne pepper
name: mom s garlic bread

steps: In a large bowl, combine olive oil, lemon juice, and lemon wedge. Add to bowl. Toss all ingredients together. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: cannellini beans, red onion, butter, garlic cloves, rosemary, lemon juice, lemon wedge
name: rosemary white bean salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly spray a 9x13 inch pan with cooking spray. Quarter biscuits, and place at bottom of pan. Layer with cooked bacon and shredded cheese. In a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs, sour cream, salt, and pepper and pour over cheese and biscuits. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until golden brown. Allow to cool 5-10 minutes before serving. Garnish with onions, if desired.
ingredients: country sausage, eggs, cheddar cheese, potatoes, salt & pepper
name: napa dave s individual breakfast casseroles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Put all ingredients in a blender. Blend until all ingredients are well blended. Pour into a 10-inch, slightly greased, pie pan. Bake for 1 hour. May be eaten warm, but refrigerate any leftovers.
ingredients: sugar, coconut, butter, flour, milk, eggs, vanilla extract
name: impossible pie

steps: In a large bowl, combine allthe ingredients except the mahi mahi fillet, cilantro leaf, hoisin sauce, mayonnaise, green onion, fresh ginger, garlic clove, salt and pepper to taste. Form the meat into 6 patties. Lightly brush a grill pan or skillet with the sesame oil and place over medium-high heat. Add the patties and fry until golden, about 4 minutes. Turn and cook until the other side is golden and the turkey is cooked through, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a bun. Serve immediately.
ingredients: mahi mahi fillet, cilantro leaf, hoisin sauce, mayonnaise, green onion, fresh ginger, garlic clove, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, sesame oil
name: mahi mahi burgers with ginger and hoisin

steps: Cook beans according to package directions. To prepare the beans, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and saute until tender. Sprinkle on chili powder and cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add beans, salsa, and water and cook about 5 minutes. Serve beans over rice, with sour cream on top.
ingredients: canned pinto beans, low-sodium tomato sauce, sweet onions, beer, molasses, dry mustard, jalapeno pepper, reduced-sodium worcestershire sauce, red pepper flakes, fresh cilantro
name: mexican baked beans

steps: Heat 2 tbsps. of olive oil on high in a heavy skillet. Add the sweet pepper and onion and garlic and saute for about 3 minutes. Add the remaining vegetables and continue cooking until they are done to your taste. Grind some fresh black pepper over all and stir well. Place in serving platter and sprinkle a small amount of grated parmesan cheese over all.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, hazelnuts, lemon juice, olive oil, maple syrup, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lettuce, prosciutto
name: baby greens with hazelnut parmesan crisps

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Pour the oil into an ovenproof pan. Stir the garlic, cumin, and cayenne pepper into the olive oil and mix well. Add the garbanzo beans and toss to coat evenly. Bake in preheated oven until garbanzo beans turn golden, about 30 minutes, shaking every 10 minutes. Remove from oven, and sprinkle with feta cheese and thyme. Serve warm.
ingredients: vegetable oil, white onion, garlic cloves, dried oregano, chili powder, red chilies, chickpeas, dry breadcrumbs, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper
name: spicy chickpea burgers

steps: Preheat grill to high. Lightly oil grates. Insert two 8-inch-long metal or presoaked wooden skewers through onion slices horizontally. Place prepared skewers and remaining vegetables on one or two rimmed baking sheets. Drizzle with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Working in batches if necessary, remove from baking sheets. Arrange on grill. Cook, turning occasionally, until lightly browned and tender, 4 to 8 minutes for squash and 8 to 12 minutes for onions and peppers. Remove skewers, and serve.
ingredients: cabbage, onion powder, season salt, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce
name: grilled cabbage

steps: Cook pasta in large pot of boiling, salted water until tender, but firm, 8 to 12 minutes, stirring often. Drain well and rinse with cold water. Shake out excess water and toss pasta with oil. Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, parsley and basil. Place pasta in large bowl. Add mayonnaise mixture, chicken, artichokes and tabasco. Toss well. Garnish with almonds. For a decorative presentation, serve in avacado halves, in tomato cups or on lettuce leaves.
ingredients: pasta, mayonnaise, coarse grain mustard, honey, cooked chicken, scallions, basil, tomatoes
name: honey mustard chicken pasta salad

ingredients: condensed cream of chicken soup, low-fat sour cream, picante sauce, chili powder, black beans, cheddar cheese, flour tortillas, tomatoes, green onions
name: creamy black bean enchiladas

steps: In a large mixing bowl, stir together all ingredients except buns. Have 12 pieces of aluminum foil ready. Partially hollow out centers of buns. Fill each bun with hot dog mixture. Wrap in aluminium foil, sealing securely. Place on a cookie sheet and bake in a preheated 375 degree fahrenheit oven for 20 minutes or place on top rack of outdoor grill. Cover grill and grill for 15 to 20 minutes. Cover grill and grill for 15 to
ingredients: hot dogs, hot dog buns, chili sauce, fresh onion, cheese sauce
name: chili cheese coney dogs

steps: In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, natural-style baking chocolate, natural-style peanut butter, xylitol sugar substitute, artificial sweetener, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, half-
ingredients: unsweetened baking chocolate, natural-style peanut butter, xylitol sugar substitute, artificial sweetener, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract
name: low carb chocolate peanut butter fudge xylitol

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well.
ingredients: brown rice, salt, champagne vinegar, sugar, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, tomatoes, basil leaves, water
name: brown rice tomatoes basil

steps: In a 2 quart saucepan, add green beans in enough water just to cover them, and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, uncovered about 15 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain and immediately rinse with cool water to stop cooking. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium-high heat until crisp. Stirring frequently. Reserve 1 tablespoon of bacon fat and drain off the rest and place bacon on plate covered with paper towels. In the same skillet add onion and 1 tablespoon bacon fat and cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until tender. Stir in tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper into onions and simmer about 5 minutes. Stir in green beans and heat through. Add bacon and stir to blend. Transfer mixture to serving dish and drizzle with lemon or lime juice.
ingredients: green beans, bacon, red onion, garlic, honey mustard, lemon juice, salt and black pepper
name: green beans with lemon mustard and bacon

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pasta mixture and sauté for 5 minutes. Add the pasta mixture and sauté for another 5 minutes. Add the pasta
ingredients: spaghetti noodles, olive oil, limes, juice and zest of, garlic cloves, red chili pepper, capers, sausage, chicken breasts, fresh spinach, feta
name: christy craig s lime spinach pasta

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: pizza crust, pizza sauce, ham, onion, crushed pineapple, tasty cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: sara s hawaiian pizza

steps: Cook pasta. Drain. Set aside. Warm milk in saucepan. When it is just warm to the touch, whisk in half the flour. Let the milk begin to simmer, whisking all the time. You be the judge of the thickness - we like it really thick. If you want it thicker, add the remaining flour and continue to whisk until smooth and thick. Stir through the cheese and the salt and pepper until the cheese is melted. Take off the heat. Pour into a baking dish and sprinkle the breadcrumbs over the top. Bake for 30 minutes at 180 degrees celcius.
ingredients: ziti pasta, pancetta, monterey jack cheese, asiago cheese, cheddar cheese, provolone cheese, parmesan cheese, heavy cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: paul s crafty mac n cheese with pancetta

steps: In a 9x13 pan pour pine nuts, flour, dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic salt, egg, lemon juice, honey, tilapia fillets, butterpreparation:In a 9x13 pan pour pine nuts, flour, dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic salt, egg, lemon juice, honey, tilapia fillets, butterpreparation:In a 9x13 pan pour pine nuts, flour, dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic salt, egg, lemon juice, honey, tilapia fillets, butterpreparation:In a 9x13 pan pour pine nuts, flour, dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic salt, egg, lemon juice, honey, tilapia fillets, butterpreparation:In a 9x13 pan pour pine nuts, flour, dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic salt, egg, lemon juice, honey, tilapia fillets, butterpreparation:In a 9x13 pan pour pine nuts, flour, dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic salt, egg, lemon juice, honey, tilapia fillets, butterpreparation:In a 9x13 pan pour pine nuts, flour, dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic salt, egg, lemon juice, honey, tilapia fillets, butterpreparation:In a 9x13 pan pour pine nuts, flour, dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic salt, egg, lemon juice, honey, tilapia fillets, butterpreparation:In a 9x13 pan pour pine nuts, flour, dill weed
ingredients: pine nuts, flour, dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, garlic salt, egg, lemon juice, honey, tilapia fillets, butter
name: pine nut crusted tilapia

steps: Place pickle dilly green beans in a steamer basket over boiling water. Cover saucepan and steam 5-7 minutes or until green beans are tender. Cover saucepan and steam 5-7 minutes or until green beans are heated throughout. Remove from heat. Add parsley and salt to taste and toss. Simmer 3-4 minutes or until green beans are heated throughout. Simmer 3-4 minutes or until
ingredients: green beans, sweet onion, cooking oil, butter, pickle juice, dried dill, sugar
name: pickle dilly green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Beat egg whites until soft peaks begin to form. Add sugar, salt, and vanilla. Beat until stiff peaks form and turn glossy. Fold in nuts and coat well with the egg white mixture. Melt butter in a 9x13 baking pan by placing pan in the oven. Evenly spread coated nuts over melted butter in pan. Bake for 30 minutes, stirring and turning nuts about every 8 minutes, or until butter no longer remains in pan. Place hot nuts on foil and allow to cool. May be stored in an airtight container for several weeks.
ingredients: margarine, soft cream cheese, flour, pecans, egg, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, salt
name: nut cups

steps: Place chicken in crockpot. Sprinkle with soup mix and garlic salt. Pour dressing and water over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Skim fat from cooking juices. Remove chicken from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless skinless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cream of chicken soup, water, butter, cornbread stuffing mix
name: crock pot chicken cornbread dressing

steps: Boil water in a large saucepan over high heat. When water comes to a rapid boil, turn off heat, put the tea bags into water and cover. After the tea has steeped about 1 hour, pour the sugar into a 2-quart pitcher, then add tea. The tea should still be warm so the sugar will dissolve easily. Add lemon juice. Chill. Makes 2 quarts.
ingredients: tea bag, tea, frozen concentrated lemonade, sugar, almond extract
name: almond lemon punch

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes.
ingredients: fresh coconut, granulated sugar, milk, salt, eggs, raisins, rum
name: coconut raisin pudding

steps: Mix egg noodles, cottage cheese, sour cream, onion, garlic clove, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce, salt, salmon, cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
ingredients: egg noodles, cottage cheese, sour cream, onion, garlic clove, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce, salt, salmon, cheddar cheese
name: salmon and noodles

steps: Mix ranch dressing, parmesan cheese and crushed cornflakes in a bowl. Dip chicken pieces into melted butter and roll in cornflake mixture. Place in 9x13 pan. Sprinkle any remaining mix over chicken. Bake 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, sour cream, mayonnaise, cream, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, mushroom, parmesan cheese
name: creamy ranch chicken

steps: Place green beans in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add shallots and saute until deep brown and crisp. Melt 1 tbutter in heavy large pot over medium-high heat. Melt 1 t butter in heavy large pot over medium-high heat. Whisk in mustard. Add green beans. Toss until heated through and evenly coated, about 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Mound beans on platter. Sprinkle with shallots.
ingredients: bulbs shallots, olive oil, kosher salt, green beans
name: green beans and shallots

steps: Mix all the ingredients except the oil in a large plastic zip lock bag, mix well so the meat is coated. Place in the fridge for at least 2 hours or overnight. Remove pork from marinade -save marinade. Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the pork is nicely browned on both sides. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened.
ingredients: cider vinegar, honey, green onions, minced ginger, garlic and red chile paste, sesame oil
name: asian chili garlic sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 9 inch square baking pan. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt. In a large bowl, cream the vegetable shortening and sugar. Beat in the egg, milk, and almond extract. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Fold in the almonds. Spread the mixture evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, until the top is lightly colored. Cool in the pan on a rack before cutting into bars.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, baking powder, eggs, vegetable oil, sugar, peach yogurt, almond extract, sliced almonds
name: almond peach yogurt bread

steps: Mix the tuna, mayo, onion, lemon juice, old bay seasoning, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place enough tuna on a toasted slice of bread and spread to cover slice. Top with slice of tomato and then top with a slice of cheese. Place sandwich slices on a cookie sheet. Placing rack not too close to the broiler, broil sandwiches until the cheese is golden brown.
ingredients: canned tuna, red onion, green olives, mayonnaise, pepperoncini juice, provolone cheese, italian bread
name: polish tuna melt sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Split each biscuit in two, rolling into small balls. Layer rolled biscuit pieces in a bundt pan. Combine margarine and brown sugar in small sauce pan. Bring to a boil and allow to boil for 2 minutes. Pour caramel mixture over biscuits and bake for approximately 40-45 minutes, or until golden brown. Carefully invert bundt pan onto a serving dish. Sprinkle nuts on top and serve immediately.
ingredients: flour, sugar, milk, butter, egg, baking powder, salt, ground nutmeg, blueberries, ground cinnamon
name: streusel blueberry coffee cake

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, cayenne pepper and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic clove, paprika, cumin, roasting chickens, salt, chicken broth, carrots, tomato paste
name: paprikash csirke paprika chicken

steps: Wash and drain onions, removing any coarse stems and midribs. Cut into half-inch strips. In a small bowl, mix together the garlic, curry powder, tomatoes, tomato paste, sugar. Heat the canola oil in a skillet and saut onion over medium-high heat until it begins to brown. Add the spices-and-tomato mixture, mix well, and cook for 10 minutes. Add greens and cook for 10 minutes more, or until potatoes are done. Correct seasoning to taste.
ingredients: brown onions, turmeric powder, oil, curry powder, coriander
name: curried onions

steps: Whisk together oil, lemon juice, garlic, sugar, oregano, gingerroot, soy sauce, granulated sugar, dry sherry, salt and pepper and pour over cool asparagus. Let stand about 30 minutes. Sprinkle with the jumbo shrimp.
ingredients: water, asparagus, vegetable oil, fresh shrimp, fresh gingerroot, soy sauce, granulated sugar, dry sherry, salt
name: jumbo shrimp with asparagus

steps: Place ice cubes in ice cream maker and mix until smooth. Pour into ice cream maker and follow maufacturers instructions. Place ice cubes in ice cream maker and mix until smooth. Pour into ice cream maker and mix until smooth. Pour into ice cream maker and
ingredients: ice cubes, vanilla ice cream, vodka, baileys irish cream, kahlua, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, chocolate sprinkles
name: frozen mudslide

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. Should be 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: butter, fresh chives, garlic, buttermilk, baking mix, sharp white cheddar cheese
name: savory white cheddar muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Combine frozen deep dish pie shell, ground beef, mayonnaise, milk, eggs, cornstarch, processed cheese with garlic, green onions, black olives, mushroomspreparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Combine frozen deep dish pie shell, ground beef, mayonnaise, milk, eggs, cornstarch, processed cheese with garlic,
ingredients: frozen deep dish pie shell, ground beef, mayonnaise, milk, eggs, cornstarch, processed cheese with garlic, green onions, black olives, mushrooms
name: jamburger hamburger quiche perfect for midweek

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve soup with sprinkled with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: butter, onion, vegetable stock, frozen peas, salt, black pepper, of fresh mint, skim milk, pine nuts, frozen spinach
name: spinach and green pea soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, milk, butter, velveeta cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, mild cheddar cheese
name: crock pot mac cheese

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions, garlic, coriander, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind
ingredients: chicken wings, olive oil, hot paprika, ground cumin, ground turmeric, ground coriander, chili powder, curry powder, lime rind, garlic cloves
name: hot hot hot chicken wings

name: raspberry pink velvet gelatin yogurt mousse

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin cups or use paper liners. Mix oats, flours, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and brown sugar in another bowl. When smooth, whisk in milk, melted butter and vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients and fold in just until dry ingredients are moistened. Scoop into mufifn cups. Bake 15 to 25 minutes or until springy to the touch in the center.
ingredients: oat bran, baking powder, cinnamon, brown sugar, vegetable oil, eggs, raisins, salt, milk
name: healthy oat bran raisin muffins

steps: Cook potatoes in large pot of boiling salted water until tender, about 30 minutes. Meanwhile, bring milk, onion and butter to boil in small saucepan over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. Drain potatoes and return to pot. Add hot milk mixture and mash. Add goat cheese and mash until blended. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: potatoes, garlic cloves, heavy cream, butter, goat cheese, scallion, salt and pepper
name: goat cheese mashed potato gratin

ingredients: dry red wine, vegetable oil, white vinegar, green onion, celery, green bell pepper, italian salad dressing mix, worcestershire sauce, boneless rib-eye roast
name: marinated rib eye roast

steps: Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until blended. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: shortening, light brown sugar, egg, pure maple syrup, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, coconut
name: chewy maple cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool in pan and cut into bars.
ingredients: butter, unsweetened chocolate, sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, walnut halves
name: brownie bites

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Combine sliced apples with sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg and lemon rind. Line pie plate with unbaked pie crust, trim pastry, crimp to edge of pie plate. Fill pie crust with apple mixture and dot with softened butter. Brush pie crust top with water and place pie crust top on top of pie, crimp to the bottom crust. Make some slits in the top crust for steam to escape. Bake for 10 minutes. Turn oven down to 350f and bake for 45 minutes longer.
ingredients: apples, sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, water, lemon juice
name: vera s apple pie in a jar

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the coriander seeds, cumin seeds, cardamom seeds, green cardamom seeds, black peppercorns, nutmeg, cassia, bay leaves, ground ginger, bay leaves, ground ginger, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves, bay leaves,
ingredients: coriander seed, cloves, cumin seed, brown cardamom pods, black peppercorns, nutmeg, cassia, bay leaves, ground ginger
name: nine spice garam masala

steps: Brown ground beef in large pot. Drain off grease. Add potatos, onions, peppers, celery, salt and bouillon cubes. Pour in water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Whisk flour into milk and slowly pour into pot with meat and vegetables. Stir until soup is thickened slightly. Mix in cheese and stir until melted.
ingredients: milk, cream of celery soup, swiss cheese, sauerkraut, turkey polish kielbasa
name: reuben chowder

steps: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook angel hair pasta until it is al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and set aside. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, bay scallop, diced tomatoes with balsamic vinegar basil and oil, fresh basil leaves, angel hair pasta, salt, pepper, italian spices
name: angel hair pasta with scallops tomato basil

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into squares and serve warm or slightly cooled.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, mozzarella cheese, fresh parmesan cheese, fresh basil, mayonnaise, garlic clove, plum tomatoes
name: tomato basil squares

steps: In a large bowl mix the flours, baking soda, salt and raisins. Stir in the buttermilk and molasses until well combined. Pour it into a bread pan sprayed with nonstick spray. Let sit for 1 hour. Preheat the oven to 325. Bake for 1 hour or until a tooth pick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Let it sit in the pan for about 10 minutes and then remove it from the pan to sit on a wire rack until it is cooled.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, eggs, vegetable shortening, milk, raisins, caraway seed
name: grandma s irish soda bread

steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add in olives, long-grain white rice, fat-free chicken broth, tabasco sauce, ground turmeric, frozen green pea, green onion, tomatoes, black olives, small shrimp, red bell pepper, snow peas, cucumber, cilantropreparation:In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Meanwhile,
ingredients: olives, long-grain white rice, fat-free chicken broth, tabasco sauce, ground turmeric, frozen green pea, green onion, tomatoes, black olives, small shrimp
name: yellow rice with vegetables and shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Lightly grease muffin cups or spray with cooking spray. Place shirley s plain or blueberry muffins in blender and blend until finely chopped. Add margarine, eggs, and milk and blend until well mixed. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda in a large bowl. Make a well in center and add blueberry mixture, stirring just until moistened. Fold in blueberries. Fill muffin cups and bake for 22-25 minutes or until golden. Cool 10 minutes in pan before removing.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, shortening, egg, milk, blueberries
name: shirley s plain or blueberry muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, unsweetened chocolate, butter, granulated sugar, eggs, flour
name: mini brownies two bite

steps: In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together. Fold until all is blended. Keep refrigerated in mason jars with lids, or in containers with tightly fitting lids. To make basil walnut cheese, slice french bread and place on cookie sheet. Spoon spread onto bread. Toast, bake, or broil until cheese is bubbly and nicely browned.
ingredients: walnuts, cream cheese, garlic, fresh basil, lemon, rind of
name: basil walnut cheese spread

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, red onion, all-purpose flour, tomatoes with garlic, brown sugar, celery, steak sauce, bloody mary mix, noodles
name: bloody mary chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375f, line a roasting pan with parchment. Lay fish fillets in a single layer on the bottom of the dish, then top with scallops and shrimp. Pour the white wine and lemon juice overtop of the seafood. Bake 15 minutes, then turn the broiler to hi and broil 2 minutes, until browned.
ingredients: finnan haddie, butter, flour, onions, bay leaf, milk, salt & pepper, nutmeg
name: creamed finnan haddie smoked haddock

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, egg, banana, milk, blueberries
name: blueberry banana bread

steps: In a high-sided nonstick pot or wok, combine the cooked rice, cooked shrimp or shrimp meat, green onions, chili peppers and water. Cook over high heat, stirring often to mix well and prevent sticking, until all ingredients are thoroughly heated and most of the water is gone, about 8 minutes. Turn the heat to high and stir for 1 more minute as the pot gets hotter. Add the nuoc cham and stir rapidly to mix thoroughly. Continue to cook over high heat, stirring constantly, until most of the liquid has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and serve.
ingredients: green bell peppers, cooked white rice, cooked shrimp, salsa, low-fat sour cream, green onion, ground cumin, salt
name: shrimp stuffed green peppers

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first seven ingredients. Add the shrimp. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Drain and discard marinade. On each of 12 metal or soaked wooden appetizer skewers, thread two shrimp and any veggies you want to add. Grill kabobs, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 5-8 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, turning once.
ingredients: butter, flour, salt, paprika, garlic cloves, shrimp, triple sec, fresh parsley, crushed red pepper flakes, lime wedge
name: lime shrimp tapas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x13 pan. Separate the biscuits into 16 pieces. Cut each biscuit into 6 pieces. Mix the cheeses, chilies, and biscuit pieces in a bowl and pour into the pan. Bake 25-30 minutes or until biscuits are just starting to brown. Let stand 10 minutes.
ingredients: white bread rolls dough, butter, parmesan cheese, provolone cheese
name: wisconsin cheese pull apart bread

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Grease 2 baking sheets. Sift together flour, cinnamon, baking soda and nutmeg. Set aside. Beat the butter and brown sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer at high speed until well blended. Beat in the eggs and apple juice. Gradually add the flour to the butter mixture, beating at low speed until well blended. Stir in the apple and pecans. Drop the dough by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: hot roll mix, sugar, cinnamon, apples, lemon juice, raisins, powdered sugar, skim milk, vanilla
name: apple carnival buns

steps: Combine first 4 ingredients in a medium saucepan& bring to a boil. Reduce heat& simmer gently for 3 to 4 minutes until blueberries become tender. Combine cornstarch& water in a small bowl until smooth. Add to blueberry mixture& cook, stirring until thickened, about 5 more minutes. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: lemon juice, cornstarch, fresh blueberries, sugar, water, salt
name: quick blueberry sauce

steps: Put the bread slices in a greased 13x9 inch baking dish. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and vanilla. Pour egg mixture evenly over the bread cubes. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours or overnight. Remove from refrigerator 20 minutes before baking. Preheat oven to 350. Bake, uncovered, for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. Serve with maple syrup, if desired.
ingredients: egg whites, skim milk, ground cinnamon, vanilla, cooking spray, raisin bread
name: cinnamon raisin french toast

steps: In a large pot of boiling water, cook the pasta for 10 minutes, or until al dente. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, gently heat the gorgonzola, milk and butter. Stir with a wooden spoon to make a smooth sauce. Stir in the cream and add salt if necessary. Drain the pasta, shaking to remove excess water. Combine the hot pasta and hot sauce in a large serving bowl, tossing until the pasta is well coated. Serve immediately with grated parmesan.
ingredients: low-carb penne, gorgonzola, walnut pieces, parsley, olive oil, fresh rosemary, garlic clove, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: low carb pasta with gorgonzola and walnuts

steps: Place all ingredients in a medium saucepan and stir thoroughly. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Simmer 1 minute. Cool. Store in the refrigerator.
ingredients: water, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, onions, brown sugar, white vinegar, salt and pepper
name: favourite everything sauce

steps: Bake at 400f for 10 minutes until the egg is firm and cheese is browned.
ingredients: potatoes, parsley flakes, eggs, butter, onion, plain flour, salt, pepper
name: potato bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: potato skins, butter, seasoning salt, green onion, bacon, cheddar cheese
name: tgi friday s baked potato skins

steps: Mix all ingredients except cheese. Bake at 350f for 25 minutes and stir after 12 minutes. Optional take a cup of cheese and mix it in the mixture when you stir after 12 minutes. Place back in oven for 8 minutes. Take remaining cheese and put it on top of the mixture and replace in oven for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted. I usually double this recipe.
ingredients: breakfast sausage, dry ranch dressing mix, rotel tomatoes, cream cheese
name: hot ranch sausage dip

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute the onion and garlic until limp. Add the green pepper. Cook and stir until tender. Drain the tomatoes, reserving juice, and pour into the skillet. Season with thyme, parsley, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes over medium heat. Add the frozen okra, and pour in enough of the reserved juice from the tomatoes to cover the bottom of the pan. Cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until okra is tender.
ingredients: okra, onion, tomatoes, ritz crackers, egg, bacon drippings, cheddar cheese
name: raymond anderson s original okra supreme

ingredients: flour, whole wheat flour, salt, sugar, butter, milk
name: unleavened communion bread

steps: Preheat oven at 410 degrees f. Line 9x12 inch baking tray with grease-proof paper. Mix together all dry ingredients. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs until fluffy, add milk, oil. Add to dry mixture. The mixed batter should be moist and of medium consistency. Cover dish with a layer of batter. Cut the cream cheese in cubes and sprinkle over first layer of batter. Add remaining batter to cover the cream cheese. Place in baking tray. Bake for 20 minutes until slightly golden brown. Cool, cut the cornbread into square pieces, and serve with tea.
ingredients: butter, eggs, milk, lox, low-fat cream cheese, jarlsberg cheese, salt, pepper
name: lox and cream cheese scrambled eggs

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
