ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion, horseradish mustard, mayonnaise, garlic cloves
name: simply wonderful warm potato salad 5fix

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Place chicken, potatoes and onions in a large baking dish. Season with sumac, salt and white pepper. In a bowl, stir together garlic, olive oil, and lemon juice. Pour over chicken mixture. Sprinkle evenly with the parsley. Cover dish with foil. Bake in preheated oven for 35-40 minutes. Remove foil, increase heat to 450 degrees and cook until chicken and potatoes are golden, about another 30-40 minutes. Remove foil, increase heat to 450 degrees and cook until chicken and potatoes are
ingredients: garlic, vegetable oil, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt & pepper
name: toum lebanese garlic sauce

steps: Heat olive oil and saute garlic and drained artichoke hearts together. Put mixture in a greased 9 x 13 pan. Mix together mayonnaise, soup, lemon juice and curry powder and pour over the chicken and artichoke hearts. Top with bread cubes and cheese then drizzle melted butter over top. Bake at 350 for 25 minutes or until bubbly.
ingredients: chicken, olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, pepper, garlic, artichoke heart, lemon slice
name: greek chicken with artichoke hearts

steps: In a large saucepan, heat olive oil and gently cook onion without browning, for 3-4 minutes. Add pumpkin, carrot and rosemary and cook, stirring for 2-3 minutes. Add stock and bay leaves. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 12-15 minutes until vegetables are tender. Remove any rosemary stalks and bay leaves. Place a third of the soup in the blender with a third of the skim milk powder and puree. Pour into a large bowl. Repeat with the remaining soup and milk powder and pour the whole lot back into the saucepan, heat through and serve. For vegetarian use vegetable stock.
ingredients: butternut pumpkin, brown onions, sweet potatoes, carrots, leeks, chicken stock, olive oil, thai red curry paste
name: pumpkin soup with a kick

steps: In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled shrimp with water and simmer until tender. Drain water and mix until cooked shrimp are a thick liquid. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with peel, onion, carrots, celery ribs, vegetable broth, creamed corn, bay leaf, paprika, green onion toppreparation:In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled shrimp with water and simmer until tender. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with peel
ingredients: philadelphia cream cheese, cream, green onion top, cream of potato soup, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, whole milk, shrimp, seafood seasoning
name: shrimp and cream cheese soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add almond meal, whey powder, caster sugar, baking powder, cocoa powder, chocolate chips, eggs, oil, water. Mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: almond meal, whey powder, caster sugar, baking powder, cocoa powder, chocolate chips, eggs, oil, water
name: high protein chocolate cookie

steps: In a skillet over low heat, cook bacon until crisp. Remove to paper towel. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Add potatoes, green pepper, onion, salt and pepper. Cook and stir over medium heat until the potatoes are golden brown. Stir in eggs and milk, and cook and stir until eggs are almost set, about 2 minutes. Reduce heat to low. Add cheese and bacon, stirring gently until heated through and eggs are set. Serve immediately. Leftovers are tasty the following day. Good wrapped in a flour tortilla for a breakfast burrito, breakfast on the go. Serves 4 to 6.
ingredients: potatoes, bacon, eggs, milk, salt, ham, tomatoes, chives
name: german farmer breakfast

steps: Wet a paper towel and wipe any dirt from the mushrooms. Place the mushrooms in a large stockpot. Add the remaining ingredients to the pot. The liquid will not cover the mushrooms at first. Remove the cover and cook for an additional 4 hours. The mushrooms will shrimk by half and become saturated with cooking liquid. Remove with a slotted spoon and serve in a bowl.
ingredients: button mushrooms, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, mexican oregano, salt and pepper, spanish onion
name: mexican marinated mushrooms and onions

steps: In a large bowl cream together butter, sugars and vanilla. Beat in egg. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in oatmeal and chocolate chips until well blended. On a baking sheet place a ball of dough 2 inches between each other. Bake at 350 degrees f. For about 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, quick-cooking oats, semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, light brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, vanilla extract
name: rissani s chewy chocolate chip oatmeal cookies

steps: Mix all other ingredients in a salad bowl. If you prefer, add some vinegar from the gherkins to taste. You can also add more mayo. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour and up to 24 hours. Garnish with optional egg slices.
ingredients: green pepper, sweet onion, butter, diced tomatoes, egg noodles
name: vera s famous noodle dish

steps: Heat butter and oil in a 3 quart saucepan. Add onion and saute on low until translucent. Add zucchini and saute another 2 minutes. Add the stock and 2 tablespoons oregano, bring to a simmer. Cover and simmer 30 minutes until tender. Pour into a blender and puree. Return to the pan and add salt and pepper. Add cream if serving it hot. If serving it cold, cool soup to room temperature and whisk in the yogurt. Garnish with remaining zucchini.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, shallots, olive oil, reduced-sodium chicken broth, apricot nectar, butternut squash, quinoa, ground cumin, zucchini
name: squash quinoa soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Heat oil in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges.
ingredients: zucchini, pepper, chives, low-fat margarine, tomatoes, dried leaf basil, low-fat cheddar cheese
name: zucchini tomato casserole

steps: Combine the spinach and avocado in a large salad bowl. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the spinach and avocado. Cook for another minute, season with salt and pepper, and stir in the remaining olive oil. Serve immediately or chill and serve cold as a salad.
ingredients: spinach leaves, avocados, sweet onion, lemon juice, olive oil, cilantro
name: wilted spinach and avocado salad

steps: In a large, heavy bottomed, skillet place the sugar and water. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add the almonds and cook, stirring constantly, until almost all the water has evaporated. About 5 minutes. Add the cinnamon and salt and cook until the sugar has dried on the almonds. About 2 minutes. Pour onto a large sheet pan and let cool.
ingredients: rice chex, sliced almonds, sugar, light corn syrup, butter, almond extract
name: almond snack mix

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: reduced-fat cream cheese, part-skim ricotta cheese, splenda granular, egg, egg yolk, vanilla extract, unsweetened cocoa powder
name: mini cocoa swirl cheesecakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: ground pork, panko breadcrumbs, scallions, egg, soy sauce, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, barbecue sauce, plum sauce, hoisin sauce
name: tangy asian meatballs

steps: Mix together flour, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Mix together parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese,
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, flour, salt and pepper, butter, fresh basil, red wine vinegar, parmesan cheese, sugar, cream
name: chicken with basil and parmesan

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, eggs, peanut butter, milk, honey, banana
name: peanut butter and honey bread

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Grease 9 x 19 cms loaf tin. Sift flours, baking powder and salt into large bowl. Stir in sugar. Lightly beat egg whites with electric mixer until just frothy. Stir in milk and oil and add to flour mixture. Beat 3 minutes until smooth. Pour mixture into prepared pan, smooth top. Press seeds lightly into mixture. Bake 55 - 60 minutes then stand 10 minutes. Turn out to cool.
ingredients: dates, baking soda, boiling water, egg, maple syrup, salt, all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, nuts
name: buffalo bread

steps: Place basil, parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper in a large bowl and stir. Cover and simmer 10-15 minutes stirring occasionally.
ingredients: cheese-filled egg tortellini, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, pepper, green onion, carrot
name: fresh basil tortellini salad

steps: Place noodles in colander, cover and chill up to 24 hours. Toss before serving.
ingredients: slivered almonds, sunflower seeds, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, coleslaw mix, red pepper, vidalia onions, rice wine vinegar, canola oil, sugar
name: nutty coleslaw

steps: Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake another 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: chicken breasts, sweet onion, celery ribs, ranch dressing, mayonnaise
name: barbequed chicken salad spread

steps: Combine powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts in a large buttered saucepan. Cook over low heat for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add milk, cook, stirring until mixture comes to a boil. Continue to stir, allow to come to soft ball stage and remove form heat. Let cool slightly. Stir in the vanilla. Gradually beat in the powdered sugar with electric beaters until mixture reaches a fudge-like consistency, about 2 minutes. Stir in nuts. Pour into prepared pan. Allow to cool completely before cutting into pieces.
ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, cocoa, butter, vanilla, nuts
name: uncooked fudge

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Remove stem end of tomato and cut tomato into several large wedges. Arrange the triangles on a flat baking stone or pizza pan so they do not touch. Sprinkle triangles with equal amounts of tomato, salami, cheese and oregano. Bake 15-18 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
ingredients: hoagie roll, plum tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, provolone cheese, fresh basil leaves, olive oil, garlic powder, black pepper
name: italian tomato and cheese melt

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine vegetable oil, white onion, garlic cloves, ground beef, ground cinnamon, canned whole tomatoes, salt & pepper, rice noodles in a large bowl. Sprinkle salt mixture over noodles, tossing well to coat. Bake at 425 degrees for 25 minutes. Turn noodles over, and rotate pans. Baking an additional 20 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: vegetable oil, white onion, garlic cloves, ground beef, ground cinnamon, canned whole tomatoes, salt & pepper, rice noodles
name: fusion confusion

steps: In a large frying pan, fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon and drain. Add cabbage, butter and water to bacon grease and cook until tender. Stop cooking when the cabbage is still a bit crunchy. Add salt and pepper to taste maybe a little more butter, not much. Slice sausage and lay on top of cabbage. Continue to cook a little longer to warm the sausage. Crumble bacon over all. Yummmy -- great with black eyed-peas and cornbread.
ingredients: green cabbage, sausage, onion, eggs, milk, cracker crumb
name: cabbage sausage

steps: Mix all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian lettuce salad.
ingredients: mayonnaise, onion, celery, ketchup, chili sauce, dill relish, sweet relish, milk, half-and-half cream
name: old spaghetti factory s thousand island dressing

steps: Wrap ribs in foil and bake for 2 hours at 300 degrees f. Unwrap and drain drippings. Combine all ingredients and pour over ribs. Bake at 350 degrees 30 minutes, basting with sauce, or grill 30 minutes, 4 inches above coals turning and basting. Bake at 350 degrees 30 minutes, basting with sauce, or grill 30 minutes, 4 inches above coals turning and b
ingredients: pork spareribs, ketchup, soy sauce, liquid honey, garlic, worcestershire sauce, cayenne pepper
name: finger licking ribs

steps: Mix cream cheese and cheese whiz together and blend well. Then add worchestershire sauce, garlic powder, and grated cheese. Blend in well. Form ball and then roll into chopped nuts. Then chill your ball till you want it served.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, raisins, salted peanuts, bacon, green onion, curry powder, flaked coconut, fresh parsley, chutney
name: chutney cheese balls

steps: Fry beef about 10 minutes and drain off grease. Boil about 10 minutes longer.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, cumin, ground red pepper, oregano, potato, vegetable oil, eggs, salt and pepper
name: marty s campfire casserole

steps: Heat oven to 350f degrees. Spray a small ovenproof dish with nonstick cooking spray. Place the brie in this dish. Spread sour cream over brie as though frosting a cake. Sprinkle top with brown sugar, then with pecans. Bake until cheese is very soft to the touch, 15-18 minutes. Increase heat to 425f and bake 5 minutes longer. Brie will be starting to melt on the bottom and the sugar will be bubbling on the top. Serve with bread, sliced apples and crackers.
ingredients: brie cheese, olive oil, fresh rosemary, apples
name: kellymac s melted brie with apples

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium high heat. Add onion and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: instant brown rice, hot italian turkey sausage, onion, black beans, tomatoes and green chilies, corn mixed with chopped peppers, reduced-fat monterey jack cheese
name: sausage and brown rice skillet meal

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: sugar, water, bananas, pineapple juice, frozen orange juice concentrate, frozen lemonade concentrate, 7-up soda
name: banana party punch

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Place apples in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired.
ingredients: sliced apples, flour, white sugar, oatmeal, brown sugar, butter
name: apple krinkle

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In small saucepan, melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares.
ingredients: egg whites, sugar, vanilla, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, flour, marshmallow cream
name: light rocky road brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place gorgonzola tart in a 9-inch tart pan and leave the sides long and free-form. Combine sugar, corn syrup, eggs, butter, pecans, vanilla, apples, lemon juicepreparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Combine sugar, corn syrup, eggs, butter, pecans, vanilla, apples, lemon juicepreparation:Preheat oven to
ingredients: pie shell, cream cheese, gorgonzola, fresh thyme, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter, pears, prosciutto
name: pear gorgonzola tart

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onions. Cook for 5 minutes or until onions are tender. Add cheddar cheese. Cook for 5 minutes or until cheddar cheese is melted.
ingredients: frozen broccoli green beans onions and peppers mix, cooked white rice, parmesan cheese, dried basil, dill weed, salt and pepper, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, reduced-fat monterey jack cheese
name: herbed veggie cheese and rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees for 20-30 minutes or until top is bubbly and golden brown. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-30 minutes or until top is bubbly and golden brown. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired.
ingredients: cream cheese, caramel topping, water, apples, cinnamon
name: cheesy apple delight

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Place on baking tray. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, black pepper, dried oregano, french bread, garlic cloves, fresh parsley
name: buttery garlic bread

steps: In a saucepan, bring the coconut milk and water to a boil. Remove from heat and whisk in the jello powder until dissolved. Stir in the ice water. Chill 20 minutes. Beat the mixture 1 minute. Fold in the cake, 4 cups of whipped topping, and the fruit. Spoon into a dish lined with plastic wrap. Cover and chill overnight. Unmold cake onto serving plate and remove plastic. Frost the cake with the remaining whipped topping.
ingredients: instant vanilla pudding, cool whip, chunk pineapple, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, mini marshmallows, slivered almonds, coconut
name: no wait make and eat ambrosia

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake the sweet potatoes for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, chicken tenderloins, steak seasoning, butter, maple syrup, green onion
name: maple glazed chicken with sweet potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. To make dough, blend the cheese with the butter. Stir in the flour, salt, and paprika. Mix well. Wrap 1 teaspoon of dough around each olive overlapping completely. Bake until light brown, 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: hot italian sausage, sharp cheddar cheese, biscuit mix, water
name: hot sausage and cheese puffs

steps: Grease and flour circular deep dish glass pie plate. Beat together eggs, sugar and flour. Add the vanilla and milk gradually. Arrange the fruit in the bottom of the pan. Pour the batter mixture over the fruit. Optional, strew dots of unsalted butter over the clafouti halfway though baking. Bake at 400 degrees f, for 30 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: butter, plums, eggs, sugar, all-purpose flour, vanilla essence, milk
name: plum clafouti

steps: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour milk and chocolate syrup over the ice. Add cold coffee and stir well until chocolate syrup is dissolved. Can be fancied up with a dollop of whipped cream, a shot of kahlua, and a few curls of shaved chocolate if you like. Diabetics and dieters can substitute sugar-free chocolate syrup.
ingredients: ice cubes, coffee, whole milk, sugar, caramel syrup, chocolate syrup, salt, vanilla extract
name: caramel iced coffee

steps: Place potatoes and water in 2 quart casserole dish, cover, and microwave on high 12-15 minutes, or until tender, stirring halfway through. Drain, reserving salad dressing mixture. Arrange potatoes on skewers. Place on grill over hot coals. Grill, covered for 4 minutes. Turn skewers, brush with reserved mixture, grill 4 minutes longer uncovered to crisp outside, covered if soft outside is preferred.
ingredients: miracle whip, garlic cloves, paprika, salt, black pepper, baking potatoes, onion
name: savory grilled potatoes in foil

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool completely. Place onions and eggs in a large jar. Add enough vinegar mixture to completely cover. Cover and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight. Use a clean spoon each time you remove eggs for serving. May be refrigerated for up to 1 week.
ingredients: eggs, cider vinegar, black peppercorns, whole allspice, mace, coriander seed, cardamom seed, clove, hot red peppers, sugar
name: southern beer joint pickled eggs

steps: Cook chicken in skillet in hot oil 4 to 5 minutes or until browned. Stir in rice, tomatoes and salsa. Reduce heat to low. Cover. Simmer 8 to 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Sprinkle with shredded cheese. Continue cooking about 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: vegetable oil, salt and pepper, boneless chicken breasts, salsa, diced green chilies, cumin, cheddar cheese, cream cheese
name: chili cheesy skillet chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: olive oil, red onions, paprika, ground coriander, chili flakes, salt and pepper, chopped tomatoes, butter beans, cannellini beans, balsamic vinegar
name: breakfast chilli beans

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Prepare pizza doughroll out on lightly floured surface and place on lightly oiled pizza pan. Toss the mushrooms with the 1 tbl of olive oil. Top pizza dough with the mushrooms, garlic and oregano. Drop dollops of ricotta, drizzle with olive oil, kosher salt and fresh ground pepper. Top with fresh basil leaves. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over basil leaves. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until crust is done and cheese is melted.
ingredients: olive oil, red onions, golden brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, dry crushed red pepper, ricotta cheese, prosciutto, basic pizza dough
name: red onion marmalade and ricotta pizza

steps: Heat a medium saucepan, sprayed with cooking spray. Cook the cream of mushroom soup until tender. Add the mushrooms, cover and cook for 5 minutes or until tender
ingredients: mushrooms, water, butter, onion, all-purpose flour, seasoning salt, evaporated milk
name: 10 minute cream of mushroom soup

steps: Heat olive oil in 5-quart pot over medium heat. Add sliced onions and saut for 2 to 3 minutes. Add all remaining ingredients except salt and simmer for 20 minutes. Turn off heat and use an immersion or regular blender to puree salsa. Taste. Add salt to your liking. Serve warm or cold with beef empanadas, pork dishes, soups, stuffed sweet plantains, tortilla chips or plantain chips.
ingredients: tomatoes, onion, fresh lime juice, olive oil, garlic cloves, chipotle chile in adobo, salt and pepper
name: family favorite chipotle salsa

steps: Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium-high heat. Add coconut milk and ginger to boiling in saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed. Add lemon rind and green onions. Fluff rice lemon rind and onions lightly with fork to mix. Garnish with coconut and lemon slices.
ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, jasmine rice, coconut milk, water, salt
name: thai garlic ginger coconut rice

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Coat 8 muffin cups with pam. Mix sugar and cinnamon in small bowl. Dip each marshmallow in melted margarine and roll in sugar mix. Separate dough into triangles. Wrap one triangle around each marshmallow and pinch dough together. Place each one in a muffin cup. Drizzle extra margarine over rolls. Bake 8-12 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, marshmallows, pillsbury refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, margarine
name: magic marshmallow crescent puffs

steps: In a large saucepan combine cream cheese and milk. Heat and stir until cheese is melted. Heat chicken according to package directions. Stir cheese sauce into cooked pasta-vegetable mixture. Cook and gently stir until cheese is melted. Spoon into individual serving bowls. Top with chicken.
ingredients: butter, red onion, yellow squash, garlic, beef broth, italian bread, meat-filled tortellini, frozen broccoli, cherry tomatoes, salt and pepper
name: tortellini minestrone

steps: Put the short ribs on a broiler pan and broil until well browned to remove excess fat. Put short ribs in crock pot. In a medium skillet, melt butter and saute onion until golden, pour in ketchup, soy sauce, vinegar and brown sugar. Heat until blended. Pour over ribs. Cover, cook on low 8 hours.
ingredients: short rib of beef, beef consomme, taco seasoning mix, green bell pepper
name: mexican short ribs crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, broccoli florets, eggs, ham, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend, cooking spray
name: mac n cheese pie

steps: In a medium saucepan bring the water to a boil. Stir red-hots in simmering water until dissolved. Remove from heat. Add jello mix and stir until dissolved. Stir in cold applesauce. Pour mixture into a serving dish and chill until set.
ingredients: water, red-hot candies, lemon jell-o gelatin, applesauce, cream cheese, mayonnaise, pecans, celery
name: red hot mama salad

steps: Preheat an 8-inch pot with a tight fitting cover over moderate heat. Add oil, onion and garlic and saute for 2 or 3 minutes. Add broth to the pan and bring to a boil. Stir in orzo and return to boiling. Cover pot and reduce heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Remove lid and stir in cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: orzo pasta, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, kalamata olive, radicchio, pine nuts, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, garlic
name: orzo with everything

steps: Rinse the rice well several times until the water runs clean. Drain thoroughly. Bring water to a boil in a lidded saucepan. Stir in rice, bouillon, salt, orange and lemon zest, and the optional smashed garlic clove. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for about 20 minutes or until water has been absorbed. Do not stir during the cooking process to prevent gumming. Remove from heat, add optional green onions and fluff with fork.
ingredients: jasmine rice, orzo pasta, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, chicken broth
name: rice with garlic and pasta

steps: Heat 2 tbs oil in small skillet, hold tortilia with tongs, dip one at a time in oil, for ten seconds, or until limp. Line a 10x6x2 inch baking dish with the tortilias. Keep warm. In same skillet add 2tbs oil and cook onion and garlic till tender. Stir in tomatoes, green chillies, and salt. Simmer 10 min. Pour over tortilias. Beat eggs and cook in skillet till set, put on top, and grate cheese on top. Put in oven just long enough for cheese to melt. Serve warm.
ingredients: catfish fillets, sour cream, mayonnaise, ranch dressing mix, french fried onion rings
name: oven baked onion ranch catfish fillets

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: sandwich wraps, tomato sauce, mexican blend cheese, parmesan cheese, oregano, sweet basil, black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, pepperoni
name: thin crust pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir into the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: german chocolate cake mix, butter, evaporated milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, caramels
name: killer brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Saute onion and mushroom stems in bacon fat until tender. Drain off excess fat. Mix crumbled bacon, onion and stems with softened cream cheese until the mixture is workable. Stuff each mushroom and bake for 10-15 minutes. Finish under the broiler just until tops are golden.
ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, worcestershire sauce, old bay seasoning, milk, garlic, button mushrooms
name: hy vee cheese stuffed mushrooms my copycat

steps: Combine all ingredients except vanilla in a saucepan. Bring to a boil and boil for only 1 minute. Remove from heat and boil for only 1 minute. Remove from heat and
ingredients: all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, salt, milk, shortening, margarine, granulated sugar, vanilla
name: ora s favorite frosting

steps: Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, kalamata olives, lemon wedge, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips.
ingredients: lettuce, tuna in water, chopped tomatoes, onion, kalamata olives, lemon wedge, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper
name: my accordin tuna salad

steps: In a double-boiler melt chocolate. Remove from heat and add the sweetened condensed milk, almonds, dried cranberries, orange peel. Stir until smooth. Turn into wax paper lined 8 inch square pan and chill in fridge. Store in cool place in an airtight container.
ingredients: white chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, almonds, dried cranberries, dried blueberries, orange peel
name: fourth of july red white and blue fudge

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium high heat. Saute salmon for 3 minutes and then flip salmon and saute for 5 minutes of other side or until fish is done.
ingredients: ground cumin, salt, fresh ground pepper, salmon fillets, olive oil, avocado, salsa
name: cumin crusted salmon with guacamole

steps: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. While butter is melting, in a small bowl combine sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt. Add sliced potatoes to melted butter and turn to coat. Sprinkle sugar mixture over potatoes, stir to coat. Cover skillet, reduce heat to low. Stirring occasionally, cook for 50-60 minutes, or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, light brown sugar, butter, sweet sherry, salt
name: candied sweet mashed potatoes

steps: Sprinkle lemon rind over orange juice in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium high heat, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Combine remaining ingredients in a blender. Add lemon rind mixture and pure. Chill before serving in individual serving glasses.
ingredients: water, parsnip, butter, honey, orange rind, fresh orange juice
name: honey orange parsnips

steps: Combine beans, onions and parsley in a large bowl. Combine dressing, sugar and garlic. Pour over bean mixture and toss. Cover. Refrigerate at least 3 hours, stirring occasionally. Just before serving, remove bean mixture with slotted spoon to lettuce-lined salad bowl.
ingredients: yellow wax beans, green beans, red kidney beans, butter beans, onion, oil, white vinegar, white sugar, celery salt
name: 3 or 4 bean salad

steps: Place pork shoulder, onion, bamboo shoots, teriyaki baste and glaze, gingerroot, broccoli carrots and water chestnut mix. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve.
ingredients: boneless pork shoulder, onion, bamboo shoots, teriyaki baste and glaze, gingerroot, broccoli carrots and water chestnut mix, instant rice, water
name: easy crock pot chop suey

steps: In a large bowl, combine the strawberries, apple, pear, red grapes, peaches, walnuts, plain yogurt, unsweetened applesauce, salt, cardamom. Mix gently. Serve atop a bed of lettuce, if desired.
ingredients: apple, pear, red grapes, peaches, walnuts, plain yogurt, unsweetened applesauce, salt, cardamom
name: breakfast fruit salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Wash in cold water and dry fish. Brush fish inside and out with lemon juice, sprinkle with salt, pepper and dill. Place in a lightly greased baking dish. Pour whipping cream over fish. Sprinkle fish and cream with bread crumbs. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily.
ingredients: trout fillets, water, lemon slices, milk, fish, butter, plain flour, lemon juice
name: trout in lemon sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine corn, sugar, salt, butter, eggs, milk, cornstarch, cold water, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, black pepper, egg, all-purpose flour, corn
ingredients: whole kernel corn, flour, granulated sugar, eggs, milk, salt and pepper
name: corn custard pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Line pricked pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pastry shell and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning.
ingredients: zucchini, tomatoes, onion, parmesan cheese, bisquick heart smart mix, nonfat milk, fat-free liquid egg product, salt, pepper
name: healthy bisquick quiche

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, white sugar, margarine, eggs, peanut butter, vanilla
name: sus peanut butter cookies

steps: Cook bacon, onions, garlic, black olives, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, chili pepper flakes, anchovy paste, salt and pepper. Simmer on stove for two hours or till the sauce reduces. Serve with pasta, ravioli, etc --.
ingredients: bacon, onions, garlic, black olives, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, chili pepper flakes, anchovy paste, salt and pepper
name: leona s spaghetti sauce

steps: Place vanilla creamsicle in ice cream maker and mix until smooth. Pour into ice cream maker and mix until smooth. Pour into ice cream maker and mix until
ingredients: vanilla vodka, orange liqueur, triple sec, orange juice, fresh cream
name: vanilla creamsicle

steps: In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the butter, celery, onion, all-purpose flour, minced clams, potatoes, evaporated milk, dried thyme, salt and pepper. Saute for about 3 minutes, add the butter, celery, onion, all-purpose flour, minced clams, potatoes, evaporated milk, dried thyme, salt and pepper. Reduce heat to low and allow soup to simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Add the clams and allow to heat through.
ingredients: bacon, celery ribs, carrots, onion, potatoes, diced tomatoes, baby clams, clam juice, dried thyme
name: diabetic manhattan clam chowder

steps: Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Pour into a 13x9 inch
ingredients: orange jell-o, unflavored gelatin, orange juice, champagne
name: mimosa jello shots

steps: Bake at 350 degrees f. for 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on a rack.
ingredients: cornstarch, water, milk, vanilla, sugar, cinnamon, shredded coconut
name: sahlab

steps: Place chicken in saute pan and cook until chicken is cooked through and the tangerine peel becomes tender. Add the seasoning mixture and cook until chicken is cooked through and the tangerine peel becomes tender. Add the seasoning mixture and cook until chicken is cooked through and the t
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, peanut oil, tangerine peel, gingerroot, dried red chilies, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sugar
name: chinese tangerine chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 200 c. Line a baking dish with non stick baking paper. Place parsnips, salt, pepper and oil in baking dish. Toss to combine. Roast for 30 minutes, pour over syrup. Roast for another 15 - 20 minutes till cooked through and golden.
ingredients: parsnips, salt & pepper, butter, parsley, nutmeg
name: buttered fried parsnips

steps: Mix all ingredients together and place them in a casserole dish. Cover with crushed potato chips and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered at 350f. For about 30 minutes or until heated through and chips are lighty brown. Serve with noodles and a salad.
ingredients: whole milk, chicken stock, margarine, salt, white pepper, all-purpose flour, cooked turkey, white bread
name: mamaw s creamed turkey over toast

steps: Preheat grill to medium high heat, and place jalapeno on grill rack coated with cooking spray, cover and grill 10 minutes, or until blackened, turning occasionally. Place jalapeno in a small paper bag, and fold tightly to seal. Let stand 5 minutes. Peel and discard skins, and cut jalapeno in half lengthwise, and discard stem, seeds, and membranes. Finely chop jalapeno. Combine jalapeno, butter, lime rind, honey, and salt in a small bowl, and stir well. Place corn on grill rack, cover and grill for 10 minutes, or until lightly charred, turning occasionally. Place corn on serving plate and brush with jalaoeno butter.
ingredients: butter, jalapeno peppers, lime zest, fresh lime juice, fresh corn, olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper
name: grilled corn with jalapeno lime butter

steps: Cream butter and granulated sugar. Add butter and granulated sugar. Mix until smooth. Spread into greased 8x13-inch pan. Boil water and dissolve brown sugar. Pour over batter. Bake at 350f for 1 hour.
ingredients: butterscotch pudding mix, yellow cake mix, butterscotch chips, nuts
name: butterscotch pudding cake quick and easy

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mash bananas. Add the other ingredients and mix until all ingredients are combined. Spray muffin tins. Bake for 18-20 minutes.
ingredients: peanut butter, butter, brown sugar, eggs, bananas, vanilla, baking powder, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour
name: peanut butter banana cupcakes

steps: In a 2 to 3 quart pan, combine butter, onion, and garlic. Stir occasionally over medium heat until onion is limp and slightly tinged with brown, about 10 minutes. Stir in flour to coat onion. Gradually stir in broth, and bring to a boil on high heat. Add potato and carrots. Cover and simmer just until onion is tender when pierced, 15 to 20 minutes. Add chicken. Cover and simmer just until chicken is hot, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in basil. Ladle into bowl and offer cheese to add to taste.
ingredients: vegetable oil, butter, onion, courgettes, potatoes, vegetable stock, fresh basil, garlic clove, eggs, parmesan cheese
name: courgette soup with basil

steps: In a double-boiler melt chocolate. Remove from heat and add the sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, salt, and nuts. Stir until smooth. Turn into wax paper lined 8 inch square pan and chill in fridge. Store in cool place in an airtight container.
ingredients: puff pastry sheet, egg, bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, orange zest, fresh strawberries, granulated sugar
name: chocolate strawberry turnover france

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In 2 pans place tomato halves cut side up. Sprinkle with oil, salt and pepper, onion, garlic, and herbs. Bake tomatoes for 2 hours. Check the tomatoes after 1 hour and turn down the heat if they seem to be cooking too quickly. Then turn the oven to 400 degrees and bake another 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and process tomatoes through a food mill using a medium dye over a small saucepan. Discard skins. Add wine, bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes.
ingredients: firm ripe tomatoes, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, hot sauce, garlic cloves
name: garlic tomato slices

steps: Melt butter with oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms, onion, garlic and saute 5-7 minutes or until tender. Stir in chicken broth and cream cheese and cook, stirring constantly, 2-3 minutes or until cream cheese melts. Stir in artichoke hearts, lemon juice and red pepper. Reduce heat to low and cook 2 minutes or until mixture is hot.
ingredients: butter, mushrooms, white wine, chicken stock, cream, garlic clove, chives, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: country pub mushroom sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together the flour, butter, sugar, lemon, zest of, ground ginger, nutmeg, bicarbonate of soda, milk, baking soda, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, lemon, zest of, ground ginger, nutmeg, bicarbonate of soda, milk
name: white gingerbread

steps: Mix together the flour, salt, oregano, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary
ingredients: chicken, flour, butter, mushrooms, holland house marsala cooking wine, water, fresh parsley, rosemary
name: chicken marsala holland house

steps: In pan, brown chops both sides in oil then transfer to crockpot. Add garlic to drippings in pan, cook and stir about 1 min or until golden brown. Stir in soy sauce, broth, brown sugar, chili pepper flakes and cook and stir until dissolved. Pour over chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Remove chops. Return chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Serve over white rice or with a boxed oriental style rice.
ingredients: pork, coarse salt, black pepper, liquid glucose, dried garlic, mustard seeds
name: homemade mettwurst

steps: In a large saucepan over low heat, bring the rhubarb, sugar, and 2 cups of water to a boil. Simmer until rhubarb is soft. Mash the berries and add to the rhubarb. Add the rest of the water. Bring to a boil again and remove from heat. Mix the cornstarch and a bit of water separately. Add to the saucepan and let simmer for a few minutes. Remove from heat and let cool. Serve with a bit of granulated sugar sprinkled on top.
ingredients: water, sugar, vanilla bean, cardamom pod, white wine, lemon, juice and zest of, rhubarb, yogurt, powdered sugar, lime, juice and zest of
name: icy rhubarb scandinavian

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the molasses and eggs. Separately, combine the dry ingredients, then slowly mix into the wet ingredients. When blended and smooth, roll the dough into small balls, about 1 inch around. Dip the tops in sugar and place on greased or non-stick baking sheets. Bake at 350f or 180c for 10-12 minutes. Cool on a wire rack, then store in a tightly covered container to keep the cookies soft.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, wheat germ, brown sugar, salt, raisins, baking soda, buttermilk, molasses
name: molasses brown bread

steps: Cook ground beef drain. Stir in taco seasoning and water and simmer for 5 minutes. Add corn soup put in 9 x 13 pan and top with tater tots. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes. Take out top with cheese put back in oven for 5 minutes or till cheese is melted. Add ketchup or taco sauce when served tastes very good enjoy.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, taco seasoning, water, whole kernel corn, fiesta nacho cheese soup, frozen tater tots, cheddar cheese
name: tater taco casserole

steps: Wet a paper towel and wipe any dirt from the mushrooms. Place the mushrooms in a large stockpot. Add the remaining ingredients to the pot. The liquid will not cover the mushrooms at first. Cook, covered, over very low heat for 4 hours. Stir occasionally so that all of the mushrooms are completely coated with the cooking liquid. Remove the cover and cook for an additional 4 hours. The mushrooms will shrimk by half and become saturated with cooking liquid. Remove with a slotted spoon and serve in a bowl.
ingredients: beef bouillon cubes, chicken bouillon cubes, vegetable bouillon cubes, whole mushrooms, butter, burgundy wine, worcestershire sauce, dried dill weed, ground pepper, garlic powder
name: drunken mushrooms

steps: Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add egg mixture and scramble until eggs are soft set. Add baby spinach leaves, stir for 30 seconds, turn off heat and cover skillet for one minute. Portion on two plates and top with feta cheese and chopped walnuts. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, salami, scallions, garlic clove, plum tomato, eggs, goat cheese, salt, pepper, parsley
name: rachael ray s salami scramble

steps: In the bowl of an electric mixer combine the butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, food coloring with an electric mixer on medium-low speed until smooth and light. Beat in the sugar, a little at a time, until smooth and of desired spreading consistency. Gently fold in the oreos. Use frosting as desired.
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, almond extract, food coloring
name: my favorite cookie icing frosting

steps: In a large pot or dutch oven heat oil over medium-high heat. Add scallions, celery, and onions, stir until vegetables are wilted, approximately 5 minutes. Add broth and bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and add peas, simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and carefully transfer to bowl of food processor or blender, do this in batches if necessary. Remove from heat and carefully transfer to bowl of food processor or blender
ingredients: butter, shallots, frozen peas, whipping cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper, crouton
name: the best fresh pea soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, sifted cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. In a small bowl combine soy milk with oil and vanilla. Pour into the flour mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts. Transfer to the prepared baking dish. Bake for about 30-35 minutes or until the top is no longer shiny. Let cool about 20 minutes or more before slicing.
ingredients: plain flour, sugar, cocoa, baking powder, salt, water, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, pecans
name: quick and easy vegan brownies

steps: Put violets in a large bowl and mix until smooth. Pour into custard cups. Bake 15 minutes at 425f. Lower temperature to 350f and bake for another 40 to 45 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean.
ingredients: violets, eggs, egg yolks, sugar, milk, vanilla
name: violet custard

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over high heat and saute the chicken until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Add the chicken and cook uncovered for 2 to 3 minutes, stirring constantly. Add the coconut milk, reduce the heat to low and simmer uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is tender and the sauce has thickened, about 10 to 15 minutes. Add the coconut milk, reduce the heat to low and simmer uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is tender and the sauce has thickened, about 10 to 15
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt, pepper, garlic powder, sweet soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, oyster sauce, oil, wooden skewer
name: grilled indonesian chicken satay

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix first 4 ingredients. Pour into pie plate or similar small baking dish. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle the bacon on top. Bake for additional 5 minutes. Serve with crackers or crusty bread.
ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, swiss cheese, green onions, bacon, ritz cracker
name: hot bacon and swiss dip

steps: Add liquid and spices to crockpot. Slice meat into thin strips. Toss meat in crockpot mixture. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. One hour before serving add broccoli. Cover and cook on high for another hour. Serve over rice.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, long grain and wild rice blend, water, soy sauce, cabbage, bean sprouts, carrot, celery, fresh white mushroom
name: chop suey ground beef supper crock pot

steps: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Divide mixture in half and place each half on a sheet of plastic wrap. Draw up the sides of the plastic wrap tightly around each ball and firmly secure. Refrigerate 6-8 hours or until firm. Remove plastic wrap and roll in nuts before serving.
ingredients: feta, kasseri cheese, cream cheese, garlic cloves, lemon juice, lemon, fresh parsley, of fresh mint
name: fet kasseri cheese balls with fresh herbs

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Remove chicken from marinade and discard marinade. Arrange chicken breasts in a shallow baking pan. Season with salt and pepper and roast for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear when you prick it with a fork.
ingredients: onion, olive oil, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken thighs, apples, dried apricots, white wine, fresh parsley
name: 30 minute braised chicken

steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Cut 4 pieces of aluminum foil twice the size of each fillet. Place each fillet on a piece of foil. Sprinkle fish evenly with salt and pepper. Top each with 1 tablespoon wine, 1 tablespoon butter, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon capers, and 1 teaspoon parsley. Wrap fish in foil grill for 6 to minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
ingredients: flounder fillets, lemon juice, margarine, cream of shrimp soup, sherry wine, mild cheddar cheese, fresh parsley, paprika
name: favorite fish casserole

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar, 1 egg and vanilla until smooth. Spread into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. In a small mixing bowl, whisk remaining eggs. Graduall whisk in caramel ice cream topping until blended. Pour over pecans. Bake at 375 for 35-40 min or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for one hour. Refrigerate for 4 hrs or overnight before slicing. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, graham cracker crust, pecans, instant chocolate pudding mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, milk, vanilla extract, whipping cream, pecan halves
name: possum pie

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: butter, egg, vanilla extract, brown sugar, flour, wheat germ, chocolate chips
name: wheat germ bars

steps: Bake tortellini in oven for 20-25 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: cheese tortellini, cream cheese, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: quick and easy six cheese tortellini bake

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add salmon. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steak, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: orange juice, light soy sauce, canola oil, ketchup, honey, ground ginger, garlic cloves, orange zest, salmon steaks
name: orange honey marinade for salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: cashews, walnuts, caster sugar, ground cardamom, phyllo pastry, water, ghee
name: fried nut rolls nashab

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together almonds, pecans, sugar, brown sugar, golden syrup, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda. Add to creamed mixture. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: blanched almonds, pecans, sugar, brown sugar, golden syrup, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda
name: almond pecan brittle

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemons, salt, ground pepper, fresh thyme leaves
name: lemon and thyme quick roasted chicken breasts

steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. In a bowl, mix the graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and butter with your hands. Press the mixture firmly into a 9-inch pie pan, and bake until brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool to room temperature before filling. Lower the oven temperature to 325 degrees f. In a separate bowl, combine the condensed milk, lime juice, and eggs. Whisk until well blended and place the filling in the cooled pie shell. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes and allow to chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours. Once chilled, combine the sour cream and powdered sugar and spread over the top of the pie using a spatula. Sprinkle the lime zest as a garnish on top of the sour cream and serve chilled.
ingredients: graham cracker pie crusts, egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, lime, rind of, fresh lime juice, whipping cream, powdered sugar
name: pirate s house key lime pie

steps: Boil chicken in a pot of water with the chicken broth. When the chicken is done let it cool. Then debone the chicken and remove the skin. Cut chicken meat into bite size pieces. Cook the vegetables and drain liquid. In a large bowl mix chicken meat, vegetables, sour cream, can of soup, and spices. Place chicken mixture in 13x9 casserole dish. In another bowl crush ritz crackers into small pieces and spread over chicken mixture. Place dots of butter all over the crackers. Place in oven preheated at 350 for about 45 minutes or until bubbly in the middle. If crakers start to get too brown before done place a piece of tin foil over the top of chicken.
ingredients: chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, egg noodles, frozen chopped broccoli, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper, texas pete
name: chicken and noodle casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Arrange fruit slices in single layer on greased baking tray. Sprinkle fruit slices with salt, bake until soft and golden. Turn heat up to 515 and place pizza stone in oven. Roll out pizza dough on cornmeal coated paddle, lightly coat with oil. Sprinkle fruit slices with mozzarella and arrange fruit in a spoke pattern. Sprinkle with tomatoes and dot with pesto. Bake 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: kiwi fruits, strawberry, apples, whipped cream cheese, sugar, milk, refrigerated sugar cookie dough, grapes
name: andrea s fruit pizza

steps: Combine chicken, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries, cherries
ingredients: chicken pieces, tomato ketchup, brown sugar, sweet cherries
name: chicken with cherries

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Add the cream and stir until the cream is melted. Add the cream and stir until the cream is thick. Add the cream and stir
ingredients: crabmeat, cream cheese spread, green onion, miracle whip, wonton wrappers
name: baked crab rangoon

steps: Heat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Roast 10 minutes, stir, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and roast an additional 10 to 15 minutes until vegetables are slightly charred and tender.
ingredients: onion, garlic, asparagus, artichoke hearts, cremini mushroom, olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, romano cheese
name: asparagus mushroom artichoke skillet

steps: Cook the pasta according to the directions on the package. Meanwhile, cut the mozzarella into small cubes and quarter the cherry tomatoes. When the pasta is cooked, drain it and rinse it in cold water until the pasta is cold. Drain it again. Mix the pesto sauce, olive oil and parmesan in with the pasta. In a large serving bowl, mix the pasta with the mozzarella and tomatoes. Sprinkle the pine nuts over the top and serve.
ingredients: tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, black pepper
name: tomato mozzarella salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a baking sheet with nonstick spray. Slice the onion rings width wise and then break them apart into rings. Put the flour in 1 bowl, the egg whites into a second, and into the third put the bread crumbs and all the spices. Dip each onion ring into the flour, then the egg whites, and then the bread crumbs. Place them on the baking sheet and then repeat with the next ring. Bake them all for about 20 minutes or until crispy.
ingredients: onions, panko breadcrumbs, jalapenos, cayenne, curry powder, garlic powder, eggs, flour
name: spicy oven baked onion rings

steps: Preheat oven to 400. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the tenderloin and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the tenderloin well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. It will continue to cook as it sits. Slice and serve immediately.
ingredients: pork shoulder, olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon juice, oregano, dried mint, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes
name: pork souvlaki

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, granulated sugar, water, brown sugar, butter
name: hot cranberry butter

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Cover and refrigerate overnight for best flavor. Serve cold.
ingredients: cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, pepperoni, pasta, italian dressing, mccormick salad supreme seasoning
name: zesty italian pasta salad

steps: In a saucepan, heat butter in a large saucepan. Add leeks, mutton stock, butter, parsley, onion, salt and pepper. Add chicken stock and potatoes. Bring to boil. Cover and let simmer for 20 minutes. Add cream and whisk until smooth. Serve with whipped cream.
ingredients: leeks, mutton stock, butter, parsley, onion, salt and pepper, head of celery, whipping cream
name: cawl cennin a hufen welsh cream of leek soup

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: kielbasa, worcestershire sauce, dark brown sugar, onion, hot sauce, water
name: sweet baked kielbasa sausage

steps: In a large saucepan, combine first 5 ingredients and simmer over medium heat for 10-15 minutes until berries pop, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium low, stir in marmalade and cook for 5 more minutes. Set aside to cool, stirring occasionally. Transfer to glass bowl and refrigerate until chilled. Will keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: grand marnier, lemon-flavored vodka, cranberry juice, ginger ale, lime, juice of, ice cubes, lemon, orange
name: citrus cranberry delight

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: baked beans, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter, brown bread, ham, jarlsberg cheese
name: boston baked bean sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, flour, ground cinnamon, salt, apples, egg, butter, unbaked pie shell, pecans
name: grated apple pie

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp.
ingredients: turkey breast, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: garlic and rosemary roasted turkey breast

steps: Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture evenly between the three pie crusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze. Leave out or refrigerate to soften a bit before cutting. Store leftover in freezer.
ingredients: chocolate cookie pie crust, peanut butter, cream cheese, sugar, non-dairy whipped topping, chocolate fudge topping, hot fudge topping
name: the best peanut butter pie

steps: Place pork chops in greased slow cooker. Top with onions and mushrooms. Combine soup mix, water, and mushroom soup. Pour over mushrooms and onions. Cover. Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 4-5. Serve over rice or cooked noodles.
ingredients: center-cut pork chops, brown gravy mix, cream of mushroom soup, water, potatoes, onion, salt, pepper
name: tender pork chops in gravy

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion slices to pan and cook until soft for about 1-2 minutes. Remove fillet from pan and drain on paper towels. Serve fillet with onion slices. Just increase the amount of ingredients to your needs, but use as less oil as possible and do not use more than 8 sprigs thyme and 2 cloves garlic for one pan.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, vegetable oil, onion, bell pepper, lemon, juice of, vinegar, cayenne, salt
name: african tilapia

steps: Place rim of chilled glass into rasperry preserves. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the pomegranate juice, orange-flavored liqueur and vodka to the shaker. Shake briskly to mix and chill. Strain into the martini glass. Garnish with the pomegranate juice, orange-flavored liqueur and vodka to the shaker. Garnish
ingredients: pomegranate juice, vodka, orange-flavored liqueur, brut champagne
name: pomegranate champagne martini

steps: In 2-quart pyrex bowl melt balls on high or till melted. Stir. Add rest of ingredients and mix well. Spray or butter a 9x13 pan and pour fudge into pan. Refrigerate and cut into squares.
ingredients: cream cheese, semisweet chocolate morsels, vanilla wafer crumbs, strawberry preserves, almonds
name: strawberry fudge balls

steps: In a medium saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until soft and light golden brown, about 8-10 minutes. Add the tomatoes and juice and bring to a boil, stirring often. Lower the heat and simmer for 30 minutes, until as thick as hot cereal. Season with salt and serve. This sauce holds one week in the refrigerator or up to 6 months in the freezer.
ingredients: tomatoes, lime juice, olive oil, fresh parsley, garlic clove, hot sauce, mahi mahi steaks
name: tomato lime mahi mahi

steps: Place chicken on top of rice when serving.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, condensed cream of chicken soup, water, broccoli, instant rice
name: one skillet rice broccoli chicken dinner

steps: Wrap ribs in double thickness of foil and bake for 2 hours at 300 degrees f. Unwrap and drain drippings. Combine all ingredients and pour over ribs. Marinate at room temperature for 1 hour. Bake at 350 degrees 30 minutes, basting with sauce, or grill 30 minutes, 4 inches above coals turning and basting.
ingredients: pork spareribs, onion, ketchup, water, salt, worcestershire sauce, white vinegar, brown sugar, dry mustard
name: baked barbecued spareribs

steps: In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add cous cous, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot.
ingredients: vegetable oil, scallion, water, soy sauce, sugar, ground ginger, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, couscous
name: asian style couscous

steps: Heat oil in a non stick skillet. Add garlic and saute for one minute. Add sliced portobello mushrooms and saute until cooked and reduced, about 10 minutes on medium heat. Add optional red wine or cooking wine, mix well until reduced. Set aside once finished. When burgers are almost ready, top with portabello mushroom mixture and a slice of cheese, continue grilling or broiling until cheese is melted.
ingredients: portabella mushrooms, olive oil, salt, pepper, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, turkey bacon, tomatoes, fresh chives
name: portabella skins low fat and low carb

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, eggs, banana, applesauce
name: no fat banana applesauce muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350f and lightly grease a casserole dish. Cover chinese cabbage with boiling water and cook for about ten minutes or until tender. Drain very well. Combine vegetable oil, summer squash, red bell pepper, celery, green onions, lemon juice, lemon pepper, snow pea pods, lemon zest, salt and pepper. Pour into a baking dish, cover and bake in oven for 30 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: vegetable oil, summer squash, red bell pepper, celery, green onions, lemon juice, lemon pepper, snow pea pods
name: delicious lemon pepper vegetables

steps: Line bottom and 2 opposite sides of an 8-inch square baking pan with a sheet of wax paper, leaving a 2-inch overhang on both sides. Mix together flaked and dried coconut and condensed milk with your finger. Chill, uncovered, 5 minutes. Melt chocolate in a metal bowl set over a saucepan of barely simmering water or in top of a double boiler, stirring until smooth. Spread chocolate evenly over coconut layer with offset spatula and chill until firm, 5 to 7 minutes. Lift confection onto a cutting board using overhang and halve confection with a sharp knife. Sandwich halves together, coconut sides in, to form an 8- by 4-inch rectangle, then discard wax paper. Cut rectangle into 32 squares. Arrange paper cups on a platter and fill with candies. Chill, covered, until ready to serve.
ingredients: desiccated coconut, glace cherries, cherry brandy, red food coloring, sweetened condensed milk, dark chocolate, copha
name: cherry ripe bites

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line cookie sheet with parchment paper to keep from sticking. Combine bacon, pancetta, ground cinnamon, whipping cream, parmesan cheese, egg yolks, fresh fettuccine, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh chives. Bake for 30-40 minutes at 350 degrees. Drain on paper towels.
ingredients: bacon, pancetta, ground cinnamon, whipping cream, parmesan cheese, egg yolks, fresh fettuccine, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh chives
name: cinnamon pancetta carbonara by giada de laurentiis

steps: Heat butter in 8in skillet. Add scallops. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add maple syrup. Stir and saute 2-3 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 3-4 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 4-5 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 5-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 7-8 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 9-10 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 11-12 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 13-14 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 15-16 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 17-18 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 19-20 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 21-22 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 23-24 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 25-26 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 27-28 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 29-30 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 31-32 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 33-34 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Stir and saute 35-36
ingredients: bacon, unsalted butter, fresh scallops, half-and-half, dijon mustard, pure maple syrup
name: new england maple mustard scallops

steps: In 15 x 9 inch baking pan, place chicken pieces. Do not overlap. Place onion rings over top. Mix seasonings with cream of chicken soup and milk and spoon over chicken. Bake, uncovered, in 375 degree oven for 40 minutes. Sprinkle chicken with almonds, if desired. Bake 10 minutes more or until chicken is tender.
ingredients: celery, tarragon, salt, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, tomato juice, chicken broth, onion flakes, carrots, green pepper
name: lite chicken tarragon

steps: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add orzo and saute until golden brown. Add scallions and saute quickly. Add chicken broth, water, salt & pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and cook for 15-20 minutes.
ingredients: butter, orzo pasta, chicken stock, rice, roasted red peppers, chili powder, sweet smoked paprika
name: chili pilaf

steps: In a resealable storage bag thoroughly combine all ingredients except the flank steak, when combined add flank. Seal bag, turn to coat. Place in the refrigerator and marinate 24 hours, turning bag occasionally. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill to desired doneness, about 6 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer steak to work surface and let stand 5 minutes. Cut across grain into thin strips. Arrange on platter and serve.
ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, green onions, fresh parsley leaves, fresh cilantro leaves, jalapeno, garlic, salt, fresh ground pepper, flank steaks
name: grilled flank steak with herb sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Sear the chicken fillets in a nonstick frypan with a little olive oil spray. Arrange them in a casserole dish with the wine, lemon zest, olives and thyme. Cook in oven for 20 minutes or until cooked. Remove from oven, and pour over the lemon juice. Season a little with salt. Serve chicken on top of jasmine rice cooked with some lemon zest and chicken stock, pour over the juice.
ingredients: chicken thigh fillets, flour, olive oil flavored cooking spray, chicken stock, dry white wine, garlic clove, red onion, fresh thyme, green olives, lemon
name: slow cook chicken and thyme with green olives
