steps: In a large pot with plenty of salted water, boil the potatoes until they are tender when a fork is inserted, about 10-12 minutes. Drain and let the potatoes cool until you can handle them. With a melon baller, remove a scoop from each potato. Cut a tiny sliver off the bottom of the potatoes so they will stand after filling. Combine the boursin, butter, and cream. Taste and add salt and pepper as needed. Spoon or pipe the cheese mixture into the potatoes. Garnish with fine sprinkling of parsley. Add a tiny dollop of red caviar. Stand the potatoes on a platter to serve.
ingredients: baking potatoes, sour cream, table cream, red kidney beans, mexicorn, recaito, salt and pepper, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, picante sauce
name: mexican stuffed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: shortening, peanut butter, granulated sugar, dark brown sugar, egg, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt
name: crisp peanut butter cookies

steps: Heat oil and saute cabbage along with the oregano. Stir in cabbage and water mixing well. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally 8 to 10 minutes or until tender. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cabbage, olive oil, butter, salt, fresh ground pepper, chicken broth, dry sherry
name: simmered cabbage

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together all ingredients from crusty bread, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, olive. Separate the halves of the burgers, placing each half face-up on a baking sheet. Spread the meat mixture on each of the burgers, placing each half face-up on a baking sheet. Top with a slice of mozzarella. Bake for 20 minutes or until the cheese is golden and bubbly.
ingredients: crusty bread, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, olive
name: easy pizza burgers

steps: In a high-sided nonstick pot or wok, combine the cooked rice, cooked shrimp, green onions, chili peppers and water. Cook over high heat, stirring often to mix well and prevent sticking, until all ingredients are thoroughly heated and most of the water is gone, about 8 minutes. Turn the heat to high and stir for 1 more minute as the pot gets hotter. Add the nuoc cham and stir rapidly to mix thoroughly. Continue to cook over high heat, stirring constantly, until most of the liquid has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and serve.
ingredients: vegetable broth, poblano peppers, jalapeno peppers, cilantro, kosher salt, oil, long grain rice, onion, garlic
name: green poblano rice

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add flour tortilla, egg, red onion, green bell pepper, velveeta cheese and cook until lightly browned, stirring occasionally. Stir in flour tortilla, egg, red onion, green bell pepper, velveeta cheese and cook until lightly browned, stirring occasionally. Remove from skillet. Place a tortilla in the same skillet. Arrange cheese slices across the whole tortilla. On one side of each tortilla, put the roast beef and top the other side with onions. Cook over medium-low heat until lightly browned. Carefully fold tortillas in half, pressing gently. Arrange cheese slices across the
ingredients: flour tortilla, egg, red onion, green bell pepper, velveeta cheese
name: ww breakfast quesadilla

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 400 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, granulated sugar, margarine, nonfat sour cream, egg substitute, skim milk
name: ww sour cream muffins 3pts

steps: Cover with foil and bake at 375 for 8-10 minutes or until the bread is golden and cheese is melted.
ingredients: sauerkraut, pastrami, thousand island dressing, simply potatoes shredded hash browns, sharp cheddar cheese
name: potatoe reuben 5fix

steps: Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture equally between the three pie crusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze. Leave out or refrigerate to soften a bit before cutting. Store leftover in freezer.
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, creamy peanut butter, whipped topping, peanut butter cups, chocolate cookie pie crust
name: creamy peanut butter pie

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add soy sauce, cumin, brown sugar, toasted sesame oil, cayenne, tuna steaks, scallion, toasted sesame seeds, and sauté for 2-3 minutes or until golden and just cooked through. Transfer to serving plates.
ingredients: soy sauce, cumin, brown sugar, toasted sesame oil, cayenne, tuna steaks, scallion
name: thai tuna ww 6 pointsplus

steps: Place peas, onion, and cheese in a large salad bowl. In a small mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream and sugar until well blended. Add the sour cream mixture to the salad, then season with salt and pepper. Toss thoroughly with a large spoon. Place in refrigerator for several hours. Add the cashews just before serving, and toss well to thoroughly blend all ingredients.
ingredients: peas, american cheese, diced onion, pimientos, hard-boiled eggs, miracle whip, salt, paprika
name: grandma weseman s english pea salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Grease and flour 9x13 pan. Combine dry ingredients in mixing bowl. Beat in shortening. Add milk and vanilla. Beat for 2 minutes. Beat in egg whites, beat until very smooth. Bake for 35 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: egg yolk, sugar, evaporated milk, vanilla extract, coco lopez, cinnamon sticks, white rum
name: coquito traditional recipe made with egg yolks

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: cauliflower, salt, flour, butter, milk, sour cream, black pepper, sharp cheddar cheese
name: zapekanka iz tsvetnoy kapusty baked cauliflower

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix peaches and raspberries, and place in bottom of 3 qt casserole dish. Using fork, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon. Stir in eggs using fork. Batter will be quite dry. Pour over top of fruit. Pour melted butter of top. Place in oven and cook for 1 hour.
ingredients: peach, sugar, cinnamon, margarine, flour, milk, baking powder
name: mignon s peach cobbler

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and lightly cook the zucchini until golden. Add the stock and zucchini. Bring to a boil, lower heat and simmer for about 10 minutes or until zucchini is soft. Process in a food processor until smooth return to pan, add the stock and zucchini. Process in a food processor until smooth return to pan
ingredients: shallots, olive oil, fresh ginger, zucchini, chicken stock, orange zest, plain yogurt, salt, white pepper
name: orange and zucchini cold soup

steps: In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, sweetened condensed milk, peppermint extract, candy canes, red food coloring. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 239. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares. Store in the refrigerator.
ingredients: vanilla baking chips, sweetened condensed milk, peppermint extract, candy canes, red food coloring
name: candy cane fudge

steps: In small bowl, combine apple and arugula. Cut into 1/2-inch slices-set aside. Slice apple slices thin and saute in oil over medium-high heat until onions are soft and browned-set aside. Slice arugula slices thin and saute in oil over medium-high heat until onions are soft and browned-set aside. Slice apple slices thin and sa
ingredients: bun, dijon mustard, greens, fuji apple, salt and pepper, brie cheese, dried thyme
name: open face brie apple and arugula sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally.
ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, sweet potatoes, garlic, olive oil, dried rosemary, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt, lemon juice
name: rosemary chicken and sweet potatoes

steps: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook cauliflower until tender, 3-5 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving dish. In a small skillet, melt butter over medium low heat. Add scallions and cook 2 minutes. Pour over cauliflower and toss. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: cauliflower, milk, salt, shallot, curry powder, heavy cream, ground pepper, butter
name: curried mashed cauliflower with shallots

steps: In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, hamburger bunspreparation:In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcesters
ingredients: ground beef, onion, sweet green pepper, pork and beans in tomato sauce, diced tomatoes with juice, catsup, chili powder, yellow mustard, hot pepper sauce, hamburger buns
name: chuckwagon sandwiches

steps: Heat oven to 350. Grease 15x10 inch cookie sheet with edges. In a large bowl mix remaining ingredients and spread in the prepared pan, including hamburger. Bake 20 minutes to 25 minutes or until golden brown, and toothpick comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes cut into any size square desired and dip into your favorite sauce. Serve warm. These freeze very well and thaw in the microwave quickly.
ingredients: lean ground beef, bisquick, tomato sauce, egg, garlic clove, salt, oregano, pepper, worcestershire sauce, garlic salt
name: beef patties parmesan

steps: Drain and flake tuna with a fork. Combine with albacore tuna, fiber one cereal, egg beaters egg substitute, green onions, dijonnaise mustard, lemon juice, salt, seafood seasoning, then mix with tuna. Cut pita bread in half and line with lettuce and tomato slices. Add tuna and serve.
ingredients: albacore tuna in water, fiber one cereal, egg beaters egg substitute, green onions, dijonnaise mustard, lemon juice, salt, seafood seasoning
name: tuna fish cakes

steps: In a saute pan, brown the rice in oil over low to medium heat, stirring constantly. When the rice is brown, add the onion, bell pepper, chili powder and garlic salt. Turn the heat to high, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the tomatoes, and then chicken stock. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce the heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and let stand for 15-20 minutes. Remove from heat, and let stand for 15
ingredients: vegetable oil, yellow onion, rice, garlic clove, chicken broth, salt and pepper, chipotle chiles, corn
name: amazing mexican rice

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: potatoes, garlic cloves, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, chicken broth
name: skordalia potato garlic spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Wash zucchini, leaving skins on, and grate either by hand or in a food processor. Blot zucchini with paper towels to remove as much moisture as possible. Place in an 8 inch square baking dish that has been sprayed with cooking spray. Cut butter into small pieces and place evenly over zucchini. Bake for 15 minutes, uncovered. Remove from oven and pour off any liquid that has accumulated in the bottom of the dish. Stir in sour cream, salt and pepper. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese and bake until zucchini is tender and cheese melts. About 5-10 more minutes.
ingredients: zucchini, corn, cottage cheese, salt, pepper, green onions, parmesan cheese
name: stuffed zucchini ii

steps: Place potatoes on 4 pieces of greased heavy duty aluminum foil. Place onion and green pepper between potatoes to quarters. Top with bacon. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Wrap in foil. Grill, covered. Over med-high heat for 40-50 minutes or until potatoes are tender, turning once.
ingredients: potatoes, bacon, cheddar cheese, green onions, oil, salt, sour cream
name: pizza pan potato skins

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan over high heat and add the sweet potato, shallot, ginger, curry paste, sweet potato, chicken stock, coconut cream, coriander leaves and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add finely grated ginger and red curry paste and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add the coconut cream and bring back to a simmer. Blend with a hand held blender until smooth. Divide between bowls and decorate with coriander leaves.
ingredients: olive oil, shallot, sweet potatoes, carrots, ginger, curry powder, fat free chicken broth
name: curried carrot sweet potato or yam ginger soup

steps: Wash manzanita berries, lemon, rind of, cinnamon stick, sugar. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Stir in pectin. Bring to a rolling boil. Boil for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Quickly skim off foam with a large metal spoon. Pour into jelly glasses and seal. If you want to try to make it sugar free i think it would work, just make sure to get the sugar free pectin otherwise it will not set. If i try it anytime soon, i will post and let you know how it turns out.
ingredients: manzanita berries, lemon, rind of, cinnamon stick, sugar
name: manzanita jelly

steps: Combine the garlic, shallots, garlic, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, salt and pepper. Pour dressing over broccoli. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh broccoli, olive oil, shallots, garlic, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard
name: broccoli with balsamic dressing

steps: Place chipoptles and adobo sauce from can in a food processor. Pulse peppers until there are no large chunks. Mix peppers, sour cream, cumin, lime and salt well. Refrigerate several hours or overnight. Stir before serving with tortilla chips.
ingredients: chipotle chiles in adobo, mayonnaise, sour cream, cream cheese, fresh lime juice, salt, green onions, tortilla chips
name: chipotle chile sour cream dip

steps: Place chicken breasts in crock pot. Pour soup mixture evenly over chicken breasts. Sprinkle stuffing over entire top of dish. Drizzle melted butter on top of stuffing. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4 hours.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, onion soup mix
name: crock pot chicken stroganoff

steps: Layer salad ingredients in order as listed in air tight container. Mix salad dressing ingredients together. Put salad dressing on top of layered salad. Do not mix. Refrigerate overnight. Do not unseal until ready to serve. Mix just before serving.
ingredients: iceberg lettuce, cherry tomatoes, onion, cheese, cucumber, carrots, broccoli
name: lovely lady salad

steps: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add cream cheese, dill pickles, ham, mustard, swiss cheese, bread. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: cream cheese, dill pickles, ham, mustard, swiss cheese, bread
name: decadent grilled ham and cheese sandwich

steps: In a blender, combine all ingredients except ice cream. Blend well. Add ice cream. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
ingredients: whipped topping, cheesecake flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, strawberry yogurt, fresh strawberries, bananas, miniature marshmallow
name: strawberry cheesecake salad

steps: In a small saucepan over medium-low heat, saute the garlic until aromatic. Add the potatoes, and saute for another minute or so, then add the broth. Scramble the egg, parmesean cheese, hot sauce, salt and pepper in a serving bowl. When the broth comes to a boil, add the egg mixture while stirring. Remove from heat, place in a bowl, top with fresh ground pepper, and enjoy.
ingredients: garlic cloves, vegetable broth, olive oil, salt, bay leaf, sage, potatoes, cumin, egg yolks, gruyere
name: garlic soup with potatoes and cumin

steps: Put meatballs in crock pot. In a medium sized bowl mix together all remaining ingredients. Microwave on high for approximately 3 minutes or until boiling. Pour over meatballs in crock pot. Cook on low for 3 hours, stirring every half hour.
ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, beef broth, meatballs
name: meatballs with fancy sauce

steps: In the bowl in which you will serve the salad, whisk together the pesto, vinegar, salt and pepper. Gradually whisk in oil until smooth. Set aside. Bring a large pot of water to a boil add 2 t. Salt and the orzo. Cook, stirring occasionally until done. About 9 minutes. Follow package directions. Drain, rinse under cold water and drain again. Add to bowl with vinaigrette and toss to coat. Add chicken, tomatoes and spinach leaves. Toss to combine and serve.
ingredients: orzo pasta, parmesan cheese, egg, heavy cream, salt & pepper, spinach, olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, balsamic vinegar
name: creamy orzo and spinach

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f and grease a large baking tin, approximately 9 x 12 inches. Melt the butter or margarine over low heat in a small saucepan. Add the flour and stir until smooth. Add the vanilla, sugar and eggs and stir constantly for 5 or so minute. Remove from heat and stir in nuts. Set aside. Mix brownie ingredients together in a large bowl. Spread topping over. Bake for 35-40 minute be careful not to overbake. Cool and cut into bars.
ingredients: brown sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, milk, butter, chocolate chips, pie shell
name: brown sugar pie

steps: Combine all gravy ingredients except flour. Shape into patties and dredge in flour. Brown patties in oil in heated skillet over medium high heat. Remove from skillet. Combine all gravy ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done.
ingredients: lean ground beef, worcestershire sauce, onion powder, salt, black pepper, brown gravy mix, condensed cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk
name: hamburger patties smothered in gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: fresh green beans, sliced ripe olives, chopped pimiento, fresh dill, butter, balsamic vinegar
name: green beans ezekiel

steps: In a food processor with a metal blade or a blender container, combine the potato and black bean soup. Process 1 minute, or until smooth. Heat vegetable broth in a medium saucepan over medium heat, until thoroughly heated. To serve, ladle soup into 2 individual bowls. Spoon 1 tablespoon of sour cream on top of each. Swirl gently. Sprinkle with green onions.
ingredients: vegetable broth, mushrooms, carrot, potatoes, black beans, whole tomatoes, fresh cilantro, cajun seasoning, low-fat sour cream
name: potato and black bean soup

steps: In a large bowl, combine condensed milk, sugar, condensed milk, chocolate milk, vanilla, semisweet chocolate, creme de cacao, instant coffee granules, vanilla extractpreparation:This recipe can also be made with white chocolate. Simply substitute white chocolate and leave out the coffee. Beat the cream, pulverized peppermints and sugar untill stiff peaks form. Pipe or spoon onto a parchment paper lined baking sheet, sprinkle with the crushed peppermints, and freeze until firm, about 20 minutes. Heat the milk and salt for the hot chocolate in a saucepan over medium heat until steam begins to rise. Whisk in the remaining ingredients until smooth. Ladle into mugs and top with a rosette of frozen whipped cream. Doubling the whipped cream will give you quite a few rosettes to keep in the freezer until needed. Store them in an airtight container and try to use them within 2 or 3 weeks.
ingredients: ice cream sandwiches, cool whip, chocolate-covered toffee bits, caramel ice cream topping
name: ice cream bar yummies

steps: Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: pineapple slices, shrimp, red bell pepper, brown sugar, seafood seasoning, butter
name: pineapple shrimp packets

steps: Mix vinegar, water, dill seed, cucumbers, onion and garlic cloves in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 1 hour. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Remove
ingredients: water, vinegar, pickling salt, dill, garlic clove, bay leaves, mustard seeds, black peppercorns, chili flakes, carrots
name: small batch refrigerator dill pickles

steps: Mix flour, cold water, salt and pepper in a large mixing bowl with a pinch of salt. Mix in the butter with the flour mixture with your hands. Add the water by the tablespoon until you can gather the dough into a ball. Refrigerate the dough for about 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 450f grease 10-12 inch round pizza pan. Roll out the dough to fit the your pizza pan or you can just press the dough in the pan. Bake for 10 minutes and remove from oven. Let your oven cool down to 400f spread the crust with mustard and then layer on the tomato slices. Sprinkle the thyme, salt and pepper on top of the tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil and bake at 400f for 30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, flour, cold water, vinegar, egg, marmalade
name: finnish tarts

steps: Preheat oven to 180c line base and sides of a 10. 5cm by 21 cm loaf pan with baking paper. Sift flour and cinnamon together into a large bowl. Add sugar and mix. Combine eggs, essence and cooled melted margarine, and stir into dry ingredients until just combined. Fold in apples and sultanas. Spoon mixture into prepared pan and smooth surface. Bake for approximately 55 mins or until a skewer inserted in the centre comes out clean. Allow to cool for 10 mins in pan, then turn out to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, unsalted butter, milk, vanilla, flour, baking powder, peaches
name: tis mamas to keik mama s cake

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: peanuts, sunflower seeds, raisins, rolled oats, toasted rice cereal, toasted wheat germ, natural-style peanut butter, brown sugar, honey, vanilla
name: peanut energy bars

steps: Put the radish in a bowl. Add the salt, mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly, pressing out as much liquid as possible. Add the sesame oil, vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, cayenne. Mix and eat.
ingredients: carrot, daikon radish, salt, sugar, white wine vinegar
name: pickled carrot radish

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Grease and flour a loaf pan. Cream the butter and sugar thoroughly. Add the bananas, eggs and vanilla. Beat well. Sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir flour mixture into the banana mixture, alternating with the buttermilk. Add walnuts and mix well. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake at 325f for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before turning it out onto a cooling rack to cool completely.
ingredients: bananas, eggs, butter, sour cream, sugar, flour, baking powder, baking soda, vanilla, pecans
name: impossibly moist banana bread

steps: In a large non stick skillet, heat oil over med high heat, and cook tuna steaks 3-4 minutes per side, until golden and just cooked through. Transfer tuna to serving plates. Add honey glaze to hot skillet and simmer one minute, then pour over tuna. Serve with jasmine rice.
ingredients: tuna steak, sesame seeds, wasabi powder, soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, peanut oil, green onion, lime wedge
name: seared sesame wasabi ahi

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add sugar, water, and spanish peanuts. Cook one minute. Add peanuts and stir to combine. Transfer peanuts to baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with spanish peanuts and toss. Cool and then transfer to airtight containers. Store at least 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: sugar, water, red food coloring, spanish peanuts
name: burnt peanuts

steps: Heat oil in skillet. Add shallots and garlic. Cook and stir about 2 minutes until tender. Add curry powder. Cook and stir about 1 minute until the mixture becomes fragrant. Add the broth and bring to simmer. Add the lime juice and shrimp. Simmer until the shrimp are cooked through, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately.
ingredients: cooking spray, red onion, fresh ginger, curry powder, shrimp, fresh cilantro, cracked black pepper, salad greens, red bell pepper
name: curried shrimp salad appetizer

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. With electric mixer, mix cream cheese, splenda, vanilla extract, egg whites until thoroughly mixed. Add cake flour, salt, and milk. With electric mixer, mix thoroughly. Pour the batter into nonstick cake pan or spring form pan and bake for 1 hour at 325 degrees f. Let cool at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Place in refrigerator and chill for at least 2 hours.
ingredients: light butter, splenda granular, fat-free cream cheese, vanilla extract
name: splenda low fat cream cheese frosting

steps: Heat oil in an 8-to 10inch frying pan over low heat. Dip the tortillas, one at a time, in the hot oil just until limp, about 5 seconds. Fill tortillas equally with chicken mixture, roll up, and arrange side by side, slit side down, in a 9-x13 inch baking dish. Pour salsa evenly over top. Bake in a 350 degree oven until heated through, about 20 minutes. If desired sprinkle with more shredded cheese over hot enchiladas before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, diced green chilies, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, salsa
name: sour cream beef enchiladas

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. Mix 2 tbls sugar with the cinnamon in small bowl and set aside. Mix remaining ingredients to a soft dough. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls into cinnamon-sugar mixture. Shape each biscuit ball in sugar mixture to coat. Place on baking sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, egg yolks, almond extract, lemon extract, all-purpose flour, glace cherries
name: simply wonderful treasure balls

steps: Preheat oven 300f. Mix butter, maple sugar, eggs, whole wheat flour, baking soda, cinnamon, plain yogurt, carrots, walnuts, coconut. Bake for 50-55 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Cool in pan 15 minutes. Remove from pan and cool on wire rack. Cool at least 1 hour before frosting.
ingredients: butter, maple sugar, eggs, whole wheat flour, baking soda, cinnamon, plain yogurt, carrots, walnuts, coconut
name: yogurt carrot cake

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop mushrooms and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes.
ingredients: dried basil, eggs, water, salt, nonfat dry milk powder, black pepper, fresh mushrooms, margarine, 9 inch pie shell, swiss cheese
name: herbed mushroom quiche

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees f. In a 9x13-inch baking pan, combine chicken, bell pepper, onion, and garlic. Squeeze the juice of one lemon evenly over chicken and vegetables. Mix together 1 teaspoon lemon zest, oregano, lemon pepper and paprika. Lightly coat all with cooking spray and bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Turn chicken and cook 30-40 minutes longer. Or until chicken is no longer pink in center. When chicken is done, place on serving platter. Add juice of the remaining lemon to vegetables and pan drippings. Stir to blend, scraping bottom and sides of pan. Spoon mixture over chicken and serve.
ingredients: chicken drumsticks, lemon juice, white wine, olive oil, dried rosemary, onion, garlic, salt and pepper
name: lemony herbed drumsticks

steps: Preheat oven to 350f, grease and flour an 8-inch square cake pan and set aside. Peel, core and chop the apples. In a bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and syrup. Sift flour, ginger and cinnamon, and fold into creamed mixture with the apples. Put mixture into prepared pan, and bake for 40-45 minutes, or until cooked. May be cut into slices, or left as a cake and decorated with whipped cream and sprinkled with cinnamon.
ingredients: granny smith apples, butter, fresh ginger, brown sugar, raisins, dark molasses, orange juice, lemon
name: baked apples ala erbe

steps: In a large plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add skirt steak. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steak, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: skirt steak, kiwi, worcestershire sauce, water, lemon pepper, fajita seasoning mix
name: yevonne s fajita marinade

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly grease a 12 cup muffin pan. In a medium saucepan with enough water to cover, boil squash 20 minutes, or until tender. Remove from heat, drain, and puree in a food processor. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, salt and pumpkin pie spice. In a medium bowl, thoroughly mix together milk, egg and applesauce. Stir in squash. Fold the squash mixture into the flour mixture just until moistened. Spoon batter into the greased muffin pan, filling cups about full. Bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: squash, butter, light brown sugar, salt, unsweetened applesauce, eggs, cream of tartar
name: applesauce squash souffle

steps: Add pasta to large pot of boiling water. Boil uncovered until tender. Drain. Heat oil in pan, add onions and pancetta. Cook, stirring until onions are soft. Add tomatoes, stir over heat for 2 minutes then add cheese and pasta. Stir until heated through. Top with chopped green onion.
ingredients: bucatini pasta, butter, pancetta, egg yolks, milk, pecorino cheese, fresh ground black pepper
name: bucatini with pancetta cheese and eggs

steps: Put the caramelized bananas in a bowl with the rum. Let them soak while you saute the bananas. Melt the butter in a frying pan, add the sugar and stir until dissolved. Add the bananas and cook for a few minutes, until tender. Sprinkle the spices over the bananas, then pour the rum and raisins on top. Sprinkle on the almonds and serve. Good with ice cream.
ingredients: sweet unsalted butter, bananas, light brown sugar, light rum, vanilla ice cream
name: caramelized bananas with rum sauce and vanilla ice cream

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the butter, coconut essence, lime rind, caster sugar, plain flour, rice flour, shredded coconut with the coconut essence, lime rind, coconut essence, lime rind, coconut essence, lime rind, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut essence, coconut
ingredients: butter, coconut essence, lime rind, caster sugar, plain flour, rice flour, shredded coconut
name: lime coconut shortbread

steps: In a large non-stick skillet, cook the ground beef mixture, cheese, and tomatoes until the beef is no longer pink, stir frequently. Drain. In a 4-quart slow cooker, add the ground beef mixture, cheese, and tomatoes. Stir to mix. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or until the cheese is melted and mixture is well heated. Stir after 2 hours. Add in the onions, stir to combine. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: tortilla chips, ground beef, nacho cheese, salsa, lettuce, diced tomato, green onions, green chilies, sour cream, cheddar cheese
name: ground beef nachos platter

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: ketchup, soy sauce, honey, garlic cloves, chicken leg quarters
name: golden honey chicken

steps: In the 3 cups of water, simmer the meat for 30 minutes. Crumble the meat up as you add it to the water. There should not be any large pieces. After 30 minutes add the remaining ingredients. Simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Serve this up with some cheese and extra onions if you want.
ingredients: lean ground sirloin, onion, green pepper, no-salt-added tomato sauce, low sodium beef broth, no-added-salt tomato paste, sodium-free chili powder, cumin, brown sugar, dark red kidney beans
name: my cardiologist s chili

steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Stir well. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: frozen orange juice concentrate, white vinegar, water, black pepper, dried basil, olive oil, garlic clove
name: basil garlic citrus vinaigrette

steps: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook cauliflower until tender, 3-5 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving dish. In a small skillet, heat oil in a large saute or fry pan until very hot. Add vegetables all at once, spreading in an even layer. Do not stir until bottom of layer begins to brown. Flip and stir to get unbrowned pieces to bottom. Let cook until beginning to brown. The trick here is to keep heat high and brown pieces without overcooking or burning them. If pieces are browned, but not soft enough for your taste, turn off heat and cover pan for a few minutes.
ingredients: cauliflower, garlic clove, olive oil, sweet paprika, salt and pepper
name: cauliflower with paprika

steps: Mix together mustard seeds, celery seed, hot sauce, white vinegar, bay leaf, kosher salt, peppercorns, garlic, boneless pork butt. Let set for 6 weeks before eating.
ingredients: mustard seeds, celery seed, hot sauce, white vinegar, bay leaf, kosher salt, peppercorns, garlic, boneless pork butt
name: pickle meat aka pickled pork

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Combine oil, onion and carrots. Cook 7 minutes. Then add turkey, thyme and salt. Cook until turkey is browned. Sprinkle in flour and cook until absorbed. Stir in tomato paste and broth, bring to boil. Reduce and simmer until thickened. Transfer to a 2 quart baking dish and top with favorite prepared mashed potatoes. Bake 15 minutes in oven.
ingredients: onion, lean ground lamb, vegetable oil, mashed potatoes, hard-cooked eggs, parsley, salt and pepper, garlic powder, eggs
name: tunisian meat pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 large baking sheets with silicone baking sheets or parchment paper. In a food processor, chop the parmesan, gruyere and rosemary together until coarsely chopped. Set the cheese mixture aside. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. Working with dough strip at a time, coat each strip with the olive oil and then the cheese mixture, pressing very gently. Twist each cheese covered dough strip and place onto prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the salt, if you wish. Bake until the breadsticks are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes. Transfer the warm breadsticks to a basket and serve.
ingredients: self raising flour, cayenne pepper, butter, fresh parmesan cheese, tasty cheese, spring onions, parsley, egg, milk, sesame seeds
name: cheese and herb bread

steps: Preheat the oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 ovenproof dish. Boil the water and add the grits. Stir and lower the heat to simmer and simmer 5 minutes. Turn off heat and add the cheese and butter into the grits and stir. Let the cheese and butter melt then stir in the eggs. Stir in the peppers and the salt. Transfer in the the 9x9 dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes.
ingredients: chicken broth, milk, salt, white pepper, quick-cooking grits, smoked gouda cheese, butter
name: smoked gouda cheese grits

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add asparagus and cook for about 5 minutes. Add lemon juice, mustard, season with salt and pepper, and cook for another 5 minutes. Add asparagus and cook for another 5 minutes.
ingredients: hearts of palm, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, green onions, pimientos, cayenne pepper
name: hearts of palm dip

steps: Slice steak into thin strips and stir-fry in oil until no longer pink. Stir in soup, water and onion soup mix. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Stir in sour cream, heat through. Serve over noodles.
ingredients: venison steak, butter, fresh mushrooms, cooking sherry, water, lipton onion soup mix, garlic salt, curry powder, beef bouillon cube, sour cream
name: ted nugent s venison stroganoff

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour.
ingredients: butter, garlic, parsley, garlic powder, italian breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: moist and juicy garlic chicken

steps: In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired.
ingredients: ground beef, onions, kidney beans, chili beans, cumin, salt, celery salt, chili powder, brown sugar, tomato soup
name: easy beef and bean chili

steps: In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice, ice, cardamom, nutmegpreparation:In a blender, combine cucumbers, cold water,
ingredients: cold water, cucumbers, sugar, lime juice
name: agua fresca de pepino

steps: Heat a little oil in a large, iron skillet. Slice onion thinly then quarter the slices. Cook onions and ham on medium-high until onions are soft and ham is lightly browned. Reduce heat to medium-low and add eggs. Cook, stirring often, until eggs are about half done. Add parmesan and black pepper. Cook until eggs are set. Serve hot with good bread.
ingredients: lamb chops, parmesan cheese, eggs, fresh breadcrumb, peanut oil, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: parmesan breaded baby lamb chops

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place eggs in a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add 4 teaspoons of oil to pan and swirl to coat. Place eggs in carefully and cook until the white has become solid, about 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle the eggs with salt, pepper, and about a tablespoon of cheese for each egg. Swirl the remaining olive oil on the top of the cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: french bread, eggs, butter, salt, cheddar cheese, tabasco sauce
name: egg nests

steps: Rinse fillet and pat dry. Start grill. Heat to medium high to high. Rub with olive oil. If salmon is skinned, rub both sides. Rub one side with garlic, sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill for approximately 10 minutes, turning once, or until fish flakes.
ingredients: cucumbers, plain yogurt, garlic clove, dried dill, salmon fillets, olive oil, salt, pepper
name: grilled salmon with cucumber yogurt salad

steps: Place rice, urad dal, pistachios, roasted cashew nuts, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, pickle masala, kasuri methi, carrot. Place rice, urad dal, pistachios, roasted cashew nuts, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, pickle masala, kasuri methi, carrot. Place rice, urad dal, pistachios, roasted cashew nuts, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, pickle masala, kasuri
ingredients: rice, urad dal, pistachios, roasted cashew nuts, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, pickle masala, kasuri methi, carrot
name: stuffed idlis

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard.
ingredients: spaghetti, sesame oil, vegetable oil, honey, soy sauce, peanuts, coriander, green onion, dry red pepper, sesame seeds
name: oriental spaghetti salad

steps: Combine ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well. Pour vinegar mixture over cabbage mixture, tossing gently to combine. Cover. Chill 1 hour.
ingredients: savoy cabbage, napa cabbage, sweet onions, fresh bean sprouts, sliced almonds, chicken meat, vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, dijon mustard
name: helen s cabbage salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together butter, flour, salt, lemon juice, lemon, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, mix together powedered sugar, beaten eggs, softened cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth. Spread mixture over bottom layer. Bake 30-40 minutes, until top layer turns a light golden brown.
ingredients: butter, flour, powdered sugar, lemon juice, fresh lemon rind, sugar, eggs, baking powder
name: luscious lemon bars

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a medium non-stick skillet, over medium heat, add the first 4 ingredients and cook until meat is no longer pink and onion is tender. Drain if needed. While meat mixture is browning, boil water. In a large bowl add rest of ingredients except shredded cheese. Mix well. Pour into a greased or sprayed 2-quart baking dish. Cover with lid or foil and bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese and bake until cheese is melted and lightly browned.
ingredients: butter, onion, green pepper, ground beef, salt, cayenne pepper, beer, shredded cheddar cheese, english muffin
name: australian ground beef rarebit

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve soup with sprinkled with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: condensed cheddar cheese soup, sherry wine, frozen baby peas, sliced water chestnuts, green onion, bacon, herb seasoned stuffing mix, butter
name: peas please

steps: Rinse flank steak and pat dry. In a 1-gallon zip lock bag or large bowl, mix the soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, green onion, sesame seeds, garlic cloves, pepper, ground ginger. Add the steak, seal bag or cover bowl tightly, and chill, turning occasionally, at least 4 hours or up to 2 days. Lift steak from the bag and let drain briefly. Place meat on a grill over a solid bed of medium-hot coals or medium-high heat on gas grill. Close lid on gas grill. Cook steak, turning occasionally to brown evenly, for medium-rare, 9 to 12 minutes,, transfer steak to a platter and let stand 10 minutes, cut meat across grain into thin slanting slices,.
ingredients: onion, garlic clove, white wine, soy sauce, honey, vegetable oil, worcestershire sauce, minced ginger, pepper, flank steaks
name: judy s grilled flank steak

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Place marmalade sauce in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade.
ingredients: whole grain mustard, garlic, dried rosemary, pepper, pork tenderloin, orange marmalade, chicken stock, ginger, soy sauce, cornstarch
name: pork tenderloin with marmalade sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Butter a shallow 8 or 9-inch baking dish. Slice potatoes thinly and boil in salted water for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside. Heat oil and butter in a medium frying pan. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes. Add chicken and fry over a high heat until nicely browned. Lower heat and stir in tarragon and half of the cream and season with salt and pepper. Spread half of the potatoes in the greased baking dish and pour chicken mixture over top. Cover with remaining potatoes. Pour remaining cream over top of potatoes and sprinkle with gruyere. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until top of casserole is golden.
ingredients: chicken breasts, butter, olive oil, shallot, brandy, chicken broth, heavy cream, tarragon, dijon mustard
name: chicken with tarragon sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Form the dough into balls about 1 inch in size. Place a little white sugar in a small bowl and roll each ball in the sugar. Place the balls about 2 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes. Leave the cookies on the cookie sheet for 3 to 5 minutes. The cookies will be soft but they will harden as they cool.
ingredients: butter, white sugar, molasses, egg, all-purpose flour, ground ginger, cinnamon, baking soda, salt
name: molasses cookies

steps: In a large bowl, beat sugar and eggs together until yellow and frothy. Bring milk to boil, gradually add it to the egg mixture, beating constantly. Add coffee essence. Pour this mixture into ramekins, place in roasting pan. Add enough water to come half way up the sides of the ramekins. Bake in a moderate oven, 350 degrees until just set, about 45 minutes. To test, stick a skewer into the custard, if it comes out clean, the custard is done. Remove from oven and allow to cool.
ingredients: mangoes, lemon juice, coconut extract, skim milk, cornstarch, brown sugar
name: mango custard

steps: Cover roast with marinade and place in crock pot. Sprinkle marinade over roast. Top roast with baby carrots and mushrooms. Finish with a little more salt and pepper. Set crock pot on high for two hours, and then low for five to six more.
ingredients: boneless chuck roast, white vinegar, garlic salt, flour, olive oil, onion and mushroom soup mix, sweet sherry, brewed coffee, fresh mushrooms
name: savory chuck roast

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 large baking sheets with silicone baking sheets or parchment paper. In a food processor, chop the parmesan, gruyere and rosemary together until coarsely chopped. Set the cheese mixture aside. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. Working with dough strip at a time, coat each strip with the olive oil and then the cheese mixture, pressing very gently. Twist each cheese covered dough strip and place onto prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the salt, if you wish. Bake until the breadsticks are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes. Transfer the warm breadsticks to a basket and serve.
ingredients: eggs, water, olive oil, all-purpose flour, sugar, pecans, sea salt, fresh rosemary, orange rind
name: rosemary snack bread

steps: Preheat oven 350 degrees. In a bowl combine soup, sour cream, green pepper and onion. And mix well. Grease a 13-inch x 9inch x 2 inch baking dish. Put a third layer of noodles in dish. Cover with spread over the top and repeat layers. Bake, uncovered at 350 degrees for 40 to 45 minutes.
ingredients: cooked chicken, cream of chicken soup, green onion, ham, cooked rice, sour cream, milk, swiss cheese
name: swiss chicken and ham casserole

steps: In a saucepan, saute the eggs in margarine. Blend in flour. Cook and stir until bubbly. Add salt and milk and cook until thick. Stir in chopped parsley. In a greased casserole, place hard boiled eggs, cut in half and round side up. Pour sauce over eggs. Toss mixture of melted margarine and bread crumbs over top. Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes.
ingredients: hardboiled egg, sunflower oil, onion, red chilies, water, tamarind pulp, maggi seasoning, rice
name: son in law eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, active dry yeast, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese, beer, basil, dried oregano, dried rosemary, round sourdough loaf, butterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, active dry yeast, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese, beer, basil, dried oregano, dried rosemary, round
ingredients: all-purpose flour, active dry yeast, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese, beer, basil
name: basil beer bread

steps: Cook and drain pasta according to package directions, rinse with cold water. In large bowl combine mayonnaise, salt, pepper and garlic. Add pasta, salsa and green onions. Toss with large spoon coat. Cover and chill 1 hour to blend flavors.
ingredients: tomatoes, chickpeas, basil, fresh parsley, garlic, balsamic vinegar, fresh ground pepper, salt, conchiglie, parmesan cheese
name: pasta with salsa cruda di pomodoro

steps: Preheat oven to 325 f. Mash the bananas until they are mostly lump-free. With a hand mixer, beat together the banana, applesauce, eggs, vanilla, and water until creamy. In a separate bowl, sift the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and spices. Gradually add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients, beating well. Pour the batter into a gently oiled and floured 95 inches loaf pan and spread evenly. Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick is inserted and comes out clean. Cool completely on wire rack before slicing.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, nutmeg, banana, honey, skim milk
name: honey banana bread

steps: Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno pepper, salt and freshly ground black pepper. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f.
ingredients: chicken pieces, chili powder, brown sugar, paprika, sea salt, barbecue sauce, tomato sauce, orange juice, soy sauce
name: chilli scented barbecued chicken

steps: Heat broiler, with rack set 4 inches from heat. Place kiwi on a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, without turning, until opaque throughout, 7 to 9 minutes. Let cool briefly, then flake. Divide spinach and tomatoes among serving plates. Top with kiwi, baby carrots, red onion, sliced almonds, poppy seed dressing and drizzle with vinaigrette.
ingredients: fresh spinach leaves, kiwi, baby carrots, red onion, sliced almonds, poppy seed dressing
name: spinach kiwi salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. For sauce combine soup, mayo, lemon juice and curry powder in a bowl. In bottom of 13x9x2-inch baking dish layer frozen broccoli, chicken, and sauce. Sprinkle with grated cheese and breadcrumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Can be eaten plain or on top of rice.
ingredients: broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, velveeta cheese, mayonnaise, eggs, cracker crumb
name: broccoli cheese casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Bake in 375 oven until golden and the eggs are cooked apprx 25 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, broccoli, onion, bell pepper, spinach, bacon, parmesan cheese, butter, salt, pepper
name: scd gluten free vegetable frittata

steps: In a small pan, heat milk until simmering. Add banana and berries, stir, then add oatmeal and wheat germ. Simmer for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until milk is absorbed. Let stand 2 minutes. Sweeten with honey.
ingredients: eggs, flax seeds, wheat germ, banana, strawberries, honey, milk
name: berry banana protein shake

steps: Mix all ingredients together in large bowl. Refrigerate 20 min or till needed. Serve with crackers.
ingredients: blue cheese, butter, tabasco sauce, onion, toasted almond
name: blue cheese balls juustotahna

steps: Combine sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar,
ingredients: dried apples, popped popcorn, pecan halves, butter, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, vanilla extract
name: cinnamon apple popcorn

steps: Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Season both sides of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Cook, turning once, until firm to the touch, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add the lime juice to the skillet, and scrape up any browned bits that cling to the pan with a wooden spoon. Add the chicken broth and ginger, and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and add the basil and mint to the pan and swirl the pan to combine. Spoon the herb sauce over the chicken.
ingredients: leeks, chicken broth, unsalted butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, kosher salt, pepper, lemon juice, fresh tarragon
name: herbed chicken breasts with buttered leeks

steps: Melt butter in large nonstick skillet on low heat. Add shrimp. Cook and stir on medium heat 5 minutes or just until shrimp turn pink. Stir in seasoning blend and wine until shrimp are well coated. Serve over cooked rice, if desired.
ingredients: baby shrimp, sweet onion, fresh cilantro, water, ketchup, hot sauce
name: not your ordinary shrimp cocktail

steps: In a large non-reactive container, mix the cider vinegar, mustard, garlic, lime juice, lemon juice, brown sugar, salt, and pepper. Whisk in the olive oil. Place chicken in the mixture. Cover, and marinate 8 hours or overnight. Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat, or preheat your broiler. Lightly oil the grill grate. Discard marinade. Place chicken on the prepared grill or under broiler, and cook 6 to 8 minutes per side, until juices run clear.
ingredients: wine vinegar, chicken, mayonnaise, pecans, soy sauce, chives, sour cream, ginger, salt, onion
name: you have to try chicken spread

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute the onion and garlic until limp. Add the green pepper. Cook and stir until tender. Drain the tomatoes, reserving juice, and pour them into the skillet. Season with thyme, parsley, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes over medium heat. Add the frozen okra, and pour in enough of the reserved juice from the tomatoes to cover the bottom of the pan. Cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until okra is tender.
ingredients: sweet onions, okra, tomatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, hot sauce
name: okra and tomatoes

steps: Heat oven 180c. Grease 2 pans 19cm x 29cm. Line trays with baking paper. Combine butter, sugar, eggs and essence in large bowl. Add sifted flour and oats and mix well. Divide mixture into 3 equal portions. Press 1 portion over base of one tray. Repeat with 2nd portion over base of 2nd tray. Heat jam and spread over the 2 bases. Crumble remaining mix over jam in both trays. Bake 30 minutes or till browned, cool in pans.
ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, egg, flour, baking powder, jam
name: season s easy jam bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 inch pan. Cream together both sugars and shortening. Add egg and mix together. Mix in all remaining ingredients and pour into prepared pan. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and sugar. Bake for 35 minutes or until toothpic comes out clean.
ingredients: white flour, wheat flour, powdered sugar, butter, sugar, splenda granular, flour, egg whites, vanilla, rhubarb
name: cookie crusted rhubarb bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. We have also toasted the muffins and cooked these in the microwave.
ingredients: unsalted butter, flour, ale, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, english mustard, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce, english muffins, bacon, parsley
name: mean chef s welsh rarebit

steps: Place pork shoulder, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, chili paste with garlic, chinese five spice powder, ground ginger, bok choy. Pour over pork shoulder and do not stir. Serve over rice.
ingredients: boneless pork shoulder, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, chili paste with garlic, chinese five spice powder, ground mustard, ground ginger, bok choy
name: sweet and spicy asian pork crockpot

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix butter, flour, oatmeal, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, peaches, raspberries, granulated sugar, cornstarch, vanilla ice cream. Bake for 15 minutes in 400 degree oven. Then pour butter, flour, oatmeal, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, peaches, raspberries, granulated sugar, cornstarch, vanilla ice cream. Bake for 30 minutes longer in 400 degree oven. Bake for 30 minutes longer in
ingredients: butter, flour, oatmeal, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, peaches, raspberries, granulated sugar, cornstarch, vanilla ice cream
name: peach and raspberry streusel

steps: In a large heavy saucepan combine all the ingredients and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Stir occasionally to prevent sticking. When mixture is simmering, reduce heat to low. Cook mixture until fruit is tender and the relish has thickened, approximately 40-50 minutes, stirring occasionally. Let cool, serve.
ingredients: cranberries, navel orange, tart apples, crushed pineapple, sugar, green grapes, orange zest, salt, walnuts
name: fruity cranberry relish

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place thai marinated summer squash in a large bowl. Mix dressing ingredients in a small bowl, stream in the extra-virgin olive oil and beat dressing with a fork. Pour dressing into the food storage bag and seal bag. Coat the vegetables evenly with dressing then grill vegetables a couple of minutes on each side until marked and tender. Arrange on a small platter.
ingredients: zucchini, summer squash, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, lime juice, of fresh mint, fresh basil, gingerroot, jalapeno, reduced sodium soy sauce
name: grilled thai marinated summer squash

steps: Spray inside of slow cooker with cooking spray. Cover and cook on low heat 7-8 hours.
ingredients: pork chops, seasoning, olive oil, pineapple rings, teriyaki sauce
name: tender pork chops with pineapple

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Beat egg. Add remaining ingredients except granulated sugar and mix well. Press dough into ungreased 13x9x2 inch pan. Sprinkle granulated sugar evenly over bars. Bake 15 to 20 minutes. Cool slightly. Cut into bars. Cool completely. Remove from pan and store in airtight container.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, butter, baking powder, egg, heavy cream, sugar
name: danish sugar pretzels kringler

steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add the dill mixture to the pancake mixture. Add the dill mixture to the pancake
ingredients: potatoes, eggs, cracker meal, onion, salt, dill, oil
name: mouthwatering potato pancakes with dill

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Season onion, garlic cloves, green bell pepper, potatoes, tomato sauce, dry white wine, cumin, fresh sage, salt and pepper, chicken leg quarters. Season to taste with some salt& pepper. Cover and chill. Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, green bell pepper, potatoes, tomato sauce, dry white wine, cumin, fresh sage, salt and pepper, chicken leg quarters
name: cuban style slow cooker chicken fricassee

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a plastic bag, combine flour, salt and pepper. Shake to coat chicken with flour mixture. Melt butter in casserole dish or skillet. Brown chicken on all sides. Mix in sour cream, cream of chicken soup, poppy seeds, chicken, butter-flavored cracker crumbs, butterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
ingredients: sour cream, cream of chicken soup, poppy seeds, chicken, butter-flavored cracker crumbs, butter
name: special delivery chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut up the fruit cocktail into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, cornstarch, salt, milk, butter, vanilla extract, 8 inch pie shell and mix well. Pour the mixture over the fruit cocktail and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: fruit cocktail, sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon, butter, egg, double crust pie crust
name: fruit cocktail pie

steps: In a large nonstick saut pan over medium heat, combine cooked rice and whole milk. Heat until mixture begins to boil. Decrease heat to low and cook to a simmer, stirring frequently, until mixture just begins to thicken, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to medium, add heavy cream, coconut milk, sugar, and cardamom. Continue to cook until mixture just begins to thicken again, approximately 5-10 minutes. Use a whisk to prevent the cardamom from clumping. Once mixture begins to thicken, remove from heat and stir in raisins and pistachios. Transfer the mixture to individual serving dishes or a glass bowl and place plastic wrap directly on the surface of the pudding. Serve chilled or at room temperature. I like my rice pudding a little sweet, so i also added a little bit more sugar than the 2 oz. Called for in the recipe to suit my personal taste.
ingredients: uncooked rice, milk, butter, sugar, eggs, salt, almonds, cinnamon, whole almond, light cream
name: baked rice pudding unni riisipuuro

steps: Add macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts, macadamia nuts
ingredients: sugar, light corn syrup, macadamia nuts, vanilla extract, baking soda, sweetened coconut
name: tropical brittle

steps: Preheat the oven to 350f place the pork roast side by side, fat side up in a large heavy roasting pan. Insert an ovenproof meat thermometer in the center of one of the roast. Roast the pork for 30 minutes. Meanwhile in a bowl, crush the rosemary with the olive oil, pepper, vinegar and salt. Spoon the seasoning over the pork. Return the meat to the oven and roast for 30 minutes longer, until the internal temperature is 160 to 165. Remove from the oven, cover loosely with foil and let rest for at least 10 minutes. Thinly slice the meat and arrange on platters. Pour any juices over the meat. Garnish with rosemary springs. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: pork roast, water, liquid smoke, kosher salt
name: oven smoked kalua pork

steps: Mix flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, butter, water, instant yeast, all-purpose flour, yeast, milk,
ingredients: flour, yeast, milk, currants, apples, salt, oil
name: oliebollen

steps: In a large serving bowl put the lettuce, canned black beans, tomato, green onion and cheese. Lightly toss. Right before serving mix together the ranch dressing and salsa and pour over the salad. Mix well. Serve at once. You may top the salad with roasted chicken pieces that you have diced, but that is optional.
ingredients: brown rice, canned black beans, corn, onions, white vinegar, vegetable oil, fresh cilantro, jalapeno, chili powder, salt
name: albuquerque salad

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, brown rice, soy sauce, tabasco sauce, red bell pepper, asparagus, minced garlic clove, carrot, salt & pepper
name: spicy shrimp and rice

steps: Place beef in crockpot. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours. Remove beef. Return beef to crockpot and cover, cooking for another 30 minutes on high. Return beef to crockpot
ingredients: chuck roast, italian salad dressing, brown sugar, italian seasoning, sandwich buns
name: sweet italian beef crock pot

steps: Boil water. Add to large teapot with 5-6 teabags and fresh mint. Steep until cool. Add to orange juice. Add sugar to taste. Add squeeze of lemon juice.
ingredients: lemonade, ginger ale, black tea, black cherries, strawberries, berries, lemon, zest of, mint leaves
name: pretty berry cherry punch

steps: Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until they look fairly cooked and shiny. Add almonds and saut for a couple more minutes. Finally, add frozen green beans and splash of soy sauce. Stir frequently until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture.
ingredients: fava beans, onion, butter, olive oil, garlic clove, tomato sauce, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: fava beans just like grandma made

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine water, brown rice, red onion, celery, dried cranberries, vinaigrette dressing, splenda sugar substitute, salt and pepper. Pour dressing over rice, mixing thoroughly. Add water, brown rice, red onion, celery, dried cranberries, vinaigrette dressing, splenda sugar substitute, salt and pepper. Add water, brown rice, red onion, celery
ingredients: water, brown rice, red onion, celery, dried cranberries, vinaigrette dressing, splenda sugar substitute
name: balsamic brown rice salad

steps: Melt 1 cup oleo in a 9x12-inch cake pan. Put 4 of the 6 cups of berries or fruit in the pan. Spread out evenly. Combine sugar, flour, baking powder and milk. Pour batter over berries or fruit. Sprinkle remaining berries or fruit over top of the batter. Sprinkle cinnamon over top. Bake at 375f for 30-45 minutes until cake is done.
ingredients: butter, self-rising flour, sugar, milk, fruit
name: one pan cobbler

steps: Put the dumplings in a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Add flour, one tablespoon sugar, salt, and mix well. The dough will be sticky. Divide in 8. Make a square from each part. Wash the plums well, remove the pips and in their place put a little sugar and cinnamon. Put a plum on each square and fold the dough around the fruit to obtain a dumpling. Bring to boil water in a large saucepan and put a little sugar and cinnamon. Put a plum on each square and
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, small curd cottage cheese, flour, fruit, milk
name: fruit dumplings

steps: Preheat oven to 180c line base and sides of a 10. 5cm by 21 cm loaf pan with baking paper. Sift flour and cinnamon together into a large bowl. Add sugar and mix. Combine eggs, essence and cooled melted margarine, and stir into dry ingredients until just combined. Fold in apples and sultanas. Spoon mixture into prepared pan and smooth surface. Bake for approximately 55 mins or until a skewer inserted in the centre comes out clean. Allow to cool for 10 mins in pan, then turn out to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: apple juice, sugar, raisins, walnuts, cornstarch, cinnamon rolls
name: south american raisin cake

steps: Combine milk, milk, sugar, ice, cardamom in a blender. Blend for 30-40 seconds until smoothie reaches desired consistency. The blender may need to be jiggled at the beginning as there is no liquid in the bottom. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cantaloupe, milk, sugar, ice, cardamom
name: cantaloupe milkshakes

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
ingredients: cream cheese, granulated sugar, cool whip topping, crushed pineapple, graham cracker pie crust, instant lemon pudding mix, milk
name: layered pineapple and lemon cheesecake pie

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Grease a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Pour the melted butter into the bottom of the baking dish, then sprinkle with garlic powder, then parmesan cheese. In a large bowl toss the potato halves in olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Place the potatoes cut-side down over the parmesan cheese in the baking dish. Bake for about 40-45 minutes, or until tender.
ingredients: mushroom, reduced-calorie margarine, garlic salt, cooking spray, parmesan cheese, paprika
name: garlic parmesan mushrooms

steps: Combine sugar, molasses and molasses in suacepan. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook for 10-15 minutes until mixture turns a light caramel color. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Pour over popcorn and nuts. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: popped popcorn, egg white, dark molasses, vanilla, salt, splenda granular, dry roasted peanuts
name: candied popcorn splenda

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes with the garlic, rosemary, and 1 tbs oil. Season generously with salt and pepper. Arrange potatoes in a single layer, cut side down. Bake, tossing potatoes once, until beginning to brown, about 20 minute. Meanwhile, rub fillets with remaining tsp oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Remove baking sheet from the oven. Add the tomatoes and olives to the potatoes. Stir to combine. Push the vegetable mixture to one side of the baking sheet and place the fillets flat on the baking sheet next to the vegetables. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast until the fish is cooked through and potatoes are brown and tender, about 15-20 minute. Transfer the fish and vegetables to a serving platter and serve immediately.
ingredients: cod fish fillets, potato, salt and black pepper, fresh rosemary, extra virgin olive oil
name: potato rosemary crusted fish fillets

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: spice cake mix, apple pie filling, eggs, vegetable oil
name: apple spice snack cake
